40001001	Ukunguut nengllugutet, sivunghi Jesus Christ-am. Tagikaaguq David-em nengllugutanganeng. David Abraham-enkuneng pinguuq.
40001002	Abraham atakaa Isaac-em, Isaac atakaa Jacob-em, Jacob atakaat Judah-nkut anglegutkullghiit,
40001003	Judah atakaak Perez-enkuk, Zerah-nkuk (Naangak Tamar), Perez atakaa Hezron-em, Hezron atakaa Ram-em,
40001004	Ram atakaa Amminadab-em, Amminadab atakaa Nahshon-em, Nahshon atakaa Salmon-em,
40001005	Salmon atakaa Boaz-em, (Boaz-em naakaa Rahab). Boaz atakaa Obed-em, (Obed-em naakaa Ruth), Obed atakaa Jesse-m,
40001006	Jesse atakaa Umiilgem David-em. David atakaa Solomon-em. (Solomon-em naakaa Uriah-m nulighqesaqanga.)
40001007	Solomon atakaa Rehoboam-em, Rehoboam atakaa Abijah-m, Abijah atakaa Asa-m,
40001008	Asa atakaa Jehoshaphat-em, Jehoshaphat atakaa Joram-em, Joram atakaa Uzziah-m.
40001009	Uzziah atakaa Jotham-em, Jotham atakaa Ahaz-em, Ahaz atakaa Hezekiah-m,
40001010	Hezekiah atakaa Manasseh-m, Manasseh atakaa Amos-em, Amos atakaa Josiah-m.
40001011	Josiah atakaat, Jechoniah-nkut anglegutkullghhiit allgeqaagut tamaani Jews-et tuguluki aglaataqngatki Babylon-mun.
40001012	Kingunganeng aglaatellghita Babylon-mun, Jechoniah atakaa Shealtiel-em, Shealtiel atakaa Zerubbabel-em,
40001013	Zerubbabel atakaa Abiud-em, Abiud atakaa Eliakim-em, Eliakim atakaa Azor-em,
40001014	Azor atakaa Zadok-em, Zadok atakaa Achim-em, Achim atakaa Eliud-em,
40001015	Eliud atakaa Eleazar-em, Eleazar atakaa Matthan-em, Matthan atakaa Jacob-em,
40001016	Jacob atakaa Joseph-em. Joseph ugiikaa Mary-m. Mary naakaa Jesus-em. Jesus Messiah-nguuq.
40001017	Sivunghi Jesus Christ-am whatetut: 14-ngukaagut kingunqullghiit Abraham-emeng David-mun. 14-ngukaagutlu kingunqullghiit David-meng kenlanga Jews-et tuguluki aglaatellghitnun Babylon-mun. Taagken Babylon-mun aglaatellghitneng 14-ngukaagutlu kingunqullghiit kenlanga Christ-am allgellghanun.
40001018	Jesus Christ-a allgeqaaguq whaten: naanga Mary aang'ghutngwaaqaq Joseph-mun, iwernga nengughutellghillukek Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham qumingestekaa.
40001019	Ugikaghqaan Joseph-em kenqigneghutmineng kayngusaakneghmeng Mary piluku, aksaqluku peggnaqegkaa.
40001020	Sumeghtaghaatkumaluku tawaten pilleghqani, Atanghem yaqulgan aliighvikluku qavangukun pikaa, “Joseph, David-em kingungha, alingegpenang nulighqigu Mary qayughllak Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham aqsangestekaqaa.
40001021	Ighnengnaqnguuq; atighnaken Jesus-meng qayughllak ellmi yuni yuguliyaghqaqii seghleghqellghitneng.”
40001022	Qamaglluni tawaten aneghtekaaguq apeghiighnaluku Atanghem akuzitkegkaa uuknaliqistekun whaten,
40001023	“Aghnaghaq yugem atuqellghilkanga qumingluni, ighnengellequq. Aatqesaghqaqaa Emmanuel” whaten pisiq, “Kiyaghneq whangkunnilnguq.”
40001024	Enkaam Joseph taghtughluni Atanghem yaqulgan pisqellghatun pikaq. Mary nulighqegkaa,
40001025	iwernga atuqumangilkanga kenlanga ighnengellghanun. Taagken Joseph-em Jesus-meng atiqaa.
40002001	Jesus allgeghaqngan Bethlehem-emi Judea-melngughmi, Herod umiilgulghii. Allgellghan kingunganeng ighaleqetaaghneng liitkaghllaget asivaghmeng kaatkat Jerusalem-emun.
40002002	Aapqughwaaqat, “Naagu taghnughhaq allgelghii umiilgat Jews-et? Ighaleqetaagha esghaamaaghput asivaghmelluku enkaam manigughyaghtughaqaghput.”
40002003	Umiilgem Herod-em nagaqughluku teggellghiighllakaq, qamagtengngwaaghlutengllu Jerusalem-eghmiit maligulluteng.
40002004	Tagsiqlighteghluki qamaglluki chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng aaptekii, “Nani Christ-a allgeghyaghqaawa?”
40002005	Kiimsiqaat, “Bethlehem-emi Judea-melngughmi. Uuknaliqistem whaten igaqegkaqaa:
40002006	‘Elpek Bethlehem, Judah-melnguq, igleghutisteyaggiitneng Judah-m ukavantelleghpigaanghituten, qayughllak elpeneng taginaqnguuq igleghutista, igleghutiyaghqaq yumneng Israel-eghmiineng.’”
40002007	Taagken Herod-em aksaqluku tagsiqliqii ighaleqetaaghneng liitkaghllaget, liigiknaluku qavngaq aliighyuwhaaqaatanga ighaleqetaaq.
40002008	Taagken pikii, “Bethlehem-emun aghulaqlusi elngaatall ivaghteggu taghnughhaq. Naalkegkufsigu ungipaasaghtughnakefsinga, whangallu manigughyaghtughlleqaqa.”
40002009	Tawaten umiilgem piyisteng igleghtekat. Esghaghlaataqaat ataasiq taana ighaleqetaaq asivaghmelluku, enkaam elngaatall quyateghllakat. Maligtekaat kenlanga aghuliillghanun taghnughhaam nengan quulngani.
40002011	Iteghluteng mangteghamun esghaqaat taghnughhaq, naangallu Mary. Segesqughquulluteng maniguqaat. Taagken aqeftaghaateng qelpeghlluki tunquqaat tunusameng: gold-meng, frankincense-meng, myrrh-meng.
40002012	Taagken Kiyaghneghem qavangukun yitkii Herod-mun uteghnifqiita pisqelluki enkaam aglaqat nunameggnun allatgun tumetgun.
40002013	Ighaleqetaaghneng liitkaghllaget aghulaqsata, qavangukun Atanghem yaqulgan aliighvikluku Joseph pikaa, “Makelluten taghnughhaqlu naangallu anagutikek Egypt-mun. Tamaanlleghhaten uteghniisqellemnun kenlanga qayughllak Herod-em ivaghtesnaqa taghnughhaq tuqutesnaluku.”
40002014	Enkaam unugmi tawani Joseph-em makelluni aghulaqutkakek taghnughhaqlu naangallu Egypt-mun.
40002015	Tamaantekat kenlanga Herod-em tuqullghanun. Enkaam apeghiiqaaguq Atanghem akuzitkegkaa uuknaliqistekun whaten, “Tuqluqaqaqa ighneqa tagisqelluku Egypt-meng.”
40002016	Herod-em liigiksamigu ighaleqetaaghneng liitkaghllagnun puughsimaniluni sakriteghllakaq. Taagken pilluwaghtet kayagtekii Bethlehem-emun, uvitanganunllu tuquqiisqelluki qamaglluki mekelghiighhaat allgenghhaghhaghneng, maalghugegnun ayumiqulleghtutkalghiinun kenlanga. Tamaakut taghnughhaat nakmikegkaqii qayughllak ighaleqetaaghem allgellghaneng maalghugughlleghhiik ayumiqullghek, ighaleqetaaghneng liitkaghllaget apellghitni.
40002017	Tawaten pilleghqun uuknaliqistem Jeremiah-am uuknaliqellgha apeghiiqaq:
40002018	“Ramah-mi nagaquqaat leghaghllagaataq. Rachel-nguftuq qiyalghii avaqutaminun, repall ilutughsaghyaghqaaghhaagpenani, qayughllak qamaglluteng tuqulaghaatkat.”
40002019	Joseph-enkut Egypt-melluki Herod tuqukaq, qavangukun Atanghem yaqulgan aliighvikegkaa Joseph
40002020	pikaa, “Makelluten taghnughhaqlu naangallu uteghniitikek Israel-mun, qayughllak tuqutinaqsalghiit taghnughhaghmeng tuqulaghaasimaat.”
40002021	Enkaam Joseph-em makelluni taghnughhaqlu naangallu aglaatkakek Israel-mun.
40002022	Iwernga Joseph-em nagaqughluku nutaghaq umiilga Judea-m, Archelaus-nguniluku Herod-em ighnegha, alingegkaq tawavek aglaneghmeng. Qavangukun Kiyaghneghem ungipaatkaa Joseph Judea-tefqaan pisqelluku, enkaam Nazareth-mun aglaqat Galilee-melngughmun. Tamaantekat uuknaliqistet whaten pillghat, apeghiighesqelluku, “Messiah Nazareth-eghmiinguyaghqaaguq.”
40003001	Taakwaningani John Paaptaayesta aglaghluni kilgaanganun Judea-m, piinliqaq ungipaqimeng.
40003002	Whaten pikaq, “Avuteghqellusi taaqitek seghleghqenneghmeng, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem kaasaghtuumaaq.”
40003003	John-nguuq uuknaliqistem Isaiah-am akuzitkegkaa whaten piiqngami, “Kilgaani kina akilghuugaquq whaten: ‘Yataaghqiteggu Atanghem tuumkaghqaa, taklaghrukegsaghteggu igleghavigkaa!’”
40003004	John-em aatkii camel-em melqwaaneng ulimaaghet, meqameng tafsiluni, neqekluni locust-mengllu honey-mengllu.
40003005	Yuget aglaghtuutkat ellnganun Jerusalem-emengllu Judea-mengllu uvitanganengllu Kiiwem Jordan-em.
40003006	Seghleghqelleteng qayvighqenghatki, John-em paaptaayaaqegkangi Jordan-egni.
40003007	John-em esghaghluki Pharisees-elghutetlu Sadducees-elghutetlu tagilghiit ellminun paaptaayesqelluteng pikii, “Elpesi nemeghyani! Kitum anagesqisi Kiyaghneghem nanqigtelleghqaaneng kaannaqelghiimeng?
40003008	Sivuklusi pinitun pilleghpesigun ipapighqiteggu seghleghqelleghpesineng avuteghqelleghsi.
40003009	Whaten'ngam sumeghtaghaghpenasi, ‘Kiyaghneghem nanqiggnaanghitiinkut qayughllak kingunqiinkut Abraham-em.’ Ungipaatamsi Kiyaghneghem Abraham kingunengllaannayaghaa maaken uyghagneng!
40003010	Whaa maaten qalqalimayaqleggiinaghlluteng ayuqut uqfiget akwiitgun. Qamaglluteng uqfiget pinilghiimeng piitestinghilnguut kepluki, kenghegnun miluusaghqaagut.
40003011	Meghqun paaptaayeghiiqunga avuteghkegkanun seghleghqelleghmeggneng. Iwernga tagiyaghqam kingumneng paaptaayelleqiisi Agleghnalghiignengllu Taghneghagneng, keneghmengllu. Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq whangamneng, repall talwa kamegkek tugumiiqepagningitagka.
40003012	Taana tagiyaghqaq nanqigtiyaqleggiinaaguq. Aafsaghqaqii pinilghiit yuget seghleghneng, katam piitesiighaghtem pekutamineng malliillghatun grain-et. Kagpagluki grain-et mallaq tamaana miluusaghqaqaa qaamyaghqaanghilnguugnun kenghegnun.”
40003013	Taagken Jesus Galilee-meng tagikaq Jordan-egnun, John-mun paaptaayesqelluni.
40003014	Iwernga John-em akuzinnaqutkegkaqsaqanga whaten, “Whanga elpek paaptaayeyaghqaqsaghaghpenga. Sangavek whangamnun tagizin?”
40003015	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Legan saaqsin paaptaayenga qayughllak tawaten pikumtung apeghiighlleqaghpung Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha.” Enkaam John-em paaptaayekaa.
40003016	Jesus paaptaayeyatni meghmeng aanegkaq. Taagken qilak qelpeghluni esghaqakek Kiyaghneghem Taghneghakek ukilghiik dove-etun ayuqlutek, enkaam ellngakun nalukak.
40003017	Taagken ma qilagmeng pikaq, “Unanguuq piniqegkaghllaka Ighneqa, efquqepigtaqa.”
40004001	Taagken Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham aghulaqutkaa Jesus kilgaanun, Tughneghaghmun seghleghqesnaqutkesqelluku.
40004002	40 aghneq, 40 unuk Jesus neghumangilnguq; taagken taakut aghneghet kingungitneng iyataqaq.
40004003	Taagken Tughneghaam takuluku pikaa, “Kiyaghneghem Ighneqngukangaten, neqngughtesqiki tamaakut uyghaget.”
40004004	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Yuuk kiyaghhnaanghituq neqnginaghhaghqun, iwernga kiyaghsaghqaaguq tamaghhaakun Kiyaghneghem akuzitangakun.’”
40004005	Taagken Tughneghaam Jesus aglaatkaa Jerusalem-emun, Agleghnalghiimun Neghllagmun. Tawani Temple-m uusqallghakun nekevesluku
40004006	pikaa, “Kiyaghneghem Ighneqngukangaten, qetgeghi tesamavek; qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Kiyaghneghemnguq yaqulegminun paqnasightesaghtughlleqaaten; iiggmeggneng nuqneqelleqaaten luuraq itegaghten uyghaghquunnayukata.’”
40004007	Jesus-em pikaa, “Iwernga Akuzitet Igaqegkat whatenllu pikaagut, ‘Ataneq Kiyaghneghen nanghiiqugpenaan sasqelluku ellngan piyukelqenghilkanganeng.’”
40004008	Taagken Tughneghaam Jesus mayuulluku uusqapiglleghiimun naayghamun kelgutkii qamagtengngwaaghluki ataneghpagullghi nunam, pinighnalleghllagillu.
40004009	Enkaam pikaa, “Qamagtengngwaaghluki maakut tuunelleqanka elpenun, segesqughlluten manigughyaquvnga.”
40004010	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Tughneghaq, iqiten! Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pikaagut, ‘Manigughyaghqaqan Ataneq Kiyaghneghen, ellnginaaguqlu qepghaasaghqan!’”
40004011	Taagken Tughneghaam unisagu Jesus, yaqulget aflengaksaghtuqaat.
40004012	Jesus-em nagaqughluku John anusimingllaghvigmenniluku, Galilee-mun uteghniqaq.
40004013	Nazareth-meng aglaqaq Capernaum-emun tamaannaluni. Capernaum esnenganituq Naayvam Galilee-m, nunami Zebulun-enkuk Naphtali-nkuk kingunghita kiyaghfigitni.
40004014	Jesus-em tawaten pilleghmikun apeghiiqaa uuknaliqistem Isaiah-m uuknaliqellgha. Qavngarugllak Isaiah-m uuknaliqutkegkaqii yuget kiyaghlleghhiit nunagkeni Zebulun-enkuk Naphtali-nkuk. Taakuk nunak naayvam tunganganilnguuk, nallangani Kiiwem Jordan-em, Galilee-melngughmi Gentile-et kiyaghfigitni!
40004016	Isaiah-m pikaqegkangi whaten, “Tamaakut kiyaghlleghhiit seghleghqellghem mamleghqestellghani esghaasaghqaagut nighugllagmeng. Alingellghita tuqumeng llangaqa nunangat saapngalghii taghneghangutellghaneng tuqullghem. Iwernga maaten aghtaghaataqii.”
40004017	Galilee-mun uteghnilleghmineng kenlekluku Jesus-em piinliqaa ungipaqilleni, “Avuteghqellusi seghleghqennanightek, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem kaasaghtuumaaq.”
40004018	Jesus-em igleghutkelluku esnengani Naayvam Galilee-m, esghaqakek anglegutkullghiik, Simon-enkunguftuk (aatghan allgha Peter), Andrew-nkuk. Iqalliniilghiik negaghpagtek miluutaqluku naayvamun.
40004019	Taagken Jesus-em pikakek, “Maligtegnenga, apeghtughlleqamtek iqalliniightengughtesqellutek yugneng.”
40004020	Tawaninginaq negaghpatek unilluki maligtekaak.
40004021	Taaganiqaaghaq esghaqakek anglegutkullghiik, James-enkuk John-enkuk ighneghqek Zebedee-m. Angyameggni atakullghiit negaghpateng ilaaghtughaqeftiit. Jesus-em tuqluqakek.
40004022	Tawaninginaq angyaghtek unitkaak atayeklu enkaam Jesus maligtekaak.
40004023	Jesus igleghakaq tamanganun Galilee-mi, synagogue-ngitni apeghtughiiqluni. Nani alngunak ungipaqaq Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Ataneghpagullghem, naallghuquqaq tamaghhaaneng aqnighneghnengllu, qinuyugnengllu.
40004024	Ungipaq mingitkaalghii naallghuqullgha tamaghhaani Syria-mi. Enkaam yuget tagitkiit ellnganun qamaglluki qinuyulghiit, allaaghhiinaaghneng aqnighnelget, ikfiqngalghiit, tughneghalget, sayugpagtaqayuget, uniiqatlu. Qamaglluki Jesus-em naallghutkii.
40004025	Uglaapiglleghhiim maligtekaat Galilee-meng, Decapolis-meng, Jerusalem-emeng, Judea-meng, Jordan-emllu inglunganeng taagegken.
40005001	Jesus-em esghaghluki yulghuteghllaget maligullghiit, qemimun mayughluni aqumegkaq. Maligsaaghtemi takulaghaasatni,
40005002	apeghtughikaq:
40005003	“Tamaakut liisimakilghiit aklukingalleghmeggneng Kiyaghneghem kayusillghaneng quyastellelguut, qayughllak yukii Ataneghpagullghan Qilagem.
40005004	Tamaakut qivghulghiit quyastellelguut, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem ilutughsaghyaghqaqii.
40005005	Tamaakut qusevegngalghiit quyastellelguut, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaqaa nuna ellngitnun.
40005006	Tamaakut atuqiyupiglleghhiit Kiyaghneghem piyukellghaneng quyastellelguut, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaqii piyukellghitneng.
40005007	Tamaakut nangllegtalghiit quyastellelguut, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nangllegyagusaghqaqii.
40005008	Tamaakut umyugaqegtat quyastellelguut, qayughllak esghaghyaghqaqaat Kiyaghneq.
40005009	Tamaakut nekeggmellengestikayuget yugneng quyastellelguut, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqniyaghqaqii.
40005010	Tamaakut amyuutkellengelghiit atuqutmeggneng Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha, qaatkutngatmeggneng quyastellelguut, qayughllak yukii Ataneghpagullghan Qilagem.
40005011	“Quyastellelguusi yuget seghlequuqangisi, amyuutkegkangisi, iqlengiqutkegkangisi maligsaaghtengutegpesineng whangamnun.
40005012	Elngaatall quyaghllagtek qayughllak qilagmi pama akileghtuusaghqalegllaguusi. Amenqun, neghighluku uuknaliqistet amyuutkegkiit katam maaten amyuutkellghistun elpesi.
40005013	“Taghyustun ayuqusi nunam yuganun. Iwernga taghyuq taghyughningiiskuni, alla naten taghyughnighsaghqaanghituq. Atuunanighllequq samun alngunak enkaam egllequq taagken yuget tutmaasghaqelleqaat.”
40005014	“Nighugestun ayuqusi nunam yuganun. Neghllak qemim qaaynganilnguq talughngayaghqaanghituq.
40005015	Talwa kitum alngunak kenelghutak kumaghllukek sagneghmun asingiinnaanghitaak. Itupill quulvaqun llilleqaak nighugutesqellukek tamaghhaanun ilunganilngughnun.
40005016	Tawateghpigaq nighugsi kuukgutesteggu yugnun esghiisqelluku aneghneghqilleghsi, enkaam usuqnakangat Atazi qilagmelnguq.
40005017	“Sumeghtaghaatkegpenanga taaqesaghtuuniluki atuqneghmeng Moses-em Liilightuusiillu uuknaliqistetlu apeghtuusiit. Tagingunga apeghtuutkennaluki ipa sameng pisighpigaatangi.
40005018	Ipa piimsi, qilagenkuk nunankuk kenletghuutellghegkenun kenlanga, talwa sasquvegaghhaq allangughhnaanghituq Liilightuusanilnguq kenlanga qamaglluteng Liilightuusanilnguut apeghiillghitnun.
40005019	Enkaangam kitum alngunak qaatkenghilkumigu ataasiq Liilightuusaq, apeghtuusaqegkumigullu yugnun qaatkefqaan pisqelluku, Kiyaghneghem pilleqaa ukalighpigaaniluku Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem. Naqamenraq kitum alngunak qaatkegkumiki Liilightuusat, apeghtuqumikillu ilangi yuget qaatkesqelluki, Kiyaghneghem pilleqaa aangyaghqaaniluku Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem.
40005020	Enkaam ungipaatamsi, iteghnaanghitusi Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem, wetkuqun qaatkutngaaghataghaqufsi Kiyaghneghmun, apeghtughikayugneng Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enengllu.
40005021	“Nagaquqaqaghsi sivunesinguq ungipaatkaqiit, ‘Yugtaghpenasi. Kina alngunak yugtalghii nanqigsaqleguuq aghyuughyaghqaaluni.’
40005022	Iwernga whanga piimsi, kitum alngunak ugumiyaguskumigu yulgutni, nanqigtivigmun aglaghsaqleguuq. Kitum alngunak pikumigu yulgutni, ‘Uyuq nallughllak’, agghistenun aglaghsaqleguuq. Kitum alngunak sasiinghinnikumigu yulgutni, aglaghsaqleguuq kumaghulghiimun hell-mun.
40005023	Enkaangam aghqefigegni Kiyaghneghmun tuuninaqumaluten tunusaghpeneng, neqaaskuvgu sugagsimaniluku yulguten,
40005024	tunusan unilluku ilaliighyaghtughnaken. Taagken tagiluten tunusan tuunaken Kiyaghneghmun.
40005025	“Kitum avutkumakangaten seghletun pimaniluni, ilaliighaghhnaken aglaasimaluten nanqigtivigmun, luuraq avutkistegpek tuunayukangaten nanqigtistemun. Taagken nanqigtistem kelengakistemun anusimingllaghtesnayukangaten.
40005026	Ipa piimken, anusimingllaghtesimakangaten aanaanghituten kenlanga nanqigtistem llivikesqellgha qamaglluku llivikegkuvgu.
40005027	“Nagaquqaqaghsi whaten pilleq, ‘Gelgaghniighpenasi’.
40005028	Iwernga whanga piimsi, kitum alngunak esghaghluku aghnaq qiliiqegkumigu taawa gelgaghniighuuq qamagun ilumikun.
40005029	Enkaam aghenqigneghem iyegpek seghleghqestekangaten, iikluku eggnaken! Itagnaghyaghqaaguq yugusin nalighneghiteghngaaghmi, iingunaghmi hell-mun miluutelleghqaaneng.
40005030	Aghenqigneghem iiggegpek seghleghqestekangaten, kepluki eggnaketen! Pinighataghaghyaghqaaguq yugusin nalighneghiteghngaaghmi, iingunaghmi hell-mun pilleghqaaneng.
40005031	“Nagaquqaqaghsi whaten pilleq, ‘Kitum alngunak nuliini pegtekumigu, igangllaannakanga kelgutusighqameng pegsimaniluku.’
40005032	Iwernga whanga piimsi, yugem nuliini pegsaghqaqenghita wetkuqun gelgaghniiqan. Gelgaghniinghiteghngaan pegtekumigu, gelghaghniightesleqaa allaneng yugmeng ugiiqan. Kitum nulighkegkumigu, taana yuuk ellngallu gelgaghniighullequq.
40005033	“Nagaquqaqaghsillu sivunesinguq ungipaatkaqiit, ‘Akequsan avelghaghpenaan, iwernga Ataneghmun akequsan atuqaqigu’.
40005034	Iwernga whanga piimsi, akeqigpenang atuqluku Kiyaghneghem aatgha, nalighmeng sakun alngunak. Akeqigpenang qilagkun qayughllak aqumutaqaa Kiyaghneghem igleghutilleghminun,
40005035	nalighmeng nunakun qayughllak itegaghiitaqaa Kiyaghneghem, nalighmeng Jerusalem-kun qayughllak neghllakaa Umiilegpagllagem.
40005036	Akeqigpenangllu naasqughpegun qayughllak talwa ataasighhaq nuyaq qateghtesnaanghitan nalighmeng tagneghtesnaanghitan.
40005037	Yeghlegi legan ‘aang'ghhaasi’, nalighmeng ‘nakaaghhaasi’. Sangwaat ilaskufsiki taakugnun Tughneghaghmeng pinguut.
40005038	“Nagaquqaqaghsi whaten pilleq, ‘Kina iiyngiquvgu elpeklu iiyngighyaghqaaguten. Kitum gguutnga mughugaghtekuvgu elpeklu gguten mughugaghsaghqaaguq’.
40005039	“Iwernga whanga piimsi, seghletun pistesi akitegpenaki. Kitum qasaghtekangaten ullungagpegun inglungallu tuunaken.
40005040	Enkaam kitum aglaaskangaten nanqigtistemun, ggategken ellmi pinalukek qaasligkenllu tuunakegken ellnganun.
40005041	Kitum alngunak qelghuskagu akmagtani igleghutesqelluku ataasimun mile-mun, alla ataasiq mile-a ilannaken.
40005042	Kitum sameng tungsighvikegkangaten, tuunaken. Kitum sameng navghaghvikegkangaten, navghinnaken.
40005043	“Nagaquqaqaghsi whaten pilleq, ‘Piniqluki ilakumtaasi, ugumikluki ugumikilghiit elpesineng’.
40005044	Iwernga whanga piimsi, ‘Piniqluki ugumikilghiit elpesineng, yughaatkaqitekillu amyuutkistesi Kiyaghneghmun quyastesqelluki’.
40005045	Tawaten pikufsi yuget liisimakelleqiisi avaqutaqutsi Atagpesinun qilagmelngughmun. Yuuk tamaghhaan tawateghlluwaaq piiqaa. Siqineni piitestaqaa seghleghnunllu pinilghiinunllu. Tawateghpigaq eslallugughtestaqaa qaatkutkayugnunllu qaatkusigalngughnunllu.
40005046	Kiyaghneghem akileghtughlleqisii-i piniqistenginaghhasi piniqegkufsiki? Talwa tax-meng qerngughtistet piniqaqiit piniqisteteng.
40005047	Enkaam ilakumtaghhiinasi quyakaataqufsiki, naten allangulleqetsi ilangitneng yuget? Talwa maniguusigalnguut Kiyaghneghmun quyakaqiit ilakumtaateng!
40005048	Elpesi avaqutaqngutanganeng Atagpesi qilagmelnguum pinightek tawateghpigaq Atagpesi pinillghatun.”
40006001	Jesus-em apeghtuusani nagneghutkii, “Wataghllak pinitun pillesi esghaghsaqegpenaki. Esghaghsaqegkufsiki Atagpesi qilagmelnguum akileghtughnaanghitiisi.
40006002	“Enkaam tuunikuvek aklumalghiinun, piniiyugneghestun pigpenang. Qalghightaghtestikayuguut tuunivagilgameng esghiisqelluteng. Tawaten piiqut, synagogue-nillu tumenillu usuqesqelluteng. Ipa ungipaatamsi akileghtuusangwaaghluteng ayuqut.
40006003	Iwernga tuunikuvek aklumalghiinun, kina alngunak ungipaategpenaan,
40006004	kitumun alngunak nallukesqelluku tuuniillghen. Atagpek esghapagaqaaten enkaam akileghtughlleqaaten.”
40006005	“Yughaneghpesini piniiyugneghestun pigpenasi. Yughaghyuneghtuut nekevghaghmeng synagogue-nillu tumenillu esghiisqelluteng yugnun. Ipa ungipaatamsi akileghtuusangwaaghluteng ayuqut.
40006006	Iwernga yughaghnaqneghpeni, iteghluten negpenun uumgulluten yughaghaqi Atagpenun aliinneghilgughmun. Atagpek liisimakaa aksaqluku sallghen enkaam akileghtughlleqaaten.
40006007	“Yughaneghpesini Kiyaghnepigmun maniguusigalngughestun pigpenasi. Yughaneghmeggni uteghpagtaghaqiit akuzitet sameng pisiinghilnguut. Sumeghmeggni akuzilleghllagmegteggun kiimsighlleqniluki yughalleteng piiqiit.
40006008	Ellngistun ayuqegpenasi qayughllak Atagpesi liisimakaa aklukegkaghsi, talwa aaptestegpenasi.
40006009	“Enkaam whaten yughaghaqitek, ‘Whangkuta Atavut qilagmelnguq pamani, agleghnalghii aatghen quulvallengli.
40006010	Yughaghtukut Ataneghpagullghen tagisqelluku, piyukellghenllu apeghiighesqelluku nunami whani, katam qilagmelngughestun.
40006011	Neghyaghqaliteqeghtikut aghneghmi whani.
40006012	Seghevutaghtiki seghleghqelleput seghevusimaluki seghletun pisteput.
40006013	Nanghiiqullengestegpenaamta, iwernga yugulikut taagken Seghleghmeng. Ataneghpagulleq, aghtughyaghqaanghilleq, nighughqelleq, elpek pikaten quunperugllak. Amen.’
40006014	“Seghevuskufsiki seghletun pistesi, Atagpesi qilagmelnguum seghevulleqiisi.
40006015	Iwernga seghevunneghilkufsiki seghletun pistesi, Atagpesi seghevunnaanghitii seghleghqellesi.
40006016	“Fast-eneghpesini iilqesugnighqegpenasi piniiyugneghestun. Aghmigigatut, mesuunangigatut liigikesqelluteng fast-enguniluteng. Ipa ungipaatamsi, akileghtuusangwaaghluteng ayuqut.
40006017	Fast-eneghpeni aghmigaqillu mesuunaaqillu,
40006018	ilagpenun nallukesqelluku fast-ellghen. Iwernga Atagpek aliinneghilnguum liisimakaa saaquten enkaam akileghtughlleqaaten.
40006019	“Nunami whani kagpagpenasi aklungimeng qayughllak kingugemllu anaghtaallghemllu naafqelleqii, teglegniightetlu naafqiiluteng teglegllequt.
40006020	Iwernga elpesineng katam qilagmi kagpagitek aklungimeng qayughllak moth-ngituq, anaghtaangituq naafqiiyaghqameng, tegleghniightengituqlu naafqiiluteng teglegughyaghqameng.
40006021	Sumeghtaghaatkumanginaghlleqaghsi aklungigpesinun kagpagvigsi.
40006022	“Iyek kenelghutastun ayuquk yugusimun. Iiskegtekuvek iingunaghmi yugusin nighugllagullequq,
40006023	iwernga iyellugmeskuvek iingunaghmi yugusin mamlegllagullequq. Enkaam nighuk ilugpenilnguq mamlegukumi, elngaatall mamlepigtuq!
40006024	“Kitum alngunak qepghaannaanghitaak maalghuk umiilgek. Maalghugegneng umiilelgukumi ugumikelleqaa ataasiq, piniqelleqaa ilanga. Qaatkutngallequq ataasimun, pitkennaanghitaa ilanga. Enkaam piniqnaanghitaghsi Kiyaghneq piniqumaluku mani.
40006025	“Tamaaken apalluqluku ungipaatamsi, nulqaviighutkegpenaan ungvalleghsi, sameng neghelleghqaghsi, meghelleghqaghsi, nalighmeng sameng aatelleghqaghsi. Sumeghtaghaqaghtekqun, unguvalleq megnunaghataghaghtuq neqmeng, yugusiqlu megnunaghataghaghtuq aatkaneng.
40006026	Esghaqaghtekiqun qawaaget, piitesighiigatut, unatiigatut, kagpagingigatut. Naqamllu Atagpesi qilagmelnguum neghqaqii! Elpesi megnunaghataghanghitsii qawaagneng?
40006027	Nalighpesi nulqaviighutkelluku unguvalleni taakughlleqaguu?
40006028	“Sangan nulqaviightaqetsi aasaghqameng? Esghaqaghtekiqun piitesighaat piitellghit, qepghiigatut talwa aatkanglliigatut ellmeggneng.
40006029	Ungipaatamsi talwa Solomon aklungighllagmini aasigatuq piitesighaghestun pinightutkalghiimeng.
40006030	Kiyaghneghem aasightughaqii vegaaghet, iwernga aga unaami quukaqiit. Kiyaghneghem aasightuqayugukaki veghaaget, aasightughataghaghnaanghitisii elpesi? Ugpeqilleghqestaapigutsi!
40006031	Tamaaken apalluqluku nulqaviightegpenasi whaten, ‘Sameng neghnaqesta?’ nalighmeng ‘Sameng meghnaqesta?’ nalighmeng ‘Sameng aannaqesta?’
40006032	Gentile-et tamaana nulqaviighutkaqaat. Atagpesi qilagmelnguum liisimakii qamaglluki aklukegkasi.
40006033	Tamaaken apalluqluku kiyaghtelleghpesini megnunalleghpigaaghtestekek Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghallu, piyukellghallu. Tawaten pikufsi Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqii qamaglluki aklukegkasi.
40006034	Nulqaviighutkegpenaan unaamilleghqaq, qayughllak unaamim seghleliighi itagnaghyaghqaagut tawavek aghneghmun. Seghleliiq pikayuguuq aghhutanga tamaghhaan, ilaaghataghaghpenaan unaamim seghleliilleghqaaneng.”
40007001	Jesus-em apeghtuusani nagneghutkii, “Nanqigtigpenasi ilagpesineng enkaam Kiyaghneghem nanqiggneghillisi,
40007002	qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqiisi tawatengngwaaq nanqigtilleghpesistun ilagpesineng. Atuqelleqiillu elpesinun ataasit tamaakut pikasi ilagpesinun.
40007003	Sangan esghaghsigu yulgutegpek iisqughutnga, elpek katam iisqughuten unaghsighllak avelghaghluku?
40007004	Salghiimeng yulguten pizigu, ‘Entaa-a iisqughutngiqaghlaken’, elpek paninang iisqughutelguluten unaghsighllagmeng?
40007005	Uyuq piniiyugneq! Sivukluku unaghsighllak iyegpeneng nusugluku elngaatall whateghlluwaaq esghaghluku yulguten iisqughutngighnaken.”
40007006	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Legasiighwaghtenun apeghtuusaqegpenaki Kiyaghneghem Akuzitangi, qayughllak qikmistunllu kurugaghestunllu ayuqut. Sangwaat agleghnalghiit tuunegpenaki qikminun luuraq sughugnayukangisi. Akituqat sungaat miluutegpenaki kurugaghnun, luuraq tutmaasghaqnayukatki.
40007007	“Aaptek, allgeghullequsi; ivaghitek, naalkullequsi; tenglugtughtek amigkun, qelpeghulleqiisi.
40007008	Qayughllak kina alngunak aapleghhii, allgeghusaghqaaguq; kina alngunak ivaghilghii, naalkusaghqaaguq, kina alngunak tenglugtulghii amigkun, qelpeghulleqaa.
40007009	Kitum yugem ighneni tungsiqan neqekrangllameng, tuunelleqaguu uyghagmeng?
40007010	Nalighmeng tungsiqan iqallugmeng, tuunelleqaguu nemeghyameng?
40007011	Seghleghughngaaghpesi, avaqutasi tuunyaghqaqasi pinilghiimeng tunusameng. Atazi qilagmelnguq tuuniyugataghaghluni ayuquq pinilghiimeng tunusameng tamaakunun aapleghhinun ellminun.
40007012	“Enkaam yulgutegpesinun pinitun pistesukufsi, elpesillu pinitun piiqiteki. Tawaten apeghtughinguut Moses-em Liilightuusiillu, uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkiit.”
40007013	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Iteghtek kagpestaaghhaghqun amigkun. Amik hell-mun ayuqelghii nuqutuuq, tuumkegtuqlu enkaam uglaq taakwagun igleghtaquq.
40007014	Iwernga amik unguvalleghmun ayuqelghii kagpestaaghhaaguq, tuumllugmetuqlu enkaam qafsinkuuraghhaam naalkaqii tumet unguvalleghmun ayuqelghiit.
40007015	“Kelengalusi uuknaliqistesighwaaghneng. Takulleqiisi penniighsugnighqelluteng, taawanginaq ugighsalghiistun amaastun ayuqut.
40007016	Liigikelleqasi nangaghneghitgun liigikelleghpesistun uqfiget sameng piitestillghitgun. Sikughlluget piitestingigatut grapes-meng nalighmeng figs-meng, tawateghpigaq seghleghet yuget pinitun pingigatut.
40007017	Uqfik pinilghii piitestiyaghqaaguq pinilghiimeng, taawanginaq uqfik seghleq piitestiyaghqaaguq seghleghmeng.
40007018	Uqfik pinilghii piitestinaanghituq seghleghmeng, uqfik seghleq piitestinaanghituq pinilghiimeng.
40007019	Enkaam alngunak uqfik piitestinghilnguq pinilghiimeng kepluni kumaghsaghqaaguq.
40007020	Enkaangam tawatetellghitgun liigikelleqasi uuknaliqistesighwaaghutangi.”
40007021	Jesus-em apeghtuusani nagneghutkii, “Ilangi yugem whangamnun maligsaaghtekniiqut enkaam piiqaatnga, ‘Atanqamken’ iwernga iteghnaanghitut Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem. Tamaakunginaat atuqilghiit piyukellghaneng Atama qilagmelnguum iteghyaghqaagut Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem.
40007022	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani, uglam piyaghqaqaanga whaten, ‘Ataneq, Ataneq! Ateghpegun Kiyaghneghem ungipaa aapqaqaghput. Ateghpegun aanesquqaqaput tughneghaat uglalghiineng yugneng. Ateghpegun allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaagukut uglaghngaan!’
40007023	Iwernga whaten pilleqanka, ‘Nallukngwaaghamsi, iqitek whangamneng, seghletun pisteni’.
40007024	“Kina alngunak nagallghii apeghtughillemnun, qaatkegkumiki peghqinelghiitun yugtun ayuquq mangteghangllaqaq uyghagem qaayngakun.
40007025	Eslallugughteghllagyalghiimi, kiiwet ulevumaghmeng, anuqlighllagyalghiimillu, tawallima mangteghaq uullghumangilnguq qayughllak uyghagkun nekeftekaalghii.
40007026	“Iwernga kina alngunak nagateghngaaghmi apeghtughillemnun, qaatkenghilkumiki, nalluqatun yugtun ayuquq mangteghangllaqaq qenaaghllugkun.
40007027	Eslallugughteghllagyalghiimi, kiiwet ulevumaghmeng, anuqlighllagyalghiimillu, aga mangteghaq uulqaq naavngwaaghluni.”
40007028	Jesus tamaaken apeghtughineghmeng taaqsan, yulghuteghllaget saghiighayukat,
40007029	qayughllak apeghtughikaq aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni, apeghtughikayugestun Liilightuusameng pigpenani.
40008001	Jesus qemimeng ukigyan, yulghuteghllagem maligtekaa.
40008002	Taagken yuuk, leprosy-lek, tagiluni ellnganun, segesqughfikluku, pikaa, “Ataneq, piyukelqegkuvgu, ukmangiqaghnga.”
40008003	Enkaam Jesus-em tawavek saafluku pikaa, “Piyukelqaqa, ukmangiighten!” Tawaninginaq leprosy-ngiitkaq.
40008004	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Wataghllak kina alngunak ungipaategpenaan naallghutelleghpeneng, yeghlegi aglaa priest-mun esghaghligu naallghutellghen. Taagken aghqerraaghhaaten Moses-em Liilightuusaan pisqellghatun ipapighqesqelluku naallghutellghen.”
40008005	Taagken Jesus Capernaum-emun pikaq. Kaataquqlu, Rome-em umiilwaaghan takuluku kayusiitaghtesqelluni pikaa,
40008006	“Ataneq, whangkunni qepghaghteka, uniighumaaq, ikfiqeghllaguuq.”
40008007	Jesus-em pikaa, “Naallghusaghtughnaqaqa.”
40008008	Iwernga umiilwaaghem pikaa, “Ataneq, itagnanghitunga elpenun iteghviksaghqaalunga mangteghamnun. Legan tawanlluten naallghutesqigu qepghaghteka enkaam naallghulli.
40008009	Qelghikayugmeng umiilelguunga enkaam whangallu qelghaqanka pilluwaghtenka. Ataasiq qelqumkun, ‘Aghulaqi’ aga aghulaqellequq. Ilanga whaten pikumkun, ‘Tagi’ tagillequq. Qepghaghteka qelqumkun, ‘Una piightigu’, aga pilleqaa.”
40008010	Jesus-em nagalluku saghiighayukaq, enkaam yuget maligullghiit ellminun pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, nallaasigatunga kitumeng alngunak Israel-eghmiimeng, uutun yugtun ugpeqineghtutkalghiimeng.
40008011	Ungipaatamsi, asivaghmengllu pakfallamengllu yulghutet tagilaghaasaghqaagut Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem. Tawani aqumuulluteng neghelgusighlleqiit sivuneput Abraham-enkut, Isaac-enkut, Jacob-enkut.
40008012	Iwernga tamaakut Ataneghpagulleghmesaghqaayalghiit aanesaghqaagut mamlegllagmun, tawani elngaatall qiyaaghwaghllagllequt gguteteng terqitaagtaamiita avuteghqem angtalanganeng.”
40008013	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa umiilwaaq, “Aglaghhaaten, ugpeqilleghpetun apeghiighllequq.” Enkaam tawaninginaq umiilwaaghem qepghaghtenga naallghutkaq.
40008014	Jesus Peter-enkunun piluni, esghaqaa aghnaq Peter-em sakinga qavaghvigmeteftuq puqleghaluni.
40008015	Saafsaqminigu iiggakun puqleghangiitkaq, aga makelluni kepsiiqukaa.
40008016	Ighivgaghyagu Jesus-mun tagiquutkiit tughneghalget ilumegteggun enkaam aanesquqii tughneghiit akuzilleghmikun, qamagllukillu qinuyuget naallghutkii.
40008017	Tawaten pikaq apeghiighnaluku uuknaliqistem Isaiah-m whaten pillgha, “Tugukaqii qinuyulleput, iqitkaqii aqnighneput.”
40008018	Jesus-em esghaghluki uvitminilnguut yulghuteghllaget, yataaghqesqegkii naayvam inglunganun aghvighnaluteng.
40008019	Taagken apeghtughikayugem Liilightuusameng takuluku pikaa, “Apeghtughista, maliglleqamken natmun alngunak pikuvek.”
40008020	Jesus-em pikaa, “Kaviighet riigtelguut, qawaaget unglutelguut, iwernga Ighnegha Yugem ingaghfigitaquq.”
40008021	Ilangan maligsaaghtengan pikaa, “Ataneq, maliglleqamken iwernga sivukluku ataka lliveghyaghtuqaghlakun.”
40008022	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Maligtinga. Tamaakut maligusunghilnguut whangamnun tuqukaagut taghneghamegteggun; lliveghlitki tuqumasliiteng.”
40008023	Taagken Jesus angyamun uugsan maligsaaghtengillu uuglleghaatkat.
40008024	Puglellghita kiingungiighhaaneng esla nuuskagllagan naafteghllakaq, naayvaqlu imaghllugughteghllagumaghmi, repall angyaq imighaataqegkaa. Iwernga Jesus qavaalghii.
40008025	Maligsaaghtet takuluku taghtughtekaat whaten pimaan, “Ataneq, yugulikut! Tuqulaghaannaqukut!”
40008026	Jesus-em pikii, “Sangafsi alingetsi? Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi!” Taagken nekevluni ineghtekakek anuqallu imaghllugetlu enkaam amsanaghllugughtekaq.
40008027	Qamaglluteng saghiighayukat. Whaten pikat, “Natelnguuwa yuuk una? Talwa anuqemllu imaghllugetlu qaatkegkangat!”
40008028	Jesus-enkut kaasameng inglunganun naayvam, aglaqat Gadara-ghmiit nunangitnun. Taagken maalghuk yugek tughneghalgek ilumegnegun tagilutek lliveghneng nallaqaak Jesus. Suugllugllagek repall kina alngunak taakwagun tuumkun igleghsigalnguq.
40008029	Legan esghaghluku Jesus akilghuukak, “Sanaqsikut, Ighneghani Kiyaghneghem? Ikfiqesnaqsikut pilleghqaq kaatestegpenaan?”
40008030	Taawanguq qantaghani kurugalghutet, neghaqeftut.
40008031	Tughneghaat maniguutepiglluteng Jesus pikaat, “Aanestekufkut, kurugaghnun iteghaatesnakefkut.”
40008032	Enkaam Jesus-em pikii, “Aanleghaatek!” Aanleghaalluteng kurugaghnun iteghaatkat. Aga kurugaat pangalgutkat asitmun naayvamun nagneghluteng meghmi tuqulaghaatkat.
40008033	Kurugaghneng aflengakilghiit qimaaguutkat nemun. Tawani aapqagket samatkek tughneghalguyalghiik ilumegnegun, samatangillu kurugalghutet.
40008034	Enkaam qamagtengngwaaghluteng tamaakumiit esghaghyaghtuutkaat Jesus. Esghaghyamegteggu maniguutepiglluteng aghulaqesqegkaat nunameggneng.
40009001	Taagken Jesus angyamun uuglluni inglunganun naayvam aghviqaq. Enkaam Capernaum-emun aglaqaq neminun.
40009002	Ilangita yuget ellnganun tagitkaat uniiqaq yuuk allighaakun. Jesus-em liigikluki ugpeqilleghtulngit, pikaa uniiqaq, “Ighnemni, quya! Seghleghqelleghten seghevutut.”
40009003	Taagken ilangi apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng sumeghtaghaqat, “Una yuuk seghleghqeghllagtuq. Kiyaghneghuyugtuq seghevutilleghmikun seghleghqelleghneng!”
40009004	Jesus-em liisimakluki sumeghtaghallghit, pikii, “Sangan seghleghmeng sumeghtaghaghetsi?
40009005	Naliq akuzilleq piyaqniita, ‘Seghleghqelleghten seghevutut’ nalighmeng ‘Makelluten piyugi’?
40009006	Liigikesnaqamsi Ighnegha Yugem seghevutilleghqalgutanga seghleghqelleghmeng nunami whani.” Enkaam uniiqaq yuuk pikaa, “Makelluten, allighan tuguluku, aglaa!”
40009007	Yuuk makelluni aglaqaq.
40009008	Yulghutet esghapagluku tallughyukat, usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq tawatelngughmeng aghtughyaghqaanghilleliskangi yuget.
40009009	Taam kingunganeng Jesus-em igleghutkelluku esghaqaa tax-em qerngughtistenga, aqumluni qepghaghvigmini; Matthew-nguftuq. Pikaa, “Maligtinga.” Enkaam Matthew-m nekevluni maligtekaa.
40009010	Mulugpenateng Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit neghyaghtuqat Matthew-nkunun. Neghuusimaluki tax-meng qerngughtistelghutetlu, seghleghqestelghutetlu aqumluteng Jesus-enkut neghelgusiqiit.
40009011	Ilangita Pharisees-et esghaghluku neghelgusiighilghii, maligsaaghtengi aaptekiit, “Sangan apeghtughistegpesi neghelgusightaki tax-meng qerngughtistetlu, seghleghqestetlu?”
40009012	Jesus-em nagalluki kiimsiqii, “Yugunqegtat aghallegtaghsughniitut, tamaakunginaat qinuyulghiit.
40009013	Liisaghtughteggu sameng pisiitanga una Akuzitnilnguq Igaqegkaq whaten pilghii, ‘Piyukenghitanka aghqutesi, itupill nangllegtaghtesugamsi.’ Tagingunghitunga tagsighnaluki elqughutngalghiit, iwernga taginguunga tagsighnaluki seghleghqestet.”
40009014	Taagken John-em Paaptaayestem maligsaaghtengita takuluku Jesus aaptekaat, “Sangan whangkutallu Pharisees-etlu awen fast-aaqesta, naqam maligsaaghteten fast-egpenateng?”
40009015	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nulightughyaghqam tagsiqliqii qivghungayaghqaawaat tawanlluku nulightughnaqelghii? Yeghlegillu! Iwernga pilleghqaq kaasaghqaaguq nulightughnaqelghii ellngitneng iqitestekumegteggu, elngaatall tamaani aghneghni fast-ellequt.”
40009016	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Kitum alngunak ilaaghnaanghitaak aatkalugek nutaghameng liiqneghmeng. Ilaalleq qellughtekumi piigullequq, enkaam piilleq sullevellequq.
40009017	Talwa kitum alngunak wine-eghraghaghmeng imighnaanghitaa awataghpaluk qayughllak awataghpaluk imiqumi aafkaghluni imiighullequq. Enkaam awataghpaluk atuuyaghqaananighllequq. Iwernga awataghpagraghaq imiqumi wine-eghraghaghmeng qerngaagmek naavnaanghituk.”
40009018	Paninang Jesus akuzimaluku Jews-et igleghutistengat iteghluni segesqughlluni manungakun pikaa, “Panika whaa tuqun'ghhaaguq, iwernga takuluku saaftekuvgu unguvaghllequq.”
40009019	Enkaam Jesus-em nekevluni maligtekaa, maligsaaghtengillu maligutkat.
40009020	Aglaamaluki, qinuyulghiim aghnam takukaa Jesus tunutanganeng. Qula maalghuk siipneqluku ayumiqulleq kiitelqungigalnguq. Whaten sumeghtaghaqaq, “Saafteqeghsaqumkun aatkaakun, naallghunnayaghtunga.” Enkaam saaftekaa atkuyaaghan keniikun.
40009022	Jesus-em qiivutkelluku esghaghluku aghnaq pikaa, “Panimni alingegpenang! Ugpeqilleghpegun naallghututen.” Aga aghnaq naallghutkaq.
40009023	Taagken Jesus-em kaalluni igleghutistenkunun, esghaqii tuqiilghiini qalghightaghtetlu, yulghutetlu qiyaaghuuteghllalghiit.
40009024	Tawavek pikii, “Aanleghaatek! Aghnaghaghhaq tuqullghituq qavaaguq!” Iwernga nenglaqegkaat.
40009025	Aanleghaatesatki, iteghluni Jesus-em tugukaa iiggakun, enkaam aghnaghaghhaq unguvaqaq.
40009026	Enkaam taana allaaghlluwhaghtilleq ungipaqegkaat tamangani.
40009027	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq nemeng. Ayaakak yugek maligsaaqaak, akilghuumaagmek whaten, “Ighneghani David-em, nangllegyagutikung!”
40009028	Aga mangteghamun iteghyan maligtekaak, enkaam Jesus-em aaptekakek, “Ugpeqestegneguu naallghutilleghqaqa?” Kiimsiqaak, “Aa-a Ataneq!”
40009029	Taagken Jesus-em iyegkenkun saaflukek pikakek, “Ugpeqilleghpetegetun apeghiighli.”
40009030	Enkaam esghaghyagutkak. Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqakek, “Ungipaghpenatek kitumun alngunak.”
40009031	Iwernga navek pineghmegni aapghaqegkangak Jesus-em apeghiiqaa ellmegnun.
40009032	Taakuk yugek aghulaqumalukek, Jesus-mun tagitkaat yuuk akuzingigalnguq qayughllak ilumikun tughneghalek.
40009033	Legan Jesus-em tughneghaq aanestaa, yuuk aga akuzikaq. Enkaam yulghutet saghiighayugulluteng whaten pikat, “Whatelngughmeng allaaghlluwaghtilleghmeng esghaasigatukut Israel-mi!”
40009034	Iwernga Pharisees-et pikat, “Umiilgita tughneghaat aghtughyaghqaanghillelisimaat aanesqiisqelluku tughneghaghneng.”
40009035	Taagken Jesus igleghtekaq tamaghhaani Galilee-mi, apeghtughimaghmi synagogue-ngitni, ungipaqimaghmillu Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Ataneghpagullghem. Naallghuquqii qamaglluki aqnighnelgetlu qinuyulghiitlu.
40009036	Esghaghluki yulghuteghllaget nangllegyagutkii, qayughllak seghleliighngaghllaget, kayutngunateng; penniighestun penniighnightengilngughestun.
40009037	Taagken maligsaaghteni pikii, “Uglalghiim yugem ugpeqsugaqiit Pinilghiit Ungipat. Tamaakunguut usputngalghiit nunivagseghanun unataghyaqleggiinaaghtekat. Taawanginaq palapiguut qepghaghtet.
40009038	Enkaangam yughaghtek Atanghanun unataghyaghqat, kayagtisqelluku qepghaghtekaghqameng unataghyaghqaanun.”
40010001	Jesus-em qerngughlluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni, aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkii aanestiyaghqaaluki tughneghaghneng, naallghutiyaghqaaluki tamaghhaaneng aqnighneghnengllu, qinuyugnengllu.
40010002	Ukunguut qula maalghuk siipneqluku apostle-et: sivuliq, Simon (alla atelek Peter-meng), Andrew (anglegutanga), James-enkuk John-enkuk (Zebedee-m ighneghqek),
40010003	Philip-enkut, Bartholomew-nkut, Thomas-enkut, Matthew-nkut (tax-meng qerngughtistenguyalghii), James-enkut (ighnegha Alphaeus-em), Thaddaeus-enkut,
40010004	Simon-enkut Zealot-a, Judas Iscariot-lu (uveghpagutiyaghqaq Jesus-meng).
40010005	Jesus-em, taakut qula maalghuk siipneqluku apostle-et kayagtekii qelghuumiita, “Gentile-etlu, Samaria-ghmiitlu nunangitnun pifqaafsi.
40010006	Yeghlegi Israel-eghmiinun pitek qayughllak iflakastun penniighestun ayuqut.
40010007	Navek alngunak pineghpesini whaten ungipaghaqitek, ‘Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem kaasaghtuumaaq!’
40010008	Qinuyuget naallghuteki, tuqukat unguvaghteki, leprosy-lget naallghuteki, tughneghaatlu aanesqughteki yugneng. Akingunaan allgeghutkaagusi, enkaam akingunaan tuunitek.
40010009	Kelqegpenasi manimeng: gold-meng, silver-meng, talwa copper-meng.
40010010	Kelqegpenasi akmagtameng, simiitkaghqameng, kamegmeng talwa ayaviighmeng, qayughllak qepghaghta aklukegkaaneng tuunyaghqaaguq.
40010011	“Town-enun nalighmeng village-enun kaanneghpesini ivaghiiqitek kitumeng pinilghiimeng enkaam ellnganitaqitek kenlanga aghulaqsaghqaaghtelleghpesinun.
40010012	Iitqufsi mangteghaanun quyastaqiteki tawanlenguut whaten, ‘Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellgha elpesinilli.’
40010013	Upughaskangisi, quyastilleghsi tawantesnakesi. Iwernga upughanneghilkangisi, quyastilleghsi veghhnakesi.
40010014	Kitum alngunak upughanneghilkangisi nalighmeng naganneghilkangisi, aanutkelluku mangteghameng nalighmeng aghulaqutkelluku town-meng, itegaghpesi pagulangi ufsugunnakesi.
40010015	Ipa ungipaatamsi, Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani, Sodom-eghmiitlu Gomorah-ghmiitlu aghyuulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut taam nem yuganeng!”
40010016	“Ukughsi! Kayagtekumsi penniighestun qungangitnilngughestun amaat lliighlequsi enkaam peghqinghulusi nemeghyastun, nekeggmellusi doves-tun.
40010017	Kelengalusi, qayughllak yuget tugulusi aglaalleqiisi agghistenun, kagsagmiglleqiisillu synagogue-meggni.
40010018	Whanga apalluqlunga, nekevesleqiisi sivungitgun igleghutistetlu umiilgetlu. Enkaam liigikesaghqaaghlleqaghpesinga ellngitnunllu Gentile-enunllu.
40010019	Nanqigtestemun aglaaskangisi, teggellghiighpenasi naten akuzilleghqaghpesineng, nalighmeng sameng pilleghqaghpesineng. Akuziyaghqaaghtekufsi akuzitkaghqalgullequsi.
40010020	Akuzitet elpesi pikenghitasi qayughllak Atagpesi Taghneghakek akuzillequk elpesigun.
40010021	“Yuget ellmeng katam angleguteteng tuqutesleqiit, atatlu avaqutateng tawaten piyaghqaqiit. Avaqutat anguyiilluki angayuqateng tuqutesleqiit.
40010022	Whangamneng apalluqlusi yugem qamaglluni ugumikelleqiisi. Iwernga nuqenneghtuqat kenlanga kenlemun yugulillengyaghqaagut.
40010023	Takukaghpesini amyuutkegkangisi, ilanganun town-em qimaggaasi. Ipa ungipaatamsi, qamaggnaanghitasi Israel-em town-ngi, sivungani Ighneghan Yugem tagilleghqaan.
40010024	“Maligsaaghta qaasghutinganghituq apeghtughistemineng, talwa qepghaghta qaasghutinganghituq umiilegmineng.
40010025	Itagnaghiyaghqaaguq maligsaaghta apeghtughistemitun lliiqumi, qepghaghtallu umiilegmitun lliiqumi. Naasquutilghii nengllugutmineng, Beelzebul-meng atiimakatgu, nengllugutangi seghleghataghaaluki atighyaghqaqiit.
40010026	“Enkaam alikegpenaki tamaakut amyuqetaghtet. Sangwaa alngunak nallukegkaq liitesaghqaaguq, qamagllunillu aksaqegkaq qayvighqesaghqaaguq.
40010027	Elpesinun sangwaat aapqanka apeghyaghqaqasi tamanganun. Sigutquutkegkanka elpesinun, ungipaqsaghqaqasi mangteghat qaayngitneng.
40010028	“Enkaam alikegpenaki yuget tuqutikayuget yugusighhiinaghmeng iwernga tuqutinaanghitut unguvasimeng. Itupill alikiteggu Kiyaghneq, qayughllak hell-mi naafqiiyaghqaaguq tamaghhaagkeneng yugusimengllu unguvasimengllu.
40010029	Penny-meng tukfighyaghqaqagsi qawaaggaak, naqamllu aallgha ifkaqan Atagpesi liisimakaa.
40010030	Iwernga elpesi aflengakataghaghlusi ayuqiisi, qayughllak talwa nuyaghpesi uglaghtalngi liisimakii.
40010031	Enkaam alingegpenasi, Atagpesi megnukataghaghiisi qawaaggaghneng!
40010032	“Kitum alngunak ungipaaskaki yuget, whangamnun pikniluni, whangallu Ataka qilagmelnguq ungipaalleqaqa whangamnun pikniluku.
40010033	Iwernga kitum alngunak ungipaaskaki yuget whangamnun pikenghinniluni whangallu Ataka qilagmelnguq ungipaalleqaqa whangamnun pikenghinniluku.”
40010034	Jesus-em paninang aleghquqii, “Sumeghtaghaghpenasi nekeggmellengestiyaghtuunilunga nunam yuganun. Yeghlegillu! Nekeggmellengestiyaghtuunghitunga, taawanginaq pillugutestiyaghtuugunga.
40010035	Taginguunga yugmun anguyaliitesqelluku atanga, aghnamun anguyaliitesqelluku naanga, ukaaghanun anguyaliitesqelluku sakinga aghnaq.
40010036	Enkaam yuuk nengllugutangita anguyaliilleqaat.
40010037	“Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu atani nalighmeng naani pakiggulluku whangamneng, whanga pikepagningitaqa. Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu ighneni nalighmeng panini pakiggulluku whangamneng, whanga pikepagningitaqa.
40010038	Kitum alngunak qaquurani tuguyunghilkumigu maliggnaanghitaanga, enkaam whangamni itagnanghituq.
40010039	Kitum alngunak unguvalleni ellminun piknikumigu iflayaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak unguvalleni pegtekumigu whanga apalluqlunga allgeghsaghqaqaa unguvallepik.
40010040	“Kitum alngunak upughaskangisi, whangallu upughalleqaanga, enkaam kitum alngunak upughaskuminga, upughalleqaa kayagtisteka.
40010041	Kitum alngunak upughaskumigu uuknaliqista uuknaliqistengutanganeng, akileghtuusangellequq uuknaliqistetun. Kitum alngunak upughaskumigu elqughutngalghii yuuk elqughutngatanganeng, akileghtuusangellequq elqughutngalghiitun yugtun.
40010042	Kitum alngunak nenglekeglleghhiimeng meghsikumigu ukalighpigaq maligsaaghteka apalluqluku maligsaaghtekutemneng, ipa piimsi akileghtuusangepestaaghyaghqaaguq.”
40011001	Jesus-em qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni apeghiighyamiki apeghtughaneghmeng, tamaaken aghulaqegkaq ilangitnun town-et apeghtughinalunillu ungipaqinalunillu.
40011002	Anusimingllaghvigmelluni John-em Paaptaayestem nagaqughluku Christ-a saaqutanga, ilangi maligsaaghteni kayagtekii Jesus-mun.
40011003	Aaptekaat Jesus, “Elpengwaa taginaqnikaat, nalighmeng kina tagiyaghqaawaa?”
40011004	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ungipaasaghtughteggu John nagatkaghpesinengllu esghaqaghpesinengllu:
40011005	ayakaayalghiit esghaghyagutut, piyugigasalghiit piyugyagutut, leprosy-lguyalghiit naallghutut, tuuslaghyalghiit nagaquusagutut, tuqukaayalghiit unguvaghtut, aklumalghiinunllu Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqut.
40011006	Kina alngunak ugpeqinaninghilkumi whangamneng quyastekaaguq!”
40011007	Aga John-em maligsaaghtengi aghulaqsata, Jesus-em akuzitkegkaa John yulghutnun, “Kilgaanun piiqngafsi, sangwaa esghaghyaghtughesteggu? Vegaaq anuqem ufsuguskangaa?
40011008	Saqutsimi? Esghaghnalukuu aatkaqegtaq yuuk? Tamaaken aatkaqelghiit kiyaghtaqut umiilget mangteghiitni!
40011009	Sangwaami esghaghyaghtughesteggu? Uuknaliqistaa? Aa-a, ungipaatamsi, esghaqaghsi John uuknaliqistenginaanghituq. Megnunaghataghaghtuq
40011010	qayughllak ellnganguuq Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapqaat whaten, ‘Kiyaghneq piiq, Sivugpeni kayaglleqaqa ungipaghteka, yataaghqesaghtiisqelluku tuumkaghqan’.
40011011	Ipa ungipaatamsi, John Paaptaayesta megnunalleghpigaaguq yugneng allgeqaghyaggaghneng. Iwernga kina alngunak ukalighpigaq Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem John-meng megnunaghataghaghtuq.
40011012	John Paaptaayesta ungipaqiyuggaallghaneng whavemun kenlanga, suuglluget wayaghnaqutkaqaat Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem.
40011013	Qamaglluteng uuknaliqistetlu Moses-emllu Liilightuusiita uuknaliqutkengngwaat Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem kenlanga John-em tagillghanun.
40011014	John-nguuq uuknaliqistet uuknaliqutkegkaat taginaqnilleghmeggteggun Elijah. Ugpeqsukufsigu uuknaliqelleq, John Elijah-nguuq.
40011015	Sigutelguusi, nagatek!
40011016	“Maaten kiyaghlleghhit yuget samun uspunnaqsingi? Taghnughhaaghestun ayuqut aqumuulluteng akilpegaghvigni, naghaalgutmeggnun akilghuullghiit whaten,
40011017	‘Qalghightaatamsi, tukaleganghitusi! Qiyiqutukut, qiyiqenghitusi!’
40011018	“John tagiiqngami fast-aaquq, meghigatuqlu wine-meng, enkaam yuget whaten pikaagut, ‘Tughneghalguuq’.
40011019	Ighnegha Yugem tagiiqngami, neghelgusighaqii, meghelgusighaqiillu yuget, enkaam yuget whaten pikaagut, ‘Yuukqun taana esghaqaghteggu! Neghetupigtuq, meghetupigtuq, ilakumtaaqaatlu tax-em qerngughtistengita, seghleghqestetlu!’ Naqamllu Kiyaghneghem peghqinellgha ipapighqengngaaq sallghakun.”
40011020	Jesus-em allulluki allaaghlluwhaghtilleni atuqegkaqii Chorazin-mi, Bethsaida-mi, Capernaum-emillu. Iwernga yugit avuteghqelluteng taaqellghilnguut seghleghqenneghmeng enkaam Jesus-em aghyuughmikii.
40011021	Pikii, “Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi, Chorazin-eghmiini! Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi, Bethsaida-ghmiini! Elpesini allaaghlluwaghtilleghllaget apeghiiqat pikaayaqata Tyre-millu Sidon-millu, neghipiglluteng yugit avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennanighnayaghtut. Tamaaken apalluqluku suvinalghiimeng qiipaghaghqameng aalluteng aqumnayaghtut panetelleghteggun.
40011022	Ipa ungipaatamsi, Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Tyre-eghmiitlu Sidon-eghmiitlu aghyulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut elpesineng!
40011023	Enkaam elpesi, Capernaum-eghmiini! Qaywa anglisteghllagyaghngaaghpesi elpesineng katam repall sumeghpesini usuqellengelleqnillusi qilagmi, yeghlegi ukiglleqiisi hell-mun. Allaaghlluwhaghtilleghllaget pikaayaqata Sodom-emi, paninang aghneghmi whani nekevghanayaghtuq!
40011024	Iwernga ungipaatamsi Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Kiyaghneghem nangllekataghaghyaghqaqii Sodom-eghmiit pakiggulluki elpesineng!”
40011025	Taagken Jesus pikaq, “Kaay Ata, Atanqaaten qilagemllu nunamllu! Iyamsiqayugvikamken qayughllak liitkaanghilngughnun liitestekaqan ipapighqelleq iiqan liitkanengllu peghqineghnengllu.
40011026	Aa-a, Ataay, efquqelleghpetun pikaaguten.
40011027	“Atama tagivaqaqaa sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku. Kitum alngunak nallukaa Ighneq, iwerngaqun Atam. Kitum alngunak nallukaa Ata, iwerngaqun Ighneghem, enkaam Ighneghem nakmikegkaminun liitesleqaa Ata.
40011028	“Tagitek whangamnun qamagllusi ughleghilghiini, uqigtuqamengllu akmalegllagni, meghnaalisleqamsi.
40011029	Iisqaghmiitagka aallukek liitivikitengnga, qayughllak yakumanginneghitunga, iluka qusevegngaaq. Enkaam meghnaalillequsi unguvasighpesinun.
40011030	Iisqaghmiitagka piyaqniituk, akmakallu uqengestaaghhaaguq.”
40012001	Taagken Sabbath-em aghneghani Jesus igleghtekaq wheat-em piitfigakun. Maligsaaghtengi iyataqat enkaam wheat-meng qesugutaqluteng neghegkat.
40012002	Pharisees-et esghaghluki maligsaaghtet wheat-meng qesugutaatalghiit, Jesus pikaat, “Ii-i, Sabbath-mi maligsaaghteten qepghaghtut, Liilightuusaq naafqaat!”
40012003	Jesus-em pikii, “Atightuumangistegguu David-enkut yukullghiit sakaatangi iyataghaqngameng?
40012004	Iitqaaguq tabernacle-mun enkaam yukullghiit neghegkaqaat neqekrangllaq Kiyaghneghmun tuunegkaq. Tawaten pilleghmegteggun Liilightuusaq naafqegkaqaat qayughllak priest-nginaat neghyaghqaqsaqangat.
40012005	Atightiigasteggullu Liilightuusanilnguq priest-et Temple-mi qepghaneghmeggni Sabbath-mi naafqaqegkangat Sabbath-em Liilightuusaa? Naqamllu priest-et anaggusigatut.
40012006	Ungipaatamsi, whaantuq Temple-mi kina aangataghalghii.
40012007	Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Nangllegtiisqesugamsi yulgutegpesinun pakiggulluku aghqutegpesineng.’ Taakut akuzitet liigikngwaaghyaqufsiki sameng pitangi, nanqiggnayanghitasi aghyuughyaghqaaluki anaggutellghilnguut,
40012008	qayughllak Ighnegha Yugem, Atanqaa Sabbath-em.”
40012009	Taaken Jesus aglaghluni synagogue-ngitnun iitqaq.
40012010	Taawanguq yuuk iiggan inglungi uniiqat. Ilangita yuget tawanlenguut aaptekaat Jesus naalkefiknaluku anaggutelleghmeng, “Liilightuusamnni itagnaghtaa-a naallghutilleghqaq Sabbath-mi?”
40012011	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nalighpesi penniigha kalefkagsaqan laawaaghmun Sabbath-mi, nusugnayaghestegguu?
40012012	Yuuk megnunaghataghaghtuq penniighmeng! Enkaam Liilightuusani itagnalghiinguuq pinitun pilleghqaq Sabbath-mi.”
40012013	Taagken yuuk uniighngalghiimeng iiggelek pikaa, “Nengugutiki iiggeten.” Iiggeni nengugutkii, aga naallghutkat, inglumegestun lliiqat.
40012014	Taagken Pharisees-et aanluteng agghisaghtuqat naten tuqunnaluku Jesus.
40012015	Jesus-em liisimakluku agghillghat, aghulaqegkaq. Yulghuteghllaget maliglleghaatkaat, enkaam naallghuquqii qinuyulghiit qamaglluki,
40012016	ineghtekiillu ungipaqefqaami pisqelluni.
40012017	Tawaten pilleghmikun apeghiiqaa Kiyaghneghem pillgha uuknaliqistekun Isaiah-kun whaten:
40012018	“Una esgha nakmikegkaqa qepghaghtenguluku. Piniqegkaqa unguvasigma efquqepigtaa. Taghneghagka ellngakun nekeglleqagka. Ungipaalleqii Gentile-et tawateghlluwaaq nanqigtilleghqamneng tamaghhaanun yugnun.
40012019	Aaghtiiraaghnaanghituq nalighmeng akilghuunaanghituq, tumeni iglagtupiglluni akuzinaanghituq.
40012020	Iiknaanghitaa vegaaq ulleghngalghii, qaamyaghtuungestaqak kenelghutak qaamnnaanghitaak. Tawaten piyaghqaaguq kenlanga qamaglluni yuuk whaten piyugluni lliiqan, Kiyaghneghem nanqigtellgha yugneng avutangituq.
40012021	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaakun Gentile-et sighimallequt.”
40012022	Taagken Jesus-mun tagitkaat yuuk ayaakaq, akuzingigalnguq qayughllak ilumikun tughneghalek. Jesus-em naallghutkaa enkaam akuziyagutkaqlu esghaasagutkaqlu.
40012023	Yulghuteghllaget saghiighayugllakat repall ellmeggneng aapqughaaghutkat whaten, “Una David-em Ighneqenghitaguu?”
40012024	Pharisees-et nagalluteng pikat, “Yugneng aanestaqii tughneghaat qayughllak atuqngukanga aghtughyaghqaanghillgha Beelzebul-em, igleghutistengat Tughneghaat.”
40012025	Jesus-em liisimakegkangi sumeghtaghallghit enkaam pikii, “Alngunak ataneghpagulleq aafquulluni pilluguskumi, naavellequq. Tanemlleqa neghllaget nalighmeng nengllugutet aafquulluteng pilluguskumeng, qerngaghmennaanghitut.
40012026	Tawateghpigaq Tughneghaam aanestekumigu Tughneghaq, taawa ellmineng pilluwaaguq enkaam ataneghpagullgha kenletghuullequq.
40012027	Aanesquungukuma tughneghaghneng Beelzebul-kun, natenmi yugpesi aanesqughaqatki tughneghaat? Enkaam yusi nanqigtistekelleqasi.
40012028	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun aanesquungukuma tughneghaghneng, taawa taam ipapighqaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem kaasimaaq elpesinun.
40012029	“Kina alngunak iteghyukumi iknaqelghiim yugem mangteghaanun teglegughnaluni saghyanganeng, sivukluku yuuk asighqesaghqaqaa. Taagken wayaghteghlleqii saghyangi.
40012030	“Kina alngunak whangamninneghilnguq kipullginaaghtekaqa; kitum alngunak qerngughtilgusinghilkuminga mingitistenguuq.
40012031	Tamaaken apalluqluku ungipaatamsi yuget seghevutellengyaghqaagut alngunak seghleghqelleghmeggneng, alngunaklu seghlequulleghmeggneng. Iwernga kitum alngunak seghlequuqumikek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak, seghevutellengnaanghituq.
40012032	Kitum alngunak kipullegmun sameng pikumigu Ighnegha Yugem, seghevutellengyaghqaaguq. Iwernga kitum alngunak kipullegmun sameng pikumikek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak, seghevutellengnaanghituq maaten kiyaghtaalleghmi, nalighmeng tuunglighhaani.
40012033	“Uqfik aflengakegkaq pinilghiinguuq, piitestekii pinightut. Uqfik aflengakellghilnguq seghleghuuq, piitestekii seghleghuut. Piitestillghakun liisimakelleqaghsi uqfigem natetulanga.
40012034	Ukughsi nemeghyani! Naten akuziiqetsi pinilghiimeng seghleghughngaaghpesi? Sangwaa alngunak yugem ilunganilnguq aanegkaayuguuq akuzillghakun.
40012035	Pinilghii yuuk pinilghiimeng ilumikilghii pinilghiimeng aanestikayuguuq. Seghleq yuuk seghleghmeng ilumikilghii seghleghmeng aanestikayuguuq.
40012036	“Ungipaatamsi, Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani yuget apeghyaghqapestaaqiit Kiyaghneghmun qamaglluki seghleghet akuzitet atuqegkateng sangita atuqumatangi.
40012037	Qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqaaten akuzitegpegun. Akuzitegpek ipapighqelleqaaten avutnginniluten nalighmeng nanqiglleqaaten aghyuughyaghqaaluten.”
40012038	Taagken ilangita apeghtughistengita Liilightuusam, ilangitallu Pharisees-et pikaat Jesus, “Apeghtughista, allaaghlluwhaghtilghiiten esghapagyuwamken liigiknaluku aghtughyaghqaanghillghen Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga.”
40012039	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Aghneghem uum yugi seghleghqumanguut, ataasiighneghilnguut Kiyaghneghmun. Naqam allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut whangamnun. Yeghlegillu! Taananginaghhaq allaaghlluwhaghtilleq esghaghlleqaghsi Kiyaghneghem allaaghlluwhaaghtillgha Jonah-mun.
40012040	Jonah iqallugrugllagem aqsaqghwanitkaaguq pingayut aghneghet, pingayut unuget. Tawateghpigaq Ighnegha Yugem samansaghqaaguq nunami pingayut aghneghet, pingayut unuget.
40012041	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekangisi elpesi kiyaghlleghhiini aghneghmi whani, Nineveh-ghmiit nekevluteng anaggunnilleqiisi aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi. Uuknaliqista Jonah ungipaghyan Nineveh-ghmiit avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennaniqaagut. Iwernga elpesi avuteghqellusi seghleghqennanillghitusi qaywa nagatkaqeghngaaghpesigu kina aangataghalghii Jonah-meng.
40012042	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekangisi elpesi kiyaghlleghhiini aghneghmi whani, Queen-ngan Sheba-m nekevluni nanqigsaghqaanilleqiisi. Tagikaaguq uyavaghpanilngughmeng nemineng nagannaluku Solomon-em peghqineghllak apeghtughillgha. Iwernga kina aangataghalghii Solomon-meng whaantuq, tawalliima ighsakaqaghsi.”
40012043	“Tughneghaq yugmeng aanegkumi igleghllequq meqraggiilngughmi nunami, ivaghillequq meghnaalivigkameng. Iwernga naalkunneghisami,
40012044	pikaq, ‘Kiyaghfiksaqemnun uteghhnaqunga.’ Kaasalghiimi paaghqiteftuq, aallwaaghluni, mingllegtengngwaaghluni ayuqeftuq.
40012045	Taagken aanluni tagitkii maaghraghvinlek tughneghaat ellmineng seghleghataghalghiit. Iteghaalluteng yugmun tawantekat. Enkaam taana yuuk sivunghaneng wataqaaghaq seghleghwaaghughtekaq. Tawateghpigaq ayuqsaghqaagut seghleghet yuget kiyaghlleghhiit maaten, wataqaaghaq seghleghughtaghaghyaghqaagut sivunghani pilleghmeggneng.”
40012046	Paninang Jesus-em aleghquumaluki yuget, Jesus-em naangallu anglegutangillu kaalluteng manughami aleghqughyukaat.
40012047	Enkaam kitum ungipaatkaa, “Ii-i, qakma naanllu anglegutetenllu, aleghqughyugaqaaten.”
40012048	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Kinangaawa naaka? Kinkungaawat anglegutenka?”
40012049	Taagken kenighluki maligsaaghteni, pikaq, “Taakusta naakallu anglegutenkallu!
40012050	Kina alngunak Atama qilagmelnguum piyukellghatun pikumi, anglegutkaqa, nayakaqa, naakaqallu!”
40013001	Tawani ataasimi aghneghmi Jesus aanluni mangteghameng, naayvam esnengakun aqumluni apeghtughikaq.
40013002	Yulghuteghllaget kanglluqaghsatni, angyamun uuglluni aqumegkaq, enkaam yulghuteghllaget esnemetkat.
40013003	Ungipaghaatetgun allaaghhiinaghmeng apeghtuqii. Pikii, “Piitesighaghta piitesighaghvigminun aglaghluni, ifkaghquqaq piitutneng.
40013004	Piitesighaghvigmini ifkaghqiyalghiimi piitutneng, ilangi tumetgun tekitkat, enkaam qawaaget tagiluteng neghuqiit.
40013005	Ilangi piitutet tekitkat uyghagaghtuqakun sunapagilngughqun. Tawaninginaq piitkat qayughllak sunanga ugmestaaghhaq.
40013006	Iwernga siqineq piisalghiimi maatneghan paneghtekii qayughllak akupagilnguut.
40013007	Ilangi piitutem tekitkat sikughllugtuqakun, sikughlluget piisalghiimeng piitfigiqiit piitutet.
40013008	Iwernga ilangi piitutet tekitkat sunakegtakun piitestikat grain-meng, ilangi 100, ilangi 60, ilangi 30.
40013009	Sigutelguusi, nagatek!”
40013010	Taagken maligsaaghtengita takuluku Jesus aaptekaat, “Sangan ungipaghaatmeng atuqaqsin apeghtuneghpeki yuget?”
40013011	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Elpesinun Kiyaghneghem liitestekaqaa talughngalghii ipapighqellgha Ataneghpagullghan Qilagem, iwernga ellngitnun liitesimangitaa.
40013012	Enkaam yuuk liigikellengegkaq, wataqaaghaq liigikellengataghaghyaghqaaguq, iwernga yuuk liigikellepagilnguq liigikellgha iqillequq.
40013013	Tamaaken apalluqluku apeghtughaqanka ungipaghaatetgun, qayughllak esghaateghngaaghmeng esghaasigalnguut, nagateghngaaghmeng nagaqiigalnguut, talwa liigikigalnguut.
40013014	Enkaam ellngitgun Isaiah-m uuknaliqutkillgha apeghiightuq. Taaggun uuknaliqellghakun Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Ellngit nagatepestaaghllequt taawanginaq liigiknaanghitiit; esghaatepestaaghllequt, taawanginaq liigiknaanghitiit esghaqateng,
40013015	qayughllak ellngita umyugiit pineghllugtekaagut. Sigutngit tusaqneghlluugtekaagut, iyetengllu quneghtekaqiit. Tawatelnguunghisaqumeng iiymeggneng esghaannayaghtut, sigutmeggneng nagaquunnayaghtut, umyugamegteggun liigiknayaghtut, enkaam qiivnayaghtut whangamnun naallghutesqelluteng.’
40013016	“Iwernga quyanaghhalek elpesi! Iyesi esghaataqut, sigutesillu nagaquutaqut.
40013017	Ipa ungipaatamsi, uuknaliqistelghutetlu, yulghutanganllu Kiyaghneghem, esghaghyukaqsaghiit esghaqasi, iwernga esghaamangitiit. Nagaqughyukaqsaghiitlu nagaquqasi, iwernga nagaquumangitiit.
40013018	“Nagateggu sameng piiqutanga ungipaghaatkegkaqa piitesighaghta.
40013019	Piitutet tumet saaghwitgun tekitkat usputngaat kitumun alngunak nagaquullghiimun ungipameng Ataneghpagulleghmeng ayuqelghiimeng. Liigikenghilkagu ungipaq Tughneghaam tagiluni wayaghlleqaa tekitkaayalghii ilungakun.
40013020	Tamaakut piitutet uyghagtuqakun sunakun tekitkat usputngaat kitumun alngunak nagaquullghiimun ungipameng, tawaninginaq ungipaq tugukliqaa quyakusiqluku.
40013021	Iwernga ungipaq ilungani mulumangilnguq qayughllak akungellghilnguq. Enkaam seghleliighyalghiimi nalighmeng amyuqetaatkellengyalghiimi, apalluqluku ungipaq tawaninginaq ugpeqinanightuq.
40013022	Tamaakut piitutet sikughllugtuqakun sunakun tekitkat usputngaat kitumun alngunak nagaquullghiimun ungipameng, taawanginaq teggellghiillghan kiyaghtaaghusighqameng, aklungighiyulleghllaganllu piitfigighaqaa ungipaq. Tamaaken apalluqluku piitestingigatuq.
40013023	Tamaakut piitutet tekitkat sunakegtakun usputngaat yugnun nagaquullghiinunllu liigikilghiinunllu ungipameng. Enkaam piitesqughaqut ilangi 100, ilangi 60, ilangi 30.”
40013024	Taagken Jesus-em aapqaa ilanga ungipaghaan ellngitnun, pikii, “Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem yugtun piitesighaqatun pinilghiimeng piitutmeng piitesighaghvigmini ayuquq.
40013025	Unugmi ataasimi qavasimaluki, anguyaga tagiluni piitesighaqaq weeds-meng akulngitgun wheat-et, taagken aghulaqegkaq.
40013026	Nunivagseghat piisalghiimeng, wheat-et akumluteng weeds-meng ayuqeftut.
40013027	Piitesighaghta qepghaghtelghutngan takuluku aaptekaat, ‘Ataneq, pinilghiimengmi piitutmeng piitesiighaghsin piitesighaghvigpeni; naken weeds-et piit?’
40013028	Yugem kiimsiiqii, ‘Anguyagem tawaten pikaqii’. Aaptekaat, ‘Weeds-et ikuultekii?’
40013029	Kiimsiqii, ‘Nakaa, qayughllak weeds-et ikuqufsiki qemall wheat-etlu ilalkiilleqasi.
40013030	Qerngiita wheat-etlu weeds-etlu nagusteki kenlanga unatalleghqamun. Enan unataghyaghqaaghtekata unataghtet ungipaannaaghanka weeds-et sivukesqelluki, qepughluki paneghsaghqaaluki. Enkaam wheat-et unataghtesluki kagpagtesnaaghanka kagpagvimnun.’”
40013031	Allameng Jesus-em aapqaa ungipaghaan, “Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem piitutngatun mustard-em ayuquq. Piitutem mekestaalleghpigaqaa, iwernga yugem piitesighaneghminigu piitesighaghvigmikun nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng aangelleghpigaakayuguuq. Uqfigughhneghani qawaaget tagiluteng avayaakun unglusiiqut.”
40013033	Allameng Jesus-em aapqaa ungipaghaan, “Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem yeast-atun ayuquq. Aghnam tuguluku akuutuskanga avlawaghllagmun, enkaam akuutaghllaga ghhuughtesteghllakaa.”
40013034	Jesus-em apeghtuneghminiki yulghuteghllaget quunpeng atuqaqii ungipaghaatet. Ipapestaaq sangwaa qamaglluku apeghtuusaqegkaa ungipaghaatetgun ayuquq.
40013035	Tawaten pikaalghii apeghiighnaluku uuknaliqistem pillgha, “Ungipaghaatet atuqelleqanka aleghququmki. Ungipaalleqanka Kiyaghneghem liitesimangilkanganeng ima ulimayuggaallghaneng nuna.”
40013036	Taagken Jesus-em unilluki yulghutet iitqaq mangteghamun. Maligsaaghtengita takuluku aaptekaat, “Sameng pisiigwat ungipaghaatkegkaghten weeds-et piitesighaghvigmelnguut?”
40013037	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Yuuk piitesighaqaq pinilghiimeng piitutmeng, Ighneqaa Yugem;
40013038	piitesighaghvik nunanguuq; pinilghiit piitutet yuguut Ataneghpagullghem pikii; weeds-et yuguut Tughneghaam pikii.
40013039	Anguyak piitestikaq weeds-meng Tughneghaaguq. Unatalleq nunam kenletghuutelqaa, unataghtet yaqulguut.
40013040	Unatalleghmi weeds-et qerngughlluki paneghtaqiit. Tawateghpigaq kenletghuutellghani nunam, yuget Tughneghaam pingi qerngughlluki paneghsaghqaagut.
40013041	Ighnegha Yugem yaqulegmineng kayagtiyaghqaaguq iqitesqelluki Ataneghpagulleghmineng qamaglluki seghleghqusitlu, seghletunllu pistet.
40013042	Enkaam kenghegnun miluulleqiit, tawani qiyaaghwaghllagllequt, gguteteng terqitaagtaamiita.
40013043	Taagken Kiyaghneghem yugi kuukgullequt siqineghtun Ataneghpagullghani Atameng. Sigutelguusi, nagatek!”
40013044	“Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem aklungistun ayuquq iighngalghii piitesighaghvigmi. Yugem naalkelluki iinqigtekii. Quyam angtalanganeng, aghulaqluni qamaglluki saghyani akikluki, taagken taana piitesighaghvik tukfiqaa.”
40013045	“Whatetuqlu Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem: tukfightughta ivaghilghii piniipiglleghhiimeng pearl-meng tukfighyaghqameng.
40013046	Naalkunneghmini piniipiglleghhiimeng akituqameng, akikughaqaa qamaglluku saghyani, tukfighnaluku taana pearl-a.”
40013047	“Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem, negaghpagtunllu ayuquq. Iqalliniightet negaghpagteng naayvamun ateghlluku aghqellaaqut enkaam allaaghhiinaghmeng iqallugteghllagaqut.
40013048	Negaghpak sayugluku quutmun, aqumluteng iqalluget avughaqiit, pinilghit kanaghsimiita qaltanun, enkaam seghlellghi egtaqiit.
40013049	Tawatesaghqaaguq kenletghuutellghani nunam. Yaqulget tagiluteng avughlleqiit seghleghet yuget pinilghiineng.
40013050	Enkaam seghleghet kenghegnun miluulleqiit, tawani qiyaaghwaghllagllequt, gguteteng terqitaagtaamiita.”
40013051	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii maligsaaghteni, “Qamaglluki tamaakut liigikestekii?” Kiimsiqaat, “Aa-a.”
40013052	Taagken pikii, “Tamaghhaghmi apeghtughikayuk Liilightuusaneng apeghtuqaq Ataneghpagullghaneng Qilagem whatelnguuguq: mangteghalek yuuk nusugralghii kagpagvigmineng nutaghamengllu neghightamengllu.”
40013053	Jesus taaqsami apeghtughineghmeng ungipaghaatneng aghulaqegkaq.
40013054	Aglaghluni neminun apeghtughiyan synagogue-ngitni, yuget saghiighayagutkaat. Ellmeggneng aapqughaaghutkat, “Naken peghqinellenga? Nakenllu aghtughyaghqaanghillenga allaaghlluwhaghtimun?
40013055	Ighneqenghitaguu kaapentam? Mary naakenghitaguu, uuk anglegutkenghitakii James-enkut, Joseph-enkut, Simon-enkut, Judas-enkut?
40013056	Nayagillu maanneghitaat? Naken liitellengeghllagtallu aghtughyaghqaanghillengallu?”
40013057	Enkaam tuguklighyunghitkaat. Jesus-em pikii, “Nani alngunak yuget siivakaqaat uuknaliqista iwerngaqun ellngan katam nunanganillu nengllugutanganillu.”
40013058	Tamaani allaaghlluwhaghtipagumangilnguq qayughllak ugpeqenghilkangat.
40014001	Tamaani pilleghmi Herod-em, igleghutistengan Galilee-m, nagaquqaa Jesus-em apeghseghuumallgha.
40014002	Herod-em qepghaghteni pikii, “Ipa una John-nguuq Paaptaayesta, unguvaamaaq. Esghaghhuqun aghtughyaghqaanghillelek allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun.”
40014003	Qavnganghhaq Herod-em tuqutestekaqegkanga John Paaptaayesta, qayughllak John-em ungipaatkaqegkanga, “Qaatkunneghituten Liilightuusamnnun tugulleghpegun Herodias, anglegutegpek nulighha.” (Herodias-em ugiksaqanga Philip, Herod-em uyughaa.) John-em ungipaatellgha apalluqluku Herod-em tugusqegkaa John, asighqelluku anusimingllaghvigmun kanaghtesqelluku. Herod-em tuqutesuguyaqanga John, naqam alikegkii Jews-et seghleliighqiinayukata qayughllak ugpeqeqkangat John uuknaliqestenguniluku.
40014006	Taagken Herod-em allgeghvigan aghneghani, Herodias-em paniga tukalegaqaq Herod-emllu aqelqatlu sivungitni. Elngaatall Herod efqughyugllakaq,
40014007	repall akeqegkaa, “Ipapestaaq sameng alngunak tungsiquvek tuunelleqamken.”
40014008	Naami kayagtellghatun pikaa, “Whaa maaten tagivaghhu qayuutaghraagkun lliluku naasqwa John-em Paaptaayestem.”
40014009	Umiilek qivghukaq iwernga akeqikaatmineng aqelqami sivungitni piyukellgha kayagutkaa.
40014010	Enkaam Herod-em anusimingllaghvigmi John-em naasqwa kepestekaa.
40014011	Naasquq qayuutaghraagkun lliluku tuunegkaat aghnaghaghmun, enkaam naaminun aglaatkaa.
40014012	John-em maligsaaghtengi tagiluteng yugusii lliveghyaghtuqaat. Taagken Jesus ungipaasaghtuqaat.
40014013	Jesus-em nagaqughyamigu ungipaq, angyamun uuglluni aghulaqegkaq paaghqillghanun ellnginaghhaanaluni. Iwernga yulghutet nagaqughyamegteggu nemeggneng maligtekaat piyugmeng.
40014014	Jesus quutmun uuglluni esghaghluki yulghuteghllaget nangllegyaguteghllakii, enkaam naallghuquqii qinuyugtengit.
40014015	Whanikuyagu maligsaaghtengita takuluku pikaat, “Whanikwaa, maana paaghqituq; aglaghtuutesqiki nenun ellngitneng neqengesqelluki.”
40014016	Jesus-em pikii, “Maanllit. Elpesi neghyaghqaliteki.”
40014017	Pikaat, “Whaa legan tallimaggaagut neqekrangllat, iqalluggaaklu.”
40014018	Jesus-em pikii, “Tagiteki whavek.”
40014019	Taagken yulghutet aqumuutesqegkii vegaaghqun. Tuguluki tallimat neqekrangllat, iqalluggaaklu, sivuglluni qilagmun Kiyaghneq iyamsiqayugvikegkaa. Iiggmineng aavgughluki neqekrangllat, maligsaaghteminun tuunegkii uyegtesqelluki yulghutnun.
40014020	Qamaglluni neghuutkaq kepsuulluni. Taagken maligsaaghtet tugukiit qula maalghuk siipneqluku pasketet esleqngalghiit kagimleghitneng neqekrangllat siipneghet.
40014021	Entaqun 5,000-nguut yuget neghuutkat, aghnatlu taghnughhaatlu kesutkegpenaki.
40014022	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni kayagtekii angyakun aghviqestiisqelluki naayvam inglunganun, ellngan aglaghtuutesimaluki yulghuteghllaget.
40014023	Yulghuteghllaget aglaghtuutesamiki ellnginaghmi naayghamun mayuqaq yughaghnaluni. Tawani ighivgaghmi Jesus ellnginaamaluku,
40014024	angyat un'ga naayvami awavaghluteng, elngaatall imaghlliiqat qayughllak aygughnaghuskangi.
40014025	Akulegkeni three-kellaagenkuk, six-eklaagenkuk unaanguluku Jesus-em takukii maligsaaghteni meghem qaayngakun piyugmeng.
40014026	Maligsaaghtet esghaghluku meghqun piyulghii kakavniiqat. Enkaam akilghuukat, “Taghneghaaguq.”
40014027	Tawaninginaq Jesus-em pikii, “Alingegpenasi, Whanganguunga!”
40014028	Taagken Peter-em pikaa, “Ataneq, ipa elpengukuvek tagsighnga elpenun aglaghlanga meghem qaayngakun.”
40014029	Jesus-em pikaa, “Tagi.” Enkaam Peter ateghluni angyameng, meghem qaayngakun piyugmeng aglaqaq Jesus-mun.
40014030	Iwernga anuqa elpeksamigu alingegkaq, kalevutkelluku akilghuukaq, “Ataneq, yugulinga!”
40014031	Tawaninginaq Jesus-em akuqaghluku pikaa, “Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguuten! Sangavek malghuklizin?”
40014032	Angyamun uugtaquklu ellmaaragtekaq.
40014033	Enkaam angyamelnguut maniguqaat Jesus. Pikaat, “Ipapestaaq Kiyaghneghem Ighneqaaten!”
40014034	Taagken naayvaq aghvighluku tamlakat Gennesaret-kun.
40014035	Tamaakumiit liisuqsamegteggu Jesus, ungipaasaghtiisqegkiit village-enilnguut qinuyugtiighit tagitesqelluki Jesus-mun.
40014036	Maniguututkiit qinuyulghiit waran saaftesqelluku keniikun enkaam qamaglluteng tamaakut saaftilghiit naallghutellengegkat.
40015001	Taagken ilangi Pharisees-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng Jerusalem-emeng tagiluteng aaptekaat Jesus,
40015002	“Sangameng maligsaaghteten qaatkusigatat sivunemta apeghtuusiitnun? Neghnaqneghmeggni uughtiigatut elqughulluteng apeghtuusiitnun.”
40015003	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sangan elpesi qaatkigataqestiki Kiyaghneghem qelghusii maliggnaluki elpesi katam apeghtuusasi?
40015004	Kiyaghneghem qelghusaqaa, ‘Quulvaghlukek atanllu naanllu’. Whatenllu pikaaguq, ‘Kitum alngunak atani, nalighmeng naani seghlepestaatun akuzitkegkumigu, tuqusaghqaaguq’.
40015005	Iwernga elpesi apeghtughiiqusi, ‘Yugem quulvanghisaghngaagu atani nalighmeng naani whaten pikagu,’ Kayusiisaghqalguunga elpenun, iwernga tuunaanghitaqa qayughllak akequsaqegkaqaqa tuunelleqniluku Kiyaghneghmun. Tawaten pilleghpesigun pakigaqasi Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii apalluqluki elpesi katam apeghtuusasi.
40015007	Ukughsi piniiyugneghni! Elqughllusi whaten Isaiah-m uuknaliqutkegkaqiisi!
40015008	Kiyaghneq piiq, ‘Ukut yuget akuzitmegteggun quulvaghaqaatnga, nakaan ilumeggneng.
40015009	Temngi manigughaqaatnga qayughllak apeghtuusaqaqiit liilightuusangllaqateng, katam whanga Liilightuusaqepiglleghhiistun.’”
40015010	Taagken Jesus-em yulghutet tagsighluki pikii, “Nagallunga liigikitek!
40015011	Yugem sangwaa qaneghminun kanaghtekaa nukeggnaghqingigatuq, iwernga yugem qaanghaneng aanegkaq nukeggnaghqikayuguuq.”
40015012	Taagken maligsaaghtengita takuluku aaptekaat, “Liisimakenghisiguu Pharisees-et anagteketen tawaten pilleghpegun?”
40015013	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nunivagseghaq qamaglluku Atama qilagmelnguum piitesighaamangilkanga nusugyaghqaaguq.
40015014	Avelghaqiinaghluki Pharisees-et! Ayaakastun maghyaghqughiiqut. Yugem ayaakam ilanga ayaakaq tasluqumigu, laagwaaghmun kalefkagtaallequk.”
40015015	Peter-em aaptekaa, “Ungipaataghtikut, sameng pisiigwa ungipaghaaten yuget nukeggnaghqiganniketen neghegkamegteggun?”
40015016	Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesillu salin liigikigatsii?
40015017	Liisimakenghisteggu sangwaa alngunak yugem qaneghminun kanaghtekaa aqsaqghwanun piiquq, taagken aanaquq yugusiineng?
40015018	Iwernga sangwaa qamaken aanegkaq qaneghqun nukeggnaghqikayuguuq yugmeng.
40015019	Qayughllak yugem ilunganeng seghleq sumeghtaghalleq pikaayuguuq, yugtaq, gelgaghniiq, allaniiq, teglegniiq, iqlengiqutki, seghlequuq yugneng.
40015020	Tamaakusta nukeggnaghqikayuget yugneng, iwernga uughtughpenani neghellghem nukeggnaghqennaanghitaa yuuk.”
40015021	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq tamaaken nunameng tungegkenun Tyre-enkuk Sidon-enkuk.
40015022	Taawanguq Canaan-eghmii aghnaq. Jesus takukaa akilghuumaghmi, “Kaay Ataneq, Ighnegha David-em, nangllegyaguteqeghtinga! Panika tughneghaam iitghumaa, seghleghwaaghuuq.”
40015023	Iwernga Jesus-em avelghaqiinaqaa. Maligsaaghtengita takuluku kayagtaghwaaqaat, “Iqitesqigu! Maligsaaghumaamta akilghuuguq!”
40015024	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqaanga Israel-eghmiinginaghhaghnun, penniighestun iflakastun ayuqelghiinun.”
40015025	Iwernga aghnaq tagiluni Jesus-em sivungakun qungughtutkelluku pikaq, “Ataneq, kayusiitaghtinga!”
40015026	Jesus-em pikaa, “Anaggutngaaq taghnughhaat neqngit tuguluki qikminun miluuskumeng.”
40015027	Aghnam pikaa, “Aa-a, Ataneq, talwa yugem qikmii ifkaghqellghaneng neghaqut.”
40015028	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Aghnaq elpek, ugpeqilleghtupigtuten! Apeghiighli piyukelleghpetun.” Tawaninginaq paniga naallghutkaq.
40015029	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq tamaaken nunameng, esnengakun Naayvam Galilee-m. Qemimun mayughluni aqumegkaq.
40015030	Yulghuteghllaget takulaghaatkaat, tagisimiita Jesus-em sivunganun piyugpagningilnguut, aqnightekat, ayaakat, akuzingigalnguut, ilangillu qinuyulghiit. Enkaam naallghuquqii.
40015031	Yulghuteghllaget saghiighayukat esghapagluki akuzingigalnguut akuziyagullghiit, aqnightekat naallghullghiit, piyugpagningilnguut piyugyagullghiit, ayaakatlu esghaasagullghiit. Enkaam usuqegkaat Kiyaghnegha Israel-em.
40015032	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni tagsighluki pikii, “Maakut nangllegyagutepigtanka qayughllak whangamnitut pingayut aghneghet, talwa neghyaghqiitut. Neghestegpenaki aghulaqesunghitanka, luuraq tumangani kayaalinayukata.”
40015033	Maligsaaghtengita aaptekaat, “Maani kilgaani naken neqengnaqesta naamayaghqameng yulghuteghllagnun?”
40015034	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Naten uglaghqakaan neqekrangllalgutsi?” Kiimsiqaat, “Maaghraghvinleguut, qafsinatlu iqalluggaat.”
40015035	Enkaam Jesus-em yulghuteghllaget qelqii aqumuutesqelluki nunakun.
40015036	Taagken tuguluki maaghraghvinlek neqekrangllat iqallugetlu, Kiyaghneq iyamsiqayugvikegkaa. Aavgughluki tuunegkii maligsaaghteminun enkaam uyegtekiit yulghuteghllagnun.
40015037	Qamaglluteng neghuutkat kepsuulluteng. Taagken maligsaaghtet siipneq qerngughlluku maaghraghvinlek pasketet imiiqiit esleqaghaghluki.
40015038	Uglaghtalangit neghuutkat yuget 4,000-nguftut, kesutkegpenaki aghnatlu taghnughhaatlu.
40015039	Taagken Jesus-em yulghuteghllaget aglaghtuutesluki ellngitnun ellnga angyamun uuglluni uvitanganun Magadan-em aglaqaq.
40016001	Taagken ilangi Pharisees-etlu Sadducees-etlu tagikat Jesus-mun anagniilqavigighnaluku. Enkaam allaaghlluwhaghtisqegkaat esghaasighqaaluku aghtughyaghqaanghillgha Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga.
40016002	Iwernga Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Siqineq tevighyaghtungestanghani esla kavighrugunghani piiqusi, ‘Unaami pinighnaquq.’
40016003	Siqineq piitekestanghani qilaga kavighrugunghanillu qilagiinghanillu piiqusi, ‘Aghneghmi esla seghleghunaquq.’ Esghapagluku qilaga liisimakaqaghsi esla natennaqutanga. Iwernga esghapaneghpesiki sallghet aghneghni maani liigikepagningitasi sameng pisiitangi.
40016004	Aghneghem uum yugi seghleghqumanguut, ataasiighneghilnguut Kiyaghneghmun, naqam allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut whangamnun. Yeghlegillu! Taananginaghhaq allaaghlluwhaghtilleq esghaghlleqaghsi Kiyaghneghem allaaghlluwhaghtillgha Jonah-mun.” Taagken Jesus-em unilluki aghulaqegkat.
40016005	Maligsaaghtekullghiit inglunganun naayvam kaalluteng, maligsaaghtet piyalghiimeng puygumalghiit neqekrangllameng kelqegpenateng.
40016006	Jesus-em pikii, “Kelengalusi Pharisees-etlu Sadducees-etlu yeast-angitneng.”
40016007	Ellmeggneng akuzimghhutkegkaat, “Tawaten piiq qayughllak kelqenghilnguukut neqekrangllameng.”
40016008	Jesus-em liisimakegkangi sameng pitangi enkaam pikii, “Elpesi yugni, ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi! Sangafsi neqekranglliinnitsi?
40016009	Taawa liigikigatsii? Neqamikenghistekii tallimat neqekrangllat aavguqanka 5,000 yugnun, qafsin'gutangillu pasketet siipneghmeng imiqasi esleqaghaghlluki?
40016010	Taakutlu neqamikenghistekii maaghraghvinlek neqekrangllat 4,000 yugnun neghestekanka, qafsin'gutangitlu pasketet siipneghmeng imiqasi esleqaghaghlluki?
40016011	Naten sangan liigikenghitesteggu neqekrangllaanghilnguq akuzitkegkegka? Kelengalusi Pharisees-etlu Sadducees-etlu yeast-angitneng!”
40016012	Taagken maligsaaghtet liigikegkaat sameng piiqutanga. Yeast-angunghiteftuq neqekrangllamelnguq kelengasaaghutkegkaa, iwernga kelengasqaqeftii apeghtuusiitneng Pharisees-etlu Sadducees-etlu.
40016013	Taagken Jesus kaasami tunganganun Caesarea Philippi-em, aaptekii maligsaaghteni, “Yuget kinanguniiqatgu Ighnegha Yugem?”
40016014	Kiimsiqaat, “Ilangi piiqut John-nguniluku Paaptaayesta, ilangita Elijah, paninang ilangita Jeremiah-nguniiqaat nalighmeng naliit uuknaliqistet.”
40016015	Aaptekii, “Elpesimi kinanguniiqestengnga?”
40016016	Simon Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Christ-anguuten, Ighnegha unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem.”
40016017	Jesus-em pikaa, “Quyastellelguuten, Simon, ighnegha Jonah-m! Qayughllak yugmeng liisimangitan, Atama qilagmelnguum elpenun liitestekaqaa.
40016018	Enkaam piimken, Peter-nguuten, Uyghak. Whagun uyghagkun nekefleqaqa yughaghvika, tuqullghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghan kayaalqesaghqaqenghitngwhaaghaa.
40016019	Elpenun tuunelleqanka key-ngi Ataneghpagullghan Qilagem. Sangwaa alngunak asightekuvgu nunami whani, asighsaghqaaguq qilagmillu. Sangwaa alngunak itemuskuvgu nunami whani, itemusaghqaaguq qilagmillu.”
40016020	Taagken Jesus maligsaaghteminun apeghtesnanighwaaqaq kitumun alngunak Christ-anguniluni.
40016021	Taagken kenlanga Jesus-em liigikesnaqegkii maligsaaghteni, Jerusalem-etepestaaghyaghqaaniluni, tawani allaaghhiinakun ikfiqesleqniluni Elder-enun, chief priest-enun, apeghtughikayugnunllu Liilightuusameng. Ungipaatkii tuqusaghqaaniluni taagken pingayaani aghneghem Kiyaghneghmun unguvaghsaghqaaniluni.
40016022	Peter-em iqitulluku aghyuuniiqaa, “Ataneq, Kiyaghneghem pisnaanghitaaten! Tawaten pinaanghituten!”
40016023	Jesus-em qiivluku Peter pikaa, “Tughneghaq, iqiten whangamneng! Amigighaghpenga, qayughllak sumeghtaghallghen yugem sumeghtaghalqaa, Kiyaghneghem sumeghtaghalqenghitaa!”
40016024	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Kitum alngunak maligsukuminga, ellmi katam piyukelleni peglluku, qaquurani uyamigluku maligllinga.
40016025	Qayughllak kitum alngunak unguvalleni ellminun katam piknikumigu iflayaghqaqaa. Kitum alngunak pegtekumigu unguvalleni whanga apalluqlunga allgeghlleqaa.
40016026	Sangwaangam yugem pinighqusiqelleqagu piliilluku nunaghllak, iflakumigu unguvasigni? Taawa avangituq veghtusighqameng unguvasigminun.
40016027	Aapghanka tamaakut elpesinun qayughllak Ighnegha Yugem tagiyaghqaaguq Atamineng aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni yaqulegtuumaghmi. Taagken tamaghhaa yuuk nallangightughlleqaa apeghiighutellghatun.
40016028	Ipa ungipaatamsi, whaanlenguut ilagpesi unguvalleghmeggni esghaghyaghqaqaat Ighnegha Yugem tagilghii Umiilguluni.”
40017001	Aghvinlek aghneq atughluku, Jesus-em kelqegkii Peter, James-enkuklu, John-enkuk, anglegutkullghiik, mayuutkii uusqalghiimun naayghamun ellnginiita.
40017002	Iiyngitneng taagken Jesus allangughtekaq: gginaa kuukgutkaq siqineghtun, aatkiillu qateghrakguughtekat nighugestun.
40017003	Taagken maligsaaghtet esghaqagket Moses-enkuk Elijah-nkuk aliighlutek aleghquqangak Jesus.
40017004	Enkaam Peter-em pikaa Jesus, “Ataneq, itagnapigtuq whaantelleghput! Piyukelqegkuvgu nekeflangi pingayut azigutat, elpenunllu, Moses-munllu, Elijah-munllu.”
