40017005	Salin akuzimaluku, qilagwaaghem nighugrakegtam saapegkii, enkaam qilawaaghmeng mem pikii, “Una Ighneqaqa, piniqepigtaqa, efquqepigtaqa, nagataqiteggu!”
40017006	Maligsaaghtet nagalluku ma, alingruughem angtalanganeng niinghutkat nunamun.
40017007	Taagken Jesus-em takuluki saafluki, pikii, “Nekevitek, alingegpenasi!”
40017008	Sivugsalghiimeng Jesus-nginaghhaq esghaqaat.
40017009	Ukigutkelluku naayghameng Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii, “Kitumun alngunak apeghyaqunaan esghaghwaalleq pinakesi kenlanga Ighnegha Yugem unguvaghtekan tuqulleghmeng.”
40017010	Taagken maligsaaghtet aaptekaat Jesus, “Sangan apeghtughistengita Liilightuusat piiqatgu Elijah sivukluni tagipestaaghyaghqaaniluku?”
40017011	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ipa Elijah tagipestaaghyaghqaaguq, enkaam sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku nallghusanqiglleqaa.
40017012	Iwernga ungipaatamsi Elijah tagingwaaqaaguq, iwernga yuget kinangutanga nallukegkaqaat, piyukelleghmegestunllu pikaqaat. Tawateghpigaq Ighnegha Yugem ikfiqesleqaat.”
40017013	Taagken maligsaaghtet liigikegkaat John Paaptaayesta akuzitkaqeftaa.
40017014	Yulghuteghllagnun uteghnighyata, yugem takuluku Jesus, aga segesqughtengnginaamaghmi manungakun pikaq.
40017015	Pikaa, “Ataneq, ighneqa nangllegyagutaghtigu! Sayugpagtalguuq, elngaatall ikfiqnguuq. Awen kenghegnun uullghaghtaquq nalighmeng meghquutaquq.
40017016	Maligsaagtegpenun tagisaghaqa, iwernga naallghutepagningitkaat.”
40017017	Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesi yugni, ugpeqillghitusillu, seghleghwaaghuusillu! Naten tagkaan elpesininnaqsinga ugpeqesqellunga? Mekelghiiq whavek tagiteggu!”
40017018	Jesus-em aghyuuqaa tughneghaq, taagken aanegkaq mekelghiighmeng enkaam tawaninginaq naallghutkaq mekelghiiq.
40017019	Taagken Jesus ellnginaaghsan maligsaagtengita takuluku aaptekaat, “Sangan whangkuta aanesneghmeng aghtughesteggu tughneghaq?”
40017020	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Qayughllak ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaalghiisi. Ipa ungipaatamsi, ugpeqillelguyaqufsi mustard-em piitutesqughhan angtalngatun, una naayghaq pikufsigu, ‘Ingavek nuugten!’ nuuggnayaghtuq. Enkaam sangwaa alngunak aghtughnayanghitaghsi!”
40017021	Iwernga tawatelnguq tughneghaq yughaghhiinaghqunllu, fast-elleghqunllu aanesaghqaqaghsi.
40017022	Maligsaaghtet qerngughusata Galilee-mi Jesus-em pikii, “Ighnegha Yugem tuguluku tuunelleqaat yugnun,
40017023	enkaam tuqulleqaat. Iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem unguvaghtesaghqaaguq.” Taagken maligsaaghtet qivghughllakat.
40017024	Taagken Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit Capernaum-emun tagiyata, Temple-em tax-meng qerngughtistengita takuluku Peter aaptekaat, “Apeghtughistezi Temple-em tax-nganeng llivikiiqaa?”
40017025	Peter-em kiimsiqii, “Aa-a, piiquq.” Peter iteghyan mangteghamun Jesus-em aleghqughyuwhaaqaa, “Simon, nateta elpek sumeghpeni? Kinkungwaaqat nunat umiilgita llivikistaqegkangit allaaghhiinaghmeng tax-emeng? Nunalgutmeggneng piiqaat nalighmeng nakumiineng?”
40017026	Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Nakumiineng.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Enkaam umiilget yugit llivikinaanghitut.
40017027	Iwernga seghleghyugsunghitapung tax-meng qerngughtistet. Enkaam nulughyaa naayvamun iqallugtaqsuggaaghpek qaanghani naalkelleqan mani. Tuguluku llivikusaghtughnakefkung.”
40018001	Taam kingunginaaneng maligsaaghtet Jesus-mun tagiluteng aaptekaat, “Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem kina angelleghpigaawa?”
40018002	Jesus-em tagsighluku taghnughhaq nekevestekaa qukiitgun.
40018003	Pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, iteghnaanghitngwaaghtusi Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem wetqukun taghnughhaghestun lliiqufsi.
40018004	Kina alngunak ukaliighlleghhii uutun taghnughhaghtun, angelleghpigaaguq Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem.
40018005	Kitum alngunak atemkun tuguklineghminigu whatelnguq taghnughhaq, whanga tuguklighaqaanga.
40018006	Iwernga kitum alngunak seghleghqestekagu naliit mekestaaghhaat ugpeqingalghiit whangamneng, itagnaghnayaghtuq yuget qaamqaghfikluku uyaqwaghkun uyghagllagmeng kalefsaqumegteggu uusqallghanun kelliim.
40018007	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut yuget qayughllak nunami whani nanghiiqulleghtupigtut seghleghqelleghmun. Nanghiiqullghet seghleghqistimun piyaghqaagut, iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq kina seghleghqestilghii yugneng!
40018008	“Iiggegpek nalighmeng itegaghpek seghleghqestekangaten, kepluki eggnaketen! Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuten kenlengilngughmun unguvalleghmun iitquvek, iiggiteghngaaghpek nalighmeng itegiiteghngaaghpek miluutelleghqaghpeneng kenlengilnguugnun kenghegnun, inglugtun iiggelighluten nalighmeng itegalighluten.
40018009	Iyegpeklu seghleghqestekangaten ipugluku eggnaken! Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuten kenlengilngughmun unguvalleghmun iitquvek inglupigaq iiskelluku, miluutelleghqaghpeneng kenghanun hell-em inglugtun iyelguluten.
40018010	“Wataghllak, ukaliqegpenaki nalighhiiniit ukut mekestaghhaat. Ungipaatamsi, qilagmi yaqulgita quunpeng Atama qilagmelnguum gginaa esghaghaqaat.
40018011	Ighnegha Yugem tagikaaguq yugulinaluki iflakat.
40018012	“Sumeghpesini sanayaghta yuuk 100 penniilek, ataasiq aghulaqsaqan? Ivaghyaghtughnayaghtaguu aghulaqegkaq unilluki 99 penniini qeminilluki?
40018013	Ipa piimsi, naalkegkumigu quyakeghllagyaghqaqaa pakiggulluku 99-eneng aghulaqumangilngughneng.
40018014	Tawateghpigaq Atagpesi qilagmelnguum piyukelqenghitaa nalighhiiniit maakut mekestaghhaat iflasqelluki.
40018015	“Ugpeqaalgutegpek seghletun pikangaten, ellnginaaghulluku ungipaannaken anaggutellghaneng. Nagaskumiten taawa ilaliighunneqigllequtek.
40018016	Iwernga nagasunghilkangaten, takunqiggnaken kelqelluku ataasiq nalighmeng maalghuk ugpeqaalgutek liisimakestengulukek sameng pilleghpetegneng. Tawaten pilghaaten qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghtuusaqaat maalghuk nalighmeng pingayut liisimakistet ipapighqesaghqaqaat anaggutelleq.
40018017	Iwernga nagasunghilkaki apeghnakesi yughaghvigem yugitnun. Nagasunghilkaki talwa yughaghvigem yugi, kiyaghunnakesi Gentile-ngulghiistun, tax-mengllu qerngughtistengulghiistun.
40018018	“Ipa ungipaatamsi, sangwaa alngunak asightekufsigu nunami whani, asighsaghqaaguq qilagmillu. Sangwaa alngunak itemuskufsigu nunami whani, itemusaghqaaguq qilagmillu.
40018019	“Ilanganengllu ungipaannaqamsi, nunami whani maalghugulutek itagnaqutngukuftek aapnalutek sameng alngunak, Atama qilagmelnguum apeghiighlleqaa elpetegnun.
40018020	Qayughllak maalghuggaat nalighmeng pingayuggaat qerngughuskata whanga atemkun, akulngitnisaghqaagunga.”
40018021	Taagken Peter-em takuluku Jesus aaptekaa, “Ataneq, ugpeqaalgutma seghletun pimanginaqanganga naten uglaghqakaan seghevusaghqaqsikun? Ketwell maaghraghvinlaak?”
40018022	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Maaghraghvinleggiinaq seghevusaghqaqenghitan, iwernga 70 x 7.
40018023	Tawaten piimken qayughllak Kiyaghneghem igleghutillgha Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem whatetuq: Umiilgem qepghaghtemi igiit yuvghiighyaghtuqii esghaghnaluki asengetulangit.
40018024	Iiwenllu igiit yuvghiighaqii, umiilegmun itghutkaat qepghaghta asengelek 10,000 manimeng.
40018025	Tawaten angkaan maningilnguq llivikuusaghqameng asengeminun. Enkaam umiilgem akikesqegkii ellnga, nulighha, avaqutii, saghyangillu llivikuusaaluki asengenganun.
40018026	Iwernga qepghaghta sikmuulluni umiilegmi manungakun maniguutepiglluni pikaa, ‘Utaqiigaghten! Lliviknaaghaqa qamagtengngwaaghluku!’
40018027	Umiilgem nangllegyagulluku puygusqegkaa asengenga enkaam aanestekaa.
40018028	“Taagken taana qepghaghta aanluni nallaqaa qepghaghtelgutni 100 manimeng asengekaq. Akuqaghluku uyaqwhakun pikaa, ‘Llivikinga asengegpeneng!’
40018029	Qepghalgutangan sikmuulluni nangllegsipiglluni pikaa, ‘Utaqiigaghten, llivikelleqamken’.
40018030	Iwernga yugem nagasimangilkanga, yeghlegi anusimingllaghtestekaa kenlanga asengenga llivikellghanun.
40018031	Ilangita qepghaghtet esghapagluku tawaten pillgha, seghleghyaguteghllagluku umiilegmeggnun apeghyaghtuqaat.
40018032	Enkaam umiilgem qepghaghta taana tagsiqlighluku pikaa, ‘Uyuq seghlepestaaq qepghaghta! Legan'ngam seghevutamken asengeghllagpeneng, qayughllak nangllegsilghiiten.
40018033	Qepghalguten nangllegyagusaqlegestun katam whanga nangllegyagutellemtun elpek!’
40018034	Umiilgem sakritepiglluni taana qepghaghta aglaatestekaa amyuutkistenun anusimingllaghvigmelngughnun kenlanga qamagtengngwaaghluku asengenga llivikellghanun.
40018035	“Esgha tawateghpigaq Atama qilagmelnguum qamagllusi piyaghqiisi, qamaken ilugpesineng seghevunneghilkufsiki yulgutesi.”
40019001	Jesus-em tamaakut apeghtuusaqneghmeng taaqsamiki aghulaqegkaq Galilee-meng, nunanganun Judea-m, inglunganilngughmun Kiiwem Jordan-em.
40019002	Yulghuteghllaget maliglleghaatkaat enkaam tawani naallghuquqii qinuyuget.
40019003	Ilangita Pharisees-et takuluku anagniilqavigighnaluku aaptekaat, “Liilightuusamnni itagnaghtaa yugem pegtekumigu nuliini sangwaa alngunak apalluqluku?”
40019004	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Atightiigastekii Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pillghit, ‘Piinlighyuwhaalleghmi Kiyaghneq yungllaghaqngami ulimakaqegkek yugenkuk aghnaankuk’?”
40019005	Enkaam pikii, “Taana apalluqluku yugem atanillu naanillu unillukek, nulighqullghiik qerngughullequk, enkaam ataasiighllequk yugusiik.
40019006	Enkaangam maalghugunanightuk, ataasiightuk yugusiik. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem qerngughutestekakek yeqay yugem pellghututesneghillikek.”
40019007	Pharisees-et aaptekaat, “Sanganmi Moses-em Liilightuusalitinkut yugmun igalitesqelluku nulighha pegtugsighqameng, aanesimaanllu?”
40019008	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Moses-em pegtesaghqaaghtestekaqii nuliisi qayughllak pineghllugulghiisi. Iwernga piinlighyuggaalleghmeng Kiyaghneghem tawatetesaghqaanghinniluku pikaqsaghaa.
40019009	Enkaam whanga piimsi, yugem pegsaghqaqenghitaa nuliini wetkuqun gelghaghniiqan. Pegtekumigu sameng allaneng apallulighluni, nulightunqigtekumi gelgaghniighullequq nulighqenghhamikun.”
40019010	Maligsaaghtengita pikaat, “Taananginaghhaakan apalluq yugem pegtusighqaa nuliighminun, yuuk nulightunghiteghngaaghmi itagnaghnayaghtuq.”
40019011	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Taana apalluq tamaghhaghmi tuguklighnaanghitaat, iwernga Kiyaghneghem ilangitnun tuguklighyaghqaaghtestekaqaa.
40019012	Ilangi yuget nulightiigatut allgeqaatmeggneng eunuch-ngnguluteng. Ilangi nulightiigatut qayughllak yuget eunuch-engllaqaqiit. Paninang ilangi eunuch-ngwaaqut pinighataghatun qepghaannaluku Kiyaghneq Ataneghpagullghani Qilagem. Kitum alngunak taana tuguklighyaghqaqegkumigu, tuguklighligu.”
40019013	Taagken taghnughhaat tagitkiit Jesus-mun saafluki yughaatkesqelluki. Taawanginaq maligsaaghtet ineghtekiit tagitistengit taghnughhaat.
40019014	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Yeqay taghnughhaat tagilit whangamnun. Ineghtegpenaki, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem taghnughhaghestun ayuqelghiit pikaat.”
40019015	Enkaam saaftaqluki quyastekii, taagken aghulaqegkaq.
40019016	Taagken yugem takuluku Jesus aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, sangwaa pinilghii piyaghqaqsikun allgeghutusighqaaluku kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng?”
40019017	Jesus-em pikaa, “Sangan aapsinga sangwaa piniitanga? Ataasighhaaguq pinilghii. Kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengyukuvek qaatkiki Kiyaghneghem qelghusii.”
40019018	Nukalpigam aaptekaa, “Nakut?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Yugtaghpenang, Gelgaghniighpenang, Teglegpenang, Iqlengiqutkigpenang,
40019019	Quulvaghlukek atanllu naanllu, Piniqluki yulguteten piniqelleghpetun elpeneng.”
40019020	Nukalpigam pikaa, “Qamaglluki taakut qaatkaqanka. Sangwaallu piyaghqaqsikun?”
40019021	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Naamigtengngwaaghyukuvgu Kiyaghneghem pisqellgha elpenun, aglaghluten qamaglluku saghyan akikluku, akinga tamaana aklumalghiinun tunqughnaken. Enkaam qilagmi aklungilgullequten, taagken tagiluten maliggnakevnga.”
40019022	Nukalpigam nagalluku, aghulaqegkaq iilqepiglluni qayughllak aklungitepiglleghhii.
40019023	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Ipa piimsi, piyaqnaghyaghqaaguq aklungilngughmun yugmun itelleghqaa Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem.
40019024	Ungipaannaqlaataghamsi ilanganeng, piyaqniisaghqaaguq camel-em suflughutelleghqaa sikuum iiyngakun, aklungilnguum yugem itelleghqaaneng Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem.”
40019025	Maligsaaghtet nagasamegteggu tawaten pilleq saghiighayugllagumaghmeng pikat, “Kinangam yugulillengelleqa?”
40019026	Iwernga Jesus-em tawaveghlluwaaq esghaghluki pikii, “Yuget piyaghqaqenghilkangit, Kiyaghneghem piyaghqaqii.”
40019027	Taagken Peter-em pikaa, “Esghaqaghqutqun, sangwaa qamaglluku unilluku maligtekaqamken. Sangwaangam allgeghlleqesteggu?”
40019028	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa piimsi, nutaghami nunami Ighnegha Yugem aqumellequq umiilgusignekun aqumutagmikun nighughqelleghmini. Taagken elpesillu maligutkani whangamnun aqumlusi qula maalghuk siipneqluku umiilgem aqumutiitgun, igleghutillequsi qula maalghuk siipneqluku ramkenganeng Israel-em.
40019029	Enkaam whanga apalluqlunga kinkut alngunak uniskumegteki mangteghateng, angleguteteng, nayateng, atateng, naateng, avaqutateng, nalighmeng piitesighaghviteng, nulallequt 100-alpagluku. Kenlengilngughmengllu unguvalleghmeng allgeghullequt.
40019030	Iwernga aangelghiilghutet ukaliighllequt enkaam ukavanlenguut angellghughllequt.”
40020001	Paninang Jesus-em pikii, “Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem yugtun ayuquq grapes-meng piitesighaghvilek. Unaanguluku aanluni tugulaasaghtuqaq qepghaghtekaghqameng piitesighaghvigminun.
40020002	Aghneghmun tawavek itagnaqegkii akileghtughnaluki ataasikaghtaan denarius-meng, taagken qepghaghyaghtestekii.
40020003	Nine-eklaagmi aaneqiglluni esghaqii yuget nekevghataaghullghiit sagpenateng akilpegaghvigmi.
40020004	Enkaam pikii, ‘Elpesillu piitesighaghvimnun qepghaghyaghtek, akileghtughnaaghamsi qepghalleghpesistun’.
40020005	Enkaangam qepghaghyaatkat. Taagken aghneghem qukaanillu, three-klaagmillu tawaten pilaataqaq.
40020006	Iiwenllu five-eklaagnaqaqaa, akilpegaghvigmun pikaq, taawanguq paninang yugem ilangi nekevghataaghaqeftut. Aaptekii, ‘Sangafsi whaantaqetsi aghnelqusiq sagpenasi?’
40020007	Kiimsiqaat, ‘Qayughllak kitum alngunak tugunghilkanginkut qepghaghtenguluta.’ Enkaam pikii, ‘Naqam elpesillu qepghaghyaghtek piitesighaghvimnun’.
40020008	“Ighivgaghyagu piitesighaghvilgem pikaa qepghaghtet naasquutistengat, ‘Qepghaghtet tuqlughteghluki akileghtughteghqi kingulighneng sivulighnun.’
40020009	Five-eklaagmi qepghaghyaatkat tagilaghaasameng akileghtuusangegkat denarius-kaghtaan.
40020010	Enkaam sivuliit qepghaghtet akileghtuusangataghaghnaqniluteng pikaayalghiit, iwernga tagilaghaasalghiimeng ellngitlu akileghtuusangegkat denarius-kaghtaan.
40020011	Akileghtuusangyameng qivraaghutkaat piitesighaghvigem yuga.
40020012	Pikaat, ‘Kinguliiluki tugukaghten qepghaghtut ataasighhaghmun aflumun. Whangkuta ughleghiightukut puqlaghllagmi aghnelqusiq, iwernga akileghtughaten whangkutestun angkaan.’
40020013	Iwernga yugem pikaa ataasiq, ‘Nagataghten, ilakumtaamni, puughhneghitamken. Itagnaqegkaqan qepghaghnaluten ataasimun denarius-mun.
40020014	Enkaam tuguluku akileghtuusan aglaa. Akileghtughyuganka kinguliit yuget tugukanka akileghtuusaghpetun angkaan.
40020015	Piyukellemtun manika atughyaghqaqaqa. Aqinaziin ighlegitutemneng?’”
40020016	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Enkaam tamaakut kinguliit sivuliighsaghqaagut, sivuliit kinguliighsaghqaagut.”
40020017	Jesus-em Jerusalem-emun mayuutkelluku yulghutneng aafutkii qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni aleghqughnaaluki.
40020018	Pikii, “Nagatek, Jerusalem-emun mayughnaqukut. Tawani Ighnegha Yugem tuunelleqaat chief priest-enunllu, apeghtughikayugnunllu Liilightuusaneng enkaam nanqiglluku tuqusaghqaanilleqaat.
40020019	Taagken Gentile-enun tuunelleqaat. Tawani legasiighwaatkelleqaat, kagsagmiglleqaat, qaquuraghlleqaatlu. Iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem unguvaghtesaghqaaguq.”
40020020	Taagken Zebedee-m ighneghegkenka naangak tagikaq Jesus-mun ighneghegni kelqellukek. Manungakun segesqughtekaq aapfiknaluku.
40020021	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Sameng piighsin?” Aghnam kiimsiqaa, “Akeqinga Ataneghpagulleghpeni ighneghegka aqumesnakegken aallgha aghenqigneghpegun, ilanga saghumigneghpegun.”
40020022	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Liigikenghitaghsi sangutanga tungsiqaghsi. Meghviknayaghestegneguu qayuusiq meghyaghqaqa?” Kiimsiqaak, “Piyaqleguukung.”
40020023	Jesus-em pikakek, “Qaywa qayuusimneng meghellequtek, iwernga whangangunghituq nakmiighyaghqaq kinkuk aqumyaghqaatkek aghenqignemkunllu saghumignemkunllu. Atama yataaghqegkaqaak taakuk aqumvigkak nakmikegkaminun.”
40020024	Taakut ilangita qula maligsaaghtet nagaqughyamegtekek samatkek anglegutkullghiik ugumiyagutkagket.
40020025	Taagken Jesus-em tuqlughluki maligsaaghteni, pikii, “Liisimakasi Gentile-et igleghutistengita atanghutaqiit yuteng, aangwaaghughtekatlu yugita yukeghqutkaqiit.
40020026	Iwernga elpesi tawatesaghqaanghitusi. Nalighsi igleghutistenguyukumi qepghaghtengughlli elpesinun.
40020027	Nalighsi aangelleghpigaayukumi qepghaghtelaaghughsaghqaaguq elpesinun,
40020028	katam tawaten Ighneghan Yugem pillghatun. Tagimangituq qepghaatesqelluni iwernga tagikaaguq qepghaatinaluni, tuunalukullu unguvalleni naveghqellisiqnaluku uglapiglleghhiinun yugnun.”
40020029	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit Jericho-meng aghulaqumaluki yulghuteghllagem maligtekaat Jesus.
40020030	Taawanguq tumet saningitni ayaakak yugek aqumlutek. Nagaqughyamegnegu Jesus naghughhniluku akilghuukak, “Ataneq, Ighneghani David-em, nangllegyagutaghtikung!”
40020031	Yulghutem ineghtekakek, nepiighesqellukek. Iwernga qevuutaghalluku wata akilghuukak, “Ataneq, Ighneghani David-em, nangllegyagutaghtikung!”
40020032	Enkaam Jesus-em aghuliighluni tuqlughlukek aaptekakek, “Sasqellutek piiqestek whangamnun?”
40020033	Kiimsiqaak, “Ataneq, iyepung esghaghtestaghtiki!”
40020034	Jesus-em nangllegyagullukek iiyngik saaftekii. Tawaninginaq esghaasagutkak enkaam maligtekaak.
40021001	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit tughaaghyalghiimeng Jerusalem-emun, kaatkaat Bethphage-mun Mount Olives-melngughmun. Tawani kayagtekakek maalghuk maligsaaghtegni igleghtekestiisqellukek.
40021002	Whaten pikakek, “Ingavek nenun aglaghlutek tawaninginaq esghaghlleqaghtek petugngalghii donkey nughalek. Itemllukek taginnakegtek whangamnun.
40021003	Kitum alngunak sameng pikangistek, whaten pinaketek, ‘Atanghem aklukaak.’ Tawaninginaq tagitesleqaak whangamnun.”
40021004	Whaten pikaaftuq apeghiighnaluku uuknaliqistem pillgha,
40021005	“Ungipaasaghtughqi, Zion-eghmiit, ‘Esghaqaghtegguqun, umiilegpesi takwaaqiisi. Qusevegngaaq donkey-kun igleghtaquq, donkey-m nughaakun.’”
40021006	Enkaam maligsaaghtek igleghtekestaghlutek sivungitni, Jesus-em pisqellghatun pikak.
40021007	Donkey nughaghtuumaan tagitkaak Jesus-mun. Qaasliit aatkateng mataghlluki teghikusak qaayngitgun llikiit. Taagken Jesus aqumegkaq.
40021008	Yulghuteghllagem tumetgun aatkateng saagtekiit, enkaam ilangi uqfigem avayaaneng ikutaqluteng tumet llilaghtughvikegkiit.
40021009	Yulghuteghlaget Jesus-em sivunganilnguutlu kingunganilnguutlu akilghuutkat, “Usuqnaghhalek Ighnegha David-em! Kiyaghneghem quyasligu tagilghii aatghakun Atanghem! Usuqilleq qilagmelngughmun!”
40021010	Jesus iteghyan Jerusalem-emun, qamaglluteng Jerusalem-eghmiit kagaygunneqegsaatkat whaten pimaghmeng, “Kinangaawa una yuuk?”
40021011	Jesus-em maligtestengita yulghuteghllaget kiimsiqiit, “Jesus-nguuq, uuknaliqista, Nazareth-meng Galilee-melngughmeng pinguuq.”
40021012	Jesus Temple-mun iteghluni aanesquqii qamaglluki tukfightulghiitlu, akikulghiitlu. Taagken manimeng naveghqughtetlu tipelngit ulleghquqii, aqumutiitlu qawaagmeng akilpegaghtet.
40021013	Enkaam pikii, “Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, ‘Mangteghama atilqesaghqaqaa, Yughaghvik.’ Iwernga elpesi iighaghvigughtaghsi teglegniightenun!”
40021014	Taagken ayaakatlu, ighullugmelnguutlu takukaat Jesus Temple-mun, enkaam naallghuquqii.
40021015	Chief priest-etlu apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng esghapagluki allaaghlluwhaghtillghi Jesus-em, nagallukillu taghnughhaat Temple-mi akilghuulghiit whaten, “Usuqilleq Ighneghanun David-em!” elngaatall ugumiyukat.
40021016	Enkaam Jesus aaptekaat, “Naganneghisikii taghnughhaat sameng pitangi?” Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Aa-a, nagatanka. Atightiigastegguu Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghit, ‘Qaanghitgun taghnughhaatlu allgenghhaghhaatlu yataaghqegkaqan usuqilleq elpenun katam?’”
40021017	Taagken Jesus-em unilluki, Jerusalem-emeng Bethany-tkaq qavaghnaluni tamaani.
40021018	Jesus unaanguluku uteghniitkelluku Jerusalem-emun iyataqaq.
40021019	Tumet saaghwitni esghaqaa figs-em uqfiga. Takuluku piyaqminigu ququngaraaghinaaftuq figs-ngunani. Enkaam uqfik tawavek pikaa, “Allamengllu piitestinaanghituten.” Tawaninginaq uqfik paliqaq.
40021020	Maligsaaghtet tawaten pilghii esghapagluku, saghiighayugutkelluku aaptekaat, “Naten uqfik sukatepiglluni palighta?”
40021021	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ipa piimsi, malghuklillngunaan ugpeqillelgukufsi, whangamtun pillequsi, esghapalleghpesistun figs-em uqfiga. Tawatenginaq pinaanghitusi talwa una naayghaq kayagtekufsigu, ‘Iikluten elpeneng meghmun miluuten’, legan pillequq.
40021022	Sameng alngunak aaptekufsi yughakun ugpeqillelgukufsi allgeghusaghqaagusi.”
40021023	Jesus kaalluni Jerusalem-emun Temple-mun iitqaq. Apeghtughimaluku, chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu takuluku aaptekaat, “Ungipaatikut kitum qeleghtaten tawaten pisqelluten, nalighmeng kitum qelellghakun tawaten pinguzin?”
40021024	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Whangallu aapnaqamsi. Kiimsiqufsinga whangallu ungipaalleqamsi kitumun qelghumatka.
40021025	Kitum qeleghtagu John paaptaayeghisqelluku? Kiyaghneghtaawaa nalighmeng yugmeng pingwaa?” Taagken ellmeggneng akuzimghhutkat, “Sameng pinaqesteggu? Kiimsiqumteggu Kiyaghneghmeng pinguniluku, whaten pilleqiinkut, ‘Sangan'ngam ugpeqenghisteggu John?’
40021026	Iwernga, ‘Yugmeng pingunikumteggu’, qemall yulghutet salleqiinkut, qayughllak qamaglluteng ugpeqegkaat John uuknaliqistenguniluku.”
40021027	Enkaam kiimsiqaat Jesus, “Nallukaghput.” Jesus-em pikii, “Whangallu ungipaannaanghitamsi kitumun qelellengegkaatka tawaten pillemnun.”
40021028	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Naten una sumeghtaghaatkelleqesteggu? Yugnguq taawa maalghugegneng ighnelek. Sivulighmun piluni pikaa, ‘Ighnemni, aghneghmi whani grapes-meng piitesighaghvimnun qepghaghyaghhaaten!’
40021029	Ighneghan pikaa, ‘Wiin piyunghitunga.’ Iwernga aghneghmi taakwani avuteghqelluni qepghaghyaqaq.
40021030	Taagken tuunglighhaanun ighneghmi piluni, tawateghpigaq pikaa. Ighneghan pikaa, ‘Aa-a, pillequnga’, iwernga pimangilnguq.”
40021031	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Naliim ighneghan qaatkegkaqagu atani?” Kiimsiqaat, “Sivuliim.” Enkaam Jesus-em pikii, “Ungipaatamsi tax-meng qerngughtestetlu, aghnatlu akikikayuget yugusimeggneng sivugpesini iteghaatnguut Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem.
40021032	John-em Paaptaayestem ungipaasaghtuqaqiisi naten kiyaghtelleghqameng Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun, iwernga ugpequmangitaghsi. Naqam tax-meng qerngughtistetlu, aghnatlu akikikayuget yugusimeggneng ugpeqegkaqaat. Talwa kingunganeng esghapakaqeghngaaghpesiki ugpeqegkangat John, paninang elpesi avuteghqellusillu seghleghqennanillghitusi, ugpequmangitaghsillu.”
40021033	Jesus-em pikii, “Ilanga ungipaghaan nagateggu. Taawanguq yuuk piitesighaqaq grapes-meng nunamikun. Minglluluku, laagutkakek grapes-mun qageghquusik, nekeftekaallu uusqalghii kelengakivigkaq. Taagken navghitkaa grapes-meng piitesighaghvini piitesighaghtenun aflengakesqelluku. Taagken ellnga ilanganun nunam aglaqaq.
40021034	Saghnayaghqaaghsata grapes-et, piitesighaghvilgem qepghaghteni kayagtekii nengini aqfasqelluki.
40021035	Iwernga piitesighaghtet akuqaghluki qepghaghtet, ataasiq anaguleghtaakaat, ilanga tuqutkaat, pingayaat milughpagaataghhiinaq tuqutkaat.
40021036	Qepghaghtemi ilangi kayagllaataqii, sivulighneng uglaghataghaghluki, ellngitlu tawatengwaaq pilaataqiit.
40021037	Qenwat ighneni kayagtekaa ellngitnun, whaten pimaghmi, ‘Ipapestaaq siivakelleqaat ighneqa.’
40021038	Iwernga piitesighaghtet esghaghluku piitesighaghvilgem ighnegha whaten pikat, ‘Uum ighneghan piliilleqaa una nuna atani tuqukan. Tuquskumteggu whangkuta piliilleqaghput una grapes-meng piitesighaghvik.’
40021039	Enkaangam akuqaghluku, piitesighaghvigmeng miluulluku tuqutkaat.”
40021040	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Piitesighaghvilgem tagikumi salleqaki piitesighaghtet?”
40021041	Chief priest-etlu siivanlleghetlu kiimsiqaat, “Seghlepestaatun tuqulleqii taakut seghleghet yuget. Taagken navghilleqaa piitesighaghvini allanun piitesighaghtenun. Saghnalleghqaq kaaskan nengiilleqaat.”
40021042	Jesus-em pikii, “Atightiigastekii Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pillghit? ‘Uyghak taana mangteghangllaghtet ighsakegkaat megnunalleghpigaaghtekaaguq uyghak. Taana Atanghem pilqaa, urang pinilleghpigaaguq whangkunnun!’
40021043	“Enkaangam ungipaatamsi, Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem elpesineng awisaghqaaguq, enkaam tuunyaghqaaguq yugnun piitestiyaghqanun fruit-nganeng Ataneghpagullghem.”
40021044	“Kina alngunak taaggun uyghagkun iqukumi, pelimyaghqaaguq. Kina alngunak taam uyghagem ifkaghvikegkumigu siftaaghqelleqaa.”
40021045	Chief priest-etlu Pharisees-etlu nagalluki Jesus-em ungipaghaatangi liigikegkat Jesus-emnguq ellngit akuzitkaqeftii.
40021046	Enkaam tuguyukaqsaqangat, iwernga alingegkat yulghuteghllagneng qayughllak ugpeqegkangat Jesus uuknaliqistenguniluku.
40022001	Taagken Jesus-em apeghtughlaataqii taakut yuget ungipaghaatetgun. Pikaq,
40022002	“Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem whatetuq, umiilgem ighneni nengughhnaqelghii yataaghqutkaa neqenghaghqunnaluku.
40022003	Qepghaghteni kayagtekii ungipaasaghtiisqelluki tagsiqliqat nengughutem neqenghaghqellghanun tagilaghaatesqelluki, iwernga tagiyunghitkat.
40022004	Taagken umiilgem pikii ilangi qepghaghteni, ‘Ungipaasaghtughteki tagsiqliqanka neqenghaghqellemnun, neghyaghqan'nguq apeghiightut. Tuqutiightesimaanka yugtaaneghneng teghikusaneng, quwintalghiinengllu nughaghneng. Enkaam sangwaa qamaglluni apeghiightuq. Tagilin'nguq nengughutem neqenghaghqellghanun!’
40022005	Iwernga aqelqaghqat tagsiqliqiit waakumangilnguut. Yeghlegi navek sayaghtuutkat, ataasiq piitesighaghvigminun pikaq, ilanga estugaghminun,
40022006	umiilgem qepghaghtengi ilangita akuqaghluki sakusiiqluki tuququqiit.
40022007	Umiilek sakriteghllakaq enkaam pilluwaghteni kayagtekii. Tuququqiit yugtaqat, kumaghtekaatlu nengat.
40022008	Taagken qepghaghteni pikii, ‘Nengughhnaqem neqenghaghqusighqii apeghiightut. Aqelqangllaqaqsaqenka seghletun pikaatmeggneng tagipagningitut.
40022009	Enkaangam aanlusi tumenun nallaqasi qamaglluki yuget neqenghaghqesaghtiisqiteki.’
40022010	Qepghaghtet aanluteng tumeni qamaglluki nallaqateng seghleghuyaghngaata, pinighyaghngaata neghyaghtiisqegkiit, enkaam nengughutfik esleqaghaghtekaq.
40022011	“Umiilgem esghaghyaghtughyaqminiki aqelqat, esghaqaa yuuk aasimangilnguq nengughhnaqelghiim aatkaaneng.
40022012	Enkaam aaptekaa, ‘Ilakumtaamni, naten iteghsin nengughhnaqelghiim aatkaaneng aategpenang?’ Yugem kiimsighpagningitkaa.
40022013	Taagken umiilgem qepghaghtet pikii, ‘Iiggillu, itegiillu asighlluki qagavek mamlegmun miluuteggu, tawani yuget qiyallequt ggutetengllu terqitaagtaghlleqiit.’”
40022014	Jesus-em taaqniqii akuzilleni whaten, “Uglapestaaq tagsiqliqaaghngaan, iwernga palaghhaagut nakmikegkat.”
40022015	Taagken Pharisees-et unilluku Jesus agghitkat naten anagniilqavigighnaluku Jesus akuzillghakun.
40022016	Enkaam kayagtekiit ilangi maligsaaghteteng, ilangillu Herodian-et Jesus-mun. Whaten pikaat, “Apeghtughista, liisimakamken akuziiquten ipanguluku. Apeghtuusanllu naten Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqesullgha ipanguuq. Aangwaaghuyaghngaata, ukavansaghngaata paninang apeghtughaqaten tawateghpigaq.
40022017	Enkaam ungipaataghtikut naten sumeghtaghalleghpeneng. Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaani elqughutngaa llivikilleghqaghput tax-emeng Caesar-mun? Llivikiltaa-a nalighmeng pinghitelta?”
40022018	Jesus-em liisimakegkii seghletun piyugukangat, enkaam pikii, “Piniiyugneghni elpesi! Sangama anagniilqavigighnaqutkestengnga?
40022019	Kelguvikitengnga manimeng tax-mun llivikisighqameng.” Enkaam tagitkaat manimeng.
40022020	Taagken aaptekii, “Kitum gginaqagu una? Kitum aatqagu una?”
40022021	Kiimsiqaat, “Caesar-em.” Enkaangam Jesus-em pikii, “Tuuniteki Caesar-mun tamaakut Caesar-em pingi, tuuniteki Kiyaghneghmun tamaakut Kiyaghneghem pingi.”
40022022	Nagasamegteggu saghiighayukat taagken unilluku aghulaqegkat.
40022023	Tawani aghneghmi Sadducees-et aapsaghtuqaat Jesus. Tamaakunguut ugpeqingigalnguut tuqukat unguvaghtekayugutangi.
40022024	Pikaat, “Apeghtughista, Moses-em Liilightuusii pikaagut, ‘Yuuk nulightughluni tuqukan avaqutigpenani, anglegutangan tuguyaghqaqaa ugingighaq avaqutinnaluku anglegutni tuqukaq.’
40022025	Maansaghtut maaghraghvinlek yuget anglegutkullghiit. Nuyekliq nulightughluni avaqutigpenani tuqukaaguq. Enkaam nulighha anglegutangan tugukaa.
40022026	Tuunglighhaallu anglegutanga tuquuq avaqutigpenani. Enkaam pingayaan anglegutangan tugaa taana aghnaq. Qamaglluteng tugaaqluku tuqulaghaatut avaqutigpenateng.
40022027	Kinguliiluni aghnaq tuqukaaguq.
40022028	Ungipaataghtikut, unguvaghtuutellghem aghneghani kitum aghnaq nulighqelleqagu, qamagllutengqun tugukaqegkangat?”
40022029	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Anaggutngaasi qayughllak liigikigatasi Akuzitet Igaqegkat, talwa aghtughyaghqaanghillgha Kiyaghneghem.
40022030	Tuqukat unguvaghtuuskumeng nengughusaghqaanghitut, yaqulgestun qilagmelngughestun.
40022031	Atightiigastegguu Kiyaghneghem apellgha elpesinun tuqukat unguvaghtuutelleghqiitneng? Whaten pikaaguq,
40022032	‘Kiyaghneqaanga Abraham-em, Kiyaghneqaanga Isaac-em, Kiyaghneqaangallu Jacob-em.’ Kiyaghneq Kiyaghneqaat unguvalghiit, nakaan tuqukat.”
40022033	Jesus-em apeghtughillgha yulghuteghllaget nagalluku, saghiighayaguteghllakaat.
40022034	Pharisees-et nagaqughyamegteki Sadducees-et Jesus-mun nepiighqwaaniluki qerngughutkat.
40022035	Ataasim Pharisees-em apeghtughistengan Liilightuusat aapqughaaqaa Jesus anagniilqavigighnaluku.
40022036	Whaten aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, natungaawa angelleghpigaq Liilightuusani?”
40022037	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “‘Ataneq Kiyaghneghen piniqsaghqaqan qamaglluku ilugpegun, qamaglluku unguvasighpegun, qamaglluku umyugaghpegun.’
40022038	Taana angelleghpigaaguqlu, megnunalleghpigaaguqlu Liilightuusaq.
40022039	Tuunglighhaa angelleghpigaq Liilightuusaq sivulightun ayuquq: ‘Piniqsaghqaqaten yulguteten piniqelleghpetun elpeneng katam.’
40022040	Taakuk Liilightuusak tunemaaguk tamaghhitnun Liilightuusanunllu, apeghtuusiitnunllu uuknaliqistet.”
40022041	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii Pharisees-et qerngughutngamaluki,
40022042	“Naten sumeghtaghaatkaqesteggu Christ-a? Kitum ighneqagu?” Kiimsiqaat, “Ighneqaa David-em.”
40022043	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sangan'ngam David-em akuziiqngami Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun atightagu, ‘Ataneghmeng’? Whaten pikaalghii,
40022044	‘Atanghem pii Atanqa, Aqumi aghenqignemkun, kenlanga anguyagten itegaghpek asinganun lliightellemnun.’
40022045	David-em atiimakagu, ‘Ataneghmeng’ naten ighneqagu?”
40022046	Nalighhiiniita Pharisees-et kiimsighpagningitkaat Jesus. Taagken kenlekluku kitum alngunak tetugyagutkaat aapneghmeng.
40023001	Taagken Jesus-em pikii yulghutetlu, maligsaaghtenillu,
40023002	“Apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-etlu aqumgaat Moses-em aqumutaakun.
40023003	Tamaaken apalluqluku qaatkaqiteki qamaglluki apeghtuusiit elpesinun, iwernga ellngita sallghit maligtegpenaki. Sasqaqiisi naqam ellngita pingigatiit.
40023004	Apeghtughillghit Liilightuusaneng piyaqnapigtut yugnun qaatkesaghqaaluteng. Apeghtuusiit uqigtuqastun akmagestun ayuqut akmagtestaqegkangit yugnun, naqamllu talwa ataasighhaq ighneghwaaghteng atuqigataat kayusiinnaluki akmagitneng.
40023005	“Qamaglluki pinitun pilleteng piiqiit esghaghsaqnaluki yugnun. Tallimegteggunllu qagumegteggunllu qillghutaqiit pateghtaaghalluki salngawaaghhaat Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng imalget, qaaslimengllu qughalkutiit taakluki ulimaaqiit.
40023006	Neqenghaghqemmi, aqumyuneghtuut aangwaaghughtekat aqumutiitgun, synagogue-nillu tawatelngughteggun aqumyuneghtuut.
40023007	Quulvaghtesugaqut akilpegaghvigni, atiisqesugaqutlu, ‘Apeghtughistemeng’.
40023008	Iwernga elpesi atightestegpenasi, ‘Apeghtughistemeng’ qayughllak ataasiiguq Apeghtughistezi, anglegutkullghiistun ayuqusi.
40023009	Kina alngunak atighpenaan, ‘Atameng’ nunami whani, qayughllak ataasiiguq Atazi qilagmelnguq.
40023010	Talwa kitumun alngunak atightestegpenasi, ‘Igleghutistemeng’ qayughllak ataasiiguq igleghutistezi, Christ-anguuq.
40023011	Taana angelleghpigaq qepghaghtekaghqaqaghsi.
40023012	Kina alngunak ellmineng anglistekumi qusevegtesaghqaaguq, enkaam kina alngunak ellmineng qusevegtekumi anglistellengyaghqaaguq.
40023013	“Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Uumgutaqasi iteghnaqelghiit Ataneghpagullghanun Qilagem. Elpesi katam iitghigatusi, aghuliightaqasillu iteghyulghiit!
40023014	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Esghaghlaataquluki ugingighat mangteghiighaqasi. Taagken pinighnilusi pisqellusi taakluku yughaghaqusi. Tamaaken apalluqluku aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagusi!
40023015	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Igleghaaqusi kelliikunllu, quutkunllu ivaghnaluku ataasiq yuuk ugpeghhnnaluku elpesistun. Taagken apeghtuusasi ugpeqegkaki apeghtuusaghpesi aglaghtesaghqaaghlleqaa hell-mun, enkaam elpesi aghyuulleghpesineng malghughqengngaan aghyuullengyaghqaaguq!
40023016	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi, ayaakani igleghutisteni! Apeghtughiiqusi whaten, ‘Kina whaten pikumi, “Akeqiinga Temple-kun” taana pitngunghituq. Iwernga kina whaten pikumi, “Akeqiinga gold-ngakun Temple-em” piyaghqapestaaqaa akequsani’.
40023017	Elpesi ayaakani temngitwhasteni! Nalikek megnunaghataghaghtak, gold-a, nalighmeng Temple-a agleghnaghtestilghii gold-meng?
40023018	Apeghtughiiqusillu whaten, ‘Kina whaten pikumi, “Akeqiinga aghqefigegnekun”, taana pitngunghituq. Iwernga kina whaten pikumi, “Akeqiinga tunusakun aghqefigegnilngughqun,” piyaghqapestaaqaa akequsani.’
40023019	Ayaangaghhaalek elpesi! Nalikek megnunaghataghaghtak, tunusaq nalighmeng aghqefigek agleghnaghtestilghiik tunusameng?
40023020	Enkaangam kina akeqikumi aghqefigegnekun, akeqinguuq taaggunllu sakunllu tamaghhaakun aghqefigegnilngughqun.
40023021	Kinallu akeqikumi Temple-kun, akeqinguuq taaggunllu kiyaghlleghhiikunllu tawani.
40023022	Kinallu akeqikumi qilagkun, akeqinguuq Kiyaghneghem aqumutagkenkunllu aqumgalghiikunllu tawani.
40023023	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Kiyaghneghmun tuunaqasi qulaghqellghi neqmun neqnighsaatet, mint-et, dill-et, cummin-et. Iwernga avelghaghaqasi apeghtuusat megnunaghataghalghiit Liilightuusanilnguut katam: taniillghitelleq, nangllegtalleq, ataasiighmetelleq. Taakut atughqaqsaghasi avelghafqiita ilangillu Liilightuusat.
40023024	Ayaakani igleghutisteni! Yugtun ayuqusi nguuyngaaghaq meghyaghqamineng iqilluku taagken camel-a tuufleqaa!
40023025	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Qayuusisillu sagnesillu qaayngi sangigtaqasi, naqam imighngaat wayaghniiqaghpesinengllu, pakigniilleghpesinengllu.
40023026	Ayaangalghii Pharisee! Sivuklukek sangigtikek ilungik qayuusimllu sagneghemllu enkaam qaaskulluteklu ukmangiillik!
40023027	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Tuqukat salngagistun ayuqusi piineqegkat qatelghiimeng. Esghaqaaluteng qaayngi pinighhalek, iwernga qama imaqut neghqughrugmengllu aghulleghmengllu.
40023028	Elpesillu tawatetusi. Qayegpesineng pinighsugnighllaget, iwernga ilugpesini piniiyugneghuusi, apeghtuutkasi Liilightuusat atuqigatasi.”
40023029	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-enillu! Piniiyugneghuusi! Mangteghasqwaangllaghaqasi lliivghitgun uuknaliqistet, pinighnaghsaghaqasillu lliivghit tamaakut kiyaghtekat elqughulluteng Kiyaghneghmun.
40023030	Taagken whatenllu piiqusi, ‘Neghighluku kiyaghtekaayaqumta sivunemnni, tuququlgusighnayanghitngwaaghaput uuknaliqisteneng’.
40023031	Tawaten akuzilleghpesigun liigikestusi, kingunqennilusi tuququghtengitnun uuknaliqistet.
40023032	Enkaam saaqetsi sivuneghpesi piinliqaat apeghiighteggu.
40023033	Nemeghyani elpesi, avaqutiitni nemeghyat! Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekangisi aghyuughyaghqaanilusi, naten anagnaqesteggu aghyuulleghqaghsi hell-mi?
40023034	Enkaam ungipaatamsi kayagfikamsi uuknaliqistenengllu, liisimalghiinengllu, apeghtughistenengllu. Ilangit tuququghlleqasi, ilangit qaquuraghlleqasi, enkaam ilangit synagogue-egpesini kagsagmiglleqasi, ilangit town-eneng ilangitnun malighqughlleqasi.
40023035	Tamaaken apalluqluku elpesi Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqaqiisi tuququllghitnun qamaglluki kiyaghtekat elqughulluteng Kiyaghneghmun nunami whani, Abel-meng Zechariah-mun, ighnegha Barachiah-m. Tuqutkaghsi akulegkeni Temple-emllu aghqefigemllu.
40023036	Ipa ungipaatamsi, elpesi unguvalghiini maaten Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqaqiisi tamaakunun seghletun pilleghnun!
40023037	“Kaay, Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Tuququqaqaten uuknaliqistet, milughpagaataghlukillu tuququqaten kayagtekanka elpenun. Uglaapiglluku qerngughsugaqsaghanka yugten whangamnun, katam qawaagem qerngughtellghatun amaaghaghhani yaqugmi asinganun, iwernga tawaten pistesugumangitaghpenga.
40023038	Enkaangam mangteghan paaghqiilleqaa.
40023039	Ungipaatamsi, whaken kenlekluku esghaghnaanghitaghpesinga alla kenlanga whaten pilleghpesinun, ‘Kiyaghneghem quyasligu tagilghii aatghakun Atanghem.’”
40024001	Jesus aanluni Temple-meng aghulaqumaluku maligsaaghtengita takuluku kelgutkiit mangteghat Temple-em pingi.
40024002	Pikii, “Esghaghasi tamaakut mangteghat. Ipa piimsi, talwa ataasiq uyghak nemininnaanghituq. Qamaglluteng ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
40024003	Jesus aqumyan Mount Olives-kun, maligsaaghtengita takuluku ellnginaghhaamaaghluteng aaptekaat, “Ungipaatikut, qakun tamaakut piyaghqaawat? Sangulleqa liisimakusighqaghput tagilleghqaghpenun, nunamllu iqugtelleghqaanun?”
40024004	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Kelengalusi, kitumun alngunak puughtestegpenasi.
40024005	Qayughllak uglaapiglleghhii tagiyaghqaaguq atuqluku aatqa, whaten piiqluteng, ‘Whanga Christ-anguunga’, puughqughtaayaghqaqaatlu yulghun.
40024006	Nagaquullequsi pilluwaneng, akusqaghtaatkellghitnengllu pilluwat; alingegpenasi qayughllak tamaana piyaghqaaguq. Iwernga salin iquggnaqngunghituq.
40024007	Nunat yugit pillugutullequt, ataneghpagullghetlu pillugutullequt, nani alngunak neqangisagllagllequq, nunat uvelegtaghllagllequt.
40024008	Qamaglluni tamaana aghnam ighniyukestallghatun ayuqellequq.
40024009	“Taagken tamaana pimaluku yuget tugulleqiisi, amyuqetaatkelleqiisi, tuqulleqiisillu. Nunataghhaan tamaghhaan ramkengan ugumiilleqiisi whanga apalluqlunga.
40024010	Enkaam uglaapiglleghhiim ugpeqnanighlleqaatnga, uveghpagutusagullequt, ugumiisagullequtlu.
40024011	Taagken uuknaliqistesighwaalghutet tagiluteng puughqughlleqiit yulghutet.
40024012	Seghleq nulam angtalanganeng apalluqluku allulluteng yuget piniqinanighllequt.
40024013	Iwernga kina alngunak nuqenneghtuqaq kenlemun yugulillengyaghqaaguq.
40024014	Ukutlu Pinilghiit Ungipat Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghaneng ayuqelghiit ungipaqsaghqaagut nunataghhaani tamaghhaani ramkengitnun nagaqiisqelluki. Taagken nuna iqugllequq.”
40024015	“Yeqay atightughtem liigikligu sameng pisiitanga uuknaliqistem Daniel-em uuknaliqutkegkaa. Uuknaliqutkegkaa taana agleghniilnguuguq paaghqiitestilghii agleghnalghiimi nemi. Esghaqufsigu tesqamani nekevelghii,
40024016	Judea-melnguut anagniighhaat naayghanun.
40024017	Yuuk mangtegham qaaynganilnguq ukigluni saghyaqufqaami pilghaaq.
40024018	Yuuk piitesiighaghvigmelnguq qaaslighqufqaami pilghaaq.
40024019	Tamaani aghneghni seghleghwaaghunaqnguut qumilget aghnat, mamaghtalgetlu!
40024020	Yughaghtek anagniifqaafsi uksumi pisqellusi nalighmeng Sabbath-mi,
40024021	qayughllak tamaani seghleliiq elngaatall seghleghllagughsaghqaaguq. Seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq seghleliighaqelleghneng ima piinlighyuggaallghaneng nunam whavemun kenlanga. Allamengllu tawatelnguq pinaanghitngwaaghtuq.
40024022	Tamaakut aghneghet Kiyaghneghem palallimangisaqaki, kina alngunak unguvanayanghituq. Iwernga apalluqluki nakmikegkani aghneghet palalliyaghqaqii.
40024023	“Tamaani kitum alngunak pikangisi, ‘Ii-i, Christ-a whaa’, nalighmeng, ‘Tazingantuq!’ ugpeqegpenaan,
40024024	qayughllak Christ-asighwaaghetlu, uuknaliqistesighwaaghetlu tagillequt. Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagllequt, saghiighanaghqeghllagllequtlu puughhnaluki yuget, talwa Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii puughsaqlegukumegteki.
40024025	Taawa ungipaatamsi sivutghulluku pilleghqaq.
40024026	“Enkaangam whaten pikangisi, ‘Ii-i, Christ-a paaghqillghanituq!’ takugpenaan; nalighmeng whaten pikata, ‘Ii-i, mangtegham ilunganituq’, ugpeqegpenaki.
40024027	Qayughllak Ighnegha Yugem tagikumi tawatesaghqaaguq nighugpaguutelleghtun kuukgullequq asivaghmeng pakfallamun.
40024028	“Qawaagpaget qerngughtaqut nani alngunak kemegqwaalgunghani.
40024029	“‘Kingungiighhiitneng tamaakut seghleliilleghllaget Kiyaghneghem siqineq mamlegtesleqaa, tanqiq nighugunnanightesleqaa, ighaleqetaaghet ifkaquutesleqii qilagameng, aghtughyaghqaanghillghet qilagamelnguut igleghallghit allangughquutesleqii.’
40024030	“Taagken qilagakun sangwaa allgeghllequq liisimakusighqaq Ighneghaneng Yugem. Taagken qamagtengngwaaghluteng nunam ramkengi qivghum qiyaaghuuteghllagllequt. Esghaghlleqaat Ighnegha Yugem tagilghii qilagwaaghteggun, aghtughyaghqaanghilleghtuumaghmillu nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
40024031	Enkaam Ighneghan Yugem qalghightaan qalghightesteghllakumigu kayaglleqii yaquleni navek alngunak qerngughtesqelluki nakmikegkani nunataghhaaneng tamaghhaaneng.
40024032	“Liitfikiteggu uqfiga figs-em. Esghaqufsiki avayii uniilliighalghiit, ququngii piitekestalghiit, liisimakaghsi kiigyaghtungestaghaa.
40024033	Tawateghpigaq qamagtengngwaaghluki aapqanka tamaakut esghaqufsiki, liisimakelleqaghsi ellnga kaasaghtungestaamaaq, aaqun amigmun lliighumaaq.
40024034	Ipa ungipaatamsi, maaten unguvalghiit tuqulaghaatestegpenaki qamaglluteng tamaakut piyaghqaagut.
40024035	Qilagallu, nunallu aviighusaghqaaguk, iwernga whanga akuzitenka aviighunnaanghitut.
40024036	“Kitum alngunak nallukaa taam aghneghem aflunga qakun kaasaghqaatanga. Talwa qilagmelnguut yaqulget nallukaat, Ighneghemllu nallukaa, Atanginaghhaam liisimakaa.
40024037	Katam tamaani Noah-m kiyaghtellghani, yuget tawatesaghqaagut Ighneghan Yugem tagilleghqaani.
40024038	Tamaani aghneghni, sivungani ulevem yuget neghaqluteng, meghaqluteng, nengughutaqluteng ayuqegkat kenlanga tawavek aghneghmun Noah-nkut itellghitnun ark-mun.
40024039	Nallukegkaat natesaghqaatanga kenlanga ulevelleghmun, enkaam qamagtengngwaaghluteng tuqulaghaatkat. Tawateghpigaq Ighnegha Yugem tagikan, nallukelleqaat natesaghqaatanga.
40024040	Tawani pilleghmi maalghuk yugek piitesiighaghvigmegni qepghaatek, aallgha tugulleqaa, ilanga uneglleqaa.
40024041	Aghnak kagimtilghiik grain-meng, aallgha tugulleqaa, ilanga uneglleqaa.
40024042	“Enkaangam kelengalusi, qayughllak nallukngwaaghaghsi nani aghneghmi Ataneghpesi tagilleghqaa.
40024043	Nalluneqniituq, mangtegham yugan liisimaksaqumigu teglegniightem tagilleghqaa, qavaghpenani kelenganayaghtuq naafqulluni iteghnayukan mangteghaminun.
40024044	Enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku elpesillu apeghiighsaghlusi quunpeng, qayughllak Ighnegha Yugem tagiyaghqaaguq waakenghillghaghllusi.
40024045	“Kinangaawa ataasiighmelnguq peghqinelghii qepghaghta? Taananguuq umiilgan igleghutistengllaqaa qepghaghtelgutanganun, neqelitaatiisqellukillu aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
40024046	Taana qepghaghta quyastellengyaghqaaguq umiilgan kaalluni esghaqumigu qelelleghmitun pilghii.
40024047	Ipa ungipaatamsi, taana qepghaghta umiilgan aflengakistengllaghyaghqaqaa saminun tamaghhaanun.
40024048	Iwernga taana qepghaghta seghleghukumi sumeghtaghaghllequq whaten, ‘Umiilka tagilghaghtughnaanghituq’,
40024049	enkaam amyuutkesagulleqii qepghaghtelgutni. Ilallequqlu suumelghiinun, neghelgusighaqluki, meghelgusighaqluki lliighllequq.
40024050	Taagken ataasimi aghneghmi umiilga kaallequq qepghaghta yataaghqellghillukullu, sighimakellghillukullu.
40024051	Enkaam umiilgan qevuulluku aghyuughlleqaa, aglaghtesleqaa piniiyugneghnun aghyuughyaghqaaluku maligulluku. Tawani qiyiqellequt, gguteteng terqitaagtaamiita.
40025001	“Tawani pilleghmi Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem uspusaghqaaguq qulaghyagnun aghnaghaghnun kelqelluki kenelghutateng paayghilghiit nulightughnaqelghiimeng.
40025002	Tallimat nalluuqat tallimat peghqinelghiit.
40025003	Nalluuqat kelqegkiit kenelghutateng uqughqangunaki,
40025004	iwernga peghqinelghiit kelqegkiit kenelghutateng uqughqalighluki.
40025005	Nulightughnaqelghii muluuqaq, qenwat aghnaghaat qavaghnikat enkaam qavatghutkat.
40025006	“Unugem qukaani kina akilghuukaq whaten, ‘Uka tagiiquq nulightughyaghqaq! Aanlusi payeghteggu!’
40025007	Aghnaghaat taghtughaghtaalluteng kenelghutateng kenghit nallghusaqiit.
40025008	Taagken nalluuqat pikat peghqinelghiinun, ‘Uqughqalitaghtikut, kenelghutaput qaamnaqut.’
40025009	Peghqinellghita pikiit, ‘Seghleghhalek tamaghhamnnun uqughqapagitukut, akilpegaghtenun tukfighiyaghtughtek.’
40025010	Enkaam nalluuqat uqughqangyaghtuutkat. Aviisimaluki nulightughnaqelghii kaatkaq. Taakut yataaghqengngalghiit itelgusiqaat nengughutem neqenghaghqellghanun, enkaam amik uumkaat.
40025011	“Kingunganeng nalluuqat aghnaghaat kaalluteng, akilghuukat, ‘Ataneq, Ataneq! Qelpeghutaghtikut!’
40025012	Iwernga nulightughnaqelghiim kiimsiqii, ‘Ipa ungipaatamsi, nallukamsi kinkungutsi.’”
40025013	Jesus-em ungipaghaatni taaqniqaa whaten, “Enkaangam kelengatek, qayughllak nallukaghsi natungutanga aghneq nalighmeng natungutanga aflu Ighneghan Yugem tagilleghqaa.
40025014	“Ataneghpagullgha Qilagem uspusaghqaaguq whavek ungipaghaatmun: Taawanguq yuuk igleghanaqelghii navek uyavanun. Tuqluqii qepghaghteni aviilleghmini aflengakistenguluki saghyaminun.
40025015	Ataasimun 5,000 manit tuunegkii, ilanganun 2,000, kingulighmun 1,000. Tamaghhiita tunquqii pillegtulngistun. Taagken aghulaqegkaq.
40025016	Yuuk taana 5,000-nengegkaq, tawaninginaq aghulaqluni akiksaghqameng tukfightuqaq. Enkaam alla 5,000 allgeghtekaa.
40025017	Taanallu 2,000-nengegkaq, allgeghutkaq alla 2,000-meng.
40025018	Iwernga taana 1,000-nengegkaq aanluni laagulluki iiqii umiilegmi maningi.
40025019	“Muluughllagluni qepghaghtet umiilgat uteghnighyami ungipaghsuqii samatangi manini.
40025020	5,000-nengegkam esnevaghluni pikaa, ‘Umiilemni, tagivaqaqaten 5,000 manit. Taawa alla 5,000 allgeghsimaaqaa.’
40025021	Umiilgan pikaa, ‘Seghleghhalek itagnapigtuten, pinightuten ataasiighmelnguq qepghaghta! Ataasiighmetkaategpeneng palaghhaghnun aflengakistengughtesnaqamken uglalghiinun. Iitghi quyalgusighyaghtughnga!’
40025022	Taagken 2,000-nengegkam esnevaghluni pikaa, ‘Umiilemni, tagivaqaqaten 2,000 manit. Taawa alla 2,000 allgeghsimaaqa.’
40025023	Umiilgan pikaa, ‘Seghleghhalek itagnapigtuten, pinightuten ataasiighmelnguq qepghaghta! Ataasiighmetkaategpeneng palaghhaghnun aflengakistengughtesnaqamken uglalghiinun. Iitghi quyalgusighyaghtughnga!’
40025024	Taagken 1,000-nengegkam esnevaghluni pikaa, ‘Umiilemni, liisimakamken elpek aaghsaghqaanghituten. Unataghaquten piitesighaqaqenghilkegpeneng. Qerngughtaqaten piitkat piitutngit ifkaghquqaqenghilketeng.
40025025	Enkaam alinglunga laagulluki maniten iiqaqanka. Ang, taawa elpek pin.’
40025026	Iwernga umiilgan pikaa, ‘Uyuq seghleq, ighsanitalghii qepghaghta! Elpek piighpenga unataghaqnilunga piitesighaqaqenghilkemneng, qerngughtiiqnilungallu piitkaneng piitutngit ifkaghquqaqenghilkemneng.
40025027	Sangan'ngam manika kanaghhnanighsigu bank-amun? Tawaten pikaqsaquvgu, uteghnillemni veghhnayaghaqa allgeghnelighluku.’
40025028	Taagken umiilgem qepghaghteni pikii, ‘Tuguluku 1,000 maninga, tuuniteggu taamun 10,000-nelegmun.
40025029	Tamaakut pilget tuunataghaghyaghqaagut enkaam siiptiillequt. Iwernga taana avangilnguq pillgaayaghngaan iqisaghqaqiit ellnganeng.’
40025030	Taagken umiilgem pikii, ‘Aanesteggu taana satngunghilnguq qepghaghta qagavek mamlegllagmun. Tawaani yuget qiyaaghwaghllagllequt, ggutetengllu terqitaagtaamiita.’
40025031	“Ighnegha Yugem tagikumi nighughqelleghmikun, yaqulegtuumaghllagmi, taagken aqumellequq nighughqengngalghiignekun aqumutagmikun.
40025032	Sivungakun qerngughutesleqiit qamagtengngwaaghluki nunam yugi. Taagken avughlleqii, katam penniighniightem avullghatun penniighet goat-neng.
40025033	Penniighet aghenqigneghminitesleqii, goat-et saghumigneghmini.
40025034	Taagken Umiilgem aghenqigneghminilnguut pilleqii, ‘Tagitek, Atama quyastekiitni, piliiteggu Ataneghpagulleq yataaghqegkaq elpesinun ima nuna ulimaaqngan.
40025035	Iyatiqngulunga neghqegkaqaghpesinga; meqsugulunga meghsikaqaghpesinga; allaneghtaalunga upughatkaqaghpesinga.
40025036	Amsikaghmellunga aasightuqaqaghpesinga, qinuyugulunga laalighfikegkaqaghpesinga, anusimingllaghaalunga esghaghyaghtuqaqaghpesinga.’
40025037	Taagken elqughutngalghiit pilleqaat, ‘Ataneq, qavngaq iyatiqnguluten neghesiken, nalighmeng meqsuguluten meghsiziken?
40025038	Qavngaq allaneghtaaluten upughasiken, nalighmeng amsikaghmelluten aasightughsiken?
40025039	Qavngaq qinuyuguluten, nalighmeng anusimingllaghvigmelluten laalighfiksiken?’
40025040	Umiilgem kiimsighlleqii, ‘Ipapestaaq ungipaatamsi, sangwaa alngunak pikaghsi ukalighpigaghnun anglegutemnun, whangamnun piiqasi!’
40025041	“Taagken Umiilgem saghumigneghminilnguut pilleqii, ‘Elpesinguut Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqii. Awiitek whangamneng, aglaghtek kenlengilnguugnun kenghegnun Kiyaghneghem yataaghqegkaanun Tughneghaghmunllu, yaqulganunllu!
40025042	Iyatiqngulunga neghestellghitaghpesinga, meqsugulunga meghsillghitaghpesinga,
40025043	allaneghtaalunga upughatellghitaghpesinga, amsikaghmellunga aasightuumangitaghpesinga. Qinuyugulungallu, anusimingllaghvigmellungallu laalighfikumangitaghpesinga.’
40025044	Taagken pilleqaat, ‘Ataneq, qavngaq iyatiqnguluten, meqsuguluten, allaneghtaaluten, amsikaghmelluten, qinuyuguluten, nalighmeng anusimingllaghvigmelluten, kayusiisimangisiken?’
40025045	Taagken Umiilgem kiimsighlleqii, ‘Ipapestaaq ungipaatamsi, tawaten pinghitelleghpesistun nalighhiiniitnun ukut ukalighpigaat, whanga pinghitaqaghpesinga.’
40025046	Enkaam taakut aglaghllequt kenlengilngughmun aghyuulleghmun, iwernga elqughutngalghiit aglaghllequt kenlengilngughmun unguvalleghmun.”
40026001	Jesus-em taaqsamiki apeghtuusaqneghmeng tamaakut, maligsaaghteni pikii,
40026002	“Liisimakaghsi maalghuk aghneghek atughlukek Neqenghaghqelleghqaa Passover-em pinaqnguuq. Enkaam Ighnegha Yugem tuunelleqaat qaquuriisqelluku.”
40026003	Tawani aghneghmi, chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu qerngughutkat palace-ngani High Priest-em, Caiaphas-em.
40026004	Agghitkegkaat Jesus aksaqluklu tuguluku, tuqunnaluku.
40026005	Iwernga pikat, “Neqenghaghqemmi pinaanghitaghput, luuraq yuget seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.”
40026006	Jesus Bethany-metaqngami Simon-enkunitkaq leprosy-lguyalghiimi.
40026007	Aghnam takukaa Jesus, tugumiiqlukek alabaster-ek aqimleghutak imalgek akitupiglleghhiimeng tepengllaasimeng. Neghumaluku naasqwakun kuuvegkakek tepengllaasik.
40026008	Iwernga maligsaaghtet esghaghluku tawaten pilghii, ugumiyagutkaat whaten pimaghmeng, “Sangan sakusiiqakek?
40026009	Akikegkaqsaqumikek tepengllaasik maningutkeghllaglukek aklumalghiinun tunqughnayaghaa!”
40026010	Jesus-em liisimakluki sameng pitangi pikii, “Sangan seghlequughesteggu aghnaq? Piniipigtuq whangamnun tawaten pillgha.
40026011	Aklumalghiit quunpeng tamaansaghqaagut, iwernga whanga quunpeng elpesininnaanghitunga.
40026012	Tepengllaghqelleghmikun yugusiqa yataaghqengngwaa llivelleghqamnun.
40026013	Ipa ungipaatamsi, nunataghhaani tamaghhaani nani alngunak una Pinilghii Ungipaq ungipaqneghmegteggu, aghnam tawaten pillgha aapghaqelleqaat yugnun neqamikesqelluku.”
40026014	Taagken Judas Iscariot ilangat qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet, chief priest-enun piluni,
40026015	aaptekii, “Sameng tuunelleqestengnga Jesus elpesinun tuunegkumkun?” Enkaam kestulluku 30 silver manimeng llivikegkaat.
40026016	Taagken kenlekluku Judas pilleghqangnaqegkaq uveghpagunnaluku Jesus.
40026017	Sivulighmi aghneghani Neqenghaghqellghan Yeast-alillghillnguum Neqekrangllam, maligsaaghtet Jesus takuluku aaptekaat, “Nani yataaghqutesugsin whangkunnun Passover-em Neqenghaghqellghaneng neghesqelluten?”
40026018	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Jerusalem-emun pitek. Yuuk tamaantuq; ungipaannakesi, ‘Apeghtughista piiq, Pilleghqaqa kaannaquq. Maligsaaghtekullghiini neghnaqaghput Passover-em Neqenghaghqellgha elpesini.’”
40026019	Maligsaaghtet Jesus-em pisqellghatun pikat, Passover-em Neqenghaghqellgha yataaghqegkaat.
40026020	Ighivgaghyagu Jesus-enkut qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtekullghiit tipelngi aqumuutkat neghnaluteng.
40026021	Neghuusimaluki, Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa piimsi, nalighpesi uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
40026022	Maligsaaghtet qivghughllagumaghmeng tuungliqutaghluteng aaptaataqaat, “Ataneq, whangangwaa?”
40026023	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Uveghpagutiyaghqaq taananguuq neqni neptekanga sagneghmun whangamnun maligulluni.
40026024	Ipapestaaq Ighnegha Yugem tuquyaghqaaguq Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun. Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq taana yuuk uveghpagutilghii Ighneghaneng Yugem! Itagnaghnayaghtuq allgeghumangisaqumi!”
40026025	Uveghpagutistem Judas-em aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, whangangwaa?” Jesus-em pikaa, “Taawa elpeneng apeghtuten.”
40026026	Neghuutnguluteng Jesus-em tuguluku neqekrangllaq iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, aavgughluku tunquqii maligsaaghteni. Pikii, “Tuguluku neghiteggu, una yugusiqaqa.”
40026027	Taagken tuguluku qayuusiq wine-meng imalek iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq tuunegkaa ellngitnun. Pikii, “Meghvikaataghteggu qamagllusi.
40026028	Taana aakwaqa, taaggun Kiyaghneghem akequsaa apeghiighyaghqaaguq. Tuqukuma aakwa kuuvellequq uglapiglleghhiinun yugnun seghevutusiiluni seghleghqellghitnun.
40026029	Ungipaatamsi, wine-meng alla meghnaanghitunga kenlanga aghneghmi tawani, wine-eghraghaghmeng meghelgusighlleqamsi Atama Ataneghpagullghani.”
40026030	Taagken ilagaghluteng aanluteng Mount Olives-mun pikat.
40026031	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Unugmi whani, whanga apalluqlunga uniqaghaalleqaghpesinga, qayughllak Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Tuqulleqaqa penniighniighta enkaam penniighet mingiqellequt.’
40026032	Iwernga unguvaghtestekanganga tuqulleghmeng sivugpesini aglaghllequnga Galilee-mun.”
40026033	Peter-em pikaa Jesus, “Apalluqluten elpek qaywa ilama uniqaghaateghngaaten, whanga uninnaanghitngwaaghamken!”
40026034	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ipa ungipaatamken, unukun rooster-a qalghightestegpenaan, pingayuneng ketwell nallunqelleqaghpenga.”
40026035	Peter-em pikaa, “Qaywa tuqumalgusighyaghngaamken, nallunqennaanghitamken.” Maligsaaghtetlu qamaglluteng ungipaatkaat tawaten.
40026036	Taagken Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit kaatkat tawavek atilqelghiimeng Gethsemane-meng. Pikii, “Aqumuutek taaggun, ingavek yughaghyaghtuumalunga.”
40026037	Tazingavek kelqegkii, Peter, Zebedee-mllu ighneghqek. Taagken qivghughllagemllu seghleliighemllu kaatekestaqaa,
40026038	enkaam pikii, “Qaamnaka qivghughllaguuq, repall tuquyaghqaaghllunga. Tawanllusi kelengalgusightengnga.”
40026039	Tazingapighqaaghluni nunamun sikmuulluni yughaqaq, “Atamni, piyaghqaakan, meghenghillanga whaken qayuusimeng; iwernga nakaan piyukellemtun, elpek piyukelleghpetun pigu.”
40026040	Taagken Jesus-em takuyaqminiki pingayut maligsaaghteni qavaaftut. Enkaam Peter pikaa, “Kelengalgusighpagningitestengngaa ataasiq aflu?
40026041	Kelengatek, yughaghtek nanghiiqullengenghitesqellusi. Ipaapestaaq taghneghak piyaghqaaghngaaghmek, iwerngaqun yugusiq kayaatuq.”
40026042	Allameng Jesus tazingavek aglaghluni yughaqaq, “Atamni, meghyaghqaqngukumkun una qayuusiq elpek piyukelleghpetun apeghiighli.”
40026043	Takunqigsaqminiki maligsaaghteni, taawa qavaatnguftut, qayughllak qavam sakniqestekangi.
40026044	Jesus-em unillaataghluki, tazingani pingayiqii yughalleni taakut ataasit yughat atuqluki.
40026045	Taagken maligsaaghteni takuluki pikii, “Taawa qavaawaqetsii, meghnaaliiqetsii? Taawa aflu kaatuq, Ighnegha Yugem uveghpagusaghqaaghtuq seghleghqestenun.
40026046	Nekevitek, igleghtelta. Ii-i, uka uveghpagutisteka.”
40026047	Jesus paninang akuzimaluku, Judas kaatkaq, qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet ilangat. Yulghutet maligtekaat, ilangi savigpalighluteng, ilangi anagutalighluteng. Chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu kayagtekiit maligtesqelluku Judas.
40026048	Uveghpagutistem Judas-em kaatfagilgameng ilani salleghqamineng ungipaatkaqegkangi, “Yuuk naaghyaghqaqa ellnganguuq piyukegkaghsi. Tugunakesi.”
40026049	Judas-em takwaaghaghlluku Jesus pikaa, “Seghleghhalek, Apeghtughista!” Taagken naaqaa.
40026050	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ilakumtaamni, aga saaqsin pilleghqan pigu!” Taagken takuluku Jesus akuqaghluku nuqneghteqaat.
40026051	Tawani naliita yuget Jesus-melnguut savigpani nusugluku kepqaghtekaa sigutnga High Priest-em qepghaghtelaaghan.
40026052	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Savigpagen kanaghtigu qantanun, qayughllak qamaglluteng savigpagmeng atuqilghiit savigpagkun tuqusaghqaagut.
40026053	Sumeghpenii-i Ataka kayutengllaghnaanghinniluku piziguu? Aaptekumkun tawaninginaq 72,000-eneng uglalghiit yaqulelghuteghllaget pilluwaghtet kayaggnayaghii.
40026054	Iwernga tawaten pinaanghitunga qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghiighyaghqaalghiit igaqelleghmegestun.”
40026055	Taagken Jesus-em yulghutet pikii, “Tuguyaghtughestengngaa savigpagtuumaghpesi, anagutaghtuumaghpesi, nikimqun wayaghniightestun ayuqlunga? Aghhutanga tamaghhaan aqumlunga apeghtughiiqunga Temple-mi tugungigataghpesinga.
40026056	Iwernga qamaglluteng tamaakut tawaten pinguut, apeghiighnaluki uuknaliqistet igaqegkiit Akuzitni Igaqegkani.” Taagken qamaglluteng maligsaaghtet unilluku qimaguutkat.
40026057	Taagken Jesus-em tugustengita aglaatkaat High Priest-em, Caiaphas-em, mangteghaanun. Tawani apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng, siivanlleghetlu qerngughutkat.
40026058	Uyavaqaanlluni Peter-em maligtekaa courtyard-nganun High Priest-em mangteghaan. Iteghluni aqumelgusiqii kelengakistet esghapagnaluku Jesus sayaghqaatangat.
40026059	Chief priest-etlu, qamagllutengllu agghistet iqlengiqutkestengnaqutkegkat Jesus tuqutestepigesnaghnaluku.
40026060	Iwernga naalkunneghmeng aghtuqat. Qaywa uglalghiim esnevaghaqluteng aapghaataghyaghngaaghmegteggu aapqiit allakutkat. Qenwatlu yugek esnevaghlutek
40026061	pikak, “Una yuuk whaten pikaaguq, ‘Temple-a naafqesaqlegwaaqa enkaam nekefleqaqa pingayani aghneghem.’”
40026062	Taagken High Priest-em nekevluni aaptekaa Jesus, “Sameng piyaghqiisiin yugek apellghegkenun?”
40026063	Iwernga Jesus qaalkaamangilnguq. Enkaam High Priest-em aaplaataqaa, “Aatghakun Unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem qelghamken ungipaatikut Christ-anguziin? Ighneqaten Kiyaghneghem?”
40026064	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpek pilleghpetun ayuquq. Iwernga ungipaatamsi, uum kingunganeng esghaghlleqaghsi Ighnegha Yugem aqumluni aghenqigneghakun Aghtughyaghqaanghilnguum, esghaghlleqaghsillu tagilghii qilawaaghitgun qilagam.”
40026065	Taagken tawaten piyatni High Priest-em aatkani piiguumiita pikaq, “Una yuuk Kiyaghneghuniluni pilghii! Alla liisimakistengisaghngaamta pilta. Legan whaa nagataghsi Kiyaghneghunilghii!
40026066	Naten elpesi nanqigtesteggu?” Kiimsiqaat, “Tuqusaghqaaghsimaaq.”
40026067	Taagken gginaakun qesiqukaat, tenglugpagaataqaatlu, enkaam qasaghtestengita
40026068	pikaat, “Elpek Christ-a uuknaliqutikut! Kitum tenglugtaten?”
40026069	Tawaten taakut pimaluki courtyard-mi Peter aqumgakaq. Qepghaghtem aghnaghaam takuluku pikaa, “Elpeklu Jesus-metkaaguten, Galilee-ghmiimi.”
40026070	Iwernga Peter mesighaqaq sivungitni tamaakut pikaa, “Nallukaqa sameng piiquten.”
40026071	Aanyan courtyard-em iteghviganun ilangan qepghaghtem aghnaghaam esghaghluku Peter, tawanlenguut pikii, “Una yuuk Jesus-metkaaguq Nazareth-eghmiimi.”
40026072	Peter mesighaghlaataqaq, “Ipapestaaq piimsi, Kiyaghneghem aatghakun nallukngwaaghaqa yuuk.”
40026073	Mulunghituq, yuget nekevghataaghullghiit tagiluteng, Peter pikaat, “Ipa ilakaaten Jesus-em malighsaghtengita qayughllak akuzillghen Galilee-ghmiistun ayuquq!”
40026074	Taagken Peter-em pikii, “Ipapestaaq Kiyaghneghem aatghakun ungipaatamsi nallukngwaaghaqa yuuk! Iqlengiqngukuma Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlinga!” Tawaninginaq rooster-a qalghiqaq.
40026075	Taagken Peter-em neqaatkaa Jesus-em pillgha, “Rooster-a qalghightestegpenaan pingayuneng nallunqelleqaghpenga.” Enkaam aanluni qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
40027001	Unaanguluku qamaglluteng chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu agghitkegkaat tuqutesnaluku Jesus.
40027002	Enkaam asighqelluku aglaalluku tuunegkaat Pilate-mun, Rome-em governor-nganun.
40027003	Uveghpagutistem Judas-em, liigiksaqminiki agghistet nanqigsimakangat Jesus tuqutesaghqaaluku, qemall avuteghqeghllakaq. Enkaam chief priest-enunllu, siivanlleghnunllu veghusaghtuqii 30 silver-et manit.
40027004	Pikii, “Seghleghqumaanga uveghpagutellemkun seghleghqumangilnguq yuuk tuqutesqelluku!” Pikaat, “Whangkunnun sasiilleqa? Elpek tawaten pilqan!”
40027005	Enkaam Judas-em miluutkii manit Temple-em ilunganun. Taagken aghulaqluni qemitkaq.
40027006	Chief priest-et saghnatkelluki manit pikat, “Liilightuusamnni ukut manit kanaghsaghqaanghitut manilghutaanun Temple-em qayughllak llivikuusaqegkaagut tuqutusighqaaluteng yugmun.”
40027007	Enkaam agghitkegkaat mani tukfighisiqnaluku nunamun atelqelghii, “Potterʼs Field” lliveghvigkaaluku nakuumiinun.
40027008	Enkaam whavemun kenlanga taam nunam ateliitkaa, “Nunanga Aawem”.
40027009	Neghighluku uuknaliqistem Jeremiah-m uuknaliqutkegkaqii whaten, “Ilangita Israel-eghmiit itagnaqegkaqiit angtalangit 30 silver manit, qayughllak sumeghmeggni tawaten akitutkaniluku pikaat. Taagken taakut manit tukfighisiqegkiit Potterʼs Field-mun. Tawaten Atanghem qelqaqaanga.” Jeremiah-m uuknaliqellgha apeghiightestekaqaat chief priest-et tukfighaqngamegteggu Potterʼs Field.
40027011	Tawani Jesus nekevghalghii sivungakun Rome-em governor-ngan. Governor-em aaptekaa, “Jews-et Umiilkataan?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpek tawatenniluku piin.”
40027012	Iwernga chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu anaggunnighngaatni, sameng pimangitkaq.
40027013	Taagken Pilate-em aaptekaa, “Nagasikii qamaglluki anaggunnillghit?”
40027014	Iwernga Jesus-em kiimsiimangilkanga talwa ataasimun anaggunnilleghmun, enkaam governor-a saghiighayugllakaq.
40027015	Ayumiitanga tamaghhaan Passover-em Neqenghaghqellghani Rome-em governor-ngan itemutaqaa ataasiq anusimingllaghaq yulghutet nakmikegkaat.
40027016	Tamaani pilleghni tamaanteftuq apeghseghuq anusimingllaghaq, aatgha Barabbas.
40027017	Enkaam yulghun qerngughsan, Pilate-em aaptekii, “Naliq itemutesugesteggu Barabbas nalighmeng Jesus, atilqelghii Christ-ameng?”
40027018	Pilate-em liisimakngukangi Jews-et igleghutistengita aqinakluku Jesus tagitngukangat ellminun.
40027019	Pilate aqumgamaluku nanqigtivigmi, nulighhan ungipaatesaghtuqaa, “Sanaqefqaan taana seghleghqellghilnguq yuuk qayughllak qavanguqegkaqaqa enkaam aghnelqusiq seghleliighusiqaqa.”
40027020	Tawaten pimaluku chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu aaghqutaqegkiit yulghutet itemutesqelluku Barabbas, Jesus tuqutesqelluku.
40027021	Governor-em aaplaataqii yulghutet, “Naliq itemutesugesteggu elpesinun?” Kiimsiqaat, “Barabbas!”
40027022	Pilate-em aaptekii, “Sanaqsikun'ngam Jesus atilqelghii Christ-ameng?” Kiimsiqaat, “Qaquuraghtestigu!”
40027023	Pilate-em aaptekii, “Sangan? Sangwaa seghleq pikaqagu?” Iwernga iglagtaaghalluteng akilghuukat, “Qaquuraghtestigu!”
40027024	Pilate liigikluni alla sapagningisami esghaghluki yulghutet seghleliiqestalghiit, tugulukek aghmigusik uughtuqaq sivungitni yulghutet. Taagken pikii, “Whanga avutngitunga tuqutelleghqaanun, elpesi tawaten pistengngwaaghsi!”
40027025	Yulghutem iingunaghhaghmeng akitkaat, “Whangkuta kingunqullghiini avutngullequkut tuqutellghanun.”
40027026	Taagken Pilate-em Barabbas itemulluku, enkaam Jesus kagsagmigtesluku tuunegkaa pilluwaghtenun qaquuriisqelluku.
40027027	Taagken governor-em pilluwaghtengita aglaatkaat Jesus qerngughtaaghvigmeggnun governor-em mangteghaani. Tawani ilateng qerngughlluki kangllukaat.
40027028	Aatkii mataghqughluki, kavirrakegtagneng atkuyaaghegneng aatesfikegkaat.
40027029	Taagken sikughllugtuqameng avayameng qaghpangllaghluku naasqwakun aatestekaat. Aghenqigneghanllu iiggakun tugusluku unaghsiighwaq, segesqughquulluteng sivungakun legasiighwaatkegkaat. Pikaat, “Quulvaghamken Umiilgat Jews-et!”
40027030	Taagken qesiquluku, tuguluku unaghsiighwaq naasqwakun anagulqaat.
40027031	Legasiighwaatkenneghmeng apeghiighyamegteggu, atkuyaaghqek mataghllukek ellngan katam aatkii aatesquqiit. Taagken qaquuraghyaghtuqaat.
40027032	Aanumaluteng neghllagmeng esghaghluku yuuk, Cyrene-eghmii, aatgha Simon, qelqaat uyamigesqelluku Jesus-em qaquuraa.
40027033	Kaasameng Golgotha-mun (Golgotha whaten pisiiguq, “Yugem Naasqwan Nenga”),
40027034	pilluwaghtet Jesus-mun tuunegkaat meghesqelluku wine-a sungaghnilngughmeng akumegkaq. Iwernga naasiighluku meghyunghitkaa.
40027035	Pilluwaghtet qaquuraghyamegteggu, nengiitkiit aatkii ateghtiiraaghutkaqluki.
40027036	Taagken tawani aqumuulluteng kelengakegkaat.
40027037	Naasqwan quulngakun nekegtekaat qaquurallghanun apalluq igaqngalghii whaten, UNA JESUS-NGUUQ, UMIILGAT JEWS-ET.
40027038	Maalghuklu wayaghniightek qaquuraqagket, aallgha aghenqigneghakun, ilanga saghumigneghakun.
40027039	Yuget naghughlleghhiit, legasiighwaatkegkaat Jesus, naasquteng ufsugusimiita
40027040	akilghuukaat, “Elpek pikaaguten Temple-a naafqennaqniluku enkaam pingayuni aghneghni nekefneqiggnaqniluku. Kiyaghneghem Ighneqngukangaten elpeneng katam yuguli, qaquurameng ukigi!”
40027041	Tawateghpigaq Chief priest-et, maligulluteng apeghtughikayugnun Liilightuusaneng, siivanlleghnunllu, legasiighwaatkegkaat,
40027042	“Yuguliiqii ilangi, naqam ellmineng katam yugulipagningituq! Umiilgukuni Israel-eghmiinun ukigli qaquuramineng enkaam ugpeqnayaghaghput.
40027043	Neghyukngwaa Kiyaghneq, piiquqlu Kiyaghneghmun Ighneqniluni. Kiyaghneghem piyukngukumigu yuguliligu maaten.”
40027044	Qaquuralgutegkenkallu wayaghniightek legasiighwaatkegkaak.
40027045	Taagken qamaglluni nuna mamleghqwaakaq aghneghem qukaaneng kenlanga three-klaagmun.
40027046	Tamani nani three-klaagmi Jesus akilghuughllakaq whaten, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?” Whaten pisiq, “Kiyaghnemni, Kiyaghnemni, sangama unisinga?”
40027047	Ilangita yuget tawanlenguut nekevghallghiit nagalluku pikat, “Uum yugem Elijah tuqlughaghaa.”
40027048	Tawaninginaq yuuk ataasiq aqfaquqaq nepsagusimeng. Taagken nepluku quwaalghiimun wine-mun, unaghsiighwaghqun nekeglluku nengugutkaa Jesus-mun melugriisqelluku.
40027049	Iwernga ilangita pikaat, “Wiintaku, esghapakaalteggu Elijah-m yuguliyaghtughnayukagu!”
40027050	Allameng Jesus araghllagluni pegtekakek taghneghagni.
40027051	Tawani pilleghmi Temple-melnguq safkaaghun, pikegken kanavek piikaq malghughqelluni. Nuna ufsugusan, uyghaget quupaghtaatkat,
40027052	lliivghet qelpeghaghtaatkat, uglalghiitlu Kiyaghneghem yugi tuqulaghaatkaayalghiit unguvaghtuutkat,
40027053	enkaam lliveghmeggneng aanleghaatkat. Kingunganeng Jesus-em unguvaghtellghan aglaghtuutkat Agleghnalghiimun Neghllagmun, tawani yulghutem esghaqiit.
40027054	Tawani qaquuraghvigmi, umiilwaaghenkut pilluwaghtekullghhiit kelengakegkangat Jesus, esghaghyamegteggu nuna qapragllalghii, tamaanallu sangwaa piyan, alingruughuteghllakat. Pikat, “Ipapestaaq una Ighnequmayaghtagu Kiyaghneghem!”
40027055	Tamaanteftut aghnalghutet esghapalghiit uyavaneng. Galilee-meng maligtekaat Jesus kayusiinnaluki.
40027056	Akulngitniteftut Mary Magdala-ghmii, Mary-llu naangak James-enkuk Joseph-enkuk, Zebedee-mllu ighneghegkenka naangak.
40027057	Whanikuyagu aklungilnguq yuuk aatgha Joseph, Arimathea-ghmii, maligsaaghtenga Jesus-em kaatkaq.
40027058	Pilate-mun piluni Jesus-em yugusii tungsiqaa. Enkaam Pilate-em qelghutkaa yugusiq Joseph-mun tuunesqelluku.
40027059	Enkaangam tuguluku yugusii, nutaghaghllugkun qiipaghakun iimgutkaa.
40027060	Taagken llikaa ellmi lliveghraghaghmikun, uyghagrugllagkun laagtestekamikun siklaqumeng. Taagken paaynganun ullghitaghlluku uyghagllak, apeghiighyami aghulaqegkaq.
40027061	Tawanteftuk Mary Magdala-ghmiinkuk, aallghallu Mary lliveghmun ayuqlutek aqumgalghiik.
40027062	Unaamingani kingunganeng Yataghqefigem Aghneghan, chief priest-etlu, Pharisees-etlu aleghqughyaghtuqaat Pilate.
40027063	Pikaat, “Yuguniiq, neqamikaghput taana puughtista salin unguvaluni pikaaguq, ‘Pingayut aghneghet atughluki unguvaghteslequnga.’
40027064	Enkaangam kayagutigu lliivgha kelengakngwaaghesqelluku pingayunun aghneghnun, luuraq maligsaaghtengita yugusii teglegluku ungipaannayukatki yuget unguvaamaniluku. Una iqlengaq seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq sivulighmeng.”
40027065	Pilate-em pikii, “Kelengakistelguusi, elngaatall kelengakestengngwaaghteggu lliveq.”
40027066	Enkaam lliveghmun aglaghluteng maghqalluku nalluniiqaat uyghak qelpeghhnayukatgu. Taagken qelghutkaat pilluwaghtenun kelengakesqelluku.
40028001	Sabbath-em kingunganeng, aghtaghaghaqaallu sivulighmi aghneghani santillghem, Mary Magdala-ghmii, ilangallu Mary-m, lliveq esghaghyaghtuqaak.
40028002	Tawani pilleghmi nuna qapragllakaq qayughllak Atanghem yaqulga qilagmeng ukikaq. Lliivghem paayngan uyghaga ullghitaghtaghluku aqumegkaa.
40028003	Esghaqaaluni nighugpaguullghiistun nighugtutkaghmi, aatkiillu qatelghiit anigustun.
40028004	Kelengakistet yaqulegmeng alingruuqat repall ungeleglluteng, tuqukastunllu lliiqat.
40028005	Iwernga aghnak yaqulgem pikakek, “Alingegpenatek. Liisimakamtek Jesus ivaghaqaghtek, qaquuraqaayalghii.
40028006	Whaanneghituq; unguvaamaaq pinaqnilleghmitun. Tagitek, esghaghyaghtughtegnegu lliviksaqanga.
40028007	Enkaam ungipaatqaghsaghtughtegneki maligsaaghtengi unguvaamaniluku tuqulleghmeng, agallu sivullgaaghumaaq Galilee-mun. Taagani esghaghlleqaghsi! Taawa ungipaatamtek.”
40028008	Enkaangam tawaninginaq lliveghmeng aghulaqegkak, alingumaagmeklu quyaghllagumaagmeklu, ketanqusnaq ungipaasaghtuqiik maligsaaghtengi.
40028009	Jesus-em aliighaghfiklukek pikakek, “Nekeggmelleq elpetegnilli.” Enkaam taakuk aghnak takuluku, itegii nuqneqluki maniguqaak.
40028010	Taagken Jesus-em pikakek, “Alingegpenatek. Ungipaasaghtughtegneki malighsaaghtenka anglegusiitkanka, Galilee-mun'nguq aglaghlit taaganinguq esghaghlleqaatnga.”
40028011	Aghnak igleghsimalukek, lliveghmelnguut ilangi kelengakistet Jerusalem-emun iteghluteng, chief priest-enun aapqaat qamaglluku tamaana apeghiiqaq.
40028012	Enkaam chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu qerngughlluteng agghitkat. Taagken maniliteghllagluki pilluwaghtet,
40028013	pikiit, “Ungipaannakesi yuget, ‘Unugmi qavaasimaluta maligsaaghtengita tagiluteng teglegumaat yugusii.’
40028014	Governor-em nagaquumakagu whangkuta aleghqughlleqaghput enkaam seghleliillengnaanghitusi.”
40028015	Kelengakistet mani tuguluku pisqelleghmegestun pikat. Enkaam whavemun kenlanga Jews-et paninang aapghaqaat Jesus-em yugusii teglekaqniluku maligsaaghtenganun.
40028016	Tawaten pimaluki, taakut qula ataasiq siipneqluku maligsaaghtet aglaqat Galilee-mun, naayghamun Jesus-em pisqellghatun tawaten.
40028017	Esghaghyamegteggu Jesus maniguqaat, iwernga ilangita aygughikegkaat ellngangutanga.
40028018	Jesus-em takuluki pikii, “Qamaglluni aghtughyaghqaanghilleq qilagmillu, nunamillu whangamnun tagivaqaaguq.
40028019	Tamaaken apalluqluku aghulaqlusi qamaglluki yuget maligsaaghtengllaghteki whangamnun, paaptaayelaghteki Aatghakun Atam, Ighneghem, Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham.
40028020	Apeghtuusaqiteki qaatkesqelluki qamaglluki qelghutkanka elpesinun. Elpesinitepestaaghllequnga quunpeng kenlanga kenletghuutellghanun nunam.”
41001001	Pinilghiit Ungipat Jesus Christ-ameng ayuqelghiit, Ighneghaneng Kiyaghneghem piinliqaagut whaten:
41001002	Uuknaliqistem Isaiah-m igaqegkaqaa Kiyaghneghem whaten pillgha, “Ungipaghteka kayagtekestaghnaqaqa sivugpeni yataaghqesqelluku tuumkaghqan.
41001003	Kilgaani ma akilghuugaquq whaten, ‘Atanghem tuumnga yataaghqiteggu, taklaghteggullu!’”
41001004	Taana ungipaghta John-nguuq Paaptaayesta. Kilgaani paaptaayelaghaquqlu ungipaghaquqlu whaten, “Avuteghqellusi, seghleghqennanighlusi paaptaayetek, enkaam Kiyaghneghem seghevulleqiisi.”
41001005	Judea-ghmiitlu Jerusalem-eghmiitlu nagasaghtuutkaat John. Enkaam seghleghqelleteng apeghranghatki paaptaayaaqegkangi kiiwegni Jordan-meng aatqelghiigni.
41001006	John-em aatkii camel-em melqwaneng ulimaaghet, meqameng tafsiluni, neghaqelghii locust-mengllu honey-mengllu.
41001007	Ungipaqikaq whaten, “Kingumneng yuuk tagiyaghqaaguq aghtughyaghqaanghitaghalghii whangamneng. Whanga sasiinghitunga repall itemtepagningitanka singii.
41001008	Meghmeng paaptaayaaqamsi, iwernga ellngan paaptaayelleqiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.”
41001009	John tawaten aneghsimaluku Jesus kaatkaq Nazareth-meng, Galilee-melngughmeng, enkaam John-em paaptaayekaa Jordan-egni.
41001010	Paaptaayeneghmeng taaqsatni Jesus-em tawaninginaq esghaqii qilaget qelpelghiit, Agleghnalghiiklu Taghneghak ukilghiik ellminun dove-etun ayuqlutek.
41001011	Memllu qilagmeng pikaa, “Ighneqamken, piniqegkamni. Efquqepigtamken.”
41001012	Tawaninginaq Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham Jesus aghulaqestekaa kilgaanun.
41001013	Ellnginaghhaakaq iwerngaqun nuyaalghiit teghikusat tamaantekat. Tamaansimaluku Tughneghaam nanghiiqukaa ketwhell 40 aghneq, iwernga yaqulget aflengakegkaat.
41001014	Tagtalmi taakwani kingunganeng John-em anusimingllallghan, Jesus Galilee-lluni ungipaqikaq Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Kiyaghneghtaneng.
41001015	Pikaq, “Pilleghqaq whaa kaasimaaq enkaam Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem whaa whaantuq! Avuteghqellusi, seghleghqennanighlusi ugpeqiteki Pinilghiit Ungipat!”
41001016	Jesus igleghutkelluku Naayvam Galilee-m esnengakun esghaqakek maalghuk iqalliniightek siiftilghiik negaghpagmeng. Simon-enkunguftuk Andrew-nkuk anglegutkullghiik.
41001017	Jesus-em pikakek, “Maligtegnenga, apeghtughnaqamtek yugmeng naapsagutesqellutek.”
41001018	Tawaninginaq negaghpatek unilluki maligtekaak.
41001019	Tazingapighqaaghluni esghaghlaataqakek James-enkuk John-enkuk anglegutkullghiik, ighneghqek Zebedee-m. Negaghpagmegneng ilaaghtulghiik angyamegni.
41001020	Jesus-em esghaqiinaghlukek pikakek, “Maligtegnenga!” Enkaam angyakun unilluku atayek Zebedee, taakutlu qepghaghtenguluki tugukateng, maligtekaak Jesus.
41001021	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit Capernaum-emun kaatkat. Sabbath-ngughsagu, Jesus synagogue-elluni apeghtughikaq.
41001022	Nagallghiit saghiighayagutkaat apeghtughillgha, qayughllak apeghtughikaq Kiyaghneghem pilleghqalitellghakun, apeghtughistengistun Liilightuusat pigpenani.
41001023	Taagken yuuk ilumikun tughneghalek iteghluni synagogue-mun akilghuukaq,
41001024	“Jesus, Nazareth-eghmii, sangamta qinuyugsikut? Naafqesaghtuuzikuut? Kinanguten liisimakaqa, Yugulighistenguuten Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaa kayaglleqniluku.”
41001025	Jesus-em aghyuuqaa tughneghaq, “Nepngunang, aani yugmeng.”
41001026	Tughneghaam yuuk sayugpagtaghtesluku, araghllagumaghmi aanegkaq.
41001027	Yuget saghiighayugluteng ellmeggneng aapqughaaghutkat, “Una sangaawa? Una apeghtuusaghraghaaguq! Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun uum yugem qelghii tughneghaat aanesqelluki, legan qaatkaat.”
41001028	Enkaam Galilee-lqaaghaghmi yuget ungipaqnginaamaan Jesus pikaat.
41001029	Taagken Jesus aanaghesnaghluni synagogue-meng, Simon-enkuk Andrew-nkuk mangteghiitnun pikaq, James-enkuklu John-enkuk maligtekaak.
41001030	Simon-em sakinga ingaghmeteftuq, puqleghaluni. Legan Jesus kaatuq ungipaatkaat aghnaq qinuyuguniluku.
41001031	Iteghluni aghnaq iiggakun tuguluku nekevestekaa enkaam puqleghangiilluni, kepsiiqunginaamiita pikii.
41001032	Sabbath-em ighivgaani siqineq tevighyan Jesus-mun tagiquutkiit qinuyulghiit, tamaakutlu tughneghalget ilumegteggun.
41001033	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng Capernaum-eghmiit mangtegham manughaani qerngughutkat.
41001034	Enkaam Jesus-em uglalghiit naallghuquqii allaaghhiinaghneng aqnighneghitneng, aanesquqiillu tughneghaat yulghutet ilungitneng. Tughneghaat sameng pisimangilkangi, qayughllak kinangutanga liisimakegkangat.
41001035	Salin aghsugniiteghllagluku, Jesus makelluni aanegkaq yughaghnaluni kilgaani.
41001036	Simon-enkut ilakulghiit ivaghyaghtuqaat,
41001037	naalkesamegteggu pikaat, “Yuget ivanghiighutaqaaten.”
41001038	Yeghlegi Jesus-em pikii, “Ilangitnun nunat pinaqukut. Ellngitnillu ungipaqiyaghqaagunga, qayughllak tamaaken apalluqluku taginguunga.”
41001039	Enkaam Galilee-lqaaghaghmi igleghutkelluku ungipaqikaq synagogue-nni, aanesquqiillu tughneghaat yuget ilungitneng.
41001040	Yuuk leprosy-lek tagiluni Jesus-mun manungakun segesqughlluni nangllegsipiglluni pikaa, “Piyukelqegkuvgu naallghutaghtinga ukmangiightesqellunga.”
41001041	Jesus-em nangllegyagulluku nengugluku saaftutkelluku pikaa, “Piyukelqaqa, naallghuten!”
41001042	Tawaninginaq yuuk naallghulluni ukmangiightekaq.
41001043	Taagken Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqaa, “Nagataghten, wataghllak kinkut alngunak ungipaategpenaki naallghunniluten whangamnun. Itupill priest-mun yuvghiighsighyaghtaa. Enkaam aghqerraaghhaaten Moses-em Liilightuusiita pisqellghistun ipapighqesqelluku yugnun naallghutellghen.” Taagken tawaninginaq aghulaqestekaa.
41001045	Iwernga yugem igleghutkelluku nani alngunak aapghumanginaqaa Jesus-mun naalghusimaniluni. Taagken kenlanga Jesus alngunak nenun pinaniqaq, qayughllak yulghuteghllaget takwaaqegkangat, enkaam paaghqillghani kiyaghtekaq. Iwernga naken alngunak yulghutet paninang takwaaqegkangat.
41002001	Mulugpenani Jesus uteghniqaq Capernaum-emun, enkaam ungipaqegkaat nayuqaqegkemininniluku mangteghami.
41002002	Yuuk tagilaghaasalghiimi ellnganun kangsuutkat repall manughamun qakmavek. Jesus ungipaqimaluku Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng,
41002003	estamat yuget kevegtughluku uniiqaq yuuk tagitkaat ellnganun.
41002004	Kaatulluku itghunneghmeng aghtuqaat, qayughllak yuuk kangsuuteghllagulghii. Enkaam mangtegham qaayngan tile-ngi ikughluki reghighulluku, yuuk allighaakun ukigtekaat Jesus-em nallangakun.
41002005	Jesus-em liisimakegkangi ugpeqilleghtulngit, enkaam uniiqaq yuuk pikaa, “Ighnemni, seghleghqelleghten seghevutellengut.”
41002006	Tawani apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng aqumgallghiit sumeghtaghaqat,
41002007	“Sangami yuuk una tawaten akuzii? Akuzillgha seghleghuuq, qayughllak Kiyaghneghunilghii! Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq seghleghqelleghneng seghevutiyaghqaq!”
41002008	Tawaninginaq Jesus-em sumeghtaghallghit liisimakegkii enkaam pikii, “Sangan tawaten sumeghtaghaghetsi?
41002009	Nalikek piyaqniitaghaghlleqak uniiqaq yuuk piyaqumkun, ‘Seghleghqelleghten seghevutellengut’ nalighmeng, ‘Makelluten, allighan tuguluku piyugi?’
41002010	Iwernga liisimakesugaqa Ighnegha Yugem seghevutiyaqleguuq seghleghqelleghneng nunami whani.” Enkaam uniiqaq yuuk pikaa,
41002011	“Ungipaatamken, maketen, allighan tuguluku, elpesinun aglaa!”
41002012	Yuget esghapakaat yuuk tawaninginaq nekevluni, allighani tuguluku aanelghii. Enkaam qamagtengngwaaghluteng tawanlenguut saghiighayukat, usuqegkaatlu Kiyaghneq, “Whatelngughmeng esghaasigasaghtukut!”
41002013	Taagken Jesus, esnenganun Naayvam Galilee-m pinqigtekaq. Yulghuteghllaget takulaghaasatni apeghtuqii.
41002014	Igleghutkelluku esghaqaa tax-neng qerngughtista, aatgha Levi, ighnegha Alphaeus-em. Aqumgaftuq qepghaghvigmini. Jesus-em pikaa, “Maligtinga.” Levi-em nekevluni maligtekaa.
41002015	Tawani ighivgaghmi, Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit Levi-enkunun neghyaghtuqat. Neghelgusiqiit tax-neng qerngughtistelghutetlu tamaakutlu qaatkusigalnguut Jews-et Liilightuusiitnun. (Tawatelnguutlu yuget maligsaaghukangat Jesus.)
41002016	Ilangi apeghtughistengit Liilightuusat Pharisees-ngulghiit, esghaghyamegteggu Jesus neghelgusighilghii, aaptekiit maligsaaghtengi, “Sangami Jesus neghaqa tax-em qerngughtistengitnillu seghleghqestenillu?”
41002017	Jesus-em nagalluki pikii, “Aghallegtaq qinuyulghiinun pinguuq, yugunqegtanun pingunghituq. Tawateghpigaq ungipaasaghtuuganka seghleghqestet avuteghqesqelluki, nakaan tamaakut seghleghqiganniluteng pilghiit.”
41002018	Ataasimi aghneghmi, John-em Paaptaayestem maligsaaghtengillu Pharisees-etlu fast-engulghiit. Ilangita yuget takuluku Jesus aaptekaat, “Sangameng John-em Paaptaayestem maligsaaghtengillu Pharisees-etlu maligsaaghtengit fast-aaqat, naqam elpek maligsaaghteten pigpenateng?”
41002019	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nulightughnaqelghiim aqelqii fast-elleqaat neqenghaghqellghani? Yeghlegillu! Nulightughnaqelghii paninang tawanlluku tawaten pinaanghitut.
41002020	Nulightughnaqelghiistun ayuqunga, maligsaaghtenka nulightughnaqelghiim aqelqiistun ayuqut. Aghulaqestekanganga elngaatall tawani aghneghmi maligsaaghtenka fast-ellequt.
