41002021	“Kitum alngunak nutaghaq qiipaghaq qellughsimangilnguq ilaaghusiqnaanghitaa qaaslilugegnun. Ilaaghusiqegkumigu piigutaaghaghllequq, enkaam piilleq sullevataghllequq.
41002022	Enkaamllu kitum alngunak awataghpaluk imighnaanghitaa wine-eghraghaghmeng. Imiqumigu awataghpaluk quupaghllequq enkaam wine-a sakusiiqellequq, awataghpaluklu naavellequq. Tamaaken apalluqluku wine-eghraghaq awataghpagraghaghmun kuuvyaghqaaguq!”
41002023	Ataasimi Sabbath-mi, Jesus igleghtekaq wheat-et piitfigitgun. Maligsaaghtengita igleghalgusiitkelluku wheat-et piitutangitneng ikutaghtaqukat neghnaluteng.
41002024	Taagken Pharisees-et aaptekaat Jesus, “Esghaqaghqiqun! Sangameng maligsaaghteten saghnaat wheat-et piitutangitneng? Tawaten pilleghmegteggun qepghaghtut Sabbath-mi, enkaam qaatkunneghitnguut Liilightuusamnnun.”
41002025	Jesus-em pikii, “Atightiigasteggu David-em pillgha qavngarugllak? Yukullghiit iyatiqaqngameng,
41002026	David iteghluni Kiyaghneghem Mangteghaanun neghegkaaguq neqekrangllameng Kiyaghneghmun tuunegkameng. Tawaten pikaaguq Abiathar, High Priest-nguluku. Liilightuusamta pillghani priest-nginaghhaat neghyaghqaayaghtut tamaaken neqekrangllameng, iwernga David neghluni yunillu tuunegkaqii.”
41002027	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Sabbath-a nakmikegkaaguq meghnaliviguluni yugem pinighqelleghqaanun. Sabbath-a nakmikegkaanghituq yugmun ikfiqliighutkesqelluku.
41002028	Enkaangam whanga, Ighneghani Yugem, Atanghuunga talwa Sabbath-mun.”
41003001	Taagken Jesus aglanqigtekaq synagogue-mun, tawanteftuq yuuk inglungi iiggan uniiqat.
41003002	Ilangita yuget tawanlenguut riirngingwaaqaat Jesus-em naallghunnayukagu Sabbath-mi. Naallghuskagu whaten pinaluku, “Anaggututen!”
41003003	Uniiqameng iiggelek yuuk Jesus-em pikaa, “Tagi whavek.”
41003004	Taagken yuget aaptekii, “Liilightuusamta sasqinkut Sabbath-mi? Pinitun pisqinkuut, nalighmeng seghletun? Yugulighisqinkuut, nalighmeng tuqutisqinkuut?” Iwernga yuget qallegnanighwaaghutkat.
41003005	Jesus-em esghapagngaaghmiki ugumiyagutkii, naqam iilqutkumiita pineghllugullghitnengllu waakigatngitnengllu. Taagken Jesus-em qiivluku yuuk pikaa, “Iiggeten nengugutiki.” Legan nengugutii aga naallghutkat.
41003006	Enkaam Pharisees-et aanaghesnaghluteng synagogue-meng, Herod-em ilapgastengitnun aglaghluteng agghitkegkaat naten tuqutelleghqameng Jesus.
41003007	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit Naayvamun Galilee-mun aglaqat. Yulghuteghllaget maligtekiit, qayughllak nagaquqaqegkangit Jesus-em allaaghllugwhaghtillghi. Tamaana yulghun Galilee-meng, Judea-meng, Jerusalem-emeng, Idumea-meng, Jordan-em Kiiwem inglunganilngughneng nunaneng, Tyre-meng, Sidon-meng pingulghiit.
41003009	Yuuk uglaghighllagyan Jesus maligsaaghteminun angyameng yataaghqutesqegkaq luuraq ighlleghnayukangatni meghmun.
41003010	Yulghun naallghuquqaqutanganeng qamaglluteng qinuyuget ellnganun kaannaqeghllakat saaftepigesnaghnaluku.
41003011	Tamaakutlu tughneghaat yuget ilungitnilnguut esghaneghmegteggu Jesus, sivungakun ullghaghlluteng akilghuugaqelghiit, “Kiyaghneghem Ighneqaaten!”
41003012	Iwernga Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii tughneghaat kinangutni apefqaan pisqelluku.
41003013	Taagken Jesus qemimun mayughluni yuget piyukegkani tagsighteqii. Tagilaghaasata
41003014	nakmikegkii qula maalghuk siipneqluku yuget apostle-nguluki. Taagken pikii, “Whangamnitesqellusi nakmikamsi, kayaglleqamsillu ungipaghyaghtiisqellusi.
41003015	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelgullequsillu tughneghaat aanestesqelluki yugneng.”
41003016	Ukut nakmikegkaqii, Simon, (Jesus-em ateghiqaa Peter-meng);
41003017	James-enkuk John-enkuk, ighneghqek Zebedee-m, (Jesus-em atiqakek Boanerges-meng, whaten pisimeng, “Ighneghqek Kallugem”);
41003018	Andrew-nkut, Philip-enkut, Bartholomew-nkut, Matthew-nkut, Thomas-enkut, James-llu ighnegha Alphaeus-em, Thaddaeus-enkut, Simon-llu Zealot-a,
41003019	Judas Iscariot-lu uveghpagutiyaghqaq Jesus-meng.
41003020	Taagken Jesus tukughminun aglaqaq. Yulghuteghllaget aglaghtuullaataqat ellngitnun, repall Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit neghepagningiitkat.
41003021	Nengllugutangan nagaqughluku tawaten aneghtellgha aqfakaat, qayughllak yuget pikangat nallungughhniluku.
41003022	Ilangi apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng Jerusalem-emeng tagikat whaten pimaaqelghiit, “Beelzebul Jesus-em ilunganituq! Enkaam aanesqughaqii tughneghaat yugneng aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Beelzebul-em, umiilwaaghitgun tughneghaat.”
41003023	Enkaam Jesus-em tagsighluki yuget ungipaghaatkii, pikii, “Tughneghaq ellmineng aanesleqaa?
41003024	Ataneghpagulleq aafquuskumi, taana ataneghpagulleq qerngaghmennaanghituq.
41003025	Nengllugutet aafquuskumeng, taakut nengllugutet qerngaghmennaanghitut.
41003026	Tawateghpigaq Tughneghaankut aafquulluteng pilluguskumeng, Tughneghaq nekevghapagningiilluni kenlekaghqaminun kaallequq.
41003027	“Kina alngunak iteghnaanghituq iknaqelghiim yugem mangteghaanun wayaghteghnaluki saghyangi. Sivukluku iknaqelghii yuuk asighqaghlluku, taagken wayaghteghlleqii saghyangi.
41003028	“Ipa ungipaatamsi, yuget seghevutellengyaghqaagut seghleghqellghitneng, seghletunllu akuzitkellghitneng Kiyaghneq.
41003029	Iwernga kitum alngunak seghletun akuzitkegkumikek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak seghevutellengnaanghituq, qayughllak seghleghqengnguuq Kiyaghneghem seghevusaghqaqenghilkanganeng. Taana seghleghqelleq kenglengilnguuguq.”
41003030	Jesus tawaten akuzikaq qayughllak ilangita pikaqegkangat, “Tughneghalguuq ilumikun.”
41003031	Taagken Jesus-em naangallu anglegutangillu kaatkat. Manughamelluteng aanesqegkaat esghaghyugniluku.
41003032	Yulghutet aqumuutngalghiit Jesus-em uvitangani ungipaatkaat, “Qakma naagpeklu anglegutegpeklu esghaghyugaqaaten.”
41003033	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Kinangaawa naaka? Kinkungaawat anglegutenka?”
41003034	Yugsughaluni aqumgalghiit pikii, “Elpesi naakamsillu, anglegutkamsillu!
41003035	Kitum alngunak atuqegkumigu Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha, anglegutkaqallu naakaqallu.”
41004001	Taakwaningani Jesus apeghtughilaataqaq Naayvam Galilee-m esnengani. Elngaatall uglapiglleghhii yuuk tagilaghaateghllakaq ellnganun, repall angyamun uuglluni aqumegkaq, llaaghanwha yulghutet naayvam esnenganitkat.
41004002	Ungipaghaatetgun allaaghiinaghmeng apeghtuqii. Apeghtughitkelluku pikii,
41004003	“Nagatek! Piitesighaghta aglaghluni piitesiighaghvigminun
41004004	ifkaghquqaq piitutneng. Ilangi piitutet tekitkat tumetgun, enkaam qawaaget tagiluteng neghuqiit.
41004005	Ilangi piitutet tekitkat uyghagtuqakun sunapagilngughqun. Tawaninginaq piitkat, qayughllak sunanga ugmestaaghhaq.
41004006	Enkaam siqineq piisalghiimi maatneghan paneghtekii piinneghhat, akungellghitutmeggneng palirakegtekat.
41004007	Ilangi piitutet tekitkat sikughllugtuqakun, sikughlluget piisalghiimeng piitfigiqiit grain-et.
41004008	Naqamalla tamaakut tekitkat sunakegtakun piitestighllakat grain-meng, ilangi 30, ilangi 60, enkaam ilangi 100.”
41004009	Jesus-em taaqniqii whaten, “Sigutelgukufsi nagatusighqameng, nagatek!”
41004010	Taam kingunganeng Jesus ellnginaaghsan, qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtengitallu ilangitallu tamaakut nagatkat aaptekaat ungipaghaatkegkaaneng.
41004011	Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesinun Kiyaghneghem liigikestaa talughngalghii ipapighqellgha Ataneghpagullghem. Sivunghani liitesimangisaghaa. Iwernga tamaakut iqitngalghiit Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghaneng nagaqughaqut sameng tamaghhaaneng ungipaghaatetgun.
41004012	Enkaam ‘Esghaannaqaqut, esghaannaqaqut esghaategpenateng. Nagataqut, nagataqut liigikegpenateng. Pikaayaquyeng qiivnayaghtut Kiyaghneghmun, enkaam seghevunnayaghii.’”
41004013	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Taana ungipaghaan piitesighaghta liigikenghitestegguu? Natenmi liigiknaqesteki alngunak ungipaghaatet?
41004014	Piitesighaghta ifkaghqilghii piitutneng, Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng ungipaghtengatun ayuquq.
41004015	Ilangi yuget qellighllakastun tumestun ayuqut. Piitutet tekinneghata tumetgun qawaaget neghaqiit. Tawateghpigaq tamaakut yuget nagaquunneghata Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng tawaninginaq Tughneghaam puygustaqii.
41004016	Ilangi yuget uyghagtuqastun sunastun ayuqut. Akut uyghagtuqamelnguut asivapagigatut. Tamaakut yuget nagaquunneghmeggni Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng tawaninginaq tuguklighaqiit quyakusiqluki.
41004017	Iwernga ugpeqngwaaghigalkangit akuzitangi enkaam ugpellghit mulungigatut. Seghleliineghmeggni, nalighmeng amyuutkellengneghmeggni apalluqluku ugpeqilleghteng Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng tawaninginaq ugpeqinanighaqut.
41004018	Ilangi yuget sikughllugtuqastun sunastun ayuqut. Piitutet sikughllugtuqakun tekitkat nagungigatut, qayughllak sikughlluget piitfigighaqegkangit. Tamaakut yuget nagaquneghmegteki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi qaatkigatiit,
41004019	qayughllak una unguvalleq nulqaaviighutkaqaat, teghhwaaghiitkaqaatlu aklungi, samengllu wata allgeghutaghaghyugaqut. Tawateghpigaq sikughlluget piitfigillghistun piitutet, tamaakut yuget piyukellghita puygustaqiit Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi.
41004020	Iwernga ilangi yuget pinilghiistun sunastun ayuqut. Piitutet tekitkat pinilghiikun sunakun elngaatall nawaaqut. Ilangi piitestiiqut 30, ilangi 60, ilangi 100. Tawateghpigaq tamaakut yuget nagaquneghmegteki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi qaatkaqiit, enkaam elngaatall qepghaghaqut Kiyaghneghmun. Ilangi wataqaaghaq qepghaghataaghaghaqut ilameggneng.”
41004021	Jesus-em nagneghutkii, “Kitum alngunak kenelghutak itghullukek sagneghem asinganun llinaanghitaak, nalighmeng qavaghvigem asinganun. Itupill quulvaqun llilleqaak.
41004022	Sangwaa alngunak iiqaq qaaynganun lliighyaghqaaguq, sangwaallu alngunak saapegkaq saaputiighyaghqaaguq.
41004023	Sigutelgukufsi nagatusighqameng, nagatek!”
41004024	Whatenllu pikii, “Nagatngwaaghtengnga! Tuunilleghpesistungwaaq Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqiisi, paninang tuunataghaghlleqiisi.
41004025	Yuuk salek tuunataghaghyaghqaaguq. Yuuk sapagllagilnguq sangiighhii tuguyaghqaagut.”
41004026	Whatenllu Jesus-em pikii, “Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem whatetuq: yuuk ifkaghqughaquq piitutneng piitesiighaghvigmini.
41004027	Piitutet piilluteng nawaaqut unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan yuuk qavaayaghngaan, teghhumayaghngaan, paninang piitutet nagwaaqut. Yugem nallukaqii naten nawaaqutangi.
41004028	Sunanginaghhaam kayutngunani piitutet nagustaqii enkaam piitestekangaqut: sivukluteng sungaghyukegtaghhaat piitaqut, taagken napaaziingaqut qenwatlu grain-engaqut.
41004029	Grain-et qigunghata unataghyaghqaaghtaqut, enkaam yugem kepughaqii kepuusimikun.”
41004030	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Samun uspunnaqesteggu Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem? Sangwaa ungipaghaatkennaqesteggu liigikestisiiluku?
41004031	Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem mustard-em piitutngatun ayuquq. Mekestaalleghpigaaguq piitutneng nunami whani iwernga yugem piitesiighaneghminigu,
41004032	anglighllagaquq angelleghpigaaghlluni nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng. Uglaapiglleghhiit avayaghrugllagi enkaam qawaaget unglusiiqut ququngaan akulngakun siqinghillghakun.”
41004033	Jesus-em atuqluki ungipaghaatelghutet yugnun akuzitkegkaqii Kiyaghneghem Akuzitangi. Aapqaqii yugnun liigikelleghtulangistun.
41004034	Quunpeng yuget apeghtughaqegkangi ungipaghaatetgun, iwernga maligsaaghtekullghiit ellnginaaghhneghmeggni whateghlluwaaq liigikestaqegkangi sameng pisiitangi ungipaghaatet.
41004035	Taam ighivgaani Jesus-em angyamelluni maligsaaghteni pikii, “Aghviilta naayvam inglunganun.” Enkaam maligsaaghtet uuglluteng angyamun unitkiit yulghutet. Ilangitallu angyat maligtekiit.
41004037	Taagken anuqlighllakaq, repall imaghllugem imighaataqegkaa angyaq qenwat esleqsaghtuqaq.
41004038	Jesus angyallimi qavaq akisighluni. Maligsaaghtengita taghtughlluku pikaat, “Apeghtughista, tuquyaghngaamtaa pizikuut?”
41004039	Jesus-em taghtughluni anuqallu imaghllugetlu ineghtekii, “Anuqa taaqingam, imaghlluget aghuliightek!” Enkaam ellmaaragutkelluku amsanaghllugughtekaq.
41004040	Taagken maligsaaghteni aaptekii, “Sangafsi alingetsi? Taawa ugpeqigastengngaa?”
41004041	Saghiighayugllakat repall tallughyugllakat alingruughumaghmeng, enkaam aapqughaaghutkat ellmeggneng, “Kinangaawa una yuuk, talwa anuqemllu imaghllugetlu qaatkegkangat?”
41005001	Naayvam inglunganun kaatkat Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit, nunangitnun Gerasa-ghmiit.
41005002	Legan Jesus angyameng quutmun uugtuq yuuk aanluni sufliitneng llivghet, paasqaa.
41005003	Taana yuuk ilumikun tughneghaghtuqaq lliveghnitaqelghii. Awen qiipraghutneng asightaqsaqangat iiggitgunllu itegiitgunllu iwernga sakeqaqegkangi qiipraghutet, kagimtaqegkangillu savikenghaaghet itegaminilnguut. Kitum alngunak asighqepagningitkaallu aghuliightepagningitkaallu, qayughllak iknaqepiglleghhii.
41005005	Unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan igleghtaqelghii lliivghet qungangitnillu qeminillu, quunpeng araghaataamaghmi, uyghagteggun kiitiqumaghmi ellmineng.
41005006	Jesus esghaghyamigu uyavaqaanlluku ketanqusnaq takuluku segesqughfikluku maniguqaa.
41005007	Taagken Jesus-em yugem ilunganilnguq tughneghaq pikaa, “Uyuq seghleq tughneghaq, aani yugmeng!” Tughneghaam araghaataqaa, “Jesus, Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem, sanaqsinga? Akeqi Kiyaghneghmun ikfiqestesaghqaafqaama pisqellunga!”
41005009	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Kinanguzin?” Yugem kiimsiqaa, “Aatqaqa ‘Uglaghllak’ qayughllak uglaghllagtukut!”
41005010	Elngaatall Jesus-mun aapuquutkii tughneghaat aghulaqestefqiita pisqelluki taagken nunameng.
41005011	Taawanguq qemim minglengani kurugalghuteghllaget, neghuullghiit.
41005012	Tughneghaat aapuquutkat Jesus-mun, “Kurugaghnun kayagtikut, ellngitnun iteghtestikut.”
41005013	Enkaam angeghqumakegkii. Tughneghaat yugmeng aanaghesnaghluteng kurugaghnun iteghaatkat. Entaqun 2,000-nguut kurugaat, pennaneng asitmun pangalgulluteng naayvamun ateghaatkat enkaam tuqulaghaatkat.
41005014	Kurugaat aflengakistengit qimaguutkat neghllagmunllu uvitanganilngughnunllu nunanun. Tamaani ungipaqegkiit ilumikun tughneghaghtuqaqlu, kurugaatlu. Enkaam yuget esghaghyaghtuutkiit samatangi.
41005015	Jesus-mun kaalluteng esghaqaat yuuk tughneghaghtughllagyalghii ilumikun. Taawanguq aqumgaftuq piluguwaaghluni, umyugakeklu naallghullutek enkaam alingruuqat.
41005016	Tamaakut esghapakat aapqaat naallghusimaniluku yuuk tughneghaghtughllagyalghii, aapqiitlu kurugaat samatangi.
41005017	Taagken yulghutet maniguutepiglluteng Jesus aghulaqesqegkaat nunameggneng.
41005018	Jesus uugtaquqlu angyamun, yugem tughneghaghtuyalghiim maniguutepiglluni aaptekaa, “Maligllaken?”
41005019	Iwernga Jesus-em ighsakluku pikaa, “Nengllugutegpenunllu, ilakumtaaghpenunllu aglaghluten apeghnaken Atanghem nangllekepiglluten apeghiillgha elpenun.”
41005020	Enkaam yuuk aghulaqegkaq. Tamaani nunami aatqelghiimi, Qula Neghllaget, ungipaqegkaa Jesus-em apeghiillgha ellminun, tamaakut nagaquutkat allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
41005021	Jesus angyakun uteghnighyan inglunganun naayvam, esnemi yulghuteghllaget qerngughutkat uvitanganun.
41005022	Taagken ataasiq synagogue-em umiilwaagha, Jairus-nguftuq aatgha, tagiluni Jesus-mun segesqughtekaq manungakun.
41005023	Maniguutepiglluni pikaa, “Paniggaqa qinuyugllaguuq, tuquyaghtungestaamaaq. Takwaaghtigu saafsaghtuqaghhu, enkaam naallghulluni kiyaghlli!”
41005024	Enkaam Jesus-em maligtekaa. Yulghuteghllagetlu maliglleghaatkaat Jesus, repall kanglluqaghlluku.
41005025	Aghnaqlu tawanteftuq aagtuqaataq qula maalghuk siipngaan ayumiqulleghni. Talwa aghallegtalghutet kayusiitaqsaghngaatni naallghusigalnguq, yeghlegi naavnginalghii. Qenwat maniqraggiighutkaq.
41005027	Nagaqughaqegkanga Jesus, enkaam yulghuteghllaget akulangitgun tunutanganeng takukaa.
41005028	Sumeghtaghaqaq, “Aatkii saafteqeghsaqumki naallghunayaghtunga.”
41005029	Legan atkuyaaghqek saaftaak kiitnginaamaghmi pikaq, enkaam elpekegkaa naallghutellgha qaamnami.
41005030	Tawaninginaq Jesus-em liigikegkaa aghtughyaghqaanghilleq aanelghii ellmineng, enkaam yulghuteghllaget qiivluki aaptekii, “Kitum aatkanka saaftaki?”
41005031	Maligsaaghtengita pikaat, “Yulghuteghllaget qungangitnilnguuten sangan kitumun saafniluten pizin?”
41005032	Iwernga Jesus-em esghaghnaqegkaa kitumun saaftutni.
41005033	Aghnam liigikluku naallghutelleni alingem ungelegsimaghmi takukaa Jesus. Taagken manungakun segesqughlluni ungipaatkaa salleghmineng.
41005034	Jesus-em pikaa, “Panimni, ugpeqilleghpek naallghutestaaten. Nekeggmellelighluten aglaa, naallghutngwaaghumaaten.”
41005035	Jesus-em aleghquumaluku aghnaq, kevgat tagiluteng ungipaatkaat Jairus, “Panigen tuqumaaq, takusqegpenaan'ngam Apeghtughistemun.”
41005036	Jesus-em nagateghngaaghmiki avelghaqiinaghluki Jairus pikaa, “Alingegpenang, taawanginaq ugpeghi.”
41005037	Taagken kitumun alngunak maligtesnaniqaq, iwerngaqun kelqegkii Peter-enkut James-enkut John-enkut, anglegutanga James-em.
41005038	Jesus-enkut kaasalghiimeng Jairus-enkunun, yulghuteghllaget elngaatall qiyaaghuuteghllaguftut metuumaghmeng.
41005039	Jesus-em iteghluni yulghutet pikii, “Sangafsi qiyaaghuuteghllagutsi? Sangafsi nepugtiighllagutsi? Taghnughhaq tuqullghituq, qavaaguq!”
41005040	Iwernga nenglaqegkaat tawaten piyisteng. Qamaglluki aanesamiki angayuqakeklu taakutlu maligsaaghteni itghutkii taghnughhaam nenganun.
41005041	Jesus-em iiggakun tuguluku aghnaghaghhaq pikaa, “Talitha kum!” (whaten pisiq, “Aghnaghaghhaq, maketesqamken!”)
41005042	Tawaninginaq makelluni piyukaq. (Aghnaghaghhaq qula maalghuk siipngaan uksughtutkaftuq.) Angayuqakeklu maligsaaghtetlu elngaatall saghiighayukat!
41005043	Taagken Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii kitumun alngunak ungipaqefqaan pisqelluku, pikiillu, “Neghyaghqaghhaghmeng tuuniteggu.”
41006001	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq Capernaum-emeng, aglaqaq neminun Nazareth-mun, maligsaaghtengitallu maligtekaat.
41006002	Sabbath-ngughsagu synagogue-mi apeghtughikaq. Yulghutet nagalluku saghiighayagutkaat. Aapqughaaghutkat ellmeggneng, “Naken liitaki? Kitum peghqinghughtestagu? Saghiighayugnaghllaguut allaaghlluwhaghtillghi!
41006003	Naten tawaten pii? Kaapentangunghitaa, Mary-m ighnegha? James-enkut, Joses-enkut, Judas-enkut, Simon-enkut anglegutkenghitakii? Nayagillulli maantaat?” Enkaam tugukliimangilkangat.
41006004	Jesus-em pikii, “Kitum alngunak uuknaliqista siivakaqaa, iwerngaqun nunalgutangitallu nalleqliitallu nengllugutangitallu pingigataat.”
41006005	Enkaam tamaani allaaghlluwhaghtipagningitkaq, iwerngaqun qafsinkuuraghhaat saafluki naallghutkii.
41006006	Enkaam Jesus saghiighayugllakaq, qayughllak ugpeqenghilkangat. Taagken Jesus Nazareth-em uvitanganilngughnun nenun piiqluni apeghtuqii yuget.
41006007	Tagsighluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni, kayaggnaqnikii malghukaghtiita ungipaqisqellukillu naallghuqiisqellukillu. Aghulaqfagilgata aghtughyaghqaanghilleliquqii yugneng aanesqiisqelluki tughneghaat.
41006008	Liilightuqiillu, “Igleghalleghpesini sameng alngunak kelqegpenasi iwerngaqun ayaviighmeng. Neqekrangllangunasi, aqeftaghaangunasi, maningunasi pilghaasi.
41006009	Iwernga kameglusi, simiitkaghqameng ggaatmeng kelqegpenasi.”
41006010	Whatenllu pikii, “Nani alngunak tukughpesi upughaskangisi tawanlleghhaasi kenlanga aghulaqelleghpesinun.
41006011	Nenun kaaskufsi upughatingigalngughnun, nalighmeng nagasugigalngughnun, uninnakesi taana nuna itegasi pagulangiimiita. Tawaten pikufsi kelengasaaghlleqasi Kiyaghneghem aghyuulleghqaaneng!”
41006012	Enkaam maligsaaghtet aghulaqluteng ungipaqikat yugnun avuteghqelluki seghleghqennaniisqelluki.
41006013	Tughneghalghutet aanesquqiit yugneng, mesiighqaqlukillu qinuyulghutet naallghuquqiit.
41006014	Umiilgem Herod-em nagaquqaa qamaglluku Jesus-em tawaten pillgha, qayughllak tamaghhaani aapqangit Jesus-em allaaghlluwhaghtillghi. Ilangi yuget pikat, “John-nguuq Paaptaayesta, unguvaamaaq enkaam esgha aghtughyaghqaanghillelek allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun.”
41006015	Iwernga ilangit yuget pikat, “Elijah-nguuq.” Ilangit pikat, “Uuknaliqistenguuq, neghighluku uuknaliqistestun ayuquq.”
41006016	Herod-em nagaqughluku pikaq, “John-nguuq Paaptaayesta, naasqwightestekaqa iwernga unguvaamaaq!”
41006017	Qavnganghhaq Herod-em kayagutkaqegkanga John tuguluku, asighqesluku anusimingllaghtestekaa. Tawaten pistekaa, qayughllak John-em piighaataqaa Herod whaten, “Liilightuusamnni anaggusimaaten tugulleghpegun anglegutegpek Philip-em nulighha Herodias.”
41006019	Enkaam Herodias-em ugumiyaguteghllakaqegkanga John repall tuqutesupigtekaqsaqanga. Iwernga pipagningitkaa qayughllak Herod-em tawaten pistepagningitkaa.
41006020	Herod-em alikegkaqegkanga John liisimakutmineng yuuk pinilghii, Kiyaghneghmun qaatkutngaghllalghii. Enkaam kelengakestengngwaaqaa sanayukatgu. Herod-em nagasugaqegkanga John qaywa seghleghyugaqeghngaaghmi naganneghminigu.
41006021	Taagken Herodias qenwatlu pilleghqangegkaq. Herod-em allgeghvini aghneq kaasan neqenghaghqestimalghii kavemem umiilwaaghitnun, pilluwaghtet umiilwaaghitnun, igleghutistengitnunllu Galilee-ghmiit.
41006022	Taagken paniga Herodias-em iteghluni neghuullghiinun tukalegaqaq. Herod-enkut aqelqaqullghiit elngaatall efquqegkaat. Enkaam umiilgem pikaa aghnaghaq, “Sameng alngunak tungsighvikegkuvnga tuunelleqamken.”
41006023	Akeqegkaallu whaten, “Ipapestaaq tuunelleqamken sameng alngunak tungsiquvek, talwa umiilgutimalleghma aklungingan avellgha!”
41006024	Taagken aghnaghaq aanluni naani aapsaghtuqaa, “Sameng tungsighnaqsinga?” Naangan pikaa, “John-em Paaptaayestem naasqwa tungsighhu.”
41006025	Aghnaghaq agliighwaghlluni umiilegmun tungsighvikegkaa, “Whaa maaten, John-em Paaptaayestem naasqwa piyugaqa qayuutaghraagkun lliluku!”
41006026	Umiilek elngaatall qivghughllakaq iwernga saluku ighlekligu, qayughllak akeqngwaaqaqegkanga aqelqalghutni nagatestekluki.
41006027	Enkaam tawaninginaq umiilgem kayagtekaa kelengakista tagitesqesluku John-em naasqwa. Kelengakista aanluni anusimingllaghvigmun aglaqaq John-em naasqwa kepnaluku.
41006028	Naasquq qayuutaghraagkun lliluku aglaalluku aghnaghaghmun tuunegkaa. Enkaam aghnaghaam naaminun tuunegkaa.
41006029	John-em maligsaaghtengita nagaqughluku, yugusii aqfaluku lliifqaat.
41006030	Apostle-et uteghnightuulluteng Jesus-mun aapqiit apeghtughilleteng, naallghuqulleghteng, tughneghaghnengllu aanesqulleghteng yugneng.
41006031	Yugllagulghii tagimaghmengllu aghulaqumaghmengllu pilghiit repall Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit neghepagningiitkat. Enkaam maligsaaghteni pikii, “Natmun aghulaqelta paaghqillghanun, elpesiqun meghnaaliightesqellusi.”
41006032	Enkaam angyakun paaghqillghanun aghulaqegkat ellnginaghhaaghhnaluteng,
41006033	iwernga yulghutem esghaqiit aghulaqelghiit. Liisimakluki navek pinaqutangit, ketanqusnaq naayvam esnengakun maligtekiit. Nenun nallangiinneghata legan yuget maligtaqegkangit. Kaatkat takukameggnun ingyaghaghlluki Jesus-enkut.
41006034	Jesus-em angyameng uuglluni quutmun yulghutet esghaghluki nangllegyagutkii, qayughllak penniighestun penniighniightengilngughestun ayuqelghiit. Enkaam allaaghhiinaghmeng apeghtughtaakii.
41006035	Whanikupigsagu maligsaaghtengita takuluku Jesus pikaat, “Maana paaghqituq, whanikughllagaallu. Yuget aglaghtuutesqiki piitesighaghtenunllu, nengiighhaghnunllu. Ellmeggneng neqengyaghtughlit neqhyaghqameng.”
41006037	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesi neghyaghqaliteki.” Aaptekaat, “Tukfighiyaghtughtesugsikuut 200 denarii-m akinganeng neqekrangllameng neghesqelluki?”
41006038	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Naten uglaghqakaan neqekrangllalgutsi? Enta ivaghiightek.” Naalkusameng ungipaatkaat, “Taawa tallimat neqekrangllat, maalghuklu iqallugek.”
41006039	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteminun qafsinkaghtiita aqumestesqegkii vegaaghqun.
41006040	Enkaam aqumuutkat 100-ngwaaqluteng 50-ngwaaqluteng.
41006041	Jesus-em tuguluki tallimat neqekrangllat, maalghuklu iqallugek, quulmun sivuglluni iyamsiqayugvikegkaa Kiyaghneq. Taagken neqekrangllat iiggmineng aavgughluki maligsaaghteminun tunquqii uyegtesqelluki. Iqallugeklu iigmineng aavgughlukek tunqughtestekii.
41006042	Qamagtengngwaaghluni neghuutkaq kepsuulluni.
41006043	Taagken maligsaaghtet tugulaqiit qula maalghuk siipneqluku pasketet esleqngalghiit kagimleghughtekaneng neqekrangllaneng, iqallugnengllu.
41006044	Yuget neghuutkat 5,000-nguftut, kesutkegpenaki aghnatlu taghnughhaatlu.
41006045	Legan taaqut Jesus-em maligsaaghteni qelqii angyakun igleghtekestiisqelluki Bethsaida-mun, naayvam inglunganilngughmun. Taagken ellngan yulghutet aglaghtuutestekii nengitnun.
41006046	Aglaghtuutesamiki yughaghyaghtuqaq qemimun.
41006047	Unugmi taakwani angyat naayvamelluki Jesus ellnginaghhaakaq quutmi.
41006048	Esghaqii malighsaaghteni aygughnaqutkelghiit yaavuqumeng, qayughllak anuqliiskangi. Akulegkeni three-kellaagenkuk six-ekellaagenkuk unaanguluku, takukii meghem qaayngakun piyugmeng. Naghughhnaqaqiillu
41006049	esghaqaat meghqun piyulghii. Sumeghmeggni taghneghaaniluku araghllakat.
41006050	Qamaglluteng alingruughutkat. Tawaninginaq Jesus-em pikii, “Ilutughtek! Whanganguunga, alingegpenasi.”
41006051	Legan angyamun uugtuq ellmaaragllugughtekaq. Maligsaaghtet saghiighayugllakat,
41006052	qayughllak paninang liigikigalkangat Jesus kinangutanga, qaywa esghapagngaaghmegteggu neqekrangllat nulastekangi. Tawatetkaalghiit qayughllak salin umyugiit reghiigalnguut.
41006053	Taagken nagneqat naayvam inglunganun enkaam Gennesaret-kun tamlagluteng angyaghteng petukaat.
41006054	Legan angyaghteng unitaat yuget liisuqnginaamaan Jesus pikaat.
41006055	Enkaam kelkaghtaarragkiiqat Jesus kaasimaniluku. Jesus navek piyaghngaan qinuyuget aglaataqegkangit allighiitgun ellnganun.
41006056	Jesus kaanneghmini neghllagnunllu, nenunllu, eslamelngughnun akilpegaghvignun aglaghaqelghii. Enkaam yuget tagitaqegkangit qinuyuget akilpegaghvignun Jesus-mun naallghutesqelluki. Jesus-mun maniguututkiit qinuyugnun waran saaftesqelluku kenii, enkaam qamaglluteng saaftilghiit naallghutkat.
41007001	Pharisees-etlu ilangillu apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng Jerusalem-emeng pit, Jesus-em uvitanganun qerngughutkat.
41007002	Esghaqiit maligsaaghtengan ilangi uughtughpenateng neghelghiit. Uughtullghilnguut Pharisees-et pisqellghistun.
41007003	(Pharisees-etlu Jews-etlu qamaglluteng neghyaghqaanghilnguut wetkuqun sivukluteng uughtughwaaghluteng, qayughllak sivuneghmeng apeghtuusiit atuqngukangit.
41007004	Talwa akilpegaghvigmeng tagineghmeggni neghigalnguut wetku sivukluten ukmangighsaghwaaghaqelghiit. Ilangillu sivuneghmeng apeghtuusalghutangit atuqngukangit. Atuqfagilgamegtiki qayuusiteng, sagneteng, siilut gaaghusiteng sangighqughwaaghaqegkangit.)
41007005	Enkaam Pharisees-etlu apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng aaptekaat Jesus, “Sangameng maligsaaghteten uughtughpenateng neghaqat? Sivunemta apeghtuusiit atuqigatiit.”
41007006	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Elqughllusi Isaiah-m uuknaliqutkumakangisi piniiyugneghni elpesi. Whaten igaqaaguq, ‘Kiyaghneq piiq, “Ukut yuget akuzitmegteggun quulvaghaqaatnga, nakaan ilumegteggun.
41007007	Temngi manigughaqaatnga, qayughllak apeghtuusaqaqiit liilightuusangllaqateng katam whanga Liilightuusaqepiglleghhiistun.”’
41007008	Enkaam elpesi Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii pakigluki qaatkaqasi yuget apeghtuusiit.”
41007009	Jesus-em nagneghutkii, “Pakigillepiguusi Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusiitnun qaatkepigesnaghnaluki elpesi katam apeghtuusasi.
41007010	Una esgha usputaq tawaten pilleghpesinun: Moses-em aapqaqii Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii whaten pilghiit, ‘Quulvaghluku atanllu naanllu.’ Whatenllu pikaaguq, ‘Kitum alngunak atanillu naanillu seghlequuqumikek tuqutellengyaghqaaguq.’
41007011	Iwernga elpesi allanguut apeghtughillesi. Whaten piiqusi, ‘Yugemnguq atani nalighmeng naani whaten piyaghngaaghmigu, “Kayusiitusighqalguunga elpenun iwernga tuunaanghitaqa qayughllak Corban-nguuq.”’ (Corban whaten pisiiguq, siingenllu Kiyaghneghmun akequsaqumaaqa.)
41007012	Tawaten pilleghpesigun apeghtughaqasi yuget kayusiinneghisaghngaatki atangitlu naangitlu pisqelluki.
41007013	Enkaam pakigaqasi Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, apeghtuusaqepigesnaghnaluki yugnun elpesi katam akuzitesi. Tamaakut temngi usputaagut, uglaapigtut sangwaat piiqegkesi.”
41007014	Taagken Jesus-em yulghutet ellminun tagsinqiglluki pikii, “Qamagtengngwaaghlusi nagallusi liigikiteggu sameng pitka.
41007015	Yuuk neghegkaan nukeggnaghqigataa, seghletun sumeghtaghallghan, sallghanllu nukeggnaghqaqaa.
41007016	Sigutelgukufsi nagatusighqameng, nagatek!”
41007017	Jesus-em unilluki yulghutet iteghyan maligsaaghtengita aaptekaat ungipaghaan sameng pisiitanga.
41007018	Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesillu liigikigatsii? Sangwaa alngunak yugem neghaqegkanga nukeggnaghqusighqaanghituq ellnganun,
41007019	qayughllak neghegkii ighsaqghwanun pinaanghitut. Aqsaqghwanun piiqut enkaam yugusiineng aanaqut.” (Tawaten pilleghmikun Jesus-em aapghwaa neqet qamaglluteng neghyaghqaaniluki.)
41007020	Pikiillu, “Yugem qamaken ilumineng aanestekaan nukeggnaghqestaqaa.
41007021	Qaamken yugem ilunganeng aanaqut: sumeghtaghalleluget, nengughtegpenani kitumeng alngunak atuqilleq, teglegniiq, yugtaq,
41007022	gelgaghniiq, pakigniiq, alngunak seghletun pilleq, puughti, kayngusaghaatelleq, aqina, yulgutmeng iqlengiqutki, qukaayugta, temngitwha.
41007023	Tamaakut qamaglluteng seghleghet yugem ilunganeng aanegkat nukeggnaghqikayuguut.”
41007024	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq Tyre-m tunganganun, kaalluni mangteghamun iitqaq. Kitumun alngunak nallukesuguyaqanga kaatelleni, iwernga ilangita liisimakegkaat.
41007025	Aghnam Gentile-em, allgeqam Phoenicia-mi, Syria-melngughmi nagaquqaa Jesus kaasimaniluku. Paniggaa ilumikun tughneghalek. Enkaam aglaragkiighluni Jesus-mun segesqughlluni manungakun, maniguutkaq aanestaghtesqelluku tughneghaq panigmineng.
41007027	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Taghnughhaat sivukluteng neghesaghqaagut, qayughllak anaggutngaaq taghnughhaat neqngit tuguluki qikminun miluuskumeng.”
41007028	Aghnam kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a, Ataneq, talwa qikmit tipelem asinganilnguut neghaqut taghnughhaat ifkaghqellghitneng!”
41007029	Enkaam Jesus-em pikaa, “Naqamqun tawaten kiimsighaghpenga aglaghhaaten, tughneghaq aanumaaq panigpeneng!”
41007030	Aghnaq neminun aglaghyalghiimi paniga ingaghmeteftuq qavaghvigmi, taawa llaaghan tughneghaq aanumalghii paniganeng.
41007031	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq Tyre-meng. Sidon-kunllu, Qula Neghllagteggunllu aagluni Naayvamun Galilee-mun pikaq.
41007032	Yuget ilangita, yuuk nagaquusigalnguq talwa akuziyiilnguq tagilluku Jesus-mun nangllegsiitkaat saaftesqelluku.
41007033	Enkaam Jesus-em awiitutkaa yulghutneng. Sivukluku tekghegni sigutegkenun kanaghllukek, taagken iqillukek qesighluki iiggeni, ulunga saaftekaa.
41007034	Taagken sivuglluni qilagmun aneghpakaghluni yuuk pikaa, “Ephphatha!” (Taana whaten pisiilghii, “Reghightek!”)
41007035	Tawaninginaq yugem sigutkek reghiqak, ulungallu piniightekaq, aga akuzinginaamaghmi pikaq akuziyiilliqegpenani.
41007036	Taagken Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii kitumun alngunak ungipaqefqaan pisqelluku, iwernga ineghtaataghyisteng wata ungipaqegkaat.
41007037	Nagaquullghiit tamaakut elngaatall saghiighayugllakat, pikat, “Uum yugem sallgha qamaglluni piniperewaaghuuq! Talwa nagaquusigalnguut nagaquusagutestii, akuziyiilnguutlu akuziyagutestii!”
41008001	Taam kingungiighhaaneng yulghuteghllak qerngughullaataqaq. Neghyaghqaqraggiighusata Jesus-em maligsaaghteni tagsighluki pikii,
41008002	“Ukut nangllegyagutepigtanka. Whangamninnaqneghmeng pingayuni aghneghni neghyaghqiighutut.
41008003	Nengitnun aglaghtestekumki neghestegpenaki tumemi taakwani ulleghaallequt, qayughllak ilangi uyavaneng tagilaghaatkaagut.”
41008004	Maligsaaghtengita aaptekaat, “Maani paaghqituq naken neqengnaqesta whaten uglaghqakalghiinun naamayaghqameng?”
41008005	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Naten uglaghqakaan neqekrangllalgutsi?” Kiimsiqaat, “Maaghraghvinleguut neqekrangllat.”
41008006	Enkaam Jesus-em yulghuteghllaget qelqii aqumuutesqelluki nunakun. Taagken tuguluki taakut maaghraghvinlek neqekrangllat Kiyaghneq iyamsiqayugvikluku, kagimlluki tuunegkii maligsaaghteminun uyegtesqelluki. Enkaam maligsaaghtengi uyegtekat.
41008007	Qafsinkuuraghhaghnengllu amsakalghiineng iqallulget. Jesus-em iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, taakutlu maligsaaghteminun uyegtesqegkii.
41008008	Entaqun 4,000-nguut yuget kepsuulluteng neghuutkat. Taagken maligsaaghtet qerngughsaqmegteggu siipneq, maaghraghvinlek pasketet imiqiit esleqaghaghlluki.
41008010	Jesus-em yulghuteghllaget aghulaquutesluki, enkaam maligsaaghtekullghiit angyamun uuglluteng aghulaqnginaamaghmeng pikat Dalmanutha-mun.
41008011	Tamaanlenguut Pharisees-et takuluku Jesus aaghtiiraaqaat. Pikaat, “Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagi, enkaam ugpeqelleqaghput aghtughyaghqaanghillghen Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga.” Tawaten pikaat anagniilqavigighnaluku.
41008012	Jesus-em aneghpagluni pikii, “Sangameng maaten aghneghem yugi allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmeng tungsighaqat? Ipa ungipaatamsi, allaaghlluwhaghtinnaanghitamsi.”
41008013	Taagken unilluki, angyamun uuglluni inglunganun naayvam aghviqat.
41008014	Maligsaaghtet puygumalghiit neqekrangllameng kelqegpenateng, ataasighhaaftuq kelqegkaat angyamelnguq.
41008015	Jesus-em kelengasaaqii, “Kelengangwaaghlusi yeast-atangitneng Pharisees-et, yeast-atanganengllu Herod-em.”
41008016	Taagken ellmeggneng aleghquutkat, “Tawaten piinkut qayughllak neqekranglliilnguukut.”
41008017	Jesus-em akuzitkengngukangi apeghtuusiit Pharisees-et, apeghtuusiillu Herod-em. Liisimakegkangi maligsaaghtengan liigikenghilkangat akuzitkegkaa enkaam aaptekii, “Sangan neqekranglliinnilusi pitsi? Paninang nallukaqetsilluu, liigikigatetsilluu? Umughtakii umyugasi?
41008018	Iyelgulghiisi, esghiigatsii? Sigutelguusi, nagaquusigatsii? Neqamikenghistekii
41008019	tallimat neqekrangllat kagimtekanka 5,000-enun? Qafsinat pasketet siipneghmeng imighesteki?” Kiimsiqaat, “Qula maalghuk.”
41008020	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Maaghraghvinlek neqekrangllat kagimtaqngamki 4,000-enun, qafsinat pasketet siipneghmeng imighesteki?” Kiimsiqaat, “Maaghraghvinlek.”
41008021	Aaplaataqii, “Sangafsi paninang liigikigatsi?”
41008022	Bethsaida-mun kaasata ilangita yuget Jesus-mun tagitkaat ayaakaq yuuk, saaftaghtesqelluku.
41008023	Jesus-em ayaakaq tasluqluku aghulaqutkaa nemeng. Taagken qesighlukek iiskek saaflukek aaptekaa, “Sameng esghaanneghisiin?”
41008024	Yugem sivuglluni yugsughaluni pikaa, “Aa-a, esghaghanka yuget, iwernga esghaqaaluteng llangaqa uqfiget piyugullghiit.”
41008025	Jesus-em allameng saaftekakek yugem iiskek. Maatenllaam yuuk esghaannaqeghllagyalghiimi, qemall esghaasagunneqigtuq whateghlluwaaq.
41008026	Jesus-em agliisqegkaa nenganun, pikaallu, “Aghuliifqaavek taakwani nemi.”
41008027	Taagken Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit aghulaqegkat nenun tunganganilngughnun Caesarea Philippi-em. Tumemi taakwani maligsaaghteni aaptekii, “Kinangunilunga yuget piiqatnga?”
41008028	Kiimsiqaat, “Ilangita piiqaaten John-nguniluten Paaptaayesta, ilangita Elijah-nguniiqaaten, enkaam ilangita naliqniluten uuknaliqistet.”
41008029	Aaptekii, “Elpesi kinganguniiqestengnga?” Peter-em pikaa, “Christ-anguuten.”
41008030	Taagken Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii, “Kitumun alngunak apeghpenanga.”
41008031	Taagken Jesus-em apeghtuqestaqii maligsaaghteni, “Ighnegha Yugem elngaatall ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq, ighsaksaghqaqaatlu siivanlleghet, chief priest-et, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng. Taagken tuqulleqaat iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem unguvaghllequq.”
41008032	Whateghlluwaaq ungipaatkii. Peter-em iqitulluku aghyuuqaa.
41008033	Iwernga Jesus-em qiivluni esghaqii maligsaaghteni taagken Peter aghyuuqaa. Pikaa, “Awiiten whangamneng, Tughneghaq. Sumeghtaghalleghten yugem sumeghtaghalqii, Kiyaghneghem sumeghtaghalqenghitii!”
41008034	Taagken Jesus-em yulghuteghllagetlu maligsaaghtenillu tagsighteghluki pikii, “Kitum alngunak maligsukuminga, ellmineng katam piyukelleni peglluki, qaquurani uyamigluku maligllinga.
41008035	Kitum alngunak yuguliyukumigu unguvalleni iflayaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak iflakumigu unguvalleni whanga apalluqlunga, Pinilghiitlu Ungipat apalluqluki yuguliyaghqaqaa.
41008036	Sangwaangam yugem pinighqusiqelleqagu piliilluku nunaghllak, iflakumikek unguvasigni?
41008037	Sameng'ngam yuuk veghtusiqelleqa unguvasigminun?
41008038	Maaten aghneghem yugi ataasiighmenneghitut Kiyaghneghmun, seghleghqumanguutlu. Maani aghneghni kitum alngunak kaynguyaguskanganga, apeghtuusankallu, whangallu Ighneghani Yugem kaynguyagulleqaqa tagikuma aghtughyaghqaanghillelighlunga Atamneng kelqelluki agleghnalghiit yaqulget.”
41009001	Nagneghutkiillu whaten, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, ilasi nekevghallghiit whani tuqunaanghitut kenlanga esghalleghmeggnun Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem tagikan aghtughyaghqaanghilleghtuumaghmi.”
41009002	Aghvinlek aghneq atughluku, Jesus-em kelqelluki Peter-enkut, James-enkut, John-enkut, mayuqat uusqalghiimun naayghamun. Ellnginaghhaalghiit tawani Jesus-em yugusii allangughtekaq esghaamallghitni.
41009003	Aatkii qelmeghtekat qatetun, qaatghataghaghluteng kitum alngunak nunami qateghsaghaqegkanganeng.
41009004	Taagken maligsaaghtet esghapakagket Elijah-nkuk Moses-enkuk aliighlutek aleghquqangak Jesus.
41009005	Enkaam maligsaaghtet alingruughuteghllakat repall sameng pipagningitkat. Taagken Peter-em pikaa Jesus, “Apeghtughista, itagnapigtuq whaanlenguukut! Pingayut azigutat nekefnaqaput, elpenunllu Moses-munllu Elijah-munllu.”
41009007	Taagken qilawaaq aliighluni saapegkii. Qilawaaghmeng mem pikii, “Unanguuq piniqepigtekegka Ighneqa; nagataqiteggu!”
41009008	Taagken yugsughaaghaghsalghiimeng Moses-enkuk Elijah-nkuk aviituk, Jesus-nginaghhaq tawanteftuq.
41009009	Ukigutkelluku naayghameng Jesus-em ungipaqesnanighwaaqaa esghaatellghat kenlanga Ighnegha Yugem tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtekan.
41009010	Enkaam ineghsisteng qaatkegkaat, iwernga ellnginaaghhneghmeggni piiqelghiit, “Samengtuq pisiiwa ‘Tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtelleq?’”
41009011	Taagken aaptekaat Jesus, “Sangan apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng piiqatgu Elijah sivukluni tagipestaaghyaghqaaniluku?”
41009012	Kiimsiqii, “Ipanguuq Elijah sivukluni tagipestaaghyaghqaaguq yataaghqennaluku sangwaa tamaghhaan. Aaptaghllamsi, naqam sangan Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaqatgu, Ighnegha Yugem ikfiqeghllagyaghqaaniluku, sasiinghilngughestunllu kiyaghusaghqaaniluku?
41009013	Iwernga ungipaannaqamsi Elijah tagikaaguq, yuget piyukelleghmegestun pikaqaat katam tawaten Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun.”
41009014	Takuyaqmegteki ilangi maligsaaghtet, yulghuteghllak tawantuteftuq. Ilangita apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng aaghtiiraaghaqeftiit maligsaaghtet.
41009015	Legan yuget esghaghluku Jesus saghiighayugllagluteng paayghaghlluku quyakegkaat.
41009016	Jesus-em maligsaaghteni aaptekii, “Sameng aaghtiiraaghaqesteki apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng?”
41009017	Yulghuteghllaget akulngitneng yugem kiimsiqaa, “Apeghtughista, ighneqa tagisaghaqa elpenun, qayughllak ilumikun tughneghalguuq. Taam tughneghaam akuzisigataa.
41009018	Kaatepiggneghminigu iqustaqaa, qaanghallu nuvaglliighqestaqaa, gguutngi terqitaagtaghtestaqii, teveghqwaastaqaallu. Maligsaaghtegpenun kayagutaghsaghaqa tughneghaq aanestesqelluku iwernga pipagningitaat.”
41009019	Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Elpesi yugni ugpeqillghitusi! Naten tagkaan elpesininnaqsinga ugpeqesqellunga? Mekelghiiq whavek tagiteggu!”
41009020	Enkaam tagitkaat. Legan tughneghaam esghaghluku Jesus, mekelghiiq iqusluku sayugpagtaghtestekaa. Tamaani temngi ullghitaperewaaghtestekaa, qaanghallu nuvaglliightestekaa.
41009021	Jesus-em aaptekaa atanga, “Qavngaghhaaneng tawateta?” Kiimsiqaa, “Mekestaghhaatmineng ima.
41009022	Uglaghngaan kenghegnunllu meghmunllu iqustaqsaghaa tuqusqelluku. Piyaghqaakuvek nangllegyagullutung kayusiitaghtikung!”
41009023	Jesus-em pikaa, “Sangavek tawaten pizin, ‘Piyaghqaakuvek’? Kiyaghneghem sangwaa alngunak piyaghqaqaa yugmun ugpelghiimun.”
41009024	Tawaninginaq mekelghiighem atanga iglagtuluni pikaq, “Ugpeghtunga, iwernga ugpelleghtughtaghaqaghnga!”
41009025	Jesus-em esghaghluki wata yuget tagilaghaallghiit qevuulluku aghyuuqaa tughneghaq, “Uyuq tughneghaq tuuslaghtestilghiillu akuzistingigalnguqlu qelghamken aani mekelghiighmeng, allamengllu itefqaavek ellnganun pilghaaten.”
41009026	Tughneghaam mekelghiiq araghaataghtesteghllagluku, sayugpagtaghtesteghllagluku, aanegkaq. Legan mekelghiiq esghaqaaluni tuqukaq repall esghapalghiit pikat, “Tuqumaaq!”
41009027	Iwernga Jesus-em iiggakun tuguluku kayusiitkaa nekevesqelluku enkaam nekevegkaq.
41009028	Jesus mangteghamun iteghyan ellnginaghhaaghsameng maligsaaghtengita aaptekaat, “Sangan whangkuta aanesneghmeng aghtughesteggu tughneghaq?”
41009029	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Tawatelnguq tughneghaq yughaghhiinaam aanesaghqaqaa, saam alla pinaanghitaa.”
41009030	Taagken nemeng aghulaqluteng nagneqat Galilee-kun. Jesus-em kitumun alngunak liisimakesugumangitkaa naantuleni,
41009031	qayughllak apeghtuungukangi maligsaaghteni tuqulleghqamineng. Pikii, “Ighnegha Yugem tuguluku tuunelleqaat yugnun tuqutesqelluku, naqamenraq pingayut aghneghet atughluki unguvaghllequq.”
41009032	Iwernga liigikumangilkangat apeghtuusaa sameng pisiitanga, enkaam aapsugumangilkangat tetugluteng.
41009033	Capernaum-emun kaalluteng, iteghaasameng Jesus-em aaptekii, “Igleghutkelluku sangwaa aaghtiiraaghutkaqesteggu?”
41009034	Kiimsighyugumangilkangat, qayughllak igleghutkelluku aaghtiiraaghutkat nalighteng angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
41009035	Jesus-em aqumluni, qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni tuqlughluki pikii, “Kina alngunak sivuliighsukumi nekeglli kinguliiluni, qepghaghtengulillu tamaghhaanun.”
41009036	Taagken taghnughhaq tuguluku nekevestekaa qukiitgun. Qelluku pikii,
41009037	“Kitum alngunak tugukliqumigu taghnughhaghhaq uutun ayuqelghii whanga apalluqlunga, tuguklighaqaanga whanga. Kitum alngunak tugukliquminga, tuguklighlleqaa Ataka kayagtikaq whangamneng.”
41009038	Mulugpenateng John-em pikaa, “Apeghtughista, yuuk esghaamaaghput ateghpegun aanesqulghii tughneghaghneng. Ineghsimaaghput qayughllak whangkunnun ilatnganghilnguq.”
41009039	Jesus-em pikii, “Ineghtegpenaan! Qayughllak kina alngunak atemkun allaaghlluwhaghtingukumi seghletun akuzitkelghaghtughnaanghitaanga.
41009040	Kitum alngunak kipullegmun pinghilkanginkut, qepghalgutkaghput.
41009041	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak meghsikangisi whanga pikutemneng, ipapestaaq akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq.”
41009042	“Ataasiq taghnughhaq ugpeqingalghii whangamneng, yugem seghleghqestekagu, pinighataghaghnayaghtuq taana yuuk meghmun ateghsaqumi uyaqghwakun qaamqaghfikluku uyghagllagmeng.
41009043	Iiggegpek seghleghqestekangaten kepnaketen. Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten yugusighpek nalighnegha iflakuvgu unguvalleghpek iflalleghqaaneng quunperugllak. Taana pinighataghaghtuq inglugtun iiggelighluten hell-mun aglalleghqaghpeneng. Tawani kumaghughngalghii keneq qaamyaghqaanghituq.
41009044	Tawani ‘kinguget neghegkayuget yugmeng tuquyaghqaanghitut, kumaghughngalghiillu keneq qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
41009045	Itegaghpek seghleghqestekangaten, iiknaketen! Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten yugusighpek nalighnegha iflakuvgu unguvalleghpek iflalleghqaaneng quunperugllak. Taana pinighataghaghtuq inglugtun itegalighluten hell-mun miluutelleghqaghpeneng.
41009046	Tawani ‘kinguget neghegkayuget yugmeng tuquyaghqaanghitut, kumaghughngalghiillu keneq qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
41009047	Iyegpek seghleghqestekangaten, ipugnaken! Pinighataghaghnayaghtuten Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem iitquvek inglupigaghmeng iiskelluten, inglugtun iyelguluten hell-mun miluutelleghqaghpeneng.
41009048	Tawani ‘kinguget neghegkayuget yugmeng tuquyaghqaanghitut, kumaghughngalghiillu keneq qaamyaghqaanghituq’.
41009049	Tamaghhaghmi taghyulighllequq keneghmeng.
41009050	“Taghyuq pinightuq iwernga taghyughningiiskan, naten elpesi taghyughnighllaataghnayaghesteggu? Taghyughningiitegpenasi, nekeggmetullusillu.”
41010001	Taagken Jesus aghulaqegkaq tamaaken nunameng. Aglaghluni nunamun aatqelghiimun Judea-mun, aghviqakek Kiiwek Jordan-ek. Yulghutem qerngughfiklaataqaa enkaam apeghtuqii piiqelleghmitun.
41010002	Ilangita Pharisees-et takuluku anagniilqavigighnaqutkelluku aaptekaat, “Liilightuusamnni itagnaghtaa yugem nuliini pegtekumigu?”
41010003	Jesus-em kiimsiqii aaptemmeng, “Sangaawami Moses-em qelghusaa?”
41010004	Kiimsiqaat, “Moses-em pilleghqalitkaqaa yuuk pegtusim igii imighluki pegtesqelluku nulighha.”
41010005	Jesus-em pikii, “Tawaten Moses-em Liilightuusalitkaqiisi pineghllugllagutegpesineng.
41010006	Iwernga nunangllaghyuwhaalleghmeng ‘Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaak yuuklu aghnaqlu.’
41010007	Taana apalluqluku yugem unillukek atanillu naanillu nuliighminun lliighwaaghyaghqaaguq.
41010008	Enkaam maalghugunanighllequk, ataasiighllequk.
41010009	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem qerngughutestekakek yeqay yugem pellghututesneghillikek.”
41010010	Mangteghamun iteghaasameng maligsaaghtet aaptekaat Jesus tamaaken pillghaneng.
41010011	Jesus-em pikii, “Yugem nuliini peglluku allaneng nulightuqumi, taawa gelgaghniighllequq.
41010012	Tawateghpigaq aghnam ugini peglluku allaneng ugiiqumi, taawa gelgaghniighllequq.”
41010013	Ilangita yuget tagitkiit taghnughhaat Jesus-mun saafluki quyastesqelluki, iwernga maligsaaghtet ineghtekiit tagitilghiit.
41010014	Jesus-em esghaghluki seghleghyagulluki maligsaaghteni pikii, “Taghnughhaat tagilit whangamnun. Ineghtegpenaki, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem taghnughhaghestun ayuqelghiit pikaat.
41010015	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak tuguklinghilkumigu Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem taghnughhaghtun, iteghnaanghituq.”
41010016	Taagken taghnughhaat tugaaqluki, saaftaqluki quyastekii.
41010017	Jesus igleghhneqigtaquqlu, yugem ketanqusnaq takuluku manungakun segesqughlluni aaptekaa, “Pinilghii Apeghtughista, naten salunga kenlengilnguq unguvalleq allgeghhnayaghsikun?”
41010018	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Sangan pinighnizinga? Kina alngunak pininghituq, Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq pinilghii.
41010019	Liilightuusat liisimakaten: ‘Yugtaghpenang; gelgaghniighpenang; teglegpenang; iqlengiqutkegpenaki yuget; puughtigpenang; quulvaghlukek atanllu naanllu.’”
41010020	Yugem pikaa, “Apeghtughista, ima nukalpigaatemneng qaatkengngwaanka taakut Liilightuusat.”
41010021	Jesus-em piniqepiglluku qiivluku pikaa, “Ataasiiguq piyaghqan. Akikughyaghtughhu qamaglluku saghyan, enkaam akinga tunqughnaken aklumalghiinun. Tawaten pikuvek aklungillequten qilagmi. Taagken maligsaghtughnakevnga.”
41010022	Tawaten piyatni yuuk nulgiiqaq, iqitkaq iilqepiglluni qayughllak aklungitepiglleghhii.
41010023	Jesus yugsughaluni maligsaaghteni pikii, “Piyaqnapigtuq aklungilngughni itelleghqaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem!”
41010024	Tawaten piyisteng maligsaaghtet saghiighayukat. Jesus-em pilaataqii, “Taghnughhaghni, piyaqnapigtuq itelleghqaq Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem!
41010025	Piyaqniisaghqaaguq camel-em suflughutelleghqaa sikuum iiyngakun, aklungilnguum yugem itelleghqaaneng Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem.”
41010026	Maligsaaghtet wataqaaghaq saghiighayukat, enkaam ellmeggneng aapqughaaghutkat, “Kinangam yugulillengelleqa?”
41010027	Jesus-em qiivluki pikii, “Yuget piyaghqaqenghilkangit, Kiyaghneghem piyaghqaqii.”
41010028	Taagken Peter-em pikaa, “Esghaqaghqutqun, sangwaa qamaglluku unilluku maliglleghaatamken.”
41010029	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak uniskumiki mangteghani, anglegutni, naani, atani, avaqutani, nunani apalluqlunga whanga, Pinilghiitlu Ungipat,
41010030	allgeghutaaghaghyaghqaaguq whani kiyaghtaalleghmi. Mangteghaa, anglegutangi, naanga, avaqutii, nunanga, nulaghllagyaghqaagut; tamaakunun maligulluku amyuutkellengyaghqaaguq. Taagken taakwaningani kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengyaghqaaguq.
41010031	Iwernga uglalghiit angelleghpigaat ukaliighsaghqaagut taagani, enkaam uglalghiit ukalighpigaat angelleghpigaaghsaghqaagut.”
41010032	Jesus aga sivungitnilnguq igleghanguluki tumetgun Jerusalem-emun ayuqelghiitgun. Maligsaaghtengi saghiighayukat, yugetlu alingumaghmeng maligtekaat. Jesus-em qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni aafulluki ungipaallaataqii salleghqamineng.
41010033	Pikii, “Nagatek, Jerusalem-ennaqukut. Tawani Ighnegha Yugem tuunelleqaat chief priest-enunllu apeghtughikayugnunllu Liilightuusaneng. Nanqiglluku tuqusaghqaanilleqaat, enkaam tuunelleqaat Gentile-enun.
41010034	Taakut legasiighwaatkelleqaat, qesiqulleqaat, kagsagmiglleqaat, tuqulleqaatlu. Pingayut aghneghet atughluki unguvaghllequq.”
41010035	Taagken James-enkuk John-enkuk, Zebedee-m ighneghegkenka takuluku Jesus pikaak, “Apeghtughista, elpenun sameng pisqesugtukung.”
41010036	Jesus-em aaptekakek, “Sasqesugestek whangamnun?”
41010037	Kiimsiqaak, “Nighughqengngalghiimi Ataneghpagulleghpeni aqumegkuvek aqumelgusighyugamken, nalighpung aghenqigneghpenilluku, nalighpung saghumigneghpenilluku.”
41010038	Jesus-em pikakek, “Nallukaghtek sameng tungsilleghtek. Meghyaghqamneng qayuusimelngughmeng meghelleqestaak? Paaptaayelleghqamtun paaptaayelleqestaak?”
41010039	Kiimsiqaak, “Piyaghqaagukung.” Jesus-em pikakek, “Meghyaghqaqa qayuusimelnguq qaywa meghelleqaghtek, paaptaayellequteklu paaptaayelleghqamtun.
41010040	Iwernga whanga nakmiksaghqaqenghitanka kinkut aqumyaghqaatangi aghenqignemkunllu saghumignemkunllu, yataaghqutkat tamaakut aqumyaghqaagut.”
41010041	Taakut qula malighsaaghtet nagaqughlukek James-enkuk John-enkuk pillghak, ugumiyagutkagket.
41010042	Enkaam Jesus-em qerngughlluki pikii, “Liisimakasi Gentile-et igleghutistengita atanghutaqiit yuteng, aangwaaghughtekatlu yukeghqutaqiit.
41010043	Iwernga tawatesaghqaanghitusi elpesi. Nalighsi aangwaaghuyukumi qepghaghtenguli ilaminun,
41010044	nalighsillu aangelleghpigaayukumi qepghaghtelaaghughlli tamanganun.
41010045	Talwa Ighnegha Yugem tagikaanghituq qepghaatesqelluni, tagikaaguq qepghaatinalunillu tuunalukullu unguvalleni yugulinaluki yulghutet.”
41010046	Taagken Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit, yulghuteghllagetlu Jericho-mun kaalluteng, aghulaqegkat. Taawaanguq ayaakaq yuuk, aatgha Bartimaeus, ighnegha Timaeus-em aqumluni tumet saningitgun tungsighraghaqelghii.
41010047	Nagaqughyamigu Jesus Nazareth-eghmii, tughwaaghniluku akilghuukaq, “Jesus! Ighneghani David-em! Nangllegyagutaghtinga!”
41010048	Uglalghiim yugem aghyuuqaat nepiighesqelluku iwernga qevuutaghalluni akilghuukaq, “Ighneghani David-em, nangllegyagutaghtinga!”
41010049	Jesus-em aghuliighluni pikii, “Tagisqiteggu.” Enkaam tuqlughluku ayaakaq pikaat, “Seghleghhalek, tuqlughaaten nekevi!”
41010050	Qaasliik atkuyaaghegni mataghaghllukek nekefqaghlluni takukaa Jesus.
41010051	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Sasqelluten piiqsin?” Ayaakam kiimsiqaa, “Apeghtughista, esghaasagunneqigsugtunga.”
41010052	Jesus-em pikaa, “Igleghlleghhaaten, ugpeqilleghpek naallghutestaaten.” Tawaninginaq esghaasagutkaq taagken maligtekaa Jesus.
41011001	Tughaaghyalghiimeng Jerusalem-emun, kaatkat Bethphage-munllu Bethany-munllu, Mount Olives-mi. Taagken Jesus-em kayagtekakek maalghuk maligsaaghtegni nemun pisqellukek. Pikakek, “Kaataghesnaquftek esghaghlleqaghtek donkey-ghaq petugngalghii kitum alngunak igleghutkumangilkanga. Itemulluku taginnakesek.
41011003	Kitum alngunak aaptekangistek whaten, ‘Sanaqestegnegu?’ ungipaannakesek, ‘Atanghem atuqsugaa. Taaqaghesnaqumigu veghutesnaaghaa.’”
41011004	Enkaam nemun kaallutek tumenilluku esghaqaak donkey-ghaq petugngalghii mangtegham amigan tungangakun. Itemsimaluku
41011005	yuget nekevghataaghullghiit tawani aaptekagket, “Sangan itemutestegnegu donkey-ghaq?”
41011006	Kiimsiqiik Jesus-em apeghtullghatun enkaam yuget nepiighutkagket.
41011007	Jesus-mun kaatulluku donkey-ghaq, qaasliit atkuyaatek teghikusam qaayngakun lliyagneki, Jesus uuglluni igleghtekaq.
41011008	Tamaakut yulghutet igleghullghiit tumetgun saaghquqiit qaasliit atkuyaateng, ilangit avayameng ququngalegmeng ikutaqluteng tumet saaghqughvikegkiit.
41011009	Jesus-em sivunganilnguutlu kingunganilnguutlu akilghuutkat, “Usuqnaghhalek Kiyaghneq! Kiyaghneghem quyasligu tagilghii aatghakun Atanghem!
41011010	Kiyaghneghem quyasligu tagilghii ataneghpagullgha sivunemta David-em! Usuqnaghhalek Kiyaghneq qulighpigaghmelnguq qilagmi!”
41011011	Jesus kaalluni Jerusalem-emun, aglaqaq Temple-mun. Tawani sangwaa qamaglluku yuvghiiqaa. Whanikungulghii, kelqelluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni aglaqaq Bethany-mun.
41011012	Unaamingani, Bethany-meng uteghniitkelluku Jesus iyataqaq.
41011013	Uyavaneng esghaqaa figs-em uqfiga ququngaghtuqaq, enkaam esghaghyaghtuqaa figs-elgunayukan. Kaasaqminigu ququngaraaghinaaftuq, qayughllak salin figs-et piisugniilnguut.
41011014	Jesus-em uqfik pikaa, “Allamengllu kitum alngunak figs-etughviknaanghitaaten!” Maligsaaghtengita nagatkaat.
41011015	Kaasameng Jerusalem-emun, Jesus, Temple-mun pikaq. Tawani aanesquqii tukfightulghiitlu akilpegalghiitlu. Manimeng naveghqughtet tipelngit ulleghquqii, aqumutiitlu qawaagmeng akilpegaghtet.
41011016	Nangaqaghsaghqaananightestekiillu kinkut alngunak sameng tugumiilget Temple-em manughaakun.
41011017	Taagken apeghtuqii yuget, “Kiyaghneq pikaaguq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, ‘Mangteghaqa, yughaghviguyaghqaaguq tamaghhaanun yuganun nunam.’ Iwernga elpesi iighaghvigughtaghsi wayaghniightenun!”
41011018	Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng nagaqughluku tawaten pillgha, akuzimghhutkegkaat naten tuqutelleghqameng, naqam alikumaan. Alikegkaat, qayughllak qamaglluteng yulghuteghllaget saghiighayagutngukangit apeghiillghi.
41011019	Ighivgaghyagu Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit aghulaqegkat Jerusalem-emeng.
41011020	Unaanguluku igleghutkelluku esghaqaat figs-em uqfiga palighwaaghumalghii akughhaghminun kenlanga.
41011021	Peter-em esghaghluku neqaatkaa Jesus-em pillgha. Enkaam pikaa, “Apeghtughista, ii-i, figs-em uqfiga ineghtengngwaaqan palighwaaghumaaq.”
41011022	Jesus-em pikii, “Ugpeqiteggu Kiyaghneq.
41011023	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak malghuklillngunani ilumikun, ugpeqegkumikillu akuzitni piyaghqaatangi, una naayghaq whaten pikumigu, ‘Kelliinun aatghi,’ taawa apeghiighyaghqaaguq ellnganun.
41011024	Enkaam ungipaatamsi: sangwaa alngunak aklukegkaghsi yughaatkegkufsigu ugpeqluku allgeghsaghqaqutsi, taawa allgeghlleqaghsi.
41011025	Nekevneghpesini yughaghnalusi, seghevutaqiteki seghletun pistesi, enkaam Atagpesi qilagmelnguum seghevulleqii seghleghqellesi.”
41011026	Iwernga seghevutinghilkufsi, talwa Atagpesi qilagmelnguum seghevunnaanghitii seghleghqellesi.
41011027	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit kaanneqigtekat Jerusalem-emun. Jesus igleghsimaluku Temple-em manughaani, chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, Elder-etlu takuluku
41011028	aaptekaat, “Saam pilleghqaakun aanesqughsiki akilpegaghtet? Kitum qelellghakun tawaten pinguzin?”
41011029	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ungipaalleqamsi kitum qelelghakun tawaten pikaatka kiimsiqufsinga.
41011030	John-em paaptaayeghillgha Kiyaghneghmeng pingwaa, nalighmeng yugneng? Ungipaatengnga.”
41011031	Ellmeggneng akuzimghhutkat, “Kiyaghneghmeng piknikumteggu, pilleqiinkut, ‘Sangan'ngam ugpeqenghisteggu John?’
41011032	Yugneng piknikumteggu yuget anguyiilleqiinkut.” (Alingegkat yugneng, qayughllak yuget qamaglluteng ugpeqngukangat John uuknaliqistengutanga.)
41011033	Enkaam Jesus kiimsiqaat, “Nallukaghput.” Jesus-em pikii, “Whangallu ungipaannaanghitamsi kitum qelellghakun tawaten pikaatka.”
41012001	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatetgun aleghquqii. Pikii, “Taawanguq yuuk piitesiighaqaq grapes-meng, mingllusiqaallu uvitanga piitesighaghvini. Laagutkakek grapes-mun qageghquusik, nekeftekaallu kelengakivigkaq. Taagken piitesighaghvini navghitkaa grapes-meng piitesighaghtenun nengitesqelluni, enkaam ellnga natmun aghulaqegkaq.
41012002	Saghnayaghqaaghsata ataasiq qepghaghteni kevgaqegkaa nengini grapes-et aqfasqelluki.
41012003	Kaasan taakut aflengakistet akuqaghluku qevutiighluku avangunaan aglaghtestekaat.
41012004	Kevgaqlaataqaa ilanga qepghaghteni. Taana naasqwakun kiitiquluku, kayngusaghaatestekaat.
41012005	Kevgaqiilaataqaq ilanganeng qepghaghtemi enkaam taana tuqutkaat. Ilangillu qepghaghtelghuteni kevgaqenghaki legan tawaten piiqegkangit, ilangit qevutiiqiit, ilangit tuququqiit.
41012006	“Qenwat ataasighhaaghtuq kevgaqsaghqaa, ighnegha piniqumtaagha. Kevgaqegkaa sumeghtaghaamaghmi whaten, ‘Ighneqa siivakelleqaat.’
41012007	Iwernga taakut aflengakistet ilateng pikiit, ‘Uum piliisaghqaqaa una piitesiighaghvik. Tuqutelteggu enkaam piitesiighaghvik whangkuta piliilleqaghput!’
41012008	Enkaam akuqaghluku, tuqulluku yugusii egtekaat piitesiighaghvigmeng.”
41012009	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Salleqang'ngam piitesiighaghvilek? Tagiluni navghitivikegkaqsaqenni taakut tuququghluki, enkaam piitesiighaghvini allanun navghilleqaa.
41012010	Atightiigasteggu una Akuzitni Igaqegkani? ‘Uyghak mangteghangllaghtet ighsakegkaat piyalghiimi megnunalleghpigaaftuq uyghak.
41012011	Taana Atanghem apeghiiqaqaa, Allaaghlluwhaghyugnapigtuq!’”
41012012	Jews-et igleghutistengita tuguyupigtekaqsaqangat, qayughllak liigikelghiit ungipaghaatetgun Jesus-em ellngit akuzitkaqeftii. Iwernga alingegkat yulghutneng enkaam unilluku aghulaqegkat.
41012013	Taam kingunganeng Jews-et igleghutistengita kayagtekiit ilangi Pharisees-etlu maligsaaghtengillu Herod-em anagniilqavigiisqelluku Jesus. Kayagtekiit anagniilqavigiisqelluku akuzillghakun.
41012014	Kaalluku pikaat, “Apeghtughista, liisimakamken ataasiighmetuten. Waakigataten yuget sumeghtaghallghit, talwa waakigataten yuget sanguyaghngaata, iwernga ipapighqelluten apeghtuusaqaqan Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha yugnun. Ungipaataghtikut, Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaani elqughutngaa llivikilleghqaghput tax-eneng Caesar-mun? Llivikiltaa-a nalighmeng pinghitelta?”
41012015	Iwernga Jesus-em liisimakegkangi seghletun pingukangat enkaam pikii, “Sangama anagvigighnaqutkestengnga? Manilitaghtengnga, esghaqaghlakun.”
41012016	Tuunyatni aaptekii, “Kitum gginaqagullu aatqagullu una?” Kiimsiqaat, “Caesar-em.”
41012017	Jesus-em pikii, “Tuuniteki Caesar-mun tamaakut Caesar-em pingi. Tuuniteki Kiyaghneghmun tamaakut Kiyaghneghem pingi.” Enkaam saghiighayagutkaat Jesus.
41012018	Taagken ilangi Sadducees-et, Jesus-mun pikat. (Tamaakut piiqelghiit tuqukat unguvaghyaghqaanghinniluki.)
41012019	Pikaat, “Apeghtughista, Moses-em Liilightuusangllaqaqiinkut whaten, ‘Yuuk nuliilek avaqutigpenani tuqukan anglegutangan tuguyaghqaqaa aghnaq avaqutinnaluku anglegutni tuqukaq.’
41012020	Taawanguq maaghragvinlek yuget anglegutkullghiit. Nuyeklighpigaq nulightughluni avaqutigpenani tuqukaq.
41012021	Enkaam tuunglighhaan tugukaa aghnaq, iwernga ellngallu tuqukaq avaqutigpenani. Pingayiitangan tuguluku aghnaq, tuqukaq avaqutigpenani.
41012022	Qamaglluteng tugaaqluku aghnaq tuqulaghaatkat avaqutigpenateng. Kingulighpigaaluni aghnaq tuqukaq.
41012023	Qamaglluteng maaghraghvinlek anglegutkullghiit nulighqegkaqsaqangat. Aghneghmi tawani tuqukat unguvaghtuutellghitni, naliita aghnaq nulighqelleqagu?”
41012024	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Sumeghtaghallesi anaggutngaat qayughllak liigikigalkesi Akuzitet Igaqegkat, nallukegkesillu Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.
41012025	Tuqukat unguvaghtuuskumeng tuqulleghmeng, qilagmelngughestun yaqulgestun ayuqsaghqaagut, nengughutusaghqaanghitut.
41012026	Atightiigastegguu Kiyaghneghem apellgha tuqukat unguvalleghqiitneng tuqulleghmeng? Moses-em igaani apeghngaaq kumaghughngalghiimi uqfillegaghmi. Tawani Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Moses, ‘Whanga Kiyaghneqaanga Abraham-em, Kiyaghneqaanga Isaac-em, Kiyaghneqaanga Jacob-em.’
41012027	Taana whaten pisiiguq, Kiyaghneq, Kiyaghneqenghitaat tuqukat, Kiyaghneqaat unguvalghiit. Enkaam anaggutepigsimaasi!”
41012028	Apeghtughikayuk Liilightuusaneng tagiluni nagatkii aaghtiiraaghullghiit. Nagalluku Jesus-em kiimsighilaataqullgha Sadducees-enun, aaptekaa, “Natungaawa Liilightuusaq megnunalleghpigaq?”
41012029	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Megnunallegpigaq unanguuq: ‘Nagatek, Israel-eghmiini! Ataneq Kiyaghneghput taananginaghhaaguq Ataneq.
41012030	Ataneq Kiyaghneghen piniqsaghqaqan tamaghhaakun ilugpegun, tamaghhaakun unguvasighpegun, tamaghhaakun umyugaghpegun, qamagllukullu iknaqelleghpegun.’
41012031	Tuunglighha whatetuq: ‘Piniqsaghqaqaten yulguteten, piniqelleghpetun elpeneng katam.’ Alla Liilightuusiituq taakugetun megnunaghtutkalghiimeng.”
41012032	Apeghtughikayugem Liilightuusaneng Jesus pikaa, “Apeghtughista, elqughaghtan! Ipanguuq taana pillghen, Ataneq taananginaghhaaguq Kiyaghneq, alla avangituq kiyaghneghmeng iwerngaqun ellnga.
41012033	Enkaam yugem piniqsaghqaqaa Kiyaghneq tamaghhaakun ilumi, tamaghhaakun umyugagmi, tamaghhaakunllu iknaqelleghmi. Piniqsaghqaqiillu yulgutni katam ellmineng piniqelleghmitun. Taakuk Liilightuusak megnunaghataghaghtuk paneghlluku tunusaqegkaneng, nalighmeng aghqutkegkaneng.”
41012034	Jesus-em liigiksamigu yugem kiimsiitnga elqughutngalghii, pikaa, “Qantaghantuten Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem.” Taam kingunganeng kitum alngunak tetugyagutkaa aapqughaaneghmeng Jesus.
41012035	Temple-mi, Jesus-em apeghtughitkelluku aaptekii, “Sangan apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng piiqatgu Christ-a David-mun Ighneqniluku?
41012036	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham David whaten pistekaqaa, ‘Atanghem pii Atanqa: Aqumi whagun aghenqignemkun kenlanga anguyagten itegaghpek asinganun lliightellemnun.’
41012037	“David-em ellngan katam atiqaqaa, ‘Ataneghmeng’ enkaam naten Christ-a Ighneqagu David-em?” Yulghutet quyakusiqinaghluku nagatkaat Jesus.
41012038	Apeghtuutkelluki pikii, “Kelengalusi apeghtughikayugneng Liilightuusaneng. Aasuneghtuut atkuyaaghmeng akughtuqameng, igleghsuneghtuutlu akilpegaghvigni yugnun qungughfikesqelluteng.
41012039	Aqumyuneghtuut aangwaaghughtekat aqumutiitgun, synagogue-nillu neqenghaghqelghiinillu.
41012040	Esghaghlaataqwaaqiit ugingighat mangteghiighaqluki. Taagken pinighniluteng pisqelluteng taakluku yughaghaqut. Tamaaken apalluqluku aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagut!”
41012041	Temple-mi, Jesus-em aqumgatkelluku tungangakun manilghutam, esghapakii yulghutet kanaghtiighaatalghiit manimeggneng. Aklungilnguut yulghutet manilghutmeng kanaghquqat.
41012042	Taagken aklumalghii ugingighaq iteghluni kanaghtekakek maalghuk maningiighhaak, qerngaagmek penny-nguftuk.
41012043	Jesus-em maligsaaghteni tuqlughluki pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, uum aklumalghiim ugingigham tuunegkakek qaayghutinguuk aklungilnguut tuunegkiitneng.
41012044	Yuget kanaghtinguut aklungimeggneng, iwernga uum aghnam kanaghtaa qamaglluku maningiighhani, akluknguyaqanga ellminun kiyaghusighqaaluku.”
41013001	Jesus aanumaluku Temple-meng, ataasim maligsaaghtengan pikaa, “Apeghtughista, ii-i! Esghaqaghqiqun maakut pinighnaghllaget mangteghat uyghagrukutaaghllagneng ulimaaghet.”
41013002	Jesus-em pikaa, “Esghaghsikii mangteghaghllaget maakut? Talwa ataasiq uyghak nemininnaanghituq; qamaglluteng ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
41013003	Mount Olives-mi, Jesus ellnginaghhaghmi aqumgamaluku Temple-mun ayuqluni, Peter-enkut James-enkut John-enkut Andrew-nkut takukaat.
41013004	Aaptekaat, “Ungipaatikut, qakun tamaakut piyaghqaawat? Sangulleqa liisimakusighqaghput tamaakut apeghiilleghqiitnun?”
41013005	Jesus-em pikii, “Kelengatek, kitumun alngunak puughtestegpenasi.
41013006	Uglaapiglleghhii tagiyaghqaaguq atuqluku aatqa, whaten piiqluteng, ‘Ellnganguunga!’ Enkaam uglaapiglleghhii puughqughyaghqaqaat.
41013007	Nagaququfsiki pilluwat, akusqaghtaatkellghetlu pilluwat, alingegpenasi. Tamaana piyaghqaaguq, salin iquggnaqngunghituq.
41013008	Nunam ramkengi pilluwutullequt, nunamllu ataneghpagullghi sughugaallequt, nunatlu nani alngunak tuyepeghtaghaqluteng piyaghqaagut, neqangisagllagaqlunillu piyaghqaaguq. Qamaglluteng tamaakut aghnam ighniyukestallghatun ayuqut.
41013009	“Iwernga elpesi kelengalusi. Tugulusi agghistenun aglaalleqiisi. Synagogue-ni kagsagmiglleqiisi. Whanga apalluqlunga nekevellequsi sivungitni igleghutistetlu umiilgetlu ungipaghtengulusi Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
41013010	Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqsaghqaagut tamanganun ramkenun sivungani iqugtellghem.
41013011	Tugulusi aglaaskangisi nanqigtivigmun sumeghtaghaqestaghpenasi akuzitkaghqameng. Pilleghqaq kaataqegkan akuziiqnaaghtusi pisqelleghpesistun, qayughllak elpesingunaanghitut akuzilghiit, Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak elpesigun akuziiqnaaghtuk.
41013012	Yuget angleguteteng tuqutesleqiit, yuget avaqutateng tawateghpigaq pisleqiit. Taghnughhaatlu angayuqateng kipullginaaghluki tuqutesleqiit.
41013013	Whanga apalluqlunga qamaglluni yugem ugumiilleqiisi. Iwernga kina alngunak nuqenneghtuqaq kenlemun yugulillengyaghqaaguq.”
41013014	(Yeqay atightulghiim liigikligu una uuknaliqelleq!) “Esghaqufsigu agleghniighutista paaghqiitestilghii, nekaghqaqenghilkemini nekevelghii, tamaakut Judea-melnguut anagniighhaat naayghanun.
41013015	Yuuk mangtegham qaaynganilnguq qamavek kelqesaghqameng aqfatefqaami pilghaaq.
41013016	Yugem piitesighaghvigmelnguum qaasligni aqfafqaamikek pilghaaq.
41013017	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut tamaakut qumilgetlu mamaghtilghiitlu tamaani aghneghni!
41013018	Yughaghtek Kiyaghneghmun uksumi tawaten pifqaan pisqelluku!
41013019	Qayughllak tamaani aghneghni seghleliiq seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq seghleliighaqelleghneng ima Kiyaghneghem ulimayuwhaallghaneng nuna whavemun kenlanga. Allamengllu tawatelnguq seghleliiq pinaanghituq.
41013020	Atanghem takellimangisaqaki tamaakut aghneghet, kina alngunak unguvanayanghituq. Iwernga apalluqluki nakmikegkani aghneghet takellikaqii.
41013021	“Taagken kitum alngunak pikangisi, ‘Esghaghteggu, Christ-a whaa!’ nalighmeng ‘Esghaghteggu, tazigna esgha!’ ugpeqegpenaan.
41013022	Christ-asighwaaghetlu uuknaliqistesighwaaghetlu allgeghtuusaghqaagut. Allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataghyaghqaagutlu, saghiighanaghqeghllagaataghyaghqaagutlu puughqughnaluki yuget, talwa Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii puughsaqlegukumegteki pilleqiit.
41013023	Enkaam kelengalusi! Sameng tamaghhaaneng ungipaatekestaghamsi tamaakut pistegpenaki.
41013024	“‘Kingunganeng taam seghleliilleghllagem siqineq mamlegllequq, tanqiq nighugunnanighllequq,
41013025	ighaleqetaaghet ifkaquullequt qilagameng, aghtughyaghqaanghillghet qilagamelnguut igleghallghit alngunaghqeslequt.’
41013026	“Taagken yuget esghaghlleqaat Ighnegha Yugem tagilghii qilawaaghteggun aghtughyaghqaanghillelighllaglunillu nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
41013027	“Taagken yaqulget kayaglleqii qerngughtesqelluki nakmikegkani yuget nunataghhaaneng tamaghhaaneng.
41013028	“Liitfikiteggu figs-em uqfiga. Avayii uniilliighaghluteng ququngii piitekestaqata sungaghyuketun liisimakelleqaghsi kiigyaghtulleq.
41013029	Figs-em uqfiganeng liitelleghpesistun esghaqufsiki tamaakut qilagamelnguut apellemtun pilghiit, liisimakelleqaghsi Ighneghan Yugem kaasaghtungestallgha, aaqun amigmun lliighumaaq.
41013030	Ipa ungipaatamsi, maaten unguvalghiit tuqunaanghitut sivungani qamaglluteng tamaakut pilleghqiita.
41013031	Qilagallu nunallu aviighusaghqaaguk, iwernga whanga akuzitenka aviighusagqaanghitut.
41013032	“Iwernga kitum alngunak nallukaa nani aghneghmillu aflumillu tagiyaghqaatanga. Talwa yaqulget qilagmelnguut nallukaat, Ighneghemllu nallukaa, Atanginaghhaam liisimakaa.
41013033	Kelengatek, waaknanighpenasi qayughllak nallukaghsi qakun tagilleghqaa.
41013034	Yugtun ayuqsaghqaaguq natmun pilghiitun. Aghulaqellghilluni qepghaghteni aflengakistengllaghlleqii mangteghaminun, ungipaalleqiillu sayaghqiitneng. Amigniighteminunllu kelengakesqegkaa uteghnilleghqani.
41013035	Enkaam elpesi kelengatek, qayughllak nallukaghsi qakun mangteghalek uteghnighyaghqaatanga. Walluumllu tagiiqli ighivgaghmi, unugem qukaani, aghtaghaqestami, nalighmeng unaanguluku.
41013036	Enkaangam kelengatek luuraq kaatqaghtekumi qavaalusi angunayukangisi.
41013037	Aapqegka una elpesinun, tamaghhaghllaganun pingwaaqa: Kelengalusi!”
41014001	Neqenghaghqelleghqaa Passover-em, Neqenghaghqelleghqaallu Yeast-alillgilnguum Neqekrangllam kaasaghqak maalghuk aghneghek atughlukek. Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng paninang agghitngulghiit aksaqluku tuguluku Jesus tuqunnaluku.
41014002	Iwernga neqenghaghqemmi piyugumangilkangat luuraq yuget seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.
41014003	Bethany-minguq taawa yuuk atighaqegkangat, Simon, Leper-a. Simon-enkuni Jesus neghumaluku, aghnaq iitqaq tugumiiqlukek alabaster-ek aqimleghutak akitupiglleghhiik tepengllaasik, nard-epigmeng ulimaaghek. Sigiqlukek aqimleghutam paaskek kuuvegkakek Jesus-em naasqwakun.
41014004	Tawanlenguut ilangi ugumiyugluteng ilateng pikiit, “Sangan tepengllaasik sakusiiqakek?
41014005	Akiklukek allgeghutkennayaghtuk 300 siipngalghiimun denarii-mun enkaam akinga tunqughnayaghtuq aklumalghiinun!” Taagken aghyuuqaat aghnaq.
41014006	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Avelghaghteggu! Sangan seghlequughesteggu? Piniipigtuq whangamnun tawaten pillgha.
41014007	Aklumalghiit quunpeng tamaansaghqaagut, enkaam qakun alngunak kayusiitaqnaaghasi. Iwernga whanga quunpeng elpesininnaanghitunga.
41014008	Uum aghnam apeghiighaa piyaghqani; tepengllaghqekestaghaa yugusiqa llivelleghqamnun.
41014009	Ipa ungipaatamsi, nani alngunak nunataghhaani tamaghhaani Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqneghmegteki, aapghaqnaaghaat aghnam tawaten pillgha yugnun neqamikesqelluku.”
41014010	Taagken Judas Iscariot, ilangat qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet, chief priest-enun pikaq uveghpagusugniluku Jesus ellngitnun, tugusqelluku.
41014011	Tawaten piyisteng elngaatall efquqegkaat, akeqegkaatlu manililleqniluku. Enkaam Judas pilleghqangnaqutkegkaq uveghpagunnaluku.
41014012	Sivuliq aghnegha Yeast-alillghilnguum Neqekrangllam Neqenghaghqellgha kaatkaq. Tawani aghneghmi, Jews-et iiwleng tuqutaqegkangit penniighaghaat Passover-em Neqenghaghqellghanun. Maligsaaghtet aaptekaat Jesus, “Nani yataaghqullaken Passover-em Neqenghaghqelleghqaaneng?”
41014013	Taagken Jesus-em pikakek maalghuk maligsaaghtegni, “Jerusalem-emun aglaghtek, yugem meghtalghiim nallaghlleqiistek, maliggnakesek.
41014014	Mangteghamun iitqan taam mangtegham yuga pinakesek, ‘Apeghtughistem whaten pisqaaten, Nani maligsaaghtekullghiini neghnaqesteggu Passover-em Neqenghaghqellgha?’
41014015	Kelguvikelleqiistek qemtamelngughmeng neghllagmeng, sangwaa qamaglluni apeghiighwaaghluni ayuquq. Tawani yataaghqunnakefkut.”
41014016	Maligsaaghtek aghulaqlutek Jerusalem-emun, kaasalghiimek sangwaa qamaglluni Jesus-em apellghatun ayuqeftuq. Enkaam Passover-em neqekaghqaa yataaghqegkaak.
41014017	Ighivgaghyagu, Jesus-em kelqelluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni aglaqat tawavek mangteghamun.
41014018	Neghuutnguluteng tipelegni Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, nalighpesi neghelgusighilghiim whangamneng uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
41014019	Maligsaaghtet seghleghyugluteng kipullgusnaq aapqughaaqaat, “Whangangwaa?”
41014020	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Naliqaghsi elpesi qula maalghuk siipngalghiini, whangamnun maligulluni sagneghmun neptekanga neqekrangllaq.
41014021	Ighnegha Yugem tuquyaghqaaguq Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun. Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq taana yuuk uveghpagutilghii Ighneghaneng Yugem! Itagnaghnayaghtuq allgeghumangisaqumi!”
41014022	Neghuutnguluteng Jesus-em tugukaa neqekrangllaq. Iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, aavgughluku tunquqii maligsaaghteni. Pikii, “Tuguluku neghiteggu, una yugusiqaqa.”
41014023	Taagken tuguluku qayuusiq wine-meng imalek, iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, tuunegkaa ellngitnun, qamaglluteng meghvikaataqaat.
41014024	Jesus-em pikii, “Una aakwaqa, taaggun Kiyaghneghem akequsaa apeghiighyaghqaaguq. Tuqukuma aakwa kuuvellequq uglaapiglleghiinun yugnun.
41014025	Ipa ungipaatamsi, wine-meng alla meghnaanghitunga kenlanga aghneghmi tawani wine-eghraghaq meghegkumkun Ataneghpagullghani Kiyaghneghem.”
41014026	Taagken ilagaan atughluku, aanluteng Mount Olives-mun pikat.
41014027	Jesus-em pikii, “Uniqaghaalleqaghpesinga qayughllak Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Tuqulleqaqa penniighniighta enkaam penniighet mingiqellequt.’
41014028	Iwernga kingunganeng unguvaghtestekanganga Galilee-mun aglaqestaghllequnga sivugpesini.”
41014029	Peter-em pikaa, “Uniteqeghhnaanghitamken qaywa ilanka qamaglluteng qimaguuteghngaata!”
41014030	Jesus-em pikaa Peter, “Ipa ungipaatamken, unukun rooster-em qalghilleni alghightestegpenaan nallunqelleqaghpenga ketwhell pingayuneng.”
41014031	Iwernga Peter-em sagiqepiglluni pikaa, “Qaywa tuqulgusighyaghngaamken, nallunqennaanghitamken!” Ilangitallu qamaglluteng tawaten pikaat.
41014032	Kaalluteng tawavek atilqelghiimun Gethsemane-meng, Jesus-em pikii maligsaaghteni, “Aqumitek taaggun, yughaamalunga.”
41014033	Peter-enkut James-enkut John-enkut kelqegkii. Taagken Jesus alingruughllakestaqaqlu seghleliighllakestaqaqlu.
41014034	Enkaam pikii, “Unguvasigka qivghughllaguuq repall tuquyaghqaaghllunga. Tawanllusi kelengalgusightengnga.”
41014035	Tazingapighqaaghluni, nunamun sikmuulluni yughaqaq pilleghqalgukumi ikfiqusighqani atuqefqaan pinaluku.
41014036	Pikaq, “Abba, Ataay, sangwaa qamaglluku piyaghqaqan. Awiitigu una qayuusiq whangamneng, iwernga whanga piyukelqa avelghaghluku elpek piyukellghen pigu.”
41014037	Taagken takuyaqminiki pingayut maligsaaghteni, qavaaftut. Peter pikaa, “Simon, qavaaziin? Ataasighhaq aflu teghhumatkenneghmeng aghtughsiguu?”
41014038	Taagken pikii, “Kelengatek, yughaghtek, nanghiiqullengenghitesqellusi. Ipapestaaq taghneghak piyaghqaaghngaaghmek iwerngaqun yugusiq kayaatuq.”
41014039	Tazingavek aglanqiglluni yughaqaq taakut ataasit akuzitkelluki.
41014040	Takunqigsaqminiki maligsaaghteni, taawa qavaatnguftut, qayughllak qavam sakniqestekangi. Kukriqegkatlu sameng pilleghqameng.
41014041	Pingayiitkun takuluki pikii, “Taawa qavaawaqetsii, meghnaaliiqetsii? Tawaten'ngam! Taawa aflu kaatuq, Ighnegha Yugem uveghpagusaghqaaghtuq seghleghqestenun.
41014042	Nekevitek, igleghtelta. Esghaqaghtegguqun, uka uveghpaqutisteka!”
41014043	Jesus paninang akuzimaluku, Judas kaatkaq, qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet ilangat. Yulghutet maligtekaat, ilangi savigpalighluteng, ilangi anagutalighluteng. Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, siivanlleghetlu kayagtekiit maligtesqelluku Judas. (Taana Judas qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet ilakegkangat.)
41014044	Uveghpagutistem pikaqegkangi, “Yuuk naaghyaghqaqa tugunakesi, enkaam aghulaqunnakesi kelengakistelighluku.”
41014045	Judas-em kaatutkelluku nagneghvikluku Jesus pikaa, “Apeghtughista!” Taagken naaqaa.
41014046	Enkaam Jesus tuguluku nuqneqaat.
41014047	Iwernga ataasim tawanlenguum savigpani nusugluku high priest-em qepghaghtelaagha sigutngighaghtekaa.
41014048	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Tuguyaghtughestengngaa savigpagtuumaghpesi, anagutaghtuumaghpesi nikimqun wayaghniightestun ayuqlunga?
41014049	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan apeghtughiiqunga Temple-mi tugungigataghpesinga. Iwernga tawaten pilleghpesigun Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghit apeghiightestasi.”
41014050	Taagken qamaglluteng maligsaaghtet unilluku, qimaguutkat.
41014051	Nukalpigam maligtekaa Jesus qiipaghaghmeng saputaqiinaghluni. Tugukaqsaqangat
41014052	iwernga saputani unitqaghlluku qimakaq amsikaghmi.
41014053	Taagken Jesus aglaatkaat High Priest-em mangteghaanun. Chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng qamaglluteng tawantullghiit.
41014054	Uyavaqaanlluni Peter-em maligsaaqaa Jesus courtyard-nganun High priest-em mangteghaan. Tawani kelengakistet akulngitgun aqumluni ughugsiqaq kenghem manungani.
41014055	Chief priest-etlu qamagllutengllu agghistet tuqutesupigtekangat Jesus. Enkaam tagsiqlighaqluki yuget aapghesqegkaat Jesus sameng anaggusimatanga. Iwernga naalkusimangilnguut tuqutusighqameng,
41014056	qayughllak uglapiglleghhiit temngi iqlengiqutkegkaat Jesus, aapqiitlu allakullghiit.
41014057	Taagken ilangi yuget nekevluteng iqlengiqutkegkaat Jesus, pikat,
41014058	“Nagatkaqaghput whaten pilghii, ‘Una Temple-a yuget ulimaaghat naafqelleqaqa. Enkaam pingayut aghneghet atughluki allaneng nekeftillequnga yugem ulimaaqenghilkanganeng!’”
41014059	Talwa taakutlu apellghit allakutkat.
41014060	High Priest-a sivungitgun nekevluni aaptekaa Jesus, “Avutkillghitnun sameng piyaghqiisiin?”
41014061	Iwernga Jesus qaalkaamangilnguq, kiimsiimangilkanga. High priest-em aaplaataqaa, “Christ-anguziin, Ighnegha Manigughaqegkemta?”
41014062	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Taananguunga. Esghaghlleqaghsi Ighnegha Yugem aqumgalghii aghenqigneghakun Aghtughyaghqaanghillelgem. Esghaghlleqaghsillu tagilghii qilagem qilawaaghitgun!”
41014063	High Priest-em aatkani piigluki pikaq, “Liisimakestengisaghngaamta lliightukut!
41014064	Nagataghsi seghletun akuzilghii, Kiyaghneghunilghii. Naten elpesi agghitkesteggu?” Agghillghat ataasiightekaq, qamaglluteng tuqusaghqaanikaat.
41014065	Taagken ilangita qesiqukaat Jesus, gginaa saapluku tenglugpagaataqaat. Aaptekaat, “Uuknaliqistengukuvek, ungipaatikut kitum tenglugtaten?” Taagken kelengakistet tuguluku qasaghtaataqaat.
41014066	Peter paninang qakma manughamelluku, ataasiq aghnaghaq high priest-em qepghaghtenga tagikaq.
41014067	Esghaqaa Peter ughugsilghii. Liisuqsamigu pikaa, “Elpeklu Jesus-metkayuguuten Nazareth-eghmiimi.”
41014068	Iwernga mesighaqaq, “Nallukaqa sameng piiquten talwa liigikenghitaqa sameng piten.” Taagken Peter aglaghaquqlu amigmun aanaluni, rooster-a qalghiqaq.
41014069	Aghnaghaam qepghaghtem esghaghyamigu allameng tawanlenguut pikii, “Una yuuk taakut ilakaat!”
41014070	Iwernga Peter mesighaghlaataqaq. Mulunghituq nekevghallghiit pikaat Peter, “Mesighaghpagningituten, taakut ilakaaten qayughllak elpeklu Galilee-ghmiinguuten.”
41014071	Taagken Peter-em siingvallaghmeng pikii, “Iqlengiqngukuma Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlinga! Nallukaqa yuuk akuzitkegkesi!”
41014072	Legan nepiightuq rooster-em qalghilleni alghiqaa. Tawani Peter-em neqaatkaa Jesus-em whaten pillgha, “Rooster-em qalghilleni alghightestegpenaan nallunqelleqaghpenga ketwhell pingayuneng.” Taagken qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
41015001	Aghtaghaqiinaghyagu chief priest-etlu, siivanlleghetlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, qamagllutengllu agghistet qerngughutkat agghinnaluteng. Taagken Jesus asighqesluku aglaalluku Pilate-mun, tuunegkaat ellnganun.
41015002	Pilate-em aaptekaa, “Jews-et umiilkataan?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpek esgha umiilgunikevnga.”
41015003	Chief priest-et uglaapiglleghhiineng allaaghhiinaghneng anaggunikaat.
41015004	Pilate-em aaplaataqaa, “Kiimsiitkaghqiisiin? Naganneghisikii uglaapiglleghhiineng allaaghhiinaghneng anaggunnikangaten?”
41015005	Iwernga Jesus sameng pimangitkaq enkaam Pilate saghiighayukaq.
41015006	Tamaghhaani Passover-em Neqenghaghqellghani, Pilate-em aanestaqegkanga ataasiq anusimingllaghaq yuget nakmikegkaat.
41015007	Taawanguq Barabbas anusimingllaghvigmelnguq, maligulluni ilangitnun yugnun yugtaghaataqaq seghleliighqiighllagmi.
41015008	Yulghutet tagiluteng Pilate-mun aanestesqegkaat ataasiq anusimingllaghaq tawaten piiqellghatun.
41015009	Aaptekii, “Aanestesugestegguu Jews-et Umiilgat?”
41015010	Pilate-em liisimakngwaaqangi chief priest-et aqinakluku Jesus tagitngukangat ellnganun.
41015011	Chief priest-et aaghqutaqegkiit yulghutet Barabbas aanestesqelluku avelghaghluku Jesus.
41015012	Pilate-em yulghutet aaplaataqii, “Sanaqsikunmi umiilkenniiqegkesi Jews-enun?”
41015013	Akilghuukat, “Qaquuraghtestigu!”
41015014	Pilate-em aaptekii, “Sangan, sameng seghleghmeng pimaa?” Iwernga iglagtaaghalluteng akilghuukat, “Qaquuraghtestigu!”
41015015	Enkaam Pilate-em efqughsugluki yulghutet, aanestekaa Barabbas. Taagken Jesus kagsagmigtesluku tuunegkaa pilluwaghtenun qaquuriisqelluku.
41015016	Pilluwaghtet itghutkaat Jesus umiilgem mangteghaanun (atilqelghii Praetorium). Taagken pilluwaghtelghuteteng qerngughtekiit.
41015017	Jesus-mun aatestekagket esnegrukegtak atkuyaaghek. Sikughllugmeng qaghpangllaghluku aatestekaat naasqwakun.
41015018	Taagken legasiighwaatkegkaat, “Quulvaghamken elpek Umiilgat Jews-et!”
41015019	Unaghsiighwaghmeng naasqwakun anaguleghluku, qesiquluku, manungakun segesqughlluteng qungughfikegkaat.
41015020	Legasiighwaatkenneghmeng taaqsamegteggu esnegrukegtak atkuyaaghqek mataghllukek ellngan katam aatkii aatestekiit. Taagken aanutkaat qaquuraghnaluku.
41015021	Tumeni taakwani nallaqaat yuuk, aatqelghii Simon-meng, Cyrene-eghmii, atangak Alexander-enkuk Rufus-enkuk. Naken qantaghaneng taginguftuq Jerusalem-emun. Pilluwaghtet qelghutkaat Simon-mun uyamigesqelluku Jesus-em qaquuraa.
41015022	Jesus aglaatkaat Golgotha-mun. (Golgotha whaten pisiiguq, “Yugem Naasqwan Nenga.”)
41015023	Tawani tuunegkaat wine-meng myrrh-meng akumegkameng, iwernga Jesus-em ighsakegkaa.
41015024	Taagken pilluwaghtet qaquuraghyamegteggu ateghtiiraaghulluki aatkii tugulaqiit.
41015025	Qaquuraqaqegkangat unaanguluku 9-eklaagmi.
41015026	Qaquuraakun nekegtekaat avutkilleghteng igaqngalghii whaten, Umiilgat Jews-et.
41015027	Maalghuklu wayaghniightek qaquuraqagket, ataasiq Jesus-em aghenqigneghakun, aallgha saghumigneghakun.
41015028	Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pillghat apeghiightuq, “Ilalkiitkaqegkangat seghletun pistenun.”
41015029	Yuget naghughlleghhiit naasquteng ufsugusimiita legasiighwaatkegkaat Jesus, “Seghleghhalek, elpek! Temple-a naafqelluku nekefsaghqaqngukuvgu pingayut aghneghet atughluki,
41015030	sangan yuguliluten elpeneng qaquurameng ukignanighsin?”
