41015031	Chief priest-etlu apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng legasiighwaatkegkaat Jesus, ilateng pikiit, “Yuguliiqi ilangit naqam ellmineng katam yugulipagningituq!
41015032	Christ-a, Umiilga Israel-em, ukigli maaten qaquurameng, enkaam esghapagluku ugpeqelteggu.” Qaquuralgutegkenkallu seghlequuqaak.
41015033	Taagken qamaglluni nuna mamleghqwaakaq aghneghem qukaaneng kenlanga 3-klaagmun.
41015034	Tawani 3-klaagmi Jesus akilghuughllakaq, “Eloi, Eloi, lama Sabachthani?” whaten pisiq, “Kiyaghnemni, Kiyaghnemni, sangama unisinga?”
41015035	Ilangita yuget nekevghallghiit nagalluku pikat, “Nagataghtekqun, Elijah tuqlughaghaa!”
41015036	Yuuk ataasiq aqfaquqaq mesiqayugmeng. Taagken nepluku quwaalghiimun wine-mun unaghsiighwaghqun nekeglluku nengugutkaa Jesus-mun melugriisqelluku. Pikaq, “Wiintaku, esghapakaalteggu Elijah-m iiksaghtughaqsaaghaa qaquurameng!”
41015037	Taagken Jesus araghllagluni tuqukaq.
41015038	Temple-melnguq safkaaghun malghughqegkaq, piikaq pikegken kanavek.
41015039	Pilluwaghtet umiilwaaghita qaquuram manunganilnguum, esghapagyamigu Jesus tawaten tuqulghii, pikaq, “Ipapestaaq una yuuk Ighnequmaagu Kiyaghneghem!”
41015040	Aghnam ilangi uyavaneng esghapakat. Tawanteftut Mary, Magdala-ghmii, Salome-llu, Mary-llu naangak uyuqliim James-em, Joses-emllu.
41015041	Jesus, Galilee-melluku taakut aghnat maligsaaqaqegkangatlu kayusiitkaqegkangatlu. Ilangillu aghnalghutet tawanlenguut, maligulluteng ellnganun Jerusalem-etkat.
41015042	Taawanguq yuuk, aatqelghii Joseph-meng, Arimathea-ghmii, siivakumtaaq ilangat agghistet. Ellnganllu utaqangukanga piinlilleghqaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem. Whanikuyagu, Yataaghqellghem Aghneghani, sivungiighhaani Sabbath-em, tetugnanighluni Pilate-mun piluni tungsiqaa Jesus-em yugusii.
41015044	Pilate-em saghiighayagutkaa nagaqughluku Jesus tuqulghaghtuumaniluku. Enkaam pilluwaghtet umiilwaaghat tagsighluku aaptekaa, “Llaaghaan Jesus tuqulghaghtuumaa?”
41015045	Umiilwaaghmeng liigiksamigu Jesus-em tuqullgha, Joseph-mun tugusqegkaa yugusii.
41015046	Enkaam Joseph tukfighiyaghtuqaq qatelghiimeng qiipaghaghmeng lliiveghyaghqanun atuqaqegkemeggneng. Taagken iikluku yugusii qaquurameng, iimgutkaa qiipaghaghqun. Taawanguq uyghagrukutaaghllak sanimineng ilutmun laakaq lliivghuluni. Tawavek yugusiq kanaghtekaa. Taagken uyghagrugllak ullghitaghtaqaa lliivghem paaynganun.
41015047	Mary-m Magdala-ghmiim, Mary-mllu Joses-em naangan esghapakaak nagun Jesus llimatanga.
41016001	Sabbath-a alpagyan Mary, Magdala-ghmii, Mary-llu naanga James-em, Salome-llu, tepengllaasingegkat Jesus-em yugusii angighhnaluku.
41016002	Sivuliim aghneghani santillghem, unaangupiglluku siqineq piitekestaaluku lliveghtekat.
41016003	Tumemi taakwani aapqughwaaghutkat, “Kitumngam ullghitaghtaannaqinkut uyghagllagmeng lliivghem paaynganilngughmeng?”
41016004	Taagken sivugsalghiimeng uyghagllak awitngwaaghluni ayuqeftuq.
41016005	Lliveghmun iteghluteng esghaqaat nukalpigaq qatelghiimeng atkuyaalek aqumgalghii aghenqigneghani. Aghnat elngaatall saghiighayukat.
41016006	Nukalpigam pikii, “Saghiighayugpenasi, liisimakamsi ivaangwaaghsi Jesus, Nazareth-eghmii, qaquuraqaayalghii. Whaanneghituq, unguvaghtestekaaguq! Esghaqaghtegguqun, whagun llikaqsaghaat.
41016007	Ungipaasaghtughteki maligsaaghtengi, Peter-llu, aga Galilee-mun sivullgaaghumaaq pinaqnilleghmitun. Taagani esghaghlleqaghsi.”
41016008	Aanluteng anagniiqat lliveghmeng, qayughllak kukragyugumaghmeng alingruughulghiit, repall ungeleglluteng. Talwa kina alngunak sameng pimangilkangat, qayughllak alingruughulghiit.
41016009	Sivuliim aghneghani santillghem, unaangupiglluku Jesus unguvaqaalghii tuqulleghmeng. Aliighviksuwhaaqaa Mary, Magdala-ghmii. (Aghnameng taagken aanestekaqegkangi maaghraghvinlek tughneghaat.)
41016010	Ungipaasaghtuqii ellnganisalghiit qivghumaluki, qiyamaluki.
41016011	Iwernga ungipaasisteng Jesus unguvaamaniluku tuqulleghmeng, ellminunllu esghaamaniluku ugpequmangilkangat.
41016012	Taam kingunganeng Jesus-em allanguluni aliighvikegkakek maalghuk maligsaaghtegni, navek pimalukek.
41016013	Uteghnighlutek ungipitkaqsaqangik ilatek iwernga ugpequmangilkegket.
41016014	Taam kingunganeng Jesus-em aliighvikegkii qula ataasiq siipneqluku maligsaaghteni neghuusimaluki. Aghyuuqii ugpeqinghitellghitnengllu aygughikellghitnengllu esghaatkat ellmineng unguvaghtestelleghmi kingunganeng.
41016015	Pikii, “Aghulaqlusi nunataghhaanun tamaghhaanun ungipaqiteki Pinilghiit Ungipat tamaghhaanun yugnun.
41016016	Kina alngunak ugpeqilghiillu paaptaayelghiillu yugulillengyaghqaaguq. Iwernga kina alngunak ugpeqinghilnguq aghyuullengyaghqaaguq seghleghqelleghminun.
41016017	Ugpeqat allaaghlluwhaghtillequt liigikesqelluku aghtughyaghqaanghilleghteng Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga. Enkaam atemkun aanesqughlleqiit tughneghaat yugneng; akuzillequt allastun ulustun;
41016018	tugusaghngaaghmeng nemeghyameng, nalighmeng meghyaghngaaghmeng tuqunalghiimeng sanaanghitut; qinuyulghiit saafneghmegteki naallghutaqellequt.”
41016019	Atanghem Jesus-em maligsaaghteni aleghquneghmeng taaqsaki, Kiyaghneghem mayughtestekaa qilagmun, enkaam aqumegkaq Kiyaghneghem aghenqigneghakun.
41016020	Taagken maligsaaghtet aghulaqluteng tamanganun ungipaqikat Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Atanghem qepghalgusiqii, ipapighqestekaallu ungipaq allaaghlluwhaghtistelleghmikun. Amen.
42001001	Angellemni Theophilus, Uglalghiim yugem igaquqaqiit tawaten pillghet akulemnni. Igaquqiit taakunguut ataasit nagaquqaput esghapakaneng tawaten pillghistun ima piinlillghitneng. Ellngitallu qepghaatkaqaat Kiyaghneq ungipaqelleghmegteggun ungipaq Christ-ameng ayuqelghii.
42001003	Nagatkaqanka apellghit, atightughwaaqaqankallu igaqullghit piinlillghitneng. Enkaam igaqughyuganka elpenun tawatetngwaaghluki pillghistun.
42001004	Tawaten liisimakelleqaten ipangutangi tamaakut apeghtuutkat elpenun.
42001005	Herod umiilkengnguluku Judea-m, tamaanteftuq priest-a, aatgha Zechariah. Qepghalgutkegkangi priest-et atilqelghiit Abijah priest-et. Nulighhan aatgha Elizabeth-nguuq, Aaron-em kingunghan priest-em paniga.
42001006	Kiyaghneghmun elqughutngalutek kiyaghtaaghek. Qaatkepigtekangik Atanghem qelghusiillu Liilightuusiillu, avutnginnalutek.
42001007	Taawanginaq taghnughhiilnguuk, qayughllak Elizabeth qumingepagningilnguq, tawaveklu qamagllutek siivanlleghughtekak.
42001008	Ataasimi aghneghmi, Zechariah, qepghaamalghii Temple-mi, qayughllak Abijah priest-et qepghalleghqaat kaallghii.
42001009	Nangaghneghmeng pillghistun priest-et ateghtiiraalleghqun nakmikegkaat Zechariah. Enkaam iteghluni Atanghem Temple-nganun paneghreghaqaq incense-meng.
42001010	Tawani aflungani incense-meng paneghreghallghem, qakma yulghuteghllaget yughaatet.
42001011	Tawani Atanghem yaqulgan aliighvikegkaa nekevghaghmi aghenqigneghanilluni aghqefigan incense-em.
42001012	Zechariah upuqaq esghaghyamigu yaqulek, alingruughllakaqlu.
42001013	Iwernga yaqulgem pikaa, “Alingegpenang Zechariah, yughaghten nagaqullengumaat. Nuliighpek Elizabeth-em ighnengunnaqngwaaten, atighlleqan John-meng.
42001014	Enkaam quyaghllagllequten, uglamllu quyakelleqaat allgellgha,
42001015	qayughllak ellnga qepghaghtekeghllaglleqaa Atanghem. Meghyaghqaanghituq wine-meng, nalighmeng suumnalghiimeng aqimlemeng, imighngayaghqaaguqlu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng talwa allgellghilluni.
42001016	Israel-eghmiilghutetlu uteghtesqughlleqii Ataneghmun Kiyaghneghitnun.
42001017	Ellnga sivukluni qepghaghllequq, taagken Ataneq qepghaghllequq. Ellnga ataasigneng taghneghalgullequqlu aghtughyaghqaanghillelgullequqlu uuknaliqistetun Elijah-tun. Atanun sumeghtaghaatkesagutesleqii avaqutiit, qaatkusigalnguutlu nallghusaghnaqngwii peghqinelleghmun Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun. Enkaam yataaghqelleqii yuget Atanghem tagilleghqaanun.”
42001018	Zechariah-m pikaa yaqulek, “Naten liisimakelleqsikun apellghen? Nanevgaghllagumaanga, nulighqallu aghnalqwaalghii.”
42001019	Yaqulgem pikaa, “Gabriel-nguunga, nekevghalghii Kiyaghneghem nayuutngallghani. Elpenun kayagtaagunga, ungipaasaghtuugamken whaken pinilghiimeng ungipameng.
42001020	Nagataghten, taawa akuzinanighnaquten kenlanga aapqanka elpenun apeghiightuutellghitnun, qayughllak ugpeqenghilketen akuzitenka, apeghiighyaghqat pilleghqiit kaaskata.”
42001021	Yuget utaqiilghiit Zechariah-meng sumeghtaghaqat sangami muluughllagutanga Temple-mi.
42001022	Aanyalghiimi aleghqughpagningitkii, enkaam liigikegkaat esghawaaghumaniluku Temple-mi.
42001023	Enkaam qepghalleni apeghiighyamigu neminun aglaqaq.
42001024	Mulunghituq taakut aghneghet kingungitneng nulighha Elizabeth qumingegkaq, enkaam tallimat tanqit aananiqaq whaten pimaghmi,
42001025	“Qenwatlu Atanghem nangllegyagutaanga, iqitaa kayngusaghaatelqa taghnughhangenghitellemneng.”
42001026	Aghvinliitangani tanqim Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaa yaqulek Gabriel Nazareth-mun, Galilee-melngughmun.
42001027	Yugmun atuqesimangilngughmun aghnaghaghmun, aang'ghutngwaaqamun Joseph-mun, kingunghanun David-em. Yugmun atuqesimangilnguum aghnaghaam aatgha Mary-nguftuq.
42001028	Yaqulgem takuluku pikaa, “Nekeggmelleq elpenilli! Atanghem nakmikumaaten aghnat akulngitneng.”
42001029	Iwernga Mary-m seghleliighutkeghllakaa nagalluku tawaten pillgha, sumeghtaghaatkegkaallu sangami tawaten quyakutni.
42001030	Yaqulgem pikaa, “Alingegpenang Mary, qayughllak efqughnaghtuten Kiyaghneghmi.
42001031	Nagataghten, taawa qumingnaqnguuten, ighnengellequten enkaam atighlleqan Jesus-meng.
42001032	Aangellequq, atighyaghqaaguqlu Ighnegha Kiyaghneghllagem; enkaam Atanghem Kiyaghneghem umiilgughtesleqaa sivunghatun David-etun.
42001033	Igleghutillequq Jacob-em kingunghitneng Israel-eghmiineng quunperugllak; Ataneghpagullghallu kenlengituq.”
42001034	Mary-m pikaa yaqulek, “Naten una piyaghqaawa yugmun atuqesigalnguunga?”
42001035	Yaqulgem pikaa, “Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham takulleqaaten, enkaam Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghan taghneghangullghiistun alkwaaghlleqaaten. Taana apalluqluku taghnughhaq agleghnaghllequq aatqesaghqaqaallu Kiyaghneghem Ighnegha.
42001036	Nagataghten, ilakwaaghen Elizabeth, aghnalqwaaghllagluni qumingumaaq, ighnengnaqnguuq. Una whaa aghvinliitkaa tanqiq, piiqsaqangat avanginniluku,
42001037	qayughllak Kiyaghneghmi sangwaa qamaglluni piyaqniituq.”
42001038	Mary-m pikaa, “Taawa whanga, Atanghem qepghaghtekaanga; legan tawaten pinaqnilleghpetun apeghiighhaaq.” Taagken yaqulgem unitkaa.
42001039	Mulunghituq Mary, yataaghqelluni taayughqemmeng aglaqaq neghllagmun, akulngitnilngughnun qemilghutngan Judea-m.
42001040	Mary kaalluni Zechariah-nkunun iteghluni quyakegkaa Elizabeth.
42001041	Legan Elizabeth-em nagaqughaa Mary-m quyakillgha, taghnughhaq qumiga qapragaghtekaq, Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham imiqaa Elizabeth,
42001042	iglagtuluni pikaq, “Quyastekaaguten akulngitni aghnat, quyastekaaguqlu taghnughhaq ighniyaghqan!
42001043	Quulvallengepestaaghtunga qayughllak Ataneghma naangan laalighfikegkanganga!
42001044	Legan quyakillghen nagaqughaqa, taghnughhaq qama quyam qapragaghtuq.
42001045	Quyanaghhalek Atanghem akuzitanga ugpeqegken apeghiighlleqniluku elpenun!”
42001046	Mary pikaq, “Unguvasigma usuqaa Ataneq,
42001047	taghneghagkallu quyaghllaguuk Kiyaghneghmi, Yugulighistemni,
42001048	qayughllak ellngan esghaghlunga nakmikaanga, ukalighpigaq qepghaghteni. Whaken kenlekluku yugem kinguliighaam qamaglluni atighyaghqaqaanga quyastekaalunga,
42001049	qayughllak Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem Kiyaghneghem apeghiighuteghllagaanga. Aatgha agleghnaghtuq.
42001050	Nangllekaqaa yuuk qamagtengngwaaghluku ellmineng talluqilghii, kinguliighaghneng tuunglighhiitnun.
42001051	Iknaqepiglleghiikun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun kayaalqaqii qukaayuglleghhiit sumeghtaghalleghmegteggun.
42001052	Umiilegllaget ateghtaqii aqumutiitneng, enkaam quulvaghaqii ukalighpigaat.
42001053	Iyatalghiit neqnilghiimeng kepsughtaqii, enkaam aklungilnguut aghulaqestaqii avangunaki.
42001054	Kayusighaqii qepghaghteni Israel-eghmiit, qayughllak nangllegtalghii,
42001055	Abraham-emunllu kingunghanunllu quunperugllak akeqelleghmitun sivuneput.”
42001056	Mary-m nayuqegkaa Elizabeth pingayut tanqit, taagken neminun aglaqaq.
42001057	Elizabeth-em ighnilleghqaa kaalluni, ighnengegkaq.
42001058	Uvilighneghitallu nalleqliitallu nagaqughluku Atanghem nangllekeghllallgha Elizabeth, quyakusaghtuqaat.
42001059	Pingayuneng inglulek aghneq atughluku yuget tagilaghaatkat circumcise-enaluku taghnughhaq, atighnaqsaghaatlu Zechariah-meng, atangan aatghaneng.
42001060	Iwernga naangan pikii, “Nakaa, aatgha John-nguuq.”
42001061	Yuget pikaat, “Nalighhiiniit nalleqlitek taagken aatghitut.”
42001062	Taagken apaqumeng atanga aaptekaat kitumeng atighnaqutanga.
42001063	Zechariah igaghyaghqameng tungsighluni, igaqegkaa, “Aatgha John-nguuq.” Tawanlenguut qamaglluteng allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
42001064	Tawaninginaq Zechariah akuziyaqlegughtekaq, usuqegkaallu Kiyaghneq.
42001065	Qamaglluteng uvilighneghit tallughyukat. Judea-mi ungipaq mingitkaat yugnun tamaani kiyaghlleghhiinun akulngitni qemit.
42001066	Qamaglluteng nagaquutkat tawaten pilleghneng sumeghtaghaatkelluki pikat, “Taghnughhaq una sastengunaqngwaatuq anglikumi?” Qayughllak ipa nalluniitkaalghii Atanghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha ellnganilnguq.
42001067	John-em atanga Zechariah, Aleghnalghiim Taghnegham imighluku uuknaliqegkaq,
42001068	“Yeqay usuqelteggu Ataneq Kiyaghnegha Israel-em, qayughllak itemusaghtughii yuni.
42001069	Yataaghqutiinkut Yugulighisteghllagmeng, qepghaghtemi David-em kingunghaneng.
42001070	Tawaten neghighluku akeqikaaguq agleghnalghiitgun uuknaliqistemikun,
42001071	yuguliyaghqaaluta anguyamnneng, tamaghhiitnengllu ugumikistemnneng.
42001072	Nagneghutkaqaa nangllegtalleni sivunemnnun, apeghiighlleqnilukullu agleghnalghii akequsani.
42001073	Akequsangllaqaaguq sivunemnnun Abraham-emun.
42001074	Akeqiinkut yugulilleqniluta anguyamnneng, enkaam qepghaalleqaghput alingegpenaamta anguyamnneng,
42001075	tuun'ngwaaghluta ellnganun, qaatkullutallu piyukellghanun unguvalleghput qamagtiiluku.
42001076	Enkaam elpek taghnughamni, atighyaghqaaguten uuknaliqistenga Aangepiglleghhiim Kiyaghneghllagem. Kayaggnaqngwaaten sivutghulluku Ataneq yataaghqesqelluki yuget tugukliisqelluku tagikan.
42001077	Ungipaalleqaten Kiyaghneghem yugi yugulilleghmeng seghevutillghakun seghleghqellghitneng,
42001078	qayughllak Kiyaghneghput nangllegtaghllagtuq. Kayaglleqaa Yugughlighista, ellnga siqinghem piitekestallghatun ayuqsaghqaaguq
42001079	qilagmeng kukeggnaluki tamaakut kiyaghlleghhiit taghneghangutellghanilnguut tuqullghem, maghyaghqughnaluta tuumnganun nekeggmellghem.”
42001080	Taghnughhaq anglikaq, iknaqughtekaqlu taghneghamikun. Kilgaanitkaq kenlanga ungipaghyaghtulleghminun Israel-eghmiinun.
42002001	Kingunganeng John-em allgellghan, tamaani pilleghni Rome-em Umiilegpigaan Augustus-em, qelqaa yuuk qamagtengngwaaghluku, aatghit igaqestesaghtiisqelluki igalghutmikun. Tawaten pistekii kesnaluki yuget uglaghtalangit igleghutkaminilnguut nunani.
42002002	Taana sivulighpigaalghii yugmeng kestilleq, Quirinius governor-kengnguluku Syria-m.
42002003	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng yuget ellmeng katam allgeghvigmeggnun aglaghtuutkat ateteng igaqesqelluki.
42002004	Nazareth-meng, Galilee-melngughmeng, Joseph-llu aghulaqegkaq Bethlehem-emun, Judea-melngughmun, umiilgem David-em allgeghviganun. Tamaavek pikaalghii qayughllak kingunqegkanga David-em.
42002005	Joseph-em ateni igaqestesaghtuqaa, nuliighqani Mary kelqelluku, aqsaliighlluni ayuqelghii.
42002006	Tamaansimalukek ighniyaghqaaghtekaq.
42002007	Aantekaa ighneqsuwhaani, enkaam qiipaghaghqun yuungiilluku, aghsukaa neghqusitagnekun, qayughllak nekaghqiilnguuk aqelqalghutami.
42002008	Unugmi tawani, nunivagmi penniighniightet aflengakingulghiit penniighmeggneng.
42002009	Atanghem yaqulgan aliighvikegkii, nighughqellghanllu Atanghem kukegtekii, enkaam alingruughuteghllakat.
42002010	Yaqulgem pikii, “Alingegpenasi nagataghtek, pinilghiimeng ungipameng tagitaqamsi quyanapiglleghhiimeng yugnun tamaghhaanun.
42002011	Aghneghmi whani elpesinun allgeghaquq Yugulighista, neghllagani David-em, Christ-anguuq Ataneq.
42002012	Whaten liisimakelleqaghsi; esghaghlleqaghsi taghnughhaq qiipaghaghqun yuungiilluni, aghsugngaaq neghqusitagnekun.”
42002013	Nuuskagan ilatqaghtaatkat yaqulegmun qilagem pilluwaghtelghuteghllagi yaqulelghutet, usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq, pikat,
42002014	“Usuqnaghhalek Kiyaghneghmun, qilagem uusqalleghpigaanilngughmun, nekeggmellelgulitlu nunamelnguut efquqegkii!”
42002015	Yaqulget mayughtuusata qilagmun, penniighniightet ellmeggneng pikat, “Bethlehem-emun esghaghyaghtuulteggu taghnughhaq allgelghii, Atanghem liisimakestekanga whangkunnun.”
42002016	Enkaam aglaragkiighluteng esghaqiit Mary-nkut, Joseph-enkut, taghnughhaqlu aghsugngalghii neghqusitagni.
42002017	Penniighniightet esghaghyamegteggu taghnughhaq, tamanganun aapqaat tamaana yaqulgem apellgha ellmeggnun.
42002018	Penniighniightet ungipaqellghitneng nagaquullghiit qamaglluteng allaaghlluwhaghyukat.
42002019	Iwernga Mary-m qaalkaghpenani ilumikegkii tamaakut pillghet, awen sumeghtaghaatkaqegkangi.
42002020	Penniighniightet uteghniqat usuqumaan, quulvamaan Kiyaghneq, qayughllak nagaquqaatlu esghaqaatlu yaqulgem apellghatun ayuqegkaq.
42002021	Pingayuneng inglulek aghneq atughluku, taghnughhaq circumise-eyan atiqaat, Jesus-meng. Yaqulgem tuunegkaa ateq Mary-mun salin qumingellghilluku.
42002022	Moses-em Liilightuusaan qelellghatun pelungighsalleghqaak kaatkaq. Enkaam Jerusalem-emun aglaatkaak taghnughhaq Ataneghmun tuunaluku.
42002023	Liilightuusaani Atanghem igaqngaaq, “Tamaghhaghmi aghnam ighneqsuwhaagha aafsaghqaaguq Ataneghmun.”
42002024	Atanghem Liilightuusaan qelghutellghatun aghqutkesaghqaalghiik maalghuk dove-ek, nalighmeng maalghuk pigeon-aaghaak.
42002025	Jerusalem-emeteftuq yuuk, aatgha Simeon. Qaatkutngalghiillu maniguutkayuklu Kiyaghneghmun. Utaqiingulghii Kiyaghneghmun yugulisqelluki Israel-eghmiit. Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak ellnganilnguuk.
42002026	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham akeqegkaa tuqunaanghinniluku kenlanga esghalleghqaanun Messiah Atanghem akequsaqegkaa.
42002027	Taghnegham maghyaghqullghakun iteghyaghtuqaq Temple-mun. Liilightuusat pisqellghistun angayuqagkenka taghnughhaq Jesus itghutkaak Temple-mun.
42002028	Simeon-em tuguluku taghnughhaq iyamsiqayugvikegkaa Kiyaghneq, pikaq,
42002029	“Ataneq, yeqay maaten qepghaghten aghulaqestigu nekeggmelluku, qayughllak akeqelleghpetun, whanga katam iyegemneng esghaghaqa kayagtekan Yugulighistenguluku.
42002031	Yataaghqegkaqan yugnun tamaghhaanun esghiisqelluku.
42002032	Nighuguuq Gentile-enun liigikestilghii Kiyaghneghmeng, ellnga apalluqluku yugten Israel-eghmiit quulvallengeghllagllequt.”
42002033	Taagken taghnughhaam atanganllu naanganllu saghiighayagutkaak tawaten akuzitkesagu.
42002034	Simeon-em Kiyaghneghmun tungsiitkakek quyastesqellukek. Enkaam naanga Mary pikaa, “Nagataghtinga, una taghnughhaq Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa. Ilangi Israel-eghmiilghutet nanqiglleqii aghyuughyaghqaaluki, ilangi yuguliyaghqaaluki. Kiyaghneghem kayagtengngwaa ellminun ungipaghtenguluku, iwernga yulghutet ighsakelleqaat,
42002035	enkaam tawaten pilleghmegteggun liitesleqiit aksaqngalghiit sumeghtaghalleteng. Enkaam elpek Mary, qivghum kagimlleqaak unguvasigken, katam tawaten savigpagem kaapellghatun.”
42002036	Taawallunguq uuknaliqista aghnaq, aatgha Anna, Phanuel-em paniga, Asher-em ramkenganeng pi. Aghnalqwaaghuftuq, ugilgukaaftuq maaghragvinlek ayumiqulleq.
42002037	Taagken ugingiitelleghmineng 84-ngughtekangi ayumiqullghet. Awen tagiiqelghii Temple-mun, aghneghuyaghngaan, unuguyaghngaan Kiyaghneq manigughaqegkanga, fast-aaqlunillu yughaghaqlunillu.
42002038	Tawani ataasimi aflumi, Anna-m takuluki Kiyaghneq iyamsiqayugvikegkaa. Taghnughhaq akuzitkegkaa tamaghhiitnun utaqiilghiinun Messiah-meng, ellnganun itemutesqelluku Jerusalem.
42002039	Joseph-enkuk Mary-nkuk qamaglluki apeghiighyamegneki Atanghem Liilightuusiita pisqellghit, uteghniqak Nazareth-mun, Galilee-melngughmun.
42002040	Taghnughhaq anglikaq, iknaqughtekaqlu, imighngaghmi peghqinelleghmeng; Kiyaghneghem kayusiqaallu quyastekaallu.
42002041	Ayumiqulleq tamaghhaan angayuqakek Jerusalem-etaqelghiit, neqenghaghqellghanun Passover-em.
42002042	Jesus-em uksughtulanga qula maalghugughsan, piiqelleghmegetun neqenghaghqelleghmun pikak kelqelluku Jesus.
42002043	Neqenghaghqelleq apeghiighyan uteghniqak, iwernga mekelghiiq Jesus unegtekaq Jerusalem-emi. Angayuqagkenka nallukegkangak.
42002044	Sumeghmegni igleghalgutegmegninniluku aghnelqusiq igleghtekak. Taagken ivaqaak ilakwaaghmegnillu ilakumtaaghmegnillu.
42002045	Naalkenghisamegnegu Jerusalem-emun ivaghyaghtuqaak.
42002046	Pingayut aghneghet atughluki naalkegkaak uvitanganilluku Temple-em, aqumluni apeghtughistet akulngitni, nagataqeftiillu aapqughaaghaqeftiillu.
42002047	Qamaglluteng nagatullghiit ellnganeng saghiighayagutkaat liigikingallghanengllu kiimsightughillghanengllu.
42002048	Angayuqagkenka esghaghluku saghiighayagutkaak. Naangan pikaa, “Ighnemni, esghaqaghqung, sangan whaten aneghsikung? Atagpeklu whangallu elngaatall ivanghiighutamken, repall peng'giilluten.”
42002049	Kiimsiqakek, “Sangan ivaghestegnenga? Nallukestegneguu Atama mangteghaanisaghqapestaaghulghiinga?”
42002050	Iwernga liigikumangilkangak sameng tawaten pingutanga.
42002051	Taagken maligllukek uteghniqaq Nazareth-mun, qaatkutngakaalghiillu elkegkenun. Naangan tamaana qamaglluku umyugaghmikegkaa.
42002052	Jesus anglitkelluku peghqinghughtekaq, efqughnaghtengnginaqaq Kiyaghneghmillu yugnillu.
42003001	Akimigaaghtengngukanga ayumiqulleq igleghutillghan Tiberius Caesar-em, Pontius Pilate, governer-nguluku Judea-mun. Enkaam Herod, igleghutistengulghii Galilee-mun, anglegutangallu Philip, igleghutistengulghii Ituraea-nkugnun, Trachonitis-enkugnun. Lysanias-llu igleghutistengulghii Abilene-mun.
42003002	Annas-enkuk Caiaphus-enkuk high priest-ngulghiik. Tamaani pilleghmi, Kiyaghneghem aleghquqaa John kilgaanisimaluku. John ighneqegkanga Zechariah-m.
42003003	Taagken John igleghtekaq uvitangani Kiiwem Jordan-em, ungipaqikaq yugnun peglluki seghleghqellghit paaptaayesqelluki, enkaam seghevutellengelleqniluki seghleghqellghitneng.
42003004	Igaqngakaalghiit igatgun akuzitangi uuknalqistem Isaiah-m whaten, “Ma akilghuugaquq kilgaani whaten; ‘Yataaghqiteggu tuumkaghqaa Atanghem, taklaghteggu tuumkaghqaa.
42003005	Qamaglluni suqluneq imighllequq, qamagllutengllu naayghat, qemit asivaghllequt, enkaam agughpiiraaghet tumet taklaghrukguullequt, tuumllugmelnguutlu tuumkwhuughlleqii.
42003006	Qamaglluni yugem esghaghlleqaa Kiyaghneghem yugulighillgha yugneng!’”
42003007	Taagken yulghuteghllaget tagilaghaatkat ellnganun paaptaayesqelluteng. John-em pikii, “Elpesi nemeghyani! Kitum kelengasaaghtisi anagesqellusi Kiyaghneghem aghyuughilleghqaaneng kaannaqelghiimeng?
42003008	Kiyaghtaalleghpesi ipapighqelligu avuteghqumaasi seghleghqelleghpesineng. Sumeghtaghaghpenasi itagnaghnilusi Kiyaghneghmi qayughllak Abraham-em kingunqegkangisi. Ungipaatamsi, Kiyaghneghem uyghaget maakut taghnughhangllaghnayaghii Abraham-emun.
42003009	Talwa maaten qalqalima uqliilluni ayuquq kepnaluki uqfiget akwiitgun. Qamaglluni uqfik pinilghiimeng piitestinghilnguq kepluni kenghegnun miluusaghqaaguq.”
42003010	Yulghuteghllaget aaptekaat, “Sanaqestangam?”
42003011	Kiimsiqii, “Maalghugegneng qaaslilgukuvek, aleghqek tuunakegken avangilngughmun yugmun, enkaam neqelgukuvek tawatenllu pilghaaten.”
42003012	Ilangillu tax-meng qerngughtistet tagiluteng paaptaayestekat ellnganun. Aaptekaat, “Apeghtughista, whangkuta sanaqesta?”
42003013	Kiimsiqii, “Tuwaaqiteggu naamignganginaghhaq tax-elleq, wata tugutegpenasi.”
42003014	Pilluwaghtetlu aaptekaat, “Whangkutamii-i, sanaqesta?” Kiimsiqii, “Akeqsagtegpenaki yuget ellngitnun manilitesqellusi nalighmeng temngi avutkegpenaki. Itagnaqaqiteki akileghtuusaghpesi angtalangit.”
42003015	Yuget sighimaluteng lliiqat, qamagllutengllu sumeghtaghaatkegkaat John, Christ-angunayukan.
42003016	Enkaam John-em pikii, “Tagiyaghqaq taana aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq whangamneng, enkaam whanga pininghitngwaaghtunga itemsaghqaaluki singii. Paaptaayeghiiqunga meghqun, iwernga ellngan paaptaayelleqiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, keneghmengllu.
42003017	Tugumiilguuq pekutameng malliighnaluki wheat-et. Taagken wheat-et kagpaglleqii, iwernga mallat paneghlleqii qaamyaghqaanghilnguugnekun kenghegnekun.”
42003018	John-em ungipaasimanginaqii yuget naten allangughnaqesqelluki kiyaghtaallghit, ellngitnun ungipaqinguluni Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
42003019	Iwernga John-em aghyuughmikaqegkanga governor-a Herod, qayughllak tugukaqegkanga Herodias, anglegutmi Philip-em nulighha. Aghyuughmikaallu Herod seghletun pillghaneng apalluqluku.
42003020	Taagken Herod wata seghleghataghatun pikaq anusimingllaghtestekaa John.
42003021	Kingungitneng qamaglluteng yuget paaptaayestellghita, Jesus-llu paaptaayestekaq. Jesus yughaamaluku, qilak qelpeqaq,
42003022	taagken Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak dove-ngulutek ukikak ellnganun. Qilagmeng ma pikaq, “Ighneqamken, piniqepigkamken, efquqepigtamken.”
42003023	Jesus-em piinlighaqngamigu qepghaqani, entaqun 30-nguuq uksughtulanga. Yuget sumeghtaghaatkegkaat ighneqniluku Joseph-mun. Joseph, ighneqegkanga Heli-m.
42003024	Heli, ighneqegkanga Matthat-em. Matthat, ighneqegkanga Levi-m. Levi, ighneqegkanga Melchi-m. Melchi, ighneqegkanga Jannai-m. Jannai, ighneqegkanga Joseph-em.
42003025	Joseph, ighneqegkanga Mattathias-em. Mattathias, ighneqegkanga Amos-em. Amos, ighneqegkanga Nahum-em. Nahum, ighneqegkanga Esli-m. Esli, ighneqegkanga Naggai-m.
42003026	Naggai, ighneqegkanga Maath-em. Maath, ighneqegkanga Mattathias-em. Mattathias, ighneqegkanga Semein-em. Semein, ighneqegkanga Josech-em. Josech, ighneqegkanga Joda-m.
42003027	Joda, ighneqegkanga Joanan-em. Joanan, ighneqegkanga Rhesa-m. Rhesa, ighneqegkanga Zerubbabel-em. Zerubbabel, ighneqegkanga Shealtiel-em. Shealtiel, ighneqegkanga Neri-m.
42003028	Neri, ighneqegkanga Melchi-m. Melchi, ighneqegkanga Addi-m. Addi, ighneqegkanga Cosam-em. Cosam, ighneqegkanga Elmadam-em. Elmadam, ighneqegkanga Er-em.
42003029	Er, ighneqegkanga Joshua-m. Joshua, ighneqegkqanga Eliezer-em. Eliezer, ighneqegkanga Jorim-em. Jorim, ighneqegkanga Matthat-em. Matthat, ighneqegkanga Levi-m.
42003030	Levi, ighneqegkanga Simeon-em. Simeon, ighneqegkanga Judah-m. Judah, ighneqegkanga Joseph-em. Joseph, ighneqegkanga Jonam-em. Jonam, ighneqegkanga Eliakim-em.
42003031	Eliakim, ighneqegkanga Melea-m. Melea, ighneqegkanga Menna-m. Menna, ighneqegkanga Mattatha-m. Mattatha, ighneqegkanga, Nathan-em. Nathan, ighneqegkanga David-em.
42003032	David, ighneqegkanga Jesse-m. Jesse, ighneqegkanga Obed-em. Obed, ighneqegkanga Boaz-em. Boaz, ighneqegkanga Salmon-em. Salmon, ighneqegkanga Nashon-em.
42003033	Nashon, ighneqegkanga Amminadab-em. Amminadab, ighneqegkanga Admin-em. Admin, ighneqegkanga Arni-m. Arni, ighneqegkanga Hezron-em. Hezron, ighneqegkanga Perez-em. Perez, ighneqegkanga Judah-m.
42003034	Judah, ighneqegkanga Jacob-em. Jacob, ighneqegkanga Isaac-em. Isaac, ighneqegkanga Abraham-em. Abraham, ighneqegkanga Terah-m. Terah, ighneqegkanga Nahor-em.
42003035	Nahor, ighneqegkanga Serug-em. Serug, ighneqegkanga Reu-em. Reu, ighneqegkanga Peleg-em. Peleg, ighneqegkanga Eber-em. Eber, ighneqegkanga Shelah-m.
42003036	Shelah, ighneqegkanga Cainan-em. Cainan, ighneqegkanga Arphaxad-em. Arphaxad, ighneqegkanga Shem-em. Shem, ighneqegkanga Noah-m. Noah ighneqegkanga Lamech-em.
42003037	Lamech, ighneqegkanga Methuselah-m. Methuselah, ighneqegkanga Enoch-em. Enoch, ighneqegkanga Jared-em. Jared, ighneqegkanga Mahalaleel-em. Mahalaleel, ighneqegkanga Cainan-em.
42003038	Cainan, ighneqegkanga Enos-em. Enos, ighneqegkanga Seth-em. Seth, ighneqegkanga Adam-em. Enkaam Adam ighneqegkanga Kiyaghneghem.
42004001	Taagken Jesus, Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng esleqngalghii, uteghniqaq Kiiwegneng Jordan-egneng, enkaam Taghnegham aghulaqutkaa kilgaanun.
42004002	Tughneghaam seghleghqesnaqutkegkaa 40 aghneq. Tamaani aghneghni Jesus neghumangilnguq. Taakut aghneghet kingungitneng iyataghllakaq.
42004003	Tughneghaam pikaa, “Kiyaghneghem Ighneqngukangaten, una uyghak neqnghugtestigu.”
42004004	Jesus-em pikaa, “Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Yuuk kiyaghhnaanghituq neqnginaghhaghqun.’”
42004005	Taagken Tughneghaam mayuutkaa uusqapiglleghhiimun, natengiighhaq kelguvikegkaa nunam ataneghpagullghitneng.
42004006	Pikaa, “Elpenun tuunelleqanka qamaglluki tamaakut ataneghpagullghet, aghtughyaghqaanghillghetlu. Qamaglluteng whangamnun tagivaqaagut enkaam kitumun alngunak tuunyukegkamnun tuunelleqanka.
42004007	Manigughyaquvnga qamaglluki elpek pikaaghhnayaghaten.”
42004008	Jesus-em pikaa, “Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Manigughyaghqaqan Ataneq Kiyaghneghen, ellnginaaguqlu qepghaasaghqan.’”
42004009	Taagken Tughneghaam aglaatkaa Jerusalem-emun, nekevestekaa Temple-em uusqalghakun. Pikaa, “Kiyaghneghem Ighneqngukangaten, qetgeghi tesamavek,
42004010	qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Kiyaghneghemnguq yaqulegminun paqnasightesaghtughlleqaaten!’
42004011	Pikaagutlu, ‘Iiggmeggneng nuqneqelleqaaten, luuraq itegaghten uygaghquunnayukata.’”
42004012	Jesus-em pikaa, “Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, ‘Ataneq Kiyaghneghen nanghiiqugpenaan sasqelluku ellngan piyukelqenghilkanganeng.’”
42004013	Taagken Tughneghaam apeghiighyamiki seghleghqestinaqutkelleni Jesus-mun, unitkaa kenlanga alla pilleghqangelleghqaminun.
42004014	Taagken Jesus uteghniqaq Galilee-mun aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun. Tamaghhaani nunani yuget ungipaqegkaat.
42004015	Apeghtughiiqelghiillu synagogue-ngitni, qamagllutengllu yuget usuqegkaat.
42004016	Taagken Jesus anglivigminun Nazareth-mun pikaq. Sabbath-ngughsagu piiqelleghmitun synagogue-mun aglaqaq. Nekevegkaq atightughnaluni Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng.
42004017	Tuunegkaat uuknaliqistem Isaiah-m igaaneng. Qelpeghtekii whaten igaqngalghiimun,
42004018	“Atanghem Taghneghakek whangamnituk, qayughllak nakmikegkaqaanga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ungipaqisqellunga aklumalghiinun. Kayagtaanga anusimingllaghat itemutesqelluki, ayaakatlu esghaasagutesqelluki, amyuqetaatkesilghiitlu itemutesqelluki amyuqetaatkistengitneng.
42004019	Apeghyaghtiisqaallu ayumiqulleq kaanniluku Atanghem yugulighilleghqaallu quyastilleghqaallu yugneng.”
42004020	Atightuneghmeng apeghiighyamiki igat tuunegkii aflengakistemun taagken aqumegkaq. Synagogue-melnguut qamaglluteng esghapagtuutkaat sameng pilleghqaaneng.
42004021	Pikii, “Aghneghmi whani, nagasimaneghpesini ukut Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapqaat apeghiightuq.”
42004022	Akuzineghmeng taaqsan qamaglluteng nagallghiit efquqegkiit akuzillghi, saghiighayagutkiitlu akuzitangi nangllegtallelguniluki. Aapqughaaghutkat, “Una Joseph-em ighneqenghitaguu?”
42004023	Jesus-em pikii, “Nalluneqnangunaan whangamnun apeghlleqaghsi whaten pilleq, ‘Aghallegtaq, elpeneng naallghuten.’ Nagaquqaqaput Capernaum-emi pikaghten, maanillu anglivigpeni tamaakut piightiki, enkaam ugpeqelleqamken Messiah-nguniluten.”
42004024	Pikiillu, “Ipa piimsi, uuknaliqista tuguklightengituq ellmi katam anglivigmini.
42004025	Iwernga ipa ungipaatamsi, Israel-mi, Elijah kiyaghtengnguluku, ugingighhaghtuuq. Tamaani pilleghni eslallugughhneghitkaaguq pingayut ayumiqullghet, aghvinlek tanqit ilalluki, enkaam neqangisagllakaaguq tamaghhaani nunangani Israel-em.
42004026	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem Elijah-mun kayusighyaghtiisqellghitii nalighhiiniit ugingighat Israel-melnguut. Yeghlegi kayusiisaghtiisqegkaqaa Gentile-a ugingighaq, kiyaghlleghhii Zarephath-mi, Sidon-melngughmi.
42004027	Enkaamllu Israel-mi leper-ekaghtuuq, kiyaghtellghani uuknaliqistem Elisha-m. Nalighhiiniit ukmangillghitutlu naallghutellghitutlu, iwerngaqun Gentile-a Naaman, Syria-ghmii.”
42004028	Qamaglluteng synagogue-melnguut sakriteghllakat nagasamegteggu Jesus-em tawaten pillgha.
42004029	Taagken nekevuulluteng, ayagaghtaamaan neghllagmeng aanutkaat. Taana neghllagat qemikun nekeftekaalghii enkaam aghulaqutkaat qemim qagughruganun siingnaluku tesamavek.
42004030	Iwernga akulngitgun naghughqughluki aghulaqegkaq.
42004031	Taagken Jesus tesamavek Capernaun-emun pikaq, neghllagmun Galilee-melngughmun. Sabbath-mi apeghtughimaluku,
42004032	saghiighayagutkaat apeghtughillgha, qayughllak apeghtughikaq aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni Kiyaghneghmeng.
42004033	Synagogue-meteftuq yuuk ilumikun tughneghalek. Iglagtupiglluni akilghuumeng pikaq,
42004034	“Avelghaghqut! Jesus Nazareth-eghmii, sanaqsikut? Naafqesaghtuuzikuut? Liisimakamken kinanguten, Agleghnalghiikaaten Kiyaghneghem.”
42004035	Iwernga Jesus-em aghyuuqaa, “Qallegpenang ellnganeng aani!” Tughneghaam iqusluku manungitgun, aqnighqegpenaan aanegkaq.
42004036	Qamaglluteng yuget saghiighayugumaghmeng pikat, “Aghtughyaghqaanghitaghhalek akuzitangi! Pilleghqalighlunillu aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni qeleghyaqminiki tughneghaat legan aanleghaatut!”
42004037	Jesus-em tawaten pillgha ungipaqegkaat nani alngunak tamaani.
42004038	Jesus nekevluni, synagogue-meng aanluni, Simon-enkunun aglaghluni iitqaq. Simon-em sakinga aghnaq puqleghaghllak, enkaam naallghutaghtesqegkaat ellnganun.
42004039	Takuluku qavaghviganun nekevghaghmi qulangighluku puqleghanga eflequqaa enkaam puqleghangiitkaq. Tawaninginaq makelluni kepsiiqukii.
42004040	Siqineq teviimaluku, Jesus-mun yuget tagiquutkiit qinuyugngalghiit allaaghhiinaghneng aqnighneghneng. Qamaglluki saaftaqluki naallghuquqii.
42004041	Tughneghaatlu aanleghaatkat yugneng akilghuumaghmeng, “Elpek Kiyaghneghem Ighneqaaten!” Iwernga aghyuuqii, akuzisnaniqiillu qayughllak liisimakegkangat ellnga Christ-angulghii.
42004042	Aghsagu Jesus kilgaanun pikaq. Yuget ivaghyaghtughluku, naalkesamegteggu aghulaqesnaniqaat.
42004043	Iwernga pikii, “Ungipaqepestaaghyaghtughnaqngwaaqa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem ilangitnunllu neghllagnun, qayughllak taana apalluqluku kayagtekaagunga.”
42004044	Enkaam ungipaqimanginaqaq synagogue-ngitni Judea-m.
42005001	Ataasimi aghneghmi, Naayvam Gennesaret-em esnengani, Jesus nekevghanguluku yuget kanglluqaghtekaat nagannaluki Kiyaghneghem Akuzitangi.
42005002	Esghaqakek maalghuk angyak esnemi sayugngalghiik. Naqam yugit iqalleniightet aviiteftut, ughvughyaghtuumakangit negaghpateng.
42005003	Uuglluni Simon-em angyaanun, awavaghqaaghutesqegkaq esnemeng. Taagken aqumluni angyakun yuget apeghtuqii.
42005004	Apeghtughineghmeng taaqsami, Simon pikaa, “Uusqallghanun awavaghluten negaghpagten ateghtiki naaptesqelluki.”
42005005	Simon-em pikaa, “Yuguniiq, unulqusiq iqalliniightaayaghtukut sakengellghitukut! Iwernga kayagtekevnga negaghpaget ateghnaqanka.”
42005006	Legan ateghtiit naapqaghiighllakat repall piiguqestaghluteng lliiqat.
42005007	Angyam aallghanilnguut ilateng apaqiit kayusighyaghtiisqelluteng. Kaasisteng angyak imiqagket esleqaghaghllukek repall kalefqaghtekat.
42005008	Iwernga Simon Peter-em esghaghyamigu allaaghlluwhaghtilleq, Jesus-em sivungakun niinghulluni pikaa, “Ataneq, whangamnitegpenang qayughllak seghleghqestenguunga!”
42005009	Simon-enkut yukullghiit saghiighayukat naapqaghiilleghmeggneng,
42005010	qepghalgutkeklu James-enkuk John-enkuk, Zebedee-m ighneghqek. Jesus-em pikaa Simon, “Alingegpenang, whaken kenlekluku yugmeng naapsagunnaqnguuten.”
42005011	Angyak quutmun sayuglukek, unitkiit sangwaat qamaglluki enkaam maligtekaat Jesus.
42005012	Jesus ilangitnisimaluku neghllaget, yuuk tamaanteftuq elngaatall leper-eghllagngalghii. Esghaghyamigu Jesus, sivungakun niinghutkaq maniguutepiglluni pikaa, “Ataneq, piyukelqegkuvgu ukmangighnga.”
42005013	Jesus-em nengugluni saafsimaan pikaa, “Piyukelqaqa; ukmangiighten.” Tawaninginaq leprosy-ngiitkaq.
42005014	Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqaa, “Kina alngunak ungipaategpenaan, iwernga aglaa priest-mun yuvghiighesqelluten. Taagken aghqerraaghhaaten Moses-em qelghutellghatun ipapighqesqelluku ukmangiightellghen.”
42005015	Iwernga Jesus wataqaaghaq ungipaqegkaat tamaghhaani, enkaam yulghuteghllaget takulaghaasimanginaqaat nagannaluku, naallghutesqellutengllu aqnighneghmeggneng.
42005016	Iwernga kilgaanun awen aghulaqaqelghii yughaghnaluni.
42005017	Ataasimi aghneghmi, Jesus apeghtughimaluku, tawani aqumgatnguftut Pharisees-etlu apeghtughikaygetlu Liilightuusaneng. Taakut tagilaghaatkaaftut tamaghhiitneng Galilee-m nengitneng, Judea-m nengitneng, Jerusalem-emengllu. Atanghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha naallghutimun ellnganilguq.
42005018	Ilangita yuget tagitkaat ellnganun uniiqaq yuuk allighaakun. Mangteghamun itghutfigkameng ivaghikat, Jesus-em manungakun llinaluku.
42005019	Iwernga itghunneghmeng aghtuqaat qayughllak yuget kanglluutngaghllagulghiit, enkaam mangtegham qaaynganun mayuutkaat. Tawani tile-em ilangi iqiqughluki, reghighulluku ukigtekaat allighaakun akulngitnun yuget manunganilnguut Jesus-em.
42005020	Liisimakegkangi ugpeqillelgulghiit enkaam yuuk pikaa, “Seghevutanka seghleghqelleghten.”
42005021	Apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-etlu umyugamegteggun aapqughaaghutkat, “Kingangaawa una yuuk Kiyaghneghukallghuughunilghii? Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq seghevutiyaghqaq seghleghqelleghneng.”
42005022	Jesus-em liisimakegkangi sumeghtaghallghit enkaam aaptekii, “Sangan tawaten sumeghtaghaghetsi?
42005023	Nalikek whaten pillghek piyaqniitak, ‘Seghleghqelleghten seghevutut’, nalighmeng, ‘Makelluten piyugi’?
42005024	Iwernga elpesinun liisimakesugaqa Ighnegha Yugem aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq nunami seghevutiyaghqaaluni seghleghqelleghneng.” Taagken pikaa uniiqaayalghii yuuk, “Ungipaatamken, maketen, tuguluku allighan, elpesinun aglaa!”
42005025	Yulghutet esghaamanghitni tawaninginaq yuuk makelluni, allighani tuguluku ellmeggnun aglaqaq, usuqumaan Kiyaghneq.
42005026	Qamaglluteng yulghutet saghiighayugllakat, usuqegkaatlu Kiyaghneq, pikat, “Aghneghmi whani elngaatall esghapagtukut allaaghlluwhaghmeng!”
42005027	Tawaten pillghet kingungitneng, Jesus navek piluni esghaqaa tax-meng qerngughtista, aatgha Levi. Aqumgaftuq tax-meng qerngughtivigmini, pikaa, “Maligtinga.”
42005028	Nekevluni sangwaa qamaglluku unilluku maligtekaa.
42005029	Taagken mulunghituq Levi-m ellmeggni neqenghaghquteghllakaa Jesus. Tawanteftut tax-meng qerngughtistelghutetlu ilangitlu yuget, aqumelgusiqiit tipelegni.
42005030	Pharisees-etlu apeghtughistengitlu Liilightuusat qikeghqukat maligsaaghtenganun, “Sangan neghelgusighaqestekillu meghelgusighaqestekillu tax-meng qerngughtistetlu seghleghqestetlu?”
42005031	Jesus-em pikii, “Yugunqegtat aghallegtaghsughniitut iwerngaqun tamaakut qinuyulghiit.
42005032	Tagingunghitunga tagsiqlighnaluki elqughutngalghiit yuget. Iwernga taginguunga seghleghqestet avuteghqelluki seghleghqennaniisqelluki.”
42005033	Ilangita yuget Jesus pikaat, “John-em maligsaaghtengi awen fast-aaqutlu yughaghaqutlu. Pharisees-etlu maligsaaghtengit tawaten piiqut. Iwernga elpek maligsaaghteten neghaqutlu meghaqutlu.”
42005034	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Nengughhnaqelghiik aqelqiik fast-elleqaat nulightughnaqelghii ellngitnilluku?
42005035	Iwernga pilleghqaq kaallequq nulightughnaqelghii ellngitneng iqilleqaat, elngaatall tawani fast-ellequt.”
42005036	Enkaamllu Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii, “Kitum alngunak ikuviknaanghitaak qaaslighraghaak, ilaaghnalukek qaaslilugek. Tawaten pikumikek piiglleqaak qaaslighraghaak enkaam nutaghaq ilaaghutkaa allangumighullequq.
42005037	Nalighmeng kitum alngunak awataghpaluget imighnaanghitii wine-eghraghaghmeng. Imiqumiki awataghpaluget quupaghllequt enkaam wine-eghraghaq sakusiiqellequq. Awataghpalugetlu atuuyaghqaananighllequt.
42005038	Itupill wine-eghraghaq kuuvyaghqaaguq awataghpagraghaghmun!
42005039	Kina alngunak wine-elugmeng meghluni, meghyugnaanghituq wine-eghraghaghmeng qayughllak whaten piyaghqaaguq, ‘Wine-eluk neqnighataghaghtuq wine-eghraghaghmeng.’”
42006001	Sabbath-em aghneghani, Jesus igleghtekaq wheat-et piitfigitgun. Maligsaaghtengi ikutaqluteng wheat-em piitutanganeng, iiggmeggneng mingwaagaqluki qantiit ikughnaluki neghegkiit piitutet.
42006002	Ilangita Pharisees-et pikiit, “Tawaten piyaghqaanghitusi. Liilightuusamnni iinghutngaaq Sabbath-mi saghnalleghqaq.”
42006003	Jesus-em pikii, “Atightiigastegguu David-em pillgha iyataghaqngami, taakutlu ellnganilnguut?
42006004	Iteghluni Tabernacle-mun tuguluku neqekrangllaq tuunegkaq Kiyaghneghmun, ikulluni neghegkaaguq, neghestekaqiillu yuni. Liilightuusamta pillghani kitum alngunak neghyaghaqenghitaa neqekrangllaq iwerngaqun priest-et.”
42006005	Taagken pikii, “Ighnegha Yugem Atanqaa Sabbath-em.”
42006006	Ilangani Sabbath-em, Jesus iteghluni synagogue-mun apeghtughikaq. Tawanteftuq yuuk aghenqigneghet iiggi uniiqaat.
42006007	Ilangita apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-etlu riirngingwaaqaat Jesus naallghutinayukan Sabbath-mi anagguniluku piyaghqaaluku.
42006008	Iwernga liisimakutmineng sumeghtaghallghit, yuuk iiggelek uniighngalghiimeng pikaa, “Tagi whavek nekevyaghtaa.” Nekevluni tazingavek aglaqaq.
42006009	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Aaptaghllamsi, Liilightuusamta sasqinkut Sabbath-mi? Pinitun pisqinkuut nalighmeng seghletun? Yugulighisqinkuut unguvalleghmeng nalighmeng tuqutisqinkut?”
42006010	Qamaglluki esghaghteghluki, yuuk pikaa, “Iiggeten nengugutiki.” Iiggeni nengugutii, aga naallghutkat.
42006011	Enkaam ugumiyaguteghllagluku Jesus agghitkegkaat sanaluku.
42006012	Tawani pilleghmi Jesus naayghamun mayuqaq yughaghnaluni. Unulqusiq yughaqaq Kiyaghneghmun.
42006013	Aghsagu tuqlughluki maligsaaghteni, taakuneng nakmiiqaq qula maalghuk siipneqluku enkaam atiqii apostle-et.
42006014	Aatghit; Simon-enkunguut, (Jesus-em ateghiqaa Peter-meng), Andrew-nkut anglegutanga, James-enkut, John-enkut, Philip-enkut, Bartholomew-nkut,
42006015	Matthew-nkut, Thomas-enkut, James-enkut ighnegha Alphaeus-em, Simon-enkut atelek Zealot-meng,
42006016	Judas-enkut, ighnegha James-em, Judas Iscariot-lu, uveghpagutistengughtekaq.
42006017	Jesus-enkut apostle-kullghiit ukigluteng naayghameng, lliivneqegtellghakun nunam nekevghalgusiqii maligsaaghtelghuteghllani. Yulghuteghllaget tagilaghaatkat tamaaghhaaneng Judea-m, Jerusalem-emengllu, esnegkenengllu Tyre-nkuk Sidon-enkuk. Nagasaghtuutkaat, naallghutesqellutengllu aqnighneghmeggneng pikat.
42006018	Naallghuquqiillu tamaakut tughneghaat seghleliighqestekiit.
42006019	Qamaglluteng yulghuteghllaget saafnaqutkegkaat Jesus, qayughllak ellnganeng aghtughyaghqaanghilleq aan'ngulghii enkaam qamaglluteng naallghuquutkat.
42006020	Taagken Jesus-em esghaghteghluki maligsaaghteni pikii, “Elpesi aklumalghiini quyaslelguusi, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem elpesi pikaghsi!
42006021	Elpesi iyatalghiini quyaslelguusi, qayughllak kepsughyaghqaagusi. Elpesi qiyalghiini quyaslelguusi, qayughllak nenglaghyaghqaagusi!
42006022	Quyaslelguusi yuget ugumikenghisi, ighsakenghisi, seghlequunghisi, seghleghunikangisillu. Tawaten piiqiisi qayughllak maligsaaghtekegkangisi Ighneghan Yugem!
42006023	“Tawaten pikangisi elngaatall quyalghaasi, qetgeghaqlusi quyam angtalanganeng, qayughllak qilagmi akileghtuusalegllaguusi. Amenqun sivunghani, sivunghita amyuqetaatkegkaqegkangit uuknaliqistet.
42006024	Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi aklungilngughni, qayughllak whani unguvalleghmi kiyaghllaataqulleghsi taananginaaguq pikaghqaghsi!
42006025	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi kepsughngalghiini maaten, qayughllak iyatiqellequsi! Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi nenglalghiini maaten, qayughllak qiyaaghwaghllagllequsi!
42006026	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi qamaglluteng yuget itagnatun akuzitkegkangisi, qayughllak sivunghita tawateghpigaq akuzitkegkaqiit uuknaliqistesighwaaghet.”
42006027	“Iwernga whanga piimsi nagallghiini: Piniqluki anguyasi, pinitun piiqiteki ugumikistesi.
42006028	Quyastesqaqiteki Kiyaghneghmun tamaakut uyvalaghistesi, yughaatkaqlukillu amyuqetaatkistesi.
42006029	Kitum alngunak ullungagpegun qasaghtekangaten, inglungallu qasaghtesnaken. Kitum alngunak qaasligken tugukakek, ggategkenllu ellnganun pisqennakegken.
42006030	Qamaglluki tungsighniilghiit tuunaqiteki. Kitum tuguvikumakangisi saghyagpesineng, veghtegpenaki.
42006031	Yulgutesi piiqiteki tawaten pisqesulleghpesistun elpesinun.
42006032	“Piniqistenginasi piniqnaqngukufsiki, sighimagpenasi quyastelleghmeng allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng.
42006033	Pinitun pistenginasi pinitun pinaqngukufsiki, sighimagpenasi quyastelleghmeng allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng. Talwa seghleghqestet tawaten piiqut.
42006034	Navghitkufsiki tamaakut sumeghpesini veghutiyaghqat, sighimagpenasi quyastelleghmeng allgeghutelleghqaghpesineng. Talwa seghleghqestet navghitiiqut seghleghqestenun, tamaakut navghaqat veghutaqiit navghateng almesiqluki angtalngit.
42006035	Iwernga piniqluki anguyasi, pinitun piiqitek, navghitiiqiteklu, sighimakegpenaki veghutelleghqiit. Akileghtuusaghqalegllaguusi, avaqutiistunllu Kiyaghneghllagem pillequsi, qayughllak nangllegtaghtuq iyamsiqayugigalngughnunllu, seghletunllu pistenun.
42006036	Nangllegtaghtek katam tawaten Atagpesi nangllegtallghatun.
42006037	“Nanqigtegpenaki yulgutesi, enkaam Kiyaghneghem nanqiggneghilleqiisi. Anaggunnigpenaki kinkut enkaam Kiyaghneghem anaggunninghillisi. Seghevutiiqitek enkaam Kiyaghneghem seghevulleqiisi.
42006038	Tuuniiqitek yulgutegpesinun enkaam Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqiisi. Tuunegkani elpesinun kenegtaqluki, ufsugutaqluki, nekegsaghwaaghlleqii, wata ilaaghataghaghlleqii tevughasluki kenisi. Tawaten tuunilleghpesistun Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqiisi.”
42006039	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii; “Ayaakam yugem maghyaghqughlleqaguu ayaakaq yuuk? Maghyaghququmigu laagwaaghmun kalefkagtaallequk.
42006040	Igaghyaghta aangataghanghituq apeghtughistemineng. Iwernga igaghyaghta peghqightengngwaaqumi, apeghtughistemitun lliighllequq.
42006041	“Sangan esghaghsigu yulgutegpek iisqughutesqughhaa, esghaghpenaan elpek katam iisqughuten unaghsighllak?
42006042	Sangan yulguten pizigu, ‘Iisqughutngiqaghlaken’ elpek paninang iisqughutelighluten unaghsighllagmeng? Uyuq piniiyugneq! Sivukluku unaghsighllak iyegpengneng nusugluku, elngaatall whateghllugwaaq esghaghluku yulgutegpek iiynga iisqughutngighnaken.
42006043	“Uqfik pinilghii piitestingigatuq seghleghmeng. Uqfik seghleq piitestingigatuq pinilghiimeng.
42006044	Uqfik natelnguutanga liigiksaghqaaguq piitestekaakun. Sikughlluget piitestingigatut figs-meng, nalighmeng neghyaghqaanghilnguut nunivagseghat piitestingigatut grapes-meng.
42006045	Pinilghii yuuk atuqiiquq pinilghiimeng ilumikegkamineng, iwernga seghleq yuuk atuqiiquq seghleghmeng ilumikegkamineng. Yuuk akuzikayuguuq ilumikegkamineng.
42006046	“Sangan tuqlughestengnga, ‘Ataneq, Ataneq?’ naqam pisqellghenka atuqegpenaki?
42006047	Kina alngunak tagiluni whangamnun, nagalluki akuzitenka qaatkegkaki, ungipaalleqamsi natetulanganeng.
42006048	Yugtun mangteghangllalghiitun ayuquq. Nuna samaverugllak laagluku uyghagmun, tunemighluku taaggun nekefleqaa mangteghaq. Kiiwek uleveghllaglutek tawalliima mangteghaq qapragtellghilkanga qayughllak uyghagmeng tunemighluni nekeftekaalghii.
42006049	Iwernga kitum alngunak nagalluki akuzitenka, qaatkenghilkumiki yugtun ayuquq tunemangunaan mangteghangllalghiitun. Kiiwek uleveghllaglutek aga mangteghaq naafqeghllakaa.”
42007001	Jesus-em aleghquneghmeng apeghiighyamiki yuget aglaqaq Capernaum-emun.
42007002	Taawanguq centurion-a qepghaghtelaalek, megnukumtaagha, enraqlu qinuyugllakaq repall tuquyaghtungestaghluni.
42007003	Centurion-em nagaqughluku Jesus, kevgaqegkii Jews-et siivanlleghit naallghusaghtuqiisqelluku qepghaghtelaani.
42007004	Jesus-mun kaasameng nangllegsipiglluteng pikaat, “Centurion-em kayutkesupigtaaten. Yuuk taana kevgaqiilghii pinighllagtuq kayusighyaghqapiguuq,
42007005	qayughllak piniqepigtii yuput, synagogue-engllaqaqiinkutlu.”
42007006	Enkaam Jesus-em maligtekii. Kaasaghtughaqutlu mangteghamun centurion-em ilakumtaaghminun ungipaasaghtiisqegkaa whaten, “Ataneq, nagneghnaqegpenang qayughllak itagnanghitunga elpenun iteghviksaghqaalunga mangteghamnun.
42007007	Tamaaken apalluqluku whangamneng takupagningitamken. Legan tawanlluten naallghutesqigu qepghaghteka enkaam naallghulli.
42007008	Whangallu umiilelguunga qelghikayugmeng enkaam asinganitunga umiilegma. Pilluwaghtenka asimnitut, ataasiq qelqumkun, ‘Aghulaqi’ aga aghulaqellequq. Ilanga pikumkun, ‘Tagi’ tagillequq. Qepghaghteka qelqumkun, ‘Una piightigu’, aga pilleqaa.”
42007009	Jesus-em nagalluku tawaten pillgha, allaaghlluwaghyagutkaa enkaam yulghuteghllaget maligtilghiit ellmineng pikii, “Ungipaatamsi, nallaataghsigatunga kitumeng alngunak talwa Israel-mi, uutun yugtun ugpeqilleghtutkalghiimeng.”
42007010	Kevgat uteghnighluteng centurion-emem mangteghaanun esghaqaat qepghaghtelaagha naallghutngwaaghluni.
42007011	Unaamingani Jesus aglaqaq neghllagmun atilqelghii Nain, maligsaaghtengitallu yulghuteghllagetlu maligtekaat.
42007012	Kaataquqlu iteghviganun neghllagem, yuget aanutaqeftaat tuqukaq yuuk lliveghnaluku. Ugingigham kezemaghhaaftuq ighnegha, enkaam neghllagem yulghutngan maliglleghaataqeftaat aghnaq.
42007013	Atanghem esghaghluku aghnaq nangllegyagulluku pikaa, “Qiyagpenang.”
42007014	Taagken takuluku saaftekakek kevgusik enkaam kevgistet aghuliiqat. Taagken tuqukaq pikaa, “Nukalpigaq, ungipaatamken, unguvaa!”
42007015	Tuqukaq aqumluni akuzinginaamaghmi pikaq enkaam Jesus-em pegtekaa naanganun.
42007016	Qamaglluteng yulghuteghllaget tallughyuguteghllakat, usuqegkaatlu Kiyaghneq, pikat, “Uuknaliqisteghllagem kaasimiinkut!” Whatenllu pikat, “Kiyaghneghem kayusighyaghtughii yuni!”
42007017	Taana ungipaq mingitkaat Judea-lqaaghaghmi, uvitanganilngughnunllu nunanun.
42007018	John-em maligsaaghtengita ellnganun apeghteqiit qamaglluki Jesus-em apeghiightuqii.
42007019	Enkaam John-em maalghuggiinaak maligsaaghtegni tagsighlukek kevgaqegkakek Ataneghmun, aaptesqelluku whaten, “Elpengwaa taginaqnikaat, nalighmeng sighimakeltegguu kina alla tagiyaghqaq?”
42007020	Yugek kaallutek Jesus pikaak, “John-em Paaptaayestem kevgaqiinkung aaptesqelluten whaten, ‘Elpengwaa taginaqnikaat, nalighmeng sighimakeltegguu kina alla tagiyaghqaq?’”
42007021	Tawani pilleghmi Jesus-em naallghuquqii yulghutet qinuyugitneng, aqnighneghitneng, tughneghaat yuget ilungitneng aanestaqluki, ayaakatlu esghaasagutestaqluki.
42007022	Enkaam kevgak kiimsiqakek, “Aglaghlutek John-mun ungipaategnegu esghapakaghpetegnengllu nagatkaghpetegnengllu. Ayaakat esghaasagutut, piyugigasalghiit piyugyagutut, leprosy-lguyalghiit ukmangiightii, tuuslaghyalghiit nagaquusagutut, tuqukaayalghiit unguvaghtestut unguvalleghmun, aklumalghiinunllu Pinilghii Ungipaq ungipaquq.
42007023	Quyastekaaguq kitum alngunak taaqenghilkuminga ugpeqneghmeng!”
42007024	John-em kevgakek aghulaqsayek, Jesus-em akuzitkegkaa John yulghuteghllagnun; “Kilgaanun piiqngafsi, sangwaa esghaghesteggu? Vegaaq anuqem ufsuguskangaa?
42007025	Sangwaa esghaghyaghtuqaqesteggu? Yuuk aarraghngalghii? Tawaten aarraghngalghiitlu, aklungiteghllagetlu kiyaghtaqut umiilget nengitni.
42007026	Sangwaa esghaghyaghtuqaqesteggu? Uuknaliqistaa? Aa-a, ungipaatamsi, esghaqaghsi uuknaliqisteneng aangataghaghtuq.
42007027	John-nguuq Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapqaat, ‘Kiyaghneq piiq, Sivugpeni kayaglleqaqa ungipaghteka yataaghqesqelluku tuumkaghqan.’
42007028	Ungipaatamsi, yugyaggaghneng allgeghaqelghiineng John aangelleghpigaaguq. Iwernga kina alngunak ukalighpigaq Ataneghpagullghani Kiyaghneghem John-meng aangataghaghtuq.”
42007029	(Qamaglluteng tamaakut yuget, talwa tax-meng qerngughtistet, nagasamegteki Jesus-em apeghtughillghi tuguklighiit Kiyaghneghem qelghusii elqughutnganiluki. Tawaten pikaagut qayughllak sivunghani tugukliqaqegkangit John-em apeghtughillghi. Enkaam John-mun paaptaayestekaalghiit.
42007030	Iwernga Pharisees-etlu apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng tugukliimangitiit John-em apeghtughillghi, enkaam ellnganun paaptaayesugumangitut. Tawaten pilleghmegteggun ighsakegkaqaat Kiyaghneghem uspeqellgha ellmeggnun.)
42007031	Jesus-em pikii, “Maaten kiyaghlleghhiit yuget tuguklighinghilnguut apeghtughillemnun, samun inglunnaqsingi? Natetat?
42007032	Taghnughhaghestun ayuqut aqumuulluteng akilpegaghvigni, ilateng akilghuukangit whaten, ‘Qalghightaatamsi, tukaleganghitusi! Qiyiqutukut, qiyiqenghitusi!’
42007033	Elpesi maaten kiyaghlleghhiini taakustun taghnughhaghestun ayuqusi. John Paaptaayesta tagiiqngami neqekrangllaghtuumangituqlu meghumangituqlu wine-meng enkaam pikaagusi, ‘Tughneghalguuq.’
42007034	Ighnegha Yugem tagiluni, neghelgusighiiqlu meghelgusighiiqlu yugneng enkaam pikaagusi, ‘Yuukqun taana esghaqaghteggu! Neghevalluuguq, meghevalluuguq, ilakumtaaqaatlu tax-meng qerngughtistet, seghleghqestetlu!’
42007035	Naqamllu tamaakut apeghtuusamneng tuguklighilghiit kiyaghllequt pinitun. Tawaten pillghem ipapighqelleqaa apeghtuutkegkaqa Kiyaghneghem peghqinelqaa!”
42007036	Ataasim Pharisee-m Jesus neghyaghtiisqegkaa ellmeggnun. Enkaam Pharisee-nkunun aglaghluni aqumegkaq neghnaluni.
42007037	Tamaanteftuq neghllagmi aghnaq seghleghqesta. Nagaqughyamigu Jesus neghaqniluku Pharisee-nkuni, kelqegkakek alabaster-ek aqimleghutak akitupiglleghhiimeng tepengllaasimeng imalgek.
42007038	Iteghluni nekevegkaq tunutangakun Jesus-em itegaan. Qiyatkelluku qunimineng aghistekii itegii, enkaam nuyamineng sangighquqii. Taagken naaghaqluki, angighhegkii tepengllaasimeng.
42007039	Neghyaghtiisqikam Pharisee-m esghapagluku sumeghtaghaqaq, “Una yuuk uuknaliqistenguyaqumi, liisimaknayaghaa aghnaq kinangutanga, sastengutangallu saafqughaalghii ellnganeng, qayughllak seghleghqestenguuq.”
42007040	Jesus-em pikaa, “Simon, ungipaataghsugamken sameng.” Simon-em aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, sameng?”
42007041	Jesus-em pikaa, “Maalghuk yugek navghaamalghiik manimeng navghitikayugmeng. Aallgha navghaqaq 500 denarii-meng, ilanga 50 denarii-meng.
42007042	Nalighhiinaagkenka llivikepagningitkiik navghatek enkaam navghitikam puygusqegkiik navghallghik. Naligkenka yugek piniqataghaghlleqagnegu?”
42007043	Simon-em kiimsiqaa, “Entaqun aangluku navghitkaan.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Elqughaghtan.”
42007044	Taagken qiivluku aghnaq Simon pikaa, “Esghaghsiguu una aghnaq? Iitghaqngama whavek meghmeng tuunellghitaghpenga iteganka ughviisqelluki. Iwernga uum aghnam iteganka ughvughii qunimineng, sangigtaqluki nuyamineng.
42007045	Upughasimangitaghpenga naaghmeng, iwernga iitghutmineng aghnam aghuliighunneghitii naaghmineghmeng iteganka.
42007046	Naasquqa mesiighmeng kuuvikellghitan, iwernga ellngan iteganka kuuvikii tepenglaasimeng.
42007047	Ungipaatamken, seghevutellengut seghleghqellelghuteghllagi, tamaaken apalluqluku piniqellelegllaguuq. Tawateghpigaq kina alngunak seghevutellengevleghaqaq piniqellevleghallgaaguq.”
42007048	Taagken Jesus-em aghnaq pikaa, “Seghleghqelleghten seghevutellengumaat.”
42007049	Taagken tipelegni ellnganeng aqumgalgusighilghiit aapqughaghutkat, “Kinangaawa una seghevutiiqelghii seghleghqelleghneng?”
42007050	Jesus-em aghnaq pikaa, “Ugpeqilleghpek yugulillengestaaten, aglaa nekeggmellelighluten.”
42008001	Mulugpenani Jesus ighleghtekaq neghllagnunllu nengiighhaghnunllu. Ungipaqikaq Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem ayuqelghiimeng. Qula maalghuk siipneqluku malighsaaghtengita maligtekaat,
42008002	ilangillu aghnat maligutkat. Aghnaneng aanesquqaqegkangi tughneghaat, naallghuquqaqegkangillu aqnighneghitneng. Taakunguftut Mary Magdala-ghmii (ellnganeng aanestekaqegkangi maaraghvinlek tughneghaat),
42008003	Joanna, Susanna, ilangillu aghnat. Taakut aghnat pitutalmeggneng kayusiitaqegkangit Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit. (Joanna-m uginga Chuza, aflengakistenguftuq Herod-em mangteghaaneng).
42008004	Neghllagneng tamaghhiitneng yulghuteghllaget tagilaghaatkat Jesus-mun. Qerngughuteghllagyata ungipaghaatkii,
42008005	“Piitesighaghta piitesighaghyaghtuqaq piitesighaghvigminun. Miluuqughyaqminiki piitutet ilangi tekitkat tumetgun enkaam yuget tutmaasghaqegkiit; taagken qawaaget tagiluteng neghegkiit.
42008006	Ilangi piitutet tekitkat uyghagtuqakun naguyalghiimeng paliqat, qayughllak sunanga yukutanneghilnguq.
42008007	Ilangi piitutet tekitkat sikughllugtuqakun, sikughlluget maligulluteng naguyalghiimeng piitfigiqiit.
42008008	Enkaam ilangi piitutet tekitkat sunakegtakun, piitestikat pinilghiineng nunivagseghaghneng. Tamaghhaghmeng tamaakut 100-kaghtaan piitutengaqut.” Jesus-em akuzilleni taaqniqii, “Sigutelguusi, nagatek!”
42008009	Maligsaaghtengita aaptekaat Jesus sameng pisiitanga taana ungipaghaan.
42008010	Kiimsiqii, “Kiyaghneghem nakmikumiisi liigikesqelluki talughngalghiit ipapillghi Ataneghpagulleghmi. Iwernga ilangitni yugni ungipaghaatnginaawaqut. Enkaam esghaateghngaaghmeng esghaasigatut, nagateghngaaghmeng liigikigatut.
42008011	“Taana ungipaghaan whaten pisiiguq: Piitutet Kiyaghneghem akuzitkii.
42008012	Piitutet tekitkat tumetgun inglutngaat nagatkanun Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Taagken Tughneghaam tagiluni tugaaqii akuzitet ilungitneng ugpeqifqiitallu yugulillengefqiitallu pisqelluki.
42008013	Piitutet tekitkat uyghagtuqakun usputngaat nagatkanun Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Nagalluki akuzitet quyakusiqluki tuguklighaqiit, iwernga qamaverugllak ilumeggnun iteghtesigatiit. Ugpeqiighlluteng, iwernga nanghiiqullengneghmeggni ugpeqinanighaqut.
42008014	Piitutet tekitkat sikughllugtuqakun usputngaat nagatkanun Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Iwernga sumeghyalinkut, aklunginkut, teghignaanllu unguvallghem piitfigighaqii, enkaam piitestekiit angtaniisigatut.
42008015	Enkaam piitutet tekitkat sunakegtakun usputngaat nagatkanun Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Neqamikaqiitlu pinilghiikun ipapighqengngalghiikun ilumegteggun. Nagneghaqut qaatkelluki akuzitangi enkaam piitestekastun ayuqut piitesqughllalghiit pinilghiineng.
42008016	“Kitum alngunak kenelghutak kumaghllukek sagneghem asinganun llinaanghitaak, nalighmeng qavaghvigem asinganun. Itupill quulvaqun llilleqaak, itelghiinun nighuk esghiisqelluku.
42008017	Qayughllak sangwaa alngunak iighngalghii Kiyaghneghem aliighsaghqaqaa, sangwaallu alngunak saapngalghii qaaynganun lliightesleqaa.
42008018	Enkaam nagatngwaaghtek. Kitum alngunak liigikegkumiki apeghtuusanka liigikellengataghaghllequq. Iwernga kitum alngunak liigikenghilkumiki apeghtuusanka talwa liigiknikii iqilleqiit.”
42008019	Taagken Jesus-em naanganllu anglegutangitallu takukaat, iwernga kaanneghmeng aghtuqaat qayughllak yulghuteghllaget kanglluqaghlluku ayuqegkangat.
42008020	Kitum ungipaatkaa, “Naanllu anglegutetenllu qakma nekevghataaghutaqut, esghaghyugaqaaten.”
42008021	Iwernga pikii, “Naakallu anglegutenkallu tamaakunguut nagallghiit akuzitanganeng Kiyaghneghem, qaatkegkangitlu.”
42008022	Ataasimi aghneghmi Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Naayvam inglunganun aghviilta.” Angyamun uughquulluteng aghulaqegkat.
42008023	Telaanangamaluki Jesus qavaqaq. Naayvami anuqliiteghllakii, angyaatlu meghem imighaataqegkaa enkaam yakughniighllakat.
42008024	Maligsaaghtengita takuluku taghtughlluku pikaat, “Yuguniiq, Yuguniiq, tuqulaghaannaqukut!” Jesus-em makelluni ineghtekii anuqallu imaghllugetlu enkaam naangegkat, amsanaghtengnginaamaghmi pikaq.
42008025	Aaptekii, “Sangama ugpeqenghitestengnga?” Iwernga alingengulghiitlu allaghlluwhaghyugulghiitlu enkaam ellmeggneng ilateng aapqughaaghutkiit, “Kinangaawa una yuuk, talwa ineghtekangi anuqallu imaghllugetlu enkaam legan qaatkegkangat?”
42008026	Taagken kaatkat Gerasa-ghmiit nunangitnun, naayvam inglunganilnguq Galilee-meng.
42008027	Legan Jesus quutmun uugtuq, nallaqaa yuuk ilumikun tughneghaghtuqaq, nemeng pinguftuq. Pilugugigalnguq qavngaghhaaneng, kiyaghsigalnguqlu mangteghani naqam lliveghnitaqelghii.
42008028	Jesus-em qelqaa tughneghaq ellnganeng aanesqelluku. Taagken yuuk araghaataghllagluni sikmuutkaq manungakun, maniguutepiglluni iglagtupiglluni pikaa, “Jesus, Ighnegha Qulighpigaghllagem Kiyaghneghem, sanaqsinga? Maniguutepigtunga ikfiqestefqaama pisqellunga.” Tawaten pikaa qayughllak Jesus-em qelqanga yugmeng aanesqelluku tughneghaq. (Uglaghngaan tughneghaam tugughllagaqegkanga. Yuget kelengakaqsaqangat, qiipraghutnengllu asightaqsaqangit iiggillu itegiillu, iwernga sakequghaqegkangi. Enkaangam tughneghaam kilgaanun aghulaqestekaa.)
42008030	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Kinanguzin?” Kiimsiqaa, “Aatqaqa, ‘Uglaghllak!’” qayughllak tughneghalghuteghllaget iteghukaqegkangat.
42008031	Taakut tughneghaat Jesus-mun aapuquusimanginaqat aglaghtestefqaameng Abyss-mun pisqelluteng.
42008032	Taawa qemim minglengani kurugalghuteghllaget neghuutaqeftut. Tughneghaat aapuquutkat Jesus-mun kurugaghnun iteghtesqelluteng enkaam iteghaatestekii.
42008033	Taagken tughneghaat yugmeng aanleghaalluteng iteghaatkat kurugaghnun. Kurughaat pennanun pangalgulluteng naayvamun ifkaqulluteng tuqulaghaatkat.
42008034	Kurugaat aflengakistengita esghapagluku tawaten pilleq, qimaguulluteng ungipaqegkaat neghllagmi, uvitanganilngughnillu nunani.
42008035	Taagken yuget esghaghyaghtuutkaat sangwaa samatanga. Kaalluteng Jesus-mun esghaqaat yuuk tughneghiighulluni. Aqumgaftuq Jesus-em manungani pilugugwaaghluni, umyugakeklu naallghutngwaaghlutek enkaam alingruughuteghllakat.
42008036	Tamaakut esghapakat ungipaqegkaat yuuk ilumikun tughneghaghtughllagyalghii naten naallghutkaatanga.
42008037	Taagken qamaglluteng yuget Gerasa-ghmiit nunangitnilnguut aghulaqeskegkaat Jesus, qayughllak alingruughuteghllagulghiit. Enkaam Jesus-enkut angyamun uuglleghaalluteng aghulaqegkat.
42008038	Yuuk tughneghaghtughllagyalghii aapuquutkaayalghii Jesus-mun maligunnaluni, iwernga Jesus-em aghulaqesqegkaa. Pikaa,
42008039	“Uteghnighluten negpenun, aapghhu naten angkaan Kiyaghneghem apeghiillgha elpenun.” Enkaam ellmeggnun aglaghluni tamaghhaani neghllagem aapqaa Jesus-em apeghillgha ellminun.
42008040	Jesus uteghnighyan yulghuteghllaget upughatkaat qayughllak utaqangukangat.
42008041	Taagken yuuk atelek Jairus-meng tagikaq, igleghutistenga synagogue-em. Jesus-em manungakun niinghulluni maniguutkaq ellmeggnun piightesqelluku,
42008042	qayughllak kezemaghhaq paniga, qula maalghuk siipneqluku uksughtutkalghii, tuqunaqnguftuq. Aglaamaluku yulghuteghllaget kanglluqaghtekaat Jesus.
42008043	Akulngitniteftuq aghnaq aagtuqaataaftuq qula maalghuk siipngaan ayumiqulleghni. Maningiitkaq llivikuusaqneghmeng aghallegtanun, naqamllu kitum alngunak naallghutepagningitkaa.
42008044	Tunutanganeng Jesus takuluku atkuyaaghan keniin esnengakun saaftekaa, enkaam kiitnginaamaghmi pikaq.
42008045	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Kitum saaftanga?” Qamaglluteng mesighaghyata, Peter-em pikaa, “Yuguniiq, yulghuteghllaget kanglluqaghlluten ayuqaaten.”
42008046	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Kitum saaftaanga, qayughllak elpekaqa aghtughyaghqaanghilleq aanelghii whangamneng.”
42008047	Aghnaq piyalghiimi aksaqfigiteftuq enkaam ungelegsimaghmi tagikaq. Jesus-em sivungakun niinghulluni, yulghutet nagasimanghitni ungipaatkaa sangan saaftelleghmineng, tawaninginaqlu naallghutelleghmineng.
42008048	Jesus-em pikaa, “Panimni, ugpeqilleghpek naallghutestaaten, aglaa nekeggmellelighluten.”
42008049	Salin Jesus akuzimaluku, igleghutistenkuneng yuuk tagiluni Jairus pikaa, “Panigen tuqumaaq, Apeghtughista qinuyugtegpenaan'ngam.”
42008050	Iwernga Jesus-em nagalluku, pikaa Jairus, “Alingegpenang. Taawanginaghhaq ugpeghi, piniighhnaaghaa.”
42008051	Jesus mangteghamun kaasami kitumun alngunak itelgusightesimangilnguq. Iwerngaqun iteghtestekii Peter-enkut John-enkut James-enkut, taghnughaamllu atanga, naangallu.
42008052	Qamaglluteng yuget qiyaaghuuteghllagulghiit aghnaghaghhaghmun tuqulghiimun. Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Qiyagpenasi qayughllak tuqullghituq, qavaghaquq.”
42008053	Nenglaqegkaat liisimakluku tuqukaatanga.
42008054	Iwernga tuguluku iiggakun tuqluumaan pikaa, “Taghnughhaq, maketen.”
42008055	Aghnaghaghhaq unguvaghluni, nekevegkaq. Jesus-em kayagutkaa sameng neghestesqelluku.
42008056	Angayuqakek saghiighayukak, iwernga ineghtekakek kina alngunak ungipaatefqaan pisqelluku tawaten pilleghmeng.
42009001	Jesus-em tuqluqii qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni. Qerngughusata aghtughyaghqaanghilleliquqiillu pilleghqaliquqiillu yugneng aanestesqelluki qamaglluki tughneghaat, naallghutesqellukillu aqnighneghet.
42009002	Taagken ungipaqiyaghtiisqegkii Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem, naallghuqiisqellukillu qinuyulghiit.
42009003	Pikii, “Igleghalleghpesinun sameng alngunak kelqegpenasi. Ayaviingunasi, aqeftaghaangunasi, neqngunasi, maningunasi, talwa kelqefqaafsi simiitkaghqameng ggaatmeng.
42009004	Kinkunun alngunak iteghlusi upughaskangisi tawanlleghhaasi kenlanga aghulaqelleghqaghpesinun.
42009005	Enkaam kinkut upughanneghilkangisi, aghulaqneghpesini nemeng taagken, tukaataqiteki pagulangi itegaghpesi. Tawaten pikufsi liisimakelleqaat kelengasaaghilleghsi Kiyaghneghem aghyuulleghqaaneng.”
42009006	Maligsaaghtet aghulaqluteng nengiighhaat takuughaqiit, ungipaqikat Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, naallghuquqatlu tamaghhiitni.
42009007	Herod-em igleghutistengan Galilee-m, nagaqughluki Jesus-em allaaghlluwhaghtillghi teggellghhiiqaq, qayughllak ilangita yuget pikangat John Paaptaayesta unguvaamaniluku tuqulleghmeng.
42009008	Paninang ilangita pikaat Elijah-nguniluku, enkaam ilangita pikaat naliq ayumightaq uuknaliqista unguvaamaniluku.
42009009	Herod pikaq, “John naasqwightestekaqaqa, iwernga kinangaawaqa yuuk nagaqughaqegkegka tawaten piiqelghii?” Enkaam Herod-em esghaghyukaa Jesus.
42009010	Apostle-et uteghnighluteng, Jesus ungipaatkaat apeghiighutelleghmeggneng. Aghulaqutkii neghllagmun Bethsaida-mun ellnginaanaluteng.
42009011	Yulghutet naantulanga liigiksamegteggu maligtekaat. Kaasata quyakluki ellngitnun akuzitkegkaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem, naallghutesulghiitlu naallghuquqii.
42009012	Whanikuyagu, qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtengita takuluku pikaat, “Maana paaghqituq enkaam yulghutet aglaghtuutesqiki qantaghanlengughnun nengiighhaghnunllu piitesighaghtenunllu. Tamaani tukughqangnayaghtutlu neghyaghqangnayaghtutlu.”
42009013	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesi sameng neghyaghqaliteki.” Pikaat, “Legan taawa tallimat neqekrangllat, iqallugeklu naamapagningitut whaten uglaghqakalghiinun yugnun. Wetkuqun navek neqengyaghtughtesukufkut taawa neghqennayaghaput qamaglluki.”
42009014	Tawanlenguut entaqun 5,000-nguut yuget, kesutkegpenaki aghnatlu taghnughhaatlu. Maligsaaghteni pikii, “Aqumuutesqiteki qerngaqaghtiita, fifty-ngwaaqluki.”
42009015	Maligsaaghtet pisqelleghmegestun qamaglluki aqumuutestekiit.
42009016	Taagken Jesus-em tuguluki tallimat neqekrangllat, iqallugeklu qilagmun sivuglluni, iyamsiqayugvikegkaa Kiyaghneq. Taagken iiggmineng aavghughluki tuunegkii maligsaaghteminun uyegtesqelluki yugnun.
42009017	Qamaglluteng neghuutkat kepsuulluteng. Maligsaaghtet tugulaghluki siipneghit imightuqiit qula maalghuk siipneqluku pasketet.
42009018	Ataasimi aghneghmi Jesus ellnginaghmi yughalghii. Maligsaaghtengi qantaghanlenguut enkaam aaptekii, “Yuget kinangunilunga piiqatnga?”
42009019	Kiimsiqaat, “John-nguniiqaaten Paaptaayesta, iwernga ilangita Elijah-nguniiqaaten. Enkaam ilangita piiqaaten naliit ayumightaq uuknaliqista unguvaqaq.”
42009020	Aaptekii, “Elpesimi kinanguniiqestengnga?” Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Christ-akaaten Kiyaghneghem.”
42009021	Iwernga Jesus-em ineghtengngwaaqii ungipaatefqaan kina alngunak pisqelluku.
42009022	Pikii, “Ighnegha Yugem uglalghiimeng ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq, ighsaksaghqaqaatlu siivanlleghet, chief priest-et, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng. Taagken tuqulleqaat, iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem unguvaghllequq.”
42009023	Taagken qamaglluki pikii, “Kitum alngunak maligsukuminga, ellmi katam piyukelleni peglluki, aghhutanga tamaghhaan tuguluku qaquurani, maligllinga.
42009024	Enkaam kitum alngunak peggneghilkumigu unguvalleni, iflayaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak pegtekumigu unguvalleni whanga apalluqlunga, yugulilleqaa.
42009025	Sangwaa yugem allgeghlleqagu iingunaan nuna piliilluku iflakumigu nalighmeng naafqegkumigu unguvalleni?
42009026	Kitum alngunak kayngukegkanganga, akuzitenkallu, Ighneghan Yugem kayngukelleqaa tagikumi nighughqelleghmikun, nighughqengngallghitgunllu Atam, agleghnalghiitlu yaqulget.
42009027	Iwernga ipa ungipaatamsi, ilasi nekevghallghiit whani tuquyaghqaanghitut kenlanga esghalleghmeggnun Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem.”
42009028	Tawaten Jesus akuziluni, pingayuneng inglulek aghneghet atughluki, kelqegkii Peter-enkut John-enkut James-enkut. Mayuqat naayghamun yughaghnaluni.
42009029	Yughaamaluku, gginaa allangughtekaq, aatkiillu qaterakguutkat nighugraketun.
42009030	Taagken aliighaghtekak maalghuk yugek nighugullutek qilagem nighughqellghakun, Moses-enkunguftuk Elijah-nkuk. Aleghqughaqeftaak Jesus tuqulleghqaaneng Jerusalem-emi; tawaten tuqukumi apeghiighlleqaa Kiyaghneghem uspeqellgha.
42009032	Peter-enkut qavanghaateghllakat, iwernga taghtughluteng esghaqaat Jesus-em nighughqellgha, yugeklu nekevghalgutkek.
42009033	Yugek unitaqaaklu Jesus, Peter-em pikaa, “Yuguniiq, itagnapigtuq whaanlenguukut! Pingayut azigutat nekefnaqaput elpenunllu Moses-munllu Elijah-munllu.” (Peter akuzikaq nallukluku sameng piiqutni.)
42009034	Salin akuzimaluku qilagwaaq aliighluni saapegkii. Maligsaaghtet alingegkat qilagwaaghem saapsisteng.
42009035	Qilagwaaghmeng mem pikii, “Una Ighneqaqa, nakmikegkaqa! Nagataqiteggu!”
42009036	Ma nepiighyalghiimi Jesus ellnginaaftuq. Maligsaaghtet sameng pimangilnguut, esghaqaghtengllu aapghumangilkangat kitumun alngunak.
42009037	Unaamingani naayghameng ukigyalghiimeng yulghuteghllaget Jesus utaqaaqeftaat.
42009038	Yulghuteghllaget akulngitneng yuuk akilghuukaq, “Apeghtughista, maniguutunga elpenun ighneqa esghaqiisqelluku qayughllak kezemaghhaalghii avaqutaqa.
42009039	Ilumikun tughneghalghuuq, tugupiggneghminigu araghaataghqaqaa, sayugpagtaghtesimaan kenlanga qaangha puuglliighqellghanun. Aqnighqeghllagaqaa, unitelqungigataallu.
42009040	Maligsaaghtegpenun aanestaghtesqumayaghaqa iwernga pipagningitaat.”
42009041	Jesus-em pikii, “Kii, elpesi yugni ugpellghitusillu seghleghwaaghuusillu! Naten tagkaan elpesininnaqsinga ugpeqesqellunga?” Taagken yuuk pikaa, “Ighneghen tagitigu whavek.”
42009042	Tagimaluku tughneghaam ulleghlluku sayugpagtaghtestekaa. Iwernga Jesus-em qelqaa tughneghaq aanesqelluku, enkaam naallghulluku mekelghiiq atanganun tuunegkaa.
42009043	Qamaglluteng yuget saghiighayagutkaat aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllaga Kiyaghneghem. Paninang yuget saghiighayugumaluki tamaghhaaneng Jesus-em apeghiillghaneng, maligsaaghteni pikii,
42009044	“Nagatngwaaghtek, puygugpenaan una: Ighnegha Yugem uveghpagutellengnaqnguuq taagken yuget tugulleqaat.”
42009045	Iwernga liigikumangilkangat tawaten pillgha qayughllak umyugiit liigiksaghqaananighqegkaalghiit. Tetukaat aapneghmeng sangami tawaten akuzillghaneng.
42009046	Taam kingunaneng maligsaaghtet aaghtiiraaghutkat nalighteng angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
42009047	Iwernga Jesus-em liisimakegkii sumeghtaghallghit. Enkaam tuguluku taghnughhaq saaghwmikun nekevestekaa.
42009048	Pikii, “Kitum alngunak atemkun tugukliqumigu una taghnughhaq, tuguklighlleqaanga. Enkaam kitum alngunak tugukliquminga, tuguklighlleqaa kayagtisteka. Kina alngunak ukalighpigaq akulegpesinilnguq, angelleghpigaaguq.”
42009049	John-em pikaa, “Yuguniiq, esghaamaghput yuuk ateghpegun aanesqulghii tughneghaghneng. Enkaam ineghsimaaghput qayughllak whangkunnun ilatnganghilnguq.”
42009050	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ineghtegpenaan qayughllak kina alngunak elpesinun kipullgginaanghilnguq elpesinun ayuquq.”
42009051	Tughaaghyan Jesus-em qilagmun mayulleghqani, qakiqniqepigtekaq Jerusalem-ennaluni.
42009052	Kayagtekii ilangi ungipaghtet igleghtekestiisqelluki sivumini. Samaria-mun pikat nekaghqangusaghtughnaluku.
42009053	Iwernga Samaria-ghmiit upughanneghitkaat qayughllak Jerusalem-emun maniguusaghtuulghii.
42009054	Maligsaaghtegkenka, James-enkuk John-enkuk esghapagluki yuget ighsakegkangat Jesus, aaptekaak, “Ataneq, Kiyaghneghmun tungsiiteltekii-i qilagmeng ukigtesqelluku keneq paneghtesqelluki?”
42009055	Jesus-em qiivlukek aghyuuqakek.
42009056	Taagken ilanganun nem aglaqat.
42009057	Tumetgun igleghsimaluki yugem Jesus pikaa, “Maliglleqamken navek alngunak pikuvek.”
42009058	Jesus-em pikaa, “Kaviighet riigtelguut, qawaaget unglutelguut, iwernga Ighnegha Yugem nekaghqiituq.”
42009059	Taagken ilanga yuuk Jesus-em pikaa, “Maligtinga.” Iwernga yugem pikaa, “Ataneq, maliglleqamken iwernga sivukluku ataka qungughyaghtughnaqaqa.”
42009060	Jesus-em pikaa, “Tamaakut tuqukat qungughlitki tuqumasliiteng. Iwernga elpek, aghulaqluten ungipaqsaghtughhu Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem.”
42009061	Ilangan yugem pikaa, “Ataneq, maliglleqamken iwernga sivukluki nemiinka ungipaasaghtuqaghnaqanka.”
42009062	Jesus-em pikaa, “Kina alngunak piitesighaghvigmini peksighqimaluni nunameng qiivaataqumi uteghmun itagnaghnaanghituq Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem.”
42010001	Taam kingunganeng, Atanghem maligsaaghtemineng nakmikegkii 72-ghyaget yuget. Takuughaghyaghqaminun kayagtekii malghukaghtiita igleghtekestiisqelluki.
42010002	Pikii, “Uglalghiim yugem ugpeqsugaqiit Pinilghiit Ungipat. Tamaakunguut usputngalghiit nunivagseghanun unataghyaqleggiinaaghtekat. Taawanginaq palapigtut qepghaghtet. Enkaangam yughaghtek Atanghanun unataghyaghqat kayagtisqelluku qepghaghtekaghqameng unataghyaghqaanun.
42010003	Aghulaqitek! Taawa kayagtamsi penniighaghaastun ayuqlusi qungangitnun amaat.
42010004	Kelqegpenasi manimeng, aqeftaghaaghmeng, simiitkaghqameng kamegmeng. Tumeni aghuliighlusi kimaawisightughpenasi aleghqughyaghqaaluki yuget.
42010005	Iteneghpesini mangteghanun, sivuklusi whaten piiqiteki, ‘Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelisilli!’
42010006	Mangtegham yugan upughaskangisi nekeggmellelighluni taawa Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelilleqii. Iwernga upughanneghilkangisi, Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelgusnaanghitii.
42010007	Tawantaqitek ataasimi mangteghami, neghaqluki sangwaat upughatusiit. Tawaten piiqitek qayughllak qepghaghta akileghtuusangaquq qepghalleghminun. Tukughpesineng aanaqlusi kinkunun nuugtaataghpenasi.
42010008	Kaanneghpesini nenun, tugukliqangisi upughatusiit neqet neghaqiteki.
42010009	Naallghuqughteki qinuyugtiighit, whatenllu piiqluki, ‘Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem whaa maantuq.’
42010010	Iwernga kaanneghpesini nenun, tuguklinghilkangisi, tuumngitnun aglaghlusi yugtuqami whaten pilghaasi,
42010011	‘Talwa nunagpesi pagulanga itegamteggun nevegkaq paallgaghput. Tawaten piikut kelguviknalusi anaggullghhiisi ighsakelleghpesigun Kiyaghneghem ungipaa. Iwernga neqamikiteggu Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem whaa maantuq!’
42010012	Ungipaatamsi, Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Sodom-eghmiit aghyuulleghqestaaghaayaghqaagut taam nem yuganeng.
42010013	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi, Chorazin-eghmiini! Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi, Bethsaida-ghmiini! Elpesini allaaghlluwaghtilleghllaget apeghiiqat pikaayaqata Tyre-millu Sidon-millu, yugit avuteghqegkaanayaghtut seghleghqennanighnayaghtut. Tamaaken apalluqluku aalluteng suvinalghiimeng qiipaghaghqameng aqumnayaghtut panetelleghteggun.
42010014	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani, Tyre-ghmiitlu Sidon-eghmiitlu aghyuulleghqestaaghaayaghqaagut elpesineng.
42010015	Enkaam elpesi, Capernaum-eghmiini! Qaywa anglisteghllagyaghngaaghpesi elpesineng katam, repall sumeghpesini usuqellengelleqnilusi qilagmi, yeghlegi ukiglleqiisi hell-mun!”
42010016	Maligsaaghteni Jesus-em pikii, “Kitum alngunak nagaskumisi, nagalleqaatnga whanga. Kitum alngunak ighsakegkumisi, ighsakelleqaatnga whanga, enkaam kitum alngunak ighsakegkuminga, ighsakelleqaat kayagtisteka.”
42010017	Tagtalmi taakwani 72-ghyaget maligsaaghtet uteghniqat quyaghllagumaghmeng. Jesus pikaat, “Ataneq, talwa tughneghaat qaatkaqiinkut ateghpegun qelenemteki!”
42010018	Jesus-em pikii, “Aa-a, esghaamaaqa Tughneghaq, qilagmeng ifkalghii nighwaagpagtastun.
42010019	Nagatek! Aghtughyaghqaanghillelisimaamsi tuutesqelluki nemeghyat, scorpion-et, kayaalqesqellukillu qamaglluki aghtughyaghqaanghillghi anguyagem. Enkaam saam alngunak aqnighhnaanghitiisi.
42010020	Itagnalghiinguuq quyalghiisi qayughllak tughneghaat qaatkegkangisi, iwernga quyaaghataghaghtek qayughllak atesi igaqelghiit qilagmi.”
42010021	Tawani pilleghmi Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham Jesus quyastekaa. Pikaq, “Ataay, Atangha qilagemllu nunamllu, iyamsiqayugvikamken! Elpek tamaakut talughtaten peghqinelghiinengllu liitkanengllu, naqam liitestaten taghnughhaghestun ayuqelghiinun. Aa-a, Ataay, taananguuq piyukellghen.”
42010022	Taagken Jesus-em pikii yuget, “Atama tuunumaanga sameng tamaghhaaneng. Kitum alngunak nallukaa Ighneq kinangutanga, iwerngaqun Atam. Kitum alngunak nallukaa Ata kinangutanga, iwerngaqun Ighneghem. Ighneghemllu liitesleqaa Ata kitumun alngunak nakmikegkaminun.”
42010023	Taagken qiivluki maligsaaghteni, ellnginiit pikii, “Quyastekaagusi esghaallghiisi sameng esghaqaghpesineng!
42010024	Ungipaatamsi, uuknaliqistelghutetlu umiilgetlu esghaghyukiit esghaghasi, esghaamangilkangit. Nagaqughyukiit nagaqughasi, nagaquumangilkangit.”
42010025	Apeghtughikayugem Liilightuusaneng takuluku anagvigighnaluku aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, naten salunga allgeghhnayaghsikun kenlengilnguq unguvalleq?”
42010026	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Sangwaa Liilightuusani igaqngaa? Naten liigikaqsiki atightuneghpeki?”
42010027	Yugem kiimsiqaa, “ ‘Piniqsaghqaqan Ataneq Kiyaghneghen, qamaglluku ilugpegun, qamaglluku unguvasighpegun, qamaglluku iknaqelleghpegun, qamaglluku umyugaghpegun.’ Enkaam, ‘Piniqsaghqaqan yulguten elpeneng katam piniqelleghpetun.’”
42010028	Jesus-em pikaa, “Elqughaghtan. Tawaten pi enkaam kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengellequten.”
42010029	Iwernga apeghtughikayuk Liilightuusaneng liigikesukaq Jesus-mun qaatkutngwaaghluni ayuqniluni Liilightuusanun, enkaam aaptekaa, “Kinangaawa yulgutka?”
42010030	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Taawanguq yuuk Jerusalem-emeng ukikaq Jericho-mun. Wayaghniightet sughugluku, qesugughluki aatkii, anagulqaat. Taagken tuqutevzighluku unitkaat.
42010031	Enraqlu priest-a taakwagun tumetgun igleghtekaq. Iwernga esghaghyamigu yuuk naghughtekaa tumet inglungitgun.
42010032	Mulugpenani Levite-a kaalluni, esghaghluku, ellnganllu naghughtekaa tumet inglungitgun.
42010033	Iwernga Samaria-ghmii, taakwagun tumetgun igleghangulghii. Kaalluku esghaghyamigu nanglegyagutkaa.
42010034	Takuluku kiingi mesiighmengllu wine-mengllu ughvughteghluki, qantaghtuqii. Taagken donkey-minun qaakluku aglaatkaa aqelqalghutamun, tawani aflengakegkaa.
42010035	Unaamingani tugulukek maalghuk denarii-ek, tuunutkellukek aqelqalghutam aflengakistenganun pikaa, ‘Aflengakaghtigu. Kayusiitaghaamakuvgu uteghniquma llivikelleqamken.’”
42010036	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Sumeghpeni taakuneng pingayuneng naliit yulgutepiigufta yugmun wayaghniightet amyuutkegkiitnun?”
42010037	Apeghtughikayugem Liilightuusaneng kiimsiqaa, “Taananguuq nangllekikaq yugmun.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Aghulaqluten, elpeklu tawaten pi.”
42010038	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit igleghutkelluku kaatkat nengiighhaghmun. Tamaanteftuq aghnaq, aatgha Martha, Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit upughatkii ellmeggnitesqelluki.
42010039	Anglegutangan aatgha Mary-nguftuq; aqumluni Jesus-em itegaan manungakun nagatkaa apeghtughilghii.
42010040	Iwernga Martha-m yataaghquteghllagukangi aqelqani neghyaghqameng, enkaam Jesus takuluku pikaa, “Ataneq, waakenghisiguu anglegutma ellnginaghma qepghaghtestekanganga? Kayusiitesqaghtinga!”
42010041	Atanghem pikaa, “Martha, Martha, uglalghiimeng sumeghyaliiqutenllu seghleliighaqutenllu
42010042	iwernga ataasighhaaguq aklunalghii. Mary-m nakmikumaa taana pinillgha, ellnganeng iqisaghqaanghituq.”
42011001	Ataasimi pilleghmi nani Jesus yughaamalghii, taaqaquqlu yughaneghmeng, ataasim maligsaaghtengan pikaa, “Ataneq, apeghtuqaghqut yughalleghmeng, katam John-em apeghtullghatun yughalleghmeng maligsaaghteni.”
42011002	Jesus-em pikii, “Whaten yughaghaqitek, ‘Ataay, agleghnalghii aatghen quulvallengli, yughaghtukut Ataneghpagullghen tagisqelluku.
42011003	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan neghyaghqaliteqeghtikut.
42011004	Seghevutaghtiki seghleghqelleput qayughllak seghevutaqaput qamaglluki seghletun pisteput. Nanghiiqullengestegpenaamtallu.’”
42011005	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Ilakumtaalguyaquvek unugem qukaani mangteghaanun piluten, tungsighyaquvek, ‘Ilakumtaamni, pingayuneng neqekrangllaghhiisiin?
42011006	Ilakumtaaqa igleghalghii kaatuq, ellnganun neghyaghqaqraggiitunga.’
42011007	Qamaken ilakumtaaghpek kiimsighyaqumiten, ‘Qinuyugtegpenanga. Amik maghqatngaaq, taghnughaqullghiini ingaghquusimaakut. Maketepagningitunga tuunyaghqaaluten sameng alngunak.’
42011008	Ungipaatamsi, qaywa ilakumtaaqeghngaaghmiten makennaanghituq tuunyaghqaaluten sameng. Iwernga makellequq tuunaluten aklukegkaghpeneng qayughllak sagiqeghllagulghiiten.
42011009	Enkaam whanga ungipaatamsi, aaptek, allgeghullequsi; ivaghitek, naalkullequsi; tenglugtughtek amigkun, qelpeghulleqiisi.
42011010	Qayughllak kina alngunak aapleghhii, allgeghusaghqaaguq; kina alngunak ivaghilghii, naalkusaghqaaguq, kina alngunak tenglugtulghii amigkun, qelpeghulleqaa.
