42011011	Nalighpesi atani, ighneghpek iqallugniighviksaqangaten, yeghlegi tuunayaghsiguu nemeghyameng?
42011012	Nalighmeng ighneghpek manigniighviksaqangaten, tuunayaghsiguu scorpion-meng?
42011013	Seghleghqestengughngaaghpesi, liisimakusi pinilghiimeng tuunilleghmeng avaqutaghpesinun. Ata qilagmelnguq tuuniighataghaghyugluni ayuquq Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghneng tamaakunun aapleghhiinun!”
42011014	Ataasimi aghneghmi Jesus-em aanestekaa tughneghaq yugmeng. Tughneghaam yuuk akuzisigalkanga. Tughneghaq aanyan, yuuk akuziyagutkaq enkaam qamaglluteng yuget tawanlenguut saghiighayagutkaat.
42011015	Iwernga ilangita yuget pikaat, “Aanestiiquq tughneghaghneng aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Beelzebul-em, tughneghaat igleghutistengitgun.”
42011016	Ilangita yuget anagniilqavigighnaluku Jesus, allaaghlluwhaghtisqegkaat kelguvikesqelluteng Kiyaghneghmun kayagtekaqutanga.
42011017	Iwernga Jesus-em liisimakegkangi sumeghtaghallghit enkaam pikii, “Alngunak ataneghpagulleq aafquulluni pilluguskumi, naavellequq. Nengllugutet aafquulluteng pilluguskumeng, qerngaghmennaanghitut.
42011018	Enkaam Tughneghaam ataneghpagullghanilnguut aafquulluteng pilluguskumeng, Tughneghaam ataneghpagullgha kenletghuullequq. Elpesi aanesqughniiqaghpesinga tughneghaghneng aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Beelzebul-em, iwernga anaggutusi.
42011019	Aanesquungukuma tughneghaghneng Beelzebul-kun, natenmi ilagpesi aanesqughaqatki tughneghaat? Enkaam ilagpesi nanqiglleqiisi anaggunnilusi.
42011020	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun aanesquungukuma tughneghaghneng, taawa taam ipapighqaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem kaasimaaq elpesinun.”
42011021	Iknaqelghiim yugem guututetuqam kelengakegkumigu mangteghani, qamaglluteng saghyangi paqniisaghqaagut.
42011022	Iwernga iknaqataghalghiim yugem sughukumigu kayaalqelleqaa. Enkaam tugulaghlleqii neghyukumtaaghi guututangi, uyeglleqiillu saghyangi.
42011023	“Kina alngunak whangamninneghilnguq kipullginaaghtekaqa; kitum alngunak qerngughtilgusinghilkuminga mingitistenguuq.
42011024	“Tughneghaq yugmeng aanegkumi, igleghllequq meqraggiilngughmi nunami, ivaghillequq meghnaalivigkameng. Naalkunneghisami pikaq, ‘Kiyaghfiksaqemnun uteghhnaqunga.’
42011025	Kaasalghiimi, aallwhaaghluni, mingllegtengngwaaghluni ayuqeftuq.
42011026	Taagken aanluni tagitkii maaghraghvinlek tughneghaat ellmineng seghleghataghalghiit. Iteghaalluteng yugmun tawantekat. Enkaam taana yuuk sivunghaneng wataqaaghaq seghleghwaaghughtekaq.”
42011027	Tawaten Jesus piyan, yulghuteghllaget akulngitneng aghnam iglagtupiglluni pikaa, “Quyastekaaguq aghnaq ighniluten mamaghtikaq elpeneng!”
42011028	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Itupill, quyastaghaqaagut tamaakut Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi nagalluki qaatkegkangit!”
42011029	Yulghutet nulanginaghyata Jesus-em pikii, “Aghneghem uum yugi seghleghqumanguut. Naqam allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut whangamnun. Yeghlegillu! Taananginaghhaq allaaghlluwhaghtilleq esghaghlleqaghsi Kiyaghneghem allaaghlluwhaaghtillgha Jonah-mun.
42011030	Katam tawaten Kiyaghneghem atuqellghatun allaaghlluwhaghtilleq Jonah-mun kelengasaaghnaluki Ninevah-ghmiit, tawaten Kiyaghneghem atuqsaghqaqaa allaaghlluwhaghtilleq Ighneghanun Yugem kelengasaaghnaluki aghneghem maaten yugi.
42011031	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekangisi elpesi kiyaghlleghhiini aghneghmi whani, Queen-ngan Sheba-m nekevluni anaggutnganilleqiisi aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi. Tagikaaguq uyavaghpanlengughmeng nemineng nagannaluku Solomon-em peghqinellgha. Iwernga kina aangataghalghii Solomon-meng whaantuq, tawalliima ighsakaqaghsi.
42011032	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani, Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekangisi elpesi kiyaghlleghhiini aghneghmi whani, Nineveh-ghmiit nekevluteng anaggunnilleqiisi aghyuughyaghqapestaaghunilusi. Uuknaliqista Jonah ungipaghyan, Nineveh-ghmiit avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennaniqaagut. Iwernga elpesi avuteghqellusi seghleghqennaniimangitusi, qaywa nagatkaqeghngaaghpesigu kina aangataghalghii Jonah-meng!”
42011033	“Kitum alngunak kenelghutak kumaghllukek iighnaanghitaak nalighmeng sagneghmun asingiinnaanghitaak. Itupill llilleqaak quulvaqun itelghiinun esghiisqelluku nighuk.
42011034	Iyegken kenelghutastun ayuquk yugusighpenun. Iiskegtekuvek iingunaghmi yugusin nighugllagullequq, iwernga iyellugmeskuvek iingunaghmi yugusin mamlegllagullequq.
42011035	Tamaaken apalluqluku kelengakigu nighuk ilugpenilnguq mamlegughtestegpenaan.
42011036	Iingunaghmi yugusin esleqngakumi nighugmeng nalighneghhaa mamlengunaan, taawa kuukgullequten nighugraketun katam kenelghutak kuukgutellghegketun elpenun.”
42011037	Jesus akuzineghmeng taaqsan, Pharisee-m ellmeggnun neghyaghtiisqegkaa. Enkaam iteghluni aqumegkaq tipelegni.
42011038	Pharisee-m esghaghluku saghiighayagutkaa uughtunghilnguq neghelleghqami sivungani.
42011039	Enkaam Atanghem pikaa, “Elpesi Pharisees-eni, sangigtaqasi qaayngi qayuusighpesillu sagneghpesillu, iwernga ilugpesigun nukeggnaghtusi, esleqngaasi pakigneghmengllu seghleghmengllu.
42011040	Liigikigatngwaaghtusi! Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqenghitaguu yugusim qaayngallu ilungallu?
42011041	Itupill tuunitek aklumalghiinun ilugpesineng enkaam qayesillu ilusillu iqangiitngwaaghlleqii.
42011042	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi Pharisees-eni! Tuunaqasi qulaghqellesi Kiyaghneghmun, talwa mint-esi, rue-si, alngunaklu neqem neqnighsaatangi. Iwernga avelghasingwaaghaqaghsi pinitun pilleq yulgutegpesinun, piniqingalleqlu Kiyaghneghmun. Taakuk piyaghqapestaaqagsi maligullukek tuunilleghpesistun qulaghqelleghpesineng.
42011043	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi Pharisees-eni! Synagogue-nni aqumyuneghtuusi aangwaaghet aqumutiitgun. Akilpegaghvignillu quyakesugaqusi aangwaaghulusi.
42011044	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi! Leganqun nalluniighumangilngughestun lliivghestun ayuqusi yuget esghiigalkangit. Qaayngitgun piyuneghmegteki ukmangiinnanighaqut.”
42011045	Ataasim apeghtughikayugem Liilightuusaneng pikaa, “Apeghtughista, tawaten pilleghpek kayngusaakiinkut!”
42011046	Jesus-em pikaa, “Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesillu apeghtughikayugni Liilightuusaneng! Apeghtughillesi piyaqnapigtut yugnun qaatkesaghqaaluteng. Uqigtuqastun akmagestun ayuqut yugnun akmagtestaqegkesi, naqamllu talwa ataasiq ighneghwaaghsi atuqigataghsi kayusiinnaluki akmagitneng.
42011047	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi! Pinighnaghsaghaqasi lliivghit quulvaghnaluki uuknaliqistet sivuneghpesi tuququqiit.
42011048	Tawaten pilleghpesigun kelgutngwaaghsi itagnaqilleghsi sivuneghpesi pillghitnun. Ellngita tuququqiit uuknaliqistet, elpesi pinighnaghsaghaqasi lliivghit.
42011049	Tamaaken apalluqluku peghqinelleghmikun Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Kayagfikelleqanka uuknaliqistenengllu apostle-enengllu, tuqulleqiit ilangi, amyuqetaatkelleqiit ilangi.’
42011050	Enkaangam aghneghni maaten kiyaghlleghhiit aghyuughyaghqaagut apalluqluki sivunghita tuququqaqegkangit qamaglluki uuknaliqistet nunam ulimayuwhaallghaneng,
42011051	taagegken ima Abel-em tuqutellghaneng Zechariah-m tuqutellghanun. Zechariah tuqutkaqegkangat akulegkeni aghqefigemllu Agleghnalghiimllu Nengan. Aa-a, ungipaatamsi, kiyaghlleghiit aghneghni maaten aghyuullengyaghqaagut tawaten pilleghnun.
42011052	“Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi elpesi liisimallelegllagni Liilightuusaneng! Aghulaqusimaaghsi key qelpeghusighqaq amiganun liisimallghem Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii; elpesi iteghyugigatusi enkaam tamaakut iteghnaqelghiit aghuliightaqasi.”
42011053	Jesus iqisan apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-etlu ugumiyaguteghllakaat. Taagken kenlanga seghlequughllagyagutkaatlu aapqughwaaghtaakaatlu piyaqnalghiineng,
42011054	sameng pisqelluku anagngalghiimeng anagvigighnaluku.
42012001	Tawaten pimaluki thousand-nelghutet yuget qerngughutkat, repall ilateng tuutqaghtaqluki pikiit. Jesus-em sivukluki maligsaaghteni pikii, “Kelengalusi Pharisees-et yeast-angitneng. Piniiyugtellghat piiqaqa.
42012002	Sangwaa saapegkaq saaputiighyaghqaaguq. Qamaglluni aksaqegkaq qayvighqesaghqaaguq.
42012003	Sameng pillesi aksaqluku nagaqughyaghqaqiit qagani. Sangwaatlu sigutquutkegkasi uumgullusi nemi ungipaqsaghqaagut tamangani.
42012004	“Ungipaatamsi ilakumtaamni, alikegpenaki tamaakut tuqutikayuget yugusimeng, iwernga taam kingunganeng alla sanaanghitiisi.
42012005	Iwernga kelengasaaghnaqamsi kitumeng aliksaghqameng. Alikiteggu Kiyaghneq, tuquskumisi aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq miluusaghqaalusi hell-mun. Aa-a, ungipaatamsi alikiteggu!
42012006	“Tallimat qateghyiighaghhaat akikegkayugunghitaat maalghugegnun penny-gnun? Tawalliima nalighhiiniit Kiyaghneghem puygunaanghitii.
42012007	Talwa nuyaghpesi uglaghtalangi Kiyaghneghem liisimakii. Alingegpenasi, Kiyaghneghem megnukataghaghiisi qateghyiighalghutneng pakiggullusi.
42012008	“Enkaam ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak ungipaaskaki sivungitni yuget whangamnun pikniluteng, Ighneghanllu Yugem piknilleqii sivungitni Kiyaghneghem yaqulelghutangan.
42012009	Iwernga kitum alngunak ungipaaskaki sivungitni yuget whangamnun pikenghinniluteng, Ighneghan Yugem pikenghinnilleqii sivungitni Kiyaghneghem yaqulelghutangan.
42012010	“Kitum alngunak seghletun akuzitkegkumigu Ighnegha Yugem, Kiyaghneghem seghevusaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak seghletun akuzitkegkumikek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak, Kiyaghneghem seghevunnaanghitaa.
42012011	“Aglaaskangisi synagogue-nnun, sivungitnun governor-et, nalighmeng igleghutistet teggellghiighpenasi naten kiimsilleghqaghpesineng, nalighmeng sameng pilleghqaghpesineng.
42012012	Tawani pilleghmi Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham akuzitkaghqalilleqiisi sameng pilleghqameng.”
42012013	Yulghuteghllaget akulngitneng yugem Jesus pikaa, “Apeghtughista, anglegutka ungipaataghtigu, atamtunguq unitkaaneng saghyameng nengitaghllinga.”
42012014	Iwernga Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Yugmi whani, kitum nanqigtistengllaghtanga, nalighmeng nengighqistengllaghtanga elpetegnun?”
42012015	Taagken qamaglluki pikii, “Kelengalusi allaaghiinaghmeng pakigniightelleghmeng, qayughllak yugem unguvalleghpigaa saghyiightelleghqun ayuqenghituq.”
42012016	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii, “Yuuk aklungilnguq nunalguftuq piitestighllakayugmeng.
42012017	Sumeghtaghaqaq, ‘Naten sanaqsinga? Piitesteghllakamnun kagpagvigitunga.’
42012018	Ellmineng kiimsiqaq, Whaten pinaqunga. Kagpagvigenka ifkaghqughluki, aangataghalghiineng kagpagvigkaneng nekefqughnaqunga. Enkaam qamaglluki grain-enka, saghyankallu kagpaglleqanka.
42012019	Taagken pillequnga unguvasimnun, ‘Unguvasimni, kagpagighllagtunga ayumiqullelghutnun! Taawa sananighnaqunga, neghaqlunga, meghaqlunga, pinighyuuggnaqunga!’
42012020	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem pikaa, ‘Uyuq nalluuqaq! Unukun unguvasin tuqunaqnguuq. Kagpagllakaghten tamaakut kitum piknaqaki?’”
42012021	Jesus-em taaqniqii, “Taatun yugtun ayuqut tamaakut sameng tamaghhaaneng kagpagilghiit ellmeggnun katam, iwernga Kiyaghneghmi aklumalghiinguut.”
42012022	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Tamaaken apalluqluku ungipaatamsi, nulqaviighutkegpenaan unguvalleghsi, sameng neghelleghqaghsi, nalighmeng sameng aatelleghqaghsi.
42012023	Unguvalleq megnunaghataghaghtuq neqneng, yugusiqlu megnunaghataghaghtuq aatkaneng.
42012024	Esghaqaghtekiqun meteghlluget, piitesighiigatut, nalighmeng unatiigatut, nalighmeng kagpagingigatut, naqamllu Kiyaghneghem neghqaqii. Elpesi megnunaghataghaghtusi qawaagneng!
42012025	Enkaam nalighpesi nulqaviighutkelluku unguvalleni taakughteregaghlleqaguu?
42012026	Nulqaviighem uyguvleghaghnaanghitutanganeng unguvalleq, sangan'ngam sangwaat alngunak nulqaviighutkaqesteki?
42012027	Esghaqaghtekiqun piitesighaat nagulghiit, qepghiigatut nalighmeng aatkanglliigatut ellmeggneng. Iwernga ungipaatamsi, talwa Solomon, aklungiteghllagmini aasimangituq piitesighaghestun pinightutkalghiimeng.
42012028	Kiyaghneghem aasightughaqii vegaaghet piitfigmeggnilnguut aghneghmi tawani, iwernga unaamingani qiitaqiit. Kiyaghneghem aasightuungukaki vegaaghet, elpesi aasightughataghaghnaanghitisii? Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi!
42012029	Sumeghtaghaamanginaghpenasi sameng neghelleghqaghpesinengllu meghelleghqaghpesinengllu. Nulqaviighutkegpenaki tamaakut,
42012030	qayughllak ugpeqingigalnguut Kiyaghneghmeng nulqaviighutkaqiit tamaakut. Atagpesi liisimakii aklukegkasi.
42012031	Tamaaken apalluqluku kiyaghtelleghpesini megnunalleghpigaaghtestekek Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghallu piyukellghallu. Tawaten pikufsi Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqii qamaglluki aklukegkasi.
42012032	“Alingegpenasi penniighhamni, qayughllak Atagpesi quyakusiqluku tuunyugaqaa elpesinun Ataneghpagulleq.
42012033	Saghyasi akikluki maniliteki aklumalghiit. Enkaam elpesi kagpagillequsi aklungigpesineng qilagmi. Tawaten pikufsi qilagmi aqeftaghaalgullequsi naavyaghqaanghilngughmeng. Tawani aklungisi naangyaghqaanghilnguut, teglegniightetlu tugunaanghitiit, moth-etlu naafqennaanghitiit.
42012034	Aklungisi naantekata sumeghtaghallesillu tawanllequt.
42012035	“Samun tamaghhaanun yataghqengngwaaghlusi, aatkasi aasaqleggiinaaghluki, kenelghutasi kumaghtengngwaaghluki.
42012036	Tawaten pikufsi qepghaghtestun ayuqellequsi utaqiilghiit umiilegmeggneng uteghnilleghqaaneng nengughutellghem neqenghaghqellghaneng. Enkaam kaalluni tenglugtuqan qelpeghutqaghlleqaat.
42012037	Quyanapigtut qepghaghtet teghhumaghmeng apeghiighwaaghluteng ayuqelghiit umiilgita kaaskumiki! Ipa ungipaatamsi, umiilgem qepghaghteni aqumuutesluki tipelegnekun, taagken kenigni tafsiillukek kepsiiqulleqii neqmeng.
42012038	Tagiiqlillu unugem qukaghtestegpenaan nalighmeng unugem qukaan kingunganeng. Iwernga qakun alngunak tagikumi tamaakut qepghaghtet apeghiighwaaqat quyastellelguyaghqaagut.
42012039	Iwernga liisimakluku una, mangteghalgem liisimaksaqumigu qakun teglegniightem tagilleghqaa, uninnaanghitaa mangteghani tegleghniighta naafqulluni iteghnayukan.
42012040	Elpesillu apeghiighsaghwaaghlusi pitek qayughllak Ighnegha Yugem tagiyaghqaaguq waakenghillghaghulluni.”
42012041	Peter-em aaptekaa, “Ataneq, ungipaghaan aapqan, whangkunnun pingwaa, nalighmeng tamaghhaanun?”
42012042	Atanghem kiimsiqaa whaten, “Kinangaawa ataasiighmelnguq, peghqinelghii qepghaghta? Taananguyaghqaaguq umiilgan igleghutistengllaqaa qepghaghteminun, neqelitaatiisqellukillu aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
42012043	Taana qepghaghta quyastellengyaghqaaguq, umiilgem kaalluni esghaqumigu qelelleghmitun pilghii.
42012044	Ipa ungipaatamsi, taana qepghaghta umiilgan igleghutistengllaghyaghqaqaa saminun tamaghhaanun.
42012045	Iwernga taana qepghaghta sumeghtaghaamakumi whaten, ‘Umiilka muluuq tagigpenani’, enkaam qevutqughyagulleqii qepghaghtet yugetlu aghnatlu. Neghaqluni, meghaqluni, suumaqlunillu pillequq.
42012046	Taagken umiilga kaallequq nallutghaaghulluni, sighimakenghilkangani aghneghem. Enkaam umiilgem aghyuughmigtaaghllaglleqaa, ilatesleqaallu ataasiighneghilngughnun.
42012047	Qepghaghta apeghiighsallghilnguq nalighmeng umiilegmi piyukellghatun piyunghilnguq anagulellengeghllagllequq.
42012048	Iwernga qepghaghtem nallukegkumigu sasqesullgha umiilegmi, anaggutkaayaghngaaghmi aghsaan ayuqluku anagulellengellequq. Yuuk tuunellengeghllakaq sameng, sayaghqaghtullequq; yuuk wata tuunellengeghllakaq sameng, wataqaaghaq sayaghqaghtughllagllequq.
42012049	“Tagikaagunga keneghmeng milughnaluku nuna, whaatuq maaten kumalghii!
42012050	Iwernga taam sivungani paaptaayeyaghqaagunga ikfiqelleghqunllu tuqulleghqunllu. Enkaam seghleliighllaguunga kenlanga paaptaayelqa apeghiillghanun.
42012051	Sumeghpesini taginnilunga nekeggmelleghmeng pistengngaa nunamun? Yeghlegillu, ungipaatamsi, aafquutestiyaghtuugunga.
42012052	Whaken kenlekluku nengllugutkullghiit tallimat aafquullequt apalluqlunga whanga. Pingayut kipullginaaghlleqagket maalghuk, enkaam maalghuk kipullginaaghlleqiik pingayut.
42012053	Ellngit aafqemeraaghullequt; atam kipullginaaghlleqaa ighneni, enkaam ighneghem kipullginaaghlleqaa atani. Naam kipullginaaghlleqaa panini, enkaam panigan kipullginaaghlleqaa naani. Aghnam kipullginaaghlleqaa ukaani, enkaam ukaaghan kipullginaaglleqaa aghnaq sakini.”
42012054	Taagken Jesus-em yulghuteghllaget pikii, “Esghaqufsigu qilagwaaq mayulghii pakfallamelluku, tawaninginaq pillequsi, ‘Eslallugughnaqaa’ pinaqnilleghpesistun pillequq.
42012055	Anuqa ikevaaghtekan, pillequsi, ‘Puqlaghqwaanaqaa’ pinaqnilleghpesistun pillequq.
42012056	Liisimakisighwaalghiini elpesi! Nunamllu qilagamllu nekegnegha esghaneghpesigu, eslam natetulanga liisimakaqaghsi. Sangan'ngam liisimaksunghisteki maaten sangwaat sallghet sameng pisiitangi?
42012057	“Sangan liigikigasteggu elpesineng katam sangwaa pinitun pillghutanga?
42012058	Avutkistegpek nanqigtivigmun aglaasimaluten, tumemi taakwani kaatfagilgaftek nallghusaghnaken qaniqutelleghtek. Pinghilkuvek ighsagpegun aglaalleqaaten nanqigtistemun. Enkaam nanqigtistem tuunelleqaaten umiilwaaghmun anusiminglliisqelluten.
42012059	Ungipaatamken, aanaanghituten kenlanga kingulighpigaq manin llivikuusaqelleghpenun.”
42013001	Tamaani pilleghni ilangi yuget tamaanteftut, ungipaatkaat Jesus Pilate-mun tuqutesimaniluki ilangi Galilee-eghmiit aghqerraaghumaluki Kiyaghneghmun. Aawitlu akumutesimaniluki aawitnun teghikusat.
42013002	Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sumeghpesinii taakut Galilee-ghmiit seghleghqengngaaghataghaghpetaat ilangitneng Galilee-ghmiineng qayughllak tawaten tuqutkaalghiit?
42013003	Ungipaatamsi, nakaa! Avuteghqellusi seghleghqennaniimakufsi taawa qamagllusi elpesillu tuqullequsi ellngistun.
42013004	Neqamikenghistekii Siloam-emi qula pingayuneng inglulek yuget tower-em ulleghvikluki tuququqii? Sumeghpesinii taakut seghleghqengngaaghataghaghtaat Jerusalem-emi kiyaghlleghhiineng?
42013005	Ungipaatamsi, nakaa! Avuteghqellusi seghleghqennaniimakufsi taawa qamagllusi elpesillu tuqullequsi ellngistun.”
42013006	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii, “Yugem piitesighaghtestekaa figs-em uqfiga grapes-mun piitesighaghvigmini. Esghaghyaghtughaqegkanga piitestimanayukan, iwernga avangitaqelghii.
42013007	Enkaam piitesighaghteni pikaa, ‘Ii-i, pingayuni ayumiqulleghni esghaghyaghtughaqsaghaqa uqfik piitestimanayukan iwernga avangitaquq. Kepigu! Piitfigillghaannaquq.’
42013008	Iwernga piitesighaghtem pikaa, ‘Yuguniiq, wiin whani ayumiqulleghmi avelghaghhu. Uvitanga laagnaqaqa, enkaam katagughvikelleqaqa piinnaasimeng.
42013009	Ayumiqun piitquumakumi pinighllequq, enan piitestinghilkan, kepesnaken.’”
42013010	Taagken ataasimi Sabbath-em aghneghani, synagogue-mi Jesus apeghtughikaq.
42013011	Tawanteftughnguq aghnaq qula pingayuneng inglulek ayumiqulleghni tughneghaam kayaaleghqegkaa. Pakegngastekaa enkaam taklaghruketun nekevigalnguq.
42013012	Jesus-em esghaghyamigu tagsighluku pikaa, “Aghnaq, itemutamken kayaaleghqengngalleghpeneng.”
42013013	Taagken saaftekaa, enkaam taklaghrukguutnginaamaghmi pikaq, usuqikaqlu Kiyaghneghmeng.
42013014	Synagogue-em igleghutistengan ugumiyagutkaa Jesus qayughllak naallghutilghii Sabbath-mi. Enkaam pikii yuget, “Aghvinleguut aghneghet qepghaghvigkaput, enkaam tagiiqitek taakuni aghneghni naallghutesqellusi, nakaan Sabbath-mi!”
42013015	Atanghem pikaa, “Uyuq piniiyugneq! Sabbath-mi, tamaghaghpesi ox-esi nalighmeng donkey-si itemulluki meghesaghtughaqasi.
42013016	Una aghnaq kingunqaa Abraham-em, Tughneghaam asighqegkaqaa qula pingayuneng inglulegni ayumiqulleghni. Ipapestaaq anaggutellghunghituq itemutelleghqaa Sabbath-mi!”
42013017	Jesus-em tawaten piyisteng, qamaglluteng anguyagi kaynguyugutkat. Enkaam qamaglluteng yuget quyateghllakat pinighrakegtaneng apeghiiqaaneng.
42013018	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Nateta Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullgha? Samun inglunnaqsikun?
42013019	Mustard-em piitutangatun ayuquq, yugem tuguluku piitesighaqanga piitesighaghvigmikun. Naguyalghiimi uqfigughtekaq, enkaam avayaakun qawaaget unglusikat.”
42013020	Allameng Jesus-em aaptekii, “Samun inglunnaqsikun Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem?
42013021	Yeast-atun ayuquq aghnam akuututaqegkanga avlawaghllagmun, enkaam akuutaghllak ghhuughtesteghllakaa.”
42013022	Jesus aglaatkelluku Jerusalem-emun, apeghtughimaghmi pikaq nenillu, nengiighhaghnillu.
42013023	Kitum aaptekaa, “Ataneq, palasqughhaawaat yuget yuguliyaghqat?” Jesus-em kiimsiqii,
42013024	“Sagiqlusi iteghnaqutkitek kagpestaaghhaghqun amigkun. Ungipaatamsi, uglaapiglleghiit yuget iteghnaqutkellequt, taawanginaq iteghpagningitut.
42013025	Mangtegham yugan makelluni amik umegyaghtughlleqaa. Enkaam tesqakmani nekevghallequsi, tenglugtughllequsillu whaten pimaghpesi, ‘Ataneq, qelpeghutaghtikut!’ Kiimsighlleqiisi, ‘Nallukamsi, nallukaqallu naken pingutsi.’
42013026	Taagken pilleqaghsi, ‘Neghelghusighaqamkenllu, meghelghusighaqamkenllu, apeghtughikaagutenllu tumemnni.’
42013027	Iwernga pilaataghlleqiisi, ‘Ungipaatamsi, nallukamsi, nallukaqallu naken pingutsi. Iqillaghaatek whangamneng elpesi seghletun pisteni!’
42013028	Taagken qiyaaghwaghllagllequsi, ggutesillu terqitaagtaamiita. Tawaten pillequsi esghaqufsiki Abraham-enkut Isaac-enkut Jacob-enkut, qamagllukillu uuknaliqistet. Ellngit Ataneghpagullghanillequt Kiyaghneghem, iwernga elpesi eslatmun miluulleqiisi!
42013029	Enkaam yuget tagillequt asivaghmeng, pakfallameng, aywaaneng, ikevaghmeng. Taagken aqumellequt tipelegni Ataneghpagullghani Kiyaghneghem.
42013030	Nagataghtekqun, tamaakut ukaliit megnunaghsaghqaagut, enkaam megnunalghiit ukaliighsaghqaagut.”
42013031	Tawani pilleghmi ilangita Pharisees-et takuluku Jesus pikaat, “Maaken iqilluten natmun aghulaqi qayughllak Herod-em tuqutestesugaqaaten.”
42013032	Jesus-em pikii, “Ungipaasaghtughteggu taana kaviiq, ‘Nagaten, aghneghmi aanesquugunga tughneghaghneng, naallghuquugungallu qinuyulghiineng. Unaamillu tawateghpigaq pillequnga. Taagken pingayaani aghneghem qepghaqaqa apeghiighlleqaqa.’
42013033	Naqamllu igleghsaghqapestaaghuunga aghneghmi, unaami, awakaghaanillu, qayughllak itagnanghituq uuknaliqista tuqusaghqaaluni nani alngunak iwerngaqun Jerusalem-emi.
42013034	“Kaay Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Tuququqaqaten uuknaliqistet, milughpagaataghlukillu tuququqaqaten Kiyaghneghem kayagtekii elpenun. Uglaapiglluku qerngughsugaqsaghanka yugten whangamnun, katam tawaten qawaagem yaqugmi asinganun qerngughtellghatun amaaghani. Iwernga tawaten pistesimangitaghpenga!
42013035	Nagaten, mangteghan paaghqiilleqaa qayughllak Kiyaghneghem uninnaqaatenllu paqniighsaghnanighnaqaatenllu. Ungipaatamken, esghaghnaanghitaghpenga kenlanga whaten pilleghqaghpenun, ‘Kiyaghneghem quyasligu tagilghii aatghakun Atanghem!’”
42014001	Ataasimi Sabbath-mi, Jesus neghyaghtughyan ataasimun igleghutistengitnun Pharisees-et, tawanlenguut yuget riirngingwaaqaat.
42014002	Jesus-em manunganiteftuq yuuk, ighukeklu, tallikekllu puuvngalghiik.
42014003	Jesus-em aleghquqii apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng, Pharisees-etlu, aaptekii, “Liilightuusamtaa naallghutisqinkuut Sabbath-mi, nalighmeng pisnanightinkuut?”
42014004	Iwernga nepiighwaaghutkat. Taagken saafluku yuuk naallghulluku, aglaghtestekaa.
42014005	Taagken aaptekii, “Nalighsi ighnelgukumi, nalighmeng ox-elgukumi, Sabbath-mi meghtaghvigmun ifkaqan, tawaninginaq sayugnayaghtaguu Sabbath-ngughngaan?”
42014006	Taawa kiimsighpagningitkaat.
42014007	Jesus-em esghaqii ilangi aqellqat aqumuullghiit aangwaaghet aqumutiitgun. Enkaam ungipaghaatkii,
42014008	“Tagsiqlillengegkuvek nengughhnaqelghiik neqenghaghqellghegkenun, aqumefqaavek pilghaaten aangwaaghet aqumutiitgun, kina tagsiqliqaanayukan aangwaaghataghalghii elpeneng.
42014009	Tagsiqlighikam elpetegneng tagiluni whaten pilleqaaten, ‘Aqumestigu taana aqumvigpegun.’ Elngaatall tawani kaynguyugllequten nuugtekuvek ukavanlenguum aqumutagkenun.
42014010	Iwernga tagsiqliqangaten, aqumyaghtughhaaten aqumutam ukavantellghanun. Tagsiqlightegpek tagiluni pilleqaaten, ‘Ilakumtaamni, aqumyaghtaa aangwaaghughtekat aqumutiitnun.’ Elngaatall quulvallengellequten aqelqalghutet esghaamanghitni.
42014011	Tamaghhaghmeng ellmeggneng aangwaaghughtekat qusevegtellengyaghqaagut, iwernga tamaghhaghmeng ellmeggneng quseveglleghhiit, taawa aangwaaghughtellengyaghqaagut.”
42014012	Taagken Jesus-em tagsiqlighteni pikaa, “Neghyaghtiisqikuvek tagsiqlifqiita ilakumtaaghten, angleguteten, ilakwaaghten, nalighmeng aklungilnguut uvilighneghten, qayughllak uteghmun ellngitallu ellmeggnun neghyaghtiisqennayukangaten. Tawaten pikufki akitkallghuughlleqaaten.
42014013	Iwernga neqenghaghqestinaqngukuvek, tagsiqlighnaketen aklumalghiit, yugusiit nalighneghllugmelnguut, ighullugmelnguut, ayaakatlu.
42014014	Enkaam quyastellengellequten qayughllak tamaakut akitepagningitaaten. Kiyaghneghem akileghtughlleqaaten unguvaghtekumiki qaatkutngalghiit yuget.”
42014015	Tipelegni ataasim aqumgalghiim nagalluku Jesus pikaa, “Quyastekaagut neghyaghtughyaghqat neqenghaghqellghanun Ataneghpagullghan Kiyaghneghem!”
42014016	Iwernga Jesus-em pikaa, “Yuuk neqenghaghqinaqumalghii, uglaqlu tagsiqliqaa.
42014017	Neqet apeghiighyata, qepghaghteni kayagtekaa whaten piyaghtiisqelluki tagsiqliqani, ‘Tagilaghaatek, neghyaqleggiinaaghtukut!’
42014018	Iwernga qamaglluteng tagsiqliqii apghusiighutkat. Sivuliim qepghaghta pikaa, ‘Piitesighaghvingumaanga, esghaghyaghtupestaaghnaqngwaaqa. Umiilgen ungipaataghnaken, qivghukaqanguq neghyaghtughpagningilnguunga!’
42014019	Tuunglighhaan pikaa, ‘Tallimat inglukullghiit ox-et tukfiimaanka, nanghiiquyaghtughnaqaqanka qepghallegtulngit. Umiilgen ungipaataghhnaken, qivghukaqanguq neghyaghtughpagningilnguunga.’
42014020	Enkaam ilangan pikaa, ‘Nulightunghhaagunga, enkaam neghyaghtughpagningitunga.’
42014021	Qepghaghtem tagiluni umiilegminun aapqii sameng pillghit. Taagken umiilgem sakriteghllagumaghmi qepghaghteni pikaa, ‘Aanqaghlluten neghllagem tuumngitneng tagiquutiki aklumalghiit, yugusiit nalighneghllugmelnguut, ayaakat, ighullugmelnguut.’
42014022	Mulugpenani qepghaghtem pikaa, ‘Yuguniiq, qelelleghpetun apeghiightuq, iwernga paninang nekaghqaghllaguuq.’
42014023	Umiilgem pikaa, ‘Aanluten neghllagmeng tumenilnguut yuget tagilaghaatesqiki enkaam mangteghaqa esleqaghaghlli.
42014024	Ungipaatamsi, tamaakut tagsiqliqaqsaqenka neghnaanghitut neqenghaghqusimneng.’”
42014025	Yulghuteghllaget maliglleghaatkaat Jesus. Qiivluki pikii,
42014026	“Kina alngunak tagilghii whangamnun maligsaaghteknaanghitaqa wetkuqun piniqataghaquminga pakiggullunga atamineng, naamineng, nuliighmineng, avaqutamineng, anglegutmineng, nayagmineng, ellminengllu katam.
42014027	Kitum alngunak ellmi katam qaquurani uyaminghilkumigullu maligtekumingallu, maligsaaghtekepagningitaqa.”
42014028	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Nalighsi tower-engllaghyugukumi, sivukluni aqumluni akitulanga naraqelleqaa naamayaghqaanayukan manini.
42014029	Naraqenghilkumigu manini, tunemangllaghluku tower-a peglleqaa. Enkaam yuget esghaghluku nenglaghyugsaatkelleqaat.
42014030	Pillequt, ‘Uum yugem piinlighluku nekeftekani taaqepagningitaa.’”
42014031	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sanayaghtatuq umiilek ilangan umiilgem sughugnaqngukangatni? Sivukluni aqumaghlluni akuzimghhutkennayaghaa ilaminun kayaalqiiyaghqaanayukami 10,000-meng pilluwaghtelighluni, pilluwaghyaghyaqumigu umiilek 20,000-meng pilluwaghtelek.
42014032	Iwernga kayaalqiipagningilkumi, taagken umiilek salin uyavanteghllagluku kayaglleqii akuzistekaghqani ellnganun. Whaten piyaghtiisqelleqaa, ‘Sasqesugsikut nekeggmetunnaluta?’”
42014033	Jesus-em nagneghutkii, “Enkaam una sumegtaghaatkiteggu, kitum alngunak pegsunghilkumiki qamaglluki ellmi pini, maligsaaghtekepagningitaqa.”
42014034	Jesus-em taaqniqii, “Taghyuq pinightuq, iwernga taghyughningiiskumi allamengllu taghyughnighunnaanghituq.
42014035	Taawa pinighnaanghituq sunamun, nalighmeng piinnasiiluni piitesighaghvigmun, enkaam yuget eglleqaat. Nagatek, sigutelguusi!”
42015001	Ataasimi aghneghmi, tax-meng qerngughtistelghutetlu, ilangillu seghleghqestelghutet nagasaatkat Jesus-mun.
42015002	Pharisees-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng qikeghqukat, “Uum yugem tuguklighaqii seghleghqestet, neghelgusighaqiillu.”
42015003	Enkaam Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii,
42015004	“Nalighsi 100-meng penniilguyaqumi, ataasiq iflayaqumigu, sanayaghta? Unilluki 99-et penniini neghumaluki vegaaghtuqami, ivaghyaghtughnayaghaa iflakaq penniini kenlanga naalkelleghminun.
42015005	Naalkesamigu, quyapiglluni uyamikaa.
42015006	Ellmeggnun kaalluni tagsiqliqii ilakumtaani, uviqlinillu pikii, ‘Quyalgusiqaghtengnga, qayughllak naalkaqa penniiqa iflakaayalghii!’
42015007	Ungipaatamsi, tawateghpigaq qilagmi quyakataghaghlleqaat ataasiq seghleghqesta avuteghqelluni seghleghqennanilghii, pakiggulluku taakuneng 99-eghyagneng pinilghiineng yugneng avuteghqesaghqaanghilngughneng.”
42015008	Taagken Jesus-em ilanganeng ungipaghaatkii, “Aghnaq qulaghyak silver-meng coin-elguyaqumi, ataasiq iflayaqumigu, sanayaghta? Kenelghutak kumaghllukek mangteghani allegnayaghaa ivaghingwaaghumaghmi kenlanga naalkelleghminun.
42015009	Naalkesamigu tagsiqliqii ilakumtaani, uviqlinillu pikii, ‘Quyalgusiqaghtengnga, qayughllak naalkaqa coin-eka iflakaqsaqegka!’
42015010	Ungipaatamsi, tawateghpigaq Kiyaghneghem yaqulgi quyaaqut ataasiq seghleghqesta avuteghqelluni seghleghqennanilghii.”
42015011	Taagken Jesus-em ilanganeng ungipaghaatkii, “Taawanguq yuuk maalghugegneng ighnelek.
42015012	Uyuqliim ighneghan pikaa atani, ‘Ataay, saghyagpeneng tuuninga nengighqamneng.’ Enkaam atangan tuunegkakek ighneghegni nengighqagkeneng.
42015013	Mulunghituq, uyuqliim ighneghan akikughluki nengini aghulaqegkaq uyavanlengughmun nunamun. Tamaani manini sakusiiqluku,
42015014	saqraggiighutkaq. Enraqlu tamaana nuna neqangisagllagughtekaq enkaam nuughteghllagughtekaq.
42015015	Enkaam qepghaghyaqaq yugmun tamaanlengughmun; taagken yugem qepghaqalitkaa neghqistenguluku kurugaghneng.
42015016	Iyatam angtalanganeng kurugaat neghqutkiitneng neghyaghngaaghmi lliiqaq, kitumllu alngunak neghyaghqalisigalkanga.
42015017	Qenwatlu liisaaghaqaq, ‘Paneghniqumalunga maani, qamaglluteng atama akileghtughluteng qepghaghtengi neghaqut kepsuulluteng, masisu siiptiigaqut!
42015018	Aglaghnaqunga atamnun whaten pinaluku, Ataay, seghleghqumaanga Kiyaghneghmunllu, elpenunllu.
42015019	Ighneghulungangam piyaghqaananighnga. Akileghtuqayugestun qepghaghtegpetun lliightestinga.’
42015020	Enkaam nekevluni ataminun aglaqaq. Iwernga salin uyavanlluku atangan esghaqaa. Nangllegyaguteghllagluku aqfaasnaq payeghluku qetqaghlluku naaqaa.
42015021	Ighneghan pikaa, ‘Ataay, seghleghqumaanga Kiyaghneghmunllu elpenunllu. Ighneghulungangam piyaghqaananighnga.’
42015022	Iwernga atangan pikii qepghaghteni, ‘Uuhuk, pinilleghpigaak atkuyaaghek tagillukek aatestekek, alangqughiitighteggullu, kamegteggullu.
42015023	Enkaam quwintallghaneng kaawaghaam tuqutiighuteggu. Neqenghaghqeghllagnaqukut quyaghllagem angtalanganeng,
42015024	qayughllak ighneqa una tuqukaayalghii, unguvaamaaq; iflakaayalghii naalkumaaq.’ Enkaam neqenghaghqeghllakat.
42015025	“Tawani pilleghmi, nuyekliq ighnegha piitesighaghvigmelnguq. Mangteghamun kaasaghtughluni nagaquqii aynganangalghiitlu tukalegalghiitlu.
42015026	Ataasiq qepghagata tuqlughluku aaptekaa saaqutangi.
42015027	Qepghaghtem pikaa, ‘Uyughaan kaasimaaq. Atagpek tuqutiighutesimaa quwintallghaneng kaawaghaam, qayughllak kaallghii yaywaaseng pinighluni.’
42015028	Anengaa sakritkaq, iteghyugumangitkaqlu. Atangan aanvikluku iitghesqughaaqaa.
42015029	Iwernga atani pikaa, ‘Ayumiqullelghutni qepghaateghllagamken, qaatkenghisigatanka qelghutkaghten. Tawalliima goat-aaghaghmeng tuqutiighusigataghpenga ilakumtaaqullghiini neqenghaghqesqelluta.
42015030	Iwernga uum ighneghpek sakusiiqegkaqaa manin aghnanun yugusimeggneng akikikayugneng. Enkaam uteghnighyan whaa elpek tuqutiighutestan quwintallghaneng kaawaghaam!’
42015031	Atangan pikaa, ‘Ighnemni, quunpeng elpek whangkunnitaquten. Qamaglluki saghyanka elpek pikaten.
42015032	Iwernga quyaluta neqenghaghqengnguukut, qayughllak una uyughaan tuqukaayalghii, unguvaamaaq; iflakaayalghii naalkumaaq.’”
42016001	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii maligsaaghteni, “Taawanguq aklungilnguq yuuk qepghaghtelguftuq, umiilgutistengllaqaa saghyaminun. Ataasimi aghneghmi kitum ungipaasimakanga aklungilnguq yuuk umiilgutistengllaqaanun sakusiiqniluki saghyangi.
42016002	Enkaam tagsighluku pikaa, ‘Samaniluten nagaqughaqsiken? Umiilgutinanighnaquten saghyamnun. Enkaangam whangamnun tagitiki igaghten; yuvghiighnaqanka.’
42016003	Taana yuuk sumeghtaghaqaq, ‘Umiilegma taaqestaanga qepghaqamneng. Sanaqsingangam? Kayaatepigtunga laagmun, kaynguyugaqungallu tungsighniilleghqamneng.
42016004	Qepghaqiighuskuma paninang yugnun tuguklightesugtunga ellngitnun.’ Enkaam tawaten pikaq.
42016005	Tagsiqlighteqii ataasikaghtiita asengelget umiilegmineng. Sivuliq aaptekaa, ‘Naten angkaan asingemazigu umiilka?’
42016006	Kiimsiqaa, ‘100-nguut aqimleghutaghllaget olives-em mesiighaneng imalget.’ Taagken pikaa, ‘Tuguluku asengegpek igaa, aqumqaghlluten igaqigu 50’.
42016007	Taagken ilanga aaptekaa, ‘Elpek naten angkaan asingemazigu?’ Kiimsiqaa, ‘1,000 bushels-nguut wheat-et’ Taam yugem pikaa, ‘Tuguluku asengegpek igaa, igaqigu 800’.
42016008	Umiilgan usuqegkaa ataasiighneghilnguq qepghaghteni peghqiniqellghaneng. Ipanguuq uum nunam yugi ilameggneng akilpeganeghmeggni, tukfightuneghmeggni, peghqiniqataghaghaqut nighugmelngughneng yugneng.
42016009	Ungipaatamsi, nunamelnguq aklungisi kayusiitusiqiteggu yugnun ilakumtaangllaasiiluku elpesinun. Taagken tuqukufsi aklungisi unilleqasi, enkaam upughatellengellequsi kenlengilngughnun nekaghqanun.
42016010	Kina alngunak ataasiighmeskumi sayaghqasqughhaghminun, ataasiighmellequqlu sayaghqalghutminun. Kina alngunak ipapighqigalkumi sayaghqasqughhaghminun, ipapighqennaanghituqlu sayaghqalghutminun.
42016011	Ataasiighmesimangilkufsi atuqaqngafsiki aklungit nunamelnguut, kitumngam neghyukulleqaki elpesinun aklungipiiget?
42016012	Enkaam ataasiighmesimangilkufsi kinkut pingitnun, kitumngam tuunelleqisi elpesi pigpesineng?
42016013	Qepghaghtem qepghaannaanghitaak maalghuk umiilgek. Maalghugegneng umiilelgukumi ugumikelleqaa aallgha, piniqelleqaa ilanga, nalighmeng qaatkelleqaa aallgha, siivaknaanghitaa ilanga. Piniqnaanghitagsi qerngaagkenka Kiyaghneghenkuk maninkuk.”
42016014	Pharisees-et maniyuneghpalluut nagasamegteggu tamaana qamaglluku, legasiighwaatkegkaat Jesus.
42016015	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesi pinighsugningllaghaqusi yuget esghaamanghitni, iwernga Kiyaghneghem liisimakiisi ipa natetulesi ilugpesigun. Sangwaat yuget megnukegkiit satngunghitut Kiyaghneghem esghaamanghani.
42016016	“Kiyaghneghem yugnun tuunegkaqii Liilightuusatlu uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkiit atuqesqelluki kenlanga John-em Paaptaayestem tagillghanun. Taam kingunganeng Pinilghiit Ungipat Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem ayuqelghiit ungipaqinguut. Enkaam qamaglluteng yuget qevuutepiglluteng iteghnaqutkeghllakaat.
42016017	Iwernga piyaqnaghataghaghtuq iqitelleghqaa ataasiq tagneqraghhaq Liilightuusaneng, qilagenkuk nunankuk aviighutelleghqagkeneng.
42016018	“Kitum alngunak peglluku nuliini, allaneng nulightuqumi gelghaghniighllequq. Kitumllu alngunak tugukumigu pegtekaq aghnaq gelghaghniighllequq.”
42016019	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Taawanguq aklungilnguq yuuk pilugugngalghii akitupiglleghhiineng aatkaneng. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan neqem akitullghinaaneng neghaqelghii siiptiighllagaqluni.
42016020	Taawallunguq aklumalghii yuuk aatgha Lazarus. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan tagitaqegkangat aklungilnguum mangteghaanun lliiqluku eslaklighneghakun amigllagan. Kitumun neghestesupigtaqsalghii ifkaghqelleghmeng asinganilngughmeng tipelngan aklungilnguum. Uvinga alqwaaghngalghii ukiqelleghmeng enkaam qikmit tagiluteng alungraqaqegkangit.
42016022	Tagtalmi aklumalghii yuuk tuqukaq, enkaam yaqulget aglaatkaat Abraham-em nayaanun. Aklungilnguqlu yuuk tuquyan lliifqaat.
42016023	Hades-mi aklungilnguq yuuk ikfiqeghllaguftuq. Quulmun esghaghyalghiimi, uyavaghpanllukek esghaqakek Abraham-enkuk Lazarus-enkuk saaqwliqullutek.
42016024	Enkaam aklungilnguq yuuk akilghuukaq, ‘Ataay, Abraham, nangllegyaguteqeghtinga! Kayagtigu Lazarus, ighneghwaani nepluku meghmun uluka nenglekegsaghtuqaghligu, qayughllak kenghem ikfiqesteghllagwaanga!’
42016025	Iwernga Abraham-em pikaa, ‘Ighnemni, neqamikan nunami kiyagtaaghuluten pinilghiimeng pilgukaalghiiten, Lazarus pilgumaluku seghleghmeng. Iwernga maaten itagnaghillengumaaq, elpek ikfiqeghllagumaluten.
42016026	Taam saaghwakun, akulemnnituq aangepiglleghhii aghvighyaghllak. Enkaam ukegken kina aghvighpagningituq elpesinun, taagegken kina aghvighpagningituq whangkunnun.’
42016027	Aklungilnguum yugem pikaa, ‘Naqam Ataay, tungsighvikaghllaken, Lazarus kayagtaghtigu atama mangteghaanun,
42016028	qayughllak tallimaneng anglegutelguunga. Kelengasaaghyaghtughliki luuraq taginayukata whavek ikfiqfigllagmun!’
42016029	Iwernga Abraham-em pikaa, ‘Igaquqiit Moses-emllu uuknaliqistetlu ellngitnitut, liitiviknakangit.’
42016030	Aklungilnguum yugem pikaa, ‘Nakaan, ataay Abraham! Itupill kitum tuqumasliighneng takuyaqumiki, avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennanighnayaghtut.’
42016031	Iwernga Abraham-em pikaa, ‘Liitfikumangilkumegteki igaquqiit Moses-emllu uuknaliqistetlu, talwa ugpeghtesnaanghitii tuqumasliighem unguvaghluni ungipaaskumiki.’”
42017001	Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Seghleghqestinaqutkellghet quunpeng piyaghqaagut. Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq taana seghleghqestinaqutkilghii yugneng.
42017002	Taam yugem seghleghqestekagu naliit mekestaaghhaat ugpeqingalghiit whangamneng, itagnaghnayaghtuq yuget qaamqaghfikluku uyghagllagmeng uyaqghwakun miluusaqumegteggu kelliimun.
42017003	Enkaam kelengalusi! Seghleghqesnaqutkegpenaki yuget. “Ugpeqaalguten seghleghqegkan, aghyuughnaken. Enkaam avuteghqelluni seghleghqennaniqan, seghevunnaken.
42017004	Ataasimi aghneghmi maaghraghvinlegneng seghletun pikangaten, tagiighaataqanllu elpenun maaghraghvinlegneng whaten pimaghmi, ‘Qivghukepigtamken seghletun piighaatallemneng’, seghevutepestaaghyaghqaqan.”
42017005	Apostle-et Ataneq pikaat, “Ugpeqilleghtughtaghaqaghqut!”
42017006	Atanghem pikii, “Ugpeqillelguyaqufsi mustard-em piitutangatun angkalghiimeng, una mulberry uqfik whaten pikufsigu, ‘Akughtuumaghpek iikluten, piisaghtaa kelliikun’, qaatkennayaghiisi.”
42017007	“Nalighsi qepghaghtelguyaqumi piitesighaghvigmi nunamun laagwaaghtemeng, nalighmeng penniighmeng aflengakikayugmeng, uteghniqan qepghaghvigmineng pinayaghsiguu, ‘Esnevaghaghlluten, neghi’?
42017008	Nakaa! Itupill whaten pilleqan, ‘Yataaghqigu neghyaghqaqa. Simightughluten kepsiiqunga neghyaghqamneng, meghyaghqamneng. Neneghmeng taaqegkuma, neghumaghpek, meghumaghpek pilghaaten.’
42017009	Umiilgem iyamsiqayugviknaanghitaa qepghaghteni qayughllak taawaraaghinaq qelellghatun piiqelghii.
42017010	Elpesillu tawatetusi. Apeghiighumakufsiki qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem qelghutkii, whaten pillequsi, ‘Qepghaghtenginaagukut; taawaraaghinaq qelghutkaghhiinaat piiqaput.’”
42017011	Jesus Jerusalem-emun pitkelluku, igleghtekaq akulegkenkun Samaria-nkuk Galilee-nkuk.
42017012	Nengiighhaghmun kaataquqlu, qulaghyaget yuget leprosy-lget nallaqaat. Uyavaqaanlluteng
42017013	akilghuukat, “Jesus! Yuguniiq! Nangllegyagutaghtikut!”
42017014	Esghaghyamiki pikii, “Aglaghtek priest-enun yuvghiighesqellusi.” Igleghsimaluteng naallghutkat, ukmangiitkat leprosy-meggneng.
42017015	Taagken ataasim esghaghluku naallghutelleni, Jesus-mun uteghlluni, iglagtuluni usuqegkaa Kiyaghneq.
42017016	Jesus-em itegaan sivungakun sekelluni nunamun iyamsiqayugvikegkaa. Yuuk taana Samaria-ghmiinguftuq.
42017017	Taagken Jesus pikaq, “Qulanguyaghtut naallghutkanka. Naaki estamaneng inglulget yuget?
42017018	Una nakumii, ellnginaawaa uteghlluni usuqiyaghtulghii Kiyaghneghmun?”
42017019	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Nekevluten ighleghten, ugpeqilleghpek naallghutestaaten.”
42017020	Ilangita Pharisees-et aaptekaat Jesus qakun Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem tagiyaghqaatanga. Kiimsiqii, “Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem taginguuq iwernga yuget esghaghyaghqaqenghitaat qayughllak nalluniighusiilnguq.
42017021	Enkaam kina alngunak whaten pinaanghituq, ‘Ii-i, whaantuq!’ nalighmeng ‘Esgha tazigna!’ qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem ilugpesinituq.”
42017022	Taagken maligsaaghteni pikii, “Ukegkuni aghneghni tagilghiini whangamnisugllagllequsi, Ighneghani Yugem, waran ataasimun aghneghmun, iwernga taana aghneq esghaghnaanghitaghsi.
42017023	Yuget ungipaalleqiisi, ‘Ii-i, esgha tazigna Ighnegha Yugem!’ nalighmeng ‘Ii-i, whaantuq!’ Iwernga takugpenaki, maligtegpenaki.
42017024	Katam nighugpaguutellghem nighugtellghatun qilaga inglunganeng agavek inglunganun, tawatesaghqaaguq Ighnegha Yugem uteghniqumi nunamun.
42017025	Iwernga sivukluni, Ighnegha Yugem uglalghiimeng ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq, ighsaksaghqaqaatlu maaten kiyaghlleghhiit yuget.
42017026	Sivungani uteghnilleghqaan Ighneghan Yugem, yuget kiyaghtaallghit tawatesaghqaagut yuget kiyaghtellghistun taagani aghneghni Noah kiyaghtengnguluku.
42017027	Yuget neghaqluteng, meghaqluteng, nengughutaqluteng, aang'ghutiiqluteng pikaagut kenlanga Noah-m ark-mun itellghanun. Taagken uleveghllagem tuququqaqii qamagtengngwaaghluki.
42017028	Yuget kiyaghtaallghit tawatesaghqaagut yuget kiyaghtellghistun taagani aghneghni Lot kiyaghtengnguluku. Yuget neghaqluteng, meghaqluteng, tukfighiiqluteng, akikiiqluteng, piitesighaghaqluteng, nekeftiiqluteng pikaagut.
42017029	Iwernga tawani aghneghmi Lot aghulaqsan Sodom-emeng, qilagmeng eslallugughtekaaguq keneghmengllu sulphur-mengllu, enkaam tuququqaqii qamagtengngwaaghluki.
42017030	“Tawani aghneghmi Ighnegha Yugem aliightekan, yuget kiyaghtaallghat almesiqsaghqaqaa yuget kiyaghtaalqesaqangistun sivunghani.
42017031	Taam aghneghani, yuuk mangtegham qaaynganilnguq ukifqaami pilghaaq mangteghami ilunganun saghyaqunaluni. Tawateghpigaq piitesighaghvigmelnguq mangteghaminun pifqaami pilghaaq.
42017032	Neqamikiteggu sakaatanga Lot-em nulighha!
42017033	Enkaam kitum alngunak peggneghilkumigu unguvalleni Ataneghmun, iflayaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak pegtekumigu unguvalleni Ataneghmun, unguvallengepiigllequq.
42017034	Ungipaatamsi, Ighnegha Yugem tagikan, tawani unugmi, maalghuk qavaallequk ataasimi qavaghvigmi. Aallgha tugulleqaa, ilanga uneglleqaa.
42017035	Maalghuk aghnak qerngaagmek kagimtillequk grain-meng. Aallgha tugulleqaa, ilanga uneglleqaa.
42017036	Maalghuk yugek piitesighaghvigmellequk. Aallgha tugulleqaa, ilanga uneglleqaa.”
42017037	Maligsaaghtet aaptekaat, “Ataneq, nani tamaakut piyaghqaagwat?” Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nani alngunak kemegkwaalgukan qawaagpaget qerngughfikelleqaat.”
42018001	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii maligsaaghteni apeghtughnaluki quunpeng yughiisqelluki iilqayufqiita.
42018002	Pikii, “Taawanguq neghllagmi nanqigtista alingigalnguq Kiyaghneghmeng, asistaaghaqegkangillu yuget.
42018003	Tamaanteftuqlunguq neghllagmi ugingighaq. Nanqigtista awen takqwaaqegkanga whaten piiqluku, ‘Nallghusaataghtinga anguyiqelghiimeng whangamnun!’
42018004	Nanqigtistem kayusiisunghiteghngaaghmigu iwernga tagtalmi sumeghtaghaqaq, ‘Qaywa alikigateghngaamkun Kiyaghneq, asistaaghaqeghngaamkillu yuget,
42018005	kayusiinnaqaqa ugingighaq qayughllak qinuyugsimanginaghnaqaanga. Kayusiinneghilkumkun qinuughhnaqaanga.’”
42018006	Taagken Atanghem nagneghutkii, “Liitivikiteggu seghleghem nanqigtistem pillgha.
42018007	Kiyaghneghem nallghusaasaghqaqii nakmikegkani yughalghiit aghneghtuumaan, unugtuumaan. Kiyaghneq sukangisigatuq kiimsighilleghminun.
42018008	Ungipaatamsi, Kiyaghneghem nallghusaatqaghsaghqaqii. Qaywaa Ighnegha Yugem uteghniqumi, nunami naalkulleqaa ugpeqillelegmeng?”
42018009	Jesus-em unallu ungipaghaatkegkaa yugnun sumeghmeggni pinighniluteng pilghiinun, asistaaghiiqlutengllu pilghiinun tamanganun.
42018010	Pikii, “Maalghuk yugek Temple-mun yughaghyaghtuumalghiik, ataasiq Pharisee, ilanga tax-meng qerngughtista.
42018011	Pharisee nekevluni ellmineng yughaatkegkaq, ‘Kiyaghneq, iyamsiqayugvikamken ilangistun yuget ayuqenghitunga, wayaghniightengunghitunga, Liilightuusaneng naafqiistengunghitunga, gelgaghniightengunghitunga, talwa uutun tax-meng qerngughtistetun ayuqenghitunga.
42018012	Santilleghni maalghugegneng fast-aaqunga, allgeghneghmallu qulaghqellgha tuunaqaqa.’
42018013	Iwernga tax-meng qerngughtista, uyavanlluni nekevghaghmi talwa sivugtegpenani qilagmun, naqam sakimani tenglugmigumiita pikaq, ‘Kiyaghneq, seghleghqestenguunga. Nangllegyaguteqaghtinga!’”
42018014	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Ungipaatamsi, tax-meng qerngughtista neminun aglaqaaguq nallghusallengluni Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun, nakaan Pharisee. Qayughllak kina alngunak ellmineng anglisleghhii ukavaghsaghqaaguq, enkaam kina alngunak ellmineng ukavaghlleghhii anglistellengyaghqaaguq.”
42018015	Taagken ilangita yuget talwa taghnughhaghhateng tagitkiit Jesus-mun saafluki quyastesqelluki. Taawanginaq maligsaaghtet esghaghyamegteki ineghtekiit angayuqiit tagitefqiita pisqelluki.
42018016	Iwernga Jesus-em tagsighluki taghnughhaat, maligsaaghteni pikii, “Yeqay taghnughhaat tagilit whangamnun, aghuliightefqiita, qayughllak Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem taghnughhaghestun ayuqelghiit pikaat.
42018017	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak tuguklinghilkumigu Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem taghnughhaghtun, iteghnaanghituq.”
42018018	Ilangani pilleghmi igleghutistem Jesus aaptekaa, “Pinilghii Apeghtughista, naten sakuma allgeghhnayaghsikun kenlengilnguq unguvalleq?”
42018019	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Sangama pinilghiingunizinga? Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq pinilghii, kina alngunak pininghituq.
42018020	Liisimakaten Liilightuusat, ‘Gelgaghniighpenang, Yugtaghpenang, Teglegpenang, Iqlengiqutkigpenang, Quulvaghlukek atanllu naanllu.’”
42018021	Yugem pikaa, “Anglinghhaatemneng ima qaatkengngwaanka taakut qamaglluki Liilightuusat.”
42018022	Jesus-em nagasamigu pikaa, “Ataasiq paninang piyaghqaqan. Qamaglluki saghyaten akikughluki, akingi uyeggnaketen aklumalghiinun, enkaam qilagmi aklungilgullequten. Taagken tagiluten maligtinga.”
42018023	Iwernga yugem nagalluku iilqeghllakaq, qayughllak aklungitepiglleghhii.
42018024	Jesus-em esghapagluku illqelghii pikaq, “Piyaqnapigtuq aklungilngughnun itelleghqaat Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem!
42018025	Ipa piyaqniisaghqaaguq camel-em suflughutelleghqaa sikuum iiyngakun, aklungilnguum yugem itelleghqaaneng Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem.”
42018026	Tamaakut nagallghiit aaptekaat, “Kinangam yugulillengelleqa?”
42018027	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Yuget piyaghqaqenghilkangit, Kiyaghneghem piyaghqaqii.”
42018028	Taagken Peter-em pikaa, “Ii-i! Unilluki neput, maligtamken.”
42018029	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak uniskumigu neni, nuliini, angleguteni, angayuqagni, avaqutani apalluqluku Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem,
42018030	whani kiyaghtaalleghmi allgeghuteghllagyaghqaaguq. Enkaamllu qilagmi kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengellequq.”
42018031	Taagken Jesus-em awiitutaghlluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghteni pikii, “Nagataghtek! Jerusalem-emun pinaqukut. Uuknaliqistet igaqullghit Ighneghaneng Yugem ayuqelghiit qamaglluteng apeghiighnaqnguut.
42018032	Jerusalem-emi Jews-et igleghutistengita tuguluku tuunelleqaat Gentile-enun. Enkaam legasiighwaatkelleqaat, kayngusaakelleqaat, qesiqulleqaat,
42018033	kagsagmiglleqaatlu. Taagken tuqulleqaat, iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem unguvaghllequq unguvalleghmun.”
42018034	Iwernga maligsaaghtengita liigikepagningitkaat qayughllak sameng pillgha whateghlluwaaghunghilnguq ellngitni. Nallukegkaat sangwaa akuzitkaqutanga.
42018035	Jesus kaasaghtughaquqlu Jericho-mun, ayaakaq yuuk aqumgaftuq tumet saaghwitni, tungsighralghii.
42018036	Yulghuteghllaget naghughqaallghiit nagasamiki, aapqughaaqaq sangwaa saaqutanga.
42018037	Ungipaatkaat, “Jesus Nazareth-eghmii naghughtaquq.”
42018038	Ayaakaq yuuk akilghuukaq, “Jesus, Ighnegha David-em! Nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!”
42018039	Tamaakut sivullgaalghiit ineghtekaat nepiighesqelluku. Iwernga iglaghtaaghalluni akilghuukaq, “Ighnegha David-em, nangllegyaguteqeghtinga!”
42018040	Jesus-em aghuliighluni tagitestekaa, tughaaghyatni aaptekaa,
42018041	“Sameng sasqelluten piiqsin?” Kiimsiqaa, “Ataneq, esghaasagusugtunga.”
42018042	Jesus-em pikaa, “Esghaasaguten! Ugpeqilleghpek naallghutaaten.”
42018043	Tawaninginaq esghaasagulluni maligtekaa, usuqumaan Kiyaghneq. Qamaglluteng yulghuteghllaget esghaghyamegteggu ellngitallu usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq.
42019001	Jesus kaalluni Jericho-mun akulngakun igleghtekaa.
42019002	Taawanguq umiilgat tax-meng qerngughtistet, aatgha Zacchaeus, aklungilnguq.
42019003	Esghaghyukaa naliitanga Jesus, iwernga amsakaghtaghhaatmineng esghaamangilkanga qayughllak yugtupiglleghhii.
42019004	Enkaam aqfaatkaq sivutghulluki yulghutet, taagken mayuqaa sycamore-a uqfik esghaghnaluku Jesus qayughllak taakwagun naghughhnaqelghii.
42019005	Jesus kaalluni uqfigmun, sivugfikluku pikaa, “Zacchaeus, egmiinaq ukigi qayughllak aghneghmi whani elpesinitepestaaghnaqnguunga.”
42019006	Ukigaghlluni, ellmeggnun Jesus aglaalluku quyakepiglluku upughatkaa.
42019007	Yulghutet esghapagluku qamaglluteng akuzimleghaatkegkaat, “Seghleghqestemun aga aqelqaayaghtughtuq!”
42019008	Iwernga Zacchaeus-em nekevluni Ataneq pikaa, “Ataneq, aveglluku aklungika tuunaqaqa aklumalghiinun. Enkaam puughsimakumkun kina estamaghqelluku veghulleqaqa.”
42019009	Jesus-em pikaa, “Aghneghmi whani, uum yugem ugpeqegkaqutmineng Kiyaghneq, ellnga kingunqaaghtepiigaa Abraham-em. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem yugulii mangteghami whani kiyaghlleghhiit.
42019010	Ighnegha Yugem tagikaaguq ivaghinaluni iflakaneng yugulinaluki.”
42019011	Yuget nagatngukangat Jesus. Sumeghmeggni kaaskumi Jerusalem-emun Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem piinlighaghhnaqniluku pikaat. Enkaam liigikesqelluki Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii.
42019012	Pikii, “Aangwaaq yuuk aghulaqumalghii uyavanun nunamun umiilgughhnaluni, apeghiiqumi uteghnighyaghqaaluni.
42019013	Aghulaqfagilgami tagsighteghluki qula qepghaghteni tunquqii gold-meng coin-meng. Pikii, ‘Kenlanga uteghnillemnun tukfighisiqitekillu akilpegaasiqitekillu nulastesqelluku manika.’
42019014	Iwernga nunalgutangita ugumikegkangat, enkaam aghulaqsan kayagtekiit yuget umiilegpigaghmun whaten pisqelluku, ‘Taana yuuk umiilkesunghitaghput.’
42019015	“Iwernga Umiilegpigaam aangwaaq yuuk umiilgughtestekaa. Uteghnighluni nunaminun tagsiqliqii qepghaghtet manilitkani liigiknaluki naten angkaan allgeghusimatangi.
42019016	“Sivuliim tagiluni pikaa, ‘Ataneq, taagken tagivaqaghpeneng allgeghsimaanka qulaghyaget gold-et coin-et.’
42019017	Umiilgem pikaa, ‘Seghleghhalek, pinilghiinguuten qepghaghta! Ataasiighmetutegpeneng sasqughhaghmun, igleghutistengllaghnaqamken qulaghyagnun neghllagnun.’
42019018	Tuunglighhaan qepghaghtem tagiluni pikaa, ‘Ataneq, taagken tagivaqaghpeneng allgeghsimaanka tallimagyaget gold-et coin-et.’
42019019	Umiilgem pikaa, ‘Elpek igleghunnaqaten tallimat neghllaget.’
42019020	Taagken pingayaat qepghaghtet tagiluni pikaa, ‘Ataneq, ang, gold-a coin-en, kakegllugiitakun iimgulluku iiqaqaqa.
42019021	Alikamken aaghsaghqaanghitutegpeneng. Tugutkayuguuten elpek pikenghilkegpeneng, saghnakayuguutenllu piitesighaqaqenghilkegpeneng.’
42019022	Umiilgem pikaa, ‘Uyuq, seghleq qepghaghta. Akuziteten elpenun nanqigtusiqnaqanka. Liisimakaghpenga aaghsaghqaanghilnguugunga. Tugutkayuguunga whanga pikenghilkemneng, unataqayuguungallu piitistekaqenghilkemneng.
42019023	Sangan'ngam manika kanaghhnanighsigu bank-amun? Uteghnillemni veghhnayaghaqa allgeghnelighluku.’
42019024	Taagken nekevghallghiit tawani, pikii, ‘Tuguluku ellnganeng gold-a coin-a tuuniteggu qepghaghtemun qulaghyak coin-elegmun.’
42019025	Pikaat, ‘Ataneq, siingenllu qulaghyak coin-elguuq!’
42019026	Umiilgem pikii, ‘Ungipaatamsi, tamaghhaghmi sameng allgeghutkaq tuunegkamneng tuunataghaghyaghqaaguq. Iwernga taana allgeghutellghilnguq, talwa salgughngaan ellnganeng iqilleqiit.
42019027	Taagken umiilek pikaq, Naaki tamaakut anguyagenka umiilgutesunghilnguut whangamnun? Tagilluki whavek tuququghteki manumni!’”
42019028	Ungipaghaneghmeng apeghiighyami Jesus-em sivullgaaqii Jerusalem-emun.
42019029	Tughaaghaqaaklu Bethphage-enkuk Bethany-nkuk, Mount Olives-melnguuk, maalghuk maligsaaghtegni kayagtekakek sivullgaaqestiisqellukek.
42019030	Pikakek, “Tazingavek nemun aglaghtek, iitghutkelluku esghaghlleqaghtek donkey-ghaq petugngalghii; kitum alngunak igleghusiqigalkanga. Itemulluku taginnakesek.
42019031	Kitum aaptekangistek, ‘Sangan itemutestegnegu?’ Whaten kiimsighnaaghaghtek, ‘Atanghem atuqsugaa.’”
42019032	Taagken aghulaqlutek esghaqaak Jesus-em apellghatun ayuqluku.
42019033	Itemusimaluku donkey-ghaq yugita aaptekagket, “Sangan donkey-ghaq itemutestegnegu?”
42019034	Kiimsiqiik, “Atanghem atuqsugaa.”
42019035	Enkaam Jesus-mun tagilluku, qaaslimeggneng tefqughvikluku donkey-ghaq, taagken Jesus aqumestekaat qaayngakun.
42019036	Igleghsan, yuget qaasliteng saaghquqiit tuumkaghqaakun.
42019037	Jerusalem-emun kaasaghtughluni, kaataqaallu ukigyaghaq tumenilnguq Mount Olives-meng, iingunaghmeng maligsaaghtelghuteghllagi quyateghllagughtekat. Iglagtupigllutengllu usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq Jesus-em allaaghlluwhaghtilleghllaganeng esghapakameggneng.
42019038	Pikat, “Kiyaghneghem quyasligu Umiilek tagilghii aatghakun Atanghem! Nekeggmelleq qilagmi, usuqnaghhaleklu Kiyaghneq uusqalleghpigaghmelnguq!”
42019039	Taagken ilangi Pharisees-et yulghutnilnguut pikaat, “Apeghtughista, maligsaaghteten nepiighesqiki.”
42019040	Jesus-em pikii, “Ungipaatamsi, nepiighngayaqata, uyghaget akilghuughllagnayaghtut.”
42019041	Jesus kaasaghtughluni Jerusalem-emun, esghaghyamigu qiyakegkaa.
42019042	Pikaa, “Whaa maaten liisimakegkentuq sangutanga aklukegkan kiyaghtesqelluten nekeggmelleghmi! Iwernga maaten liigikepagningitan.
42019043	Aghneghet kaannaqnguut anguyagpek amigiiritaghvingllaghlleqaaten uzimun. Aghuliighhnaqngwaat igleghalleq iteghmunllu aanmunllu, kangllulleqaatenllu uzimun.
42019044	Naafqelleqaaten, tuququghlleqiitlu yugten mingllutegpek ilunganilnguut, talwa ataasiq uyghak nemininnanghituq. Tamaakut qamaglluteng piyaghqaagut qayughllak liigikenghilken Kiyaghneghem yuguliyaghtuqaqsaqangaten!”
42019045	Taagken Jesus iitghaqngami Temple-mun, yuget tukfightulghiitlu akilpegalghiitlu sakritutepiglluki eslatmun aanesquqii.
42019046	Ungipaatkii, “Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Mangteghaqa yughaghviguuq yugnun’, iwernga elpesi iighaghvingllaghaghsi teglegniightenun!”
42019047	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan, Jesus apeghtughikaq Temple-mi. Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, igleghutistengitallu yuget agghitkengngukangat naten tuqutelleghqameng.
42019048	Iwernga tuqutepagningitkaat qayughllak yulghuteghllaget kanglluluku nagatngwaaghutngukangit apeghtuusii.
42020001	Aataasimi aghneghmi, Temple-mi, Jesus apeghtughimaluku yugnun, ungipaqimalukullu Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, siivanllequlluteng takukaat.
42020002	Pikaat, “Ungipaatikut kitum qeleghtaten tawaten pisqelluten, nalighmeng kitum qelellghakun tawaten pinguzin?”
42020003	Kiimsiqii, “Whangallu aaptaghllamsi. Ungipaataghtengnga,
42020004	John-em paaptaayeghillgha Kiyaghneghmeng pingwaa, nalighmeng yugneng?”
42020005	Ellmeggneng akuzimghutkelluku, pikat, “Sameng pinaqesta? Kiimsiqumteggu Kiyaghneghmeng pinguniluku, whaten pilleqiinkut, ‘Sanganmi ugpeqenghitesteggu John?’
42020006	Iwernga, ‘Yugneng pingunikumteggu’, qamaglluteng yuget milughpagaataghlleqiinkut, qayughllak ugpeqngukangat John uuknaliqistenguniluku.”
42020007	Enkaam kiimsiqaat nallukniluku naken pingutanga.
42020008	Jesus-em pikii, “Whangallu ungipaannaanghitamsi kitumeng qelellengegkaatka tamaavek pikamnun.”
42020009	Taagken Jesus-em yuget ungipaghaatkii, “Yuuk piitesighaghvigmini grapes-meng piitesighaamalghii. Navghilluku aflengakistenun taagken ilanganun nunam aghulaqluni muluughllakaq.
42020010	Grapes-et saghnayaghqaaghsata, qepghaghta kevgaqegkaa aflengakistenun nengini aqfasqelluki. Iwernga aflengakistet qevuutiighluku aghulaqestekaat avangunaan.
42020011	Ilanga qepghaghta kevgaqegkaa, ellngallu qevutiighluku, kayngusaakluku aghulaqestekaat avangunaan.
42020012	Enkaam pingayiitangat qepghaghta kevgaqegkaa, taana kiitiquluku eslatmun miluutkaat.
42020013	Taagken grapes-em piitesighaghvigan yuga pikaq, ‘Sanaqsinga? Kevaqnaqaqa whanga katam piniqegkaqa ighneqa, luuraq siivaknayukatgu.’
42020014	Iwernga aflengakistet esghaghyamegteggu pikat, ‘Una pagitiyaghqaaguq whaken piitesighaghvigmeng, tuqutelteggu enkaam piitesighaghvik whangkuta piliilleqaghput.’
42020015	Aanesluku piitesighaghvigmeng tuqutkaat.” Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Piitesighaghvilgem salleqakingam taakut aflengakistet?
42020016	Tagiluni tuququghlleqii, enkaam piitesighaghvini tuunelleqaa ilangitnun.” Nagasamegteggu tawaten pilghii, pikaat, “Kiyaghneghem tawatelluku apeghiightesneghilligu!”
42020017	Iwernga esghaamakngwaaghluki aaptekii, “Una Akuzin Igaqegkaq sameng pisiiwa? ‘Uyghak mangteghangllaghtet ighsakegkaat, megnunalleghpigaaghtekaaguq uyghak.’
42020018	Tamaghhaghmi iqulghii taaggun uyghagkun kagimyaghqaaguq. Iwernga uyghagem ulleghvikegkumigu kina kagimqelleqaa pagulanguluku.”
42020019	Apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, chief priest-etlu liigikegkat Jesus-mun ellmeng akuzitkengnguniluteng ungipaghaatmikun. Enkaam tawaninginaq tuguyukaat iwernga alikegkiit yuget seghleliighqiinayukata.
42020020	Enkaam iiskughtengngwaaqaat Jesus qayughllak tuunyukangat Rome-em governor-nganun, ellnganun nanqigtesqelluku. Tamaaken apalluqluku kayagtekiit riirngistet nagatesqelluku Jesus. Ipapighqesighwaaghluki anaggutesnaqutkesqelluku Jesus akuzillghakun.
42020021	Taakut riirngistet pikaat, “Apeghtughista, whangkuta liisimakamken akuzilleghtenllu apeghtughilleghtenllu ipanguut. Atunengwaaq pikayuguuten yugnun, apeghtughaqatenllu ipalleghmeng Kiyaghneghem piyukellghaneng ayuqelghiimeng.
42020022	Ungipaataghtikut, Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaani elqughutngaa llivikilleghqaghput tax-meng Caesar-mun? Llivikiltaa-a nalighmeng pinghitelta?”
42020023	Iwernga Jesus-em liisimakegkangi peghqiniqellghit enkaam pikii,
42020024	“Kelguvikitengnga coin-meng. Kitum gginaallu, aatghallu coin-meta?” Kiimsiqaat, “Caesar-em.”
42020025	Pikii, “Tuuniteki Caesar-mun tamaakut Caesar-em pingi, enkaam tuuniteki Kiyaghneghmun tamaakut Kiyaghneghem pingi.”
42020026	Enkaam riirngistet Jesus akuzillghakun anaggutestepagningitkaat yuget sivungitni. Saghiighayagulluki kiimsiitangi, qallegnaniqat.
42020027	Taagken ilangi Sadducees-et tagikat Jesus-mun. Ellngita ugpeqngukangit tuqukat unguvaghyaghqaanghinniluki.
42020028	Pikaat, “Apeghtughista, Liilightuusamnni Moses-em igaqegkaqaa whaten, yugem anglegutanga nulightughluni tuqumakan avaqutigpenani, anglegutangan tuguyaghqaqaa nulighqesaqanga avaqutinnaluku anglegutni tuqukaq.
42020029	Taawanguq maaghraghvinlek yuget anglegutkullghiit. Nuyekliq nulightughluni tuqukaq avaqutigpenani.
42020030	Tuunglighhaan tuguluku ugingighaq, ellngallu tuqukaq.
42020031	Pingagayiitangitallu tuguluku, ellngallu tuqukaq. Qenwat qamaglluteng maaghraghvinlegyaget anglegutkullghiit tuqulaghaatkat avaqutigpenateng.
42020032	Kinguliiluni aghnaq tuqukaq.
42020033	Qamagllutengqun maaghraghvinlegyaget nulighhuluku tugukaqegkangat. Enkaangam kitum nulighqelleqagu aghnaq tuqukat unguvaghtuuskata?”
42020034	Jesus-em pikii, “Kiyaghtaalleghmi maaten yuget nulightughaqut, aghnat aang'ghutaqiit.
42020035	Iwernga tamaakut Kiyaghneghem itagnaqegkii tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtuusaghqaagut, kiyaghllequtlu nutaghami nunami, tugutunnaanghitut.
42020036	Tawani unguvalleghmi yaqulgestun ayuqsaghqaagut tuqunaanghitut. Avaqutaqii Kiyaghneghem, qayughllak tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtekaagut.
42020037	Whateghlluwaaq Moses-em ipapighqegkaqii tuqukat unguvaghsaghqaaniluki. Igatgun igaqaqngamigu uqfillegaq kumaghughngalghii whaten pikaaguq, Ataneq ‘Kiyaghneqaa Abraham-em, Kiyaghneqaa Isaac-em, Kiyaghneqaa Jacob-em.’
42020038	Ellnga Kiyaghneqaat unguvalghiit, qayughllak ellngani qamaglluteng paninang unguvalghiinguut. Ellnga Kiyaghneqenghitaat tuqukat.”
42020039	Ilangita apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng pikaat, “Apeghtughista, kiimsighlaataqwaaten.”
42020040	Taagken tetugyagutkaat aapqughaaneghmeng.
42020041	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sanganmi yuget Christ-a ighneqniiqatgu David-mun?
42020042	Igaani Psalms-em David pikaalghii, ‘Atanghem Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Atanqa, Aqumi aghenqignemkun,
42020043	kenlanga anguyagten asingiitellemnun itegaghpek.’
42020044	David-em tuqluqaa ‘Ataneghmeng’ enkaam natenmi ighneqelleqagu?”
42020045	Yuget ellminun nagatusimaluki, Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii,
42020046	“Kelengalusi apeghtughikayugneng Liilightuusaneng. Igleghsuneghtuut aalluteng akughtuqameng atkuyaaghmeng, akilpegaghvignillu quyakesugaqut aangwaaghughtekaaluteng. Synagogue-nillu neqenghaghqelghiinillu aqumyuneghtuut aangwaaghughtekat aqumutiitgun.
42020047	Esghaghlaataquluki ugingighat mangteghiighaqiit. Taagken pinighniluteng pisqelluteng taakluku yughaghaqut. Tamaaken apalluqluku aghyuullengeghllagyaghqaagut!”
42021001	Jesus Temple-mesimaluni, esghapakii aklungilnguut tunusameggneng manilghutagnun kanaghtilghiit.
42021002	Taagken esghapakaa aklumalghii ugingighaq manilghutagnun kanaghtilghii maalghugegneng coin-ngiighhaagneng.
42021003	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, una aklumalghii ugingighaq kanaghtinguuq uglaghataghaghluku tamaakuneng aklungilngughneng.
42021004	Tamaakut tunquugut aklungighllagmeggneng, iwernga ugingigham aklumaghllagmini qamaglluku tuunaa kiyaghusighqaqsaqeni.”
42021005	Ilangita maligsaaghtengan akuzitkegkaat Temple-a. Pinighyagutkiit pinighnaghllaget uyghaget, tunusatlu tuunegkat Kiyaghneghmun pinighnaghsaasiqegkiit Temple-mun. Iwernga Jesus-em pikii,
42021006	“Tamaakut esghaghteghasi, pilleghqaq kaasaghqaaguq talwa ataasiq uyghak tawanlenguq nemininnanghituq, qamaglluteng ulleghqughyaghqaagut.”
42021007	Ilangita maligsaaghtengan aaptekaat, “Apeghtughista, qakun tamaakut piyaghqaawat? Sangulleqa liisimakusighqaghput tamaakut piyaghqaaghtekata?”
42021008	Kiimsiqii, “Kelengatek, puughtestegpenasi, qayughllak uglaq taginaqnguuq aatqa atuqluku whaten pimaghmeng, ‘Whanga Christ-anguunga!’ piiqellequtlu, ‘Pilleghqaq kaatuq!’ Iwernga maligsaqunaki.
42021009	Kakavegpenasi nagaququfsiki nunat pillugutnguniluki, nunalgutkullghiitlu pillugutnguniluki. Sivukluni tamaana piyaghqapestaaghuq, iwernga tawaninginaq iqugtelleq pinaanghituq.”
42021010	Taagken pikii, “Nunat pillugullequt, ataneghpagullghetlu pillugutullequt.
42021011	Nani alngunak nunat uvelegtaghllagllequt, neqangisagllagllequt, allegvikikayugetlu aqnighneghet pillequt. Yuget esghaghlleqiit sangwaat qilagami, kakavaataghnalghiit, allaaghlluwhaghyugnalghiitlu.
42021012	Iwernga qamaglluki tamaakut pistegpenaki, tugulusi amyuqetaatkelleqiisi. Synagogue-nun aglaallusi nanqiglleqiisi enkaam anusimingllaghlleqiisi. Aglaalleqiisi umiilegnunllu governor-nunllu nanqigtesqellusi whanga apalluqlunga.
42021013	Taana pilleghqaqaghsi ungipaqesqellunga whanga.
42021014	Enkaangam sumeghtaghaatkekestaghpenaan sameng pilleghqaghsi.
42021015	Whanga akuzitkaghqalilleqamsi, peghqinellelilleqamsillu repall anguyagpesi kipullginaaghpagningitiit akuzillesi nalighmeng temnginguninaanghitiit.
42021016	Talwa angayuqaghpesi, anglegutegpesi, ilakwaaghpesi, ilakumtaaghpesi uveghpagulleqiisi igleghutistenun, enkaam ilasi tuqulleqiit.
42021017	Whanga apalluqlunga tamaghhaghmi yugem ugumikeraaghlleqiisi.
42021018	Iwernga naasqughpesineng ataasiq nuyaq iflanaanghituq.
42021019	Ugpeqillesi ayepsugitestekufsiki allgeghlleqaghsi unguvalleghsi.
42021020	“Tawani esghaqufsigu Jerusalem kangllukangat pilluwaghtet, taawa liisimakelleqaghsi qantaghaqun naafqelleghqaa.
42021021	Taagken Judea-melnguut anagniighhaat naayghanun, Jerusalem-emelnguutlu aghulaqelghaat, eslataanilnguutlu itefqaameng pilghaat.
42021022	Qayughllak tamaakuni aghneghni Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqii Jews-et. Enkaam uuknaliqistet igaquqiit taakuneng aghneghneng qamaglluteng apeghiighllequt.
42021023	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut qumilgetlu mamaghtalgetlu anagniighnaqutkelleghqiit. Seghleliighllagem kaannaqngwaa Israel-em nunanga qayughllak Kiyaghneghem aghyuughnaqngwii yugi.
42021024	Ilangi tuqulleqiit savigpagkun, ilangi tuguluki aghulaqulleqiit tamanganun nunanun. Enkaam Gentile-et kayaalqelleqaatlu igleghulleqaatlu Jerusalem, kenlanga pilleghqaat kenletghuutellghanun.
42021025	“Taakwaningani sangwaat alingruughnalghiit pillequt siqineghqun, tanqikun, ighaleqetaaghteggun. Nunami, nunataghhaani tamaghhaani yuget alingruughllagllequtlu kukragyugllequtlu sangami kellii qallaghtelleghllaganengllu qagingughtelleghllaganengllu.
42021026	Yuget esghaqumegteki aghtughyaghqaanghillghet qilagami qapraghqesleghhiit igleghneghmeggneng, teggellghiighutkeghllaglleqaat saaqutanga nuna. Enkaam alingruughem tuquraagllequt.
42021027	Taagken esghaghlleqaat Ighnegha Yugem tagilghii qilagwaaghqun aghtughyaghqaanghillelighlunillu nighughqellelighllaglunillu.
42021028	Tamaana tawaten pikestaqan, nekevlusi sivuglleghhaasi, qayughllak yugulillengyaghtungestaghtusi.”
42021029	Taagken Jesus-em ungipaghaatkii, “Esghaqaghteggu figs-em uqfiga, qamagllukillu uqfilghutet.
42021030	Esghaneghpesiki ququngangekestanghata, liisimakaqaghsi kiigyaghtulghii.
42021031	Tawateghpigaq qamagtengngwaaghluki aapqanka esghaqufsiki, liisimakelleqaghsi Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem kaasaghtungestalghii.
42021032	Ipa ungipaatamsi, maaten unguvalghiit tuqulaghaatestegpenaki qamaglluteng tamaakut piyaghqaagut.
42021033	Qilagenkuk, nunankuk aviighusaghqaaguk, iwernga whanga akuzitenka aviighunnaanghitut.
42021034	“Kelengalusi, aghsaghpaagtegpenasi neqenghaghqemmeng, meghuutelleghmeng, nalighmeng sumeghyaligpenasi nunam pinganeng. Tawaten pikufsi taam aghneghem kaatqaghnayukangisi naapleghhiistun.
42021035	Taana Aghneq kaasaghqaaguq iingunaghhaanun yugnun nunamelngughnun.
42021036	Enkaam kelengatek quunpeng! Yughaghtek anagyaqlegesqelluki tamaakut qamaglluki pikata, nekevyaqlegesqellusi sivungakun Ighneghan Yugem.”
42021037	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan Jesus apeghtughiiqelghii Temple-mi, iwernga aaneghmini unugmi Mount Olives-metaqelghii.
42021038	Unaanguluku yuget qamaglluteng aglaghtuutaqelghiit Temple-mun nagannaluku.
42022001	Kaasaghtuungulghii “Neqenghaghqellgha Yeast-aliimangilnguum Neqekrangllam”, atilqelghii Passover-meng.
42022002	Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng agghitkengngukangat naten tuqutelleghqameng Jesus. Iwernga agghitkelleteng liisimakesunghilkangit yugnun qayughllak alingelghiit seghleliighqiighllagnayukata.
42022003	Taagken Tughneghaam iitqaa Judas Iscariot, ilatngalghii qula maalghuk siipneqluku malighsaaghtenun.
42022004	Enkaam aleghqughyaghtuqii chief priest-etlu, umiilwaaghitlu Temple-em kelengakistengita naten uveghpagunnaluku Jesus ellngitnun.
42022005	Tawaten pinaqellghaneng quyakat enkaam akeqegkaat manililleqniluku.
42022006	Judas-em itagnaqluki uveghpagutilleghqangnaqutkegkaq Jesus-meng, iwernga yugtuqami piyugumangilkanga.
42022007	Aghneq kaatkaq Neqenghaghqelleghqaanun Yeast-aliimangilnguum Neqekrangllam. Tawani aghneghmi tamaghhaghmeng nengllugutet tuqutiighaqelghiit penniighaghaghmeng Passover-mun.
42022008	Enkaam Jesus-em pikakek Peter-enkuk John-enkuk, “Yataaghqesaghtughtegnegu Passover-em neqekaghqaa neghuunnaluta.”
42022009	Aaptekaak, “Nani yataaghqestesugsigu?”
42022010	Kiimsiqakek, “Nagataghtek! Iitquftek neghllagmun, yugem nallaghlleqiistek tugumiilguuq melghutagneng. Malignakesek mangteghamun iitqan,
42022011	enkaam mangtegham yuga pinakesek, ‘Apeghtughistem aaptaaten, malighsaaghtekullghiini natungaawa neghvigkaghput Passover-mun?’
42022012	Taagken mayuulleqiistek qemtamun nunatuqameng nelek, neghuutelleghqamun atughqalwaalek. Tawani yataaghqilghaatek.”
42022013	Aglaghlutek piyalghiimek sangwaa qamaglluni Jesus-em apellghatun ayuqegkaq, enkaam yataaghqegkaak Passover-em neqekaghqaa.
42022014	Neghvigkaq kaasan Jesus-llu apostle-etlu iggasighquutkat neghnaluteng.
42022015	Pikii, “Neghelgutkesupigtamsi Passover-em neqnganeng sivutghulluku ikfiqelleghqaqa!
42022016	Ungipaatamsi, alla neghyaghqaqenghitaqa taana kenlanga Ataneghpagulleghmini Kiyaghneghem apeghiiqagu uspeqelleni Passover-mun.”
42022017	Taagken tuguluku qayuusiq, iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, pikaq, “Tuguluku qayuusiq meghvikaataghteggu.
42022018	Ungipaatamsi, whaken kenlekluku meghnaanghitaqa wine-a kenlanga Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem kaatellghanun.”
42022019	Taagken tuguluku neqekrangllaq, iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, aavgughluku tunquqii, whaten pimiita, “Una yugusiqaqa tuunegkegka elpesi apalluqlusi. Neghaqiteggu neqamikusiiluku whangamnun.”
42022020	Neneghmeng taaqsameng tawateghpigaq tuunegkii qayuusimelngughmeng wine-meng, whaten pimiita, “Una qayuusiq Kiyaghneghem nutaghaaguq akequsaa aamkun, kuuvelghii elpesi apalluqlusi.
42022021	“Iwernga nagatek! Uveghpagutisteka whaantuq, neghelgusighaqaanga!
42022022	Kiyaghneghem tawaten uspeqelqaa Ighneghan Yugem tuqulleghqaa. Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq taana yuuk uveghpagutiyaghqaq ellnganeng!”
42022023	Taagken malighsaaghtet aapqughaaghutkat ellmeggneng nalighteng tawaten piyaghqaatanga.
42022024	Taagken malighsaghtet aaghtiiraaghutkat nalighteng angelleghpigaayaghqaatanga.
42022025	Jesus-em pikii, “Gentile-et umiilgita atanghutaqiit yuteng, igleghutistengitlu atightesugaqut ‘Kayutngit Yuget’ tawatenneghiteghngaaghmeng.
42022026	Iwernga elpesi tawatesaghqaanghitusi. Itupill akulegpesini angelleghpigaat uyuqlighpigaastun lliighlit, enkaam igleghutista qepghaghtestun lliighli.
42022027	Nalikek aangataghaghta, aqumgalghii tipelegni, nalighmeng kepsiiqulghii? Aqumgalghii aangataghaghtuq. Iwernga akulegpesini whanganguuq kepsiiqulghii elpesinun.
42022028	“Elpesinguut whangamnitkat nanghiighsaghallemni.
42022029	Tamaaken apalluqluku ataneghpagullelitamsi katam Atama tagivallghatun whangamnun.
42022030	Enkaam Ataneghpagullemni neghellequsillu meghellequsillu tipelegemni. Aqumellequsillu umiilgusim aqumutiitgun nanqigsaghqaaluki qula maalghuk siipneqluku Israel-em ramkengi.”
42022031	Jesus-em pikaa Peter, “Simon, Simon! Nagaten! Tughneghaq pilleghqangumaaq Kiyaghneghmeng nanghiiqunaluki ugpeqillesi. Aaftesugiisi whangamneng katam piitesighaghtem avullghatun mallat wheat-neng.
42022032	Iwernga yughaatkumaamken Simon, ugpeqillghen pegtefqaan pisqelluku. Enkaam ugpeqenqigtekuvnga, iknaqughsaghyaghqaqaten maligsaaghtelgutegpek ugpeqillghit.”
42022033	Peter-em pikaa, “Ataneq, maligsaqleggiinaaghsimaamken anusimingllaghvigmun, tuqulgusighnalutenllu!”
42022034	Jesus-em pikaa, “Peter, ungipaatamken, unukun pingayuneng nallunqelleqaghpenga sivungani rooster-em qalghilleghqaan.”
42022035	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii, “Kayagtaqngamsi manilghutangunasi, aqeftaghaangunasi, nalighmeng kaamngunasi sameng aklumatsi?” Kiimsiqaat, “Aklumangitukut.”
42022036	Pikii, “Iwernga maaten, kina alngunak manilghutalgukumi, nalighmeng aqeftaghaalgukumi kelqelli. Kina alngunak savigpagiskumi qaasligni akiklukek pikengli.
42022037	Ungipaatamsi, igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, ‘Ilalkiisimaat Liilightuusat naafqiistengitnun.’ Taana Akuzin Igaqegkaq whangamneng ayuquq, enkaam apeghiighyaghqaaghtuq.”
42022038	Maligsaaghtet pikaat, “Ii-i Ataneq! Whaa maalghuk savigpagek.” Jesus-em pikii, “Tawatenginaghngam!”
42022039	Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit aanluteng Jerusalem-emeng, piiqelleghmegestun aglaqat Mount Olives-mun.
42022040	Kaasameng takukameggnun pikii, “Yughaghtek aaghqutaqenghitesqellusi nanghiiqulleghmun.”
42022041	Uyghagem miluutellghan uyaatulngatun tazingavek aglaqaq unilluki maligsaaghteni. Enkaam segesqughlluni yughaqaq,
42022042	“Atamni, piyukellqegkuvgu awiitigu una qayuusiq whangamneng. Iwernga whanga piyukelqa avelghaghluku elpek piyukellghen apeghiighli.”
42022043	Qilagmeng yaqulgem takuluku iknaqughsaqaa.
42022044	Ikfiqeghllagem angtalanganeng taakunginaghhaagneng yughaqaq, qesightellghallu aawestun uqlughqaqaq nunamun.
42022045	Yughaneghmeng taaqsami nekevluni malighsaaghteminun piyalghiimi qavaatnguftut, qayughllak qivghullghem paghyughqegkangi.
42022046	Pikii, “Sangafsi qavaghaqetsi? Makellusi yughaghtek aaghqutaqenghitesqellusi nanghiiqulleghmun.”
42022047	Jesus akuzimaluku, Judas-em maghyaghquqii yulghutet ellnganun. (Judas ilatngalghii qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtenun.) Takukaa Jesus naaghnaluku.
42022048	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Judas, naaghsiguu Ighnegha Yugem uveghpagunnaluku anguyaganun?”
42022049	Maligsaaghtet Jesus-melnguut liigikluku sangwaa sanaqutanga, aaptekaat, “Ataneq, pilluwaaltekii savigpamteggun?”
42022050	Aga naliita savigpagmineng ilefkaghaghtekaa aghenqigneghan sigutnga qepghaghtelaaghan high priest-em.
42022051	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Haamangam, tawaten'ngam pitek!” Enkaam saafluku qepghaghtelaaghem sigutnga maamestekaa.
42022052	Taagken Jesus-em aaptekii chief priest-et, umiilwaaghi Temple-em kelengakistengita, siivanlleghetlu aqfaaghilghiit ellmineng, “Tuguyaghtuungustengngaa savigpagtuumaghpesi, anagutaghtuumaghpesi nikimqun wayaghniightengulunga?
42022053	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan elpesinitaqngama Temple-mi, tugunaqutkumangitaghpesinga. Iwernga una aflukaghsi, qayughllak aghtughyaghqaanghillgha mamlegem igleghutinguuq.”
42022054	Taagken Jesus tuguluku aghulaqutkaat, aglaatkaat high priest-em mangteghaanun. Uyavaqaanlluni Peter-em maligtekaa.
42022055	Courtyard-em qukaani, kumaaqiyameng qerngaghmeng aqumuutkat. Peter-llu akulngitgun aqumegkaq.
42022056	Taagken aghnaghaam qepghaghtem esghaghyamigu aqumgalghii kenghegni, esghapagtughluku pikaq, “Unallu yuuk ellnganitkayuguuq!”
42022057	Iwernga Peter mesighaqaq, “Aghnami whani, nallukaqa kingangutanga!”
42022058	Mulugpenani yugem esghaghluku pikaa, “Elpeklu naliqaaten maligsaaghtengan!” Iwernga Peter-em pikaa, “Yugmi whani, maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
42022059	Taagken entaqun ataasiq aflu naghughtaquqlu ilangan yugem sagiqutkaa, “Ipapestaaq una yuuk ellnganitkaaguq, qayughllak Gallilee-ghmiinguuq!”
42022060	Iwernga Peter-em pikaa, “Yugmi whani, sameng piiquten nallukaqa!” Tawaninginaq tawaten akuzimaluku, rooster-a qalghiqaq.
42022061	Atanghem qiivluku esghaqaa Peter iyegkenkun. Taagken Peter-em neqanguqii Atanghem akuzitangi, pikaqegkanga, “Unukun rooster-a qalghightestegpenaan pingayuneng nallunqelleqaghpenga.”
42022062	Enkaam Peter aanluni qiyaaghwaghllakaq.
42022063	Yuget kelengakilghiit Jesus-meng legasiighwaatkegkaatlu qevuutiiqaatlu.
42022064	Qiipaghaghmeng iiskek saaplukek tengluwaataatkaat. Taagken pikaat, “Uuknaliqistenguuten. Ungipaatikut kitum tenglugtaten?”
42022065	Seghlequughtaakaatlu.
42022066	Aghsagu, Jews-et siivanlleghit, chief priest-et, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng qerngughulluteng, Jesus tagitestekaat.
42022067	Pikaat, “Christ-angukuvek ungipaatikut.” Iwernga pikii, “Ungipaaskumsi, ugpeqnaanghitaghpesinga.
42022068	Aaptekumsillu kiimsighnaanghitaghpesinga.
42022069	Iwernga qantaghaqun Ighnegha Yugem aqumellequq aghenqigneghakun Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem Kiyaghneghem.”
42022070	Qamaglluteng aaptekaat. “Awii, Kiyaghneghem Ighneqaten?” Kiimsiqii, “Elpesi taananguniighpesinga.”
42022071	Taagken pikat, “Taawa liisimakistesughniighutiinkut! Ellnganeng katam nagaqughaghput Kiyaghneghmun Ighneqniluni piiq.”
42023001	Taagken qamaglluteng taakut agghistet nekevuulluteng Jesus aglaatkaat Pilate-m sivunganun.
42023002	Pilate pikaat, “Liitaghput uum yugem seghletun igleghutaqeftii yuput. Tax-meng llivikisnanighaqeftii Caesar-mun, ellminengllu piiquq Christ-anguniluni, umiilek.”
42023003	Pilate-em aaptekaa, “Umiilkataan Jews-et?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpek taananguniighpenga.”
42023004	Taagken Pilate-em pikii chief priest-etlu yulghuteghllagetlu, “Una yuuk anaggutellghituq.”
42023005	Iwernga wata sagiqutkaat, “Tamaghhaani Judea-mi apeghtughilleghmikun seghleliighutesteghllagaqii yuget. Piinlighluni Galilee-mi, whaa maavek kaatuq.”
42023006	Pilate-em nagalluki aaptekii, “Una yuuk Galilee-ghmiingwaa?”
42023007	Liisamigu Jesus, Herod-em igleghutkaaneng pingutanga, aglaatestekaa Herod-mun. Ellngallu Jerusalem-ememelnguq tamaani pilleghni.
42023008	Herod-em esghaghyamigu Jesus, quyaghllakaq. Esghaghyupigtaqegkanga qayughllak nagaqughaqegkanga, sighimakegkaallu allaaghlluwhaghtisqelluku.
42023009	Enkaam aapqughaaghtaakaa, iwernga Jesus-em kiimsiimangilkanga.
42023010	Chief priest-etlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng esnevaghluteng ugumiyupiglluteng Jesus anagguteghllagumaniluku pikaat.
42023011	Herod-enkut pilluwaghtekullghiit asistaaqaat legasiighwaatkumaan. Taagken aateslukek akitupiglleghhiik atkuyaaghek, uutghutestekaat Pilate-mun.
42023012	Tawani aghneghmi Herod-enkuk Pilate-enkuk ilaliighutkak; sivunghani anguyakusalghiik.
42023013	Taagken Pilate-em qerngughtestekii chief priest-et, igleghutistet, yugetlu.
42023014	Pikii, “Whangamnun tagitaghsi una yuuk qayughllak seghletun ighleghutingunikesi yugnun. Sivugpesini aapqughaaghyaqegka anaggunnilleghpesineng, taawa liigikaqa anaggutellghiteftuq.
42023015	Talwa Herod-em anaggunnillghitaa enkaam uutghutestaa whangkunnun. Taawa una yuuk avangituq tuqusaghqaaluni.
42023016	Enkaangam aghyuughmigtaasluku itemutesleqaqa.”
42023017	Ayumiqulleq tamaghhaan Passover-mi, piiqelleghmegestun Pilate-em itemutesaghqaqegkanga ataasiq anusimingllaghaq yugnun.
42023018	Iwernga qamaglluteng yulghuteghllaget akilghuutkat, “Tuqutestigu! Barabbas itemutestigu whangkunnun!”
42023019	(Barabbas anusimingllaqaqegkangat qayughllak ilatngakaalghii seghleliighqiighllak piiqngan Jerusalem-emi, yugtalleghmunllu.)
42023020	Allameng Pilate-em pikii itemutesugniluku Jesus.
42023021	Iwernga yuget akilghuukat, “Qaquuraghtestigu, qaquuraghtestigu!”
42023022	Pingayiitkun Pilate-em pikii, “Sangan, sameng anaggutkaawa? Aapqughaaghluku liigiksaqegka anaggutellghiteftuq tuqusaghqaaluni. Enkaangam aghyuughmigtaasluku itemutesnaqaqa.”
42023023	Iwernga araghaatallghat iglagtughtengnginaqaq Jesus qaquuriisqelluku. Qenwat araghaatallghat aaghtikaq.
42023024	Enkaam Pilate-em itagnaqegkaa yuget piyukellghat.
42023025	Taagken Pilate-m aanestekaa Barabbas yuget piyukellghistun. (Anusimingllaqaqegkangat seghleliighqiilleghmunllu yugtalleghmunllu.) Enkaam Jesus pegtekaa yugnun piyukellghistun pisqelluku.
42023026	Taagken Rome-em pilluwaghtengita Jesus aanutkaat. Igleghsimaluteng nallaqaat yuuk, aatgha Simon, Cyrene-eghmii, tagingulghii Jerusalem-emun taagegken nunameng. Pilluwaghtet akuqaghluku, Jesus-em qaquuraa iisqaghmigtesluku maligtestekaat kingunganeng.
42023027	Yulghuteghllaget maligtekaat Jesus, ilangita aghnat uupteghllagumaghmeng qiyakegkaat.
42023028	Iwernga Jesus-em qiivluki pikii, “Aghniitni Jerusalem-em! Qiyakegpenanga, iwernga qiyakitek elpesineng, avaqutaghpesinunllu.
42023029	Qayughllak aghneghet uka taginguut yuget pillequt, ‘Quyastekaagut aghnat qumingigalnguut, taghnughhangigalnguut, mamaghtingigalnguut!’
42023030	Taagken naayghat pilleqiit, ‘Ulleghvikikut!’ qemitlu pilleqiit, ‘Saapikut!’
42023031	Yuget tawaten pikumeng uqfik sungaghyuguluku, sangwaa salleqa kiinqan?”
42023032	Tamaanteftuk maalghuk yugek liilightuusameng naafqiikak. Ilangita pilluwaghtet aanutkagket tuqunnalukek maligullukek Jesus-mun.
42023033	Kaasameng tawavek atilqelghiimun, “Yugem Naasqwa,” tawani qaquuraqaat. Taakuklu yugek liilightuusameng naafqiikak qaquuraqagket, ataasiq aghenqigneghakun, ilanga saghumigneghakun.
42023034	Jesus pikaq, “Ataay, seghevutiki, qayughllak naallukut saaqutseng.” Pilluwaghtet ateghtiiraaghutkelluki aatkii nengiitkiit.
42023035	Nekevgaghmeng yuget esghapakat. Tawani igleghutistet legasiighwaatkegkaat Jesus whaten, “Yuguliiqii ilangi; yeqay ellmineng yugulili Christ-angukumi, Kiyaghneghem Nakmikegkaa!”
42023036	Pilluwaghtetlu legasiighwaatkegkaat. Tagitkaat quwaalghiimeng wine-meng,
42023037	pikaat, “Umiilkengngukangaten Jews-et, elpeneng katam yuguli!”
42023038	Naasqwan quulngakun nekegtekaat whaten igaqngalghii, “Una Umiilkaat Jews-et.”
42023039	Liilightuusameng naafqiistem aallghan qaquuralgutangan legasiighwaatkegkaa, pikaa, “Christ-anguziin? Elpeneng yuguli, whangkutungllu!”
42023040	Iwernga ilangan aghyuughmikaa, “Alikenghisiguu Kiyaghneq? Qerngaamta pingayuni taagken ataasimeng aghyuullengukut.
42023041	Naqamenraq whangkutung elqughullutung aghyuullengukung, iwernga una yuuk sameng anaggusimangituq.”
42023042	Taagken Jesus pikaa, “Jesus, neqamiknakevnga Umiilguluten tagikuvek!”
42023043	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ipa ungipaatamken, aghneghmi whani whangamnillequten Paradise-mi.”
42023044	Aghneghem qukaghaqaallu siqineq kuukgunaniqaq enkaam nuna qamaglluni mamleghqwaaghllakaq kenlanga three-kellaagmun. Safkaaghunllu Temple-melnguq piikaq malghughqelluni.
42023046	Taagken Jesus iglagtupiglluni pikaq, “Ataay, taghneghagka aflengakelleghqaghpenun pegtagka!” Tawaten piluni tuqukaq.
42023047	Pilluwaghtet umiilwaaghita esghapagluku tawaten pilleq, Kiyaghneq usuqegkaa, “Ipapestaaq una yuuk pinilghiinguuq!”
42023048	Yulghuteghllaget qerngughutkat esghapagnaluteng, esghapagluki tawaten pillghet nemeggnun aglaghtuutkat sakimateng tenglugmigumiita.
