42023049	Qamaglluteng liisimakistengita Jesus-em, aghnatlu ellnganun maligutkat Galilee-meng, uyavaqaanlluteng nekevghaghmeng esghapakiit tawaten pillghet.
42023050	Tamaanteftuq yuuk aatgha Joseph, Arimathea-meng pinguftuq Judea-melngughmeng. Yuuk pinilghii, malighqutaqngalghii Liilightuusanun, utaqiingulghiillu Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem. Qaywa ilatngaghngaaghmi Agghistenun, itagnaqumangilkangi agghillghit, apeghiiqiitlu Jesus-mun.
42023052	Taam yugem Pilate-mun tungsighyaghtuqaa Jesus-em yugusii.
42023053	Taagken yugusii qaquurameng iikluku ukigtekaa. Iimgulluku qiipaghaghqun linen-kun, lliifqaa laawaaqakun uyghaghrughllagkun. Taana lliveq atuqumangilnguq.
42023054	Aghnat Jesus-mun maligutkat Galilee-meng, lliveghmun maligtekaat Joseph. Tawani esghapakaat naten yugusii llikaatanga. Taagken uteghnighluteng yataaghqegkiit neqnighsaasitlu tepengllaasitlu angighhunnaluki Jesus-em yugusiinun. Aghneqegkanga yataaghqutilleghqam Sabbath-mun, whaa Sabbath piinlighnaqelghii. Enkaam aghnat meghnaalikat Liilightuusat qelellghistun.
42024001	Sivulighmi aghneghani santillghem, unaangupiglluku, taakut aghnat lliveghtekat kelqelluki yataaghqegkateng neqnighsaasit.
42024002	Lliveghmun kaasalghiimeng uyghagllak paaynganeng ullghitaghngaftuq.
42024003	Iteghaasalghiimeng aviiteftuq yugusii Atanghem Jesus-em.
42024004	Kukriqutkumaluku samatanga, yugek aliighaghtekak saaghwitgun, aatkiik nighugllagek.
42024005	Aghnat alingruughutkat repall gginateng seketestekiit nunamun, yugek aaptekiit, “Sangan ivaghitsi unguvalghiimeng akulngitni tuqukat?
42024006	Whaanneghituq; unguvaghsimaaq tuqulleghmeng. Amenqun salin Galilee-melluni ungipaatkaqegkangisi,
42024007	‘Ighnegha Yugem tuunepestaaghyaghqaqaat seghleghqestenun qaquuriisqelluku, taagken pingayaani aghneghem unguvaghllequq tuqulleghmeng.’”
42024008	Taagken aghnat neqanguqiit Jesus-em akuzitangi.
42024009	Lliveghmeng uteghnighluteng tamaana qamaglluku aapqaat qula ataasiq siipneqluku apostle-enun, ilangitnunllu maligsaaghtengitnun.
42024010	Taakut lliveghtekat Mary Magdala-ghmiinkut, Joanna-nkut, Mary-llu naanga James-em, ilangillu aghnat. Ungipaatkiit apostle-et tamaaken pilleghneng,
42024011	iwernga apostle-et sumeghmeggni temngi piniluki pikiit enkaam ugpequmangilkangit.
42024012	Naqamenraq Peter nekevluni lliveghmun ketanqukaq. Kaasami lliveghmun qineghtekaq, esghaqii qiipagharaaghinaat linen-et lliluteng. Taagken aglaqaq sumeghtaghaatkumaan Jesus samatanga.
42024013	Tawani ataasimi aghneghmi, maalghuk maligsaaghtekek aghulaqegkak nengiighhaghmun aatgha Emmaus, Jerusalem-emeng entaqun maaghraghvinlek miles-ngulghii.
42024014	Akuzitkegkaak qamaglluku tamaana tawaten pilleq.
42024015	Akuzitkumaluku tamaana pilleq, Jesus-em kaallukek igleghalghusiqakek.
42024016	Iwernga nallukegkaak kinangutanga qayughllak Kiyaghneghem liisuqesneghilkanga.
42024017	Jesus-em aaptekakek, “Igleghutkelluku sangwaa akuzitkaqestegnegu?” Aghuliiqak, esghaqaalutek qivghungaghllagek.
42024018	Taagken aallghan, Cleopas-meng atelgem aaptekaa, “Ellnginaaziin laalightaq Jerusalem-emun nallukilghii tamaaken apeghiiqaneng akugwaaq?”
42024019	Aaptekakek, “Sangwaa saa?” Kiimsiqaak. “Jesus Nazareth-eghmii akuzimghhutkaqaghpung. Uuknaliqistenguyaghtuq, qepghallghillu apeghtughillghillu aghtughyaghqaanghisaghtut Kiyaghneghmillu yugnillu.
42024020	Chief priest-emtallu igleghutistemtallu tuunegkaqaat Rome-em governor-nganun tuqutesqelluku, enkaam qaquuraghtestekaqaa.
42024021	Sighimaknguyaghaghput ellnganun itemunnaqniluku Israel. Taam saaghwakun, una aghneq pingayiitkaa taagken tawaten pilleghmeng.
42024022	Ilangita aghnamta saghiighayugsimiinkut. Aghtaghaghaqaallu lliveghlluteng
42024023	aviilngaamakangat Jesus-em yugusii. Tagiluteng aapghaat yaqulgegneng esghaghwaalleghteng, yaqulgek ungipaasimakangik aghnat unguvaamaniluku.
42024024	Taagken ilaput lliveghlluteng aapghaat tawatengngwaaq aghnat apellghistun, iwernga esghallghitaat Jesus.”
42024025	Taagken Jesus-em pikakek, “Nallughhaghmeng yugegni! Piyaqnaghhaghmeng ugpeqinaqelleghtek uuknaliqistet akuzitkegkiitneng.
42024026	Pikaagut Christ-a ikfiqepestaaghluni tuqulleqniluku iteghvagilgami nighughqelleghminun.”
42024027	Enkaam Jesus-em piinliisiqluki igaquqiit Moses-enkut, qamagllutengllu uuknaliqistet, liigikestekakek Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng ellmineng ayuqelghiineng.
42024028	Kaasaghtuqat Emmaus-mun, Jesus nagneghsugnighqegkaq.
42024029	Iwernga ighlekluku pikaak, “Whangkutegniten, whanikunaqaa mamleggnaqegkanga.” Enkaam elkegnitkaq.
42024030	Tipelegni aqumelgusighlukek, neqekrangllaq tuguluku iyamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq, ikutaqlukek tuunegkakek.
42024031	Taagken Kiyaghneghem liisuqestekaak Jesus-ngutanga, esghaamanghegkenengllu aviitqaghtekaq.
42024032	Ellmetegneng pikak, “Qaamggunqun quyaghllagtukung aleghqughaqngamikung tumemi, liigikestaqngamikung Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng!”
42024033	Tawaninginaq yugek nekevlutek uteghniqak Jerusalem-emun. Tawani qerngughutngaftut qula ataasiq siipneqluku maligsaaghtet, tamaakutlu ellngitnilnguut.
42024034	Kaasayek taakut ungipaatkagket maligsaaghtek, “Ataneq unguvapestaaghumaaq tuqulleghmeng! Aliighvikumaallu Simon!”
42024035	Taagken yugek aapqaak tumemellutek sangwaa sakaatanga, natenllu liisuqelleghtek Ataneq neqekrangllaq aavgughaqngagu.
42024036	Yugek ungipamsukumaluku tawaten pilleq, Jesus ellnga katam nekevghaftuq akulngitni, pikii, “Nekeggmelleq elpesinilli!”
42024037	Upughluteng alingruuqat, sumeghmeggni esghaanniluteng taghneghameng pikat.
42024038	Iwernga Jesus-em aaptekii, “Sangafsi alingruughetsi? Sangan aygughitiqetsi?
42024039	Esghaqaghtekiqun iigenkallu itegankallu, whanganguunga. Saaflunga liisimakelleqaghpesinga, qayughllak taghneghak kemekragituklu neghqwaaghituklu, esghaghaghpesinga whanga pilguunga.”
42024040	Tawaten piluki Jesus-em kelguvikegkii iigminengllu itegaminengllu.
42024041	Iwernga ugpeqngwaaghumangilkangat qayughllak quyaghllagulghiitlu saghiighayugllagulghiitlu. Enkaam aaptekii, “Whani sameng neghyaghqiitsii?”
42024042	Tuunegkaat gaaqameng iqallugmeng,
42024043	tuguluku neghegkaa esghaamanghitni.
42024044	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesinitngulunga whaten ungipaatkaqamsi: Sangwaat qamaglluteng whangamneng ayuqelghiit igaqegkat apeghiighyaghqaagut, Moses-em Liilightuusaanilnguut, uuknaliqistet igaqegkiitngilnguut, psalms-enilnguutlu.”
42024045	Taagken umyugiit liigikestekii Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng.
42024046	Pikii, “Whaten igaqegkaaguq: ‘Christ-a ikfiqepestaaghyaghqaaguq, taagken pingayaani aghneghem unguvapestaaghyaghqaaguq tuqulleghmeng.’
42024047	Whatenllu igaqegkaalghii: ‘Maligsaaghtengi ungipaqillequt Aatghakun, piinlighluteng Jerusalem-emeng taagken tamaghhaanun ramkenun. Ungipaasaghqaqiit avuteghqelluki seghleghqennaniisqelluki Kiyaghneghmun seghevutesqelluki.’
42024048	Elpesi liisimakistenguusi ikfiqellemnun, tuqullemnun, unguvaghtestellemnun.
42024049	Enkaam taawa kayaglleqagka Atama akequsakek elpesinun. Iwernga utaqiilghaasi maani Jerusalem-emi, kenlanga aatesfikelleghpesinun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng qilagmeng pamaken.”
42024050	Taagken aghulaqutkii uyavantulangatun Bethany-m, tawani iiggeni nengugulluki quyastekii.
42024051	Quyasimaluki unitkii, Kiyaghneghem qilagmun mayuutestekaa.
42024052	Tawani manigughluku uteghniqat Jerusalem-emun quyallelighllagluteng,
42024053	enkaam iiwleng Temple-metaqelghiit Kiyaghneq usuqaqegkangat.
43001001	Piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng Akuzin tawantekaq, Akuzin Kiyaghneghmetkaq, Akuzin Kiyaghneghulghii.
43001002	Ellnga Kiyaghneghmetkaq piinlighyuggaalleghmeng ima.
43001003	Kiyaghneghem ellngakun sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku ulimakaa, talwa sangwaa ataasighhaq ulimamangitaa Akuzitngunani.
43001004	Akuzitmetuq unguvalleq, taana unguvalleq nighuguuq yugnun.
43001005	Taana nighuk kuukgutnguuq mamlegmi, mamlegem kayaalqumangitaa.
43001006	Taawanguq yuuk Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaa, aatgha John.
43001007	John-em apeghyaghtuqaa nighuk qamaglluki yuget ugpeghesqelluki ungipaqilleghmikun.
43001008	Ellnga nighugunghituq, iwernga apeghyaghtuuwaa nighuk.
43001009	Taana nighupiiguuq tagikaq nunamun, nighugullghii tamaghhaanun yugnun.
43001010	Taana Akuzin nunametkaq. Qaywa nuna ulimakaayaghngaan ellngakun, tawalliima nunam yugita nallukegkaat.
43001011	Tagikaayalghii ellmi katam yugminun, iwernga tugukliimangilkangat.
43001012	Iwernga qamaglluki tuguklighilghiitlu ugpelghiitlu ellmineng, avaqutaliisaghqaaghtestekaqii Kiyaghneghmun.
43001013	Avaqutaliisimangitii yugkun allgeghaqelghiistun, talwa yugem piyukellghakun nalighmeng nakmikellghakun. Kiyaghneghem ellmineng katam avaqutaliitkaqii.
43001014	Akuzin kemgughlluni akulemnnitkaq. Ellngakun Kiyaghneq liitestengngwaaqaaguq, liitestengngwaaqaqaallu piniqelleni whangkunnun. Esghaqaqaghput taawa seghleghllaguftuq. Seghleghllaguftuq qayughllak taananginaghhaalghii Ighnegha Atam.
43001015	John-em Paaptaayestem aapqaqaa, akilghuutkegkaqaa whaten, “Taananguuq aapqaqa elpesinun whaten piiqngama, ‘Kingumneng tagiyaghqaq aangeghllagtuq whangamneng, qayughllak kiyaghtengngulghii talwa allgellghillunga.’”
43001016	Piniqingaghllagutmineng quyastaqiinkut uteghpagtiinaq.
43001017	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqii Liilightuusat Moses-kun, iwernga piniqelleqlu ipalleqlu liitestekaqaak Jesus Christ-akun.
43001018	Kitum alngunak esghiigataa Kiyaghneq. Taananginaghhaam Ighneghem qantaghantelleghpigaam Atamun, liitestekaa yugnun.
43001019	Jerusalem-emeng Jews-et igleghutistengit kayagtikat priest-enengllu Levite-enengllu aaptesqelluku John whaten, “Kinanguzin?”
43001020	Aapsatni kiimsighaghtekii whateghlluwaaq, “Whanga Christ-angunghitunga.”
43001021	Enkaam aaptekaat, “Kinanguzinmi? Elijah-nguziin?” John-em kiimsiqii, “Nakaa.” Aaplaataqaat, “Uuknaliqistenguziin?” Kiimsiqii, “Nakaa.”
43001022	Pikaat, “Ungipaatikut kinanguten, qayughllak ungipaasaghtupestaaghnaqaput kayagtikat whangkunneng. Aapghi kinanguten.”
43001023	John-em pikii, “Uuknaliqista Isaiah pikaaguq, ‘Ma akilghuugaquq kilgaani whaten, Taklaghteggu tuumkaghqaa Atanghem’. Taana yuuk akilghuulghii whanganguuq.”
43001024	Pharisees-et taakut kayagtekaqegkangit John-mun.
43001025	Aaptekaat, “Christ-angunghilkuvek, Elijah-ngunghilkuvek, uuknaliqistengunghilkuvek, sangavek paaptaayeghiiqsin?”
43001026	John-em kiimsiqii, “Paaptaayeghiiqunga meghqun. Akulegpesinituq kina nallukegkaghsi.
43001027	Taananguuq tagiyaghqaq kingumneng, seghleghllaguuq repall whanga pininghitunga itemsaghqaaluki singii.”
43001028	Qamaglluteng tamaakut pikaagut Bethany-mi inglunganilngughmi Kiiwegni Jordan-egni. Taakwani John paaptaayeghingulghii yugneng.
43001029	Unaamingani John-em esghaghluku Jesus tagilghii ellminun yuget pikii, “Ii-i, taanata Penniighaghaa Kiyaghneghem iqitiyaghqaq seghleghqellghaneng nunam yugan.
43001030	Taananguuq aapqaqa whaten, ‘Yuuk taginaqnguuq kingumneng, iwernga aangwaaghuuq whangamneng, qayughllak kiyaghtengnguuq talwa allgellghillunga.’
43001031	Whangallu nalluksaghaqa kinangutanga, iwernga paaptaayeghiyaghtuugunga meghqun liitesqelluku kinangutanga Israel-eghmiinun.”
43001032	Taagken John-em ungipaqegkaqaa, “Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqaanga paaptaayeghisqellunga meghqun. Paninang nalluknguluku kinangutanga, Kiyaghneghem ungipaatkaqaanga, ‘Esghaghlleqagken Taghneghak ukilghiik yugmun. Taana yuuk paaptaayeghiyaghqaaguq Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun.’ Enkaam esghaghagka qilagmeng Taghneghak ukilghiik dove-ngulutek Jesus-mun, ellnganitkaklu”
43001034	Taagken John-em pikii, “Tawatelluku esghaqaqaqa, ungipaatamsi, taana Ighneqaa Kiyaghneghem.”
43001035	Unaamingani John tawanllaataqaq, maalghuklu maligsaaghtekek.
43001036	John-em esghaghluku Jesus naghughlleghhii pikaq, “Esgha taanata Penniighaghaa Kiyaghneghem!”
43001037	Taakuk maligsaaghtek nagalluku John, maligtekaak Jesus.
43001038	Jesus-em qiivluni esghaghlukek maligullghiik ellminun aaptekakek, “Sangwaa piiqestegnegu?” Kiimsiqaak, “Rabbi, naantaqsin?” (“Rabbi” whaten pisiiguq, “Apeghtughista”.)
43001039	Pikakek, “Maligllunga esghaghyaghtughtegnegu.” Enkaam maligtekaak kiyaghfiganun, tawantekak 4-eklaagmeng kenlanga unulleghmun.
43001040	Yugem aallgha nagatkaq John-meng akuzilghiimeng, maligtikaq Jesus-meng Andrew-nguftuq, Simon Peter-em anglegutanga.
43001041	Tawaninginaq Andrew anglegutminun Simon-mun aglaghluni pikaa, “Naalkumaaghpung Messiah.” (“Messiah” whaten pisiiguq, “Christ-a”.)
43001042	Taagken Simon aglaatkaa Jesus-mun. Jesus-em esghaghluku pikaa, “Elpek Simon-nguuten ighnegha John-em. Aatghen Cephas-ngullequq, whaten pisiq, Peter.”
43001043	Unaamingani Jesus Galilee-nnaqumalghii. Nallaghluku yuuk aatgha Philip, pikaa, “Maligtinga.”
43001044	(Philip Bethsaida-ghmiingulghii, Andrew-nkugetun Peter-enkugetun.)
43001045	Taagken Philip-em ivaghyaghtughluku Nathanael ungipaatkaa, “Nallaamaaghput yuuk Moses-em igaqegkaa igiitgun Liilightuusat, uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkaqaat igamegteggun. Jesus-nguuq Nazareth-eghmii, ighnegha Joseph-em.”
43001046	Nathanael-em aaptekaa, “Sangwaangam pinilghii Nazareth-meng allgeghlleqefta?” Philip-em kiimsiqaa, “Esghaghyaghtuqaghhuqun.”
43001047	Jesus-em esghaghyamigu Nathanael tagilghii ellminun pikaa, “Taanata Israel-eghmiipik, temngitwhangilnguq.”
43001048	Nathanael-em aaptekaa, “Naten liisimaksinga?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Esghaqaqamken asinganilluten figs-em uqfigan, talwa salin Philip-em apellghillunga elpenun.”
43001049	Nathanael-em pikaa, “Apeghtughista, elpek Ighneqaaten Kiyaghneghem! Elpek Umiilkaaten Israel-em!”
43001050	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ugpeghsiin qayughllak ungipaaskemken esghaamaniluten asingani figs-em uqfigan? Sangwaat aangataghalghiit tamaakuneng esghaghlleqaten.”
43001051	Taagken pikii “Ipa ungipaatamsi, esghaghlleqaghsi qilak qelpelghii, Kiyaghneghemllu yaqulgi mayulghiit, ukilghiit Ighneghakun Yugem.”
43002001	Pingayiitangani aghneghet taawanguq nengughhnaqelghiik Cana-mi, Galilee-melngughmi. Jesus-em naanga tawanlenguq,
43002002	Jesus-enkutlu maligsaaghtekullghiit tagsiqliqaalghiit nengughhnaqelghiignun.
43002003	Wine-a qamagsatgu, naangan Jesus pikaa, “Wine-ngiitut.”
43002004	Jesus-em pikaa, “Aghnami whani, sasqegpenanga, salin pilleghqaqa kaasigatuq.”
43002005	Taagken Jesus-em naangan pikii qepghaghtet, “Sasqegkangisi legan pilghaasi.”
43002006	Taawanguq aghvinleguftut uyghagmeng ulimaaghet melghutat. Ilangi 20-gallons-ngulghiit, ilangi 30 gallons-ngulghiit. (Jews-et atuqaqegkangit ukmangighsamun Moses-em Liilightuusaan pisqellghatun.)
43002007	Jesus-em pikii qepghaghtet, “Imighteki taakut melghutat meghmeng.” Imiqiit eslemkaghaghtaghluki.
43002008	Taagken pikii, “Meghmeng imiillusi aglaateggu neqenghaghqem umiilga.” Enkaam imiilluteng aglaatkaat.
43002009	Umiilgem naasiiqaa meq wine-ngughtekaq. Nallukegkanga naken taana wine-a pingutanga. (Taakut qepghaghtet liisimakegkangat qayughllak imiilluteng meghmeng pikaalghiit.) Enkaam umiilgem tuqlughluku nulightughnaqelghii
43002010	pikaa, “Tamaghhaghmi kiyang pinilghiimeng wine-meng atuqaquq sivukluni enkaam aqelqat kepsuunneghata tamaana aghsaan ayuqelghii wine-a kinguliiluku atughaqaat. Iwernga pinillgha wine-em atuqumangisimazigu sivukluku.”
43002011	Cana-mi, Galilee-melngughmi Jesus-em apeghiiqaa allaaghlluwhaghtilleqsuwhaani. Taaggun allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmikun yugnun esghaghtestekaa aangelleghllani. Enkaam maligsaaghtengita ugpeqegkaat ipa Messiah-nguniluku.
43002012	Taam kingunganeng Jesus, naanga, anglegutangi, maligsaaghtengillu aglaqat Capernaum-emun, tamaantekat qafsinat aghneghet.
43002013	Jews-et neqenghaghqesaghtungestalghiit Passover-mun enkaam Jesus aglaqaq Jerusalem-emun.
43002014	Temple-mi esghaqii yuget akikulghiit ox-eneng, penniighneng, dove-eneng. Esghaqiillu manimeng naveghqughtet aqumluteng tipelemeggni.
43002015	Jesus-em kagsagutangllaghluni tapghaghmeng, Temple-meng aanesquqii maligulluki penniighnunllu ox-enunllu. Manilghutiit kataguutaqluki mingilatkii, ulleghquqiillu tipelngit.
43002016	Taagken yuget akilpegalghiit dove-eneng qelqii whaten, “Aanuteki whaken! Atama Mangteghaa akilpegaghvigughtegpenaan.”
43002017	Maligsaaghtengita neqaatkaat Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghat, “Megnukingalqa Mangteghaghpenun naafqutkennaqngwaaqa.”
43002018	Taagken Jews-et igleghutestengita aaptekaat Jesus, “Kitum qeleghtaten tawaten pisqelluten? Kiyaghneghem pisqumakangaten, allaaghlluwhaghti ipapighqusighqameng.”
43002019	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Naafqiteggu una temple-a, pingayuni aghneghni nekefleqaqa.”
43002020	Aaptekaat, “Elpaak nekefleqsiguu pingayuni aghneghni? 46-nguut ayumiqullghet nekeftusiqegkaat uumun Temple-mun.”
43002021	Iwernga Jesus-em akuzitkengngukanga ellmi yugusini temple-nguluku.
43002022	Unguvaghtaqngan tuqulleghmeng maligsaaghtengita neqaatkaat whaten pillgha, “Una temple-a, pingayuni aghneghni nekefleqaqa.” Enkaam ugpeqegkiit Akuzitet Igaqegkat, Jesus-emllu akuzillghi.
43002023	Jesus Jerusalem-emelluku Passover-em neqenghaghqellghani, uglapiglleghhiit esghapagluki allaaghlluwhaghtillghi ugpeqegkaqegkangat,
43002024	iwernga Jesus-em ugpequmangilkangi.
43002025	Kinkunun alngunak ungipaanneghisaghngaatni ayuqelghii yugneng qayughllak liisimakegkangi natetulangi.
43003001	Taawanguq yuuk aatghha Nicodemus, Pharisee Jews-et igleghutistengat.
43003002	Unugyagu Jesus-mun aglaghluni pikaa, “Rabbi, whangkuta liisimakamken apeghtughistenguuten kayagtekaa Kiyaghneghem. Kina alngunak allaaghlluwhaghtinaanghituq elpetun tawaten wetkuqun Kiyaghneq ellnganiskan.”
43003003	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ipa ungipaatamken, kitum alngunak esghaghnaanghitaa Ataneghpagullgha Kiyaghneghem wetkuqun allgenqigtekumi.”
43003004	Nicodemus-em aaptekaa, “Naten'ngam anglikaq yuuk allgenqiglleqa? Ipapestaaq iteghnaanghituq naami qantagkenun allgenqiggnaluni.”
43003005	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Ipa piimken, kina alngunak iteghnaanghituq Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem wetkuqun allgenqigtekumi meghqunllu, Taghneghagnekunllu.
43003006	Tamaana kemegkun allgeqaq kemguuq, iwernga tamaana taghneghagnekun allgeqaq taghneghaaquq.
43003007	Saghiighayugpenang qayughllak ungipaaskemken, ‘Elpesi allgenqigsaghqapestaaghuusi.’
43003008	Anuqa naken alngunak piiquq, nagataqan sulugtallgha, iwernga nallukngwaaghan naken piiqutangallu naveklu piiqutanga. Tawateghpigaq ayuquq tamaghhaghmi allgelghii Taghneghagnekun.”
43003009	Nicodemus-em aaptekaa, “Naten'ngam taana piyaghqaawa?”
43003010	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpek apeghtughistelgaghlluten Israel-eghmiinun, paninang nalluksiguu taana?
43003011	Ipa piimken, akuzitkaqaghput liisimakegkaghput, aapghaqaghput esghaqaghput, paninang nalighhiinaghpesi ugpeqigataa ungipaghput.
43003012	Aapghaqanka elpesinun nunam pingi iwernga ugpeqigataghpesinga, naten'ngam ugpeqelleqesteki aapqumki qilagem pingi?
43003013	Kina alngunak mayiigatuq qilagmun iwerngaqun Ighnegha Yugem ukikaq qilagmeng.”
43003014	Kilgaani katam Moses-em napaghtellghatun napaqakun bronze-a nemeghyaq, tawateghpigaq Ighnegha Yugem napaghsaghqaalghii.
43003015	Enkaam kina alngunak ugpeqilghii ellnganeng kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelgullequq.
43003016	Kiyaghneghem piniqepigtutmineng nunam yuga tuunegkaa kezemaghhaq Ighneni. Ighnegha kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu tuqunaanghituq, iwernga allgeghlleqaa kenlengilnguq unguvalleq.
43003017	Kiyaghneghem kayagsimangitaa Ighneni nunamun aghyuughisqelluku nunam yuganeng, kayagtekaqaa yugulighistenguluku yugnun.
43003018	Kina alngunak ugpeqilghii Ighneghmeng aghyuullengnaanghituq. Kina alngunak ugpeqinghilnguq nanqigtengngwaaqaaguq aghyuughyaghqaaluni, qayughllak ugpeqenghilkanga kezemaghhaq Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem.
43003019	Esgha una apallaa Kiyaghneghem aghyuughisighqaa yugnun: nighuk tagikaayaghngaan nunamun, yuget piniqataghaqaat mamlek nighugmeng qayughllak seghletun piiqelghiit.
43003020	Kitum alngunak seghletun pikayugem ugumikaa nighuk, enkaam taginaanghituq nighugmun seghletun pilleni esghaghnayukatki.
43003021	Iwernga kina alngunak ipapighqelluni pikayuk tagiyaghqaaguq nighugmun, esghiisqelluku qepghaqani Kiyaghneghem piyukellghakun ayuqelghii.
43003022	Kingunganeng taam Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit aglaqat Judea-mun. Maligsaaghteminun maligulluni tamaantutkelluku paaptaayekii yuget.
43003023	John-llu paaptaayeghingulghii Aenon-mi, Salim-emeng qantaghanlengughmi, qayughllak meghllagulghii tamaana. Yuget tagilaghaatngulghiit ellnganun paaptaayesqelluteng.
43003024	(John salin anusimingllaghvigmun kanaghtellghilnguq.)
43003025	Ilangita John-em maligsaaghtengita aaghtiiraaqaat ataasiq Jew ukmangighsalleghmeng Moses-em Liilightuusaanilngughmeng.
43003026	Enkaam aglaghluteng John-mun ungipaatkaat, “Apeghtughista, neqamikenghisiguu yuuk elpenitkaq inglungani Jordan-em, akuzitkegkan? Whaa maaten paaptaayeghiiquq, enkaam qamaglluteng yuget aglaghtuutnguut ellnganun.”
43003027	John-em kiimsiqii, “Kina alngunak allgeghunnaanghituq sameng wetkuqun Kiyaghneghem tuunegkumigu.
43003028	Elpesi liisimakistekamsi whaten piiqngama, ‘Whanga Christ-angunghitunga iwernga kayagtekaagunga sivungani.’
43003029	Ugiighnaqelghii ugikaghqaan ellngan pikaa. Nulightughnaqelghiim ilakumtaagha, kayutanga utaqiigaquq nagasugnimaghmi menganeng. Ilakumtaaghan nagaquneghminigu menga quyaghllagaquq. Tawateghpigaq whangallu quyalqa iighwightuq.
43003030	Ellnga megnunaghataghaghnaqnguuq, whanga ukavaghnaqnguunga.”
43003031	Ellnga taana pamakaghtaq aangeghllagtuq tamaghhaghllaganeng. Ellnga taana nunameng pi, nunam pikaa enkaam akuzikayuguuq nunam pinganeng. Ellnga taana qilagmeng pi, quliiguq tamaghaghllaganeng.
43003032	Aapghaqaa esghaqanillu nagaquqanillu iwernga kitum alngunak ugpeqigatii akuzitangi.
43003033	Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumiki akuzitangi, tawaten pilleghmikun ipapighqaqaa Kiyaghneq ipangutanga.
43003034	Taam Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaan atuqaqii Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagni tuun'ngukek ellnganun iingunalkighllukek.
43003035	Atam piniqepigtaa Ighneq, enkaam aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaa samun tamaghhaanun.
43003036	Kina alngunak ugpelghii Ighneghqun, kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelguuq. Kitum alngunak qaatkenghilkumigu Ighneq unguvallengeqeghhnaanghituq, taawanginaq Kiyaghneghem aghyuullghanisaghqaaguq quunpeng.
43004001	Pharisees-et nagaquumakangat palaghhaaghhniluki yuget tagilaghaallghiit John-mun, naqam nulaniluki tagilaghaallghiit Jesus-mun maligsaaghtengunalutengllu, paaptaayesqellutengllu.
43004002	(Iwernga Jesus-em ellngan katam paaptaayelanghilkangi, malighsaaghtengita paaptaayelaqangit.)
43004003	Atanghem liigiksamiki Pharisees-enun taana nagaquumaniluku, aghulaqluni Judea-meng Galilee-nneqigtekaq.
43004004	Tuumkaghqaanilnguq Samaria.
43004005	Kaatkaq Sychar-mun, Samaria-melngughmun uyavantepagllagunghilnguq piitesiighaghvigmeng Jacob-em tuunegkaaneng ighneghminun Joseph-mun.
43004006	Jacob-emllu meghtaghviga tawanlenguq. Jesus igleghteghllagem meghnulghii enkaam aqumegkaq saaghwakun meghtaghvigem, aghneghem qukaani.
43004007	Maligsaaghtengi Sychar-mun neqengyaghtuqaalghiit. Taagken Samaria-ghmii aghnaq, Sychar-meng meghtaqaq. Jesus-em pikaa, “Meghsiightinga.”
43004009	Aghnam pikaa, “Jew-nguuten, whanga Samaria-ghmiinguunga, sangavek whangamnun meghsisqesin?” (Tawaten pikaqegkanga qayughllak Jews-et talwa aleghqughyaghqaqenghilkangit Samaria-ghmiit.)
43004010	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Huuk, liisimaksaquvgu Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaa, liisimaksaquvgullu kinangutanga meghsingllalghii elpenun, meghsingllaghviknayaghan unguvallengestikayugmeng meghmeng.”
43004011	Aghnam pikaa, “Yuguniiq, meghtaghvik uusqapigtuq, talwa qaltiituten. Naken'ngam unguvallengestikayugmeng mengelleqsin?
43004012	Sivunemta Jacob-em tuunegkaqaa una meghtaghvik whangkunnun. Ellngallu, ighneghillu, teghikusiillu qamaglluteng meghegkaagut taagken. Aangwaaghuniluten Jacob-meng pinguziin?”
43004013	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Kina alngunak meghelghii whaken meghmeng alla meqsugyaghqaaguq.
43004014	Meq whanga tuunyaghqaqa kitum alngunak meghegkumigu allamengllu meqsugnaanghituq. Meq tuunyaghqaqa ellnganun tawaten lliighyaghqaaguq sengngulghiistun, tevughalghii ellngan ilunganeng. Taana meq kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengusighqaqaa.”
43004015	Aghnam pikaa, “Yuguniiq, taagken meghmeng meghsinga enkaam alla meqsunghillanga, talwa whavek meghtaghnanighlanga.”
43004016	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ugin aqfagu enkaam tagilghaaten.”
43004017	Aghnam pikaa, “Ugingitunga.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Ipa uginginniiten.
43004018	Ugikegkaqaten tallimat yuget. Maaten taana yuuk kiyaghfigen ugikenghitan. Ungipaataghpenga ipapigmeng.”
43004019	Aghnam pikaa, “Yuguniiq, taawa liigikamken uuknaliqistenguftuten.
43004020	Sivuneghma maniguqaqaat Kiyaghneq whani naayghami, iwernga elpesi Jews-eni Jerusalem-nguniiqaghsi maniiguutfigkaq Kiyaghneghmun.”
43004021	Jesus-em pikaa, “Aghnami whani, ugpeqinga, taakwaningani yuget manigughnanighlleqaat Ata whani naayghami talwa Jerusalem-emi.
43004022	Elpesi Samaria-ghmiini talwa nallukaghsi kinangutanga maniguqaghsi. Whangkuta Jews-eni liisimakaghput kinangutanga maniguqaghput, qayughllak Jews-etgun Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaqaa yugulilleq.
43004023	Iwernga pilleghqaq uka taginguuq, aaqun kaalluni ayuquq maniguutepikayuget manigughlleqaat Ata Taghneghagnekunllu ipalleghqunllu. Tawatelnguut maniguutkayuget Atam maniguutesugaqii ellminun.
43004024	Kiyaghneq Taghneghaaguq, tamaakut maniguullghiit ellnganun manigughyaghqaqaat Taghneghagnekunllu ipalleghqunllu.”
43004025	Aghnam pikaa, “Liisimakaqa Messiah tagillequq, atilqelghii Christ-ameng. Tagikumi ungipaalleqiinkut sameng tamaghhaaneng.”
43004026	Jesus-em pikaa, “Whanga taananguunga aleghquqen.”
43004027	Whaallu Jesus-em maligsaaghtengi uteghniqat. Esghaghlukek Jesus-enkuk aghnaankuk aleghquullghiik elngaatall saghiighayagutkagket. Iwernga nalighhiiniita pimangilkangat aghnaq, “Sameng pizin?” Nalighmeng Jesus aapsimangilkangat, “Sangan aghnaq aleghqughsigu?”
43004028	Taagken aghnam melghutagni unillukek, Sychar-mun aglaghluni yuget pikii,
43004029	“Esghaghyaghtuqaghtegguqun meghtaghvigmelnguq yuuk. Sallemneng tamaghhaaneng ungipaataanga. Qaa Christ-anguuq?”
43004030	Enkaam yuget taagken nemeng esghaghyaghtuutkaat Jesus.
43004031	Salin kaatellghilluki maligsaaghtengita Jesus piighaataqaat, “Apeghtughista, sangiighhaghmeng neqaa.”
43004032	Iwernga pikii, “Whanga neqelguunga neghyaghqameng elpesi nallukngwaaqaghpesineng.”
43004033	Maligsaaghtet ellmeggneng aapqughaaghutkat, “Qaa kitum neqmeng tagisimaa?”
43004034	Jesus-em pikii, “Neqeka qaatkutellghuuq kayagtikameng whangamneng, apeghiighesqellukullu qepghaqaq tagivaqani whangamnun.
43004035	Nagataqasi yuget pilghiit, ‘Taagken piitesighalleghmeng estamat tanqit atughluki, unatalleghqaq kaataquq.’ Ungipaataghllamsi, yuvghiighwaaqaghtekiqun piitesiighaghviget, tamaakut piitkat unataghyaghqaaghtut.
43004036	Yuuk unatalghii wheat-meng akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq qepghaqaminun, enkaam quyayaghqaaguq maligulluni piitesiighaqamun. Tawateghpigaq yugem ungipalleghmikun kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengestekumiki akileghtuusangyaghqaaguq. Taanallu quyayaghqaaguq maligulluni ungipaqiyuwhaaqanun whangamneng.
43004037	Taana akuzilleq ipanguuq, ‘Ataasiq yuuk piitesiighaghaquq, ilanga yuuk unataghaquq.’
43004038	Kayagtekaqamsi unatiisqellusi piitesighaghvigmi piitesighaamangilkegpesineng. Ilangit piitesiighaqaagut, iwernga elpesi unataqayuguusi piitestekiitneng, enkaam elpesillu akileghtuusangellequsi qepghaqiitneng.”
43004039	Sychar-mi, Samaria-ghmiilghutet ugpeqegkaat Jesus qayughllak aghnam ungipaatkaqegkangi, “Taam yugem ungipaataanga sallemneng tamaghhaaneng.”
43004040	Samaria-ghmiit kaalluku Jesus ellmeggnitesqegkaat. Jesus tamaantekaq maalghuk aghneghek,
43004041	enkaam wata ugpeghtuutkat akuzitangi nagalluki.
43004042	Taana aghnaq pikaat, “Nagasuwhaaghaqngamken ugpeqegkaqaput akuziteten. Iwernga maaten whangkunneng katam nagalluku liitaghput taana yuuk ipa yugulighistekeftaa nunam yugan.”
43004043	Maalghuk aghneghek atughlukek, Jesus Sychar-meng aghulaqegkaq Galilee-mun.
43004044	(Jesus ellmineng katam pikaalghii, “Uuknaliqista nunalgutangan tugukliigataat uuknaliqistenguluku.”)
43004045	Kaasan Galilee-mun, yuget tugukliqaat qayughllak esghapakaqegkangat sallgha qamaglluku Jerusalem-emi, Passover-mun neqenghaghqengnguluteng.
43004046	Enkaam Jesus aglanqigtekaq Cana-mun, Galilee-melngughmun, meq wine-ngughtestefigminun. Taawanguq kavemem umiilwaagha, Capernaum-emi ighnegha qinuyugllak.
43004047	Nagaqughyamigu Jesus tagimaniluku Judea-meng, Galilee-mun takuluku maniiguutkaq naallghusaghtuqiisqelluku ighneni tuquyaghtungestalghii.
43004048	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ugpeqinaanghitusi wetkuqun esghapakufsiki aangelghiit allaaghlluwhaghtillghet.”
43004049	Umiilwaaghem pikaa, “Yuguniiq, maligtinga taghnughhaqa tuquvagilgan.”
43004050	Jesus-em pikaa, “Aglaa, ighneghen unguvallequq.” Yugem ugpeqegkii Jesus-em akuzitangi enkaam aglaqaq.
43004051	Tumangani taakwani qepghaghtengita nallaghluku ungipaatkaat, “Ighneghen piniighsimaaq.”
43004052	Aaptekii naniklaagmi piniighsimatanga. Pikaat, “Ighivgaq one-eklaagmi puqleghangiitkaaguq.”
43004053	Atangan liisimakegkanga tawani aflumi Jesus-em pikaqegkanga, “Ighneghen unguvallequq.” Enkaangam nengllugutkullghiit ugpeghtuutkat.
43004054	Taana tuungliqegkanga Jesus-em allaaghlluwhaghtillghan tagiluni Judea-meng Galilee-mun.
43005001	Taam kingunganeng Jesus, Jerusalem-etkaq Jews-et neqenghaghqellghitnun.
43005002	Taawanguq Jerusalem-emi, Sheep Gate-em tungangani naayvaghaaq tallimaneng porch-elek, Hebrew-stun atillgha Bethzatha.
43005003	Uglapiglleghhii qinuyuk ingaghmetullghii porch-eni, ayaakat, piyugigalnguut, uniiqat. (Pagughrugughhneghsighaqegkangat meq ateghyuwhaaghnaluteng.
43005004	Ilangani aghneghem, yaqulga Atanghem ateneghmini naayvaghaaghmun pagughrugughtestaqegkanga meq. Enkaam kina ateghyuwhaalghii meghmun naallghutaqelghii sameng alngunak aqnighneghmineng.)
43005005	Taawanguq yuuk qinuyugngalghii 38 ayumiqulleghni.
43005006	Jesus-em esghaqaa. Liisimakegkaa qavngarugllak ima qinuyukaq enkaam aaptekaa, “Naallghusugsiin?”
43005007	Qinuyulghiim kiimsiqaa, “Yuguniiq, meq pagughrugughhneghani kayutkaghqiitaqunga. Ateghnaqutkaqsaghtunga ima kitum ingyaghaghtaqaanga.”
43005008	Jesus-em pikaa, “Nekevi, allighan tuguluku piyugi.”
43005009	Tawaninginaq yuuk naallghulluni, allighani tuguluku piyukaq. Sabbath-ngulghii tawani aghneghmi.
43005010	Tamaaken apalluqluku Jews-et igleghutistengita pikaat naallghutkaq yuuk, “Aghneghmi Sabbath-nguuq, Liilightuusamnni allighan igleghusaghqaqenghisaghan Sabbath-mi.”
43005011	Pikii, “Yugem naallghutistema piinga, ‘Allighan tuguluku piyugi.’”
43005012	Aaptekaat, “Kitum naallghulluten allighan tuguluku piyugesqaten?”
43005013	Iwernga yugem nallukegkaa naallghutisteni kinangutanga, qayughllak uglapiglleghii yuuk tawanlenguq, Jesus-llu esghaghtengngunani iqitkaalghii.
43005014	Aghneghmi taakwani Temple-mi, Jesus-em nallaqaa taana yuuk naallghutkani, pikaa, “Uyuq, naallghusimaaten. Seghleghqennanii luuraq sangwaa seghleghataghalghii ikfiqutkennayukavgu seghleghqumanginaquvek.”
43005015	Taagken yugem ungipaasaghtuqii Jews-et igleghutistengit Jesus-nguniluku naallghutisteni.
43005016	Taagken kenlanga Jews-et igleghutistengita seghletun piyagutkaat Jesus, Sabbath-mi naallghutillghaneng apalluqluku.
43005017	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Ataka quunpeng qepghaaguq, whangallu qepghaghyaghqaagunga.”
43005018	Enkaam Jews-et igleghutistengita wataqaaghaq tuqusukaat. Pikat, “Jesus-em Sabbath-em Liilightuusaa naafqinaghpenaan pikaaguqlu Kiyaghneq Atakniluku. Tawaten akuzilleghmikun Kiyaghneghtungwaaq ayuqniluni piiquq.”
43005019	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa piimsi, Ighneq ellnginaghmi sayaghqaanghituq, Atamineng esghapakaghhiinani piiqaa. Atami pillghatun piiquq.
43005020	Atam piniqaa Ighneni, enkaam kelguvikaqaa sameng tamaghhaaneng salleghmineng. Iwernga taakuneng aangataghalghiineng kelguviksaghqaqaa saghiighayugesqellusi.
43005021	Atam unguvaghtesluki tuqukat unguvallelitaqii, enkaam tawateghpigaq Ighneq unguvallelitikayuguuq piyukegkaminun.
43005022	Ata nanqigtingigatuq kitumeng alngunak. Iwernga aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaa Ighneni qamaglluku nanqigtilleq ellnganun pisqelluku.
43005023	Kiyaghneghem tawaten pikaqaa Ighneni tamaghhaanun quulviisqelluku katam tawaten quulvallghistun Ata. Kitum taam quulviigalkumigu Ighneq quulviigataa Ata kayagtikaq Ighneghmeng.
43005024	“Ipa piimsi, kitum nagaskumiki akuzitenka, ugpeqegkumigullu kayagtisteka, kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelguuq. Nanqigtellengnaanghituq aghyuughyaghqaaluni qayughllak tuqumeng unguvalleghmun lliiqaaguq.
43005025	Ipa piimsi, pilleghqaq uka taginguuq, whaa kaasimaaq, tuqukat nagaqughlleqaat menga Ighneghan Kiyaghneghem. Tamaakut nagaquullghiit unguvallequt,
43005026	qayughllak Ata unguvallghuuq, enkaam unguvalleq ellnganeng pinguuq. Tawateghpigaq Ighnegha unguvallghuuq, qayughllak Atam tawatetestekanga.
43005027	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaqaallu Ighneni nanqigtilleghmun qayughllak Ighneqegkanga Yugem.
43005028	“Saghiighayagutegpenaan una: pilleghqaq taginguuq qamaglluteng tuqukat lliveghmelnguut nagaqughluku menga,
43005029	aanleghaasaghqaagut lliveghmeggneng. Tamaakut pinitun pikat unguvaghtesaghqaagut unguvalleghmun. Iwernga tamaakut seghletun pikat unguvaghtesaghqaagut nanqigtelleghmun aghyuughyaghqaaluteng.
43005030	“Nanqigsigataqa kina alngunak sivukluku aaptellngunaan Ata. Enkaam nanqigtiiqunga ellngan pisqellghinaghhaatun. Nanqigtilqa elqughutngaaq, qayughllak nanqigtiiqunga Atam kayagtikam whangamneng piyukellghatun. Whanga piyukellemtun pingigatunga.
43005031	“Aapquma whangamneng, yuget ugpeqnaanghitiit akuzitenka, wetkuqun kitum alla aapqanganga.
43005032	Iwernga kitum aapghaqaanga tawaten, liisimakanka aapqii ipanguut qayughllak aapghisteka Atakaqa.
43005033	Elpesi yuget kayagtekaqasi John-mun, apellghi whangamneng ipanguut.
43005034	Yuget apenghisaghngaaghmegtengnga, iwernga tawaten piinga elpesi yugulillengesqellusi.
43005035	John kenelghutastun kumangayaghtuqlu kuukgutngayaghtuqlu. Akuzitangi nighugestun ayuqsaghtut enkaam elpesi natengiighhaq akuzitangakun quyastesukaagusi.
43005036	John-em akuzitangan liitestekaqaanga yugnun. Iwernga wataqaaghaq John-em akuzitanganeng qepghalleghma liitestaghaghaanga yugnun. Qepghaghanka Atama pisqegkii enkaam qepghalleghma liitestaa yugnun Atamnun kayagtekaqnilunga.
43005037	Kayagtikam whangamneng, Atam ellmineng katam aapghwaa ipapighqelleq whangamneng ayuqelghii. Nagaqiigatngwaaghaghsi menga, esghiigatngwaaghaghsi natetulanga,
43005038	tugukliigatasillu akuzitangi, qayughllak ugpeqigataghsi Atam kayagtekaa.
43005039	Ivaghivikaqasi Akuzitet Igaqegkat, qayughllak sumeghpesini kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengviknaluki piiqasi. Taakusta ataasit Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapghilghiit whangamneng.
43005040	Naqam whangamnun tagiyugigatusi unguvallelitesqellusi.
43005041	“Yugnun usuqesunghitunga.
43005042	Liisimakamsi elpesi, piniqellghitusi ilugpesini Kiyaghneghmun.
43005043	Atama kayagtekaqaanga akuzistengulunga ellminun, iwernga elpesi tugukliigataghpesinga. Naqam kina tagiluni ellminun katam akuzilghii tuguklighaqluku.
43005044	Naten'ngam ugpeqelleqesteggu tagikaatka Kiyaghneghmeng usuqesugukufsi ilagpesinun, naqam taananginaghhaam Kiyaghneghem usuqelleghqaa avelghaghluku?
43005045	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi apeghlleqniluku anaggutelleghsi Atamun. Moses-nguuq aapghiyaghqaq anaggutelleghpesineng qaywa sighimaksaghngaaghpesigu yugulisqellusi.
43005046	Moses ipa ugpequmakufsigu ugpeqnayaghaghpesinga qayughllak igaqegkaqaanga igatgun.
43005047	Enkaam Moses-em igaqegkii ugpeqigalkufsiki, natenngam ugpeqelleqesteki akuzitenka?”
43006001	Kingunganeng taam, Jesus-em aghviqaa Naayvaq Galilee, aatqelghiillu Tiberias-meng.
43006002	Uglapiglleghhiim maliglleghaatkaat qayughllak naallghuquulghii qinuyugneng allaaghlluwhaghtilleghqun.
43006003	Kaalluteng Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit mayughluteng naayghamun aqumuutkat.
43006004	Jews-et Passover-mun Neqenghaghqellghat kaasaghtulghii.
43006005	Jesus-em sivuglluni esghaqii yulghuteghllaget tagilaghaallghiit ellminun. Aaptekaa Philip, “Naken tukfighinayaghesta neqmeng yulghuteghllagnun neghyaghqameng?”
43006006	Tawaten aaptekaa Philip naten pilleghqaa esghaghnaluku, liisimakeghngaaghmigu ellmi salleghqani.
43006007	Philip-em kiimsiqaa, “200 denarius-elgughngaamta naamayaghqameng neqengnaanghitukut, talwa sasqughhaghmeng tunqughngaamteki.”
43006008	Ilangallu maligsaaghta tawanlenguq, Simon Peter-em anglegutanga Andrew. Andrew-m pikaa Jesus,
43006009	“Esgha una mekelghiighhaq tallimaneng neqekrangllallgaq, maalghuklu iqallugek, iwernga naamanaanghitut.”
43006010	Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Yuget aqumuutesqiteki.” (Tamaana vegaaghllagulghii.) Enkaam entaqun 5,000-nguut yuget aqumuutkat, kesutkegpenaki aghnatlu, taghnughhaatlu.
43006011	Taagken Jesus-em tuguluki neqekrangllat, iyamsiqayugluni Kiyaghneghmun, tunqughtestekii aqumuutkaghllagnun tamaavek. Tawateghpigaq iqallugek pikakek, qamaglluteng neghuutkat kepsulleghmeggnun.
43006012	Qamaglluteng kepsuusata Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Qerngughteggu tamaana neghumangilkangat, sakusiiqegpenaki.”
43006013	Enkaam qerngughlluki imiqiit qula maalghuk siipneqluku pasketet siipneghitneng tallimat neqekrangllat.
43006014	Taana allaaghlluwhaghtilleq yuget esghapagluku pikat, “Ipapestaaq una uuknaliqistenguuq tagiyaghqaanikaat nunamun.”
43006015	Jesus-em liisimakegkanga yuget aqfaluku umiilengllaghnaqutkennaqngukangat, enkaam naayghamun aglaqaq ellnginaghhaanaluni.
43006016	Tawani ighivgaghmi, Jesus-em maligsaaghtengi ukikat Naayvamun Galilee-mun.
43006017	Mamlegtekanga, Jesus-llu paninang aviilnguq, enkaam maligsaaghtengi angyamun uughquulluteng aglaqat Capernaum-emun inglunganilngughmun naayvam.
43006018	Taagken naayvaq imaghllugughtekaq qayughllak anuqlighllakanga.
43006019	Iiwenllu angwaaghmeng naayvam qukaanun lliighaqut, esghaqaat Jesus meghqun piyugmeng tagilghii angyamun enkaam alingruughutkat.
43006020	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Alingegpenasi, Whanganguunga.”
43006021	Enkaam uugtesukaat angyamun. Taagken tawaninginaq quutmun kaatkat takukameggnun.
43006022	Yulghuteghllaget unegtekat inglungani naayvam, unaamingani piyalghiimeng Jesus aviituq. Liisimakegkangat ataasiinaalghii angyaq esnami. Jesus maligusimangilnguq maligsaaghteminun angyakun, ellnginaghmeng pikaalghiit unilluku.
43006023	Taagken ilangi angyat kaatquutkat Tiberias-meng. Tamlakat tungangakun yulghuteghllaget neghuutfigitgun ighivgaq. Neghegkaalghiit neqekrangllameng, kingunganeng Jesus-em iyamsiqayullghan.
43006024	Yulghuteghllaget piyalghiimeng Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit aviitut, enkaam angyanun uuglleghaalluteng Capernaum-emun ivaghyaghtuqaat Jesus.
43006025	Naalkesamegteggu Jesus aaptekaat, “Apeghtughista, qavngaq maavek kaasin?”
43006026	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, ivaghaghpesinga qayughllak neghelghiisi neqekrangllameng kepsughaaghlusi. Ivanghitaghpesinga allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka apalluqluki.
43006027	Qepghaategpenaan neqa mulungigalnguq. Yeghlegi qepghaataqiteggu neqa naavyaghqaanghilnguq, kenlengunaan unguvallengestikayuk. Tawatelnguq neqa Ighneghan Yugem tuunyaghqaqa elpesinun, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Atam itagnaqegkaqaa ellnga.”
43006028	Yuget aaptekaat Jesus, “Sangaawat qepghaqat Kiyaghneghem pisqesukii whangkunnun?”
43006029	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Elpesinun qepghaqaq Kiyaghneghem pisqesukaa esgha una: ugpeqesqelluku taana ataasiq Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaa.”
43006030	Enkaam yuget aaptekaat, “Sangwaa allaaghlluwhaghtilleq pinayaghsigu? Esghapagyaqumteggu elngaatall ugpeqnayaghamken. Sanayaghsin?
43006031	Sivuneput neghegkaagut manna-meng kilgaani. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaaguq whaten, ‘Qilagmeng pamaken tuunegkaqii neqekrangllameng neghesqelluki.’”
43006032	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, qilagmeng pamaken Moses-ngunghituq tuunikaq neqekrangllameng. Qilagmeng pamaken Atakaqa tuunikayuk neqekrangllapigmeng elpesinun.
43006033	Kiyaghneghem neqekrangllaa esgha taana ataasiq ukikaq qilagmeng, tuunilghii unguvalleghmeng nunam yuganun.”
43006034	Yuget pikaat, “Yuguniiq, iiwleng tuunikut tawatelngughmeng neqekrangllameng.”
43006035	Jesus-em pikii, “Whanganguuq neqekrangllaq unguvallelitikayuk. Kina taana tagilghii whangamnun allamengllu iyataghnaanghituq. Kitum taam ugpeqegkuminga allamengllu meqsugnaanghituq.
43006036	Iwernga sivunghani ungipaatellemtun piimsi, esghaqaqaghpesinga iwernga salin ugpeqigataghpesinga.
43006037	Kina alngunak Atam tagivaqaa tagiyaghqaaguq whangamnun. Ighsaksaghqaqenghitaqa kina alngunak tagilghii whangamnun,
43006038	qayughllak ukikaagunga qilagmeng atuqnaluku piyukellgha Kayagtistema. Whanga piyukelqa piyaghtuunghitaqa.
43006039	Kayagtistema ifliisunghitaanga taakuneng tagivaqamineng, talwa ataasighhaq. Itupill whangamnun unguvaghtesqesuwii kingulighmi aghneghmi.
43006040	Una Atama piyukelqaa: kitum alngunak esghaghluku Ighneq ugpeqegkumigu kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengellequq. Enkaam unguvaghlleqaqa kingulighmi aghneghmi.”
43006041	Jews-et ungyupghutkaat Jesus-em whaten pillgha, “Whanga neqekrangllaguunga ukikaq qilagmeng.”
43006042	Pikat, “Jesus-nguuq, Joseph-em ighneqaa, liisimakagput atangallu naangallu. Sangami whaten pii, ‘Ukikaagunga qilagmeng?’”
43006043	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Ungyupeghtegpenasi.
43006044	Atanguuq kayagtikaq whangamneng. Kina alngunak taginaanghituq whangamnun wetkuqun Atam tagistekumigu whangamnun. Enkaam unguvaghlleqaqa kingulighmi aghneghmi.
43006045	Uuknaliqistet igaqegkaqaat una, ‘Kiyaghneghem apeghtughyaghqaqii qamaglluki yuget.’ Tamaghhaghmi nagallghii, liillghii Atameng tagikayuguuq whangamnun.
43006046	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi kitumun alngunak esghaamaniluku Ata. Kiyaghneghmeng tagikam ellnginaghhaghmi esghaqaqaa Ata.
43006047	“Ipa ungipaatamsi, ellnga taana ugpeqilghii kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelguuq.
43006048	Whanga neqekrangllaagunga tuunikayuk kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng.
43006049	Sivunesi neghegkaagut manna-meng kilgaani, iwernga paninang tuqulaghaatkaagut.
43006050	Iwernga una neqekrangllaq ukikaq qilagmeng, kitum alngunak neghegkumigu tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.
43006051	Whanga unguvallelitikayuguunga, neqekrangllaq ukikaq qilagmeng. Kitum alngunak neghegkumigu taana neqekrangllaq, kiyaghsaghqaaguq quunperugllak. Taana neqekrangllaq kemekrakaqa, tuunaqegkegka nunam yugi unguvallengesqelluki.”
43006052	Taagken Jews-et aaghtiiraaghusagutkat ellmeggneng. Pikat, “Naten uum yugem kemekrani tuunaqagu neghesqelluku?”
43006053	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, Ighneghan Yugem kemekraga neghyaghqaqaghsi, aawallu meghyaghqaqaghsi. Tawaten pinghilkufsi, unguvallepigitusi ilugpesini.
43006054	Kitum alngunak neghegkumigu kemekraka, meghegkumigu aakwa, kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelguuq, unguvaghlleqaqallu kingulighmi aghneghmi.
43006055	Kemekraka neqeghpigaaguq, aakwallu meghyaghqapiiguuq.
43006056	Kitum alngunak neghegkumigu kemekraka, meghegkumigu aakwa, kiyaghtengnguuq whangamni, whanga kiyaghtengnguunga ellngan ilungani.
43006057	Atam unguvastikayugem kayagtekaqaanga, whangallu unguvastaqaanga. Enkaam kitum alngunak neghegkuminga unguvallequq whanga apalluqlunga.
43006058	Sivunemta neghegkiistun neqekrangllastun ayuqenghitunga. Neghegkaagut neqekrangllameng iwernga paninang tuqulaghaatkaagut. Neqekrangllaagunga ukikaq qilagmeng. Kina alngunak neghegkumi taagken neqekrangllameng kiyaghsaghqaaguq quunperugllak.”
43006059	Jesus-em tamaana qamaglluku aapqaa apeghtughinguluni synagogue-ngani Capernaum-em.
43006060	Jesus-em maligsaaghtengita nagalluku allulluteng pikat, “Una apeghtuusaq piyaqnapigtuq, kitumngam tuguklighlleqagu?”
43006061	Ungipaatestengngunani Jesus-em liisimakegkangi maligsaaghteni ungyupghullghiit tawaten, enkaam pikii, “Taam apeghtullghem iilqayugtestisii?
43006062	Sameng'ngam pinayaghetsi esghaghyaqufsigu Ighnegha Yugem mayulghii neksaqeminun sivunghani?
43006063	Taghneghak unguvallelitikayuguuk, iwernga yuuk unguvallelitinaanghituq. Akuzitenka elpesinun taghneghaagutlu unguvallghuutlu.
43006064	Iwernga ilagpesi ugpeqigatiit akuzitenka.” (Jesus-em liisimakegkangi kinkut ugpeqinghilnguut. Liisimakegkangi ima piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng. Talwa liisimakegkanga kinangutanga uveghpagutiyaghqaq ellmineng.)
43006065	Jesus-em pikii, “Ilagpesi ugpeqinghitellgha apalluqluku whaten pikaagunga, ‘Atam tagisneghilkumigu yuuk whangamnun, taginaanghitngwaaghtuq.’”
43006066	Kingunganeng Jesus-em tawaten pillghan uglapiglleghhiim maligsaaghtengan unitkaa maligsaaghnaniqaat.
43006067	Jesus-em aaptekii qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtet, “Elpesillu aghulaqsugetsii?”
43006068	Simon Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Ataneq, kitumun'ngam pilleqesta? Elpek akuzitegpek aapghaqaa naten allgeghutelleghqaq kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng.
43006069	Whangkuta ugpeqamken, liitkaqamken elpek Agleghnalghiikaaten Kiyaghneghem.”
43006070	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Nakmikegkaqaqa qula maalghuk siipneqluku maligsaaghtekaghqaq, elpesinguut. Iwernga nalighsi ataasiq tughneghaaguq.”
43006071	Jesus-em akuzitkengngukanga Judas, ighnegha Simon Iscariot-em qayughllak taakwaningani uveghpagusaghqaqegkanga. Judas ilakegkangat taakut qula maalghuk siipngalghiit maligsaaghtet.
43007001	Kingunganeng taam Jesus igleghakaq Galilee-mi. Igleghayugumangilnguq Judea-mi, qayughllak Jews-et igleghutistengit tamaanlenguut tuqusugukangat.
43007002	Jews-et neqenghaghqelleghqaat aatqelghii tabernacles-meng kaasaghtungestalghii.
43007003	Jesus-em anglegutangita pikaat, “Aghulaqi maaken, aglaa Judea-mun maligsaaghteten esghapagesqelluki allaaghlluwhaghtilleghpeneng.
43007004	Kitum alngunak apeghseghuuyulghiim aksaqigataa salleni. Enkaam tawaten pinaqngukuvek tamaghhaghmi yugem esghapagliten!”
43007005	(Talwa anglegutangita Jesus ugpeqenghilkangat.)
43007006	Jesus-em anglegutni pikii, “Judea-telleghqaqa salin kaasigatuq, iwernga elpesi alngunak aghneghni piyaghqaagusi.
43007007	Nunam yugan ugumiknaanghitiisi, whanga ugumikaatnga qayughllak aapghaqegkegka seghleq atuqaqegkangat.
43007008	Enkaam elpesi neqenghaghqelghiinun pitek; whanga pinaqenghitunga qayughllak aghneqa salin kaasigatuq.”
43007009	Jesus-em tawaten piluki ellnga Galilee-metkaq.
43007010	Jesus-em anglegutangi neqenghaghqemmun pikat. Taagken kingungitneng yugnun esghaghtesukaghpenani ellngallu pikaq.
43007011	Neqenghaghqemmi Jews-et igleghutistengita ivaqaat Jesus, pimaghmeng, “Naagu taana yuuk?”
43007012	Uglapiglleghhiit yuget tawanlenguut sigutquutkegkaat Jesus. Ilangita pikaat, “Jesus piniipigtuq yuuk.” Ilangita pikaat, “Nakaa, puughtaqii yuget.”
43007013	Iwernga kitum alngunak qaayngakun akuzitkumangilkanga Jesus, alingluni Jews-et igleghutistengitneng.
43007014	Neqenghaghqellgha santillghem qukaghitaquqlu, Jesus Temple-mun aglaghluni apeghtughikaq.
43007015	Jews-et igleghutistengita saghiighayagulluku pikat, “Naten una yuuk liiteghllagta igaghyaamangilnguq?”
43007016	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Apeghtuusanka whangamneng pingunghitut, Kayagtistemneng pinguut.
43007017	Kitum alngunak Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha atuqsugukumigu liisimaksaghqaqaa, apeghtughilqa Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga, nalighmeng whangamneng katam pingutanga.
43007018	Kina alngunak apeghtughilghii ellmi katam sumeghtaghalleghmineng quulvallengnaqutkengnguuq. Iwernga kina alngunak quulvallengestinaqutkelghii kayagtikamun, akuzinguuq ipapigmeng, iqlengiqigatuq.
43007019	Qamagllusi liisimakaghsi Moses-em Liilightuusalitkaqiisi, iwernga nalighhiinaghpesi qaatkigatasi. Sangamangam tuqunnaqutkestengnga?”
43007020	Yuget kiimsiqaat, “Tughneghaam iitghumaaten. Kitum tuqunnaqutkaten?”
43007021	Jesus-em pikii, “Ataasimeng allaaghlluwhaghtiyama Sabbath-mi qamagllusi saghiighayugtusi.
43007022	Moses-em qelqaqiisi circumcise-esqelluki ighnesi (qaywa sivunesi circumcise-ekaaghngaata Moses-em circumcise-esqellghan sivungani). Naqam elpesi circumcise-eyaghqaanghata ighnesi Sabbath-mi piiqasi.
43007023	Naafqengngunghilkufsigu Moses-em Liilightuusaa circumcise-eghilleghpesigun Sabbath-mi, sangama ugumiyagutestengnga yuuk naallghutngwaallemneng Sabbath-mi?
43007024	Nanqigtigpenasi yuget saaqutangi liigikngwaaghpenaki, nanqigtiiqitek elqughullusi.”
43007025	Taagken ilangi Jerusalem-eghmiit pikat, “Taanata yuuk tuqusukangat.
43007026	Naqam esgha apeghtughilghii yugnun, naqamllu igleghutistemta sanaqigataat. Qaa whaa liigikaat Christ-angutanga, Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaa?
43007027	Iwernga whangkuta liisimakaghput taana yuuk naken pingutanga. Christ-apik tagikan, kitum alngunak nalluksaghqaqaa naken pingutanga.”
43007028	Jesus paninang apeghtughinguluni Temple-mi, iglagtuluni pikaq, “Qaywa liisimakngwaaghestegguu kinangutka, nakenllu pingutka? Whangamneng tagimangitunga. Kayagtisteka ipapiguuq, iwernga elpesi nallukaghsi.
43007029	Whanga liisimakaqa qayughllak ellnganeng tagikaagunga, ellngan kayagtekaqaanga.”
43007030	Jesus tawaten piyan ilangita yuget tugunaqutkegkaat. Iwernga kitum alngunak agtuqaamangilkanga qayughllak aghnegha salin kaasigalnguq.
43007031	Iwernga uglapiglleghhiit yuget ugpeqegkangat Jesus. Enkaam pikat, “Liisimakaghput una yuuk Christ-anguuq, qayughllak uglaapiglluku allaaghlluwhaghtiiq Christ-am piyaghqaaneng.”
43007032	Ilangita Pharisees-et nagaquqiit yuget tawaten akuzimleghaallghiit Jesus-meng, enkaam ellngitallu, chief priest-etlu kayagtekiit kelengakistet tugusqelluku.
43007033	Taagken Jesus pikaq, “Natengiighhaq elpesinillunga aglaghllequnga Kayagtistemnun.
43007034	Ivaghlleqaghpesinga iwernga naalkennaanghitaghpesinga. Takukamnun aglaghpagningitusi.”
43007035	Jews-et igleghutistengita ilateng pikiit, “Navek una yuuk pinaqa naalkesaghqaafqaami? Greek-et akulangitnilnguut yuput takulaghnaqakii? Qaa apeghtughillequq Greek-enun?
43007036	Samengtuq Jesus pii whaten piiqngami, ‘Ivaghlleqaghpesinga iwernga naalkennaanghitaghpesinga; takukamnun aglaghnaanghitusi’?”
43007037	Kinguliq aghnegha neqenghaghqellghem megnunalleghpigaalghii. Tawani aghneghmi, Jesus nekevluni iglagtuluni pikii, “Kina alngunak meqsukumi tagiluni whangamnun meghli.
43007038	Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkuminga, ilunganeng qamaken kiiwet maaqsaghqaagut unguvallengestikayuget meghet.” Akuzitet Igaqegkat tawaten pikaagut.
43007039	Jesus-em akuzitkengngukek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak. Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagni salin tuunigataak qayughllak salin kevgigalkanga Jesus quulvalleliteghllagnaluku. Iwernga taakwaningani tamaakut ugpeqilghiit Jesus-meng, allgeghusaghqaagut Taghneghagneng.
43007040	Nagasamegteggu Jesus tawaten akuzilghii ilangi yuget pikat, “Una yuuk ipapestaaq uuknaliqistenguuq neghyukegkaghput.”
43007041	Ilangita pikaat, “Christ-anguuq.” Iwernga ilangita pikaat, “Christ-a tagiyaghqaawaa Galilee-meng?
43007042	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut Christ-a tagilleqniluku David-em nengllugutanganeng, allgeghlleqnilukullu Bethlehem-emi, David-em kiyaghfiganeng.”
43007043	Ilangita yuget ipapighqutkumangilkangat Jesus,
43007044	enkaam tuguyukaat iwernga kitum alngunak agtuqaamangilkanga.
43007045	Kelengakistet kayagtekaayalghiit tugusqelluku Jesus, kaasata chief priest-etlu, Pharisees-etlu aaptekiit, “Sangan taginnanighesteggu Jesus?”
43007046	Kiimsiqiit, “Kina alngunak taatun yugtun akuzingigatuq.”
43007047	Pharisees-et aaptekiit, “Elpesillu Jesus-em puughtisii?
43007048	Whangkuta igleghutistenillu, Pharisees-enillu liisimakaput Moses-em Liilightuusii. Nalimtaa-a ugpeqatgu Jesus? Nakaa!
43007049	Tamaakut yulghutet nallukiit Moses-em Liilightuusii, enkaam Kiyaghneghem naafqelleqii.”
43007050	(Ataasiq Jews-et igleghutistengat Nicodemus-nguftuq, sivunghani Jesus-mun pikaq.) Nicodemus-em pikii,
43007051	“Liilightuusamnni nanqigsaghqaqenghitaghput yuuk, wetqukun nagalluku liigikegkumteggu samatanga.”
43007052	Pikaat, “Elpeklu Galilee-meng pinguzin? Liinnaqiki Akuzitet Igaqegkat. Liilleqan uuknaliqistengituq tagikameng Galilee-meng.”
43007053	Qamaglluni tamaana aghulaquutkaq, nemeggnun aglaghtuutkaq.
43008001	Jesus aglaqaq Mount Olives-mun.
43008002	Unaanguluku aglanqigtekaq Temple-mun. Yulghun tagilaghaasan Jesus-em aqumluni apeghtuqii.
43008003	Liilightuusaneng apeghtughikayugetlu, Pharisees-etlu tagitkaat aghnaq anguksakaq gelgaghniighumaluku. Nekevesluku sivungitgun yuget,
43008004	Jesus pikaat, “Apeghtughista, una aghnaq anguksakaaguq gelgaghniighumaluku.
43008005	Liilightuusaan Moses-em qelghusaqaa, aghnat tawaten pikata tuqutesqelluki milughpagaataghhiinaq. Elpek sameng pinayaghsigu?”
43008006	Jesus aaptekaat tawaten Liilightuusat kipullegmun sameng pisqelluki, qayughllak anaggutesugukangat. Jesus peghleghlluni ighneghwaaghmineng igaqaq nunakun.
43008007	Aaptaataghyatni Jesus-em nekevluni pikii, “Nalighpesi seghleghqelleqraggiilnguum milughyuwhaaghligu uyghagmeng.”
43008008	Alla peghleghlluni ighneghwaaghmineng igaqaq nunakun.
43008009	Nagasamegteggu Jesus, aghulaquutekestaqat. Nuyekliit sivukluteng, taagken tamaakut ilangit aghulaquutkat. Jesus ellnginaghhaaghtekaq, iwerngaqun taana aghnaq paninang nekevghalghii sivungani.
43008010	Jesus-em nekevenqiglluni aaptekaa, “Aghnami, naaki anaggunnisteten? Nalighhiiniitaa-a aghyuughyaghqaaniluten pinghitataan?”
43008011	Kiimsiqaa, “Yuguniiq, nalighhiiniita pinghitaatnga.” Enkaam Jesus-em pikaa, “Whangallu aghyuughyaghqaaniluten pinaqenghitamken. Aghulaqi, alla seghleghqegpenang.”
43008012	Taakwaningani Jesus-em aleghqughlaataqii yuget. Pikii, “Whanga nighuguunga nunam yuganun. Kitum maligtekuminga mamlegmi kiyaghhnaanghituq, kenelgullequq unguvallelitikayugmeng.”
43008013	Pharisees-et pikaat Jesus, “Taawa apeghlaataghtuten elpeneng, iwernga akuziteten ipapighqusighqiitut.”
43008014	Jesus-em pikii, “Akuzitkeghngaaghma whangamneng katam, akuzitenka ipanguut qayughllak liisimakaqa naken tagikaatka, liisimakaqallu takuyaghqaqa. Elpesi nallukaghsi naken pimatka, talwa nallukaghsi takuyaghqaqa.
43008015	Nanqigtiiqusi nunam yugatun, whanga nanqigsigataqa kina alngunak.
43008016	Nanqigtinaqsaquma nanqigtilqa elqughutnganayaghtuq qayughllak ellnginaanghitunga: Ata Kayagtisteka whangamnituq.
43008017	Liilightuusaghpesini igaqngaaq maalghuk yugek sangwaa aapqumegnegu tawatengwaaq, akuzillghik ugpeqelleqiit ipanguniluki.
43008018	Enkaam whangamneng aapghaqunga, Atamllu Kayagtistema aapghaqaanga.”
43008019	Aaptekaat, “Naagu Atan?” Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Nallukaghpesikung Atakullghiigni. Iwernga whanga liisimaksaqufsinga, Atakallu liisimaknayaghaghsi.”
43008020	Jesus apeghtughingulghii tawaten Temple-mi manimeng aflengakivigan tungangani. Iwernga kitum alngunak tugumangitkaa, qayughllak pilleghqaa salin kaasigalnguq.
43008021	Allameng Jesus-em pikii yuget, “Unilleqamsi, ivaghlleqaghpesinga, iwernga tuqullequsi seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi. Takukamnun aglaghnaanghitusi.”
43008022	Taagken Jews-et igleghutistengit pikat, “Jesus whaten piiq, ‘Takukamnun aglaghnaanghitusi.’ Qaa ellmineng tuqunnaquq?”
43008023	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Elpesi maaken nunameng pinguusi, whanga pamaken pinguunga. Elpesi nunam pikiisi, whanga nunam pikenghitaanga.
43008024	Enkaam ungipaatamsi tuqulleqnilusi seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi. Aa-a tuqullequsi seghleghqelleghtuumaghpesi ugpeqenghilkufsinga whanga whangangutka.”
43008025	Aaptekaat, “Kinanguzinmi?” Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Whanganguunga aapghaqellemtun piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng ima.
43008026	Akuzitkesaghqaghllaguunga elpesineng, nanqigtusighqaghtuungallu elpesinun. Iwernga Kayagtikaq whangamneng ipanguuq, enkaam nunam yuganun aapghaqanka nagatkanka ellnganeng.”
43008027	Yuget liigikumangilkangat Jesus-mun akuzitkengngutanga Ata.
43008028	Enkaam Jesus-em pikii, “Kefkufsigu Ighnegha Yugem liilleqaghsi whanga whangangutka. Liilleqaghsi sangwaa maana piiqegkegka whangamneng pingigatulka. Liilleqaghsi akuzitkegkayugutka Atam apeghtuusaqegkaghhiinaa whangamnun.
43008029	Kayagtikaq whangamneng whangamnituq. Iiwleng atuqegkayuwaaqa efqughtinalghii ellnganun enkaam unisigataanga.”
43008030	Jesus tawaten akuzimaluku, uglapiglleghhiim ugpeqegkaa.
43008031	Jesus-em pikii Jews-et ugpeqilghiit ellmineng, “Nagnequfsi qaatkullusi apeghtullemnun, ipapestaaq maligsaaghtekamsi.
43008032	Ipapighqelleq liilleqaghsi enkaam ipapighqellghem itemulleqiisi.”
43008033	Pikaat, “Abraham-em kingunqiinkut, qepghaghtelaaghungigatukut. Sangamta pizikut itemusaghqaaniluta?”
43008034	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, kina alngunak seghleghqengngalghii, seghleghqelleghmun qepghaghtelaaghestun ayuquq.
43008035	Qepghaghtelaaq nengllugutenisaghqaanghituq quunperugllak. Iwernga nengllugutet ighneghat ellngitnisaghqaaguq quunperugllak.
43008036	Enkaam Ighneghem itemestekangisi, ipapestaaq itemyaghqaagusi.
43008037	Liisimakamsi Abraham-em kingunqiisi. Iwernga tuqusuwaqaghpesinga qayughllak tugukliigalkesi apeghtuusanka.
43008038	Ungipaatamsi Atama kelgutkaaneng whangamnun, iwernga elpesi atagpesi qelghutkaa piiqaghsi.”
43008039	Kiimsiqaat, “Whangkuta atakaghput Abraham.” Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa Abraham-em avaqutaqsaqangisi, atuqaqnayaghaghsi Abraham-em pikaa.
43008040	Iwernga whaa elpesi tuqunnaqutkaqaghpesinga, whanga ipapigmeng ungipaatikayuk nagaquqamneng Kiyaghneghmeng. Abraham tawaten pinayanghituq.
43008041	Atuqngwaaghsi atagpesi pikaa.” Jews-et pikaat, “Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq Atavut, enkaam whangkuta ellngan ighnepikiinkut.”
43008042	Jesus-em pikii, “Kiyaghneq ipa Ataksaqufsigu piniqnayaghaghpesinga, qayughllak tagikaagunga Kiyaghneghmeng, enkaam whaa whaantunga. Whangamneng tagimangitunga, Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqaanga.
43008043	Liigikigataghsi sameng pilqa qayughllak tuguklighyaghqaqenghilkesi apeghtughillghenka.
43008044	Avaqutaqiisi atagpesi tughneghaam, enkaam atuqsuwaqaghsi atagpesi piyukellgha. Piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng ima yugtaghtenguuq. Ipapighqelleq atuqaghsigataa qayughllak ipapighqellghilnguq. Iqlengiqneghmini taawanginaghhaq ayghiitkani piiqegkanga qayughllak iqlengiqestengulghii, atakegkanga iqlengam.
43008045	Iwernga whanga akuziiqunga ipapigmeng, enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeqigataghpesinga.
43008046	Nalighpesi ipapighqutkennayaghtanga seghleghqestengutka? Qaywa akuzighngaaghma ipapigmeng, sangamangam ugpeqigastengnga?
43008047	Kitum alngunak Kiyaghneghem pingan tuguklighaqii Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi. Iwernga elpesi tugukliigatasi Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem pikenghilkangisi.”
43008048	Jews-et pikaat, “Piimken, Samaria-ghmiinguuten, tughneghaamllu iitghumaaten. Ipa pizikaan?”
43008049	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Tughneghaam itellghitaanga. Quulvaghaqaqa Ataka iwernga elpesi quulviigataghpesinga.
43008050	Quulvallengnaqutkengngunghitunga whangamneng. Iwernga Ataasiiguq quulvaghiyulghii whangamneng, ellnganguuq nanqigtiyaghqaq elqughulluni.
43008051	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak qaatkegkumiki apeghtughillghenka, tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.”
43008052	Jews-et pikaat Jesus, “Taawa liitamken tughneghalguftuten ilugpeni. Talwa Abraham-llu, uuknaliqistetlu tuqulaghaatkaagut. Iwernga elpek piiten, ‘Kitum alngunak qaatkegkumiki apeghtughillghenka, tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq.’
43008053	Sumeghpenii aangataghaghsiin atamnneng Abraham-emeng? Abraham tuqukaaguq, uuknaliqistetlu tuqulaghaatkaagut. Kinanguniluten piiqsin?”
43008054	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Whangamneng quulvaquma taana quulvalleq sasiinaanghituq. Quulvaghikayuk whangamneng Atakaqa. Elpesi Kiyaghneqniiqluku
43008055	nallukaghsi. Whanga liisimakaqa. Nalluknikumkun iqlengiqestengullequnga elpesistun. Iwernga whanga liisimakaqa, qaatkaqankallu sameng pillghi.
43008056	Atazi Abraham quyaghllakaaguq esghaghlleqniluku tagilqa. Esghaqaqaa, enkaam quyakaaguq.”
43008057	Jews-et pikaat, “Ay? Sameng pizin? Esghaamangitngwaaghan Abraham. Talwa salin 50 years-ngughsigatuten.”
43008058	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, talwa sivungani Abraham-em Whanganguunga.”
43008059	Jesus tawaten piyan, yuget uyghagmeng tugulaatkat milughpagaataghnaluku. Iwernga Jesus iighluni aanegkaq Temple-meng.
43009001	Jesus-em igleghutkelluku esghaqaa yuuk ayaangaghmi allgeqaq.
43009002	Maligsaaghtengan aaptekaa, “Apeghtughista, kitum seghleghqellghan una yuuk ayaangaghmi allgeghtestagu, ellngan seghleghqellghaan nalighmeng angayuqagkenka?”
43009003	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Uum yugem nalighmeng angayuqagkenka seghleghqellghita ayaangasneghitaa. Una yuuk ayaangaghmi allgeqaaguq esghiisqelluku Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha ellngakun.
43009004	Nagneghutepestaaghyaghqaqaput qepghaqii Kayagtistema paninang aghneghuluku. Unugyaghtughaa, kina alngunak qepghaghnaanghituq unugmi.
43009005	Paninang nunamellunga nighukaanga nunam yugan.”
43009006	Tawaten pitkelluku nunakun qesighluni sunameng akumluku angighhegkakek yugem iiskek.
43009007	Taagken yuuk pikaa, “Naayvaghaghmun Siloam-emun aghmigyaghtaa.” (Siloam whaten pisiilghii, “Tuyuqaq”.) Enkaam yuuk aghmigyaghtughluni tagiyalghiimi esghaasagulluni.
43009008	Uvilighneghitallu ilangitallu awen esghaghaqegkangat taana yuuk tungsighralghii enkaam aapqughaaghutkat, “Unangunghitaa yuuk aqumluni tungsighraghaqsalghii?”
43009009	Ilangi pikat, “Aa-a taananguuq.” Iwernga ilangi pikat, “Nakaa, allanguuq, kinanguuq ellngasugnilnguq.” Enkaam ayaangayalghiim pikii, “Taananguunga.”
43009010	Aaptekaat, “Naten esghaasagusin?”
43009011	Kiimsiqii, “Yugem aatqelghiim Jesus-meng qesighluni sunameng akumluku angighllukek iyegka aghmigyaghtiisqaanga Siloam-emun. Enkaam aghmiglunga esghaasagutunga.”
43009012	Aaptekaat, “Naagu taana yuuk?” Yugem kiimsiqii, “Saa, nallukaqa!”
43009013	Taagken ayaangayalghii yuget aglaatkaat Pharisees-enun.
43009014	(Tawani aghneghmi Sabbath-ngulghii Jesus-em qesighluni sunameng akumluku esghaasagutestaqngamigu yuuk.)
43009015	Pharisees-et aaptekaat yuuk, “Naten esghaghyagusin?” Kiimsiqii, “Yugem angighllukek sunameng iyegka, aghmigyalghiinga esghaghtunga.”
43009016	Ilangi Pharisees-et pikat, “Una yuuk Kiyaghneghmeng pingunghituq, qayughllak qaatkigatii Liilightuusat Sabbath-meng ayuqelghiit.” Iwernga ilangi pikat, “Yuuk seghleghqesta, allaaghlluwhaghtilaghnaanghituq tawatelngughmeng.” Aaghtiiraaghutkat.
43009017	Alla aaptekaat yuuk, “Ellngan esghaghtestaaten. Sameng pinayaghsigu?” Yugem kiimsiqii, “Uuknaliqistenguuq.”
43009018	Jews-et igleghutistengita ugpequmangilkangat ayaangayaatangallu, esghaghyagutellghallu, enkaam aqfastekagket angayuqakek.
43009019	Aaptekagket, “Una ighneqestegnegu? Ayaangaghmi allgeghumanikesek, naten esghaghyaguta?”
43009020	Angayuqagkenka kiimsiqii, “Liisimakaghpung ighneqaghpung. Liisimakaghpung ayaangaghmi allgeqaaguq,
43009021	iwernga nallukaghpung naten esghaghyagusimatanga. Talwa nallukaghpung kitum esghaghyagutestellgha. Aapteggu yugughtekaaguq, kiimsighnaaghiisi ellmineng.”
43009022	Angayuqakek tawaten pikak alinglutek Jews-et igleghutistengitneng. Igleghutistet ataasiightengngwaaqat kitum alngunak ugpeqnikagu Jesus, Christ-anguniluku iqitesaghqaaluku synagogue-nneng.
43009023	Taana apalluqluku angayuqakek whaten pikak, “Yugughtekaaguq, aapteggu.”
43009024	Enkaam Jews-et igleghutistengita tuqlunqiglluku ayaangayalghii yuuk, pikaat, “Usuqigu Kiyaghneq. Liisimakaghput taana yuuk, Jesus, seghleghqestenguuq.”
43009025	Pikii, “Nallukaqa seghleghqestengutanga, iwernga liisimakngwaaghaqa ayaangayalghiinga whaa esghaghyagutunga.”
43009026	Jews-et igleghutistengita aaptekaat, “Saaten? Naten esghaghyagutestaten?”
43009027	Kiimsiqii, “Ungipaatngwaaghamsi, iwernga nagasugigataghpesinga. Sangan alla nagasugesteggu? Elpesillu maligsaaghtengughsugetsii ellnganun?”
43009028	Taagken ugumiyagulluku pikaat, “Elpek maligsaaghtekaaten. Whangkuta Moses-em maligsaaghtekiinkut.
43009029	Liisimakaghput Kiyaghneghem aleghquqaqaa Moses. Iwernga taana yuuk, Jesus, nallukaghput naken pingutanga.”
43009030	Yugem pikii, “Kii! Elpesi igleghutisteni nallukumasteggu naken tagikaatanga, naqamllu ellngan esghaghyagutestaanga.
43009031	Qamaglluta liisimakngwaaghaghput Kiyaghneghem nagasigatii seghleghqestet. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nagatkayuwaa kina alngunak maniguullghii, qaatkullghii ellminun.
43009032	Ima nuna piinlighyuwhaallghaneng kitum alngunak nagaqiigataa kina alngunak esghaghtestiniluku ayaangaghmi allgeqameng.
43009033	Taana yuuk Kiyaghneghmeng pingunghisaqumi sanayanghituq.”
43009034	Pikaat, “Seghleghqestenguuten ima allgenghaghhaategpeneng, sangan'ngam whangkuta apeghtughnaqutkesikut?” Taagken aanestestekaat synagogue-meng.
43009035	Jesus-em nagaquqaa ayaangayalghii yuuk aanesimaniluku synagogue-meng. Enkaam ivaghluku naalkesamigu pikaa, “Ugpeqsigu Ighnegha Yugem?”
43009036	Yugem aaptekaa, “Yuguniiq, kingangaawa Ighnegha Yugem? Ungipaatinga enkaam ugpeqlakun.”
43009037	Jesus-em pikaa, “Esghamaan, aleghqughaqaaten.”
43009038	Yugem pikaa, “Aa-a, Ataneq, ugpeghtunga.” Taagken segesqughlluni maniguqaa Jesus.
43009039	Jesus pikaq, “Taginguunga nunamun aafqughnaluki yuget, tamaakut esghiigasalghiit esghiisqelluki, tamaakut esghaqayuget ayaasnaluki.”
43009040	Ilangita Pharisees-et tunganganilnguut Jesus-em nagalluku aaptekaat, “Sameng pizin? Whangkutallu ayaanganizikuut?”
43009041	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ayaangayaqufsi Kiyaghneghem pinayanghitiisi seghleghqestengunilusi. Iwernga whaten pikaategpesineng, ‘Esghaqayuguukut’ tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem piiqiisi seghleghqestengunilusi.”
43010001	Jesus-em pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, yuuk nagun alngunak mayughluni penniilghutamun iitqumi amigunghilngughqun, teglegniightenguuqlu, wayaghtenguuqlu.
43010002	Yuuk itelghii amigkun penniighniightenguuq, enkaam
43010003	kelengakistem amigmelnguum qelpeghutaqaa. Penniighet nagaquneghmegteggu menga takwaaqaat. Taam pennighniightem ellmi katam penniini aatghitgun tuqlughteghluki aanutaqii.
43010004	Ellngan katam penniighi qamaglluteng aanleghaanneghata, penniighniighta sivungitni igleghtaquq enkaam pennighet maliglleghaataqaat, qayughllak menga liisimakegkangat.
43010005	Maliggnaanghitaat kina nallukegkaghteng yeghlegi qimaguusaghqaagut, qayughllak nallukegkangat menga.”
43010006	Taaggun ungipaghaatkun Jesus-em ungipaatkii taakut Pharisees-et, iwernga liigikumangilkangat sameng pisiitanga.
43010007	Enkaam Jesus-em pilaataqii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, whanga amiguunga penniighnun.
43010008	Qamaglluteng yuget sivumni tagikat teglegniightenguutlu wayaghtenguutlu enkaam penniighet nagasimangitiit taakut.
43010009	Whanga amiguunga, kina alngunak iitqumi whangamkun yugulillengyaghqaaguq. Enkaam iitghaqluni, aanaqluni, naalkutaqlunillu neghyaghqameng pillequq.
43010010	Teglegniighta taawanginaq teglegyaqayuguuq, yugtaghyaqayuguuq, naafqiiyaqayuguuq, iwernga whanga tagikaagunga yuget unguvallengesqelluki unguvallepigmeng.
43010011	“Whanga pinilghiinguunga penniighniighta. Pinilghiim penniighniightem tuqumatkesaghqaqii penniini.
43010012	Akileghtuqayuk penniighniightengunghituq enkaam penniighet ellngan pikengitii. Taam qepghaghtem esghaqumigu amaa tagilghii, qimagyaghqaaguq penniighet unilluki. Taana amaa penniightekan qamaglluteng penniighet mingillequt.
43010013	Yuuk akileghtuqayuk qimagyaghqaaguq, qayughllak temngi qepghaghtengulghii enkaam legan waaknaanghitii penniighet.
43010014	Whanga pinilghiinguunga penniighniighta. Atam liisimakellghatun whanga, whangallu liisimakellemtun Ata, tawateghpigaq liisimakanka penniighenka, penniighma liisimakaatnga. Tuqumatkelleqanka penniighenka.
43010016	Penniightuunga penniilghutamenneghilngughmeng. Ellngitlu tagisaghqapestaaqanka, nagalleqaat meka enkaam penniighenka ataasistun lliighllequt, ataasiq penniighniightekluku.
43010017	“Atam piniqaanga qayughllak unguvalqa tuunyukestaghluku ayuqaqa veghhneqiggnaluku.
43010018	Kitum alngunak iqinnaanghitaa unguvalqa, qayughllak whangamneng katam tuunyugluku ayuqaqa. Tuunilleghqalguunga unguvallemneng, veghtilleghqalguunga unguvallemneng. Tawaten Atama qelqaqaanga.”
43010019	Allameng Jews-et aaghtiiraaghutkat, Jesus-em akuzitangi apalluqluki.
43010020	Uglapiglleghhiit pikat, “Taana yuuk tughneghaam iteghluku nallungughtestekaqaa, sangan'ngam nagataqesteggu?”
43010021	Iwernga ilangi pikat, “Yuuk tughneghaam nallungughtestekaa tawaten akuzinaanghituq. Tughneghaam esghaghtesagulleqaguu ayaakaq?”
43010022	Uksuulghii, Jerusalem-emi Jews-et neqenghaghqelghiit neqamiknaluku Dedicate-ellgha Temple-em.
43010023	Jesus igleghtengngulghii Solomon's Porch-mi, tungangani Temple-em.
43010024	Jews-et uvitangighluku pikaat, “Naten tagkaan kukriqutkesnaqsin whangkunnun? Christ-angukuvek ungipaatngwaaghqut.”
43010025	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Ungipaatngwaaqaqamsi iwernga ugpeqigataghpesinga. Allaaghlluwhaghtiiqunga Atama Aatghakun liigikesqellunga kinangutka.
43010026	Iwernga elpesi ugpeghigatusi qayughllak penniiqenghilkemsi.
43010027	Liisimakanka penniighenka, nagalluku meka maligtaqaatnga.
43010028	Tuunanka kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng, enkaam tuqunaanghitngwaaghtut. Kitum alngunak akuqaghnaanghitii iiggemneng.
43010029	Atama tagivaqaqii penniighenka. Aangeghllagtuq kitumeng alngunak, enkaam kitum alngunak akuqaghnaanghitii Atama iigganeng.
43010030	Atakullghiigni ataasistun ayuqukung.”
43010031	Taagken Jews-et tugulaallaataqat uyghagmeng tuqunnaluku Jesus.
43010032	Iwernga Jesus-em pikii, “Esghapagaghpesinga uglapiglleghhii aneghneghqilleq apeghiighaqa Atama aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun. Naliitnun taakut aneghneghqilleghma milughpagaataghyugestengnga?”
43010033	Jews-et kiimsiqaat, “Tuqunnaqenghitamken aneghneghqillghen apalluqluku, taawanginaq akuzillghen apalluqaghput. Temngi yuguuten. Kiyaghneghmun seghleghqeghllakaaguten Kiyaghneghtun ayuqniluten piiqngavek!”
43010034	Jesus-em pikii, “Liilightuusaghpesini igaqngaaq Kiyaghneghem pillgha whaten, ‘Elpesi kiyaghneghuusi.’
43010035	Liisimakaput Akuzitet Igaqegkat allangughsaghqaanghitut. Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneghem kiyaghneghunimakaki
43010036	sangamangam seghleghqeghllagumanistengnga Kiyaghneghmun? Apalluqestegguu Kiyaghneghmun Ighneqnilqa? Atam nakmikegkaqaanga, kayagtekaqaanga nunamun.
43010037	Atuqenghilkumkun Atama piiqegkanga, elngaatall ugpeqenghinnakefsinga,
43010038	iwernga atuqaqaqa Atama piiqegkanga. Ugpeqenghiteghngaaghpesinga whanga, ugpeqiteki qepghaqanka enkaam liilleqaghsi, liigikelleqaghsi Ata whangamnitutanga, whanga ellngani.”
43010039	Taagken Jews-et tugunaqlaataghyaghaat, iwernga Jesus anakaq ellngitneng.
43010040	Taagken Jesus-em aghvighlukek Kiiwek Jordan-meng aatqelghiik aglanqigtekaq John-em paaptaayeviksuwhaallghanun, enkaam tamaantekaq.
43010041	Uglapiglleghhii yuuk tagilaghaatkaq ellnganun, pikat, “John allaaghlluwhaghtimangituq, iwernga John-em apellgha uumeng yugmeng qamaglluni ipanguuq.”
43010042	Tawani uglapiglleghhiim ugpeqegkaa Jesus.
43011001	Taawanguq yuuk, aatqelghii Lazarus-meng qinuyukaq. Bethany-mi kiyaghtengngulghii nayagegmini Mary-nkugni Martha-nkugni.
43011002	(Taam Mary-m taakwaningani Atanghem itegii kuuvikluki tepengllaasimeng nuyamineng sangigsaghqaqii. Mary-m kuugqegkanga Lazarus qinuyulghii.)
43011003	Mary-nkuk Martha-nkuk ungipaasaghtiisqegkaak Jesus, “Ataneq, piniqegkan qinuyuguuq.”
43011004	Jesus ungipaasatni pikaq, “Qinuyullghan apallaa tuqullghunghituq iwernga usuqisiiluni Kiyaghneghmun pinguuq, esghiisqellukullu aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaga Ighneghan Kiyaghneghem.”
43011005	Jesus-em piniqegkek Martha-nkuk anglegutkullghiik, Lazarus-llu.
43011006	Iwernga nagaqughngaaghmigu Lazarus-em qinuyullgha, paninang maalghuk aghneghek tamaantekaq.
43011007	Taagken Jesus-em maligsaaghteni pikii, “Judea-nneqigtelta.”
43011008	Maligsaaghtengita pikaat, “Apeghtughista, legan qantaghaqun Jews-et tuqunnaqegkaqaaten milughpagaatameng. Whaa alla aglanqigsugsiin?”
43011009	Jesus-em kiimsiqii, “Aghneghem ataasim avellgha nighuguq. Kina alngunak igleghtekumi aghneghmi naaggnaanghituq, qayughllak esghaghaqaa tumeni nunam nighugakun.
43011010	Iwernga kina alngunak igleghtekumi unugmi naagsaghqaaguq qayughllak nighugilnguq ilumini.”
43011011	Jesus tawaten piluni pikiillu, “Ilakumtaaghput Lazarus qavaaguq, taghtughsaghtughnaqaqa.”
43011012	Maligsaaghtengita pikaat, “Ataneq, qavaakumi piniighlleqaa.”
43011013	Jesus-em pinguyaqangi Lazarus tuqumaniluku, iwernga maligsaaghtengita sumeghtaghaatkegkaat Lazarus qavaaniluku.
43011014	Enkaam Jesus-em ungipaatngwaaqii, “Lazarus tuqumaaq.
43011015	Quyaanga ellnganinneghitkaalghiinga tuqaaqngan. Apalluqaqa elpesinun ugpeqataghhiisqellunga. Tagitek, takulteggu.”
43011016	Taagken Thomas-em (Malghimengllu aatqelghiim) pikii maligsaaghtelgutni, “Whangkutallu tuqulgusighyaghtuulteggu.”
43011017	Jesus-em kaalluni Bethany-mun nagaquqaa Lazarus tuqumaniluku, enmis estamagughtaqeftii aghneghet llivelleghmineng.
43011018	Bethany qantaghanlenguq Jerusalem-emeng,
43011019	enkaam uglapiglleghhiit Jews-et tagilaghaatkat ilutughsaghnalukek Martha-nkuk Mary-nkuk, kuugghegkenka tuqullghaneng.
43011020	Martha-m nagaqughyamigu Jesus taginiluku paasqaa, Mary nemetkaq.
43011021	Martha-m pikaa Jesus, “Ataneq, maantekaayaquvek kuugqa tuqunayanghituq.
43011022	Iwernga liisimakaqa, talwa maaten Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaqaaten sameng alngunak aaptekuvek.”
43011023	Jesus-em pikaa, “Kuugghen unguvaghllequq unguvalleghmun.”
43011024	Martha-m pikaa, “Liisimakaqa unguvaghllequq tuqukat unguvaghtuuskata kingulighmi aghneghmi.”
43011025	Jesus-em pikaa, “Whanga tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtellghuungallu unguvallghuungallu. Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkuminga tuquyaghngaaghmi, unguvallelguyaghqaaguq.
43011026	Enkaam kina alngunak kiyaghtekumi whangamni, ugpeqegkumingallu, tuqunaanghitngwaaghtuq. Martha, ugpeqsiguu taana?”
43011027	Martha-m kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a Ataneq, ugpeqamken Christ-anguuten, Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem. Elpenguuq tagiyaghqaanikaat nunamun.”
43011028	Martha-m tawaten piluku aglaqaq. Tuqlughluku anglegutni Mary, ellnginaaghulluku pikaa, “Apeghtughista kaasimaaq, aaptaqaaten.”
43011029	Ungipaasatni, Mary nekefqaghtekaq Jesus-mun pinaluni.
43011030	(Jesus paninang neghpigaghmun agliigalnguq, salin Martha-m nallaghviganilnguq.)
43011031	Jews-et Mary-nkunilnguut ilutughsaghilghiit Mary-meng esghapagluku nekefqaghlluni aanyan maligtekaat. Sumeghmeggni lliveghmun qiyayaghtughnaqniluku pikaat.
43011032	Iwernga Mary aglaqaq Jesus-mun. Esghaghyamigu sikmuulluni manungakun pikaa, “Ataneq, maantekaayaquvek kuugqa tuqunayanghituq.”
43011033	Jesus-em esghaghluku Mary qiyalghii, tamaakutlu Jews-et maligutkat qiyaaghuullghiit elngaatall seghleliighllakaq.
43011034	Aaptekii, “Nagun lliivghumasteggu?” Pikaat, “Ataneq, tagi, esghaghyaghtughhu.”
43011035	Jesus qiyakaq.
43011036	Enkaam Jews-et pikat, “Esghaghhu tawateghllak piniqumaagu Lazarus.”
43011037	Iwernga ilangi pikat, “Jesus-em naallghusimakumigu ayaakaq, sangan Lazarus tuqunghitesnanightagu?”
43011038	Jesus lliveghmun aglaatkelluku alla seghleliinqigteghllakaq. Lazarus-em lliivgha sufluulghii, uyghagrugllagmeng paaynga saapluni.
43011039	Jesus pikaq, “Iqiteggu uyghak.” Martha-m pikaa, “Ataneq, estamagughtii aghneghet tuqutmineng enkaam tepengeghllagtuq.” (Martha nayakegkanga tuqukam yugem.)
43011040	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ungipaatkaqamken ugpeghyaquvek esghaghlleqan Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.”
43011041	Taagken iqitkaat uyghak paaynganeng llivghem. Jesus quulmun esghaghluni pikaq, “Ataay, iyamsiqayugvikamken nagataqegkevnga.
43011042	Liisimakaqa quunpeng nagaqughaqaghpenga. Iwernga tawaten piinga yuget uvitemnilnguut apalluqluki, ugpeqesqelluku elpenun kayagtekaatka.”
43011043	Jesus tawaten piluni, iglagtupiglluni pikaq, “Lazarus, aani.”
43011044	Yuuk tuqukaayalghii aanegkaq. Iiggillu itegiillu iimguvikngalghiit qiipaghaghmeng, gginaallu qantaghluni allaneng qiipaghaghmeng. Jesus-em pikii, “Qiipaghaat iikiteki enkaam igleghlli.”
43011045	Taakut Jews-et maligutkat Mary-mun esghapakaat Jesus unguvaghtilghii, enkaam uglapiglleghhiim ugpeqegkaat Jesus.
43011046	Iwernga ilangi Jews-et Pharisees-enun pikat, ungipaatkiit Jesus-em unguvaghtillghaneng.
43011047	Taagken chief priest-etlu, Pharisees-etlu qerngughlluki agghistet aaptekiit, “Sanaqestangam? Taana yuuk allaaghlluwhaghtighllaguuq.
43011048	Nagneghtestekumteggu tawaten, tamaghhaghmi ugpeqelleqaat. Enkaam Rome-eghmiit tagiluteng naafqelleqaat Temple-allu yuputlu.”
43011049	Caiaphas-llu tawanlenguq, high priest-ngulghii tawani ayumiqulleghmi. Caiaphas-em pikii, “Elpesi nallukngwaaghtusi!
43011050	Itagnaghataghaghnayaghtuq ataasim yugem tuqumatkesaqumiki yuget, qamaglluteng yumta naafqelleghqiitneng. Iwernga elpesi liigikigataghsi taana.”
43011051	Caiaphas ellmineng tawaten akuzimangilnguq, Kiyaghneghem akuzistekaqaa qayughllak high priest-ngulghii tawani ayumiqulleghmi. Tawaten pilleghmikun uuknaliqutkegkaa Jesus-mun tuqutkelleqniluki Jews-et.
43011052	Jews-nginaat tuqutkegpenaki iwernga qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem avaqutii mingitngalghiit tamangani tuqutkesaghqaqii ataasiightesqelluki nengllugutkullghiit.
43011053	Taagken aghneghmeng kenlanga Jews-et igleghutistengita agghitkegkaat naten tuqutelleghqameng Jesus.
43011054	Enkaam Jesus aliilluni alngunak igleghhnaniqaq Jews-et akulngitni. Iwernga tamaaken aghulaqegkaq kilgaan tunganganun, nemun atilqelghii Ephraim. Maligsaaghtekullghiit tamaantekat.
43011055	Jews-et Neqenghaghqellghat Passover-mun kaasaghtulghii, enkaam naken alngunak uglapiglleghhii yuuk aglaghtuutkaq Jerusalem-emun. Tawani yataaghqegkat neqenghaghqelleghmun ukmangighsalleghmegteggun Liilightuusat pisqellghistun.
43011056	Yuget ivaqaat Jesus enkaam qerngughusameng Temple-mi aaptekiit ilateng, “Jesus-llu taginaqaqaa Neqenghaghqemmun? Sumeghpesini sanaqa?”
43011057	Chief priest-etlu Pharisees-etlu tugunaluku Jesus liilightuutkaqegkangat yugnun, “Nalighpesi liisimakegkumigu Jesus-em naantulanga wataghllak ungipaannakefsikut.”
43012001	Aghvinlegughtaquqlu aghneq Neqenghaghqellghanun Passover-em, Jesus Bethany-tkaq, Lazarus-em kiyaghfiganun. (Taana Lazarus Jesus-em unguvaghtekaqaa tuqulleghmeng).
43012002	Tawani Jesus yataaghqutkaat neqenghaghqunnaluku enkaam Martha-m ketfaghtuutkii aqelqat. Lazarus-llu tawanlenguq maligulluni Jesus-mun.
43012003	Taagken Mary-m tagitkakek akitupiglleghhiik tepengllaasik nard-epigmeng ulimaaghek. Jesus-em itegii kuuvikluki sangigtekii nuyamineng. Enkaam mangtegham ilunga tepengllaasighpagnighqwaakaq.
43012004	Judas Iscariot-lu tawanlenguq, Jesus-em maligsaaghtenga. (Taakwangingani uveghpagusaghqaqngukanga Jesus). Judas pikaq,
43012005	“Taakuk tepengllaasik 300 denarii-em akikaak. Akiksaqlegestun, akinga taana aklumalghiinun tunqughnayaghtuq.”
43012006	Tawaten pikaalghii megnukelghiistun aklumalghiit iwernga megnukepigtekanga mani. Aflengakistengulghii maligsaaghtet manilghutiitneng enkaam tugutkayugulghii ellminun katam atughqameng teglegniightengutmineng.
43012007	Jesus-em pikaa, “Avelghaghhu, aflengakumaak tepengllaasik aghneghmun whavek yataaghqennaluku llivelleghqaqa.
43012008	Aklumalghiit quunpeng tamaantut. Whanga quunpeng elpesininnaanghitunga.”
43012009	Uglapiglleghhiit Jews-et nagaqughluku Jesus Bethany-menniluku esghaghyaghtuutkaat, tawaveklu Lazarus esghaghnaluku Jesus-em unguvaghtekaa.
43012010	Lazarus apalluqluku uglapiglleghhiit Jews-et unilluki igleghutisteteng ugpeqegkaat Jesus. Enkaam taakut chief priest-et agghitngwaaqat tuqunnaluku Jesus, enraghngam whaa agghitkegkaat Lazarus-lu tuqunnaluku.
43012012	Unaamingani yulghuteghllaget Neqenghaghqellghanun Passover-em tagilaghaatkat, nagaquqat Jesus tagiiqniluku Jerusalem-emun.
43012013	Enkaam kepuulluteng palm-et uqfiget avayiitneng paasqaat Jesus akilghuumaghmeng, “Usuqnaghhalek Kiyaghneq! Kiyaghneghem quyasligu Umiilga Israel-em tagilghii Aatghakun Atanghem!”
43012014	Jesus-em navghaghluku donkey-ghaq qaayngakun aqumegkaq tawatengwaaq Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun. Taakut Akuzitet whaten pikaagut,
43012015	“Alingegpenasi, yugani Jerusalem-em! Esghaghteggu, umiilegsi tagiiquq aqumluni donkey-ghaam qaayngakun.”
43012016	Tawani pilleghmi Jesus-em maligsaaghtengita liigikumangilkangat taana uuknaliqelleq. Wetku kingunganeng Jesus-em unguvalghanllu, mayullghanllu qilagmun neqaatkaat taana uuknaliqelleq, neqaatkiitlu apeghiiqiit ellnganun.
43012017	Yulghutet ungipaqngukangat esghapalleghteng Jesus-em unguvaghtillgha Lazarus-meng, aanesqellghallu lliveghmeng.
43012018	Enkaam uglapiglleghhiim yugem paasqaat Jesus, qayughllak nagaquqaqegkangat taana allaaghlluwhaghtilleq.
43012019	Taagken Pharisees-et ilateng pikiit, “Sangwaa tamaghhaghmi anaggutnguuq whangkunnun. Esghaqaghtegguqun, iingunaghhaghmi yugem maligtengngwaa Jesus.”
43012020	Ilangillu Greek-et Jerusalem-etkaalghiit maniguunnaluteng Neqenghaghqellghani Passover-em.
43012021	Aglaghluteng Philip-mun, pikaat, “Yuguniiq, esghaghyuwaqaghput Jesus.” (Philip Bethsaida-meng pingulghii, Galilee-melngughmeng.)
43012022	Enkaam Philip-em ungipaalluku Andrew, ungipaasaghtuqaak Jesus.
43012023	Jesus-em pikakek, “Aflu kaasimaaq Ighneghan Yugem quulvallengeghllalleghqaa.
43012024	Ipa ungipaatamsi, wetkuqun piitun ifkaghlluni nunamun iteghluni tuqukumi piitesqughllagyaghqaaguq, aamtaam tuqunghilkumi taawa ataasighhaallequq piitun.
43012025	Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu unguvalleni iflayaghqaqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak ugumikegkumigu unguvalleni whani nunami kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengyaghqaaguq.
43012026	Kitum alngunak qepghaasukuminga maligsaghqaqaanga. Enkaam qepghaghteka whangamnisaghqaaguq naansaghngaaghma. Atama quulvaghyaghqaqaa kina alngunak qepghaatilghii whangamneng.”
