43012027	“Maaten unguvasigka seghleliighuuk. Sameng pilanga? Whaten pilangaa, ‘Ataay, yugulinga ikfiqelleghqamneng’? Nakaa, tawaten pinaanghitunga qayughllak tagikaagunga ikfiqnalunga.
43012028	Ataay, aangelleghllaga ateghpek aliightigu.” Taagken ma qilagmeng pikaq, “Aangelleghllaga ateghma aliighsimaaqa, alla aliighlleqaqa.”
43012029	Yulghutem nekevghallghiim tawani nagalluku taana ma pikat, “Kallugughtaa.” Iwernga ilangi pikat, “Yaqulgem aleghqughwaa Jesus.”
43012030	Jesus-em pikii, “Ma taana elpesinun ayuquq, whangamnun pingunghituq.
43012031	Whaa maaten Kiyaghneghem nanqiggnaqaa nunam yuga, whaa maaten Kiyaghneghem eggnaqngwaa igleghutistenga uum nunam.
43012032	Whanga kevellengegkuma nunameng, taaggun tagilaghaatesleqaqa qamaglluku yuuk whangamnun.”
43012033	Jesus tawaten pikaq apeghnaluku naten tuqulleghqani.
43012034	Yulghuteghllaget pikaat, “Nagaquqaqaghput Liilightuusaaneng Moses-em, Christ-anguq kiyaghsaghqaaguq quunperugllak. Enkaam sangavek pizin, ‘Ighnegha Yugem kevellengyaghqaaguq’? Kinangaawa taana, ‘Ighnegha Yugem’?”
43012035	Taagken Jesus-em pikii, “Nighuk elpesininnaqnguuq natengiighhaq. Enkaam igleghtek nighugaghluku, mamlegfagilgan. Kina alngunak igleghlleghhii mamlegmi nallukuq natmun piiqutni.
43012036	Enkaam nighuk paninang elpesinilluku ugpeqiteggu, avaqutaliitesqellusi nighugmun.” Jesus tawaten piluni kagtaghtekaq ellngitneng.
43012037	Yuget esghapagyaghngaaghmegteggu Jesus uglapiglluku allaaghlluwhaghtilghii paninang ugpequmangilkangat.
43012038	Ugpequmangitellghita apeghiightestekaa Isaiah-m uuknaliqistem whaten pillgha: “Ataneq, kitum ugpeqaki sangwaat aapqaput? Atanghem aghtughyaghqaanghilleni kitumun esghaghtestagu?”
43012039	Tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeghpagningitkaagut. Isaiah whatenllu uuknaliqegkaaguq,
43012040	Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Iiyngit ayaastekaqanka esghaannayukata. Umyugiitlu liigiksaghqaananighqegkaqanka luuraq qiivnayukata whangamnun naallghutesqelluteng.”
43012041	Isaiah tawaten pikaaguq esghaqaqutmineng Jesus-em nighughqelleghqaa enkaam akuzitkegkaqegkanga.
43012042	Qaywa uglapiglleghiit Jews-et ugpeqenghisaghngaatgu Jesus, naqamenraq uglapighlleghhiit igleghutistengita ugpeqegkaat Jesus, Christ-angutanga. Iwernga aapghumangilkangat alingluteng Pharisees-et aanesnayukangisteng synagogue-meng,
43012043	qayughllak taakut igleghutistet usuqellengyugaqut yugneng pakiggulluku Kiyaghneghem usuqelleghqaaneng.
43012044	Jesus akilghuukaq, “Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkuminga, whanganginaghma ugpeqegpenanga, ugpeqngwaa Kayagtisteka.
43012045	Kitum alngunak esghaquminga, esghaangwaa Kayagtisteka.
43012046	Tagikaagunga nunamun nighugulunga, kitum alngunak ugpeqegkanganga mamlegmennanighllequq.
43012047	Kitum alngunak nagalluki akuzitenka qaatkenghilkaki, nanqiggnaanghitaqa aghyughyaghqaaniluku, qayughllak nanqigsaghtuunghitanka nunam yugi, yeghlegi yuguliyaghtuuwanka.
43012048	Kitum alngunak ighsakegkangangallu tuguklinghilkakillu akuzitenka nanqigtistekaghqalguuq. Akuzitet akuzitkegkanka nanqiglleqaat kingulighmi aghneghmi,
43012049	qayughllak akuzitenka whanga pikenghitanka. Atam Kayagtistema qelghutkaaneng akuziiqunga.
43012050	Liisimakanka qelghusii kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengestikayuguut. Enkaam akuzitkaqegkenka Atam qelghusaqii whangamnun akuzitkesqelluki.”
43013001	Ataasiightekaq aghneq Passover-em Neqenghaghqelleghqaanun. Jesus-em liisimakegkanga qantaghaqun Atamun aglalleghqani unilluku una nuna. Quunpeng piniqegkaqii tamaakut ellmi pini nunamelnguut, piniqegkaqii kenlemun.
43013002	Tawani ighivgaghmi Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit qerngughutkat neghnaluteng. Tughneghaam apeghiiqaa sumeghtaghaatkesqelleq Judas Iscariot-mun uveghpagutesqelluku Jesus. (Judas ighneqegkanga Simon-em.)
43013003	Jesus-em liisimakegkanga Atam tuunegkaqegkanga aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng samun tamaghhaanun. Liisimakegkangallu Kiyaghneghmeng pingutni, aglalleghqanillu Kiyaghneghmun.
43013004	Neghuutnguluteng tawani Jesus nekevluni, qaasliit aatkani mataghqughluki, veglluk qukamikun qillghutkaa.
43013005	Taagken aghmigusik meghmeng imighlukek maligsaaghtemi itegiit ughvughtuqii, qukaminilngughmeng vegllugmeng sangigtaqluki.
43013006	Jesus-em kaatkaa Simon Peter, Peter-em aaptekaa, “Ataneq, iteganka ughvughnaqsikii?”
43013007	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Liigiknaanghitan saaqutka maaten iwernga taakwaningani liigikellequten.”
43013008	Peter-em pikaa, “Iteganka ughvughnaanghitngwaaghaten.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Ughvunghilkumki itegaghten, maligsaaghteknanighlleqamken.”
43013009	Simon Peter-em pikaa, “Ataneq, naqam iteganka ughvuneghmeng taaqegkufki iiggenkallu naasquqallu pinaketen.”
43013010	Jesus-em pikaa, “Yuuk ughvughqenneghmini iqangiitaqaa, itegaghhiinii ughvughyaghqaawaqut qagani igleghlluni iteneghmini. Qamagllusi iqangitusi, iwerngaqun kina ataasiq.”
43013011	Jesus-em liisimakegkanga kinangutanga uveghpagutiyaghqaq ellmineng. Tamaaken apalluqluku whaten pikaalghii, “Qamagllusi iqangitusi, iwerngaqun kina ataasiq.”
43013012	Taaqsamiki itegiit ughvughtuneghmeng qaasliit aatkani aalluki aqumenqiglluni aaptekii, “Liigikenghistegguu taana ughvughtughilqa itegaghpesineng?
43013013	Tuqlughaqaghpesinga Apeghtughistemengllu, Ataneghmengllu, elqughaghtaqaghpesinga, qayughllak tawatetunga.
43013014	Whanga, Ataneghpesini, Apeghtughistegpesini ughvuumakumki itegasi elpesillu ughvughyaghqaqasi ilagpesi itegiit.
43013015	Tawaten piinga usputaqesqelluku elpesinun. Enkaam elpesillu piiqitek whanga pillemtun elpesinun.
43013016	Ipa ungipaatamsi, qepghaghta aangataghanghituq umiilegmineng, ungipaghtallu aangataghanghituq kayagtistemineng.
43013017	Liisimakegkufsiki tamaakut quyallequsi tawaten pikufsi.
43013018	“Akuzitkengngunghitamsi qamagllusi. Liisimakanka natetulangi nakmikegkanka. Iwernga apeghiighyaghqaaguq Akuzitnilnguq Igaqegkani whaten pilleq, ‘Yugem neghelgusighikam whangamneng uveghpagutkaqaanga’.
43013019	Ungipaatamsi taana sivutghulluku, enkaam apeghiiqan ugpeqelleqaghpesinga whanga ellnganguunga.
43013020	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum alngunak tugukliqumigu kayagtekaqa, whangallu tuguklighlleqaanga. Enkaam kitum alngunak tugukliquminga, tuguklighlleqaa Kayagtikaq whangamneng.”
43013021	Jesus-em apeghluku uveghpagutelleghqani elngaatall qaamggurugllak qivghughllakaq, pikii, “Ipa ungipaatamsi, nalighpesi uveghpagunnaqngwaanga.”
43013022	Maligsaaghtet esghaqaqutkat ellmeggneng qayughllak nalluneqsukegkaat kina pitanga.
43013023	Ataasiq maligsaaghta piniqegkaa Jesus-em aqumgalghii saaghwani.
43013024	Simon Peter-em apaquluku taana maligsaaghta aaptesqegkaa kina piiqutanga.
43013025	Taam maligsaaghtem mallegluni Jesus-mun aaptekaa, “Ataneq, kinangaawa uveghpagutinaqelghii elpeneng?”
43013026	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Nepluku neqekrangllaq qayuusimun tuunelleqaqa uveghpagutiyaghqamun whangamneng.” Enkaam Jesus-em tuguluku neqekrangllaq, nepluku, tuunegkaa Judas Iscariot-mun, ighneghanun Simon-em.
43013027	Legan Judas-em tuwaa neqekrangllaq, Tughneghaam iitqaa Judas. Jesus-em pikaa Judas, “Taana piyaghqan piighaghtigu.”
43013028	Nalighhiiniita tawanlenguut liigikumangilkangat sameng Jesus-em Judas pitanga.
43013029	Judas-em aflengakngukek manilghutak, enkaam sumeghtaghaatkegkaat sameng tukfighiyaghtiisqenniluku aklukegkameng neqenghaghqemmun, nalighmeng aklumalghiinun tuuniyaghtiisqenniluku.
43013030	Enkaam Judas-em neghluku neqekrangllaq aanegkaq. Unugulghii tawani.
43013031	Judas aanyan Jesus pikaq, “Whaa maaten yuget esghaghaat naten Ighnegha Yugem quulvallengellgha, enkaam ellngakun Kiyaghneq quulvallenguq.
43013032	Kiyaghneq quulvallengengukan Ighneghakun Yugem, Kiyaghneghem quulvaghyaghqaqaa ellmikun qantaghaghhaqun.
43013033	“Taghnughhaghhamni, unisaghtungestaghamsi. Qaywa ivaghyaghngaaghpesinga, takukamnun pinaanghitusi. Jews-et igleghutistengitlu ungipaatkaqanka tawaten.
43013034	Ungipaannaqamsi nutaghameng qelghusameng: Piniqutullusi. Piniqutusaghqaagusi katam whanga piniqellemtun elpesi.
43013035	Piniquskufsi tamaghhaghmi yugem liisimakelleqiisi whangamnun maligsaaghtekutsi.”
43013036	Simon Peter-em aaptekaa Jesus, “Ataneq, navek pinaqsin?” Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Takuyaghqamnun maliggnaanghitaghpenga maaten iwernga taakwaningani maligullequten.”
43013037	Peter-em aaptekaa, “Ataneq, sangan maliggnaqenghisiken maaten? Tuqutkesaqlegwaamken whaa.”
43013038	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Ipaa tuqutkelleqsingaa? Ipa ungipaatamken, pingayuneng nallunqelleqaghpenga rooster-a qalghightestegpenaan.”
43014001	Jesus pilaataqaq, “Qaamnasi seghleliightestegpenaki, sighimakiteggu Kiyaghneq, sighimakitengnga whangallu.
43014002	Uglaapigtuq nekaghqaq Atama mangteghaani enkaam yataaghqusaghtughnaqamsi nekaghqameng. Tawatenneghisaqan ungipaannayanghitamsi.
43014003	Yataaghqunneghmeng apeghiiqumsi taginqigllunga tuguklighlleqamsi, whangamnitesqellusi kiyaghfimni.
43014004	Liisimakaghsi tuma takunaqegkegka.”
43014005	Thomas-em pikaa Jesus, “Ataneq, nallukaghput navek pinaquten enkaam naten'ngam liisimakelleqesteggu tuma?”
43014006	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Whanga tuumnguunga, ipapillghuunga, unguvallghuunga. Kina alngunak Atamun aglaghnaanghituq wetqukun whangamkun.
43014007	Liisimakngwaaghyaqufsinga, liisimaknayaghaghsi Atakallu. Iwernga whaken kenlanga liitaghsillu esghaghaghsillu.”
43014008	Philip-em pikaa, “Ataneq, kelgutigu Ata whangkunnun enkaam itagnaghilta.”
43014009	Jesus-em pikaa, “Philip, elpesinitunga qavngarugllaggaaneng, taawaa nallukaqsingaa? Kitum esghaamakuminga, esghaqaqaallu Ata. Enkaam sangavek pizin, ‘Kelgutigu Ata whangkunnun’?
43014010	Ugpeqenghistengngaa Atam ilunganilnguunga, Ata whanga ilumni? Akuzitenka whanga katam akuzitkenghitanka. Ata ilumnilnguq qepghaghaquq whangamkun.
43014011	Ugpeqitengnga Atam ilunganinnilunga pilghiinga, Atallu ilumninnikegka. Nalighmeng ugpeqitengnga allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka apalluqluki.
43014012	Ipa ungipaatamsi, kitum ugpeqegkuminga, taakut ataasit qepghaqanka pilleqii. Talwa aangataghalghiit tamaakuneng pilleqii qayughllak aglaghnaqunga Atamun.
43014013	Aaptekufsi sameng alngunak Atemkun legan pilleqaqa, Atam aangelleghllaga kelgutesqelluku Ighneghqun.
43014014	Sameng alngunak aaptekufsinga Atemkun pilleqaqa.
43014015	“Piniqegkufsinga qaatkelleqasi qelghusanka.
43014016	Aapleqaqa Ata tuunesqellusi allaneng Kayutkaghqameng, enkaam tuunelleqiisi Kayutkaghqameng elpesinisaghqameng quunperugllak.
43014017	Taakuk Kayutek Taghneghaaguk apeghtughlleqiisi Kiyaghneghem ipapillghaneng. Nunam yugan tuguklighnaanghitaa qayughllak esghiigalkanga talwa nallukegkanga. Iwernga elpesi liisimakaghsi qayughllak elpesinituq, ilugpesinisaghqaaguqlu.
43014018	“Uninnaanghitamsi ellnginaghhaghpesi yaywaalistun. Taginqigllequnga elpesinun.
43014019	Maateqwaaqun nunam yugan esghaghnanighnaqaatnga, iwernga elpesi esghaghlleqaghpesinga, qayughllak unguvalghiinga, elpesillu unguvallequsi.
43014020	Enkaam tawani aghneghmi unguvaghtellemni liilleqaghsi Atama ilunganitulka, elpesillu ilumnitelleghsi, whangallu ilugpesinitulka.
43014021	“Kitum tugukliqumiki qelghusanka, qaatkegkumikillu, piniqistekaqa, Atamallu piniqelleqaa. Whangallu piniqelleqaqa, liiteslequngallu ellnganun.”
43014022	Taagken Judas-em pikaa, (Judas Iscariot-ngunghilnguum) “Ataneq, sangavek liitesnaqsin whangkunnun, naqam nunam yuganun liitestegpenang?”
43014023	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Kitum piniqegkuminga qaatkelleqii apeghtuusanka. Atama piniqelleqaa enkaam Atakullghiigni takuluku kiyaghfikelleqaghpung.
43014024	Kitum piniqenghilkuminga qaatkennaanghitii apeghtuusanka. Apeghtuusat nagatkesi whangamneng pingunghitut, Atameng pinguut Kayagtistemneng.
43014025	“Ungipaatamsi tamaaken elpesinillunga.
43014026	Kayutem apeghtughlleqiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng. Neqaghtesleqii qamaglluki tamaakut aapqanka elpesinun. Taakuk Kayutek Agleghnalghiinguuk Taghneghak, Atam kayagsaghqakek Atemkun.
43014027	“Univikamsi nekeggmelleghmeng. Nekeggmelqa tuunaqa elpesinun. Nunam tuunellghatun tuuneghitamsi. Enkaam ilusi seghleliightestegpenaki talwa alingegpenasi.
43014028	Nagatkaqaghpesinga whaten pilghiinga, ‘Aghulaqnaqunga iwernga taginqigllequnga elpesinun.’ Piniqegkaqsaqufsinga quyanayaghtusi ungipaataqngamsi Atamun aglaghnaqnilunga, qayughllak aangeghllagtuq whangamneng.
43014029	Whaa ungipaatamsi taagken sivutghulluku pilleghqaa enkaam apeghiiqan ugpeghllequsi.
43014030	Aleghqughnanighyaghtungestaghamsi, qayughllak igleghutistenga nunam uum taginguuq. Aghtughyaghqaanghillghituq whangamnun,
43014031	iwernga Atam qelghutkii pisqellghwaaghatun atuqaqanka nunam yuganun liitesqelluku piniqilqa Atamun. Nekevitek, aghulaqelta.”
43015001	“Whanga vine-epiguunga, Ataka piitesiighaghtenguuq.
43015002	Qamaglluki avayanka piitestingigalnguut ikughaqii. Qamaglluki avayat piitestikayuget kepughvikaqii piitestighataghiisqelluki.
43015003	Elpesi ukmangighwaaghlusi ayuqusi akuzitetgun akuzitkegkamkun elpesinun.
43015004	Whangamnitekestaghtek whanga elpesinitellemtun. Avayaraaghinaq piitestinaanghituq wetkuqun vine-meskumi. Tawatetusi ellnginaghpesi piitestinaanghitusi wetkuqun whangamnitekestaqufsi.
43015005	“Whanga vine-nguunga, elpesi avayaagusi. Kina alngunak piitesqughllagyaghqaaguq whangamnitekestaqumi, whanga ellngani. Iwernga whangangunasi sanaanghitusi.
43015006	Kina alngunak whangamninneghilkumi avayastun ayuquq eglluni paliqaq. Tawatelnguut avayat qerngughlluki paneghtaqiit.
43015007	Whangamnitekestaqufsi, akuzitenka elpesinitestekufsiki aapleghhaasi sameng alngunak piyukegkaghpesineng enkaam allgeghullequsi.
43015008	Ataka usuqellengellequq piitesqughllakufsi, liigikeslequsillu whangamnun maligsaaghtekutsi.
43015009	Piniqamsi katam Atam piniqillghatun whanga. Piniqellemnitekestaghtek.
43015010	Qaatkegkufsiki qelghusanka piniqellemnitekestaghllequsi tawateghpigaq Atama piniqellghanitellemtun qaatkutellemkun qelghusaanun.
43015011	“Ungipaatamsi tamaaken quyamalqa elpesinitesqelluku, quyamalleghsi iighwiisqelluku.
43015012	Unanguuq qelghusaqa elpesinun: piniqutullusi whanga piniqellemtun elpesi.
43015013	Yugem tuqumatkegkumiki ilakumtaani piniqellgha aangepigtuq. Kina alla piniqellghituq taameng aangataghalghiimeng.
43015014	Ilakumtaaqaghpesinga, qelghutkanka qaatkegkufsiki.
43015015	Whaken kenlekluku qepghaghtengulusi atighnaanghitamsi, qayughllak qepghaghtem nallukaa umiileni saaqutanga. Iwernga maaten atighamsi ilakumtaaghmeng, qayughllak liitestekegka elpesinun qamaglluku nagatkaqa Atamneng.
43015016	Elpesi nakmikumangitaghpesinga, whanga nakmikegkaqamsi, qepghaqalitamsillu. Enkaam aghulaqlusi piitesqughtek, piitesqulleghsi nagneghasqesuwaqa. Tawaten pikufsi Atam tuunelleqiisi sameng alngunak aaptekufsi Atemkun.
43015017	Una qelghusaqaqa, piniqutullusi.”
43015018	“Nunam yugan ugumikegkangisi, neqamikluku whanga sivuklunga ugumikegkaqaatnga.
43015019	Nunam piksaqumisi, yugan piniqnayaghiisi piniqututelleghmegestun. Iwernga whanga nakmikegkaqamsi whaken nunameng enkaam nunam pikenghitiisi. Tamaaken apalluqluku nunam yugan ugumikiisi.
43015020	Neqamikluku aapqaqa elpesinun: Qepghaghta aangataghanghituq umiilegmineng. Amyuutkumakumegtengnga elpesillu amyuutkelleqiisi. Qaatkumakumegteki apeghtuusanka, elpesillu apeghtuusasi qaatkelleqiit.
43015021	Tawaten pilleqiisi whanga apalluqlunga qayughllak nallukaat kayagtisteka.
43015022	Tagilunga aleghquumangisaqumki liinnayanghitut seghleghqestengutseng. Iwernga whaa anagniilqavigiitii seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
43015023	Kitum ugumikegkuminga, ugumikaallu Ataka.
43015024	Akulngitni allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaagunga kitum alngunak pingigalkanganeng. Esghapakaqeghngaaghmegteki allaaghlluwhaghtillghenka paninang ugpeqellghitaatnga, ugumikiinkung Atakullghiigni enkaam seghleghqestenguut nanqigtellengyaghqat.
43015025	Tawaten pilleghmegteggun apeghiiqaqaat Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pillghat, ‘Ugumikaatnga apallungunaan.’
43015026	“Kayutek kayaglleqagka elpesinun, Atameng pinguuk. Taghneghaaguk apeghtughiyaghqak Kiyaghneghem ipapillghaneng. Tagikumi ungipaqelleqaanga.
43015027	Elpesillu ungipaqelleqaghpesinga yugnun, qayughllak whangamnitkaalghiisi qepghaghyuwhaallghaneng ima.
43016001	“Ungipaatamsi tamaaken iilqayufqaafsi pisqellusi amyuutkegkangisi.
43016002	Yuget iqitesleqiisi synagogue-meggneng. Aa-a, pilleghqaq taginguuq, kitum alngunak tuquskumisi sumeghtaghaghyaghqaaguq qepghaatnguniluku Kiyaghneq.
43016003	Tawaten piyaghqaqiisi qayughllak liisimangilkanginkung Atakullghiigni.
43016004	Ungipaatamsi tamaaken maaten pilleghqaq kaaskan neqamikesqelluki aapqanka. Ungipaasimangitamsi tamaaken piinlighyuwhaalleghmi maligsaaghtengughtaqngafsi qayughllak elpesinilnguunga.
43016005	“Maaten uteghnighnaqnguunga Kayagtistemnun; iwernga nalighpesi aapneghitaghpesinga whaten, ‘Navek pinaqsin?’
43016006	Qivghughllaguusi qayughllak ungipaaskemsi tamaaken.
43016007	Iwernga ungipaannaqamsi ipapigmeng: pinighataghaghyaghqaagusi aghulaqegkuma, qayughllak kayagfikelleqamsi Kayutkaghqagneng. Aghulaqenghilkuma Kayutkaghqak taginaanghituk elpesinun.
43016008	Kayutek tagikumek liigilliighqelleqii nunam yugi seghleghqelleghmeng, elqughutngalleghmeng, nanqigtilleghmeng.
43016009	Liigikesleqii seghleghqestengutangi, qayughllak whanga ugpeqigalkangatnga.
43016010	Liigikesleqaa elqughutngalleq, qayughllak aglaghnaqelghiinga Atamun enkaam esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga.
43016011	Liigikesleqaa nanqigtelleq, qayughllak igleghutistenga nunam uum nanqigtellengwaaghluni ayuquq aghyuughyaghqaaluni.
43016012	“Paninang apeghyaghqaghllaguunga elpesinun iwernga salin liigikepagningitasi.
43016013	Iwernga Taghneghak apeghtughilghiik Kiyaghneghem ipapillghaneng, tagikumi maghyaghqughlleqiisi ipapilleperegwaaghmun. Akuzitkennaanghitii ellmi katam akuzitni, iwernga akuzillequq nagaquqaghhiinaghmineng. Enkaam ungipaalleqiisi sangwaa sayaghqaatanga taakwaningani.
43016014	Quulvaghlleqaanga qayughllak tuguklighluki whanga akuzitenka apeghlleqii elpesinun.
43016015	Qamagtengngwaaghluku Atam pinga whanga pikaqa. Tamaaken apalluqluku piinga, Taghnegham tuguklighluki tuunegkanka apeghlleqii elpesinun.
43016016	“Qantaghaqun esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga iwernga mulugpenasi esghanqiglleqaghpesinga.”
43016017	Ilangita maligsaaghtet ilateng aaptekiit, “Sameng piinkut Jesus-em whaten pilleghmikun, ‘Qantaghaqun esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga iwernga mulugpenasi esghanqiglleqaghpesinga’? Taanallu sangaawa whaten pillgha, ‘Qayughllak aglaghnaqunga Atamun’?”
43016018	Pikat, “Sameng pii tawaten pilleghmikun, ‘Qantaghaqun’? Nallukaghput sameng pisiitanga.”
43016019	Jesus-em liisimakegkangi aapsukangat enkaam pikii, “Elpesineng aapqughwaaghusiqestegguu sameng pitka whaten pillemkun, ‘Qantaghaqun esghaghnanighlleqaghpesinga iwernga mulugpenasi esghanqiglleqaghpesinga?’
43016020	Ipa ungipaatamsi, qiyayaghqaagusillu qivghuyaghqaagusillu iwernga nunam yugi quyayaghqaagut. Elpesi qivghuyaghqaagusi iwernga qivghullesi quyallghughsaghqaagut.
43016021	Aghnaq ighniyuneghmini ikfiqaquq, qayughllak ighnilleghqaa kaallghii. Iwernga ighniyami puygaa ikfiqelleni, qayughllak quyakegkanga taghnughhaq allgelghii nunamun.
43016022	Qivghunguusi maaten iwernga esghaghlleqamsi allameng enkaam quyallequsi. Kitum alngunak iqinnaanghitaa quyalleghsi.
43016023	“Tawani aghneghmi aapnaanghitaghpesinga sameng alngunak. Ipa ungipaatamsi, Atama tuunelleqiisi sameng alngunak aaptekufsi Atemkun.
43016024	Whavemun kenlanga aapsigatusi sameng alngunak Atemkun. Aaptek allgeghullequsi enkaam quyalleghsi iighwighllequq.
43016025	“Ungipaatkaqamsi tamaakuneng ungipaghaatetgun. Iwernga ungipaghaatneng atuqnanilleghqaqa kaallequq enkaam whateghlluwaaq apeghyagulleqaqa Ata elpesinun.
43016026	Taana pilleghqaq kaaskan elpesineng katam aapleghhaasi Atemkun. Enkaam ungipaatamsi whanga aaptunnanighlleqamsi Atamun,
43016027	qayughllak Atam ellmineng katam piniqiisi. Piniqiisi qayughllak piniqegkefsinga, ugpeqegkesillu Atameng tagikaatka.
43016028	Atameng tagikaagunga nunamun. Maaten unilluku nuna aglaghnaqunga Atamun.”
43016029	Maligsaaghtengita pikaat Jesus, “Taawa aleghqughaghpekut whateghlluwaaq atuqegpenaki ungipaghaatet!
43016030	Whaa liitamken sangwaa tamaghhaan liisimakeftan. Liisimakaqaten yugem aapsaghqii talwa aaptestegpenaki enkaangam kitum alngunak aapneghiteghngaaghmiten sameng alngunak ayuquten. Tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeqamken Kiyaghneghmeng tagikaaten.”
43016031	Jesus-em pikii, “Qenwatlu ugpeghetsii?
43016032	Mingitelleghqaghsi kaasaghtughtuq, talwa whaa kaalluni ayuquq. Qamagllusi negpesinun aglaghtuullequsi, unilleqaghpesinga ellnginaghhaghma. Iwernga paninang ellnginaghhaanaanghitunga qayughllak Ata whangamnilnguq.
43016033	Ungipaatamsi tamaaken nekeggmellelgusqellusi whangamkun. Nunami whani seghleliighllequsi iwernga ilutulusi qayughllak kayaallqegkaqaqa nuna.”
43017001	Jesus taaqsami akuzineghmeng sivuglluni qilagmun yughaqaq, “Ataay, aghneq kaatuq. Quulvaghhu Ighneghen, quulviisqelluten Ighneghpenun.
43017002	Ighneq Atanengllaqaqan tamaghhanun yugnun. Enkaam kenlengilnguq unguvalleq tuun'ngwaa tamaghhiitnun tuunegkaghpenun ellnganun.
43017003	Yuget kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengaqut liitelleghmegteggun elpek, taananginaghhaq Kiyaghneghpigaq, liitelleghmegteggunllu Jesus Christ-a elpek kayagtekan.
43017004	Quulvaamaamken nunami whani apeghiillemkun qepghaqaq qelghutkan whangamnun pisqelluku.
43017005	Enkaangam Ataay, manugpenisimalunga quulvaghnga quulvalleghmeng whanga piksaqemneng elpenillunga, sivungani nunam ulimallghan.
43017006	“Liitestekaqaqa natetulen yugnun tagivaqaghpenun nunameng whaken. Elpek piksaqeten tagivaqaghten whangamnun. Qaatkegkaqiit akuziteten.
43017007	Qenwatlu liitiit sangwaat qamaglluki tagivaqaghten elpeneng pingutangi,
43017008	qayughllak apeghtuusaqegkaghten whangamnun apeghtuusaqegkaqanka ellngitnun. Tugukliimiit enkaam liitaat ipapestaaq tagikaatka elpeneng. Ugpeqaatlu elpenun kayagtekaatka.
43017009	“Yughaatkengngwaanka ellngit. Yughaatkengngunghitanka yuget nunam pingi. Yughaatkengngwaanka tamaakut tagivaqaghten qayughllak elpek pikegketen.
43017010	Qamaglluki whanga pinka elpek pikaten; qamaglluki elpek piten whanga pikanka. Ellngitgun aangelleghllaka kelgulluni ayuquq.
43017011	Aglaghyaghtungestaghtunga elpenun, nunamennanighyaghtungestaghtunga, iwernga ellngit nunamellequt. Agleghnalghii Ata, aflengakiki aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun ateghpek, tagivaqaghten whangamnun, ataasiisqelluki ataasiillemtegetun.
43017012	Ellngitnillunga aflengakegkaqanka aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun ateghpek, tagivaqaghten whangamnun. Kelengakegkaqanka, enkaam talwa ataasiq iflallghituq, iwerngaqun ataasiq yuuk iflayaghqaq, Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghiighesqelluki.
43017013	Whaa maaten elpenun aglaghnaqunga. Iwernga tawaten yughaghtunga paninang nunamellunga, quyalqa ilungitnitesqelluku whanga pima.
43017014	Aapqaqanka Akuziteten ellngitnun, enkaam nunam yugan ugumikii qayughllak nunam pikenghilkangi whangamtun.
43017015	Yughaatkengngunghitanka elpenun iqitesqelluki nunameng. Iwernga yughaatkengngwaanka elpenun aflengakaghtesqelluki Tughneghaghmeng.
43017016	Nunam pikenghitii katam whanga pikenghitellghatun.
43017017	Aaftiki elpenun ipapilleghqun; akuziten ipapillghuuq.
43017018	Kayagtekaqanka nunamun, kayagtelleghpetun whanga.
43017019	Ellngit apalluqluki whangamneng aaftekaagunga elpenun, ellngitlu aaftesqelluki akuzitegpegun ipapilleghqun.
43017020	“Yughaatkengngwaanka taakut yuget, yughaatkengngwaanka tamaakutlu yuget ugpeqiyaghqat whangamneng ungipaqillghitgun maligsaaghtema.
43017021	Yughaghtunga qamaglluki ataasiisqelluki. Ataay, yeqay ilumtegnitestiki katam tawaten elpek ilumnitelleghpetun, whanga elpek ilugpenitellemtun. Ilumtegnitestiki nunam yuganun ugpeqesqelluku elpenun kayagsimatka.
43017022	Quulvaqaqanka katam tawaten quulvalleghpetun whanga, ellngit ataasiisqelluki katam tawaten whangkutung ataasiillemtegetun.
43017023	Whanga ilungitnitunga, elpek ilumnituten ellngit ataasiightengngwaaghesqelluki. Enkaam nunam yugan liilleqaat elpenun kayagsimatka. Liilleqaatlu piniqellghen tamaakunun ugpeqilghiinun whangamneng, whangamnun piniqelleghpetun ayuqelghii.
43017024	“Ataay, ukut yuget tagivaqaghten whangamnitesuwaqanka, ellngitnun esghiisqelluku nighughqelqa. Piniqutegpeneng taana nighughqelleq tagivaqaqan sivungani nunangllallghem.
43017025	Kaay elqughutngalghii Ata, nunam yugan nallukaaten; whanga liisimakamken. Taakutlu tagivaqaghpek liisimakaat elpenun kayagsimatka.
43017026	Liitestekaqanka natetulegpeneng. Liitesimanginaghnaqamken piniqellghen whangamnun ilungitnitesqelluku, whangallu ilungitninnalunga.”
43018001	Jesus yughaneghmeng taaqluni, maligsaaghtekullghiit aghviqat suqlunghegnekun aatqelghiik Kidron-meng. Taawanguq inglugkeni olives-et uqfigit; tawavek aglaqat.
43018002	Jesus-em uveghpagutistengan, Judas-em liisimakegkanga taana takukaat, qayughllak Jesus-enkut maligsaaghtekullghiit tawavek pituqat.
43018003	Enkaam Judas chief priest-enunllu, Pharisees-enunllu aqfatkaq kelengakistenengllu, ilangitnengllu Rome-em pilluwaghtengitneng. Taagken maghyaghquqii uqfigtuqamun. Taakut kelqegkat guututmeng, ilangi unaghsimeng kumangalghiimeng, ilangi kenelghutameng.
43018004	Jesus-em liisimakegkanga qamaglluku salleghqani, enkaam takuluki aaptekii, “Kina ivaghaqesteggu?”
43018005	Kiimsiqaat, “Jesus Nazareth-eghmii.” Jesus-em pikii, “Whanga Jesus-nguunga.” (Judas-lu uveghpagutista nekevghalghii pilluwaghteni.)
43018006	Jesus-em tawaten piyisteng, “Whanga Jesus-nguunga,” taakut yuget uteghmiiqaghluteng ulleghaatkat.
43018007	Jesus-em aaplaataqii, “Kina ivaghaqesteggu?” Kiimsiqaat, “Jesus Nazareth-eghmii.”
43018008	Jesus-em pikii, “Ungipaatamsi, whanga Jesus-nguunga. Whangangukan ivaqaghsi ukut yuget aghulaqesteki.”
43018009	Jesus tawaten pikaalghii apeghiighesqelluku whaten pilleni, “Ataay, tagivaqaghpeneng talwa ataasiq yuuk iflamangitaqa.”
43018010	Taagken Simon Peter-em savigpani nusugaghlluku ilefkaghaghtekaa Malchus-em aghenqigneq sigutnga. (Malchus, high priest-em qepghaghtelaaqegkanga.)
43018011	Jesus-em pikaa Peter, “Savigpagen kanaghtigu. Qayuusiq meghenghillakuun Atam tagivaqaa?”
43018012	Taagken pilluwaghtet, umiilgatlu, kelengakistetlu Jews-et takuluku Jesus, tuguluku asighqegkaat.
43018013	Enkaam sivukluku aglaatkaat Annas-mun, sakinganun Caiaphas-em. (Tawani ayumiqulleghmi Caiaphas high priest-ngulghii.)
43018014	Caiaphas-em pikaqegkangi Jews-et igleghutistet, pinighataghaghlleqniluku ataasiq yuuk tuqumatkiyaqan yugnun.
43018015	Simon Peter-emllu, ilanganllu maligsaaghtem kingunganeng maligtekaak Jesus. High priest-em liisimakegkanga aallgha maligsaaghta. Enkaam legan taam maligsaaghtem maligtekaa Jesus, high priest-em mangteghaan uvitanganun.
43018016	Peter nekevghamaluku amigem tungangani, aallghan maligsaaghtem, high priest-em liisimakegkaan, aanluni aleghqughluku aghnaghaq amigniighta iteghtestekaa Peter.
43018017	Aghnaghaam amigniightem aaptekaa Peter, “Elpekluu taam yugem maligsaaghtekaten?” Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Nakaa! Maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
43018018	Qepghaghtetlu kelengakistetlu charcoal-meng kumaghtikaalghiit ughugsighnaluteng qayughllak aqlaghalnguq. Peter-llu tawani ughugsiqaq.
43018019	Qama ilungani high priest-em aapqughwaaqaa Jesus, maligsaaghtenganengllu apeghtughillghanengllu.
43018020	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Yugtuqami akuziiqunga. Quunpeng apeghtughiiqunga qamaglluteng Jews-et qerngughutfigitni, synagogue-ni, Temple-millu. Sangwaa alngunak aksaqluku akuzitkigataqa.
43018021	Enkaam sangama aapqughwaaghsinga? Aaptiki yuget nagatkat apeghtughillemneng. Liisimakaat sameng pimatka.”
43018022	Jesus tawaten piyan kelengakistem tunganganilnguum qasaghlluku aaptekaa, “Sangan tawaten kiimsighsigu high priest-a?”
43018023	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Sameng seghletun akuzimakuma, aapghu seghletun akuzilqa. Iwernga elqughusimakuma sangama qasaghsinga?”
43018024	Taagken Annas-em, aglaatestekaa Jesus asighqengngaan Caiaphas-mun, high priest-mun.
43018025	Simon Peter nekevghaghmi ughugsiimaluku aaptekaat, “Elpekluu maligsaaghtekaten taam yugem?” Peter mesighaqaq, “Nakaa! Maligsaaghtekenghitaanga!”
43018026	Ataasiq qepghaghtenga high priest-em tawanlenguq, ilakwaagha yugem, Peter-em sigutngighaghtekaan. Qepghaghtem aaptekaa, “Esghaghsugnisiken ellnganilluten olives-meng uqfigtuqami?”
43018027	Allameng Peter mesighaghlaataqaq. Aga tawaninginaq rooster-a qalghiqaq.
43018028	Taagken unaangupiglluku Jews-et igleghutistengita aglaatkaat Jesus Caiaphas-em mangteghaaneng, Rome-em umiilegpagan palace-nganun. Taakut igleghutistet iitghumangilnguut palace-mun, qayughllak ukmangighsaghwaaqaalghiit Moses-em Liilightuusaan pisqellghatun neghnaluteng Passover-mi.
43018029	Enkaam Pilate-em aanvikluki aaptekii, “Sameng anaggusimafta una yuuk?”
43018030	Kiimsiqaat, “Una yuuk taginnayanghitaghput elpenun anaggusimangisaqan.”
43018031	Pilate-em pikii, “Aglaalluku elpesineng nanqigteggu Liilightuusaghpesi pisqellghatun.” Pikaat, “Rome-em liilightuusiitni whangkuta Jews-eni aghyuughisiqsaghqaqenghitaghput tuqutilleq.”
43018032	(Tawaten akuzillghita apeghiiqaat Jesus-em apellgha naten tuqulleghqamineng.)
43018033	Taagken Pilate itenqiglluni palace-mun, tagitesluku Jesus aaptekaa, “Elpaak umiilkaten Jews-et?”
43018034	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Elpeneng aapsinga tawaten? Nalighmeng kitum ungipaatkaqaaten whangamneng?”
43018035	Pilate-em kiimsiqaa, “Sumeghpeni Jew-nguzingaa? Elpek katam yugpek, chief priest-etlu tagitkaqaaten whangamnun. Sameng anaggusimazin?”
43018036	Jesus-em pikaa, “Ataneghpagulqa uum nunam pikenghitaa. Ataneghpagulqa nunameng pinguyaqan, qepghaghtema pilluwaannayaghaatnga Jews-enun tuunefqaama pisqellunga. Iwernga Ataneghpagulqa nunameng pingunghituq.”
43018037	Pilate-em pikaa, “Taawa umiilguftuten!” Jesus-em pikaa, “Elpek umiilguniighpenga. Tagikaagunga nunamun una apalluqluku: apeghnaluku ipapighqelleq yugnun; taana apalluqluku allgeqaagunga. Qamaglluni piniqingalghii ipapilleghmeng nagatkayuguuq whangamnun.”
43018038	Pilate-em aaptekaa, “Sangaawa ipapighqelleq?” Tawaten piluni Jews-et aanviklaataqii. Pikii, “Una yuuk naalkefikenghitaqa sameng anaggusimatanga aghyuughusighqameng.
43018039	Iwernga elpesi nangaghneqegkesi, Passover-mi whangamnun aanestesugaqegkesi ataasiq anusimingllaghaq. Itemutesugestegguu una umiilga Jews-et?”
43018040	Akilghuukat, “Nakaa, ellnga pifqaan, Barabbas aanestigu!” (Barabbas wayaghniightengulghii.)
43019001	Enkaam Pilate-em qelghutkaa iqitulluku Jesus kagsagmigesqelluku.
43019002	Pilluwaghtet qaghpangllaqaat sikughllugtuqameng avayameng. Aatesluku qaghpa Jesus-em naasqwakun, esnegrukegtagnengllu atkuyaaqaat.
43019003	Taagken Jesus takuluku legasiighwaatkegkaat, “Hail, Quulvaghamken, Umiilgat Jews-et!” qasaghtaataqaatlu.
43019004	Pilate-em aaneqiglluni pikii Jews-et, “Esghaghteggu, aanutesnaqaqa Jesus elpesinun, liigikesqellusi naalkefikenghitaqa anaggutelleghmeng.”
43019005	Taagken Jesus aanusaqmegteggu qaghpaluni sikughllugmeng, atkuyaaghlunillu esnegrukegtagneng ayuqeftuq. Pilate-em pikii Jews-et, “Taanata yuuk! Esghaqaghtegguqun!”
43019006	Chief priest-etlu, kelengakistetlu Jews-et esghaghluku Jesus akilghuutkat, “Qaquuraghtestigu! Qaquuraghtestigu!” Iwernga Pilate-em pikii, “Elpesineng aghulaqulluku qaquuragteggu, qayughllak whanga naalkefikenghitaqa sameng anaggutelleghmeng.”
43019007	Jews-et pikaat, “Liilightuusamnni tuqusaghqaaguq, qayughllak Ighneqniluni Kiyaghneghmun pikaaguq.”
43019008	Pilate-em nagalluki tawaten pilghiit wataqaaghaq alingegkaq.
43019009	Itenqiglluni palace-mun aaptekaa Jesus, “Naken pinguzin?” Iwernga Jesus-em kiimsiimangitkaa.
43019010	Pilate-em aaptekaa, “Aleghqughyunghisingaa? Liisimakenghisiguu itemutesqennayaqemken, nalighmeng qaquuriisqennayaqemken?”
43019011	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Qeleghnaanghitaten pilluwaghtet qaquuriisqellunga wetkuqun Kiyaghneghem piyukelqegkagu. Enkaam yuuk tagitisteka seghleghqelleghtaaghatuq elpeneng.”
43019012	Kingunganeng taam Pilate-em itemunnaqutkegkaqsaqanga Jesus, iwernga Jews-et akilghuukat, “Kina alngunak ellmineng umiilengllalghii, anguyaguuq Caesar-mun. Itemuskuvgu taana yuuk ilakumtaaqenghitaaten Caesar-em.”
43019013	Pilate-em nagalluki taakut akuzitet, aanutestekaa Jesus, Stone Pavement-mun. (Hebrew-stun taana ateq Gabbatha-ngulghii.) Taagken Pilate aqumegkaq nanqigtivigem aqumutaakun.
43019014	(Aghneghem qukaghnaqegkanga Yataaghqillghem Aghneghani Passover-mun.) Pilate-em pikii Jews-et, “Taawa Umiilegsi!”
43019015	Jews-et akilghuutkat, “Sanguluku, sanguluku, qaquuraghtestigu!” Pilate-em aaptekii, “Whangamnun qaquuraghtestesugestegguu umiilegsi?” Chief priest-et kiimsiqaat, “Caesar-nginaghhaaguq umiilegput.”
43019016	Enkaam Pilate-em pegtekaa Jesus ellngitnun qaquuriisqelluku.
43019017	Taagken pilluwaghtet aanutkaat Jesus uyamigtesluku qaquuraa. Aglaatkaat tawavek atilqelghiimun, “Yugem Naasqwan Nenga.” (Taana Hebrew-stun, Golgotha-ngulghii.)
43019018	Tawani qaquuraqaat, maalghuklu yugek maligullukek qaquuraqagket. Aallgha aghenqigneghanilluku, ilanga saghumigneghanilluku, Jesus qukaanilluku.
43019019	Pilate-em igaqestekaqegkanga, Jesus Nazareth-eghmii, Umiilgat Jews-et. Taagken nekegtestekaa qaquuraakun Jesus-em.
43019020	Taana igaqegkaalghii Hebrew-t, Latin-et, Greek-et ulungistun. Uglalghiit Jews-et atightuqaat, qayughllak qaquuraghviga Jesus-em qantaghanlenguq Jerusalem-emeng.
43019021	Jews-et chief priest-ngita takuluku Pilate pikaat, “Tawaten igaqsaghqaanghisaghtuq, ‘Umiilgat Jews-et.’ Whaten igaqsaghqaayaghtuq, ‘Una yuuk pikaaguq, Whanga Umiilkaatnga Jews-et.’”
43019022	Pilate-em pikii, “Igaqestekaqa tawatennaqnguuq.”
43019023	Pilluwaghtet tuquuqaasamegteggu Jesus qaquuramun tuguluki aatkii, estamaghqegkiit, ataasikaghtaan tugulaatkat. Ataasik atkuyaaghqek kelungunatek ulimaaghek tuuymegneng kenimegnun.
43019024	Pilluwaghtet pikat, “Taakuk iighwiigkenka ateghtiiraaghusiqeltekek.” Tawaten pilleghmegteggun Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghiightestekiit whaten pillghit: “Aatkanka nengiitkaqiit, enkaam taakuk atkuyaaghegka ateghtiiraaghusiqegkaqagket.”
43019025	Pilluwaghtet tawaten pimaluki, taawanguq estamat aghnat nekevghallghiit qaquram tungangani: Jesus-em naanga, naanganllu anglegutanga, Mary-llu Clopas-em nulighha, Mary-llu Magdala-ghmii.
43019026	Jesus-em esghaqakek naanillu, piniqegkanillu maligsaaghteni nekevghalghiik tawani. Naani pikaa, “Aghnami whani, taana ighneliitan.”
43019027	Taagken maligsaaghteni pikaa, “Taana naaliitan.” Taagken kenlanga maligsaaghtengan aglaatkaa ellmeggnun.
43019028	Taam kingunganeng Jesus-em liisimakegkaa sangwaa tamaghhaghmi whaa apeghiilghii. Enkaam Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghiighesqelluki whaten pikaq, “Meqsugtunga.”
43019029	Taawanguq sagneghwaaq quwaalghiimeng wine-meng imalek. Pilluwaghtet nekeglluku nepsagusiq hyssop-em unaghsiighwaaghakun, nepluku wine-mun Jesus-em qaanghanun nengugutkaat.
43019030	Jesus-em naasiighluku wine-a, pikaq, “Taawa apeghiightuq.” Guughtutkelluku taghneghagni pegtekakek.
43019031	Yataaghqivigutanganeng Aghneq, Jews-et igleghutistengita taakut yugusit qaquurametesunghilkangit, qayughllak unaamingani Sabbath-ngumaghmi, Passover-emllu aghneqegkanga. Enkaam Pilate-mun qelghutesqegkiit pilluwaghtenun ayemqiisqelluki ighungit tuquragkiighesqelluki, iqinnaluki qaquuriitneng.
43019032	Taagken pilluwaghtet takuluku sivuliq yuuk, ayemquqagket ighukek, aallghanllu ighukek ayemquqagket. Taakuk qaquuraqaqegkegket maligullukek Jesus-mun.
43019033	Jesus-em ighukek ayemsimangilkegket qayughllak takuyaqmegteggu tuqungwaaghluni ayuqeftuq.
43019034	Iwernga ataasim pilluwaghtem panamineng kenuqaqaa Jesus saningakun. Tawaninginaq aakwlu meqlu maaqegkak.
43019035	(Esghapakam tamaaken aapghii tamaakut. Akuzitkegkii ipanguut, liisimakuqlu ungipaqngwaa ipapilleq. Aapghii tamaakut elpesillu ugpeghesqellusi.)
43019036	Tamaakut apeghiiqaagut Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghiighesqelluki: “Talwa ataasiq neghqwaagha ayemyaghqaanghituq.”
43019037	Whatenllu Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Esghapaglleqaat panakaghteng.”
43019038	Taam kingunganeng yugem Arimathea-ghmiim, aatqelghiim Joseph-meng, Jesus-em yugusii aghulaqutkaa Pilate-em angeghyagu. (Joseph maligsaaghtekegkanga Jesus-em, iwernga aksaqluku pikaalghii alingluni Jews-et igleghutistengitneng.)
43019039	Nicodemus-em maligtekaa Joseph, kelqelluni tepengllaasimeng 100 pounds, myrrh-enkugneng, aloes-enkugneng akumutngalghiigneng. (Taana Nicodemus sivunghani Jesus-mun pikaalghii unugmi.)
43019040	Taakuk yugek aghulaqulluku Jesus-em yugusii tepengllaghqumaan iimgutkaak qiipaghaghqun. (Tawaten Jews-et lliivghaqegkangit yuget tuqukat.)
43019041	Jesus-em qaquuraghvigan tungangani taawanguq garden-a uqfigtuqaq. Tawanteftuq nutaghaghlluk lliveq, salin lliveghvikellghilnguq.
43019042	Taayughqengngulghiik qayughllak Jews-et Yataaghqefikegkangat Aghneq taana, enkaam taaggun qantaghanlengughqun lliifqaak.
43020001	Sivulighmi aghneghani santillghem, Mary Magdala-ghmii lliveghtekaq salin mamlegluku. Esghaqaa uyghagrugllak iqilluni lliivghem paaynganeng.
43020002	Enkaam ketanqusnaq aglaqaq Simon Peter-munllu ilanganunllu maligsaaghtemun, Jesus-em piniqegkaanun. Mary-m pikakek, “Nuugsimaat Ataneq lliivghaneng. Nallukaghput navek llimatanga.”
43020003	Enkaam Peter-enkuk aallghallu maligsaaghta lliveghtekak
43020004	ketanqusnaq. Aallgha Peter-meng sukalnguq, enkaam sivukluni kaatkaq.
43020005	Guughlluni qineghsalghiimi esghaqii qiipaghaat, iwernga iitghumangilnguq.
43020006	Kingungiighhaaneng Simon Peter kaalluni iitqaq lliveghmun, esghaqii qiipaghaat tawani.
43020007	Esghaqaallu allakaghmi qiipaghaq Jesus-em naasqwakun iimgutngayalghii.
43020008	Taagken aallgha maligsaaghta kaasuwhaaqaq lliveghmun iitqaq. Esghaghyamigu ugpeqegkaa Jesus.
43020009	Salin esghallghilluki liigikumangitkangak Akuzitnilnguq Igaqegkaq unguvapestaaghyaghqaaniluku tuqulleghmeng.
43020010	Taagken maligsaaghtek aglaqak nemegnun.
43020011	Iwernga lliveghmi Mary qiyiqegkaq. Qiyanqusiin guughlluni ilutmun qineghsalghiimi,
43020012	esghaqakek maalghuk yaqulgek atkuyaalgek qatelghiimeng. Aqumgaftuk Jesus-em yugusiin lliviksaqangakun, aallgha naasqwan nengakun, ilanga itegaan nengakun.
43020013	Aaptekaak, “Aghnaq, sangavek qiyaaqsin?” Kiimsiqakek, “Nuugsimaat Atanqa. Nallukaqa navek llimatangat.”
43020014	Mary tawaten piluni qiivutkelluku esghaqaa Jesus nekevghalghii, iwernga nallukegkaa Jesus-ngutanga.
43020015	Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Aghnaq, sangavek qiyaaqsin? Kina ivaghaqsigu?” Mary-m piitesiighaghtenguniluku pikaqsaqanga, enkaam pikaa, “Yuguniiq, nusugumakuvgu ungipaatinga navek llimaten, enkaam aqfalleqaqa.”
43020016	Jesus-em pikaa, “Mary”. Mary-m qiivluku pikaa Hebrew-stun, “Rabboni”. (Whaten pisiq, “Apeghtughista”.)
43020017	Jesus-em pikaa, “Saaftegpenanga, salin mayiigatunga Atamun. Iwernga aglaghluten anglegutemnun ungipaannaketen, ‘Mayughnaqunga Atamnun, elpesillu Atagpesinun, Kiyaghnemnun, elpesillu Kiyaghneghpesinun.’”
43020018	Mary Magdala-ghmii aglaghluni maligsaaghtenun pikii, “Esghaamaaqa Ataneq.” Enkaam ungipaatkiillu Jesus-em ungipaatesqellghaneng.
43020019	Sivuliilghii aghnegha santillghem. Ighivgaani tawani maligsaaghtet qerngughutkat. Alingluteng Jews-et igleghutistengitneng, amiget maghqatngastekiit. Jesus tagiluni akulangitgun nekevluni pikii, “Nekeggmelleq elpesinilli.”
43020020	Tawaten piluni, kelgutkii iiggenillu saninillu, enkaam maligsaaghtet quyaghllakat esghaghluku Ataneq.
43020021	Taagken Jesus-em pilaataqii, “Nekeggmelleq elpesinilli. Katam tawaten Atam kayagtellghatun whanga, tawateghpigaq kayagtamsi.”
43020022	Tawaten piluni, aneghziigluki pikii, “Tuguklightekek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak.
43020023	Seghevuskufsiki kinkut alngunak seghleghqellghitneng, Kiyaghneghem seghevulleqii. Seghevunneghilkufsiki, Kiyaghneghem seghevunnaanghitii.”
43020024	Thomas, (aatghan aallgha Malghi) maligsaaghtenisimangilnguq Jesus-em takwaaqngaki. Thomas qula maalghuk siipneqegkangat maligsaaghtet.
43020025	Ilangita maligsaaghtet ungipaatkaat Thomas, “Esghaamaaghput Ataneq!” Iwernga Thomas-em pikii, “Ugpeqnaanghitaqa wetkuqun esghaqumki tuquuqallghi iigganilnguut. Ugpeqnaanghitaqallu wetkuqun saaftekumki tuquuqallghetlu, saninganilnguqlu panalleq.”
43020026	Santilleq ataasiq atughluku maligsaaghtet tawanllaataqat mangteghami, Thomas-llu tawanlenguq. Amiget maghqatngaghngaata Jesus-em iteghvikluki nekevegkaq akulangitgun. Pikii, “Nekeggmelleq elpesinilli.”
43020027	Taagken Thomas pikaa, “Esghaghluki iiggenka saaftiki, saaftigullu sanika. Aygughitiqefqaavegngam, ugpeghi.”
43020028	Thomas-em pikaa, “Atanemni, Kiyaghnemni!”
43020029	Taagken Jesus-em pikaa, “Ugpeqiiten qayughllak esghaqevnga. Quyanaghhalek tamaakut ugpelghiit esghaghpenanga.”
43020030	Jesus uglaghngaan allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaaguq esghaamanghitni maligsaaghtemi, igaqumangilnguugut ukuni igani.
43020031	Iwernga ukut igaqngalghiit igaqegkaagut elpesinun ugpeqesqelluku Jesus, Christ-angutanga, Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem. Ugpeqelleghpesigun unguvallengellequsi Aatghakun.
43021001	Taakwaningani Jesus esghaghteslaataqaq maligsaaghteminun Naayvami Tiberias-mi. Whaten esghaghtestekaaguq.
43021002	Ilanginguq maligsaaghtem qerngaghmetkat naayvami. Simon Peter-enkunguftut, Thomas-enkut (aatghan aallgha Malghi), Nathanael-enkut, Cana-meng pi Galilee-melngughmeng, Zebedee-mllu ighneghqek, alla maalghuk maligsaaghtek.
43021003	Simon Peter-em pikii, “Iqalliniighyaghnaqunga.” Pikaat, “Maliggnaqamken”. Enkaam angyakun kelluteng unulqusiq iqalluggnaqutkegkaayalghiit, iwernga pikengumangitkat.
43021004	Aghtaghaghaqaallu maligsaaghtet esghaqaat Jesus nekevghalghii esnemi, iwernga kinangutanga nallukegkangat.
43021005	Jesus-em pikii, “Ilakumtaamni, iqalluggneghitsii?” Kiimsiqaat, “Nakaa”.
43021006	Pikii, “Ateghteggu negaghpagsi angyaghpesi aghenqigneghakun, enkaam pikengellequsi.” Pisqellghatun pikat. Naapqaghighllakat repall negaghpak qaakneghmeng aghtuqaat angyamun.
43021007	Maligsaaghtem Jesus-em piniqegkaan pikaa Peter, “Atanghuuq!” Simon Peter-em nagaqughyamigu pilugugluni qetgeqaq meghmun. (Peter amsikaghtekaayalghii qepghaghnaluni.)
43021008	Maligsaaghtet angyamelnguut esnamun qamuqaat naapqaghiighngalghii negaghpak. Awavantepanghilnguut quutmeng, entaqun 100 yards uyatutkalghiit.
43021009	Maligsaaghtet uuglleghaasalghiimeng quutmun esghaqagket aniighwtekak kenghek, iqallugmeng ugkelgek. Taawallu neqekrangllalguftuq.
43021010	Jesus-em pikii, “Tagitek iqallugtaghpesineng.”
43021011	Enkaam Simon Peter angyamun uuglluni sayukaa negaghpak quutmun. Taawanguq 153-nguftut iqallugpaghqughllaget naaptekat, naqamllu negaghpak piigumangilnguq.
43021012	Jesus-em pikii, “Neghyaghtughtek.” Nalighhiiniita maligsaaghtet aapneghmeng tetukaat kinangutanga, liisimakluku Atanghutanga.
43021013	Jesus-em tuguluku neqekrangllaq tunquqaa ellngitnun, iqallugetlu tawaten pikii.
43021014	Taana pingayiitkegkanga Jesus-em esghaghtestellgha maligsaaghteminun, unguvaghtestelleghmi kingunganeng.
43021015	Taaqsameng neneghmeng Jesus-em aaptekaa Simon Peter, “Simon, ighnegha John-em, piniqataghaghsingaa ukuneng?” Kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a Ataneq, liisimakaghpenga piniqegkemken.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Neghqiki penniighaghaanka.”
43021016	Alla Jesus-em aaptekaa, “Simon, ighnegha John-em, piniqsingaa?” Kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a Ataneq, liisimakaghpenga piniqegkemken.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Aflengakiki penniighenka.”
43021017	Pingayiitkun aaptekaa, “Simon, ighnegha John-em, piniqsingaa?” Peter seghleghyukaq, qayughllak Jesus-em pingayuneng aaptekanga, “Piniqsingaa?” Peter-em kiimsiqaa, “Ataneq, liisimakan sangwaa qamaglluku. Liisimakaghpenga piniqegkemken.” Jesus-em pikaa, “Neghqiki penniighenka.
43021018	Ipa ungipaatamken, nukalpigaaluten elpeneng tafsiluten navek piyukelleghpenun piiquten. Iwernga nanevgaquvek, iiggeten kevegluki, kitum tafsiluten aglaalleqaaten takuyukegkaqenghilkegpenun.”
43021019	Tawaten pilleghmikun Jesus-em ungipaatnguftaa Peter naten tuquyaghqaatanga, enkaam tuqulleghmikun quulvaghyaghqaa Kiyaghneq. Taagken Jesus-em pikaa Peter, “Maligtinga.”
43021020	Peter-em qiivluni esghaqaa maligsaaghta Jesus-em piniqegkaa maligullghii. (Taananguuq maligsaaghta ayaqightekaq Jesus-kun neghuutnguluteng aaptikaq, “Ataneq, kitum uveghpagunnaqaten?”)
43021021	Peter-em esghaghluku taana maligsaaghta, aaptekaa Jesus, “Ataneq, ellngangam salleqa?”
43021022	Jesus-em kiimsiqaa, “Kiyaghtesukumkun kenlanga tagillemnun, agghitkesaghqaqenghitan elpek. Maligtengnginaghnga.”
43021023	Enkaam ugpeqani ungipaq mingitkaq, taana maligsaaghta tuqunaanghinniluku. Iwernga Jesus-em pimangitaa tuqunaanghinniluku. Whaten pikaaguq, “Kiyaghtesukumkun kenlanga tagillemnun, agghitkesaghqaqenghitan elpek.”
43021024	Ellnganguuq maligsaaghta aapghiiqelghii tamaaken pilleghneng, igaquqaqiillu tamaakut. Liisimakaput aapqii ipanguut.
43021025	Uglaapigtut igaqullghilnguut Jesus-em pikii. Igaquqaayaqumeng qamaglluteng sumemni entaqun iingunaghmi nuna llivigiinnayaghaa igalghuteghllagnun.
44001001	Theophilus, igangllaqaqsuwhaamkun igaqegkaqaqa qamagtengngwaaghluku Jesus-em qepghallghallu apeghtughillghallu, piinlighyuwhaallghaneng kenlanga Kiyaghneghem qilagmun mayughtesleghanun. Sivukluni nakmiiqaaguq apostle-kaghqameng enkaam apeghtughllakaqii uglapiglleghhiimeng aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham. Taakwaningani anguyagita qaquuraghluku tuqutkaqaat iwernga pingayut aghneghet atughluki unguvaqaaguq. Unguvalleghmi kingunganeng 40 aghneq nunametkaaguq, enkaam uglaapiglluku apostle-enun esghaghtestaataqaaguq ipapestaaq unguvaamaniluni, aleghqughnalukillu Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem. Allameng qerngughusata Jesus-em liilightuqii apostle-et, “Wataghllak aghulaqegpenasi Jerusalem-emeng kenlanga allgeghtelleghpesinun Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak. Atama akequsaqegkaqaak tuunelleqnilukek elpesinun katam tawaten apellemtun. John paaptaayeghikaaguq meghqun, iwernga Atama paaptaayeyaghtungestaghiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.” Taakusta igaqegkanka igangllaqaqsuwhaamkun.
44001006	Sivungiighhaani Jesus-em mayulleghqaan qilagmun, apostle-et qerngughusameng aaptekaat Jesus, “Ataneq, Israel-em atanghutillgha pisneqiggnaqsiguu?”
44001007	Jesus-em pikii, “Atanginaghhaghma liisimakii qayughllak ellngan aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun uspeqegkaqii. Elpesi liisimaksaghqaqenghitasi sangwaat qakun pilleghqii.
44001008	Iwernga aghtughyaghqaanghillengellequsi Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak iitqayek ilugpesinun. Taagken ungipaqelleqaghpesinga Jerusalem-emi, Judea-mi, Samaria-mi, uyavaghpanillu nunani.”
44001009	Akuzineghmeng taaqngan Kiyaghneghem mayughtestekaa qilagmun. Esghapagusimaluku qilawaaghem talughtekaa esghaamallghitneng.
44001010	Apostle-et quulmun esghapagtuusimaluki, maalghuk yugek qatelghiimeng aatkaqelghiik aliighaghtekak saaghwitgun.
44001011	Pikiik, “Yugitni Galilee-m, sangafsi quulmun esghapagtuutaqetsi? Taagna Jesus Kiyaghneghem mayughtestekanga ukigyaghqaaguq esghapalleghpesistungwaaq mayullghatun qilagmun.”
44001012	Taagken apostle-et uteghniqat Jerusalem-emun Mount Olives-meng. Mount Olives qantaghaghhanlenguq Jerusalem-emeng.
44001013	Peter-enkut, John-enkut, James-enkut, Andrew-nkut, Philip-enkut, Thomas-enkut, Bartholomew-nkut, Matthew-nkut, James, ighnegha Alphaeus-em, Judas, ighnegha James-em, Simon Zealot-a, kaalluteng Jerusalem-emun mayuqat qemtamun nayumeggnun.
44001014	Taakut apostle-et, aghnatlu ugpeqat, Mary-llu Jesus-em naanga, Jesus-em anglegutangillu qerngughulluteng elngaatall ipapighqelluteng yughaghaqelghiit ataasistun.
44001015	Taagken qafsinat aghneghet atughluki ugpeqat qerngughutkat, entaqun 120-nguut. Tawani Peter-em nekevluni pikii,
44001016	“Ugpeqaalgutemni, neqamikaghsi qepghalgutfut Judas, Jesus-em nakmikegkaa. Ayumirugllak Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham uuknaliqutkegkaqaa David-kun. Taana uuknaliqelleq apeghiiqaaguq Judas-em uveghpagutaqngagu Jesus. Jesus-em tugiistengi Judas-em maghyaghquqaqii, enkaam akileghtuusangegkaaguq manimeng. Taagken akileghtuusamineng nunangluni qemitkaaguq ellmineng tawani. Yugusii ifkaghyalghiimi quupaghtekaq repall ighneghii aanqaghlluteng. Jerusalem-eghmiit nagaqughyamegteggu tuqumatanga tawani nunami, atiqaat taana nuna Akeldama-meng, whaten pisiq, ‘Nuna aaghwqegkaq.’”
44001020	Peter-em nagneghutkii, “David whaten igaqaaguq Psalms-mi: ‘Mangteghaa paaghqiilli, allamengllu kina alngunak tawantefqaami pili.’ Igaqegkaalghiillu whaten, ‘Qepghaqaa kitumun tugusaqumi.’
44001021	“Enkaam nakmiighelta apostle-kaghqameng tugusqelluku Judas-em qepghaqaqsaqanga. Kina nakmikelteggu maligsaaghikaq whangkunneng igleghalgusighaqngamteggu Jesus. Tawantekaalghii ima John-em ungipaqellghaneng paaptaayelleq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem mayughtestellghanun Jesus qilagmun. Enkaam whangkunnun maligulluni ungipaghli ellminunllu esghaamaniluku Jesus unguvallghan kingunganeng.”
44001023	Enkaam ugpeqat nakmikegkagket maalghuk yugek: Matthias-enkuk, Joseph Justus-enkuk, allameng atelek Barsabbas-meng.
44001024	Taagken yughaqat, “Ataneq, simighistekaghqangyugaqukut Judas-mun, qayughllak uniskanga qepghaqani nekaghqaminun aglalghii. Qamaglluku umyugaq liisimakan. Enkaam naliq nakmiksigu apostle-nguluku qepghaghtekaghqaq elpenun?”
44001026	Taagken maalghuk uyghagek samun kanaghllukek aghulasaqmegteggu aallgha aanqaghsalghiimi Matthias-nguftuq nakmikegkaq. Enkaam ilatkaq qula ataasiq siipneqluku apostle-enun.
44002001	Pentecost-em aghneghanun Jerusalem-eghmiit ugpeqat qerngughutkat ataasimi mangteghami.
44002002	Taagken nuuskagllagan anuqeghllagestun sulugllagem qilagmeng pamaken ukigluni imiqaa mangteghaq.
44002003	Taagken llangaqa ulusugnilnguut kenghhaat allgeqat, esghapakiit ilameggnun nekeghqaallghiit.
44002004	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem imiqii Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng qamaglluki tawanlenguut. Taghnegham aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun akuzistekii nakumiistun.
44002005	Tamaanguq Jerusalem-emi, Jews-et Kiyaghneghmun qaatkutngalghiit. Naken nunaneng tagiiqluteng Jerusalem-eghmiingughquutkat.
44002006	Nagaquusameng sulugllagmeng uplegutkiit ugpeqat qerngughfigitnun. Kaasalghiimeng nakumiistun ugpeqat akuziteghllaguftut repall kukriqutkegkiit.
44002007	Saghiighayagusimiita pikat, “Ukut akuzillghiit Galilee-ghmiinguut.
44002008	Naten ukut qamaglluta akuzillemtestun akuziit nallukngwaaqameggneng?
44002009	Whaa whaantutut Parthia-ghmiit, Media-ghmiit, Elam-eghmiit, Mesopotamia-ghmiit, Judea-ghmiit, Cappadocia-ghmiit, Pontus-eghmiit, Asia-ghmiit,
44002010	Phrygia-ghmiit, Pamphyllia-ghmiit, Egypt-eghmiit, Libya-ghmiit Cyrene-em tunganganeng pit, Crete-eghmiit, Arabia-ghmiit, whaa whaantutlu Rome-emeng laalightat Jews-et, Gentile-etlu maniguutkayuget Jews-estun. Nagataput akuzillemtestun ungipaghtut Kiyaghneghem apeghiilleghllaganeng.”
44002012	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng saghiighayagutkiitlu kukriqutkegkiitlu ugpeqat, enkaam ellmeggneng aapqughwaaghutkat, “Saaqat ukut?”
44002013	Iwernga ilangita nenglaghyugsaatkumiita pikiit, “Ukut yuget megheghllaguut!”
44002014	Peter-llu tawanlenguq apostle-elgutmini. Nekevluni iglagtuluni yuget pikii, “Jew-lgutemni, nagatngwaaqaghtengnga.
44002015	Megheghllagunighngaaghpesikut megheghllagunghitukut nutaanqun 9-eklaakanga unaanguluku.
44002016	Una whaten aneghtelleq Joel-em uuknaliqutkegkaqaa whaten:
44002017	‘Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, Kingulighni aghneghni Taghneghagka kayagsaghqaqagka tamaghhaanun yugnun. Enkaam ighnesi, panisi uuknaliqsaghqaagut, nukalpigasi esghaghwaaghyaghqaagut, nanevgasi qavangughyaghqaagut.
44002018	Talwa qepghaghtemnun yugnunllu aghnanunllu Taghneghagka kayagsaghqaqagka uuknaliqesqelluki.
44002019	Yugnun esghaghtesaghqaqanka sangwaat saghiighanalghiit qilagmillu nunamillu: aakwh, keneq, agepsughllak,
44002020	siqiineq mamlegsaghqaq, tanqiq kavighsaghqaq aawestun. Tamaakut kingungitneng megnunapiglleghhii Atanghem nanqigtivigkaa aghneq piyaghqaaguq.
44002021	Iwernga aghneq taana kaatestegpenaan, kina alngunak seghevutesqelghii Ataneghmun yugulillengyaghqaaguq.’ Tawaten Joel uuknaliqegkaaguq.
44002022	“Israel-eghmiini, nagataghtengnga, liisimakegkaghsi Nazareth-eghmii Jesus, uglapiglluku allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaalghii. Kiyaghneghem tawaten pistekaqaa aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun elpesinun liitesqelluku ellminun nakmikegkaqutni.
44002023	Kiyaghneghem liisimalleghmikun tuunegkaqaa Jesus elpesinun piyukelleghpesistun pisqelluku. Taagken elpesi qaquuraghtestaghsi tamaakunun waakigalngughnun Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaanun.
44002024	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem tuqulleghmeng unguvaghtestekaqaa, itemutkaqaa tuqullghem asighqutellghaneng, talwa tuqullghem nuqneghpagningitkaqaa.
44002025	David-em akuzitkegkaqaa Jesus whaten: ‘Esghaghaqaqa Ataneq sivumnilluku quunpeng: unisigataanga, enkaangam seghleghmun qapragtesnaanghitunga.
44002026	Tamaaken apalluqluku qaamnaka quyaghllaguuq, akuzillghenka quyalleperewaaghmeng ayuqut. Tuquyaghqaaghngaaghma sighimaknaqamken Ataneq,
44002027	qayughllak uninnaanghitagken unguvasigka tuqumalghiini, talwa Seghleghqumangilnguum yugusii aghusnaanghitan.
44002028	Apeghtuqaqaghpenga kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengelleghqameng, whangamnisimanginalleghpek quyasteghllawaanga.’”
44002029	Peter-em nagneghutkii, “Jew-lgutemni, whateghlluwaaq apeghyugaqa sivuneghput David. Liisimakaghput tuqukaaguq, lliivghallu naantulanga liisimakaghput.
44002030	Unguvanguluku Kiyaghneghem akeqegkaqaa, ‘Ipapestaaq kingunghen ataasiq igleghutiyaghqaaguq yugpeneng.’ David-em uuknaliqistengutmineng liisimakegkaqaa Kiyaghneghem akequsaa. Uuknaliqutkegkaqaa Christ-a tuqumalghiininnaanghinniluku talwa yugusii aghunaanghinniluku, unguvaqaaniluku tuqulleghmeng.
44002032	Taananguuq Jesus Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaa tuqulleghmeng enkaam whangkuta liisimakistenguukut.
44002033	Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaqaa Jesus aghenqigneghmikun, tawaten quulvaqaqaa. Akeqelleghmitun Jesus, tuunegkaqaak Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak ellnganun, enkaam Jesus-em whangkunnun tuunaak. Tamaakut saghiighanalghiit esghaqesi, nagaskesi Taghnegham aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun pillghuut.
44002034	“David pikaaguq whaten: ‘Atanghem pii Atanqa, Aqumi aghenqignemkun kenlanga kayaalqestellemnun anguyagten.’ David mayuumangitutmineng qilagmun Jesus-etun, ellmineng akuzitkengngunghituq, akuzitkengngwaa Jesus.
44002036	“Ungipaataghllamsi qamagllusi Israel-eghmiini, Kiyaghneghem ipapestaaq nakmikegkaqaa Jesus Atanghulukullu Christ-angulukullu. Taananguuq Jesus qaquuraqaghsi!”
44002037	Yuget nagalluku Peter, seghleghyugllakat enkaam Peter-llu apostle-elgutangillu aaptekiit, “Ugpeqaalgutemnni, sanaqesta?”
44002038	Peter-em kiimsiqii, “Avuteghqellusi, seghleghqennanighlusi qiivitek Kiyaghneghmun, paaptaayeteklu Aatghakun Jesus Christ-am, seghleghqellesi seghevutellengesqelluki, enkaam Kiyaghneghem tunusakek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak allgeghtekek.
44002039	Ataneq Kiyaghneghput tawaten piyaghqaaguq, qayughllak akequsaqegkaqaak Taghneghagni elpesinun, kinguneghpesinun, kitumunllu alngunak uyavaghpansaghngaan tuqluqaminun.”
44002040	Peter-em tawatenginaq pigpenaki wata sameng allaaghhiinaghmeng pikii. Kelengasaaqiillu, “Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqaqii seghletun pistet, enkaam ellngistun seghletun pigpenasi luuraq elpesillu aghyuughyaaghiisi.”
44002041	Taagken ugpeqilghiit ungipaaneng paaptaayekat. Enkaam tawani aghneghmi 3,000 yuuk ilatkaq ugpeqanun.
44002042	Ugpeqat iiwleng qerngughutngulghiit liinnaluteng apostle-eneng. Christ-akun anglegutkullghiistun kiyaghtaaghet, neghaqelghiit, yughaghaqelghiit qerngaghmeng.
44002043	Apostle-et uglaghngaan allaaghlluwhaghtikaalghiit Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun. Enkaam qamaglluni saghiighayukaalghii, tallughyagutkaqegkangatlu Kiyaghneq.
44002044	Ugpeqat qamaglluteng nagneqaalghiit ataasistun, saghyateng atunem atuqluki.
44002045	Akikluki nunatengllu saghyatengllu, allgeghtateng manit tuunaqegkangit sameng aklulghiinun.
44002046	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan qerngughutaqelghiit Temple-mi. Neghelgutengllaghaqluki ilateng, quyakusiqinaghluki neqeteng upughatusiqaqegkangit.
44002047	Kitumun alngunak piniqnighllaget, usuqumanginaghaqegkangatlu Kiyaghneq. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan Atanghem yugulingukangi yuget, enkaam ugpeqat nulamanginaqat.
44003001	Taagken Peter-enkuk John-enkuk aglaqak Temple-mun 3-klaagem yughaatellghani.
44003002	Taawanguq yuuk piyugigalnguq ima allgenghhaghhaatmineng, aqumluni tungangakun Temple-em iteghvigani atilqelghii, Pinighnalghii Amigllak. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan kinkut kevegtughaqegkangat tawavek naghughtaneng tungsighniighesqelluku manimeng.
44003003	Esghaghyamikek Peter-enkuk John-enkuk itelghiik Temple-mun tungsighvikegkakek manimeng.
44003004	Qerngaagmek esghaghluku yuuk tawavek, Peter-em pikaa, “Ukavek qiivi whangkutegnun.”
44003005	Sighimapiglluni tuunaqniluni qiivegkakek.
44003006	Peter-em pikaa, “Maniqraggiitngwaaghtunga iwernga sameng tuunaqamken. Aatghakun Jesus Christ-am Nazareth-eghmiim, piyugi!”
44003007	Tuguluki aghenqigneghi iiggi nekevesimaluku yugem itegiillu tukughiillu iknaqughtekat,
44003008	repall qetgeqaamaghmi nekevegkaq aga piyuginaamaghmi pikaq. Taagken maligllukek iitqaq Temple-mun piyugumaghmi, qetgeqaghaqluni, usuqumaan Kiyaghneq.
44003009	Temple-metullghiim esghaqaat piyulghii, usuqilghii Kiyaghneghmeng.
44003010	Liisuqegkaat tungsighraghtenguyalghii aqumluni tungangani iteghvigan Temple-em. Saghiighayagutkaat esghaghyamegteggu yuuk piyulghii.
44003011	Paninang naallghutkam yugem Peter-enkuk John-enkuk qetngamalukek, yulghutem saghiighayugumaghmeng kanglluqaghtekiit Solomon-em Porch-ngani.
44003012	Peter-em esghaghyamiki pikii, “Israel-eghmiini, sangafsi saghiighayugetsi? Sangamta esghapagtuutestekut? Piyugtesneghitaghpung una yuuk aghtughyaghqaanghillemtegnegun, nalighmeng piniitemtegneng. Piyugigalnguum yugem Jesus ugpeqsaqminigu naallghutuq.
44003013	Abraham-enkut, Isaac-enkut, Jacob-enkut, sivunemtallu qamaglluteng maniguqiita Kiyaghneghem quulvaghaa Qepghaghteni Jesus. Iwernga elpesi aglaatkaqaghsi Pilate-mun nanqigtesqelluku, ighsakegkaqaghsillu Pilate-em itemusugaqngagu.
44003014	Yeghlegi Pilate-mun yugtaghalqaq itemutesqegkaqaghsi ighsakluku Jesus, Seghleghqumangilnguq, Qaatkutngaghllalghii.
44003015	Tawaten pilleghpesigun tuqutestekaqaghsi Unguvallghem Allgeghvigpigaa, iwernga Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng. Liisimakngwaaghaghpung, qayughllak esghaqaqaghpung unguvallghan kingunganeng enkaam apeghyaghqaqaghpung.
44003016	Esghaqesi una yuuk nekevghalghii sivugpesini, qamagllusi liisimakaghsi piyugigasalghiinguuq ima allgenghhaghhaatmineng. Iknaqughtekaaguq ugpeqluku aatgha taam ataasim Jesus-em Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaan tuqulleghmeng. Aa-a, ugpeqillghan Jesus-kun naallghutngwaaghaa, esghaqesi maaten.
44003017	“Jew-lgutemni, neghighluku Kiyaghneghem aapqaa uuknaliqistetgun nakmikegkani Christ-a ikfiqluni tuqulleqniluku. Taana uuknaliqellghat apeghiiqaaguq igleghutistekullghiini tuqutestaqngafsigu Jesus, nallukluku Christ-angutanga.
44003019	Tamaaken apalluqluku avuteghqellusi, seghleghqennanighlusi qiivitek Kiyaghneghmun. Ugpeqiteggu Ataneq enkaam sangiglleqii seghleghqellesi.
44003020	Tawaten pikufsi Atanghem nutaghtaqnaaghii taghneghasi, kayaggneqiglleqaallu Jesus nakmikegkani Christ-anguluku elpesinun.
44003021	Iwernga Jesus tagivagilgami qilagmesaghqaaguq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem nutaghtellghanun sangwaa qamaglluku. Tawaten Kiyaghneq akeqikaaguq neghighluku uuknaliqistetgun aaftekamikun ellminun qepghaghtenguluki.
44003022	Moses pikaaguq, ‘Atanghem Kiyaghneghem uuknaliqista nakmikelleqaa yugpesineng, whanga nakmikelleghmitun uuknaliqistengulunga. Nagatngwaaghnakesi akuzillgha qamaglluku.
44003023	Tamaakut naganneghilnguut uuknaliqistemun Kiyaghneghem yuganeng aafluki tuqusaghqaagut.’
44003024	“Sangwaa maana atughput kiyaghtellemnni Samuel-em uuknaliqutkegkaqaa. Samuel-em kingunganeng ilangitallu uuknaliqistet uuknaliqutqegkaqiit.
44003025	Kingunqiisi uuknaliqistet enkaam Kiyaghneghem aapqii akequsat ellngitgun, elpesinunllu pinguut. Tawateghpigaq Abraham-emllu kingunqiisi. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem akeqaqngamiki sivunesi Abraham-kun whaten, ‘Abraham, kinguneghpegun quyasleqanka qamagtengngwaaghluki nunam yugi,’ akequsaq taana elpesinunllu pinguuq.
44003026	Enkaangam Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkani Qepghaghteni kayagsuwhaaqaqaa elpesinun. Kayagtekaqaa quyasnalusi qamagllusi tunutestelleghmikun seghleghqumalleghpesineng.”
44004001	Peter-enkuk John-enkuk paninang ungipaamalukek Solomon-em Porch-ngani, priest-etlu umiilgatlu Temple-em kelengakistengita, Sadducees-etlu tagilaghaatkat.
44004002	Piyukumangilkangat apostle-ek apeghtuusaak yugnun Jesus unguvaqaaniluku tuqulleghmeng, taam ipapighqegkanga tuqukat unguvaghyaghqaaniluki unguvalleghmun.
44004003	Tamaaken apalluqluku apostle-ek tugulukek anusimingllaqagket. Siingenllu unugnaqegkanga unaaqusitkagket nanqigtegpenakek.
44004004	Iwernga tamaana ilanga uglapiglleghhii nagatkaq Peter-enkugneng John-enkugneng ugpeghtuutkaq. Enkaangam yuggiinaat ugpeqat entaqun 5,000-ngughtekat, aghnatlu taghnughhaatlu ugpeqat ilategpenaki.
44004005	Unaamingani Jerusalem-emi qerngughutkat Jews-et igleghutistengit, siivanlleghet, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng,
44004006	High Priest-a Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander, ilangillu high priest-em ilakwaaghi.
44004007	Taagken apostle-ek tagiteslukek aaptekagket, “Kitum aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun yuuk piyugtesagutestegnegu? Kitum aatgha atuqluku tawaten pistek?”
44004008	Peter-em kiimsiqii Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun, “Igleghutistenillu siivanlleghnillu,
44004009	aaptaghpesikung aneghneghtillemtegneng, naten naallghusimatanga piyugigalnguq yuuk.
44004010	Enkaangam liigikesugamsi qamagllusi, ilangillu Israel-eghmiit qamaglluki naten una yuuk naallghutkaatanga. Naallghutkaaguq Aatghakun Jesus Christ-am Nazareth-eghmiim. Ellngan aghtughyaghqaanghillghan naallghutkaqaa, elpesi qaquuraqaghpesi, Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaan tuqulleghmeng. Enkaam una yuuk piyugigasalghii whaa maaten nekevghaaq sivugpesini.
44004011	Jesus-nguuq ukut Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaat, ‘Uyghak ighsakegkaghsi elpesi mangteghangllaghteni, piyalghiimi megnunalleghpigaaftuq uyghak.’
44004012	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqaa nunamun, ellnginaghhaaguq yugulighiyaghqaq. Alla naten yuuk yugulillengnaanghituq iwerngaqun aataghakun Jesus-em.”
44004013	Jews-et agghistengita saghiighayagutkagket Peter-enkuk John-enkuk tetunghitellghegkeneng, qayughllak liisimakegkegket igaghyaamangilnguuk. Liigiksaqmegtekek Jesus-metkaatmegneng tawaten akuzinguftuk.
44004014	Enkaam aaghtiiraaghpagningitkagket, qayughllak esghaqaat yuuk naallghutngwaaghluni nekevghalghii Peter-enkugni John-enkugni.
44004015	Agghivigmeng agghistet aanestekiit Peter-enkut John-enkut naallghutkaqlu yuuk, enkaam ellngit agghitnginaamaghmeng pikat.
44004016	Aapqughaaghutkat ellmeggneng, “Naten pinaqestekek yugek? Seghleghhalek ipanguninaqaghput allaaghlluwhaghtillghak, qayughllak Jerusalem-eghmiit qamaglluteng liisimakaat.
44004017	Taawanginaq ineghsaqumtekek allallu akuzitkefqaan Jesus pisqelluku kitumun alngunak wata kinkut alngunak nagaqughnayukatgu.”
44004018	Enkaam iteghteslukek ineghtengngwaaqagket, “Allamengllu akuzitkefqaan, apeghtuusaqefqaan Jesus pinakesek.”
44004019	Iwernga Peter-enkuk John-enkuk kiimsiqiit, “Qaatkellamsii Kiyaghneq avelghaghluku? Naliq efqughnaghta Kiyaghneghmi? Ataasiighteki umyugasi.
44004020	Whangkutung akuzitkenneghmeng taaqnaanghitaghpung esghaqaghpungllu nagaquqaghpungllu.”
44004021	Agghistet aghyuughpagningitkagket, qayughllak qamaglluteng yuget usuqegkangat Kiyaghneq allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun. Enkaam temngi alingsequlukek aanestekagket.
44004022	Taana yuuk 40 ayumiqulleq siipngaan uksughtutkalghii, piyugpagningisalghii iwernga maaten naallghullghii.
44004023	Peter-enkuk John-enkuk aanesistek aglaqak ugpeqaalgutmegnun. Ungipaqak chief priest-etlu siivanlleghetlu pillghitneng.
44004024	Nagallukek ataasiighlluteng yughaqat Kiyaghneghmun, “Ataneq, ulimakaqaten qilak, nuna, meq, sangwaallu alngunak taakunilnguq, igleghutngwaatenllu qamaglluki.
44004025	Ayumirugllak Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun akuzikaaguten sivunemteggun David-kun qepghaghtegpegun whaten, ‘Sangan Gentile-et temngi sakrituteghllagtatkek Atanghenkuk Christ-akullghiik, sanganllu yuget seghletun piyupigtatkek pipagningiteghngaaghmegtekek?
44004026	Nunam umiilgillu igleghutistetlu qerngughulluteng yataaghqutut pilluwaghnalukek Atanghenkuk Christ-akullghiik!’
44004027	“Ipapestaaq maani Jerusalem-emi tawaten pikaagut. Herod-enkuk Pontius Pilate-enkuk ilatkaaguk Gentile-enunllu Israel-eghmiinunllu kipullginaaghnaluku, Jesus Seghleghqumangilnguq Qepghaghten, nakmikegkan Christ-anguluku.
44004028	Ataneq liisimakngwaaqenllu yataaghqegkaqegkenllu tawaten pilleghqaa enkaam tawaten pikaagut.
44004029	Nagataqaten maaten whaa alingsiqukanginkut ikfiqesleqniluta. Ataneq, iknaqughsaqaghtikut enkaam tetugpenaamta ungipaalta ungipaghpeneng,
44004030	whangkutgun naallghutiki qinuyuget, allaaghlluwhaghtistikutlu aatghakun Jesus-em, Seghleghqumangilngughqun Qepghaghtegpegun.”
44004031	Yughaneghmeng taaqaqutlu qerngughutfigat mangteghaq ufsugutkaq. Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham imiqii qamaglluki, enkaam tetugpenateng ungipaghyagutkat Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng.
44004032	Apostle-et aghtughyaghqaanghillelighllagluteng ungipaqegkaat Ataneq Jesus unguvaqaaniluku tuqulleghmeng. Kiyaghneghem quyasteghllagukangillu qamaglluki ugpeqat. Ugpeqat ataasistun lliiqat ilumegteggunllu unguvasimegteggunllu. Enkaam kina alngunak pingigalnguq saghyateng ellnginaghmeggnun pikniluki, atunem atuqaqegkangit.
44004034	Nunalget, mangteghalget akikneghmegteki nunatengllu mangteghatengllu, allgeghtateng manit apostle-enun tuunaqegkangit. Enkaam ugpeqat sameng aklunghata manilitaqegkangit, tawaten kina alngunak aklumangilnguq.
44004036	Joseph tawanlenguq, Cyprus-eghmii, Levi-em kingungha, ellnganllu akikluku nunani tuunegkaa allgeghtani apostle-enun. Apostle-et atiqaat Barnabas-meng whaten pisimeng, “Kayemesta.”
44005001	Taawanguq yuuk aatgha Ananias, nulighha Sapphira. Akikegkaa nalighnegha nunami.
44005002	Nuliighmi liisimanghani aksaqegkaa ilanga manim ellminun pinguluku. Taana siipneni tuunegkaa apostle-enun sumeghmini qamaglluku tuuniluku pisqelluku.
44005003	Yeghlegi Peter-em aaptekaa, “Sangan qaatkesigu Tughneghaam nanghiiqullgha iqlengiqesqelluten Agleghnalghiignun Taghneghagnun aksaqelleghpegun ilanga manim?
44005004	Sangan tawaten sumeghtaghaamazin? Yugnun iqlengiqenghituten, Kiyaghneghmun iqlengiquten. Akikellghilluku nunan elpek piksaghan, enkaam akikaqngavgu maningallu taana piyukelleghpetun piyaghqaqsaghan.”
44005005	Legan Ananias-em Peter nagalluku uullghaghlluni tuqukaq. Nukalpigat iteghluteng qiipaghakun iimgulluku yugusii aanulluku lliifqaat. Ungipaq Ananias-em iqlengiqellghallu tuqullghallu mingitkaq, enkaam nagaquutkat alingruughuteghllakat.
44005007	Pingayut aflut atughluki Ananias-em tuqullghaneng, nulighha iitqaq nallukluku ugini samatanga.
44005008	Peter-em aaptekaa, “Tawaten akitutkaan akikestegneguu nunayek?” Sapphira-m kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a.”
44005009	Peter-em aaplaataqaa, “Sangaftek ugikullghiigni sumeghtaghaamastek nanghiiqunalukek Atanghem Taghneghakek? Yuget lliivghikat ugigpeneng qakma manughametut. Elpeklu tawaten pilleqaaten.”
44005010	Tawanighlluggiinaq ellngallu uullghaghlluni tuqukaq. Nukalpigat iteghyalghiimeng Sapphira-llu taawa tuqumalghii, enkaam aanulluku ugingan saaghwakun lliifqaat.
44005011	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng ugpeqat, qamagllutengllu nagaquullghiit Ananias-enkuk Sapphira-nkuk tuqullghegkeneng alingruughuteghllakat.
44005012	Yulghutet qungangitni apostle-et allaaghlluwhaghtighllagumanginaqat. Qamaglluteng ugpeqatlu apostle-etlu qerngughutaqelghiit Temple-em manughaani aatqelghiimi, Solomon-em Porch-ngani.
44005013	Iwernga yuget ugpeqillghilnguut Jesus-meng ilasigalnguut ugpeqanun qayughllak alingekanighaqelghiit, naqam pinighniiqegkangit.
44005014	Iwernga uglapiglleghiit yugetlu aghnatlu ugpeqngukangat Ataneq Jesus, enkaam ugpeqat nulamanginaqat.
44005015	Apostle-et allaaghlluwhaghtillghit apalluqluki kinkut alngunak qinuyugtiiteng allighiitgun tagilluki tumetgun lliiqegkangit. Tawaten pikiit qayughllak Peter-em naghughtekaki luuraq taghneghangutellghan naallghunnayukaki qinuyulghiit.
44005016	Enkaam Jerusalem-emun qantaghanlengughneng nunaneng tagilaghaatkaq yulghun Jerusalem-emun. Qinuyugtiitengllu tamaakutlu tughneghalget ilumegteggun tagitkiit apostle-enun, enkaam qamaglluteng tagitkiit naallghuquutkat.
44005017	High priest-enkut ilakullghiit Sadducees-et aqinatkat apostle-neng
44005018	enkaam tugusluki kanaghtestekiit anusimingllaghvigmun.
44005019	Iwernga unugyan yaqulgan Atanghem qelpeghtekii anusimingllaghvigem amigi. Enkaam aanulluki apostle-et pikii,
44005020	“Aglaghlusi Temple-mun, qamaglluku apeghteggu una nutaghaq kiyaghtaalleq Jesus Christ-akun ayuqelghii.”
44005021	Apostle-et qaatkegkaat yaqulek. Aghtaghaghaqaallu iteghluteng Temple-mun apeghtughikat. High priest-enkut ilakullghiit qerngughtekiit Jews-et siivanlleghitlu qamagllukillu agghistet, agghitkennaluki apostle-et. Taagken anusimingllaghvigem umiilwaaghitnun aqfastekiit apostle-et.
44005022	Iwernga umiilwaaghet anusimingllaghvigmun kaasalghiimeng apostle-et aviiteftut. Enkaam agghistenun aglaghluteng ungipaatkiit,
44005023	“Anusimingllaghvigmun kaasalghiikut amiget maghqaqughwaaghngaftut, kelengakistetlu amignituteftut naqam iteghyalghiikut paaghqiteftuq!”
44005024	Temple-em kelengakistengita umiilgatlu, chief priest-etlu ungipaasisteng kukriqutkegkiit samatangi apostle-et.
44005025	Taagken kitum iteghluni pikii, “Taakut yuget anusimingllaqaqsaqesi inga Temple-mi apeghtughiiqut.”
44005026	Kelengakistet umiilkullghiit aqfakiit apostle-et. Seghletun pimangilkangit, qayughllak alingelghiit yugneng Temple-melngughneng tuqunnayukangisteng milughpagaataghhiinaq.
44005027	Tagilluki itghutkiit agghistenun enkaam high priest-em pikii apostle-et,
44005028	“Ineghtengngwaaqaqsaghamsi allamengllu apeghtughifqaafsi Aatghakun Jesus-em pisqellusi, iwernga qaatkumangitaghpesikut! Yeghlegi allulluteng Jerusalem-eghmiit liitaat apeghtuusaghsi, whangkutallu avutngusnaqutkaghpekut Jesus-em tuqullghanun.”
44005029	Peter-em kiimsiitkii apostle-et, “Qaatkesaghqaqaghput Kiyaghneq avelghaghluki yuget.
44005030	Qaquuraghluku tuqutestekaqaghsi Jesus, iwernga Kiyaghneghem, sivunemta maniguqiita unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng.
44005031	Enkaangam quulvaghnaluku Jesus aghenqigneghmikun nekegtekaqaa Igleghutistengulukullu Yugulighistengulukullu. Tawaten pikaqaa Israel-eghmiit avuteghqesaghqaaghtesqelluki seghleghqennaniisqelluki, qiivesqelluki Kiyaghneghmun, seghevunnalukillu seghleghqellghitneng.
44005032	Whangkuta ungipaghtenguukut tamaakunun pilleghnun, maligulluta Agleghnalghiignun Taghneghagnun Kiyaghneghem tuunegkagkenun tamaakunun qaatkullghiinun ellminun.”
44005033	Agghistet sakritutkaalghiit Peter-em kiimsighyisteng tawaten, repall tuqusukaqegkangit apostle-et.
44005034	Iwernga ataasiq agghista nekevegkaq akuzinaluni. Gamaliel-nguftuq, Pharisee, apeghtughistengat Jews-et Liilightuusiita, elngaatall kitum alngunak qaatkumtaagha. Kelengakistenun aanutaghtesqegkii apostle-et.
44005035	Taagken agghistelgutni pikii, “Israel-eghmiilgutemni, piraamsilluki taakut yuget piteki.
44005036	Neqamikenghistegguu qavnganghhaq Theudas pikaalghii igleghutesteghllaguniluni. Enkaam 400 yuuk maligsaaghikaq ellnganeng. Iwernga Theudas tuqusatgu maligsaaghtengi qimaguutkat, talwa kitum alngunak allamengllu akuzitkesugumangilkangat.
44005037	Taakwaningani Judas-llu Galilee-ghmii, qerngughtikaq yugkameng kavema kestistiiqngan yugem uglaghtalanganeng. Iwernga ellngallu tuqutaqngatgu yugi mingitkaagut.
44005038	Enkaam whaa sumemni itagnaghnayaghtukut safqiita qakemkut yuget piyaqumteki. Ellmeggneng pingukumeng tawaten pillghat satngunanighllequq.
44005039	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem pilqegkagu aghuliighhnaanghitasi, kipullginaaghlleqaghsillu Kiyaghneq.” Enkaam agghistet qaatkegkaat Gamaliel.
44005040	Taagken kelengakistenun itghutesluki apostle-et kagsagmigtestekiit. Ineghtengngwaaqiitlu ungipaqnaniisqelluku Jesus. Apeghiighyamegteki aanestekiit.
44005041	Apostle-et aanesisteng quyaghllakat, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem kayngusaghaatestekaqegkangi Jesus apalluqluku.
44005042	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan Temple-millu kinkunillu ungipaqaqegkangat, apeghtuusaqaqegkangat Jesus, Christ-anguniluku Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaa.
44006001	Tamaani aghneghni ugpeqat nulanguluki Greek-stun akuzikayuget Jews-et seghleghyukat, Hebrew-stun akuzikayugneng Jews-eneng, qayughllak ugingighaghtiiteng aklukegkiitneng tuunlaaghigalkangit. Enkaam yiillgikiit, “Aghhutanga tamaghhaan uyegtistet palasqughhaan tuunaqiit whangkuta ugingighaput.”
44006002	Tamaaken apalluqluku qula maalghuk siipneqluku apostle-et, qerngughlluki ugpeqat pikiit, “Anaggullequkut pegtekumteggu ungipaqilleghput Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng uyegtistengughhnaluta.
44006003	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, tamaaken apalluqluku nakmikiteki maaghraghvinlek yuuk pinilghii, Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng imighngalghiit, peghqinelghiit, uyegtistengllaghlleqaput.
44006004	Tawaten pikumta whangkuta apostle-eni yughaamanginaghllequkut, ungipaqimanginaghllequkut Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng.”
44006005	Ugpeqat efquqegkiit apostle-et agghillghit. Enkaam nakmikegkaat Stephen, elngaatall ugpeqingaghllak Kiyaghneghmeng, imighngalghiillu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng. Nakmikegkiitlu Philip-enkut, Prochorus-enkut, Nicanor-enkut, Timon-enkut, Parmenas-enkut, Nicolaus-llu Gentile-a Antioch-eghmii Jews-estun maniguusagutkaq.
44006006	Taakut yuget tagitkiit apostle-enun yughaatkesqelluki, naasqwitgun saafluki yughaatkegkiit.
44006007	Kiyaghneghem ungipii mingisimanginaqiit. Enkaam nulakaalghiit ugpeqat Jerusalem-emi, priest-elghutetlu ilalghutngit ugpeghtuutkat maligulluteng.
44006008	Stephen kayusillelegllagutminengllu aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllagutminengllu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaq.
44006009	Taagken ilangita Jews-et, Cyrene-eghmiinguyalghiitlu, Alexandria-ghmiinguyalghiitlu aaghtiiraaghyaghtuqaat Stephen. Taakut yuget synagogue-ngita aatqeftaa, “Itemutkat Qepghaghtelaaghet.” Yuget Cilicia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu, Asia-ghmiinguyalghiitlu ilatkat taakunun.
44006010	Iwernga Stephen, Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham peghqinepiglluku akuzistekaa repall kiimsighpagningitkaat.
44006011	Tamaaken apalluqluku ilangi yuget aksaqluku akileghtuqiit iqlengiqutkesqelluku Stephen whaten, “Nagatkaqaghput seghlequuqek Moses-enkuk Kiyaghneghenkuk.”
44006012	Siivanlleghetlu, apeghtughikayugetlu Liilightuusaneng, ilangillu yuget nagalluteng iqlengiqellghitneng sakritutkat. Taagken aaghtiiraaghulluteng aglaatkaat Stephen agghistenun.
44006013	Taam kingunganeng yuget tagitkiit agghistenun iqlengiqutkesqelluku Stephen. Pikat, “Stephen-em quunpeng seghletun akuzitkaqaa Temple-a, Liilightuusatlu Moses-em tuunegkii whangkunnun.
44006014	Nagatkaqaghputlu pilghii Jesus-emnguq Nazareth-eghmiim naafqelleqaa Temple-a, allangughlleqaallunguq kiyaghtaalleghput Moses-em apeghtuutkaa whangkunnun.”
44006015	Qamaglluteng tawanlenguut esghaqaat Stephen-em gginaa kuukgullghii yaqulgem gginaatun.
44007001	Taagken high priest-em aaptekaa Stephen, “Ipa tawaten akuzikaaziin ukut avutkistegpek apellghistun?”
44007002	Stephen-em kiimsiqaa, “Anglegutemnillu, siivanlleghnillu, nagataghtengnga ungipamsugunnaqamsi! Sivuneghput Abraham salin Mesopotamia-melluku, nuugtellghilluku Haran-mun, Nighughqengngalghiim Kiyaghneghem aliighvikluku
44007003	pikaa, ‘Unitigu allgeghvigen nuna, ilakwaaghtenllu, aghulaqi maghyaghqughnaaghamken.’
44007004	Enkaam Abraham aghulaqegkaq Chaldea-meng, nuugtekaq Haran-mun. Atanga tuquyan, Kiyaghneghem maghyaghquqaa Abraham nunamun maaten kiyaghfigpesinun.
44007005	Tagisuwhaaghaqngamigu natengiighhaq nunalisimangitaa ellnganun pikaghqameng. Iwernga talwa salin avaqutiilluku Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaqaa una nuna ellnganunllu kingunghanunllu.
44007006	Kiyaghneghem whatenllu pikaqaa, ‘Kinguneghten aghulaqsaghqaagut nunakenghilkemeggnun enkaam nunataallequt. Tamaani qepghaghtelaaghuyaghqaagutlu amyuqetaatkesighllagyaghqaagutlu 400 ayumiqullelghutni.
44007007	Iwernga aghyuughlleqanka qepghaghtelaaghughtestilghiit. Kingunganeng aghyuughilleghma kinguneghten tagillequt nunamun akequsaqegkamnun, tamaani manigughlleqaatnga.’ Tawaten Kiyaghneq pikaaguq.
44007008	Taagken Kiyaghneq akequsangllaqaq Abraham-emun nalluniighutkesqelluku circumcise-elleq. Enkaam Abraham circumcise-ekaq. Ighnengyami Isaac-meng pingayuneng inglulek aghneq atughyagu circumcise-ekaa ellngallu. Tawateghpigaq Isaac-em circumcise-ekaa ighneni Jacob. Jacob-em circumcise-elaqii qula maalghuk siipneqluku ighneni. Taakut piinliisiqii ramkengan Israel-em.
44007009	“Anglilaghaalluteng Jacob-em ighneghita aqinakepigtekaat anglegutseng Joseph, enkaam akikegkaat Egypt-eghmiinun qepghaghtelaaghuluku. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nayuqegkaa,
44007010	seghleliinghani kayusighaqegkanga. Kiyaghneghem peghqinellelitkaa enkaam Pharaoh-m umiilgan Egypt-em, efquqluku umiilgataghaaghtestekaa Egypt-mun, igleghutistengllaqaallu mangteghaminunllu, qepghaghteminunllu.
44007011	Taagken neqangisagllakaq Egypt-millu, Canaan-millu, elngaatall uglaq iyatiquteghllakaq. Sivuneputlu neqangisagllakat.
44007012	Jacob-em nagaqughyamiki Egypt-eghmiit grain-meng kagpagllagumaniluki, ighneni pikengyaghtiisqegkii.
44007013	Tuunglighhaani alla piyata, Joseph-em anengani ungipaatkii ellngitnun uyughaqniluni. Enkaam umiilgem Pharaoh-m anglegutkututangi liigikegkii.
44007014	Taagken Joseph-em lipeghsaqaa atani Jacob, nengllugutelghutangillu nuugtesqelluki Egypt-mun. Qamaglluteng 75-nguftut.
44007015	Enkaam Jacob-enkut nuugtekat. Tamaani Jacob tuqukaq, kingunganeng tagtalmi taakwani ilangillu sivuneput tuqulaghaatkat.
44007016	Taakwaningani neghqwaaghit aglaalluki Shechem-emun, llivenqigtekiit nunakun Abraham-em tukfiqaakun Hamor-em kingunghaneng.
44007017	“Kiyaghneghem Abraham-emun akequsaa piyaghtungestaghaquqlu, sivuneput nulaghllakat Egypt-mi.
44007018	Taagken Egypt nutaghameng umiilengegkaq, taam umiilgem nallukngwaaqanga Joseph.
44007019	Sivunemta nulaghllallghit apalluqluki umiilgem peghqiniqulluki ikfiqestekii sivuneput, talwa taghnughhaghhiit aanutestaqluki pikii tuqusqelluki.
44007020	Tawaten kiyaghsimaluki Moses allgeqaq, yuukegtepiglleghii taghnughhaq. Angayuqagkenka nemegni iighaghtumeng aflengakegkaak pingayut tanqit.
44007021	Iighaghtughpagningiisamegnegu aanutkaak. Umiilgem panigan naalkelluku allughqiluku, anglistekaa ighneqelghiistun.
44007022	Egypt-eghmiit apeghtuqaat liitkameggneng. Enkaam Moses peghqinghughighllagyalghiimi akuzillguughqaaghllakaq, aghtiigalnguqlu sameng tamaghhaaneng.
44007023	“Moses 40 uksughtutkalighyami Israel-eghmiilgutni esghaghyugluki esghaghyaghtuqii.
44007024	Tawani esghaqaa Egypt-eghmiim amyuutkegkanga Israel-eghmii. Enkaam Moses-em Israel-eghmii igughluku tuqutkaa Egypt-eghmii.
44007025	Tawani sumeghtaghaqaayalghii Israel-eghmiilgutminun liigikelleqniluku Kiyaghneghmun kayagtelleni ellngitnun aghulaqutistenguluku Egypt-meng. Iwernga liigikumangilkangat.
44007026	Unaamingani esghaqakek Israel-eghmiik pillugullghiik. Akuzinnaqutkegkaqsaqek, ‘Pillugutegpenatek yulgutkututek.’
44007027	Yeghlegi amyuqetiqelghiim yugem ayagaghlluku Moses pikaa, ‘Kitum igleghutistengllaghtaten, nanqigtistengllaghtatenllu whangkunnun?
44007028	Whangallu tuqusugsingaa ighivgaq tuqutelleghpetun Egypt-eghmii?’
44007029	Yugem tawaten piyatni Moses qimakaq Midian-mun, tamaani allaneghtaakaq. Qenwat nulightughluni ighnengegkaq maalghugegneng.
44007030	“Moses, 40 ayumiqulleq Midian-metutkelluku kilgaanun aghulaqegkaq Mount Sinai-em uvitanganun. Tawani esghaqaa yaqulek kumaghulghiimi uqfillegami.
44007031	Allaaghlluwhaghyagutkaqegkanga. Kenqigtengngwaaghnaluku takukaa, kaasaghtughaqaallu Atanghem pikaa,
44007032	‘Kiyaghneghuunga, sivuneghpek Abraham-enkut Isaac-enkut Jacob-enkut Kiyaghneqaatnga.’ Moses alingruuqaq repall ungelegtekaq talwa esghaghyugumangitkaa.
44007033	Atanghem pikaa, ‘Kaamgegken mataghtikek qayughllak whanga apalluqlunga agleghnalghiinguuq nekevghavigen.
44007034	Esghapaganka yugenka amyuutkegkangit Egypt-mi, nagatanka ngilleglleghhiit. Ukigtunga yugulinaluki Egypt-eghmiineng. Enkaam whaa kayaggnaqamken Egypt-mun.’
44007035	“Taananguuq Moses Israel-eghmiit ighsakaqngamegteggu pikaat, ‘Kitum igleghutistengllaghtatenllu nanqigtistengllaghtatenllu whangkunnun?’ Iwernga ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem uteghnightestekaa Egypt-mun igleghutistengulukullu yugulighistengulukullu ellngitnun. Tawaten Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa yaqulegkun kumaghulghiimi uqfillegami.
44007036	Moses allaaghluwhaghtighllagaataghluni Egypt-mi, aghulaqutkaqii sivuneput Egypt-meng. Wata allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaaguq Red Sea-millu, igleghalleghmeggnillu kilgaani maghyaghqughaqngamiki 40 ayumiqulleghni.
44007037	Taananguuq Moses Israel-eghmiinun whaten pikaq, ‘Kiyaghneghem uuknaliqista nakmikelleqaa yugpesineng whanga nakmikelleghmitun uuknaliqistengulunga.’
