44007038	Taananguuq Moses sivunemnnitkaq qerngughutaqngata kilgaani Mount Sinai-em tungangangi. Tawani naayghami yaqulgem aleghqughyatni tugukii Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii apeghtuusat naten kiyaghtelleghqameng. Taagken aapqii taakut sivunemnnun enkaam ellngita nagneghtekaqiit whangkunnun.
44007039	“Iwernga sivunemta Moses qaatkesugumangitaatlu, igleghutisteksugumangitaatlu, yeghlegi uteghsukaagut Egypt-mun.
44007040	Enkaam Moses-em anengaa Aaron pikaat, ‘Kiyaghnengllaghteghqut maghyaghqiisqelluta. Nallukaghput Moses samatanga, legan aghulaqulluta Egypt-meng unitiinkut.’
44007041	Enkaam kiyaghnengllaqat kaawaghaghsugnilngughmeng, aghqerraaqaatlu. Neqenghaghqegkatlu quulvaghnaluku ulimaaghteng.
44007042	“Tawaten piyata Kiyaghneghem tunutkiillu, pegtekiillu elngaatall maniguutesqelluki siqineghmun, tanqimun, ighaleqetaaghnunllu. Ataneq whaten pikaaguq uuknaliqistet igaqellghitni, ‘Israel-eghmiini, 40 ayumiqulleghni igleghangulusi kilgaani aghqerraaghumangitaghpesinga tuqutiineghpesini teghikusameng.
44007043	Yeghlegi kelqutaaqegkaqasi tiintat manigughviguluki kiyaghnengllaqamun Moloch-mun, kelqutaaqegkaqaghsillu ighaleqetaangllaqaq maniguusiiluku Rephan-mun. Tamaaken apalluqluku anguyagpesinun aghulaqutesleqamsi naghughlluku Babylon.’”
44007044	Stephen paninang akuzikaq, “Sivuneput kilgaanilluki Kiyaghneghem tiintanglliisqegkii amimeng manigughviguluki ellminun. Ulimakaqiit tawatengwaaq Kiyaghneghem apeghtuutellghatun Moses-mun. Kelqutaaqegkiit taakut tiintat neqanguusiiluki Kiyaghneghem nayuutngallghanun.
44007045	Taakwaningani Moses tuquyan Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaa Joshua igleghutistekesqelluku sivunemnnun. Joshua-m maghyaghqughyisteng nunamun Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaanun taakut tiintat kelqegkiit. Takukameggnun nunamun kaasalghiimeng yulguftuq. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem sivunemnnun ighlleghtestekii yugi, enkaam sivuneput nelikat taaggun nunakun. Tamaani nagneghutkiit taakut tiintat maniguutfiguluki Kiyaghneghmun kenlanga umiileliitelleghmeggnun David.
44007046	David-em kiyaghtaallgha elngaatall efqughnapigtekaalghii Kiyaghneghmi. Enkaam David-em aaptekaqsaqanga whaten, ‘Kiyaghnegha Jacob-em, mangteghangllaghlakaan?’ Iwernga Kiyaghneghem pisimangilkanga,
44007047	yeghlegi David-em ighneghan Solomon-em mangteghangllaqaa Kiyaghneq.
44007048	“Iwernga Kiyaghneghllak kiyaghsigatuq mangteghani yuget ulimaaghitni. Whaten Ataneq pikaaguq uuknaliqistem igaqellghani,
44007049	‘Qilak aqumutaqaqa, nunallu itegaghiitaqaqa. Sangan mangteghangllaghnaqestengnga? Meghnalivigitaangunghitunga.
44007050	Ulimaaqenghiisikuun sangwaa qamatengngwaaghluku?’”
44007051	Stephen-em nagneghutkii, “Pineghllugllagni elpesi, qaatkesugigataghsi, ugpeqsugigataghsi Kiyaghneq. Kiyaghneghem ungipii nagasugigatasi, ighsakeraaghaqagsillu Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak sivuneghpesistungwaaq.
44007052	Qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem uuknaliqistengi sivuneghpesi amyuutkegkaqiit. Tuququqaqiit uuknaliqistet uuknaliqutkesatgu Seghleghqumangilnguq tagiyaghqaaningatgu. Enkaam kaasan, uveghpagulluku tuqutkaqaghsi.
44007053	Elpesinguusi Kiyaghneghem yaqulegteggun tuunegkii Liilightuusaneng, qaatkumangitasi.”
44007054	Agghistet nagalluku Stephen sakrituteghllakat repall ggiistaghaatkaat.
44007055	Iwernga Stephen, imighngalghii Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, sivugsalghiimi qilagmun esghaqaa Kiyaghneghem nighughqellgha, Jesus-llu nekevghalghii Kiyaghneghem aghenqigneghani.
44007056	Pikii, “Esghaqaghtegguqun! Esghaghaqa qilak qelpelghii, Ighneghallu Yugem nekevghalghii Kiyaghneghem aghenqigneghani!”
44007057	Agghistet siguteteng saapluki iiggmeggneng, araghaataasimaghmeng qamaglluteng sughukaat Stephen.
44007058	Siingvagaatameng aghulaqutkaat Jerusalem-emeng, tuqunnaluku milughpagaataghhiinaq. Taagken Stephen-em avutkistengita qaasliteng mataghlluki nukalpigam Saul-em saaghwakun lliluki milughpagaataghyuggaaqaat. Tamaakutlu ilangita milughpagaataqaat.
44007059	Whaa uyghagem tekiqaghvikngatni Stephen yughaqaq, “Ataneq Jesus, taghneghagka tuguklighqek.”
44007060	Segesqughlluni iglagtupiglluni pikaq, “Ataneq, seghevutiki whaken seghleghqellghitneng.” Tawaten piluni tuqukaq.
44008001	Saul-em itagnaqegkaa Stephen-em tuqutellgha. Yuget piniqingalghiit Kiyaghneghmeng lliifqaat Stephen qiyakeghllagumaan. Taagken aghneghmeng kenlanga amyuutkeghllagyagutkiit ugpeqat Jerusalem-emelnguut. Saul-em elngaatall amyuutkegkii ugpeqat naangesqelluki. Iitghaqluni nengitnun qamughsiighmeng aanuquqii aghnatlu, yugetlu anusimingllaghtesqughnaluki. Qamagtengngwaaghluteng ugpeqat, pelleghmun qimaguutkat nunanun Judea-melngughnunllu, Samaria-melngughnunllu, apostle-nginaghhaat qimagumangilnguut.
44008004	Tamaakut ugpeqat qimaguutkat tamanganun ungipaqikat Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng naansaghngaaghmeng.
44008005	Philip Samaria-lluni ungipaqegkaa Christ-a, allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataqaqlu.
44008006	Enkaam yuget nagatngwaaqaqegkangat esghapagluki allaaghlluwhaghtillghi.
44008007	Uglapiglleghhiineng yugneng aanesquqii tughneghaat akilghuungitgun. Tamaakutlu piyugigalnguut, uniiqatlu naallghuquqii.
44008008	Enkaangam Samaria-ghmiit elngaatall quyaghllakat.
44008009	Samaria-minguq taawa alignalghii yuuk, aatgha Simon. Salin Philip kaatellghilluku alignaghtaalleghmikun saghiighayugtaqegkangi yuget, qukaayugtaqelghiillu aghtiiganniluni.
44008010	Enkaam qamaglluteng tamaanlenguut, pingwaaghllagneng, ukavanlleghpigaghnun nagasukestaghluku ayuqegkangat. Pikaat, “Una yuuk aghtughyaghqaanghillengeghllakaaguq Kiyaghneghmeng.”
44008011	Yuget nagasupiglluku ayuqegkangat, qayughllak qavngarugllaggaaneng allaaghlluwhaghyugtekayugukangi alignaghtaalleghmikun.
44008012	Iwernga Philip-em ungipaqsaki Pinilghiit Ungipat Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghaneng ayuqelghiit, Aatghanengllu Jesus Christ-am ugpeqegkiit ungipii. Tamaakut yugetlu, aghnatlu ugpeqilghiit paaptaayekat.
44008013	Talwa Simon-emllu ugpeqegkii. Enkaam paaptaayelleghmi kingunganeng maligsaaqaa Philip. Esghapagluku Philip allaaghhiinaghneng allaaghlluwhaghtiighaatalghii saghiighayukaq.
44008014	Apostle-et Jerusalem-emelnguut nagaqughluki Samaria-ghmiit ugpeghniluki Kiyaghneghem Ungipaaneng, kayagtekagket Peter-enkuk John-enkuk ellngitnun.
44008015	Samaria-ghmiit ugpeqiit paaptaayekat Aatghinaghhaakun Atanghem Jesus-em, naqam salin nalighhiiniita allgeghsigalkegket Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak. Peter-enkuk John-enkuk Samaria-mun kaallutek aglaqak ugpeqanun. Taagken saaftaqluki yughaatkaataqiik, enkaam Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak allgeghtekagket.
44008018	Simon-em esghapakakek apostle-ek, saafneghmegneki ugpeqat allgeghutaqelghiit Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.
44008019	Enkaam apostle-ek pikakek, “Tukfighiighllanga aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng whangallu saaftekumki yuget allgeghutesqelluki Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.”
44008020	Iwernga Peter-em pikaa, “Yeqay Kiyaghneghem naafqelliten manituumaghpek. Sumeghpenii-i Kiyaghneghem tunusaa tukfighlleqniluku pizigu?
44008021	Qepghalgusighinaanghituten, qayughllak sumeghtaghallghen anaggutngaaq Kiyaghneghem esghaamallghani.
44008022	Avuteghqelluten seghleghqusiqnanighhungam taana seghlepestaaq piyukellghen. Enkaam yughaa Ataneghmun luuraq seghevunnayukagu taana seghlepestaaq seghleghqellghen.
44008023	Taawa liigikamken aqinallelegllaguutenllu asighqengngaatenllu seghleghqelleghpeneng.”
44008024	Simon-em pikakek, “Yughaatkaghtegnenga Ataneghmun tawaten pilleghpesistun pifqaama pisqellunga.”
44008025	Taagken Peter-enkuk John-enkuk tistemunilutek, ungipaqilutek Atanghem ungipaaneng aghulaqegkak Jerusalem-emun. Samaria-mi igleghangulutek, nenun kaanneghmegni Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ungipaghaqelghiik.
44008026	Taagken yaqulgan Atanghem pikaa Philip, “Yataaghqelluten ikevaam tunganganilengughnun tumenun aglaa paaghqillghanilngughnun, Jerusalem-emeng Gaza-mun ayuqelghiinun.”
44008027	Enkaam yataaghqelluni aghulaqegkaq. Taakwani tumangani esghaqaa Ethiopia-ghmii eunuch, Ethiopia-m Queen-ngan Candace-em, manimeng aflengakistenga. Jerusalem-emeng uteghnighaqeftuq neminun maniguusaghtughluni Kiyaghneghmun. Chariot-mikun igleghutkelluku atightughaqeftii uuknaliqestem Isaiah-m igaqegkii.
44008029	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham pikaa Philip, “Chariot-ngan saaghwanun aglaghluten maligsaaghhu.”
44008030	Enkaam malighqaghluku nagatkaa atightulghii uuknaliqestem Isaiah-am igaqegkaaneng. Philip-em aaptekaa, “Liigiksikii atightuqaghten?”
44008031	Kiimsiqaa, “Naten liigikesqelluki piziki, wetkuqun kitum liigikestekaki whangamnun sameng piiqutangi.” Taagken uugtesluku saaghwmikun aqumesqegkaa.
44008032	Eunuch-em atightughaqeftii Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi whaten pilghiit: “Penniighet tuqusaghtunghisteng qalghiigatut, penniighaghaatlu qigunghisteng qalghiigatut, tawateghpigaq ellngallu sameng piighsimangilnguq.
44008033	Kayngusaakestaqngatgu igughistengitkaq. Unguvallgha kenletghuutestekaq nunami. Enkaam kitumngam aapghwaaghlleqaki seghleghtulangi yulgutangan tamaani pilleghmi?”
44008034	Eunuch-em aaptekaa Philip, “Ungipaataghtinga uuknaliqista ellmineng akuzitkaqaa, nalighmeng kina alla piiqagu?”
44008035	Philip-em piinliisiqluki Isaiah-am igaqegkii, ungipaatkaa Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Jesus-meng.
44008036	Igleghutkelluku meghmun kaasamek eunuch-em pikaa, “Esgha taana meq! Sangwaangam eltuusiqelleqsikun paaptaayelleghqamnun?”
44008037	Philip-em pikaa, “Ipapighqelluten ugpequvek paaptaayelleqamken.” Eunuch-em kiimsiqaa, “Aa, ugpeqaqa Jesus Christ-a Ighneqaa Kiyaghneghem.”
44008038	Enkaam eunuch-em igleghutisteni aghuliighesqegkaa. Ateghlutek chariot-meng meghmun aatqak, enkaam Philip-em tawani paaptaayekaa.
44008039	Meghmeng uugsayek Atanghem Taghneghagkenka aghulaqutkaa Philip, enkaam eunuch-em alla esghamangitkaa, iwernga nagneqaq quyallelighllagluni.
44008040	Taana Philip piyalghiimi Azotus-meteftuq. Caesarea-mun aglaatkelluku nenun kaanneghmini Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ungipaghaqelghii.
44009001	Saul Jerusalem-emelluni taawa paninang alingsiqukii tuququghnaqniluki maligsaaghtengi Atanghem. Qenwat Damascus-esukaq, luuraq Jesus-em maligsaaghtengi yugetlu aghnatlu tamaannayukata. Esghaqumiki taginnaluki Jerusalem-emun anusiminglliisqelluki. Enkaam high priest-mun piluni latangllaatesqegkaq pilleghqalitesqelluni igleghutistengitnun synagogue-et Damascus-melngughnun, tawaten pinaluni.
44009003	Enkaam Saul aghulaqegkaq Damascus-mun. Iiwenllu kaasaghtughaquq, qilagmeng nighugllagem kukegtekaa.
44009004	Uullghaghlluni nagaquqaa ma whaten pilghii, “Saul, Saul, sangama amyuutkumanginaghsinga?”
44009005	Saul-em aaptekaa, “Kinanguzin Ataneq?” Mem kiimsiqaa, “Jesus-nguunga amyuutkegkan.
44009006	Makelluten aglaa Damascus-mun, tawani kitum ungipaalleqaaten naten pilleghqaghpeneng.”
44009007	Yuget igleghalgutangi aghuliiqat tawani, akuzipagningunateng nagatkaat ma, naqam kina alngunak esghaamangilkangat.
44009008	Saul makesalghiimi esghaanneghituq qayughllak ayaamalghii. Enkaam tasluqluku aglaatkaat Damascus-mun.
44009009	Pingayut aghneghet ayaangakaq, talwa neghumangilnguqlu, meghumangilnguqlu.
44009010	Taawanguq Damascus-mi, yuuk ugpeqingalghii Jesus-meng, aatgha Ananias. Esghaaghwaalleghqun Atanghem tuqluqaa, “Ananias.” Kiimsiqaa, “Ay, Ataneq?”
44009011	Atanghem pikaa, “Tumenun aglaa aatqelghiinun, ‘Taklaghrukegtaq’ Taagken Judas-enkunun aapsaghtughhu yuuk, Saul-nguuq, Tarsus-meng pinguuq, yughaghaquq.
44009012	Esghaghwaaghqun esghamaa yuuk itelghii, aatgha Ananias, saafsaqminigu esghaghyagunneqigtuq.”
44009013	Iwernga Ananias-em pikaa, “Ataneq, nagaqughaqaqa taana yuuk uglapiglleghhiineng, apeghnaqepigtaqaat seghletun pilleghllaga yugpenun Jerusalem-emi.
44009014	Pilleghqangegkaaguq chief priest-eneng tagiluni Damascus-mun tugulaghnaluki qamaglluki yughaqayuget ateghpegun.”
44009015	Iwernga Atanghem pikaa, “Aglaa, takugu qayughllak nakmikumaaqa ungipaqesqellunga Gentile-enun, umiilegnun, Israel-eghmiinunllu.
44009016	Liigikesnaqngwaaqa aangluku ikfiqelleghmeng whanga apalluqlunga.”
44009017	Enkaam Ananias-em takukaa Saul. Iteghluni saafsimaan pikaa, “Anglegutemni Saul, Atanghem Jesus-em esghaqaghpek tumeni taginguluten, kayagtaanga elpenun. Kayagutaaten saaftesqelluten esghaasagunneqigtesqelluten, imiisqellutenllu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.”
44009018	Tawaninginaq iqallugem qaltesugningi iyegkeneng ifkaquutkat, enkaam esghasagutkaq. Taagken makelluni paaptaayekaq.
44009019	Taam kingunganeng neghyalghiimi iknaqsuugtekaq. Saul ugpeqanitkaq Damascus-mi qafsinat aghneghet.
44009020	Mulugpenani synagogue-ni ungipaqegkaa Jesus, Ighneqniluku Kiyaghneghmun.
44009021	Nagatullghiim saghiighayagutkaat repall ellmeggneng aapqughaghutkat, “Unangunghitaa-a yuuk Jerusalem-emi amyuqetiqeghllakaq yughaqayugneng Jesus-em aatghakun? Maavek taginguyalghii tawaten pinaluni, ugpeqat tugulaghnaluki, aglannaluki chief priest-enun.”
44009022	Saul-em ungipaqilleghmikun wata liigikestaghaqaa Jesus, Christ-angutanga repall Jews-et Damascus-melnguut aaghtiiraaghpagningitkaat.
44009023	Saul ungipaqilqinaghyan tawaten qafsinegyagllak aghneq, Jews-et wataqaaghaq ugumiyagutkaat, repall qerngughulluteng agghitkegkaat tuqunnaluku.
44009024	Enkaam aghneghtuumaan, unugtuumaan Damascus-em amigllalghutngani kelengakegkaat tuqunnaluku. Iwernga Saul-em nagaquqaa tawaten agghillghat.
44009025	Enkaam unugmi ataasimi, Saul-em maligsaaghtengita pasket-eghrugllagegnekun mingllutmeng eslatmun ukigtekaat.
44009026	Taagken Saul kaasami Jerusalem-emun ilannaqegkaayaalghii Jesus-em maligsaaghtengitnun. Taawanginaq iingunaghhaghmeng alikegkaat, qayughllak aygughikegkaat ellngallu maligsaaghtengughsimatanga.
44009027	Iwernga Barnabas-em Saul aglaalluku apostle-enun aapqaa Saul-mun tumemi esghaamaniluku Ataneq, aleghquutkaaniluteklu. Aapqaallu Damascus-mi ungipaqaaniluku tetugpenani Aatghakun Jesus-em.
44009028	Enkaam tugukliqaat. Taagken kenlanga Saul ugpeqanitkaq. Igleghutkelluku Jerusalem-emi, ungipaqikaq tetugpenani aatghakun Atanghem. Iwernga ilangita Jews-et Greek-estun akuzikayuget aaghtiiraaqaan tuqusukaqegkangat.
44009030	Ugpeqat liigiksamegteggu Jews-enun tuqunnaqniluku Saul, aglaatkaat Caesarea-mun, taagken kayagtekaat Tarsus-mun.
44009031	Qamaglluteng ugpeqat Judea-mi, Galilee-mi, Samaria-millu amyuutkestengngunateng kiyaghtekat. Ugpellghit iknaqughtekat, alingaqelghiit qaatkunneghitelleghqameggneng Ataneghmun, Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham kayusiingukangi enkaam ugpeqat nulakat.
44009032	Peter-em igleghatkelluku laalighfikuqii Kiyaghneghem yugi naansaghngaata. Ataasimi aghneghmi laalightekaq Lydda-melngughnun.
44009033	Tamaani esghaqaa yuuk aatgha Aeneas, pingayuneng inglulek ayumiqulleq makesigalnguq uniighngatmiineng.
44009034	Peter-em pikaa, “Aeneas, Jesus Christ-am naallghutaaten, makelluten allighan iimggu.” Tawaninginaq Aeneas maketkaq.
44009035	Uglapiglleghhiit Lydda-ghmiitlu Sharon-eghmiitlu esghaghyamegteggu Aeneas naallghulluni, ugpeghtuutkat Ataneghqun.
44009036	Joppa-minguq taawa ugpeqaq aghnaq aatgha Tabitha, (Greek-stun Dorcas, whaten pisiq, quyngiq), quunpeng kayusighimaghllak, kiyang tamaakunun aklumalghiinun.
44009037	Taagken qinuyugluni tuqukaq enkaam ughvughqelluku qemtamun mayuutkaat.
44009038	Joppa-ghmiit ugpeqat nagaquqaat Peter Lydda-menniluku. Lydda, Joppa-meng qantaghaghhanlenguq, enkaam ugpeqat kevgaqegkagket maalghuk yugek Peter-mun tagiragkiighesqelluku Joppa-mun.
44009039	Peter-em yataaghqelluni maligtekakek. Kaasan qemtamun mayuutkaat. Legan iteghtuq ugingighat qiyamaghmeng kanglluqaghlluku kelguvikegkaat aatkaneng Dorcas-em ulimaaghaneng.
44009040	Peter-em aanesqughluki segesqughlluni yughaqaq. Taaqluni yughaneghmeng qiivluku yugusiq pikaa, “Tabitha, maketen.” Tabitha esghaatkelluku esghaghyamigu Peter aqumegkaq.
44009041	Peter-em iiggakun tuguluku nekevestekaa. Taagken tuqluqii ugpeqatlu ugingighatlu esghiisqelluku unguvaamatanga.
44009042	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng Joppa-ghmiit nagaquqaat Tabitha-m unguvallgha enkaam uglapiglleghhiim ugpeqegkaat Ataneq.
44009043	Peter mulukaq Joppa-mi, Simon-enkunitkaq sanaghtistemi.
44010001	Caesarea-minguq taawa yuuk aatgha Cornelius. Umiilgat Rome-em pilluwaghtengita Italy-meng pit.
44010002	Yuuk pinilghii, kayusighimaghllak aklumalghiinun, yughatuqaqlu Kiyaghneghmun. Nengllugutkullghiit, qepghaghtekullghiit maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun.
44010003	Ataasimi aghneghmi 3-klaagmi esghaghwaaqaq. Whateghlluwaaq esghaqaa Kiyaghneghem yaqulga itelghii, yaqulgem tuqluqaa, “Cornelius!”
44010004	Alingruughumaghmi esghapagtughluku yaqulek aaptekaa, “Ataneq, sameng pizin?” Yaqulgem pikaa, “Kiyaghneghem nagaquumii yughalleghten, efquqepigtaallu kayusighillghen aklumalghiinun enkaam neqamikaaten.
44010005	Joppa-mun aqfastigu yuuk aatqelghii Simon Peter-meng.
44010006	Simon-enkunituq sanaghtistemi, mangteghaa esnemetuq.”
44010007	Yaqulgem tawaten piluku unitkaa. Taagken Cornelius-em tuqluqakek maalghuk qepghaghtegni, pillugwaghtallu. Taana pilluwaghta Cornelius-em kayutanga maniguutkayuk Kiyaghneghmun.
44010008	Tagiyata ungipaatngwaaqii esghaghwaalleghmineng, taagken kevgaqegkii Joppa-mun.
44010009	Unaamingani aghneghem qukaani kevgat kaasaghtughaqutlu Joppa-mun, Peter mayuqaq mangtegham qaaynganun yughaghnaluni.
44010010	Taagken iyataqaq, sameng neghyukaq. Sama neqmeng yataaghqumaluki Peter esghaghwaaqaq.
44010011	Esghaqaa qilak qelpelghii, taagken esghaqaa qiipaghaghllagsugnilnguq ukigtekangat nunamun estamatgun tekerqaakun.
44010012	Taawanguq imaqeftuq allaaghhiinaghneng teghikusaneng, reptile-eneng, qawaagnengllu tengaakayugneng.
44010013	Taagken mem pikaa, “Peter, makelluten tuqutiluten neghi!”
44010014	Iwernga Peter-em pikaa, “Yeghlegillu, Ataneq! Neghigatunga iinghutkameng ukmanginneghilngughmeng teghikusameng.”
44010015	Mem pilaataqaa, “Kiyaghneghem ukmangiqaqii taakut, ukmanginneghinniluki pigpenaki.”
44010016	Tawaten pikaq pingayuneng ketwhell. Taagken tawaninginaq taana iingunaghmi qilagmun mayuutkaq.
44010017	Peter-em kukriqutkegkaa sameng pisiitanga esghaghwaalleni. Tawaten pimaluku Cornelius-em kevgiita liitkaat Simon-em mangteghaa naantulanga, enkaam manughaanun kaatkat.
44010018	Qamavek aaptekiit, “Whani aqelqaanghitaa yuuk aatgha Simon Peter?”
44010019	Peter-em paninang sumeghtaghaatkumaluku esghaghwaalleni, Taghnegham pikaa, “Uyuq, yuget pingayut ivaghaqaaten.
44010020	Ukigluten qaqilqafqaavek maligtiki, qayughllak whanga kayagtanka elpenun.”
44010021	Enkaam Peter-em ukigluni pikii, “Whanganguuq ivaqaghsi. Sameng pistengnga?”
44010022	Kiimsiqaat, “Cornelius-em kevgaqiinkut, umiilguuq Rome-em pilluwaghtengitnun. Yuuk pinighllagtuq maniguutkayuk Kiyaghneghmun, qamagllutengllu Jews-et siivakepigtaqaat. Kiyaghneghem yaqulgan pikaqaa Cornelius, ‘Aqfastigu Peter elpesinun pisqelluku, nagatesqelluku sameng pilleghqaa elpenun.’”
44010023	Taagken Peter-em iitghesqegkii, tawanillu qaviisqegkii. Unaamingani yataaghqelluni maligtekii Cornelius-em kevgii, ugpeqatlu ilangi Joppa-meng maligutkat.
44010024	Taagken unaamingani kaatkat Caesarea-mun. Cornelius-em ilakwaanillu ilakumtaanillu tagilaghaatesluki ellmeggnun utaqakaat Peter.
44010025	Peter iitghaquqlu Cornelius-em payeghluku segesqughfikegkaa manigughnaluku.
44010026	Iwernga Peter-em nekevestutkelluku pikaa, “Nekevi, whangallu yuguunga.”
44010027	Iitghutkelluku Peter-em aleghquqaa Cornelius. Iteghyalghiimi taawa yuuk qerngughuteghllagumalghii tawani.
44010028	Peter-em pikii, “Liisimakngwaaghaghsi whangkuta Jews-eni Liilightuusamta ineghtekaqiinkut ilatefqaamta pisqelluta Gentile-enun, talwa laalighfikesnaniqaqii. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem kelguvikaanga kina alngunak ukmanginneghinniluku sumeghtaghaatkefqaan pisqelluku.
44010029	Aqfasafsinga tagiinga qaqilqagpenanga. Sangama piiqestengnga?”
44010030	Cornelius-em pikaa, “Whaten lliighumaan akuwaaq piiqellemtun yughaamalunga 3-kellaagmi, yuuk manumkun nekevuq aatkii nighugllaget.
44010031	Whaa piinga, ‘Cornelius! Kiyaghneghem yughalleghten nagaquumii, neqamikiillu aklumalghiinun kayusighilleghten.
44010032	Joppa-mun kina kevgaqigu aqfasqelluku Simon Peter. Simon-enkunituq sanaghtistemi, mangteghaa esnemetuq.’
44010033	Enkaam tawaninginaq aqfasqamken, quyakamken tagilghiiten. Liisimakluku Kiyaghneghem nayuqellgha qamaglluta whaanlengughni nagaqughyugaghput sangwaa qamaglluku Atanghem elpenun aapghesqegkaa whangkunnun.”
44010034	Taagken Peter-em pikii, “Taawa ipa liigikaqa Kiyaghneq taniillghiteftuq, tawatengwaaq pikayuguftaa tamaghhaghllagan yuuk ataasistun.
44010035	Tuguklighyaghqaqaa kina alngunak nakumiinguyaghngaan alikilghii ellmineng, pinitunllu pikayuk.
44010036	Liisimakaghsi Kiyaghneghem ungipaa ungipaqegkaq Israel-eghmiinun, taana Pinilghii Ungipaq yuget nekeggmellengusighqaqaat Kiyaghneghmun Jesus Christ-akun. Jesus Christ-a, Atanqaa tamaghhaghwaaghmi yugem.
44010037	Liisimakaghsi taana ungipaq mingitkaaguq Judea-lqaaghaghmi, piinliqaq Galilee-mi John-em ungipaqaqngagu paaptaayelleq.
44010038	Liisimakaghsi Jesus Nazareth-eghmii, Kiyaghneghem imiqaa Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmengllu. Navek alngunak pineghmini pinitun piiqegkangi yuget, naallghuquqiillu tamaakut Tughneghaam aaghqutaqegkii, qayughllak Kiyaghneq Jesus-melnguq.
44010039	Whangkuta apostle-eni liisimakistenguukut tamaghhaanun tawaten pillghanun Jews-et nunangitni, Jerusalem-emillu. Tuqutkaqaat tuquuqaalluku qaquurakun.
44010040	Iwernga pingayiitangani aghneghem Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng, esghaghtestekaqaallu yugnun.
44010041	Iwernga qamaglluni yugem esghaamangitaa. Whangkuta esghaqaqaghput qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiinkut liisimakistenguluta. Talwa neghelgusiqaqaghputlu meghelgusiqaqaghputlu kingunganeng unguvaghtestellghan tuqulleghmeng.
44010042	Taagken kayagtekaqiinkut ungipaqesqelluku Pinilghii Ungipaq, aapghesqegkaaguqlu Kiyaghneghmun nakmikegkaqniluni nanqigtistenguluni unguvalghiinunllu tuqukanunllu.
44010043	Qamaglluteng uuknaliqistet pikaagut, kitumnguq alngunak ugpeqegkumigu aatghakun, seghevutellengyaghqaaguq seghleghqelleghmineng.”
44010044	Peter paninang akuzimaluku qamaglluki nagallghiit ungipameng Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham iitqii, enkaam allaaghlluwhatun akuzistekiillu usuqistekiillu Kiyaghneghmeng. Circumcise-ekat ugpeqat Joppa-meng maligutkat Peter-mun saghiighayukat nagasamegteki tawaten akuzillghiit. Liigikegkaat Kiyaghneghem Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak tunusaqegkek talwa Gentile-enun. Taagken Peter-em pikii,
44010047	“Ukut yuget allgeghutut Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng whangkuteghpigaghestun. Kitumngam paaptaayesnanighnaqaki meghqun?”
44010048	Taagken qelqii paaptaayesqelluki Aatghakun Jesus Christ-am. Taam kingunganeng ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaat Peter.
44011001	Apostle-etlu ugpeqatlu Judea-melnguut nagaquqiit Gentile-enunllu ugpequmaniluki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi.
44011002	Peter kaasan Jerusalem-emun, Jews-et ugpeqat circumcise-eghiyukat Gentile-et ugpeqiitneng seghlequuqaat Peter, pikaat,
44011003	“Sangan circumcize-emangilnguut iteghvikluki nengitnun neghelgusighsiki?”
44011004	Liigikesqelluki Peter-em esghaghwaalleghmineng kenlanga aapqaa sangwaa qamaglluku apeghiiqaq.
44011005	“Joppa-mi yughaamalunga esghaghwaaqaagunga. Esghaghaqa qiipaghaghllagsugni estamatgun tekerqaakun ukigtekangat qilagmeng whangamnun.
44011006	Tawavek yuvghiighwaaghyaqegka imaqeftuq allaaghhiinaghneng teghikusaneng, reptile-eneng, qawaagneng tengaakayugneng.
44011007	Taagken ma nagaqughaqa whaten pilghii, ‘Peter, makelluten tuqutiluten neghi!’
44011008	Iwernga kiimsighaqa, ‘Yeghlegillu Ataneq! Neghigatanka tamaakut ukmanginneghilnguut neqet iinghutkat.’
44011009	“Mem pilaataghaanga qilagmeng, ‘Kiyaghneghem ukmangiqaqii tamaakut, ukmanginneghinniluki sumeghtaghaatkesaghqaqenghitaten.’
44011010	Tawaten pikaaguq pingayuneng ketwhell. Taagken qamaglluteng taakut aga qilagmun mayuutaqutlu,
44011011	whaa yuget pingayut kaatut tukumnun, kevgaaftut whangamnun Caesarea-meng.
44011012	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham qaqilqafqaama maligtesqii. Ukutlu aghvinlek yuget ugpeqaalguteput maligutut Joppa-meng Caesarea-mun. Kaalluta Cornelius-enkunun iteghaatukut.
44011013	Cornelius-em aapghaa yaqulegmeng esghaatelleni nemini, yaqulgemnguq whaten pii, ‘Joppa-mun aqfastigu yuuk aatqelghii Simon Peter-meng.
44011014	Ungipaalleqiisi nengllugutkullghiini naten yugulillengelleghqameng.’
44011015	Enkaam akuziiqungallu Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham iitghii tawatengwaaq whangkunnun itelleghmitun Pentecost-em Aghneghani.
44011016	Taagken neqangughaqa Atanghem pillgha whaten, ‘John paaptaayelaqaaguq meghqun, iwernga elpesi paaptaayellequsi Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun.’
44011017	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem tuunumakaki Gentile-et taagken ataasimeng tunusameng tuunegkamineng whangkunnun ugpeqaqngamteggu Ataneq Jesus Christ-a, whanga kinanguzinga aghuliighhnaqsaghqaaluku Kiyaghneq tawaten pillghaneng Gentile-enun?”
44011018	Tawaten Peter-em piyisteng qallegnanighluteng, yeghlegi usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq. Pikat, “Taawa liigikaghput Kiyaghneghem talwa Gentile-et pilleghqalisimakangi avuteghqesqelluki seghleghqellghitneng, unguvallengesqellukillu kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng!”
44011019	Stephen-em tuqutellgha kenlekluku Jews-et amyuutkegkiit ugpeqat, enkaam anakat Jerusalem-emeng. Aghulaquutkat kenlanga Phoenicia-mun, Cyprus-mun, Antioch-munllu. Igleghutkelluku ungipaqegkiit Pinilghiit Ungipat Jews-nginaghhaghnun.
44011020	Iwernga ilangi ugpeqat Cyprus-mengllu Cyrene-mengllu Antioch-etkat, kaalluteng ungipaqegkaat Ataneq Jesus talwa Jews-ngunghilngughnun.
44011021	Atanghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha ellngitnitkaalghii, enkaam uglapestaaq yuuk ugpeghtuulluni qiivuutkaq Ataneghmun.
44011022	Ugpeqat Jerusalem-emelnguut nagalluku Peter, Barnabas kayagtekaat Antioch-mun.
44011023	Kaasalghiimi uglaapiglleghhii yuuk ugpeghtuulluni ayuqeftuq, enkaam quyaghllakaq qayughllak liigikegkaa Kiyaghneghem piniqingalleghllaga yugnun. Barnabas pinilghiingulghii yuuk, imighngaghllaklu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, ugpeqillelegllaklu. Taagken allangughtefqiita ataasiighmetekestiisqegkii Ataneghmun. Wataqaaghaq ilangitallu yuget ugpeqegkaat Ataneq.
44011025	Taagken Barnabas-em Saul ivaghyaghtuqaa Tarsus-mun.
44011026	Naalkesamigu kelqegkaa Antioch-mun. Ataasiq ayumiqulleq tamaantelleghmegni ilataqlutek ugpeqanun apeghtughikak yulghuteghllagnun. Tamaani Antioch-mi ugpeqat atighyuwhaaqiit, “Christian-et.”
44011027	Tamaani ilangi uuknaliqistem Jerusalem-emeng Antioch-mun tagikat.
44011028	Ataasiq Agabus-nguftuq, nekevluni uuknaliqegkaq Taghneghagnekun neqangisagllagnaqniluku tamangani. Taawa neqangisagllakaq Claudius Umiilegpigaaluku.
44011029	Ugpeqat ugpeqaalguteteng Judea-melnguut kayusighyukiit pitutalmegestun.
44011030	Enkaam qerngughtiluteng manimeng tuyughikat elder-enun Jerusalem-emelngughnun Barnabas-enkugnekun Saul-enkugnekun.
44012001	Nani tamaani pilleghmi Umiilgem Herod-em amyuutkesagutkii ilangi ugpeqat.
44012002	John-em anglegutanga James tuqutestekaa savigpagkun.
44012003	Umiilgem Herod-em liigiksamigu Jews-eneng efqughtilleni tawaten pilleghmikun, qelghutkaa Peter tugusqelluku. (Tawaten pikaaftuq Neqenghaghqengnguluki Yeast-aliimangilngughmeng Neqekrangllameng.)
44012004	Peter tuguyatgu, Umiilgem Herod-em qelghutkaa 16-eghyagnun pilluwaghtenun kelengakesqelluku estamakaghtiita kipullgutaqluki. Yugtuqami nanqigsukaa kingunganeng Passover-em.
44012005	Enkaam Peter anusimingllaghvigmetestekaa. Iwernga ugpeqat yughaatkeghllakaat Kiyaghneghmun.
44012006	Peter qavaalghii maalghuk kelengakistek akulegkeni, petugngalghiillu malghugneghteggun qiipraghutetgun. Allameng anusimingllaghvigem amiga kelengakistelek. Whaa aghtekan Herod-em tagitesnaqngukanga yugnun nanqigtesqelluku.
44012007	Atanghem yaqulga aliighaghtekaq, enkaam nighuk kuukgutkaq anusimingllaghvigem ilunganun. Yaqulgem Peter tuuyngakun aghulalluku, teghtughlluku pikaa, “Egmiinaq maketen!” Tawaninginaq qiipraghutet ifkaquutkat iigganeng.
44012008	Taagken yaqulgem pikaa, “Pilugugluten kaamgegken aatikek.” Peter pisqellghatun pikaq. Yaqulgem pilaataqaa, “Qaasligken aallukek maligtinga.”
44012009	Enkaam Peter-em maligtekaa. Ugpequmangitngwaaqaqsaqanga aanutelleni, yeghlegi sumeghtaghaqaq esghaghwaaghniluni.
44012010	Sivuliitlu tuunglighhiillu kelengakistet naghughlluki kaatkak savikenghaaghmun amigmun. Amik ellmineng qelpeghyan, aanlutek igleghteghngaagmek tumetgun yaqulek aviitqaghtekaq.
44012011	Taagken Peter-em liigikngwaaqaa samatni enkaam pikaq, “Taawa ipanguftuq Atanghem kayagsimaa yaquleni iqitutesqellunga Herod-meng, Jews-etlu salleghqiitneng.”
44012012	Liigikluku samatni Mary-nkunun aglaqaq, John Mark-em naanganun. Tawani yulghun qerngughulluni yughaateghllagulghii qerngaghmi.
44012013	Peter eslaklighqun amigkun tenglugtughyan aghnaghaam qepghaghtem, Rhoda-m qelpeghusaghtuqaa.
44012014	Liisuqsamigu Peter-em menga, quyaghllagem angtalanganeng qelpeghutegpenaan, yeghlegi ilutmun iitqaghlluni aapqaa qakma Peter manughamenniluku.
44012015	Iwernga pikaat, “Temngi piiten!” Iwernga sagiqutkii ipanguniluku. Taagken pikaat, “Yaqulkenghitaguwha.”
44012016	Qakma Peter tenglugtuumanginaqaq. Qelpeghusaqmegteggu ellnganguftuq enkaam saghiighayukat.
44012017	Peter-em apaqukii qallegnaniisqelluki, enkaam ungipamsugutngwaaqii Atanghem aanutellghaneng anusimingllaghvigmeng. Pikiillu, “Aapqaghnakefsinga James-munllu ugpeqaalgutemnnunllu tawaten pimanilunga.” Taagken aanluni natmun pikaq.
44012018	Aghtaghaghaqaallu kelengakistet aviilngaqaat Peter, alingrughumaghmeng kukriqegkat samatanga.
44012019	Herod-em ivaghtesimayaqanga iwernga naalkumangitkaat. Enkaam kelengakistet aapqughaaghtesluki nalluksatgu tuququghtestekii. Taam kingunganeng Herod Judea-meng Caesarea-lluni tamaanteghraakaq.
44012020	Umiilgem Herod-em ugumiyaguteghllagukangi Tyre-eghmiitlu Sidon-eghmiitlu, iwernga tamaakumiit yuget kayagtekiit Blastus-mun akuzitunnaqaghtesqelluteng Herod-mun. Blastus igleghutistekegkanga Umiilgem Herod-em mangteghaghllagan. Kaalluteng aaptekaat Blastus akuzitutaghtesqelluteng umiilegmun. Tawaten pikaalghiit neqengnanighnayukameng Herod-em nunanganeng.
44012021	Tawani aghneghmi pivigkameggni Herod-em umiilgusit aatkani aatqughluki aqumluni aqumutaghllagegmikun akuzikaq.
44012022	Taaqsan akuzineghmeng yuget akilghuukat, “Yugunghituq akuzilghii, naliqaat kiyaghneghet!”
44012023	Tawaninginaq Atanghem yaqulgan qinuyugtesteghllakaa Herod, qayughllak tugukliqanga quulvalleq Kiyaghneghem pinga. Unguvaghmi kingugtaaghllagluni tuqukaq.
44012024	Taawa Kiyaghneghem ungipii mingisimanginaqat enkaam wata yuuk ugpeghtuutkaq.
44012025	Taakuk Barnabas-enkuk Saul-enkuk apeghiighyamegnegu qepghaqaghtek Jerusalem-emi, Antioch-mun uteghniqak kelqelluku John Mark.
44013001	Antioch-mi ugpeqam ilangi uuknaliqistenguftutlu apeghtughistenguftutlu. Taakunguftut Barnabas, Simeon, atilqelghii Niger-meng, Lucius (Cyrene-meng pi), Manaen (anglilgutanga umiilgem Herod-em), Saul-llu.
44013002	Maniguusimaluki Ataneghmun, fast-emalukillu, Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham pikii, “Aaftekek Barnabas-enkuk Saul-enkuk, qayughllak nakmikagka allaneng qepghaqameng qepghiisqellukek whangamnun.”
44013003	Taaqsameng fast-elleghmengllu yughalleghmengllu saaflukek yughaatkellukek aghulaqestekagket.
44013004	Barnabas-enkuk Saul-enkuk, Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham kayagsistek, Seleucia-tkak kelqelluku John Mark kayutnguluku. Tamaaken angyaghpagkun qiighqamun Cyprus-mun pikat. Kaasameng Salamis-mun synagogue-ngitni ungipaqikat akuzitanganeng Kiyaghneghem.
44013006	Salamis-meng igleghakat inglunganun qiighqam Paphos-mun kaatelleghmeggnun kenlanga. Tamaani nallaqaat yuuk alignalghii aatgha Bar-Jesus, uuknaliqestesighwaaq, Jews-a.
44013007	Qiighqam Governor-ngan Sergius Paulus-em ilakumtaagha. Sergius Paulus pillegllak. Aqfastekakek Barnabas-enkuk Saul-enkuk nagannaluki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi.
44013008	Iwernga Bar-Jesus-em alignalghiim, ateghalgem Elymas-meng, aaghtiiraaqakek governor-a ugpeghnayukan. (Ateq Elymas, Greek-stun whaten pisiilghii, alignalghii.)
44013009	Taagken Saul-em, ateghaqelghiim Paul-meng, imighngalghiim Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, esghapagtughluku alignalghii
44013010	pikaa, “Uyuq Tughneghaam ighnegha! Ugumikan sangwaa qamaglluku pinilghii. Iqlengasagllaguutenllu seghletunllu pisteghllaguuten. Taaqnaqenghisikii iqlengiqusiqneghmeng Atanghem apeghtuusii?
44013011	Whaa Atanghem aghyuughnaqaaten ayaastemmeng, enkaam esghaatelghaghtughnaanghituten aghneghem nighuganeng.” Tawaninginaq Elymas-em iiskek mamleghqwaakak, enkaam tamaani eflughwaaghmeng ivaghikaq kitumun tasluqiisqelluni.
44013012	Governor-a ugpeqaq esghapagluku tawaten pilghii, saghiighayagutkaallu apeghtuusaq Ataneghmeng ayuqelghii.
44013013	Paul-enkut igleghalgutkullghiit angyaghpagkun igleghtekat Paphos-meng, Perga-mun Pamphylia-melngughmun. Tamaanlluki John Mark-em unilluki Jerusalem-emun uteghniqaq.
44013014	Taagken Paul-enkut Perga-meng, Antioch-etkat Pisidia-melngughmun. Sabbath-ngughsagu synagogue-ngitnun iteghluteng aqumegkat.
44013015	Igleghutistengi synagogue-em, taaqsameng atightuneghmeng Liilightuusanengllu uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkiitneng, kevgaqutkiit Paul-enkut whaten pisqelluki, “Ugpeqaalgutemnni, ungipalgukufsi iknaqsuugusighqameng ugpellemnnun, saaqetsi akuzitek.”
44013016	Taagken Paul nekevluni apaqumaghmi pikii, “Israel-eghmiini, elpesillu Gentile-eni maniguutkayugni Kiyaghneghmun, nagatengnga!
44013017	Whangkuta Israel-eghmiini maniguqamta Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii sivuneput, nulasteghllakaqiillu nunataawaqngata Egypt-mi. Taakwaningani qepghaghtelaaghughtekat iwernga Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun aghulaqutkaqii Egypt-meng.
44013018	Kilgaanilluki qaatkutepagllanghiteghngaata ellminun paninang aflengakegkaqii ketwhell 40 ayumiqulleghni.
44013019	Taagken Kiyaghneghem naafqesamiki taakut maaghraghvinlek ramket Canaan-melnguut nunaksaqangat piliitestekaqaa sivunemnnun pagitaqesqelluku.
44013020	Entaqun 450-nguut ayumiqullghet Kiyaghneghem nakmikellghaneng sivuneput kenlanga nuna piliitellghitnun. “Taam kingunganeng nanqigtistengestaataqaqii igleghutesqelluki kenlanga Samuel uuknaliqista igleghutistekaaghtellghitnun.
44013021	Taagken umiilengyuwaqngata Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa Saul umiilkesqelluku Kish-em ighnegha, Benjamin-em ramkenganeng pi. Umiilgukaaguq 40 ayumiqulleghni.
44013022	Kiyaghneghem umiilgunanightesamigu Saul, David umiileliitestekaa ellngitnun. Kiyaghneghem akuzitkegkaqaa whaten, ‘Jesse-m ighnegha David umiilgughtesugaqa. Tawatelnguq yuuk piyukaqaqa, qayughllak piyaghqaqaa sangwaa alngunak piyukegkaqa.’
44013023	“Taakwaningani David-em kingunghakun Kiyaghneghem akeqilleghmitun allgeghtestekaqaa Yugulighista Israel-eghmiinun. Taana yugulighista Jesus-nguuq.
44013024	Jesus-em salin qepghaqani piinlillghilluku John ungipaqikaaguq Israel-eghmiinun whaten, ‘Avuteghqellusi, seghleghqennanighlusi, paaptaayetek.’
44013025	John-em qepghaqani taaqsaghtungestaghluku pikaaguq, ‘Kinangunilunga piiqestengnga? Whangangunghituq utaqakaghsi. Kingumneng tagiyaghqaaguq aangeghllalghii, repall whanga pininghitunga singiinun itemtistengulunga.’
44013026	“Ugpeqaalgutemni, Abraham-em kingunghitni, Gentile-enillu maniguutkayugni Kiyaghneghmun, taana ungipaa yugulillghem whangkunnun pinguuq!
44013027	Jerusalem-eghmiit igleghutistekullghiit nallukegkaqaat Jesus Yugulighistengutanga, qaywa Sabbath-a tamaghhaan nagateghngaaghmegteki uuknaliqistet igaqegkiit. Naqam uuknaliqistet igaqegkiit apeghiiqaqiit agghitkaqngamegteggu Jesus tuqunnaluku.
44013028	Taawa legan temngi apalliiteghngaan tuqutusighqameng Pilate-mun tuqutesqegkaqaat.
44013029	Legan Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun pikaqaat. Taagken qaquurameng ateghlluku lliifqaqaat,
44013030	iwernga Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng.
44013031	Taam kingunganeng igleghalgutkegkiita Jesus-em Galilee-meng, Jerusalem-emun esghaghaataqaqaat qafsinegyagni aghneghni. Ellnginguut ungipalghiit yumnnun esghaamaniluku Jesus unguvaluku.
44013032	“Whaten pikaagut, ‘Ungipaatamsi Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaaneng sivunemnnun.
44013033	Apeghiighumaa akequsani whangkunnun kingunghitnun, unguvaghtestelleghmikun Jesus tuqulleghmeng.’ Kiyaghneq pikaaguq whaten Psalm 2-mi, ‘Elpek Ighneqamken, aghneghmi whani Ataliitaghpenga.’
44013034	Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqaa Jesus tuqulleghmeng enkaangam allamengllu tuqunaanghituq aghyughyaghqaaluni. Enkaam Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Agleghnalghiit akequsaqegkanka David-mun ipapestaaq quyastisiqelleqanka elpesinun.’
44013035	Ilangani Psalms-em Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, ‘Agleghnalghiin aghusnaanghitaqa lliveghmi.’
44013036	“David-em unguvalleghmini atuqegkaqaa Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha. Taagken qavaghyan qunguqaqaat sivunghan saaghwitgun, yugusii aghukaaguq lliveghmi.
44013037	Iwernga taana Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaa tuqulleghmeng aghumangituq.
44013038	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesinun liitesqesugaqa Jesus-kun yuget seghleghqellghit seghevutellengegkayuguut. Taanata ungipaqegkegka elpesinun.
44013039	Qaatkutellghem Moses-em Liilightuusiitgun kina alngunak itemunnaanghitaa seghleghqellghaneng, iwernga kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu Jesus, itemusaghqaaguq tamaghhaaneng seghleghqelleghmineng.
44013040	Kiyaghneq pikaaguq uuknaliqistetgun whaten, ‘Nagatek elpesi aygughitalghiini. Saaqetsi saghiighayuglusi tuqutek, qayughllak unguvangulusi sallequnga iwernga ugpeqnaanghitaghsi talwa kitum ungipaateghngiisi.’ Kelengalusi, luuraq tawaten pinayukafsi.”
44013042	Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk synagogue-meng aanumalukek alla tagisqegkagket tuunglighhaani Sabbath-em, wata ungipiqutesqelluteng.
44013043	Aanleghaasameng Jews-elghutetlu, Gentile-elghutetlu maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun Jews-estun, maligutkat Paul-enkugnun Barnabas-enkugnun. Apostle-ek kayemegkiik kiyaghtekestiisqelluki sighimakluku Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha.
44013044	Tuunglighhaani Sabbath-em qamagtevzighluteng Antioch-eghmiit nagasaatkat Atanghem ungipaaneng.
44013045	Jews-et aqinakat esghaghyamegteki yulghuteghllaget enkaam Paul kipullginaqaat, seghleqegkaatlu.
44013046	Iwernga Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk tetugpenaki Jews-et pikiik, “Kiyaghneghem ungipaa elpesinun sivukluni apeghyaghqaayaghtuq iwernga nagasugumangitusi. Kiyaghneghem ungipaa ighsakegkaqutegpesineng, palaqegkaategpesinengllu kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengelleghqaghpesineng, whaa Gentile-enun ungipaqinaqukut Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng.
44013047	Tawaten piikut qayughllak Atanghem qelqaqiinkut whaten, ‘Nakmikegkaqamsi nighugulusi Gentile-enun, aapghesqelluku yugulilleq nunataghhaanun tamaghhaanun.’”
44013048	Gentile-et nagaqughluki taakut akuzitet quyaghllakat, pikaalghiitlu, “Kiyaghneghem ungipaa piniipigtuq.” Tamaakut Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengesqelluki ugpeqikat ungipameng.
44013049	Enkaam tamaani Antioch-mi, uvitanganilngughnillu nunani Atanghem ungipaa mingitkaq.
44013050	Iwernga Jews-et takukiit Gentile-et aghniit maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun, igleghutistengillu Antioch-em naavguunnalukek Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk. Tamaaken apalluqluku amyuutkegkagket taakuk yugek, aghulaqestekagketlu nunameggneng.
44013051	Enkaam apostle-ek itegatek pagulangiqiik kelgunnaluku peggniluki kipullginaalghiit Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng. Taagken Iconium-emun aghulaqegkak.
44013052	Iwernga tamaakut ugpeqat Antioch-melnguut quyangaghllagetlu, imighngalghiitlu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.
44014001	Iconium-emi Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk piiqelleghmegetun synagogue-mun aglaqak. Tawani whateghlluwaaq akuzikak repall Jews-elghutetlu, Gentile-elghutetlu ugpeghtuutkat.
44014002	Enkaam Iconium-emetelqinaqak, tamaani tetugpenatek ungipaqikak Ataneghmeng. Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk Atanghem allaaghlluwhaghtisteghllagaataqakek yugnun ipangutanga liigikesqelluku ungipaqegkaak Atanghem nangllegtallgha. Iwernga ugpeghyugumangilnguut Jews-et Gentile-enun seghletun sumeghtaghaatkestekiit ugpeqat.
44014004	Enkaam Iconium-eghmiit malghughkegkat, ilangi ilatkat Jews-enun, ilangi apostle-enun.
44014005	Taagken ilangita Gentile-etlu, Jews-etlu maligulluteng igleghutistemeggnun amyuutkesukagket apostle-ek, milughpagaataghhiinaqlu tuqusukagket.
44014006	Nagaqughyamek yugnun tawaten pinaqnilutek, qimakak Lycaonia-m neghllagegkenun Lystra-munllu, Derbe-munllu, uvitegkenilngughnunllu nenun.
44014007	Enkaam tamaani ungipaqegkiik Pinilghiit Ungipat.
44014008	Lystra-minguq taawa yuuk itegii natelnguut allgenghhaghhaatmineng ima enkaam piyugigalnguq.
44014009	Aqumgaghmi tawani nagatkaa Paul akuzilghii. Paul-em liigikegkaa yuuk ugpelghii Kiyaghneghmun naallghulleqniluni.
44014010	Enkaam qiivluku tawavek iglagtupiglluni pikaa, “Nekevngwaaghi itegaghpegun!” Aga yuuk nekefqaghlluni tamaani piyukaq.
44014011	Yulghutet esghapagluku Paul-em naallghutillgha araghaataatkat Lycaonia-ghmiistun, “Yuguluteng kiyaghneghet takwiinkut!”
44014012	Barnabas Zeus-ngunikaat enkaam Paul Hermes-ngunikaat kiyang akuzistengutanganeng.
44014013	Priest-ngan Zeus-emllu, yugetlu aghqerraaghyukagket Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk. Enkaam priest-a tagitkaq teghikusamengllu piitesiighaghmengllu Lystra-m mingllutangan amigllaganun. (Temple-a kiyaghnengllaqamun Zeus-mun amigllagem tunganganilnguq).
44014014	Iwernga apostle-ek Barnabas-enkuk Paul-enkuk liigiksamegneki sanaqutangi aatkatek piiguqiik. Taagken aqfaasnaq yugnun qungangiitkak araamaagmek,
44014015	“Ukughsi yugni, sangafsi tawaten pitsi? Whangkutungllu yuguukung elpesistungwaaq! Ungipaqiyaghtuugukung Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng elpesinun, tunullusi satngunghilngughneng maniguqaghpesineng qiivesqellusi unguvalghiimun Kiyaghneghmun. Ellngan ulimakaqii qilak, nuna, kellii, sangwaallu tamaghhaan taakunilnguq.
44014016	Sivunghani agani Kiyaghneghem qamaglluki ramket Jews-ngunghilnguut piyukellghistun pistekaqii.
44014017	Iwernga tawateteghngaata paninang liisimakestekaaguq unguvaniluni pinitun pilleghmikun tamaghhaanun. Eslallugughtestaqaa nunivagseghat nagusqelluki. Ayumiqulleq kaspuglluku piitestaqii piisaghqat piitfigit kaanneghata neqelgusqellusi, quyangasqellusillu.”
44014018	Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk tawaten akuzighngaayek taawa paninang Lystra-ghmiit aghqerraaghnaqutkegkagket. Iwernga pegnem pisneghitkak.
44014019	Taagken ilangi Jews-et Antioch-mengllu Iconium-emengllu kaatkat Lystra-mun. Lystra-ghmiinun naavguullukek ugumiitestekagket. Enkaam Jews-etlu, Lystra-ghmiitlu Paul milughpagaataghluku qamuqaat nem kelutanganun sumeghmeggni tuqumaniluku.
44014020	Iwernga ugpeqat takulaghaasatni Paul nekevluni aglanqigtekaq nemun. Taagken unaamingani elkek Barnabas-enkuk Derbe-mun aglaqak.
44014021	Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk ungipaqikak Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Derbe-mi enkaam uglaq maligsaaghtengughtekaq. Taagken Lystra-mun pinqigtekak, taagken Iconium-emun, Antioch-munllu pikak Pisidia-melngughmun.
44014022	Takuughaqamegni tamaani apeghtuqiik ugpeqat ugpeqillghit wata iknaqughtesqelluki, kayemegkiiklu ugpellghit aghuliitesqelluki. Pikiik, “Uglapestaaq seghleliilleq atuqsaghqapestaaqaghput iteghyaghqaaghhnaluta Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem.”
44014023	Takuughaqamegnillu nakmiightuqak Elder-kaghqameng igleghutesqelluki ugpeqat. Taagken yughaamaagmek fast-ekak. Taam kingunganeng Ataneghmun ugpeqegkamegnun yughaatkegkiik Elder-et aflengakesqelluki.
44014024	Taagken Pisidia-kun igleghakak Pamphylia-mun.
44014025	Tamaani Perga-mi, Pamphylia-melngughmi ungipaqikak Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Taaqsamek tesamavek Attalia-mun pikak.
44014026	Taagken Antioch-mun angyaghpagkun aghulaqegkak. (Tamaani Antioch-mi ugpeqat Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk aghulaqellghillukek yughaatkegkaqegkegket. Aaputkaqegkegket Kiyaghneghmun kayusiitesqellukek ungipaqillghegkeni. Taananguuq qepghaqaq apeghiiqaak.)
44014027	Kaasamek Antioch-mun ugpeqat qerngughtekiik. Ungipaatkiik Kiyaghneghem apeghiillghaneng ellmetegnegun, aapqaaklu Kiyaghneghmun ugpeqilleghqalitellghi Gentile-et.
44014028	Tamaani muluughllakak ugpeqani.
44015001	Taagken Judea-meng ilangi yuget tagiluteng Antioch-mun ugpeqanun apeghtughikat, “Yugulillengnaanghitusi wetkuqun circumcise-ekufsi Moses-em Liilightuusaan qelellghatun.”
44015002	Iwernga Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk elngaatall aaghtiiraaqiik taakut yuget apeghtuusiitneng. Enkaam ugpeqat nakmikegkiit Paul-enkuk, Barnabas-enkuk, ilangillu yuget Antioch-meng pit, Jerusalem-etesqelluki aapsaghtiisqelluki apostle-etlu Elder-etlu qerngaghmelnguut naliq apeghtuusaq elqughutngatanga.
44015003	Kayagsisteng Paul-enkut igleghatkelluku Phoenicia-kunllu, Samaria-kunllu ugpeqat tamaanlenguut ungipaatkiit Gentile-et Kiyaghneghmun qiivuusimaniluki, enkaam qamaglluteng ugpeqat quyateghllakat.
44015004	Kaasata Jerusalem-emun apostle-etlu, Elder-etlu, ugpeqatlu upughatkiit. Taagken Paul-enkut apeghlaataqaat Kiyaghneghem apeghiillgha ellmegteggun.
44015005	Ilangi ugpeqat Pharisees-et nekevluteng pikat, “Tamaakut Gentile-et yugulillengyaghqaanghitut wetkuqun circumcise-elutengllu, qaatkullutengllu Moses-em Liilightuusaanun.”
44015006	Taagken apostle-etlu Elder-etlu qerngughutkat agghitkennalukek taakuk.
44015007	Akuzitkenneghpagllakaat. Taagken Peter-em nekevluni pikii, “Ugpeqaalgutemni, liisimakaghsi qavngaq Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga Gentile-enun ungipaqisqellunga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ugpeghesqelluki.
44015008	Kiyaghneghem liisimakilghiim yugem tamaghhaan sumeghtaghallghaneng, tugukliqaqii Gentile-et. Kelgutkaqaa tuguklighilleni ellngitneng tuunelleghmikun Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak katam tawaten whangkunnun tuunelleghmitun.
44015009	Whangkutestungwaaq kiyaghutaqii; whangkutestungwaaq ukmangighaqii ilungit ugpenghata.
44015010	Enkaam sangan'ngam Kiyaghneq sakraasnaqutkengngusteggu qelelleghpesigun Gentile-et ugpeqiit qaatkelluki Liilightuusaput kiyaghtesqelluki? Talwa sivunemtallu whangkutallu qaatkepagningilkeput taakut Liilightuusat yugulillengnaluta.
44015011	Iwernga ugpeqaghput Kiyaghneghem yugulikaqiinkut kayusillghakun Atanghem Jesus-em tawateghpigaq Gentile-enun pilleghmitun.”
44015012	Taagken tawantullghiit qallegnanighwaaghulluteng nagatkagket Barnabas-enkuk, Paul-enkuk aapqangik ellmetegnegun Kiyaghneghem allaaghlluwhaghtillghi Gentile-enun.
44015013	Akuzineghmeng taaqsayek James-em pikii, “Ugpeqaalgutemni, nagataghtengnga!
44015014	Simon Peter-em ungipaatiinkut naten Kiyaghneghem nakmikuqestallghi Gentile-et ellminun katam yuguluki. Tawaten pilleghmikun liigikestekaqii ellngitlu piniqniluki.
44015015	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem sallgha Gentile-enun elqughutuq uuknaliqistet igaqegkiitnun. Akuzitni Igaqegkani Ataneq pikaaguq:
44015016	‘David-em mangteghaa uulqaaguq iwernga uteghnighlunga nekefneqiglleqaqa. Naavumayaghngaan nallghusaghlleqaqa.
44015017	Taagken qamaglluteng ilangi yuget Gentile-eneng nakmikegkama whangamnun katam pinguluki, ellngita liisuglleqaat Ataneq.
44015018	Atanghuuq tawaten akuzikaq, ima qavngarugllak ellngan liitestekaqii tamaakut.’”
44015019	James-em nagneghutkii, “Enkaam whanga sumemni Gentile-et qiivegkat Kiyaghneghmun qaatkutesqughaafqiita Liilightuusamnnun pilteki.
44015020	Itupill latatgun neghesnaniilteki neqmeng aghqutkegkameng kiyaghnengllaqanun, qemitkameng teghikusameng, aawmeng; ineghteltekillu seghleghqusiqefqaan sex pisqelluku.
44015021	Tawaten piyaghqaanghitut qayughllak Moses-em Liilightuusaan iinghutkaqii tamaakut. Ima qavngarugllaggaaneng Jews-et nagataqiit Liilightuusat atightughluki ungipaqenghatki Sabbath-a tamaghhaan, nani alngunak synagogue-ni.”
44015022	Taagken apostle-et, Elder-et, qamagllutengllu ugpeqat nakmiiqat yugmeggneng maligutesaghqameng Paul-enkugnun Barnabas-enkugnun Antioch-mun pinaqelghiignun. Nakmikegkagket Silas-enkuk Judas-enkuk ateghaqelghii Barsabbas-meng. Taakuk yugek Jerusalem-eghmiit ugpeqiita siivakepigtekagket.
44015023	Elkegnekun tuyuqiit latat whaten igaqegkat: “Whangkuta apostle-enillu Elder-enillu lataaqukut Gentile-enun ugpeqaalgutemnnun Antioch-melngughnun, Syria-melngughnun, Cilicia-melngughnunllu, quyakamsi!
44015024	Nagaquumaakut yumtanguq ilangita takulusi sameng pilusi seghleghyugtekaqiisillu kukragyugtekaqiisillu. Naqamllu whangkuta tawaten pisqumangitaput.
44015025	Enkaam qerngaamta agghilluta nakmikagput Judas-enkuk Silas-enkuk maligutesqellukek piniqegkamnnun ugpeqaalgutemnnun Barnabas-enkugnun Paul-enkugnun, elpesinun pinaqelghiignun.
44015026	Taakuk Barnabas-enkuk Paul-enkuk tuqusaghngiistek pikaaguk apalluqluku Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a.
44015027	Judas-enkuk Silas-enkuk kayaggnaqagput aapghwaaghesqelluki taakut ataasit latatkegkaput elpesinun.
44015028	Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham, whangkutallu itagnaqamsi allulluki Jews-et Liilightuusiit atuqenghisaghngaaghpesiki pisqelluki. Iwernga ukut Liilightuusat elpesinun atuqesugaput:
44015029	Neghegpenasi neqmeng aghqutkegkameng kiyaghnengllaqanun, aawmeng, teghikusameng qemitkameng, nuqetutaqiteggullu sex-kun seghleghqelleq. Maligtekufsiki taakut Liilightuusat taawa pinitun pillequsi. Tawatenginaq lataamsi.”
44015030	Taagken taakut yuget aghulaqegkat Jerusalem-emeng Antioch-mun. Kaasameng qerngughlluki ugpeqat tuunegkiit latat.
44015031	Atightughluki latat elngaatall quyateghllakat qayughllak ilutughlleghiit.
44015032	Judas-enkuk Silas-enkuk elkeklu uuknaliqistengulghiik, enkaam ungipaqiighaataghllakak ugpeqanun ugpellghit iknaqughtesqelluki.
44015033	Tamaantelqinaghlutek aghulaqsukak. Enkaam ugpeqat aghulaqestekagket whaten pilukek, “Nekeggmellelgutek igleghalleghpetegni.” Taagken uteghniqak kayagtistemegnun Jerusalem-emelngughnun.
44015034	Iwernga Silas tamaansukaq.
44015035	Taakuk Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk Antioch-metaaghaqak. Elkeklu maligullutek uglapiglleghhiinun ugpeqanun apeghtughikaklu ungipaqikaklu ungipaaneng Atanghem.
44015036	Tagtalmi Paul-em pikaa Barnabas, “Takuughaqaaltegneki ungipaqivikegkapung Atanghem ungipaaneng, esghaghyaghtuultegneki natetulangi ugpeqaalgutepung.”
44015037	Barnabas-em kelqesukaa John Mark,
44015038	iwernga Paul-em kelqesugumangilkanga, qayughllak Pamphylia-melluteng John Mark-em unitkakek qepghaqaghteng taaqestegpenaan.
44015039	Paul-enkuk Barnabas-enkuk aaghtiiraaghutkeghllagluku pelleghmun aghulaquutkak. Barnabas-em kelqelluku Mark angyaghpagkun Cyprus-mun pikaq.
44015040	Enkaam Paul-em aghulaqfagilgami nakmikegkaa Silas kelqennaluku. Taagken ugpeqat yughaatkellukek neghyukutkagket Ataneghmun aflengakesqellukek.
44015041	Igleghtekak Syria-kunllu Cilicia-kunllu iknaqughsaamiita ugpeqat ugpellghit.
44016001	Paul Derbe-tkaq enkaam taagken nagneqaq Lystra-mun, tamaani nallaqaa ugpeqaq yuuk aatqelghii Timothy-meng. Naangallu ugpeqaalghii Jews-a, naqam atanga Greek-a.
44016002	Ugpeqat qamaglluteng Lystra-melnguutlu Iconium-emelnguutlu akuzitkaqegkangat Timothy piniipiggniluku.
44016003	Paul-em kelqesukaa Timothy kayutnguluku enkaam circumcise-estekaa. Tawaten pistekaa tugukliisqelluku Jews-enun, qayughllak tamaanlenguut Jews-et liisimakegkangat atanga Greek-ngulghii.
44016004	Taagken igleghanguluteng neghllagnun kaanneghmeggni ugpeqat qaatkutesqaqegkangit apostle-etlu, Elder-etlu liilightuusangllaqiitnun Jerusalem-emi.
44016005	Enkaam ugpeqat wata ugpeqiighataghaqat, nulamanginaqatlu aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
44016006	Paul-enkut igleghtekat akulegkenkun Phrygia-mllu, Galatia-mllu, qayughllak Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham ungipaghtesimangilkangi ungipameng Asia-mi.
44016007	Tughwaaghluteng Mysia-mun nagneghnaqegkaayalghiit Bithynia-mun, iwernga Jesus-em Taghneghagkenka pisneghitkii.
44016008	Enkaam Mysia naghughlluku tesamavek Troas-mun pikat.
44016009	Unugmi tawani Paul-em esghaghwaalleghqun esghaqaa yuuk Macedonia-ghmii tagsighralghii. Yugem maniguutepiglluni pikaa, “Tagiluten Macedonia-mun kayusiitaghtikut!”
44016010	Legan Paul-em esghaghwaallghan kingunganeng yataaghqukut Macedonia-mun pinaluta, qayughllak liigikegkefut Kiyaghneghem ungipaqisukanginkut Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng tamaani.
44016011	Enkaam telanangameng nangaqaghtukut Troas-meng Samothrace-mun. Unaamingani Neapolis-mun piikut.
44016012	Taagken quutkun kaatukut neghllagmun Philippi-mun Macedonia-melngughmun Rome-eghmiit nelikiitnun. Qafsinat aghneghet tamaantukut.
44016013	Tamaansimaluta Sabbath-ngughsagu mingllutem amigllagakun aanluta kiiwegnun piikut, Jews-et tawani yughaataqnayukata. Aghnam ilangi tawantuteftut enkaam aqumuulluta aleghqughaput.
44016014	Ataasiq nagallghii Lydia-nguftuq, Thyatira-ghmii, akilpegaqayuk esnegrukegtameng qiipaghaghmeng, maniguutkayuk Kiyaghneghmun. Atanghem liigikestengngwaaqii Paul-em akuzitangi Lydia-mun enkaam ugpeqegkii.
44016015	Qamaglluteng nengllugutkullghiit paaptaayeyameng Lydia-m aqelqangllaghiinkut, “Sumeghpesini ipapik ugpeghumakuma Ataneghqun, whangkunnitaghhnayanghitsii?” Enkaam sagiqusinkut ellngitnitukut.
44016016	Ataasimi aghneghmi kiiwem esnenganilngughmun yughaatfigmun aglaamaluta, nallaghaghput qepghaghtelaaq aghnaghaq ilumikun tughneghalek. Taam tughneghaam uuknaliqutkestaqegkangi sangwaat sayaghqat sivutghulluki. Enkaam piliitestengita aklungighisiqngukangat.
44016017	Taam aghnaghaam maligsaaghiinkut Paul-llu whangkuta akilghuumaghmi, “Ukut yuget qepghaghtekii Aangelleghpigaam Kiyaghneghem! Ungipaataqiisi naten yugulillengelleghqameng!”
44016018	Qafsinegllak aghneq tawaten piiq. Qenwatlu Paul-em qinuyagulluku tughneghaq ilunganilnguq qiivluku pikaa, “Aatghakun Jesus Christ-am qelghamken aanesqelluten ellnganeng!” Tawaninginaq tughneghaq ilunganeng aanegkaq.
44016019	Piliitestengita liigiksamegteggu allgeghututkesaghqaananiimatseng aghnaghaq, Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk akuqaqagket. Qamughsiighmeng aglaatkagket igleghutistenun akilpegaghvigmelngughnun.
44016020	Taagken igleghutistet aglaallukek Rome-eghmiit nanqigtistengitnun pikiit, “Yugek ukuk Jew-nguuk, seghleliighqiinguuk maani.
44016021	Apeghtughiiquk kiyaghtaalleghmeng whangkuta Rome-eghmiini liilightuusamta iinghutkiitneng. Tamaaken apalluqluku apeghtuusiik atuqnaanghitaput.”
44016022	Enkaam yulghun ilatqaghtaalluni sughukagket Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk. Nanqigtistet qelghutkagket aatkiik qesugumeng mataghqughluki anagulghesqellukek.
44016023	Anaguleghtaaneghmeng taaqlukek anusimingllaghvigmun kanaghtekagket. Taagken anusimingllaghvigem umiilganun maghqatutngwaaghesqegkagket.
44016024	Anusimingllaghvigem umiilgan tawaten kayagsatni iluklighpigaghmun qamavek kanaghtekakek. Taagken umughllagmeng unaghsimeng tukughusighlukek, maghqatkiit taakut tukughutet qapragyaghqaagpenakek.
44016025	Nani tamaani unugem qukaani Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk yughaamaagmek ilagaqak usuqilleghmeng Kiyaghneghmun, anusimingllaghat tawanlenguut nagatkagket.
44016026	Nuuskagllagan nuna tuyepeghtaqaq, repall anusimingllaghvik tunemaghtuumaan aghulatkaa. Tawaninginaq amiget qelpeghaghtaatkat, anusimingllaghanengllu qiipraghutet ilefkaghaghtaatkat.
44016027	Anusimingllaghvigem umiilga taghtughyalghiimi, amiget qelpatuteftut. Sumeghmini anusimingllaghat qimaguusimaniluki savigpani nusugluku ellmineng tuqunnaqegkaq.
44016028	Iwernga Paul-em iglagtupiglluni pikaa, “Tuqunnaqegpenang elpeneng qayughllak qamaglluta whaantutukut!”
44016029	Anusimingllaghvigem umiilga keneghmeng tungsighluni iitqaghtekaq. Alingruughem ungelegsimaghmi Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk manugkenkun segesqughtekaq.
44016030	Taagken aanututkellukek aaptekakek, “Yugegni ukughtek, naten salunga yugulillengnayaghsinga?”
44016031	Pikaak, “Ugpeqigu Ataneq Jesus enkaam yugulillengellequten, nengllugutetenllu yugulillengellequt.”
44016032	Taagken Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk ungipaqegkaak Ataneq ellnganunllu nengllugutanganunllu.
44016033	Tawani unugmi anusimingllaghvigem umiilgan ughvughteqii taakuk yugek anagulellghegkenka kiingik. Taagken nengllugutkullghiit paaptaayenginaamaghmeng pikat.
44016034	Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk ellmeggnun aglaallukek neghestekagket. Nengllugutkullghiit quyateghllakat qayughllak ugpeqegkangat Kiyaghneq.
44016035	Aghsagu Rome-eghmiit nanqigtistengita kevgaqegkiit umiilwaateng ungipaasaghtiisqelluku anusimingllaghvigem umiilga whaten, “Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk aanestikek.”
44016036	Enkaam anusimingllaghvigem umiilgan Paul pikaa, “Nanqigtistet kayagutiistek aaneslamtegnguq enkaam aanelghaatek, aghulaqitek nekeggmellutek.”
44016037	Iwernga Paul-em umiilwaaghet pikii, “Rome-eghmiingughngaamtung yugtuqami anaguleghtaakaqiinkung, talwa ipapighqutkegpenaan sameng anaggusimatfung. Taagken anusimingllaghiinkung. Enraghngam whaa maaten aksaqluku aanesnaqinkuung? Yeghlegillu! Ellmeggneng nanqigtistet tagiluteng aaneslinkung.”
44016038	Paul-em tawaten piyisteng umiilwaaghet ungipaasaghtuqiit nanqigtistet. Enkaam nanqigtistet alingegkat Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk nagaqughlukek Rome-eghmiingutkek.
44016039	Taagken takulukek qivghuklukek aanestekagket anusimingllaghvigmeng, aghulaqesqegkagketlu.
44016040	Enkaam Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk anusimingllaghvigmeng aanyamek, Lydia-nkunun pikak. Tawani laalighfikluki ugpeqat kayemluki aghulaqegkak.
44017001	Paul-enkut igleghtekat Amphipolis-kunllu, Apollonia-kunllu Thessalonica-mun kaatelleghmeggnun kenlanga. Tamaani Jews-et synagogue-elget.
44017002	Paul piiqelleghmitun synagogue-mun pikaq. Pingayuni Sabbath-eni Paul-em liigikesnaqutkegkii yuget Christ-ameng Akuzitetgun Igaqegkatgun.
44017003	Uuknaliqelleghteggun liigikesnaqutkegkaa ipa Christ-a tuquyaghqapestaaghunilukullu unguvaghyaghqapestaaghunilukullu tuqulleghmeng. Pikii, “Una Jesus aapqegka elpesinun Christ-anguuq.”
44017004	Ilangi Jews-et ugpeghluteng ilatkat Paul-enkugnun Silas-enkugnun. Tamaakutlu Greek-elghutet maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun, aghnalghutetlu pingwaaghet ugpeghtuutkat.
44017005	Taagken ugpeqaanghilnguut Jews-et aqinaklukek Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk tesqagantaqelghiineng sangigalngughneng yugneng qerngughtiluteng seghleliighqiighllakat. Qenwat qamagtengngwaaghluki Thessalonica-ghmiit qapraghqegkiit. Taagken ketanqusnaq Jason-enkunun aglaghluteng iitqaghtaatkat Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk aanunnalukek yulghutnun.
44017006	Iwernga naalkenghisamegtekek, Jason-llu ilangillu ugpeqat qamughsiiqiit Thessalonica-m igleghutistengitnun. Akilghuukat, “Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk navek alngunak pineghmegni seghleliighqiigaquk, whaa maanillu tawaten piiquk.
44017007	Caesar-em liilightuusii kipullegmun piiqiik whaten pilleghmegnegun, ‘Jesus umiilegpigaaguq, Caesar umiilgunghituq.’ Jason-em ellmeggnitestaqaak Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk.”
44017008	Tawaten piyata yugetlu igleghutistengillu Thessalonica-m sakraaghllakat.
44017009	Taagken igleghutistet pikiit Jason-enkut, “Qelghutagput Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk elpesinun aghulaqestesqellukek Thessalonica-meng, iwernga sivuklusi manilitikut. Aghulaqegkayek manizi veghulleqaghput.” Taagken aglaghtestekiit.
44017010	Mamlegtaghesnaghyagu ugpeqat Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk aghulaqestekagket Berea-mun. Kaasamek synagogue-mun pikak.
44017011	Tamaakut Jews-ngit nagasukestaghlukek ayuqegkegket Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk, Thessalonica-melngughneng. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan Jews-et ellmeggneng liinnaqegkiit Akuzitet Igaqegkat, liigiknaluki Paul-enkuk Silas-enkuk apeghtughillghik ipangutangi.
44017012	Enkaam uglapiglleghhiit ugpeghtuutkat, uglapiglleghhiitlu pingwaaghet Greek-et aghniitlu yugitlu ugpeghtuutkat.
44017013	Iwernga Jews-et Thessalonica-melnguut nagaqughyamegteggu Paul ungipaqiniluku akuzitanganeng Kiyaghneghem Berea-mi, Berea-tkat. Kaalluteng qapraghqiikat yugneng seghleliighqiikat tamaani.
44017014	Enkaam ugpeqat Paul esnemun atghaatqaghtestekaat iwernga Silas-enkuk Timothy-nkuk Berea-metkak.
44017015	Yuget igleghutilghiit Paul-meng maligutkat Athens-mun kenlanga. Uteghnighnaqngata Berea-mun Paul-em lipeghsaqakek Silas-enkuk Timothy-nkuk takusqelluni piyaghqaaghtaghesnaqayek.
44017016	Athens-mi Paul utaqiitkelluku Silas-enkugneng Timothy-nkugneng, yuvghiighyalghiimi tamaani seghleghyugllakaq, qayughllak kiyaghnengllaqaghtupigteftuq.
44017017	Enkaam Paul-em synagogue-mi Jews-etlu Gentile-etlu, maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun liigikesnaqutkegkii Jesus, Christ-anguniluku. Akilpegaghvigmillu aghhutanga tamaghhaan kinkut alngunak tawanneghata aapghaqegkanga Christ-a.
44017018	Ilangita apeghtughistengita Epicurean-etlu, Stoic-etlu takuluku Paul aaghtiiraaqaat. Ilangita ilateng aaptekiit, “Una akuzivallughllak sameng piiqa?” Tamaakut ilangita pikaat, “Llangaqa nakumiit kiyaghneghit akuzitkaqii.” Tawaten pikat qayughllak Paul-em ungipaqngukanga Jesus, unguvallghallu tuqulleghmeng.
44017019	Taagken Paul-mun maligtestekat agghistenun Areopagus-melngughnun. Enkaam kaasameng pikaat, “Taana nutaghaq apeghtuusaqaqegken liisuwaghput.
44017020	Sangwaa taana aapqan allaaghlluwhaaguq whangkunni, enkaam liigiksuwaghput sameng pisiitanga.”
44017021	(Sangwaat nutaghat apeghtuusat pinghata Athens-eghmiitlu, nakumiitlu tamaavek lliiqat apeghyuwaqiitlu nagasugaqiitlu.)
44017022	Enkaam Areopagus-mi Paul-em nekevluni pikii, “Athens-eghmiini, liigikamsi elngaatall maniguutkayuguftusi elpesi yugni.
44017023	Igleghsalghiinga qagani akulmi, esghaghanka manigughvilghutesi, aghqefiklu ataasiq igaqfikngalghii whaten, ‘Nallukegkamun Kiyaghneghmun.’ Taananguuq Kiyaghneq nallukeghngaaghpesigu maniguqaghsi apeghyukegka elpesinun.
44017024	Taam Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaa nuna, sangwaallu qamagtengngwaaghluku nunamelnguq. Atanqaa qilagemllu nunamllu enkaam maniguutfingllaqanisigatuq.
44017025	Taananguuq Kiyaghneq tuunikayuk unguvalleghmeng, aneghneghmeng, samengllu tamaghhaaneng yugnun. Akluksaghqaqenghitaa yuget kayusillghat qayughllak sangwaa tamaghhaan aklukigataa.
44017026	Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaa ataasiq yuuk, enkaam taagken ataasimeng allgeqaaguq allaaghhiinaq yuuk nunamelnguq whani. Iingkerugllak yataaghqegkaqiillu qakun yuget allgeghyaghqaatangi, nanillu kiyaghsaghqaatangi.
44017027	Tawaten pikaqii yugnun iviisqelluni luuraq naalkennayukangatni. Naqamllu nalighhiinamnneng uyavanneghituq
44017028	qayughllak ‘Ellngakun kiyaghtengnguukutlu, qapraguukutlu, allgeqaagukutlu.’ Talwa ilangi igangllaghtesi whaten pikaalghiit, ‘Ipapestaaq avaqutaqiinkut.’
44017029	“Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqutanganeng sumeghtaghaatkesaghqaqenghitaghput yuget ulimaaghistun gold-meng, silver-meng, nalighmeng uyghagmeng ayuqluki. Yuget sumeghtaghallghistun ayuqenghituq.
44017030	Sivunghani agani yuget salin nallukluku Kiyaghneq, aghyuughyugumangitii aghyuusaqeghngaata. Iwernga maaten qelghwii qamaglluki yuget naansaghngaata avuteghqelluki, seghleghqennaniisqelluki.
44017031	Kiyaghneghem tawaten qelqaqii qayughllak nekegtekaqaa aghneq nanqigtiviguluku. Nakmikegkamikun yugkun yuuk tamaghhaan tawateghlluwaaq nanqigsaghqaqaa. Liitesnaluku nakmikegkani yuuk unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng.”
44017032	Nagalluku Paul-em aapqanga yuuk unguvaghtesimaniluku tuqulleghmeng, ilangita legasiighwaatkegkaat, iwernga ilangita pikaat Paul, “Wataqaaghaq nagasuwaghput alla apeghnaqegkuvgu.”
44017033	Taagken Paul-em unitkii,
44017034	iwernga ilangita maligsaaghluku Paul ugpeghtuutkat. Ataasiq Dionysius-nguftuq, Areopagus-mi agghista, aghnaqlu aatqelghii Damaris-meng, kinkutlu ilangi ugpeghtuutkat.
44018001	Taam kingunganeng Paul Corinth-etkaq Athens-meng.
44018002	Tamaani nallaqaa Jew aatgha Aquila, Pontus-mi allgeqaq. Italy-meng kaanneghhaaftuk nulighqullghiik Priscilla-nkuk, qayughllak Umiilegpigaam Claudius-em eflequqii Jews-et Rome-emeng. Paul-em laalighfiklukek
44018003	elkegkenitkaq qayughllak qepghaqaak ellngan qepghaqaatun ayuqelghii. Tiintangllallghem akinga kiyaghusiqegkangat.
44018004	Sabbath-a tamaghhaan Paul synagogue-mun piluni ungipaghaqelghii Jews-enunllu, Greek-enunllu ugpeghesqelluki.
44018005	Silas-enkuk Timothy-nkuk kaatkak Macedonia-meng, taagken kenlekluku Paul ungipaqinginaghluni lliiqaq. Jews-enun aapqaa Jesus, Christ-anguniluku.
44018006	Jews-et kipullginaaghyatnillu seghletunllu akuzitkesatni, aatkami pagulangi ufsugulluki pikii, “Iflakufsi elpesi pilqaghsi, whanga pilqennaanghitaqa. Whaken kenlekluku Gentile-enun ungipaqinaqunga.”
44018007	Enkaam unilluki Jews-et Titius Justus-mun lliiqaq, Gentile-mun maniguutkayugmun Kiyaghneghmun. Mangteghaa synagogue-em saaghwanilnguq.
44018008	Synagogue-em igleghutistenga Crispus-nguftuq. Qamaglluteng nengllugutkullghiit ugpeqegkaat Ataneq. Corinth-eghmiilghutetlu nagalluku Paul ugpeghluteng paaptaayekat.
44018009	Taagken unugmi ataasimi Paul esghaghwaalleghqun Atanghem pikaa, “Alingegpenang, yeghlegi ungipaqikestaa iilqayufqaavek
44018010	qayughllak elpenitaqunga. Kitumun alngunak aqnightesnaanghitamken, qayughllak neghllagmi whani uglapiglleghhii yuuk whanga pikaqa.”
44018011	Enkaam Paul tamaani apeghtughikaq Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng ataasiq ayumiqulleq alla aghvinlek tanqit ilalluki.
44018012	Gallio, Rome-em umiilgughtestaqngagu Greece-mun, Jews-et qerngughulluteng sughugluku Paul aglaatkaat nanqigtivigmun.
44018013	Kaatulluku pikat, “Uum yugem apeghtughaqii yuget Kiyaghneq manigiisqelluku allanguluku Liilightuusamnneng!”
44018014	Iiwenllu Paul akuzinaqaquq, Gallio-m Jews-et pikii, “Una yuuk tegleguqaayaqan, yugtaqaayaqan nalighmeng sangwaa alngunak seghlepestaaq pikaqsaqagu ilapgapestaaghnayaghamsi.
44018015	Iwernga una yuuk tawaten pimangituq. Aaghtiiraaghutkengngunghitasi Rome-em liilightuusii, aaghtiiraaghutkengngwaasi elpesi katam Liilightuusasi, akuzitetlu aatghetlu sameng pisiitangi. Tamaaken nanqigtiyaghqaanghitunga, elpesineng piteki.”
44018016	Enkaam eflequqii aanesqelluki.
44018017	Taagken yuget akuqaghluku synagogue-em igleghutistenga Sosthenes, qevutiiqaat nanqigtivigem manughaani iwernga Gallio-m avelghaqiinaqii.
44018018	Taam kingunganeng Paul paninang ugpeqanitkaq qafsinegllak aghneq Corinth-mi. Taagken angyaghpagkun aghulaqegkaq Syria-mun kelqellukek Priscilla-nkuk Aquila-nkuk. Kaasameng Cenchrea-mun Paul qiguqaq liigikesqelluku akequsani Kiyaghneghmun apeghiillgha.
44018019	Kaalluteng Ephesus-mun, tamaani Paul-em unitkakek Priscilla-nkuk Aquila-nkuk, synagogue-elluni liigikesnaqutkegkaa Jews-enun Jesus, Christ-anguniluku.
44018020	Ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaqsaqangat iwernga pipagningitkaq.
44018021	Enkaam aghulaqnaqngami pikii, “Kiyaghneghem piyukelqegkagu alla tagillequnga.” Taagken Ephesus-meng angyaghpagkun aghulaqegkaq.
44018022	Kaalluni Caesarea-mun nagneqaq Jerusalem-emun laalighfiknaluki ugpeqat, taagken Antioch-etkaq.
44018023	Tamaantaghlluni aghulaqegkaq. Igleghutkelluku Galatia-kunllu Phrygia-kunllu, qamaglluki ugpeqat kayemumiita pikii.
44018024	Paul tawaten aneghsimaluku Apollos, Ephesus-mun kaatkaq. Jew-ngulghii allgeqaq Alexandria-mi. Elngaatall akuzillegllaklu liiteghllakaqlu Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng.
44018025	Salin Alexandria-melluku kitum apeghtuqaqegkanga Atanghem tumanganeng. Enkaam sagiqepiglluni akuzitkengngukangallu apeghtuusaqngukangallu elqughaghlluku Jesus, apeghtuusiillu. Naqam liisimakegkanga paaptaayelleq John-em apeghtuutellghiinaatun ayuqelghii.
44018026	Ephesus-mi Apollos synagogue-elluni tetugpenani ungipaqikaq. Priscilla-nkuk Aquila-nkuk nagalluku aqelqangllaqaak liigikestaghaghnaluku Kiyaghneghem tumanganeng, wataqaaghaq elqughaghlluku.
44018027	Apollos Greece-mun piyugyan, ugpeqat kayemegkaat enkaam latakat Greece-eghmiit ugpeqiitnun upughatesqelluku. Taakut Greece-eghmiit ugpeqegkaqegkangat Jesus Kiyaghneghem kayusillghakun. Apollos-em kaalluni elngaatall iknaqughsaqaqegkangi ugpellghit apeghtughilleghmikun.
44018028	Yugtuqami aaghtiiraaghllakii Jews-et, Akuzitet Igaqegkat ipapighqusiqluki Jesus, Christ-anguniluku.
44019001	Apollos Corinth-melluku, Paul quutkun igleghakaq Ephesus-mun kenlanga. Tamaani ilangi maligsaaghtet nallaghluki
44019002	aaptekii, “Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak allgeghsimastekek ugpeghaqngafsi?” Pikaat, “Nakaa, nallukngwaaghagput Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak.”
44019003	Aaplaataqii, “Samunmi paaptaayematsi?” Kiimsiqaat, “John-em paaptaayellghatun.”
44019004	Paul-em pikii, “John-em paaptaayeghillgha avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennanilghinun ayuquq. Pikaqiillu ugpeqesqelluku kingumineng tagiyaghqaq, taana Jesus-nguuq.”
44019005	Nagaqughyamegteggu taana, paaptaayekat aatghakun Atanghem Jesus-em.
44019006	Paul-em saafsaqminiki Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak iitqak ellngitnun. Taagken akuzikat allaaghhiinaastun ulustun, uuknaliqumaghmengllu pikat.
44019007	Entaqun qula maalghuk siipneqluku yuuk tawantuq.
44019008	Pingayuni tanqini Sabbath-a tamaghhaan Paul-em tetukaghpenani aleghquqii yuget synagogue-mi. Aaghhnaqutkegkii, liigikesnaqutkegkii Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem.
44019009	Iwernga ilangi pineghllulghiit ugpeghyunghitkat, enkaam sivungitni yuget seghletun akuzitkegkaat kiyaghtaalleq Atanghem apeghtuusaa. Enkaam Paul-em unitkii kelqelluki ugpeqat. Taagken aghhutanga tamaghhaan Tyrannus-em apeghtughivigani, Paul-em aleghqughaqegkangi yuget.
44019010	Tawaten pikaq maalghuk ayumiqullghek, enkaam tamaghhaghmeng Jews-etlu Greek-etlu Asia-melnguut nagaquqiit akuzitangi Atanghem.
44019011	Kiyaghneq allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaq saghiighanalghiimeng Paul-kun.
44019012	Talwa ilangita yuget Paul-em kakegllugiitiillu, aatkiillu llineghmegteki qinuyugnun naallghutaqelghiit, tughneghaatlu ilungitnilnguut aanaqelghiit.
44019013	Ilangi Jews-et igleghangulghiit nunanun, yugneng aanesquungukangit tughneghaat. Taagken Atanghem Jesus-em aatgha aanesquusiqnaqutkegkaqsaqangat. Pikat, “Qelghamken aanesqelluten taaggun ataasikun Jesus-kun Paul-em ungipaqegkaakun.”
44019014	Sceva-m maaghraghvilek ighneghi tawaten pikat. (Taana Sceva Jew-ngulghii high priest-a.)
44019015	Iwernga tughneghaam pikii, “Liisimakaqa Jesus, liisimakaqa Paul, elpesi kinkungutsi?”
44019016	Taagken yugem ilumikun tughneghalgem qetgeghvikluki taakut yuget qevutiiqii, iknaqepigtutmineng qamaglluki avangilkegkii. Enkaam mangteghaaneng aanqaghtalluteng qimaguutkat amsikaghmeng, kiitiqullelighluteng.
44019017	Qamaglluteng Ephesus-eghmiit, Jews-etlu Greek-etlu alingruughutkat taana nagaqughluku, enkaam aatgha Jesus-em wataqaaghaq quulvaqaat.
44019018	Uglapiglleghhiit ugpenghhaqaniit yugtuqami apeghraqiit alignaghtaalleteng.
44019019	Uglapiglleghhiit alignaghtaaqayuguyalghiit tagiquulluki alignaghtaaghusit igateng paneghquqiit yulghutet esghaamanghitni. Igalghutet akitulesughyaqmegteki 50,000 silver drachmas-et akikeftiit.
44019020	Tamaana apalluqluku wataqaaghaq akuzitangi Atanghem mingitkat, enkaam uglapiglleghhiit ugpeqegkiit.
44019021	Kingungitneng tamaakut Paul qakiqniqegkaq Jerusalem-emun pinaluni, Macedonia-kunllu Greece-kunllu aagluni. Pikaq, “Jerusalem-etaghllunga taagken Rome-esaghqapestaaghuunga.”
44019022	Taagken Paul-em kayutegni Timothy-nkuk Erastus-enkuk kayagtekakek aglaqestiisqellukek Macedonia-mun, ellnga Asia-metaghaqaq.
44019023	Nani tamaani pilleghmi uglaapiglleghhiit Ephesus-eghmiit elngaatall seghleliighutkegkaat kiyaghtaalleq Atanghem apeghtuusaqegkaa.
44019024	Tamaana seghleliilleq Demetrius-em silver-meng ulimastem piinliqaa. Tawaten pikaq qayughllak ulimalgutkullghiit elngaatall maningllaasiqngukangit silver-meng ulimaaghet temple-engwaaghhaat. Tamaakut temple-engwaaghhaat kiyaghnengllaqamun Artemis-mun maniguutfigestun ayuqelghiit.
44019025	Demetrius-em ulimalgutnillu ilangillu tawatelngughmeng ulimakayuget qerngughlluki pikii, “Ukughsi yugni, liisimakaghsi elngaatall maningllaghaqukut qepghaqamnneng.
44019026	Iwernga esghapagaghsillu nagataghsillu Paul-em pillgha. Piiquq kiyaghnengllaqat kiyaghnepigunghinniluki. Enkaam uglapiglleghhii yuuk allangughqughaa maani Ephesus-mi, maaninginaagpenaan tamaghhaanillu Asia-mi piiquq.
44019027	Seghleghhalek sanghilkumta qepghaqaghput ukavaghllequq. Liisimakaghsi qamaglluteng Asia-ghmiitlu nunataghhaanilnguutlu manigughaqaat aghnaq kiyaghneq Artemis. Sanghilkumta yuget sumeghtaghaatkesagulleqaat temple-a megnuniinniluku, Artemis-emllu aangelleghllaga satngunanighllequq.”
44019028	Taakut yuget nagalluku Demetrius elngaatall sakraakat, akilghuughllakatlu, “Aangeghllagtuq Artemis-nga Ephesus-em!”
44019029	Mulugpenateng qamaglluteng Ephesus-eghmiit ketanqwaaghaatkat akilghuumaghmeng nallukeghngaaghmegteki saaqutangi. Paul-em igleghalgutkek Gaius-enkuk Aristarchus-enkuk Macedonia-ghmiik tamaanlenguuk uvitangitni. Ilangita yuget taakuk akuqaghlukek qamuqlukek ketarwakat qerngughutfigllagmun maliglluki yulghuteghllaget.
44019030	Paul iteghyukaayalghii yulghun aleghqughnaluku iwernga ugpeqat ighlekegkaat.
44019031	Talwa ilangita Asia-m igleghutistengita kevgaqutkaat ilakumtaaghteng Paul wataghllak itefqaan qerngughutfigllagmun pisqelluku.
44019032	Taakut qerngughutfigllagmelnguut wanlegi nepugllagughtekat. Ilangi yuget sameng akilghuughllaget, ilangi sameng allaneng akilghuughllaget. Kiyang allulluteng nallukegkangat sangameng qerngughusimatseng.
44019033	Taagken yuuk aatqelghii Alexander-meng, Jews-et apeghtughwaaghluku sameng pilleghqameng, akuziyaghtiisqegkaat sivungitnun yulghuteghllaget. Alexander-em iiggeni nengugutkii nagatesqelluni yugnun.
44019034	Iwernga yulghuteghllaget liigiksamegteggu Alexander Jew-ngutanga, qerngaghllagmeng akilghuughllakat, “Aangeghllagtuq Artemis-nga Ephesus-em!” Tawaten akilghuukat ketwhell maalghuk afluk.
44019035	Ataasim Ephesus-em umiilwaaghan nepiightesteqaghsamiki yulghutet pikii, “Ephesus-eghmiini, tamaghhaghllagmi liisimakaa Ephesus aflengakistekaa aangelghiim Artemis-em temple-ngan, agleghnalghiimllu uyghagem ifkaqam qilagmeng.
44019036	Kitum alngunak aygughiknaanghitiinkut taakugneng aflengakestengutfut enkaam nepiightek. Sangwaa temngighllak apeghiighvagilgafsigu sumeghtaghaghtek.
44019037	Taakuk yugek whavek tagitkaqagsi talwa sameng teglenghiteghngaayek temple-eneng, akuzitkenghiteghngaagnegullu sameng seghleghmeng kiyaghneghput Artemis.
44019038	Una nanqigtivigunghituq. Demetrius-enkut qepghaghtekullghiit sameng apallulgukumeng nanqigtivigmun aglaghlit. Tawani nanqigtistenun apeghnakangit apalluteng enkaam elngaatall avutkiiraaghhaat.
44019039	Wata sameng piyaghqalgukufsi sameng tamaaken qerngughutfigpigaghmi agghitkennakesi.
44019040	Tawaten piimsi qayughllak Rome-em umiilgita nagaququmegteggu una seghleliilleq aghneghmi whani, taana apalluqluku qaatkunneghinniluta liilightuusameggnun pinaqiinkut. Sameng'ngam pilleqesteki qayughllak apalliitukut seghleliighqiillemnnun.”
44019041	Taam umiilwaaghem tawaten piluki aglaghtuutestekii.
44020001	Taana seghleliilleghllak alpagyan Paul-em aqfastekii ugpeqat. Kayemluki aghulaqegkaq Macedonia-mun.
44020002	Enkaam Macedonia-kun igleghutkelluku laalighqwaaghvikegkii ugpeqat, kayemumiita pikii. Taagken nagneqaq Greece-mun,
44020003	tamaantekaq pingayut tanqit. Yataaghqaquqlu angyaghpagkun Syria-nnaluni, liigikegkii Jews-en'nguq yataaghqaqeftut tuqunnaluku. Tamaaken apalluqluku uteghsukaq Macedonia-kun Jerusalem-emun.
44020004	Maligtestekeftii Sopater, ighnegha Pyrrhus-em, Berea-ghmii, Aristarchus-enkuk Secundus-enkuk Thessalonica-ghmiik, Gaius Derbe-ghmii, Tychicus-enkuk Trophimus-enkuk Asia-ghmiik, Timothy-llu.
44020005	Taakut aghulaqekestaghluteng Troas-mun, tamaani utaqiigut whangkunneng.
44020006	Kingunganeng Neqenghaghqellghan Yeast-aliimangilnguum Neqekrangllam, Philippi-meng angyaghpagkun aghulaqukut. Tallimat aghneghet atughluki kaataput ilaput Troas-mi. Tamaantukut maaghraghvinlek aghneq.
44020007	Sivulighmi aghneghani santillghem Troas-eghmiit ugpeqiitlu whangkutallu qerngughutukut neghnaluta Atanghem Neqenghaghqellghaneng. Sivukluni Paul ungipaqikaq unugem qukaanun kenlanga, qayughllak unaami aghulaqsugulghii.
44020008	Qemtamelnguukut kenelghutaghtuqami.
44020009	Nukalpigaq Eutychus, aqumluni qergesem esnengakun nagatkaq. Paul ungipaqimaluku qenwat Eutychus qavaghnikaq. Qenwatlu umuqilluni qavaghyalghiimi eslatmun ifkaqaq pamaken pingayaaneng qemtam. Aanluteng tuguyaqmegteggu tuquluni.
44020010	Iwernga Paul-em ukiragkiighluni segesqughfikluku qetkaa. Pikii, “Alingegpenasi, whaa unguvaamaaq!”
44020011	Taagken mayughtuulluteng Paul-em neqekrangllaq aavgughluku neghegkat. Aleghquutkat unulqusiq kenlanga aghtelleghmun, taagken Paul aghulaqegkaq.
44020012	Ugpeqat nukalpigaq aglaatkaat nenganun ilutullengeghllagluteng unguvallgha apalluqlluku.
44020013	Angyaghpagkun aghulaqukut Assos-mun sivungani Paul-em, qayughllak quutkun Assos-mun piluni wetku tamaani uuggnaqnilghii angyaghpagmun.
44020014	Kaasan Assos-mun qaakluku angyaghpagmun Mitylene-etukut.
44020015	Unaamingani Mitylene-meng aghulaqluta aghuliightukut Chios-em tungangakun. Taagken unaamingani kaatukut Samos-mun, enkaam awakaghaani kaatukut Miletus-mun.
44020016	Paul-em naghughsukaa Ephesus qayughllak Asia-mi kimaawiyunghilnguq. Pilleghqalgukumi Jerusalem-emun kaasupigtengngulghii angiinnaluni Pentecost-mun.
44020017	Miletus-melluni Paul-em tagsiqliqii ugpeqat Elder-ngit Ephesus-melnguut.
44020018	Kaasata pikii, “Liisimakaghsi naten kiyaghtaalqa elpesinillunga Asia-mun kaasuwhaallemneng ima.
44020019	Qepghaatkaqaqa Ataneq qusevegtepigllunga, qunituumaghmallu qaywa Jews-et seghleliighqeghllagngaatngallu, tuqunnaqutkeghngaatngallu.
44020020	Iwernga liisimakaghsi nuqetusigatanka sangwaat kayutkaghqasi ungipaqinemni, apeghtunemsi yugtuqamillu negpesinillu.
44020021	Qevuulluki qelghaqsaghanka Jews-etlu Greek-etlu avuteghqelluki seghleghqennaniqata qiivesqelluki Kiyaghneghmun, ugpeqisqellukillu Atanemnneng Jesus Christ-ameng.
44020022	Whaa maaten qaatkullunga Agleghnalghiignun Taghneghagnun Jerusalem-ennaqunga, nallukaqa sayaghqaqaatnga Jerusalem-eghmiit.
44020023	Iwerngaqun tamaghhiitni nunani takukamni Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham ungipaataqaanga Jerusalem-emi seghleliighlleqnilungallu anusimingllaghlleqnilungallu yugnun.
44020024	Iwernga whanga katam unguvalqa waakigataqa apeghiiqaghhnaluku qepghaqaq Atanghem Jesus-em qelghutkaa whangamnun. Aapghesqegkaqii Pinilghiit Ungipat Kiyaghneghem piniqellghaneng ayuqelghiit.
44020025	“Liisimakaqa allameng esghaghnaanghitaghpesinga, elpesi ungipiqutkamni Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem.
44020026	Tamaaken apalluqluku aghneghmi whani ungipaannaqamsi malghuklillngunaan, nalighsi iflakan whanga pilqenghitaqa,
44020027	qayughllak nuqetusimangitaqa sangwaa tamaghhaan Kiyaghneghem liitesukaa elpesinun.
44020028	Kiyaghneghem yugi penniighestun ayuqut, enkaam Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham elpesinun aflengakesqii katam tawaten penniighniightem aflengakellghatun penniini. Enkaam kelengangwaaghlusi, Kiyaghneghemllu yugi kelengakngwaaghluki. Aflengakiteki qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tukfiqaqii ellmi katam aawmikun.
44020029	Liisimakaqa uniskumsi apeghtughistesighwaaghet takulleqiisi. Katam tawatetut ugighsalghiistun amaastun naafqiinaqelghiit penniighmeng, naafqennaqutkelleqiit ugpeqat apeghtughilleghmegteggun.
44020030	Talwa ilangi ugpeqaalgutesi iqlengiqsaghqaagut ugpeqesqelluki apeghtughilleteng, ugpeghteqeghtekumegteki maligsaaghteknaluki.
44020031	Enkaam kelengangwaaghlusi puughtellengnayukafsi. Neqamikluku pingayut ayumiqullghet kelengasaaqaqamsi qamagllusi tamaaken aghneghtuumaan, unugtuumaan seghleliighllaghngaaghma, qunituumaghma.
44020032	“Naangniitkennaqaqa, neghyukutamsi Kiyaghneghmun aflengakesqellusi, ungipamunllu piniqellghanun quyastesqellusi. Nagatelleghpesigun taana ungipaq ugpellesi iknaqughllequtlu allgeghlleqaghsillu elpesi piliisaghqaghsi Kiyaghneghmeng. Taana piliisaghqaq tamaakunun pinguuq aaftekaminun ellminun katam yuguluki.
44020033	Elpesinitaqngama manigpesinengllu aatkaghpesinengllu qiliighumangitunga.
44020034	Liisimakaghpesinga sangwaa aklukegkaqa, ilamallu whangamnilnguut aklukegkiit qepghaatkayuwaanka allgeghhnaluki.
44020035	Sangwaa qamaglluku pikaqaqa elpesinun usputaasqelluku, whangamtun ughleghiilleghpesigun kayusiitesqelluki pipagningilnguut. Neqamikluku Atanghem Jesus-em whaten pillgha, ‘Quyanaghataghaghtuq tuuniilleq allgeghutelleghmeng.’”
44020036	Paul tawaten akuzineghmeng taaqsami, segesqughlluni yughalgusiqii.
44020037	Qamaglluteng qiyamaghmeng Paul qetaqluku naaghaataqaat.
44020038	Qivghukelleghpigaqegkangat qayughllak pikaqegkangi allamengllu esghaghnaanghinniluteng. Taagken qanikaat angyaghpagmun.
44021001	Unisamteki ugpeqat angyaghpagmun uuglluta nangaqaghtukut Cos-mun. Unaamingani Rhodes-mun kaalluta taagken nagneghtukut Patara-mun.
44021002	Tawani angyaghpagmeng naalkutukut Phoenicia-nnaqelghiimeng enkaam uuglluta aghulaqukut.
44021003	Esghaghyamteggu qiighqaq Cyprus uughqangakun nagneghtukut Syria-m esnengakun Tyre-mun. Tawani usingighaat angyaghpak.
44021004	Tamaani ivaghluki ugpeqat naalkesamteki ellngitnitukut ataasiq santilleq. Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun ugpeqat Paul Jerusalem-etesnaniqaat.
44021005	Aghulaqsaghqaaghtengngamta ugpeqaalgutemta nulighqullghiit, avaqutaqullghiit maligtiinkut esnamun. Tawani segesqughquulluta yughaatukut.
44021006	Taagken uugtukut angyaghpagmun, qaniighisteput nemeggnun aglaghtuutut.
44021007	Aghulaqluta Tyre-meng kaatukut Ptolemais-mun. Tamaani quyakluki ugpeqaalguteput ataasiq aghneq ellngitnitukut.
44021008	Unamingani Caesarea-mun kaalluta Philip-enkunitukut evangelist-emi. Maaghraghvinleqegkangat nakmikegkat kayutnguluki.
44021009	Estamaneng panilek ugiighumangilngughmeng, qamaglluteng uuknaliqistet.
44021010	Salin tamaansimaluta uuknaliqista Agabus, Judea-meng kaatuq.
