44021011	Whangkunnun tagiluni Paul-em tafsinga iikluku asighqelluki iteganillu iiggenillu piinkut, “Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak piik, ‘Jerusalem-emi tafsim uum yumanga Jews-et asighqesaghqaqaat, taagken tuunelleqaat Gentile-enun.’”
44021012	Whangkutallu ilangitallu yuget nagalluku Agabus tawaten pilghii ighlegaatkesaghaghput Paul Jerusalem-etefqaan pisqelluku.
44021013	Iwernga Paul-em piinkut, “Sangafsi qiyamaghpesi tawaten pistengnga? Seghleliighqaghpesinga! Whaa apeghiighwaaghlunga ayuqunga asighqesaghqaalunga Jerusalem-emi, talwa tuquyaghqaalunga apalluqluku Ataneq Jesus.”
44021014	Paul sagiqsan iilqayagutaghput enkaangam piighput, “Yeqay Atanghem piyukellgha apeghiighli.”
44021015	Enkaam qafsina aghneq atughluku yataaghqelluta aghulaqukut Jerusalem-emun.
44021016	Ilangita ugpeqat Caesarea-ghmiit maligtiinkut, kaasamta Jerusalem-emun aglaatiinkut tukughqamnnun Mnason-enkunun, Cyprus-eghmiimun. Ugpeqaqsuwhaaghteggun maligulluni ugpeqegkaa Jesus.
44021017	Jerusalem-emi ugpeqaalgutemta quyakluta upughatiinkut.
44021018	Unaamingani Paul maliglluku esghaghyaghtughyaqefut James, Elder-etlu qamaglluteng tawanteftut.
44021019	Paul-em quyakegkii. Taagken ungipaatkii tamaghhaaneng Kiyaghneghem apeghiillghaneng qepghalleghmikun Gentile-enilluni.
44021020	Nagalluku usuqegkaat Kiyaghneq. Taagken pikaat Paul, “Ugpeqaalgutemni, liisimakan uglapestaaghllaget Jews-et ugpeqaat Christ-a. Elngaatall qaatkusimanginaghyugaqutlu Moses-em Liilightuusaanun.
44021021	Ungipaataqiinnguq apeghtughaqatennguq qamaglluki Jews-et, Gentile-et nunangitnilnguut qaatkutefqiita Moses-em Liilightuusaanun pisqelluki. Piiqatenllunguq ighneghit circumcise-enghisaghngaata, talwanguq atuqesnanighaqan Jews-et kiyaghtaallghat.
44021022	Kaasimaniluten nagaqupestaaghnaqngwaaten. Sanaqestangam?
44021023	Itagnapiggnayaghtuq pisqellemtestun piyaquvek. Estamat yumta apeghiighyaghtungestaamiit akeqilleghteng Kiyaghneghmun.
44021024	Elpeklu maliglluki Temple-mun ukmangighyaghtaa Moses-em Liilightuusaan qelellghatun. Tukfighnaketenllu teghikusat aghqutkaghqasi enkaam aghqerraghhaasi Kiyaghneghmun. Taam kingunganeng yuget taakut taawa meqestengngwaaghluteng qigughyaghqaaghllequt Liilightuusat pisqellghistun. Elpeklu ukmangiquvek qamaglluteng Jews-et liigikelleqaat qaatkutngallghen Moses-em Liilightuusaanun. Liigikelleqaatlu nagaquqaghteng tamaana temngingutanga.
44021025	Taakut Gentile-et ugpeqiit ungipaatkaqaput latatgun qaatkesqelluki ukut, ‘Neghegpenasi neqmeng aghqutkegkameng kiyaghnengllaqanun. Neghegpenasi aawmeng. Neghegpenasi qemitkameng teghikusameng. Nuqetaqiteklu sex-kun seghleghqelleghmeng.’”
44021026	Enkaam unaamingani Paul ukmangighyaghtuqaq Liilightuusat pisqellghistun maliglluki estamat yuget ukmangighyaghtulghiit. Taagken Paul Temple-mun iteghluni priest-et pikii, “Santilleq atughluku estamat yuget ukmangighsalleghteng apeghiighnaqaat Liilightuusat pisqellghistun. Tukfighlleqanka teghikusat aghqutkaghqiit enkaam aghqerraaghutaataqaghnakesi taakut yuget.”
44021027	Iiwenllu santilleq naangnaqaquq taakut yuget ukmangighsallghat, Asia-meng pit Jews-et esghaqaat Paul Temple-melluku. Aga akuqaghluku akilghuukat,
44021028	“Israel-eghmiini, tagiightekqun! Una yuuk navek alngunak pineghmini seghlequughaqiinkut Jews-eni whangkuta, Liilightuusaputlu. Wataqaaghaq seghleghataghaaguq tagitaqngamiki Gentile-et Temple-mun Liilightuusat iinghutkiit. Sakusiiqaqaallu una agleghnalghii Temple-a.”
44021029	(Tawaten pikiit sumeghmeggni Paul-mun Gentile-a itghusimaniluku Temple-mun, qayughllak Jerusalem-emi esghaqaqegkegket Trophimus-enkuk qerngaghmellukek. Trophimus Gentile-ngulghii Ephesus-eghmii.)
44021030	Jerusalem-eghmiit ugumiyugllakat, ketanqusnaq aglaghtuutkat Temple-mun akilghuusimaghmeng, seghleliighqiighllakat. Temple-mi Paul akuqaghluku qamuqaat eslatmun. Tawaninginaq kitum amigllaget uumkii.
44021031	Tuqunnaqutkumaluku Paul Rome-eghmiit pilluwaghtengita umiilgat ungipangegkaq qaga iingunaghmi seghleliighqiighllaguniluku.
44021032	Tawaninginaq Rome-eghmiit pilluwaghtengita umiilgat kelqegkaq umiilwaaghnengllu pilluwaghtenengllu enkaam aqfaasnaq aglaqat. Yulghuteghllaget esghaghluki pilluwaghtet qevuutiighnaniqaat Paul.
44021033	Taagken pilluwaghtet umiilgita tuguluku Paul asighqestekaa malghugneghneng qiipraghutneng. Pilluwaghtet umiilgita aaptekii, “Kinangaawa una yuuk? Samaa?”
44021034	Ataasikun akilghuumeng kiimsiisaqmegteggu repall umiilgem liigikenghitkii sameng pitangi. Enkaam pilluwaghtet umiilgita yugminun aglaatesqegkaa Paul pilluwaghtet mangteghiitnun.
44021035	Tutemqiiraaghnun kaatulluku pilluwaghtet kefkaat Paul, qayughllak yulghuteghllaget suugllugughteghllalghiit.
44021036	Yulghuteghllaget maliglleghaatkaat akilghuusimaghmeng, “Tuquteggu!”
44021037	Pilluwaghtet itghunnaqngatni Paul-em aaptekaa pilluwaghtet umiilgat Greek-estun, “Aleghquqaghnayanghisikaan?” Kiimsiiqaa, “Awii Greek-estun akuzikayuguziin?
44021038	Taanangunghisiin Egypt-eghmii qavnganghhaq qerngughtikaq yugmeng awiinnaluku Rome-em kavemenga, kilgaanun aghulaqutkii 4,000 yuget atelget, Yugtaghtet?”
44021039	Paul-em kiimsiiqaa, “Jew-nguunga, Cilicia-ghmii, allgeqaagunga neghllagmi Tarsus-mi. Aleghquqaghnayanghisingii yuget?”
44021040	Pilluwaghtet umiilgita angeghqumaksatni, Paul nekevluni tutemqiiraaghteggun iiggeni nengugutkii nepighesqelluki. Enkaam qallegnanighyata aleghquqii Hebrew-stun.
44022001	Paul-em pikii, “Anglegutemnillu siivanlleghnillu nagataghtengnga, liigikesnaqutkaghhnaqamsi saaqutemneng.”
44022002	Jews-et nagasamegteggu akuzilghii ellmegestun elngaatall qallegnanighwaaghutkat.
44022003	Taagken pikii, “Jew-nguunga allgeqaq Tarsus-mi Cilicia-melngughmi iwernga maani Jerusalem-emi anglikaagunga. Gamaliel apeghtughistekluku liitngwaaqaqanka Liilightuusat sivunemta apeghtuusaqegkiit, enkaam tuunegkaagunga Kiyaghneghmun qaatkengngwaaghnaluku katam tawaten elpesistun.
44022004	Elngaatall amyuqetaatkegkaqanka tamaakut qaatkutngalghiit Jesus-em apeghtuusaanun repall tuqunnaqutkegkaqanka. Yugetlu aghnatlu tugustaqluki anusimingllaghtesquqaqanka.
44022005	High priest-emllu agghistetlu ipanguninaaghaat apelqa elpesinun. Whangamkun latat tuyughiit Jews-elgutemnnun Damascus-melngughnun, latatkumakangatnga ivaghiyaghtuunilunga ugpeqaneng. Naalkegkumki asighqelluki taginnaqnguyaghanka Jerusalem-emun aghyuughnaluki.
44022006	“Taagken Jerusalem-emeng Damascus-mun kaasaghtughaqungallu aghneghem qukaani qilagmeng nighugllak kuukgutqaghtuq whangamnun.
44022007	Uullghaghllunga nunamun nagaqughaqa ma pilghii, ‘Saul, Saul, sangama amyuutkaqsinga?’
44022008	Aaptaqa, ‘Kinanguzin, Ataneq?’ Kiimsighaanga, ‘Jesus-nguunga Nazareth-eghmii amyuqetaatkegken.’
44022009	Tamaakut igleghalgutma esghaqaqaat nighuk iwernga aleghqughtema menga nagaquumangitaat.
44022010	Enkaam aaptaqa, ‘Ataneq, salanga?’ Atanghem piinga, ‘Nekevluten aglaa Damascus-mun. Tawani kitum ungipaalleqaaten Kiyaghneghem yataaghqegkaaneng elpenun.’
44022011	Ayaamalghiinga nighugllagem angtalanganeng enkaam igleghalgutma taslughaatnga Damascus-mun.
44022012	“Kaasamta yugem Ananias-nguuniiqegkangita esghaghyaghtughaanga. Elngaatall qaatkutngalghii Liilightuusamnnun, Damascus-eghmiit Jews-et pinistaghhiinatun akuzitkaqegkangat.
44022013	Takulunga piinga, ‘Anglegutemni Saul, esghasagunneqigten!’ Enkaam tawaninginaq esghaasagullunga esghaghaqa.
44022014	Piinga, ‘Kiyaghneghem, sivunemta maniguqiita, nakmikaaten elpenun liigikesqelluku piyukelleni, esghiisqelluku Seghleghqumangilnguq Qepghaghteni, nagatesqelluku aleghquqangaten.
44022015	Enkaam ungipaghtekelleqaaten tamanganun esghaatelleghpenengllu nagatelleghpenengllu.
44022016	Sameng utaqiigaqsin? Saaqsin paaptaayesten, seghleghqelleghten ughvughtestiki tuqlughilleghpegun Aatghakun Atanghem.’
44022017	“Taagken Jerusalem-emun taginqigllunga, Temple-mi yughaamalunga esghaghwaalleghqun
44022018	esghaghaqa Ataneq. Piinga, ‘Aghulaqragkiighi Jerusalem-emeng qayughllak maani tuguklighnaanghitaat ungipan whangamneng ayuqelghii.’
44022019	Kiimsighaqa, ‘Ataneq, Jerusalem-eghmiit liisimakngwaaghaat synagogue-nnun piiqlunga tugulaqaqanka ugpelghiit elpeneng, anaguleghtestaqankallu anusimingllaghtestaqankallu.
44022020	Ungipaghten Stephen tuqutaqngatgu legan itagnaqegkaqaqa, taakut tuqutistengita qaasliit aatkiit aflengakegkaqanka.’
44022021	Atanghem piinga, ‘Aghulaqi, kayaggnaqngwaamken agavek uyavanun Gentile-enun.’”
44022022	Tamaakut yulghutet nagatkaat Paul kenlanga Gentile-enun pinaqnillghanun. Taagken akilghuughllakat, “Tuquteggu! Unguvanguyaghqaanghituq!”
44022023	Sakrituteghllagem angtalanganeng akilghuutkelluku qaasliit aatkateng nengugulluki aghulatkiit, sunamengllu quulmun milughmikat.
44022024	Pilluwaghtet umiilgita esghapagluki pilluwaghteminun itghutesqegkaa Paul pilluwaghtet mangteghiitnun. Kayagutkaallu kagsagmigesqelluku aapghesqelluku sangan yulghuteghllagnun akilghuutkutanga.
44022025	Iwernga asighqesatni Paul-em aaptekaa umiilwaaq, “Rome-em liilightuusiitni itagnaghyaghqaawaa kagsagmikufsigu Rome-eghmii, talwa nanqigtegpenaan sameng anaggusimatanga?”
44022026	Paul-em tawaten piyatni umiilwaaghem umiilegteng takuluku pikaa, “Sanaqsin? Una yuuk Rome-eghmiinguuq!”
44022027	Taagken umiilgem takuluku Paul aaptekaa, “Ipa Rome-eghmiinguziin?” Kiimsiqaa, “Aa-a.”
44022028	Pilluwaghtet umiilgita pikaa, “Whanga llivikuteghllaglunga Rome-eghmiingughtekaagunga.” Paul-em pikaa, “Whanga Rome-eghmiingulunga allgeqaagunga.”
44022029	Taakut aapqughaaghtekaghqaqsaqangi tawaninginaq iqillaghaatkat ellnganeng. Pilluwaghtet umiilgita liigiksamigu Paul Rome-eghmiingutanga alingegkaq qayughllak asighqestekaqegkanga.
44022030	Pilluwaghtet umiilgita liigikesukaa Jews-enun sameng apalluqutanga Paul. Enkaam unaamingani qiipraghutngightestekaa. Taagken chief priest-etlu agghistetlu qerngughutesluki aglaatkaa Paul ellngitnun.
44023001	Paul-em qiivluki agghistet pikii, “Jew-lgutemni, aghneghmun whavek kenlanga seghleghyugutangitunga kiyaghtellemni Kiyaghneghmun.”
44023002	Aga High Priest-em Ananias-em nekevghalghiinun Paul-em tungangani qelghutkaa Paul qasaghtesqelluku qaanghakun.
44023003	Taagken Paul-em pikaa, “Ipapestaaq Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqaaten, uyuq piniiyugneq! Liilightuusatgun nanqigsaghqaqaghpenga iwernga elpek naafqaten Liilightuusat qasaghtestelleghpegun.”
44023004	Paul-em saaghwanilnguut nekevghalghiit pikaat, “Seghletun aleghqughan Kiyaghneghem high priest-nga.”
44023005	Paul-em pikii, “Jew-lgutemni, liisimaksaqumkun high priest-ngutanga tawaten pinayanghitaqa, qayughllak liisimaksaghaqa Akuzitngi Igaqegkani whaten pilleq, ‘Igleghutilghiit yugpesineng seghletun akuzitkesaghqaqenghitasi.’”
44023006	Paul-em liigikluki ilangi Sadducees-ngutangi, ilangi Pharisees-ngutangi iglagtuluni pikii, “Jew-lgutemni, Pharisee-nguunga, sivunghenkallu Pharisees-nguut. Whaa nanqiggnaqaghpesinga qayughllak ugpeqegkenka tuqukat unguvaghsaghqaatangi.”
44023007	Paul tawaten piyan Pharisees-etlu Sadducees-etlu aaghtiiraaghutkat aga malghughqengnginaamaghmeng pikat.
44023008	(Tawaten pikat qayughllak Pharisees-et ugpeqngukangit tuqukat unguvaghyaghqaaniluki, yaqulegtuniluku, taghneghaghtunilukullu, naqam Sadducees-et ugpeqigalkangit tamaakut).
44023009	Qenwat aaghtiiraaghullghiit iglagtughtekat. Ilangita Pharisees-et apeghtughikayuget Liilightuusaneng mesiighaatkaat Paul whaten, “Sameng seghleghmeng naalkefikneghmeng aghtughaghput, ipa entaqun taghnegham nalighmeng yaqulgem aleghquumaa.”
44023010	Wanlegi aaghtiiraaghuteghllagyata repall Paul wayaalluku lliighyatgu, pilluwaghtet umiilgita yakughyagulluku aqnighhnayukatgu pilluwaghteminun aqfasluku awitutesqegkaa agghisteneng. Enkaam aglaatesqegkaa pilluwaghtet mangteghiitnun.
44023011	Tawani unugmi Atanghem aliighvikluku Paul pikaa, “Ilutuluten, katam tawaten Jerusalem-emi ungipaqelleghpetun, Rome-emillu ungipaqelleqaghpenga.”
44023012	Unaamingani 40-neng uglalghiit Jews-et agghilluteng tuqunnaqegkaat Paul. Ellmeggneng akequtkat neghnaanghinnilutengllu, meghnaanghinnilutengllu kenlanga tuqutelleghmeggnun.
44023014	Enkaam chief priest-enunllu siivanlleghnunllu aglaghluteng pikiit, “Ipapestaaq akeqiikut neghnaanghinniluta kenlanga tuqutellemnnun Paul.
44023015	Elpesillu agghistetlu aapteggu pilluwaghtet umiilgat taginneqigtesqelluku Paul aapqughaaghwaaghnaqniluku. Enkaam tumemi taakwani whangkuta tuqulleqaghput.”
44023016	Iwernga Paul-em uyghungan nagaqughluki agghillghit ungipaasaghtuqaa Paul pilluwaghtet mangteghiitnun.
44023017	Ungipaasatni Paul-em tuqlughluku umiilwaaq pikaa, “Uum nukalpigaam ungipaasuwaqaa pilluwaghtet umiilgat sameng, aglaataghtigu.”
44023018	Umiilwaaghem tuguluku, aglaalluku pilluwaghtet umiilgat pikaa, “Anusimingllagham Paul-em tagitesqaa elpenun una nukalpigaq, samenguq ungipaasuwaaten.”
44023019	Umiilgem tasluqluku iqitulluku ellnginaaghsamek aaptekaa, “Sameng ungipaasugsinga?”
44023020	Kiimsiqaa, “Jews-et agghisimaat aapnaluteng Paul aglaataghtesqelluku agghivigmun unaami, aapqughwaghataghaghnaqniluku.
44023021	Ugpeqegpenaki, qayughllak 40-neng uglaghtut yuget iighluteng tumemi utaqiinaqnilghiit tuqunnaluku. Akeqimaat neghnaanghinnilutengllu, meghnaanghinnilutengllu kenlanga tuqutelleghmeggnun Paul. Apeghiighluteng utaqiigaqut naten pilleghqaghpeneng.”
44023022	Umiilgem ineghtengngwaaqaa nukalpigaq, “Kina alngunak ungipaategpenaan ungipaasaghtuumanilunga.” Taagken aanestekaa.
44023023	Taagken pilluwaghtet umiilgita tagsiqlighlukek umiilwaaghek pikakek, “Ungipaasaghtughteki 200 pilluwaghtet, 70 kuunitistet, 200 panastet igleghsaqleggiinaaghllinnguq Caesarea-mun, ighivgaqun 9-eklaagmi.
44023024	Paul-llu kuunimeng yataaghqunnakesi igleghusighqameng, wataghllak pinitun kaatunnakesi Governor-mun Felix-mun.”
44023025	Taagken governor-mun latatkegkaa Paul:
44023026	Ukut latat Claudius Lysias-meng pinguut Angellemnun Governor-mun Felix-mun, quyakamken.
44023027	Jews-et tugukaqaat Paul, tuqunnaqaqsaghpetaatlu iwernga liigikluku Rome-eghmiingutanga pilluwaghtekullghiini aqfaaghput aqnighhnayukatgu.
44023028	Liigiksugluku Jews-enun sameng apalluqutanga agghistengitnun aglaataqa.
44023029	Iwernga liigiksaqegka sameng apalliiteftuq tuqusaghqaaluni, talwa anusimingllaghyaghqaaluni. Taawanginaq Jews-et qaatkuuneghinniluku Liilightuusameggnun piiqeftaat.
44023030	Ungipaasatnga Jews-ennguq tuqunnaqaqaat Paul, tawaninginaq elpenun aglaatestaqa. Taakutlu avutkistengi kayagtanka elpenun apeghyaghtiisqelluku apallaat.
44023031	Enkaam unugmi tawani pilluwaghtet kayagtelleghmegestun aghulaqutkaat Paul kenlanga Antipatris-mun.
44023032	Unaamingani ilangi uteghniqat pilluwaghtet mangteghiitnun, taakut kuunitistet nagneghutkaat Paul Caesarea-mun.
44023033	Kaalluteng Paul aglaatkaat governor-mun, latatlu tuunegkiit.
44023034	Governor-em latat atightughluki aaptekaa Paul, “Nalighneghaneng Rome-em pinguzin?” Paul-em kiimsiqaa, “Cilicia-meng”.
44023035	Governor-em pilaataqaa, “Avutkisteten kaaskata nanqiglleqamken.” Taagken kelengakistenun kayagutkaa kelengakesqelluku Praetorium-emi mangteghami Herod-em ulimastekaani.
44024001	Tallimat aghneghet atughluki High Priest-a Ananias, ilangillu siivanlleghet, akuzistekaghqaatlu Tertullus, kaatkat Caesarea-mun. Nanqigtivigmi Governor-mun Felix-mun aapqiit Paul-em seghletun pillghi.
44024002	Tuqlughyatni Tertullus pikaq, “Angellemni Governor Felix-mi, elpek apalluqluten nekeggmellelguukut nunamnni qavngarugllaggaaneng. Tamaakutlu kiyaghtellemnni allangughquqaghten pinightut.
44024003	Salleghpenun tamaghhaanun iyamsiqayugllaguukut.
44024004	Kimaawisnayukamken takestaaghhaaluku akuzinaqunga, iyamsiqayugvikamken nagannaqegkefkut.
44024005	Una yuuk Paul seghleliighqistenguuq. Seghleliighqaqii qamaglluki Jews-et naansaghngaata. Maghyaghqughtekaat Jesus-em Nazareth-eghmiim maligsaaghtengita.
44024006	Talwa sakusiiqnaqegkaqsaghaa Temple-a, iwernga tugukaqaghput.
44024007	Nanqiggnaqegkaqsaghaghput liillightuusamta pillghatun, taawanginaq pilluwaghtet umiilgita Lysias-em tagiluni pilluwaghteminun wayaghtestekaqaa whangkunneng. Taagken qelghii avutkistengi elpenun tagisqelluki.
44024008	Governor Felix-mi, aapqughaaquvgu liigikelleqaten anaggunnilleput ipangutangi.”
44024009	Jews-et ilatqaghtekat Tertullus-mun, akuzillghi qamaglluki ipangunikiit.
44024010	Taagken governor-em Paul akuzisqegkaa. Enkaam Paul pikaq, “Governor Felix-mi, quyaanga mesighaghnaqelghiinga elpenun, qayughllak liisimakamken qavngarugllaggaaneng nanqigtistenguuten whangkunnun Jews-enun.
44024011	Elpeni liigiksugnaghtuq ipangutanga akugaarugllak Jerusalem-etelqa maniguunnalunga Kiyaghneghmun.
44024012	Anaggunnistema liisimakaatnga aaghtiiraaghumangitaqa kina alngunak, qapraghqiimangitungallu yugneng Temple-mi, synagogue-nnillu, talwa nani alngunak Jerusalem-emi.
44024013	Enkaangam tawaten pimanighngaaghmegtengnga ipapighqennaanghitaat.
44024014	Iwernga apeghnaqaqa una elpesinun, manigughaqaqa Kiyaghneghat sivunemta maliglluku Tumanga Jesus-em. Ukut yuget pikangat temnginguniluku. Iwernga whangallu ellngistun ugpeqanka Moses-em Liilightuusii, uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkiit.
44024015	Anaggunnistemtunllu ugpeqaqa Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtesaghqaqii qamagtengngwaaghluki tuqukat pinighyaghngaata, seghleghuyaghngaata.
44024016	Enkaangam quunpeng kiyaghhnaqutkaqunga seghleghyugutkaghqiillunga Kiyaghneghmunllu yugnunllu.
44024017	“Qafsinegyak ayumiqulleq atughluku qantaghaqunghhaq uteghnightunga Jerusalem-emun manilinnaluki aklumalghiit Jews-elgutenka, aghqerraaghnalungallu Kiyaghneghmun.
44024018	Pelungighsaneghmeng apeghiighlunga Temple-mi aghqerraaghumalunga, ilangita Jews-et Asia-meng pit esghaghaatnga. Uvitka paaghqituqlu seghleliighituqlu.
44024019	Taakut Jews-et sangameng taginghitat? Sameng anaggusimakuma ellnginguyaghtut aapghistekaghqanka seghletun pillemneng iwernga aviitut.
44024020	Yeqay ukut whaanlenguut nagatkaqaatnga mesighaghaqngama Jews-et agghivigitni, apeghlitgu anaggutelleghmeng naalkefikumakumegtengnga.
44024021	Entaqun ellngitni seghleghuuq whaten piiqngamki, ‘Nanqigtaghpesinga qayughllak ugpeqegkenka tuqukat unguvaghyaghqaaniluki.’”
44024022	Iwernga Felix-em, liisimakngwaaghluku kiyaghtaalleq Jesus-em apeghtuusaa, wintakusitkaa nanqigtegpenaan Paul. Pikaq, “Pilluwaghtet umiilgat Lysias kaaskan agghitkelleqaqa Paul.”
44024023	Taagken umiilwaaghmun kayagutkaa Paul kelengakesqelluku, naqam anusimingllaghtesnaniqaa. Ighsakesnaniqiillu ilakumtaaghita sameng taginneghatgu aklukegkaaneng.
44024024	Qafsinat aghneghet atughluki Felix-em Jews-a nuliini, Drusilla, kelqelluku tagikaq. Tagsiqlighluku Paul, nagatkaak ungipalghii ugpeqilleghmeng Jesus Christ-akun.
44024025	Paul-em akuzitkesaki ukut: pinitun kiyaghtaalleq, nuqenneghtulleq, Kiyaghneghemllu nanqigtilleghqaa tamaghhaanun. Governor Felix-em alingluni pikaa, “Aanelghaaten'ngam, alla aqfasleqamken pilleghqangegkuma.”
44024026	Tawani pilleghmi Felix neghyunguyalghii Paul-mun manililleqniluni pegtekumigu. Tamaaken apalluqluku tagsiqlighaqegkanga mulutegpenaan aleghquunnalutek.
44024027	Taagken maalghuk ayumiqullghek atughlukek, Porcius Festus governor-ngughtekaq. Iwernga Felix-em efqughsugluki Jews-et Paul unitkaa paninang qiipraghusighngaluku.
44025001	Festus kaasami Caesarea-mun igleghutinaluni, pingayut aghneghet atughluki aghulaqegkaq Jerusalem-emun.
44025002	Tawani chief priest-etlu, igleghutistengitallu Jews-et ungipitkaat, Paul seghleliighqiighllakaaniluku Jews-eneng.
44025003	Sagiqutkaat Festus-mun, Paul tagitesqelluku Jerusalem-emun qayughllak aksaqluku tuqusukaat tumangani.
44025004	Iwernga Festus-em pikii, “Paul kelengakaqaghput Caesarea-mi. Qantaghaqun uteghnighyaghqaagunga,
44025005	igleghutistegpesi maliggnakangatnga. Elngaatall tawani sameng anaggusimakan apeghnakangat.”
44025006	Festus Jerusalem-emetaghaqaq pingayuneng inglulek nalighmeng qula aghneq, taagken Caesarea-tkaq. Unaamingani nanqigtivigem aqumutagkenkun aqumluni aqfastekaa Paul.
44025007	Tagisatgu, Jerusalem-eghmiit Jews-et kanglluqaghlluku anaggutaataghllagumanikaat iwernga ipapighqepagningitkiit anaggutellghi.
44025008	Paul mesighaqaq, “Qaatkiganneghitanka Jews-et Liilightuusiit, seghletun pingigatunga Temple-mi, seghletun pimangitaqa Rome-em Umiilegpigaa.”
44025009	Festus-em efqughsugluki Jews-et aaptekaa Paul, “Jerusalem-emi whangamnun nanqigtesugsiin?”
44025010	Paul-em kiimsiqaa, “Nakaa! Whaa Umiilegpigaam nanqigtivigani nekevghaanga enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku whani nanqigsaghqaagunga. Liisimakngwaaghan Jews-enun anaggutellghitunga.
44025011	Anaggusimakuma Rome-em liilightuusaan pillghani repall tuqusaghqaalunga, anagnaqnaanghitaqa tuqulleq. Iwernga Jews-et anaggunnillghat temngingukan, kitum alngunak Jews-enun sastekanganga, taana yuuk qaatkunnaanghituq Rome-em liilightuusaanun. Rome-em Umiilegpigaanun nanqigtesugtunga.”
44025012	Festus-enkut agghilgutkullghiit agghinneghmeng taaqsameng Paul-em piyukellghaneng, Paul pikaa, “Nanqigtesugulghiiten Umiilegpigaghmun, Umiilegpigaghmun aglaghllequten.”
44025013	Taam kingungiighhaaneng Umiilek Agrippa kaatkaq Caesarea-mun kelqelluku nayani Bernice, quyaknaluku Governor Festus.
44025014	Tamaansimalukek Festus-em ungipamsugutkaa Agrippa Paul-meng. Pikaa, “Governor-ngughsalghiinga Felix-em yuuk anusimingllaghvigmetestaqeftaa maani.
44025015	Jerusalem-emellunga chief priest-etlu, igleghutistengitallu Jews-et ungipaataatnga Paul-em anaggutellghaneng. Taagken aaptaatnga whangamnun tuqutestesqelluku,
44025016	iwernga kiimsiqaqanka, ‘Whangkuta Rome-eghmiini kinkut alngunak nanqigtegpenaki tuqusigataput. Liilightuusaput whaten pikaagut, Seghletun pinikaat, sivukluni apeghtesaghqaaguq ipa pimatanga anaggunnistet nagatestekluki. Taagken liigikelleqaghput salleghqaghput.’
44025017	Enkaam Paul-em anaggunnistengi tagilaghaasata aga unaamingani aqumegkaagunga nanqigtivigkun, tagitestekaqaqallu Paul.
44025018	Anaggunistengi nekevuulluteng seghletun pillghi apeghyaqmegteki sumeghtaghaatkellemtun seghleghtutkanghiteftut.
44025019	Taawanginaghhaq aaghtiiraaghumakangat ugpeqilleghmeggneng, taanallu yuuk aatqelghii Jesus-meng tuqumaniluku, iwernga Paul-em sagiqutkaqaa unguvaamaniluku.
44025020	Liisimakepagunghitutemneng tamaakut, Paul aaptaqa nanqigtesugutanga Jerusalem-emi.
44025021	Iwernga Paul-em kiimsighaanga, ‘Nanqigtesugtunga Umiilegpigaghmun. Kelengakestinga kenlanga aglaghtestelleghpenun ellnganun.’ Enkaam anusimingllaghvigmun kanaghtesneqigtaqa kenlanga aglaghtestelleghqamnun Umiilegpigaghmun.”
44025022	Agrippa-m pikaa Festus, “Whangallu nagasugaqa Paul.” Pikaa, “Unaami nagalleqan.”
44025023	Unaamingani Agrippa-nkuk Bernice-enkuk iitqak qerngughutfigllagmun elngaatall aarraghwaaghlutek umiilgem aatkaaneng, maligtestekluki umiilgitlu pilluwaghtet, igleghutistengillu Caesarea-m. Taagken Festus-em itghutesqegkaa Paul.
44025024	Festus-em pikii, “Umiilegmi Agrippa-mi, elpesillu qamagllusi whaanlengughni, una yuuk esghaqesi, Paul-nguuq. Qamaglluteng Jews-et maanlenguut, Jerusalem-emelnguutlu qikeghqukegkaqaat whangamkun repall akilghuutkegkaqaat tuqusaghqaaniluku.
44025025	Iwernga nanqigsaqegka sameng apalliiteftuq tuqusaghqaaluni. Ellmineng nanqigtesukaatanganeng Umiilegpigaghmun aglaghtesnaluku piiqaqa.
44025026	Iwernga latatgun sameng ipapighqengngalghiimeng apeghyaghqiitunga Umiilegpigaghmun uumeng yugmeng ayuqelghiimeng. Enkaam tagitaqa sivugpesinun, kiyang elpenun Umiilegmi Agrippa-mi! Neghyukaqa aapqughaaqumteggu sameng latasighqameng naalkefiknayukamkun.
44025027	Whangamni temnginguuq aglaghtestekumkun anusimingllaghaq Umiilegpigaghmun sameng anaggutelleghmeng apallungunaan.”
44026001	Agrippa-m pikaa Paul, “Taawa mesighaghyaghqaaghtuten, saaqsin akuzi.” Paul-em iiggeni nengugulluki, pikaa,
44026002	“Umiilegmi Agrippa-mi, aghneghmi whani elngaatall aneghneghtunga sivugpeni mesighaghnaqelghiinga Jews-et anaggutelqennikangitneng,
44026003	qayughllak nallukenghitngwaaghaten Jews-et nangaghneghitlu apalluqutkaqegkangitlu. Enkaam nangllegsipigllunga aaptamken nagataghtesqellunga.
44026004	“Nunamnilnguutlu Jerusalem-emelnguutlu qamaglluteng Jews-et liisimakaat kiyaghtaalqa anglinghhaatemneng ima.
44026005	Apeghyugyaqumegteggu liisimakegkaghteng apeghnayaghaatnga iiwleng qaatkutngalghiinga Jews-et Liilightuusiitnun.
44026006	Whaa Jews-et tagistaatnga whavek nanqigtesqellunga qayughllak neghyukngukegka Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtilleghqaa tuqukaneng akequsaqegkaa sivunemnnun.
44026007	Taanata akequsaq qula maalghuk siipneqelghiit ramkemta neghyukegkangat allgeghhnaluku, elngaatall maniguutnguluteng Kiyaghneghmun unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan. Umiilegmi, iwernga taana ataasiq neghyukilleq apalluqluku Jews-et nanqigtesugaatnga.
44026008	Sangafsi sumeghtaghaghaqetsi Kiyaghneq unguvaghtipagninginniluku tuqukaneng?
44026009	“Sivunghani agani ugpeqepigtekaqaqa kipullginaalleghllaka elqughutnganiluku aatghaneng Jesus-em Nazareth-eghmiim.
44026010	Tawaten pikaagunga Jerusalem-emi. Chief priest-eneng pilleghqangegkaagunga anusimingllaghtesnaluki ugpeqalghutet. Tuququghnaqngatki itagnaqepigtekaqanka tuqutesqelluki.
44026011	Uglaghngaan aghyuughtestekaqanka tamaghhiitni synagogue-nni, whatenllu pisnaqutkegkaqanka, ‘Ugpeqnaniimaaqa Jesus.’ Ugumiyagutepigtekaqanka repall malighqaqaqanka talwa Gentile-et nunangitnun amyuutkennaluki.
44026012	“Tamaaken apalluqluku Damascus-etunga pilleghqalighlunga, qelellelighlunga chief priest-eneng.
44026013	Umiilegmi, igleghtaaluta aghneq qukaghitaquqlu esghaghaqa nighuk nighugataghalghii siqineghmeng, kuukgullghii qilagmeng pamaken. Elngaatall nighupiglluni kuukgutkaaguq uvitemnun, igleghalgutemnunllu.
44026014	Qamaglluta ulleghaatukut nunamun. Taagken ma nagaqughaqa whaten pilghii Hebrew-ghmiistun, ‘Saul, Saul! Sangama amyuutkesinga? Aqnighquuguten elpeneng amyuutkilleghpegun, tawateghpigaq ox-em aqnighqullghatun ketngighqulleghmikun yugmi maghyaghquusii.’
44026015	Aaptaqa, ‘Kinanguzin Ataneq?’ Atanghem kiimsighaanga, ‘Jesus-nguunga, amyuutkegken.
44026016	Nekevi. Aliighvikamken qayughllak nakmikamken qepghaghtengulutenllu liisimakistengulutenllu. Apeghnaketen tamaakut esghaaqaghten aghneghmi whani, tamaakutlu kelgusaghqanka kinguvaqun aliighvikegkumken.
44026017	Yuguliiqnaaghamkenllu elpek katam yugpeneng, Gentile-enengllu. Ellngitnun kayaggnaqngwaamken
44026018	esghaghtestesqelluki, tunulluki mamlegmeng qiivesqelluki nighughmun, tunulluki Tughneghaam aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng qiivesqelluki Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun. Taagken Kiyaghneghem seghevulleqii seghleghqellghitneng, ilalleqiillu tamaavek aaftekaminun ugpeqillghitgun whangamneng.’
44026019	“Umiilegmi Agrippa-mi, qaatkegkaqaqa taana esghaghwaalqa qilagmeng.
44026020	Sivuklunga ungipaqiinga Damascus-mi taagken Jerusalem-emi, tamanganillu Judea-mi. Ungipaqiinga Jews-enunllu Gentile-enunllu avuteghqelluki seghleghqennanighluki qiivesqelluki Kiyaghneghmun, pinitunllu pisqanka ipapighqutkesqelluku avuteghqelluteng seghleghqennaniimatangi.
44026021	Tawaten ungipaqilqa apalluqluku Temple-mi Jews-et tugulunga tuqunnaqutkegkaqaatnga.
44026022	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem kayusiitaqaanga whavemun kenlanga, enkaam sivugpesigun nekevlunga aapghaqa Christ-a pingwaaghllagnunllu ukavantalghiinunllu. Aapqaqa taananguuq ataasiq uuknaliqistetlu Moses-emllu uuknaliqutkegkaat.
44026023	Pikaagut Christ-a ikfiqepestaaghlleqniluku enkaam sivuliiluni unguvaghyaghqaaniluku tuqulleghmeng. Apeghyaghqaanilukullu nighuga yugulillghem yugnunllu Gentile-enunllu.”
44026024	Paul mesighaamaluku Festus-em akilghuughllakaa, “Paul, nallungughtuten! Liitelleghllagpek nallungughtestaaten!”
44026025	Iwernga Paul-em pikaa, “Governor Festus-mi, nallungughtellghitunga, liisimalunga ipameng akuzinguunga.
44026026	Umiilgem Agrippa-m liisimakngwaaghaa tamaana enkaam tetugpenaan aleghqughaqa. Liisimakaqa nagaquqaqii qamaglluki tamaakut qayughllak aksaqluku pikaanghitut.
44026027	Umiilegmi Agrippa-mi, ugpeqaqsikii uuknaliqistet igaqegkiit? Liisimakamken ugpeqaqaten!”
44026028	Umiilgem Agrippa-m aaptekaa Paul, “Sumeghpenii-i whaa takesqughhaan aleghqughlunga ugpeghtesnaqsingaa Christ-ameng?”
44026029	Paul-em kiimsiqaa, “Takesqughhaaghngaan, nalighmeng taakluku aleghqughyaghngaamken yughaatkengngwaamken Kiyaghneghmun ugpeghesqelluten. Ellnginaghpek yughaatkengngunghitamken, yughaatkengngwaamsi qamagllusi nagallghiini whangamneng aghneghmi whani, whangamtun lliighesqellusi iwerngaqun qiipraghutngunasi!”
44026030	Taagken Umiilek Agrippa, Governor Festus, Bernice, tamaakutlu ilangi nekevuutkat.
44026031	Aanluteng ellmeggneng aleghquutkat, “Uumun yugmun sameng apalliitukut tuqutusighqameng nalighmeng anusimingllaasighqameng.”
44026032	Agrippa-m pikaa Festus, “Aanesnayaghaghput Umiilegpigaghmun nanqigtesqelluni pikaanghisaqan.”
44027001	Festus-em Italy-tesqesugyinkut angyaghpagkun, aglaatestekii Paul-llu ilangillu anusimingllaghat umiilwaaghmun Julius-mun. Julius-enkut pilluwaghtekullghiit aatqelghiit, “Umiilegpigaam Pilluwaghtengi.”
44027002	Taawa angyaghpak Adramyttium-emeng pi, aghulaqsaqleggiinaaghtekaq nenun Asia-m esnenganilngughnun. Tawavek uuglluta aghulaqukut. Aristarchus-em maligtiinkut Thessalonica-ghmiim. (Thessalonica Macedonia-melnguq).
44027003	Unaamingani kaatukut Sidon-mun. Julius-em pinitungwaaq pikaa Paul, laalightestaqluku ilakumtaaghanun Sidon-mi, sameng aklukegkaaneng tuunaqluku pisqelluku.
44027004	Sidon-meng aghulaqukut anuqa aygumun enkaam igleghtukut uqiinellghakun qiighqam Cyprus-em.
44027005	Igleghaakut esnengakun Cilicia-mllu Pamphylia-mllu, taagken nagneghtukut Myra-mun Lycia-melngughmun.
44027006	Tamaanteftuq angyaghpak Alexandria-meng pi, enkaam Umiilwaaghem Julius-em liigikluku Italy-nnaqutanga uugtestiinkut.
44027007	Nunmaasqughhaq igleghtukut qafsinegyagllak aghneq, iwernga piyaqliighngaamta kaatukut Cnidus-mun. Anuqliitem igleghapagningiitesinkut taagavek, igleghtukut uqiinellghakun qiighqam Crete-em, naghughlluku Salmone.
44027008	Esnengiighhaakun igleghtukut piyaqliighngaamta, kaatukut kangighamun aatqelghiimun, Uqitaghvik Kangighaq, taana qantaghanlenguq Lasea-meng.
44027009	Tamaanteghllagtukut qenwat yakughnaghtaa taakluku igleghamun, siingenllu Aghneq naghughlleghhii priest-et aghqerraaghvigat seghleghqellghitnun Jews-et. Enkaam Paul-em kelengasaaghii angyaghpagem umiilwaaghi.
44027010	Pikii, “Ukughsi yugni, sumemni whaa elngaatall yakughniighnaqukut igleghallemnni. Iflaaqelteggullu angyaghpagput usituumaan, entaqun talwa tuqulaghaallequkut.”
44027011	Iwernga Umiilwaaghem Julius-em nagatkaqegkek angyaghpagemllu umiilga, angyaghpaleklu yuuk avelghaghluku Paul.
44027012	Allullutengllu angyaghpagem yugi igleghsukat qayughllak taana kangighaq yakughnalghii angyaghpagmun uksughfiguluni. Kaannaqnaluteng Phoenix-mun pikat uksughsaghqaaluteng tamaani. Phoenix-em kangighaa qiighqamelnguq Crete-mi, northwest-munllu southwest-munllu ayuqelghii.
44027013	Ikegkemeng anuqataghaaghsan angyaghpagem yugi pikat, “Taanata anuqa utaqakaghput.” Enkaam uyghiita sayugluku telanangaakut Crete-em esnengiighhaakun.
44027014	Iwernga anuqlighllagtuq nakaghyameng enkaam qiighqameng atghaghteghllagaa.
44027015	Angyaghpak awatmun tengsagu quutmun taglaghnaqutkesaghluta iilqayugtukut enkaam upuupeng tengtestukut.
44027016	Qiighqasqughhaam Cauda-m uughqanganun lliighusinkut uqiteghraagtukut. Tawani qamuqsaqefut angyaghhaghput piyaqliighutkeghngaamteggu qaakaghput.
44027017	Taagken angyaghpak ayugighsaghaat asighlluku tapghaghmeng. Alingluteng qenaaghllughquunnayukameng Syrtis-mi telanangat ifkaghqughluki tengtestukut.
44027018	Unaamingani paninang esla almesiqeghllagyagu, angyaghpagem usingan ilangi meghmun ateghqughiit.
44027019	Awakaghaani esla almesiqsagu angyaghpagem sanqutngi ateghqughiit.
44027020	Qafsinegllak aghneq siqinngunani, ighaleqetaangunani piiq eslam seghleghllagem angtalanganeng. Enkaam talwa iilqayugtukut, isigimaqun tuqulaghaannaqelghiikut.
44027021	Yuget neghegpenateng muluughllagyata Paul-em nekevluni pikii, “Ukughsi yugni, nagatkaqsaqufsinga kennayanghilnguukut Crete-meng enkaam aghsaan seghleliighnayanghitusi, saghyangiinnayanghitusi.
44027022	Iwernga iilqayugpenasi, nalighhiinaghsi tuqunaanghituq iwerngaqun angyaghpagiillequkut.
44027023	Unuk Kiyaghneghem yaqulgan takukaqaanga. Taanata Kiyaghneq manigughaqegkegka, ellngan pikaanga.
44027024	Yaqulgem piinga, ‘Paul, alingegpenang, kaallequten Rome-emun, nekevellequten sivungakun Umiilegpigaam. Yughaatkegkaqutegpeneng angyaghpagmetelguteten qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem yugulilleqii.’
44027025	Enkaam quyatek, ugpeqiinga Kiyaghneghqun tawatetngwaaghesqelluku ungipaatellemtun.
44027026	Iwerngaqun angyaghpagiillequkut qiighqami.”
44027027	Qula estamat siipneqluku unuk Kelliimi Adriatic-mi tengtiinkut. Taakwani unugem qukaani yulaaghet piiqut quutmun tughwaaghsugninniluta.
44027028	Tapghaq uqigkutighluku meghmun ateghsaqmegteggu yuginaq yaagneq uusqaghtutkaftuq. Tazingapighqaaghyamta tapghaq ateghllaataghyaqmegteggu akimigaq yaagneq uusqaghtutkaliimalghii.
44027029	Yulaaghet alingegkat angyaghpak qalmesinnayukan enkaam estamaneng uyghighaat kingungakun. Taagken yughaghtut aghhragkiighesqelluku.
44027030	Angyaghpagem yulaaghi anagnaqegkat sivuyaga angyaghpagem uyghiitelighnaqesighwaaghutkelluku, angyaghhaq meghmun ateghtekaat.
44027031	Iwernga Paul-em pikii umiilwaaqlu pilluwaghtetlu, “Ukut yuget aghulaqegkata kayutepagiillequkut enkaam elpesi tuqulaghaallequsi.”
44027032	Enkaam pilluwaghtet angyaghhaq keputkaat.
44027033	Aghtaghaghnaqaqaallu Paul-em qamaglluki neghesqughwaaqii, pikii, “Qula estamat siipneqluku aghneq neghelqunghitusi qayughllak elngaatall kelengaruulghiisi.
44027034	Tamaaken apalluqluku neghesqughwaaghnaqamsi iknaqughtesqellusi. Nalighhiinaghsi tuqunaanghituq talwa aqnighhnaanghituq.”
44027035	Nepiighyami neqekrangllameng tugulluni igamsiqayugvikluku Kiyaghneq manungitni ikulluni neghegkaq.
44027036	Yuget ilutughsaghyisteng ellngitlu qamaglluteng neghuutkat.
44027037	Qerngaghllagemta angyaghpagmelngughni 276-nguukut.
44027038	Qamaglluteng neghuunneghmeng apeghiighyameng angyaghpak uqengellinaluku wheat-a meghmun ateghqughaat.
44027039	Aghsagu quutmeng esghaatut, taawanginaq liisuqenghitaat natungutanga. Iwernga kangighalguftuq esnalegmeng enkaam taaggun tamlagnaqsugtut.
44027040	Kepuulluki uyghiitet unitkiit meghmelluki, petugutiiklu aquutak naghighquqiit. Taagken sayugluki telaanangat sivuyagmelnguut tengtestut tespikavek esnamun.
44027041	Iwernga angyaghpagem sivuyaga aghqitaghisan kingunga qagighllaget kagimtaat.
44027042	Pilluwaghtet piyaghiit anusimingllaghat tuququghnaluki luuraq quutmun pugimluteng navek anagnayukata.
44027043	Iwernga umiilwaaghem tuqutesugumangitkaa Paul enkaam iinghutkii. Yeghlegi qelqii pugimaqayuggaat quutmun tagliisqelluki.
44027044	Tamaakut pugimellgilnguut angyaghpagem ikellghaakun tuguluki taglaghnaqesqegkii quutmun. Tawaten qamaglluta yaywaaseng uuglleghaatukut quutmun.
44028001	Yaywaaseng quutmun uugsamta liigikaghput qiighqaq Malta-ngutanga.
44028002	Tamaakumiit elngaatall upughatiinkut kumaqisimaamta qayughllak aqlaghaghtekanga eslallugughsimaghmi.
44028003	Paul saqumigluni quugkameng qiighimaluku, tuqunalghii nemeghyaq maatneghem aanesluku quugneng, iiggakun amqeghtekaa.
44028004	Tamaakumiit esghaghluku nemeghyaq Paul-em iigganeng qughaghngalghii ilateng pikiit, “Ipapestaaq una yuuk yugtaghtenguuq. Qaywa un'gani meghmi tuqunghiteghngaaghmi esghaghhu tuquyaghqaamalghii.”
44028005	Paul-em iiggeni ufsugusaqminiki nemeghyaq ifkaghtuq kenghegnun iwernga talwa nemeghyam aqnighsimangilkanga.
44028006	Yuget pikaqsaqangat Paul puuveghllagnaqniluku nalighmeng tuqunaqniluku. Iwernga sagpenani muluughllagyan, sumeghtaghaatkegkaat, “Una naliqaat kiyaghneghet.”
44028007	Taam qiighqam umiilga Publius, nunalguftuq ughugsighvimta tungangani. Publius-em elngaatall upughatiinkut, ellnganitukut pingayut aghneghet.
44028008	Atanga puqleghanguftuq aqsalliqumaghmi. Paul-em esghaghyaghtughluku yughaatkelluku, saafsaqminigu naallghutuq.
44028009	Paul tawaten piyan qamaglluteng ilangi qinuyuget tagilaghaatkat enkaam naallghutkat.
44028010	Tamaaken apalluqluku tunqughtaagiinkut tunusameng. Tamaani pingayut tanqit atughluki aghulaqsaghqaaghsamta tunqughtaalaataghiinkut tumangani atughqamnneng. Angyaghpak Alexandria-meng pi uksughsimalghii tamaani qiighqami. Aatqeftaa “Malghik kiyaghneghek” sivuyaganiteftuklu ulimaaghulutek taakuk. Aghulaqsaghqaaghsan taaggun uugtukut.
44028012	Syracuse-mun kaalluta tamaantukut pingayut aghneghet.
44028013	Taagken qapiighwtaghtukut Rhegium-emun kaatellemnnun kenlanga. Aghneq ataasiq atughluku tamaani, unaamingani anuqataghaaghutiinkut ikevaghmeng enkaam awakaghaani Puteoli-mun kaatukut.
44028014	Tamaanteftut ugpeqat, ellmeggnitesqiinkut maaghraghvinlek aghneq. Taagken Rome-emun nagneghtukut.
44028015	Ugpeqat Rome-emelnguut nagaqughluta, paayghumakanginkut tungangitnun Akilpegaghviget Appius-melnguut, ilangita paayghumakanginkut tungangitnun Pingayut Aqelqalghutat. Paul-em esghaghluki ugpeqat ilutughtekaq enkaam iyamsiqayugvikegkaa Kiyaghneq.
44028016	Rome-emun kaasamta Paul ellnginaghmetestaat nani piyukelghani iwerngaqun ataasim pilluwaghtem kelengakaa.
44028017	Pingayut aghneghet atughluki Paul-em tagsiqlighii Jews-et igleghutistengit. Tagiyata pii, “Jew-lgutemni, sanghiteghngaamki yuput, nalighmeng kipullginaanghiteghngaamki nangaghneghit sivunemta, paninang igleghutistemta Jerusalem-emelnguut tugulunga tuunaatnga Rome-eghmiinun.
44028018	Aapqughaaghlunga sameng apalliisama tuqutusighqameng itemunnalunga piyaghaatnga.
44028019	Iwernga Jews-et ighlekaatnga enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku piiqa nanqigtista Umiilegpigaghmun nanqigtesugnilunga. Umiilegpigaghmun seghlequughyaghtuunghitanka yulgutenka.
44028020	Enkaam tagsiqlighamsi apeghnaluki tamaakut elpesinun. Liitesugaqallu elpesinun taana ataasiq Israel-eghmiit neghyukegkaat apalluqluku qiipraghusighngaanga.”
44028021	Kiimsiqaat, “Judea-ghmiit latatkigataaten whangkunnun. Talwa nalighhiiniita ugpeqaalgutemta taagegken tagiluteng ungipaqigataaten, nalighmeng seghletun akuzitkigataaten.
44028022	Whangkuta liisugaghput elpenun sameng sumeghtaghaatkaqutangi tamaakut ugpeqilghiit Jesus-meng, qayughllak liisimakaghput nani alngunak seghlequughaqiit.”
44028023	Taagken nakmikegkaat aghneq ataasiq qerngughutfiguluku. Taana aghneq kaasan uglapiglluteng tagilaghaatkat Paul-em kiyaghfiganun. Unaaghhaaneng unullghanun kenlanga apeghtuqii Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem, liigikestengngwaaghnaqutkegkiillu Jesus-meng atuqluki Liilightuusii Moses-em, uuknaliqistetlu igaqegkiit.
44028024	Ilangita ugpeqegkaat iwernga ilangita ugpequmangilkangat.
44028025	Enkaam aaghtiiraaghutkat. Nekevuutaqutlu aanleghaannaluteng Paul-em pikii, “Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak ipa pimalghiik sivuneghpesigun uuknaliqistekun Isaiah-kun.
44028026	Whaten pikaaguq, ‘Takuluki ukut yuget whaten piki, Nagasaghngaaghpesi, esghapagngaaghpesi liigiknaanghitusi.
44028027	Taakut yuget tawatetut qayughllak umyugiit pineghlluugtekaagut enkaam sigutetengllu iyetengllu saapegkaqiit. Tawatenneghisaqumeng esghaannayaghtut, nagaquunnayaghtut, liigiknayaghtut, qiivnayaghtutlu whangamnun naallghutesqelluteng.’”
44028028	Paul-em taaqniitkun pikii, “Elpesinun liigikesugaqa, Kiyaghneghem kayagtengngwaaqaqii ungipaghteni ungipiisqelluki yugulilleghmeng Gentile-enun. Ellngit nagatepestaaghyaghqaagut.”
44028029	Tawaten Paul piyan Jews-et aaghtiiraaghuteghllagumaghmeng aanleghaatkat.
44028030	Maalghuk ayumiqullghek Paul-em kiyaghfikegkaa mangteghaq llivikaqluku. Upughataqegkangi qamaglluki iteghteni,
44028031	tetugpenanillu ungipaqaq Ataneghpagullghaneng Kiyaghneghem. Apeghtuutkegkaallu Ataneq Jesus Christ-a. Tawaten pillgha kitum alngunak aghuliighsimangilkanga.
45001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut; qepghaghtekaanga Jesus Christ-am. Kiyaghneghem tuqluqaqaanga apostle-ngulunga, nakmikegkaqaangallu ungipaqesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipani.
45001002	Ayumiq Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaqii taakut Pinilghiit Ungipat uuknaliqistemikun. Uuknaliqutkegkaqiit agleghnalghiitgun Akuzitetgun Igaqegkatgun.
45001003	Taakut Pinilghiit Ungipat Kiyaghneghem Ighneghaneng ayuqut. Yuguluni allgeqaaguq Umiilgem David-em kingunghitgun.
45001004	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham liigikestiinkut Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a, Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilnguuguq Ighnegha. Taghnegham ipapighqegkaqaa unguvaghtesluku Jesus tuqulleghmeng.
45001005	Ellngakun nangllekellengumaanga apostle-ngulunga. Tawaten Kiyaghneghem pikaqaanga tuqliisqelluki nunataghhaan yugi ugpeqesqellukullu, qaatkesqellukullu Christ-a. Enkaam Christ-am aatgha quulvallengellequq.
45001006	Elpesillu Rome-emelngughni, Kiyaghneghem tuqluqaqiisi Jesus Christ-amun pikesqellusi.
45001007	Qamagllusi elpesi Rome-emelngughni Kiyaghneghem piniqegkiitni, tuqluqiitnillu yuknalusi: Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanghemllu Jesus Christ-am kayusiillisi, nekeggmellelisillillu.
45001008	Sivukluku tamaghhaghpesinun iyamsiqayugvikaqa Kiyaghneqa Jesus Christ-akun, qayughllak ungipaa ugpeqilleghpesi mingitnguuq yulghutnun tamaghhaani.
45001009	Pinaqelqa qamaglluku qepghaataqaqa Kiyaghneq, ungipaqnaluki Pinilghiit Ungipat Ighneghaneng ayuqelghiit. Kiyaghneq liisimakistekaqa quunpeng yughaatkengngukemsi.
45001010	Yughaghaqungallu Kiyaghneghmun piyukelqegkagu qenwatlu elpesinun piyaghqaalunga.
45001011	Esghaghyupigtaqamsi quyastellelinnalusi Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkeneng iknaqsuugtesqellusi.
45001012	Whaten pingwaamsi: qerngaamta kayemutunnaluta, elpesi ugpeqillemkun, whanga ugpeqilleghpesigun.
45001013	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liisimakesugamsi awen laalighfiksugaqamsi iwernga saam quunpeng pinghitestaqaanga. Enkaam maaten kayusiisuganka Rome-eghmiit ugpeghesqelluki Christ-akun, ilangitnun Gentile-enun pillemtun.
45001014	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga ungipaqesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipat. Enkaam ungipaqsaghqaqanka tamaghhaanun, Greek-enunllu Greek-ngunghilngughnunllu, peghqineghnunllu nalluuqanunllu.
45001015	Enkaam whaa ungipaqiyugllaguunga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng elpesinunllu kiyaghlleghhiini Rome-emi.
45001016	Kayngukigatanka Pinilghiit Ungipat: Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilqii yugulilleghmun tamaghhaanun ugpeqilghiinun. Sivukluteng ungipaqegkaagut Jews-enun taagken Gentile-enun.
45001017	Taakut Pinilghiit Ungipat liigikestiinkut naten Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghaqutangi yuget elqughutngalleghminun. Ugpeqillghiniitgun Kiyaghneq tawaten piiquq. Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Nallghughqegkaq Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun kiyaghllequq neghyukluku ellnga.”
45001018	Qilagmeng Kiyaghneghem yuget liigikestii sakritutnguniluki, aghyuughlleqnilukillu seghleghqellghitnun, seghletunllu pillghitnun. Seghletun pillghita liigiknanightestiit Kiyaghneghem ipapillghaneng.
45001019	Sangwaa yuget liisimakegkaat Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii whateghlluwaaghuuq ellngitnun qayughllak Kiyaghneghem whateghlluwaaghughtaa ellngitnun.
45001020	Kiyaghneghem ulimatanganeng nuna, yuget liigikngwaaghaqaat aghtughyaghqaanghillgha aghuliighigalnguq, ipallu Kiyaghneghutanga. Qaywa yuget esghaghpagningiteghngaaghmegtekek taakuk, paninang liisimakagket Kiyaghneghem ulimaaghakun. Enkaam yuget apalliitut whaten pilleghqameng, Nallukaghput Kiyaghnelgutanga.
45001021	Liisimakeghngaaghmegteggu Kiyaghneq, quulviigataat Kiyaghneghuluku, iyamsiqayugvikigataatlu. Yeghlegi sumeghtaghallghit Kiyaghneghmeng satngunaniqaagut, umyugiitlu liigiknaniqaagut.
45001022	Peghqinghuniiqut iwernga nalluughtaqut.
45001023	Enkaam manigughpenaan Kiyaghneq tuquyaghqaghhaanghilnguq, yeghlegi manigughaqiit kiyaghnengllaqateng yugsugnilnguut, qawaagsugnilnguut, teghikusaghsugnilnguut, nalighmeng nemeghyaghsugnilnguut.
45001024	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem pegtii atuqesqelluki nukeggnalghiit sex-kun seghleghqellghet piyukeghllakiit. Enkaam atuqaqiit yugusiteng anagngaluki, seghleghqaqluteng sex-kun ilameggnun,
45001025	qayughllak ipapilleq Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii naavghusimaat iqlengamun. Enkaangam manigughaqiitlu, qepghaataqiitlu Kiyaghneghem ulimaaghi, avelghaghluku Ulimaghista ellnga katam. Ellnganguuq usuqsaghqaq quunperugllak kenlengunaan! Amen.
45001026	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem pegtii atuqesqelluki seghleghqellghet piyukeghllakiit. Aghnat sex-eyugnanighiit yuget, yeghlegi sex-eyagutut aghnaalgutmeggneng.
45001027	Tawateghpigaq yugetlu sex-eyugnanighiit aghnat, yeghlegi sex-eyaguteghllagtut yulgutmeggneng. Tawaten pikaatangitneng Kiyaghneghem aghyuughii yugusiitgun apalluqluki anaggutelleghllagit.
45001028	Tamaakut yuget sumeghmeggni satngunghinniiqaat liisimakipiilleq Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem pegtii satngunghilngughnun sumeghtaghallghitnun, atughqaqenghisaqangitnunllu.
45001029	Allaaghhinaghmeng seghleghmeng pimanginaghaqut, seghleghqaqut, pakigneghuut, ugumiketaghtutlu. Aqinaketaghtut, yugtaghyuneghtuut, pilluwaghyuneghtuut, puughtiyuneghtuut, sumeghtaghaatkaqiitlu ilateng seghlepiguluki. Yiillgiiqut,
45001030	seghletun akuzitkaqiit ilateng. Ugumikaat Kiyaghneq, yukeghqenghuut, qukaayugneghuutlu. Sumeghtaghaghaqut wata seghletun pinaluteng; qaatkusigatut angayuqameggnun,
45001031	nalluut, akequsateng atuqigatiit, nangllegyugigatut, nafughtiitaqutlu ilameggnun.
45001032	Liisimakiit Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii pilghiit tawatelnguut yuget allgeghsaghqaqaan'nguq tuqulleq. Nagneghutnginaghpenaki tamaakut atuqegkateng, talwa itagnaqaqiit tawaten pilghiit.
45002001	Tamaaken apalluqluku nanqigtikuvek yugneng anagniilqavigituten. Nanqiggneghpeki, elpeneng nanqigtaquten aghyuughyaghqaaluten qayughllak elpeklu ellngistun piiqelghiiten.
45002002	Kiyaghneq nanqigtiiquq yugneng seghlepestaatun pilghiineng, liisimakaghputlu nanqigtillghi elqughutngaat.
45002003	Iwernga nanqigtaqaten anaggullghiit, naqamllu elpek katam piiqaten tamaakut ataasit anaggutellghet. Enkaam sumeghpenii anagyaghqaaniluku piziguu Kiyaghneghem nanqigtillgha?
45002004	Liigikenghisiguu nangllegtaghtulanga Kiyaghneghem? Aghyuughaghsigalkangaten tawaninginaq qayughllak nuqetutaqegkangaten. Sumeghpenii-i taakut satngunghitaat? Liisimakenghisiguu Kiyaghneghem nangllekaqegkangaten qayughllak avuteghqesqesukangaten?
45002005	Iwernga elpek aleghquneghlluguuten, pineghlluguuten; tamaaken apalluqluku avuteghqesugigatuten. Enkaangaam elpek katam ulimangwaan aghyuullengelleghqan seghleghataghaaluku Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani. Tawani Aghneghmi Kiyaghneghem aliighlleqaak sakraallenillu, elqughutngalghiillu nanqigtilleni.
45002006	Nanqiglleqii tamaghhiita yuget apeghiighutellghistun.
45002007	Ilangi yuget pinitun pimanginaghaqut qayughllak Kiyaghneghmeng allgeghsukangit usuqelleq, quulvalleq, yugusiqlu tuquyaghqaanghilnguq. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem kenlengilngughmeng unguvallelilleqii.
45002008	Iwernga ilangi yuget ellnginaayugneghuut. Ugpeqsugigataat ipapilleq seghlepestaatun pinaluteng. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem sakrituteghllagluki, aghyuughllaglleqii.
45002009	Qamagtengngwaaghluni nunamelnguq yuuk, Jews-a nalighmeng Gentile-a, seghlepestaatun pikaq, Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqaa seghleliighmengllu ikfiqelleghmengllu.
45002010	Iwernga qamagtengngwaaghluni yuuk, Jews-a nalighmeng Gentile-a, pinitun pikaq, Kiyaghneghem usuqelleqaa, quulvaghlleqaa, nekeggmellelilleqaallu.
45002011	Taniillngunaki Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqii qamagtengngwaaghluki yuget.
45002012	Gentile-et allgeghtellghitiit Liilightuusat Kiyaghneghem tuunegkii Moses-mun. Enkaam seghleghqelghiit nallukluki Liilightuusat, tuqukata Kiyaghneghem nanqiggnaanghitii Liilightuusatgun. Jews-et Liilightuusalguut, enkaam seghleghqegkata Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqii Liilightuusatgun.
45002013	Tamaakut nagataghesnalghiit Liilightuusaminun, Kiyaghneghem nallghusiigatii elqughutngalleghminun. Iwernga qaatkullghiit Liilightuusaminun nallghughqaqii elqughutngalleghminun.
45002014	Gentile-et allgeghtellghitiit Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii. Iwernga qaatkenneghmegteki taakut Liilightuusat, qaatkutellghita Liilightuusalgestun ayuqestiit ilumegteggun, allgeghtekaqenghiteghngaaghmegteki.
45002015	Qaatkutellghita yugnun liigikestiit ilumegteggun liisimakiit Liilightuusat qelghusiit. Sumeghtaghallghitallu liisimakestiit Liilightuusat ilungitnitulangi, qayughllak sumeghtaghallghita ilangakun anaggunniiqiit nalighmeng ilangakun itagnaghniiqiit.
45002016	Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani, Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqii yuget aksaqegkiit Christ Jesus-kun. Aapghaqaqa taana ungipaqnemki Pinilghiit Ungipat.
45002017	Maaten'ngam latayuganka Jews-et. Jew-ngukuvek, neghyukaten Liilightuusat Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqii yugpenun. Qukaayugtutenllu Kiyaghneghmun pikniluten.
45002018	Liilightuusatgun liisimakan sangwaa Kiyaghneghem sasqesullgha elpenun, natenllu nakmiksaghqaatanga sangwaa elqughutngalghii.
45002019	Enkaam sumeghpeni maghyaghqughtenguniiquten ayaakanun, nighuguniiqutenllu mamlegmelngughnun.
45002020	Sumeghpeni nallghusaghtenguniiquten nalluuqanun, apeghtughistenguniiqutengllu taghnughhaghnun. Liilightuusalgutegpeneng, sumeghpeni liisimakniluku sangwaa tamaghhaan piiqan, qamagllukullu ipapilleq.
45002021	Apeghtughaqaten ilaten, sangan elpeneng apeghtiigasin? Ungipaqiiquten, “Teglegpenang,” elpaa-ak, teglekiigasiin?
45002022	Piiquten, “Gelgaghniighpenang,” elpaak, gelgaghniiqiigasiin? Ugumikepigtaten kiyaghnengllaqat, elpaak, tugunniiqiigasiin temple-ngitneng?
45002023	Qukaayugtaquten qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusani tuunegkaqii yugpenun. Iwernga qaatkenghinneghpeki Liilightuusat quulviigatan Kiyaghneq.
45002024	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Apalluqlusi elpesi Jews-eni, Gentile-et sanguughtaqaat Kiyaghneghem aatgha.”
45002025	Qaatkengngukufki Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii circumcise-ellghen pinightuq. Iwernga qaatkenghilkufki Liilightuusat circumcise-ellghilngughestun ayuquten. Enkaam quyastellengnaanghituten Kiyaghneghem akequsaaneng.
45002026	Gentile-a circumcise-ellghilnguq qaatkullghii qelghusiitnun Liilightuusat, Kiyaghneghem tuguklighlleqaa nikimqun circumcise-ekaaluku.
45002027	Elpesi Jews-eni Liilightuusalguusi igaqngalghiineng, circumcise-ekaagusillu, taawanginaq qaatkigatasi Liilightuusat. Iwernga Gentile-et circumcise-ellghilnguut, qaatkaqiit Liilightuusat. Enkaam qaatkutellghitgun Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqiisi aghyuughyaghqaalusi.
45002028	Circumcise-enginaghluku yugem yugusii Jew-pigughtesnaanghitaa. Circumcise-ellepiik pingigatuq yugusim qaaynginaakun.
45002029	Itupill, yuuk Jew-piiguuq Jew-ngukumi ilumikun. Ighsaqghwa circumcise-ekaaguq Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun, nakaan igaqegkatgun Liilightuusatgun. Enkaam Kiyaghneghmeng usuqellengellequq, nakaan yugneng.
45003001	Sangwaa aneghneghqusiigwa yuuk allgequmi Jew-nguluni? Sangwaa aneghneghqusiigwa circumcise-elleghmun?
45003002	Uglaapigtut aneghneghqusit! Sivulighpigaq Kiyaghneghem neghyukutkaqii Jews-enun Akuzitet Igaqegkat.
45003003	Ilangi ataasiighmenneghilkata Kiyaghneghmun, Kiyaghneq ataasiighmenneghitesleqatguu?
45003004	Yeghlegillu! Tamaghhaghmi yuuk iqlengiqestengughngaan, Kiyaghneq ipanguuq. Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii igaqngaaq whaten, “Akuzineghpeni, tamaghhaghmi liisimakelleqaaten elqughutnganiluten. Yuget nanqigtekangaten, ipapighqelleqaten anaggutnganiluki.”
45003005	Anaggunnemta, anaggutellemta yuget liigikestengngwaaghaqiit Kiyaghneq elqughutnganiluku. Enkaam pilleqestaa Kiyaghneq anaggunniluku aghyuuqanginkut anaggutellemnnun? (Akuzinguunga yugestun.)
45003006	Tawatenneghituq! Kiyaghneq elqughutnganghilkan, natenmi Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqaki nunam yugi?
45003007	Iwernga yuuk pinayalghii, “Iqlengiqelleghma yuget usuqistaqiit Kiyaghneghmun qayughllak iqlengiqelleghma aliightaqaa Kiyaghneghem ipangullgha. Enkaam sangan'ngam Kiyaghneghem nanqigtanga aghyuughyaghqaalunga seghleghqestetun?”
45003008	Yuuk pinayalghiillu, “Seghletun pilta sangwaa pinilghii apeghiighesqelluku seghletun pillemnneng.” Ilangi yuget temngimeng piiqut whangkuta apeghtughiiqniluta tawaten. Nanqigtellengyaghqaagut aghyuughyaghqaaluteng, aghyuulleghqamegestun.
45003009	Enkaam whangkuta Jews-enii, pinighataghaghestaa Gentile-eneng? Nakaa, yeghlegillu! Aapghwaaqaqanka Jews-etlu, Gentile-etlu tawateghpigaq seghleghqellghem aaghqutaqluki ayuqii.
45003010	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Taawa kina alngunak elqughutnganghituq, talwa ataasighhaq.
45003011	Kina alngunak liigikigatuq, kitum alngunak iviigataa Kiyaghneq.
45003012	Qamaglluni yuuk tunutkaaguq Kiyaghneghmeng; qamaglluteng anaggutkaagut; kina alngunak pinitun pingigatuq, talwa ataasighhaq.
45003013	Ighsalqiit qelpalngughestun lliivghestun ayuqut; uluteng atuqngwiit puughtimun, qezimegteggun poison-elguut nemeghyastun;
45003014	qaanghit imighngaat curse-elleghnengllu, ugumiketiqelleghmengllu.
45003015	Yugtaghirakegtut;
45003016	navek alngunak pineghmeggni naafqiistengwaaqut, seghleliighqistengwaaqutlu.
45003017	Nallukaat nekeggmelluni kiyaghtelleghqaq,
45003018	talwa alikigataat Kiyaghneq.”
45003019	Liisimakaput Jews-et Liilightuusalget qaatkesaghqaqiit qelghusiit. Enkaam taakut Liilightuusat nepiighqelleqiit yuget whaten pilleghqiitneng, “Nallukaput sangutangi seghleghqellghet.” Liilightuusatlu liigikesleqiit Kiyaghneghmun nanqiglleqniluki qamaglluki nunam yugi.
45003020	Nanqigtekumiki yuget nallghusaghnaanghitii elqughutngalleghminun qaatkutellghitgun Liilightuusanun. Itupill Liilightuusat liitestii yuget seghleghqestenguniluki.
45003021	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem yuget liigikestii nallghusaghlleqniluki elqughutngalleghminun, nakaan qaatkutellghitgun Liilightuusanun. Kiyaghneghem aapqaqaa taana Liilightuusatgunllu, uuknaliqistetgunllu.
45003022	Kiyaghneghem yuget nallghusaqaqii elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghitgun Jesus Christ-akun. Taana ipanguuq tamaghhaanun ugpelghiinun Christ-akun qayughllak allakunneghitut
45003023	qamaglluteng seghleghqegkaatmeggneng. Enkaam nuughhutkaagut Kiyaghneghem aangelleghllaganun.
45003024	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem akingilngughqun tunusamikun nallghusaqaqii elqughutngalleghminun itemutistengitgun, Christ Jesus-kun.
45003025	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqaa Jesus aghqutnguluku seghleghqelleghnun. Enkaam Jesus-em aawakun seghevutaqii yuget seghleghqellghit ugpeqingalghiit ellngakun. Tawaten liigikestekaqaa elqughutnganiluni. Sivunghani agani Kiyaghneghem nuqetutkaqii yuget enkaam nepiighutkaqii seghleghqellghit.
45003026	Iwernga uumi pilleghmi ipapighqaa elqughutnganiluni nallghusalleghmikun alngunak yuuk elqughutngalleghminun apalluqluki ugpeqillghit Jesus-kun.
45003027	Enkaam sangaawa qukaayugutkesaghqaghput? Qukaayugutkaghqiitukut! Qukaayuggnaanghitestaa qayughllak qaatkennaqutkegkeput Liilightuusat? Nakaa, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqangi yuget elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghitgun Jesus-kun, nakaan qaatkutellghitgun Liilightuusanun.
45003028	Enkaam liigikaghput yuuk nallghusaqaaguq Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun ugpeqilleghqun, nakaan qaatkutelleghqun Liilightuusanun.
45003029	Kiyaghneq Jews-nginaghhaat Kiyaghneqatguu? Gentile-etlu Kiyaghneqenghitatguu? Aa-a, Gentile-etlu Kiyaghneqaat,
45003030	ataasighhaatanganeng Kiyaghneq. Enkaam nallghusaghlleqii Jews-et elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghitgun, Gentile-etlu ugpeqillghitgun.
45003031	Liilightuusaat satngunanighqestekii ugpeqillemteggun? Nakaa! Yeghlegillu! Ugpeqillemta qaatkesugtestaqii Liilightuusat qelghutkiit.
45004001	Sameng'ngam pilleqesta Abraham-emeng, sivunemnneng whangkuta Jews-eni? Sameng liitkaawa?
45004002	Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqaqngukagu elqughutngalleghminun sallghakun, sameng qukaayugusighqalgunayaghtuq. Iwernga Kiyaghneghmun qukaayugutkepagningitii salleni.
45004003	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq whaten, “Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqaa Kiyaghneq enkaam ugpeqillgha apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqaa elqughutngalghiinguluku.”
45004004	Yuuk qepghalleghmineng akileghtuusangegkayuguuq. Akileghtuusaa tunusaanghituq qayughllak ellngan allgeghtekaqaa qepghaalluku.
45004005	Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghnaanghitaa yuuk elqughutngalleghminun qepghaatillghakun ellminun. Itupill yugem neghyuksaghqaqaa Kiyaghneq nallghusaghikayuk seghleghqesteneng elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghitgun.
45004006	Umiilgem David-em igaqegkaqaa taana ataasiq. Pikaaguq yuget quyastepikaaniluki Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghaqngaki elqughutngalleghminun avelghaghluki qepghaatillghit Kiyaghneghmun.
45004007	“Quyastekaagut tamaakut seghleghqellghit Kiyaghneghem seghevutkii, anaggutellghit saapegkii!
45004008	Quyastekaaguq yuuk seghleghqellghi Atanghem sumeghmiknaniqangi.”
45004009	Taana quyastelleq David-em akuzitkegkaa, circumcise-ekaghhiinaghnun pingwaa? Nakaa! Circumcise-ellghilngughnunllu pinguuq. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqaa Kiyaghneq, enkaam ugpeqillgha apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqaa elqughutngaluku.”
45004010	Qavngaq Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqagu? Sivungani circumcise-ellghaan nalighmeng kingunganeng? Sivungani circumcise-ellghan, nakaan kingunganeng.
45004011	Tagtalmi taakwani Abraham circumcise-ekaaguq. Circumcise-ellgha nalluniilkutaaguq ipapighqusiiluni Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqaqegkanga elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghakun. Salin circumcise-ellghilluku Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqaa elqughutngaluku. Tamaaken apalluqluku Abraham atanguuq tamaghhaanun ugpeqilghiinun circumcise-ellghiteghngaata, enkaam Kiyaghneghem tugukliimii elqughutngaluki.
45004012	Abraham-llu atakaat circumcise-ekat. Taana ipanguuq taawanginaghhaq ugpeqillelgukuyeng Abraham-etun, salin circumcise-ellghilluku.
45004013	Kiyaghneghem akeqegkaqii Abraham-enkut kingunqullghiit iingunaghhaan nuna ellngitnun pagilleqniluku. Akequsaqellghitaa taana Abraham-emun qayughllak qaatkegkangi Liilightuusat. Itupill Kiyaghneghem akeqegkaqaa qayughllak ugpeqegkanga enkaam Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqaa elqughutngaluku.
45004014	Kiyaghneghem akequsaa tuunyaghqaayaqan qaatkullghiinun Liilightuusanun, taawa ugpeqilleq satngunghituq. Kiyaghneghemllu akequsaa satngunghituq.
45004015	Kiyaghneq sakritaquq yuget qaatkunneghinneghata Liilightuusanun tuunegkaanun Moses-mun. Iwernga Liilightuusiisaqan taawa yuget qaatkunneghitusiinnayaghtut.
45004016	Tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeqilleghmegteggun yuget allgeghtaat Kiyaghneghem akequsaa akingilnguuluku tunusaq. Enkaam qamaglluteng Abraham-em kingunghita allgeghtepestaaghlleqaat Kiyaghneghem akequsaa. Taana akequsaq Jews-nginaghhaghnun ayuqenghituq Liilightuusalegnun. Iwernga ugpeqilghiinunllu ayuquq Abraham-em ugpeqillghatun. Enkaam Abraham qamaglluta atakaghput ugpeqilghiini.
45004017	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Atangughtestamken uglapiglleghhiinun nunat yugitnun.” Kiyaghneghem tawaten akeqegkaqaa Abraham qayughllak ugpeqegkanga Kiyaghneq. Kiyaghneghuuq tuqukaneng unguvaghtikayuk, qelghilleghmikunllu ulimatkayuk sameng sangilngughmeng.
45004018	Abraham-em avaqutilleghqaa sighimaniitkaaguq. Iwernga ugpeqegkaqaa Kiyaghneq, sighimakumanginaqaqaallu. Enkaam atangughtekaaguq uglaapiglleghhiinun nunat yugitnun. Whaten Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa, “Kinguneghten kestepagningisaghqaagut.”
45004019	Abraham-em nulighha, Sarah, qumingepagningitkaalghii. Ellnga Abraham 100 ayumiqulleghtutkalighyaghtughluni, tuqumun tughaaghulghii. Iwernga tamaakut suumqeghngaaghmiki, ugpeqillgha Kiyaghneghmun ukavaamangilnguq.
45004020	Ugpeqinaniimangituq talwa aygughikumangitaa Kiyaghneghem akequsaa. Iwernga ugpeqiighataghaqaq, usuqegkaallu Kiyaghneq.
45004021	Abraham-em ipapighqutkengngwaaqaqaa Kiyaghneghmun piyaghqaqniluku akequsaqegkani.
45004022	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Kiyaghneghem tuguqliqaqaa elqughutngaluku,” apalluqluku ugpeqillgha.
45004023	Taakut akuzitet, “Kiyaghneghem tuguqliqaqaa elqughutngaluku,” igaqegkaagut nakaan Abraham-nginaghmun,
45004024	iwernga igaqegkaagut whangkunnunllu. Kiyaghneghem tuguklighlleqiinkut elqughutngaluta qayughllak ugpeqegkefut ellnga. Ellnganguuq Jesus-meng Atanemnneng unguvaghtestikaq.
45004025	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqaa Jesus tuqumatkesqelluki seghleghqelleput, unguvaghtekaqaallu nallghusaghnaluta elqughutngalleghminun.
45005001	Tamaaken apalluqluku nallghusaqaatemnneng Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun ugpeqillemteggun, nekeggmellelguukut Kiyaghneghmi Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun.
45005002	Apalluqluku ugpeqilleghput Jesus-em kiyaghtestiinkut Kiyaghneghem piniqellghani. Enkaam quyaghllaguukut qayughllak liisimakngwaaghaghput Kiyaghneghem nengightesleqiinkut nighughqelleghmineng.
45005003	Taam saaghwakun quyaaqukut seghleliillemnni qayughllak liisimakaghput seghleliillghem nuqenneghtullengestaqiinkut.
45005004	Nuqenneghtullemteggun Kiyaghneghem itagnaqaqiinkut. Itagnaqillghan sighimallengestaqiinkut.
45005005	Taam sighimallghem iilqamiqnaanghitiinkut qayughllak Kiyaghneghem kuuvegkaqaa piniqelleni qamavek ilumnnun Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun, Kiyaghneghem tuunegkamikun whangkunnun.
45005006	Yugulipagningilluta Christ-am tuqumatkegkaqii seghleghqestet, tawani pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaani.
45005007	Entaqun qafsinkuuraghhiinaat tuqumatkiyugnayaghtut elqughutngalghiimun yugmun. Nalighmeng entaqun kina tuqumatkiyugnayaghtuq pinilghiimun yugmun.
45005008	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem kelgutkaqaa piniqelleni whangkunnun, paninang seghleghqestenguluta Christ-am tuqumatkegkaqiinkut!
45005009	Nalluneqniighaghput Kiyaghneghem nallghusaamiinkut elqughutngalleghminun Christ-am aawakun. Nalluneqniighataghaghaghput yugulillengellequkut Christ-akun Kiyaghneghem sakraallghaneng.
45005010	Whangkuta Kiyaghneghem anguyaksaghiinkut, iwernga ilaliiqaqiinkut tuqullghakun Ighneghmi. Maaten Kiyaghneghem ilakumtaaqiinkut, enkaam nalluneqniighataghaghaghput yugulillengellequkut Christ-am unguvallghakun!
45005011	Taam saaghwakun, quyaghllaguukut Kiyaghneghmi Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun. Ellnganguuq whangkunnun ilaliighutestilghii Kiyaghneghmun.
45005012	Yuksuwhaaq, Adam, seghleghqaqngan, seghleghqellghan tuqulleq iteghtestekaqaa nunamun. Enkaam qamaglluni yuuk tuquyaghqaaguq qayughllak qamaglluni seghleghqegkaaguq.
45005013	Seghleghqellelgukaaguq nunami salin Kiyaghneghem tuunellghilluki Liilightuusat Moses-mun. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nanqigtellghitii yuget aghyuughyaghqaaluki seghleghqellghitnun qayughllak Liilightusiilnguq.
45005014	Paninang yuget kiyaghtekaagut ima Adam-emeng Moses-mun, qamaglluteng tuquyaghqaagut, maligulluteng tamaakut seghleghqellghit Adam-em seghleghqellghatun ayuqenghilnguut. Adam Christ-atun ayuquq, tagiyaghqatun.
45005015	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem tunusaa Adam-em seghleghqellghatun ayuqenghituq. Ipanguuq uglapiglleghhiit yuget tuqukaagut apalluqluku ataasim yugem seghleghqellgha. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem piniqellgha seghleghllaguuq. Enkaam uglaapiglleghhiit yuget allgeghtekaqaat Kiyaghneghem aqeghqengngalghii akingilnguq tunusaa, piniqellghakun ataasim yugem Jesus Christ-am.
45005016	Allakuteghllagtuk, Adam-em seghleghqellghallu, tunusaallu Kiyaghneghem. Kingunganeng Adam seghleghqaqngan Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekaqaa aghyuughyaghqaaluku. Iwernga kingungitneng yulghuteghllaget seghleghqaqngata, Kiyaghneghem akingilngughqun tunusamikun nallghusaghtestekaqii elqughutngalleghminun.
45005017	Ataasiq yuuk seghleghqegkaaguq enkaam ellnga apalluqluku, tuqullghem igleghutii qamaglluki yuget. Iwernga sangwaa Kiyaghneghem apeghiiqaa ataasikun yugkun, Jesus Christ-akun, aangataghaghtuq seghleghqellghaneng ataasim yugem. Enkaam allgeghullghiit Kiyaghneghem kemnapiglleghhiimeng piniqellghaneng, tunusaanengllu elqughutngallghaneng, qamaglluteng igleghutillequt kiyaghtelleghmi ataasikun yugkun Jesus Christ-akun.
45005018	Apalluqluku Adam-em ataasiq seghleghqellgha, Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekaqii qamaglluki yuget aghyuughyaghqaaluki. Tawateghpigaq apalluqluku Christ-am ataasiq elqughutngalghii pillgha Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghii qamaglluki yuget elqughutngalleghminun, tuuniillu unguvalleghmeng.
45005019	Qaatkunneghitellghakun ataasim yugem, uglaapiglleghhiit yuget seghleghqestengughtekaagut. Tawateghpigaq, qaatkutellghakun ataasim yugem, uglaapiglleghhiit yuget nallghusaghyaghqaagut Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun.
45005020	Liilightuusat Kiyaghneghem tuunegkii Moses-mun yuget liisaaghaghtestiit seghleghqelleghmeng. Iwernga yuget seghleghqataghaghyata Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha nulanginaqaq.
45005021	Seghleghqellghem igleghutkaqii yuget tuqulleghqun. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem piniqellghan igleghutngwii yuget nallghusalleghmikun ellngit elqughutngalleghminun. Enkaam allgeghtaat kenlengilnguq unguvalleq Jesus Christ-akun Atanemteggun.
45006001	Sameng'ngam pilleqesta? Seghleghqumanginaaltaa-a Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha nulasqelluku?
45006002	Nakaa! Qayughllak tuqukastun ayuqukut, enkaam tuqukaakumta naten seghleghqumanginaghnaqesta?
45006003	Liisimakaghsi, qamaglluta paaptaayaaqngamta ilatkaagukut Christ Jesus-mun. Ilatkaagutkutlu tuqullghanun paaptaayaaqngamta.
45006004	Paaptaayellemteggun tuquqaagukutlu qungukaagukutlu Christ-ami. Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun Atam unguvaghtekaqaa Christ-a tuqulleghmeng. Enkaam kiyaghsaghqaaghllequkut kiyaghtaallelighraghaghluta.
45006005	Kiyaghneghem ilasimakanginkut Christ-amun tuqullghakun, taagken ilatestepestaaghlleqiinkutlu ellnganun unguvaghtesluta ellngatun.
45006006	Liisimakaghput whangkuteluguyalghiit qaquuraatkaagut Christ-akun igleqataqnaniisqelluta seghleghqellghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun, qepghaghtelaaghunanighnalutallu seghleghqelleghmun.
45006007	Yuuk tuquneghmini itemaquq aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng seghleghqellghem.
45006008	Tuqumakumta Christ-ami, ugpeqaghput kiyaghtelgusighyaghqaqaghputlu ellnga.
45006009	Liisimakaghput Christ-a unguvaghtestekaaguq tuqulleghmeng enkaam allamengllu tuquyaghqaanghituq qayughllak tuqulleq aghtughyaghqaanghillghiitkaaguq ellnganun.
45006010	Ataasighhaghmeng tuqukaaguq kayaalqennaluku seghleghqelleq. Iwernga unguvatmineng, kiyaghtengnguuq Kiyaghneghmun.
45006011	Tawateghpigaq sumeghtaghaghtek tuqukaalusi seghleghqellghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghanun, sumeghtaghaghteklu unguvangulusi Kiyaghneghmun Christ Jesus-kun.
45006012	Tamaaken apalluqluku seghleghqelleghmun igleqataqestegpenaki yugusisi tuqukayuget. Seghleghqellghem igleqataqegkaki yugusisi, qaatkesuglleqasi yugusighpesi seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi.
45006013	Alngunak nalighneghi yugusighpesi tuunegpenaki seghleghqusiiluki, qayughllak tawaten pikufsi tuunelleqasi seghleghmun. Itupill tuunitek Kiyaghneghmun. Tuqukastun ayuqsaghtusi, iwernga Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaqiisi. Enkaam tuuniteki iinguniita yugusisi Kiyaghneghmun ellnganun atuqesqelluki elqughutngalleghmun.
45006014	Seghleghqellghem igleqataqnaanghitiisi qayughllak igleqataqngwiisi Kiyaghneghem piniqellghan; igleqataqngunghitiisi Liilightuusat.
45006015	Enkaam sanaqestangam? Itagnaghtaa-a seghleghqelleghqaghput qayughllak Kiyaghneghem piniqellghan igleqataqngukanginkut nakaan Liilightuusat? Nakaa, itagnanghituq!
45006016	Liisimakaqusi tuunegkufsi kitumun qaatkesaghqaaluku, taawa ellngan qepghaghtelaaqaaghlleqiisi. Qaatkegkufsigu seghleghqelleq, tuqusleqiisi. Iwernga qaatkegkufsigu Kiyaghneq, nallghusaghlleqiisi elqughutngalleghminun.
45006017	Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi seghleghqelleghmun. Iwernga iyamsiqayugvikaqa Kiyaghneq qayughllak maaten qamakerugllak qaatkegkesi apeghtuusaghraghaat apeghtuusaqegkat elpesinun.
45006018	Itemutkaagusi seghleghqelleghmeng enkaam qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi elqughutngalleghmun.
45006019	Tamaakut liigikneghllugutangitneng elpesinun, usputaqngwaanka qepghaghtelaaghetlu piliitestengitlu. Sivunghani tuunegkayuguyaghasi yugusisi qepghaghtelaaghuluki nukeggnalghiinunllu nulamanginalghiinunllu seghletun pilleghnun. Maaten tuuniteki yugusisi qepghaghtelaaghuluki elqughutngalleghmun kiyaghtesqellusi pelungillusi.
45006020	Qepghaghtelaaghwaaqngafsi seghleghqelleghmun, elqughutngallghem igleqataqellghitiisi.
45006021	Sivunghani seghletun pikaagusi, iwernga maaten kayngukaaghtasi tamaakut seghletun pikasi. Sangaawa allgeghtekaghsi tamaakut piluki? Allgeghtekaqaghsi tuqullghiinaghhaq.
45006022	Iwernga maaten itemullusi seghleghqelleghmeng qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagusi Kiyaghneghmun. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem pelungiightesimiisi, allgeghutesimiisillu kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng.
45006023	Akileghtuusaa seghleghqellghem tuqullghuuq; iwernga Kiyaghneghem akingilnguq tunusaa kenlengilnguuguq unguvalleq Christ Jesus-kun Atanemteggun.
45007001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, lataamsi liisimakilghiini Liilightuusaneng. Enkaam liigikasi Liilightuusat qelghaqiit yuget kiyaghtengnguluki.
45007002	Ugiiqaq aghnaq usputaaguq. Liilightuusam qelellghani aghnaq ugiminisaghqaaguq tagtalngatun ugimi kiyaghtellghan. Iwernga tuqukan ugini, taawa itemellequq Liilightuusaaneng nengughtellghem.
45007003	Iwernga, ugini unguvaluku allami yugmi kiyaghtekumi gelgaghniightenguluni atighyaghqaaguq. Iwernga uginga tuqumakan, itemellequq taagken Liilightuusameng. Gelgaghniighunghituq ugiinqigtekumi.
45007004	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesillu itemumaasi Liilightuusaneng qayughllak tuqukaagusi Christ-ami. Tamaaken apalluqluku Christ-am pikiisi. Ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaa tuqulleghmeng, whangkunnun qepghaatesqelluku Kiyaghneq.
45007005	Sivunghani qaatkaqaput seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi yugusimta. Liilightuusat atuqistesugaqiinkut tamaakuneng. Enkaam atuqegkumteki tuqusleqiinkut.
45007006	Sivunghani anusimingllaghastun ayuqsaghtukut Liilightuusanun. Tuqukaatemnneng Christ-ami, itemutkaagukut qaatkusaghqaallemnneng Liilightuusanun. Enkaam qepghaatngwaaghput Kiyaghneq unguvalleghraghamteggun Taghneghagnekun, nakaan unguvallelumteggun Liilightuusatgun.
45007007	Sameng'ngam pilleqesta? Liilightuusaat seghleghqellghwaat? Yeghlegillu! Taakut Liilightuusat liitestekaqii whangamnun seghleghqellghet sangutangi. Liinnayanghitaqa qiliiqetiqelleq sangutanga Liilightuusaq whaten qelghimangisaqan, “Qiliiqetiqegpenang.”
45007008	Iwernga atuqluku taana qelghusaq, seghleghqellghem allaaghhiinaghneng qiliiqetangllaqaqaanga. Liilightuusangunateng seghleghqellghet tuqungaat.
45007009	Sivunghani kiyaghtengnguyaghtunga Liilightuusangunaan; iwernga liisaqegka taana qelghusaq, seghleghqelleq unguvaghluni enkaam tuquunga.
45007010	Qelghusaq unguvastiyaghqaayalghii whangamnun, yeghlegi tuqustaanga.
45007011	Taaggun qelghusakun, seghleghqellghem puughsaqlegughtaanga. Enkaam atuqluku qelghusaq seghleghqellghem tuqutaanga.
45007012	Iwernga Liilightuusat agleghnalghiinguut, qelghusaqlu agleghnalghiinguuq, elqughutngaaqlu, pinightuqlu.
45007013	Taam qelghusam pinilghiim, tuqustangaa? Yeghlegillu! Seghleghqellghem tuqutaanga atuqluku sangwaa pinilghii. Enkaam liitaghput qelghusakun seghleghqelleq elngaatall seghlepiguuq.
45007014	Liisimakaput Liilightuusat Kiyaghneghem Taghneghaaneng pinguut, iwernga maghyaghquunghitaanga Taghnegham. Maghyaghquungwaanga yugusima piyukellghan, enkaam qepghaghtelaaghuunga seghleghqelleghmun.
45007015	Liigikigataqa saaqutka qayughllak atuqigataqa sangwaa atuqsukaqa. Itupill atuqaqaqa sangwaa ugumikegkaqa.
45007016	Iwernga atuqegkumki ugumikegkanka atuqsunghiteghngaamki, taawa itagnaqaqanka Liilightuusat piniitangi.
45007017	Enkaam whangangunghituq tawaten piiqelghii, itupill seghleghqelleq ilumnilnguq tawaten piiquq.
45007018	Liisimakaqa avangitunga pinilghiimeng ilumni, yugusimni. Pinitun piyugaqsaghngaaghma, pipagningitaqa.
45007019	Pingigataqa pinilghii piyukegkaqa, yeghlegi seghleq piiqaqa piyukenghitkaqa.
45007020	Enkaam piyukenghitkaqa pinemkun, taawa whangangunghituq tawaten pilghii. Itupill seghleghqellghwaaquq ilumnilnguq tawaten piiqelghii.
45007021	Enkaam liitaqa taana: pinitun pinaqeghngaghma, paninang seghleq tawantaquq.
45007022	Qaamkerugllak pinighyuugusiqanka Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii.
45007023	Iwernga liitaqa taawa ilanga liilightuusaq yugusimnituq. Pilluwaqangi Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii umyugama itagnaqegkii. Liilightuusam yugusimnilnguum seghleghqestaqaanga, enkaam anusimingllaghastun ayuqunga taamun liilightuusamun.
45007024	Seghleghwaaghuunga! Kitumngam itemulleqanga whaken yugusimeng tuqustiyaghqameng whangamneng?
45007025	Iyamsiqanaghhalek Kiyaghneghmun itemuskanganga Jesus Christ-akun Atanemteggun! Enkaangam qaatkanka Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii umyugamkun, iwernga yugusimkun qaatkaqa liilightuusaq seghleghqestilghii whangamneng.
45008001	Enkaangam kinkut alngunak Christ Jesus-mun ilatkaakata Kiyaghneghem nanqiggnaanghitii aghyuughyaghqaaluki.
45008002	Qayughllak Liilightuusaan Taghnegham unguvallelitilghiim Christ Jesus-kun itemutkaqaanga liilightuusaaneng seghleghqellghemllu tuqullghemllu.
45008003	Moses-em Liilightuusii tawaten pipagningitut qayughllak yugusimta piyukellghita kayaaleghqegkaqii Liilightuusat. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Liilightuusat pipagningitkaat. Kayagtekaqaa ellmi katam Ighneni nunamun seghleghqumalghiitun yugtun ayuqluku. Tuunegkaqaa Ighneni aghqutnguluku seghleghqellemnnun. Tawaten nanqigtekaqaa seghleghqelleq yugusimelluku,
45008004	whangkunnun qaatkesaqlegughtesqelluki Liilightuusat elqughutngalghiit qelghusii. Whangkunguut kiyaghlleghhiit malighqutaqluta Taghnegham piyukellghanun, nakaan yugusimta piyukellghitnun.
45008005	Tamaakut kiyaghlleghhiit malighqutaqluteng yugusimeng piyukellghitnun, sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit piyukelleteng. Iwernga tamaakut kiyaghlleghhiit malighqutaqluteng Taghneghagnun, sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghaqiit Taghnegham piyukellghi.
45008006	Umyugaput malighqutaqegkata yugusimta piyukellghanun, tuqullequkut. Iwernga umyugaput malighqutaqegkata Taghneghagnun, Kiyaghneghem unguvallelilleqiinkutlu nekeggmellelilleqiinkutlu.
45008007	Umyugaput malighqutaqenghata yugusimta piyukellghanun, anguyagwaaqukut Kiyaghneghmun qayughllak qaatkigalkeput Liilightuusii. Ipa qaatkepagningitaput Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii.
45008008	Tamaakut malighqutaqngalghiit yugusimeng piyukellghanun efqughtepagningitaat Kiyaghneq.
45008009	Iwernga elpesi igleqataqngunghitiisi yugusighpesi piyukellghan. Igleqataqngwiisi Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka, qayughllak ipa kiyaghtengngulghii ilugpesini. Christ-am Taghneghakek kiyaghtengngunghilkayek ilungani yugem, pikenghitaa Christ-am.
45008010	Yugusisi tuqunaqnguut apalluqluki seghleghqellesi. Iwernga Christ-a kiyaghtengngukan ilugpesini, taawa Taghnegham unguvallelilleqiisi, qayughllak Christ-am nallghusaghtestekaqiisi Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun.
45008011	Kiyaghneghem Taghneghakek unguvaghtikak Jesus-meng, kiyaghtengnguuk ilugpesini. Katam Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestellghatun Christ Jesus, unguvaghtesleqii yugusisi Taghneghagmikun kiyaghlleghhiignekun ilugpesini.
45008012	Enkaangam ugpeqaalgutemni, kiyaghsaghqaagukut Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka kiyaghtesqesullghatun, nakaan yugusimta kiyaghtesqesullghatun.
45008013	Kiyaghtengngukufsi malighqutaqlusi yugusighpesi piyukellghanun, tuqullequsi. Iwernga Taghneghagnekun tuquskufsiki yugusighpesi seghleghqeng'ngalghiit piiqegkangit, taawa kiyaghllequsi.
45008014	Qayughllak tamaakut maghyaghquqii Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqii.
45008015	Taghnegham allgeghtekaghpesi Kiyaghneghmeng qepghaghtelaaghughtesneqiggnaanghitiisi alingelleghmun. Yeghlegi Taghnegham Kiyaghneghmun avaqutaqestiisi. Enkaam ellngakun tuqlughaghaghput Kiyaghneq, “Abba! Ataay!”
45008016	Kiyaghneghem Taghneghakek ellmegneng ilatkaaguk taghneghamnnun ungipaannaluta Kiyaghneghmun avaqutaqniluta.
45008017	Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqutanganeng, Kiyaghneghem pagitistekiinkut, Christ-amllu pagitistelgutkiinkut. Nighughqellengellequkut Christ-atun ikfiqegkumta Christ-am ikfiqellghatun.
45008018	Sumemni ikfiqelleput unguvallemnni inglutepagningitut nighughqelleghmun Kiyaghneghem aliighsaghqaanun whangkunnun.
45008019	Ulimaaq qamaglluni utaqiinguuq qelanellelighluni Kiyaghneghmun aliightesqelluki kinkungutangi avaqutii.
45008020	Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekaqaa ulimaaq aghyughyaghqaaluku enkaam atuunanightestaa. Ulimaaq nanqigtesunghitkaaguq, iwernga Kiyaghneghem tawaten piyukegkaqaa. Naqamllu paninang sighimallelguuq
45008021	qayughllak ataasimi aghneghmi Kiyaghneghem itemulleqaa ulimaaq aghulleghmeng. Taagken ulimaaq ilallequq itemngalleghllagitnun Kiyaghneghem avaqutiitnun.
45008022	Liisimakaghput whavemun kenlanga iingunaghmi ulimaaq ngillegtengnguuq aqnighqellghatun ighniyulghiim.
45008023	Iwernga ulimaaghhiinaanghituq ngilleglleghhii, whangkutallu ngillegtengnguukut. Whangkunguukut Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng pilegni Kiyaghneghem tunusaqsugwhaagha whangkunnun. Ngillegtengnguukutlu ilumteggun utaqiimaluta Kiyaghneghmun allughqisqelluta avaqutaaluta ellnganun, itemutesqellukillu yugusiput seghleghqelleghmeng.
45008024	Taaggun sighimalleghqun yugulikaagukut. Iwernga allgeghsimakumteggu sighimakegkaghput, taawa sighimallghunghituq. Yuget sighimangigatut sameng allgeghtengngwaaqameggneng.
45008025	Iwernga sighimamakumta sameng allgeghtekaqenghilkemnneng, utaqalleqaghput qelaneghpenaamta.
45008026	Tawateghpigaq Taghnegham kayusighaqiinkut kayaatellemnni, qayughllak nallukelghiikut naten yughalleghqaqsaqemtestun. Iwernga Taghnegham ellmineng katam yughaataqiinkut Kiyaghneghmun ngillegtelleghllagkun akuzitngunaan.
45008027	Kiyaghneghem liisimakii yuget sumeghtaghallghit. Liisimakiillu sumeghtaghallghi Taghnegham, qayughllak Taghnegham yughaatkaqii yugi Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun ayuqluki.
45008028	Liisimakaghput Kiyaghneghem sangwaat qamaglluki qepghaghtestaqii qerngiita pinighqelleghqiitnun piniqistemi. Ellnginguut tuqluqii uspeqelleghmitun.
45008029	Tamaakunguut Kiyaghneghem nakmikekestaqii. Aaftekaqiillu Ighneghmitun lliighesqelluki. Tawaten pikaaguq Ighneni allgeghyuwhaaghumasqelluku anglegutelghutanganeng.
45008030	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem aaftekani tuqluqaqii. Tamaakutlu tuqluqani nallghusaqaqii elqughutngalleghminun. Tamaakutlu nallghusaqani elqughutngalleghminun quulvaqaqii.
45008031	Sameng'ngam pinaqesteggu una? Kiyaghneq whangkunnun ayuqngukan, kitumngam tengvimun pilleqinkut?
45008032	Ighlekumangitaa ellmi katam Ighneni; itupill tuunegkaqaa aghqutnguluku tamaghhamnnun! Kiyaghneghem tuunumakanginkut Ighneghmineng, taawa ellngakun ighlegpenani tuunelleqiinkut sameng tamaghhaaneng.
45008033	Kitumngam anaggunnilleqaki Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii yuget? Kiyaghneghem ellmineng katam anaggutellghinnikaqii!
45008034	Kinangam pilleqa Kiyaghneghem yugi nanqigsaghqaaniluki aghyuughyaghqaaluteng? Christ Jesus-em pilleqaguu? Nakaa, qayughllak ellnganguuq tuqumatkikaq whangkunnun, unguvaghtekaaguqlu tuqulleghmeng. Maaten yughaatkaqiinkut aqumluni aghenqigneghani Kiyaghneghem.
45008035	Saamngam iqitesleqinkut piniqellghaneng Christ-am? Seghleliillghaam, piyaqliillghaam, amyuqetaatkellghaam, paneghniqellghaam, aklumallghaam, yakughnaam, nalighmeng tuqutellghaam?
45008036	Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Elpek apalluqluten aghhutanga tamaghhaan yuget tuqusugaqiinkut. Sumeghtaghalleghmeggni penniighestun ayuqniiqiinkut tuqusaghqat.”
45008037	Iwernga tamaakut qamaglluki kayaalqengngwaaqaqaput Christ-akun piniqistemteggun.
45008038	Liisimakngwaaghaqa saam alngunak iqitesnaanghitiinkut Kiyaghneghem piniqellghaneng: talwa tuqullghem, unguvallghem, yaqulget, nalighmeng tughneghat. Talwa sangwaa saghngaan aghneghmi nalighmeng sivumi agani, nalighmeng aghtughyaghqaanghillghet.
45008039	Talwa sangwaat qulemnni nalighmeng asimnni. Ulimaaghmi iqitestiyaghqaqraggiituq whangkunneng Kiyaghneghem piniqellghaneng Christ Jesus-kun Atanemteggun.
45009001	Apeghyukaqa elpesinun ipanguuq. Iqlengiqngunghitunga qayughllak Christ-am pikaanga, Agleghnalghiim Taghneghamllu igleghutngwaak umyugagka.
45009002	Ungipaasugamsi whaten: qivghughllaguunga qayughllak qaamggurugllak ilumkun naangigalngughmeng aqnighqutkeghllagwaanka
45009003	yulgutenka, Jews-et. Piyaqleguyaqan, ellngit apalluqluki Kiyaghneghemtuq nanqigtekanganga aghyuughnalunga, iqitestekangangallu Christ-ameng.
45009004	Yulgutenka Israel-em kingunqii, Kiyaghneghem allughqikaqii ellminun avaqutaaluki. Aliightekaqaa nighughqelleni ellngitnun. Akequuqaqii salleghqamineng ellngitnun. Tuunegkaqii Liilightuusamineng. Apeghtuqaqii ellminun maniguutelleghqameng elqughulluki. Akequuqaqiillu quyasleqniluki qaatkegkangatni.
45009005	Kingunqiit sivuneqsuwhaamta, taakutgun kinguneghteggun Christ-a allgeqaaguq yuguluni. Ellnga Kiyaghneghuuq igleghutilghii sameng tamaghhaaneng. Usuqellengi quunperugllak kenlengunaan! Amen.
45009006	Kiyaghneghaam akequsani pimangitaguu Israel-eghmiinun? Nakaa! Akequsani pikaqaa ellngitnun, iwernga ilanginaghhii kingunghi Israel-em Israel-eghmiipiguut.
45009007	Ilanginaghhiillu Abraham-em kingunghi ellngan avaqutapiikii. Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Abraham whaten, “Kingunghet elpenun akequsanka Isaac-ekun ayuqsaghqaagut.”
45009008	Taana whaten pisiiguq, ilangi avaqutat allgeqat Abraham-emun avaqutaqenghitii Kiyaghneghem. Iwernga allgeqaghhiinaat Kiyaghneghem akequsaakun Abraham-emun kingunepiikii Abraham-em.
45009009	Kiyaghneghem akequsaa Abraham-emun whatetuq, “Ayumiqun uteghniquma whaten lliiqan Sarah ighnengellequq.”
45009010	Taana Sarah-m ighnegha Isaac-nguuq, sivuneghput. Nulightughluni Rebecca-meng, atakaak malghik ighneghegkenka Rebecca-m.
