45009011	Talwa salin allgellghillukek, salinllu pingigallukek pinilghiimeng nalighmeng seghleghmeng, Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Rebecca, “Nuyekliim qepghaalleqaa uyuqliq.” Ataneq tawaten pikaaguq liigikesqelluku ellnginaghmi nakmiightenguniluni salleghqamineng. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa taana ighneq qayughllak ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem tuqlughyukaa. Nakmikegkaqenghitaa qayughllak taam ighneghem sangwaa pikaqutanganeng.
45009013	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaalghii, “Piniqegkaqaqa Jacob, naqam ugumikegkaqaqa Esau.”
45009014	Sameng'ngam pinaqesteggu taana? Kiyaghneq anaggutaa? Yeghlegillu!
45009015	Qayughllak Moses whaten pikaqaa, “Nangllegtaghllequnga kitumun alngunak nanglleqsaghqamnun; nafughtaghllequnga kitumun alngunak nafuqsaghqamnun.”
45009016	Enkaangam yuget allgeghtepagningitaat Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha piyukluku nalighmeng salleghmegteggun. Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq nakmiighyaghqaq nanglleksaghqaminun.
45009017	Akuzitni Igakegkani igaqngaaq Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa Pharaoh whaten, “Umiilgughtestekaqamken kelgunnaluku aghtughyaghqaanghilqa elpegun. Enkaam yuget nunataghhaani tamaghhaani ungipaqelleqaat aatqa.”
45009018	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nangllegyagutkayugaa kina alngunak piyukegkani, pineghlluugtestaqaallu kina alngunak piyukegkani.
45009019	Enkaam aapleqaghpenga whaten, “Kiyaghneq tawatetngukan, sangan'ngam nanqiglleqaki kinkut alngunak aghyuughyaghqaaluki? Kitum alngunak aygiinaghyaghqaqenghitaa Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha.”
45009020	Iwernga kinanguzin, yugmi, veghusnaasken Kiyaghneq? Qikumeng ulimaaghem sagneghem aapsigataa ulimasteni whaten, “Sangama whatellunga ulimazinga?”
45009021	Yugem qikumeng sagnengllaghtem piyukelleghmitun atuqsaghqaqaa qiku. Ulimayukumikek maalghuk ataasimeng qikumeng piyaghqaqaak, aallgha megnunalghiimun atuuluku, ilanga samun alngunak atuuluku.
45009022	Kiyaghneghem kelgusukaqaa ugumiyulleghllani, liisimakesugaallu aghtughyaghqaanghilleni. Iwernga nuqetunneghpakaqii nanqigtekani naafqennaluki.
45009023	Tawaten pikaaguq liisimakesqelluku nighughqelleghllani nangllekegkaminun. Yataaghqekestaqaqii ellngitnun allgeghtesqelluku nighughqelleni.
45009024	Talwa whangkutallu tuqluqaqiinkut, nakaan Jew-nginaghneng iwernga Gentile-enengllu.
45009025	Hosea-m uuknaliqellghani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq whaten Gentile-eneng, “Tamaakut yukenghilkenka, atighlleqanka, ‘Yugenka’. Tamaakut yuget piniqenghilkenka, atighlleqanka, ‘Piniqegkanka’.
45009026	Tawani Kiyaghneghem ungipaatfigitni, ‘Yukenghitamsi’, tawanillu atighlleqiit, ‘Avaqutii unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem.’”
45009027	Isaiah-m akilghuutkegkaqaa Israel whaten, “Qaywa Israel-eghmiit esnem qenaavzeghaatun uglaghtatkalighngaata, tawalliima qafsinkuuraghhaat yugulillengyaghqaagut,
45009028	qayughllak Atanghem kimaawillngunani nanqigtengngwaaghlleqii nunam yugi.”
45009029	Sivunghani Isaiah-m pinaqnillghatun ayuquq, “Atanghem aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum siipusimangisaqanginkut kinguneghmeng, qamagtengngwaaghluta naafqellengnayaghtukut Sodom-enkuk Gomorrah-nkuk neghllagegketun.”
45009030	Sameng'ngam pilleqesta? Gentile-et, ellmeggneng nallghusaghnaqutkumangitut Kiyaghneghmun, iwernga Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqaqii elqughutngalleghminun apalluqluku ugpeqillghat.
45009031	Israel-eghmiit malighqutaqnaqutkegkaagut Liilightuusanun elqughutnganaluteng Kiyaghneghmun, iwernga pilaataqumangitut.
45009032	Sangameng pilaataqunghitat? Qayughllak nallghusaghnaqutkelghiit ellmeggneng Kiyaghneghmun salleghmegteggun, neghyukegpenaan Kiyaghneghmun nallghusiisqelluteng elqughutngallghanun. Enkaam naagtaqut “naagtusikun uyghagkun.”
45009033	Igaqegkaalghii Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten: “Ii-i, Zion-mi nekegtaqa uyghak yuget naagtesqelluki, taam uyghagem iqusleqii. Iwernga kina alngunak ugpequmi ellngakun kaynguyugnaanghituq.”
45010001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, qamagun ilumkun piyukepigtaqanka whanga katam yugenka Jews-et yugulillengesqelluki! Elngaatall Kiyaghneghmun yughaatkaqanka!
45010002	Whaten piighhnaqanka yugenka: Qepghaasupigtaqaat Kiyaghneq iwernga liigikigataat naten Kiyaghneq qepghaatesugaqutni ellngitnun.
45010003	Liigikellghitaat naten Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghaqutangi yuget elqughutngalleghminun. Enkaam elqughutngangllaghnaqutkaqut qaatkelluki Liilightuusii. Tawaten pilleghmegteggun tugukliigataat Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallgha.
45010004	Christ-a kenlekaat Liilightuusat. Enkaam tamaghhaghmi ugpeqillelek Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghlleqaa elqughutngalleghminun.
45010005	Moses igaqaaguq Kiyaghneghmeng nallghusaghilghiimeng yugneng elqughutngalleghminun qaatkutellghitgun Liilightuusanun. Whaten igaqegkaqaa, “Yugem qaatkumakaki Liilightuusat, taakutgun kiyaghllequq.”
45010006	Iwernga nallghusaqaq Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun ugpeqilleghqun, qelqaaguq, “Aaptegpenang, ‘Kina mayughlleqa qilagmun?’” (ukiggnaluku Christ-a nunamun).
45010007	Nalighmeng aaptegpenang, “Kina ukiglleqa Abyss-mun?” (mayuunnaluku Christ-a tuqumeng.)
45010008	Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten igaqngaaq, “Kiyaghneghem ungipaa qantaghantuq elpenun. Akuzitkelleqan qaneghpegun, ugpeqelleqanllu ilugpegun.” (Kiyaghneghem ungipaa ugpeqilleghmeng ayuqelghii, taananguuq ungipaqegkefut.)
45010009	Aapquvgu qaneghpeneng, “Jesus Atanghuniluku,” ilugpenengllu ugpeqegkuvgu Kiyaghneghmun unguvaghtesimaniluku tuqulleghmeng, yugulillengellequten.
45010010	Yuuk ugpeghtuq ilumikun, enkaam Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghaa elqughutngalleghminun. Aapghaallu qaneghmikun ugpeqegkani, enkaam yugulillenguq.
45010011	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu ellnga kaynguyugnaanghituq.”
45010012	Allangughutngitut Jews-etlu Greek-etlu qayughllak ataasiiguq Ataneq, Atanqaa tamaghhaan. Quyasteghllagaqaa tamaghhaan tuqlughilghii ellmineng.
45010013	Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Tamaghaghmi tuqlughilghii aatghakun Atanghem yugulillengyaghqaaguq.”
45010014	Iwernga naten yuget tuqlughlleqatgu ugpenghilkumeng? Naten ugpeghlleqat, nagaquunneghilkumeng? Natenllu nagaqughlleqat ungipaqistengunateng?
45010015	Naten yuget ungipaqilleqat ellnganeng wetku kayagtellengegkuyeng? Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Pinighnaghhaghmeng itegiit tamaakut ungipaqilghiit Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng!”
45010016	Iwernga ilanginiita qaatkegkaqiit Pinilghiit Ungipat. Isaiah aaptekaaguq, “Ataneq, kitum ugpeqegkaqagu ungipaghput?”
45010017	Kina alngunak ugpeqillelgunaanghituq nagategpenani ungipameng Christ-ameng ayuqelghiimeng.
45010018	Iwernga piiqsingaa Israel-eghmiit nagaquunneghinniluki ungipameng? Aa-a, nagaqupestaaqaagut. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Mengit aghulaqumaat tamaghhaanun nunam; akuzitangitlu kenlengitnun nunam.”
45010019	Alla aapqughaallelguunga: Israel-eghmiit liigikenghitatkii-i Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut ellngitlu Kiyaghneghem yukatkii? Aa-a, liigikumiit. Sivukluku Kiyaghneghem Moses whaten pistaa: “Elpesinun aqinakesnaqanka Israel-eghmiingunghilnguut. Israel-eghmiingunghilngughteggun liigikigalngughteggun ugumiyugtesnaqamsi.”
45010020	Taagken Isaiah tetugpenani aapghikaaguq whaten Kiyaghneghem pillghaneng, “Tamaakut ivaghimangilnguut whangamneng, naalkegkaqaatnga. Tamaakunun aaptinghilngughnun whangamneng, liitestekaagunga.”
45010021	Iwernga Israel-meng Kiyaghneq whatenllu pikaaguq, “Aghnelqusighllak nengugutanka iiggenka qaatkusigalngughnunllu, kipullginaalghiinunllu whangamneng.”
45011001	Enkaam aaptamsi, “Kiyaghneghaam Israel-eghmiit yuksugnanightakii?” Yeghlegillu! Whanga katam Israel-eghmiinguunga, Abraham-em kingungha, Benjamin-em ramkenganeng pinguunga.
45011002	Kiyaghneghem yuksugnanillghitii yuni qayughllak nakmikegkaqii salin nunangllallghilluni. Liisimakenghistegguu Akuzitni Igaqegkani Elijah-m qikeghqutkegkaqegkangi Kiyaghneghmun Israel-eghmiit? Whaten pikaalghii,
45011003	“Ataneq, tuququqaqiit uuknaliqisteten, ulleghquqaqiit aghqefigten; whanganginaghhaagunga siipneq, tuqunnaqutkaqaatngallu.”
45011004	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa, “Paninang 7,000-meng yulguunga maniguusigalnguut kiyaghnengllaqamun Baal-mun.”
45011005	Maatenllu tawatetut. Siipnelguuq Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaaneng nangllegtalleghmikun.
45011006	Kiyaghneq nakmiighumakumi nangllegyulleghmikun, taawa nakmikellghitii pinitun pillghitgun. Tawaten nakmikumakumiki, taawa nakmikellghitii nangllegyulleghmikun.
45011007	Whaten piiqunga: Israel-eghmiit naalkellghitaat ivaqaghteng, Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaghhiiniita naalkegkaqaat. Ilangi tamaakut Kiyaghneghem pineghlluugtestekaqii.
45011008	Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaalghii, “Kiyaghneghem umyugiit liigiksaghqaananighqegkaqii. Whavemun kenlanga aghneghmun iiyngit esghaghyaghqaananighqegkaqii, sigutngitlu nagaquusaghqaananighqegkaqii.”
45011009	David-llu pikaaguq, “Neqenghaghqellghit negaghaaghllit, naaptellghughllit, naagtusiighllit, aghyuughisiighllit ellngitnun.
45011010	Iiyngit ayaallenglit esghaghnaniisqelluki, qukiitlu pakegnenglit uqigitneng seghleliillghita quunperugllak.”
45011011	Enkaam aaptamsi, Israel-eghmiit naagtaqngameng, alla nekevepagningitaqaat? Yeghlegillu! Iwernga Israel-eghmiit seghleghqellghit apalluqluki, Gentile-et yugulillengut. Enkaam yugulillengellghita Israel-eghmiit aqinastiit.
45011012	Kiyaghneghem atuqegkaqii seghleghqellghit Israel-eghmiit taginnaluku quyastelleghllak nunam yuganun. Israel-eghmiit ifliillghita tagitaat quyastelleghllak Gentile-enun. Taagken qamaglluteng nakmikegkat Israel-eghmiit, ilaskumeng yugulikanun, quyastellghet natenmi uglaghtatkalleqat!
45011013	Maaten aleghqughyugamsi elpesi Gentile-eni. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga apostle-ngulunga Gentile-enun. Enkaam piraamsipigllunga piiqaqa una megnunalghii qepghaqaq Kiyaghneghem qelghutkaa whangamnun.
45011014	Apeghtughillemkun elpesinun aqinasnaluki piinka Jews-elgutenka, ilangi yugulillengesqelluki.
45011015	Kiyaghneghem ighsakaqngaki Jews-et, nunam yugi Jew-ngunghilnguut ilaliightestekaqii ellminun. Enkaam Jews-et tuguklinqigtekumiki, unguvaghlleghhiistun tuqukat ayuqsaghqaagut.
45011016	Neqekrangllam ikelleqsuwhaagha tuunegkaq Kiyaghneghmun, agleghnaangukan, taawa iingunaghmi neqekrangllak agleghnaghtuq. Akghwi uqfigem agleghnaqata, avayiillu agleghnaghtut.
45011017	Jews-et piitesighaqastun olive-em uqfigatun ayuqut ilangi avayaan ayemtekat. Elpesi Gentile-eni avayastun ayuqusi ayemtekat piitesighallghilngughmeng olive-em uqfiganeng. Taameng uqfigmeng, kitum tuguluku avayaq nekegtekumigu piitesighaqamun olive-em uqfiganun, allgeghusaghqaaguq akum mesaaneng piinnapiglleghhiimeng.
45011018	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi pinighataghaghnilusi avayaneng ayemtekaneng. Qukaayugtegpenasi, qayughllak avayaraaghinaagusi. Akut iknaqughtesigatasi, akuugut iknaqughsaghilghiit elpesineng.
45011019	Iwernga pillequsi, “Aa-a, avayat ayemtekaagut nekeggnaluta uqfigmun.”
45011020	Taana ipanguuq. Kiyaghneghem ayemtaqii avayat qayughllak ugpeqenghilkangat ellnga. Iwernga elpesi nekegtestekaqiisi uqfigmun qayughllak ugpeqegkesi ellnga. Enkaam qukaayugtegpenasi, yeghlegi alingitek.
45011021	Jews-et avayaghpigaagut. Kiyaghneghem ayemtekaqutanganeng avayaghpigaat, taawa elpesillu ayemlleqiisi uqfigmeng nagneghunneghilkufsigu ugpelleghsi.
45011022	Enkaam liigikaghsi Kiyaghneq nangllegtaghtuq, aghyuutapigtuqlu. Aghyuughaqii seghleghqegkat, iwernga nangllekaqiisi neghyukumanginaneghpesigu nangllegtallgha. Iwernga neghyuknaniimakufsigu elpesillu kepulleqiisi.
45011023	Jews-et ugpeqenqigtekumegteggu Kiyaghneq, nekeggneqiglleqii uqfigmun. Kiyaghneq aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq nekeggneqigsaghqaaluki neksaqangitgun.
45011024	Elpesi Gentile-eni avayapikenghitiisi piitesighaqam olive-em uqfigan. Kiyaghneghem kepegkaqiisi piitesighallghilngughmeng olive-em uqfiganeng. Taagken nekegtekaqiisi piitesighaqamun olive-em uqfiganun, qaywa yuget nekegtingigasaghngaata uqfigmun tawatelngughmeng avayameng. Jews-et piitesighaqameng olive-em uqfiganeng pingutmeggneng, Kiyaghneghmi piyaqniitut nekeggneqigsaghqaaluki ellngita katam uqfigitnun.
45011025	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liigikesugamsi sameng qayvighsimangilngughmeng sivunghani. Apeluugusiqa elpesinun unanguuq: peghqinghuyugneghufqaafsi pisqellusi sumeghtaghalleghpesigun. Ilangita Israel-eghmiit ugpeqsugumangitaat Kiyaghneq. Tawatellequt kenlanga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii Gentile-et qamaglluteng tagilaghaatellghitnun ellminun.
45011026	Taagken qamaglluteng Israel-eghmiit yugulillengellequt. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Yugulighista tagillequq Zion-meng; iqilleqii qamaglluki seghleghet kingunghaneng Jacob-em.
45011027	Taana akequsaqaqa ellngitnun iqiskumki seghleghqellghit.”
45011028	Jews-et ighsakegkaqiit Pinilghiit Ungipat enkaam Kiyaghneghem anguyakii. Elpesi apalluqlusi Gentile-eni Kiyaghneghem atuqegkaqaa ighsakillghat quyasnalusi. Iwernga Jews-et paninang Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii yuget. Piniqumanginaawii apalluqluku akequsani sivunghitnun.
45011029	Kiyaghneghem umyugagni allangughteqaghhnaanghitaak. Veghhnaanghitii tunusani, peggnaanghitiillu nakmikegkani ellminun yuguluki.
45011030	Sivunghani elpesi Gentile-eni qaatkellghitaghsi Kiyaghneq. Iwernga maaten allgeghtaghsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha qayughllak Jews-et qaatkunneghilnguut.
45011031	Maaten Jews-et qaatkusigatut Kiyaghneghmun, enkaam nangllekaqiisi Gentile-eni. Iwernga ilangani aghneghem ellngitallu allgeghlleqaat Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha.
45011032	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng yuget qaatkigataat Kiyaghneq. Qaatkunneghitellghat anusimingllaghvigtun ayuquq, Kiyaghneghem tawavek kanaghtaqegkangi. Tawaten piiquq nanglleknaluki qamaglluki.
45011033	Kaay, seghleghllaguut Kiyaghneghem aklungingi, peghqinellgha, liisimallghallu! Kitumngam liigikngwaaghlleqaki nanqigtillghi? Kitumngam liigikngwaaghlleqaki igleghneghi?
45011034	Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Kitum liisimakakek umyugakek Atanghem? Kitumngam aleghqughlleqagu apaqunnaluku?
45011035	Kitum alngunak salisigataguu-u Ataneq, Ataneghmun llivikesqelluku uteghmun?”
45011036	Sangwaa qamaglluni ellnganeng pinguuq, ellngakun pinguuq, ellnganunllu pinguuq. Ellnga usuqellengli quunperugllak! Amen.
45012001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, Kiyaghneq nangllegtapigtutanganeng, elngaatall kayemamsi tuunesqelluki yugusisi Kiyaghneghmun unguvalghiinguluki aghqutet. Pelungillit, tuguklighyugnaghlitlu Kiyaghneghmun. Taananguuq maniguutellepigsi.
45012002	Uum nunam yugatun kiyaghtegpenasi. Yeghlegi Kiyaghneghmun allangughtestek nutaghtesluki umyugasi. Taagken liigikelleqaghsi piyukellgha Kiyaghneghem pinilghii, tuguklighyugnalghii, qamagtiingwaaghngalghiillu.
45012003	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqutanganeng tunusameng apostle-ngulunga, tamaghhaghpesinun piinga: Sumeghtaghaatkegpenasi elpesineng pinighataghaghnilusi ayuqelleghpesineng. Yeghlegi ipapighqellusi sumeghtaghaatkaqitek ugpeqilleghtulegpesigun Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaakun elpesinun.
45012004	Yugusiput nalighneghtupigtut, tamaghaghmi nalighneq allatun sayaghqaaguq.
45012005	Uglaghyaghngaamta, ataasigukut Christ-am yugusiini. Enkaam whangkuta nalighneghni whangkunneng pikutukut.
45012006	Qamaglluta allakullghiineng tunusalguukut Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaaneng nangllegtalleghmikun. Tunusaghput ungipaqingukan Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng, ungipaqilta ugpeqilleghtutalemtestun.
45012007	Tunusaghput qepghaatingukan, qepghaatilta, apeghtughingukan, apeghtughilta;
45012008	kayemingukan ilameng, kayemilta; tuuningukan, ighlegpenaamta tuunilta; igleghutingukan, sagiqluta igleghutilta; nangllekingukan, quyakusiqluku nangllekilta.
45012009	Piniqitek ipapighqellusi. Ugumikluku seghleq, piyukumanginaghteggu sangwaa pinilghii.
45012010	Piniqututek anglegutkullghiistun. Quulvaatutaqitek pakiggulluku quulviisqesulleghpesineng.
45012011	Taakunginaghhaagneng qepghaghtek, ighsanifqaafsi. Sagiqulluku qepghaataqiteggu Ataneq qamaken ilugpesineng.
45012012	Quyangatek qayughllak sighimallelguusi, nuqetaqitek nekeggmellusi seghleliineghpesini, yughaghaqiteklu iiwleng.
45012013	Ugpeqaalgutegpesinun aklulghiinun tuuniiqitek, upughatiiqitek kinkuneng alngunak.
45012014	Yughaatkaqiteki amyuqetaatkistesi Kiyaghneghmun quyastesqelluki, nakaan aqnightesqelluki.
45012015	Quyalgusighaqiteki tamaakut quyalghiit, qiyalgusighaqiteki tamaakut qiyalghiit.
45012016	Kiyaghtek nekeggmetullusi. Qukaayugtegpenasi yeghlegi ilakiteki ukavantalghiit. Sumeghtaghaatkegpenasi peghqinghunilusi ilagpesineng.
45012017	Kitum seghletun pikangisi, akitegpenaki seghletun. Piiqiteki pinilghiit tuguklighyugnalghiit tamaghhaanun.
45012018	Piyaghqaakan, piiqiteggu sangwaa piyaghqaghsi kiyaghtesqellusi nekeggmellusi tamaghhaanun.
45012019	Piniqegkamni, akiniighnaqegpenaki seghletun pistesi, itupill pegteki Kiyaghneghem sakraallghanun. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii whaten, “Whanganguuq aghyuughiyaghqaq, whanganguuq akiniighyaghqaq, piiq Ataneq.”
45012020	Igaqngaaqlu Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Anguyagen iyataangukan neghesnaken, meqsugukan meghsinaken. Tawaten pikuvgu naasqwakun mayughfikelleqan kumangalghiimeng coal-meng.”
45012021	Kayaalqestegpenasi seghleghmun, itupill kayaalqiteggu seghleq pinitun pilleghqun.
45013001	Tamaghhaghmi qaatkusaghqaaguq aangwaaghughtekanun igleghutistenun. Kina alngunak igleghutistengunaanghituq wetkuqun Kiyaghneghem igleghutistengughtestekumigu. Igleghutistenguut qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaqii igleghutisqelluki.
45013002	Kitum alngunak qaatkenghilkumiki igleghutistet, qaatkigatii Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii. Enkaam aghyuughteslequq.
45013003	Pinitun pikayuget alikigatiit igleghutistet, iwernga seghletun pikayuget aliksaghqaqiit. Aliksunghilkufsiki igleghutistet, pinitun pitek, enkaam usuqelleqiisi.
45013004	Igleghutistet Kiyaghneghem qepghaghtekii aneghneghqelleghqaghpesinun. Iwernga seghletun pikufsi, aliknakesi, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem qelghumii aghyuughesqelluki seghletun pikat. Kiyaghneghem qepghaghtekii, aghyuughistekiillu seghletun pilghiinun.
45013005	Tamaaken apalluqluku qaatkiteki igleghutistet. Qaatkiteki qayughllak Kiyaghneghmun aghyuughtesunghilnguusi. Iwernga taananginaq apalluunghituq. Qaatkiteki qayughllak liisimakaghsi qaatkutelleq elqughutngaaq.
45013006	Taakuklu apalluqlukek llivikaqasi tax-esi, qayughllak igleghutistet qepghaagut Kiyaghneghmun qepghaqaten pineghmegteki.
45013007	Enkaangam tax-et asengesi qamaglluki llivikiteki igleghutestegpesinun. Siivakitekillu quulvaghtekillu qamaglluki.
45013008	Asengegpenaan kina alngunak, iwerngaqun piniqelleghsi asengeknginaghteggu ilagpesinun. Kitum alngunak piniqegkumiki yulgutni qaatkengngwii iinguniita Liilightuusat.
45013009	Igaqngaat Liilightuusani whaten, “Gelgaghniighpenang, Yugtaghpenang, Teglegpenang, Qiliiqetiqegpenang.” Qaatkelleqaten taakut qelghusat, alngunaklu qelghusat, qaatkegkuvgu una qelghusaq: “Piniqluku yulguten piniqelleghpetun elpeneng.”
45013010	Kina alngunak piniqikumi yulgutmineng, seghletun pinaanghitii. Piniqilleghmikun qaatkutnguuq iinguniitnun Liilightuusat.
45013011	Tamaakut piteki qayughllak liisimakaghsi pilleghqaq kaasimaaq. Qavalghiistun ayuqusi iwernga maaten taghtughyaghqaaghtusi. Yugulilleghput tughaaghtuq ugpeghyuggaallemnneng.
45013012	Unuk alpagyaghtughtuq, whaa aghsaghtungestaghaa. Taaqeltekingam atuqneghmeng seghleghet yuget piiqegkangit mamlegmi. Enkaam tugulteki pilluwaasighqat nighugmi.
45013013	Pinitun kiyaghtelta katam yugestun kiyaghlleghhiit nighugani aghneghem. Seghletun teghigniqefqaamta, suumefqaamta, alngunak sex-kun seghleghqefqaamta, pilluwutefqaamta, aqinatefqaamta.
45013014	Itupill akulghaaghestun aateggu Ataneq Jesus Christ-a, sumeghtaghaatkefqiitallu atuqnaluki yugusighpesi piyukellghit.
45014001	Upughateggu yuuk ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaq akulegpesinilnguq. Aaghtiiraaghusiqegpenaan sangwaa upeqegkaa elqughutngatanga nalighmeng anaggutngatanga.
45014002	Ataasim yugem ugpeqaa neghyaghqaaniluni alngunak neqmeng. Iwernga yuuk ugpelleghqestaaghhaq neghaquq nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng.
45014003	Yugem neghegkayugem alngunak neqmeng, siivakligu yuuk neqayuk nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng. Yugem neghegkayugem nunivagseghaghhiinaghmeng, nanqiggneghilligu yuuk neqayuk alngunak neqmeng, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tugukliimaa.
45014004	Kinanguniluten piiqsin nanqigtilghii kitum qepghaghtenganeng? Qepghaghtem piliitistenginaan nanqiglleqaa pinitun pimatanga nalighmeng seghletun pimatanga. Atanghem qepghaghtenga pinitun pillequq qayughllak Atanghem kayusighyaqlegukanga pinitun pisqelluku.
45014005	Yugem ugpeqaa ataasiq aghneq megnunaghataghaghniluku ilangitneng aghneghneng. Ilangan yugem ugpeqii qamaglluteng aghneghet tawatelkunniluki. Tamaghhaghmi yugem umyugagni ataasiightengngwaaghlikek.
45014006	Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu megnunaghluku aghneq tawaten piiquq quulvaghnaluku Ataneq. Kitum alngunak neghegkumigu alngunak neqa tawaten piiquq quulvaghnaluku Ataneq, qayughllak iyamsiqayugvikaqegkanga Kiyaghneq neqmeng. Kitum alngunak neghyunghilkumiki ilangi neqet tawaten piiquq quulvaghnaluku Ataneq, iyamsiqayugvikaqegkangallu Kiyaghneq.
45014007	Unguvangigatukut whangkunnun, tuqungigatukutlu whangkunnun.
45014008	Unguvakumta, Ataneghmun unguvanguukut. Tuqumakumta, Ataneghmun tuqullequkut. Enkaam unguvayaghngaamta nalighmeng tuquyaghngaamta Atanghem pikiinkut.
45014009	Christ-a tuquluni, unguvaghtekaaguq Atanghunaluni unguvalghiinunllu tuqukanunllu.
45014010	Elpesi, sangan nanqigtaqesteki ugpeqaalgutesi? Sanganllu siivakigasteki ugpeqaalgutesi? Neqamikluku, qamaglluta nekevyaghqaagukut sivungakun Kiyaghneghem, ellnganun nanqigtesqelluta.
45014011	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Ataneq piiq, qayughllak whanga unguvalghiinga Kiyaghneq, tamaghhaghmi yuuk segesqughquullequq whangamnun, tamaghhaghmillu yugem usuqelleqaa Kiyaghneq.”
45014012	Enkaam qamaglluta Kiyaghneghmun apeghyaghqaqaghput salleghput, sanganllu tawaten pimatfut.
45014013	Enkaangam taaqelta nanqigtunneghmeng. Yeghlegi, umyugaput ataasiightelteki ugpeqaalgutfut naagtestefqaan nalighmeng seghleghqestegpenaan pisteggu.
45014014	Ataneghqun Jesus-kun liisimakngwaaghaqa avangituq iinghutkameng neqmeng. Iwernga yugem ugpeqegkumigu sangwaa iinghutkaaluku, taawa ellngani iinghutkaaguq.
45014015	Ugpeqaalguten uniighmiqumakan sameng neghegkaghpeneng, taawa piniqnaniimaan. Neghegkaghpenun naafqestegpenaan ugpeqillgha Christ-am tuqumatkegkaa.
45014016	Ugpeqegkan pinightuq; akuzitkestegpenaan seghleghuluku.
45014017	Qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghani sangwaat neghegkaputlu meghegkaputlu megnunanghitut. Ukut megnunaghtut: elqughutngalleq, nekeggmelleq, quyalleqlu; taakut Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng pinguut.
45014018	Taakut atuqluki qepghaatilghiim Christ-amun, efqughlleqaa Kiyaghneq, itagnaqelleqaatlu yuget.
45014019	Enkaam atuulteggu nekeggmellengestiyaghqaq, kayemututeltallu ugpelleghtughtaghaghnaluta.
45014020	Naafqegpenaan Kiyaghneghem qepghallgha apalluqluku neqa. Qamaglluni neqa neghyaghqaaguq, iwernga anaggutngaaq neghelleghqaq alngunak neqmeng seghleghqestiyaghqaq kitumeng.
45014021	Itagnaghyaghqaaguq kemekragtunghitelleq, wine-etunghitelleq, sangwaallu alngunak naagtestiyaghqaq ugpeqaalgutegpesinun.
45014022	Kiyaghneghhiinaqlu liisimaksaghqaqatek tamaakut ugpeqegkaghten. Quyangaaquq yuuk atuqneghminiki ugpeqegkani elqughutnganiluki seghleghnitkegpenaki.
45014023	Iwernga yugem neghegkani, ugpeqegkumigu anaggutnganiluku, Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqaa qayughllak pinghilkanga sangwaa ugpeqegkani. Sangwaa alngunak ugpeqegkani anaggutnganiluku atuqumakumigu seghleghqellequq.
45015001	Whangkuta ugpeqilleghtuqani kayusiisaghqaqaput ugpeqilleghqestaaghhaat seghleliinghata. Efqughsaghqaanghitukut whangkunneng.
45015002	Itupill, tamaghhaamta efqughhnaqelteggu ugpeqaalgutfut ellngan katam pinighqelleghqaanun, ugpeqilleghtughtesqelluku.
45015003	Talwa Christ-a efqughsimangituq ellmineng katam. Yeghlegi igaqegkaaguq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Yuget seghlequulghiit elpeneng, seghlequullghit tekitaqut whangamkun.”
45015004	Sivunghani Akuzitet Igaqegkat igaqegkaagut apeghtughnaluta. Nuqenneghtustiinkut, kayemiinkutlu sighimallengnayukamta.
45015005	Nuqenneghtullghenkuk, kayemellghenkuk Kiyaghneghtaaguk. Ellngan kiyaghteslisi itagnaqullusi katam Christ Jesus-em pillghatun.
45015006	Taagken qamagllusi qerngaghpesi ataasistun usuqelleqaghsi Kiyaghneq, Atanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am.
45015007	Tamaaken apalluqluku tugukliitullusi katam Christ-am tugukliqayugukangisi elpesi. Tawaten pikufsi yuget usuqelleqaat Kiyaghneq.
45015008	Amenqun Christ-a qepghaghtengughtekaalghii Jews-enun liigikesqelluki Kiyaghneq iiwleng ipapiiquq. Tamaaken apalluqluku Jews-et liisimakngwaaghaat Kiyaghneghem piyaghqaqii akequsaqegkani sivunghitnun.
45015009	Christ-a tagikaalghiillu Gentile-enun usuqesqelluku Kiyaghneq nangllegtallghanun. Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Enkaangam usuqelleqamken akulngitni Gentile-et, ilagaghllequngallu usuqilleghmeng ateghpenun.”
45015010	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaqlu whaten, “Gentile-eni, quyatek maligullusi Kiyaghneghem yugitnun!”
45015011	Alla Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Usuqiteggu Ataneq, qamagllusi Gentile-eni; usuqiteggu, qamagllusi yugni!”
45015012	Isaiah pikaaguq, “Kingungha Jesse-m tagillequq igleghunnaluki Gentile-et, enkaam ellngakun sighimallequt.”
45015013	Kiyaghneghuuq sighimastilghii. Imighlisi quyalleghllagmengllu nekeggmelleghmengllu ugpeqelleghpesigun ellnga. Taagken sighimallengataghaghllequsi aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham.
45015014	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liisimakngwaaghamsi piniipigtusi yugni. Liisimakaqallu liigikngwaaghluki ayuqasi apeghtuusat Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghiit, enkaam apeghtuusaqlegwaasi ilangitnun.
45015015	Iwernga tetullngunanga latakaqamsi sameng ilangitneng neqangughhnalusi tamaaken. Tawaten lataanga qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tunusightughaanga
45015016	qepghaghtengulunga Christ Jesus-mun Gentile-enun. Priest-etun ayuqaqunga ungipaqinemni Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Kiyaghneghem Gentile-enun. Tawaten ungipaqiiqunga ellngit tunusatun ayuqesqelluki tuguklighyugnalghii Kiyaghneghmun. Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham agleghnaghtestaa tunusaq.
45015017	Enkaam qukaayugtaqunga qepghaqamneng Kiyaghneghmun Christ Jesus-kun.
45015018	Akuzitkesaghqaqanka Christ-am apeghiiqaghhiinii whangamkun. Ellnganguuq Gentile-eneng qaatkutestilghii Kiyaghneghmun ungipaqillemkunllu qepghaqamkunllu.
45015019	Tawaten pikaaguq aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun allaaghlluwhaghtillghet, aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham. Ungipaqngwaaqaqanka Pinilghiit Ungipat Christ-ameng ayuqelghiit tamaghhaani Jerusalem-emeng taagaverugllak Illyricum-emun.
45015020	Iiwleng piyukelqesaghaqa ungipaqnaluki Pinilghiit Ungipat nunani nagaquusigalngughni Christ-ameng. Tawaten pikaagunga qayughllak nekeftiyugunghilnguunga tunemakun ilangan yugem piinliqaakun.
45015021	Katam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii whaten, “Tamaakut salin ungipaasigalnguut ellnganeng, esghaghlleqaat, salinllu nagaquusigalnguut ellnganeng, liigikelleqaat.”
45015022	Tamaaken apalluqluku uglaghngaan elpesinun pipagningitaqunga qayughllak ilangitni nunani ungipaqiiqelghiinga.
45015023	Iwernga maaten apeghiighaqa qepghaqaqa maani. Uglalghiini ayumiqulleghni elpesinun piyupigtaqsaghtunga,
45015024	enkaam sunanguq maaten laalighfiklamsi Spain-mun pitkelluku. Laalighutaghtellemta kingunganeng sunanguq kayusightengnga aghulaqnaqegkuma Spain-mun.
45015025	Iwernga elpesinun pivagilgama, Jerusalem-mennaqaqunga kayusiinnaluki Kiyaghneghem yugi tamaanlenguut.
45015026	Ugpeqat Macedonia-melnguutlu, Achaia-melnguutlu quyakusiqluku tuunikaagut manimeng kayusiinnaluki aklumalghiit akulngitnilnguut Kiyaghneghem yugan Jerusalem-emi.
45015027	Quyakusiqluku tawaten pikaagut. Taakut Gentile-et asengemiit Jews-et qayughllak allgeghutkaalghiit Kiyaghneghem quyastillghaneng ellngitgun. Enkaam Gentile-et kayusighyaghqaqiit Jews-et ugpeqiit Jerusalem-emelnguut tuyughluki manimeng.
45015028	Whaa kelqennaqaqa Gentile-et maningat Jews-enun. Apeghiiqumkun una qepghaqaq tuunluku mani ellngitnun, laalighfiksaghtughlleqamsi, taagken Spain-ellequnga.
45015029	Liisimakaqa kaaskuma elpesinun, pilgullequnga Christ-am iingunaan quyastellghaneng.
45015030	Ugpeqaalgutemni, Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun, piniqellghakunllu Taghnegham, maligullusi whangamnun yughaatkeghllakaghtengnga Kiyaghneghmun kayusiitesqellunga.
45015031	Yughaghtek Kiyaghneghmun paqniighsiisqellunga ugpeqaanghilngughneng Judea-mi. Yughaatkiteggullu qepghaqaqa Jerusalem-emi tuguklighyugniisqelluku Kiyaghneghem yugitnun.
45015032	Taagken Kiyaghneghem piyukelqegkagu, elpesinun pillequnga quyallelighllaglunga, enkaam pinighyuuggneqigllequnga laalighfikumalusi.
45015033	Kiyaghneq nekeggmellelitilghii tamaghaghpesinilli. Amen.
45016001	Ungipaasugamsi ugpeqaalgutemnneng, Phoebe-meng. Pinilghiinguuq deaconess-a ugpeqanun qerngughutkayugnun yughaghvigani Cenchreae-m.
45016002	Upughannakesi Kiyaghneghem yugita piiqellghistun qayughllak Atanghem pikaa. Kayutkesunghisi kayusighaqluku qayughllak kayuteghllaguuq uglalghiinun yugnun, whangamnunllu talwa.
45016003	Ungipaataghhnakegsi Priscilla-nkuk Aquila-nkuk suumqaqagkanguq. Qepghalgutkagka Christ Jesus-mun.
45016004	Talwa tuqutelleghqaghtek pitkegpenaan paqniighsaghqaqaagnenga. Tamaaken apalluqluku iyamsiqayugllaguunga elkegkeneng. Qamagllutengllu ugpeqat Gentile-et yughaghvigitnilnguut iyamsiqayuguut.
45016005	Ungipaataghhnakesi ugpeqat qerngughutkayuget mangteghagkeni suumqaqankanguq. Ungipaataghhnakesi piniqegkaqa Epaenetus suumqaqaqanguq. Asia-mi ellnga ugpeghyuggaaqaaguq Christ-akun.
45016006	Ungipaataghhnakesi Mary suumqaqaqanguq; qevuulluni qepghaatkaqiisi.
45016007	Ungipaataghhnakegsi Andronicus-enkuk Junias-enkuk Jew-lgutegka, anusimingllaghalgutkegkaqagkallu, suumqaqagkanguq. Apostle-nguuk yuget liisimakngwaaqegket; sivumni ugpeqaaghtekaaguk.
45016008	Ungipaataghhnakesi Ampliatus, piniqegkaqa Ataneghqun, suumqaqaqanguq.
45016009	Unipaataghhnakesi Urbanus, qepghalgutfut Christ-amun, piniqegkaqallu Stachys, suumqaqagkanguq.
45016010	Ungipaataghhnakesi Apelles suumqaqaqanguq. Nanghiighsaghallengaqngami ipapighqegkaqaa ataasighmitelleni Christ-amun. Ungipaataghhnakesi nengllugutangi Aristobulus-em suumqaqankanguq.
45016011	Ungipaataghhnakesi Herodion, Jew-elgutka, suumqaqaqanguq. Ungipaataghhnakesillu ugpeqat nengllugutanganilnguut Narcissus-em suumqaqankanguq.
45016012	Ungipaataghhnakegsi Tryphaena-nkuk Tryphosa-nkuk suumqaqagkanguq. Taakuk aghnak qepghaghtenguuk Ataneghmun. Ungipaataghhnakesillu piniqegkaqa Persis, suumqaqaqanguq; qevulluni qepghaqaaguq Ataneghmun.
45016013	Ungipaataghhnakegsi Rufus-enkuk naakullghiik, suumqaqagkanguq. Rufus Atanghem nakmikegkaqaa, naanganllu ighneqelghiistun piiqaanga.
45016014	Ungipaataghhnakesi Asyncritus-enkut, Phlegon-enkut, Hermes-enkut, Patrobas-enkut, Hermas-enkut, qamagllukillu ugpeqaalgutet ellngitnilnguut, suumqaqankanguq.
45016015	Ungipaataghhnakegsi Philologus-enkuk, Julia-nkuk, Nereus-enkuk nayakullghiik, Olympas-llu qamagllukillu Kiyaghneghem yugi ellngitnilnguut, suumqaqankanguq.
45016016	Quyakutaqitek naaghutmeng Kiyaghneghem piniqellghakun. Qamaglluteng ugpeqat Christ-am yughaghviganilnguut, liisimakesugiisi suumqaqiisinguq.
45016017	Ugpeqaalgutemni, qelghamsi kelengasqellusi tamaakuneng aafquutestikayugneng, tunutestilghiineng yuget ugpeqillghitneng, kipullginaalghiineng apeghtuusaneng liitkaghpesineng. Iqitngatek tamaakuneng.
45016018	Yuget tawaten pikayuget qepghaatngunghitaat Christ-a Ataneghput. Taawanginaghhaq ellmeng katam efquqegkaghhiinateng piiqiit. Apeghtughineghmeggni akuziteghlluwhaat atuqaqiit, usuquughtaqiitlu yuget puughhnaluki puughsugumalghiit.
45016019	Qamaglluteng yuget nagaquumaat qaatkutngalleghsi Ataneghmun, enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku quyakeghllawaamsi. Peghqinghusugamsi samun pinilghiimun, iwernga anaggutellngunasi seghleghmun.
45016020	Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelitilghiim qantaghaqun kagimlleqaa Tughneghaq itegaghpesi asingani. Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a nangllegtaghli elpesinun.
45016021	Qepghalgutma Timothy-m, Jew-lgutmallu Lucius-enkut, Jason-enkut, Sosipater-enkut suumqaqiisinguq.
45016022	Tertius-nguunga, igaataqaqa Paul latanganeng. Whangallu suumqaqamsi Ataneghqun.
45016023	Whanga Paul, Gaius-metaqunga. Mangteghaani qamaglluteng ugpeqat qerngughutkayuguut. Ellnganllu ugpeqatlu suumqaqiisinguq. Neghllamta manimeng aflengakistengan, Erastus-em, ugpeqaalgutemtallu Quartus-em suumqaqiisinguq.
45016025	Usuqelteggu Kiyaghneq! Ellngan ayepsugighsaghyaqlegwii ugpeqillesi Pinilghiitgun Ungipatgun Jesus Christ-ameng ayuqelghiimeng ungipaqumanginaghaqegkemkun yugnun. Taananguuq aksaqegkaq ungipaq Kiyaghneghem qayvighsimangitkaa ima piinlighyuggaallghaneng nunam.
45016026	Iwernga maaten, piinleghilnguum Kiyaghneghem qayvighsimii Pinilghiit Ungipat igaqullghitgun uuknaliqistet. Qelghusimii Pinilghiit Ungipat liitesqelluki yugnun nunataghhaani tamaghhaani. Tawaten pikaaguq ellngitnun ugpeqesqellunillu qaatkesqellunillu.
45016027	Ellnginaaguq Kiyaghneq, peghqinelghii samun tamaghhaanun. Yuget usuqlitgu quunperugllak Jesus Christ-akun! Amen.
46001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut, Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaaneng Jesus Christ-amun apostle-nguluku. Ugpeqaalgutfut Sosthenes whangamnituq.
46001002	Lataaqunga Kiyaghneghem ugpeghtengitnun Corinth-melngughnun, Kiyaghneghem aaftekaanun yuknalusi Christ Jesus-kun. Nakmikegkaqiisillu pelungitesqellusi maligullusi yulghuteghllagnun tamanganilngughnun, yughaqayugnun Atanemnnun Jesus Christ-amun, qamagtengngwaaghluta Atanqaghput.
46001003	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am nanglleklisillu nekeggmellelguslilsillu.
46001004	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneq qayughllak nangllekegkaqiisi Christ Jesus-kun.
46001005	Enkaam ellngakun aklungighikaagusi liigikelleghmengllu akuzilleghmengllu. Enkaam maaten liigikataghaghlleqaghsi Christ-a, akuzitkataghaghlleqaghsillu Ataneq.
46001006	Allangughtekamllu kiyaghtaalleghpesi ipapighqaa ungipaqegkaghput Christ-a.
46001007	Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng tunusalguusi sameng tamaghhaaneng, utaqiingulusi Atanemta Jesus Christ-am taginqigtelleghqaaneng.
46001008	Kiyaghneghem ugpellesi iknaqughsaamanginaghnaaghii kenlanga kingulighpigaghmun aghneghmun. Inqun anaggutellghitesqellusi Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a nanqigtikan yugneng.
46001009	Ataasiighmelnguum Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiisi ilatesqellusi Ighneghminun Jesus Christ-amun Atanemnnun.
46001010	Ugpeqaalgutemni, Atanemta Jesus Christ-am aatghakun piimsi taaqesqellusi aaghtiiraaghunneghmeng. Aafquutegpenasi. Sumeghtaghallesillu sanaqellesillu ataasiighhnaqluki.
46001011	Ugpeqaalgutemni, ilangita Chloe-em nengllugutangan ungipaatkaqaatnga aaghtiiraaghutaqnilusi.
46001012	Ilasinguq piiqut, “Whanga Paul-em maligsaaghtekaanga.” Ilasi, “Whanga Apollos-em.” Ilasi “Whanga Peter-em.” Paninang ilasinguq piiqut, “Whanga Christ-am maligsaaghtekaanga.”
46001013	Enkaangam qafsinaghqaghsi Jesus Christ-a. Paul-em qaquraatkegkaqisii? Paaptaayekaatsii Paul-em aatghakun?
46001014	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneq paaptaayemangilkegka nalighhiinaghsi iwerngaqun Crispus-enkuk Gaius-enkuk.
46001015	Enkaangam kina alngunak pinaanghituq paaptaayemaniluni atemkun.
46001016	(Atwhay paaptaayekaqankallu Stephanas-enkut nengllugutkullghiit. Iwernga neqamikenghitaqa kina alla alngunak paaptaayematka).
46001017	Christ-am paaptaayeliisqumangitaanga, iwernga kayagtekaqaanga ungipaqisqellunga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Ungipaqingigatunga atuqluki yugem peghqinellghi, luuraq aghtughyaghqaanghillghiitesnayukamkun qaquuraa Christ-am.
46001018	Ungipaq Christ-am tuqullgha qaquurakun temnginguuq iflanaqelghiinun. Iwernga yugulillengelghiini whangkuta liisimakaghput Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilqaa.
46001019	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Peghqinghet peghqinellghat atuunanightesleqaqa. Liitkaghllagetlu liitellghat sasiinanightesleqaqa.”
46001020	Enkaam sanaqan'ngam nunam peghqinelghiingi? Sanaqan'ngam apeghtughistengi Liilightuusat? Sanaqan'ngam aaghtiiraaghtet? Qamagtengngwaaghluni liitelleghllallghat sasiinghituq qayughllak Kiyaghneghem temngitwhangllaqaqaa peghqinellgha nunam.
46001021	Peghqinelleghmikun Kiyaghneq pikaaguq nunam yuganun nallukelleqniluni peghqinellghitgun. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nakmikii yugulinaluki qamaglluki ugpelghiit Christ-ameng ungipaqegkamnneng. Ugpeqaanghilnguut sumeghtaghaatkaqaat taana ungipaqegkaghput temnginguniluku.
46001022	Jews-et esghaasugaqut allaaghlluwhaghtilleghneng ugpeqnaluku Kiyaghneghem ungipaa; Gentile-et peghqinellengyugaqut ugpeqnaluku ungipaq ipangutanga.
46001023	Iwernga paninang ungipaqnaqngwaaghput Christ-amun tuqutkegkaqniluki qaquurakun. Una ungipaq Jews-eni piyaqnapigtuq ugpeqsaghqaaluni, Gentile-eni temngiinguuq.
46001024	Iwernga whangkunnun Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaanun Jews-ngughngaamta, Gentile-ngughngaamta tawatenneghituq. Christ-am tuqullghan qaquurakun liitestekaqiinkut Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu peghqinellghanengllu.
46001025	Kiyaghneghem temngitwhallgha peghqinghataghgaghtuq yugem peghqinellghaneng. Kiyaghneghem kayaatellgha iknaqataghaghtuq yugem iknaqellghaneng.
46001026	Ugpeqaalgutemni, neqamikluku natesaatsi Kiyaghneghem tuqlughaqngisi. Qafsinkuuraghhaghni peghqinghuyaghtusi nunam yugan sumeghtaghaatkellghitni. Qafsinkuuraghhaghni aghtiigasaghtusi igleghutistet, nalighmeng aklungilngughneng nengllugutneng pinguyaghtusi.
46001027	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii tamaakut nalluuqat nunami kayngusaaknaluki peghqinelghiit, Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii kayaalnguut nunami kayngusaaknaluki tamaakut iknaqelghiit.
46001028	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii ukavanlenguutlu asitnginaaqiitlu nunami. Tamaakunguut Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii, yugnun liigikesqelluki sumeghtaghaatkegkiit aangwaaghuluki iwernga Kiyaghneghmi aangwaaghunghitut.
46001029	Enkaangam kina alngunak aangaayuggnaanghituq nekevegkuni sivungani Kiyaghneghem.
46001030	Kiyaghneghuuq tuunistesi unguvalleghmeng Christ Jesus-kun. Kiyaghneghem Christ Jesus-mun tuunestiinkut peghqinelleghmeng, elqughutestiinkutlu Kiyaghneghmi, agleghnaghtestiinkutu, itemutestiinkutlu seghleghqellemnneng.
46001031	Enkaangam atuqelteggu, Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngalghii, “Kina alngunak aangaayugsukuni, aangaayugutkelliki Atanghem apeghiiqii ellminun.”
46002001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, ungipaqiyaghtughaqngama elpesinun, atuqumangitanka akuzitet liigikepagningilkesi. Peghqilleghllamkun ungipaqiyunghitunga Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng elpesinun.
46002002	Pakikaqanka tamaakut qayughllak ungipaqiyulghiinga Jesus Christ-anginaghhaghmeng tuqullghanengllu qaquurakun.
46002003	Elpesinitaqngama tetugaataqaagunga, alingruuqaagunga, ungelegtekaagungallu.
46002004	Kukragnalghiimeng akuzitkumangitunga peghqineghllagem akuzitanganeng. Iwernga Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham aghtughyaghqaanghillghan ipapighqegkaqii apeghtughillghenka ipangutangi.
46002005	Enkaangam ugpeghtusi apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha, nakaan apalluqluku yugem peghqinellgha.
46002006	Angtaniitkanun ugpeqanun apeghtuusaqaqa Kiyaghneghem peghqinellgha. Iwernga taana peghqinelleq nunameng pingunghituq, talwa igleghutistenganeng. Qantaghaqun aviighusaghqaagut.
46002007	Peghqinelleq apeghtuusaqa Kiyaghneghem peghqinelqaa, nallukaat yuget. Yuget nallukngwaaghyaqangat taana peghqinelleq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem liitestellghanun. Talwa nunangllaamangilluni Kiyaghneghem usuqsaghqaaluta pikaqiinkut peghqinelleghmikun.
46002008	Nalighhiiniita nunam igleghutistengita liigikumangitaat taana peghqinelleq. Liigikegkaqsaqumegteggu, qaquuraghnayanghitaat Atangha nighughqellghem.
46002009	Igaqegkani Akuzitni igaqegkaaguq, “Tamaakut iyem esghamangilkangi, tamaakut sigutem nagaquumangilkangi, tamaakut umyugam sumeghtaghaatkumangilkangi. Kiyaghneghem yataaghqegkaqii piniqisteminun.”
46002010	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem liigikestekaqii whangkunnun Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagmikun. Taghnegham yuvghiighaqaa sangwaa tamaghhaan, talwa Kiyaghneghem qaamnarugllaganilnguut.
46002011	Yugem sumeghtaghallgha kitum alngunak nallukaa iwerngaqun ellngan katam taghneghagkenka. Tawateghpigaq Kiyaghneghem sumeghtaghallgha kitum alngunak nallukaa iwerngaqun ellngan katam Taghneghagkenka.
46002012	Nunam taghneghaaneng allgeghusimangitukut. Yeghlegi, allgeghtekaqagput Taghneghak Kiyaghneghmeng pik, liigiknaluki qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem tuunegkii whangkunnun.
46002013	Enkaam akuzingigatukut yugem peghqinellghakun, iwernga atuqaqaput akuzitet Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham apeghtuutkii. Tawaten piiqukut apeghtuusaqnemteki Taghnegham ipapillghi tamaakunun allgeghutkanun Agleghnaliigneng Taghneghagneng.
46002014	Iwernga kina alngunak allgeghusimangilnguq Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, tuguklighingigatuq tunusaneng Taghneghagneng pineng. Tamaakut tunusat temngitwhanguut ellngani. Liigikepagningitii qayughllak Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham kayusillghiinaakun liigiksaghqaaguq.
46002015	Yugem allgeghutkam Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng nanqigtaqaa sangwaa qamaglluku. Iwernga kitum alngunak nanqigsaghqaqenghitaa ellnga.
46002016	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghistun, “Kitum alngunak nallukaa Atanghem sumeghtaghallgha. Enkaam kitum alngunak liilightughnaanghitaa.” Iwernga whangkuta ugpeqani sumeghtaghaghaqukut Christ-am sumeghtaghallghatun.
46003001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesinitaqngama aleghqughpagningitkaqamsi aleghqughwaqellemtun ugpeqaghllaget. Yeghlegi aleghquqaqamsi ugpellesi anglillghilngughestun ayuqluki. Ugpeqillesi Christ-akun taghnughhaghhaghestun ayuqut.
46003002	Kukragnangunaan apeghtuqaqamsi. Katam tawaten mamaghhaghmeng meghesleghhiistun pikaqamsi. Neqepigmeng neghestepagningitkaqamsi qayughllak neqepigtughpagningilnguusi salin. Paninang maaten neqepigtughpagningitaqusi, qayughllak ugpeqaanghilngughestun ayuqusi salin. Liigikestengngwaaghsi ugpelleghpesi anglinghitellgha aqinalleghpesigunllu aghivatelleghpesigunllu. Ugpeqaanghilngughestun kiyaghtengnguusi.
46003004	Nalighsi pineghmini, “Whanga Paul-em maligsaaghtekaanga,” ilasillu pineghmeggni, “Whanga Apollos-em maligsaaghtekaanga,” ugpeqaanghilngughestun piiqusi.
46003005	Kinangaawa Apollos? Kinanguzinga whanga? Qepghaghtekiinkung Kiyaghneghem, kayusiitkaqamsi ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a. Qepghaqalestaghhiinaagukung Ataneghem qelghutkaaneng.
46003006	Elpesi Kiyaghneghem piitesighaghvikiisi. Piitesighaghaqunga, Apollos-em meghqaqaa, iwernga Kiyaghneghem nagustaqaa.
46003007	Enkaangam kina alngunak piitesiighalghiillu meghqilghiillu ukavantuq. Kiyaghneghhiinaq aangeghllagtuq nagustikayuguuq.
46003008	Piitesiighaghtallu meghqistallu tawatelkutuk. Kiyaghneghem akileghtughyaghqaqaak qepghallghegkenkun.
46003009	Qepghalgutkutukung Kiyaghneghmun; elpesi Kiyaghneghem piitesiighaghvikiisi. Kiyaghneghem mangteghaqiisi.
46003010	Kiyaghneghem nangllegtalleq tagivaqaa atuqluku piinliqaqaqa qepghaqaq elpesini. Peghqinelghiistun tunemiqaqaqa mangteghaq ulimayaghqaq. Jesus Christ-anginaaguq tunemaq, alla saaghwakun tunemaghqiituq. Ilangita ulimavikngwaat qaayngakun. Qamaglluni piraamsiluni ulimali.
46003012	Ilangita atughlleqaat gold-a, silver-a, jewel-a, ilangita unaghsiq, paliqaq vegaaq, ungagaqlu tunemakun taaggun.
46003013	Sangwaa atuqegkaghput esghaghyaghqaqaghput ataasikaghtaamta qamagtengngwaaghluta aghneghmi tawani Christ-am nanqigtilleghqaani. Kenghem esghaghtesaghqaqaa qepghaqaghput natetulanga.
46003014	Sangwaa yugem atuqegkaa kumanghilkuni, akileghtusangyaghqaaguq.
46003015	Iwernga ilangan yugem qepghaqaa iflayaghqaaguq kumaquni, akileghtusangnaanghituqlu. Naqamenraq ellnga yugulillengyaghqaaguq, katam tawaten keneghmeng aanelghiistun.
46003016	Liisimakngwaaghaghsi Kiyaghneghem Temple-kiisi. Agleghnalghiik Taghneghakek kiyaghtengnguuk ilugpesini!
46003017	Kitum alngunak naafqegkagu Kiyaghneghem Temple-nga, Kiyaghneghem naafqesaghqaqaa ellnga, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Temple-nga agleghnalghiinguuq. Elpesi Temple-kiisi.
46003018	Kina alngunak puughtefqaami ellmineng pili. Nalighsi sumeghtaghaangukumi liitepagllakaaniluni nunam peghqinellghaneng, yeqay maliglligu Christ-a, ugpeqaanghilnguut temngingunighngaatgu. Tawaten pikuni elngaatall peghqinghughtepiiglleqaa.
46003019	Kiyaghneghmi nunam peghqinellgha temnginguuq. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Peghqinghet yuget nunami whani Kiyaghneghem pipagningiitestaqii ellngita katam peghqinellghitgun.”
46003020	Igaqegkaaguqlu, “Atanghem liisimakaa peghqinghem yugem sumeghtaghallgha sasiinghituq.”
46003021	Enkaangam kitum alngunak qukaayugutkesaghqaqenghitii sangwaat yuget piiqegkangit. Sangwaa qamaglluku Kiyaghneghem pinighqusighqaaghtestekaqaa elpesinun,
46003022	talwa Paul, Apollos, Peter-llu. Nunallu una, unguvalleqlu, tuqulleqlu, sangwaallu alngunak kiyaghtaalleghmelnguq maaten, sangwaallu alngunak kaasaghqaq, qamagtengngwaaghluki elpesi pikasi.
46003023	Enkaam elpesi Christ-am pikiisi, Christ-a Kiyaghneghem pikaa.
46004001	Sumeghtaghaatkitekut qepghaghtekniluta Christ-amun. Qepghaghtenguukut apeghtughilghiit ipapighqelleghmeng Kiyaghneghem apeghtuutkaaneng whangkunnun.
46004002	Christ-am qepghaghtengi ataasiighmesaghqaagut.
46004003	Whanga, ataasiighmennilunga qepghaghta pikufsinga, nalighmeng ataasiighmenneghinnilunga kitum alngunak pikanganga, sumeghtaghaatkennaanghitaqa. Talwa whangamneng nanqigsigatunga.
46004004	Nallukaqa sameng anaggusimatka, iwernga anaggutellghinnilunga pinghitunga. Atanghhiinaam nanqigsaghqaqaanga.
46004005	Enkaangam wiin nanqigtegpenaan kina alngunak sallghaneng. Atanghem taginqigtekumi kukegsaghqaqii yuget ilungit aliighqelluki sangwaat iighngayalghiit tesqamani. Aliighqesaghqaqii sangameng saaqutangi. Taagken usuqsaghqat tamaakut usuqellengyaghqaagut Kiyaghneghmeng.
46004006	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesi apalluqlusi Apollos-lu whangkutung usputaqnguukung. Usputaagukung elpesinun liitesqelluku una igaqnalghii sameng pisiitanga. “Qaatkaqiteki sangwaat igaqngalghiit Akuzitni Igaqekani.” Nalighhiinaghpesi aangaayugutkesaqunaan ataasiq yuuk, aallgha ugumikluku.
46004007	Kitum pinighataghaghtestisi ugpeqaalgutegpesineng? Sangwaa qamaglluku Kiyaghneghmeng pikaghsi. Kiyaghneghem tuunumakangisi, aangaayugtegpenasi. Ungipaghpenasi whaten, “Sangwa qamaglluku whangamneng pikaqaqa.”
46004008	Allgeghtengngwaaghumaaghsi aklukegkaghsi qamaglluku! Aklungighingwaaghlusi ayuqusi! Whangkungunasi umiilgughsimaasi! Umiilgulghiisituq, enkaam umiilgutilgusighnayaghamsi!
46004009	Sumeghtaghallemni Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaqiinkut apostle-eni ukalighpigaaluta yugneng. Anusimingllaghastun ayuqukut, tuqusaghqastun. Yuget qamagtengngwaaghluteng, yaqulgetlu esghapagaqiinkut.
46004010	Whangkuta nallungughtekaagukut Christ-a apalluqluku, iwernga elpesi sumeghpesini peghqinepiguusi ugpeqani. Yuget waakigatiinkut, iwernga sumeghpesini elpesi nagataqiisillu quulvaghaqiisillu, whangkuta pingigatiinkut.
46004011	Whavemun kenlanga neqangisagaqukut, meghyaghqiisagaqukut, aatkiisagaqukut. Yuget qevutkaqiinkut. Nengitukut, igleghtaagukut quunpeng.
46004012	Qepghaghaqukutlu qevuulluta maningnaluta kiyaghtaaghusighqameng. Seghlequulghiit whangkunneng pinitun aleghqughaqaput. Ugpeqaatemnneng amyuutkenghinkut akuzilgiigatukutlu akisigataputlu.
46004013	Iqlengiqutkenghinkut pinitun aleghqughaqaput tawaten pifqiita pisqelluki. Whavemun kenlanga sumeghtaghaatkaqiinkut sakwaaghestunllu sasiinghilngughestunllu.
46004014	Latangunghitunga kaynguyuggnalusi. Iwernga piniqepigllusi whanga katam taghnughhaqelghistun liilightughyugaqamsi kiyaghtaalleghqaghpesineng.
46004015	Qaywa apeghtughistetupigsaghngaaghpesi Christ-ameng, atatughllanghitusi. Ugpeqsuwhaghaqngafsigu Jesus Christ-a nagaqughluki Pinilghiit Ungipat, tawanita atastun lliiqanga elpesinun.
46004016	Enkaangam kiyaghtesupigtamsi whangamtun.
46004017	Tamaaken apalluqluku Timothy kayagtengngwaaqa elpesinun. Ighneqelghiistun ayuqaqa Ataneghqun. Ataasiighmelnguq ugpeqaq piniqepigtaqa. Neqangughhnaaghiisi naten whanga kiyaghtaqellemneng Christ-amun. Tawatelnguq kiyaghtaalleq apeghtuusaqaqaqa ugpeqanun tamanganilngughnun.
46004018	Ilasi aangaayugneghughtaqut, qayughllak sumeghmeggni laalighhnaanghinnilunga pikaqaatnga Corinth-mun.
46004019	Iwernga Atanghem piyukelqegkagu, elpesinun piyaghtungestaghtunga. Taagken liigikelleqanka aangaayugneghet aangaayugtelleghmegestun piyaghqaatangi.
46004020	Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullgha akuzitetgun ayuqenghituq iwernga aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun ayuquq.
46004021	Kaaskuma sasqesugestengnga? Anagutalighlungaa aghyuughlamsii, nalighmeng piniqlusi, pinitungwaaq pilamsii?
46005001	Nagaqughaqaqa nalighpesinguq atami nulighha nulighqelghiistun ayuqaa. Seghlepiglleghhiimeng seghleghqengnguuq talwa ugpeqaanghilnguut atuqesnayanghitaat taana seghleghqelleq.
46005002	Paninang yuukutkaqetsii elpesineng katam? Qivghughllagyaqlegestun! Elpesi iqisaqlegestun yuuk taana akulegpesineng.
46005003	Uyavanteghllagyaghngaaghma sumeghtaghaatkeghllawaaqa. Tawanlengughestun elpesini agghitkegkaqaqa naten pilleghqameng taana yuuk aatghakun Atanemta Jesus-em. Ugpeqani, allameng qerngughuskufsi, tawanlengughestun umyugaghmiklunga, aghtughyaghqanghillghakun Jesus Christ-am yuuk taana elpesinitestegpenaan allamengllu pinakesi. Tuuniteggu Tughneghagh-mun, piyukelleghmitun yugusii naafqelligu, enkaam taghneghakek yugulillengesqellukek Ataneq taginqigtekan.
46005006	Piniiyugtelleghsi seghleghuuq. Liisimakaghsi whaten pilleq, “Yeast-am ghhuughtesteghllakayuwaa akuutaq.”
46005007	Tamaaken apallukluku seghleghqellghet akulegpesinilnguut iqiteki. Tawaten pikufsi pelungillequsi akuutastun yeast-angilngughestun. Ipa pelungitusi qayughllak Christ-a Passover-em penniighaghaqaa aghqutkegkaaguq seghleghqellemnnun.
46005008	Katam Jews-et iqitellghistun yeast-at mangteghameggneng yataaghqutfagilgamegteggu Passover-em neqenghaghqellgha, tawateghpigaq seghleghqelleput iqilleqaput. Enkaangam pelungillequkut, ipapighqengngallequkutlu.
46005009	Ilangitgun latama ilatngasnanighamsi ugpeqanun anagngalghiikun atuqullghiinun.
46005010	Akuzitkengngunghitanka uum nunam yugi anagngalghiikun atuqullghiit, nalighmeng pakigneghet, wayaghniightet, nalighmeng tamaakut maniguutkayuget kiyaghnengllaqanun. Iqisukufsi tawatelngughneng yugneng nuna unisaghqaqaghsi.
46005011	Iwernga latamkun ilatesnaniqaqamsi tamaakunun ugpeqaalgutnguniluteng pilghiinun sex-kun seghleghqengngukata, nalighmeng pakigneghukata, maniguutkayugukata kiyaghnengllaqanun, seghlequughutngukata yulgutmeng, meghestengukata, wayaghniightengukatallu. Talwa neghelgusighpenaki tawatelnguut.
46005012	Whanga nanqigsaghqaqenghitanka ugpeqaanghilnguut; Kiyaghneghem nanqigsaghqaqii. Iwernga elpesi nanqigsaghqaqsaghasi ugpeqaalgutesi. Akuzitet Igaqegkat piit, “Seghleghqesta iqiteggu akulegpesineng.”
46006001	Nalighsi aaghtiiraaneghmini ugpeqaalgutmineng, sangan aglaataqagu nanqigtivigmun? Kaynguyugigatsii ugpeqaanghilngughnun nanqigtesneghpesini elpesi ugpeqani? Ugpeqat ugpeqaalgutmeggnun taklaghutesaghqaayaghtut aaghtiiraaghutelleghmeggneng.
46006002	Liisimakenghistegguu Kiyaghneghem yugan nanqigsaghqii ugpeqaanghilnguut ilangani aghneghem? Nanqigsaghqaqngukufsiki, naten piyaqnaghtutkalleqeftat elpesinun nanqigtelleghqii piyaqniilnguut?
46006003	Liisimakenghistekii nanqigsaghqaqekeput yaqulget? Enkaam taklaghqullghet aaghtiraaghutelleghneng whani unguvalleghmi piyaqniisaghqaayaghtut.
46006004	Aaghtiiraaghunneghpesini sangafsingam ugpeqaanghilngughnun piiqetsi nanqigtesqellusi?
46006005	Kayngunaghhaghmeng elpesi! Liisimakaqa akulegpesini liisimalghiimeng taklaghutistekaghqalguut ugpeqaalgutet aaghtiiraaghullghiit.
46006006	Yeghlegi ugpeqam ugpeqaalgutni aglaataqaa ugpeqaanghilngughnun nanqigtistenun, agghitkesqelluki aaghtiiraaghutelletek.
46006007	Tawatetelleghpesigun ugpeqaanghilngughestun kiyaghtaaghuusi. Ugpeqaalgutesi aglaategpenaki nanqigtivigmun. Nepiighutaqiteki anagteghngiisi, puughteghngiisi.
46006008	Itupill elpesi katam ugpeqaalgutesi anagtaqasillu puughtaqasillu.
46006009	Ipapestaaq liisimaksaghqaqsaghaghsi seghletun pistet nekaghqiilnguut Ataneghpagullghani Kiyaghneghem. Puughtestegpenasi kitumun alngunak. Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghani nekaghqiitut: sex-kun seghleghqegkayuget, maniguutkayuget kiyaghnengllaqanun, gelgaghniightet, aghnaasit, yuget yulgutmeggneng atuqikayuget, aghnat aghnaalgutmeggneng atuqikayuget.
46006010	Tamaakutlu teglengalghiit, pakigneghet, meghestet, seghlequughtet yugneng, wayaghniightet, nekaghqiitut Ataneghpagullghani Kiyaghneghem.
46006011	Ilasi tawatesalghiit salin ugpeqillghilluteng Christ-ameng. Iwernga maaten Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka ughvughqegkaqiisi seghleghqelleghpesineng, aaftekaqiisi Kiyaghneghmun, seghleghqumangilngughestunllu lliightekaagusi qayughllak ugpeqilghiisi Ataneghqun Jesus Christ-akun.
46006012	Ilasi pikaagut, “Itagnaghtuq sangwaa piyukelqa piyaghngaamkun.” Iwernga whanga piimsi, ilangan salleghpesi kayuusiinnaanghitii ugpellesi. Aa, entaqun, “Itagnaghtuq sangwaa piyukelqa piyaghngaamkun.” Iwernga sumeghtaghaghyalghiinga seghleghmun ayghipagllagnayukama pinaanghitunga.
46006013	Kinallu pinayalghii, “Neqa ulimaaghuuq aqsaqumun, aqsaquq neqmun.” Aa, iwernga ilangani aghneghem Kiyaghneghem naafqesaghqaqaak qamagllukek aqsaquqlu neqallu. Yugusiq sex-kun seghleghqusighqaanghisaghtuq qayughllak yugusiq Ataneghmun pinguuq, Ataneq yugusimnnun pinguuq.
46006014	Ilangani aghneghem Kiyaghneghem makesaghqaqii yugusiput tuqulleghmeng aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun, tawateghpigaq maketelleghmitun Ataneq Jesus Christ-a tuqulleghmeng.
46006015	Liisimakenghistegguu yugusisi nalighneqegkangi Christ-am yugusiin? Yugusiqa Christ-am piliitkaa atuqnaaghsikuun aghnamun akikikayugmeng yugusimineng? Nakaa! Pinaanghitaqa.
46006016	Neqamikluku, yugem atuqegkumigu aghnaq akikilghii yugusimineng ataasiightekayugek yugusiik. Qayughllak igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Maalghuk yugusik ataasighsaghqaaguk.”
46006017	Iwernga Ataneghmun lliiquvek, ataasiigutek taghneghakun.
46006018	Liisimakenghistegguu yugusisi Kiyaghneghem Temple-kegkangi, Agleghnalghiim Taghneghagkenka kiyaghfigi? Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghaghmineng, enkaam maaten Kiyaghneghem piliitkaqiisi. Elpesineng pikenghitusi. Tamaaken apalluqluku sex-kun seghleghqegpenasi. Sex-kun seghleghqegkufsi, nukeggnaghqelghiistun Kiyaghneghem Temple-nga pilleqaghsi. Ilangi seghleghqellghet tawatenneghitut. Kiyaghneghem tukfiqaqiisi akitupiglluku. Tamaaken apalluqluku quulvaghteggu Kiyaghneq yugusighpesigun.
46007001	Aaptekaqaghpesinga nengughutelleghmeng latagpesigun. Ukusta kiimsiitenka. Pinightuq yuuk nuliingunani.
46007002	Iwernga yuuk tamaghhaghmi nuliilguyaghqaaguq, aghnaq tamaghhaghmi ugilguyaghqaaguq, qayughllak nanghiiqullengnayukafsi sex-kun seghleghqelleghmun.
46007003	Yugem efqughsaghqaqaa nuliini. Tawategghpigaq aghnam efqusaghqaqaa ugini atuqutelleghmegni.
46007004	Aghnam ellnginaghmi yugusini pikenghitaa, uginganllu pikaa. Tawateghpigaq yugem ellnginaghmi yugusini pikenghitaa, nulighhanllu pikaa.
46007005	Nengughsimakufsi ighsakutegpenasi. Wetkuqun itagnaqullusi atuqusaghqaafqaafsi qafsinat unuget yughaghataghaghnalusi. Taagken atuqunneqiglleghhaasi nanghiiqullengnayukafsi Tughneghagh-meng qayughllak nuqesaghqaananiqaalghiisi.
46007006	Qelghunghitamsi nulightiisqellusi nalighmeng ugiighesqellusi. Iwernga piyukufsi pilghaasi.
46007007	Whangamtuntuq nulightufqaafsi, aghnanillu ugiifqaafsi. Iwernga allakutukut. Kiyaghneghem nuliilgustekayugii ilangi yuget, ugilgustekayugii ilangi aghnat. Iwernga itagnaghtestekayugii ilangi yuget nuliingunaki, aghnatlu ugingunaki. Kiyaghneghem allakullghii tunusaq tuunegkayuwaa yugnunllu aghnanunllu.
46007008	Unata pikegka nulightuumangilngughnun, ugiighumangilngughnunllu, ugingighanunllu: Pinighnayaghtusi nulightunghisaqufsi whangamtun, aghnanillu ugiinghisaqufsi.
46007009	Iwernga yuuk pinighataghaghnayaghtuq nulightughluni nuqetepagningilnguq aghnaghyulleghmineng. Aghnaqlu pinighataghaghnayaghtuq ugiighluni nuqetepagnengilnguq yugyulleghmineng. Pinighataghaghnayaghtusi nengughllusi nanghiiqullengelleghqaghpesineng seghleghqelleghmun sex-kun.
46007010	Ukut akuzitet whangamneng pingunghitut, qelghusaagut Ataneghmeng nengughtekanun. Aghnaq iqisaghqaanghituq ugimineng.
46007011	Iwernga iqiskumi, allaneng ugiighyaghqaanghituq nalighmeng ugiminun lliinqiglli. Yugemllu iqitesaghqaqenghitaa nuliini.
46007012	Una qelghusaq whangamneng pinguuq ilangitnun. (Atanghem sameng piighsimangitaa.) Yuuk ugpeqaq ugpeqaanghilngughmeng nuliilgukumi ellminisulghiimeng, iqitesneghilligu.
46007013	Aghnaqlu ugpeqaq ugpeqaanghilngughmeng ugilgukumi ellminisulghiimeng, iqinneghilli.
46007014	Inqun yuuk ugpeqaanghilnguq aaftengngwaaqaaguq Kiyaghneghmun qayughllak nulighha ugpeqaalghii. Aghnaqlu ugpeqaanghilnguq aaftengngwaaqaaguq Kiyaghneghmun qayughllak uginga ugpeqaalghii. Tamaaken apalluqluku taghnughhiit pelungitutlu aaftengngwaaqaagutlu.
46007015	Iwernga naliq ugpeqaanghilnguq iqisukumi, iqilli. Taagken ugpeqaq yuuk nalighmeng aghnaq itemli tawatelngughmeng nengughtelleghmineng. Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellusi kiyaghtesqesugaqiisi.
46007016	Ugpeqami aghnami, ugigpeniskuvek kayusiitaqsaaghan yugulilleghmun. Nalighmeng ugpeqami yugmi, nuliighpeniskuvek kayusiitaqsaaghan yugulilleghmun.
46007017	Kiyaghneghem ataasikaghtaghpesi ugpeqistaqngisi Christ-ameng, nengughtekaatsii nalighmeng nengughsimangitsii? Circumcise-ekaatsii nalighmeng pimangitsii? Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghetsii nalighmeng qepghaghtelaaghunghitetsii? Almesiqlusi tawaten nagneghtek qayughllak Atanghem tawatetestekaqiisi. Qamaglluki ugpeqat taagken apeghtughaqanka.
46007018	Yuuk circumcise-ekaq ugpeghaqngami, allangughtefqaami pilghaaq. Circumcise-emangilnguqlu ugpeqaq, circumcise-enaqefqaami pilghaaq.
46007019	Circumcise-elleqlu circumcise-enghitelleqlu pitngunghituk. Pitnguyaghqaqta taana qaatkelluki Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii.
46007020	Ataasikaghtaghpesi ugpeqiiqngafsi, natetelleghpesistun almesiqiteggu.
46007021	Qepghaghtelaaghuyaghsiin Kiyaghneghem tuqlughaqngaten? Sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan. Iwernga qepghaghtelaaghunanighnaqngukuvek, saaqsin legan tawaten pilghaaten.
46007022	Qepghaghtelaaq nakmikegkaa Atanghem, ellngan itemngalghiikaa. Tawateghpigaq qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguq yuuk nakmikegkaa Christ-am, ellngan qepghaghtelaaqaa.
46007023	Kiyaghneghem tukfighpakaqiisi, enkaam qepghaghtelaaghughtegpenasi yugnun.
46007024	Ugpeqaalgutemni, tamaghhaghpesi aghuliisaghqaagusi ilatngalleghpesigun Kiyaghneghmun almesiqlusi tawaten tuqlullghatun.
46007025	Aaptaqaghpesinga naten sumeghtaghaatkaqutangi ugiighumangilnguutlu nulightuumangilnguutlu. Atanghem ungipaasimangitaanga Liilightuusameng tamaakunun yugnun, iwernga ungipaannaqamsi sumeghtaghallemneng. Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghakun apostle-ngughtekaagunga. Tamaaken apalluqluku neghyuknakefsinga.
46007026	Seghleliighllagughtuq nuna maaten. Sumemni whanga itagnaghyaghqaaguq yuuk almesiqluni.
46007027	Nulightuumaziin? Iqitestegpenaan nulighhen. Nulightuumangilkuvek, nulightughnaqegpenang.
46007028	Iwernga nulightuquvek seghleghqengngunghituten. Ugiighumangilnguq ugiiqumi, seghleghqengngunghituq. Iwernga nulightuqufsi, aghnatlu ugiiqumeng piyaqliighataghaghyaghqaagusi whani kiyaghtaalleghmi. Piyaqliightesunghitepigtamsi tawaten.
46007029	Ugpeqaalgutemni, unata pikegka: Ataneghput tagiyaghtungestaghtuq. Taana apalluqluku nengughtekat qepghaallitgu Ataneq nengughsimangilngughestun.
46007030	Qivghulghiitlu qepghaallitgu qivghunghilngughestun. Quyangalghiitlu qepghaallitgu quyanghilngughestun. Tamaakutlu tukfightughllakayuget qepghaallitgu avangilngughestun.
46007031	Kiyaghtengngulusi nunami whani, megnukataghaghpenaan nunam sanqutanga. Qayughllak nuna almesiqluni aviighusaghqaaguq.
46007032	Kiyaghtaalleghmengtuq whaken sumeghtaghaatkegkiilnguusi. Nulightuumangilnguq qepghalleghqaghtaaghatuq Atanghem qepghaqaaneng qayughllak efqughsugaqegkanga.
46007033	Nuliilek qepghaghataghaqayuquuq kiyaghtaallghem qepghaqaaneng qayughllak efqughsugaqegkanga nuliini. Enkaam sumeghtaghallgha malghughqengngaaquq.
46007034	Tawateghpigaq aghnatlu ayuqut. Aghnat ugingiitkat, ugiighumangilnguutlu qepghalleghqaghtaaghatut Atanghem qepghaqaaneng, qayughllak yugusitengllu taghneghatengllu tuunyugaqiit iinguniita Ataneghmun. Iwernga ugilek qepghaghataghaqayuguuq kiyaghtaallghem qepghaqaaneng qayughllak efqughsugaqegkanga ugini. Ellnganllu sumeghtaghallgha malghughqengngaaq.
46007035	Tawaten piimsi kayusiinnalusi. Nengughtesnaninghitamsi. Iwernga nakmikesugaqa pinilleghpigaq elpesinun qepghaatesqelluku Ataneq uglafqusingunasi.
46007036	Nuliighqalgem atuqsugyaguskumigu nuliighqani, nengughllik. Enkaam nengughtekumek seghleghqengngunaanghituk.
46007037	Iwernga yugem liisimakngwaaqumigu naten pilleghqani, nuqetutngukumigullu atuqsulleghmineng nuliighqani, pinitun pinguuq. Kitum alngunak nulightiisqughaanghilkumigu, nulightughyunghilkumi pinitun pinguuq.
46007038	Nuliighqalek nengughlluni pinitun pinguuq, iwernga nuliighqalek nengughhneghilkumi pinighataghatun pinguuq.
46007039	Aghnaq allaneng ugiighyaghqaanghituq ugini kiyaghlluku. Iwernga ugini tuqukan, piyukelleghmineng ugiighyaghngaaghmi itagnaghtuq, taawanginaq ugpeqaghhiinaghmeng.
46007040	Iwernga quyangaaghataghaghyaghqaaguq ugiinqiggneghilkuni. Taakusta sumeghtaghallghenka. Ugpeqaqa Kiyaghneghem Taghneghakek whangamnituk.
46008001	Kiimsighyuganka aapqughaallesi neqneng aghqutkegkaneng kiyaghnengllaqanun. Ipanguuq whaten pilleghsi, “Liisimallelguukut qamaglluta.” Tawatelnguq liisimalleq aangaayugtestikayuguuq, iwernga piniqellghem iknaqughtengngwaa ugpelleghput.
46008002	Yuuk pillguyugneq, esghaghhuta taana paninang liisaghqaghtuqaq.
46008003	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem piniqisteni whaten piyaghqaqii, “Whanga pikanka.”
46008004	Enkaam neghelleqestaa aghqutkegkameng kiyaghnengllaqanun? Liisimakaput kiyaghnengllaqat kiyaghneghunghitut. Ataasighhaaguq Kiyaghneq, alla kiyaghneghituq.
46008005	Ilangita yuget ugpeqaqaat kiyaghneghtuniluku, ataneghtuniluku qilaklu nunallu.
46008006	Iwernga whangkuta liisimakaghput ataasighhaaguq Kiyaghneq, ellnga Atanghuuq. Sangwaa qamaglluni ellnganeng pinguuq, kiyaghtengnguukut ellnganun. Liisimakaghputlu ataasighhaaguq Ataneq, Jesus Christ-anguuq. Ellngakun sangwaa qamaglluni ulimakaaguq, unguvanguukutlu ellngakun.
46008007	Ilangita ugpeqat nallukiit kiyaghnengllaqat kiyaghnepigunghitulangi. Tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeqaqiit neqet aghqutkaqniluki kiyaghnepignun. Enkaam neneghmeggni aghqutkegkameng sumeghtaghaghaqut, “Seghleghqunga.”
46008008	Iwernga neqa pitngunghituq. Kiyaghneghem usuqataghaghnaanghitiisi neghelleghpesigun neqmeng. Aghqutkegkameng neghenghilkumta sangwaa alngunak iflanaanghitaghput Kiyaghneghmeng ayuqelghii. Talwa negheghngaamta allgeghunnanghitukut ellnganeng.
46008009	Ugpeqaghllagni elpesi, piyukelleghpesistun piyaghqaalghiisi, liigikngategpesineng taana ipapighqelleq apeghtuusaqegkaqa. Iwernga kelengalusi kayaalnguut ugpellghit ayuqniighqegpenaki ellngita sumeghtaghallghitni anaggutngalghiimeng.
46008010	Naliita esghaqumiten neghumaluten kiyaghnengllaqat temple-ngitni, ellngallu neghyugyaaghtuq sumeghtaghalleghmini anaggutngayaghngaan.
46008011	Enkaam liisimalleghpek seghleghqestesaaghaa kayaalnguq ugpellgha iflasluku, ugpeqaalgutkan Christ-am tuqutkegkaa.
46008012	Enkaangam ayuqniighqegkufsiki sumeghtaghallghitni anaggutngalghiimeng, seghleghqellequsi ellngitnunllu Christ-amunllu.
46008013	Enkaam neghellemkun aghqutqegkameng seghleghqesnayukamkun ugpeqaalgutka, allamengllu neghnaanghitunga sameng tamaaken.
46009001	Itemngaanga, piyukellemtun piyaghqaagunga. Apostle-nguunga esghaatkaq Jesus-meng Atanemnneng. Qepghaatellemkun ellnga ugpeqaagusi elpesi.
46009002	Talwa ilangita apostle-epigunghinnighngaatnga elpesi liisimakaghpesinga apostle-epiiguunga Ataneghqun, qayughllak kiyaghtaalleghpesi Christ-amun kelguskanga.
46009003	Taakusta aapghaqegkenka seghleqistemnun.
46009004	Barnabas-lu whangkutung tungsighnaanghistuung neghyaghqamengllu meghyaghqamengllu elpesineng apeghtuqamtegneng?
46009005	Navek pinemtung kelqepagningitestegnekii ugpeqat nuliipung ilangistun apostle-et, Atanghem anglegutangistunllu, Peter-etunllu?
46009006	Barnabas-lu whangkutuung ellnginaghhaamtung qepghaasimanginaghyaghqaqestegneguu neqekaghqaghpung?
46009007	Pilluwaghtem tukfighyaghqaqenghitii saghyani pilluwaghtenilluni. Tawateghpigaq grapes-meng piitesiighaghtem neghegkayugii ilangi piitestekani. Penniighniightemllu penniighmi mamaan ilanga pikayugaa.
46009008	Taakut usputat yugem apeghtuusaqii, iwernga Kiyaghneghem Liilightusaanillu apeghtuusat tawatetut.
46009009	Igaqegkaaguq Liilightuusani, Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaakun Moses-mun: “Sugrugiitalighpenan ox-a wheat-et tutmaghtesneghpesiki qantiit sigiqesqelluki.” Kiyaghneghem sumeghmikenghitaguu ox-a?
46009010	Sangami Kiyaghneq tawaten pii? Ox-nginaghhaaq suumqaguu? Nakaa, whangkutallu suumqaqiinkut. Ipapestaaq whangkunnunllu igaqegkaaguq, qayughllak piitesighaghvigmeng yataaghqistenunllu saghnastenunllu neghyukegkayugaaput nengighqaput.
46009011	Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi piisaghqastun ayuqut. Whangkutung piitesighaghvikegkaqamsi, enkaam taghneghasi quyastekaagut. Tungsipaglleqestuung tungsighvikegkumsi aklukegkamtegneng?
46009012	Apeghtughistem ilangi elpesineng allgeghutngukata aklukegkameggneng, whangkutung wataqaaghaq piyaghqaghpigaayaghtukung. Yeghlegi qepghaghyukaagukung maningeregaghnalutung aklukegkamtegneng allgeghunnalutung. Ilangani manipagitaqukung. Talwa tamaani aapsugigatamsi akileghtiisqellutung. Unata apalluqa, kitumun alngunak whaten pisunghitukung, “Paul ungipaqiiquq Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng akileghtuusangepigesnaghnaluni.”
46009013	Liisimakasi Temple-em qepghaghtengi neghegkayuget neqmeng Temple-mun tuunegkameng. Aghqefigemllu qepghaghtengi nengiqayuguut aghqutkaghqameng.
46009014	Tawatetuq Atanghem qelghusaa: Ungipaghtetlu Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng aklukegkateng allgeghsaghqaqiit tamaakuneng ugpeqikaneng Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
46009015	Elpesineng sameng alngunak allgeghusigatunga pikaghqaqsaqemneng. Sumeghtaghaatkegpenanga sameng alngunak tungsighnilunga maaten. Quyaaqunga akileghtiisqigalnguunga elpesinun ungipaqinemni Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Ungipaqinaqnguunga akileghtuusiiteghngaaghma talwa paneghyaghngaaghma. Enkaam kitum alngunak pinaanghitaanga, “Paul ungipaqiiquq Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng akileghtuusangepigesnaghnaluni.”
46009016	Iwernga aangaayugusighqiitunga ungipaqinemni Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem qelqaqaanga ungipaqisqellunga. Seghleghwaaghunayaghtunga qaatkenghisaqumkun Kiyaghneq.
46009017	Nakmikegkaqsaqumkun una qepghaqaq whangamneng akileghtuusaghqalgunilunga pinayaghtunga, iwernga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqutanganeng piyaghqaqaqa akileghtuusiiteghngaaghma. Alla naten pilleghqiitunga.
46009018	Sangaawa akileghtuusaqa? Akileghtuusaqaqa una, quyapigtaqunga akileghtuusangunanga ungipaqinemni Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, qaywa akileghtughyaghqaqsaghngaaghpesinga.
46009019	Qepghaghtelaaghunghisaghngaaghma, whangamneng katam qepghaghtelaaghughtekaagunga kitumun alngunak, yugmun uglalghiimun ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a.
46009020	Jews-eninnemni kiyaghtaqunga ellngistun, ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a. Kiyaghhnemni Gentile-eni Liilightuusatgun kiyaghtaaghni, ellngistun kiyaghtaqunga liisimakeghngaamkun qaatkutellemkun Liilightuusatgun yugulillengyaghqaanghiteghngaaghma, ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a.
46009021	Gentile-eninnemni nallukilghiini Liilightuusaneng, ellngistun kiyaghtaqunga nallukelghiistun Liilightuusat, ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a. Qaatkengngunghinniluki pingunghitanka Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii, iwernga qaatkengngwaanka Christ-am Liilightuusii.
46009022	Kayaalngughni kiyaghhnemni ellngistun lliighaqunga, ugpeqesqelluku Christ-a. Enkaangam kinkustun alngunak kiyaghtaqunga natesaghngaata, naten alngunak yugulillengesqelluki.
46009023	Tawaten piiqunga nagaqiisqeqeghlluki Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, qayughllak quyastellengaqelghiingallu ugpeqenghatgu Christ-a.
46009024	Qamaglluteng ketanqustet sivuliiyukayuguut, iwernga ataasighhaq kayaalqiikayuguuq. Kiyaghtaalleghpesini Christ-amun, ketanqustestun kayaalqiinaqaqitek.
46009025	Ketanqustet ulapaqut yugusiteng iknaqughhnaluki qayughllak qaghpangyugaqelghiit avayameng ququngalegmeng. Tamaakut palighyaghqaagut. Iwernga qaghpa ugpeqat allgeghsaghqaat quunpekaghqaaguq.
46009026	Ketanqustestun taklaghruketun ketanqwaaqunga kaannalunga kenlemun. Nalighmeng tenglugtestun, tenglugpagaataghaqunga kayaalqiinalunga.
46009027	Ungipaqiiqunga naten kiyaghtelleghqameng Christ-amun. Whangallu kiyaghtengnguunga ellnganun enkaam yugusimnun qaatkestaqunga, luuraq pinghilkuma Kiyaghneghem iqinnayukanganga ellmineng.
46010001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, sumeghtaghaatkesqesuganka Jews-et, maligsaaghikat Moses-meng. Egypt-meng aghulaqaqngameng qamaglluteng maligtekaqaat qilawaaq, maghyaghqughilghii tuumkaghqiitgun. Kaasata Kavilngughmun Kelliimun, Kiyaghneghem pelleghtekaqegkanga meq aghviisqelluki yaywaaseng.
46010002	Qamaglluteng paaptaayekaalghiit qilawaaghqunllu Kavilngughqunllu Kelliikun maligsaaghtenguluteng Moses-mun.
46010003	Qamaglluteng neghegkaagut manna-meng,
46010004	meghegkaagut ataasimeng taagken meghmeng Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka tuunegkaaneng. Meghegkaqaat meq maaqegkaq uyghagmeng. Taam uyghagem maligsaaqaqegkangi Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenkun. Uyghak taana Christ-anguuq.
46010005	Tawaten Kiyaghneghem aflengakegkaqeghngiisteng, paninang allulluteng efqughsimangilkangat ellnga. Enkaam tumangani Kiyaghneghem tuqustaqluki yugusighqwaaghit mingitkaalghiit kilgaani.
46010006	Tamaana qamaglluni pillghat whangkunnun usputaaguq, kelengasaaghiinkut ellngistun piyukefqaan seghleq pisqelluku.
46010007	Manigughtengughtegpenasi kiyaghnengllaqanun ilangistun. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaaguq, “Yugetlu aghnatlu neghaqut, meghaqut taagken aghulaaqut.” Tawaten maniguutkaagut gold-meng ulimaaghmun kaawaghaghmun.
46010008	Seghleghqefqaamta sex-kun ilangistun. Allgeghnegha seghleghqellghita 23,000 yuuk tuqulaghaatkaaguq ataasimi aghneghmi.
46010009	Nanghiiqunaqefqaamteggu Atanghem nuqenneghtullgha pilteggu, ilangistun. Nemeghyat tuququqaqiit ilangi sivuneput qayughllak nanghiiqukaqegkangat Ataneq.
46010010	Akuzilgaghpenasi ilangistun. Yaqulgem tuqustikayugem tuququqaqii ilangi sivuneput qayughllak akuzilgaatkaqegkangat Kiyaghneq.
46010011	Qamaglluki tamaakut sivunemta atuqegkiit, usputaghqaakaagut whangkunnun. Igaqegkaagut kelengasaatnguluteng whangkunnun kiyaghlleghhiinun kingulighni aghneghni, ellngistun pifqaamta pisqelluta.
46010012	Enkaam kina alngunak sumeghmini pikumi ugpelleni aghuliinniluku, kelengali luuraq seghleghqesaaghtuq.
46010013	Qamaglluteng nanghiiqullesi allakaayagunghitut yugnun. Iwernga Kiyaghneq atasiighmetuq, nanghiiqulleghmun qaasghutesaghqaqenghitii iknaqellesi, iknaqellelitaqnaaghiisi nuqetusighqameng. Enkaam iqitaqellequsi taagken nanghiiqulleghmeng.
46010014	Piniqegkamni, maniguutegpenasi kiyaghnengllaqanun.
46010015	Aleghqughamsi sumeghnelgulusi, sumeghtaghaatkennakesi sameng pilqa.
46010016	Iyamsiqayagunnemteggu qayuusimelnguq wine-a Atanghem Neqenghaghqellghani, nengighaqukut Christ-am aawaneng. Iiggemnneng aavgughluku neqekrangllaq nenemteggu, nengighaqukut Christ-am yugusiineng.
46010017	Neqekrangllaq aavguqaaghngaaghmi ataasiiguq. Uglaghllagyaghngaamta, ataasimeng taagken neghaqukut. Enkaam kelgutaqaa nalighnequghniluta ataasimun yugusimun.
46010018	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtekiqun Israel-eghmiit; neneghmeggni aghqutkegkameng, ilataqut maniguullghiinun Kiyaghneghmun aghqefigegni.
46010019	Sumeghpesinii kiyaghnengllaqat kiyaghnepiwaat? Neqetlu aghqutkegkat kiyaghnengllaqanun, maniguusipiwaaqaat?
46010020	Nakaa! Nallukilghiit Kiyaghneghmeng aghqerraaghaqut tughneghaghnun, nakan Kiyaghneghmun. Ilatngastesunghitamsi tughneghaghnun.
46010021	Christ-amun piliitestekaakufsi tughneghaat maliggnaanghitasi. Tamaaken apalluqluku Atanghem qayuusiineng meghegkufsi, tughneghaatlu qayuusiitneng meghnaanghitusi. Tawateghpigaq Atanghem Neqenghaghqellghani neghegkayugukufsi neqekrangllameng Atanghem tipelegkeni, tughneghaatlu tipelngitni neghnaanghitusi neqmeng.
46010022	Whangkuta Christ-am piliitkiitni tughneghaat maliggnaqegkumteki, Kiyaghneq qungyaghtesleqaghput. Neqamikluku ellnga iknaqeghllagtuq whangkunneng.
46010023	Ilasi pikaagut, “Itagnaghtuq sangwaa piyukelqa piyaghngaamkun.” Iwernga whanga piimsi, ilangi sallesi pininghitut. Aa-a, entaqun, “Itagnaghtuq sangwaa piyukelqa piyaghngaamkun,” iwernga ilangan salleghpesi kayuusiinnaanghitii ugpellesi.
46010024	Kina alngunak ellnginaayugtefqaami piiqli, yeghlegi ilanillu sumeghtaghaatkaqluki.
46010025	Sangwaa alngunak kemekrak tukfiqaghsi estugaghmeng neghaqiteggu sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan aghqutkegkaatanga kiyaghnengllaqanun.
46010026	Qayughllak igaqegkaaguq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Nuna, sangwaatlu qamagtengngwaaghluki tawanlenguut Atanghem pikii.”
46010027	Ugpeqaanghilnguum neghyaghtiisqegkangisi piyukufsi pilghaasi. Sangwaa alngunak ketfaghtuqaat neghaqiteggu sumeghtaghaatkegpenaan aghqutkegkaatanga kiyaghnengllaqanun.
46010028	Iwernga kitum pikangisi, “Taana aghqutkegkaaguq kiyaghnengllaqanun,” neghegpenaan, ungipaatistegpesi ugpellgha kayaalisnayukafsigu, qayughllak ellngani anaggutngalghiinguuq. Entaqun sumeghtaghaghnayalghiisi, “Sangamatuq piyukellemtun piyaghqaanghisinga? Sangamatuq kitum ineghqughaghaqanga allatun sumeghtaghaqayugem whangamneng?
46010030	Iyamsiqayugvikegkumkun Kiyaghneq neghyaghqamneng, sangan'ngam kitum seghlequughlleqanga neghegkuma iyamsiqayugutkegkamneng?”
46010031	Enkaam qamaglluku salleghsi quulvaasiqaqiteggu Kiyaghneghmun, talwa neghellesillu meghellesillu.
46010032	Sagpenasi seghleghqestiyaghqameng Jews-enun, Gentile-enun, ugpeqanunllu.
46010033	Efqughhnaqutkaqanka yulgutenka sallemkun alngunak. Whanganginamnun pinilleghqaq pingigataqa, iwernga pinighqelleghqiitnunllu yulgutma piiqunga, uglalghii yugulillengesqelluku.
46011001	Enkaam whangamtun piiqitek, katam whanga maligtellemtun Christ-a.
46011002	Usuqamsi neqamikegkefsinga, atuqegkesillu apeghtuusanka.
46011003	Iwernga liigikesugamsi Christ-a naasquutinguuq tamaghhaanun yugnun, yuguuqlu naasquutilghii nuliighmineng.
46011004	Nasqughiitighluni yuuk yughaqumi nalighmeng ungipaqumi Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng yughaghvigmi, quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa naasquutilghi.
46011005	Enkaam aghnaq nasqughiitighpenani yughaqumi nalighmeng ungipaqumi Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng, quulvaghyaghqaqenghitaa naasquutilghii. Tawaten pikumi qigughwaaqastun meqesluni ayuqellequq.
46011006	Aghnaq nasqughiitighyunghilkumi, kepughli nuyiighulluni. Iwernga aghnani kayngunalghiinguuq qigulleqlu nuyiighullunillu kepulleq, enkaam nasqughiitighngali.
46011007	Yuuk nasqughiitighyaghqaanghituq maniguuskumi qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nangaghneghatun ulimaaghuuq, Kiyaghneghem aangellgha esghiisqelluku. Iwernga aghnaq ulimaaghuq yugem aangellgha esghiisqelluku.
46011008	Liisimakegkesi yuuk aghnameng ulimaaghunghilnguq, iwernga aghnaq yugmeng ulimaaghulghii.
46011009	Yuuk ulimaaghunghituqlu aghnamun iwernga aghnaq ulimaaghuuq yugmun.
46011010	Taana apalluqluku aghnaq nasqughiitighyaghqaaguq, enkaam yaqulget liigiklitgu yuuk aghnamun naasquutingutanga.
46011011	Iwernga neqamikiteggu Atanghem uspeqellgha, yugenkuk aghnaankuk aklukutngaak.
46011012	Aghnaqsuggaaq yugmeng ulimaaghughngaan, taagken kenlanga yuuk qamaglluni allgeqaaguq aghnameng, iwernga aghnatlu yugetlu qamaglluteng Kiyaghneghmeng pinguut.
46011013	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtegguqun: ipa anaggutngaa aghnam nasqughiitangunani yughallgha Kiyaghneghmun?
46011014	Yuget quunpeng ugpeqaqaat nuyiightekaghnguq yuuk ukavaghtaquq ellmineng,
46011015	iwernga aghnam nuyaghllani quulvaasiqaa. Nasqughiitaghqaaluni ellnganun pikaaguq.
46011016	Paninang kina aaghtiiraaghyugukumi nasqughiitameng, ungipaanneqigtaghllakun taanata apostle-eni apeghtuusaqaqegkefut, Kiyaghneghem yugan atuqaqaat apeghtuusaq naansaghngaaghmeng.
46011017	Whaken apeghtughyugamsi qerngughutaqelleghpesineng maniguutelleghmun. Usuqepagningitamsi qerngughutaqelleghpesinun qayughllak aqnighquutaghaghaqusi pinighqutegpenasi.
46011018	Ungipaataqaatnga qerngughunneghpesininguq ilasi aafqemeraaghutaqut, ataasistun pigpenateng. Ugpeqekestaghluku lliighaqa.
46011019	Entaqun aafquutelleghpesigun liigiksaghqaqasi nalisi ipa qaatkutngatangi Ataneghmun.
46011020	Enkaam qerngughunneghpesini Atanghem Neghestillghanun, neghyaghtuunghitaqaghsi.
46011021	Neghuunneghpesini tamaghhaghpesi neragkiighaqusi neqegpesineng, ilasi utaqagpenaki. Enkaam ilasi iyataghaqut, ilasi suumaqut.
46011022	Neghigatsii-i, meghigatsii-i negpesini? Nalighmeng ugumikestekii Kiyaghneghem yugi? Kayngusaghaatesnaqutkaqestekii avangilnguut? Sameng pilamsi? Usuqlamsii? Nakaa, usuqnaanghitamsi!
46011023	Sangwaa liitkaqa Ataneghmeng apeghtuusaqaqaqa elpesinun. Atanghem Jesus-em ighivgaghmi tawani uveghpagutelleghqamini tugukaa neqekrangllaq.
46011024	Iyamsiqayugviksamigu Kiyaghneq, aavgughluku, pikaq, “Una yugusiqaqa elpesinun pinguuq. Neghaqiteggu neqamikusiiluku whangamneng.”
46011025	Neneghmeng taaqsameng, tawateghpigaq tuguluku qayuusiq wine-eghraghaghmeng imalek, pikaq, “Una qayuusiq Kiyaghneghem nutaghaaguq akequsaa aamkun. Awen meghaqiteggu neqamikusiiluku whangamneng.”
46011026	Enkaam quunpeng neneghpesini taagken neqekrangllameng, meneghpesinillu taagken qayuusimeng, kelgutngwaaqaghsi Atanghem tuqullgha kenlanga alla tagilleghqaanun.
46011027	Kina alngunak temngi neghegkumi Atanghem neqekrangllaaneng, meghegkumillu Atanghem qayuusiineng, quulvaghnaanghitaa Atanghem yugusiillu aawallu.
46011028	Tamaaken apalluqluku sivukluni yugem avuteghqutkelliki seghleghqelleni alla piyaghqaafqiita pinaluki. Enkaam neghelghaaq neqekrangllameng, meghelghaaqlu qayuusimeng.
46011029	Kina alngunak neghelghii neqekrangllameng, meghelghiillu qayuusimeng, Atanghem yugusii liigiknaqegpenaan sameng pisiitanga nanqigtellengyaghqaaquq Ataneghmeng.
46011030	Taana apalluqluku uglaghtusi kayaalngughnillu qinuyugngalghiinillu enkaam qafsinat tuqulaghaatkaagut.
46011031	Iwernga ipapighqelluta nanqigtekumta whangkunneng katam enkaam avuteghqutkegkumteki seghleghqelleput, Atanghem nanqiggnaanghitiinkut tawaten pikumta.
46011032	Iwernga Atanghem apeghtughyuneghminikut naten kiyaghtelleghqameng, nanqigtaqiinkut. Aghyuughyaghqaafqaamta pinaluta nanqigtikumi ugpeqingigalngughneng.
46011033	Enkaam ugpeqaalgutemni qerngughunneghpesini neghnalusi Atanghem Neqenghaghqellghaneng neghekestaghpenasi, utaqatutaqlusi.
46011034	Iyatalghiit tamaakut nemeggni neghlit enkaangam Atanghem nanqiggneghilliki. Aglaquma elpesinun ilangi aaptekasi kiimsighnaaghanka.
46012001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liitesugamsi Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tunusaaneng.
46012002	Neqamikaghsi salin ugpellghillusi maniguutestaataqaqegkangisi kiyaghnengllaqanun akuzingigalngughnun. Aaghqutaqestekaalghiisi.
46012003	Tamaaken apalluqluku liigikesugamsi kina alngunak whaten pilghii, “Jesus seghleghuuq,” Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham akuzistengngunghitaa tawaten. Iwernga kina alngunak whaten pilghii, “Jesus Atanghuuq,” Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham akuzistengngwaa tawaten.
46012004	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tunusii allaghhiinaagut, iwernga tunusat qamaglluki taam ataasim Taghnegham tunusaqii.
46012005	Uglapigtuq allaaghhiinaq qepghaatilleghqaq ilamun, iwernga taana ataasiq Ataneq qepghaatellengaquq.
46012006	Uglaapigtuq allakullghii Kiyaghneghem qepghaqaa, iwernga taam ataasim Kiyaghneghem pistaqii whangkunnun.
46012007	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham liitestekayugaa aghtughyaghqaanghilleni ugpeqatgun tunusalitkamikun. Tunusat kitumun alngunak pinighqusighqaagut.
46012008	Taam ataasim Taghnegham yugem ilangi akuzistaqii peghqinelleghmikun, ilangi liisimalleghmikun.
46012009	Taam ataasim Taghnegham ugpeqillelitaghaqaqii ilangi yuget, ilangi aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaqii naallghutiyaghqaaluki aqnighneghneng.
46012010	Taghnegham tuunegkaqii ilangi yuget allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng. Ilangan yugem tugukliqaqaa ungipaqilleghqaq Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng. Ilangan yugem tugukliqaqaa liigikilleghqaq Agleghnalghiim Taghegham nalighmeng tughneghaat igleghutngutanga kina. Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham akuzistaqii ilangi yuget allaaghhiinakun ulukun. Enkaam ilangitnun mumighqughtestaqii akuzillghet.
46012011	Qamaglluteng tamaakut tunusat ataasikaghtaghhaghmeng taagken ataasigneng Taghneghagneng pinguut. Tuunyukani tamaakut naliitneng tunusaghqami tuunaqii.
46012012	Katam yugusiq ataasiq nalighneghtughllak, qamaglluteng nalighneghet yugusim pikegkangi. Qaywa uglaghngaaghmeng ataasiiguq yugusiq, Christ-allu tawatetuq.
46012013	Qamaglluki ugpeqat nalighnequghii Christ-am yugusiin. Ilaput Jews-nguut, ilangi Gentile-et, ilangi qepghaghtelaaghet, ilangi qepghaghtelaaghunghitut. Iwernga qamaglluta paaptaayekaagukut taaggun ataasikun Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun, Christ-amun yugusiliitesqelluta. Qamaglluta tugukliqaqagput ataasik Taghneghak.
46012014	Yugusiq ataasiinghituq nalighneq, nalighneghtupigtuq.
46012015	Itegat whaten pighngaaghmeng, “Iiggengunghilnguunga, yugusim pikenghitaanga.” Taaqnaanghitngwaaghtut yugusimenneghmeng.
46012016	Siguta whaten pighngaaghmi, “Iiyngunghitunga, yugusim pikenghitaanga.” Taaqnaanghitngwaaghtuq yugusimenneghmeng.
