46012017	Yugusiq iyeraaghinaayaqumi, naten'ngam nagaqughnayaghta? Nalighmeng siguteraaghinaayaqumi, naten'ngam naaghunnayaghta sapagnimeng?
46012018	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem ulimamangitii yugusiput tawatelluki. Nakmikegkamineng nalighnelightuqaqii.
46012019	Yugusiq ataasiiyaqumi nalighneq yugusiinayanghituq.
46012020	Ipapestaaq yugusiq nalighneghtupigtuq.
46012021	Tamaken apalluqluku iyem pinanghitii iigget, “Aklukenghitamsi.” Tawateghpigaq naasqum pinanghiti itegat, “Aklukenghitamsi.”
46012022	Ipapestaaq yugusimta natangi kayaatesugnilnguut megnunapigtut.
46012023	Yugusimta natangi sumemnni megnunapagilnguut, elngaatall aflengakaqaput. Yugusimta natangi esghaghtesugigalkeput pilugugngaaqaput,
46012024	ilangi tamaakut esghaghyaghngaaghmeng ayuqelghiit pilugugigataput. Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqngamigu yugusiq, megnunaghataghaghtestekaqii megnunapagitesugnilnguut.
46012025	Enkaam yugusiq qepghaqayuguuq qerngaghmi. Nalighneghem qamaglluteng aflengakaqiit ilateng tawatengwaaq.
46012026	Ataasiq aqninghani qamaglluteng aqniqayuguut. Ataasiq usuqellengenghani qamaglluteng quyakayuguut.
46012027	Qamagllusi ugpeqani Christ-am yugusiqiisi, nalighnequghiisi.
46012028	Kiyaghneghem ugpeqanun nakmikegkaqii sivukluki Apostle-et aangelleghpigaaluki, tuunglighhii uuknaliqistet (ungipaqilghiit Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng) pingayii apeghtughistet, taagken allaaghlluwhaghtistet, tamaakutlu aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkat naallghutimun, kayusighiyaghqat ilameggneng, pinilghiit igleghutistet, tamaakutlu allaaghhiinaastun akuzikayuget. Kiyaghneghem tuunyukani tamaakut naliitneng tunusaghqami tuunaqii.
46012029	Qamagllusi Apostle-ngutsii, uuknaliqestengutsii, apeghtughistengutsii? Qamagllusi aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaatsii allaaghlluwhaghtisighqameng,
46012030	naallghutikayugutsii? Qamagllusi allaaghhiinaastun akuzikayugutsillu mumighquqayugutsillu allaaghhiinaghneng akuzilleghneng? Nakaa!
46012031	Iwernga piyukiteki aangataghalghiit Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tunusii. Whaa maaten apeghnaqaqa pinighataghalghii taakuneng.
46013001	Akuzikayuguyaghngaaghma yugetlu yaqulgetlu akuzillghistun, temngi tengngaagtaghllequnga nalighmeng lengaaghtaghllequnga piniqinghilkuma.
46013002	Uuknaliqegkayugughngaaghma, liigikegkayugughngaamki aliinneghilnguut qamaglluki, liisimalleq qamagtekaqsaghngaamkun, ugpeqillelgughngaaghma naayghanun nuugtisighqameng, pitngunaanghitunga piniqinghilkuma.
46013003	Tuunyaghngaamki qamaglluki sanka aklumalghiinun, nalighmeng paneghtesaghngaaghma ungipaqilqa Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng apalluqluku, allgeghunnaanghitunga piniqinghilkuma.
46013004	Piniqelleq nuqenneghtuuqlu, nangllegtaghtuqlu; piniqelleq aqinangituq, nalighmeng yamrrangituq, nalighmeng aangaayugneghituq.
46013005	Piniqelleq seghleghyugutngituq, nalighmeng ellnginaayugneghituq. Piniqelleq sagiqigatuq piyukelleghmitun pinaluni, qikeghqungigatuq, nalighmeng neqamikingigatuq anaggutelleghmeng.
46013006	Piniqellghem quyasiqigataa seghleq, yeghlegi quyasiqaqaa ipapilleq.
46013007	Piniqelleq ataasiighmetuq sangwa sayaghngaan. Iiwleng ugpeqingaaq, iiwleng neghyukingaaq, iiwleng nuqenneghtuuq.
46013008	Piniqelleq kenlengilnguq. Uuknaliqellghet kenletghuusaghqaagut; allastun akuzillghet taaqsaghqaagut; liisimalleq kenletghuusaghqaaguq.
46013009	Qayughllak tunusagput liisimalleqlu uuknaliqelleqlu iighwinneghilnguuk.
46013010	Iwernga iighwilnguq kaaskan, qamaglluteng iighwinneghilnguut aviighughsaghqaagut.
46013011	Taghnughhaalunga akuzikayuguyaghtunga, sumeghtaghaqayuguyaghtunga, liigikegkayuguyaghtunga taghnughhaghestun, iwernga yugughsalghiinga taghnughhaghestun pinanightunga.
46013012	Liigikelleghput Kiyaghneghmeng iighwinneghituq, katam tawatetuq esghalghiistun taghneghaghquutelugkun. Qakuqaaqun liigikngwaaghyaghqaghput Kiyaghneq qayughllak esghaghlleqaghput gginasaghqughluku. Maaten liisimalqa iighwinneghituq. Ilangani aghneghem liisimalqa iighwighyaghqaaguq katam tawaten Kiyaghneghem liisimakngwaaqanganga iighwighma.
46013013	Enkaangam ukut pingayut kenletghuunnaanghitut: ugpelleq, sighimalleq, piniqelleq; iwernga piniqellghuuq angelleghpigaq.
46014001	Piniqellengyugataghaghyaghqaagusi pakiggulluku sameng tamaghhaaneng. Iwernga piyukitekillu Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tunusii, wata piyuksaghqaqaghsi ungipaqilleq Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng.
46014002	Yuuk akuzineghmini allastun ulustun aleghqughaqaa Kiyaghneq. Yuget aleghqiigatii qayughllak liigiknaaghitaat. Akuziiquq aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham yugem nallukegkaaneng.
46014003	Iwernga yuuk tunusalek ungipaqilleghmeng Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng akuzikayuguuq yugnun. Akuzitangi kayusighikayuguut, kayemikayuguut, ilutughsaghikayuguut yugnun.
46014004	Yuuk akuzikayuk allastun ulustun kayusiitkayuguuq ellmineng katam, iwernga yuuk ungipaqikayuk Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng kayusighikayuguuq ugpeqaneng.
46014005	Qamagllusi piyukaqsaghamsi akuzisqellusi allastun ulustun, iwernga wataqaaghaqtuq tunusalgulghiisi ungipaqsaghqaaluki Kiyaghneghem ungipii. Tamaakut ungipaqikayuget aangataghaghtut akuzikayugneng allastun ulustun. Akuzikayuget allastun ulustun mumighqughtelguyaghqaagut kayusiitesqelluki ugpeqat.
46014006	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesinun pilunga aleghqughyaqumsi allastun ulustun liigiksaghqaqenghilkegpesigun naten'ngam kayusiinnayaghestemsi? Iwernga apeghtughyaqumsi Kiyaghneghem kelgutkaaneng whangamnun, nalighmeng ungipaasaqumsi sameng liitkamneng, nalighmeng uuknaliqutkesaqumkun Kiyaghneghem salleghqaa, nalighmeng apeghtughyaqumsi ipapighqelleghmeng elngaatall kayusiinnayaghamsi.
46014007	Flute-allu harp-allu seghletun qalghightekayek kitum alngunak liigiknaangitaa sangwaa ilagaan atughaqutanga.
46014008	Pilluwaghtem bugle-a qalghightekagu seghletun ilangita pilluwaghtet nallukelleqaat pilluwalleghqaghteng.
46014009	Tawateghpigaq akuzikufsi allastun ulustun, kitum alngunak liigiknaanghitiisi sameng piiqutsi. Akuzinghilngughestun piyaghqaagusi.
46014010	Uglapigtuq allaghhiinaq akuzilleq, atuqistengita liigikaqiit.
46014011	Iwernga liigikenghilkumkun yuuk akuzilghii allakun akuzilleghqun nakumiinguuq whangamni, enkaam whangallu nakumiingunga ellngani.
46014012	Enkaangam elpesi, tunusangyupigtekufsi Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tunusaaneng, tungsightek kayutkaghqameng ugpeqanun.
46014013	Tamaaken apalluqluku yuuk akuzikayuk allastun ulustun, yughaghli mumighqughyaghqaaluku sameng pilleni.
46014014	Yughaghyaquma allastun ulustun, taghneghagka yughaghllequk, iwernga umyugagma liigiknaanghitaak.
46014015	Sanaqsingangam? Yughaghllequnga taghneghamkun, yughaghllequngallu umyugamkun. Tawateghpigaq ilagaghllequnga taghneghamkun, ilagaghllequngallu umyugamkun.
46014016	Qayughllak taghneghagpegun usuqegkuvgu Kiyaghneq allastun ulustun, naten'ngam liigikigalnguum usuqilgusighlleqaten Kiyaghneghmun iyamsiqayulleghpeneng? Nallukaa sameng piiquten.
46014017	Yughallghen piniipigsaghngaan ilanga yugem kayusillengnaanghituq.
46014018	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneq akuziiqelghiinga allastun ulustun uglaghataghaghluku elpesineng.
46014019	Iwernga yughaghvigmennemni apeghtughiyugaqunga. Tamaaken apalluqluku apeghtughiiqunga qafsinkuuraghhaat akuzitet atuqluki liigiksaghqasi, akuzinaanghitunga allastun ulustun uglapiglluku liigiksaghqaqenghilkegpesineng.
46014020	Ugpeqaalgutemni, sumeghtaghaghpenasi taghnughhaghhaghestun. Sumeghtaghaghaqitek anglikastun, iwernga seghleghqesulleghsi taghnughhaghhaghestun ayuquq.
46014021	Liilightuusani igaqngaaq: “Kiyaghneq piiq, ‘Kayaglleqanka yuget allaneng nunaneng aleghqughyaghtiisqellusi ellngita katam ulungistun. Aleghqughlleqamsi qaanghitgun iwernga paninang nagannaanghitaghpesinga.’”
46014022	Enkaam tunusaa akuzillghem allastun ulustun ipapighqusiiguq ugpeqingigalngughnun, nakaan ugpeqikayugnun. Ungipaqilleq ugpeqilghiinun ayuquq, nakaan ugpeqingigalngughnun.
46014023	Enkaangam yughaghvigpesini ugpeqat qamaglluteng akuzisaqumeng allastun ulustun, ilangi yugem nalighmeng ugpeqaanghilnguut iitqumeng nallungughhnilleqiisi.
46014024	Iwernga ugpeqaanghilnguq nalighmeng liigikigalnguq yughaghvigpesinun iteghluni nagaskumisi ungipalghiisi Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng, nagalluni nanqigtengngwaaghllequq seghleghqestenguniluni.
46014025	Qamanlliqegkii aksaqngalghiit qayvighqellequt. Enkaam qungughlluni manigughlleqaa Kiyaghneq. Whaten pillequq, “Ipapestaaq, Kiyaghneq whaantuq elpesini.”
46014026	Ugpeqaalgutemni, unata apeghtuusaqnaqutkaqegkegka. Qerngughunneghpesini maniguunnalusi ilasi ilagaghaqnaaghtut, kina apeghtughiiqellequq, nalighmeng nalighsi ungipaghllequq Kiyaghneghem ungipaqesqegkaaneng, nalighmeng nalighsi akuzillequq allastun ulustun, nalighpesi mumighqughlleqii. Ugpeqat ugpellghitnun iknaqughusiilit qamaglluteng.
46014027	Yughaghvigmi kina akuzinaqngukumi allastun ulustun, maalghuk nalighmeng pingayut pilghaat, utaqaluki ilateng taaqelleghqiit. Kitumllu mumighqughnakangi sameng pillghit.
46014028	Iwernga mumighqughtengiskan akuzilghiimun allastun ulustun, akuzifqaami pilghaaq. Allastun ulustun akuziyukumi kavyuguutegpenani akuzilghaaq ellminunllu Kiyaghneghmunllu.
46014029	Uuknaliqistek maalghuk nalighmeng pingayut ungipangelghiit Kiyaghneghmeng akuzilit. Qamaglluteng nagallit, liigiklitgu ungipaq Kiyaghneghmeng pingutanga.
46014030	Iwernga kina ungipangegkan Kiyaghneghmeng, akuzilghii nepiighli, ungipangelghii akuzisqelluku.
46014031	Tawaten pikufsi qamaglluteng ungipaqiyaghqat Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng akuziiqellequt. Enkaam qamaglluni nagallghii, liilli, taagavenginaallenglillu.
46014032	Neqamikluki ungipaqikayuget Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng, aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkaagut akuzisighqameng, taaqusighqamengllu. Iiwleng aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut akuzisighqameng nalighmeng taaqusighqameng.
46014033	Kiyaghneghem alngunak pisugigatiinkut. Qerngughutelleput nekegmetesugaqii. Kiyaghneghem yugi qerngughunneghata,
46014034	aghnat akuzistenguyaghqaanghitut yughaghvigni. Akuziyaghqaanghitutlu igleghutistenguyaghqaanghitutlu qerngughutngalghiini, qayughllak Liilightusanillu igaqngaaq tawaten.
46014035	Aapqughaghyukumeng, ugiteng nemeggni aaplitki. Yughaghvigni aghnat akuzilleghqaat anaggutngaaq.
46014036	Elpesi Corinth-eghmiit ugpeqat aangaayugneghuusi. Sumeghpesinii Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi elpesineng pingwaat? Ellnginaghhaghpesinun apeghtuutkaawaat?
46014037	Kina alngunak sumeghmini uuknaliqistenguniluni pikumi, nalighmeng ugpeghllagumaniluni, liigikliki latatkegkanka elpesinun Ataneghem qelghusaqii.
46014038	Tuguklinghilkagu una apeghtuusaq, tuguklighpenaan ellnga.
46014039	Enkaangam ugpeqaalgutemni, ungipaghtenguyugaqitek Kiyaghneghem ungipaaneng, iwernga taaqestegpenaki akuzilghiit allastun ulustun.
46014040	Yughaghvigni sangwaa qamaglluku pinitungwaaq, tawatengwaaq piiqiteggu.
46015001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, neqangughsugamsi Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ungipaqegkamneng elpesinun. Tugukliqaqasi enkaam ugpellesi taaggun nekegngaat ayugilluteng.
46015002	Yugulillengegkaagusi ugpeqaqngafsiki Pinilghiit Ungipat, enkaam ugpequmanginaghteki aapqanka. Iwernga ugpeqnaniqufsiki, ugpellesi sasiinaanghitut.
46015003	Apeghtuqaqamsi apeghtuusaqegkameng whangamnun. Taakut ugpeqsaghqaqasi: Christ-am tuqutkegkaqii seghleghqelleput, katam Akuzitet Igaqegkat pinaqnillghistun.
46015004	Taagken lliifqaqaat, enkaam pingayaani aghneghem unguvaqaaguq Akuzitni Igaqegkani pinaqnillghistun.
46015005	Peter-em esghaqaqaa, taagken kingunganeng qamaglluteng qula maalghuk siipneqluku apostle-et esghaqaqaat.
46015006	Kingungitneng 500-neng uglalghiim maligsaaghtengita qerngaghllagmeng esghaqaqaat. Kiyang taakut unguvaat, ilangi tuqukaaghngaaghmeng.
46015007	Taagken James-em esghaqaqaa, enkaam kinguvaqun qamaglluteng apostle-et esghaqaqaat.
46015008	Kinguliilunga esghaqaqaqa, ugpeghyaghqaghpagningitkaaghngaaghma kitumi alngunak.
46015009	Ukalighpigaagunga apostle-eni, talwa atighyaghqaanghisaghtunga apostle-meng, qayughllak amyuqetaatqegkaqanka Kiyaghneghem yugi.
46015010	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghakun apostle-nguunga. Nangllegtallgha whangamnun avanginneghituq. Qepghaghataghaghtunga tamaghhiitneng apostle-et, iwernga whangamneng pingunghitaqa, Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghakun piiqunga.
46015011	Qepghaghataghalleghput ilamnneng megnuniituq. Megnunalghiita taana qamaglluta ungipaqegkaqaput elpesinun taakut ataasit Pinilghiit Ungipat, enkaam ugpeqegkaqasi.
46015012	Ugpeqngukesi Ungipaq ungipaqegkaghput: Christ-am unguvaghtellgha tuqulleghmeng. Sangamengam ilasi piiqat, “Tuqukat unguvaghnaanghitut?”
46015013	Kina alngunak unguvaghtesimangilkan, Christ-a paninang tuqunganayaghtuq.
46015014	Paninang tuqungakan ungipaghqiitukut, enkaam ugpeqsaghqiitusi.
46015015	Tuqukat unguvaghtesimangilkata tuqulleghmeng, Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtesimangitaa Christ-a. Enkaangam whangkuta apostle-eni qamaglluta iqlengiqestenguukut qayughllak pikaagukut, “Kiyaghneghem Christ-a unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng.”
46015016	Tuqukat unguvaghtesimangilkata, Christ-allu unguvaghtesimangituq.
46015017	Christ-a paninang tuqungakan ugpellesi sasiinghitut enkaam aghyullengellequsi seghleghqelleghpesinun.
46015018	Ugpeqistet Christ-akun tuqulaghaatkat qamaglluteng iflanayaghtut.
46015019	Neghyukilleghput Christ-akun whaninginaghhaq kiyaghtaallemnni atuukan, nangllegnalleghpigaayaghqaagukut yugni kitumeng alngunak.
46015020	Ipanguuq Christ-a unguvaqaaguq tuqulleghmeng, tamaaken apalluqluku liisimakngwaaghaghput whangkutallu unguvaghtesaghqaagukut ilangani aghneghem.
46015021	Tuqulleq allgeqaaguq ataasikun yugkun, Adam-kun. Tawateghpigaq unguvaghtestelleq tuqulleghmeng allgeqaaguq ilangakun yugkun, Christ-akun.
46015022	Adam-kun qamaglluni tuquyaghqaaguq, iwernga qamaglluteng Christ-amelnguut unguvaghtesaghqaagut tuqulleghmeng.
46015023	Qamaglluteng tuqulaghaatkat pilleghqateng kaanneghata unguvaghaqnaaghtut: Christ-a sivulighpigaaluni unguvaqaaguq. Taagken taginqigtekan tamaakut ellngan pingi unguvaghyaghqaagut.
46015024	Christ-a umiilguyaghqaaguq kenlanga kayaalqelleghminun qamagtengngwaaghluki aghtughyaghqaanghillghet qaatkusugigalnguut Kiyaghneghmun, tughneghaatlu igleghutistet, yugetlu igleghutistet ilalluki. Christ-a umiilguyaghqaaguq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem kayaalqellghanun qamagtengngwaaghluki Christ-am anguyagi. Kingulighpigaq anguyak tuqullghuuq Kiyaghneghem kayaalqesaghqaa. Christ-am tuunegkagu Ataneghpagulleq Kiyaghneghmun Atamun taagken kenla kaallequq. Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Kiyaghneghem sangwaa tamaghhaan itegaan asinganun lliightesaghqaqaa.” Whaten pisiiguq, Kiyaghneghem samun tamaghhaanun qaatkestesaghqaqaa Christ-a. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem qaatkusaghqaaghtestekumigu sangwaa tamaghhaan Christ-amun, qaatkusaghqaaghsaghqaanghituq, ellmineng katam. Tawaten pikan, taagken Ighneq ellmineng katam asiliighsaghqaaguq Kiyaghneghmeng. Elngaatall Kiyaghneghem sangwaa tamaghhaan igleghulleqaa.
46015029	Ilangi yuget paaptaayestaqut tuqukat apalluqluki. Tuqukat unguvaghsaghqaanghilkata tuqulleghmeng, sangamengam ilangi paaptaayestaqat tuqukat apalluqluki?
46015030	Liisimakaput tuqukat unguvaqaagut tuqulleghmeng. Enkaangam ungipaqinguukut Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng tuqunnaqsaghngiinkut aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
46015031	Ipanguuq tuqusaqleggiinaq ayuqaatnga aghhutanga tamaghhaan. Katam liisimakelleghpesistun quyakelqa ugpelleghsi anglilghii Christ Jesus-kun Atanemteggun. Tawateghpigaq ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghsi tuqusaqleggiinaq ayuqegkangatnga aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
46015032	Yuget Ephesus-melnguut pilluwaqanka teghikusastun ayuqut. Allgeghunnalunga whani kiyaghtellemni pilluwaqumki, sameng allgeghunnaanghitunga. Tuqullemta kingunganeng unguvaghyaghqaanghilkumta, “Neghelta, meghelta, qayughllak unaami tuqullequkut.”
46015033	Kitumun alngunak puughtestegpenasi ilakumtaangumakufsi seghletun pikayugmeng, atuqsagulleqaghsi sangwaa piiqegkangat.
46015034	Sumeghtaghaghaqlusi piniitun, seghleghqennanightek, ilasi akulegpesinilnguut apeghtuumangilnguugut Kiyaghneghmeng. Qayughllak elpesi ugpeqani kaynguyugyaghqaagusi.
46015035	Kina alngunak whaten pikan: “Naten tuqukat unguvaghtestaqat tuqulleghmeng? Natelngughmeng yugusilguyaghqaawat?”
46015036	Uyuq nalluuqaq! Piituta nunakun peghukuvgu tuquyaghqaaguq sivungani piitelleghqami.
46015037	Piitutmeng allanguluni angliiquq. Piitesiighaneghpeni, piitutesquvegaghhaq peghwaaqan nunakun, wheat-kaghqaq nalighmeng sanguyaghqaq.
46015038	Piitutesquvegaghhaq taana Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkamineng yugusilitaqaa. Allakullghiit piitutet allakullghiimeng yugusighqalguut.
46015039	Tawatelkutngwaaghunghitut yugusit. Yuget, teghikusat, qawaaget, iqalluget allakutut yugusiit.
46015040	Qilak yugusightuuq, nuna yugusightuuq. Yugusit qilagmelnguut ellmegestun pinighnaghtut. Yugusitlu nunamelnguut ellmegestun pinighnaghtut.
46015041	Siqineq, tanqiq, ighaleqetaaghetlu allakutut pinighnallghit. Talwa ighaleqetaaghet allakaqaghtaghmeng allakutut pinighnallghit.
46015042	Tawatesaghqaagut tuqukat unguvaghtestekata tuqulleghmeng: nunami yugusiput tuqaaqut, aghwaaqut, iwernga yugusighraghaput tuqunaanghitngwaaghtut.
46015043	Lliifqumeng nunamelnguut yugusiput seghleghughsaghqat kayaaliyaghqat, iwernga yugusiq unguvaghtestekumi pinighnaghyaghqaqlu iknaqsaghqaqlu.
46015044	Lliveneghmini yugusiq yugem pikaa. Iwernga yugusiq unguvaghtestekumi taghneghamnnun yugusiiyaghqaaguq. Yugusilgukata yuget yugusighqalguutlu taghneghaput.
46015045	Enkaam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaaguq, “Yuksuwhaaq Adam unguvalghiingughtekaaguq.” Iwernga kinguliq Adam unguvallelitikayuguuq taghneghaq, Christ-anguuq.
46015046	Sivukluta yugem yugusiineng yugusingaqukut, taagken taakwaningani Kiyaghneghem yugusilitaqii taghneghaput.
46015047	Yuksuwhaaq nunameng pinguuq, pagulanganeng nunam ulimaaghuuq, iwernga tuunglighhaa yuuk Christ-a, qilagmeng pinguuq.
46015048	Yuget kiyaghtekumeng nunami whani, yugusilguut Adam-em yugusiitun ayuqelghiimeng. Iwernga tamaakut qilagmi kiyaghsaghqat Christ-atun yugusilguyaghqaagut.
46015049	Adam-etun yugusilgullemtestun, ilangani aghneghem Christ-atun yugusilguyaghqaagukut.
46015050	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liitesugamsi yugusiput ukut kemekragmeng, aawmeng ulimaaghet, iteghnaanghitut Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem. Ilangani aghneghem ukut yugusiput tuquyaghqaagut. Unguvanaanghitut quunperugllak.
46015051	Ungipaataghllamsi qayvighsimangilngughmeng: qamaglluta tuqunaanghitukut, iwernga qamaglluta allangughsaghqaagukut,
46015052	sukatepiglluta qunqallellghestun kingulighpigaq qalghightaq nagaququmteggu. Tawani qalghightalleghmi ugpeqat qamaglluteng tuqulaghaatkat unguvaghtuusaghqaagut nutaghameng yugusilighluteng tuquyaghqaanghilngughmeng. Taagken whangkutallu paninang unguvalghiini nutaghameng yugusingaghaghtaallequkut.
46015053	Yugusiput pagulameng ulimaaghet allangughsaghqapestaaghuut naafqesaghqaanghilngughmeng. Ukut yugusiput tuqukayuget simighyaghqaagut yugusimeng tuquyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
46015054	Enkaam Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaq apeghiighllequq: “Tuqulleq naafquq; kayaalqiilleq iighwightuq!”
46015055	“Tuqu, kayaalqiillghen naagu? Tuqu, aghtughyaghqaanghillghen aqnighquusin whangkunnun naagu?”
46015056	Tuqullghem aghtughyaghqaanghilleni allgeghtaqaa seghleghqelleghmeng aqnighhnaluta, enkaam seghleghqellghem Liilightuusat aghtughyaghqaanghilqii.
46015057	Enkaangam iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput Kiyaghneq qayughllak kayaalqiistekaqiinkut Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun.
46015058	Enkaangam, piniqegkamni ugpeqaalgutemni, kayaalqiilleghqaghput ipapestaghutanganeng, ugpellesi aghuliitesluki, nuuggaghtafqaafsi, quunpeng qepghaghteggu Atanghem qepghaqaa. Liisimakaghsi Ataneghqun qepghalleghsi avanginneghituq.
46016001	Ukut esgha elpesinun qelghusanka manimeng tuunyaghqaghpesineng ugpeqanun Judea-melngughnun. Ungipaatellemtun Galatia-ghmiit ugpeqiit, elpesillu ellngistun pitek.
46016002	Sivulighpigaghmi Santillghem aghneghani qamagllusi aaftiiqitek manimeng allgeghneghpesineng. Tuunyaghqaghpesi angtalanga allgeghneghpesi angtalanganeng iikluku tuunyaghqaaguq. Enkaam elpesinun pikuma qerngughtifqaafsi manimeng pilghaasi.
46016003	Kaaskuma kayaglleqanka tamaakut nakmikegkasi latatgun aglaatesqelluku tunusaghsi Jerusalem-emun.
46016004	Sumeghtaghallemni whangallu pilleghqaqa pinighyaghqaakan, maliggnakangatnga.
46016005	Elpesinun laalighhnaqegkuma sivuklunga Macedonia-kun aagllequnga.
46016006	Entaqun elpesinitaghaqaghllequnga walluumllu uksulqusiq. Taagken navek pinaqegkuma yataaghqelgusiqaghnakefsinga.
46016007	Atanghem piyukelqegkagu maaten pikuma elpesinitaghaghyugaqunga, aagvikaghesnaghyunghitamsi.
46016008	Iwernga Ephesus-mellequnga kenlanga Pentecost-em aghneghanun,
46016009	qayughllak megnunalghii, aangelghii qepghalleghqaqa Ataneghmun piiqeftuq. Maanllequnga qaywa uglapiglleghhiim anguyaksaghngaatnga.
46016010	Timothy elpesinun pikan, elngaatall upughannakesi, qayughllak qepghaaguq Ataneghmun whangamtun.
46016011	Qamagllusi asitnginaaghpenaan, enkaam quyangaan kayaggnakesi whangamnun. Utaqaaqaqa maligulluku ugpeqaalgutnun.
46016012	Ungipaataghllamsi ugpeqaalgutemnneng Apollos-meng. Elngaatall qelqaqsaghaqa laalighfikesqellusi maliglluki ilangi ugpeqaalgutet. Iwernga maaten piyunghituq. Laalighfiknaaghiisi pilleghqangegkumi.
46016013	Kelengatek, ugpeqilleghpesini aghuliitek, ilututek, iknaqitek.
46016014	Piniqelleghqun piiqiteggu sangwaa tamaghhaan.
46016015	Ugpeqaalgutemni, liisimakasi Stephanas-enkut nengllugutkullghiit, ugpeqaqsuwhaaghulghiit Achaia-mi. Ataneghmun tuunegkaagut ellmeggneng, ugpeqat ilangi kayusiinnaluki.
46016016	Qelghamsi qaatkumanginiisqelluki liilightullghit tawatelnguut yuget, ilangillu qepghalgutangit.
46016017	Quyaanga Stephanas-enkut, Fortunatus-enkut, Achaicus-enkut kaallghiit qayughllak kayusiitngwaatnga aviilleghpesini.
46016018	Quyastengngwaatnga quyastelleghmegestun elpesi. Kayusiitillghitnun iyamsiqayugvikelleghpesineng liisimakestengngwaaghnakesi.
46016019	Ugpeqat Asia-melnguut suumqaqiisinguq. Aquila-nkuk Priscilla-nkuk suumqeghllagiisinguq Ataneghqun, qamagllutengllu ugpeqat qerngughutkayuget elkegkenka mangteghiitni.
46016020	Qamaglluteng ugpeqaalgutet whangamnilnguut suumqaqiisinguq. Quyakutaqitek naaghluki Kiyaghneghem piniqellghakun.
46016021	Whanga katam iiggemneng una igaqaqa: Suumqamsi. Paul.
46016022	Kitum alngunak piniqenghilkumigu Ataneq, naafqellelguuq. “Maranatha,” whaten pisiiguq, Ataneghput, tagi!
46016023	Nangllegtallgha Atanghem Jesus-em elpesinilli.
46016024	Piniqamsi qamagllusi Christ Jesus-kun. Amen.
47001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut, apostle-nganeng Christ Jesus-em Kiyaghneghem piyukellghakun, Timothy-mengllu pinguut ugpeqaalgutemnneng. Kiyaghneghem yugitnun qerngughutkayugnun yughaghvigani Corinth-em, tamaghhiitnunllu Kiyaghneghem yugitnun iingunaghhaani Achaia-m.
47001002	Yeqay Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am tuunlisi quyastelleghmengllu nekeggmelleghmengllu.
47001003	Usuqelteggu Kiyaghneq Atanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am, nangllegtapiglleghii Ata, Kiyaghneghmeng tagiiquq qamaglluni kayutkaghqaq!
47001004	Kayusighaqiinkut qamaglluta seghleliillemnni, enkaam whangkutallu kayusighyaqlegwaaput tamaakut allaaghhiinaghmeng seghleliilghiit, atuqluku ataasiq taana kayusilleq allgeghtekaghput Kiyaghneghmeng.
47001005	Katam ilatngallemtestun Christ-am uglaapiglleghhiinun ikfiqellghanun, enkaam Christ-akun ilatngallequkut Kiyaghneghem kayusilleghllaganun.
47001006	Ikfiqegkumta, kayusilleghpesinunllu yugulilleghpesinunllu pillghuuq; kayusillengegkumta taawa elpesillu kayusillengellequsi enkaam tuunellengellequsi nekeggmellelighlusi suflughsaghqaaluki tamaakut ataasit ikfiqellghet suflughtekaput.
47001007	Enkaam sighimakilleghput elpesinun aghuliituq; liisimakaghput taana katam ilatngalleghpesigun ikfiqellemnnun, elpesillu ilatngaasi kayusilleghmun allgeghtekamnnun.
47001008	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, nallukesunghitamsi seghleliilleghmeng nanghiiqamnneng Asia-mi. Elngaatall seghleghllaguuq uqigtupigtekaaguq, repall sighimananiqaagukut kiyaghtelleghqamnneng.
47001009	Ipapestaaq tuqunaqniluta piyaghtukut. Iwernga tawaten aneghtukut whangkunneng sighimakefqaamta pisqelluta, taawanginaghhaq Kiyaghneq sighimakesqelluku unguvaghtestikayuk tuqukaneng.
47001010	Elngaatall seghlepestaaghmeng tuqum tevneghaneng yuguliinkut, yugulilleqiinkutlu. Enkaam ellngakun sighimanguukut ellngan yugulilaataghlleqiinkut,
47001011	elpesi kayusiisimaluta yughalleghpesigun. Yughaatkilleghllagsi whangkunneng kiimsillengellequt, enkaam Kiyaghneghem quyasleqiinkut; uglapiglleghhiitlu iglagtughlluteng iyamsiqayugvikelleqaat whangkunneng.
47001012	Una esgha qukaayugusighput, sumeghtaghallemta ungipaatiinkut kiyaghtaalleghput whani nunami ipapighqengngaaqlu piniqingaaqlu, kiyang elpesinun. Tawaten piiqukut Kiyaghneghem piniqingalghiikun kayusillghakun, nakaan yugem peghqinellghakun.
47001013	Qamaglluteng lataput elpesinun piyaqniitut atightughyaghqaalutengllu liigiksaghqaalutengllu. Sighimakaqamsi liigikngwaaghesqelluku
47001014	sangwaa maaten liigikegkaghpesi nalighneghhiinaa, enkaam Aghneghani Atanghem Jesus-em elpesi qukaayugutkelleqaghpesikut katam whangkuta qukaayugutkellemtestun elpesi.
47001015	Qayughllak ipapighqutkegkaqaqa qamaglluku tamaana, sivuklunga elpesinun laalighhnalunga pikaayaghtunga, quyastellengnayukafsi malghughqengngaan.
47001016	Laalighfiksukaqamsi aglaatkelluku Macedonia-mun, uteghniitkellukullu tamaaken, kayutengnalunga elpesineng igleghalleghqamnun Judea-mun.
47001017	Sumeghpesinii tawaten qakiqniqellemni ataasiighneghisingaa? Sumeghpesinii qakiqniqelqa nunam yugatun ayuqaa, tawaninginaq piyaghqaq, “Aa-a,” “Nakaa?”
47001018	Ipapestaaq Kiyaghneq ataasiighmetuq, akequsaqa elpesinun “Aang'ghunghituqlu” “Nakaaghunghituqlu”.
47001019	Kiyaghneghem Ighnegha, Jesus Christ-a ungipaqegkaghput elpesinun Silas-lu Timothy-llu whangallu, “Aang'ghunghituqlu” “Nakaaghunghituqlu”; iwernga ellngani quunpeng “Aang'ghuuq”.
47001020	Ellnganguuq “Angelleq” tamaghhiitnun Kiyaghneghem akequsiitnun. Tamaaken apalluqluku whangkuta “Amen-aaghaqukut” ellngakun usuqnemteggu Kiyaghneq.
47001021	Kiyaghneghem ayepsugighsaghiinkut, maligulluta elpesinun Christ-akun; Kiyaghneghem ellngan katam aaftiinkut;
47001022	nalluniighiinkut ellminun pinguluta, tuunaaklu Taghneghagni ilumnnun nallangiisaalukek tamaghhaanun akequsaqegkaminun whangukunnun.
47001023	Tuqlughaqa Kiyaghneq liisimakistenguluku qayughllak liisimakegkanga qaamna iluka! Corinth-esugunghitunga seghleliighqesnayukamsi.
47001024	Igleghunnaqutkengngunghitaghput ugpeqilleghsi; qepghalgusighyugamsi quyamasqellusi, qayughllak aghuliitusi ugpeqilleghpesigun.
47002001	Taawa umyugagka ataasiighsimaagka alla elpesinun pikuma quyanghitesaghqaafqaafsi pinalusi.
47002002	Qayughllak quyanghitestekumsi kitumngam whanga qaqayugtesleqanga? Alla kitum pinaanghitanga iwerngaqun elpesi quyanghitestekama.
47002003	Tamaaken apalluqluku latakaqamsi qayughllak elpesinun piyunghilnguunga quyanghitesnayukafsinga, elpesi quyanghitesnayukafsinga, elpesi quyastistemni. Ipapighqutkengngwaaqa una, whanga quyanganemni taawa elpesillu qamagllusi quyangaaqusi.
47002004	Latakaagunga elpesinun elngaatall aangluku qivghullelighlunga qamagun ilumkun, qiyamaghma alla quyanghitestefqaafsi pinalusi taawanginaq liigikesqelluku piniqelleghllaka elpesinun.
47002005	Taana yuuk seghleghqelghii tawani, seghleghqenghituq whangamnun. Yeghlegi elpesinun seghleghqengnguuq iwernga nakaan tamaghhaghpesinun. Uniighmighsunghitaqa sameng pillemkun.
47002006	Tawatenginaq aghyuughilleghsi itagnaghtuq.
47002007	Maaten seghevullukung'ngam kayemiteggu wata iilqennayukan repall iilqayugllagnayukan.
47002008	Maniguututaqa elpesinun liigikestesqelluku ipapestaaq piniqniluku elpesinun.
47002009	Taana apalluqluku latakaqamsi: liisimaknaluku qaatkutngwaaqutsi samun tamaghhaanun.
47002010	Kina seghevunneghpisigu sameng elpesinun pillghaneng whangallu seghevutaqaqa. Sangwaa alngunak seghevusaghqaq seghevusugaqaqa elpesi apalluglusi Christ-a tawantepiglleghhiistun,
47002011	Tughneghaam aaghqutaqnayukanginkut qayughllak liisimakegkefut sangutanga yataaghqegkaa.
47002012	Kaasalghiinga Troas-mun ungipaqnaluku Pinilghii Ungipaa Christ-am, Atanghem pilleghqangestengngwaaghumakanganga.
47002013	Iwernga pengegllakaagunga qayughllak ugpeqaalgutka Titus aviilnguq tamaani. Enkaam unilluki aghulaqunga Macedonia-mun.
47002014	Iwernga iyamsiqanaghhalek Kiyaghneq! Iiwleng igleghutngwiinkut kayallqiingalleghqun Christ-akun. Kiyaghneghem whangkutgun mingitestengngwaa liisimalleni nani alngunak katam neqnilghiim tepengllaasim tepangan mingitellghatun.
47002015	Qayughllak whangkuta tepkegtastun neqnighsaasistun ayuqukut Christ-am aghqutkegkaatun Kiyaghneghmun. Tepevut mengitnguuq yugulikanunllu iflakanunllu.
47002016	Tamaakunun iflakanun tepkiinkut tuqullghem tuqutikayugem; iwernga yugulikanun tepkaa unguvallengestikayugem. Kinangam qepghaghyaghqaawa tawatelngughmeng qepghaqameng?
47002017	Uglapiglleghhiistun kinkustun ayuqenghitukut salin qepghaghyaghqaanghilngughestun tamaaken qepghaqameng. Pinilghiit ungipat piiqiit ilangistun qepghaqastun ayuqniluki allgeghutusighqat kiyaghtaaghusighqamun. Iwernga whangkuta ataasiighmelluta ipapighqelluta qepghaghaqukut; aapghaqaput ungipat Kiyaghneghem pisqellghatun, kayagtellghatun ungipaghtengulutallu qepghaghtengulutallu Christ-amun.
47003001	Whangkuta usuqesaayuggnaqlaataghestaa whangkunneng katam? Nalighmeng ilangistun aklukingustaa latameng aapghesqelluta elpesinun, nalighmeng elpesineng?
47003002	Elpesi, elpesi katam whangkuta latakamsi, igaqngaasi ilumteggun tamanganun liisimakesqellusillu atightiisqellusi.
47003003	Whateghlluwaaq latanguusi Christ-ameng pit whangkunnun tuyuqii. Latatkegkaanghitusi ink-akun nalighmeng lliivneqegtatgun uyghagteggun. Latatkegkaagusi yuget ilungitgun Taghneghagkenkun unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem.
47003004	Tawaten piikut qayughllak neghyullelguukut Kiyaghneghmi Christ-akun.
47003005	Whangkunneng pikninaanghitaghput qepghaghyaqleguniluku taana qepghaqaq. Kiyaghneghem piyaqlegughtestaqiinkut qepghaqamun.
47003006	Ellngan qepghaghyaqlegughtestiinkut nutaghamun akequsamun. Taana nutaghaq akequsaq igaqngalghiingunghituq liilightuusaq, iwernga Taghneghagneng ayuquq. Igaqngalghiim Liilightuusam tagitaa tuqulleq, iwernga Taghnegham tuunaa unguvalleq.
47003007	Liilightuusat igaqegkaagut uyghagteggun, enkaam Kiyaghneghem nighughqellgha aliiqaaguq Liilightuusat tuunaqngata. Moses-em gginaa kuukgutkaaguq taagken nighughqelleghmeng, qaywa gheveghngaan Israel-eghmiit esghaghpagningitkaat gginaa. Liilightuusat tuqustiyaghqaagut qayughllak yuget qaatkenghilkangit. Liilightuusat nighughqestighllagumakata,
47003008	natenmi angkaan qepghallgha Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka nighughqestiighataghaghlleqa!
47003009	Liilightuusaq nanqigtiyaghqaakan yugmeng aghyuughyaghqaaluki nighughqengngayaghtuq; anaggutellghinniluteng yuget pilghiit natenmi angkaan nighughqengngalleghtulleqat!
47003010	Tawaten pinguukut qayughllak nighugataghalghiingughtuq nighughqelleq maaten, taana nighughqengngayalghii sivunghani aviighusimaaq.
47003011	Nighughqellelguyaqan tawaten mulughraakameng, natenmi angkaan nighughqellegulleqa mulughllagyaghqameng quunperugllak!
47003012	Taana sighimakutemnneng tetugigatngwaaghtukut.
47003013	Moses-etun ayuqenghitukut, gginani saaputiqaa enkaam Israel-eghmiit esghaamangitaat nighugllak aviighullghii.
47003014	Umyugiit liigikepagningiitkaagut, whavemun kenlanga umyugiit saapngaat taagken ataasimeng saaputameng, atightuneghmegteki neghightat akequsat. Taana saaputaq iqisaghqaaguq Christ-anginaghhaghqun.
47003015	Talwa aghneghmi whani, atightuneghmegteki Liilightuusat Moses-mun tuunegkat, umyugiit saaputameng saapngaaqut.
47003016	Iwernga yuuk qiivneghmini Ataneghmun saaputaa iqitaquq.
47003017	Maaten Ataneq Taghneghaalghii, kina alngunak Atanghem Taghneghagkeneng pilgukumi, itemngallelguuq.
47003018	Qamagtengngwaaghluta saaputangunaki gginaput esghaghlleqaghput nighughqellgha Atanghem. Taana ataasiq nighughqelleq tagilghii Ataneghmeng Taghneghaaguq, allangughtiinkut ellngasugnightesqelluta aangataghaghluku nighughqelleghmeng.
47004001	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nangllegtalleghmikun qepghaqalitiinkut whaken qepghaghyaghqameng. Tamaaken apalluqluku iilqayugigatukut.
47004002	Ighsayagutkaqaput aksaqegkatlu kayngunalghiitlu. Puughsigataput yuget, allangughsigataputlu Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi. Whateghlluwaaqlu apeghtuusaqaqaput Kiyaghneghem ipapillghi, enkaangam yuget liilleqiinkut natelnguutfut esghaamanghani Kiyaghneghem.
47004003	Ungipaqegkaput Pinilghiit Ungipat saapngakata, saapngaat iflayaghqaghhiinaghnun.
47004004	Ellngita ugpeqigataat ungipaghput qayughllak Tughneghaam, uum nunam kiyaghneghan, ayaastekaqii umyugiit. Esghanghitestaqaa nighuga Pinilghiim Ungipam nighughqellghaneng Christ-am ayuqelghii. Christ-a Kiyaghneghtun ayuquq.
47004005	Whangkunneng katam ungipaqngunghitukut, itupill ungipaqngwaaghput Jesus Christ-a Atanghuniluku. Qepghaghtekaghpesikut Jesus apalluqluku.
47004006	Kiyaghneghuuq whaten pikaq, “Yeqay nighuk kuukgulli mamlelleghmeng!” Ellnganguuq ataasiq Kiyaghneq kuukgutestilghii nighugmeng ilumnnun. Taaggun nighugkun liitaghput nighughqellgha Kiyaghneghem, kuukgullghii Jesus Christ-am gginaaneng.
47004007	Iwernga whangkunnun Kiyaghneghem kanaghtekaqaa taana nighuk kuukgutesqelluku ilumnni. Whangkuta qikustun qantaghqastun ayuqukut, enkaam tamangan liigikelleqaat aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllak Kiyaghneghtaaniluku, whangkunneng pingunghinniluku.
47004008	Seghleliillengaqukut allaaghhiinatun iwernga kayaalqigatiinkut. Ilangakun kukragyullengaqukut iwernga sighimallghiisigatukut.
47004009	Amyuqetaatkellengaqukut, iwernga Kiyaghneghem unisigatiinkut; aqnighqwaallengaqukut, iwernga tuqungigatukut.
47004010	Iiwleng tuqullgha Jesus-em yugusimnnituq, esghiisqelluku unguvallgha Jesus-em yugusimnni.
47004011	Unguvanguluta iiwleng yakughnallghanitukut tuqullghem apalluqluku Jesus, esghiisqelluku Jesus-em unguvallgha yugusimnni tuqukayugni.
47004012	Enkaam whangkuta yakughnallghanitukut tuqullghem qayughllak qepghaatngukefut Kiyaghneq. Iwernga qepghallemta kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengestengngwiisi.
47004013	Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani, “Ugpeqaqa Kiyaghneq enkaam akuzitkaqaqa.” Ugpeqilleghput tawatetuq igaqestetun. Whangkutallu ugpeqaghput Kiyaghneq enkaam akuzitkaqaghput.
47004014	Liisimakaghput Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaqaa Ataneq Jesus. Whangkutallu unguvaghlleqiinkut Jesus-kun. Taagken aglaalleqiinkut qerngaamta elpesillu tawantelleghminun.
47004015	Qamaglluteng tamaakut apeghiiqat whangkunnun elpesinun ayuqut. Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghan nulasleqii yuget ugpeqilghiit Christ-akun. Enkaam iyamsiqayulleghllak Kiyaghneghmun nulallequq, quulvallengeghllagllequqlu.
47004016	Enkaam iilqayugigatukut. Qaywa yugusiput kayaalikestaghyaghngaata, taghneghaput nutaghtengnguut aghhutanga tamaghhaan.
47004017	Seghleliilleput sasqughhaagut muluyaghqaanghitut. Iwernga tamaakut yataaghqutngwiinkut allgeghtesqelluku Kiyaghneghmeng kenlengilnguq quyalleghllak. Enkaam seghleliilleput avangilngughestun ayuqut.
47004018	Sumeghtaghaatkumanginiigataput seghleliilleput. Itupill sumeghtaghaatkaqaput esghaghpagningilkeput. Qantaghaqun seghleliilleput kenletghuullequt, iwernga quyalleghput esghiigalkefut quunpekaghqaaguq.
47005001	Whani nunami ukut yugusiput kiyaghfiput tiintastun ayuqut. Liisimakaghput yugusiput tuqukata Kiyaghneq mangteghalguuq qilagmi whangkunnun kiyaghfigkameng. Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaa mangteghaq, yugem ulimaaqenghitaa. Taana mangteghaq quunpekaghqaaguq.
47005002	Ipa ngillegtukut nunametnguluta qayughllak kiyaghsupiglleghhiikut yugusighraghamnni qilagmi.
47005003	Aatkastun aalleqaput tamaakut yugusighraghaat amsikaghmenneghinnaluta.
47005004	Yugusiput tiintastun ayuqut. Tiintamelluta ngillegtaqukutlu, seghleliightukutlu qayughllak mataghsugigalkeput. Itupill simighyugaqaput yugusinun tuqungigalngughnun.
47005005	Kiyaghneghem yataaghqutkaqiinkut whavek allangughtelleghmun. Whangkunnunllu tuunegkaqaak Taghneghagni liisimakesqelluku allangughtelleghqaghput ipapestaaq apeghiighlleqniluku.
47005006	Enkaam iiwleng ilutaaqukut. Liisimakaghput nemetnguluta yugusimnni, Ataneghmesigatukut.
47005007	Kiyaghtengnguukut ugpeqilleghqun, nakaan esghaqayumteggun.
47005008	Enkaam ilutaaqukut. Unisugaqaput yugusiput nemennaluta Ataneghmi.
47005009	Nemesaghngaamta nalighmeng nemenneghiteghngaamta, efqughsugaqaghput Ataneq.
47005010	Qamaglluta nekevepestaaghyaghqaagukut Christ-am sivungakun nanqigtesqelluta. Ataasikaghtaamta allgeghullequkut pinilghiimeng nalighmeng seghleghmeng apeghiighutellemtestun yugusimteggun.
47005011	Enkaangam alikaqaghput Ataneq, tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeghtesnaqutkaqaput yuget Christ-akun. Kiyaghneghem liisimakiinkut natelnguutfut yugni, sunanguq elpesillu liisimakitekut tawatelluta.
47005012	Elpesinun tuguklightesnaqutkengngunghitukut allameng. Itupill ungipaataqamsi whangkunneng elpesinun qukaayugutkesqelluta. Taagken apeghyaqlegughlleqaghpesikut qukaayugutkilghiinun yugem qaastulnginaghhaaneng. Waakigataat sangutanga yugem ilumikegkaa.
47005013	Nallutuyiqngukumta, Kiyaghneghmun ayuquq, iwernga nallutuyiqngunghilkumta, elpesinun ayuquq.
47005014	Christ-am igleghutngwiinkut piniqelleghmikun. Liisimakngwaaghaghput yugem ataasim tuqumatkegkaqaa qamagtengngwaaghluku yuuk. Tamaaken apalluqluku qamagtengngwaaghluteng yuget tuqukaagut.
47005015	Christ-am tuqumatkegkaqii qamagtengngwaaghluki yuget. Enkaam kiyaghlleghhiit kiyaghsaqlegullequt ellnganun, nakaan ellmeggnun katam. Tuquluni unguvaghtekaaguq ellngit apalluqluki.
47005016	Whaken kenlekluku kina alngunak sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput nunam yugan sumeghtaghaatkellghatun. Qaywa ataasimeng sumeghtaghaatkegkaqaghput Christ-a nunam yugan pillghatun, tawaten sumeghtaghaatkennaniimaaghput.
47005017	Kina alngunak Christ-am piliinneghminigu nutaghaghllugughtaquq. Kiyaghtaalleluga aviighutaquq, iwernga nutaghaghlluk kiyaghtaallgha piinlighaquq.
47005018	Kiyaghneghuuq tawaten pikaq. Ellngan ilaliighutestekaqiinkut ellminun Christ-akun. Qepghaqalitiinkutlu ilangillu yuget ilaliighutesqelluki ellminun.
47005019	Christ-akun Kiyaghneghem ilaliighwii qamagtengngwaaghluki yuget, umyugaghmikegpenaki seghleghqellghit. Enkaangam ungipaghqalitkaqiinkut aapghesqelluki naten ellminun ilaliighutangi ellngit.
47005020	Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqiinkut ungipaghtenguluta Christ-amun, enkaam whangkutgun tagisqellusi ellminun. Akuzistenguukut Christ-amun kayemilghiit ilaliighutesqellusi Kiyaghneghmun.
47005021	Christ-a seghleghqumangitngwaaghtuq, iwernga seghleghqellemnnun Kiyaghneghem aghyuuqaqaa seghleghqegkaaluku. Enkaam Christ-akun Kiyaghneghem elqughutngangllaqaqiinkut.
47006001	Qepghalgutkututemnneng Kiyaghneqlu, taawa kayemamsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha tuguklighpenaan temngitwhanguluku.
47006002	Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Pilleghqaghlluwaaghmi nagaquqaqamken, aghneghani yugulillghem kayusiqaqamken.” Ungipaatamsi, maatenguuq Kiyaghneghem pilleghqaghlluwaagha; nagatek, maatenguuq aghnegha yugulighillghem!
47006003	Kiyaghtaallemteggun naagsaghanglliigataput yuget, seghlequufqaan pisqelluku qepghaqaghput Ataneghmun.
47006004	Iwernga sallemteggun tamaghhaakun liigikestaqukut yugnun Kiyaghneghmun qepghaghtekniluta. Tamaaken apalluqluku nuqetutimallemteggun suflughtaghaqaput seghleliillghet, piyaqliillghet, ikfiqellghet.
47006005	Qevutquqaagukut, anusimingllaqaagukut, uglaatellengegkaagukutlu. Ughleghiiqaagukut, qavalqumangitukut, iyataqaagukutlu.
47006006	Liigikestengnguukutlu Kiyaghneghmun qepghaghtekutfut pinitun kiyaghtaallemteggun, liisimakillemteggun, nuqetutillemteggun, nangllegtallemteggun, piniqipillemteggun, Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun.
47006007	Qepghaatngwaaghput Kiyaghneq ungipaqellemteggun ipapilleq. Atuqaqaghput Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha, elqughutngalleqlu guututkelluku aghenqignemnnunllu saghumignemnnunllu.
47006008	Quulvallengaqukutlu ukavaghllengaqukutlu; seghlequughsighaqukutlu usuqellengaqukutlu. Iqlengalghiinguniiqiinkut, iwernga akuziiqukut ipapigmeng.
47006009	Yuget nallukniqiinkut, naqamllu liisimakluta; uglaghngaan tuquvzighaqukut, iwernga paninang unguvaakut. Aghyuughyaghngiinkut, tuqusigatiinkut.
47006010	Qivghungughngaamta, naqamllu quyangaghllawaaqukut; aklumaghngaamta, naqamllu aklungighistaqaput yuget; avaqraggiiteghngaamta, naqamllu pilwaaqukut sameng tamaghhaaneng.
47006011	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, Corinth-eghmiini, ipapighqullusi ayuqamsi. Ungipaatamsi piniqepigtamsi.
47006012	Nuqneghusimangitamsi piniqellemnneng, iwernga elpesinguut nuqneghutikat piniqilleghpesineng whangkunnun.
47006013	Maaten aleghqughamsi avaqutaqepiglleghhiistun, piniqeqeghtikut katam whangkuta piniqellemtestun elpesi.
47006014	Inglukegpenaki ugpeqaanghilnguut. Elqughutngallghenkuk seghleghenkuk inglukutepagningituk. Nighugenkuklu mamlegenkuklu qerngaghmetepagningituk.
47006015	Christ-am itagnaqsaghqaqenghitngwaaghaa Tughneghaq. Ugpeqat piyukellghit allanguut ugpeqaanghilngughneng.
47006016	Kiyaghnengllaqat manigughyaghqaanghitut Kiyaghneghem Temple-ngani. Qayughllak whangkuta Temple-kiinkut unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem, Kiyaghneq pikaalghii, “Ellngitnillequngallu akulngitnillequngallu; Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga, ellngitlu yukelleqanka.”
47006017	“Tamaaken apalluqluku Ataneq pikaalghii, Uniteki tamaakut yuget, aaftek ellngitneng. Saaftegpenaki ukmanginneghilnguut; enkaam tuguklighlleqamsi.
47006018	Atakelleqaghpesinga, enkaam elpesi ighneqelleqamsillu panikelleqamsillu, piiq Ataneq Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq.”
47007001	Piniqegkamni ilakumtaamni, Kiyaghneq tamaakuneng akequsangllaqaatanganeng whangkunnun, ukmangighsaalteki allaaghhiinaat nukeggnii yugusimtallu taghneghamtallu. Pelungightengngwaaghelta qayughllak alikaghput Kiyaghneq.
47007002	Ilaliiqaghqut ilugpesigun. Kina alngunak anagngalghiimeng pingigataghput, ugpeqillgha naafqumangitaghput, talwa puughneqguusimangitaghput.
47007003	Ungipaatngunghitamsi tamaakuneng avutkennalusi. Sivunghani ungipaatkaqamsi piniqepiggnilusi, enkaam kiyaghtelgusighlleqamsi nalighmeng tuqulgusighlleqamsi.
47007004	Neghyukeghllaglusi ayuqamsi, qukaayugutkepigtamsi. Kayemeghllagaqaghpesinga. Enkaam seghleliilleghllamnni paninang tevughaaqunga quyalleghmeng.
47007005	Kaataqngamta Macedonia-mun, meghnaalipagningitkaagukut. Seghleliiqaagukut tamangani, yuget aaghtiiraaqaqiinkut, teggellghiiqaagukutlu.
47007006	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem ilutughsaghaqii iilqengngalghiit, enkaam ilutughsaghiinkut tagistelleghmikun Titus whangkunnun.
47007007	Ilutughtekaagukut tagiiqngan Titus, iwernga ilutughllengataghaghtukut ungipaasinkut elpesinun ilutughsaamaniluni. Ungipaatiinkut elpesinun esghaghyupiggnilunga, qivghuknilunga seghleliighqelleghpesineng, kayusighyupiggnilungallu. Tawaten pilleghpesi wanlegi quyasteghllagaanga.
47007008	Qaywa latamkun qivghusteghngaamsi, avuteghqutkengngunghitanka latanka. Sivukun avuteghqesaghtunga qayughllak latama qivghustaghtekangisi.
47007009	Quyangunghitunga latamnun qivghusimanilusi. Iwernga quyaghllaguunga qivghulleghpesi allangughtestekaqegkangi kiyaghtaallesi. Qivghulleghsi Kiyaghneghem atuqegkaqaa elpesinun, enkaam naten alngunak whangkuta aqnightellghitamsi.
47007010	Kiyaghneghem atuqaqaa qivghulleq yugnun avuteghqelluki seghleghqellghitneng, yugulillengesqelluki. Kitum alngunak avuteghqutkennaanghitaa yugulilleq. Iwernga qivghulleq nunameng pi tuqustiiquq.
47007011	Esghaqaghtegguqun sangutanga Kiyaghneghem apeghiiqaa qivghulleghpesigun. Qivghulleghpesi efqughutesugllagiisi Kiyaghneghmun. Elngaatall ipapighqennaqutkegkaayaghtusi anaggutellghinnilusi. Ugumiyagutkaqaghsi anaggutelleq, alingruuqaagusillu. Esghaghyupigtekaqaghpesinga, pinitun pikaagusi, aghyuuqaqaghsillu anaggutkaq. Tawaten pilleghpesigun ipapighqegkaagusi apalliinnilusi.
47007012	Enkaam qaywa tawaten latayaghngaamsi, apalluqngunghitaqa anaggutkaq, nalighmeng tawavek seghletun pikaanun. Itupill latakaqamsi liigikngwaaghesqellusi Kiyaghneghem esghaamanghani tuun'ngwaaghlusi whangkunnun ayuqelghiisi.
47007013	Tamaaken apalluqluku ilutughtengngaakut. Ilutughtengnginaghpenaamta, iwernga quyaaghataghaghtukut esghaghluku Titus-em quyamallgha. Qamagllusi sumeghyalingiitesimaaghsi.
47007014	Qanatkegkaqamsi Titus-mun efquqnilusi. Elpesinun piiqngami liitkaqii ipangutangi sameng pillghenka elpesineng ayuqelghiit, enkaam kaynguyagutellghitanka qanatkillghenka. Iiwleng ipapighqelluta aleghqughaqamsi. Tawateghpigaq ipanguut qanatkilleghput Titus-mun.
47007015	Enkaam Titus-em wanlegi piniqaaghtiisi sumeghtaghaatkenneghminigu qaatkutngalleghsi ellminun. Upughatkaqegkesillu alingellelighlusi, ungellegtellelighlusi.
47007016	Quyaghllaguunga qayughllak neghyukeghllaglusi ayuqamsi samun tamaghhaanun!
47008001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, whangkuta liisimakesuwamsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghaneng ugpeqanun yughaghvigitni Macedonia-m.
47008002	Ikfiqliightelleghllagita nanghiighsaghallengesteghllakaqiit. Qaywa aklumaghllagyaghngaaghmeng, paninang quyamaghllakaagut repall ighlegpenateng tuunikaagut kayusighnaluki ilangi ugpeqat.
47008003	Ungipaatamsi tuunikaagut tuunyaghqaghtutalmegestun, talwa tuuniighataghaqaagut. Tawaten pikaagut qayughllak ellngit tuuniyulghiit. Kitum alngunak pisqumangitii.
47008004	Talwa aapuquuteghllakaagut tuunilgusighinaluteng Kiyaghneghem yugitnun.
47008005	Tuunillghat uglaqaaguq sighimakellemnneng. Sivukluteng ellmeggneng pegtut Ataneghmun, taagken whangkunnun piyukellghakun Kiyaghneghem.
47008006	Titus elpesinitaqngami piinlighikaaguq qerngughtilleghpesineng manimeng. Enkaam kayemaghput kayusiisaghtiisqellusi apeghiighesqelluku nangllekusaghsi tunusaq.
47008007	Salleghpesigun tamaghhaakun pinitun piiqusi: ugpeqilleghpesigun, akuzilleghpesigun, liisimalleghpesigun, kayusighiyukestalleghpesigun, piniqilleghpesigunllu whangkunnun. Maatemillu pinitun piiqitek tuunilleghpesigun.
47008008	Qelghunghitamsi tuunisqellusi, iwernga ungipaatngwaamsi naten ilangit tuunimatangi. Enkaam tuunilleghpesi ipapighqelleqaa piniqilleghsi ipangutanga.
47008009	Liisimakaghsi piniqingalleghllaga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am. Aklungighllagmini tawalliima ellmineng katam aklumaaghtekaaguq elpesi apalluqlusi. Tawaten pikaaguq aklungighisqeqaghllusi aklumalleghmikun.
47008010	Awatangani elpesi qerngughtiyuwhaaqaagusi manimeng, tuunikaagusillu qayughllak tuuniyulghiisi. Sumemni whatelluku piyaqufsigu, itagnaghnayaghtusi,
47008011	nagneghusaqufsigu piinliqaghsi! Sagiqngakaagusi qerngughtiyuwhaaghaqngafsi manimeng. Enkaam sagiqenqigllusi apeghiighteggu qerngughtekaghsi. Tuunitek tuunilleghqaghpesistun.
47008012	Tuuniyupigtekufsi Kiyaghneghem tuguklighlleqii tunusasi. Piyukaqaa yuuk tuunisqelluku tuunyaghqalgukan, iwernga avangiskan tuuninghisaghngaan.
47008013	Nuuqragtistesugunghitamsi ilasi nuuqragtinghisimaluki.
47008014	Maaten llileghllaglusi ayuqusi enkaam kayusighyaghqaqasi tamaakut aklulghiit. Iwernga aklukufsi taawa ellngita kayusighlleqiisi. Tawaten pikufsi kayusiitullequsi enkaam atunem pillequsi.
47008015	Katam Akuzitet Igaqegkat igaqellghistun, “Yuuk saghnaghllakaq suyvaghsimangituq, iwernga yuuk saghnapagumangilnguq aklunaanghituq.”
47008016	Iyamsiqayugvikaqa Kiyaghneq qayughllak Titus kayusighiyugtesteghllakanga elpesineng katam whangkutestun.
47008017	Titus angeghqumakaaguq elpesinun pisqesamteggu. Elpesinun piyupigtekaaguq, taana ellngan piyukelqaa.
47008018	Ugpeqaalgutfut Titus-mun maligutesnaqaghput. Qamagtengngwaaghluteng ugpeqat qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigni usuqepigtaqaat ungipaqillghaneng Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
47008019	Taananginaagpenaan, ugpeqat nakmikegkaqaat maligutesqelluku whangkutgun, tuuniyaghtuqumta nangllekusameng tunusameng ugpeqanun. Tawaten pinguukut usuqellengesqelluku Ataneq, yugnunllu liitesqelluku kayusighiyulleghput.
47008020	Piraamsinguukut kitumun alngunak seghlequufqaamta pisqelluta naten aflengakaqutfut taana tunusaghllak.
47008021	Enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku atuqsugaqaghput Kiyaghneghmi elqughutngalghii, yugnillu elqughutngalghii.
47008022	Titus-enkugnunllu maligutesnaqaghput ilanga ugpeqaalgutfut. Awen esghaghnaluku natetulanga piiqaghput, piyalghiikut iiwleng kayusighiyukestaghluni ayuqeftuq. Wanlegi maaten kayusighiyugllagughtuq qayughllak neghyukeghllakangisi.
47008023	Titus qepghalgutkaqa, qepghalgusighaqaanga kayusiinnalusi. Taakuklu ugpeqaalgutek ugpeqat yughaghvignilnguut kayagtekaqagket. Quulvaghllagluku Christ-a ayuqaak.
47008024	Enkaam Corinth-eghmiini, esghaghtesteggu piniqilleghsi taakugnun yugegnun. Taagken piniqilleghpesi ipapighqesleqiit ugpeqat yughaghvignilnguut sangan qanatkellemnneng elpesi.
47009001	Latatkenghisaghngaamkun ayuqaqa tunusaq tuyughyaghqaghsi Kiyaghneghem yugitnun Jerusalem-em.
47009002	Liisimakamsi kayusighiyuglusi ayuqusi enkaam qanatkaqamsi ugpeqiitnun Macedonia-m. Whaten pikaagunga, “Awatangani ima ugpeqaalgutet Achaia-melnguut yataaghqegkaagut tuuninaluteng.” Sagiqelleghpesi allulluki ugpeqat maanlenguut tuuniyugtestekaqiitlu.
47009003	Iwernga kayaggnaqanka ilangi ugpeqaalguteput elpesinun. Apalluqaqa qanatkilqa elpesineng temngingufqaan pisqelluku. Yataaghqesqesugamsi katam whanga pisqellemtun elpesi,
47009004	luuraq Macedonia-ghmiit ilangita maliggnayukangatnga Corinth-mun. Esghaqumisi yataaghqellghillusi tunusaghqaghpesineng, taawa whangkuta kayngusaakelleqiinkut, elpesillu kaynguyugllequsi.
47009005	Enkaam sumeghtaghaghtunga sivumni kayagtekestaghnaluki ilangi ugpeqaalguteput. Tawaten kayusiilleqiisi yataaghqesqelluku akequsaqegkaghsi tunusaq. Taagken kaaskuma tunusaghsi apeghiighngallequq, enkaam yuget liisimakelleqaat tuuniyulleghsi, nakaan qayughllak tuuniyaghqaategpesineng.
47009006	Neqamikluku una, yuuk palaghhaghmeng piitutmeng piitesighaqumi, palaghhaan saghnallequq. Yuuk uglaghluku piitutmeng piitesighaqumi, uglaghluku saghnallequq.
47009007	Tamaghhaghpesi sumeghtaghaatkiteggu tuunilleghqaghtutalesi. Ighlegumaghpesi tuunigpenasi nalighmeng tuuniyaghqaategpesineng. Iwernga quyakusiqluku tuuniiqitek qayughllak Kiyaghneghem piniqii tawatelnguut tuunistet.
47009008	Kiyaghneghem tuunyaqlegwiisi aklukegkaghpesineng qaayghulluku. Enkaam iiwleng sameng alngunak pilwaaqellequsi, siipngaanllu kayusiitesqelluki ilasi.
47009009	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Ighlellngunani tuuniiquq aklumalghiinun; pinitun pingallgha nagneghyaghqaaguq quunpeng.”
47009010	Kiyaghneghuuq tuunikayuk piitutmeng piitesighaghtemun, neqmengllu neghyaghqameng. Tuunelleqaa qamaglluku piitun aklukegkaghsi, nagusleqiillu. Enkaangam unataghllagllequsi qayughllak ighlegilnguusi.
47009011	Sakun tamaghhaakun aklungighisleqiisi, naran'ngunaan tuunisqellusi salleghmi tamaghhaani. Enkaam tuunilleghpesigun whangkutgun uglalghiim iyamsiqayugvikelleqaat Kiyaghneq.
47009012	Kiyaghneghem yugita Jerusalem-emelnguut allgeghlleqiit aklukegkateng tunusaghpesigun. Enkaam yulghuteghllaget iyamsiqayulleghmeng tevughallequt Kiyaghneghmun.
47009013	Tuunyaghqaghpesigun ipapighqellequsi ugpeqinganilusillu qaatkutnganilusillu Pinilghiinun Ungipaanun Christ-am. Tamaaken apalluqluku yuget usuqelleqaat Kiyaghneq. Usuqelleqaatlu ighlellngunasi tuunilleghpesineng Jerusalem-eghmiinunllu ilangitnunllu.
47009014	Enkaangam piniqepigllusi yughaatkelleqiisi apalluqluku piniqelleghrugllak Kiyaghneghem tuun'ngakanga elpesinun.
47009015	Yeqay iyamsiqayugvikelteggu Kiyaghneq tunusaanun akuzitet apeghpagningilkangat.
47010001	Ilangita yugpesi piiqaatnga tetugtaghnilunga elpesininnemni, iwernga tetugiganniiqaatnga elpesininneghinnemni. Whanga Paul, whangamneng katam, Christ-am qusevegngallghakunllu piniqellghakunllu,
47010002	tetugtesneghitaghhnakefsinga laalighfikenqigtekumsi. Iwernga tetugyaghqaqenghilkumki tamaakut yuget pilghiit kiyaghtengngunilunga nunam yugistun, elngaatall tetugnaanghitanka.
47010003	Nunametngughngaamta pilluwiigatukut nunam yugan pilluwallghistun.
47010004	Guututet pilluwaasiput nunam yugan guututkenghitii. Guututeput Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng pilguut. Naafqesaqlegwiit ayepsugilnguut mingllutet anguyagem nekefquqii yuget uvitangitgun.
47010005	Taakutgun guututetgun naafqaqaput anguyagem iqlengii, sumeghneghitlu aangaayugneghet. Apeghtughillghita amigighaqiit yuget liitelleghqiitneng Kiyaghneghmeng. Katam pilluwaghtet tugutellghistun anusimingllaghyaghqameng, whangkutallu tugwaaqaput qamaglluki sumeghneghet qaatkutesqelluki Christ-amun.
47010006	Christ-amun qaatkutngngwaaqufsi, taawa aghyuughiyaghqaaghllequkut qaatkunneghilngughnun.
47010007	Nanqigtiiqusi esghallghiinaghpesigun. Christ-amun pikepestaaghnikufsi, neqamikluku whangkutallu Christ-am pikiinkut, elpesistun.
47010008	Kayngukigataqa qanatkivleghapalqa Atanghem igleghutistengughtestekanganga elpesinun. Tawaten pikaaguq whangkunnun kayemesqelluku ugpeqilleghsi, nakaan naafqennaluku.
47010009	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi alingesnaqutkengngunilusi latamkun.
47010010	Ilangita piiqiit Paul-em latangi seghleghllaguniluki aghsaaghmikaghnganiluki, naqam whangkunninneghmini, aghsaan ayuqaquq, akuziyiitaquqlu!
47010011	Tamaakut yuget tawaten pikat liigiklitgu sameng pilleghput latatgun, tamaakunguut ataasit piyaghqaput ellngitnun pikumta.
47010012	Inglunnaqutkennaanghitukut tamaakunun aangaayuglleghhiinun. Sumeghtaghaghaqut aangniluteng qayughllak ungipaatutaqelghiit aangniluteng. Nalluughhaghmeng!
47010013	Qukaayugutkennaanghitaghput alngunak qepghaqaq Kiyaghneghem kayagusimangilkanga whangkunnun. Iwernga qukaayugutkengnginaghlleqaghput qepghaqaq kayagutkaa whangkunnun. Elpesillu ilatngaasi qepghaqamnnun.
47010014	Sivulighpigaagukut ungipaqiyaghtuqani elpesinun Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Christ-am. Enkaam alpagigataghput qepghaqaq Kiyaghneghem kayagutkaa whangkunnun.
47010015	Qukaayugutkelleqaghput taananginaq qepghaqaq pikaghput, nakaan ilangita qepghaqaat. Ugpelleghtughtekufsi sighimaakut kayusighataghiisqelluta qepghaqamnneng.
47010016	Enkaam ungipaqiyaghtughllequkut Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ilangitnun nunat. Qukaayugutkesugunghitaghput qepghaqaq ilangita apeghiiqaat.
47010017	Iwernga igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Kina alngunak qukaayugsukumi, qukaayugutkelligu Atanghhiinaq.”
47010018	Atanghem tugukliigatii pinighnilghiit. Itupill Atanghem tuguklighaqii tamaakut pinighniluki pikani.
47011001	Sighimakamsi nekeggmetutesqellunga akuzikuma temngitwhalghiistun natengiighhaq. Nekeggmetuteqaghtengnga.
47011002	Qungyaghaqunga Kiyaghneghem qungyaqellghatun elpesi, qayughllak tuusimaamsi Christ-amun. Pelungilngughestun ugiighnaqelghiistun aang'ghusimaamsi ellnganun, ugikesqelluku ellnginaa.
47011003	Iwernga alingutkaqamsi anguyagem puughhnayukangisi, katam tawaten nemeghyam peghqiniqutkelluku puughtellghatun Eve. Enkaam elpesi piniqnanighwaaghnayukafsigu Christ-a.
47011004	Ungipaqaqngamteki Pinilghiit Ungipat elpesinun, ugpeqegkaqaghsi Jesus, tuguklighagsillu Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak. Iwernga nagasukestaghluki ayuqegkaqasi ungipaqiyaghtulghiit ilanganeng Jesus-em. Tuguklighiyugtusillu ilanganeng taghnegham, ugpeqsukaqasillu ilangi pinilghiit ungipat.
47011005	Tamaakut ungipaqistet apostle-nguniluteng piiqut. Sumeghmeggni aangwaaghuniiqut apostle-et. Iwernga liisimakanka aangwaaghunghitut whangamneng.
47011006	Akuzillgiteghngaaghma, liisimaghllagtunga. Uglaghngaan liigikestaqamsi liisimallemneng.
47011007	Elpesinun akileghtughsaqumangitunga ungipaqaqngamki Pinilghiit Ungipii Kiyaghneghem. Tawaten pikaagunga qusevegllunga quulvaghnalusi. Seghleghqesingaa-a tawaten pilunga?
47011008	Ugpeqat ilangitnilnguut yughaghviget akileghtuqaqaatnga elpesinillunga. Wayaqallghuughanka maningitneng kayusiinnalusi.
47011009	Elpesinitaqngama ughleghiightellghitamsi kayusiitesqellunga aklukegkamneng. Ugpeqaalgutet Macedonia-meng tagitkaqaatnga sameng tamaghhaaneng aklukegkamneng. Enkaam aapfikellghitamsi aklukegkamneng, aapfiknaanghitamsi.
47011010	Kitum alngunak Achaia-mi aghuliighhnaanghitaa qukaayugtelqa taagken. Tawaten piinga Christ-am ipapighqellghakun whangamnilngughqun.
47011011	Kayutengllanghitutemneng elpesinun, sumeghpesinii-i piniqenghinnilusi pitsi whangamnun? Kiyaghneghem liisimakaa piniqilqa elpesinun.
47011012	Taawa ighsakiivikumanginaghnaqamsi manigpesineng. Tawaten piiqunga qukaayuggnaniisqelluki apostle-esighwaaghet whangkutestun qepghaghnilghiit akileghtuusangunateng.
47011013	Tamaakut yuget apostle-esighwaaghuut puughtilghiit yugneng iqlengiqelleghmegteggun. Yugnun sumeghtaghaatkestaqut Christ-amun apostle-epiikniluteng.
47011014	Taamengwhaqun. Talwa Tughneghaq allangughtaquq ellmineng katam aliighyaghqaaluni kuukgutngalghiitun yaqulegtun.
47011015	Enkaam saghiighaniitut Tughneghaam qepghaghtengi tawaten pikumeng. Yugnun sumeghtaghaatkestaqut elqughutngalghiinguniluteng qepghaghtengi Kiyaghneghem. Iwernga kenlemi Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqii elqughutngalghiimeng aghyuulleghmeng anaggutellghitnun.
47011016	Alla piimsi, kitum alngunak sumeghtaghaatkenghillinga temngitwhangulunga. Iwernga tawaten sumeghtaghaatkengngukufsinga, tugukliqaghtengnga temngitwhangulunga. Taagken whangallu qukaayugtevleghaghllequnga.
47011017	Qukaayugutkelqa whangamneng Ataneghmeng pingunghituq. Itupill akuzinguunga temngi pilghiistun.
47011018	Uglalghiit ugpeqaanghilngughestun qukaayugtaqut qepghaqameggneng, enkaam whangallu tawaten qukaayugllequnga.
47011019	Sumeghpesini peghqinepiggnilusi piiqusi. Enkaam quyakusiqluku nagataqasi temngitwhalghiit.
47011020	Tuguklighaqasi qelellghit nikimqun elpesi qepghaghtelaaghet ellngitnun. Kagukaqestaqusi, teglegvikestaqusi, ukaliqestaqusillu, talwa gginaghpesigun qasaghtestaqlusi.
47011021	Kaynguyugtunga kayaatepigtukut tawaten pilleghqamnneng elpesinun tamaakustun apostle-esighwaaghestun. Kina alngunak qukaayugsaghqaakan, whangallu qukaayugllequnga. Iwernga tawaten pilleghqaq temngitwhanguuq.
47011022	Taakut apostle-esighwaaghet, Hebrew-ngwaat? Whangallu Hebrew-nguunga. Israel-eghmiingwaat? Whangallu Israel-eghmiinguunga. Abraham-em kingunqakii? Whangallu kingunqaanga.
47011023	Christ-am qepghaghtekakii? Iwernga whanga pinighataghaghtunga qepghaghta ellngitneng. Taawa akuziinga nallekaghnilngughestun. Qepghaghataghaqaagunga ellngitneng, anusiminglaghvigmetaaghaqaagungallu ellngitneng. Kagsagmillengegkaagunga kestekaanghilngughmeng, uglaghngaan tuquvzighaataqaagunga.
47011024	Tallimagyagneng Jews-et igleghutistengita kagsagmigtestaataghaatnga. (39-ngwaaqut ataasit kagsagmillghet.)
47011025	Rome-eghmiit umiilwaaghita pingayuneng anaguleghtestekaqaatnga. Ataasimeng ilangita yuget milughpagaataghaatnga. Pingayuneng angyiighututaqaanga enkaam ataasimeng unulqusiq, aghnelqusiq uughhutkaqaanga kelliini.
47011026	Uglapiglleghhiimi igleghallemni elngaatall yakughniightunga kiiwni, wayaghniighteneng, talwa yulgutemnengllu, Gentile-enengllu. Yakughniightungallu neghllagni, kilgaani, kelliinillu. Talwa yakughniightunga ugpeqaalgutesighwaaghneng.
47011027	Ughleghiighllakaagunga, piyaqliighaqlunga. Ilangani qavaghpenanga, iyataghngaaqlunga, meqsugngaaqlunga. Awen neqngitaqlunga, azigutiitaqlunga, ghhuutaqlungallu aatkiitem.
47011028	Tamaakut saaghwitgun, aghhutanga tamaghhaan sumeghyalitkegkaqanka ugpeqaalgutet tamaghhitni yughagvigni.
47011029	Ugpeqaalgutem ugpeqillgha kayaanneghani, whangallu kayaataqunga. Ugpeqaalguta kitum seghleghqesneghagu, sakritaqunga.
47011030	Qukaayuggnaqngukuma, qukaayugllequnga kayaalliqusimneng.
47011031	Kiyaghneghem liisimakaanga iqlengiqnaanghitunga. Ellnga Atakaa Atanghem Jesus-em, usuqsaghqaq quunperugllak.
47011032	Damascus-mellunga, governor-em tugustesukaqaanga. (Umiilgem Aretas-em governor-ngughtestekaqaa.) Enkaam tugusqellunga pilluwaghteni kelengakistekaqii neghllagem amigllagitni.
47011033	Iwernga ilakumtaaghma ukigtekaqaatnga pasketegnekun mingllutem qergesegkenkun enkaam anakaagunga governor-meng.
47012001	Qukaayugsaghqaagunga, aneghneghqusiinghiteghngaan. Paninang ungipaannaqamsi esghaghwaallemneng, Atanghemllu aliighquqaaneng whangamnun.
47012002	Liisimakaqa yuuk Christ-amelnguq. Qula estamat siipneqluki ayumiqulleghni agani naghughtekani Kiyaghneghem mayuutqaghtekaqaa pingayaanun qilagem. Nallukngwaaghaqa yuuk yugusiminitutanga nalighmeng yugusimineng aan'ngakaatanga, iwernga Kiyaghneghem liisimakaa.
47012003	Liisimakaqa taana yuuk Kiyaghneghem mayuutqaghtekaqaa Paradise-mun. Nallukngwaaghaqa yuuk yugusiminitutanga nalighmeng yugusimineng aan'ngakaatanga, iwernga Kiyaghneghem liisimakaa.
47012004	Tawani nagatkaqii sangwaat apeghyaghqaanghilnguut. Tamaakut iinghutkaagut yugmun akuzitkesaghqaaluteng.
47012005	Qukaayugutkennaqaqa taana yuuk, iwernga qukaayugutkennaqenghitunga whangamneng iwerngaqun kayaalliqusiqegkaghhiinamneng.
47012006	Qukaayugutkesukuma whangamneng, temngingunaanghitunga qayughllak apeghlleqaqa ipapilleq. Iwernga qukaayugutkennanghitunga whangamneng, qayughllak yugnun sumeghtaghaatkesugtunga elqughllunga esghapallghitgunllu nagatellghitgunllu whanga.
47012007	Kiyaghneghem aliightekaqeghngaaki whangamnun uglaapiglleghhiit sangwaat qilagmi, qukaayugtestesunghitaanga. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem qusevegtesqellunga sikughllungestaanga yugusimkun. Taana sikughlluk ungipaghtenguuq Tughneghagh-meng. Taam ikfiqestaanga qusevegngasqellunga.
47012008	Pingayuneng ketwell Ataneghmun yughaghaqunga iqitesqelluku.
47012009	Iwernga piinga, “Kayusilqa naamaaq elpenun suflughtesqelluku taana ikfiqelleq qayughllak aghtughyaghqaanghilqa iknaqelleghpigaagwaquq kayaalliqneghpeni.” Enkaam quyakusiqluku qukaayugtaqunga kayaalliqusimneng whangamnitesqelluku Christ-am aghtughyaghqaanghillgha.
47012010	Taana apalluqluku quyaaqunga kayaalliqnganemni, seghlequullengnemni, piyaqliinemni, amyuutkellengnemni, allaaghhiinaghmengllu seghleliinemni Christ-a apalluqluku. Qayughllak kayaalliqnganemni taawa iknaqaqunga.
47012011	Akuzinguunga temngitwhastun, iwernga elpesi tawaten pistaghpesinga. Elpesi pinitun akuzitkesaghqaqsaghaghpesinga ilagpesinun. Qaywa sasiinghiteghngaaghma, tamaakut “aangwaaghet apostle-et” aangwaaghunghitut whangamneng.
47012012	Elpesinillunga nekeglluwaan uglaapiglleghhiit allaaghhiinaat allaaghlluwhaghtillghet pikaqanka. Tamaakut ipapighqaatnga apostle-epiigutka.
47012013	Sakaqsingi ugpeqat ilangitnilnguut yughaghviget elpesinun pimangilkemneng? Ataasighhiinaq allanguuq, akilguqumangitamsi. Seghevutaghtengnga anagsimakumsi!
47012014	Laalighfiknaqaqamsi pingayiitkun, iwernga ughleghiighutkestesunghitunga elpesinun. Elpesi sumeghmikaqamsi, nakaan saghyasi. Taghnughhaqelghiistun ayuqamsi. Taghnughhaat aflengakiyaghqaanghitut angayuqameggneng, iwernga angayuqat aflengaksaghqaqiit taghnughhateng.
47012015	Tuunyaghqaaghtamsi sameng tamaghhaaneng whanga pimneng, talwa whangamneng tuunellequnga elpesinun. Piniqataghanemsi, llangaqa elpesi piniqepagigataghpesinga.
47012016	Elpesillu whangallu liisimakaghput ughleghiightesimangitamsi. Iwernga ilagpesi anaggusimaniitnga. Piiqut puughneqguunnilusi iqlengiqellemkun.
47012017	Naten tawaten pistemsi? Sakengegkaazinga elpesineng kayagtaqngamki yuget elpesinun?
47012018	Kayagtekaqaqa Titus elpesinun pisqelluku, ugpeqaalgutfutlu maligutesqaqa. Titus-em puughtekaqisii? Nakaa, Titus-lu whangkutung qepghaqaghpung ataasiiguq, ataasikun taghneghakun.
47012019	Sumeghpesinii-i elpesinun ipapighqennaqutkestegneguu anaggutellghinnilutung? Nakaa! Kiyaghneghem nagaquumanghani, akuziiqukung Christ-am akuzisqellghatun. Piniqegkamni, sangwa qamaglluku piiqaghpung iknaqughsaghnaluku ugpelleghsi.
47012020	Sumeghyalitkaqamsi elpesinun kaaskuma esghaqumsi allaknayukamsi whanga sighimakellemneng. Elpesillu whanga esghaqufsinga allaknayukafsinga sighimakelleghpesineng. Sumeghyalitkaqamsi aghivatngunayukafsi, aqinakutngunayukafsi, sakraatutngunayukafsi, ellnginaayugutngunayukafsi, seghlequughutngunayukafsi, yiillgitngunayukafsi, qukaayugutngunayukafsi, suuglliqutngunayukafsi.
47012021	Sumeghyaliiqunga alla takukumsi Kiyaghneghma kayngusaaknayukanganga sivugpesini apalluqluki seghleghqellesi. Enkaam qivghughllagllequnga qayughllak uglalghiini elpesi seghleghqumanginaagusi avuteghqegpenasi. Paninang sumeghtaghaghaqusi sex-meng pelunginneghilngughmeng, sex-a seghletun atuqaqaghsi, sex-ellghetlu anagngalghiit nuqetusigatasi.
47013001	Una pingayiitkaa laalighhnaqelleghma elpesinun. Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq whaten, “Yuuk anaggusimanikatgu, maalghuk nalighmeng pingayut liisimakistet ipapighqesaghqaqaat anaggutellgha.”
47013002	Tuunglighhaani laalighfikaqngamsi kelengasaaqaqamsi tamaakut sivunghani seghleghqelghiit. Ilangitlu kelengasaaqaqanka, taginqigtekuma aghyuughmiglleqniluki seghleghqumanginaqata. Tamaanneghiteghngaaghma kelengasaaghnaqanka.
47013003	Whangamnun ipapighqestesukesi Christ-a akuziiqutanga whangamkun. Christ-a kayaanneghituq aghyuughmikumisi, itupill aghtughyaghqaanghituq.
47013004	Qaywa Christ-a kayaatkaayaghtuq qaquuraghaqngamegteggu, maaten kiyaghtengnguuq Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun. Whangkutallu kayaatukut katam Christ-am kayaatkaayallghatun. Iwernga elpesinitkumta kayusiilleqamsi Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun.
47013005	Yuvghiightek elpesineng liigikesqelluku ugpeqepiigutsi Jesus Christ-a. Liigikenghistegguu-u Jesus Christ-a kiyaghtengngutanga ilugpesini? Ilugpesininneghitngukan, taawa ugpeqepiillghitaghsi.
47013006	Sunanguq liigikiteggu Kiyaghneghmun itagnaqumaniluta.
47013007	Yughaghaqukut Kiyaghneghmun kayusiitesqellusi anaggutefqaafsi pisqellusi. Iwernga yughaangunghitukut ipapighqennaluku elpesinun Kiyaghneghmun itagnaqumaniluta. Itupill whangkuta yughaatkaqamsi elqughutngaan pisqellusi, qaywa yuget pighngiinkut itagnaqellghinniluta Kiyaghneghmun.
47013008	Kipullginaaghpagningitaghput ipapilleq; itupill ilapgayaghqaqaghput.
47013009	Quyaaqukut kayaannemta, iknaqnguneghpesini. Enkaam yughaatkaqamsi veghunneqigtesqellusi kiyaghtesqesullghanun Kiyaghneghem.
47013010	Tamaaken apalluqluku lataaqamsi elpesinun pivagilgama qayughllak nanqigsunghilkemsi aghyuughmigyaghqaalusi. Atanghem qelqaqaanga nanqigtestengulunga elpesinun. Enkaam nanqigsugamsi kayusiinnalusi ugpeqilleghtughtesqellusi, nakaan kayaalisqellusi.
47013011	Ugpeqaalgutemni, tawaten'ngam piinga. Quyangatek. Veghutek kiyaghtesqesullghanun Kiyaghneghem. Pisqesullemtun pitek. Kiyaghtek itagnaqullusi, nekeggmetullusi. Enkaam Kiyaghneq tenemenga piniqellghemllu nekeggmellghemllu elpesinilli.
47013012	Quyakututaqitek agleghnalghiikun naalleghqun.
47013013	Qamaglluteng ugpeqaalgutet piniqiisinguq.
47013014	Nangllegtallgha Atanghem Jesus Christ-am, piniqellghallu Kiyaghneghem, qerngaghmetellghallu Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham elpesinilli.
48001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut, apostle-meng. Yuget nakmikellghitaatnga apostle-ngulunga, talwa kayagtellghitaatnga. Apostle-nguughtekaagunga Jesus Christ-akunllu Kiyaghneghqunllu Atakun, unguvaghtestikaq ellnganeng tuqulleghmeng.
48001002	Lataaqamsi ugpeqani Galatia-melngughni. Qamaglluteng ugpeqaalgutma maanlenguut piniqiisinguk whangamnun maligulluteng.
48001003	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am nanglleklisillu nekeggmellelguslisilillu.
48001004	Christ-a ellmineng aghqutkegkaaguq seghleghqellemnnun, itemunnaluta whaken seghleghmeng kiyaghtaalleghmeng. Kiyaghnemta Atam piyukellghatun pikaaguq.
48001005	Enkaam Kiyaghneq usuqellengli quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
48001006	Saghiighayagutamsi aawallu pegtaghtaghsi tuqlughistezi nangllegtallghakun Christ-am, tuguklighiisi allaneng “pinilghiineng ungipaneng”.
48001007	Avaqraggiituq alla “pinilghiineng ungipaneng”. Iwernga ilangita yuget teggellghiightestaqiisi allangughhnaqutkelleghmegteggun Pinilghiit Ungipat Christ-ameng ayuqelghiit.
48001008	Qaywa yaqulek qilagmeng, nalighmeng nalimta whangkuta ungipaqegkumteki “pinilghiit ungipat” allanguluki ungipaqegkamnneng elpesinun, taana ungipaqilghi Kiyaghneghem nanqiglligu aghyuulleghmun.
48001009	Sivunghani ungipaatkaqamsi, whaa ungipaannaqlaataghamsi, kitum alngunak ungipaqegkumiki “pinilghiit ungipat” allanguluki ugpeqegkaghpesineng, Kiyaghneghem nanqiglligu aghyuulleghmun.
48001010	Tawaten akuzillemkun efqughhnaqutkengngunghitanka yuget. Nakaa, Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq efqughsukaqa. Paninang yugnun efqughtinaqutkengngukuma, Christ-amun qepghaghtengunaanghitunga.
48001011	Ugpeqaalgutemni, una liisimakesugaqa elpesinun, Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqaqegkenka yugneng pingunghitut.
48001012	Nagaquqaqenghitanka yugneng, talwa kitum alngunak apeghtuutkumangitii whangamnun. Jesus Christ-am aliightekaqii whangamnun.
48001013	Nagaquqaqaghsi natesaatka maligtengnguluki Jews-et kiyaghtaallghit. Elngaatall nangllegyullngunanga amyuutkegkaqanka ugpeqat, taakunginaghhaagneng aviighutesnaqutkegkaqanka.
48001014	Ingyaqaqanka allulluki angtaalgutenka atuqnguluki Jews-et kiyaghtaallghit, qayughllak sagiqneghllaguyaghtunga sivunemta nangaghneghitnun.
48001015	Iwernga allgeghumangillunga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga, nangllegtalleghmikun tuqluqaqaanga.
48001016	Enkaam whangamnun aliightekaqaa kinangutanga Ighneni ungipaqesqelluku Gentile-enun. Kinkunun alngunak akuzitkesaghtullghitaqa taana,
48001017	talwa Jerusalem-etellghitunga akuzitkennaluku apostle-ngughtekanun sivumni. Yeghlegi Arabia-mun piinga. Tagtalmi uteghnightunga Damascus-mun.
48001018	Tamaani pingayut ayumiqullghet atughluki Jerusalem-etunga aleghqughnaluku Cephas (Peter). Ellnganitunga akimigaq unuk.
48001019	Kina alla apostle-a aleghqunghitaqa iwerngaqun James, Atanghem anglegutanga.
48001020	Aapqanka ukut ipanguut, Kiyaghneghem liisimakaanga iqlengiqngunghitunga.
48001021	Taagken igleghaanga Syria-munllu Cilicia-munllu.
48001022	Tamaani Judea-mi ugpeqat Christ-akun salin nalliigalkangatnga gginasaghqughlunga.
48001023	Taawanginaq liisimakaat nagaqulleghteng whaten, “Yuuk amyuqetiqestekegkaghput, naafqiinaqutkegkaqlu ugpeqillemnneng Christ-ameng maaten whaa ungipaqiiquq ugpeqilleghmeng Christ-akun!”
48001024	Enkaam Kiyaghneq usuqaqaat whanga apalluqlunga.
48002001	Qula estamat siipneqluku ayumiqulleq atughluku uteghnightunga Jerusalem-emun; Barnabas-em maligtaanga Titus-lu kelqaqa.
48002002	Kiyaghneghem liigikestaanga Jerusalem-etesqellunga. Kaasamta ugpeqat igleghutistenginiit qerngughutaghtesqanka. Tawani ungipamsugutanka naten Gentile-enun ungipaqillemneng Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Tawaten pikaagunga luuraq taakut igleghutistet apeghtughillghenka temnginguninayukatki sivunghanillu maatenllu.
48002003	Liigikanka apeghtughillghenka tuguklighiit qayughllak maligtisteka Titus, Greek-ngughngaan, circumcise-esqenghilkangat.
48002004	Iwernga ilangi ugpeqasighwaaghet aksaqluku ilatut whangkunnun riirnginaluku itemngalleghput Christ Jesus-kun. Qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtesqelluta piinkut Liilightuusaanun.
48002005	Ellngitnun malighqutaqellghitukut talwa natengiighhaq almesiqesqelluki ipangullghit Pinilghiit Ungipat apeghtuusaqellemtestun elpesinun.
48002006	Taakut ugpeqat igleghutistengita allangughsimangitiit Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqaqegkenka. (Igleghutistenguyaghngaata, whangamni allangughutngitut qayughllak Kiyaghneq taniillghituq.)
48002007	Igleghutistet liigikumaat Kiyaghneghmun neghyukusimaniluki whangamnun Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqesqelluki Gentile-enun, katam tawaten neghyukutellghatun Peter-mun Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqesqelluki Jews-enun.
48002008	Katam Kiyaghneq qepghaqaaguq Peter-kun apostle-kennaluku Jews-enun, whangamkunllu qepghaqaaguq apostle-kennalunga Gentile-enun.
48002009	Enkaam taakut igleghutistet, James-enkut Peter-enkut John-enkut, nekevghatilghiit ugpeqanun, liigikaat Kiyaghneghmun tunusalisimanilunga tawaten qepghiisqellunga Gentile-enun. Tamaaken apalluqluku Barnabas-lu iiggepung aghulatiit tuguklighniluku qepghaangulleghpung Gentile-enun, ellngit Jews-enun.
48002010	Taananginaq puygusnanighaat kayusiitesqelluki aklumalghiit, taanata nagneghusupigtekegka.
48002011	Tagtalmi taakwani Peter Antioch-melluni sameng anaggutkaq. Enkaam sivungitni ugpeqat aghyuughmigaqa anaggutellghaneng apalluqluku.
48002012	Peter neghelgusighikayuguyalghii Gentile-et ugpeqiitneng kenlanga James-em yuget Antioch-etestellghitnun. Iwernga kaasata neghelgusighnanighii Gentile-et, aaftekaqlu ellngitneng. Tawaten pikaalghii qayughllak alingelghii taakut yuget sagiqutngukangit Gentile-et ugpeqiit circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki.
48002013	Taagken qamaglluteng Antioch-eghmiit Jews-et ugpeqiit maligutkat Peter-em anaggutellghanun, talwa Barnabas-lu ilalluni.
48002014	Liigiksamki qaatkunneghitellghit apeghtuusiitnun Pinilghiit Ungipat, sivungitni yuget Peter piiqa, “Elpek qaywa Jew-ngughngaaghpek kiyaghtenguuten Gentile-estun, nakaan Jews-estun. Sangitangam Gentile-et Jews-estun kiyaghtesnaqutkesiki?”
48002015	Jews-nguluta allgeqaagukut, nakaan Gentile-et seghleghqestet.
48002016	Naqamllu liisimakaghput Kiyaghneghem elqughutngalleghminun nallghusaghnaanghitaa yuuk qaatkutellghakun Liilightuusanun, tawatenginaq nallghusaghlleqaa ugpeqillghakun Jesus Christ-ameng. Talwa whangkuta Jews-eni ugpeqegkaqaghput Christ Jesus, Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun nallghusiisqelluta ugpeqellemteggun Christ-a, nakaan qaatkutellemteggun Liilightuusanun. Kina alngunak qaatkutellghakun Liilightuusanun Kiyaghneghem elqughutngalleghminun nallghusaghyaghqaqenghitaa.
48002017	Jews-eni whangkuta nallghusaghtesugukumta Christ-akun, nakaan Liilightuusatgun, ilangita Jews-et seghleghqestengunilleqiinkut Gentile-estun. Enkaam Christ-anguftaa seghleghqestengughtestilghii? Yeghlegillu!
48002018	Liilightuusat pegtekaqanka, atuqenqigsaguskumki taawa Liilightuusanun anaggullequnga.
48002019	Liilightuusatgun tuqukaagunga Liilightuusanun kiyaghsaghqaalunga Kiyaghneghmun.
48002020	Qaquuraatkaagunga Christ-amun maligullunga, enkaam whangangunaniimaaq kiyaghlleghhii; Christ-angughsimaaq kiyaghlleghhii ilumni. Kiyaghtengngughngaaghma yugusimni, kiyaghtengnguunga ugpeqillemkun Ighneghaneng Kiyaghneghem. Piniqegkanganga, tuunegkaalghiillu whangamnun.
48002021	Enkaam pakigigataqa Kiyaghneghem tunusaa. Yuuk qaatkutelleghmikun Liilightuusanun nallghusaghyaghqaayaqan Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun, taawa Christ-am tuqullgha temngingunayaghtuq.
48003001	Nallughhaghmeng elpesi Galatia-ghmiini! Kitum puughtisi? Puygustegguu aapghwaaqaqsaqegka Jesus Christ-am tuqullgha qaquurakun?
48003002	Aaptaghllamsi: naten allgeghtekaqestekek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak, qaatkutelleghpesigun Liilightuusanun nalighmeng ugpeqelleghpesigun nagatkaghsi?
48003003	Nalluupigetsii? Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun piinlighluku nutaghaq unguvalleghsi, apeghiighnaqestegguu-u elpesineng katam?
48003004	Ikfiqelleghsi temnginguftaa? Ugpeqepestaaghaqa temngingunghituq.
48003005	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqisii-i Taghneghagmineng, allaaghlluwhaghtikaawalluu akulegpesini qayughllak qaatkegkesi Liilightuusat, nalighmeng ugpeqegkesi nagaquqaghsi?
48003006	Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapqaqaat Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqaa Kiyaghneq, enkaam Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqaqaa elqughutngalleghminun.
48003007	Enkaam elpesi liisimakelleqasi tamaakut ugpeqillelget Kiyaghneghqun Abraham-em kinguneghpigaqii.
48003008	Akuzitet Igaqegkat aapqestaqaqaat Kiyaghneghmun nallghusaghnaqniluki Gentile-et elqughutngalleghminun ugpeqillghitgun. Neghighluku Kiyaghneghem aapqaqaa taana Pinilghii Ungipaq Abraham-emun, whaten piiqngami, “Qamagtengngwaaghluteng nunam ramkengi quyastellengnaqnguut elpegun.”
48003009	Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqaa enkaam quyastellengegkaq. Tawateghpigaq tamaghhaghmi ugpeqilghii quyastellengyaghqaaguq ellngatun.
48003010	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqaqii tamaakut sighimalghiit qaatkutelleghmegteggun Liilightuusanun nallghusaghlleqniluteng elqughutngallghanun. Qayughllak igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Kitum alngunak qaatkenghilkaki tamaghhiita igaqngalghiit igiitgun Liilightuusat nanqigtellengellequq aghyuughyaghqaaluni.”
48003011	Whateghlluwaaq liigiknaghtuq, kina alngunak nallghusaghyaghqaanghituq Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun qaatkutelleghmikun Liilightuusanun. Qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Taana Kiyaghneghem nallghusaqaa elqughutngalleghminun kiyaghllequq ugpelleghmikun.”
48003012	Iwernga qaatkullghii Liilightuusanun sighimangunghituq ugpelleghqun, qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Sighimalghii Liilightuusatgun kiyaghllequq qaatkelluki.”
48003013	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekaqiinkut aghyuughnaluta apalluqluki Liilightuusat, iwernga Christ-am naveghqellikaqiinkut nanqiglleghqamnneng tugulleghmikun aghyuulleghqaghput. Qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Nanqigtekaaguq aghyuughyaghqaaluni tamaghhaghmi agaghtekaq uqfigkun.”
48003014	Christ Jesus-em naveghqellikaqiinkut enkaam ellngakun Kiyaghneghem quyastekaqii Gentile-et taagken ataasimeng quyastelleghmeng akequsaqegkaminun Abraham-emun. Enkaam ugpelleghqun allgeghtagput Taghneghak Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkakek.
48003015	Ugpeqaalgutemni, ungipaataghllamsi usputaghqameng aghhutanga tamaghhaan piiqelghiineng: yugek akequskumek sameng, igaqluku igakun, ateteklu igaqlukek, kitum alngunak aghuliighsaghqaqenghitaa akeqututellghak nalighmeng ilayaghqaqenghitaa.
48003016	Kiyaghneq akequsangllaghteqaaguq Abraham-emunllu kingunghanunllu. Kiyaghneghem akequsangllaamangitii, “Kingunghi,” Akequsangllaghteqaaguq ataasiinaghmun kinguneghmun, taana Christ-anguuq.
48003017	Taana liigikesugaqsaghaqa: Kiyaghneq akequsangllaqaaguq Abraham-emun enkaam akequsani pinaqnikaqaa. 430 ayumiqullghet kingungitneng akeqilleghmi, Kiyaghneghem tuunegkii Liilightuusat. Taakut Liilightuusat taana akequsaq satngunanighqennaanghitaa nalighmeng naafqennaanghitaa.
48003018	Liilightuusatgun allgeghhnaqngukumteggu Kiyaghneghem tunusaa, taawa akequsaakun allgeghhnaanghitaghput. Iwernga akeqilleghmikun Kiyaghneghem tunusani tuunegkaqaa Abraham-emun.
48003019	Sangameng Liilightuusat tuunegkaawat? Tuunegkaagut yugnun liigikesqelluki anaggutellghit seghleghqellghuniluki. Taakut Liilightuusat tawatetkaagut kenlanga kinguneq tagillghanun. Ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem akequsangllaqaa. Taakut Liilightuusat Kiyaghneghem yaqulegteggun tuunegkaqii Moses-mun. Taagken Moses-em uygukutistem tuunegkaqii yugnun.
48003020	Iwernga uygukutistesughniituq ataasiq akeqikumi. Kiyaghneq ataasighhaatmineng uygukutistesughniituq.
48003021	Liilightuusaat tengvimun ayuqatkii Kiyaghneghem akequsii? Nakaa, yeghlegillu! Liilightuusam unguvallengesaghqaqsaqumikut, taawa Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghnayaghiinkut elqughutngalleghminun taaggun Liilightuusakun.
48003022	Iwernga Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut qamaglluki nunam yugi seghleghqellghem anusimingllaghaqii. Enkaangam Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkani tuunelleqaa ugpeqikaghhiinaghnun Jesus Christ-ameng.
48003023	Salin ugpellghilluku anusimingllaghaayaghtukut Liilightuusanun. Liilightuusat aaghqutaqnguyaghiinkut kenlanga Kiyaghneghem whangkunnun liitestellghanun ugpelleq.
48003024	Liilightuusat apaqutisteksaghaput kenlanga Christ-am tagillghanun. Enkaam maaten ugpeqillemteggun Christ-akun, Kiyaghneghem nallghusaghyaghqaaghtiinkut elqughutngalleghminun.
48003025	Ugpelleq tagitanganeng Christ-akun Liilightuusat apaqutisteknanighaput.
48003026	Ugpeqilleghpesigun Christ Jesus-kun, qamagllusi Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqiisi.
48003027	Paaptaayaaqngafsi Christ-amun, aallghiistun Christ-a pikaqaghsi tawaten pilugugaqelleghpesistun.
48003028	Allangughutngitut Jews-etlu Gentile-etlu; allangughutngitut qepghaghtelaaghetlu qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu; allangughutngitut yugetlu aghnatlu, qayughllak qamagllusi atunem ayuqusi Christ Jesus-kun.
48003029	Christ-am pikngukangisi taawa Abraham-em kingunqiisi. Enkaam elpesillu piliilleqaghsi Kiyaghneghem akequsaa Abraham-emun.
48004001	Nagneghutaghllakun whaten, ighneq piliitiyaghqaq atami saghyanganeng qepghaghtelaaghestun kiyaghutkayuguuq mekestaaghhaaluni, qaywa ellngan piksaghngaagu sangwaa tamaghhaan atami pinga.
48004002	Mekestaaghhaaluku yuget aflengakegkaqaat, sangwaatlu tamaakut ellngan pikaghqii kenlanga atangan piyaghqaaghhnillghanun.
48004003	Whangkutallu tawatesaghtukut. Taghnughhaaluta qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtukut nunam igleghutistengitnun tughneghaghnun.
48004004	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaa aghneq kaasan kayagtekaa Ighneni, allgeqaq aghnakun. Ellngan qaatkegkaqii Liilightuusat
48004005	itemunnaluta Liilightuusaneng, avaqutaliitesqellutallu Kiyaghneghmun.
48004006	Elpesi avaqutaqutmineng Kiyaghneghem, Ighneghmi Taghneghakek kayagtekaqaak ilumnnun, qevullutek pikak, “Abba, Ata!”
48004007	Enkaam Kiyaghneghqun qepghaghtelaaghunanightuten, avaqutaqaaten. Avaqutaqaaghtutmineng ellmi pini elpenun piliitesleqii.
48004008	Sivunghani nalluksaghaghsi Kiyaghneq, enkaam qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi kiyaghneghunghilngughnun.
48004009	Iwernga maaten liisimakaghsi Kiyaghneq, nalighmeng ipapestaaq Kiyaghneghuuq liisimakistezi. Sangafsingam uteghsugetsi kayaalngughnun sasiinghilngughnun igleghutilghiinun tughneghaghnun? Sangan tamaakunun qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigsugetsi?
48004010	Paninang qaatkaqasi apeghtughallghit aghneghnun, tanqinun, ayumiqulleghnun aghneghnunllu salqumsivikaqegkangitnun.
48004011	Alingutkaqamsi, qamaglluni qepghaatilqa elpesinun sasiinghinnayukan.
