48004012	Ugpeqaalgutemni, tungsighvikamsi, whangamtun lliighesqeqaghllusi qayughllak whangallu elpesistun lliiqaagunga Gentile-estun. Sivunghani ungipaqitaqngamsi Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng seghletun pimangitaghpesinga. Neqamikaghsi tawani takukaqamsi qayughllak qinuyugulghiinga.
48004014	Qaywa qinuyulleghma seghleliightesaghngaaghmisi ukavaghsimangitaghpesinga nalighmeng ighsakumangitaghpesinga. Yeghlegi, upughataghpesinga nikimqun Kiyaghneghem yaqulgatun, nalighmeng Christ Jesus-etun.
48004015	Naagu quyangalqesaqesi? Liisimakamsi piyaqleguyaqata iyesi nusugluki tagivaghnayaghasi.
48004016	Enkaam anguyiitestengngaa qayughllak ungipaaskemsi ipapigmeng?
48004017	Tamaakut yuget qaatkutesukangisi Jews-et Liilightuusiitnun, piyukepigtiisi ellmeggnun malighqutaqesqellusi, iwernga apallaat pininghituq. Ellngita aaftesugiisi whangamneng, ellnginaghmeng maligtesqelluteng.
48004018	Pinightuq yuget suumqegkumegteki yulguteteng, taawanginaghhaq apalliit piniqata. Quunpeng taana ipanguuq, aviisaghngaaghma.
48004019	Taghnughhaghhamni, katam aghnam aqnighqellghatun ighniyulleghmini whangallu tawaten aqnighqutkenneqigtengngwaamsi kenlanga Christ-atun lliilleghqaghpesinun.
48004020	Whaatuq maaten elpesinilnguunga enkaam liisimaknayalghiinga naten aleghqughyaghqaalusi. Sumeghyalitkeghllawaamsi.
48004021	Elpesi atuqiyulghiini Jews-et Liilightuusiitneng, talwa liigikigatasi Liilightuusat sameng pisiitangi.
48004022	Igaqngaaq Akuzitni Igaqegkani Abraham-nguq maalghugegneng ighnelguuq, aallgha qepghaghtelaaghqun aghnakun, ilanga qepghatelaaghunghilngughqun aghnakun.
48004023	Ighnegha qepghaghtelaaghqun allgeqaaguq yugestun kitutun alngunak. Iwernga ilanga ighneghan qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughqun allgeqaaguq qayughllak Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkanga.
48004024	Taakuk aghnak usputaaguk maalghugegnun akequsagkenun Kiyaghneghem. Qepghaghtelaaq Hagar akequsaatun Kiyaghneghem ayuquq Mount Sinai-mi enkaam allgeqaagut qepghaghtelaaghqaaluteng.
48004025	Hagar Mount Sinai-nguluni ayuquq, Arabia-melnguq. Aghneghmimllu Jerusalem-ngatun ayuquq, qayughllak avaqutaqullghiit qepghaghtelaaghuut Liilightuusanun.
48004026	Iwernga paamna Jerusalem qepghaghtelaaghituq, ellnga naakaghput.
48004027	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Quyaghllagi, elpek qumingigalnguuten, aqnighqigalnguuten ighniyulleghmeng. Ugigpek uniteghngaaten, araa quyaghllagem angtalanganeng qayughllak taghnughhaghtaaghasaghqaaguten aghnameng ugilegmeng.”
48004028	Ugpeqaalgutemni, Isaac-etun ayuqusi qayughllak avaqutaqiisi Kiyaghneghem apalluqluku akequsani Abraham-emun.
48004029	Tamaani aghneghni taana ighneq allgeqaq yugestun kitutun alngunak amyuqetaatkegkaqaa ighneq allgeqaq Taghnegham pillghakun. Paninang maaten tawatetuq.
48004030	Iwernga Akuzitet Igaqegkat sameng piitgu? “Qepghaghtelaaq aghnaq, ighneghallu aghulaqestekek. Qayughllak qepghaghtelaaghem aghnam ighnegha nengighnaanghituq atami saghyanganeng maligulluni ighneghanun qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum aghnam.”
48004031	Ugpeqaalgutemni, whangkuta avaqutaqenghitiinkut qepghaghtelaaghem aghnam, iwernga avaqutaqiinkut qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum aghnam.
48005001	Christ-am whangkuta itemutkaqutanganeng, itemepiigumaakut. Enkaangam nekevghatek aghuliilkaalusi, qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtegpenasi Liilightuusanun.
48005002	Nagatek! Whanga, Paul, ungipaatamsi: circumcise-estekufsi Liilightuusam pisqellghatun, taawa Christ-am apeghiiqaa kayutkennaanghitaghsi.
48005003	Alla kelengasaaghaqa tamaghhaan yuuk, circumcise-estekumi taawa qaatkengngwaaghyaghqaqii qamaglluki Liilightuusat.
48005004	Liilightuusatgun nallghusaghtesnaqutkegkufsi Kiyaghneghem elqughutngallghanun, aaflequsi elpesineng Christ-ameng, unilleqaghsillu Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha.
48005005	Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun utaqangwaaghput sighimalleghput apeghiighesqelluku. Sighimalleghput taananguuq: Kiyaghneghmun nallghusiisqelluta elqughutngallghanun ugpeqellemteggun Christ-a.
48005006	Christ Jesus-em pikngukanginkut, yuuk megnunanghituq circumcise-ekaakumi nalighmeng circumcise-ellghilkumi. Una esgha megnunalghii, ugpeqilleq Christ-akun piniqistilghii yulgutemnneng.
48005007	Sivunghani pinitungwaaq pinguyaghtusi. Kitum qaatkunnanightestisi ipapighqelleghmun?
48005008	Kiyaghneghem tuqlughistegpesi pilqenghitaa.
48005009	Neqamikluku, “Yeast-angiighhaam ghhuughtesteghllagaqaa akuutaq.”
48005010	Elpesillu whangallu pikutanganeng Atanghem, nalluneqsukenghitanka ugpeqnanifqiita apeghtuusanka elpesinun pisqelluki. Liisimakaqallu Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqaa seghleliighqilghii elpesineng, kinanguyaghngaan.
48005011	Ugpeqaalgutemni, ungipaqingigatunga yuget circumcise-esqelluki. Tawaten ungipaqinguyaquma Jews-et amyuqetaatkennanighnayaghaatnga enkaam qaquuraa Christ-am sugagniighutkennayanghitaat.
48005012	Tamaakut seghleliighqilghiit elpesineng circumcise-elleghmeng, ellngistuq circumcise-estengnguluteng eunuch-englallghiit ellmeggneng.
48005013	Ugpeqaalgutemni, Kiyaghneghem tagsiqaqiisi itemngalleghmun Christ-akun. Taawanginaq atuqegpenaan itemngalleghsi atughyaghqaaluki seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi yugusim. Itupill qepghaateki ilasi piniqelleghpesigun.
48005014	Qayughllak qaatkelleqasi qamaglluki Liilightuusat qaatkegkufsigu una Liilightuusaq: “Piniqluku yulguten piniqelleghpetun elpeneng katam.”
48005015	Iwernga elpesineng qaniqunnaqngukufsillu pillugunnaqngukufsillu ugighsalghiistun teghikusastun, kelengatek, qayughllak naafqutunnaqusi.
48005016	Whaten piimsi, kiyaghtek qaatkellukek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak. Tawaten pikufsi atuqnaanghitasi seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi yugusim.
48005017	Qayughllak seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi yugusim kipullegngaat Taghneghagnun, piyukellghi Taghnegham kipullegngaat piyukellghanun yugusim. Taakuk anguyakutuk enkaam atuqnaanghitasi piyukellesi.
48005018	Taghnegham maghyaghquungukangisi taawa Liilightuusat atuqsaghqaananighasi.
48005019	Yugusim seghleghqelleghtuqam piyukellghi nalluniitut. Ukunguut: alngunaseghaq, seghletun atuqutelleq, nuqesigalnguut alngunak atuqimun,
48005020	maniiguutelleq kiyaghnengllaqanun, uyviiniqelleq, anguyiqelleq, pillugutelleq, qungyaqilleq, sakritelleq, ellnginaayugtelleq, aafqemeraalleq, qerngughpagtaatelleq,
48005021	aqinalleq, suumelleq, qerngughulluteng aghsaghpaagtaqut seghletun pilleghmun, ilanganengllu seghleghqelleghneng. Kelengasaaghnaqlaataghamsi sivunghani pillemtun, tamaakut tawaten kiyaghlleghhiit ilatnganaanghitut quyasleghaneng Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghan.
48005022	Naqamenraq Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham piitestekii ukunguut: piniqelleq, quyamalleq, nekeggmelleq, nuqenneghtulleq, nangllegtalleq, pinilleq, ataasiighmetelleq,
48005023	yakumangingitelleq, nuqetelleqlu. Taakut iinghutellghitut alngunak liilightuusani.
48005024	Christ Jesus-em pingita qaquuraatkaqiit seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghit yugusimeng.
48005025	Kiyaghtengngukumta Taghneghagnekun, qaatkeltekek Taghneghak.
48005026	Qukaayugneghufqaamta, qinuyugtifqaamta, aqinakutefqaamta.
48006001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, kina seghleghqellghem kaatfallugtekagu, elpesi kiyaghlleghhiini Taghneghagnekun, pinitungwaaq yakuqluku kayusiiteggu maligunneqigtesqelluku Ataneghmun. Elpesillu, kelengangwaaghlusi luuraq nanghiiqullengnayukafsi.
48006002	Kayutkutullusi seghleliilleghpesini; tawaten qaatkelleqaghsi Liilightuusaq Christ-am qelghutkaa.
48006003	Kina sumeghtaghaqumi sanguniluni, sangunghiteghngaaghmi, ellmineng puughtengnguuq.
48006004	Yeqay tamaghhaghmi yugem yuvghiighwaaghligu kiyaghtaalleni. Enkaam piniqan quyaknakanga ellmi katam apeghiiqani usputaqellngunaan kitum apeghiiqaanun.
48006005	Tamaghhaghmi yugem igleghusaghqaqii ellmi piyaghqani.
48006006	Kina alngunak apeghtuqaq Kiyaghneghem apeghtuusaaneng, pinilghiimeng tuunili apeghtughisteminun.
48006007	Sumeghtaghaquvek puughlleqniluku Kiyaghneq elpeneng puughtengnguuten. Yugem sangwaa piitesiighaqani unataghyaghqaqaa.
48006008	Piitesighaquvek efqughhnaluku seghleghqengngalghii piyukellghen, taagken unataghlleqan tuqulleq. Iwernga piitesighaquvek efqughhnalukek Taghneghak, taagken Taghneghagneng unataghlleqan kenlengilnguq unguvalleq.
48006009	Enkaam qinuyagutegpenaan pinitun pilleq pilteggu, qayughllak iilqayunghilkumta pilleghqaq kaaskan akileghtuusangellequkut.
48006010	Enkaam pilleghqalgunemta iiwleng pinitun piiqelteki qamagtengngwaaghluki yuget, kiyang tamaakut angleguteliitkaput Christ-akun.
48006011	Esghaqaghtekiqun yaagtughllaget igallghenka latamalusi!
48006012	Yuget esghaghsaqsuneghtuqatlu qanatkiyuneghtuqatlu pinitun qepghalleghmeggneng, ellnginguut circumcise-esquughwaaghilghiit elpesineng. Tawaten piiqut qayughllak alingaqelghiit amyuqetaatkellengnayukameng ungipaqegkumegteggu qaquuraghhiinaa Christ-am, avelghaghluku circumcise-elleq.
48006013	Qaywa circumcise-ekaayaghngaaghmeng, ellngit katam qaatkusigatut Liilightuusanun. Circumcise-esqesugaqiisi qanatkepigesnaghnalusi ellmeggnun circumcise-estekaqnilusi.
48006014	Iwernga whanga qananaanghitunga sameng alngunak iwerngaqun qaquuraaneng Atanemta Jesus Christ-am. Tuqullghakun qaquurami nuna qaquuraamaaq whangamnun, enkaam whanga qaquuraamaanga nunamun.
48006015	Megnunanghituq yuuk circumcise-ekaakumi, nalighmeng circumcise-ellghilkumi. Una megnunalghiinguuq: Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqiinkut nutaghaaluta yugni.
48006016	Tamaghhiitnun qaatkullghiinun apeghtuusamnun, yeqay Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellghallu nangllegtallghallu ellngitnilli, Israel-nganillu Kiyaghneghem.
48006017	Whaken kenlekluku kitum alngunak alla seghleliightestefqaama pilinga qayughllak yugusimnilnguut maamellghet kelgutngwaat qephaghtelaaghulqa Jesus-mun.
48006018	Ugpeqaalgutemni, yeqay piniqingalghii kayusillgha Atanemta Jesus Christ-am tamaghhaghpesinilli. Amen.
49001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut. Christ Jesus-em apostle-kaanga Kiyaghneghem piyukellghakun. Latanguunga Kiyaghneghem yugitnun Ephesus-melngughnun, ataasiighmelnguut maligsaaghtengi Christ Jesus-em.
49001002	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am nanglleklisillu nekeggmellelguslisillu.
49001003	Usuqellengli Kiyaghneq, Atanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am! Christ-akun Kiyaghneghem quyastengngwiinkut tamaghhaaneng tunusameng qilagtameng.
49001004	Nuna ulimallghilluku Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiinkut Christ-akun pelungitesqellutallu avutngitesqellutallu ellminun.
49001005	Qayughllak Kiyaghneghem piniqegkanginkut, neghighluku allughqinakegkaqiinkut avaqutaaluta Jesus Christ-akun. Tawaten pikaaguq qayughllak piyukegkanga, efquqegkangallu.
49001006	Enkaam usuqaghput Kiyaghneq qayughllak ighlegpenani nangllekeghllagiinkut piniqegkamikun Ighneghmikun.
49001007	Christ-am aawakun, Kiyaghneghem itemutkaqiinkut seghleghqellemnneng. Seghevutii seghleghqelleput apalluqluku nangllegtalleghllani
49001008	aqeghqusiqeghllakanga whangkunnun. Peghqinghustiinkutlu liigikestiinkutlu
49001009	uspeqelleghmineng salin aliighsigalkemmineng sivunghani. Taananguuq Kiyaghneghem uspeqegkaa, pikaqaa Christ-akun.
49001010	Kiyaghneghem uspeqelleni apeghiighlleqaa pilleghqaghllugwaaghmi. Qamagtengngwaaghluki ulimaani qilagmelnguutlu nunamelnguutlu qerngughlleqii, Christ-amun igleghutesqelluki.
49001011	Christ-akun Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiinkut ellminun yuguluta. Ayumirugllak piyukelleghmitun uspeqegkaqaa. Ellngan sangwaa tamaghhaan piyukelleghmitun pistaqaa.
49001012	Whangkuta Jews-eni ugpeqani sighimakiyuwhaaqaagukut Christ-akun. Enkaam kiyaghtaallemteggun usuqesleqaghput Kiyaghneq aangelleghllaganun.
49001013	Christ-akun elpesillu nagaquqaqaghsi ipapik ungipaq. Pinilghiinguuq Ungipaq ungipaatilghii yugulilleghpesineng. Ugpeqaqngafsigu Christ-a, Kiyaghneghem nalluniiqaqiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng, akequsaqegkamineng tuunelleqnilukek.
49001014	Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham ipapighqestiinkut pagitaghqamnneng kenlanga whangkuta piliitelleghqamnnun. Enkaam usuqelleqaghput Kiyaghneq aangelleghllaganun!
49001015	Nagaquumaaqa ugpeqilleghsi Ataneghqun Jesus-kun, piniqelleghsillu tamaghhiitnun Kiyaghneghem yugitnun. Tamaaken apalluqluku,
49001016	neqamikaqamsi yughanemni, iyamsiqayagunneghmeng taaqigatamsi Kiyaghneghmun.
49001017	Ataghllakaa Atanemta Jesus Christ-am. Ellnganun tungsiitaqamsi peghqinghusqellusi Taghneghagkenkun, liigikataghiisqellusi Kiyaghneghmeng.
49001018	Yughaatkaqa nighuk kuukgutesqelluku ilugpesinun, liigikesqelluku sighimalleq Kiyaghneghem elpesinun pikestekaa qayughllak nakmikegkaqiisi. Yughaatkamsillu liigikesqelluki kemnaghllaget quyastelleghllaget Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkii yugminun.
49001019	Yughaghtungallu liigikesqelluku seghleghllaguuq Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaga qepghalghii whangkunni ugpeqilghiini. Taana aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllak ataasiiguq Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtisiqegkaa Christ-amun tuqulleghmeng. Taagken qilagmi Kiyaghneghem aqumesimaa aghenqigneghmikun.
49001021	Kiyaghneghem qulighpigaaghtestekaqaa Christ-a tamaghhiitneng igleghutisteneng, qelghikayugneng, aghtughyaghqaanghillelegneng, umiilegnengllu. Aatgha ingyaatngaghllagtuq ateghyaggaghneng nunami whani, nunaghraghaghqamillu.
49001022	Kiyaghneghem llikaqaa sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku Christ-am itegaan asinganun, naasquutistengllaqaqaallu samun tamaghhaanun apalluqluki ugpeqat.
49001023	Qamaglluteng ugpeqat yugusiqii Christ-am, enkaam ellnga iighwightuq. Christ-am iighwightaa sangwaa qamaglluku nani alngunak.
49002001	Sivunghani taghneghasi tuqungayaghtut qayughllak qaatkumangilkesi Kiyaghneq, seghleghqestenguyaghtusillu.
49002002	Tawatesaghtusi kiyaghtengngulusi nunam seghleghmun igleghneghanun. Qaatkengnguyaghaghsillu igleghutistengat tughneghaat qilagamelnguut. Ellnganguuq aangwaalleghpigaq tughneghaq igleghutilghii yugneng qaatkusigalngughneng Kiyaghneghmun.
49002003	Qamaglluta kiyaghtekaagukut tamaakustun yugestun. Atuqegkaqaput seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghi yugusimtallu umyugamtallu. Enkaam qamaglluta allgeqaatemnneng seghleghqestenguluta, aghyuullengnaqnguyaghtukut Kiyaghneghem sakraallghakun.
49002004	Iwernga Kiyaghneq nangllegtaghllagtuq, piniqepigtiinkutlu.
49002005	Qaywa taghneghaput tuqungayaghngiita apalluqluki seghleghqelleput, Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtiinkut maligulluta Christ-amun. (Yugulikaagusi Kiyaghneghem nangllekellghakun.)
49002006	Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtiinkut maligulluta Christ Jesus-mun, whangkunnunllu aqumelgusightestaa qilagmi.
49002007	Kiyaghneq tawaten pikaaguq kinguliighaghnun liitesqelluku piniqelleghrukutaaghllani whangkunnun Christ Jesus-kun.
49002008	Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghakun yugulikaagusi ugpeqilleghpesigun. Yugulilleghsi elpesineng pilqenghitaghsi, Kiyaghneghem tunusaqaa elpesinun.
49002009	Yugulillghitiisi apalluqluku salleghsi, enkaam qukaayugutkesaghqaqenghitaghsi.
49002010	Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqiinkut tawatelluta. Christ Jesus-kun ulimaaqiinkut qepghiisqelluki pinilghiit qepghaqat. Sivunghani taakut pinilghiit qepghaqat yataaghqengngwaaqaqii whangkunnun qepghiisqelluki kiyaghtellemnni.
49002011	Neqamikluku Gentile-ngulusi allgeqaagusi. Jews-et atighaqiisi “circumcise-ellghilnguut”, ellmeggneng atiqayuguut “circumcise-ekat”. (Circumcise-ellghat yugusighhiiniitnituq.)
49002012	Neqamikluku tamaani pilleghni nalluksaghaghsi Christ-a kinangutanga. Nunataayaghtusi Israel-eghmiinun enkaam ilatellghisaghtusi Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaanun ellngitnun. Nunami whani kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi sighimallngunasillu Kiyaghnengunasillu.
49002013	Iwernga maaten pilleghmi Christ Jesus-mun ilasimaasi. Sivunghani awavansaghtusi Kiyaghneghmeng, iwernga maaten pilleghmi tughaaghusimaasi ellnganun Christ-am aawakun.
49002014	Christ-a ellnga katam nekeggmelqaghput. Ellnganguuq ataasiightestilghii Jews-enengllu Gentile-enengllu. Naafqegkaqaa minglluta aaftilghii whangkunneng, enkaam anguyakunnanighqegkaqiinkut.
49002015	Christ-am tuqulleghmikun atuunanighqegkaqii Jews-et Liilightuusiitlu qelghusiitlu. Tawaten pikaaguq Jews-etlu Gentile-etlu ataasiightesqelluki ellmikun. Enkaam nekeggmellengestekaqii.
49002016	Tuqulleghmikun qaquurakun, Christ-am ugumikunnanighqii Jews-etlu Gentile-etlu. Taagken ataasiightestii, ilaliighutestiillu Kiyaghneghmun.
49002017	Christ-a tagiluni ungipaqikaaguq nekeggmelleghmeng elpesinun Gentile-enun, awavantengnguyalghiisi Kiyaghneghmun. Ungipaqikaaguqlu nekeggmelleghmeng Jews-enun, qantaghantengngulghiit Kiyaghneghmun.
49002018	Enkaam Christ-akun Jews-enillu Gentile-enillu tagiyaqlegughtukut Atamun ataasikun Taghneghakun.
49002019	Enkaangam elpesi Gentile-eni nunataananightusi. Itupill nunalgutkaaghtiisi Kiyaghneghem yugita, ilatusillu nengllugutanganun Kiyaghneghem.
49002020	Mangteghaatun ayuqusi nekeftekat tunemangllaqiitgun apostle-etlu uuknaliqistetlu. Christ Jesus ellnga katam kangigham uyghakaa.
49002021	Qamaglluteng mangtegham nalighneghi nekeghquutngaat qerngaghmeng Christ-akun. Taakut nalighneghet nulayalghiimeng temple-ngughtengnguut Ataneghmun. Taana temple-a agleghnaghtuq.
49002022	Ilatngalleghpesigun Christ-amun, maligullusi ilangitnun ugpeqanun nekeftengnguusi mangteghamun Kiyaghneghem kiyaghfiganun Taghneghagmikun.
49003001	Tamaaken apalluqluku, whanga, Paul, anusimingllaghvigmetunga qayughllak qepghaaskegka Christ Jesus elpesi apalluqlusi Gentile-eni.
49003002	Entaqun nagaquumaaghsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtalleghmikun qepghaqalitkaqaanga elpesinun.
49003003	Kiyaghneghem liitestaa whangamnun qayvightellghilnguq uspeqelleni. Qavnganghhaq latatkaghtekaqaqa taana.
49003004	Atightuqufsigu latatkegkaqa liilleqaghsi liigikelqa qayvightellghilnguq uspeqelleq Christ-ameng ayuqelghii.
49003005	Sivunghani Kiyaghneghem ungipaatellghitii yuget qayvightellghilngughmeng uspeqelleghmineng. Iwernga ukuni aghneghni Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun qayvightaa uspeqelleni agleghnalghiinun apostle-minunllu uuknaliqisteminunllu.
49003006	Whatetuq uspeqellgha: Gentile-et ugpeqilleghmegteggun Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ilasimaat Jews-enun Kiyaghneghem quyastellghanun. Nalighneqaaghsimii ataasim yugusim, enkaam ilatut Kiyaghneghem akequsaanun Christ Jesus-kun.
49003007	Kiyaghneghem nangllegtalleghmikun, aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu tunusalitaanga qepghaghtengulunga ungipaqesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipat.
49003008	Ukalighpigaagunga tamaghhiitneng Kiyaghneghem yuganeng. Tawalliima Kiyaghneghem nangllegtalleghmikun tunusalitaanga whaten: nakmikaanga Gentile-enun ungipaqesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipat Christ-am aklunginganeng ayuqelghiit. Aklungingi ingyaatngaat yuget liigikellghitneng.
49003009	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaangallu liigikestesqelluki qamaglluki yuget qayvighsimangilngughmeng uspeqelleghmineng. Kiyaghneghem, ulimaghikam sameng tamaghhaaneng, qayvightellghitaa uspeqelleni piinlighyuggaalleghmeng maatemun.
49003010	Taagken qilagnilnguut: igleghutilghiitlu, aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu, Kiyaghneghem liitesleqii allaaghhiinaghmeng peghqinelleghmineng. Tawaten pillequq yugmikun yughaghvignilngughteggun.
49003011	Tamaakunguut Kiyaghneghem uspeqegkii salin nunangllalghilluni. Apeghiighumii Christ Jesus-kun Atanemteggun.
49003012	Ugpeqillemteggun Christ-akun aglaghyaghqaaghsimaakut Kiyaghneghmun tetullngunaamtallu alingellngunaamtallu.
49003013	Enkaangam iilqayagutegpenaan ugpeqilleghsi apalluqluku ikfiqutkengngukemsi. Ikfiqelleghma quulvaghtesleqiisi.
49003014	Enkaam taana apalluqluku segesqughtunga sivungani Atam.
49003015	Ellnganguuq atighilghii tamaghhiitneng nengllugutneng qilagmelngughnengllu nunamelngughnengllu.
49003016	Yughaghtunga Kiyaghneghmun aklungighllaganeng aghtughyaghqaanghillelitesqellusi iknaqughsiisqeluki ilusi qaamkut Taghneghagkenkun.
49003017	Yughaatkamsi Christ-a kiyaghtesqelluku ilugpesini ugpeqilleghpesigun. Yughaatkamsi akulgusqellusillu, tunemalgusqellusillu piniqelleghqun.
49003018	Yughaatkamsi, qamagllukillu Kiyaghneghem yugi, liigiksaqlegusqelluku Christ-am piniqellghan, iqetulanga, tagtalanga, uusqaghtulanga, samavneghtulangallu.
49003019	Elpesinun liisimakesqesugaqa Christ-am piniqellgha, qaywa piyaqnaghngaan liigikngwaalleghqaa. Taagken piniqellghakun, Kiyaghneghem nangaghneghatun wata lliighllequsi.
49003020	Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun qepghalghiikun ilumnni, ellngan piyaqlegwaa qaayghulluku sangwaa alngunak aaptekaghput nalighmeng sumeghtaghaatkegkaghput.
49003021	Kiyaghneq usuqellengli ugpeqatgun yughaghvignilngughteggun, Christ Jesus-kunllu. Usuqiteggu quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
49004001	Anusimingllaghaagunga qayughllak qepghaaskegka Ataneq. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiisi ellminun yugulusi; tamaaken apalluqluku kayemamsi kiyaghtesqellusi Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqesullghatun.
49004002	Iiwleng qusevegllusi, yakumangilliqegpenasi, nuqenneghtulusi, tugukliitullusi piniqelleghqun.
49004003	Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka qerngughutkaqiisi nekeggmelleghqun. Enkaam nanghiiqughllagtek iiwleng kiyaghtek tawaten.
49004004	Ataasiiguq yugusiq, ataasiiguklu Taghneghak, katam tawaten ataasimun sighimalleghmun Kiyaghneghem tagsighiisi.
49004005	Ataasiiguq Ataneq, ataasiiguq ugpeqilleq, ataasiiguq paaptaayelleq.
49004006	Ataasiiguq Kiyaghneq, Atakaat saam tamaghhaan. Ellngan igleghutngwaa sangwaa tamaghhaan, tamaghhaanituq, sametuqlu alngunak.
49004007	Christ-am tamaghhaamta tuunegkaqiinkut tunusameng qepghaqani pisqelluku. Tuunegkaqii taakut tunusat tuunyukelleghmitun.
49004008	Tamaaken apalluqluku Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqegkaalghii, “Mayughaqngami uusqalleghmun tugukaqii uglaapiglleghhiit wayaqat, yugetlu tunusaliquqaqii.”
49004009	Sameng pisiiwa, “Mayuqaaguq”? Whaten pisiiguq, sivukluni ukikaaguq samavek asilighneghanun nunam.
49004010	Enkaam ellnga taana ukikaq samavek, ellnganguuq ataasiq taana mayuqaq pamavek ingyaghluki qilaget, imighnaluku sangwaa qamaglluku nayuutngalleghmineng.
49004011	Ellnganguuq tunusaliquqaq yugnun: ilangi apostle-nguluki, ilangi uuknaliqistenguluki, ilangi evangelist-nguluki, ilangi yughaghtenguluki, apeghtughistengulukillu.
49004012	Taakut tunusalitkaqii apeghtiisqelluki Kiyaghneghem yugi ellngitnun qepghaatesqelluku ellnga. Kiyaghneq tawaten pikaaguq ellngitnun nekeftesqelluku Christ-am yugusii.
49004013	Taana qepghaqaq nagneghllequq kenlanga ataasiightellemnnun ugpeqillemteggun, liisimakellemteggunllu Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem. Taagken angtaniitngwaaghluta Christ-atun lliighllequkut.
49004014	Enkaam taghnughhaghhaananighllequkut. Tamaaken apalluqluku puughtesnaanghitukut yugnun temngimeng apeghtughillghitgun. Apeghtughillghit anuqestunllu imaghllugestunllu ayuqut nuugtaatalghiit yugneng. Tamaakut peghqinelghiit, iqlengalghiit yuget, iqlengateng ipasugnighsaghaqiit maghyaghquneghlluggnaluki yuget.
49004015	Itupill akuzitkelteggu ipapilleq piniqelleghqun, enkaam wata Christ-atun lliighllequkut sallemteggun tamaghhaakun. Christ-a naasquqaat ugpeqat.
49004016	Ugpeqani yugusiqiinkut Christ-am. Ellngakun iingunaghmi yugusiq qerngughutkaaguqlu nuverraatkaaguqlu yugusim ivalungakun. Qamaglluteng nalighneghet qepghanneghmeggni qepghalleghqamegestun, taawa yugusiq nagwaaquq, iknaqughsaghaquqlu piniqelleghqun.
49004017	Enkaangam Atanghem aatghakun whaten piimsillu kelengasaaghamsillu: kiyaghtegpenasingam Gentile-et kiyaghtaallghistun. Sumeghtaghallghit sasiinghilnguugut,
49004018	umyugiitlu liigikingigalnguugut. Ilatnganghitut unguvalleghmun Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaanun, qayughllak nallukngwaaghaat, pineghlluguutlu.
49004019	Talwa kaynguyugyaghqaananiimaat; atuqaqiitlu sangwaat alngunak seghleghet yugusimeng piyukegkiit. Nagneghusugaqiit qamaglluki seghleghet nuqetutegpenaki.
49004020	Iwernga tamaakut liitellghitasi Christ-am apeghtuusiitneng!
49004021	Nagaqupestaaqaqaghsi ellnga, qayughllak maligsaaghtekegkangisi. Enkaam apeghtuqaagusi ipa apeghtuusaaneng Jesus-em.
49004022	Whaten apeghtuqaqiisi: seghleghet piyukelleghpesi puughlleqiisillu naafqelleqiisillu. Tamaaken apalluqluku pegteki nangaghnelusillu kiyaghtaalqesaqesillu.
49004023	Itupill taghnegham nutaghlliki umyugasi.
49004024	Enkaam atuqiteggu nangaghneghraghaghsi qayughllak Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaa ellmitun ayuqluku: elqughutngapiigluku, agleghnaghlukullu.
49004025	Enkaam iqlengiqnanightegngam! Itupill iiwleng apeghteggu ipapilleq ilagpesinun, qayughllak qamaglluta nalighnequghiinkut Christ-am yugusiin.
49004026	Sakritek iwernga seghleghqegpenasi. Siqineq tevightestegpenaan paninang sakritngulusi.
49004027	Talwa tughneghaq pilleghqalitegpenaan nanghiiqusqellusi seghleghqelleghmun.
49004028	Tegleghniighta teglegnanighli. Itupill qepghaghli allgeghusaghqaaluni aklukegkamineng, tuuniyaghqaaghllequqlu aklukilghiinun.
49004029	Akuzitkigpenasi seghleghmeng. Itupill aleghqughteki pinitun yuget aklukillghitni. Pinilghiit akuzitet kayemyaghqaqiit, aneghneghqesaghqaqiit nagallghiit.
49004030	Qivghustegpenakeklu Agleghnalghiik Taghneghakek Kiyaghneghem. Taghneghagmineng nalluniiqaqiisi ellmi piknalusi. Tawaten pikaaguq elpesinun liisimakesqelluku itemulleqiisi seghleghqelleghpesineng Itemutellghem Aghnegha kaaskan.
49004031	Pegteggu ugumikeraaq, sakraa, sakraaghllak, yupighqaghaataq, seghlequuq, qamagllukillu seghleghet.
49004032	Yeghlegi nangllegtaghtek, nafughtaghtek ilagpesinun, seghevutullusillu, katam Kiyaghneghem seghevutkaqegkangisi Christ-akun.
49005001	Kiyaghneghem elpesi avaqutaqutanganeng piniqepigtekii, ayuqesighaghteggu.
49005002	Kiyaghtaallesi aaghqutaqesteki piniqelleghmun, katam Christ-am piniqegkanginkut, tuqumatkegkaqegkanginkutlu. Tuqullgha tepkegtatun tunusatun ayuquq Kiyaghneghmun, aghqutnguuqlu ellnganun.
49005003	Elpesi Kiyaghneghem yukegkangisi, enkaam kitumun alngunak allaniightestengunifqaafsi, nalighmeng alngunak sex-kun seghleghqestengunifqaafsi, nalighmeng pakigniightengunifqaafsi. Tamaakut seghleghuut enkaam Kiyaghneghem yugita piyaghqaqenghitiit.
49005004	Kayngusaghaategpenasi, temngitwhameng akuzitkegpenasi sex-meng, nalighmeng amyughaaghutkegpenasi sex-meng. Itupill iyamsiqayugviksaghqaqaghsi Kiyaghneq.
49005005	Nalluneqnaghhiituq una: Kina alngunak pagisaghqiituq Ataneghpagullghani Christ-amllu Kiyaghneghemllu seghleghqelghii allaniighmeng, alngunak sex-kun seghleghqelleghmeng, nalighmeng pakigniighmeng. (Pakigneghet manigughtenguut kiyaghnengllaqanun.)
49005006	Yugnun puughtestegpenasi ungipaaskangisi tamaakut seghleghqellghet seghleghunghinniluki. Iwernga tawatelnguut seghleghqellghet Kiyaghneq sakraasteghllagaqaat qaatkunneghilnguut ellminun.
49005007	Tamaaken apalluqluku ilategpenasi tawatelngughnun yugnun.
49005008	Yugestun ayuqsaghtusi kiyaghlleghhiit mamlegmi, iwernga maaten kiyaghtengnguusi nighugmi qayughllak Atanghem pikegkangisi. Enkaam kiyaghtek yugestun nighugmelngughestun.
49005009	(Qayughllak kiyaghhneghpesini nighugmi pinightestaqiisi, elqughutngastaqiisi, ipangustaqiisi.)
49005010	Liinnaqiteggullu sangwaa efqughnalghii Ataneghmun.
49005011	Ilatqaghtaghpenasi yugnun satngunghilngughmeng pilghiinun mamlegmi. Itupill liigikesteki tawaten pillghit seghleghuut.
49005012	Kayngunapigtut talwa akuzitkesaghqaaluteng tamaakut piiqegkangit aksaqluku.
49005013	Iwernga qamagtengngwaaghluteng aliightekumeng nighugmun, taawa nateteghpigaatangi whateghlluwaaq aliighllequt, qayughllak sangwaa qamaglluni nighugem esghaghyaghqaaghtesleqaa.
49005014	Tamaaken apalluqluku yuget pikaagut, “Qavalghiimi, taghtughhaaten. Unguvaa tuqulleghmeng enkaam Christ-am kukeglleqaaten.”
49005015	Enkaam kelengalusi kiyaghtek. Peghqinghunghilngughestun kiyaghtegpenasi; itupill peghqinghestun kiyaghtek.
49005016	Pinitun atuqiteggu tamaghhaan pilleghqaghsi qayughllak aghneghni maaten yuget seghletun piiqut.
49005017	Tamaaken apalluqluku nallufqaafsi, iwernga liigikiteggu sangwaa Atanghem pisqesullgha elpesinun.
49005018	Suumegpenasi wine-meng qayughllak naafqelleqiisi. Iwernga imightek Taghneghagneng,
49005019	aleghquutaqlusi akuzitangitneng psalms-et, ilagaatet, taghneghakunllu ilagaatneng. Ilagaghaqitek ilagaatnengllu psalms-enengllu Ataneghmun, usuqillelighlusi ilugpesigun.
49005020	Aatghakun Atanemta Jesus Christ-am, iyamsiqayugvikumanginaghteggu Kiyaghneq Atanga saam tamaghhaan.
49005021	Malighqutaqngalusi ilagpesinun qayughllak siivakngukesi Christ-a.
49005022	Nuliighni, malighqutaqlusi ugigpesinun katam Ataneghmun pilghiistun.
49005023	Qayughllak ugi naasquqaa nulighhan katam Christ-a naasquqegkangat ugpeqat. Christ-a Yugulighistekaat ugpeqat; ellngan yugusiqii.
49005024	Katam ugpeqat malighqutaqellghistun Christ-amun, tawateghpigaq salleghqun tamaghhaakun nulighhet malighqutaqsaghqaagut ugimeggnun.
49005025	Ugini, piniqluki nuliisi katam Christ-am piniqellghatun ugpeqat. Piniqepigtekaqii repall tuqumatkegkaqii.
49005026	Ugpeqat agleghnaghsaqaqii aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun akuzitmi, pelungighsaqaqiillu aghvigluki meghqun.
49005027	Christ-a tawaten pikaaguq aang'ghunnaluki ugpeqat ellminun katam pinighnalghiitun ugiighnaqelghiitun. Tuqukaaguq ugpeqat tagneqriitesqelluki, ungllevregiitesqelluki nalighmeng sameng alngunak afkuyiitesqelluki. Enkaam nuliighqaa agleghnaghllequq, avutngillequqlu.
49005028	Ugim piniqsaghqaqaa nuliini piniqelleghmitun yugusini. Ugi piniqilghii nuliighmineng ellmineng piniqnguuq.
49005029	Kitum alngunak ugumikigataa ellmi katam yugusini. Yeghlegi, neghestaqaallu aflengakaqaallu, katam tawaten Christ-am piiqellghatun ugpeqanun,
49005030	qayughllak nalighnequghiinkut ellngan yugusiin.
49005031	Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten igaqngaaq, “Tamaaken apalluqluku yugem unilleqaak atanillu naanillu ilannaluni nuliighminun. Enkaam nulighqullghiik ataasiighllequk.”
49005032	Taam Akuzitem Igaqegkam qayvightaa megnunapiglleghhii ipapilleq: Christ-allu ugpeqatlu ataasiigut.
49005033	Iwernga taana elpesinunllu ayuquq: tamaghhaghmi ugim piniqepestaaghyaghqaqaa nuliini ellmineng katam piniqelghiistun. Tamaghhaghmillu nulighhem siivaksaghqaqaa ugini.
49006001	Taghnughhaghni, qaatkullusi angayuqaghpesinun Atanghem pisqesullghatun elpesinun. Tawaten elqughutngaaq.
49006002	Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten Kiyaghneq qelghikaaguq, “Quulvaghluku atanllu naanllu.” Taana qelghusaq sivuliiguq akequsalek.
49006003	Whaten Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Kiyaghtaallghen itagnaghllequq, taaklukullu kiyaghllequten nunami.”
49006004	Angayuqani, sakritestegpenaki taghnughhasi. Yeghlegi anglisteki peghqigsaghlukillu apeghtughaghlukillu Atanghem pisqellghatun.
49006005	Qepghaghtelaaghni, alingellelighlusillu ungelegllelighlusillu qaatkiteki piliitistesi nunami whani. Ipapighqellusi qepghaataqiteki, katam Christ-a qepghaatelleghpesistun.
49006006	Piliitistesi qaatkiteki qaywa esghapanghiteghngiisi. Qepghaghtek efqughhnaluki piliitistesi katam efqughtelleghpesistun Ataneq. Ilugpesineng atuqiteggu Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha Christ-amun qepghaghtelaaqelghiistun.
49006007	Enkaam qepghaghtek sagiqlusi Ataneghmun pilghiistun, nakaan yugnun.
49006008	Neqamikluku Atanghem akileghtughyaghqaqii yuget qamaglluki, pinitun pillghitnun. Ataneq tawaten pillequq qepghaghtelaaghnunllu qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughnunllu.
49006009	Piliitisteni, pinitun piteki qepghaghtelaasi katam ungipaatellemtun ellngit pinitun pisqellusi. Alingsequgpenaki. Neqamikluku elpesillu qepghaghtelaasillu ataasimeng Atanelguusi qilagmelngughmeng. Ellngan nanqigsaghqaqii yuget qamaglluki taniillngunaki.
49006010	Kinguliq apeghyaghqaqa unanguuq, iknaqellengitek Ataneghmeng, aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaganengllu.
49006011	Aatekek iingunaagkenka akulghaaghek Kiyaghneghem yataaghqegkakek elpesinun. Taagken tengvimun nekevghasaghqaaghlleqasi Tughneghaam puughtillghi.
49006012	Neqamikluku, pilluwaangunghitaput yuget. Itupill pilluwaangwaaput igleghutilghiit, aghtughyaghqaanghillelget, igleghutilghiit nunam mamleganeng, seghleghetlu tughneghaat qilaganilnguut.
49006013	Tamaaken apalluqluku aatekek iingunaagkenka akulghaaghqek Kiyaghneghem yataaghqegkakek elpesinun! Enkaam seghleliighem aghneghani pilluwaghyaqlegulleqasi anguyagem sughugallghi. Taagken pilluwaneghmeng apeghiiqufsi, elpesi paninang nekevghangullequsi.
49006014	Enkaam nekevghamanginaghtek. Ipapilleq tafsiiteggu, elqughutngalleqlu sakimagiitiiteggu.
49006015	Pinilghiit Ungipat nekeggmelleghmeng ayuqelghiit, kamiiteki.
49006016	Tamaakut saaghwitgun, atuqiteggu ugpeqilleq amiigighaghtaasiiluku qaamsaghqaaluki kumangalghiit aaygungi Tughnegham.
49006017	Aateggu yugulilleq naasqughiitaaluku, Taghneghamllu savigpaga, Kiyaghneghem akuzitkaa.
49006018	Iiwleng yughaghtek Taghnegham maghyaghquutellghakun. Atuqluki allaaghhiinaat yughallghet, aapniighteklu Kiyaghneghmun. Tamaaken apalluqluku kelengalusi, iilqayugpenasi. Iiwleng yughaatkelluki qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem yugi.
49006019	Whangallu yughaatkitengnga Kiyaghneghmun akuzitelitesqellunga. Taagken tetugpenanga apeghlleqaqa sangwaa Kiyaghneghem salin liigikestellghilkanga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ayuqelghii.
49006020	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga akuzistengulunga ellminun. Enkaam tamaaken apalluqluku anusimingllaghaagunga qiipraghusighlunga. Yughaghtek ungipaqinalunga tetugpenanga katam Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun.
49006021	Liisimakesugamsi natetulemnengllu saaqutemnengllu. Tamaaken apalluqluku kayagsimaaqa Tychicus elpesinun. Piniqegkaghput ugpeqaalgutfut, ataasiighmelnguuguqlu qepghaghtenga Atanghem. Kaaskumi ungipaalleqiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng whangamneng, kayemelleqiisillu.
49006023	Kiyaghneghmeng Atameng, Ataneghmengllu Jesus Christ-ameng elpesinun pinguuk nekeggmelleqlu, piniqelleqlu ugpeqillelek.
49006024	Nangllegtalleq tamaghhaghpesinun pinguuq piniqilghiini Atanemnneng Jesus Christ-ameng piniqellelighluku naangyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
50001001	Ukut latat Paul-mengllu Timothy-mengllu pinguut, qepghaghtekiinkung Christ Jesus-em. Lataaqamsi qamagllusi Kiyaghneghem yugitni, yughaghvigem igleghutistengitni, deacon-enillu Philippi-melngughni, ugpeqilghiit Christ Jesus-kun.
50001002	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am nanglleklisillu nekeggmellelguslisillu.
50001003	Iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneqa elpesineng sumeghtaghaatkennemsi.
50001004	Yughaatkennemsi quyapigtaqunga,
50001005	qayughllak neqamikaqa ungipaqilgusiqaqaghpesinga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Kayusiqaqaghpesinga ugpeqiyuggaalleghpesineng Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng whavemun kenlanga.
50001006	Liisimakngwaaghaqa Kiyaghneq piinlighikaq pinilghiimeng qepghaqameng ilugpesini, ellngan apeghiighlleqaa Christ Jesus uteghniqan.
50001007	Itagnapigtuq whangamni sumeghtaghaatkennemsi tawaten qayughllak ilumnitaqusi. Ungipaqingulungallu ipapighqingulungallu Pinilghiit Ungipat ipanguniluki, maatenllu anusimingllaghvigmellunga, qamagllusi allgeghtengngwaaghsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha whangamnun maligullusi.
50001008	Kiyaghneq liisimakistekaqa esghaghyupigtaqamsi, qayughllak qamagllusi piniqamsi Christ Jesus-em piniqellghatun elpesi.
50001009	Yughaatkaqamsi piniqighllagesqellusi, liisimallengataghiisqellusi, liigikellengataghiisqellusillu.
50001010	Tawaten lliiqufsi kiyaghtelleghpesini sangwaa pinilleghpigaq nakmikumanginaghyagulleqaghsi. Taagken Christ-a taginqigtekan pelungillequsillu anaggutellghillequsillu.
50001011	Enkaam unguvallesi imighllequt ipapestaaq piniipiglleghhiimeng Jesus Christ-anginaghhaam piitestekaaneng. Taagken yuget quulvaghlleqaatlu, usuqelleqaatlu Kiyaghneq.
50001012	Ugpeqaalgutemni, elpesinun liisimakesugaqa anusimingllaghvigmetelleghma ipapestaaq uglalghii yuuk nagatestaa Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
50001013	Tamaaken apalluqluku qamaglluteng umiilgem mangteghaan kelengakistengita liitaat anusimingllaghaagunga qayughllak qepghaghtekegkanganga Christ-am.
50001014	Anusimingllaghvigmetelleghma allulluteng ugpeqalghutet ugpeqiighataghaghtestii Ataneghqun. Enkaam wata tetugnanighataghaghtut ungipaqneghmegteggu Christ-a.
50001015	Ipanguuq ilangi ungipaqinguut Christ-ameng qayughllak aqinakngukangatngallu aaghtiiraaghukangatngallu. Iwernga ilangi ungipaqinguut Christ-ameng elqughulluteng.
50001016	Ungipaqinguut qayughllak piniqegkangatnga. Liisimakegkangat Kiyaghneghem tagistekaqaanga whavek nekevghatesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipat anguyamnneng.
50001017	Iwernga ilangit ungipaqinguut Christ-ameng ellnginaayugtem, ipapighqegpenateng. Sumeghmeggni tawaten pilleghmegteggun seghleliighqataghaghnilunga piitnga anusimingllaghvigmesimalunga.
50001018	Itagnaghtuq, ungipaqillghat elqughutngayaghngaan nalighmeng sameng allaneng apallulguyaghngaan, ungipaqillghita quyastaqaanga, qayughllak ungipaqinguut Christ-ameng uglapiglleghiinun.
50001019	Aa-a quyangallequnga, qayughllak liisimakaqa aanyaghqaagunga anusimingllaghvigmeng yughaatkelleghpesigun, kayusillghakunllu Jesus Christ-am Taghneghaan.
50001020	Piyukelleghllakallu, sighimakelleghllakallu esgha taana, kayngusaghaatefqaama pinalunga Christ-amun. Itupill kiyaghsugaqunga ilutulunga wataqaaghaq maaten anusimingllaghvigmetellemni. Enkaam Christ-a quulvallengellequq unguvaghngaaghma, nalighmeng tuquyaghngaaghma.
50001021	Whangamni unguvalleq Christ-anguuq, enkaam tuqulleq allgeghutaghallghuuq.
50001022	Iwernga unguvanaqngukuma qepghaghataghaghllequnga Christ-amun. Nalikek nakmikelleghqaqa nallukaqa, unguvalleq nalighmeng tuqulleq.
50001023	Kukriqnguunga naligkeneng nakmiilleghqamneng. Aghulaqsupigtaqsaghtunga Christ-amennalunga, qayughllak pinighataghaghyaghqaaguq taana.
50001024	Iwernga megnunaghataghaghtuq elpesi apalluqlusi unguvanguunga.
50001025	Ipapighqutkumaaqa taana, liisimakaqa wiin unguvanaqnguunga. Elpesininnaqnguunga kayusiinnalusi nagusqellusi, quyamallengesqellusi ugpelleghpesigun.
50001026	Elpesinun pikuma, usuqataghaghlleqaghsi Christ Jesus whanga apalluqlunga.
50001027	Sayaghngaatnga nagneghuteki kiyaghtaallesi Christ-am apeghtullghatun Pinilghiitgun Ungipatgun. Enkaam esghaghyaghtuqumsi, nalighmeng aviiteghngaaghma nagaququmsi, liigikelleqaqa ataasistun pilleghsi. Liigikelleqaqallu qerngaghpesi nekevghannaqutkellesi Pinilghiit Ungipat anguyagpesineng.
50001028	Alikegpenaki anguyasi, quunpeng ilutullusi. Enkaam tawaten pilleghpesi ipapighqelleqaat ellngit kayaalqiinaanghitut. Elpesi kayaalqiillequsi qayughllak Kiyaghneghuuq kayaalqiistilghii elpesineng.
50001029	Elpesinun qepghaasaqlegughtestekaqaa Christ-a, ugpeqnginaghpenaan, ikfiqelgusiqesillu.
50001030	Pilluwalgusightengnga. Sivunghani esghapakaqaghpesinga piyaqliilghiinga, nagaquqaqasillu piyaqliillghenka maaten. Elpesillu tamaakut ataasit piyaqliighutkennaqngwaasi.
50002001	Kiyaghtaalleghpesi Christ-akun iknaqughtisii? Piniqellghan ilutughtisii? Quyaaqetsii ataasistun lliilghiisi ugpeqaalgutkullghiini Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun? Pinitun piiqestekii, nangllekaqestekii ilasi?
50002002	Tawatetngukufsi, quyamasteghllagtengnga piniqutelleghpesigun, ataasistun sumeghtaghalleghpesigun, ataasistun pilleghpesigun.
50002003	Ellnginaayugneghugpenasi, aangaayugneghugpenasi. Yeghlegi qusevgutullusi, ilagpesineng pinighataghaghnilusi sumeghtaghaghpenasi.
50002004	Suumqegpenaki piyukellghiinasi, yeghlegi piyukellesi pakikaghluki kayusiitaqluki ilasi.
50002005	Sumeghnesi Christ Jesus-em sumeghneghatun ayuqlit.
50002006	Jesus Kiyaghneghtun ayuqsaghngaaghmi sumeghtaghaamangituq Kiyaghneq ingluksaghqaaluku.
50002007	Yeghlegi Kiyaghneghulleni pakigluku, qepghaghtestun lliiqaaguq. Yugestun lliiqaaguq, allgeqaaguqlu yugestun.
50002008	Yugughsami qusevegtekaaguq enkaam qaatkutkaaguq tuqulleghmun, talwa tuqukaaguq qaquurakun.
50002009	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaqaa Jesus aangelleghpigaaluku, atiqaqaallu Ataneghmeng aangelleghpigaghmeng ateghyaggaghneng.
50002010	Enkaangam qamagtengngwaaghluni qilagmelnguum, nunamelnguum, nunam asinganilnguum quulvaghlleqaat Jesus qungughquutelleghmegteggunllu apelleghmegteggunllu, “Jesus Christ-a Atanghuuq.” Tawaten pilleghmegteggun quulvaghlleqaat Kiyaghneq Ata.
50002012	Enkaangam piniqegkamni, elpesinillunga qaatkumanginaqaqaghpesinga, maaten aviillemni qaatkataghaghtengnga. Iighwightesqelluku yugulilleghsi qepghaamanginaghtek alingellelighlusillu ungelegtellelighlusillu;
50002013	qayughllak Kiyaghneq quunpeng qepghaaguq elpesini atuqsagutesqelluku piyukelleni, qaatkusagutesqellusillu piyukelleghminun.
50002014	Sangwaa tamaghhaan piiqiteggu akuzilgafqaafsi, nalighmeng aaghtiiraaghutefqaafsi.
50002015	Enkaam avutngillequsillu pelungillequsillu. Kiyaghneghem avaqutii avutngisaghqaagut kiyaghtengnguluteng akulngitni puughtinghetlu seghleghqestetlu. Kuukgutepestaaghyaghqaagusi ighaleqetaaghestun nunami,
50002016	ungipaqingulusi ellngitnun Christ-ameng unguvallengestikayugmeng. Enkaam taginqigtekan quyasleqaghpesinga elngaatall, qayughllak kiyaghtaalleghpesi kelgusaghqaqaa qepghalqa temngingunghilnguq.
50002017	Ugpeqilleghsillu qepghalleghsillu Kiyaghneghmun aghqutestun ayuqut. Tuquskangatnga whani anusimingllaghvigmi quyallequnga, qayughllak tuqulqa aghqutestun ayuqsaghqaaguq tuunelghii elpesi aghqutegpesinun iighwiisiiluni. Taam qamaglluta quyasleqiinkut.
50002018	Tawateghpigaq elpesillu quyayaghqaagusi, quyalgusighllagyaghqaqaghpesinga.
50002019	Atanghem piyukelqegkagu, Timothy kayagsaghtungestaghaqa elpesinun. Enkaam quyallequnga ungipangegkuma elpesineng.
50002020	Timothy-nginaghhaam sumeghtaghaatkaqiisi sumeghtaghaatkellemtun.
50002021	Tamaakut ilangi kiyang ellmeggneng katam sumeghtaghaatkaqut Jesus Christ-am qepghaqaa avelghaghluku.
50002022	Iwernga Timothy liisimakngwaaghaghsi natetulanga. Ighneghestun kayuusiitkaqaanga ungipaqingulunga Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng.
50002023	Liigikaghesnaqumkun aanesaghqaatka anusimingllaghvigmeng kayaglleqaqa elpesinun.
50002024	Neghyukaqa Ataneq whangallu elpesinun piyaghtungestaghtunga.
50002025	Sumeghtaghaatkaqaqa ugpeqaalgutfut Epaphroditus elpesinun uteghnightesnaluku. Kayutkaghqaghyugumalunga tagistekaqegkesi kayusiitesqellunga. Qerngaamtung qepghaqaagukungllu ungipaqikaagukungllu Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Nekevghatkaqapungllu Pinilghiit Ungipat kipullginaalghiineng.
50002026	Aglaghtesnaqaqa elpesinun qayughllak aghyuqnguuq. Peng'gaqiisi qayughllak nagaquqaqegkesi qinuyullghaneng.
50002027	Ipanguuq qinuyugllakaaguq repall tuquvziqaaguq. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem nangllegyagutkaqaa, whangallu nangllegyagutkaqaanga. Tuqumayaqan wataqaaghaq qivghullengataghaghnayaghtunga.
50002028	Tamaaken apalluqluku wataqaaghaq aglaghtesugaqa elpesinun. Kaaskan esghaqufsigu quyallequsi, enkaangam itagnaghillequnga whangallu.
50002029	Epaphroditus tuquyaghngaaghmi qepghaqaaguq Christ-amun, aaqun tuquvziqaaguq. Kayusiitkaqaanga qayughllak elpesi kayusiitepagningitkaqaghpesinga, aviilnguusi. Quyakusiqluku upughannakesi qayughllak anglegutkaghsi Ataneghqun. Enkaam quulvaghluki qamaglluki yuget Epaphroditus-etun ayuqelghiit.
50003001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, naangniitkun ungipaasuwamsi, “Quyamaaqitek Ataneghqun!” Qinuyagusigatunga ungipaanneqiggnemsi latatgun igaqegkamneng sivunghani, enkaam ilallequq paqniitelleghpesinun.
50003002	Kelengalusi seghletun pikayugneng, tamaakuneng qikmineng, yuguut sagiqutilghiit kepfikesqelluki yugusit.
50003003	Whangkutanguukut ugpeqani circumcise-epiiwaaqani qayughllak manigughaqaghput Kiyaghneq Taghneghagkenkun, usuqaqaghputlu Christ Jesus. Neghyungigatukutlu Kiyaghneghmun piliitesqelluta whangkuta katam sallemteggun.
50003004	Kina alngunak Kiyaghneghem piliisaghqaqsaqagu ellngan katam sallghakun, whanga piyaghqaayaghtunga. Yuget tawaten piyaghqaayaqata whanga wataqaaghaq pinayaghtunga ukut apalluqluki:
50003005	Circumcise-ekaqaatnga pingayuneng inglulek aghneq atughyamkun kingunganeng allgelleghma. Israel-eghmiineng pinguunga, ramkenganeng Benjamin-em. Hebrew-piiguunga, angayuqagkallu Hebrew-nguuk. Malighqutaqngaghllagtunga Jewish-et Liilightuusiitnun, tamaaken apalluqluku Pharisee-ngughtunga.
50003006	Sagiqepigllunga amyuqetaatkegkaqanka ugpeqat. Qaatkengngwaaqaqanka Jews-et Liilightuusiit repall anaggutelleghmun avutngitkaagunga.
50003007	Iwernga tamaakut allgeghtekaqnikaqsaqenka iflamaanka apalluqluku Christ-a.
50003008	Ipa sangwaat qamaglluki iflamaanka apalluqluku megnunaghtulnga liitngwaallemneng Christ Jesus, Atanqa. Ellnga apalluqluku sangwaat qamaglluki egsimaanka. Esghaghanka mallastun ayuqluki allgeghteqeghnaluku Christ-a,
50003009	ilatngwaaghtungallu ellnganun. Ugpeqnaniimaaqa whangamneng pinighnaqelleq qaatkutellemkun Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaanun. Yeghlegi liisimakaqa Kiyaghneghem pinightestaqaanga qayughllak ugpeqegkegka Christ-a. Una pinilleq Kiyaghneghmeng ayuquq, yuget allgeghtaqaat ugpeqilleghmegteggun Christ-ameng.
50003010	Piyukelleghllakaqa, liinnaluku Christ-a, nanghiighnalukullu aghtughyaghqaanghillgha unguvaghtellghan; ilannalungallu ikfiqellghanun, ellngatunllu lliighyaghqaalunga tuqullghani.
50003011	Tawaten pikuma, Kiyaghneq sighimakaqa whangallu unguvaghtesqellunga tuqulleghmeng.
50003012	Whaten pingunghitunga, “Christ-atun lliighumaanga nalighmeng Christ-atun kiyaghtaqunga quunpeng.” Iwernga pinaqellghaqa qamaglluku atuqngwaaqa Christ-am piyukellghatun lliighnalunga atuqnalukullu pisqesullgha whangamnun.
50003013	Ugpeqaalgutemni, sumeghtaghiigatunga kayaalqelghagtuumaniluku. Iwernga ataasiq piiqaqa, puyguluku sangwaa tunutemnilnguq sivutmiighnaqutkaqunga kaannaluku sangwaa sivumnilnguq.
50003014	Enkaam taklaghruketun kilgaaqunguunga kayaalqiisiqnaluku akileghtuusaq, Kiyaghneghem tuqluutkaanun pamavek Christ Jesus-kun.
50003015	Tawaten sumeghtaghanghilkufsi, Kiyaghneghem liigikesnaaghii sumeghtaghallesi anaggutngalghiit.
50003016	Una megnunapigtuq, nagneghutelteki kiyaghtaalleput maliglluku ipapighqelleq liitkaghput.
50003017	Ugpeqaalgutemni, usputaqlunga maligtengnga. Esghapagluki ilangillu kiyaghlleghhiit whangamtun.
50003018	Sivunghani uglaghngaan ungipaataataqaqamsi, maaten ungipaannaqlaataghamsi qunituumaghma. Uglaapigtut kiyaghlleghhiit anguyaguluteng Christ-am tuqullghaneng qaquurakun.
50003019	Suumqaqiit yugusimeng piyukellghit kiyang, Kiyaghneq avelghaghluku. Kaynguyugusighqaqsaqeteng aangaayugusiqaqiit. Sumeghtaghaatkaqaat nunamelngughhiinaq kiyaghtaalleghteng enkaam naafqellengyaghqaagut hell-mi.
50003020	Iwernga ugpeqani whangkuta qilagmiinguukut. Enkaam utaqangwaaghput yugulighista, Ataneq Jesus Christ-a, ukigyaghqaq whangkunnun qilagmeng pamaken.
50003021	Tagikumi allangughsaghqaqii kayaalnguut, tuqumun ayuqelghiit yugusiput. Unguvaghtekatun yugusimitun lliighsaghqaqii aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun. Taaggun ataasikun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun igleghusaghqaaghlleqaa sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku.
50004001	Enkaangam piniqegkamni ugpeqaalgutemni, esghaghyupigtamsi, quyamasiqamsi, akileghtuusaqamsillu qepghallemnun. Tawaten aghuliitekestaghtek Ataneghqun.
50004002	Euodia, Syntyche, qevuullunga qeleghnaqamtek, taaqitek aghivanneghmeng. Ataasistun lliightek, qayughllak ugpeqaalgutkututek Ataneghqun.
50004003	Qepghalgutemni Syzygus, elpeklu kayuusiitaghtikek aghnak taakuk taaqesqellukek aghivanneghmeng. Elkegkenka qevuullutek qepghalgusiqaqiinkut Clement-lu ilangillu qepghalgutenka, qamaglluta ungipaqinguluta Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng yulghuteghllagnun. Qepghalgutma qamaglluteng aatghit igaqngaat Igaakun Unguvallghem. Tawantut igani aatghit qamaglluteng kenlengilngughmeng unguvallengegkat.
50004004	Iiwleng quyamaaqitek Ataneghqun. Pinaqlaataghamsi, Quyamaaqitek!
50004005	Nuqenneghtulleghsi yugem qamaglluni liilligu. Ataneq tagiyaghtungestaghtuq.
50004006	Sumeghyalitkegpenaan sangwaa alngunak. Yeghlegi, sameng aklukufsi yughaneghpesini tungsighaqitek Kiyaghneghmun tuunesqellusi. Iiwleng tungsighaqitek igamsiqayullelighlusi.
50004007	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem ilusillu umyugasillu nekeggmetesnaaghii Christ Jesus-kun. Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellgha aangeghllagtuq, kitum alngunak liigikngwaaghnaanghitaa.
50004008	Enkaangam ugpeqaalgutemni, naangniitangakun latama ungipaasuwamsi sumeghtaghaatkumanginiisqelluki pinilghiitlu usuqsaghqatlu whatelnguut: tamaakut ipapiget, quulvaghyaghqat, elqughutngalghiit, pelungilnguut, piniqsaghqat, tamaakutlu pinitun akuzitkesaghqat.
50004009	Sangwaa qamaglluku nagneghuteggu liitkaghsi whangamneng apeghtughillemkunllu kiyaghtaallemkunllu. Enkaam Kiyaghneq nekeggmellelitikayuk elpesinillequq.
50004010	Elngaatall quyapigtunga Ataneghqun qayughllak qavngarugllaggaaneng whaa allameng kayusiillaataqefsinga! Liisimakaqa kayusiisukaqaghpesinga, iwernga pipagningitkaagusi.
50004011	Aklungunilunga pingunghitunga qayughllak natesaghngaaghma itagnaghaqunga.
50004012	Ilangani nuughngaghma kiyaghtaqunga, ilangani siiptiilunga kiyaghtaqunga. Itagnaghyagusimaanga nani alngunak satulemtun kiyaghhnemni. Itagnaghaqunga kepsughngaghma kiyaghhnemni, iyataghngaaghmallu kiyaghhnemni, talwa aklumaghngaaghmallu, aklunghiteghngaaghmallu.
50004013	Sangwaa alngunak piyaghqaqaqa Christ-akun iknaqughsaghtemkun.
50004014	Paninang elpesi pinitungwaaq kayusiitaqaghpesinga seghleliinemni.
50004015	Elpesi Philippi-yeghmiini, liisimakngwaaghaghsi aghulaqaqngama Macedonia-meng, ungipaqiyuwhaaghaqngama Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng, ellnginaagusi ugpeqani kayusighikat whangameng. Ellnginaagusi ilatngalghiit allgeghutellemnunllu ifliillemnunllu.
50004016	Ataasighhaagpenaan aklupignemni manimeng Thessalonica-mellunga, tuyughaqaghpesinga.
50004017	Iwernga liigikesugamsi tunusasi manit megnunalleghpigaanghitut whangamni. Megnunalleghpigaqta esgha una: akileghtuusaghqaq allgeghsaghqaghsi Kiyaghneghmeng pinitun pillesi apalluqluki.
50004018	Whaa maaten naamaanga, aa-a, talwa siiptiilunga ayuqunga. Tuyuusasi Epaphroditus-kun qamaglluteng kaasimaat, enkaam whaa aklungigatunga. Tunusasi whangamnun aghqutkegkastun ayuqut Kiyaghneghmi efqughtinapiglleghhiit.
50004019	Enkaangam Kiyaghneghma yataaghqunnaaghiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng aklukegkaghpesineng aklungitelleghllagmikun Christ Jesus-kun.
50004020	Kiyaghnemnnun, Atamun usuqilta, quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
50004021	Ungipaataghnakesi qamaglluki ugpeqat Christ Jesus-kun suumqaqankanguq. Ugpeqaalgutet whangamnilnguut suumqaqiisinguq.
50004022	Qamaglluteng Kiyaghneghem yugan suumqaqiisinguq, kiyang taakut Caesar-em mangteghaghmiingita.
50004023	Nangllegtallgha Jesus Christ-am taghneghaghpesinilli.
51001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut. Kiyaghneghem piyukellghakun apostle-ngughtekaagunga Christ Jesus-mun. Timothy-mengllu pinguut ugpeqaalgutemnneng.
51001002	Kiyaghneghem yugitnun pinguut Colossae-melngughnun, ataasiighmelnguut ugpeqaalgutet Christ-akun. Kiyaghneghem Atamta, nanglleklisillu nekeggmellelisillillu.
51001003	Iiwleng iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput Kiyaghneq, Atanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am, yughaatkennemsi.
51001004	Tawaten piiqukut qayughllak nagaquumaaghput ugpeqilleghsi Christ Jesus-meng, piniqilleghsillu tamaghhiitnun Kiyaghneghem yugitnun.
51001005	Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipapiguut. Nagaqughyuwhaaghaqngafsiki, liitkaagusi sighimalleghmeng Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaaneng elpesinun. Enkaam sighmalleghpesi ugpeqillelgustaqiisillu piniqillelgustaqiisillu. Qilagmi Kiyaghneghem kagpagumaa elpesinun sangwaa sighimakegkaghsi.
51001006	Pinilghiit Ungipat quyastimanginaagut yugnun. Enkaam Pinilghiit Ungipat mingitnguut iingunaghhaanun nunam, katam tawaten quyastillghistun elpesinun nagaqughyuwhaaghaqngafsigu Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha. Taagken kenlanga liitaghsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha.
51001007	Liitkaqaghsi Kiyaghneghem nanglleghtallgha Epaphras-meng, piniqegkamnneng qepghalgutemnneng. Ataasiighmelluni qepghaaguq Christ-amun, qepghaqaqaa whangkuta qepghaghyukaqsaqefut.
51001008	Ellngan ungipaasimiinkut piniqilleghmeng Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham tuunegkaaneng elpesinun.
51001009	Aghneghmeng taagken nagaquutemnneng tamaakut, yughaatkennaniigatamsi. Tungsiitngwaamsi Kiyaghneghmun liisimakesqelluku qamaglluku ellngan piyukellgha. Yughaatkaqamsillu peghqinghusqellusi, liigikesqellukillu sangwaat Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham apeghtuutkii.
51001010	Taagken kiyaghsaghqaaghllequsi Atanghem piyukellghatun, iiwleng atuqaqelleqaghsi sangwaa efqughnalghii ellngani. Tawaten kiyaghtelleghpesini allaaghhiinaq pinilghii qepghaghlleqaghsi enkaam wata liilleqaghsi Kiyaghneq.
51001011	Yughaatkaqamsi Kiyaghneghmun iknaqughsiisqellusi ilugpesigun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun. Tawaten piiquq nuqenneghtughteghllagesqellusi nekeggmellelighlusi samun tamaghhaanun.
51001012	Enkaam quyamallelighllaglusi iyamsiqayugvikelleqaghsi Ata. Ellngangulghii elpesinun nengilgutestikaq sameng tamaghhaaneng akequsaqegkamineng tuunelleqniluki yuni kiyaghlleghhiit nighugmi.
51001013	Ellngan yugulikaqiinkut aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng mamlegem enkaam tagitkaqiinkut Ataneghpagullghanun piniqegkami Ighneghmi.
51001014	Ellngan tukfiqaqiinkut, seghevutkaqiillu seghleghqelleput.
51001015	Christ-a tawatetngwaaghtuq aliinneghilngughtun Kiyaghneghtun. Kiyaghtenguuq sivungani sangwaa alngunak ulimallghilluku, enkaam qulighpigaaguq ulimaaghyaggaghneng.
51001016	Ellngakun Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqii sangwaat qamaglluki qilagmelnguutlu nunamelnguutlu. Ulimakaqii esghaqayuput, esghiigalkeputlu tamaakutlu umiilget, atanghet, igleghutistet, pilleghqalgetlu. Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqii sangwaat qamaglluki Christ-akun, Christ-amunllu.
51001017	Christ-a tawantekaaguq sivungitni sangwaat alngunak, aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu sangwaat qamaglluki ellngan nekaghqaghlluwaaghitnitestaqii.
51001018	Ellnga naasquutinguuq ugpeqanun yughaghvigmelngughnun, ellngan yugusiqii. Ellngan yugusiq unguvangustengngwaa. Ellnganguuq unguvaghyuwhaaqaq tuqulleghmeng, enkaam qulighpigaaguq samun tamaghhaanun.
51001019	Kiyaghneghem piyukelqaa qamagtengngwaaghluni ellmi katam kiyaghhnaluni Ighneghmi ilungani.
51001020	Kiyaghneghem Ighneghmikun veghutestekaqii ellminun sangwaat qamaglluki nunamillu qilagmillu. Enkaam aawakun Ighneghmi tuqaaqngan qaquurami ilaliighutestekaqii ellminun.
51001021	Ataasimeng pelleghngayaghtusi Kiyaghneghmeng. Enkaam anguyaksaghiisi sumeghtaghalleghpesigun, seghletunllu pilleghpesigun.
51001022	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem ilaliighunneqigtestiisi ellminun Ighneghmi yugusiin tuqullghakun. Tawaten pikaaguq taginnalusi nayuutngalleghminun agleghnaghlusi, pelungillusi, avutngillusillu.
51001023	Kiyaghneq tawaten pillequq nagnequfsi ugpeqluki Pinilghiit Ungipat aygughikellngunaki. Iqitegpenasi sighmalleghmeng allgeghtekaghpesineng nagaqughaqngafsiki Pinilghiit Ungipat. Taakut Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqnguut tamaghhaani nunam. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga, whanga Paul, qepghaghtengulunga ellminun ungipaqesqelluki Pinilghiit Ungipat.
51001024	Ikfiqelleghma yugusimkun elpesi apalluqlusi quyasteghllagaanga. Tawaten kayusighinguunga apeghiighnaluki Christ-am ikfiqellghi yugusiminun. Ellngan yugusii ugpeqaagut yughaghvigmelnguut.
51001025	Kiyaghneghem qepghaghtengllaqaqaanga ugpeqanun. Tagivaqaqaa una qepghaqaq kayusiitesqellusi, elpesinun liigikngwaaghesqelluki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi.
51001026	Sivunghani Kiyaghneghem qayvighsimangitaa una ipapilleq tamaghhaanun yugnun, iwernga maaten qayvightengngwaa ellmi yugminun.
51001027	Kiyaghneghuuq nakmiilghii yugminun liisimakesqelluku sangwaa qayvightellghilkenni sivunghani. Nakmikegkaqaa liisimakesqelluku aangelleghllaga uum ipapillghem akulngitni Gentile-et. Ipapilleq qayvightekaa unanguuq: Christ-a kiyaghtengnguuq ilugpesini. Christ-anguuq sighimavut kiyaghtesqelluta Kiyaghneghmi ellngan nighughqellghani.
51001028	Enkaam ungipaqngwaaghput Christ-a tamaghhaanun. Qamaglluku peghqinelleghqun, kelengasaaghaqaputlu apeghtughaqaputlu qamaglluki yuget. Tawaten piiqukut taginnaluki ataasikaghtiita yuget Kiyaghneghem nayuutngallghanun angtaniitkaaluki Christ-akun.
51001029	Taana pinaluku taakunginaghhaagneng ughleghiightunga atuqluku Christ-am aghtughyaghqaanghillgha qepghalghii iknaqepiglluni ilumnni.
51002001	Ungipaataghllamsi taakunginaghhaagneng qepghaatillemneng elpesinun, ugpeqanunllu Laodicea-melngughnun, tamaghhaanunllu esghaasigalngughneng whangamneng.
51002002	Tawaten piiqunga ilungit ilutughllengesqelluki, ataasiightesqellukillu piniqelleghqun. Enkaam liigikngwaaghlleqaat sangwaa Kiyaghneghem qayvighsimangilkanga sivunghani. Taana Kiyaghneghem qayvightekaa Christ-anguq.
51002003	Qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem peghqinellghillu liigikingallghillu Christ-ametut. Taakuk aklungistun ayuquk iighngalghiik Christ-ami.
51002004	Ungipaatamsi, kitumun alngunak puughtestegpenasi temngineng apeghtughallghitneng, qaywa ipasugniteghngaata.
51002005	Qaywa uyavansaghngaaghma elpesineng, umyugamkun elpesinitaqunga. Quyaanga qayughllak kiyaghlleghhiisi Kiyaghneghem pisqellghatun, ugpeqilleghsillu Christ-akun aghuliilnguq.
51002006	Tuguklilleghpesistun Christ Jesus Atanghuluku, tawateghpigaq ugpeqilleghqun kiyaghtek ellngakun.
51002007	Ellngakun akulgutek asivanun samavek, ellngakun nekefteki kiyaghtaallesi enkaam iknaqughtek ugpeqilleghpesigun apeghtulleghpesistun. Iyamsiqayugumanginaghtek.
51002008	Kelengalusi! Kitumun alngunak aghulaqutestegpenasi temngitwhatgun apeghtughallghitgun. Tamaakut apeghtughallghet yuget sumeghtaghallghitneng pinguut, tughneghaghnengllu pinguut, igleghutilghiit whani nunami. Christ-ameng pingunghitut,
51002009	qayughllak qamagtengngwaaghluni Kiyaghneq kiyaghtengnguuq Christ-am yugusiini.
51002010	Christ-a naasquutinguuq igleghutistenunllu pilleghqalegnunllu. Ilateslusi Christ-amun Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqiisi unguvallepigmeng.
51002011	Ilatngalleghpesigun Christ-amun circumcise-ekaagusi. Circumcise-elleghsi yuget pistellghitaat, iwernga Christ-am pistekaqaa. Enkaam itemutkaqiisi aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng yugusighpesi seghleghqengngalghiit piyukellghitneng.
51002012	Paaptaayaaqngafsi qunguutkaagusi Christ-akun. Taagken maketkaagusi unguvalleghmun Christ-akun qayughllak ugpeqegkesi Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha. Kiyaghneghem maketkaqaa Christ-a tuqumeng.
51002013	Tuqukaagusi qayughllak seghleghqestenguyalghiisi, qayughllaklu circumcise-elghilnguusi yugusighpesigun. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqiisi Christ-akun qayughllak seghevutkaqii qamaglluki seghleghqelleput.
51002014	Qaatkenghitaqngamteki Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusi seghleghqellghet pikaput igaqegkaagut. Kiyaghneghem iqitkaqii igaquqat seghleghqelleput tuquqaalluki Christ-am qaquuraanun.
51002015	Kiyaghneghem wayaghteqaqii guututangit igleghutilghiitlu aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu tughneghaat. Tawaten tamanganun esghaghtestekaa kayaalqiilleni tamaakuneng tughneghaghneng.
51002016	Kitumun alngunak nanqigtestegpenasi neghelleghmengllu meghelleghmengllu, neqenghaghqellghet aghneghitneng, nutaghat tanqit aghneghitneng, nalighmeng Sabbath-et aghneghitneng.
51002017	Taakut taghneghangullghiistun ayuqut taakunun piyaghqanun aga sivumelngughnun. Iwernga tamaakut ipapiget Christ-ametut.
51002018	Ilangi yugem qusevegngasugnighqesuneghtuut, manigughaqiitlu yaqulget. Iiwleng akuzitkaqiit esghaghwaalleteng esghaqateng. Ellngitnun ungipaatestegpenasi anaggutnganilusi. Ellngit esleqngaat temngitwhameng qukaayuglleghmeng qayughllak sumeghneghit yugem sumeghneqii.
51002019	Ellngit ilannanightut Christ-amun naasquutilghiimeng yugusimun. Igleghutngwaa iingunaan yugusiq, iknaqughsaghaqaallu neghqaqluku. Qerngaghmetestaqaa yugusiq atuqesluki nafliillu ivalungillu. Enkaam yugusiq nagunguuq Kiyaghneghem nagustesqesullghatun.
51002020	Christ-a tuqaaqngan tuqulgusiqallghuuqaqaghsi. Enkaam itemutkaagusi tughneghaghneng igleghutilghiineng whani nunami. Sangan'ngam kiyaghtaqetsi nunamun pikepiglleghhiistun? Sangan qaatkaqesteki liilightughallghit whatelnguut,
51002021	“Saflegpenaan, Naasiighpenaan, Saaftegpenaan?”
51002022	Taakut liilightughallghet yuget neghegkiitnengllu meghegkiitnengllu ayuqut. Enkaam neghegkiitlu meghegkiitlu atuqsaghqaananighaqut. Tamaakut liilightughallghet taawanginaghhaq yuget liilightughalqiitlu apeghtuusaqiitlu.
51002023	Tamaakut liilightughallghet apeghtughiit yuget peghqinesighwaaghesqelluki. Apeghtughiitlu amyuutkesqelluki yugusiit, atuqnaniisqelluki yugusiita pikyukellghit. Iwernga tawaten pillghita aghuliighsigatiit atuqnanilleghqameng tamaakut seghleghqellghet. Tamaakut liilightughallghet ipasugnitut iwernga temnginguut apeghtuusat.
51003001	Unguvaghtekaategpesineng maligullusi Christ-amun, piyukaqiteki sangwaat Kiyaghneghem elpesinun pikesqelluki qilagmelnguut. Tawani Christ-a aqumgaaq aghenqigneghakun Kiyaghneghem.
51003002	Suumqaqiteki tamaakut qilagmelnguut, nakaan tamaakut nunamelnguut.
51003003	Tawaten sumeghtaghaghaqitek qayughllak tuqukaagusi. Unguvalleghsi iighngaaq Christ-ami Kiyaghneghqun.
51003004	Christ-a unguvalqaghput. Aliiqan, elpesillu aliilgusighlleqaghsi nighughqellghani.
51003005	Taaqiteki atuqneghmeng yugusighpesi seghleghet piyukellghit, katam allaniiq, ukmanginneghilnguq kiyaghtaalleq, atuqsullgha seghleghem, pakigniiqlu. Pakigniiq maniguullghiistun kiyaghnengllaqanun ayuquq.
51003006	Tamaakut apalluqluki Kiyaghneghem sakraalleghllaga taginguuq qaatkusigalngughnun ellnganun.
51003007	Sivunghani tawaten kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi.
51003008	Iwernga maaten atuqnanighteki qamaglluki ukut: sakraa, sakraaghllak, ugumikeraaq, seghlequuq, seghleghmengllu akuzitkilleq.
51003009	Iqlengiqutegpenasi qayughllak taaqumaaghsi kiyaghtaallelugsi, ayghiitkaqsaqesillu.
51003010	Enkaam kiyaghtaalleghraghaq atuqaaghsimaaghsi. Nutaghtengnguusi, Ulimaghistegpesistunllu lliighuusi. Tamaaken apalluquku liigikekestaghaghsi Kiyaghneq kinaghpigaatanga.
51003011	Kiyaghtaalleghraghaghmi, allangughutngitut akulngitni Gentile-etlu Jews-etlu, akulngitni circumcise-ekatlu circumcise-ellghilnguutlu, akulngitni barbarian-etlu, Scythian-etlu, akulngitnillu qepghaghtelaaghetlu, qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu. Iwernga Christ-a qulighpigaaguq, kiyaghtengnguuqlu tamaghhamnni ugpeqani.
51003012	Kiyaghneghem yukiisi agleghnalghiit, piniqepigtiisillu. Nakmikegkaqiisi. Enkaam nangllegtaghlusi, nangllekilusi, qusevegllusi, yakuqlusi, nuqenneghtulusillu.
51003013	Sakritutegpenasi iwernga seghevutullusi. Kinkut anagtekangisi seghevunnakesi katam Atanghem seghevutellghistun elpesi.
51003014	Qamaglluteng tamaakut megnunaghtut iwernga piniqelleq megnunalleghpigaaguq. Piniqutellghem ataasiightengngwaaghiinkut.
51003015	Tamaghhaghpesi nalighneqiisi Christ-am yugusiin, enkaam nakmikegkaagusi kiyaghtesqellusi qerngaghpesi nekeggmelleghqun. Taana apalluqluku Christ-am nekeggmellghan igleghulliki ilusi. Iyamsiqayugngateklu.
51003016	Yeqay Christ-am apeghtuusii kemnaghluteng kiyaghllit ilugpesini. Apeghtuututaqlusi, kelengasaaghututaqlusillu tamaghhaakun peghqinelleghqun. Ilagaghtek Kiyaghneghmun iyamsiqayullelighlusi ilugpesigun, ilagaghtek psalms-neng, ilagaatneng, maniguutmunllu ilagaatneng.
51003017	Enkaam sangwaa pikaghsi, akuzitkun nalighmeng qepghalleghqun qamaglluku piiqiteggu aatghakun Atanghem Jesus-em. Ellngakun iyamsiqayugvikiteggu Kiyaghneq Ata.
51003018	Nuliighni, malighqutaqlusi ugigpesinun qayughllak tawaten Atanghem pisqesuwiisi.
51003019	Ugini, piniqluki nuliisi, yakuqluki piiqiteki.
51003020	Taghnughhaghni, qaatkelluki angayuqasi salleghqun tamaghhaakun, qayughllak tawaten pillghem efqughtaqaa Ataneq.
51003021	Atani, sakraasaghaghpenaki taghnughhasi luuraq iilqennayukata.
51003022	Qepghaghtelaaghni, iiwleng qaatkelluki piliitistesi. Iiwlengllu efqughhnaqluki esghapagughngaata nalighmeng esghapagunghiteghngaata. Qepghaateki ipapighqellusi qayughllak tawaten quulvaangwaaghsi Ataneq.
51003023	Salleghpesini tamaghhaani qepghaghaqitek pinaqellghaghsi qamagtiiluku qepghaatepiglleghhiistun Ataneq, nakaan yugnun.
51003024	Neqamikluku Atanghuuq Christ-a qepghaatkaghsi. Allgeghlleqaghsi akileghtuusaghsi ellnganeng. Akileghtuusaq akequsaqegkaqaa tuunelleqniluku yugminun.
51003025	Iwernga kina alngunak seghletun pista nallangighyaghqaaguq seghletun pillghanun qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nanqigsaghqaqaa tamaghhaan yuuk tawateghlluwaaq.
51004001	Qepghaghtelaaghet piliitistengitni, pinitungwaaqlu atunengwaaqlu piiqiteki qepghaghtelaasi, liisimakluku elpesillu Piliitistelguusi qilagmi.
51004002	Yughaamanginaghtek, iilqayugpenasillu yughaghaqitek iyamsiqayugvikumaan Kiyaghneq.
51004003	Yughaqufsi, yughaatkennakefsikutlu. Yughaghtek Kiyaghneghmun qelpeghutesqelluta amigmeng mingitesqelluki akuzitangi Christ-ameng ayuqelghiit. Sivunghani Kiyaghneghem qayvighsimangitaa ipapilleq Christ-ameng ayuqelghii. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem ungipaataanga ungipaqesqelluku taana qayvighsimangilnguq ipapilleq. Ungipaqegkaqutemneng taana ipapilleq anusimingllaghaatnga.
51004004	Enkaam yughaatkitengnga una ungipaq ungipaqsaghqaaluku whateghlluwaaq katam Kiyaghneghem whangamnun pisqellghatun.
51004005	Peghqinghwaaqitek ugpeqaanghilngughninneghpesini. Atuqaqiteggu tamaghhaan pilleghqaghsi ungipaasaghqaaluki Christ-ameng.
51004006	Aleghquneghpesiki iiwleng nangllegtaghlusi, akuziiqlusi itagnaghyugnaghlusi, nagasugnaghlusillu. Tawaten piiqitek liisimakesqellusi naten kiimsilleghqiit aapqughaallghit.
51004007	Tychicus ugpeqaalgutkaqa, piniqepigtekaqa. Qepghalgutkaqa, qepghaataqaallu Ataneq whangamnun maligulluni.
51004008	Kayagtaqa elpesinun, liisimakesqelluku natetulvut enkaam kayemellengesqellusi. Ungipaannaaghiisi whangamneng.
51004009	Kayagtaqallu Onesimus elpesinun. Piniqegkaaguq ataasiighmelnguq ugpeqaalgun, elpesineng pinguuq. Tychicus-enkuk ungipaalleqiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng salleghneng maani.
51004010	Aristarchus-em anusimingllaghalgutma, Mark-emllu atalgutangan Barnabas-em suumqaqiisinguq. (Ungipaatkaqamsi latatgun Mark-meng, kaasimakan elpesinun upughatesqelluku.)
51004011	Jesus-emllu, alla atelgem Justus-meng suumqaqiisinguq. Taakunginaagut Jews-et ugpeqat, qepghalgusighaqaatnga Ataneghpagullghanun Kiyaghneghem. Ilutuqutkanka elngaatall.
51004012	Epaphras, qepghaghtenga Christ Jesus-em, elpesineng pinguuq, ellnganllu suumqaqiisinguq. Iiwleng taakunginaghhaagneng yughaatkaqiisi angtaniitesqellusi, liisimakngngwaaghesqelluku sangwaa Kiyaghneghem pisqesullgha elpesinun, elpesinunllu qamagtengngwaaghluku piyukellgha pikesqelluku.
51004013	Ungipaasugamsi Epaphras qepghaghllakaaguq kayusiinnalusi, kayusiinnalukillu Laodicea-ghmiitlu Hierapolis-eghmiitllu.
51004014	Luke-emllu piniqepigtekamta aghallegtam, Demas-emllu suumqaqiisinguq.
51004015	Ugpeqaalgutnun Laodicea-melngughnun, Nympha-munllu, ugpeqaalgutnunllu qernughutkayugnun maniguunnaluteng mangteghaani, ungipaannakesi suumqaqankanguq.
51004016	Atightughnakesi ukut latat ugpeqanun qerngughutkayugnun yughaghvigani Colossae-m. Wataghllaklu atightughnakesi ukut latat Laodicea-ghmiit ugpeqiitnun. Atightughnakesillu latat Laodicea-ghmiit ugpeqiita tuyughyaghqiit elpesinun.
51004017	Archippus ungipaataghnnakesi whaten, “Wataghllak apeghiighnaken qepghaqaq Atanghem qelghutkaa elpenun.”
51004018	Whanga, Paul, whanga katam iiggemneng una igaqaqa. Neqamiklunga anusimingllaghaagunga, qiipraghusighlunga ayuqunga. Qamagllusi suumqaqamsi. Kiyaghneq nangllegtaghli elpesinun.
52001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng, Silas-meng, Timothy-mengllu pinguut, Thessalonica-ghmiit ugpeqiitnun Kiyaghneghem Atam pingi Atanghemllu Jesus Christ-am. Kiyaghneghem nangllekillghallu nekeggmellghallu elpesinillik.
52001002	Quunpeng iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput Kiyaghneq tamaghhaghpesinun, iiwlengllu yughaatkaqamsi.
52001003	Yughanemta Kiyaghneghmun Atamnnun neqamikaqaghput qepghalleghsi ugpelleghpesigun, qepghalleghsi piniqelleghpesigun. Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu ugpelleghsi nagneghuskesi iknaqluku qayughllak sighimangulghiisi Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun.
52001004	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, Kiyaghneghem piniqegkaani, liisimakaghput nakmikegkaqiisi
52001005	qayughllak Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng tagitaqngamsi, akuziteraaghinaghteggun pimangitukut, iwernga aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqunllu, Agleghnalghiignekunllu Taghneghagnekun pikaagukut. Enkaam ugpeqasi Pinilghiit Ungipat ipangutangi. Liisimakaghsillu naten kiyaghtekaatfut elpesinilluta, tawaten kayusiinnalusi kiyaghtekaagukut.
52001006	Enkaam whangkutestunllu Ataneghtunllu lliightek. Qaywa ikfiqeghllagngaaghpesi, tuguklighasi Pinilghiit Ungipat quyamallelighlusi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.
52001007	Enkaam usputaaghtusi tamaghhiitnun ugpeqanun Macedonia-millu Achaia-millu.
52001008	Atanghem ungipaa mingitnguuq elpesineng Macedonia-millu Achaia-millu. Ugpeqilleghsillu Kiyaghneghmeng liitaat tamangani. Enkaam whangkuta sameng pinghisaghngaamteggu ugpeqilleghsi, qayughllak siingenllu yuget nagaquumaat.
52001009	Tamangani aapghaqaat upughatilleghllagsi whangkunneng elpesinitnguluta. Qiivumanilusillu unguvalghiimun Kiyaghnepigmun qepghaannaluku, peglluki kiyaghnengllaqat.
52001010	Utaqaaqaghsillunguq Kiyaghneghem Ighnegha, Jesus, tagiyaghqaq qilagmeng. Ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekaa tuqulleghmeng, yuguliiqiinkutlu Kiyaghneghem sakraallghaneng kaasaghqameng.
52002001	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, liisimakaghsi elpesinun pilleghput temngingunghitkaaguq.
52002002	Iwernga sivunghani elpesinun pillemta, liisimakaghsi Philippi-mi ikfiqliightestekaqiinkutlu seghlequuqaqiinkutlu. Tamaanlluta qaywa uglalghiim yugem aghuliighhnaqutkeghngiinkut Kiyaghneghem ilutustekaqiinkut, enkaam ungipaasaghtughamsi Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Kiyaghneghem.
52002003	Ungipaqilleghput ipanguuq. Iqlengiqngunghitukut elpesinun, seghleghmeng piyukegkiitukut elpesinun, puughhnaqutkigatamsi.
52002004	Yeghlegi, ungipaqaqaput Pinilghiit Ungipat qayughllak Kiyaghneghem itagnaqluta neghyukutkaqii whangkunnun. Akuzillemteggun efqughhnaqutkengngunghitaput yuget, iwernga efqughsukaghput Kiyaghneghuuq, nanqigtingalghii ilumta sumeghtaghallghaneng.
52002005	Liisimakaghsi usuquughsaghtuunghitamsi nalighmeng sakengviksaghtuunghitamsi. Kiyaghneq liisimakistekaghput.
52002006	Usuqesaayugtengngunghitukut yugneng, elpesineng, nalighmeng kinkuneng.
52002007	Apostle-ngutemnneng Christ-amun, tungsighniighviksaghqaqsaghamsi sameng alngunak. Iwernga elpesinilluta yakumangilliqutkumangitamsi, yeghlegi mamaghtikayugestun naastun aflengakilghiistun taghnughhaghmeggneng ayuqegkaagukut.
52002008	Piniqepigtamsi, enkaam quyakusiqinaghluku elpesinun liisimakesugaput Kiyaghneghem Pinilghiit Ungipii. Pinilghiinginaat Ungipat pigpenaki, quyakusiqinaghluku sameng tamaghhaaneng kayusighyuglusi ayuqamsi, qayughllak piniqsaliitkaqamsi.
52002009	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, neqamikaghsi naten angkaan qepghalleghputlu ughleghiilleghputlu! Qepghaqaagukut unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan qayughllak elpesinun uqigtuqutnguyunghilnguukut; elpesinisimaluta ungipaqikaagukut Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Kiyaghneghem.
52002010	Elpesillu Kiyaghneqlu liisimakistekamsi. Elpesini ugpeqani kiyaghtekaagukut pelungilluta, ipapighqelluta, anaggutellngunaamta.
52002011	Liisimakaghsi katam atam aflengakillghatun taghnughhaghmineng, whangkutallu tamaghhaghpesi tawaten katam aflengakegkaqamsi. Kayemegkaqamsi, ilutughsaqaqamsi, qelghutaataqaqaghput elpesinun atuqesqelluku kiyaghtaalleq efqughnalghii Kiyaghneghmi. Tuqluungwiisi ilatesqellusi ellmi katam Ataneghpagulleghminunllu pinighnalleghllagminunllu.
52002013	Iyamsiqayugvikumanginaangwaaghputlu Kiyaghneq una apalluqluku: whangkunneng nagaqughluku tuguklighaghsi Kiyaghneghem ungipaa. Elpesi tuguklighaghsi Kiyaghneghmeng ungipaaluku, nakaan yugneng ungipaaluku. Taananguuq Kiyaghneghem ungipaghpigaa qepghalghii elpesini ugpeqilghiini.
52002014	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, elpesi tawatetusi ugpeqistengistun Christ Jesus-em qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigitni Kiyaghneghem Judea-mi. Nunalgutegpesi ikfiqestekaqiisi katam Jews-et ikfiqestellghistun ugpeqat Judea-mi.
52002015	Jews-nguut tuqutikat Ataneghmeng Jesus-meng, uuknaliqistenengllu, amyuqetaatkegkaqiinkutlu. Efqughhneghitaat Kiyaghneq, kipullginaaghuutlu tamaghhaanun yugnun
52002016	aghuliighhnaqutkelleghmegteggun ungipaqilleghput Gentile-enun yugulillengnayukata. Tawaten pilleghmegteggun ilamanginaghiit seghleghqelleteng enkaam qenwatlu Kiyaghneghem ugumiyaguteghllagluki qantaghaqun aghyuughlleqii.
52002017	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, amyuqetaatkistemta aghulaqestaqngamikut Thessalonica-meng, pellghututestaghtiinkut, iwernga paninang sumeghmikaqamsi. Esghaghyupigtaqsaghamsi gginasaghqughlusi
52002018	enkaam takunaqutkaqsaghamsi. Whanga, Paul, takunaqutkaataghaqsaghamsi iwernga Tughneghaam amigighaghtaqiinkut.
52002019	Elpesi sighimalqamsi, quyasiqamsi, qaghpakamsillu. Taana qaghpa whangkuta qukaayugusiqelleqaghput manungani Atanemta Jesus-em tagikan.
52002020	Ipapestaaq elpesi qukaayugusiqamsillu quyasiqamsillu!
52003001	Iwernga esghaatusigatutemnneng qavngaghhaaneng pelleghngatutelleghput nuqetutepagningiitaghput. Enkaam agghitkaagukut whanga ellnginaghma Athens-mennalunga,
52003002	kayagtekaqaghpungllu Timothy elpesinun. Ugpeqaalgutkaghpung, qepgalgusighaqiinkung Kiyaghneghmun. Ungipaqilgusighaqiinkung Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng Christ-ameng ayuqelghiineng. Kayagtekaqaghpung iknaqughsaghyaghtiisqelluki ugpeqillesi, kayemesqellusillu,
52003003	qayughllak iilqayugtesunghilkemsi ugpeqilleghpesineng seghleliillesi apalluqluki. Iwernga liisimakaghsi ugpeqani whangkuta seghleliighyaghqaagukut.
52003004	Elpesinilluta ungipaatngwaaqaqamsi amyuqetaatkellengelleqniluta; enkaam liisimakaghsi taawa ipa ikfiqutkegkaqaghput amyuqetaatkelleq.
52003005	Tamaaken apalluqluku aghtughyagusama nuqenneghmeng, kayagtekaqaqa Timothy elpesinun liigiknaluku ugpeqilleghsi natetaqutanga. Pengkaqamsi qayughllak Tughneghaam nanghiiqumanayukangisi ugpeqinaniisqellusi, enkaam qepghalleghput temngisugnighsimanayukan.
52003006	Iwernga Timothy-m uteghnighluni ungipaatiinkung quyanalghiimeng ungipameng ugpeqilleghpesinengllu piniqelleghpesinengllu. Ungipaataqiinkungllu iiwleng neqamikaqnilutung pinitun, esghaghyugaqnilutungllu katam whangkutung esghaghyullemtestegetun elpesi.
52003007	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, seghleliighllagumaluta, ikfiqeghllagumaluta ilutughtukut qayughllak nagneghutngukesi ugpeqilleghsi.
52003008	Whaa aneghtaghaghtukut qayughllak aghuliilkaalghiisi Ataneghqun.
52003009	Enkaam iyamsiqayugvikngwaaghput Kiyaghneq elpesineng. Elpesi apalluqlusi quyaghllaguukut sivungani Kiyaghnemta.
52003010	Taakunginaghhaagneng yughaatkengngwaamsi unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan alla esghaghyaghqaalusi, ilayaghqaaluki ugpeqilleghpesi aklukegkiit.
52003011	Kiyaghnemta, Atam ellmineng katam, Atanemtallu Jesus-em qantaghaqun elpesinun piyaghqaaghteslikut!
52003012	Atanghem, piniqsaliitutestaghaghlisi. Piniqelleghsillu tevughasligu tamaghhaanun yugnun, katam whangkuta piniqellemtestun elpesi.
52003013	Tawaten ayepsugighsaghlleqii ilusi avutngitesqellusillu pelungitesqellusillu sivungani Kiyaghnemta Atam, Atanemta Jesus-em tagillghani. Tawani kelqelleqii qamagtengngwaaghluki ellmi yuni.
52004001	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, alaghrang whaten pinaqamsi, liitivikegkaqaghpekut naten kiyaghtelleghqameng efqughnaghlusi Kiyaghneghmun, esgha tawaten kiyaghlleghhiisi. Aatghakun Atanghem Jesus-em kayemamsi wataqaaghaq tawaten pisqellusi.
52004002	Liisimakasi sangwaat qelghutkaput elpesinun pisqelluki Ataneghqun Jesus-kun.
52004003	Whatetuq Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha elpesinun: pelungitesugiisi seghleghqestesunghitiisi atuqutelleghqun.
52004004	Liitesugiisillu tamaghaghpesi nuqetutesqelluki yugusisi pinilleghmun enkaam kiyaghllequsi pelungillusi, efqughnaghlusi Kiyaghneghmunllu yugnunllu.
52004005	Ilapgategpenasi yugusighpesi atuqiyullghanun ugpeqaanghilnguut pillghistun nallukilghiit Kiyaghneghmeng.
52004006	Kitum alngunak sakusiiqefqaan piligu ugpeqaalgutmi inglunga atuqilleghmun. Atanghem aghyuughllaglleqii tawaten pikayuget. Sivunghani kelengasaaghllakaqamsi tamaaken.
52004007	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiinkut kiyaghtesqelluta pelungilluta, seghleghqellngunaamta.
52004008	Enkaangam kitum alngunak qaatkenghilkumiki tamaakut apeghtuusat, Kiyaghneghuuq qaatkenghilkanga nakaan yuuk. Kiyaghneghuuq tuunistezi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng.
52004009	Kitum alngunak latanghisaghngaaghmisi ayuqiisi ungipaannalusi piniqesqelluki ugpeqaalgutesi, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem apeghtuqaqiisi piniqutesqellusi.
52004010	Ipanguuq piniqasi qamaglluki ugpeqaalgutesi tamaghhaani Macedonia-mi. Iwernga ugpeqaalgutemnni, qelghamsi piniqutaghiisqellusi.
52004011	Pinaqellghaghsi qamaglluku kiyaghtek nekeggmellelighlusi, elpesi sayaghqasi piiqiteki, avelghaghluki ilagpesi sayaghqiit. Qepghaghtek allgeghusaghqaalusi aklukegkaghpesineng katam whangkuta qelellemtestun.
52004012	Tawaten pikufsi neghyuknaanghitasi kinkut alngunak aklukegkaghpesinun, ugpeqaanghilnguutlu siivakelleqiisi.
52004013	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, liisimakesugamsi ugpeqaneng qavalghiineng qivghukefqiita pisqelluki sighimallghilngughestun.
52004014	Ugpeqaghput Jesus tuquluni unguvaqaaguq. Enkaam ugpeqaghput Kiyaghneghem tagilleqii Jesus-kun tamaakut qavaqat ugpeqiluteng ellnganeng.
52004015	Ungipaatngwaaghamsi Atanghem apeghtuutkaaneng. Ataneq tagikan, whangkuta paninang unguvalghiini ingyaghaghnaanghitaput tamaakut qavaqat.
52004016	Ataneq ellnga katam qilagmeng ukigllequq, yuget nagaqughlleqaat iglagtuqaq qelelleq, menga archangel-em, qalghightaatangallu Kiyaghneghem. Tamaakut ugpeqiluteng Christ-ameng tuqulaghaatkat unguvaghyuggaaghllequt.
52004017	Taagken whangkuta unguvalghiini unegtekani, Kiyaghneghem qerngughutesluta, ellngitnun, ghhataghaghtaatesleqiinkut qilagwaaghnun paayghesqelluku Ataneq eslami. Enkaam Ataneghmellequkut quunperugllak.
52004018	Tamaaken apalluqluku ilutughsaasiqaqiteki taakut akuzitet.
52005001	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, elpesinun latatkenniitut qakun tamaakut piyaghqaatangi.
52005002	Qayughllak elpesi liisimakngwaaghaghsi Aghnegha Atanghem tagiyaghqaaguq waakenghillghaghulluni tagillghatun teglegniightem unugmi.
52005003	Yuget whaten pimaluki, “Nekeggmellelguukutlu paqniitukutlu,” naafqellghem kaatqaghlleqii katam aghnam ighniyullghan aqnighqellghatun. Yuget anagnaanghitaat taana naafqelleq.
52005004	Iwernga elpesi ugpeqaalgutemnni, mamlegllagmenneghitusi enkaam Aghneghan Aghneghem waakenghillghaghhnaanghitiisi tegleghniightetun.
52005005	Qamagllusi avaqutaqiisi nighugem, avaqutaqiisillu aghneghem. Unugem pikenghitiinkut nalighmeng mamlegllagem.
52005006	Enkaam qavaafqaamta pilta ilangistun, itupill teghumalta, liisimaluta.
52005007	Tamaakut qavalghiit qavaghaqut unugmi, tamaakut meghelghiit suumaqut unugmi.
52005008	Iwernga Atanghem pikiinkut enkaam liisimaluta kiyaghtelta. Paqniighsaasilleghqamnnun sakimamteggun aatelteggu sighimalleq yugulilleghmun.
52005009	Kiyaghneghem piyukelqenghitaa ikfiqesqelluta sakraalleghmeng, iwernga yugulillengesugiinkut Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-akun.
52005010	Jesus-em tuqumatkegkaqiinkut ellminitesqelluta unguvayaghngaamta, tuqukaayaghngaamta tagikumi.
52005011	Tamaakut apalluqluki kayemututaqiteklu kayutkutaqiteklu whaa maaten pilleghpesistun.
52005012	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, siivakiteki Ataneghmun qepghalghiit akulegpesini. Ellngan nakmikegkaqii igleghutistengulukillu apeghtughistengulukillu elpesinun.
52005013	Siivakeghllagaqitekillu piniqaqitekillu apalluqluki qepghallghit. Nekeggmetullusi pitek.
52005014	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, kelengasaaghteki ighsanitalghiit, ilutughsaghteki alingtalghiit, kayusighteki kayaalnguut, negkeghlluwaan piiqiteki qamaglluki.
52005015	Wataghllak akisaqunaki seghletun pistesi iwernga pinitun piiqiteki ilasi, qamagllukillu yuget.
52005016	Quyamanginaghlusi,
52005017	yughaamanginaghlusi,
52005018	iyamsiqayuglusi tamaghhaani nekegneghmi. Taakunguut Kiyaghneghem piyukellghi elpesinun Christ Jesus-em piliitkiitnun.
52005019	Qaamtegpenakek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak,
52005020	sasiinghinnigpenaki uuknaliqillghet.
52005021	Iwernga sangwaa qamaglluku nanghiiqwaaqiteggu enkaam tuguklighaqluki sangwaat pinilghiit,
52005022	iqitngatek tamaghhaaneng seghleghmeng.
52005023	Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelitistem iighwightengngwaaghlusi pelungighllisi. Avutngitesliki taghneghasi, unguvasisi, yugusisi Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a tagikan.
52005024	Tagsiqlightegpesi pilleqii tamaakut qayughllak ataasiighmetuq.
52005025	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, yughaatkaqluta.
52005026	Quyakaqiteki ugpeqaalgutesi naaghluki Kiyaghneghem piniqellghakun.
52005027	Qelghamsi Atanghem pilleghqalitellghakun ukut latat atightiisqelluki tamaghhiitnun ugpeqaalgutegpesinun.
52005028	Piniqellgha Atanghem Jesus Christ-am elpesinilli.
53001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng, Silas-meng Timothy-mengllu pinguut. Ugpeqanun Thessalonica-melngughnun Kiyaghneghem Atamta pingitnun, Atanghemllu Jesus Christ-am.
53001002	Nangllegtalleqlu nekeggmelleqlu elpesinun pinguuk Kiyaghneghmeng Atameng, Ataneghmengllu Jesus Christ-ameng.
53001003	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, iiwleng iyamsiqayagusaghqaqamsi Kiyaghneghmun. Elqughutngaaq tawaten pilleghqaghput, qayughllak ugpeqineghtughtaghalghiisillu, piniqutaghaghlusillu lliightusi.
53001004	Tamaaken apalluqluku qanatkaqamsi ilangitnun ugpeqat Kiyaghneghem yughaghvigitnilngughnun. Aapghaqaghput nuqetutineghtulleghsillu, ugpeqilleghsillu qaywa amyuutkellengeghngaaghpesi, ikfiqellengeghngaaghpesillu.
53001005	Tamaakut ipapighqaat Kiyaghneghem nanqigtillgha elqughutngalghiinguuq. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem aapghiisi itagnaghnilusi kiyaghtesqellusi Ataneghpagulleghmini qayughllak ikfiqutkengngukesi.
53001006	Kiyaghneghem piyaghqaqaa sangwaa elqughutngalghii: ikfiqesaghqaqii tamaakut ikfiqestilghiit elpesineng.
53001007	Enkaam elpesi ikfiqelghiini Kiyaghneghem meghnaalisnaaghiisi ikfiqelleghmeng whangkutallu maligulluta. Tawaten pillequq aliightekumiki Ataneq Jesus, iknaqeghllalghiitlu yaqulgi. Qilagmeng ukigllequt keneghmelluteng kumaghughngalghiimi.
53001008	Taagken Jesus-em aghyuughlleqii tamaakut nallukilghiit Kiyaghneghmeng, qaatkusigalnguutlu Pinilghiineng Ungipaaneng Jesus-meng ayuqelghiit.
