53001009	Aghyuughnaqngwiillu kenlengilngughmeng naafqelleghmeng, iqitesnaqnguutlu Ataneghmeng, nighuganengllu aghtughyaghqaanghillghan.
53001010	Tamaakut piyaghqaagut tawani Aghneghmi Ataneq Jesus tagikan. Qamaglluteng yuget ugpeqikat ellnganeng usuqelleqaat, saghiighayagulleqaatlu. Elpesi akulngitnillequsi qayughllak ugpeqegkesi ungipaq aapqaghput elpesinun.
53001011	Enkaam quunpeng yughaatkaqamsi whaten: Kiyaghneghem apeghlisi kiyaghtengngunilusi ellmi kiyaghtesqesulleghmitun. Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu naamiglligu qamaglluku piyukelleghsi pinilleghmun, qepghallghillu ugpeqilleghpesi.
53001012	Enkaam aatgha Atanemta Jesus-em quulvallengellequq elpesigun, elpesillu ellngakun quulvallengellequsi nafughtallghakunllu nangllegtallghakunllu Kiyaghnemta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am.
53002001	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, ungipaasugamsi tagilleghqaaneng Atanemta Jesus Christ-am, qerngughutelleghqamnnengllu ellnganun.
53002002	Umyugasi qapragaghtesunghitngwaaghaput nalighmeng kakavesunghitaput nagaququfsigu Aghnegha Atanghem kaasimaniluku. Entaqun kitum uuknaliqutkegkaqaa, nalighmeng kitum ungipaqegkaqaa, nalighmeng kitum latatkumaniluku whangkunnun pikaqaa.
53002003	Iwernga puughtestegpenasi! Taana Aghnegha Atanghem kaannaanghituq kenlanga yuget malighqutaqsugnanilghitnun Kiyaghneghem igleghutillghanun, kaatellghanunllu Seghlepestaaghem Yugem. (Ellnga naafqesaghqaaguq hell-mi.)
53002004	Taam yugem kipullginaaghlleqii kiyaghnengllaqat nalighmeng manigughyaghqat, tamaakuneng ellmineng qulighpigaaghsaghqaaguq. Enkaangam iteghluni Kiyaghneghem Temple-nganun aqumluni Kiyaghneghunillequq.
53002005	Neqamikenghistegguu salin elpesinillunga ungipaatkaqegkemsi tamaaken?
53002006	Liisimakaghsi kitum maaten nuqneqaqaa Seghlepestaaq Yuuk tagilleghqaaneng. Wetku aghneni kaaskan tagillequq.
53002007	Aawallu qayvighsimangilnguq aghtughyaghqaanghillgha seghleghqellghem qepghaaghsimaaq nunami. Iwernga maaten kitum kimaawistaqaa taana seghleghqelleq. Kimaawististenga tawaten pillequq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem iqitestellghanun.
53002008	Taagken Seghlepestaaq Yuuk aliightesllequq, iwernga Atanghem Jesus-em tagikumi tuqulleqaa aneghneghaneng qaneghmi, naafqelleqaallu nighugllagakun tagilleghmi.
53002009	Sivutghulluku Atanghem Jesus-em tagilleghqaa, Seghlepestaaq Yuuk tagillequq aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni Tughneghagh-meng. Taana Yuuk allaaghlluwhaghtisighwaaghllequq allaaghhiinaghmeng saghiighanalghiineng.
53002010	Atuqelleqiillu allaaghhiinaat seghleghet puughhnaluki tuquyaghqat. Tuquyaghqaagut qayughllak ugpeqsunghilkangat ipalleq yugulisighqaqsaqeseng.
53002011	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem puughneqguutesleqii ugpeqesqelluki sangwaat ipangunghilnguut.
53002012	Enkaam qamagtengngwaaghluteng ugpeqinghilnguut ipapilleghmeng nanqigsaghqaagut aghyuughyaghqaaluteng qayughllak pinighyuugusiqegkangat seghlleghqelleq.
53002013	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, iiwleng iyamsiqayagusaghqaqamsi Kiyaghneghmun, elpesi piniqegkiitni Atanghem. Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu Kiyaghneq qayughllak nakmikegkaqiisi yugulisqellusi ima piinlighyuwhaallghaneng nunam. Yugulikaagusi pelungighsallghakun Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham, ugpeqelleghpesigunllu ipapilleq.
53002014	Tawaten kiyaghtaalleghmun Kiyaghneghem tagsiqaqiisi Pinilghiitgun Ungipatgun ungipaqegkamegteggun; tagisqaqiisi piliitesqelluku nengighqaghsi pinighnallgha Atanemta Jesus Christ-am.
53002015	Enkaam ugpeqaalgutemnni, aghuliitekestaghtek, ugpeqekestaghteggu ipapilleq apeghtuutkaghput elpesinun ungipaqillemteggunllu latallemteggunllu.
53002016	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, piniqistemta, nangllegtalleghmikun tuunegkaqiinkut kenlengilngughmeng ilutulleghmeng, pinilghiimengllu sighimalleghmeng. Atanemta Jesus Christ-am ellngan katam, Kiyaghneghemllu Atamta, elkegkenka
53002017	ilutughsaghlisillu, iknaqughsaghlisillu tamaghhaakun pinilghiikun qepghalleghpesigunllu akuzilleghpesigunllu.
53003001	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, taaqniitkun sameng piighaataqaghlamsi. Yughaatkitekut Atanghem ungipaa mingirragkiighesqelluku, yugnunllu quulviisqelluku, katam elpesi pilleghpesistun.
53003002	Yughaatkitekutlu Kiyaghneghmun yugulisqelluta seghleghneng yugneng, qayughllak uglalghii yuuk ugpeqillelgunghituq.
53003003	Iwernga Ataneq ataasiighmetuq; iknakqughsaghlleqiisillu paqniighsaghlleqiisillu Tughneghaghmeng.
53003004	Atanghem nalluneqniighumaa whangkunnun qaatkutnguusi qelellemnnun, qaatkumanginaghlleqaghsillu.
53003005	Atanghem liigikeslisi wataqaaghaq Kiyaghneghem piniqellghaneng, Christ-amllu nuqetutineghtullghaneng.
53003006	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, aatghakun Atanemta Jesus Christ-am qelghamsi iqitngasqellusi tamaghhiitneng ugpeqaalgutegpesineng ighsanitalghiinengllu malighqutaqigalngughnengllu apeghtuutkamnneng elpesinun.
53003007	Elpesi katam liisimakaghsi ayuqesighaghyaghqaqsaghaghpekut; elpesinilluta ighsanitiqumangitukut.
53003008	Tugukliigataput neqet kinkuneng alngunak tukfillngunaki. Iwernga unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan qepghaqaagukut, ughleghiiqaagukut uqigtuqutnguyunghitutemnneng nalighhiinaghpesinun.
53003009	Elpesinun aapsaqleguyaghtukut kayusiitesqelluta, yeghlegi qepghaqaagukut aflengaknaluta whangkunneng usputaanaluta elpesinun ayuqesighiisqelluta.
53003010	Talwa elpesinilluta whaten qelqaqegkemsi, “Kina alngunak qepghaghyunghilnguq neghestegpenaan.”
53003011	Tawaten pikaagukut qayughllak nagaqughaqukut ilasinguq ighsanitaghtut, qepghaghyugigatut, yeghlegi yanutqwaaqiinguq yuget.
53003012	Aatghakun Atanghem Jesus Christ-am qelghaputlu kayemaputlu tawatelnguut yuget ighsanitiqefqiita allgheghutesqelluki kiyaghusighqiitneng.
53003013	Ugpeqaalgutemnni, qinuyagutegpenasi pinitun pineghmeng.
53003014	Kina alngunak qaatkusunghilkan sameng pillemnnun ukutgun latamteggun, suumqennakesi kinkungutangi. Enkaam iqitngalghaasi ellnganeng kaynguyugesqelluku anaggutellghaneng.
53003015	Iwernga kiyaghutegpenaan anguyaguluku, itupill kelengasaaghteggu ugpeqaalgutkelluku.
53003016	Atanghem ellmineng katam nekeggmellelitikayugem, nekeggmellelisilli iiwleng sami tamaghhaani. Ataneq tamaghhaaghpesinilli.
53003017	Whanga, Paul whanga katam iiggemneng igaqaqa piniqilqa elpesinun. Tawaten igaghaqunga qamaglluki latamkun elpesinun liisimakesqelluki whangamneng pingutangi.
53003018	Nangllegtallgha Atanemta Jesus Christ-am tamaghhaghpesinilli.
54001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut apostle-nganeng Christ Jesus-em. Apostle-ngughtekaagunga qelellghakun Kiyaghneghem Yugulighistemta, Christ Jesus-emllu sighimakegkamta.
54001002	Timothy-mun; ighnepikamken ugpeqillemtegnegun. Kiyaghneghem Atam, Christ Jesus-emllu Atanemta quyasliten, nangllekliten, nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
54001003	Aghulaqnaqumalunga Macedonia-mun Ephesus-metesqegkaqamken. Ilangi yuget tamaanlenguut apeghtughinguut ipangunghilngughmeng apeghtuusaneng. Qeleghqi taaqesqelluki
54001004	sangillghaatkegpenakinguq akuzimghhutkelluki ungipaghaatengllaqat, sivunelghuteghllagetlu aatghit. Tamaakut aaghtiiraaghusighhiinaagut, kayutngunghitut qepghaqaanun Kiyaghneghem. Ellngan qepghaqaa apeghiighaquq ugpeqillghiinaghhaghqun.
54001005	Qeleluugutkaqa ugpeqat piniqutepiigesqelluki, umyugaqeglluki, ipapigmeng ugpeqillelguluki.
54001006	Ilangita yuget pegtekaqiit tamaakut enkaam aaghtiiraaghaqut temngimeng.
54001007	Apeghtughistenguyugaqut Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaanun. Iwernga liigikigatiit akuzitkegkateng qaywa apeghtuusaqeghngaaghmegteki ipasugnilluki.
54001008	Liisimakaput Liilightuusat pinightut elqughlluki atuqelghiini.
54001009	Liisimakaput Liilightuusat ulimaaghunghitut pinilghiinun yugnun. Ulimaaghuut liilightuusaneng naafqiikayugnun, qaatkusigalngughnunllu. Ulimaaghuut Kiyaghneghyugigalngughnun, seghleghqestenunllu. Ulimaaghuut waakigalngughnun Kiyaghneghmeng, legasiighwaatkilghiinunllu agleghnalghiinun. Ulimaaghuut tuqutikayugnun atameggneng nalighmeng naameggneng, yugtaghtenunllu.
54001010	Ulimaaghuut sex-kun seghleghqestenun, yugnun yulgutmeggneng atuqikayugnun, yugnun akikikayugnun yugmeng qepghaghtelaaghuluki, iqlengiqestenun, iqlengalghiinun liisimakistenun, kipullginaalghiinunllu Kiyaghneghem apeghtuusiitnun ipapighqengngalghiinun.
54001011	Taakut apeghtuusat piniipiglleghhiineng Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng pinguut. Aapghwaat usuqnalghii Kiyaghneq, neghyukutkaqii whangamnun aapghesqelluki.
54001012	Iyamsiqayugvikaqa Christ Jesus Ataneghput, iknaqughsaqaqaanga qepghaqamnun. Iyamsiqayugvikaqa esghaqaqaanga ataasiighmellunga nakmiklunga qepghaatesqelluni.
54001013	Sivunghani seghlepestaatun akuzitkegkaqaqa Christ-a, seghlepestaatunllu pikaqaqa. Amyuqetaatkaqngamki maligsaaghtengi tawateteftuq amyuqetaatkengnguftaqa ellnga. Tawalliima Kiyaghneghem nangllekegkaqegkanganga qayughllak salin ugpeqigalkegka Christ-a, liigikumangilkegka saaqutka.
54001014	Iwernga Atanemta nangllekeghllakaqaanga! Ugpeqillelitkaqaanga, piniqellelitkaqaangallu Christ Jesus-melngughmeng.
54001015	Sameng pilleghqaqa ipanguuq enkaam qamaglluni ugpeqsaghqaaguq, “Christ Jesus tagikaaguq nunamun yugulinaluki seghleghqestet.” Whanga seghlelleghpigaagunga seghleghqesteneng.
54001016	Naqamllu Kiyaghneghem nangllegyagutkaqaanga. Enkaam usputaagunga naten tagkaan Christ Jesus-em utaqiilleghqaaneng seghleghqesteneng ugpeqesqelluni. Taana usputaq tamaakunun ayuquq ugpeqiyaghqanun ellnganeng unguvallengesqelluki kenlengilngughmeng.
54001017	Umiilegmun kenlengilngughmun, tuqupagningilngughmun, aliinneghilngughmun, ellnginaa Kiyaghneghuuq; ellnga quulvallenglillu usuqellenglillu quunperugllak kenlengunaan! Amen.
54001018	Timothy-mi ighnemni, qavngaq ilangita uuknaliqistet akuzitkegkaqaaten. Enkaam maaten qelghamken akuzitangit guututkiki pilluwamun. Tawaten pinitun pilluwaghllequten Christ-amun.
54001019	Ugpeqikestaa Christ-akun atuqluku liisimakegkan elqughutngalghii. Ilangita yuget atuqigatiit liisimakegkateng elqughutngalghiit enkaam naafqaqiit ugpeqilleteng katam angyaghpagiillghiistun.
54001020	Hymenaeus-enkuk Alexander-enkuk tamaakut akulngitnituk. Tuunegkaqagka Tughneghagh-mun liitesqellukek seghlepestaatun akuzitkefqaan Kiyaghneq pisqelluku.
54002001	Sivukluku kayemamken yughaatkesqelluki qamaglluki yuget, tungsiitesqelluki Kiyaghneghmun aklukegkiitneng, iyamsiqayagunnaketenllu Kiyaghneghmun.
54002002	Yughaatkiki umiilget, qamagllukillu igleghutilghiit, kiyaghsaghqaaluta nekeggmelluta maniguusimaluta, quulvaamalukullu Kiyaghneq.
54002003	Tawatelnguq yughalleq pinightuq, efqughnaghtuq Kiyaghneghmi Yugulighistemnni,
54002004	qayughllak qamaglluku yuuk yugulillengesugaa, liitesugaallu ipapilleq.
54002005	Taawa ataasiinaaguq Kiyaghneq, ataasiinaaguqlu ilaliighutista Kiyaghneghmunllu yugnunllu. Taananguuq yuuk Christ Jesus.
54002006	Ellmineng tuunegkaaguq aghqutnguluni itemunnaluki seghleghqellghitneng qamaglluki yuget. Taananguuq pilleghqaghlluwaaq Kiyaghneghem kelgutillgha yugulillengesugniluki yuget qamaglluki.
54002007	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga ungipaqistengulunga, apostle-ngulunga. Kayagtaanga apeghtiisqelluki Gentile-et ugpeqilleghmengllu ipapilleghmengllu. Ipa ungipaatamken, iqlengiqngunghitunga!
54002008	Tamaghhaani yughaghvigni yugiinaat yughiisqesuganka. Tamaakungulit kiyaghlleghhit qaatkulluteng Kiyaghneghem piyukellghanun. Yughaghlit nengugulluki iiggeteng sakraallngunatengllu aaghtiiraallngunatengllu.
54002009	Piyukankallu aghnat pinighnallghit kelgutesqelluki pinitun pilugullghitgun. Aatkiit mallegngafqiita nalighmeng kayngunaghyaghqaafqiita. Itupill pinighnalleteng kelgullitki aneghneghqilleghmegteggun, nakaan nuyaqegsaghwaalleghqun nalighmeng gold-mengllu pearl-mengllu ullngaqluteng nalighmeng akituqameng aatkameng aalluteng. Tawaten pilleq elqughutngaaq aghnanun maniguutkayugunilghiinun Kiyaghneghmun.
54002011	Yuget apeghtughinghata yughaghvigni aghnat nagasaghqaagut nepiighngaghmeng, malighqutaqluteng.
54002012	Aghnat apeghtughistesugigatanka nalighmeng igleghutistengusugigatanka yugnun. Nepiighngayaghqaagut,
54002013	qayughllak Kiyaghneghem ulimayuggaaqaqaa Adam, taagken Eve.
54002014	Adam-ngunghituq puughtellengegkaq, iwernga aghnaaguq puughtellengegkaq enkaam seghleghqestengughtekaaquq.
54002015	Iwernga aghnat ighniightuqumeng taghnughhaghneng yugulillengellequt nagneghumakuyeng neghyukluku Jesus, piniqimanginaqumeng ilameggneng, kiyaghsimanginaqumengllu agleghnaghluku kiyaghtaalleghmeng qusevegtellelighluteng.
54003001	Whaten pilleq ipanguuq: Kina alngunak igleghutistenguyukumi ugpeqanun taana qepghaqaq piyukegkaa piniipigtuq.
54003002	Igleghutista avutngisaghqaaguq, ataasimeng nuliilguyaghqaaguq, nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq, sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaaguq, yupiinghuyaghqaaguq, upughanghuyaghqaaguq, apeghtughiyaqleguuqlu.
54003003	Suumestenguyaghqaanghituq, suuglluguyaghqaanghituq iwernga nanglleghtaghyaghqaaguq, qanengnaqigasaghqaaguq, maniyuneghtuyaghqaanghituq.
54003004	Igleghutistem igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqii mangteghaghmiini, avaqutanillu apeghtughyaghqaqii veghusnaatefqaami qaatkesqelluni.
54003005	Igleghutista igleghutillgiskumi ellmi katam nengllugutmineng, naten'ngam aflengakelleqaki ugpeqistengi Kiyaghneghem?
54003006	Igleghutista ugpenghhaanghisaghqaaguq, luuraq qukaayugtepagnayukan enkaam nanqigtellengellequq aghyuughyaghqaaluni Tughneghaghtun.
54003007	Igleghutista pinitun kiyaghsaghqaaguq ugpeqaanghilngughnun akuzitkesqelluku itagnaghluku. Enkaam seghlequughpagningilleqaat, Tughneghaamllu kayaalqepagningilleqaa.
54003008	Tawateghpigaq Deacon-etlu pinighluki akuzitkesaghqaagut, ipapighqengngayaghqaagut, wine-meng meghepagyaghqaanghitut, pakigneghuyaghqaanghitutlu manimeng.
54003009	Pegsaghqaqenghitiit apeghtuusat Kiyaghneghem qayvighqegkii, umyugiitlu seghleghyugisaghqaagut.
54003010	Igleghutistet nakmiighvagilgameng deacon-kaghqameng qepghaqalilluki liigiknakangit piniitangi yuget. Taagken deacon-ngughtesnakangit.
54003011	Tawateghpigaq aghnatlu pinighluki akuzitkesaghqaagut, yiillgiyaghqaanghitut, iwernga nuqenneghtuyaghqaagut, ataasiighmesaghqaagutlu sakun tamaghhaakun.
54003012	Deacon-et ataasimeng nuliilguyaghqaagut, igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqiit avaqutatengllu mangteghaghmiitengllu.
54003013	Tamaakut deacon-et qepghaqegtat quulvallengyaghqaagut, nalluneqsuknaanghitaatlu ugpeqilleghteng Christ Jesus-kun.
54003014	Sunanguq qantaghaqun elpenun pilanga, iwernga maaten elpenun latatkanka tamaakut apeghtuusat.
54003015	Enkaam kimaawimakuma latama liisimakesleqaaten naten ugpeqat kiyaghsaghqaatangi Kiyaghneghem nengllugutanganilnguut. Ellnginguut ugpeqistengi unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem, aghveghaqetaagut, tunemaagutlu ipapilleghmun.
54003016	Nalluneqnaghhangunaki ugpeqaput apeghtuusat Kiyaghneghem qayvightekii seghleghllaguutlu ipapestaaghuutlu: Christ-a allgeqaaguq yugusipiguluni, Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka liisimakestii tamaakut ellngan pikii elqughutngatangi, yaqulgetlu esghaqaqaat. Ungipaqegkaaguq nunataghhaani tamaghhaani, ugpeqegkaqaat nunataghhani tamaghhaani, taagken qilagmun mayuutkaguq.
54004001	Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak whateghlluwaaq piik kingulighni aghneghni ilangita yuget peglleqaat ugpeqilleghteng Christ-akun. Tawaten pillequt qayughllak qaatkelleqegkangit iqlengalghiit tughneghaat, apeghtuusiitlu.
54004002	Tawatelnguut apeghtuusat iqlengalghiineng pinguut. Iqlengiqelleteng aapghaqiit ipapigsugnighqelluki. Nagannaniqaqiit umyugateng liisimakilghiit elqughutngalleghmengllu anaggutngalleghmengllu.
54004003	Tawatelnguut yuget nengughutesnanighiiqut, ilangillu neqem neghesnanighaqiit. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqii qamaglluki neqet neghyaghqaaluki iyamsiqayagutaqluki. Ugpeqat liisimakilghiit ipapilleghmeng liisimakiit tamaakut.
54004004	Kiyaghneghem ulimaaghi qamaglluteng pinilghiinguut. Enkaam ighsaksaghqaanghitut tugukliimakumeng iyamsiqayagulluki.
54004005	Akuzitangakun Kiyaghneghem, yughakunllu aaftekaagut agleghnaghluki.
54004006	Tamaakut apeghtuusat liigikestengngwaaqufki ugpeqaalgutegpenun, pinilghiingullequten qepghaghtenga Christ Jesus-em. Ugpeqillghen iknaqughlleqaa liisimanginaqufki ipapillghet ugpeqat ugpeqaqegkangit, pinilghiitlu apeghtuusat qaatkegkaghten.
54004007	Nagategpenaki sasiinghilnguut ungipaghaatet tengvimun ayuqelghiit Kiyaghneghem ipapillghanun. Yeghlegi peghqigsaatkigu Kiyaghneghmun ayuqelghii kiyaghtaalleq.
54004008	Yugusim ulapellgha pinightuq, iwernga kiyaghtelleghput Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun ayuqelghii pinighataghaghtuq. Kayusiisaghqaqiinkut whani unguvallemnni, tuunglighhaanillu unguvallghem.
54004009	Taana pilleq ipanguuq, enkaam qamagtengngwaaghluni ugpeqsaghqaaguq.
54004010	Tamaaken apalluqluku qepghaghllaguukutlu sagiqliightengnguukutlu yugnun ugpeqesqelluku ipapilleq. Tawaten piikut qayughllak neghyukaghput unguvalghii Kiyaghneq, Yugulighistengat qamaglluteng yuget, kiyang tamaakut ugpelghiit ellngakun.
54004011	Qeleghqi apeghtughqi tamaaken.
54004012	Kitumun alngunak palaqestegpenaan anglinghhaamallghen. Iwernga ugpeqanun usputaawi akuzilleghpegun, salleghpegun, piniqelleghpegun, ugpeqilleghpegun, pelungilluten kiyaghtelleghpegun.
54004013	Kaatellemnun kenlanga, ugpeqat qerngughunneghata atightuutaqiki Akuzitneng Igaqegkaneng, ungipaqitaqiki, apeghtughaqiki.
54004014	Atuqaqigu taghneghagnekun tunusaq ilugpenilnguq. Taana tunusaq tuunegkaaguq elpenun uuknaliqelleghqun Elder-et iigtighaqngaten.
54004015	Pinaqellghen qamaglluku piiqiki qelghutkanka. Tawaten yuget liilleqaat pillguughlleghhiiten.
54004016	Piraamsingwaaghluten kiyaghtaalleghpenillu apeghtughilleghpenillu. Tawaten pikuvek elpeneng yugulillequten, tamaakutlu nagatesteten.
54005001	Aghyuughpenaan siivanlleq yuuk, iwernga kavyungunaan nallghusaghaqigu atakelghiistun. Uyuqliit yuget anglegutkelghiistun piiqiki.
54005002	Siivanlleghet aghnat naakelghiistun piiqiki, enkaam uyuqliit aghnat nayagestun piiqiki, qiliighyukefqiita.
54005003	Kayusiitiki ugingighat aflengakistengiitkat.
54005004	Iwernga ugingighaq avaqutaghtukumi nalighmeng eltughaghtukumi, kelgullit nengllugutmeggnun kiyaghsugniluteng Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqellghatun. Aflengakelleghmegteggun angayuqateng akinaqelleqiit enkaam efqughlleqaat Kiyaghneq.
54005005	Ugingighaq ilakwaaghiitkaq sighimanguuq Kiyaghneghqun. Enkaam unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan yughaamanginaaguq kayusiitesqelluni.
54005006	Iwernga ugingighaq teghigniqnginaqumi ellmineng efqughhnaluni, unguvaghngaaghmi tuqukastun ayuqsaghqaaguq.
54005007	Qeleghqi ugpeqat tamaakut pisqelluki enkaam kitum alngunak seghlequunghillitki.
54005008	Kitum alngunak aflengakenghilkumiki ilakwaani, wata ellmi katam nengllugutni, tawaten pilleghmikun pegtekaqaa ugpeqilleni. Enkaam seghleghataghaallequq ugpeqaanghilngughmeng.
54005009	Ugingighaq 60 uksughtutkaliimakan, nengughtekaakanllu ataasimeng, aatgha igaqsaghngaaghmi ayuquq ugingighat atelghutiitgun.
54005010	Amalleqa tamangan liisimakaat qepghallegtulanga, katam avaqutani pinitun anglistellghatun, upughaneghtulanga, ugpeqaalgutmi itegiit ughvughaqluki, kayusighiiqluni seghleliilghiineng, quunpengllu pinitun piiqelghii.
54005011	Iwernga nuteghat ugingighat aatghit igaqegpenaki atelghutatgun. Yugusiita piyukellghan sakniqesneghisteng ugiighyugllequt. Tawaten pimakumeng naafqelleqaat akeqilleghteng Christ-amun.
54005012	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqii aghyuughyaghqaaluki qayughllak naafqegkangat akeqilleghteng.
54005013	Taam saaghwakun ighsanitaghtaqii, itghiitughtaqii, yiillgitughtaqii, yanutquneghtughtaqii, akuzitkaqiitlu sangwaat akuzitkesaghqaqenghilketeng.
54005014	Enkaam itagnaghataghaghnayaghtut nuteghat uginghighat ugiighyaquyeng, taghnughhangluteng, aflengakesqellukillu nengllugutangit. Tawaten pikumeng anguyak seghlequughvigiitesleqaat whangkunneng.
54005015	Aawallu ilangi nuteghat ugingighat ugpeqaananighluteng maligusimaat Tughneghagh-mun.
54005016	Ugpeqaq aghnaq ilakwaalgukumi ugingighaneng, ellngan kayusiisaghqaqii. Enkaam ilangita ugpeqat kayusiinneghisaghngaaghmegteki ayuqiit. Taagken ugpeqat kayusiilleqiit uginghighat aflengakistengiitkat.
54005017	Elder-et igleghutiyuqat yugaghvigmi, taakunginaghhaagnengllu qepghalghiit apeghtughilleghqun, ungipaqilleghqunllu, quulvaghaqiteki malghughqelluki akileghtuusiit.
54005018	Qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat piit, “Ox-a tutmalghii grain-meng malliighnaluki, neghesqelluku grain-meng sugrugiitighpenaan.” Amalleqa, “Qepghaghta akileghtughyaghqaaguq qepghallghanun.”
54005019	Nagategpenaki kinkut alngunak avutkilghiit Elder-meng anaggusimaniluku, wetkuqun avutkilghii liisimakistelgukan maalghugegneng nalighmeng pingayuneng.
54005020	Kina alngunak seghleghqumanginaqan, aghyuughnaken seghleghqennaniisqelluku ugpeqat manungitni. Tawaten pikuvgu ilangi tamaakut alingellequt.
54005021	Tamaakut qelghutanka elpenun qaatkesqelluki, pakiggutifqaavek nalighmeng taniilqifqaavek pisqelluten. Tawaten qelghamken esghaamanghitni Kiyaghneghenkut, Christ Jesus-enkut, nakmikegkatlu yaqulget.
54005022	Iigtighaghtegpenaan kina igleghutistekaghqaaluku yughaghvigmi. Taayughqegkuvek ilalkiinnayukavek seghleghqellghanun. Kiyaghtekestaa pelungilluten.
54005023	Meghhiinaghmeng meghegpenang, iwernga wine-ngiighhaghmeng meqaghaqluten kayutkelleqan aqsaqughpenun, qinuyugaatalleghpenunllu.
54005024	Ilangita yuget seghleghqellghit aliitngwaaghaqut, talwa salin nanqigtellghilluteng. Iwernga ilangita yuget seghleghqellghit aliighsaghqaagut kinguvaqwaaqun.
54005025	Tawateghpigaq aneghneghqillghat aliitngwaaghaqut, iwernga tamaakut aliinneghilnguut iighnganaanghitut.
54006001	Qamaglluteng qepghaghtelaaghet siivakeghllaglitki tamaakut piliitisteteng, enkaam kitum alngunak seghletun akuzitkenghillikek aatgha Kiyaghneghem, apeghtughilleghputlu.
54006002	Qepghaghtelaaghet piliitistengit ugpeqaalgutngukata siivakataghaghlitki qayughllak ugpeqaalgutkegkangit. Enkaam qepghaataghaghlitki qayughllak kayusiingwiit ugpeqaalguteteng piniqegkateng. Tamaakut apeghtuusaqikillu ungipaqikillu.
54006003	Kina alngunak apeghtughikumi allanguluku tamaakuneng apeghtuusaneng, itagnaqenghitii apeghtuusapigi Atanemta Jesus Christ-am. Ellngan apeghtuusaan ungipaatiinkut Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun kiyaghtelleghqameng.
54006004	Kina alngunak allatun apeghtughilghii aangaayugneghllaguuq, liigikigatuq sameng alngunak. Aaghtiiraaghyuneghtuuqlu qaniqsuneghtuuqlu akuzitneng. Tawaten pillghem allgeghtaqii: aqinalleq, aghivatelleq, seghlequughutelleq, ugpequnnanilleq.
54006005	Tawatelnguut quunpeng aaghtiiraaghutestiiqut. Umyugiit sumeghneghlluugtaqut enkaam liisimaknanighaqaat ipapilleq. Sumeghmeggni qepghaaskumegteggu Kiyaghneq aklungighilleqniluteng piiqut.
54006006	Iwernga allgeghuteghllagllequkut kiyaghtekumta Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqesullghatun itagnaqluku pitutalvut.
54006007	Allgeghaqngamta nunamun kelqutngitukut, tuqukumtallu kelqutelgunaanghitukut.
54006008	Enkaam itagnaghllequkut neqelgukumta, aatkalgukumta.
54006009	Iwernga tamaakut aklungighiyulghiit nanghiiqullengaqut. Seghleghem piyukellghita tugwaaqii enkaam temngitwhaghllagughtaqut. Taagken piyukellghita sayugaqii naafqelleghmun.
54006010	Manimeng piniqilleq akuqaa qamaglluni seghleghem. Ilangita yuget pegtaqaat ugpeqilleghteng qayughllak manitughqaaghllagyulghiit. Enkaam ellmeggneng qivghughllagughtaqut.
54006011	Iwernga elpek Kiyaghneghem yukaaten, enkaam iqitngaluten tamaakuneng. Sagiqutiki elqughutngalleq, kiyaghten Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqellghatun, ugpeqillelighluten, piniqillelighluten, nuqenneghtuluten, nangllegtaghluten.
54006012	Pilluwaatigu ugpeqilleq qayughllak tawaten pilluwalleq pinilghiinguuq. Tugugullu kenlengilnguq unguvalleq. Kiyaghneghem tagsiqaqaaten tugukliisqelluku taana unguvalleq aapghaqngavgu ugpeqillghen ugpeqalghutnun.
54006013	Qeleghnaqamken nagasimanghani Kiyaghneghem, unguvallelitikam samun tamaghhaanun unguvalghiinun, nagasimanghanillu Christ Jesus-em, kiimsighilaataqughikam Pontius Pilate-mun.
54006014	Qelghamken piraamsiluten qaatkesqelluki qamaglluki qelgutkanka elpenun. Nagneghutiki kenlanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am uteghninqiglleghanun. Tawaten pikuvek kitum alngunak anagguniluten pinaanghitaaten.
54006015	Kiyaghneghem pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini tagisleqaa Jesus Christ-a. Usuqnalghii Kiyaghneq, ellnginaaguq Igleghutisteghllak, ellnganguuq Umiilgat umiilget, Atanghat atanghet.
54006016	Ellngiinaaguq tuqungigalnguq. Kiyaghtengnguuq nighugrakegllagmi repall kitum alngunak tughaaghpagningitaa. Kitum alngunak esghiigataa, talwa esghaghnaanghitaa. Kiyaghneghem piklikek quulvalleqlu aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu quunperugllak. Amen.
54006017	Qukaayugtesnanighqi tamaakut aklungilnguut nunami whani, talwa sighimasnanighqi aklungingitgun nalluneqnalghiitgun. Iwernga sighimasqiki Kiyaghneghqun. Ellngan ighlegutegpenaamta tuunaqiinkut sameng tamaghhaaneng pinighyuugusighqameng.
54006018	Aklungilnguut pinitun pisqiki, aklungitesqiki pinitun qepghalleghqun, ighlellngunaki tuuniyukestaghluki ilangitnun yugnun.
54006019	Tawaten pikumeng kagpaglleqaat aklungi ellmeggnun. Taana aklungi ayugilnguuguq tunemaq aagnakaghqiitnilnguq. Enkaam unguvallengellequt unguvallepigmeng.
54006020	Timothy, kelengakluki tamaakut Kiyaghneghem neghyukutkii elpenun. Iqitngaluten ugpeqaanghilnguut temngitwhaneng akuzitngitnengllu, aaghtiiraaghutellghitnengllu. Tamaakut ugpeqaanghilnguut sumeghmeggni liisimallepiilguniiqut, iwernga ipangunghituq.
54006021	Ilangita pegsimaat ugpeqilleghteng qayughllak ugpeqegkangat ipangunghilnguq liisimalleq. Kiyaghneghem quyaslisi.
55001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut apostle-nganeng Christ Jesus-em Kiyaghneghem piyukellghakun. Kayagtekaqaanga aapghesqelluku akequsaqegkaq unguvalleq Christ Jesus-melnguq.
55001002	Timothy-mun piniqepigtekamnun ighnemnun. Kiyaghneghem Atam, Christ Jesus-emllu Atanemta quyasliten, nangllekliten, nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
55001003	Unugtuumaan, aghneghtuumaan yughallemkun iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneq elpeneng. Qepghaataqaqa seghleghyullngunanga, katam sivunemtun.
55001004	Esghaghyupigtaqamken allameng, qayughllak neqamikaqa pellghututaqngamtung qiyakaalghiiten. Enkaam quyaghllagllequnga qerngughunneqigtekumtung.
55001005	Neqamikaqa ugpeqillepiigen. Taananguuq ataasiq ugpeqilleq nengyughpek Lois-em, naagpeklu Eunice-em atuqegkangak. Liisimakngwaaghaqa elpeklu atuqngwaan.
55001006	Tamaaken apalluqluku neqangughsugamken, atuqumanginaghhu tunusan Kiyaghneghmeng, tuunegkaqaa iigtighaqngamken.
55001007	Kiyaghneghem taghneghalitellghitiinkut alingyugnalghiimeng. Itupill Taghneghagkenka imiqaqiinkut aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng, piniqelleghmeng, nuqetelleghmengllu.
55001008	Kayngukegpenaan ungipaqigu Ataneghput, talwa kaynguyagutegpenanga anusimingllaghaagunga Christ-a apalluqluku. Itupill aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun Kiyaghneghem ikfiqelgusighnga Pinilghiit Ungipat apalluqluki.
55001009	Kiyaghneghem yugulikaqiinkutlu nakmikegkaqiinkutlu pelungitesqelluta. Tawaten pikaaguq apalluqluki ellmi katam uspeqellenillu piniqillenillu, nakaan qepghalleghput apalluqluku. Piniqegkaqiinkut Christ Jesus-kun sivutghulluku piinlilleghqaan nunam.
55001010	Iwernga whaa piniqelleni liitestaa whangkunnun tagillghakun Yugulighistemta Christ Jesus-em. Christ-am naafqegkaqaa tuqulleq, taagken Pinilghiitgun Ungipatgun liitestiinkut tuqungigalngughmeng unguvalleghmeng.
55001011	Pinilghiit Ungipat apalluqluki Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaanga ungipaqistengulunga, apostle-ngulunga, apeghtughistengulungallu.
55001012	Taakut apalluqluki ikfiqnguunga. Iwernga kaynguyunghitunga qayughllak liisimakaqa kinangutanga ugpeqegkaqa. Liisimakngwaaghaqa ellngan kelengaksaqlegwaa sangwaa neghyukutkaqa ellnganun kenlanga kingulighmun Aghneghmun.
55001013	Maligtiki apeghtuusapiget nagaquqaghten whangamneng. Usputaagut atughqaqaten. Apeghtuusaqiki ugpeqilleghqunllu piniqelleghqunllu allgeghtekaqaten Christ Jesus-meng.
55001014	Kelengakigu ipapilleq neghyukutkaq elpenun. Kelengakigu kayutkellukek Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak kiyaghlleghhiik ilumnni.
55001015	Liisimakan qamagtevzighluteng ugpeqat Asia-melnguut kayusighyugnaniimaatnga, talwa Phygelus-enkuk Hermogenes-enkuk.
55001016	Yughaatkengngwaanka Ataneghmun nangllegyagutesqelluki Onesiphorus-em nengllugutangi, qayughllak uglaghngaan ilutughsaghaqaanga. Kaynguyagusimangitaallu anusimingllaghaamalqa.
55001017	Kaataqngami Rome-emun ivan'ghiighutkaqaanga kenlanga naalkelleghminun.
55001018	Ataneghmun yughaatkaqaqa Onesiphorus nangllegyagutesqelluku tawani Aghneghmi! Liisimakan kayutkeghllakaqaqa Ephesus-mi.
55002001	Enkaangam elpek ighnemni, iknaqi atuqelleghpegun piniqellgha Christ Jesus-em.
55002002	Elpeklu tawantutkatlu nagatkaqasi apeghtuusanka. Enkaam apeghtuusanka neghyukutiki ataasiighmelngughnun. Taagken ellngita apeghtuusaqlegulleqiit ilameggnun.
55002003	Ikfiqelgusighqut pinilghiitun pilluwaghtengatun Christ Jesus-em.
55002004	Pilluwaghtem ilatngalghiim pilluwaghtenun efqughsugaqaa umiileni, enkaam akumghhuusigatuq pilluwaghtengunghilnguut kiyaghtaallghitnun.
55002005	Kayaalqiiraaghta kilgaaqumun malighqutaqenghilkumi liilightuusameggnun, allgeghunnaanghituq qaghpanganeng kayaalqiistem.
55002006	Ughleghiighllakaq piitesighaghta nengighyuwhaaghyaghqaaguq unataqata.
55002007	Sumeghtaaghaatkiki sameng pillghenka qayughllak Atanghem liigiksagutesleqaaten sameng tamaghhaaneng.
55002008	Neqamikluku Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtestekaqaa Jesus Christ-a tuqulleghmeng, kingunqaa David-em. Tamaakunguut ungipaqaqegkenka apenemki Pinilghiit Ungipat.
55002009	Ikfiqnguunga qayughllak ungipaqegkenka Pinilghiit Ungipat. Talwa qiipraghusighlunga ayuqunga liilightuusameng naafqiistetun. Iwernga akuzitangi Kiyaghneghem qiipraghutngitut.
55002010	Enkaam ikfiqusiqsugluku ayuqaqa sangwaa tamaghhaan Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii yugulillengesqelluki Christ Jesus-kun. Yugulilleghmegteggun nighughqellengellequt kenlengilngughmeng.
55002011	Maakut pillghet ipanguut: Tuqulgusiimakumteggu, kiyaghtelgusighlleqaghput.
55002012	Iilqayunghilkumta, igleghutilgusighlleqaghput. Nallunqegkumteggu, ellnganllu nallunqelleqiinkut.
55002013	Ataasiighmenneghilkumta, ellnga ataasiighmetaquq qayughllak taaqnaanghituq ataasiighmenneghmeng.
55002014	Kitumun alngunak puygustegpenaki tamaakut. Kiyaghneghem nagasimanghani, kelengasaaghqi qaniqututkefqiita akuzitet pisqelluki. Qaniqutellghat kayutngunaanghituq, naafqengnginaghlleqaat ugpeqillghat nagallghiit.
55002015	Taakunginaghhaagneng qepghaa Kiyaghneghmun itagnaqesqelluten. Qepghaghtengu kayngukingigalnguq qepghaqamineng. Elqughaghllukullu apeghtuusaqigu Kiyaghneghem ungipaghpigaa.
55002016	Iqitngaluten temngitwhaneng, sameng pisiinghilngughneng aleghquutelleghneng. Tawatelnguut aleghquutellghet uyavaataghaghlleqiit yuget Kiyaghneghmeng.
55002017	Tawatelnguut temngitwhat apeghtuusat aqnighneghestun ayuqut mingitkayuget maamyaghqaanghilnguut. Hymenaeus-enkuk Philetus-enkuk apeghtughillghik tawatelnguugut.
55002018	Pegtekaqiik apeghtuusapiget qayughllak piiquk siingenllu tuqukat unguvaghtesimaniluki. Enkaam ilangitnun ugpeqnanightestekaqaak ipapilleq.
55002019	Iwernga ayugilnguq tunemaq Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaa qapragtepagningituq. Taaggun tunemakun igaqngaat akuzitet: “Atanghem liisimakii ellmi pini.” Whatenllu igaqngaaq, “Kina alngunak tuqlughilghii aatghaneng Ataneghem, seghletun pineghmeng taaqli.”
55002020	Mangteghaghllagmi allaaghhiinaghmeng salghutaghtuuq: ilangi ulimaaghuut gold-meng, silver-meng, unaghsimeng, qikumengllu. Ilangi salghutat megnunalghiinun atuugut, ilangi samun alngungak.
55002021	Kina alngunak ellmineng katam pelungighsaqumi seghleghmeng, salghutaghtun atughqaaghllequq megnunalghiimun. Aaftekaaghllequq atuuluni mangtegham yuganun. Taagken atughqaaghllequq alngunak pinilghiimun qepghaqamun.
55002022	Iqitngaluten sameng seghleghmeng anglinghhat atuqsugaqegkangitneng. Quunpeng atuqaqigu elqughutngalleq. Ataasiighmelluten, piniqingaluten, nekeggmellutenllu. Tamaakut atuqiki, maligulluten tuqlughilghiinun Ataneghmun qamaken pelungilngughmeng ilumeggneng.
55002023	Iqitngaluten temngitwhaneng aleghquutellghitneng yuget akuzitkilghiineng liigikumangilkemeggneng. Liisimakaten aaghtiiraaghutestikayuguut.
55002024	Atanghem qepghaghtenga aaghtiiraaghtengunghituq. Itupill nangllegtaghyaghqaaguq tamanganun. Pinilghiinguyaghqaaguq apeghtughista. Nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq.
55002025	Atanghem qepghaghtenga kavyugisaghqaaguq apeghtughikumi kipullginaalghiinun. Walluumllu Kiyaghneghem avuteghqestaqliki ugpeqesqelluku ipapilleq.
55002026	Enkaam liisaaghaghyaqumeng anagnayaghaat Tughneghaam negaghaa. Tughneghaam naapsimaneghminiki aaghqutaqaqii.
55003001	Liisimakesugamken kingulighni aghneghni seghleliighllaguyaghqaaguq.
55003002	Yuget ellmeggneng piniqellequt, maniyuneghtullequt, yamrratullequt, aangaayugllequtlu. Seghlequughlleqiit ilateng, qaatkennaanghitiit angayuqateng, iyamsiqayugnaanghitut, waaknanighlleqaatlu Kiyaghneq.
55003003	Piniqinaanghitut, seghevutinaanghitut, iqlengiqutkillequt, suugllugullequt, amyuqetiqellequt, ugumikelleqaatlu sangwaa alngunak pinilghii.
55003004	Uveghpagulleqiit ilateng, nangyiighullequt, qukaayugteghllagllequt, teghigniqelleq piniqataghaghlleqaat pakiggulluku Kiyaghneghmeng.
55003005	Qaaymegteggun ugpeqaayugllequt, iwernga kiyaghtaallghita apeghlleqaat avangitulngi Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng. Iqitngaluten tawatelngughneng yugneng.
55003006	Ilangi tamaakut nenun iitghaataghllequt aaghqutaqepigesnaghnaluki nallekaghnilnguut aghnat. Tamaakut aghnat seghleghqellghita uqigtuqusighllaglleqii, seghleghemllu piyukellelghutngita aaghqutaqelleqii.
55003007	Tamaakut aghnat nagallequt apeghtughillghanun kitum alngunak, taawanginaq liinnaanghitaat ipapilleq.
55003008	Tamaakut apeghtughilghiit ellngitnun kipullginaaghlleqaat ipapilleq, katam Jannes-enkuk Jambres-enkuk kipullginaallghegketun Moses. Umyugaghlluugllequt, ugpeqillghatlu ipangunghillequq.
55003009	Iwernga tawaten pillghat mulunaanghituq. Temngitwhallghat aliillequq tamanganun, katam Jannes-enkuk Jambres-enkuk temngitwhallghak aliitngallghatun.
55003010	Iwernga elpek liisimakngwaaghaten apeghtughillghenka, kiyaghtaalqa, apallaallu kiyaghtelleghma. Liisimakanllu ugpeqilqa, iilqayunghitelqa, piniqilqa, aghuliilkaamalqa.
55003011	Liisimakan amyuqetaatkesilqa, ikfiqelqallu. Liisimakan tawaten pikaqaatnga Antioch-mi, Iconium-emi, Lystra-millu. Uglaghngaan amyuqetaatkellengegkaagunga, tawalliima Atanghem yugulikaqaanga tamaghhiitneng.
55003012	Tamaghhaghmi amyuqetaatkellengellequq kiyaghsulghii Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun Christ Jesus-kun.
55003013	Seghleghet yuget, puughtistetlu, seghleghughtaghaghllequt. Puughqughllequt, ellngitlu puughtellengellequt.
55003014	Iwernga elpek atuqumanginaghqi apeghtuusat liitkaghten, ugpeqepiikaghten. Liisimakaten ipangutangi, qayughllak liisimakaten kinkungutangi apeghtughistekegkaghten.
55003015	Ima taghnughhaategpeneng liisimakegkaqaten agleghnalghiit Akuzitet Igaqegkat. Akuzitet Igaqegkat apeghtughyaqlegwaaten yugulilleghqameng ugpeqilleghpegun Christ Jesus-kun.
55003016	Qamaglluteng Akuzitet Igaqegkat Kiyaghneghem aneghziilqii. Enkaam apeghtughisighqaagut, aghyuughusiighqaagut, nallghusaasighqaagut anaggutelleghmun, apeghtughisighqaagutlu pinitun kiyaghtaalleghqamun.
55003017	Enkaam atuqluki Akuzitet Igaqegkat, Kiyaghneghem qepghaghtenga peghqigsaghwaaghngallequq, yataaghqengngallequqlu tamaghhaanun aneghneghqilleghmun.
55004001	Christ Jesus tagikumi igleghutinaluni Ataneghpagulleghmini, nanqiglleqii unguvalghiitlu tuqukatlu. Enkaam nagasimanghegkeni Kiyaghneghenkuk Christ Jesus-enkuk, qelghamken
55004002	ungipaqiki Pinilghiit Ungipat. Sagiqluten ungipaqiki yugnun nagasugughngaata nalighmeng nagasugunghiteghngaata. Nekeggmelluten apeghtughilleghpegun ugpeghtesnaqiki, ineghtiki anaggutellghitneng, kayemikillu.
55004003	Pilleghqaq taginguuq yuget nagasugnanighllequt ipapignun apeghtuusanun. Ivaghillequt piyukegkameggneng apeghtughistelghutneng nagatepigesnaghnaluki nagaqughyukegkaghhiinateng.
55004004	Nagasugnanighllequt ipapilleghmun, nagasugyagullequt temnginun ungipaghanun.
55004005	Iwernga elpek iiwleng nekeggmelluten, nagneghutigu sangwaa piyaghqan ikfiqngughngaaghpek, ungipaqikestaa Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng. Elpek qepghaghtekegkangaten Kiyaghneghem, apeghiighhu qamaglluku qepghaqaq elpenun pisqegkaa.
55004006	Whanga aghqutkesaghqaaghsimaanga Kiyaghneghmun, tuqulleghqaqa kaasaghtuumaaq.
55004007	Pilluwaamaaqa pinilghii pilluwalleq, apeghiighaqa kilgaaqulqa, ataasiighmesimanginaqaagunga Ataneghmun.
55004008	Enkaam taawa Kiyaghneghem utaqiitngwaa whangamnun qaghpanga elqughutngallghem. Atanghem elqughlluku nanqigtistem akileghtughlleqaanga Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani. Whanganginaagpenanga iwernga akileghtughlleqii qamaglluki tamaakut qelanelghiit tagilleghqaaneng.
55004009	Pinaqellghaagken qamagllukek tagiragkiighi whangamnun.
55004010	Demas-em piniqsaliisimaa nunam kiyaghtaallgha enkaam unisimaanga, aghulaqumaaq Thessalonica-mun. Crescens Galatia-simaaq enkaam Titus Dalmatia-mun pimaaq.
55004011	Luke-nginaghhaq whangamnituq. Mark aqfaluku kelqennaken qayughllak kayutkepigtaqa qepghallemni.
55004012	Tychicus Ephesus-mun kayagsimaaqa.
55004013	Troas-mellunga unitkaqagka qaasligka Carpus-enkuni. Taginaqegkuvek tagitaghhnakegken. Tagitaghhnaketenllu iimgat iganka, kiyang taakut amiirameng ulimaaghet.
55004014	Alexander-em siilumeng sangllaghtem elngaatall seghletun pikaqaanga. Atanghem aghyuughnaaghaa tawaten pillghaneng.
55004015	Elpeklu kelengakluku tawaten pinayukangaten qayughllak ungipaghput ugumikepigtaa.
55004016	Nanqigtistemun aglaasuwhaaghaqngatnga kitum alngunak mesighaasaghtullghitaanga, yeghlegi uniqaghaatkaqaatnga. Yughaatkaqanka Kiyaghneghmun akinaqefqiita pisqelluki tawaten pillghitneng.
55004017	Iwernga Ataneq whangamnitkaaguq. Iknaqusiqaqaangallu ungipaqesqelluki iinguniita Pinilghiit Ungipat qamaglluki Gentile-et nagaqiisqelluki. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem yugulikaqaanga tuqutelleghqameng.
55004018	Atanghem yuguliyaghqaqaanga tamaghhaaneng seghleghem sughugallghaneng, enkaam paqnanangunaan aglaalleqaanga qilagmelngughmun Ataneghpagulleghminun. Ellnganun usuqilleq quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
55004019	Ungipaataghhnaketen Priscilla-nkuk Aquila-nkuk, Onesiphorus-enkutlu nengllugutkullghiit suumqaqankanguq.
55004020	Erastus unegtekaaguq Corinth-mi; qinuyugutanganeng Trophimus unitkaqaqa Miletus-mi.
55004021	Uksughvagilgan taginaqeghllagi. Eubulus-enkut, Pudens-enkut, Linus-enkut, Claudia-nkut, ilangitallu ugpeqaalgutet ungipaatesqiisi suumqaqiisinguq.
55004022	Ataneq taghneghaghpenilli, quyaslisillu.
56001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut qepghaghtenganeng Kiyaghneghem, apostle-nganengllu Jesus Christ-am. Kayagtekaagunga kayusiitesqelluki Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii yuget ugpelleghtughtaghiisqelluki, liitesqellukullu ipapilleq. Taam ipapillghem kayusighlleqii yuget kiyaghtelleghqiit Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun.
56001002	Taagken ataasimeng ipapilleghmeng sighimallelguukut kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng. Iqlengiqigatngwaaghem Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaqaa taana unguvalleq ima ayumirugllaggaaneng.
56001003	Enkaam pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini Kiyaghneghem liitestekaqaa taana kenlengilnguq unguvalleq ungipamikun. Whangamnun neghyukutkaqaa ungipani enkaam ungipaqaqaqa qelghutellghatun Kiyaghneghem Yugulighistemta.
56001004	Ukut latat Titus-mun pinguut, ighnepikamken ugpeqillemtegnegun. Kiyaghneghem Atam, Christ Jesus-emllu Yugulighistemta quyaslitenllu nekeggmellelguslitenllu.
56001005	Unitkaqamken Crete-mi, apeghiighesqelluku qepghaqaghput apeghiillghilnguq. Nakmiightiisqesugamken Elder-kaghqameng yughaghvignun tamaghhiitni town-et. Neqamikluki qelghutkanka:
56001006	Elder-kaghqaq avutngisaghqaaguq; ataasimeng nuliilguyaghqaaguq, avaqutiillu ugpeqaayaghqaagut; nelliqneghuyaghqaanghitut, qaatkusigasaghqaanghitutlu.
56001007	Igleghutistengutmineng Kiyaghneghem qepghaqaanun, Elder-a avutngisaghqaaguq. Yukeghqenghuyaghqaanghituq, nalighmeng kaatqaghtaamanguyaghqaanghituq, nalighmeng suumestenguyaghqaanghituq, nalighmeng suuglluguyaghqaanghituq, nalighmeng pakigneghuyaghqaanghituq aklungighinaluni.
56001008	Itupill upughanghuyaghqaaguq, piniqistekaghqaqaa pinillghem. Nuqenneghtuyaghqaaguq, elqughutngayaghqaaguq, taghneghagmikun pelungisaghqaaguq, nuqetutiyaghqaaguq alngunak seghleghmeng.
56001009	Ellnga ataasighmesaghqaaguq ipapignun apeghtuusanun apeghtughallengelleghmitun. Atuqluki ipapiget apeghtuusat kayemelleqii yuget, liigikesleqiillu apeghtughistesighwaaghet anaggutnganiluki.
56001010	Uglaapigtut qaatkusugigalnguut, temngi akuzilghiit puughtilghiit ilameggneng, kiyang tamaakunguut apeghtughilghiit Gentile-et ugpeqiit circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki.
56001011	Taaqestiki tawaten apeghtughillghitneng. Temngimeng apeghtughilleghmegteggun alngunaseghaghqaqiit iinguniita nengllugutet. Apeghtughiiqut apeghtuusaghqaqenghilkemeggneng; tawaten piiqut aklungighipigesnaghnaluteng.
56001012	Ataasim Crete-eghmiim uuknaliqistem pikaqii, “Crete-eghmiit quunpeng iqlengaghtut, ugighsalghiistun teghikusastun ayuqut, ighsanitalghiinguutlu negheghllaget.”
56001013	Tawaten pillgha ipanguuq. Taana apalluqluku qevuulluki aghyuughqi Crete-eghmiit ugpeqiit ugpeqesqelluki ipapiget apeghtuusat.
56001014	Ungipaatiki nagannanighlitkinguq Jews-et temngi ungipaghaatangit. Qaatkennanighlitkinguq yuget qelghusangllaqiit. Taakunguut ighsakikat ipapigneng apeghtuusaneng.
56001015	Sangwaa qamaglluni pelungituq tamaakunun pelungilngughnun. Iwernga sangwaa qamaglluni pelunginneghituq tamaakunun pelunginneghilngughnun. Kiyaghtengnguut seghleghqelleghmi, ugpeqigataatlu Christ-a. Umyugiitlu sumeghneghitlu nukeggnaghtekaagut, enkaam liigiksaghqaananiimaat pinilleqlu seghlelleqlu.
56001016	Liisimakniiqaat Kiyaghneq iwernga kiyaghtaallghita ipapighqaqaat nallukutanga: ugumiknipigtut, qaatkusigatut, sasiinghitutlu sangwaa alngunak pinitun pinaanghitaat.
56002001	Iwernga elpek apeghtuusaqiki ugpeqanun ipapiget apeghtuusat.
56002002	Apeghtughqi nuyekliit yuget nuqenneghtusqelluki, siivaknalghiinguluki, sumeghtaghayusqelluki, ayepsugitesqelluki ugpeqilleghqun, piniqilleghqun, nuqenneghtulleghqun.
56002003	Tawateghpigaq apeghtughqi nuyekliit aghnat kiyaghtesqelluki tuun'ngaluki Kiyaghneghmun. Seghletun akuzitkesaghqaqenghitiit ilateng, nalighmeng megheghllafqiita wine-meng. Apeghtughiyaghqaagut pinitun kiyaghtaalleghqameng,
56002004	enkaam peghqighlleqiit uyuqliit aghnat piniqesqelluki ugingitlu avaqutiitlu.
56002005	Sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaagut, pelungisaghqaagut kiyaghtaalleghmeggni, qepghaqegsaghqaagut nemeggni, nangllegtaghyaghqaagut, qaatkusaghqaagut ugimeggnun. Enkaam kitum alngunak seghlequughnaanghitii Kiyaghneghem apeghtuusii.
56002006	Tawateghpigaq qeleghqi nukalpigat nuqenneghtusqelluki.
56002007	Elpek salleghpegun tamaghhaakun, usputaawi ellngitnun aneghneghqilleghpegun. Apeghtughiiqi ipapighqelluten, piraamsiluten.
56002008	Wataghllak apeghtuusaqegkan elqughutngali enkaam kitum alngunak seghlequunghillinkut. Tawaten pikuvek kipullginaaghtet seghletun akuzitkennaanghitiinkut, kipullginaallghitallu kaynguyugtesleqii.
56002009	Apeghtughqi qepghaghtelaaghet qaatkesqelluki piliitestengit, efqughtengngwaaghesqellukillu. Veghusnaghyaghqaqenghitiit,
56002010	nalighmeng teglegviksaghqaqenghitiit. Yeghlegi quunpeng pinitun, ataasiighmelluteng piyaghqaqiit. Enkaam salleghmegteggun tamaghhaakun piyuknangllaghlleqiit apeghtuusii Kiyaghneghem Yugulighistemta.
56002011	Tawaten kiyaghsaghqaagukut qayughllak Kiyaghneghem aliightekaqaa piniqelleni yugulillengesqelluku yuuk tamaghhaan.
56002012	Taam piniqellghem apeghtughiinkut pegtesqelluku kiyaghtaalleq Kiyaghneghmun ayuqenghilnguq, ighsakesqelluki nunam yugan piyukellghi seghleghqengngalghiit. Apeghtughiinkutlu nuqenneghtusqelluta, elqughutngaluta, kiyaghtesqelluta Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun nunami whani.
56002013	Tawaten kiyaghtelta utaqiimaluta quyanalghiimeng sighimalleghmeng. Sighimalqaghput nighughqengngalghii aliilleghqaa Jesus Christ-am Kiyaghneghllamta Yugulighistemta.
56002014	Ellmineng tuunegkaaguq yugulinaluta tamaghhaaneng seghleghqelleghmeng. Tawaten pikaaguq qayughllak pelungighsaghyukanginkut ellminun yuguluta, sagiqluta aneghneghqisqelluta yugnun.
56002015	Apeghtuusaqiki tamaakut ugpeqanun. Kiyaghneghem qelghusii atuqluki kayemiki, aghuliightikillu seghletun pingukata. Yeqay kitumun alngunak ukavaghtestegpenang.
56003001	Neqangughtiki ugpeqat malighqutaqesqelluki kavemem igleghutistengitnun, umiilwaaghnunllu. Qaatkutngayaghqaagut, apeghiighngayaghqaagut tamaghhaanun aneghneghqilleghnun.
56003002	Ungipaatiki kina alngunak seghletun akuzitkefqaan, aaghtiiraafqaan pisqelluku. Itupill nekeggmetulluki, qusevegngatulluki pisqelluki tamanganun.
56003003	Whangkutallu sivunghani nalluyaghtukut, qaatkusigasaghtukut, puughtengngayaghtukutlu. Yugusimta piyukellgha ayghiilluku, itagnaghqusiqluku ayuqsaghaghput. Unguvalleput kiyaghusiqsaghaput seghlepestaaghmun, aqinalleghmunllu. Yuget ugumiksaghiinkut, ugumikusaghtukutlu.
56003004	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem Yugulighistemta liisimakestekaqiinkut nangllegtalleghmineng, piniqelleghminengllu.
56003005	Yugulikaqiinkut apalluqluku nangllegtalleni, nakaan aneghneghqillemteggun. Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun ughvuqaqii seghleghqelleput, nutaghamengllu unguvallelitkaqiinkut.
56003006	Kiyaghneghem kuuvegkaqaak Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak kemnapigllukek whangkunnun Jesus Christ-akun, Yugulighistemteggun.
56003007	Kiyaghneq tawaten pikaaguq piniqelleghmikun nallghusaghnaluta elqughutngalleghminun. Enkaam sighimallelguukut whangkuta piliinnaluku kenlengilnguq unguvalleq.
56003008	Tamaakut pillghet ipanguut. Tamaakut apeghtuusat elpenun sagiqutesqesuganka yugnun qaatkesqelluki. Taagken ugpellelget Kiyaghneghqun aneghneghqipestaaghllequt. Tamaakut aneghneghqillghet pinilghiinguutlu kayutnguutlu tamanganun.
56003009	Iwernga elpek iqitngaluten tamaakuneng temngi qaniqullghiineng, aaghtiiraaghullghiineng sivuneghmeng aatghitneng, Liilightuusanengllu. Tamaana sasiinghituq, kayutngunaanghituq kitumun alngunak.
56003010	Kina alngunak aafquutestilghii kelengasaaghnaken ataasimeng nalighmeng alghighluku. Naganneghilkan peggnaken.
56003011	Liisimakan tawatelnguum yugem ighsakegkaqaa ipapilleq, seghleghqestenguuqlu. Enkaam ellngan katam seghleghqellghan nanqigsaghqaaghtesleqaa aghyuughyaghqaaluku.
56003012	Aglaghtestekumkun Artemas nalighmeng Tychicus elpenun, Nicopolis-ennaqeghllaggaaten, qayughllak uksughsugaqunga tamaani.
56003013	Kayusighnaqeghllagnakegken lawyer-a Zenas, Apollos-lu igleghalleghqagkenun. Wataghllak yataaghqunnakegken kelqesaghqameng sameng aklukegkagkeneng.
56003014	Ugpeqaalgutemta peghqigsaatkellitgu aneghneghqutkaghqaq enkaam kayusighyaqlegughhnakangit aklukegkapilget. Temngi kiyaghtaafqaameng pilit.
56003015	Qamaglluteng whangamnilnguut piniqiisinguq. Piniqelleghput aapqaghnaken ugpeqaalgutemnnun piniqistemnnun. Kiyaghneghem quyaslisi qamagllusi.
57001001	Ukut latat Paul-meng pinguut, anusimingllaghaq Christ Jesus apalluqluku, ugpeqaalgutemnnengllu Timothy-meng. Piniqegkamtegnun qepghalgutemtegnun Philemon-mun,
57001002	ugpeqanunllu qerngughutkayugnun mangteghaghpeni, Apphia-munllu nayamnnun Christ-akun, Archippus-munllu pilluwalgutemtegnun.
57001003	Kiyaghneghem Atamta, Atanemtallu Jesus Christ-am nanglleklisillu, nekeggmellelguslisillu.
57001004	Philemon-mi, quunpeng iyamsiqayugvikaqaqa Kiyaghneqa yughaatkennemken,
57001005	qayughllak nagaqughaqaqa piniqellghen tamaghhiitnun Kiyaghneghem yugitnun, ugpeqillghenllu Ataneghqun Jesus-kun.
57001006	Yughaatkaqamken ungipaatesqelluki ilaten ugpeqillemnneng Christ-akun. Tawaten pikuvek liigikataghaghlleqaten qamaglluki quyastellghet allgeghtekaput Christ-akun.
57001007	Ugpeqaalgutemni, piniqilleghpek Kiyaghneghem yuganun quyasteghllagaangallu kayemaangallu! Piniqelleghpek quyastii Kiyaghneghem yugi.
57001008	Tetugnaanghitunga qeleghnaluten Christ-akun atuqesqelluku elqughutngalghii, iwernga tawaten pinaanghitunga.
57001009	Piniqutelleghpung apalluqluku aapfikamken atuqesqelluku elqughutngalghii. Whanga, Paul, nanevgaagunga, anusimingllaghaagungallu apalluqluku Christ Jesus.
57001010	Whanganguuq aaputilghii ighnemnun, Onesimus-mun. Anusimingllaghvigmi ataliitkaqaanga Christ-akun.
57001011	Sivunghani sasiinghisaghtuq elpenun, iwernga whaa kayutngughtepigsimaaq whangkutegnun.
57001012	Onesimus elpenun aglaghtesnaqaqa, leganqun iluka maligunnaquq ellngakun.
57001013	Whangamnitesuguyaghaqa kayusiitesqellunga anusimingllaghvigmi, katam elpek kayusiinnayaqevnga maansaquvek. Liisimakegkenqun anusimingllaghaalghiinga Pinilghiit Ungipat apalluqluki.
57001014	Iwernga whangamnitesnaanghitaqa wetkuqun sivukluten aaptaghlluten. Itagnaqumakuvgu whangamnitesqelluku taawa elpek piyukelqelleqan, qayughllak qelghunghitamken tawaten pisqelluten.
57001015	Entaqun Onesimus iqitaghtekaaguq elpenisaghqaaluni quunperugllak.
57001016	Ellnga paninang qepghaghtelaaghuuq. Iwernga qepghaghtelaaghumalleghmineng angliighataghaamaaq qayughllak piniqegkaaghsimaaq ugpeqaalguta. Piniqepigtaqa, iwernga elpek piniqataghaghlleqan qepghaghtelaaghuluku, ugpeqaalgutngulukullu Ataneghqun.
57001017	Enkaangam tugukliimakuvnga qepghalgutngulunga, tuguklighnaken Onesimus whangangusluku.
57001018	Sameng seghletun pimakangaten nalighmeng asengemakangaten, asengenga whanga llivikelleqaqa.
57001019	Whaa, whanga katam iiggemneng igaghtunga whaten: whanga, Paul, llivikelleqamken. Iwernga puygugpenaan unguvallghen asengeluku ayuqan whangamnun.
57001020	Aa-a, ugpeqaalgutemni, aapfikamken Ataneghqun tugukliisqelluku Onesimus. Tawaten pikuvek quyasleqaghpenga Christ-akun!
57001021	Lataamken liisimakngwaaghluku qaatkesaghqaqan qelghutkaqa elpenun, repall qaayghulluku pillequten.
57001022	Atwhay, nekaghqangllaataghhnakevnga qayughllak sighimanguunga Kiyaghneghem kiimsighlleqii yughallesi, enkaam elpesinun pillequnga.
57001023	Epaphras-emnguq piniqiisi; anusimingllaghalgutkaqa apalluqluku Christ Jesus.
57001024	Qepghalgutmallu Mark-enkut, Aristarchus-enkut, Demas-enkut, Luke-enkut ellngitallunguq piniqiisi.
57001025	Piniqellgha Atanghem Jesus Christ-am tamaghhaghpesinilli.
58001001	Sivunghani agani uglaghlukullu, allaaghhiinaalukullu Kiyaghneghem aleghquqaqii sivuneput uuknaliqistetgun.
58001002	Iwernga ukuni kingulighni aghneghni aleghquqaqiinkut Ighneghmikun. Ellngakun Kiyaghneq nunangllaqaaguq, nakmikegkaqaallu piliitesqelluku sangwaa tamaghhaan.
58001003	Ighneghem kuukgutaqaa Kiyaghneghem nighughqellgha, Kiyaghneghtungwaaqlu ayuquq. Sangwaat qamaglluki nagneghastengngwii tawatelluki aghtughyaghqaanghilnguutgun akuzitmikun. Ighneghem tuunegkaqaa ellmi katam unguvalleni ukmangighnaluta tamaghhaaneng seghleghqellemnneng. Apeghiighyamigu tawaten pilleni, qilagmi aqumegkaaguq aghenqigneghakun Kiyaghneghem, aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam.
58001004	Kiyaghneghem quliightekaqaa Ighneq yaqulegneng, atelitkaqaallu ingyaatngalghiimeng aatghitneng.
58001005	Tawaten pikaqaa qayughllak Kiyaghneghem pimangitii nalighhiiniit yaqulget whaten, “Ighneqamken; aghneghmi Ataliitaghpenga.” Kiyaghneghemllu pimangitii nalighhiiniit yaqulget whaten, “Atakelleqaanga enkaam ellnga Ighneqelleqaqa.”
58001006	Kiyaghneghem kayagsaghqaaghsamigu Ighneqsuwhaani nunamun, whatenllu pikaaguq, “Yeqay qamaglluteng Kiyaghneghem yaqulgita manigughlitgu.”
58001007	Whatenllu pikaaguq yaqulegneng, “Kiyaghneghem yaquleni anuqestun lliightestekaqii. Qepghaghtengi kumaghulghiistun kenghestun lliightestekaqii.”
58001008	Iwernga Kiyaghneq Ighneghmineng whaten pikaaguq, “Kaay Kiyaghneq, aqumutagken kenlengisaghqaaguk quunperugllak! Igleghulleqan ataneghpagullghen elqughutngallelighluku.
58001009	Piniqan elqughutngalleq, ugumikan anaggutngalleq. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneq, Kiyaghneghpek nakmikumaatenllu quulvaamaatenllu pakiggulluku ilagpeneng. Enkaangam quyastighllagtuq anoint-eluten mesiighmeng.”
58001010	Whatenllu pikaaguq, “Elpek, Ataneq, piinlighyuggaaghmi nunangllaqaaguten, iiggegpenengllu qilagangllaqaaguten.
58001011	Qamaglluteng aviighusaghqaagut, iwernga elpek kiyaghsaghqaaguten. Aghyughyaghqaagut aatkastun.
58001012	Imegteghlleqaten qaasligetun, simighlleqatenllu aatkastun. Iwernga elpek quunpeng almesiqelleqaaten, aghyughyaghqaanghitutenllu.”
58001013	Kiyaghneghem pimangitngwaaghii nalighhiiniit yaquleni whaten: “Aqumi whagun aghenqignemkun, kenlanga anguyagten tunemaliitestellemnun itegaghpek asinganun.”
58001014	Sangaawan'ngam yaqulget? Qamaglluteng taghneghaagut qepghaatilghiit Kiyaghneghmeng, kayagtaqiillu kayusiitesqelluki tamaakut yugulillengyaghqat.
58002001	Tamaaken apalluqluku sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaghelteki ipapillghet nagaquqaput luuraq waaknaniqestaghnayukamteki.
58002002	Kiyaghneghem apeghtuusii ipanguut; aapqaqii yugnun yaqulegteggun. Kina alngunak qaatkunneghilnguq apeghtuusanun, Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqaa aghyuulleghqaghtutalangatun.
58002003	Enkaam ighsakumakumteggu Kiyaghneghem yugulighilleghllaga anagpagningitaghput aghyuughilleghqaa. Atanghem apeghyuggaaqaqaa taana yugulilleq. Taagken tamaakut nagaquutkat ellnganeng, ipapighqaat whangkunnun.
58002004	Kiyaghneghemllu ipapighqegkaqaa whangkunnun. Tawaten pikaaguq atuqelleghmikun allaaghhiinaat allaaghlluwhaghtillghet, uyegtelleghmikunllu tunusii Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham piyukelleghmitun.
58002005	Kiyaghneghem nakmikellghitii yaqulget igleghutisqelluki sivumelngughmun nunakaghqamun. (Taananguuq nuna akuzitkegkefut.)
58002006	Nalighneghitni Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten igaqngaaq, “Kiyaghneq, sangaawa yuuk umyugaghmikaqegken, nalighmeng ighnegha yugem aflengakegkan?
58002007	Ulimaaqan ukavaqaanlluku yaqulegneng, qaghpaliqaqan nighughqelleghmengllu quulvalleghmengllu,
58002008	igleghutistengllaqaqanllu samun tamaghhaanun.” Tawanillu Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqaa yuuk “igleghutistenguluku samun tamaghhaanun.” Taana whaten pisiiguq sangwaa qamaglluni ilatngaaq igleghutillghanun. Naqamllu salin esghiigataghput yuuk igleghutilghii samun tamaghhaanun.
58002009	Iwernga esghaghaghput Jesus! Kiyaghneghem natengiighhaq ukavaghtestekaqsaghaa yaqulegneng. Maaten esghaghaghput qaghpaluni nighughqelleghmengllu quulvalleghmengllu qayughllak ikfiqluni tuqukaaguq. Kiyaghneghem piniqellgha apalluqluku, Jesus tuqukaaguq tamaghhaanun.
58002010	Kiyaghneghuuq ulimaghikaq sameng tamaghhaaneng ellminun, nagneghastengngwiillu tawatelluki. Itagnapigtekaaguq Kiyaghneghem pinighsaghwaaqaqaa Jesus ikfiqelleghqun piinlightenguluku yugulillghitnun. Enkaam Jesus-em tagisaghqaaghtekaqii yulghutet nighughqelleghmun.
58002011	Jesus-em pelungighsaqaqii yuget seghleghqellghitneng. Enkaam ellngallu tamaakutlu pelungighsaqii, qamaglluteng Atakaat Kiyaghneq. Tamaaken apalluqluku Jesus-em kayngukigatii atighyaghqaaluki anglegutnguluki.
58002012	Jesus-em pikaqaa Kiyaghneq, “Apeghlleqaqa aatghen anglegutemnun; usuqelleqamken qerngughutkata.”
58002013	Whatenllu pikaaguq, “Neghyukelleqaqa Kiyaghneq.” Pikaaguqlu, “Whaantunga, taghnughhaatlu Kiyaghneghem tagivaqii whangamnun.”
58002014	Taakut taghnughhaat yuguut kemekralgetlu aalguutlu, enkaam Jesus ellngistun lliiqaaguq. Tawaten pikaaguq tuqunaluni naafqennaluku Tughneghaq, aghtughyaghqaanghillelek tuqumun.
58002015	Enkaam tawaten pilleghmikun itemutkaqii tamaakut qepghaghtelaaghestun ayuqelghiit unguvalleteng qamaglluki qayughllak alikngukangat tuqulleq.
58002016	Whateghllugaaghuuq yaqulgunghitut Jesus-em kayusiqii, iwernga Abraham-em kingunghi kayusighaqii.
58002017	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem Jesus lliightestengngwaaghyaghqaqaa whangkutestun. Tawaten qepghaasaqlegwaa Kiyaghneq High Priest-nguluni, nangllegtaghlunillu ataasiighmellunillu. Enkaam tuuniyaqlegughtekaaguq aghqutmeng Kiyaghneghmun seghevutesqelluki yuget seghleghqellghit.
58002018	Jesus ikfiqegkaatminengllu nanghiiqullengegkaatminengllu, kayusighyaqlegwii tamaakut nanghiiqullengelghiit.
58003001	Enkaangam ugpeqaalgutemni, Kiyaghneghem aaftekaqiisi ellminun yugulusi, tuqluqaqiisillu ellminitesqellusi qilagmi. Sumeghmikluku Jesus. Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaa Apostle-ngulukullu High Priest-ngulukullu aapghaqegkefut ugpeqniluku.
58003002	Jesus ataasighmetkaaguq Kiyaghneghmun nakmikisteminun, katam Moses ataasighmetkaq Kiyaghneghmun qepghaataqngamigu Kiyaghneq mangteghaani.
58003003	Tamaghhaghmi mangteghaq kitumeng ulimaghistelgulghii, iwernga Kiyaghneghem Jesus-kun sangwaa tamaghhaan ulimaaqaa. Yuget usuqataghaghyaghqaqaat Jesus pakiggulluku Moses-meng, qayughllak yuget usuqelleqaat mangteghangllaghta pakiggulluku mangteghameng.
58003005	Moses ataasiighmetkaaguq qepghaghta Kiyaghneghem mangteghaani, ungipaatkaqiillu yuget Kiyaghneq sameng apeghyaghqalguniluku taaganiqaaghaq.
58003006	Iwernga Christ-a ighneghuluni ataasiighmetkaaguq igleghutista Kiyaghneghem mangteghaani. Whangkuta mangteghaqiinkut Kiyaghneghem, ilutumanginaqumta, ipapighqutkumanginaqumteggullu sighimakegkaghput.
58003007	Enkaangam katam tawaten Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak piik, “Aghneghmi whani nagaququfsigu Kiyaghneghem menga,
58003008	pineghlliqegpenasi sivuneghpesistun. Tamaani aghneghni kilgaanilluteng qaatkesugumangitaat Kiyaghneq, nanghiighsaghaqaqaatlu nuqenneghtullgha.”
58003009	Kiyaghneq piiq, “Tamaani 40 ayumiqulleghni sivuneghpesi esghaqaqeghngaaghmegteki apeghiiqanka, paninang nanghiighsaghaqaqaatnga.
58003010	Tamaaken apalluqluku tamaakut yuget sakritestekaqaatnga. Enkaam pikaagunga, ‘Iiwleng ataasiighmesigatut whangamnun, liigikigatutlu natelluku kiyaghtesqesullemneng.
58003011	Sakritngulunga akeqikaagunga allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng.’ Whaten piinga, ‘Iteghnaanghitngwaaghaat meghnaalivigkaq yataaghqegkaqa ellngitnun.’”
58003012	Ugpeqaalgutemni kelengalusi, seghleghmeng sumeghtaghalleghnengllu ugpenghitelleghnengllu, iqitutestegpenasi unguvalghiimeng Kiyaghneghmeng.
58003013	Iwernga aghhutanga tamaghhaan kayemutaqitek pilleghqalgumaluku atilqelghiimeng “Aghneghmi.” Tawaten pinghilkufsi taawa seghleghqellghem puughllusi pineghllungllaghlleqiisi.
58003014	Iwernga ataasiighmelkumta unguvallemta kenlenganun, neghyukluku Kiyaghneq ugpeghyuwhaallemtestun, taawa Christ-am pilgutkelleqiinkut ellmi pimineng.
58003015	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Aghneghmi nagaququfsigu Kiyaghneghem menga, pineghllugugpenasi sivuneghpesistun qaatkusimangilnguut Kiyaghneghmun.”
58003016	Kinkungaawat nagaquutkat Kiyaghneghem menganeng naqam qaatkutegpenateng? Tamaakunguut yuget Moses-em maghyaghquqii Egypt-meng.
58003017	40 ayumiqulleghni kinkut Kiyaghneq sakritestatgu? Tamaakunguut seghleghqelluteng tuqulaghaatkat kilgaani.
58003018	Kinkunun Kiyaghneq akeqikaawa iteghnaanghitngwaaghniluki meghnaalivigkamun yataaghqegkaminun? Akeqegkaqii qaatkusimangilnguut ellminun.
58003019	Taawa liigikaghput iteghpagningitkaagut tawavek meghnaalivigmun qayughllak ugpeqenghilkangat.
58004001	Kiyaghneghem akequsaa yugnun aghuliituq iitghesqelluki meghnaalivigminun. Iwernga alingelta luuraq nalighsi nuughhunnayukan iteghpenani meghnaaliviganun.
58004002	Pinilghii ungipaq Kiyaghneghem meghnaaliviganeng ayuqelghii nagaquqaqaghput katam tamaakustun yugestun Moses-em maghyaghquqiistun Egypt-meng. Iwernga pinilghiim ungipam kayusiitellghitii qayughllak ugpequmangitaat nagaquqaghteng.
58004003	Whangkuta ugpelghiini iteghllequkut Kiyaghneghem meghnaaliviganun. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem akuzitkegkaqii ugpeqillghilnguut whaten, “Sakritngulunga akeqikaagunga allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng. Whaten piinga, ‘Iteghnaanghitngwaaghtut meghnaalivigkamnun.’” Tawaten akuzikaaguq qepghaqani apeghiiqaqeghngaaghmiki ima nunangllalleghmineng.
58004004	Naantuq Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqluni maaghraghvinliitanga aghneghem whaten, “Kiyaghneq meghnaalikaaguq tamaaghhaaneng qepghaqamineng maaghraghvinliitangani aghneghem.”
58004005	Akuzitnillu Igaqegkani Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Iteghnaanghitngwaaghtut meghnaalivigkamnun.”
58004006	Paninang ilangi yuget iteghllequt Kiyaghneghem meghnaaliviganun. Iwernga nagaquusuwhaaqat pinilghiimeng ungipameng, itellghitut meghnaalivigmun qayughllak qaatkutellghilnguut Kiyaghneghmun.
58004007	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem nekegtekaqaa ilanga aghneq, atilqelghii “Aghneghmi.” Kingurugllaganeng Moses-em, Kiyaghneghem akuzitkegkaqaa taana aghneq David-kun. Uteghpagtanka David-em igaqegkii Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Aghneghmi whani nagaququfsigu Kiyaghneghem menga, pineghlliqegpenasi sivuneghpesistun.”
58004008	Joshua-m maghyaghqullghitii yuget tawavek meghnaalivigmun. Liisimakaghput qayughllak taam kingunganeng Kiyaghneghem akuzitkegkaqaa ilanga aghnegha meghnaalillghem.
58004009	Tamaaken apalluqluku taawa Sabbath-a aghuliituq, meghnaalivik Kiyaghneghem yugitnun.
58004010	Kina alngunak iitqumi Kiyaghneghem meghnaaliviganun, meghnaalillequq qepghaqamineng katam tawaten Kiyaghneghem meghnaalillghatun.
58004011	Tamaaken apalluqluku iteghnaqeghllagelta Kiyaghneghem meghnaaliviganun. Qaatkenghitefqaan pilteggu Kiyaghneq sivunemta pillghistun.
58004012	Akuzitangi Kiyaghneghem unguvaat qepghaagut. Iipgataghaghtut alngunak inglugtun ipegsaqaneng savigpagneng. Kaaputkayuguut qamaverugllak unguvasimllu taghneghamllu kaatutngallghegkenun, naflutlu paatghetlu kaatutngallghitnun. Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi nanqigtikayuguut yugem sumeghtaghallghanengllu sanaqellghanengllu.
58004013	Sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluni Kiyaghneghem ulimaagha iighnganghituq Kiyaghneghmeng. Aliitut, whateghlluwaaghuutlu iyegkeni. Ellnganun qayvighqesaghqaqaput salleput qamaglluki.
58004014	Tamaaken apalluqluku High Priest-elegllaguukut qilagmun mayuqameng. Jesus-nguuq, Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem. Enkaam ugpeqilleghmetekestaalta aapqamnni yugnun.
58004015	High Priest-emta liigikngwaaqaqii kayaalliqusiput, qayughllak nunamelluni nanghiiqullengegkaaguq whangkutestungwaaq. Naqamllu seghleghqumangituq.
58004016	Enkaam tetullngunaamta aglaalta umiilgusignun aqumutagkenun Kiyaghneghem, allgeghuseghqaaluta nangllegtallghanun. Tawani nangllekelleqiinkut, kayusighlleqiinkutlu aklukillemnni.
58005001	Tamaghhaan high priest-a Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa yulgutanganeng. Kiyaghneghmun aglaghaquq yuget apalluqluki tuunaluki tunusiit aghqerraaghunnalukillu seghleghqellghitnun.
58005002	High priest-a kayaalliqegkayugutmineng nangllegtaghyaghqaaguq tamaakunun nallukelghiinunllu ugpeqinanilghiinunllu ipapilleghmun.
58005003	Qayughllak kayaalliqegkayugutmineng, high priest-a aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq ellmi katam seghleghqelleghminun, seghleghqellghitnunllu yuget.
58005004	Kina alngunak nakmikigatuq ellmineng high priest-ngughhnaluni quulvaghyaghqaaluni. Iwernga yuuk high priest-ngughtaquq Kiyaghneghem nakmikenghatni, katam tawaten nakmikellghatun Aaron.
58005005	Tawatenllu Christ-a quulvallghituq ellmineng nakmikluni high priest-ngughtelleghmun, iwernga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa. Pikaqaa, “Ighneqamken; aghneghmi whani Ataliitaghpenga.”
58005006	Nalighneghitni Akuzitni Igaqegkani Kiyaghneghem pikaqaa, “Priest-ngullequten quunperugllak, Melchizedek-em priest-ngullghatun.”
58005007	Kiyaghneq aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq yuguliyaghqaaluku Jesus tuqulleghmeng. Enkaam Jesus nunametnguluni, iglagtuluni qunituumaghmi yughaqaalghiillu tungsiqaalghiillu Kiyaghneghmun yugulisqelluni tuqulleghmeng. Kiyaghneghem nagatkaqii yughallghi, qayughllak quseveglluni qaatkegkaa Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha.
58005008	Qaywa Jesus Kiyaghneghem Ighneqeghngaatni, paninang liitkaaguq qaatkusimalleghmeng ikfiqelleghmikun.
58005009	Apeghiighyagu qamaglluku Kiyaghneghem pisqellgha, Jesus-ngughtuq kenlengilngughmeng yugulillengestiyaghqaq tamaghhaanun qaatkullghiinun ellminun.
58005010	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa high priest-nguluku, Melchizedek-em high priest-ngullghatun.
58005011	Apeghyaghqaghllaguukut tamaakuneng. Iwernga apeghtuneghllupigtusi tamaakuneng qayughllak liigikaghaghsigalnguusi.
58005012	Neghipigllusi ugpeqaalghiisi enkaam apeghtughiyaghqaaghtekaagusi ilagpesinun. Yeghlegi paninang aklaaqusi kitumun apeghtunqigtesqellusi ugpenghhat liisuwhaaghyaghqiitneng Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Katam taghnughhaghhaghestun mamaghtughyugaqusi, neqepigyugpenasi.
58005013	Kina alngunak mamaghtuqayuk paninang taghnughhaghhaaguq. Salin nallukaa elqughutngalleqlu anaggutngalleqlu.
58005014	Iwernga neqepik angtaniitkanun pinguuq. Peghqigsaqaagut liigiksaghqaalukek pinilghiinkuk, seghleghenkuk.
58006001	Enkaam liitelteki apeghtuusat angtaniitkanun ugpeqanun ayuqelghiit. Liitngwaaqaqasi apeghtuusuwhaaqat Christ-ameng ayuqelghiit enkaangam liinneqigsaghqaqenghitasi. Liitngwaaghumaasi atuqsaghqaafqiita pinaluki tamaakut tuqumun ayuqelghiit. Liinneqigsaghqaqenghitaghsillu ugpeqilleghmeng ayuqelghii Kiyaghneghqun,
58006002	paaptaayelleghneng, iigtilleghneng, unguvaghtilleghneng tuqukaneng, Kiyaghneghemllu nanqigtilleghqaaneng yugneng aghyuughyaghqaaluki kenlengunaan.
58006003	Kiyaghneghem pistekanginkut, apeghtughlleqamsi angtaniitesqellusi ugpeqat.
58006004	Tamaa ilanganeng yulguuq allgeghutkaayalghiineng Kiyaghneghem nighuganeng, naasiiqaqaatlu qilagem tunusaa. Allgeghutkaagutlu Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng. Nanghiiqaqiit pinightulangi Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, nanghiiqaqaatlu Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghillgha nunakaghqamelnguq. Taagken ugpeqnaniqumegteggu Christ-a, avuteghqenqigtepagningiillequt qayughllak qaquuranqigtekangat Kiyaghneghem Ighnegha, kayngusaakegkangatlu yugtuqami.
58006007	Nuna meghaquq eslallugughnneghani, piitestiiquqlu nunivagseghameng atughqameng tamaakunun peksighqikanun nunameng. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem pinighqestaqaa nuna.
58006008	Iwernga nuna piitestimakumi sikughllugnengllu weeds-nengllu satngunghituq. Yakughnaanituq Kiyaghneghem seghleghunilleghqaaneng, enkaam paneghsaghqaaguq.
58006009	Piniqegkamnni, qaywa elpesinun latatkeghngaamteki tamaakut, sumeghtaghaatkigatamsi tawatellusi. Liisimakaghput pinighataghalghiimeng quyastellelguusi yugulilleghpesigun.
58006010	Kiyaghneq elqughutngaan nanqigtiiquq, enkaam puygunaanghitaa qepghalleghsillu, piniqilleghsillu ellminun kayusiitelleghpesigun yugi. Neqamikelleqaallu paninang kayusiitngukesi.
58006011	Nagneghtesugamsi sagiqlusi qepghaatesqelluku Kiyaghneq unguvalleghpesi tagtalngatun. Enkaam allgeghtepestaaghlleqaghsi sighimakegkaghsi.
58006012	Ighsanitalghiingughtesunghitamsi. Yeghlegi tamaakustun ayuqestesugamsi ugpeqilleghmegteggun, nuqetutilleghmegteggunllu allgeghusaghqat Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaaneng.
58006013	Kiyaghneghem akeqaqngamigu Abraham, akeqegkaqaa piyaghqapestaaghuniluku. Avangitutanganeng aangataghalghiimeng ellmineng, atuqluku ellmi katam ateni akeqikaaguq.
58006014	Abraham pikaqaa, “Quyastepestaaghluten, uglaapiglluku kingunelilleqamken.”
58006015	Abraham qelaneghpenani utaqiikaaguq, enkaam allgeghtekaqaa Kiyaghneghem akequsaa.
58006016	Kitum neklegsuneghminigu aaghtiiraaghutelleq, akeqiiquq sameng pilleni ipanguniluku atuqluku kitum aatgha ellmineng aangataghalghiim.
58006017	Allgeghusaghqat akequsamineng, Kiyaghneghem liigikestesugwii allaangughsaghqaqenghitngwaaghniluki agghilleni. Enkaam akeqikaaguq atuqluku ateni.
58006018	Kiyaghneghem tawaten kayemiinkut. Kiyaghneq iqlengiqigatuq akeqineghmini, iqlengiqnaanghituqlu akeqikumi atuqluku ateni ipapighqennaluku piyaghqaqutni. Taakuk allangughteqaghhnaanghituk. Whangkuta anagniiqani Kiyaghneghmun paqniinnaluta, kayemellengeghllagtukut sighimaknaluku Kiyaghneghem akequsaa.
58006019	Taana sighimalleq uyghiitnguuq unguvasimnnun, paqnaniighutestiinkutlu ayepsugitestiinkutlu. Taana sighimalleq iteghtuq agleghnalleghpigaghmun nemun safkaaghutem awatanganilngughmun.
58006020	Tawavek Jesus iitqaaguq sivumnni whangkuta apalluqluta. High Priest-ngughtekaaguq quunperugllagmun, Melchizedek-em priest-ngumallghatun.
58007001	Taana Melchizedek umiilkesaghaa Salem-em, priest-ekaallu Qulighpigaam Kiyaghneghem. Abraham uteghniimaluku pilluwameng kayaalqughluki umiilget, Melchizedek-em nallaghluku quyastekaqaa.
58007002	Taagken Abraham-em tuunegkaa qulaghqellghaneng sameng tamaghhaaneng tugukamineng pilluwami. Melchizedek-em aatgha maalghugegneng sameng pisilguuq, sivuliq whaten pisiiguq, “Umiilga Elqughutngallghem.” Umiilkegkaatanganeng Salem-em, aatghan aallgha whaten pisiiguq, “Umiilga Nekeggmellghem.”
58007003	Igiituq igaqfikegkameng Melchizedek-em atanganengllu naanganengllu nalighmeng sivunghaneng, talwa allgellghanengllu tuqullghanengllu. Kiyaghneghem Ighneghatun aghuliituq priest-nguluni quunperugllak.
58007004	Taawa liigikaghsi Melchizedek-em aangumalleghllaga. Talwa sivuneqsuwhaamta Abraham-em tuunegkaa Melchizedek qulaghqellghaneng tugulaqamineng pilluwami.
58007005	Priest-et kingunqii Levi-em. Liilightuusani, Kiyaghneghem qelqaqii priest-et qerngughtisqelluki yulgutangitneng qulaghqelleghmeng allgeghtekiitneng. Priest-et tawaten piiqut, priest-etlu yugetlu Abraham-em kingunqeghngiisteng.
58007006	Melchizedek kingunqenghitaa Levi-em, iwernga tugukliqaqaa qulaghqelleq Abraham-em tuunyagu. Quyastekaqaallu Abraham, allgeghutkaalghii Kiyaghneghem akequsaaneng.
58007007	Nalluneqniituq taana quyastilghii aangataghaghtuq taagken quyastekameng.
58007008	Priest-et yuguut tuqukayuget naqamllu allgeghutkaagut qulaghqelleghmeng. Melchizedek-llu allgeghutkaaguq qulaghqelleghmeng, iwernga kiyaghtengnguuq, Akuzitet Igaqegkat apellghistun.
58007009	Levi allgeghutkaaguq yugneng qulaghqelleghmeng. Pinayalghiikut talwa ellngallu llivikikaaguq qulaghqelleghmeng Melchizedek-mun Abraham-kun.
58007010	Qaywa Levi allgellghiteghngaaghmi, sivuneghmi Abraham-em yugusiinitkaaguq Melchizedek-em nallaghaqngagu Abraham.
58007011	Liilightuusani igaqngaaq priest-et kingunqesaghqaqii Levi-em. Ellngita Liilightuusat apeghtuutkaqiit yugnun, iwernga qepghaqaat Kiyaghneghmun nuughhutkaaguq. Tamaaken apalluqluku yuget aklukaagut priest-meng Melchizedek-etun ayuqelghiimeng, Aaron-etun ayuqenghilnguq.
58007012	Levite priest-et simineghmegteki allaneng priest-eneng, taawa Liilightuusatlu allangughsaghqaagut.
58007013	Priest-et quunpeng Levi-em ramkenganeng pinguut, iwernga Ataneghput ramkenganeng pingunghituq. Kina alngunak Atanemta ramkenganeng pi qepghiigatngwaaghtuq priest-nguluni aghqefigegni.
58007014	Tamaghhaghmi liisimakaat Ataneghput allgeqaaguq ramkenganun Judah-m. Moses-em pimangitii kingunghi Judah-m priest-nguyaghqaaniluki.
58007015	Enkaam tamaakut liigikataghaghaput whateglluwaaq qayughllak ilanga priest-em Melchizedek-etun ayuqelghii tagimaaq.
58007016	Liilightuusat qelghutkaqaat priest-a kingunqesaghqaqniluku Levi-mun. Ataneghput priest-ngughtekaanghituq Liilightuusat pisqellghitgun, iwernga priest-ngughtekaaguq aghtughyaghqaanghilngughqun unguvalleghmikun kenletghuusaghqaanghilngughqun.
58007017	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaalghiit, “Priest-nguuten quunperugllak, Melchizedek-em priest-ngullghatun.”
58007018	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem simiqaqaa Liilightuusaq priest-eneng ayuqelghii qayughllak kayaalnguqlu atuunghilnguqlu.
58007019	Liilightuusat kina alngunak pistesimangitaa Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem tuunumiinkut pinighataghalghiimeng sighimalleghmeng. Taaggun sighimalleghqun aglaghyaghqaaghtukut Kiyaghneghmun.
58007020	Taam sighimallghem saaghwakun Kiyaghneq allangughhnaanghilngughmeng akeqimaaq.
58007021	Iwernga tawatelngughmeng akeqillghituq Levi-em kingunghi priest-ngughtaqngata. Jesus-nginaghmun whaten pikaaguq, “Ataneq akeqimaaq, allangughhnaanghitaaklu umyugagni; ‘Elpek priest-nguuten quunperugllak.’”
58007022	Tamaaken apalluqluku Jesus-nguuq ipapighqelleq Kiyaghneghem akequsani pipestaaghlleqaa. Taana akequsaq pinighataghaghtuq akequsaqegkamineng Moses-kun.
58007023	Sivunghani priest-etuyaghtuq. Tuqunghata ilangita priest-et nagneghutaqaat qepghaqaat.
58007024	Iwernga Jesus priest-nguuq quunperugllak qayughllak unguvallequq quunpeng.
58007025	Tamaaken apalluqluku Jesus-em iiwleng yuguliyaqlegwii Kiyaghneghmun aglalghiit ellmikun, qayughllak quunpeng unguvanguuq maniguutunnaluki tamaakut Kiyaghneghmun.
58007026	Jesus High Priest-nguuq tuunikayuk sameng aklukegkamnneng. Agleghnaghtuq, avutngituq, pelungituq, aaftengngaaq seghleghqesteneng, Kiyaghneghem quulvaqaqaa qulighpigaghmun qilagmun.
58007027	Jesus ilangistun high priest-estun ayuqenghituq. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan high priest-a aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq, sivukluni ellmi seghleghqelleghminun, taagken yuget seghleghqellghitnun. Jesus tuunaqngami ellmineng katam, aghqutkegkaaguq seghleghqellghitnun yuget, ataasighhaghmeng.
58007028	Liilightuusani igaqngaaq yuget nakmiighyaghqaaniluki high priest-ekaghqameng seghleghqegkayugughngaan alngunak yugestun. Kingunganeng Kiyaghneghem apellghan Liilightuusat Moses-mun, tagtalmi taakwani allangughsaghqaanghilngughmeng akeqikaaguq. Taaggun akeqilleghqun Kiyaghneghem Ighneni High Priest-ngughtestekaqaa, afkuyangunaan, quunperugllak.
58008001	Aapqaghput elpesinun, whaten pisiiguq: tawatelngughmeng high priest-elguukut aqumgalghii aghenqigneghani saaghwakun Aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam qilagmi.
58008002	Qepghaatinguuq high priest-nguluni sanctuary-mi. Taana tabernacle-epiguuq Atanghem nekeftekaqaa, yugem nekeftekaqenghitaa.
58008003	Tamaghhaghmi high priest-a nakmikegkaaguq tuunisqelluku tunusaneng, teghikusanengllu aghqerraaghesqelluku Kiyaghneghmun. Enkaam High priest-evutlu sameng tuunyaghqalguyaghqaaguq Kiyaghneghmun.
58008004	Jesus nunamesaqumi priest-ngunayanghituq, qayughllak priest-elguuq nunami tuunikayugneng tunusaneng Kiyaghneghmun Liilightuusat pisqellghistun.
58008005	Priest-et qepghaqaagut sanctuary-mi, qilagmelngughtun ayuqesugnilngughmi. Salin Moses-em tabernacle-a nekeftellghilluku, Kiyaghneghem apaqutkaqaa, “Wataghllak sangwaa qamaglluku ulimanaken tawatengwaaq uspeqellemtun kelgutkamtun elpenun naayghami.”
58008006	Kiyaghneghem Jesus qepghaqalitkaqaa priest-nguluku. Qepghaqaa megnunaghataghaghtuq Levite-et priest-et qepghallghitneng. Tawateghpigaq akequsaghraghaq pinighataghalghiinguuq akequsalugmeng qayughllak taaggun Jesus-em ilaliighutestekaqii Kiyaghneqlu yugetlu. Pinighataghaghtuq qayughllak tunemiitngaaq akequsatgun pinighataghalghiitgun.
58008007	Sivuliq akequsaq afkuyiisaqan, taawa tuungliinnayaghtuq.
58008008	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem afkuyalgunikaqii yuni whaten piiqngami, “Aghneghet kaallequt, piiq Ataneq, akequsaghraghaq pilleqaqa Israel-eghmiinunllu Judah-ghmiinunllu.
58008009	Akequsaghraghaqa tawatennaanghituq akequsaqegkamtun sivunghitnun tasluqluki aghulaqutaqngamki Egypt-meng. Qaatkusimangitut akequsama pisqellghatun. Enkaam avelghaqiinaqaqanka, piiq Ataneq.
58008010	Aghneghet taakut kingungitneng una akequsaghraghaq pilleqaqa Israel-eghmiinun, piiq Ataneq: Liilightuusanka umyugiitnun kanaghlleqanka, igaqelleqankallu qamagun ilungitgun. Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga, ellngit yukelleqanka.
58008011	Nalighhiiniita apeghtughyaghqaqenghitaa nunalgutni, nalighmeng nengllugutni liitesqelluku Ataneq, qayughllak qamaglluteng liisimakelleqaatnga, ukalighpigaghhaghneng pingwaaghllagnun.
58008012	Seghevulleqanka anaggutellghit, allamengllu neqamiknaanghitanka seghleghqellghit.”
58008013	Kiyaghneghem akuzitkaqngamigu akequsaghraghaq, sivuliq akequsaq atuunanightestekaqaa. Enkaam sangwaa alngunak atuunanighluni aghyughluni mulugpenani aviighullequq.
58009001	Akequsaqsuwhaaghmini Kiyaghneghem igaqegkaqii qelghusat naten maniguutelleghqameng ellminun, natenllu nekeftelleghqaa sanctuary nunami.
58009002	Taana sanctuary yuget ulimakaat tiintanguftuq maalghugegneng nelek. Sivuliim nem aatqeftaa Agleghnalghii Na. Ilunganiteftut kenelghutalghutak, tipelek neqekrangllalgek tuunegkameng Kiyaghneghmun.
58009003	Awalighneghani tuunglighhaan safkaaghutem ilanga nem atilqelghii Agleghnalleghpigaq Na.
58009004	Ilungani taawa gold-ek aghqefigek paneghreghaasik incense-mun. Taawallu salngagek qaspeghiqak gold-meng, ateghqek ark-ek, neqanguusighqak Kiyaghneghem akequsaanun. Ark-em imaqeftii gold-ek aqimleghutak manna-meng imalgek, Aaron-em ayaviigha piitqughvikegkaq, maalghuklu lliivneqegtak uyghagek igaqughvikngalghiik Kiyaghneghem qelghusaaneng.
58009005	Quulngani ark-em taawa gold-ek cherubim-ek, yaqghwik taghneghangullghiik mercy seat-kun. Iwernga uumi pilleghmi akuzitkepagningitaput tamaakut.
58009006	Sangwaa tamaghhaan tiintanilnguq apeghiighluku, taagken aghhutanga tamaghhaan priest-et iitghaqut sivulighmun nemun qepghaghnaluteng.
58009007	Iwernga high priest-nginaghhaq iteghyaghqaaguq tuunglighhaanun nenganun tiintam. Tawaten piiquq ataasighhaghmeng ayumiqulleghmi. Iteneghmini tawavek nemun iiwleng kelqesaghqaaguq aawaneng aghqutkegkam teghikusam. Tuuniiquq aawmeng Kiyaghneghmun ellmi seghleghqelleghminun, yugetlu seghleghqellghitnun. Taana aawk seghleghqellghitnun pinguuq nallukluteng pikiitnun.
58009008	Tamaakutgun Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham liigikestiinkut iteghvik Agleghnalleghpigaghmun Nemun salin qelpeghsigalnguq tabernacle-a atuqnguluku.
58009009	Taakut usputaagut maatemun. Liigikestiinkut tunusatlu aghqutkegkatlu teghikusat nallghusaghpagningitaat maniguutistem sumeghnegha.
58009010	Tamaakut tunusatlu aghqutetlu atuqegkaagut qaatkesaghqaaluki qelghusat neqnengllu, meghyaghqanengllu, pelungighsalleghqanengllu yugusiitneng ayuqelghiit. Tamaakut qelghusat yugusighhiinaghmun ayuqut. Qaatkesaghqaagut kenlanga Kiyaghneghem akequsaghraghaa atuughtellghanun.
58009011	Christ-a tagiiqngami High Priest-nguluni, tagitkaqii qamaglluki pinilghiit quyastillghet whaa maaten whaanlenguut. Iitqaqaa tabernacle-a qilagmelnguq, megnunaghataghalghiillu pinighataghalghiillu nunamelngughmeng tabernacle-meng. Qilagmelnguq tabernacle-a yuget ulimaaqenghitaat enkaam nunam pikenghitaa.
58009012	Taagken Christ-a iitqaaguq ataasimeng quunperugllak Agleghnalleghpigaghmun Nemun seghleghqellemnneng itemunnaluta kenlengunaan. Tawaten pikaaguq tuunelleghmikun ellmi katam aawni, atughpenaki aawit goat-etlu, kaawaghaatlu.
58009013	Liightuusat qelqaqiit priest-enun sivillagtiisqelluki yuget aawitneng goat-et, bull-et, panellghanengllu kaawaghaam. Tawaten piiqut pelungighsaghnaluki yuget yugusiit tuguklighyugnaghtesqelluki Kiyaghneghmun.
58009014	Tamaakut pelungighiyaqlegukata yuget yugusiitneng, taawa Christ-am aawan wata pilleqii. Pelungighlleqii umyugasi satngunghilngughneng ugpeqilleghneng elpesinun qepghaatesqelluku unguvalghii Kiyaghneq. Kenlengilnguugnekun Taghneghagnekun, Christ-a seghleghqellghilnguq, tuunegkaaguq ellmineng katam Kiyaghneghmun aghqutnguluni.
58009015	Enkaam Christ-am tagitkaqaa Kiyaghneghem akequsaghraghaa yugnun tuqluqaanun. Christ-a tawaten pikaaguq ellngitnun allgeghtesqelluku kenlengilnguq pagitaq Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaa ellngitnun. Allgeghlleqiit pagitat qayughllak Christ-am tuqumatkegkaqegkangi. Enkaam yuget kiyaghtekat akequsaqsuwhaaghmi, itemumaat seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
58009016	Igakun yugem igaqughlleqii saghyani kitumun pagisaghqaaniluki tuqukumi. Pagitiyaghqam allgeghhnaanghitii pagisaghqani wetku kitum ipapighqegkagu yuuk tuqumatanga.
58009017	Taam yugem igaquqii pitngunaanghitut salin kiyaghtengnguluku. Igaquqii pitngughllequt kingunganeng tuqukan.
58009018	Tamaaken apalluqluku talwa akequsaqsuwhaaq pitngumangituq aawngunani.
58009019	Moses-em aapqaqii yugnun qamaglluki qelghusat Liightuusanilnguut. Taagken kaawaghaatlu, goat-etlu aawitneng tugulluni meghmeng akumegkaa. Tugulluni kavilngughmeng wool-meng, avayaanengllu hyssop-em neptekii aawmun. Taagken sivillagtaqii igat Liilightuusalghutat, qamagllukillu yuget.
58009020	Pikii, “Unanguuq aawk apeghiighilghii Kiyaghneghem akequsaaneng qelghuskanga elpesinun qaatkesqelluku.”
58009021	Tawatengngwaaq Moses-em sivillagtaqaqii aawmeng tabernacle-a, qamagllukillu saghyat atuqegkat maniguutelleghmun.
58009022	Ipapestaaq Liilightuusat pillghitni, qamagtevzigluni sangwaa tamaghhaghmi pelungiqaaguq aawkun. Kiyaghneghem seghevunnaanghitii yuget seghleghqellghit wetkuqun aawk maaqegkan.
58009023	Nunamelnguq tabernacle-a, ilunganilnguutlu saghyat qilagmelngughestun ayuqut. Tamaakut nunamelnguut saghyat pelungighyaghqaagut aawitgun teghikusat. Iwernga qilagmelnguut saghyapiget pelungighyaghqaagut aghqutetgun pinighataghalghiit nunami aghqutkegkaneng.
58009024	Christ-a iitghumangituq Agleghnalleghpigaghmun Nemun yuget ulimaaghitnun. Taana ipapigtun qilagmelngughtun ayuquq. Yeghlegi qilagmun iitqaaguq enkaam maaten Kiyaghneghmetuq High Priest-nguluni whangkunnun.
58009025	Christ-a nunam high priest-ngatun ayuqenghituq. Ataasighhaghmeng ayumiqunghani high priest-a iitghaquq Agleghnalleghpigaghmun Nemun kelqelluni aawmeng ellmi pikenghilkemineng. Iwernga Christ-a aghqutkumangituq ellmineng uteghpagtiinaq,
58009026	qayughllak ikfiqnayaghtuq ugliinaghluku ima ulimallghaneng nunam. Iwernga ukuni kingulighni aghneghni tagikaaguq ataasimeng quunperugllak iqinnaluki seghleghqellghet aghqutkelleghmikun ellmineng.
58009027	Tamaghaghhmi tuquyaghqaalghii ataasighhaghmeng, enkaam taam kingunganeng Kiyaghneghem nanqiglleqii.
58009028	Tawateghpigaq ataasighhaghmeng Christ-a aghqutkegkaaguq ellmineng iqinnaluki seghleghqellghit yulghutet. Iwernga alla tagikumi, aghqutkesaghtuunghituq ellmineng seghleghqelleghmun. Yeghlegi yuguliyaghtughlleqii qelanqilghiit ellmineng.
58010001	Liilightuusat taghneghangullghiistun ayuqut pinilghiinun kaasaghqanun, iwernga Liilightuusat taakughpigaanghitut. Liilightuusat qelellghistun Jews-et aghqerraaghumanginaghaqut ayumiitanga tamaghhaan.
