Iwernga tamaakut aghqerraallghet ukmangighwaaghpagningitiit seghleghqellghitneng manigughyaghtuneghmegteggu Kiyaghneq.
58010002	Yuget maniguutestengi Kiyaghneghem ukmangipiigumakumeng seghleghqelleghmeggneng, seghleghninanighnayaghtut. Enkaam aghqutkinanighnayaghtut.
58010003	Iwernga ayumiitanga tamaghhaan, tamaakut aghqerraallghet neqangughtestaqiit yuget seghleghqellghitneng,
58010004	qayughllak aawita bull-etlu goat-etlu seghleghqellghighpagningitiit.
58010005	Tamaakut apalluqluki Christ-a tagiiqngami nunamun pikaqaa Kiyaghneq: “Aghquteyugumangitutenllu tunusaghyugumangitutenllu, iwernga yataaghqegkaqan yugusiq whangamnun.
58010006	Efququmangitaten teghikusat iinguniita paneghtekat aghqefigegni nalighmeng aghqutet seghleghqelleghnun.
58010007	Taagken whanga piiqa, ‘Ii-i Kiyaghneq, tagiinga piyukelleghpetun pinalunga, katam tawaten igaquqaqegkangatnga Akuzitni Igaqegkani.’”
58010008	Christ-a pikaalghii, “Aghquteyugumangitutenllu tunusaghyugumangitutenllu. Aghquteyugumangituten teghikusaneng iingunaghmeng paneghtekaneng aghqefigegni nalighmeng aghqutneng seghleghqelleghnun. Tamaakut efqughsimangitaaten.” Christ-a tawaten pikaaguq Liilightuusat qelghutkaqeghngaatki tamaakut aghqutet pisqelluki.
58010009	Taagken pikaaguq, “Ii-i, tagiinga piyukelleghpetun pinalunga.” Enkaam Kiyaghneghem qamaglluki iqiqughluki aghquteluget nengitgun nekegtekaqaa Christ-a aghqutnguluku.
58010010	Jesus Christ-am qaatkesaqminigu Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha, pelungiqaqiinkut seghleghqellemnneng tuunelleghmikun yugusini ataasighhaghmeng quunperugllak.
58010011	Aghhutanga tamaghhaan, tamaghhaghmeng priest-et nekevghaghmeng qepghaqateng piiqiit. Uteghpagtiinaq tuuniiqut tawatelkullghiineng aghqutneng. Tawalliima tamaakut aghqutet seghleghqellghighiyaghqaghhaanghitut.
58010012	Iwernga Christ-am tuunegkaqaa ataasiq aghqun seghleghqelleghnun quunperugllagmun. Taagken aqumegkaq aghenqigneghakun Kiyaghneghem.
58010013	Tawani Christ-a utaqiigaquq kenlanga Kiyaghneghem nekegtelleghqaanun anguyagi itegaan asinganun.
58010014	Taaggun ataasikun aghqutkelleghqun, Christ-am quunperugllak naamigtestekaqii pelungighsaqat seghleghqelleghmeggneng.
58010015	Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham ungipaatiinkut tamaakuneng. Sivukluni whaten pikaaguq,
58010016	“Unanguuq akequsaqa yumnun, kingungitneng tamaakut aghneghet, piiq Ataneq, Liilightuusanka kanaghlleqanka ilungitnun, igaqelleqankallu umyuwiitgun.”
58010017	Taagken piiq, “Allamengllu neqamiknaanghitanka seghleghqellghit, seghletunllu pillghit.”
58010018	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem seghevuskaki seghleghqellghit, aghqutet atuqsaghqaananighllequt seghleghqelleghnun.
58010019	Tamaaken apalluqluku, ugpeqaalgutemni, alingillngunaamta itelleghqangukut Agleghnalleghpigaghmun aawakun Jesus-em.
58010020	Qelpeghusimiinkutlu tumeghraghaghmeng unguvalleghmun safkaaghutkun; taana safkaaghun yugusiqaa.
58010021	Priest-elegllaaguukutlu igleghutilghii Kiyaghneghem mangteghaaneng.
58010022	Tamaakut apalluqluki tughaaghelteggu Kiyaghneq ipapighqelluta, neghyukngwaaghluku. Tawaten pilleghqangukut qayughllak umyugalluput sivillagtaqaagut Christ-am aawaneng ukmangiightesqelluki, yugusiputlu ughvughqegkaagut pelungilngughqun meghqun.
58010023	Yeqay ataasiighmelluta sighimalleghmetekestaalta whangkunnun piknikamnnun, qayughllak ugpeqaghput Kiyaghneq ataasiighmetuq enkaam piyaghqaqii akequsani.
58010024	Yeqay sumeghtaghaalta naten qiilngumighusaghqaaluta piniqsaghqaaluki ilat, pinitunllu piyaghqaaluta.
58010025	Yeqay taaqefqaamta qerngughunneghmeng pilta manigughnaluku Kiyaghneq, ilangita piiqellghistun. Yeghlegi qerngughusimanginaalta kayemutunnaluta. Wata kayemusimanginaalta qayughllak Atanghem Aghnegha tughaalghii.
58010026	Seghleghqesugaataqumta kingunganeng liilluku ipapilleq, taawa aghqutkaghqiituq iqitusighqameng tamaavek seghleghqelleghnun.
58010027	Tamaakut tawaten pilghiit alingruughmeng utaqiillequt Kiyaghneghem nanqigtillghaneng. Atuqelleqaak uguqnaghllagek kenghek naafqennaluki tamaakut kipullginaalghiit ellmineng.
58010028	Maalghuk nalighmeng pingayut liisimakistet aapqatgu yuuk qaatkusimanginniluku Moses-em Liilightuusaanun, nanqigtistem nangllekegpenaan tuqutesleqaa.
58010029	Sumeghtaghaatkaghteggu natenmi angkaslugan Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqagu yuuk tutmaasghaqiiqelghii Ighneghaneng Kiyaghneghem, piiqelghii satngunghinniluku aawk apeghiighutkaq akequsaghraghaghmeng (qaywa Kiyaghneghem ukmangiisiqegkaqeghngaagu seghleghqellghanun), seghlequughiiqelghiillu nangllegtalghiignun Tagneghagnun.
58010030	Liisimakaghput Kiyaghneq; ellngangulghii whaten pikaq, “Whanganguuq aghyuughiyaghqaq, akisaghqaqanka seghletun pillghit.” Whatenllu pikaaguq, “Atanghem nanqigsaghqaqii ellmi yuni.”
58010031	Tatamaataghnapigtuq kina alngunak iigganisaghqaq unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani!
58010032	Neqamikegkesi tamaakut aghneghet sivunghani liisuwhaaghaqngafsigu ipapilleq Christ-ameng ayuqelghii. Aghuliitkaagusi ataasiighmellusi qaywa ikfiqeghllaghngaaghpesi.
58010033	Ilangakun yugtuqami yuget seghletun akuzitkaqiisillu amyuqetaatkaqiisillu. Ilangani nekevghalgusighaqasi tamaakut amyuqetaatkesilghiit.
58010034	Nangllekaqasi anusimingllaghvigmelnguut. Talwa quyangaaqusi yuget tugulanghatki saghyasi qayughllak liisimakaghsi paninang salguusi pinighataghalghiimeng quunpekaghqameng.
58010035	Enkaangam iilqayugpenasi qayughllak ilutumanginaqufsi allgeghullequsi akileghtuusaghllagmeng.
58010036	Aklukngwaaghsi nuqenneghtulleq atuqsaghqaaluku Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha. Taagken allgeghlleqasi akequsaqegkii.
58010037	Katam igaqngalghii Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Qantaghaqun taana tagiyaghqaq kaallequq; kimaawinaanghituq.
58010038	Elqughutngalghiit yugenka kiyaghllequt ugpeqilleghqun. Iwernga kitum alngunak pegtekumigu ugpeqilleni, unguvasigma efquqnaanghitaqa.”
58010039	Iwernga whangkuta pegtikastun ugpeqilleghmeggneng ayuqenghitukut, naafqellengyaghqastun. Iwernga ugpeqillelguukut enkaam unguvasiput yugulikaagukut.
58011001	Ugpeqillghem liisimakestengngwaaghiinkut allgeghsaghqaqniluku sighmakegkaghput, ipapighqusiguq esghaghyaghqaqenghilkemnnun.
58011002	Ugpeqilleghmegteggun ayumiim yugi itagnaqellengegkaagut Kiyaghneghmeng.
58011003	Ugpeqilleghqun liigikegkaqaghput Kiyaghneghem ulimaaqaa nuna akuzitmikun. Tamaakut aliilnguut ulimaaghuut esghaghyaghqaanghilngughmeng.
58011004	Ugpeqilleghqun Abel tuunikaaguq Kiyaghneghmun tuguklighyugnaghataghalghiimeng aghqutmeng Cain-em aghqutkegkaaneng. Kiyaghneq pikaaguq Abel elqughutngalghiinguniluku yuuk ugpeqillgha apalluqluku. Kiyaghneghem ipapighqegkaqaa Abel elqughutnganiluku tuguklilleghmikun tunusii. Ugpeqilleghmikun Abel paninang akuzinguuq, tuqukaayaghngaaghmi.
58011005	Upeqilleghqun Enoch mayuutestekaaguq qilagmun enkaam nanghiillghitaa tuqulleq. Kitum alngunak naalkellghitaa qayughllak Kiyaghneghem tugukaqegkanga. Mayullghilluni qilagmun, igaqngakaaguq Enoch-em efqughtekaqaa Kiyaghneq.
58011006	Ugpeqillngunani kitum alngunak efqughtepagningitaa Kiyaghneq. Kina alngunak tagiyukumi Kiyaghneghmun ugpeqepestaaghyaghqaqaa Kiyaghnelguniluku, akileghtughyaghqaqiillu ivaghipiilghiit ellmineng.
58011007	Ugpeqilleghqun Noah-m nagatkaqii Kiyaghneghem kelengasaaghutkii tamaakut salin pingigalluki. Enkaam qaatkelluku Kiyaghneq angyaghpangllaqaaguq nengllugutni yugulinaluki ulevelleghmeng. Tawaten pilleghmikun Noah-m nunam yugi nanqigtestekaqii Kiyaghneghmun aghyuughesqelluki. Ugpeqilleni apalluqluku Noah-m allgeghtekaqaa elqughutngalleq Kiyaghneghmeng.
58011008	Ugpeqilleghqun Abraham-em qaatkegkaqaa Kiyaghneq tuqlughaqngatni aghulaqesqelluku ilanganun nunam. Kiyaghneghem akequsaqaa taana nuna ellnganun tuunelleqniluku. Enkaam unitkaqaa ellmi nunani nallukluku navek pinaqutni.
58011009	Ugpeqilleghqun kiyaghtekaaguq nunataaluni nunami Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaani. Tiintanitkaaguq katam Isaac-enkuk Jacob-enkuk pillghegketun. Elkegkenkallu allgeghtekaqaak Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaa taana nuna.
58011010	Abraham tawaten pikaaguq qayughllak utaqiingulghii kiyaghhnaluni neghllagmi tunemaghtuqami. Kiyaghneghuuq uspeqistengallu ulimaghistengallu neghllagem.
58011011	Abraham nanevgaghllaghngaaghmi, Sarah-llu qumingyaghqaanghiteghngaaghmi, paninang ugpeqilleghqun Sarah qumingegkaaguq, qayughllak neghyukegkaqaa Kiyaghneghmun pilleqniluku akequsaqegkani.
58011012	Tamaaken apalluqluku Abraham tuquyaghtungestaqaaghngaaghmi, paninang kinguneghtughqaaghllakaaguq. Ellngita uglaghtalngit ighaleqetaaghestun qilagamelngughestun ayuqut, kestekaanghilngughestunllu qenaavzeghaatun esnam.
58011013	Qamaglluteng tamaakut yuget paninang kiyaghtekaagut ugpeqilleghqun tuqulleghmeggnun kenlanga. Tuqulaghaatkaalghiit allgeghtegpenaki Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkii ellmeggnun. Iwernga ugpeqilleghqun esghaqaqiit Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkii uyavanlluki sivumeggnilluki quyakegkaqiitlu. Enkaangam ungipaatkaqiit yuget nunataaniluteng whani nunami, nunamun pikenghinniluteng.
58011014	Tamaakut tawaten akuzilghiit, whateghlluwaaq aapghwaat nunakaghqaghyugniluteng ellmeggnun pikaghqameng.
58011015	Suumqegkaqsaqumegteggu taana nuna unitkaghteng, uteghtelleghqalgunayaghtut.
58011016	Yeghlegi piyukataghaqaqaat pinighataghalghii nuna, qilaghmelnguq. Enkaam Kiyaghneq kaynguyugigatuq Kiyaghneqninghatni. Talwa yataaghqutkaqii neghllagmeng.
58011017	Kiyaghneghem akeqegkaqegkanga Abraham, “Isaac-ekun kinguneghllagullequten.” Ugpeqilleghqun Abraham-em neghyukegkaqaa Kiyaghneq nanghiiqwaaqngatni. Enkaam aghqutkesaghqaaghtekaa kezemaghhaq ighneni, Isaac.
58011019	Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqaa Kiyaghneq unguvaghtiyaqleguniluku tuqukaneng. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem tuqutesnanighaqngagu Isaac, Abraham-em veghtekallghuuqaqaa Isaac tuqulleghmeng.
58011020	Ugpeqilleghqun Isaac-em quyastekaqaak Jacob-enkuk Esau-nkuk, tungsiitkaqaak Kiyaghneghmun quyastesqellukek aagnaqkaghqiik.
58011021	Ugpeqilleghqun Jacob-em, tuqunaqnguluni quyastekaqaak allakaqaghtaagkenka ighneghqek Joseph-em. Taagken qungughlluni ayaviighmikun maniguqaqaa Kiyaghneq.
58011022	Ugpeqilleghqun Joseph-em, kenletghuunnaqellghani unguvalleghmi, akuzitkegkaqaa aghulaqelleghqaat Israel-eghmiit Egypt-meng. Apeghtuutkaqiillu neghqwaani naten salleghqii.
58011023	Ugpeqilleghqun Moses-em angayuqagkenka iighaghtuqaqaak pingayut tanqit allgellghan kingunganeng. Esghaqangak yuukegtepiglleghii, alingumangilnguuklu qaatkunneghisaghqaalutek umiilgem qelghutellghanun.
58011024	Ugpeqilleghqun Moses, yugughsami ighsakaaguq ighneqesneghmeng Pharaoh-m paniganun.
58011025	Yeghlegi nakmiiqaaguq ikfiqelgusighnaluki Kiyaghneghem yugi, avelghagluku efqughyugnallgha seghleghqellghem muluyaghqaanghilnguq.
58011026	Itupill sumeghtaghaatkegkaqaa ikfiqelleghqani Christ-amun itagnaghataghaghniluku aklungilghutanganeng Egypt-em. Sumeghtaghaatkengngwii akileghtuusaghqat aga sivumelnguut.
58011027	Ugpeqilleghqun Moses-em unitkaqaa Egypt alingellngunani umiilgem sakraallghaneng. Iilqayugumangituq qayughllak esghalghiistun pikaqegkanga aliinneghilnguq Kiyaghneq.
58011028	Ugpeqilleghqun Moses-em qelqaqii yuget Passover-esqelluki, qelghutkaqaallu aakw sivillagtaatesqelluku amigteggun. Enkaam Yaqulgan Tuqullghem tuqutellghitii ighneqsuwhaaghit Israel-eghmiit.
58011029	Ugpeqilleghqun Israel-eghmiit aghviqaqaat Red Sea nikimqun qutestun. Iwernga Egypt-eghmiit, aghvighnaqutkengnguluteng pekaqutkaagut.
58011030	Ugpeqilleghqun Israel-eghmiit maaghraghvinlegni aghneghni uzivgaqaqaat Jericho-m mingllutanga. Taagken minglluta ulleghaatkaaguq.
58011031	Ugpeqilleghqun Rahab-em, yugusimineng akikikayugem, upughatkaqaak Israel-eghmiit riirngistegket. Tamaaken apalluqluku tuqullghituq maligulluni qaatkusigalngughnun Kiyaghneghmun.
58011032	Wataqaaghaq ungipamsugullamsii yugneng ugpeqikaneng Kiyaghneghmeng? Taakeghllagyaghqaagut akuzitkesaghqaaluki Gideon-enkut, Barak-enkut, Samson-enkut, Jephthah-nkut, David-enkut, Samuel-enkut, uuknaliqistetlu.
58011033	Ugpeqilleghqun ilangi yuget whaten pikaagut: kayaalqegkaqiit ataneghpagullghet, elqughutngaluteng igleghutikaagut. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem akequsii tugukaqiit. Ilangita lion-et qaanghit meqetestaqiit.
58011034	Kumaghughllaget kenghet qaamtaqiit, anagaqlukillu tuqutistekaghqateng savigpagkun. Kayaataqut iwernga ugpeqillghita iknaqughtaqiit. Ugpeqilleghqun pilluwaghtengit iknaqughteghllagaqut enkaam kayaalqaqiit ilangita nunat pilluwaghtengit.
58011035	Ugpeqilleghqun aghnat tuqumasliiteng veghtaqiit tuqulleghmeng Kiyaghneghem unguvaghhneghaki. Ilangi elngaatall ikfiqesteghllagaqiit pegtesqelluku ugpeqillghat. Iwernga tuqunaluteng piiqut Kiyaghneghmun unguvaghtesqelluteng pinighataghalghimun unguvalleghmun.
58011036	Ilangi legasiighwaatkaqluki, ilangi kagsagmigaqluki, ilangi qiipraghusighluki anusimingllaghaqiit.
58011037	Ilangi milughpagaatameng tuqutaqiit, ilangi yugusiit pilagtughluki malghughqaqiit, ilangi tuqutaqiit savigpagkun. Ilangi temgi tamaani igleghtaqut aalluteng penniighemllu goat-emllu amiineng. Ilangi aklumapiglleghhiit, yuget amyuqetaatkegkiit, seghletunllu kiyaghutkiit.
58011038	Nunam yugi pinipagunghitut kiyaghtelgusighyaghqaaluki tamaakut elqughutngalghiit yuget! Ilangi elqughutngalghiit temngi tamaani igleghakaalghiit paaghqillghani, naayghani, kiyaghtaqluteng qayeni, laawaaghnillu.
58011039	Qamaglluki tamaakut Kiyaghneghem itagnaqegkaqii ugpeqillghit apalluqluki! Naqamllu allgeghsimangitaat Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaa,
58011040	qayughllak Kiyaghneghem uspeqegkaa whangkunnun pinighataghalghiinguuq. Uspeqillgha whatetuq: akequsani pinaanghitii ellngitnun whangkungunaki. Qerngaamta qamaglluta iighwighlleqiinkut.
58012001	Qamaglluteng tamaakut yuget liigikestiinkut ugpeqilleghmeggneng naten kiyaghtelleghmegteggun. Maaten uvitangighluta esghapagaqiinkut. Enkaam kilgaaqustestun iqitelteki qamaglluki uqigkutat, seghleghqellghetlu iglagullghiit whangkunnun. Sagiqlutangam kilgaaqulta sivumnnilngughmun,
58012002	esghaamakluku Jesus, piinlighistengallu apeghiighistengallu ugpeqillemta. Kayngunaghtuq tuqulleghqaq qaquurakun, iwernga Jesus-em pitkumangitaa kayngusaghaatelleq. Yeghlegi nakmiiqaaguq ikfiqnaluni qaquurakun apalluqluku quyalleq allgeghsaghqani. Enkaam maaten aqumgaaq aghenqigneghani Kiyaghneghem.
58012003	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtegguqun Jesus. Iilqayugumangituq qaywa seghleghqestet ugumikeraaghllaghngaatni. Tawaten elpesillu ilutullghiinnaanghitusillu iilqayugnaanghitusillu.
58012004	Seghleghqenghinnaqutkelleghpesi salin yugnun tuqutesigatiisi.
58012005	Puygustekii ilutughsaasit akuzitet ungipaatilghiit Kiyaghneghmun ighneqnilusi? Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Ighnemni, avelghaqiinaghpenaan Atanghem nallghusanghaten, iilqayugpenangllu aghyuunghaten.
58012006	Qayughllak qamaglluki piniqegkani Atanghem apeghtughaqii qaatkesqelluni, aghyuughaqiillu tugukliqani avaqutaaluki.”
58012007	Tuguklighaqiteggu Kiyaghneghem aghyuughillgha qayughllak ighneqelghiistun piiqiisi. Qamaglluki avaqutateng atangita aghyuughaqiit nallghughqennaluki.
58012008	Qamaglluteng avaqutat aghyuullengaqut. Aghyuullengenghilkuvek taawa atangilnguuguten enkaam avaqutapikenghitaaten.
58012009	Taam saaghwakun, atamta nunamelnguut aghyuughaqiinkut apeghtughnaluta qaatkesqelluteng, iwernga paninang quulvaghaqaput. Enkaam Atavut qilagmelnguq qaatkataghaghyaghqaqaghput unguvanaluta.
58012010	Atamta nunamelnguut aghyuughaqinkut natengiighhaq, sumeghmeggni elqughlluku aghyuughinguniluteng. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem aghyuughaqiinkut pinighqelleghqamnnun pelungiightesqelluta ellmitun.
58012011	Quyaniituq aghyuullengnemta qayughllak aqnightaqegkanginkut. Iwernga tagtalmi, liitfiknemteggu, nekeggmellengaqukut qayughllak kiyaghsagutaqukut elqughulluta.
58012012	Kevegteki iiggesi qughaghngalghiit, taagken iknaqughsaghteki kayaalnguut segesqusi!
58012013	Taklaghtiki tuumngi tutmalleghpek, taagken kayaalnguq ighun aanqaghnaanghituq naflumineng, iwernga naallghullequq.
58012014	Kiyaghhnaqitek nekeggmetullusi tamaghhaanun yugnun, kiyaghhnaqiteklu seghleghqellngunasi. Kinkut alngunak pelunginneghilnguut esghaghnaanghitaat Ataneq.
58012015	Esghaamakullusi kinkut alngunak luuraq allgeghhneghisaaghaat Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha. Nagusaqunaanllu sungaghnilnguq akuq seghleliighqiiluni naafqiiyaghqaq yulghutmeng.
58012016	Esghaamakullusi kinkut alngunak seghleghqesaaghtut sex-kun, nalighmeng kinkut alngunak quulvaghinghisaaghtut Kiyaghneghmeng Esau-tun. Akikegkaqegkanga pagitaghqani ataasighhaghmun neghyaghqamun.
58012017	Liisimakaghsi taam kingunganeng, allgeghsugaqngamigu atami quyastellgha, atangan ighsakegkaqaa. Esau-m allangughtepagningitkaqaa apeghiiqani, qaywa qunituumaghmi tungsighngaaghmigu atami quyastillgha.
58012018	Sivuneghpesistun ayuqenghitusi Mount Sinai-mun pikastun. Esghaghyaghqaat, saafsaghqaatlu. Tawani mamlegllagukaq, naafteghllagukaq, naayghaqlu kumaghughllagulghii.
58012019	Nagaquqaat qalghightaan qalghighlleghhii, nagaquqaatlu Kiyaghneghem menga. Iwernga nepiiqiisqegkaat,
58012020	qayughllak tuguklighyunghilkangat qelghillgha whatelnguq, “Taana naayghaq, yugem nalighmeng teghikusam saaftekumigu, tuqusaghqapestaaghuuq milughpagaatameng.”
58012021	Moses-em esghaqaa kakavaataghnapiglleghhii repall whaten pikaalghii, “Ellngaatall ungelegtunga alingruughem.”
58012022	Iwernga katam elpesi tagikaagusi Mt. Zion-mun, qilagem Jerusalem-nganun, neghllaganun unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem. Tagikaagusi kestekaanghilngughnun yaqulegnun qerngughutkanun quyallelighllagluteng.
58012023	Tagikaagusi qerngughutellghitnun qamagtengngwaaghluteng ugpeqat ighneqsuwhaaghestun ayuqelghiit. Qilagmi aatghit igaqngaat igatgun. Tagikaagusi Kiyaghneghmun nanqigtistengitnun qamagtengngwaaghluteng yuget, taghneghiitnunllu elqughutngalghiit yuget iighwightestekanun.
58012024	Tagikaagusi Jesus-mun, ellngakun Kiyaghneq akequsaghraghangllaqaaguq. Tagikaagusillu sivillagtaatkamun aawanun Jesus-em. Pinighataghaghtuq Abel-em aawaneng, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem seghevutii seghleghqellghet Jesus-em aawakun.
58012025	Enkaam kelengatek, nagasunghitegpenaan Kiyaghneq akuzilghii. Sivunemta nagasunghitkaqaat kelengasaaghillgha nunami whani, enkaam anagumangitaat aghyuughillgha. Whangkuta aghyuughataghaghlleqiinkut nagasunghilkumteggu kelengasaallgha qilagmeng.
58012026	Kiyaghneq akuziiqngami Mount Sinai-meng, mengan ufsugutkaqaa nuna. Iwernga maaten akeqimaaq whaten, “Ataasighhaghmeng ufsugunneqiglleqaqa nuna, iwernga qilaklu ufsugulleqaqa.”
58012027	Tawaten akuzillghan, “Ataasighhaghmeng ufsugunneqiglleqaqa nuna,” liigikestengngwaaghiinkut whaten, sangwaat qamaglluki ulimaani, Kiyaghneghem iqilleqii ufsugusaghqat. Tamaakunginaghhaat ufsugutepagningilnguut tamaanllequt quunperugllak.
58012028	Tamaaken apalluqluku iyamsiqayugvikelteggu Kiyaghneq qayughllak tuunegkanginkut ataneghpagulleghmeng ufsugusaghqaanghilngughmeng. Enkaangam maniguulteggu Kiyaghneq efqughnalkegkaatun alingellelighlutallu quulvaghillelighlutallu,
58012029	qayughllak Kiyaghneghput naafqiilghiinguuq keneq.
58013001	Piniqekestaghteki ugpeqaalgutesi.
58013002	Upughamanginaghtek aqiiyagnun qayughllak ilangita upughataqiit nallukluki yaqulgutangi.
58013003	Neqamikluki anusimingllaghvigmelnguut, nikimqun elpesillu anusimingllaghvigmetellghistun. Neqamikluki ikfiqngalghiit, nikimqun elpesillu ikfiqelghiistun.
58013004	Tamaghhaghpesi siivakiteggu nengughutelleq enkaam ugitlu nulighhetlu ataasiighmetullit. Kiyaghneghem nanqigsaghqaqii gelgaghniilghiit, tamaakutlu ilanganeng sex-kun seghleghqelghiit.
58013005	Kiyaghtek pakigneghugpenasi manimun, itagnaghaqiteklu satutalegpesistun. Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Uninnaanghitngwaaghamsi; peggnaanghitngwaaghamsi.”
58013006	Enkaam tetullngunaamta whaten pilta, “Ataneq kayutkaqa! Alingnaanghitunga yuget salleghqiitneng.”
58013007	Neqamikluki igleghutistesi ungipaqikat elpesinun Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Neqamikluki naten kiyaghtekaatangi enkaam ugpellelgunaqitek ellngistun.
58013008	Jesus Christ-a almesiqaqaa ighivgaq, aghneghmi, quunperugllaklu.
58013009	Iqitutestegpenasi ipapilleghmeng allaaghhiinaghnunllu allakaayagnunllu apeghtuusanun. Nangllegtallghakun Kiyaghneghem ayepsugighsaghteki ilusi, nakaan qaatkelluki Liilightuusat neqneng ayuqelghiit. Taakut neqet Liilightuusiit qaatkegkufsiki ayepsugighsaghnaanghitiit ilusi.
58013010	Priest-et qepghalghiit tabernacle-mi ineghtekaagut neghelleghqiitneng aghqutkegkameng aghqefimteggun.
58013011	High Priest-em tagitaqii aawit teghikusat Agleghnalleghpigaghmun aghqutkennaluki seghleghqelleghnun. Iwernga kemegkwaaghit teghikusat neghllagmeng iqitulluki paneghtaqiit.
58013012	Tamaaken apalluqluku Jesus-llu iqitutkaaguq neghllagmeng. Tawani tuqukaaguq, pelungighsaghnaluki yuget seghleghqellghitneng ellmi katam aawmineng.
58013013	Enkaangam neghllagmeng whangkutallu aglaalta Jesus-mun, seghletun akuzitkesqelluta katam ellnga seghletun akuzitkellghistun.
58013014	Nunami whani quunpekaghqameng neghllagitukut, iwernga utaqangwaaghput neghllak tagiyaghqaq.
58013015	Jesus-kun iiwleng aghqutkilta Kiyaghneghmun. Aghquteput usuqilqaput apenemteggu Jesus Atanghuniluku.
58013016	Puygugpenaan pinitun pilleq, tuunutaqiteklu qayughllak tamaakut aghqutnguut efqughnalghiit Kiyaghneghmun.
58013017	Qaatkiteki igleghutistesi atuqluki qelghusiit. Kelengakinguut unguvasighpesineng liisimakluku Kiyaghneghmun nanqigsaghqaatseng. Quyanghitestegpenaki igleghutistesi, itupill qaatkelleghpesigun qepghaqateng pilleqiit quyakusiqluki. Qaatkenghilkufsiki kayusiitepagningitiisi.
58013018	Yughaatkitekut. Liisimakukut umyugamta anaggutellghinniinkut, qayughllak iiwleng piyukelqaghput elqughutngalghii piyaghqaaluku.
58013019	Taakunginaghhaagneng kayagtamsi yughaatkesqellunga qantaghaqun elpesinun uteghnighnalunga.
58013020	Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellelitistem Ataneghput Jesus unguvaghtestekaqaa tuqulleghmeng. Enkaam aawmikun Penniighniighteghllagughtekaaguq penniighnun. Aawan atuuyaghqaaghtestekaqaa Kiyaghneghem quunpekaghqaq akequsaa.
58013021	Yughaghtunga Kiyaghneghmun tuunesqellusi sameng tamaghhaaneng pinilghiimeng elpesinun piyukellgha pisqelluku. Jesus Christ-akunllu ilugpesinun Kiyaghneghem piligu efqughnalghii ellminun. Christ usuqellengli quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
58013022	Ugpeqaalgutemni, nagatngwaaqaghteki latanka qayughllak kayemyugaqamsi. Tamaaken apalluqluku takestaaghhaaluku lataamsi.
58013023	Liisimakesugamsi ugpeqaalgutemnneng, Timothy-meng, aanesimaaq anusimingllaghvigmeng. Kaatelghaghtughyaqan qerngaamtung esghaghyaghtughlleqamsi.
58013024	Quyakaghhnakesi qamaglluki igleghutistesi, qamagllukillu Kiyaghneghem yugi. Ugpeqaalgutetlu Italy-meng pit quyakaghhnakiisinguq.
58013025	Kiyaghneghem piniqingalghii kayusillgha tamaghhaghpesinilli! Amen.
59001001	Ukut latat James-meng pinguut qepghaghtenganeng Kiyaghneghemllu Atanghemllu Jesus Christ-am. Lataaqunga Jews-et ugpeqiitnun mingitngalghiinun tamangani. Quyakamsi.
59001002	Ugpeqaalgutemni, quyaaqitek allaaghhiinaghmeng seghleliineghpesini,
59001003	qayughllak liisimakasi seghleliilleghpesi nanghiiqungwaat ugpeqilleghsi, nuqenneghtughsaghnalusi.
59001004	Taagken nuqenneghtulleghsi nagneghngasteggu. Enkaam tawaten pikufsi angtaniillequsi, iighwighllequsi nuughyaghqaagpenasi.
59001005	Nalighsi peghqinellengyukumi tungsighli Kiyaghneghmeng. Kiyaghneq ighlegiteghllagtuq, quyakusiqinaghluku tuunegkayuwaa qamaglluku yuuk aapleghhii. Kiyaghneghem tuunelleqiisi tungsiqufsi.
59001006	Enkaam aaptek ugpeqillelighluku malghuklillngunaan. Malghuklingalghii imaghllugestun ayuquq, anuqem tengqaataqegkanga.
59001007	Malghuklingalghii ataasiighsigatuq salleghmikun tamaghhaan. Tawatelnguq yuuk talwa sumeghtaghaghyaghqaanghituq sameng alngunak allgeghulleqniluni Ataneghmeng.
59001009	Yeqay aklumalghii ugpeqaalgun quyali quulvaghtestengngalleghmineng.
59001010	Yeqay aklungilnguq ugpeqaalgun quyali qusevegtestengngalleghmineng, qayughllak aviighusaghqaaguq piitesighaghestun.
59001011	Siqineq piinneghmini maatneghqwaaghllagaqelghii, piitesighaat palightesluki. Taagken piitesighaat ifkaquutaqut, pinighniighutaqii. Tawateghpigaq aklungilnguq yuuk sakestaghngaaghmi aviighullequq.
59001012	Quyanaghhalek yugem nanghiiqulleni nuqetutkayugi. Suflughtekumiki allgeghsaghqaqaa akileghtuusani kenlengilnguq unguvalleq, Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaa tuunelleqniluku piniqisteminun.
59001013	Kina alngunak nanghiiqullengegkumi whaten pifqaami, “Kiyaghneghem seghleghqesnaqutkaanga.” Kiyaghneq nanghiiqullengyaghqaghhaanghituq seghleghmeng; tamaaken apalluqluku kina alngunak seghleghqesnaqutkesaghqaqenghitaa.
59001014	Iwernga yuuk piyukellelugan nanghiiqullengestaqaa seghleghqelleghmun. Sivukluku piyukellelugan sayugaqaa seghleghqelleghmun, taagken seghleghqellghem naaptaqaa.
59001015	Piyukellelugem allgeghtestaqaa seghleghqelleq. Taagken seghleghqelleq anglineghmini tuqullghughtaquq.
59001016	Piniqegkamni ugpeqaalgutemni, puughtesighpenasi.
59001017	Qamaglluteng pinilghiitlu, sallghwaaghhiilnguutlu tunusat qilagmeng pinguut. Tamaakut Atameng pinguut ulimaghistenganeng qamaglluni nighugem; allangughsigatuqlu, mamlegtestingigatuqlu.
59001018	Kiyaghneghem ellngan katam piyukelqaa, tuunaluta nutaghameng unguvalleghmeng ungipaakun ipapighqellghem. Tawaten pikaaguq, whangkuta megnunalleghpigaasqelluta ulimaaghyaggaghmineng.
59001019	Piniqegkamni ugpeqaalgutemni, neqamikluku una: tamaghhaghmi nagasukestaghluni piyaghqaaguq, akuziighaghtafqaamillu sakraagaghaghtafqaamillu,
59001020	qayughllak sakraam kayusiisigatiisi pinitun kiyaghtaalleghmun Kiyaghneghem piyukegkaanun.
59001021	Tamaaken apalluqluku pegteggu qamagtengngwaaghluku allaaghhiinaq seghleq atuqaqegkesi. Qusevegngaghpesi tuguklighteki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, piitesiighaqii ilugpesigun, qayughllak yuguliyaghqaqiisi unguvasighpesineng.
59001022	Nagataghesnaghpenaki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi itupill atuqiteki. Puughtaqusi elpesineng katam nagataghesnaneghpesiki atuqegpenaki.
59001023	Yuuk nagataghesnaqumi Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng atuqegpenaki, taghneghaghqulghiistun ayuquq
59001024	tunuskumi tawaninginaq puygulleqaa natetuleni.
59001025	Kiyaghneghem elqughutngalghiit Liilightuusii itemutestiiqut yugneng. Yugem liinnaqumanginaqumiki taakut Liilightuusat, puygugpenaki atuqegkumiki Kiyaghneghem quyasaghqaqaa sallghakun tamaghhaan.
59001026	Yuuk sumeghtaghaqayuk ugpeqaghllaguniluni, naqam akuzitkesaghqaqenghilkemmineng akuzikayuk temngi puughtengnguuq ellmineng katam. Ugpellgha satngunghituq.
59001027	Kiyaghneghem Atamta pillghani yuuk ugpellepiilgukumi, kayusighyaghqaqii yaywaalitlu ugingighatlu seghleliinghata, nuqesaghqaaguqlu seghleghaneng nunam.
59002001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, ugpeqingutegpesineng Atanemnneng Jesus Christ-ameng, Atanghaneng nighughqellghem sumeghtaghaatkegpenaki ilangi yugem megnunaghataghaghniluki ilameggneng.
59002002	Maalghuk yugek iteghyaqayek qerngughutfigpesinun, aallgha aarraghluni, gold-meng alangqughiitightughluni, aallgha aatkalukaghlluni,
59002003	taana aarraghngalghii yuuk pikufsigu, “Whagun aqumi pinillghakun aqumutam,” naqam aklumalghii yuuk pikufsigu, “Tawani nekevgha,” nalighmeng, “Aqumi itegama saaghwakun,”
59002004	tawaten pikufsi pakiggulleqasi ilangi yuget enkaam seghleghqellequsi sumeghtaghalleghpesigun.
59002005	Piniqegkamni ugpeqaalgutemni, nagataghtekqun. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii aklumaalghiit nunami whani ugpeqilleghtusqelluki. Nakmikegkaqii tuguklightenguluki Ataneghpagulleghmineng, akequsaqegkamineng yugminun, piniqingalghiinun ellmineng.
59002006	Iwernga elpesi aklumaalghiit yuget ukaliistaqasi. Liisimakasi aklungilnguut piyaqliighqaqiisi, aglaataqlusi nanqigtivigmun.
59002007	Ellnginguut seghletun akuzitkilghiit quulvaghngalghiimeng aatghaneng Jesus-em, ateq tuunegkaq elpesinun qayughllak ellngan pikegkangisi.
59002008	Kiyaghneghem Ataneghpagullghan Liilightusaa unaanguq: “Piniqluku yulguten piniqelleghpetun elpeneng katam.” Qaatqegkufsigu taana Liilightuusaq, taawa pinitun piisi.
59002009	Iwernga pakigguskufsiki ilangi yuget seghleghqellequsi, qaatkennaanghitaghsillu taana Liilightuusaq.
59002010	Kitum qaatkesaghngaaghmiki qamaglluki Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii, ataasiq qaatkenghilkumigu, qamaglluki qaatkengngunghitii.
59002011	Kiyaghneq pikaaguq, “Gelgaghniighpenang.” Whatenllu pikaaguq, “Yugtaghpenang.” Gelgaghniinghisaghngaaghpek yugtaquvek taawa qaatkengngunghitaten Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusii.
59002012	Akuzilleghpesigun, salleghpesigun piraamsilusi qayughllak elpesinguusi nanqigsaghqat megnunalleghpigaghqun Liilightuusakun. Taam Liilightuusam itemutkaqiisi atuqesqelluku Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha elpesinun.
59002013	Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekumisi nangllegyagunnaanghitiisi, nangllegyagunneghilkufsiki yulgutesi. Iwernga nangllekegkufsiki yulgutesi Kiyaghneghem nangllegyagulleqiisi.
59002014	Ugpeqaalgutemni, kina whaten pighngaaghmi, “Ugpeqillelguunga,” iwernga taam ugpeqillghan yugulinaanghitaa atuqenghilkumigu ugpeqilleni aneghneghqilleghmikun. Sasiilleqangam ugpeqillgha aneghneghqillngunani?
59002015	Sanayaghetsi ugpeqaalgutsi aatkiisagyaqanllu, neqangisagyaqanllu?
59002016	Tuunegpenaan aklukegkaaneng temngi whaten pikufsigu, “Kiyaghneghem quyasnaaghaaten; sunanguq neghyaghqangillu aatkangillu maqalghiimeng,” sasiilleqan'ngam akuzitesi aneghneghqillngunateng?
59002017	Ugpeqilleqlu tawatetuq, aneghneghqilleghqun atuqenghilkumi sasiinghituq.
59002018	Kina pillequq, “Elpek ugpeqillelguuten, whanga aneghneghqellelguunga.” Kelguvikinga ugpeqilleghpeneng aneghneghqillghilngughmeng, kelguvikelleqamken ugpeqillemneng aneghneghqillemkun.
59002019	Ugpeqan ataasighhaatanga Kiyaghneq. Taana pinightuq! Tughneghaatlu ugpeqaqaat taana enkaangam alingruughaqut, ungelegtaqut qayughllak liisimakegkangat Kiyaghneghem nanqigsaghqaqegkangi.
59002020	Uyuq nalluuqaq yuuk, paninang liigikigasiguu ugpeqilleq aneghneghqillngunani sasiinghitulanga?
59002021	Sangan Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqagu sivuneghput Abraham seghleghqumangilngughestun? Tugukliqaqaa Abraham qayughllak ugpeqilleni atuqegkaqaa aneghneghqelleghmikun aghqutkaqngamigu ighneni Isaac aghqefigegnekun.
59002022	Liigiksiguu? Ugpeqilleqlu aneghneghqilleqlu qerngaagmek qepghaqayuguuk. Tamaaken apalluqluku Abraham-em ugpeqillgha iighwightekaqaa aneghneghqelleghqun.
59002023	Enkaam Akuzitet Igaqegkat whaten pillghit Abraham-emeng apeghiiqaagut, “Abraham-em ugpeqegkaqegkanga Kiyaghneq. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqegkanga Abraham seghleghqumangilngughestun.” Enkaam Kiyaghneghem Abraham ilakumtaaqniluku pikaqaa.
59002024	Kiyaghneghem tuguklighaqaa yuuk aneghneghqillghakunllu ugpeqillghakunllu; tugukliigataa ugpeqilleraaghinaakun.
59002025	Rahab-llu usputaaguq. Akikikayuguyalghii yugusimineng. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem tugukliqaqegkanga seghleghqumangilngughestun apalluqluku kayusighillgha. Joshua-m kayagtekaqegkek maalghuk yugek aksaqluku nunangat yuvghiighesqelluku. Yuget ivaghyatkek, Rahab-em allakun tuumkun anagtestekakek.
59002026	Enkaangam yugusiq taghneghangunani tuqungaaq, ugpeqilleqlu aneghneghqillngunani tuqungaaq.
59003001	Ugpeqaalgutemni, allullusi apeghtughistengughtefqaafsi Kiyaghneghem Akuzitanganeng, qayughllak liisimakaghsi whangkuta apeghtughisteni nanqigtengngwaaghataghaghyaghqaagukut.
59003002	Qamaglluta anaggutaghaneghtughllagtukut. Kina alngunak yuuk akuzilleghmikun anaggusigalnguq elqughutngapestaaghuuq. Yugem elqughutngalghiim talwa yugusinillu agghitkelluku ayuqsaghqaqa.
59003003	Savikenghaaghhaat sanitmun ayuqluki kuunit qaanghitnun kanaghtaqaput qaatkesqelluta enkaam whangkuta igleghutaqaput.
59003004	Sumeghtaghaatkaghtekiqunllu angyaghpagllaget; aquutasquvegaghhaam qiiftaqii angyalgem piyukellghanun talwa anuqateghllagyaghngaan.
59003005	Ulullu mekestaaghhaaguq iwernga aangaayugneghllaguuq. Kenghhaam uqfilghuteghllaget kumaghsaghqaqii!
59003006	Ulullu kenghestun ayuquq. Esleqngaaq seghleghqelleghmeng enkaam seghleghqumallgha mingitkayuguuq yugusimun. Enkaam naafqiikayuguuq kiyaghtaallemnneng qayughllak hell-em kenghan kumaghtaqaa.
59003007	Allaaghhiinaat teghikusat, qawaaget, nemeghyat, meghem teghikusii qimugtekayuguut, aaqun yugem qimugtaqii
59003008	iwernga kitum alngunak qimuggnaanghitaa ulu. Neklegigalnguuguq, seghleghuuq, esleqngaaq tuqunalghiimeng poison-meng.
59003009	Ulu usuqusiqaqaghput Atanemnnun Atamun. Naqam seghleghmeng neghyugtaghaasiqaqaghput yulgutemnnun, Kiyaghneghem ulimaaghitnun ellmisugnilluki.
59003010	Usuqilleqlu, seghleghmengllu neghyugtaghalleq aanegkayuguuk ataasimeng qaneghmeng. Ugpeqaalgutemni, tawatesaghqaanghisaghtuq.
59003011	Pinilghiillu seghleqlu meq maaqegkayuwaak ataasimeng sengngumeng?
59003012	Ugpeqaalgutemni, figs-em uqfiga piitestinaanghituq olives-meng. Tawateghpigaq grapes-em vine-nga piitestinaanghituq figs-meng. Talwa meghtaghvik taghyughnilngughmeng meqelghii pinilghiimeng meghituq.
59003013	Kina akulegpesinita peghqinelghii, liigikimalghiillu? Tawatetelleni kelgulligu pinitun kiyaghtaalleghmikun, aneghneghqilleghmikunllu qusevegngaghmi.
59003014	Iwernga ilugpesigun aqinangakufsillu, ellngiinaayugneghukufsillu iqlengiqutkegpenaan ipapighqelleq, qaghyalleghpesigun liisimanilusi.
59003015	Tawatelnguq peghqinelleq qilagtaanghituq, nunameng pinguuq. Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkeneng pingunghituq, tughneghaghmeng pinguuq.
59003016	Nani alngunak aqinallelgunghanillu, ellnginaayugllelgunghanillu taawa kipullginaallelwaaquq, sangwaatlu allaaghhiinaat seghleghet tawantaqut.
59003017	Iwernga peghqinelleq qilagtaq kiyang pelungituq. Amalleqaa nekeggmetuq, kavyugituq, malighqutaqingaaq, nangllegtaghtuq, pinistaghhiinatun pikayuguuq, taniillghituq, yupiinghuuq.
59003018	Nekeggmelleq piitutestun ayuquq. Tamaakut nekeggmelleghmun qepghaqayuget piitesighaghaqiit, enkaam saghnaaqut elqughngalghiimengllu pinilghiimengllu kiyaghtaalleghmeggni.
59004001	Saam aaghtiiraaghutestaqisillu, pillugutestaqiisillu? Apalluqaqaghsi, seghleghem piyukelleghpesi pilluwaghaqii pinilghiit piyukellesi.
59004002	Qiliighaqusi avanginneghpesini enkaam yugtaghyaghqaghtaqusi allgeghhnaluki qiliiqegkasi. Qiliighllagaqusi taawanginaq allgeghtepagningitaqasi enkaam aaghtiiraaghutaqusi, pilluwutaqusi. Allgeghusigatusi Kiyaghneq aapsigatutegpesineng.
59004003	Talwa aapteghngaaghpesigu Kiyaghneq allgeghsigatasi qayughllak seghleghmun atughqaaluki aaptaqelghiisi. Piyukegkaghsi elpesi katam piyukegkaghhiinaghpesinun ayuqaqelghii.
59004004	Ukughsi ataasiighneghilngughni! Liisimakenghistegguu piniqegkufsigu nunam seghlegha, ugumikaghsi Kiyaghneq? Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu nunam seghlegha anguyaguuq Kiyaghneghmun.
59004005	Sumeghtaghaghpenasi Akuzitet Igaqegkat temnginguniluku whaten pillghat, taghneghak kiyaghlleghhiik ilumnni aqinanaqneghtuuk.
59004006	Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem kayusiitaghaghaqiinkut nuqetutesqelluki piyukelleluput. Iwernga Akuzitet Igaqegkat piit, “Kiyaghneghem kayusighaqii qusevegngalghiit puuru kipullegmun piiqii qukaayugneghet.”
59004007	Tuunlusi elpesineng katam Kiyaghneghmun. Ayaklighteggu tughneghaq, anagniighllequq elpesineng.
59004008	Qantaghalliighaghtek Kiyaghneghmun, Kiyaghneq qantaghalliighaghllequq elpesinun. Seghleghqesteni, uughtughtek! Elpesi ataasiightellghilngughni, ukmangighteki ilusi qaamkut.
59004009	Quyanghitek, asemeghqitek, qiyatek! Nenglaghqiqellesi qiyallghughteki, quyallesi quyanghilnguughtesteki.
59004010	Qusevegtek Ataneghmun, quulvaghlleqiisi.
59004011	Ugpeqaalgutemni, seghlequughutegpenasi. Kitum alngunak seghlequuqumigu ugpeqaalguteni, seghlequughlleqii Liilightuusat. Nanqigtekumigullu ugpeqaalguteni nanqigtengngwii Liilightuusat. Nanqigtekufki Liilightuusat qaatkengngunghitaten. Yeghlegi Liilightuusat nanqigtistekaaten.
59004012	Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq Liilightuusangllaghta, nanqigtisiiluki atuqaqii, enkaam sangan'ngam nanqigsigu yulguten? Kiyaghneghhiinaaguq yugulighiyaghqaq, naafqiyaghqaq.
59004013	Ilasi whaten piiqut, “Aghneghmi nalighmeng unaami tawavek nunamun aghulaqellequnga. Tamaanllequnga ataasiq ayumiqulleq, maningllaghllequnga.”
59004014	Iwernga nallukaghsi unaami salleghqaghsi! Talwa nallukaghsi unguvalleghpesi tagtalkaghqaa. Unguvalleghsi takesqughhaaguq, agepsughruggaghestun ayuquq, mulugpenani aviighutkayuk.
59004015	Itupill whaten piiqitek, “Atanghem piyukelqegkagu unguvakestaghllequkut enkaam apeghiighutaqellequkut sameng alngunak.”
59004016	Tawaten pinghilkufsi aangaayugllequsillu qanangullequsillu. Tamaakut aangaayugtellghet seghleghuut.
59004017	Enkaam kitum alngunak liisimakeghngaaghmigu pinitun pilleq atuqenghilkumigu, seghleghqengnguuq.
59005001	Nagatek aklungilngughni! Qiyakestaghtek, iilqekestaghtek qayughllak seghleliighnaqnguusi.
59005002	Aklungisi aghumaat, aatkasi moth-em neghumii.
59005003	Gold-esillu silver-esillu anaghtaamaat. Anaghtaallghita ipapighqennaqngwaa ellnginaayugneghulleghsillu, pakigneghulleghsillu nanqigtellengegkufsi. Taagken anaghtaallghem yugusisi naafqelleqii katam kenghestun. Qaywa kingulighnun aghneghnun lliighngaaghpesi, qerngughtimanginaagusi wata aklungighinalusi.
59005004	Talwa akileghtullghitasi qepghaghtesi unataqat piitesiighaghvigpesini. Nagateki akuzilgallghit. Atanghem aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem nagaquumii akilghuullghit.
59005005	Kiyaghtaalleghpesini whani nunami, aklungitutegpesineng sangwaa alngunak piyukegkaghsi allgeghtaqaghsi efqughhnalusi elpesineng katam. Tawaten pilleghpesigun penniighestun ayuqusi. Penniighet qugilisighat nallukaat qantaghaqun tuqutelleghqaghteng. Nallukestegguu qantaghaqun Atanghem nanqigtilleghqaa?
59005006	Elpesinguut nanqigtistikatlu tuqutistikatlu anaggusimangilngughneng yugneng, ellngita ayakliimangitiisi.
59005007	Ugpeqaalgutemni, qelaneghpenasi kenlanga Atanghem taginqigtelleghqaanun. Piitesiighaghta usputaqiteggu. Nunami piitesiighaghluni qelaneghyukaghpenani utaqiigaquq uksaaghemllu upenghaamllu eslalluwaneng nagustikayugmeng piisaghqaneng.
59005008	Elpesillu qelaneneghllugutek neghyumanginaghlusi qayughllak Ataneq tagiyaghtughtuq.
59005009	Ugpeqaalgutemni, seghlequughpenaki ilasi enkaam Atanghem nanqiggneghillisi. Ellnganguuq Nanqigtista kaasaghtungestalghii.
59005010	Ugpeqaalgutemni, neqamikluki uuknaliqistet akuzikat aatghakun Atanghem. Usputaqiteki qelaneghpenateng nuqenneghtuluteng ikfiqelleghmi pikat.
59005011	Quyanganiiqaput uuknaliqistet qayughllak ikfiqngughngaaghmeng paninang neghyukumanginaqaqaat Ataneq. Nagaquqaqaghsi Job-em nuqenneghtullgha, quyastellghallu Ataneghmeng ikfiqellgha alpagyan. Enkaam Job-kun Atanghem liitestiisi nafughtalleghminengllu nangllegtalleghminengllu.
59005012	Ugpeqaalgutemni, apeghnaqegkegka una megnunapigtuq. Akeqineghpesini, akeqigpenasi qilagkun, nalighmeng nunakun, nalighmeng sakun alngunak. Piyaghqaakufsi legan aang'ghhaasi, piyaghqaanghilkufsi legan nakaaghhaasi. Enkaam atuqaqiteki akequsasi, tawaten pikufsi Atanghem nanqiggnaanghitiisi aghyuughyaghqaalusi.
59005013	Kina akulegpesini ikfiqngwaa? Yughaghli. Kina quyangaa? Ilagaghli usuqilleghmeng.
59005014	Kina qinuyuwaa? Tuqlughliki Elder-et enkaam yughaatkellitgu mesiighqelluku Aatghakun Atanghem.
59005015	Yughallghem ugpeqilleghqun naallghusaghqaqaa qinuyulghii yuuk. Enkaam Atanghem yugunqwuughtesneqiglleqaa, seghleghqellghillu seghevulleqii.
59005016	Tamaaken apalluqluku aapghaqluki seghleghqellesi ilagpesinun, yughaatkututaqlusi naallghutellengesqellusi. Elqughutngalghiim yugem yughallghi iknaqeghllagtut, allgeghutkayuguut.
59005017	Elijah yuguuq whangkutestun ayuqelgii. Taakunginaghhaagneng yughaqaq eslallugughtefqaan pisqelluku. Enkaam eslallugughsimangilnguq pingayut ayumiqullghet alla aghvinlek tanqiq ilalluku.
59005018	Taagken alla yughaqaq eslallugughtesqelluku. Enkaam eslallugughsalghiimi nuna piitestikaq neghyaghqameng.
59005019	Ugpeqaalgutemni, una kinguliiguq apeghyukegka elpesinun. Nalighsi ugpeqinaniqan apeghtuusapigneng, kitum kayusighligu ugpeqinqigtelleghmun. Tawaten pikumigu yugulisleqaak seghleghqestem unguvasikek tuqulleghmeng. Kiyaghneghemllu seghuvulleqii taam seghleghqestem seghleghqellelghuteghllagi.
60001001	Ukut latat Peter-meng pinguut apostle-nganeng Jesus Christ-am, Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkiitnun yugnun aghulaquutestekat Pontus-mun, Galatia-mun, Cappadocia-mun, Asia-mun, Bithynia-munllu.
60001002	Neghighluku Kiyaghneghem Atam nakmikegkaqiisi ellminun yugulusi, Agleghnalghiimllu Taghnegham pelungighsaqaqiisi. Tawaten pikaaguk qaatkutesqellusi Jesus Christ-amun, ukmangiightesqellusillu aawakun. Kiyaghneghem kayusillghallu nekeggmellghallu wata nulalik elpesinun.
60001003	Usuqelteggu Kiyaghneq, Atanga Atanemta Jesus Christ-am! Apalluqluku nangllegtalleghllani allgenqigtestiinkut unguvaghtelleghmikun Jesus Christ-a tuqulleghmeng. Taam sighimallengesteghllagiinkut nalluneqniilngughmeng.
60001004	Enkaam utaqangwaaput piliisaghqaput quyastelleghllaget Kiyaghneghem aflengakegkangi yugminun. Aflengakngwii qilagmi elpesinun enkaam aghunaanghitut, naavnaanghitut, ghevnaanghitutlu.
60001005	Kiyaghneghem aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun paqniighsaghlleqiisi ugpeqilleghpesigun. Enkaam kenletghuutelleghmi aliighlleqaa yugulilleq yataghqegkaq elpesinun.
60001006	Taam quyamastiisi, qaywa maaten natengiighhaq allaaghhiinaghmeng seghleliighyaghngaaghpesi.
60001007	Tamaakut seghleliighet nanghiiqusiigut ipapighqennalusi ugpeqillepiilgutsi. Ugpeqilleghsi megnunaghataghalghiinguq gold-nneng. Gold-et nanghiiquneghmegteki keneghqun naafqegkayuguut. Paninang kenghet atuqaqiit pelungighnaluki. Tawateghpigaq ugpeqilleghsi nanghiiquyaghqaaguq. Aghuliiskan pelungilluni, allgeghlleqaghsi usuqelleq, nighughqelleq, quulvalleq Kiyaghneghmeng aliightekagu Jesus Christ-a.
60001008	Esghiigateghngaaghpesigu piniqaghsi, esghanghiteghngaaghpesigu maaten ugpeqaghsi. Enkaam quyaghllaguusi repall aapghwaaghpagningitaghsi angtalanga quyalleghpesi,
60001009	qayughllak allgeghtengngukesi yugulillgha unguvasighpesi. Taananguuq apallaa ugpeqilghiisi Christ-akun.
60001010	Neghighluku uuknaliqistet liigikngwaaghnaqegkaqaat taana yugulilleq. Uuknaliqutkegkaqaat tunusaq Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaa elpesinun.
60001011	Taghneghakek Christ-am uuknaliqistet ilungitnitkaaguk. Ungipaatekestaqaqii ikfiqelleghqaaneng Christ-am, quulvallengelleghqaghllaganengllu ikfiqellghan kingunganeng. Enkaam uuknaliqistet liigiknaqutkegkaqaat kinanguyaghqaatanga Christ-a, qakunllu tamaakut piyaghqaatangi.
60001012	Kiyaghneghem uuknaliqistet liigikestekaqii uuknaliqutkegkiit ellngitnun pingunghinniluki, iwernga elpesinun pinguniluki. Agleghnalghiik Taghneghak kayagtekaaguk qilagmeng. Ellngan aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun ungipaqilghiit Pinilghiineng Ungipaneng ungipaatkaqiisi tamaaken. Talwa yaqulget liigiksupigtekaqiit tamaakut.
60001013	Enkaangam umyugasi apeghiighsaghwaaghluki ayuqiteki salleghqamun. Umyugasi whateghlluwaaghuluki, sighimakngwaaghteggullu tunusaq yugulillengelleq Kiyaghneghem tuunyaghqaa Jesus Christ-a tagikan.
60001014	Qaatkullusi Kiyaghneghmun qayughllak avaqutaqiisi. Enkaam atuqegpenaki seghleghet piyukellesi atuqnguyaqesi. Tawatesaghtusi nallukutegpesineng naten Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtesqesullghan ayuqutanga.
60001015	Kiyaghneq nakmikestezi, pelungitutanganeng elpesillu pelungitek salleghpesigun tamaghhaakun.
60001016	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Pelungitek qayughllak whanga pelungitunga.”
60001017	Yughaneghpesini Kiyaghneghmun Atakniiqaghsi. Nanqigtaqaa atunengwaaq yuuk tamaghhaan salleghtulngatun. Enkaam talluqiteggu nunataamalusi nunami whani.
60001018	Liisimakaghsi sivunghani kiyaghtekaagusi sasiigpenasi katam sivuneghpesistun. Iwernga Kiyaghneghem itemutkaqiisi taagken sasiinghilngughmeng kiyaghtaalleghmeng. Tukfillghitiisi silver-meng nalighmeng gold-meng naavegkayugmeng,
60001019	iwernga tukfiqaqiisi megnunapiglleghhiimeng aawaneng Christ-am. Ellnga penniighaghaghtun ayuquq sallwhaaghhiilnguq.
60001020	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa Christ-a talwa sivungani nuna ulimallghilluku. Maaten kingulighni aghneghni aliightekaqaa elpesi apalluqlusi.
60001021	Christ-akun ugpeqaghsi Kiyaghneq. Ellngan unguvaghtekaqaa Christ-a tuqulleghmeng, quulvaghllakaqaallu. Tamaaken apalluqluku ugpeqilleghsi, sighimalleghsi Kiyaghneghmun ayuquq.
60001022	Qaatkutelleghqun ipapighqelleghmun pelungightekaqasi unguvasisi, enkaam piniqepiigasi ugpeqaalgutesi. Piniqutekestaghtek ilugpesineng qamaken.
60001023	Allgenqigtekaagusi. Unguvalleghraghaghsi tuqukayugmeng pingunghituq, iwernga tuqungigalngughmeng pinguuq. Allgenqigtekaagusi Kiyaghneghem akuzitangitgun, unguvalghiit, kenlengilnguut.
60001024	Akuzitni Igaqegkani igaqngaaq, “Qamaglluteng yuget vegaaghestun ayuqut, pinighnallghillu piitesighaghestun ayuqut. Vegaaghet palighaqut, piitesighaatlu ifkaghaqut,
60001025	iwernga akuzitangi Kiyaghneghem quunpekaghqaagut.” Taakusta akuzitet Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqegkangit elpesinun.
60002001	Enkaam taaqiteggu allaaghhiinaq seghleq atuqegkaghsi. Iqlengiqnanightek, piniiyuggnanightek, aqinananightek, seghlequughunnanighteklu.
60002002	Allgenghhaghhaat quunpeng mamaghyugaqut. Ellngistun quunpeng mamaghyugtek pelungilngughmeng taghnegham mamaaneng. Angtaniitesleqaa yugulilleghsi,
60002003	qayughllak naasiighaghsi Atanghem nangllegtallgha.
60002004	Tagitek Ataneghmun, ellnga unguvalghiinguuq uyghak. Yuget ighsakegkaat sasiinghilngughestun, iwernga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqaa megnunaghluku.
60002005	Elpesillu unguvalghiistun uyghagestun ayuqusi, enkaam Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham nekeftusiqlisi Kiyaghneghem mangteghaanun. Qepghaalleqaghsi aaftekaalusi priest-et tuunilghiit aghqutmeng Kiyaghneghmun. Ellngan tuguklighlleqii aghqutet Jesus Christ-akun.
60002006	Igaqegkaalghii Akuzitni Igaqegkani whaten, “Zion-mi nekegtaqaqa megnunalghii uyghak; kangigham uyghakaa nakmikegkaqa. Kina alngunak ugpeqilghii ellnganeng kayngumiqnaanghituq.”
60002007	Taana uyghak megnunapigtuq elpesinun ugpeqilghiinun. Iwernga ugpeqingigalngughnun whatelnguuguq, “Taana uyghak mangteghangllaghtet ighsakegkaat, kangigham uyghakaaghsimakanga.”
60002008	Amalleqa, “Taam uyghagem yuget naagtestaqii, iqustaqiillu.” Naagtaqut qayughllak qaatkusigalnguut Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganun. Tawaten Kiyaghneghem uspeqegkaqii.
60002009	Iwernga elpesi yugni nakmikegkaagusi, umiilgem priest-ekiisi, aaftekaagusi yugni, Kiyaghneghem ellngan katam yukiisi. Nakmikegkaagusi aapghesqelluki allaaghlluwhaat aneghneghqillghi Kiyaghneghem, tagsighikaq elpesineng mamlegllagmeng ellmi katam allaaghlluwhaghmun nighugminun.
60002010	Sivunghani Kiyaghneghem yukenghisaghiisi, iwernga maaten yuliisimiisi. Sivunghani nalluksaghaghsi Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallgha, iwernga maaten allgeghsimaaghsi nangllegtallgha.
60002011	Ilakumtaamni, nunataagusillu allaneghtaagusillu nunami whani. Enkaam kayemamsi ilapgategpenasi yugusighpesi piyukellghanun, qayughllak yugusim piyukellghan pilluwaangwaa unguvasighsi.
60002012	Pinitun kiyaghtek akulngitni ugpeqaanghilnguut, luuraq ellngita seghletun pistenguninayukangisi. Esghaqumegteki aneghneghqillesi usuqelleqaat Kiyaghneq Aghneghani Christ-am tagillghan.
60002013	Ataneq apalluqluku malighqutaqlusi kiyaghtek tamaghhiitnun kavemem igleghutistengitnun. Qaatkullusi umiilegmun; ellnganguuq angelleghpigaq igleghutista.
60002014	Qaatkellukillu igleghutistet; umiilgem aghyuughiyaqlegughtestaqii seghletun pistenun, usuqiyaqleghughtestekaqiillu pinitun pistenun.
60002015	Kiyaghneghem piyukelqaa pinitun pilleghpesigun nepiightesqelluki nalluuqat temngitwhameng akuzillghiit.
60002016	Kiyaghtek itemngalghiistun iwernga itemngalleghsi atuqefqaan seghleghmun. Kiyaghtek qepghaghtelaaghulusi Kiyaghneghmun.
60002017	Quulvaghluku tamaghhaa yuuk, piniqluki ugpeqaalgutesi, alikluku Kiyaghneq, quulvaghlukullu umiilek.
60002018	Elpesi qepghaghtelaaghni qaatkutek piliitestegpesinun siivakellelighlusi. Qaatkegpenaki nangllegtaghhiinaatlu, umyugaqegtaghhiinaatlu, iwernga qaatkaqitekillu amyuqetalghiit.
60002019	Kiyaghneghem efquqaqiisi sumeghmikneghpesigu ellnga ikfiqngulusi sameng sapiglleghhiistun.
60002020	Iwernga suflughsimakufsiki qevutqullesi, seghletun pillesi apalluqluki, kitum alngunak usuqnaanghitiisi. Naqamenraq suflughsimakufsigu ikfiqelleq pinitun pilleghpesinun, taawa Kiyaghneghem efquqelleqiisi.
60002021	Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiisi suflughtesqelluki ikfiqellghet qayughllak Christ-am ikfiqutkegkaqiisi. Ikfiqellgha usputaaguq elpesinun maligtesqelluku.
60002022	Ellnga seghleghqigatuq, iqlengiqigatuq.
60002023	Seghlequullengaqngami akisimangitii. Ikfiqaqngami akeqsagsimangitii. Itupill neghyukutkaaguq ellmineng nanqigtikayugmun elqughaghlluku.
60002024	Christ-am ellmineng katam aglaatkaqii seghleghqelleput yugusighmikluki qaquuramun. Tawaten pikaaguq tuqungasqelluta seghleghqelleghmun unguvasqelluta elqughutngalleghmun. Kiitiqullghakun naallghutkaagusi.
60002025	Penniighestun aghulaqaatalghiistun ayuqsaghtusi. Iwernga maaten uteghniimaasi Penniighniightemun Kelengakistenganun unguvasighpesi.
60003001	Elpesi ugiiqani, kiyaghtek qaatkullusi ugigpesinun. Ilangi nuliilget ugpeqingigalnguugut Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Iwernga tawaten kiyaghtelleghpesigun ugpeqaaghhnayukata sameng pinghiteghngaaghpesiki,
60003002	qayughllak esghapakangat pelungitun kiyaghtaalleghsi, alikilleghsillu Kiyaghneghmun.
60003003	Nuyaqegsallghem, ullngaqellghem gold-meng, aarrallghem pinighnaghsiigatii ilusi.
60003004	Itupill pinighnaghtek ilugpesigun qusevegllelighlusi, nekeggmellelighlusillu. Tawatelnguq pinighnalleq quunpekaghqaaguq, megnunaghllagtuq Kiyaghneghmun.
60003005	Sivunghani agani, aghnat maniguutkayuget Kiyaghneghmun pinighnaghsaqayuguut ilumegteggun, qusevegllelighluteng, nekeggmellelighlutengllu. Neghyukegkaqaat Kiyaghneq, qaatkegkaqiitlu ugiteng.
60003006	Sarah tawatetkaaguq! Qaatkegkaqaa Abraham, atanqennikaqaallu. Enkaam elpesi panikiisi pinitun pimakufsi, alingigalkufsillu sameng alngunak.
60003007	Elpesillu nulightuqani kiyaghuteki nuliisi liigikluki natetulangi qayughllak kayaataghaghtut elpesineng. Quulvaghluki nuliisi qayughllak atunem allgeghsaghqaqaghsi Kiyaghneghem tunusaa kenlengilnguq unguvalleq. Tawaten pikufsi saam alngunak pillgilliqnaanghitii yughallesi.
60003008	Taaqnighnaqanka sameng pillghenka whaten: qamagllusi ataasistun sumeghnelgutek, aqniqututek, piniqutek anglegutkullghiistun, nangllekututek, qusevgututek.
60003009	Yuget seghletun pikangisi akitegpenaki seghletun, nalighmeng seghlequuqangisi akitegpenaki seghlequughmeng. Itupill akiteki quyastelleghmeng, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiisi tawaten pisqellusi elpesinun allgeghtesqelluku quyastilleni.
60003010	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghistun, “Kina alngunak quyangalghiimeng unguvallelguyukumi, quyamalghiinengllu aghnelguyukumi, seghletun akuzineghmeng taaqli, iqlengiqnanighlillu.
60003011	Seghletun pinanighluni, pinitun pili. Nekeggmennaqlunillu kiyaghlli,
60003012	qayughllak Atanghem esghapawii elqughutngalghiit, nagataqiillu yughallghit. Iwernga Atanghem tengvimun ayuqii seghletun pilghiit.”
60003013	Kitumngam aqnighlleqisi sagiqngukufsi pinitun pilleghmun?
60003014	Iwernga ikfiqeghngaaghpesi pinitun pilleghmun quyastellengellequsi. Alikegpenaki yuget, talwa sumeghyaligpenasi.
60003015	Iwernga ilugpesigun manigughaqiteggu Christ-a Atanghuluku. Kitum alngunak aaptekangisi sighimalleghmeng ilugpesinilngughmeng quunpeng liigiknatun kiimsighyaqleggiinaawaqiteki.
60003016	Iwernga kiimsighaqiteki qusevegllelighlusi, siivakillelighlusi. Seghleghqenghilkufsi umyugasi seghleghninaanghitut. Enkaam yuget seghlequuqangisi pinitun kiyaghtelleghpesineng Christ-akun, kaynguyugllequt tawaten akuzilleghmeggneng.
60003017	Iwernga Kiyaghneghem piyukelqengngukagu ikfiqesqellusi pinitun pilleghmun, taana itagnaghataghaghtuq ikfiqelleghqaghpesineng seghletun pilleghmun.
60003018	Christ-a tuqukaaguq ataasighhaghmeng apalluqluki yuget seghleghqellghit. Seghleghqumangituq, iwernga tuqumatkegkaqii seghleghqestet taginnaluki Kiyaghneghmun. Yugusii tuqutkaaguq iwernga taghneghakek unguvaghtekaaguk.
60003019	Enkaam taghneghaaluni ungipaghyaghtuqaaguq taghneghanun anusimingllaghvigmelngughnun.
60003020	Taakunguut qaatkusimangilnguut Kiyaghneghmun neghighluku Noah kiyaghtengnguluku. Noah ark-engllaaluku Kiyaghneq qelaneghpenani utaqiikaaguq qaatkusimangilngughnun avuteghqesqelluki. Pingayuneng inglullgiinaat yuget iteghluteng ark-mun yugulikaagut meghqun.
60003021	Taananguuq meq usputaq paaptaayelleghmun yugulighilghii elpesineng maaten unguvaghtellghakun Jesus Christ. Paaptaayelleq iqangiisiinghituq yugusimun. Itupill paaptaayelleghqun akeqiikut Kiyaghneghmun umyugamnneng seghleghningilngughmeng.
60003022	Jesus Christ-a qilagmun mayughluni aghenqigneghanituq Kiyaghneghem. Enkaam igleghutngwii qamaglluki yaqulget, qilagem igleghutistengi, aghtughyaghqaanghillghetlu.
60004001	Ikfiqegkaatanganeng Christ-a yugusimikun elpesillu yataaghqitek ikfiqsaghqaalusi Christ-atun, qayughllak kina alngunak yugusimikun ikfiqelghii seghleghqesugnaniimaaq.
60004002	Enkaam whaken kenlekluku unguvalleghpesi tagtalngatun malighqutaqegpenasi yugusighpesi piyukellghanun, iwernga atuqiteggu Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha.
60004003	Sivunghani seghletun kiyaghtelqinaghtusi qaatkusigalngughestun Kiyaghneghmun. Whaten pikaagusi: seghleghnapiglluku atuqutkayuguyaghtusi, qiliiqutaqlusi, suumuutaqlusi, qerngughutullusi uglapestaaghet seghleghet atuqaqluki, neqenghaghqellusi, meghuuteghllaglusi enkaam alngunaseghaghllagughtaqusi, maniguqaqasillu iinghutkat kiyaghnengllaqat.
60004004	Kiyaghhnanilghiisi ugpeqaanghilngughestun, liigikigataat sangan ilannaniitsi seghletun kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun, enkaam seghlequughaqiisi.
60004005	Iwernga salleteng ellmeggneng katam apeghyaghqaqiit Kiyaghneghmun, nanqigtiyaqleggiinaghmun unguvalghiinengllu tuqukanengllu.
60004006	Tamaaken apalluqluku Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqegkaagut talwa tuqukanun. Tamaakut nanqigtekaagut unguvanguluteng nunami whani. Iwernga Pinilghiit Ungipat ungipaqegkaagut ellngitnun, enkaam taghneghiit kiyaghsaghqaaghllequt katam Kiyaghneghem kiyaghtellghatun.
60004007	Sangwaa qamaglluni kenletghuusaghtughtuq. Tamaaken apalluqluku whateghlluwaaghuluki umyugasi, nuqenneghtulusi yughaghyaghqaalusi yughalleghqaghpesistun.
60004008	Megnunalleghpigaaguq una: piniqutepiiglusi qayughllak piniqellghem seghevutestaqii seghleghqellelghuteghllaget.
60004009	Upughanghulusi qikeghqufqaafsi.
60004010	Tamaghhaghpesi allgeghutkaagusi tunusaneng atughqameng ilagpesinun. Allaaghhiinaat tunusat Kiyaghneghmeng pisi atuqaqiteki pinitun.
60004011	Tunusalget akuzimun akuzilit Kiyaghneghem akuzitanganeng. Tunusalget qepghhaatimun qepghhaatilit iknaqellelighluteng Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaaneng. Enkaam salleghpesigun tamaghhaakun Kiyaghneq usuqellengellequq Jesus Christ-akun. Ellngan pikaak nighughqelleqlu aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Amen.
60004012	Piniqegkamni ilakumtaamni, quupkaghpenasi seghleliighrukutaaghllaget kaaskangisi nanghiighsaghaghnalusi. Nanghiighsaghallesi allakaayagunghitut.
60004013	Itupill quyatek ilallghiisi Christ-am ikfiqellghanun quyangaghllagesqellusi nighughqellgha aliightekan.
60004014	Seghlequuqangisi apalluqluku maligsaaghtengumalleghsi Christ-amun, quyastellelguusi qayughllak Kiyaghneghem Taghneghakek nighughqengngalghiik kiyaghtengnguuk elpesini.
60004015	Ikfiqsaghqaakufsi, ikfiqegpenasi yugtaghtengulusi, teglegniightengulusi, seghletun pistengulusi, nalighmeng yanutqustengulusi.
60004016	Naqamenraq ikfiqsaghqaakufsi Christian-ngutegpesineng, kaynguyugpenasi iwernga usuqnakesi Kiyaghneq atiqangisi Christ-am aatghaneng.
60004017	Nanqigtilleghqaq kaatuq, sivukluni piinlighllequq Kiyaghneghem nengllugutangakun. Piinlighnaqngukan whangkutgun, salleqan'ngam qaatkusigalnguut Kiyaghneghem Pinilghiinun Ungipaanun?
60004018	Akuzitet Igaqegkat pillghistun, “Elqughutngalghiit pegnem yugulikaakuyeng, avelghasingwaalghiit Kiyaghneghmeng, seghleghqestetlu naten'ngam yugulillengelleqat?”
60004019	Enkaangam tamaakut ikfiqelghiit apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha, elqughulluteng pillequt, neghyukulleqiitlu unguvasiteng ataasiighmelngughmun Ulimaghistemun.
60005001	Sameng piighsuganka Elder-et yughaghvigpesinilnguut. Whangallu Elder-nguunga, esghapakaqegkegkallu Christ-am ikfiqellgha, ilasaghqaagungallu Christ-am aangelleghllaganun Kiyaghneghem aliightekagu.
60005002	Enkaam qeleghyugamsi Elder-eni whaten: Penniighniightengutek Kiyaghneghem penniighitnun; neghyukutkaqii elpesinun aflengakesqelluki. Aflengakiteki qayughllak aflengaksukesi, nakaan qayughllak piyaghqaategpesineng. Kiyaghneghem tawaten pisqesugiisi. Aflengakiteki nakaan akileghtuusangepigesnaghnalusi, iwernga qayughllak kayusighyugukesi.
60005003	Agghitkaqegpenaki aflengakegkasi, iwernga maligsugnaghqitek ellngitnun.
60005004	Enkaam Igleghutistengat Penniighniightet tagikan allgeghullequsi pinighnapiglleghhiimeng qaghpameng qelmeghiisaghqaanghilngughmeng.
60005005	Tawateghpigaq elpesi uyuqlighni malighqutaqlusi siivanlleghnun. Qamagllusi qusevgutullusi qayughllak Akuzitet Igaqegkat pikaagut, “Kiyaghneghem kipullegmun ayuqii qukaayugneghet, iwernga kayusighaqii qusevegngalghiit.”
60005006	Enkaangam elpesineng katam qusevegngatek Kiyaghneghmun aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagmun. Taagken quulvaghlleqiisi nakmikegkamini aghneghmi.
60005007	Qamaglluki sumeghyalitkegkasi pegteki ellnganun, qayughllak aflengakngwiisi.
60005008	Liisimalusi, kelengalusi. Anguyagsi Tughneghaq igleghanguuq uginilghiitun lion-etun, ivaghiiquq kina naafqennaluku.
60005009	Ayaklighteggu Tughneghaq ayepsugilngughqun ugpeqilleghpesigun, liisimakluki ugpeqaalgutesi nunataghhaanilnguut tawaten ellngitlu ikfiqnguut.
60005010	Iwernga natengiighhaq ikfiqelleghpesi kingunganeng, Kiyaghneghem piniqingaghllagem tamanganun, ellngan katam nallghusaalleqiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng. Ugpeqillesi iknaqughsaghlleqii, ayepsugighsaghlleqii, aghuliilkaaghtesleqii. Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqiisi Christ-akun ilatesqellusi kenlengilngughmun aangelleghllagminun.
60005011	Qamaglluku aghtughyaghqaanghilleq ellngan pikaa quunperugllak! Amen.
60005012	Silas ataasiighmelnguuguq ugpeqaalguta; igaataqaanga takestaaghhaghteggun latamkun elpesinun. Latanka Kiyaghneghem piniqellepiiganeng ayuqut. Ungipaatamsillu kayemamsillu kiyaghtekestiisqellusi piniqellghani.
60005013	Ugpeqaalgutesi Babylon-melnguut, elpesistun Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaqii. Ellngitallu, ighneghmallu Mark-em piniqiisinguq.
60005014	Quyakutaqitek naalleghqun Christ-am piniqellghakun. Nekeggmelleq tamaghhaghpesinilli Christ-am piliitkiitni.
61001001	Ukut latat Simon Peter-meng pinguut. Qepghaghtekaangallu, apostle-kaangallu Jesus Christ-am. Lataaqamsi qamagllusi allgeghutkani ugpeqilleghmeng whangkutestun ayuqelghiimeng. Allgeghtekaqaghput ugpeqilleghput elqughutngallghakun Jesus Christ-am, Kiyaghneqegkefutlu Yugulighistekegkefutlu.
61001002	Piniqellghenkuk nekeggmellghenkuk wata nulalik elpesini liisimakelleghpesigun Kiyaghneqlu Jesus-lu Ataneghput.
61001003	Jesus aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq Kiyaghneghmeng. Taaggun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun tuunegkaqiinkut sameng tamaghhaaneng aklukegkamnneng kiyaghtesqelluta Kiyaghneghyuneghtuluta. Tamaakut allgeghtekaqaput qayughllak liisimakegkefut Jesus. Tuqlughiinkut ilatesqelluta quulvalleghminunllu pinilleghminunllu.
61001004	Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun, Jesus-em tuunegkaqiinkut akequsamineng megnunapiglleghhiinengllu pivagnapiglleghhiinengllu. Tamaagun akequsatgun Kiyaghneghem ilatesleqiisi nangaghneghminun. Taagken anagyaqlegughlleqasi seghleghem piyukellghi nunamelnguut naafqiiyaqleget elpesineng.
61001005	Kiyaghneghem nangaghnelitkaqutanganeng elpesi, taakunginaghhaagneng pinaqellghaghsi qamaglluku ilateki ukut ugpeqilleghpesinun: ugpeqilleghpesinun ilateggu pinilleq, pinilleghpesinun ilateggu liisimalleq,
61001006	liisimalleghpesinun ilateggu nuqetutilleq, nuqetutilleghpesinun ilateggu aghuliilkaamalleq, aghuliilkaamelleghpesinun ilateggu Kiyaghneghyuneghtulleq,
61001007	Kiyaghneghyuneghtulleghpesinun ilateggu nangllekututelleq ugpeqaalgutegpesinun, nangllekututelleghpesinun ilateggu piniqelleq.
61001008	Tamaakut atuqngukufsiki, nulastekufsikillu kayusiilleqiisi atughqaalusillu kayutkaghqaalusillu liisimakelleghpesigun Ataneghput Jesus Christ-a.
61001009	Iwernga kitum alngunak atuqenghilkumiki tamaakut, amugtapigtuq enkaam esghaatepagningituq. Puygukaqaallu Kiyaghneghem ukmangiqaqegkanga seghleghqelleqsaqanganeng.
61001010	Enkaangam ugpeqaalgutemni, nalluneqniighwaaghteggu Kiyaghneghem tuqluqaqiisillu nakmikegkaqiisillu. Tawaten pikufsi taawa iqiteqaghhnaanghitusi Christ-ameng.
61001011	Enkaam Kiyaghneghem quyakusiqeghllaglusi iteghtesleqiisi kenlengilngughmun Ataneghpagullghanun Atanemtallu Yugulighistemtallu Jesus Christ-am.
61001012	Qaywa liisimakeghngaaghpesiki taakut ipapillghet, sagiqutngughngaaghpesikillu qaatkennaluki, iiwleng neqangughlleqamsi taakuneng ipapilleghneng elpesinun apeghtuutkamnneng.
61001013	Sumemni itagnaghtuq neqangughtaataqumsi tamaakuneng unguvangulunga.
61001014	Liisimakaqa tuquyaghtughtunga qayughllak Atanemta Jesus Christ-am ungipaatekestaqaqaanga.
61001015	Pinaqelqa qamaglluku apeghtughamsi tamaaken, enkaam tuqulleghma kingunganeng neqaataqelleqasi.
61001016	Atuqumangitaput peghqiniqutngwaaghluki ungipaghaatengllaqat aapghaqngamtekek elpesinun aghtughyaghqaanghillghallu tagillghallu Atanemta Jesus Christ-am. Whangkuta katam iyeghlluwaamnneng esghaqaqaghput ellngan aangelleghllaga.
61001017	Jesus-em allgeghtaqngagu quulvalleqlu nighughqelleqlu Kiyaghneghmeng Atameng, nagaquqaqaa menga Kiyaghneghem, Qulighpigaalghii Nighughqengngaghllak. Atam pikaqaa, “Unanguuq piniqepigtekegka Ighneqa, efquqepigtekegka.”
61001018	Whangkuta whangkunneng katam nagatkaqaghput ma qilagmeng Jesus-metaqngamta agleghnalghiimi naayghami.
61001019	Tamaaken apalluqluku whangkunni nalluneqnaqraggiitut uuknaliqistet uuknaliqutkegkiit ipangutangi. Elpesinun pinighllequt sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaqufsiki uuknaliqutkegkiit, qayughllak kenelghutam kuukgutellghatun ayuqut mamlegmun. Tawatetekestaghtek kenlanga Christ-am tagilleghqaan aghneghanun. Taagken nighuga kuukgullequq ilugpesinun, unaangum ighaleqetaaghatun ayuqluni.
61001020	Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi una: Kitum alngunak ellmineng katam liigikepagningitii sameng pisiitangi uuknaliqellghet Akuzitnilnguut Igaqegkani.
61001021	Uuknaliqistet nakmikumangitiit uuknaliqutkesaghqateng. Itupill Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham uuknaliqistet akuzitelitkaqii akuzisqelluki Kiyaghneghtameng.
61002001	Sivunghani agani uuknaliqistesiighwaaghet akulngitnisaghtut Kiyaghneghem yugitni, katam apeghtughistesighwaaghet akulegpesinillequt. Nalluneghpesini apeghtughlleqiisi iqlengameng naafqennaluki ugpeqillesi. Qaywa Christ-am Piliitestengita tukfiqaqeghngiisteng itemunnaluki seghleghqellghitneng, paninang piknanighlleqaat. Enkaam nuuskagan ellmeggneng naafqeslequt.
61002002	Yulghutet maligullequt apeghtughistesighwaaghnun kayngunalghinun kiyaghtaallghitnun. Enkaam yuget seghlequughlleqiit apeghtuusapiget atuput.
61002003	Pakigtelleghmegteggun apeghtughistesighwaaghet aklungighiyugllequt elpesineng. Enkaam apeghlleqiit apeghtuusangllaqateng maningnaluteng elpesineng. Ima neghighhaaneng Kiyaghneq Nanqigtistengatlu Naafqiistengatlu qaviigatuq aghyuughyaqlegughllukillu ayuqii.
61002004	Kiyaghneghem aghyuughumanginneghitii yaqulget seghleghqaqngata, iwernga miluutkaqii hell-mun. Tawani pisaghtiighllagmi qiipraghusighngaat, utaqiilghiit Aghneghanun Nanqigtillghem.
61002005	Neghighluku Noah kiyaghtengnguluku, Kiyaghneghem aghyuughumanginneghitii yuget avelghasingwaaghikat ellmineng, enkaam ulevestekaqaa nuna. Iwernga yugulikaqaa Noah, ilangillu maaghraghvinlek yuget. (Noah ungipaghtengukaaguq elqughutngalghiimun kiyaghtaalleghmun.)
61002006	Kiyaghneghem aghyuuqaqaaklu neghllagek Sodom-enkuk Gomorrah-nkuk. Naafqegkaqaak keneghqun kenlanga ashes-ngughtellghegkenun. Enkaam usputaaghtekaqaak sayaghqaatangi yuget avelghasighwaaghikat Kiyaghneghmeng.
61002007	Lot elqughutngalghiinguyaghtuq yuuk kiyaghtekaq akulngitni tamaakut seghleghet yuget. Aghhutanga tamaghhaan seghleliighutkeghllakaqii unguvasigmikun esghapagluki, nagalluki seghletun kiyaghtaallghit, nuqetegpenatengllu sex-ellghit. Enkaam Atanghem yugulikaqaa.
61002009	Taawa liitaghput, Ataneq liisimakuq naten yugulilleghqameng elqughutngalghiit yuget, nanghiighsaghallengenghata. Kelengakngwiillu seghleghet yuget aghyuullengelleghmelnguut, utaqiimaluki Aghneghanun Nanqigtillghem.
61002010	Taana aghyuulleq kiyang tamaakunun ayuquq maligullghiinun yugusimeng seghletun piyukelleghllagitnun, qaatkusugigalngughnunllu kitumun alngunak. Tamaakut apeghtughistesighwaaghet tetugigatutlu ellminguyugneghuutlu. Alingegpenateng seghlequughaqiit nighugrakegtat.
61002011	Yaqulget iknaqataghaghtut, aghtughyaghqaanghitaghaghtut taakuneng nighugrakegtaneng, paninang sivungani Atanghem anaggusimaninaanghitiit nighugrakegtat.
61002012	Iwernga tamaakut apeghtughistesighwaaghet seghlequughaqiit sangwaat liigikegpenaki. Teghikusastun sumeghtaghaghpagningilnguugut. Tuqutellengellequt teghikusastun allgeghluteng teghigtughluki tuqutkat.
61002013	Uglalghiit ikfiqestaqiit enkaam Kiyaghneghem ikfiqesleqii. Talwa aghneraaghinaghmi meghuuteghllagaqut, yugusimengllu seghleghet piyukellghit atuqaqiit. Kayngusaghaateghllagaqut neqenghaghqelgusiimalusi, enkaam akulegpesini nukeggnaghqegkastunllu ellmiigutkastunllu ayuqut.
61002014	Esghaneghmegteki aghnat qiliiqaqiit. Seghleghqesuneghtuut iwernga seghleghqellelghutangita kepsughsigatngwaaghiit. Manighaqiit yuget puughhneqegtat seghleghqesugesqelluki, pakignepigtutlu. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem aghyuughyaghqaqii!
61002015	Tamaakut apeghtughistesighwaaghet ugpeqnaniqaqiit apeghtuusapiget. Enkaam aghulaqegkaagut Balaam-em pillghatun pinaluteng. (Ighneqsaqanga Beor-em.) Quyaaquq yuget akileghtunghatni seghletun pisqelluku.
61002016	Iwernga donkey-m akuzipagningilnguum, yugem mengakun ineghtekaqaa Balaam. Enkaam aghuliightekaqaa uuknaliqista sumeghneghiilliqellghaneng.
61002017	Tamaakut apeghtughistesighwaaghet paatqastun sengngustun ayuqut, qilagwaaghestunllu ayuqut anuqeghllagem tengtekangi. Kiyaghneghem nekaghqangllaatkaqii pisaghtiighllagmi.
61002018	Aghsaaghmikameng aangaayugtaqut temngitwhameng akuzitkelluteng. Piiqut itagnaghniluku malighqutaqelleghqaq seghleghnun yugusim piyukellghanun. Enkaam yuget taaqaqutlu tawaten kiyaghtelleghmeggneng, manighaqiit tawaten pinqigtesqelluki.
61002019	Apeghtughistesighwaaghet ungipaatkaqiit tamaakut yuget itemnganiluki samun alngunak piyukellghitnun, ellngit katam itemngangunghiteghngaaghmeng. Qepghaghtelaaghuut seghleghqelleghmeggnun enkaam seghleghqellghita naafqesaqlegwii. Yuuk qepghaghtelaaghuuq alngunak samun igleqataqilghiimeng ellminun.
61002020	Yuget liitaqngamegteggu Ataneghputlu Yugulighistevutlu Jesus Christ-a anagyaghqaqaat nukeggnaa nunam. Iwernga uteghninqigtekumeng seghletun kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun aaghqutaqesimakumengllu tamaakunun, taawa kiyaghtaallghit seghleghataghaayaghqaagut piyuwhaalleghmeggneng.
61002021	Tamaakut yuget, liitngwaaghluku agleghnalghii qelghusaq allgeghtekaghteng, tunutkaqaat. Itaghnaghataghaghnayaghtut liisimangisaqumegteggu elqughutngalghii kiyaghtaalleq.
61002022	Tawaten aneghtellghita ipangughtestaat yuget pillghat, “Qikmim uteghfikaqaa mighyaqani, kurugaqlu ughvughqegkaq aglanqiglluni ugharramun mingughunneqigtaquq.”
61003001	Ilakumtaamni, ukut alghiitkii latalleghma elpesinun. Tamaghhaagkenkun latalleghma neqangughtesnaqutkamsi liisimakegkaghpesineng. Sumeghtaghiisqesugamsi tamaakuneng ipapighqellusi.
61003002	Elpesinun neqamikesuganka agleghnalghiit uuknaliqistet uuknaliqutkegkiit. Neqamikesugaqallu qelghusaq Atanemta Yugulighistem aapqaa apostle-egpesigun.
61003003	Liigikngwaaghyaghqaqaghsi una: kingulighni aghneghni legasiighwaghtelguyaghqaaguq; tamaakunguut malighqutaqngalghiit seghleghnun piyukegkameggnun. Legasiighwaatkelleqaat Kiyaghneghem akequsaa,
61003004	whaten pillequt, “Jesus akeqikaaguq taginqiglleqniluni. Naagu? Ima sivuneput tuqulaghaatellghitneng, paninang sangwaa qamaglluni almesiqaqaa nunam piinlillghaneng.”
61003005	Nakmiiqaagut avelghasingwaaghnaluku una ipapilleq: neghighluku Kiyaghneghem akuzitmikun ulimakaqaa qilaga, ulimakaqaallu nuna meghmeng, meghqunllu.
61003006	Taagken Kiyaghneghem meghmeng ulevesluku nuna naafqegkaqaa.
61003007	Iwernga taaggun akuzitkun Kiyaghneghem aflengakaqii qilagallu nunallu naafqesaghqaaluki keneghqun. Aflengaknguut kenlanga aghneghanun nanqigtillghem. Tawanillu aghneghmi naafqelleqii yuget avelghasingwaaghikat ellmineng.
61003008	Ilakumtaamni, puygugpenaan una! Ataneghmi aghneq ataasiq thousand ayumiqullghestun ayuquq, thousand ayumiqullghet ataasitun aghneghtun ayuquq.
61003009	Ataneq egnaanginneghituq akequsani piyaghqaaluku, ilangita yuget sumeghtaghallghistun. Yeghlegi nekeggmetutaqiisi qayughllak kina alngunak iflayugunghilkanga. Itupill tamaghhaan yuuk avuteghqesqesugaa seghleghqellghitneng.
61003010	Iwernga Aghnegha Atanghem tagillequq teglegniightetun. Tawani Aghneghmi qilaga aviighusaghqaaguq eftughuuteghllagmeng. Sangwaat qamaglluteng qilagamelnguut kenghem ughuglleqii. Qamagllutengllu nunamelnguut paneghllequt.
61003011	Qamaglluteng tamaakut ughugyaghqaatangitneng, elpesi yugni natelnguunaqetsi? Kiyaghtaallesi pelungillit, Kiyaghneghmunllu ayuqlit,
61003012	utaqiimalusi Aghneghanun Kiyaghneghem. Pinaqellghaghsi qamaglluku pinitun pitek aghneq tagiragkiighesqelluku. Tawani aghneghmi kenghem naafqelleqaa qilaga, maatneghemllu ughuglleqii sangwaat qamaglluki qilagamelnguut.
61003013	Iwernga whangkuta utaqiinguukut Kiyaghneghem akequsaqegkaaneng. Pikaaguq nutaghameng qilagangllaghlleqniluni nutaghamengllu nunangllaghlleqniluni. Tawani elqughutngalghiinginaat kiyaghllequt.
61003014	Enkaangam ilakumtaamni, utaqiimalusi tawavek Aghneghmun pinaqellghaghsi qamaglluku pelungiteklu afkuyiiteklu Kiyaghneghem esghaamallghani. Nekeggmeteklu Ellngani.
61003015	Sumeghmikiteggu Atanemta nuqetutillgha elpesineng yugulillengesqeqaghllusi. Piniqegkamta ugpeqaalgutemta Paul-em aapqaqii taakut ataasit lataaqngamisi peghqinellelighluni Kiyaghneghtameng.
61003016	Latatkegkaqii tamaakut qamaglluki latamikun. Nalighneghi Paul-em latangan liigikneghlluguut. Yuget liigikellepagilnguut, ugpeqillepagilnguut allangughtaqiit sameng pisiitangi latanganilnguut. Tawatenllu piiqiit ilangi Akuzitet Igaqegkat enkaam naafqengnguut ellmeggneng.
61003017	Ilakumtaamni, liisimakutegpesineng saaqutangi qaatkusigalnguut liilightuusanun, kelengatek. Aghulaqutestegpenasi anaggutngalghiinun apeghtughillghitnun. Tawaten pikufsi malghuklinaanghitusi ugpeqegkaghpesineng.
61003018	Iwernga nagneghtek wataqaaghaq liisimakluku Jesus Christ-a, Ataneghput, Yugulighistevut, nagneghteklu wataqaaghaq piniqellghakun. Enkaam Christ-a usuqelteggu, quulvaalteggu maaten, quunperugllaklu! Amen.
62001001	Taana piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng ayuqelghii: nagaquqaghput, esghaqaghput whangkuta katam iyemnneng, esghapakaghput, saaftekaghput iiggemnneng, taananguuq Akuzin unguvalleq.
62001002	Taana unguvalleq esghaghyaghqaaghtestaqngan esghaqaqaghput; enkaam whaa aapghaghputlu ungipaqaghputlu elpesinun taana kenlengilnguq unguvalleq Atamesalghii, esghaghtestekaq whangkunnun.
62001003	Aapghaghput elpesinun sangwaa esghaqaghputlu nagatkaghputlu ilatesqellusi whangkunnun, ilatngallemnnunllu Atamun, Ighneghanunllu Jesus Christ-amun.
62001004	Latatkaput tamaakut quyalleghput iighwiisqelluku.
62001005	Una ungipaq nagaquqaghput Ighneghaneng Kiyaghneghem apeghnaqaghput elpesinun, Kiyaghneghnguq nighuguuq, mamlelleqraggiituq.
62001006	Iwernga ilatnganikumta ellnganun naqam paninang mamlegmi kiyaghtengnguluta, iqlengiqnguukut, atuqigataghputlu ipapighqelleq.
62001007	Iwernga nighugmi kiyaghtekumta ellngan nighugmetellghatun taawa ilatngaakut ilamnnun, aawanllu Jesus-em, Kiyaghneghem Ighneghan, ukmangiiwiinkut tamaghhaaneng seghleghqellemnneng.
62001008	Seghleghqellghinnikumta puughtengnguukut whangkunneng katam, ipapighqellghitukutlu.
62001009	Iwernga aapqumteki seghleghqelleput Kiyaghneghmun, seghevusaghqaqiinkut seghleghqellemnneng, ukmangighyaghqaqiinkutlu tamaghhaaneng anaggutaghallemnneng qayughllak ataasiighmetuqlu elqughullunillu ayuqelghiinguuq.
62001010	Seghleghqigannikumta, Kiyaghneq iqlengiqestengughlleqaghput, akuzitangillu atuqngunghitaput.
62002001	Taghnughhaghhamni, whaten latangwaamsi seghleghqefqaafsi pisqellusi. Iwernga kina alngunak seghleghqegkan Jesus Christ-am elqughutngalghiim maniguututaqiinkut Atamun.
62002002	Ellnganguuq iqitusiq seghleghqellemnnun, whangkunginaamta seghleghqellemnnun pingunghituq, iwernga tamaghaghllagan yugem seghleghqellghanun ayuquq.
62002003	Esgha whaten ipapighqutkesaghqaghput liisimakilleghput Kiyaghneghmeng, qaatkellemteggun qelghusii.
62002004	Kina whaten pilghii, “Liisimakaqa Kiyaghneq,” naqam qaatkegpenaki qelghusii, iqlengiqestenguuq, nallukaallu ipapighqelleq.
62002005	Iwernga kitum alngunak qaatkegkumiki Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, piniqillgha Kiyaghneghmun ipapestaaq iighwiqaaguq, tawaten ipapighqutkesaghqaqaghput ellnganitulvut.
62002006	Kina alngunak pilghii kiyaghtengnguniluni ellngani, kiyaghsaghqaaguq Jesus Christ-am pillghatun.
62002007	Piniqegkamni, una qelghusaq latatkegkegka elpesinun nutaghaanghituq. Taananguuq neghightaq qelghusaq nagatkayugsi ima piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng, taana ungipaaguq nagatkayugsi.
62002008	Iwernga una qelghusaq latatkegkegka elpesinun nutaghaaguq. Taam ipapighqellgha esghaghluni ayuquq Christ-akunllu elpesigunllu qayughllak mamlek aga naghughtengnguuq, nighupik kuukgutnguuq.
62002009	Kina alngunak pilghii nighugmenniluni naqam ugumikluku ugpeqaalgutni, paninang mamlegmelnguuguq.
62002010	Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu ugpeqaalgutni nighugmi kiyaghtengnguuq, nighugmetutmineng naagtusighqiituq.
62002011	Iwernga kitum alngunak ugumikegkumigu ugpeqaalgutni, mamlegmetuq. Igleghtengnguuq mamlegmi, talwa nallukuq navek pingutni qayughllak mamlegem ayaastekaqaa.
62002012	Taghnughhaghhamni, lataaqamsi qayughllak seghleghqellesi seghevutellengegkaagut apalluqluku Christ-a.
62002013	Atani, lataaqamsi qayughllak liisimakegkesi ellnga piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng ayuqelghii. Nukalpigani, lataaqamsi qayughllak kayaalqegkaqegkesi Tughneghaq. Taghnughhaghni, lataaqamsi qayughllak liisimakegkesi Ata.
62002014	Atani, lataaqamsi qayughllak liisimakegkesi ellnga ima piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng ayuqelghii. Nukalpigani, lataaqamsi qayughllak iknaqelghiisi, akuzitangillu Kiyaghneghem ilugpesinilnguut, kayaalqegkaqegkesillu Tughneghaq.
62002015	Piniqegpenaan nuna talwa sangwaa alngunak nunam pinga. Kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu nuna, piniqellghituq Atamun.
62002016	Ukut esgha qamaglluki nunam pingi: sangwaa yugusim piyukellgha seghleghqusiqaqelghii, iyem qiliightestellgha, sangwaatlu yuget qukaayugutkaqegkangit nunami whani. Taakut Atameng pingunghitut, nunameng pinguut.
62002017	Nuna aviighutnguuq, tamaakutlu seghleghqusiiwaqelghiit yugem piyukaqegkangi; iwernga kitum atuqegkumigu Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha kiyaghsaghqaaguq quunperugllak kenlengunaan.
62002018	Taghnughhamni, kenla qantaghalliighaghtuq! Ungipaatkaagusi Anguyakilghii Christ-ameng tagilleqniluku, whaa maaten uglapiglleghiit anguyakilghiit Christ-ameng allgeghtuutngwaaghluteng ayuqut, enkaam liisimakaghput kenla qantaghalliighaghtuq.
62002019	Tamaakut whangkunnisaghtut iwernga unitkaqiinkut qayughllak ilatngwaaghumangilnguut whangkunnun. Ilatngwaaqaayaqumeng uninnayanghitiinkut. Unitelleghmegteggun liigikestengngwaaghaat ilatngwaaghumangitelleghteng whangkunnun.
62002020	Iwernga elpesi, Christ-am kuuvegkaqiisi Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng enkaam qamagllusi liisimakaghsi ipapighqelleq.
62002021	Latangustemsii-i ipapighqelleq nallukutegpesineng? Nakaa, latangwaamsi liisimakutegpesineng. Liisimakegkesillu iqlengiqelleq ipapighqelleghmeng pingunghilnguq.
62002022	Kina iqlengiqestengwaa? Iqlengiqestenguuq whaten pilghii, “Jesus, Christ-angunghituq.” Taananguq anguyakilghii Christ-ameng qayughllak ighsakegkek Atankuk Ighneghenkuk.
62002023	Kitum alngunak ighsakegkumigu Ighneq, Atallu ighsaksaghqaqaa; kitum alngunak tugukliqumigu Ighneq, Atallu tuguklighyaghqaqa.
62002024	Enkaangam iiwleng neqamikluku apeghtuusaq, apeghtuusaqegkaq elpesinun ugpeghyuwhaalleghpesineng ima. Atuqumanginaqufsigu nagaquqaghsi taawa iiwleng Ighneghmellequsillu Atamellequsillu.
62002025	Unanguuq akequsaqegkaa tuunelleqniluku whangkunnun, kenlengilnguq unguvalleq.
62002026	Latasiqanka elpesinun tamaakut puughtinaqutkelghiit elpesineng apalluqluki.
62002027	Iwernga elpesi Christ-am kuuvikegkaqiisi Taghneghagmineng. Taghneghakek ilugpesinitutmegneng alla kina alngunak Apeghtughisteksugnaanghitaghsi, qayughllak Taghneghagkenka apeghtughaqiisi sameng tamaghhaaneng. Apeghtuusii ipanguut, temngingunghitut enkaam Taghnegham apeghtulghatun Christ-ametekestaghtek.
62002028	Taghnughhamni, Christ-ametekestaghtek enkaam uka aliiqan ilutuyaghqaaluta, iighnaqefqaamta kaynguyugem ellnganeng pilghaakut tawani Aghneghmi tagillghani.
62002029	Liisimakegkesi Christ-a elqughutngalghii. Enkaam liisimaksaghqaqasi kinkut alngunak elqughutngaan pikayuget Kiyaghneghem taghnughhaqii.
62003001	Esghaqaghtegguqun Atam piniqimalleghllaga whangkunnun, avaqutaqniiqiinkut ellminun, ipa avaqutaqiinkut. Tamaaken apalluquluku nunam yugan nallukiinkut qayughllak nallukegkangat Kiyaghneq.
62003002	Piniqegkamni, taawa avaqutaqegkanginkut Kiyaghneghem, iwernga salin whateghlluwaaq liigikigataghput naten lliilleghqaghput. Iwernga liisimakaghput, Christ-a aliiqan ellngatun ayuqellequkut qayughllak esghaghlleqaghput legan tawatelluku.
62003003	Taana kitum alngunak ellmineng sighimakegkumigu Christ-akun pelungighsaghyaghqaaguq, katam Christ-am pelungitellghatun.
62003004	Kina alngunak seghlleghqegkayuk qaatkusigatuq Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaanun. Seghleghqellghuuq qaatkunneghitelleq Kiyaghneghem Liilightuusaanun.
62003005	Liisimakaghsi Christ-a allgeqaaguq iqinnaluki seghleghqelleput, ellnga seghleghqellghituq.
62003006	Kina alngunak Christ-ami kiyaghlleghhii seghleghqumanginaghnaangituq. Kina alngunak seghleghqumanginaqumi, liigikumangitaallu nallukaqaallu Christ-a.
62003007	Taghnughhaghhaghni, kitumun alngunak puughtestegpenasi! Kina alngunak elqughulluni pikayuk elqughutngaaq katam Christ-am elqughutngallghatun.
62003008	Kina alngunak seghleghqumanginalghii Tughneghaam pikaa qayughllak Tughneghaq seghleghqengngulghii ima piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng. Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem allgeqaaguq una apalluqluku, naafqennaluku Tughneghaam qepghaqaa.
62003009	Kina alngunak taghnughhaa Kiyaghneghem seghleghqumanginiigatuq qayughllak Kiyaghneghem nangaghnegha ellnganilnguq; qayughllaklu Kiyaghneq Atakegkanga, enkaam seghleghqumanginaghnaanghituq.
62003010	Whaten liisimaksaghqaqaput Kiyaghneghemllu avaqutii, Tughneghaamllu avaqutii: kina alngunak elqughulluni pingigalnguq nalighmeng ugumikingalghii yulgutmineng Kiyaghneghem avaqutaqenghitaa.
62003011	Ungipaq nagaquqaghsi piinlighyuwhaalleghpesineng unanguuq: piniqutusaghqaagukut.
62003012	Cain-etun ayuqsaghqaanghitukut. Cain Tughneghaam pikaa enkaam tuqutkaqaa ellmi katam anglegutni. Sangan tuqutagu? Qayughllak sallghi anaggutngalghiit naqam anglegutangan sallghi elqughutngalghiit.
62003013	Ugpeqaalgutemni, saghiighayugpenasi nunam yugan ugumikegkangisi.
62003014	Liisimakukut tuqumeng alpakaagukut unguvalleghmun qayughllak piniqegkeput ugpeqaalguteput. Kina alngunak piniqingigalnguq paninang tuqumetuq.
62003015	Kitum alngunak ugumikegkumigu ugpeqaalgutni yugtaghtenguuq. Liisimakaghsi yugtaghtem ilungani kenlengilnguq unguvalleq kiyaghtengngunghituq.
62003016	Whaten esgha liisimakegkefut piniqelleq sangutanga: Christ-am tuunellghakun unguvalleni whangkunnun. Enkaam whangkutallu tuunelteki unguvalleput ugpeqaalgutemnnun.
62003017	Kitum alngunak naamaghmi kiyaghtaaghem esghaghluku ugpeqaalgutni aklumalghii nangllekenghilkumigu, naten'ngam Kiyaghneghem piniqellgha ilunganilleqa?
62003018	Taghnughhaghhaghni! Piniqiyaghqaanghitukut akuziteraaghinaghteggunllu akuzillemteggunllu. Yeghlegi piniqilta ipapighqelluta nangaghnemteggun.
62003019	Enkaangam liisimakellequkut Kiyaghneghmun ipapighqelleghmun pikutfut. Seghleghninemtallu Kiyaghneghem sivungani nalluneqsuknaanghitaghput seghevutingallgha qayughllak Kiyaghneq aangataghaghtuq seghleghyugngallemnneng, liisimakegkangallu sangwaa tamaghhaan.
62003021	Piniqegkamni, seghleghninghilkumta tetugnaanghitaghput Kiyaghneq.
62003022	Aapnemtallu sameng alngunak allgeghutaqukut ellnganeng qayughllak qaatkaqegkeput qelghuusii, atuqaqegkeputlu efqughnalghiit ellngani.
62003023	Una esgha qelghusaa: whangkunnun ugpeqesqelluku Ighneghmi aatgha Jesus Christ-am, piniqutullutallu Christ-am qelellghatun.
62003024	Kitum alngunak qaatkegkumiki Kiyaghneghem qelghuusii kiyaghtengnguuq Kiyaghneghmi, Kiyaghneq ellngani. Whaten esgha liisimakegkefut Kiyaghneghem whangkunnitellgha: Taghneghagnekun tuunegkamikun whangkunnun.
62004001	Piniqegkamni, ugpeqegpenaki qamaglluki taghneghat. Yeghlegi liigiknaqaqiteki Kiyaghneghmeng pingutangi, qayughllak uglapiglleghhiit uuknaliqistesighwaaghet mingisimaat nunami.
