62004002	Esgha whaten liisimaksaghqagsi Kiyaghneghmun Taghneghaqutkek: tamaghhaghmi taghnegham aapqagu Jesus Christ-a yuguluni allgeqaaniluku, Kiyaghneghtaaguq.
62004003	Iwernga tamaghhaghmi taghnegham mesiighaaskagu Jesus yuguluni allgeqaanghinniluku Kiyaghneghtaanghituq. Taakuk taghneghak anguyakilghiimeng Christ-ameng pinguuk nagaquqaghpesineng tagiiyaghqaanilukek. Taawa maaten kaatngwaaghlutek nunamun ayuquk.
62004004	Taghnughhaghni, elpesi Kiyaghneghem pikutanganeng, kayaalqegkaqasi tamaakut qayughllak ilugpesinilnguq aghtughyaghqaanghitaghaghtuq nunamelngughmeng.
62004005	Tamaakut nunam pikii, apeghtuusiit nunameng pinguut, enkaam nunam yugan nagataqiit.
62004006	Iwernga whangkuta Kiyaghneghem pikiinkut, enkaam kitum liisimakilghiim Kiyaghneghmeng nagataqiinkut. Tamaakut ilangita Kiyaghneghem pikenghilkangan nagasigatiinkut. Enkaam tawaten esgha liisimaksaghqagput Taghneghakek ipapighqellghem nalighmeng taghneghakek ipangunghilnguum.
62004007	Piniqegkamni, yeqay piniqututelta qayughllak piniqelleq Kiyaghneghmeng pinguuq. Kina alngunak piniqingalghii taghnughhaqaa Kiyaghneghem, liisimakaallu Kiyaghneq.
62004008	Kitum alngunak piniqinghilnguum nallukaa Kiyaghneq, qayughllak Kiyaghneq piniqellghuuq.
62004009	Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqaa taananginaghhaq Ighneni nunamun, unguvallengesqelluta ellngakun. Tawaten pilleghmikun Kiyaghneghem kelgutkaqaa piniqelleni whangkunnun.
62004010	Piniqelleq akuzitkegkegka whangkuta piniqelqenghitaghput Kiyaghneghmun. Yeghlegi Kiyaghneghem piniqelqaa whangkunnun kelgutkaa kayagtelleghmikun Ighneni iqitusiiluku seghleghqellemnnun.
62004011	Piniqegkamni, Kiyaghneghem piniqellgha whangkunnun tawateskan whangkutallu piniqutusaghqaagukut.
62004012	Kitum alngunak esghiigatngwaaghaa Kiyaghneq; piniquskumta Kiyaghneq kiyaghtengnguuq ilumnni, piniqellghallu iighwighyaghqaaguq ilumnni.
62004013	Kiyaghneghem tuunegkaqiinkut ellmi katam Taghneghagmineng enkaam liisimakaghput kiyaghtengnguuq whankunni, whangkuta ellngani.
62004014	Esghaqaqaghput Ighnegha. Enkaam ungipaqngwaaghput Kiyaghneghmun kayagtekaqniluku Yugulighistenguluku tamaghhaanun yugnun.
62004015	Kitum alngunak aapqagu Jesus Ighneqniluku Kiyaghneghmun, Kiyaghneq kiyaghtengnguuq ellngani, ellnga Kiyaghneghmi.
62004016	Enkaam whangkuta liisimakaghputlu ugpeqaghputlu Kiyaghneghem piniqillgha whangkunnun. Kiyaghneq piniqellghuuq, enkaam kina alngunak kiyaghlleghhii piniqelleghmi kiyaghtengnguuq Kiyaghneghmi, Kiyaghneq ellngani.
62004017	Enkaam piniqelleq iighwightekaaguq ilumnni ilutusqelluta Nanqigtillghem Aghneghani. Tawatetukut qayughllak Christ-atun ayuqelghiikut nunami whani.
62004018	Piniqelleghmi alingelleq aviituq qayughllak iighwiqam piniqellghem ighlleqayuwaa alingelleq. Enkaangam piniqelleq iighwiimangituq tamaakuni paninang alingegkayugni, qayughllak alingellelguuq aghyuulleq.
62004019	Piniqiiqukut qayughllak Kiyaghneghem sivukluni piniqegkaqiinkut.
62004020	Kina pikumi, “Piniqaqa Kiyaghneq,” naqam ugumikluku ugpeqaalgutni, iqlengiqestenguuq. Qayughllak kitum alngunak piniqenghilkumigu ugpeqaalgutni esghaqayuni, piniqnaanghitaa Kiyaghneq esghiigalkenni.
62004021	Una qelghusaqaa Christ-am whangkunnun, kitum piniqegkumigu Kiyaghneq, piniqsaghqaqaa ugpeqaalgutnillu.
62005001	Kitum alngunak ugpeqngukumigu Jesus, Christ-angutanga, avaqutaqaa Kiyaghneghem, kitum alngunak piniqegkumigu Ata piniqsaghqaqii avaqutii.
62005002	Whaten liisimaksaghqaqaghput piniqilleghput Kiyaghneghem avaqutiitnun: piniqellemteggun Kiyaghneq, qaatkellemteggunllu qelghusii.
62005003	Una piniqellghuuq Kiyaghneghmun: qaatkutelleghput qelghusaanun. Qelghusii piyaqnaghllagunghitut,
62005004	qayughllak tamaghhaghmi avaqutaliitkaan Kiyaghneghem kayaalqegkaqaa nuna. Whaten esgha kayaalqesaghqaghput nuna, ugpeqillemteggun.
62005005	Kinangaawa kayaalqiista nunameng? Kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu Jesus Ighneqniluku Kiyaghneghmun, taanata kayaalqiista.
62005006	Jesus Christ-anguuq tagikaq. Tagikaaguq meghqunllu aawhkunllu. Tagimangituq meghhiinaghqun iwernga meghqunllu aawhkunllu tagikaaguq.
62005007	Taghnegham aapghaa taana ipanguniluku qayughllak Taghneghak ipapighqellghulghiik.
62005008	Taawa pingayuguut aapghistet, Taghneghak, meq, aakwh; taakut qamaglluteng itagnaqulluteng ayuqut.
62005009	Ugpeqngukumteki yuget aapqiit whangkunnun, ipapestaaq ugpeqataghaghyaghqaqaput Kiyaghneghem aapqii. Kiyaghneghem apellgha Ighneghmun ipanguuq.
62005010	Enkaam kitum alngunak ugpeqegkumigu Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem qama ilunganituq Kiyaghneghem aapqaa. Iwernga kitum alngunak ugpeqenghilkumigu Kiyaghneq iqlengiqestengllaghlleqaa, qayughllak Kiyaghneghem aapqaa Ighneghmineng ugpeqenghilkanga.
62005011	Una Kiyaghneghem aapqaqaa, Kiyaghneghemnguq tuunegkaqiinkut kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng, taana unguvalleq Ighneghanituq.
62005012	Kitum alngunak tugukliqumigu Ighneq, unguvallelguuq; kitum alngunak tugukliimangilkumigu Ighnegha Kiyaghneghem unguvallengellghituq.
62005013	Latasiqanka tamaakut elpesinun ugpeqilghiinun aatghaneng Ighneghan Kiyaghneghem, elpesinun liisimakesqelluku kenlengilnguq unguvalleghsi.
62005014	Nalluneqsukigataghput Kiyaghneq; liisimakaghput nagataqiinkut aapnemteggu sameng alngunak piyukellghakun ayuqelghiimeng.
62005015	Liisimakegkumteggu nagatellgha sameng alngunak aaptellemnneng, liisimakaghput allgeghutaqukut tungsiqamnneng ellnganeng.
62005016	Kitum esghaqumigu ugpeqaalgutni seghleghqelghii tuqumun ayuqenghilngughmeng yughaatkelligu enkaam Kiyaghneghem tuunligu unguvalleghmeng. Akuzitkengngwaanka yuget seghleghqellghita tuqumun piyaghqaqenghilkangitneng. Seghleghqellelguuq tuqumun ayuqelghiimun. Iwernga yughaatkesqengngunghitaqa tawaten seghleghqelghii.
62005017	Qamaglluni seghletun pilleq seghleghqellghuuq. Iwernga seghleghqellelguuq tuqumun ayuqenghilngughmeng.
62005018	Liisimakaghput kina alngunak Kiyaghneghem avaqutaa seghleghqumanginaghnaanghituq, qayughllak Ighneghan Kiyaghneghem aflengakngukanga enkaam Tughneghaam seghletun pinaanghitaa.
62005019	Liisimakukut Kiyaghneghem pikiinkut qaywa Tughneghaam igleghutngughngaagu qamaglluku nuna.
62005020	Liisimakaghput Ighneghan Kiyaghneghem tagiluni liigikestekaqiinkut liisimakesqelluku Kiyaghnepik. Kiyaghnepigmetukut Ighneghanitutemnneng Jesus Christ-ami. Taanata Kiyaghnepiklu kenlengilnguqlu unguvalleq.
62005021	Taghnughhaghhaghni, iqitngalusi kiyaghnesighwaaghneng!
63001001	Ukut latat Elder-meng pinguut Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkaanun aghnamun, avaqutaanunllu ipapigmeng piniqegkamnun. Ellnginaanghitunga piniqistezi, qamagllutengllu liisimakelghiit ipapighqelleghmeng piniqiisi,
63001002	qayughllak ipapighqelleq ilumnnilnguq. Taana ipapighqelleq ilumnnisaghqaaguq quunperugllak.
63001003	Kayusilleq, nangllegyulleq, nekeggmelleqlu whangkunnillequt kiyaghtengnguluta ipapighqelleghqunllu piniqelleghqunllu. Taakut Kiyaghneghmeng Atameng, Jesus Christ-amengllu, Atam Ighneghaneng pinguut.
63001004	Quyapigtekaagunga nagaqughluki ilangi avaqutaghten kiyaghtengnguniluki ipapighqelleghqun tawateghpigaq Atam qelellghatun whangkuta.
63001005	Aghnami, piimken piniqututelta. Taana nutaghaanghituq qelghuusaq latatkegkegka elpenun; qelghusaaguq ima piinlighyuggaalleghmeng.
63001006	Una piniqellghuuq, qaatkutelleq Kiyaghneghem qelghuusaanun. Qelghuusaq nagaquqaghsi piinlighyuwhaalleghmeng unanguuq: qamagllusi piniqullusi kiyaghtek.
63001007	Uglapiglleghhii puughtista nunami mingilluni ayuquq. Tamaakut yuget apeghnaanghitaat Jesus Christ-a yuguluni allgeqaaniluku qayughllak ugpeqigataat. Tawatelnguq yuuk puughtistenguuqlu, anguyakilghiinguuqlu Christ-ameng.
63001008	Enkaam kelengalusi, pegsaqunaan qepghaatkaghsi akileghtuusaghqaghsi qamaglluku allgeghsaghqaqaghsi.
63001009	Kitum alngunak qaasghuskumiki apeghtuusii Christ-am Kiyaghneq ellnganinneghituq. Iwernga kitum alngunak atuqumanginaqumiki apeghtuusii Christ-am, Atallu Ighneqlu ellnganituk.
63001010	Kitum alngunak apeghtughyaghtuqangisi atuqegpenaki Christ-am apeghtuusii, aqelqangllaghpenaan nalighmeng quyakegpenaan,
63001011	qayughllak kitum alngunak quyakegkumigu qepghalgusiqallghuughlleqaa seghleghmeng qepghaqaaneng.
63001012	Apeghyaghqaghllagughngaaghma elpesinun latatgun piyunghitanka. Iwernga sunanguq laalighfiklamsi, aleghquunnayaghtukut gginasaghquulluta, enkaam quyateghllagnayaghtukut.
63001013	Avaqutiita nakmikegkam aakaghpesi piniqiisinguq.
64001001	Ukut latat Elder-meng pinguut Gaius-mun ipapik piniqegkamnun.
64001002	Piniqegkamni, liisimakaqa unguvasigken itagnaghtuq. Yughaatkaqamken itagniisqelluten sakun tamaghhaakun, yugunqegtesqellutenllu.
64001003	Quyapigtekaagunga ilangita ugpeqaalgutet kaalluteng ungipaasatnga ataasiighmetelleghpeneng ipapighqelleghmun, iiwleng elpesinun atuqnguniluku ipapighqelleq.
64001004	Quyapigtaqunga nagaqunemki avaqutaliitkanka atuqinguniluki ipapighqelleghmeng. Alla saam alngunak quyasigataanga tawaten.
64001005	Piniqegkamni ilakumtaamni, piniipigtuq ataasiighmelluten qepghallghen Kiyaghneghmun aflengakelleghpegun ugpeqaalgutet talwa tamaakut nallukegkaghten.
64001006	Maani yughaghvigmi aapghaqaat piniqellghen. Kayusiitaghtiki nagneghutesqelluki igleghallghit. Kayusighillghen Kiyaghneghem piyukellghatun ayuqluku
64001007	qayughllak igleghanguut apalluqluku Christ-a. Tuguklighingigatut ugpeqaanghilngughneng kayusilleghmeng
64001008	enkaam whangkuta ugpeqani kayusighyaghqaqaput tamaakut yuget. Tawaten pikumta qepghalgutkelleqiinkut apeghtughinguluteng ipapighqelleghmeng.
64001009	Latakaayaghtunga ugpeqanun iwernga Diotrephes-em umiilguyugneghem waakigatii liilightullghenka.
64001010	Elpesinun pikuma apeghlleqaqa saaqutanga. Seghletun akuzitkaqiinkut, iqlengiqutkaqiinkutlu. Tawatenginaq pingigatuq upughasugigatii ugpeqaalguteput kaanneghata. Upughatiyulghiit ineghtaqii, upughatinghatallu eflequghaqii ugpeqat qerngughutfigitneng.
64001011	Piniqegkamni, seghletun pikayugestun pigpenang, yeghlegi pinitun pikayugestun piiqi. Kina alngunak pinitun pikayuk Kiyaghneghem pikaa; iwernga kitum alngunak seghletun pikayugem nallukaa Kiyaghneq.
64001012	Tamaghhaghmi ugpeqam Demetrius pinighniiqaat yuuk. Ipapighqelluni kiyaghtaallghan ipapighqutkestaa. Taawa whangkutallu tawaten piighput, liisimakasi akuzilleput ipanguut.
64001013	Apeghyaghqaghllaguunga elpenun iwernga latatgun piyunghitanka.
64001014	Sunanguq qantaghaqun esghaghlaken enkaam aleghquullequkung gginasaghquullutung.
64001015	Kiyaghneghem nekeggmellgha elpenilli. Ilakumtaaghpek qamaglluteng sumeghmikaqaatenguq. Ungipaaquqaghnaketen qamaglluki ilakumtaaput sumeghmikaqapun'nguq.
65001001	Ukut latat Jude-meng pinguut, Jesus Christ-am qepghaghtenganeng, James-em uyughaaneng. Lataaqunga Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkiitnun. Kiyaghneghem Atamta piniqiisi, Jesus Christ-amllu aflengakaqiisi.
65001002	Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghallu, nekeggmellghallu, piniqellghallu nulali elpesini.
65001003	Piniqegkamni, latayupigtaqamsi yugulillemnneng. Iwernga nagaqughyamki apeghtughistesighwaaghet elpesinilnguut, apeghyukaqa elpesinun simighaqa. Liisimakasi Kiyaghneghem kayagtekaqii Apostle-etlu ilangillu yuget apeghtiisqelluta ugpeqsaghqamnneng. Enkaam kitum alngunak allangughsaghqaqenghitiit ellngita apeghtughillghit. Tamaaken apalluqluku latanguunga qevuullusi kipullginaaghesqelluki apeghtughistesighwaaghet. Apeghtughistegpenaki ipangunghilngughneng apeghtuusiitneng.
65001004	Qerngughunneghpesini maligutaqut, iwernga ungipaasigatiisi sameng apeghtughyugaqnilusi. Tamaakut yuget tuguklighyugigataat Jesus Christ-a taananginaghhaq Igleghutistevut, Ataneghputlu. Enkaam allangughtaqaat apeghtuusaq Kiyaghneghem nangllegtallghaneng ayuqelghii. Whaten piiqut, “Kiyaghneq nanglegtaghllagtuq, seghevutikayuguuq enkaam itagnaghtuq seghleghqesaghngaamta sex-kun.” Qavngarugllak Kiyaghneghem ungipaatkaqiinkut aghyuughlleqniluku kina alngunak apeghtughilghii tawaten.
65001005	Ungipaatkaayaghngaaghpesi sivunghani Kiyaghneghem aghyuughillghaneng seghleghqestenun, neqangughsugamsi allameng taakut usputaqluki. Neqamikluku Atanghem yugulikaqii Israel-eghmiit Egypt-eghmiineng, aghulaqestekaqii Egypt-meng. Iwernga kingunganeng taam ilangi Israel-eghmiit ugpeqinanighyata, qaatkunnanighyata ellminun, tuqustekaqii.
65001006	Neqamikluki yaqulget Kiyaghneghem pisqegkaa nagneghusimangitkaat, unitkaatlu neyeng qilak. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem asighqegkii qiipraghutneng nekegngayaghqaneng quunperugllak, nekegtestekii mamlegllagkun. Tawantesnaqngwii kenlanga aghyuulleghqaminun Nanqigtivigem Aghneghani.
65001007	Neqamikluki Sodom-eghmiitlu Gomorrah-ghmiitlu, uvitangitnilnguutlu nunat. Yaqulgestun seghleghqegkaagut. Allaaghhiinaq seghleghqelleq sex-kun pikaat, talwa yuget yulgutkullghiit atuqutaqluteng, sangwaatlu seghleghataghaat atuqegkaqiit. Usputaagut Kiyaghneghem aghyughillghaneng seghleghqestenun kenlengilngughqun keneghqun.
65001008	Apeghtughistesighwaaghet tawatetut. Piiqut qavangullghitanguq seghleghqestaqiit sex-kun, qaatkesigatiitlu yuget igleghutistet, seghletunllu akuzitkestaqiit yaqulget igleghutistet.
65001009	Naqam Michael, yaqulget igleghutistengita ilangat, tawaten pillghituq. Tughneghaan-kuk aaghtiiraaghutkaqngamegnegu Moses-em yugusii, Michael-em seghletun akuzitkumangitaa, anaggusimanilukullu pillghitaa. Yeghlegi pikaqaa, “Atanghem aghyuughmigliten.”
65001010	Iwernga tamaakut apeghtughistesighwaaghet sangwaa alngunak liigikenghilkeseng seghletun akuzitkaqaat. Sangwaa ilanga liigikaqaat teghikusastun sumeghtaghiigalngughestun. Teghikusat piyukelleghmegestun pikayuguut. Tawateghpigaq apeghtughistesighwaaghet pikayuguut. Enkaam seghleghqestengughtaghaghaqut.
65001011	Seghleghwaaghunaqnguut ellngit! Cain-etun pinguut, tuqutkaqaa anglegutni. Allgeghuteqaghhnaluteng manimeng seghletun pikaagut Balaam-em pillghatun. Korah-tun pinguut, qaatkesunghitkaqegkangi igleghutistet Kiyaghneghem nakmikegkii. Enkaam Kiyaghneghem naafqegkaqaa ellnga, apeghtughistesighwaaghetlu naafqesaghqaqii.
65001012	Neqenghaghqusaghtuneghpesini, communion-emaghpesi, tamaakutlu apeghtughistet piiqut. Yakughnaghtut ugpeqanun katam tawaten uyghagllak meghem asinganilnguq yakughnalghii angyanun. Neghaqut qerngaghmeng nenglaghqiqusimaghmeng, akuzimaghmeng nepugllaget kaynguyugpenateng. Ellnginaghmeng neghaqut kinkut tuunegpenaki. Sasiinghitut qilawaaghestun eslallugilngughestun ayuqut, anuqem naghughuskangi quulngakun nunam meghisagllagem. Sasiinghitut piitestingigalngughestun uqfigestun ayuqut, unataghvigmi. Piitestingigalnguut uqfiget tuqukastun ayuqut. Tamaaken apalluqluku piitesiighaghtem nusugaqii paneghhnaluki. Enkaam maalghugegneng tuqukallghuughaqut.
65001013	Kayngunalghiit nangaghneghit qagighllagestun ayuqut, temngi puugllungllat. Ighaleqetaaghestun qaprakayugestun ayuqut, qayughllak tawatelnguut ighaleqetaaghet nalluniighutnguyaghqaanghitut igleghanun. Tawateghpig-aq igleghusaghqaqenghitaat kina alngunak apeghtughillesighwaalleghmegteggun. Tamaaken apalluqluku Kiyaghneghem yataaghqutkaqii pisaghtiighllagmeng nekaghqameng kenlengilngughmeng.
65001014	Enoch-nguq maaghraghvinliitkegkangat kingunghita Adam-em, ellngan uuknaliqutkegkaqii tamaakut yuget. Whaten pikaaguq, “Esghaghtek, Ataneq tagiyaghqaaguq agleghnalghiit yaqulelghuteghllani kelqelluki,
65001015	nanqiggnaluki qamagtengngwaaghluki yuget. Qayvighqesaghqaqii qamagtengngwaaghluki seghleghqestet seghleghqellghit, seghlepestaatunllu akuzitkillghit ellmineng. Tamaaken apalluqluku Atanghem aghyuughyaghqaqii seghleghqesteghllaget.”
65001016	Tamaakut yuget quunpeng temngi akuzilgaghllaget, efqughutkigalkangit sangwaat alngunak. Sangwaat alngunak seghleghqusit atuqsuneghmegteki atuqaqiit, piniiyugneghllaget, usuqnguughtaqiitlu kinkut sameng qiliighvikneghmegteki.
65001017	Piniqegkamni, neqamikluki Atanghem Jesus Christ-am apostle-ngita aapqiit sivunghani.
65001018	Ungipaatkaqiisi whaten, “Kingulighni aghneghni nenglaghyugsaghtelguyaghqaaguq Kiyaghneghem ipapighqellghaneng ayuqelghiineng. Sangwaat alngunak yugusim piyukellghi atuqsuneghmegteki piiqiit.”
65001019	Tamaakut yuget aaghtiiraaghutestiyugaqut ugpeqaneng. Maligtaqiit yugusimeng piyukellghit seghleghqelleghmun ayuqelghiit, Agleghnalghiigneng Taghneghagneng avangitutmeggneng.
65001020	Iwernga piniqegkamni, wata iknaqughsaamanginaghteggu ugpeqaamalleghsi, ugpeqilleghpesigun Kiyaghneghem agleghnalghiitgun apeghtuusiitgun. Yughaghaqitek Agleghnalghiignekun Taghneghagnekun.
65001021	Kiyaghneghem piniqellghanitekestaghtek, utaqiimalusi Atanemnneng Jesus Christ-ameng tuunesqellusi kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng nangllegtalleghmikun.
65001022	Nangllekluki tamaakut malghuklingalghiit Kiyaghneghem ipapighqellghaneng.
65001023	Yuguliteki akuqaqallghuulghiistun kenghegneng. Nangllekaqluki ilangitlu iwernga piraamsingwaaghlusi luuraq seghleghqellghistun piiqsaaghtusi. Ugumikluki seghleghqellghit katam ugumikelleghpesistun nukeggnaghqeghllakiit aatkateng seghleghqengnguluteng.
65001024	Kiyaghneghem kelengaksaghqaqiisi seghleghqelleghqaghpesineng, seghleghqellghiitesaghqaqiisillu. Enkaam quyaghllagllequsi nekevegkufsi sivungakun nighughqellghan.
65001025	Kiyaghneq taananginaghhaaguq Kiyaghneq, yugulikaqiinkut Atanemteggun Jesus Christ-am tuqullghakun. Ima tazimakerugllak, maaten, quunperugllak kenlengunaan Kiyaghneq aangeghllagtuq, aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq, igleghutngwaa sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku, aghtughyaghqaqenghitaa sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku. Kiyaghneq usuqli. Amen.
66001001	Whani igani igaqngaat Kiyaghneghem aliightekii Jesus Christ-amun. Kiyaghneghem aliightekaqii ellnganun liigikestesqelluki qepghaghteni sangwaat piyaghtungestaghniluki. Enkaam Christ-am kayagtekaqaa yaquleni qepghaghteminun John-mun tamaakut liisimakesqelluki.
66001002	Taagken John-em aapqaqii qamaglluki esghaqanillu nagatkanillu. Nagatkaqii akuzitangi Kiyaghneghem, ungipaqlu Jesus Christ-ameng ayuqelghii.
66001003	Quyastekaaguq atightulghii iglagtuluni akuzitangitneng uuknaliqellghem. Quyastekaagutlu nagalluteng qaatkullghiit qayughllak qantaghaqun tamaakut pillequt.
66001004	Ukut latat John-meng pinguut ugpeqanun qerngughtukayuget maaghraghvinlegni yughaghvigni Asia-mi. Nangllegtalleqlu nekeggmelleqlu elpesinillik Kiyaghneghmeng, maaghraghvinlek taghneghaneng, Jesus Christ-amengllu. Kiyaghneghuuq kiyaghlleghhii maaten, ellnganguuq kiyaghlleghhii sivunghani, ellnganguuq tagiyaghqaq. (Taakut maaghraghvinlek taghneghat sivunganitut Kiyaghneghem umiilgusiin aqumutaan.) Jesus Christ-a ataasiighmelnguuguq liisimakista ipapilleghmun. Ellnganguuq Kiyaghneghem unguvaghsuwhaaqaa tuqulleghmeng. Ellnganguuq igleghutistengat umiilgita nunam. Ellnganguuq piniqilghii whangkunneng, aawmikunllu itemutkaqiinkut seghleghqellemnneng. Ataneghpagulleghminitestiinkut, priest-ngughtestiinkutlu Kiyaghneghminun Atamun. Jesus Christ-am allgeghllikek nighughqelleqlu, aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu igleghutimun quunperugllak kenlengunaan! Amen.
66001007	Ii-i! Jesus tagiiquq qilagwaagteggun. Tamaghhaghmi yugem esghaghlleqaat, talwa tamaakut panasqelluku pikiita esghaghlleqaat. Qamaglluteng nunam ramkengi qiyaaghuuteghllagllequt apalluqluku ellnga. Aa-a, tamaakut piyaghqaagut! Amen.
66001008	“Whanga Alpha-nguungallu Omega-nguungallu,” piiq Ataneq Kiyaghneq, Aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllak. Ellnganguuq kiyaghlleghhii maaten, ellnganguuq kiyaghlleghhii sivunghani, ellnganguuq tagiyaghqaq.
66001009	John-nguunga, ugpeqaalgutkaghpesinga. Ikfiqunga elpesistun qayughllak Jesus-em Ataneghpagullghan pikiinkut. Ellngakun ikfiqelleput nuqetutaput. Aglaghtestekaagunga qiighqamun aatqelghii Patmos-meng qayughllak ungipaqegkenka Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, ungipaqlu Jesus-meng ayuqelghii.
66001010	Atanghem Aghneghani Agleghnalghiim Taghnegham iitghaanga. Taagken tunutemnilluku nagaqughaqa ma iglagtuqaq qalghightaatetun.
66001011	Whaten piiq, “Igaqughqi igatgun esghaqaghten. Taagken tuyughnaketen ugpeqanun qerngughutkayugnun maaghraghvinlegni yughaghvigni: Ephesus-melnguut, Smyrna-melnguut, Perga-melnguut, Thyatira-melnguut, Sardis-melnguut, Philadelphia-melnguut, Laodicea-melnguutlu.”
66001012	Taagken qiivunga esghaghnaluku ma aleghqughteka. Qiivyalghiinga esghaghanka maaghraghvinleguftut gold-et kenelghutat tunemiit.
66001013	Taawa qukiitni kina llangaqa ighnegha yugem akughtughllagegneng atkuyaaqeftuq, sakimagmikunllu tafsingaftuq gold-meng.
66001014	Naasqwallu nuyaallu qateghpetuk wool-estun nalighmeng anigustun, iiskeklu kenghem kumangallghatun ayuqlutek.
66001015	Itegii qelmeghsaqastun siilustun ayuqeftut pelungighsaqat keneghqun. Mengallu eftughllagatun meghllagem tevughallghan ayuqluni.
66001016	Aghenqigneghmineng tugumiiqeftii maagraghvinlek ighaleqetaaghet, qaanghanengllu aanuq savigpak inglugtun gginakek ipegsaqak. Gginaa nighugllak aghneghem qukaan siqinghuughtellghatun.
66001017	Esghaghyamkun itegaan manungakun uullghaghtunga tuqukastun. Iwernga aghenqigneghmineng iiggmineng saaflunga piinga, “Alingegpenang, whanga sivuliigungallu kinguliigungallu.
66001018	Unguvalghiinguunga! Tuqukaayaghtunga, iwernga ii-i, unguvanguunga quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Key-lguunga Tuqulleghmunllu Hades-munllu.
66001019	“Saaqsin igaqughqi igatgun sangwaat qamaglluki esghaqeten maaten, sangwaatlu kinguvaqun piyaghqat.
66001020	Esghaghaten maaghraghvinlek ighaleqetaaghet aghenqigneghma iigganilnguut, maaghraghvinleklu gold-et kenelghutat tunemiit, taakut sameng pisiitangi salin qayvightellghitut. Whaten pisiigut: Maaghraghvinlek ighaleqetaaghet yaqulguut. Kiyaghneghem ungipaghtekii ugpeqanun qerngughutkayuget maaghraghvinlegni yughaghvigni. Maaghraghvinlek kenelghutam tunemii taakunguut maaghraghvinlek yughaghviget.
66002001	“Latagu yaqulek igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Ephesus-em. Whanganguuq tugumiilek maaghraghvinlek ighaleqetaaghneng aghenqignemkun, igleghtengnguungallu akulngitni maaghraghvinlek gold-et kenelghutat tunemiitni.
66002002	Liisimakamsi saaqutsi, ughleghiilghiisi, iilqayunghitelleghsillu. Liisimakamsillu tugukliigatasi seghleghet yuget, iwernga apostle-ngunilghiit liitaqasi esghapagluki temngingutangi. Taawa liitasi iqlengiqestenguut.
66002003	Meghniigatusi ikfiqelleghpesineng whanga apalluqlunga, iilqayugigatusillu.
66002004	Iwernga piyukenghitusiqa elpesinun unanguuq, piniqnaniimaaghpesinga, ugpeqaalgutesillu sivunghani piniqelleghpesistun.
66002005	Tamaaken apalluqluku puygugpenaan piniqeghllagyaqefsinga, ugpeqaalgutesillu. Piniqnanighaghpesinga piiqelleghpesistun. Enkaam avuteghqitek. Piniqenqigtikut piniqsugwhaalleghpesistun. Avuteghqenghilkufsi, takulusi iqilleqaqa kenelghutaghpesi tunemaa nenganeng.
66002006	Iwernga una pinitun pilqaghsi: ugumikasi piiqegkangit Nicolaus-em maligsaaghtengita, katam whanga ugumikellemtun.
66002007	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek Taghneghak sameng piiqutkek ugpeqanun! Tamaakut kayaalqiilghiit kayaalqiilleghmeng neghesqelleqanka piitestekaaneng uqfigan unguvallghem, tawanlenguq Kiyaghneghem Piitesighaghvigani.
66002008	“Latagu yaqulek igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Smyrna-m. Una ungipaq whangamneng pinguuq: Sivuliigungallu kinguliigungallu, tuqulunga unguvaqaagunga.
66002009	Liisimakanka seghleliillesi, aklumanguusillu iwernga aklungitusi! Liisimakaqa seghleghet akuzitet ilangita yuget piiqegkangit elpesinun. Jews-nguniiqut, Jews-epigunghiteghngaaghmeng. Yuguut qerngughutkayuget Tughneghaam synagogue-ngani.
66002010	Alikegpenaki tamaakut ikfiqutkennaqegkesi. Nagatek! Tughneghaam ilasi anusimingllaghtesnaqii nanghiiqunalusi. Enkaam ikfiqellequsi qula aghneghnun. Iwernga ataasiighmetek, qaywa tuquyaghqaaghngaaghpesi. Tawaten pikufsi, akileghtuusalilleqamsi kenlengilngughmeng unguvalleghmeng.
66002011	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek Taghneghak sameng piiqutkek ugpeqanun! Tamaakut kayaalqiilghiit kayaalqiilleghmeng, tuunglighhaan tuqullghem aqnighhnaanghitii.
66002012	“Latagu yaqulek igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Pergamum-em. Una ungipaq savigpalegmeng pinguuq inglugtun gginalek ipegsaqameng.
66002013	Liisimakamsi naantutsi, tawantusi Tughneghaam umiilgutivigan aqumutagkeni. Whangamnun ataasiighmetusi, ugpeqnanillghitaghpesingallu. Tawatetkaagusi talwa Antipas, ataasiighmelnguq ungipaghteka, kiyaghtengnguluku. Tawani Tughneghaam kiyaghfigani tuqutkaqaat.
66002014	Iwernga piyukenghitusinka elpesinun ukunguut: taawa elpesinitut ilangi qaatkullghiit Balaam-em apeghtuusaanun. Apeghtuqaqaa Balak naten seghleghqestesqelluki Israel-eghmiit. Enkaam Balak-em apeghtuqaqii neghyaghngiita pisqelluki neqet aghqutkegkat kiyaghnengllaqanun. Apeghtuqaqiillu itagnaghniluku alngunak sex-kun seghleghqelleghqaq.
66002015	Tawateghpigaq ilasi qaatkutut Nicolaus-em apeghtuusaanun.
66002016	Avuteghqellusi seghleghqennanightek! Pinghilkufsi qantaghaqun takulleqamsi. Taagken pilluwaghlleqanka tamaakut yuget savigpagmeng qanemnilngughmeng.
66002017	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek Taghneghak sameng piiqutkek ugpeqanun qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigni! Manna-meng iighngalghiimeng, manna-lilleqaqa taana kayaalqiilghii Tughneghagh-meng. Ellnganunllu tuunelleqaqa qatelghii uyghak, ateghraghaghmeng igaqfikegkaq. Kitum alngunak nallukegkaa ateq iwerngaqun allgeghtikaghhiinaam uyghagmeng liisimakaa.
66002018	“Latagu yaqulek igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Thyatira-m. Una ungipaq Ighneghaneng Kiyaghneghem pinguuq. Iiskek kumaghuuguk kenghestun, itegii qelmeghtutkaat siilum qelmeghsalghatun.
66002019	Liisimakamsi saaqutsi. Liisimakaqa piniqelleghsi, ugpeqelleghsi, qepghaatilleghsi, nuqetutilleghsillu. Liisimakanka tamaakut wata piiqasi sivunghani piiqelleghpesineng.
66002020	Iwernga ukunguut tengvimun ayuqegkanka elpesinun: Aghuliighnneghitaghsi aghnaq Jezebel apeghtughilghii ipangunghilngughneng. Uuknaliqestenguniiquq Kiyaghneghmun. Iwernga apeghtughilleghmikun puughtaqii yugenka seghleghqesqelluki sex-kun, neghesqellukillu neqet aghqutkegkat kiyaghnengllaqanun.
66002021	Pilleghqalitkaqsaghaqa avuteghqesqelluku, iwernga taaqsunghituq allaniineghmeng.
66002022	Ii-i! Miluunnaqaqa qavaghvigmun tawani ikfiqesqelluku. Maligulluki ellnganun miluulleqanka tamaakut gelgaghniilgutangi enkaam ikfiqesteghllaglleqanka. Tawaten pillequnga wetkuqun avuteghkegkata seghletun pillghitneng.
66002023	Tuqulleqankallu avaqutii. Enkaam qamaglluteng ugpeqat yughaghvignilnguut liilleqaatnga whanganguuq liisimakilghii yugem tamaghaghhmi sumeghtaghallghitnengllu ilumikegkiitnengllu. Aghyuughyaghqaqamsi tamaghaghpesi seghleghqetulegpesistun.
66002024	Iwernga ilagpesi Thyatira-mi, maligtellghitasi Jezebel-em seghleghet apeghtughillghi. Liitellghitasillu Tughneghaam aksaqumtaaghllagi. Tamaaken apalluqluku qelghataghaghnaanghitamsi,
66002025	iwerngaqun ugpequmanginaghteggu apeghtullesi kenlanga uteghnillemnun.
66002026	Ellnga taana kayaalqiilghii kayaalqiilleghmeng, atuqilghiillu aneghneghqillemneng kenlemun, aghtughyaghqaanghillelilleqaqa igleghutesqelluki nation-et.
66002027	Igleghutesqeluki iron-meng rod-elighluki enkaam kagimnnakangit qikumeng qulmesiitengllaqastun.
66002028	Tuunelleqankallu unaangum ighaleqetaaghaneng.
66002029	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek sameng piiqutkek Taghneghak ugpeqanun!
66003001	“Igaqigu una ungipaq yaqulegmun igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Sardis-em. Taana Kiyaghneghem maaghraghvinlek taghneghaaneng pilek maaghragvinleklu ighaleqetaalek, piiq, Liisimakamsi saaqutsi. Yuget piiqiisi unguvanilusi iwernga tuqungaasi.
66003002	Taghtughlusi, iknaqughsaghteggu sangwaa salin elpesi pizi tuqunaqelghii. Liitanka ukavantut sangwaat piiqegkesi Kiyaghneghma pisqesullghaneng elpesinun.
66003003	Neqamikluki apeghtuutkat elpesinun, nagaquqasillu. Qaatkiteki, avuteghqiteklu seghleghqelleghpesineng. Iwernga taghtunghilkufsi, takulleqamsi teglegniightetun. Nallukelleqaghsi qakun tagilleghqaqa elpesinun.
66003004	Paninang qafsinggaagut yuget Sardis-mi aatkateng nukeggnaghqellghilkangit. Igleghtelgusighlleqaatnga aalluteng qatelghiimeng aatkameng qayughllak itagnalghiinguut.
66003005	Kayaalqiilghii, ellngistun aallequq qatelghiimeng aatkameng. Aatghallu ghevesnaanghitaqa Kenlengilnguum Unguvallghem Igaaneng. Atamallu yaqulganllu sivungitni whangamnun piknilleqaqa.
66003006	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek sameng piiqutkek Taghneghak ugpeqanun!
66003007	“Igaqigu una ungipaq yaqulegmun igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Philadelphia-m. Una ungipaq Agleghnalghiimeng, Ipapigmeng pinguuq. Ellnganituq David-em key-nga. Qelpeghtekumigu amik, kitum alngunak umegnaanghitaa. Uumkumigullu amik, kitum alngunak qelpeghhnaanghitaa.
66003008	Liisimakamsi saaqutsi, liisimakamsillu kayaatusi. Naqamllu qaatkasi apeghtuusanka, mesighiigatusillu whangamnun maligsaaghteknilusi. Ii-i, qelpeghusimaamsi amigmeng; kitum alngunak umegyaghqaqenghilkanganeng.
66003009	Ii-i! Tamaakut qerngughullghiit Tughneghaam synagogue-ngani, Jews-nguniiqut. Iwernga iqlengiqestenguut; Jews-ngunghitut. Elpesinun pisluki qungughtesnaqanka sivugpesigun. Taagken liilleqaat piniqegkemsi.
66003010	Qelqaqamsi nuqetesqellusi. Qaatkegkaqutegpesineng qelghilqa paqniighsaghlleqamsi seghleliilleghneng kaannaqelghiineng nunataghhanun tamaghhaanun. Tamaakut seghleliillghet nanghiiqulleqiit qamaglluki yuget kiyaghlleghhiit nunami.
66003011	Tagiyaghtughtunga. Ayepsugillusi ugpequmanginaghtengnga kitumun alngunak wayanghitesqelluki qaghpasi.
66003012	Kayaalqiilghii aghveghaqetaaghtesleqaqa Kiyaghneghma Temple-ngani, allamengllu aanaanghituq. Enkaam ellngakun igaqelleqaqa aatgha Kiyaghneghma, aatghallu Kiyaghneghma neghllagan, Jerusalem-eghraghaq, ukilghii qilagmeng Kiyaghnemneng. Ellngakunllu igaqelleqaqa ateghraghaqa.
66003013	Sigutelgukufsi nagatekek sameng piiqutkek Taghneghak ugpeqanun!
66003014	“Igaqigu una ungipaq yaqulegmun igleghutilghii ugpeqaneng qerngughutkayuget yughaghvigani Laodicea-m. Una ungipaq Amen-meng pinguuq. Ataasiighmelnguuguq, ipapighqengngalghiinguuq liisimakista. Ellngakun Kiyaghneghem ulimakaqaa sangwaa qamaglluku.
66003015	Liisimakamsi saaqutsi: isekinanghitusi, nalighmeng uguqnanghitusi. Isekinalghiisituq nalighmeng uguqnalghiisituq!
66003016	Enkaam maqaghraaggaategpesineng, isekinanghilnguusi nalighmeng uguqnanghilnguusi, qesiinnaqamsi qanemneng!
66003017	Piiqusi aklunginnilusi, allgeghuteghllagaqnilusi, aklungigannilusillu. Iwernga nallukusi seghleghwaaghuusi, nangllegnaghtusi, aklumaasi, ayaangaasi, amsikaghmetusillu.
66003018	Tamaaken apalluqluku ungipaatamsi aklungighisqellusi gold-tengyaghtughtek whangamnun qigeghtengngwaaqameng keneghqun. Tukfighiteklu whangamneng qatelghiineng aatkaneng saapesqelluki kayngunalghiit amsikaghmetellesi. Tukfighiteklu whangamneng aghakaghqameng iyegpesinun esghaasagutesqellusi.
66003019	Tamaakut piniqegkanka nallghusaghaqanka, aghyuughaqankallu. Enkaam sagiqneghughtek, avuteghqellusi seghleghqennanightek.
66003020	Ii-i! Nekevlunga amigmi tenglugtughtunga. Kitum alngunak nagaququmigu meka, amigmeng qelpeghusimakanganga iteghllequnga ellnganun. Enkaam neghelgusighlleqaqa, ellnganllu neghelgusighlleqaanga.
66003021	Kayaalqiilunga enkaam aqumgaanga saaghwani Atama umiilgusiikun aqumutagkenkun. Tawateghpigaq kayaalqiilghii aqumesleqaqa saamkun umiilgusignekun aqumutamkun.
66003022	Sigutelgukufsi, nagatekek Taghneghak sameng piiqutkek ugpeqanun!”
66004001	Taagken tamaakut kingungitneng taawa esghaghaqa qilagmi amik qelpalnguq! Ma nagatkaqa qalghightaatetun ayuqelghii, whaten piiq, “Mayaa whavek. Elpenun esghaghtesnaqanka sangwaat piyaghqat.”
66004002	Tawaninginaq Taghneghagnitunga. Taawa qilagmi esgaghagka umiilgusik aqumutak, kina aqumgaftuq.
66004003	Aqumgalghii umiilgusigni esghaqaaluni iqeghtagketun jasper-enkuk carnelian-enkuk ayuquq. Uvitangani umiilgusim taawa agluk iqeghtakek emerald-etun ayuqlutek.
66004004	Uvitangani umiilgusim aqumutaghllagem taawa yuginaq estamat siipneqluki umiilgusit aqumutalghutet. Taakutgun aqumgatngaftut yuginaq estamat siipneqluki elder-et qatelghiimeng atkuyaaghulluteng, gold-mengllu qaghpaluteng.
66004005	Umiilgusim aqumutaghllagegkeneng kallugem nighwaagpagtii, leveklugtii, tengngaagtiillu piit. Sivugkeni umiilgusim aqumutaghllagem taawa maaghraghvinlek torch-et kumangalghiit, taakut maaghraghvinleguftut taghneghii Kiyaghneghem.
66004006	Umiilgusim aqumutaghllagem sivugkeni taawa kelliisugnilnguq qergesa, meghraakeghtaq crystal-estun. Umiilgusim aqumutaghllagem uvitangani, tamaghhiitni sanigkeni, taawa estamat Unguvalghiit, iyeghllaguftut saaymegteggunllu aqsagemegteggunllu.
66004007	Sivuliq Unguvalghii lion-esugniteftuq, tuunglighhaa Unguvalghii ox-esugniteftuq, pingayaat sangwaa Unguvalghii gginalguftuq yugem gginaaneng, enkaam estamiitangat Unguvalghii tengaakayugtun qawaagpagtun ayuqeftuq.
66004008	Enkaam estamat Unguvalghiit tamaghhaghmeng aghvinlegneng yaqulgututeftut, elngaatall yugusiit iyeghllaguftut talwa qamavek yaqghwita asingitnun. Aghneghtuuman unugtuumaan taaqigalnguut ilaganeghmeng, “Agleghnalghii, agleghnalghii, agleghnalghii, Atanghuuq Kiyaghneq, Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak, ellnganguuq maaten, ellnganguuq sivunghani, ellnganguuq tagiyaghqaq!”
66004009	Taakut estamat Unguvalghiit ilagaghtut ilagaatngitneng usuqillghem, quulvaghillghem, iyamsiqayullghem aqumgalghiimun umiilgusigni aqumutaghllagegni, kiyaghlleghhiimun quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Tawaten pinghata
66004010	yuginaq estamat siipneqluki elder-et niinghutaqut sivungakun aqumgalghiim umiilgusim aqumutaghllagegkenun, manigughaqaat kiyaghlleghhii quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Taakut elder-et qaghpateng mataghlluki lliiqiit sivungakun umiilgusim aqumutaghllagegkenka, enkaam ilagaghaqut,
66004011	“Whangkuta Ataneghput Kiyaghneghput! Elpek tugupestaaghyaghqaqaten usuqelleghllaget, quulvalleghllaget, iyamsiqayulleghllaget aghtughyaghqaanghilleghpenun. Ulimakaqutegpeneng sangwaa qamagtengngwaaghluku, piyukelleghpetun kiyaghllequt enkaam allgeghullequtlu unguvalleghmeng.”
66005001	Taagken esghaghanka iimgat igat aghenqigneghan iigganilluki aqumgalghiim umiilgusim aqumutagkeni. Taakut iimgat igat igaghvikegkaaftut inglugtun, umegluteng maaghraghvinlek seal-eneng.
66005002	Taagken esghaghaqa aghtughyaghqaanghilnguq yaqulek. Iglagtuluni aaptilghii, “Kina itagnaghyaghqaawa ikughyaghqaaluki maaghraghvinlek seal-ellghet qelpeghsaghqaaluki iimgat igat?”
66005003	Taawa avangituq kitumeng alngunak qilagmi, nalighmeng nunami, nalighmeng nunam asingani itagnalghii qelpeghsaghqaaluki iimgat igat, esghaghyaghqaalukillu ilungit.
66005004	Enkaam qiyaaghwaghllagtunga qayughllak naalkenghilkangat kina alngunak itagnalghii qelpeghsaghqaaluki iimgat igat, esghaghyaghqaalukillu ilungit.
66005005	Taagken ataasim elder-eneng piinga, “Qiyagpenang! Ii-i, lion-a. Judah-m ramkenganeng pinguuq, David-emllu kingunqaa. Kayaalqiistenguuq enkaam ellnga itagnaghtuq ikughyaghqaaluki maaghraghvinlek seal-ellghet qelpeghsaghqaaluki iimgat igat.”
66005006	Taagken esghaghaqa Penniighaghaq nekevghalghii saaghwani umiilgusim aqumutam. Qukiitniteftuq estamat unguvalghiit, elder-etlu. Penniighaghaq esghaqaaluni nikimqun tuqutkaq. Maaghraghvinlegneng sighunelguftuq, maaghraghvinlegnengllu iyelguftuq. Taakut iyet maaghraghvinlek taghneghaqii Kiyaghneghem, kayagtekii tamaghhaanun nunam.
66005007	Penniighaghaam takuluku umiillgusigni aqumutagni aqumgalghii, aghenqigneghan iigganeng tuwii iimgat igat.
66005008	Tuguyaki iimgat igat, taakut estamat unguvalghiit, yuginaqlu estamat siipneqluku elder-et sekequutut nunamun sivungakun Penniighaghaam. Tamaghaghmeng tugumiiqluteng harp-meng, gold-mengllu sagneghhaghneng esleqngalghiit incense-meng. Incense-et yughaqiit Kiyaghneghem yugita.
66005009	Ilagaghtut nutaghameng ilagaatmeng whaten: “Itagnaghtuten tuguyaghqaaluki iimgat igat, ikughyaghqaalukillu seal-ngit. Tuqutkaalghiiten, aawpenengllu tukfiqaqaten yuget Kiyaghneghmun. Ellngit tamaghhiitneng pinguut ramkeneng, uluneng, yugneng, nunataanengllu.
66005010	Enkaam Ataneghpagullghanitestaten, priest-ngughtestatenllu Kiyaghnemnnun, umiilgestunllu igleghutillequt nunami.”
66005011	Esghapagumalunga nagaqughanka mengit yaqulelghuteghllaget. Uglaapiglleghhiit kestepagningilnguut. Nekevghatnguftut uvitangani umiilgusim aqumutam, estamatlu unguvalghiit, elder-etlu.
66005012	Iglagtuluteng piiqut, “Penniighaghaq tuqutkaq, itagnaghtuq allgeghsaghqaaluku aghtughyaghqaanghilleq, aklungi, peghqinelleq, iknaqelleq, quulvalleq, nighughqelleq, usuqelleqlu!”
66005013	Taagken nagaqughanka tamaghhaghmeng ulimaaghet, qilagmelnguut, nunamelnguut, nunam asinganilnguut, kelliinilnguutlu. Qamaglluteng pilghiit aqumgalghiimunllu umiilgusigni aqumutagni, Penniighaghaghmunllu, “Usuqillengitek, quulvallengitek, nighughqellengitek, aghtughyaghqaanghillelguteklu quunperugllak kenlengunaan!”
66005014	Taagken estamat unguvalghiit piit, “Amen,” elder-etlu sekequulluteng nunamnun, manigughagket Kiyaghneghenkuk, Penniighaghaankuk.
66006001	Taagken esghapagaqa Penniighaghaam qelpeghtekanga sivuliq seal-elleq taakuneng maaghraghvinlegneng seal-elleghneng. Tawanteftut estamat Unguvalghiit, nagaqughaqa ataasiq pilghii, “Tagi!” Menga kallugestun tengngaalghii.
66006002	Taagken esghaghaqa qatelghii kuuni. Igleghutistenga ughluvelguftuq, qaghpalitaatlu. Ellnganguuq kayaalqiikaq anguyagmineng, enkaam aanuq kayaalqiimanginaghnaluni.
66006003	Penniighaghaam qelpeghsaqminigu tuunglighhaa seal-ellghem, nagaqughaqa tuunglighhaa Unguvalghii pilghii, “Tagi!”
66006004	Ilanga kuunim aanuq, kavilnguuftuq. Igleghutistenga pilleghqalitaat yuget nekeggmetunnaniitesqelluki tuququutesqelluki. Tuunegkaatlu savigpagrugllagmeng.
66006005	Taagken Penniighaghaam qelpeghsaqminigu pingayiitanga seal-ellghem, nagaqughaqa pingayiitangat Unguvalghii pilghii, “Tagi!” Esghaghaqa tagnelghii kuuni. Igleghutistenga aapqaasilguftuq iiggmini.
66006006	Nagaqughaqa mestun ayuqesugnilnguq akulngitni estamat Unguvalghiit pilghii, “Quart-em imaa wheat-a akikaa ataasim denarius-em. Pingayut quart-em imii barley-t akikii ataasim denarius-em. Iwernga naafqegpenakek olive-em mesiigha, wine-allu.”
66006007	Taagken Penniighaghaam qelpeghsaqminigu estamiitanga seal-ellghem, nagaqughaqa estamiitangat Unguvalghiit pilghii, “Tagi!”
66006008	Esghaghaqa aghsaallaak kuuni. Igleghutistengan aatqeftaa Tuqulleq, Hades-em maligtaa. Pilleghqalitkaaftuk tuquqiisqelluki estamaghqellghan nunam yugi savigpagkun, paneghaatelleghqun, aqnighneghqun, ugwighsalghiitgunllu teghikusiitgun nunam.
66006009	Taagken Penniighaghaam qelpeghsaqminigu tallimiitanga seal-ellghem, esghaghanka asinganilluki aghqefigem unguvasiit tuququqat. Tuqutkaqegkangit qayughllak ugpeqegkaqegkangit Kiyaghneghem akuzitangi, ungipaqumanginaqiitlu.
66006010	Akilghuughllagtut, “Kaay Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak Ataneq, agleghnaghtutenllu, ipapiguutenllu! Tamaakut nunam yugi tuququqat whangkunneng, naten tagkaan utaqiinnaqsiki nanqigsaghqaalukillu aghyuughyaghqaalukillu?”
66006011	Taagken ataasikaghtiita unguvasiit tuqutkat qatelghiimeng atkuyaalitkiit, meghnaaliightesqegkiitlu. Tawaten piyaghqaagut qayughllak ilangi ugpeqaalgutngit, Christ-amllu qepghaghtengi tuqusaghqaagut ellngita tuqutellghistun. Enkaam meghnaalinaqut kenlanga uglaghtalngit naamigtekata tamaakut tuqusaghqat.
66006012	Esghapagaqa Penniighaghaam qelpeghsaqminigu aghvinliitanga seal-ellghem nuna ufsuguteghllagtuq. Siqineq tagneghtaa suvinalghiitun qiipaghaghtun ulimakatun goat-em melqwaneng. Tanqiqllu esleqngalghii aawestun lliightuq.
66006013	Ighaleqetaaghet qilagameng ifkaquutut nunamun katam tawaten qigumangilnguut figs-et ifkaquullghiit uqfigmeng anuqeghllagem ufsugutellghatun.
66006014	Qilaga aviighutuq iimgat igat imellghistun, qamaglluteng naayghatlu qiighqatlu nuughquutut nemeggneng.
66006015	Taagken nunam umiilgi, igleghutistengi, pilluwaghtet umiilgit, aklungilnguut, qiilngumightikayuget, tamaghhaghmeng qepghaghtelaaghet, qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu iightuutut qayeni, akulngitnillu uyghaget naayghani.
66006016	Naayghanunllu uyghagnunllu akilghuugut, “Ulleghvikikut iighesqelluta gginaaneng aqumgalghiim aqumutagkeni umiilgusim, sakraalleghllaganengllu Penniighaghaam!
66006017	Kaatuq Aghneq aghyuughilleghqaghllagak whangkunnun enkaam kitumngam anaglleqagu!”
66007001	Tamaakut kingungitneng esghaghanka estamat yaqulget nekevghallghiit estamani kangighiitni nunam. Yaqulget nuqneqeftiit estamat anuqet anuqlinghitesqelluku nunami nalighmeng kelliini nalighmeng alngunak uqfigni.
66007002	Taagken esghaghaqa ilanga yaqulek mayulghii asivaghmeng tugumiilek nalluniighutanganeng unguvalghiim Kiyaghneghem. Yaqulgem akilghuugii estamat yaqulget Kiyaghneghem tuunegkii aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng naafqesqelluku nuna, kelliillu.
66007003	Yaqulgem pii, “Naafqegpenaan nuna nalighmeng kellii nalighmeng uqfiget! Utaqiitek kenlanga seal-ellemnnun qawiitgun qepghaghtengi Kiyaghnemta.”
66007004	Taagken nagaqughanka qafsingutangi yuget seal-elaghtuqiit qawiitgun. Yuget uglaghtalangit 144,000-nguftut tamaghhiitneng ramkenganeng Israel-em.
66007005	Judah-m ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut, Reuben-em ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut, Gad-em ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut,
66007006	Asher-em ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut, Naphtali-m ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut, Manasseh-m ramkenganeng 12,000-nguftut,
66007007	Simeon-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut, Levi-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut, Issachar-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut,
66007008	Zebulun-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut, Joseph-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut, Benjamin-em ramkenganeng, 12,000-nguftut.
66007009	Taam kingunganeng esghaghanka uglapestaaghllaget yulghuteghllaget kitum alngunak kestepagningilkangi! Tamaghhiitneng pinguftut nunataaneng, ramkeneng, yugneng, ulunengllu. Nekevghatnguftut umiilgusim aqumutam, Penniighaghaamllu sivugkenkun. Qiipaghaalluteng qatelghiineng, tugumiighlutengllu palm-em uqfigan avayiitneng.
66007010	Akilghuuteghllagtut, “Yugulilleq Kiyaghnemta pikaa umiilgusigni aqumutagni aqumgalghii, Penniighaghaamllu!”
66007011	Qamaglluteng yaqulget nekevuutut uvitangitni umiilgusim aqumutam, elder-etlu, estamatlu unguvalghiit. Taagken sekequutut nunamun sivungakun umiilgusim aqumutam, manigughaat Kiyaghneq.
66007012	Piit, “Amen! Kiyaghneghput tamaghhaghmi usuqligu, nighughqelligu, iyamsiqayugvikligu, quulvaghligu qayughllak ellnganguuq peghqinellelek, aghtughyaghqaanghillelek, iknaqelleleklu. Ellnga tawatetuq quunperugllak kenlengunaan! Amen!”
66007013	Taagken ataasim elder-eneng aaptaanga, “Kinkungaawat qatelghiimeng qiipaghaghngalghiit, nakenllu pingwaat?”
66007014	Kiimsighaqa, “Yuguniiq, elpek liisimakaten.” Elder-em piinga, “Taakunguut suflughutkat seghleliighrukutaaghllagmeng. Penniighaghaam aawakun aghvigluki qiipaghateng, qateghtestekaqiit.
66007015	Tamaaken apalluqluku nekevghatnguut sivugkeni Kiyaghneghem umiilgusiin aqumutagkeni. Manigughaqaat aghneghtuumaan unugtuumaan Temple-ngani. Aqumgalghiim umiilgusigni aqumutagni azigutighlleqii nayuutngalleghmineng.
66007016	Iyatiqnanighllequt, nalighmeng meqsugyugnanighllequt. Siqinghem nalighmeng alngunak uguqnaghllalghiim ugunnaanghitii.
66007017	Penniighaghaq umiilgusim aqumutam saaghwanilnguq penniighniightekelleqaat. Maghyaghqughlleqii sengngulghiinun meghnun unguvallelitikayugnun, Kiyaghneghemllu quningightughlleqii.”
66008001	Penniighaghaam qelpeghtaqngamigu maaghraghvinliitanga seal-ellghem, qilagmi qallegnanighwaaghutut entaqun aflum avellghatun tagkaan.
66008002	Taagken esghaghanka taakut maaghraghvinlek yaqulget nekevghalghiit Kiyaghneghem sivungakun. Tamaghhaghmeng qalghightaatenguutut.
66008003	Taagken ilanga yaqulek, tugumiilek gold-meng sagneghmeng, tagiluni nekevuq aghqefigegni. Tuunegkaat incense-elghutmeng ilatesqelluki qamaglluki yughiitnun Kiyaghneghem yugan. Yaqulgem llii gold-egnun aghqefigegnun sivunganilnguuk umiilgusim aqumutam.
66008004	Incense-em agepsaa mayughtuq maligulluni yughallghitgun Kiyaghneghem yugita. Mayughtut Kiyaghneghmun sagneghmeng yaqulgem tugumiighaneng.
66008005	Taagken yaqulgem, tuguluku sagneq, imighaa kenghaneng aghqefigem. Sagneghem imii miluutii nunamun. Enkaam kallugughteghllagtuq, kavlegtaghllagtuq, nighwaaghpagtaghllagtuq, nunallu ufsuguteghllagtuq.
66008006	Taagken maaghraghvinlek yaqulget, qalghightaatelget yataaghqut qalghightinaluteng.
66008007	Sivuliim yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Taagken kaftekragenkuk, kenghenkuk akumlutek aawmeng nunamun miluutagket. Enkaam pingayughqellgha nunam paneghtuq, pingayughqellghitlu uqfiget paneghtut, qamagllutengllu sungaghyulghiit vegaaghet paneghtut.
66008008	Tuunglighhaan yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Taagken sangwaa naayghaghllagsugnilnguq kumaghugngalghii, miluutaat kelliinun. Enkaam pingayughqellgha kelliim aawgughtuq.
66008009	Pingayughqellghit kelliinilnguut unguvalghiit tuquut, pingayughqellghitlu angyaghpaget naafqengngwaaghii.
66008010	Pingayiitangita yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Taagken ighaleqetaaghllak, kumaghughngalghii torch-etun, qilagameng ifkaghtuq pingayughqellghitgun kiiwetlu sengngulghiitlu meghet.
66008011	Aatgha ighaleqetaaghem “Sungaghni”. Pingayughqellgha meghem sungaghnightekaq enkaam yulghuteghllaget meghluteng tuqukat qayughllak meq sungaghnightekaalghii.
66008012	Estamiitangita yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Taagken saam tenpii siqineq, tanqiq, ighaleqataaghetlu, enkaam pingayughqellghi mamlegtii. Pingayughqellgha aghneghem mamlegtaa, pingayughqellghallu unugem.
66008013	Esghaghaqallu nagaqughaqallu qawaagpak tengaalghii quulvani, iglagtuluni pilghii, “Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq! Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq! Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq! Kinguliit pingayut yaqulget qalghighhnaqegkumegteki qalghightaateteng, taagken elngaatall seghlepestaaghunaqnguuq yugnun nunami kiyaghlleghhiit tamaani pilleghni!”
66009001	Taagken tallimiitangita yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Esghaghaqa ighaleqetaaq ifkaqaq qilagameng nunamun, key-litkaaftuqlu qelpeghtesqelluku asilighneghilnguq laawaaq.
66009002	Ighaleqetaaghem qelpeghtaa asilighneghilnguq laawaaq. Tesamaken agepsuq aanuq katam agepsaatun egllughllagem repall siqineqlu qilagallu mamlegtaa agepsum.
66009003	Taagken agepsumeng aanleghaatut locust-elghutet, nunamunllu ukigtuutut. Kaapigaqleghutekat yugneng, katam scorpion-et kaapiiqellghistun.
66009004	Ungipaatkaalghiit locust-et naafqefqiita vegaaghet pisqelluki nalighmeng sungaghyuget nunivagseghat nalighmeng alngunak uqfiget. Aqnightesqegkiillu tamaakunginaat yuget Kiyaghneghem nalluniillghilkangi qawiitgun.
66009005	Locust-enun tuququghtesnaniqii tamaakut yuget, taawanginaq ikfiqesteghllagestesqegkii tallimanun tanqinun. Scorpion-et kaapellghistun yuget ikfiqeghllakat.
66009006	Taakuni tallimani tanqini tamaakut yuget tuquyupigllequt, iwernga tuqupagningillequt. Yuget tuqunaqeghllagllequt, iwernga tuqunaanghitut.
66009007	Locust-et esghaqaaluteng kuunistun ayuqut pilluwamun yataaghqegkat. Naasqwitniteftut llangaqa gold-et qaghpat, gginiitlu yuget gginiistun ayuqluteng.
66009008	Nuyiit aghnat nuyiistun ayuqluteng, gguutngitlu lion-et gguutngistun ayuqluteng.
66009009	Yugusimegteggun qaltelguftut esghaqaaluteng savikenghaaghet sakimagiitat. Yaqwghitallu sulugtallghit llangaqa chariot-et kuunituqat sukeralghiit pilluwamun.
66009010	Papelguftut scorpion-estun kaapikayugmeng. Enkaam tallimanun tanqinun yuget ikfiqesteghllagiit papegmeggneng kapughluki.
66009011	Umiilelguftut igleghutilghii ellngitneng, yaqulguftuq esghaamakistenga asilighneghilnguum laawaaghem. Hebrew-stun aatgha Abaddon, Greek-estun Apollyon, (whaten pisiq, “Naafqiista”).
66009012	Sivuliq seghlepestaaghllak alpagtuq, taam kingunganeng paninang maalghuk seghlepestaaghllagek piyaghqaaguk.
66009013	Taagken aghvinliitangita yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Nagaqughaqa ma gold-egneng aghqefigegneng estamaneng sighunelgegneng tekerqamegnekun Kiyaghneghem sivunganilnguuk.
66009014	Taam mem aleghqughaa aghvinliitangat yaqulget qalghightaatelek. Pikaa, “Itemutiki estamat yaqulget asighqengngalghiit kiigwllagegni Euphrates-egni!”
66009015	Enkaam estamat yaqulget itemutkii. Yataaghqegkaaftut taamun aflumun, aghneghmun, tanqimun, ayumiqulleghmunllu tuquqiisqelluki pingayughqellghi yuget.
66009016	Ungipaataanga uglaghtalangitneng kuunitgun igleghlleghhiit pilluwaghtet, 200 million-nguftut.
66009017	Esghaghwaallemkun esghaghanka kuunit, igleghutistengitlu. Sakimagiitiit kenghestun kaviteftut, sapphire-estun sungaghyukegteftut, sulphur-estun, yellow-nguftut. Kuunit naasqwit lion-et naasqwistun ayuqeftut, qaanghitneng aanut keneq, agepsuq, sulphur-a.
66009018	Taakutgun pingayutgun naafqiilleghllagteggun tuququghiit pingayughqellghi yuget. Kuunit qaanghitneng aanleghaatut keneq, agepesuq, sulphur-a.
66009019	Kuunit aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut qaanghitnillu paapgitnillu. Paapgit nemeghyastun ayuqelghiit naasqulget kiitiqusiit yugnun.
66009020	Ilangi tamaakut yuget tuqutellghilkangit tamaakut naafqiilleghllaget, avuteghqumangilnguut pegsugumangilkangit kiyaghnengllaqateng. Manigughnaniimangitiit tughneghaat, kiyaghnengllaqatlu ulimaaghet gold-meng, silver-meng, siilumeng, uyghagmeng, unaghsimengllu. Tamaakut esghaasaghqaanghilnguut, nagaquusaghqaanghilnguut, nalighmeng piyugyaghqaanghilnguut.
66009021	Talwa avuteghqutkumangilkangit yugtalleteng, alignaghtaalleteng, nengughtegpenateng atuqutelleghteng, nalighmeng teglegniilleteng.
66010001	Taagken esghaghaqa ilanga aghtiigateghllak yaqulek ukilghii qilagmeng. Pilugugngaftuq qilagwaaghmeng, naasqwan qulangani agluk, gginaa siqineghtun kuukgulluni, ighukeklu kumaghulghiistun pillar-estun ayuqlutek.
66010002	Tugumiiqeftii iimgat igaghhaat qelpalnguut. Aghenqigneghet itegani tuutestii kelliim meghan qaayngakun, saghumigneghetlu itegani tuutestii quutkun.
66010003	Iglagtupiglluni akilghuuguq lion-em uwighhniillghatun. Akilghuughllagyan maaraghvinlegyaget kalluget tengngaagtaghtut.
66010004	Maaghraghvinlegyaget kalluget tengngaagtaghyata igaqnaqsaghanka sameng pillghit. Iwernga nagaqughaqa ma qilagmeng pilghii, “Aksaqiki maaghraghvinlegyaget kalluget sameng pillghit, igaqegpenaki!”
66010005	Taagken esghaghaqa yaqulek nekevghalghii kelliikunllu quutkunllu. Qilagmun nengugutii aghenqigneghet iiggeni,
66010006	akeqiiq Kiyaghneghem aatghakun kiyaghlleghhii quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Ellngangulghii ulimaghikaq qilagameng, nunameng, kelliineng, samengllu tamaghhaaneng taakunilngughneng. Yaqulek piiq, “Pilleghqaq kaatuq.
66010007	Iwernga maaghraghvinliitangita yaqulgem qalghighhnaqegkumigu qalghightaatni, taawa Kiyaghneghem apeghiighlleqaa uspeqilleni qayvighsimangilkenni sivunghani. Uspeqillgha ataasiiguq aapqaa qepghaghteminun uuknaliqistenun.”
66010008	Taagken nagaquqama mem qilagmeng aleghqughlaataghaanga, “Aglaghluten tuguki qelpalnguut iimgat igat iigganilnguut yaqulgem nekevghalghiim kelliikunllu quutkunllu.”
66010009	Yaqulegmun aglaghlunga tungsighanka imegngalghiit igaghhaat. Piinga, “Tuguluki neghiki; aqsaqughpeni qugaagllequt iwernga qaneghpeni muugallequt honey-stun.”
66010010	Yaqulgem iigganeng tuguluki iimgat igaghhaat neghanka, imani qanemni muugatut honey-stun. Iwernga tuufsaqenka aqsaquqa quwaagtaa.
66010011	Taagken piitnga, “Allameng uuknaliqutkepestaaghyaghqaqaten yulghutet, nunatalghutet, alaaghhiinaat ululghutet, umiilelghutetlu.”
66011001	Taagken kitum ayaviilitaanga usputaasiqesqelluku. Enkaam kayagtaanga, “Usputaghyaghtughhu Kiyaghneghem Temple-nga, aghqefigeklu, kesnaketenllu yuget maniguullghiit tawani.
66011002	Iwernga usputaghpenaan Kiyaghneghem Temple-ngan court-nga eslataanilnguq, qayughllak tuunegkaaguq Gentile-enun. Tutmaasghaqnaqngwaat Agleghnalghii Neghllak forty two-ghyagni tanqini.
66011003	Ungipaghtegka pilugugngalghiik sackcloth-meng, aghtughyaghqaanghillelelleqagka uuknaliqesqellukek 1,260 aghneghnun.”
66011004	Maalghuk ungipaghtek maalghuguuk olive-em uqfigek, maalghuguuklu kenelghutam tunemakek nekevghalghiik sivungani Atanghan nunam.
66011005	Enkaam kitum alngunak aqnighhnaqutkegkumikek, qaanghegkeneng kenghem aanluni tuququghlleqiik anguyagik. Kitumllu alngunak aqnighhnaqutkegkumikek taawa tuqusaghqaaghllequq.
66011006	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk qilaga eslallugughnaniisqelluku uuknaliqellghegkegni. Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk meghet aawughtesqelluki. Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuklu allaaghhiinaghneng ikfiqnalghiineng seghleliighllagneng, awen tawaten piiqellequk piyukelleghmegetun.
66011007	Apeghiiqayek ungipaneghmeng, asilighneghilngughmeng laawaaghmeng aanellequq teghikusalluuk. Pilluwaghlleqaak enkaam kayaalqegkumikek tuqulleqaak.
66011008	Kemegkwaaghik tamaanllequk tuumngani neghllagem, Atanghita qaquuraghvigani. Taana neghllak aatqeftuq Sodom-emengllu Egypt-mengllu qayughllak yugi Sodom-eghmiistunllu Eygpt-eghmiistunllu ayuqelghiit.
66011009	Yuget nunataghhaaneng, ramkeneng, allaaghhiinaghneng uluneng, nunatanengllu tagillequt esghaghnalukek kemegkwaaghik. Tawaten pillequt pingayunun aghneghnun avellelighluku, kitumunllu alngunak qungughtesnanighlleqagket.
66011010	Taakuk uuknaliqistek ikfiqestighllakaalghiik nunam yugitnun. Enkaam yuget quyaghllagllequt, tunquullequtlu tunusameng ilameggnun, apalluqluku tuqullghegkenun.
66011011	Iwernga kingungitneng pingayut aghneghet avellelighluku Kiyaghneghem aneghneni iteghtestekaa uuknaliqistegnun. Enkaam nekevyayek, qamaglluteng tamaakut esghaghlukek alingruughuteghllakat.
66011012	Taagken uuknaliqistek nagaqughaak iglagtupiglleghhii ma qilagmeng pilghii, “Mayughtek whavek!” Anguyagik esghapagumaluki mayughtuk qilagmun qilawaaghqun.
66011013	Tawani pilleghmi qevuutepiglluni nuna ufsuguteghllagtuq; qulaghqellgha neghllagem naavuq. Enkaam seven thousand yuuk tuququghaa nunam ufsugutelleghllagan. Tamaakut yuget yaywaasekat kakavaataateghllagluteng usuquughtaat Kiyaghnegha qilagem.
66011014	Tuunglighhaa seghlepestaaghllagem seghleliillghem alpagtuq, iwernga esghaghteggu pingayaa seghlepestaaghllagem seghleliillghem kaasaghtungestaghtuq.
66011015	Taagken maaghraghvinliitangita yaqulgem qalghightaatni qalghightaa. Iglagtupiglluteng met qilagmi piit, “Ataneghpagullgha nunam ataneghpagulqaaghtaak Atanemtallu Christ-anganllu, enkaam Ellnga igleghutillequq quunperugllak kenlengunaan!”
66011016	Taagken yuginaq estamat siipneqluku siivanlleghet aqumgalghiit umiilgusitgun aqumutamegteggun Kiyaghneghem sivungani, gginateng sekelluki manigughaat Kiyaghneq.
66011017	Pikaat: “Iyamsiqayugvikamken, Ataneq Kiyaghneq Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq, kiyaghlleghhii maaten, iiwlengllu kiyaghlleghhii! Tugumaan aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghllagen enkaam piinlightuten igleghutimun.
66011018	Nunam yugi sakriteghllagtut, iwernga maaten sakraalleghqan kaatuq. Tuqukat nanqigsaghqaaghtut. Akileghtughyaghqaaghtaten qepghaghteten uuknaliqistet, agleghnalghiit yugten, qamagllukillu siivakilghiit elpeneng, ukavanlenguutlu apeghseghutlu. Tuququlleghqan kaatuq tamaakunun tuququqaneng yugneng nunami.”
66011019	Taagken Kiyaghneghem Temple-nga qilagmelnguq qelpateftuq. Tawani Temple-ngani esghaghagka Ark-ek Kiyaghneghem Covenant-elghutakek. Taagken nighwaagpagtaghtuk, eftughtaghtuk, tengngaagtaghtuklu kallugek; nuna ufsuguteghllagtuq, kaftekragughteghllagaallu!
66012001	Taagken qilagami sangwaa saghiighanapiglleghhii aliightuq liigikusighqaghput piyaghqamun: Aghnaq pilugugluni siqineghmeng, itegii tanqikun nekeglluteng, naasqumikun qaghpaluni qula maalghuk siipneqluku ighaleqetaaghneng.
66012002	Qumilguftuq, ighniyugem aqnighqelluku lliighaa, aanaqellghan taghnughhaam araghqaa.
66012003	Taagken qilagami sangwaa ilanga saghiighanapiglleghhii aliightuq liigikusighqaghput apeghiighnaqelghiimun: Taawa kavilnguq dragon-eghllak, maaghraghvinlek naasqulek, qula sighunelek, enkaam qamaglluteng naasqwi qaghpalgututeftut.
66012004	Papegmineng saqipgutii nunamun pingayughqellghi qilagam ighaleqetaaghi. Taagken dragon-a nekevegkaq manungakun aghnam neghnaluku taghnughhaa ighniighesnaqagu.
66012005	Aghnaq ighnenguq, igleghusaghqii qamagtengngwaaghluki nunam yugi iron-meng anagutalighluni. Iwernga aghnam taghnughhaa akuqaghluku aglaataat Kiyaghneghmun, umiilgusigkenunllu aqumutagnun.
66012006	Aghnaq qimagtuq kilgaanun. Tamaani Kiyaghneghem yataaghqutkaqegkanga nekaghqameng, aflengaksaghqaqegkangat 1,260 aghneghet.
66012007	Taagken qilagmi pillugutut. Michael-enkut yaqulkullghiit pilluwaghaat dragon-a. Dragon-enkut yaqulkullghiit pilluwaghiit Michael-enkut yaqulkullghiit,
66012008	iwernga Michael-enkut kayaalqaat dragon-a. Enkaam dragon-enkut yaqulkullghiit qilagmesaghqaananightut.
66012009	Qilagmeng miluutaat dragon-eghllak. (Neghightaluk nemeghyaq aatgha Tughneghaq, nalighmeng Tughneghaq, puughqughtenga nunam yugan.) Miluutaat nunamun yaqulegtuumaan.
66012010	Taagken nagaqughaqa ma iglagtuluni qilagmeng pilghii, “Whaa kaasimaat Kiyaghneghem yugulighillgha, aghtughyaghqaanghillgha, ataneghpagullghallu, Christ-anganllu aghtughyaghqaanghillgha. Salin Tughneghaq miluutellghilluku qilagmeng, aghneghtuumaan unugtuumaan anaggutnganiiqii ugpeqaalguteput Kiyaghneghmun.
66012011	Ugpeqaalgutemta kayaalqumaat aawakun Penniighaghaam, ungipaqelleghmegteggunllu Kiyaghneghem ipapighqellgha. Talwa tuquyaghngaaghmeng ayuqut Christ-a apalluqluku.
66012012	Enkaam qamagllusi kiyaghlleghhiini qilagmi, quyateghllagtek! Iwernga seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi nunamelngughnillu kelliinilngughnillu! Tughneghaam ukigvikumiisi, sakriteghllaguuq qayughllak liisimakaa pilleghqiighusaghtughtuq.”
66012013	Dragon-em liigiksamigu nunamun miluutelleni, malighqaghaa aghnaq ighnengegkaq.
66012014	Iwernga aghnaq tuunegkaat qawaagpagrugllagem yaqugkeneng tengaasqelluku kilgaanun. Tamaani paqniillequq nemeghyameng, aflengakelleqaatlu pingayut ayumiqullghet, aghvinlek tanqit ilalluki.
66012015	Taagken nemeghyam ughyuutaa meq kiiwestun ayuqelghii aghnaq maaqutesqelluku.
66012016	Iwernga nunam kayusiitaa aghnaq. Nunam agitaghulluku tuuftaa meghllak dragon-em ughyuutkaa.
66012017	Taagken dragon-em ugumiyaguteghllagluku aghnaq, enkaam pilluwaghyaghtughii qamaglluki ilangi kingunghi. Tamaakunguut qaatkutngalghiit Kiyaghneghem qelghusiitnun, ataasiighmelnguutlu ipalleghmun apeghtuusaqegkaanun Jesus-em.
66012018	Taagken dragon-a nekevuq kelliim esnaakun.
66013001	Taagken esghaghaqa teghikusalluuk aanelghii kelliimeng. Qulanguftut sighunghi, maaghraghvinlek naasqulek. Qamaglluteng sighunghi qaghpalgututeftut, tamaghhaghmeng naasqut igaqughvikngaftut ateghmeng seghlequulghiimeng Kiyaghneghmun.
66013002	Taana teghikusalluuk leopard-esugnituq, itegii kayngem itegaatun ayuqelghiit, qaangha lion-em qaanghatun ayuqelghii. Dragon-em tuunaa teghikusalluuk aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmineng, umiilgusigmineng aqumutagneng, igleghutiyaghqaaghtestaallu ateni atuqluku.
66013003	Ataasiq naasqwa teghikusalluugem tuqutesugnitkaq kiitighluni, iwernga taana kiiyallgha maamegkaaftuq. Iingunaghhaghmeng nunam yugita saghiighayagulluku maligtaat teghikusalluuk.
66013004	Qamaglluteng yuget manigughaat dragon-a qayughllak teghikusalluugmun tuunegkanga aghtughyaghqaanghilleni. Manigughaatlu teghikusalluuk, piit, “Kinangam teghikusalluugtun ayuqa? Kitumngam pilluwaghlleqagu?”
66013005	Taagken teghikusalluuk akuziyaghqaaghtuq. Aangaayugteghllagtuq, seghlepestaatunllu akuzitkaa Kiyaghneq. Aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq igleghutiyaghqaaluni 42-nun tanqinun.
66013006	Piinlighaa seghlepestaatun akuzitkilleni Kiyaghneghmeng, aatghaneng, kiyaghfiganeng, tamaakunengllu kiyaghlleghhiineng qilagmi.
66013007	Aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaa pilluwiisqelluki Kiyaghneghem yugi, kayaalqesqellukillu. Igleghusaghqaaghtestii qamaglluki ramket, yuget, ulut, nunataanilnguutlu yuget.
66013008	Qamaglluni nunami kiyaghlleghhiim manigughlleqaat teghikusalluuk. Iwernga tamaakut aatghit igaqngalghiit Igiitgun Unguvallghem manigughnaanghitaat. Kiyaghneghem igaqegkaqii aatghit nunangllallghilluni. Taakut igat pikii Penniighaghaam, yuget tuqutkiita.
66013009	“Nagatek, sigutelgukufsi:
66013010	Kina alngunak tuguyaghqaakumi, tugulleqaat. Kina alngunak tuqusaghqaakumi savigpagkun, tuqulleqaat savigpagkun. Taakuk whaten pisiiguk: Kiyaghneghem yugi nuqenneghtuyaghqaagutlu ugpeqillelguyaghqaagutlu.”
66013011	Taagken esghaghaqa ilanga teghikusalluuk nunameng aanelghii. Maalghugegneng sighunelguftuq penniighaghaam sighunghatun, akuziiqlu dragon-etun.
66013012	Sivuliq teghikusalluuk tawanlluku tunglighhaan teghikusalluugem atuqaa qamaglluku aghtughyaghqaanghillgha. Taaggun aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun maniguutestii qamaglluki nunam yugi sivulighmun teghikusalluugmun. (Kiiyallghan tuqutesugnitkaa, iwernga kiiyallgha maamegkaq.)
66013013	Tuunglighhaa teghikusalluuk allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataghtuq, talwa qilagmeng nunamun keneq ukigtestaa yuget esghaamanghitni.
66013014	Tuunglighhaa teghikusalluuk aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq allaaghlluwaghtiyaghqaaluni tawantellghani sivuliim teghikusalluugem. Tamaagun allaaghlluwhaghtilleghteggun puughtii qamaglluki yuget kiyaghlleghhiit nunami. Qelghii yuget nangaghnenglliisqelluki quulviisqelluku sivuliq teghikusalluuk. (Taana tuqutkaayalghii savigpagkun iwernga unguvaqaq.)
66013015	Tuunglighhaa teghikusalluuk aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq aneghnengestiyaghqaaluni unguvalleghmeng nangaghneghanun teghikusalluugem. Enkaam nangaghneq akuziyaqlegughtuq. Taagken nangaghneghem qelghii yuget tuquqiisqelluki tamaakut maniguusunghilnguut ellminun.
66013016	Tuunglighhaan teghikusalluugem nalluniightiisqii number-meng qamaglluki yuget aghenqigneghitgun iiggitgun nalighmeng qawiitgun. Tawaten qelghii aangwaaghughngaata, ukavansaghngaata, aklungiteghngaata, aklumaghngaata, qepghaghtelaaghunghiteghngaata, qepghaghtelaaghughngaata.
66013017	Kina alngunak tukfighiyaghqaanghituq nalighmeng akikiyaghqaanghituq wetkuqun nalluniillelgukumi. Taana nalluniilkutaq teghikusalluugem aatqaa nalighmeng aatghan number-kaa.
66013018	Peghqinellelgem liigiknaaghaa una. Sumeghtaghalleghmikun liigikelleqaa sameng pisiitanga teghikusalluugem number-nga. Taana number-a yugmun aatghuuq, 666-nguuq.
66014001	Taagken esghaghaqa taawa Penniighaghaq nekevghalghii Naayghami Zion-mi. Ellnganituteftut 144,000 yuget, qagumegteggun igaqfikegkat aatghaneng, Atanganllu aatghaneng.
66014002	Nagaqughaqallu ma qilagmeng. Nagatkaaluni llangaqa qallangatun meghllaget, tengngaagatunllu kallugem. Nagatkaqa ma llangaqa harp-estet aynganangallghiistun harp-etgun ayuqelghii.
66014003	144,000 yuget nekevghatnguftut sivungani umiilgusim aqumutam, estamatlu unguvalghiit, elder-etlu. Taakut yuget ilagaghaqeftut ilagaateghraghaghmeng. Kitum alngunak taana ilagaan liisaghqaqenghilkanga iwerngaqun 144,000 yuget. Ellnginguut Kiyaghneghem yugulikii qungangitneng nunam yuganeng.
66014004	Taakut yuget nukeggnaghqumangilnguugut aghnameng atuqilleghqun. Maligtaqaat Penniighaghaq navek alngunak pinghani. Kiyaghneghem yugulikaqii akulngitneng nunam yugan, tunusaqsuwhaaghuut Kiyaghneghmunllu Penniighaghaghmunllu.
66014005	Iqlengiqigatngwaaghtut. Apalliitut.
66014006	Taagken esghaghaqa ilanga yaqulek tengaalghii quulvaghpani. Aapghii kenlengilnguut Pinilghiit Ungipat nunami kiyaghlleghhiinun, tamaghhiitnun nunataanilngughnun yugnun, ramkenun, ulunun, yugnunllu.
66014007	Iglagtupiglluni piiq, “Alikiteggu Kiyaghneq, usuqiteggu aangelleghllaga! Yugneng nanqigtilleghqaa kaatuuq. Manigughteggu ulimaghikaq qilagameng, nunameng, kelliineng, sengngulghiinengllu meghneng!”
66014008	Tuunglighhaan yaqulgem maligtaa sivuliq, whaten pimaghmi, “Naavumaaq! Babylon-eghllak naavumaaq! Babylon-em seghletun atuqillgha sex-meng wine-etun ayuquq. Wine-mineng meghesqughii qamaglluki nunam yugi, enkaam ellngitallu seghletun sex atuqsagutaat. Enkaam tawaten pilleghmegteggun Kiyaghneghmun aghyuughteslequt.”
66014009	Pingayaak yaqulgem maligutuq sivuliignun. Iglagtupiglluni piiq, “Kitum alngunak maniguqumigu teghikusalluuk, nangaghneghallu, allgeghsimakumigullu nalluniilleq qagumikun nalighmeng iiggmikun
66014010	meghyaghqaqaa wine-nga Kiyaghneghem sakraallghan. Taana wine-a meliimangilnguq kuuvegkaq qayuusimun Kiyaghneghem sakraalqaa! Kina alngunak maniguutkaq taakugnun ikfiqeghllagyaghqaaguq keneghmillu, sulphur-millu, sivungitni agleghnalghiitlu yaqulget, Penniighaghaamllu.
66014011	Kenghem ikfiqesteghllaglleqii, agepsaa mayughllequq quunperugllak kenlengunaan. Ikfiqnanighnaanghitut aghneghtuumaan unugtumaan, maniguutkaatmeggneng teghikusalluugmun, nangaghneghanun, nalluniiqaatmeggnengllu aatghaneng.”
66014012	Tamaakut qamaglluteng whaten pisiigut, Kiyaghneghem yugi nuqenneghtupestaaghyaghqaagut. Tamaakunguut qaatkutngalghiit Kiyaghneghem qelghusaanun, ataasiighmellutengllu Jesus-mun.
66014013	Taagken nagaqughaqa qilagmeng ma pilghii, “Igaqigu una: Whaken kenlekluku quyasaghqaagut tuquyaghqat qepghaasimaluku Ataneq!” Taghneghak piik, “Quyanapestaaghtut! Meghnaalillequt ughleghiilleghmeggneng, yuget neqamikelleqiit aneghneghqillghit.”
66014014	Taagken esghaghaqa taawa qatelghii qilawaaq, qilawaghqun aqumgaftuq llangaqa ighnegha yugem. Naasqumikun gold-meng qaghpalguftuq, tugumiiqeftaallu ipelghii pakregmelnguq savik.
66014015	Taagken ilanga yaqulek aanuq Temple-meng. Akilghuughllagaa aqumgalghii qilagwaaghmi, “Pakregmelnguq savigen atuqluku unataa, qayughllak unatalleghqaq kaatuq, nunam piitestekaa unataghyaghqaaghtengnguuq!”
66014016	Enkaam qilawaaghmi aqumgalghiim pakregmelnguq savini unataasiqaa nunamun.
66014017	Taagken ilanga yaqulek aanuq Temple-meng qilagmi, ellngallu ipelghiimeng pakregmelngughmeng savilguftuq.
66014018	Taagken ilanga yaqulek aanuq aghqefigegneng aflengakistenga kenghan aghqefigem. Akilghuughllagaa yaqulek ipelghiimeng pakregmelngughmeng savilek, “Savigpeneng kepughqi grapes-et nunam vine-nganeng, qayughllak grapes-et qigumaat!”
66014019	Enkaam yagulgem pakregmelnguq savini saqipgutaa nunamun, kepughii grapes-et nunam vine-nganeng. Taagken miluqutaqii grapes-em qageghquusighllaganun. Taananguuq Kiyaghneghem sakritfigllaga.
66014020	Grapes-mun qageghquusik eslataanilnguuk neghllagem. Grapes-et qageghqughyalghiimeng aawk maaquq qageghquusineng 180 miles tagtalkelluku, 5 feet uusqaghtulkelluku.
66015001	Taagken qilagami aliightuq sangwaa saghiighanapiglleghhii liisimakusighqaghput piyaghqamun. Taawa maaghraghvinlek yaqulget, tagitilghiit maaghraghvinlegneng seghleliilleghllagneng. Taakut seghleliilleghllaget taaqniitkeftii Kiyaghneghem sakraalleghllagan.
66015002	Taagken esghaghaqa kelliisugnilnguq meghraakegtaq siqinwaaghestun, akumngalghii keneghmeng. Esghaghankallu kayaalqiikat teghikusalluugmeng, nangaghneghaneng, aatghanllu number-nganeng. Nekevghatnguftut saaghwaghni kelliim, harp-elightuulluteng Kiyaghneghem tuunegkiitneng ellngitnun.
66015003	Ilagaghaqeftut ilagaatanganeng Moses-em, (Kiyaghneghem qepghaghtenga), ilagaatanganengllu Penniighaghaam: “Kaay, Ataneq Kiyaghneq Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghiteghllak, qepghalleghten seghleghllaguut, allaaghlluwhaghllaguut! Kaay, umiilgat nunam yugita, elpek salleghten elqughutngaatlu ipanguutlu!
66015004	Ataneq, qamagtengngwaaghluteng yuget alikelleqaaten, quulvaghlleqaatlu aatghen! Ellnginaaguten agleghnalghii! Qamagtengngwaaghluteng nunatat manigughyaghtughlleqaaten, qayughllak liisimakegkangat nanqigtilleghten elqughutngalghiit!”
66015005	Taam kingunganeng esghaghaqa qilagmi qelpeghtekangat Temple-a. (Agleghnalleghpigaaguq Na, ellngan yugita liisimakusiqaat Kiyaghneq tawanniluku.)
66015006	Taagken maaghraghvinlek yaqulget aanleghaatut Temple-meng kelqelluteng maaghraghvinlegneng seghleliilleghllagneng. Tamaghhaghmeng atkuyaaghulluteng qateghrakegtameng nighulghiimeng, sakimagmegteggun gold-meng tafsiluteng.
66015007	Taagken ataasim unguvalghiim estamaneng taakuneng, gold-meng sagneliqughii maaghraghvinlek yaqulget. Taakut sagneghet imighngaat sakraalleghllaaganeng Kiyaghneghem, kiyaghlleghhii quunperugllak kenlengunaan.
66015008	Temple-em ilunga agepsughqaagaa Kiyaghneghem nighughqellghanengllu, aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu. Kina alngunak iteghnaanghituq Temple-mun kenlanga maaghraghvinlek seghleliilleghllaget kenletghuutellghitnun, tagitkiit maaghraghvinlek yaqulget.
66016001	Taagken Temple-meng nagaqughaqa iglagtulghii ma, ungipaaskangi maaghraghvinlek yaqulget, “Kuuvyaghtughteki nunamun maaghraghvinlek sagneghet Kiyaghneghem sakraalleghllagi!”
66016002	Enkaam sivuliim yaqulgem sagneni kuuvyaghtughaa nunamun. Taagken seghlepestaaghllaget aqnighnapiglleghhiit pupiget piitquutut nalluniillengegkanun teghikusalluugmeng. Tamaakunguut maniguutkat nangaghneghanun.
66016003	Tuunglighhaan yaqulgem sagneni kuuvaa kelliinun. Taagken kellii aawatun tuqukam yugem lliighluni, enkaam qamaglluteng unguvalghiit kelliini tuqulaghaatut.
66016004	Pingayiitangita yaqulgem sagneni kuuvaa kiigwnunllu, sengngununllu meghnun enkaam aawughquutut.
66016005	Nagaqughaqa igleghutilghii meghneng yaqulek pilghii, “Kaay, Agleghnalghii Kiyaghneq, elpenguuq maaten kiyaghlleghhii, elpenguuq quunpeng kiyaghlleghhii! Nanqigtilleghtenllu aghyuughilleghtenllu elqughutngaat.
66016006	Yuget tuququqaqiit yugten, uuknaliqistetenllu, enkaam meghyaghqalitaten aawmeng. Tawaten aghyuughyaghqaaluteng ellmeggneng allgeghtekaqaat!”
66016007	Taagken nagaqughaqa aghqefigegneng ma pilghii, “Aa-a Ataneq, Kiyaghneq Aghtughyaghqaanghilnguq! Ipanguutlu elqughutngaatlu nanqigtilleghqaghten!”
66016008	Estamiitangita yaqulgem saghneni kuuvaa siqineghqun enkaam Kiyaghneghem siqinghem kenghanun paneghtestii yuget.
66016009	Siqinghem uguqnaghllagan paneghtestii yuget. Enkaam sanguughteghllagaat aatgha Kiyaghneghem, igleghutistengutanganeng tamaavek seghleliilleghllagnun. Avuteghqenghitutlu, usuqenghitaatlu Kiyaghneghem aangelleghllaga.
66016010	Tallimiitangita yaqulgem sagneni kuuvaa teghikusalluugem umiilgusiin aqumutagkenkun, enkaam ataneghpagullgha mamleghqwaagaa. Yuget ikfiqem uluteng amqeghqughiit.
66016011	Sanguughteghllagaat Kiyaghnegha qilagem apalluqluku aqnighqelleghmeggnengllu pupigtaalleghmeggnengllu. Avuteghqenghitutlu seghletun pilleghmeggneng.
66016012	Aghvinliitangita yaqulgem sagneni kuuvaa kiiwllagegnun Euphrates-egnun. Kiiwek pateghtuk yataaghqunnaluki tuumkaghqameng umiilget tagilghiit asivaghmeng.
66016013	Taagken esghaghanka pingayut nukeggnalghiit tughneghaat frog-esugnilnguut. Aanut qaanghitneng dragon-em, teghikusalluugem, uuknaliqistesighwaaghemllu.
66016014	Taakut tughneghaat allaaghlluwhaghtikayuguftut. Aghulaqut umiilgitnun nunataghhaan tamaghhaan qerngughhnaluki pilluwamun aghneghllagani Kiyaghneghem Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum.
66016015	Ataneq piiq, “Nagataghtek! Taginguunga teglegniightetun! Quyanaghtuq teghhumalghii, aatkani piiftengngwaaghluki ayuqegkangi. Enkaam igleghhnaanghituq amsikaghmi, kayngusaghaannaanghituqlu tesqagani yuget esghaqumegteggu!”
66016016	Taagken tughneghaat qerngughtiit umiilget Armageddon-mun. Tawaten Hebrew-ghmiistun atillgha ayuquq.
66016017	Taagken maaghraghvinliitangita yaqulgem sagneni kuuvaa eslakun. Temple-mi umiilgusigneng aqumutaghllagegneng iglagtupiglluni ma piiq, “Apeghiightuq!”
66016018	Taawa nighwaagpagtaghtuq, tengngaagtaghtuq, kallituq, nunallu ufsuguteghllagtuq. Taana nunam ufsugutelleghllaga seghlelleghpigaaguq Kiyaghneghem yungllaghyuggallghaneng.
66016019	Neghllak pelleghtuq pingayughqelluni. Nunatlu neghllagit qamagtengngwaaghluteng naavuutut. Kiyaghneghem neqamikii Babylon-eghllagem seghleghqellghi. Enkaam meghestaa wine-a qayuusimelnguq sakritelleghllagmineng imaqelghii.
66016020	Qamaglluteng qiighqat aviighuquutut, qamagllutengllu naayghat kaavuutut.
66016021	Kaftekragrugllaget 100 uqigtutkavzilghiit qilagameng ifkaquutut yugnun. Enkaam tamaakut yuget sanguughteghllagaat Kiyaghneq apalluqluki kaftekragrugllaget. Taana seghleliilleghllak seghlepigulghii.
66017001	Taagken yaqulget maaghraghvinlegneng sagnelget, taakuneng ataasim takulunga piinga, “Tagi, kelguviknaqamken aghyuulleghqaaneng apeghseghuum aghnam yugusimineng akikikayugem, aqumgalghii meghllagteggun.
66017002	Nunam umiilgi seghleghqaqut atuqaqluku aghnaq. Seghleghet atuqistillghi wine-etun ayuqut, enkaam nunam yugi suumaqut meneghmegteggu wine-nga.”
66017003	Taagken yaqulgem Taghneghagnekun aglaataanga kilgaanun. Tawani esghaghaqa aghnaq aqumgalghii kavirrakegtakun teghikusalluugkun. Teghikusalluuk igaqughvikngaftuq uzimun sanguughtusineng ateghneng Kiyaghneghmun. Maaghraghvinlek naasqulguftuq, quulnguftutlu sighunghi.
66017004	Aghnaq pilugugngaftuq esneyaaghmengllu kavirrakegtamengllu, enkaam ullngaqluni gold-meng, akitughllagmeng uyghagmeng, pearl-mengllu. Tugumiiqeftaa gold-a qayuusiq esleqngalghii seghleghnalghiineng kiyaghtaalleghneng, nukeggnalghiinengllu sex-kun seghleghqellghaneng.
66017005	Qawaani igaqngaftuq ateq qayvighsimangilnguq whaten pisiq, Apeghseghuq Babylon, naakaat yugusimeggneng akikikayuget aghnat, seghleghnallghanengllu nunam.
66017006	Esghaghaqa aghnaq suumelghii aawitneng Kiyaghneghem yugita, aawitnengllu tuququqat qayughllak ataasiighmelnguut Jesus-mun. Esghaghluku aghnaq saghiighayugllagtunga.
66017007	Iwernga yaqulgem piinga, “Sangavek saghiighayugsin? Ungipaannaqamken qayvighsimangilngughmeng sameng pisiitkek aghnaankuk, teghikusalluugenkuk. Taana teghikusalluuk igleghutilghii aghnameng, naasqulguuq maaghraghvinlek, sighunelguuqlu qula.
66017008	Teghikusalluuk esghaqan unguvayalghiinguuq, Iwernga tuqukaaguq. Mayughllequq Saamnangilngughmeng Laagwaaghmeng naafqellengnaluni. Yulguuq nunami aatghit igaqellghilnguut Igiitgun Unguvallghem nuna piinlillghilluku. Tamaakut yuget esghaqumegteggu teghikusalluuk saghiighayugllequt qayughllak unguvayalghii, tuqukaq iwernga tagiyaghqaq.
66017009	“Sumeghtaghayuqam liigikelleqaa una: Maaghraghvinlek naasqut maaghraghvinleguut qemit aghnam aqumgavigi.
66017010	Taakut naasqut maaghraghvinleguutlu umiilget. Tallimat tuqukaagut, ataasiq igleghutinguuq, enkaam ataasiq salin tagingigatuq. Tagikumi igleghutiyaghqaaguq natengiighhaq.
66017011	Teghikusalluuk unguvayalghii iwernga tuqukaq, pingayuneng ingluliitnguuq umiilek. Taana pingayuneng ingluliita umiilek ilakaat sivuliit maaghraghvinlek umiilget, naafqellengyaghtuuguq.
66017012	“Esghaqaghten qula sighunghet, qulanguut umiilget salin igleghutingigatut. Iwernga aghtughyaghqaanghillengellequt igleghutiyaghqaaluteng ataasiq aflu maligulluteng teghikusalluugmun.
66017013	Taakut ataasiq umyugaqluku tuunelleqiit teghikusalluugmun aghtughyaghqaanghilletengllu pilleghqatengllu.
66017014	Enkaam pilluwaghlleqaat Penniighaghaq. Iwernga Penniighaghaam kayaalqelleqii qayughllak Atanqegkangat atanghet, Umiilkegkangatlu umiilget. Penniighaghaghmelnguut tuqluqaagut, nakmikegkaagut, ataasiighmelnguugutlu.”
66017015	Taagken yaqulgem piinga, “Esghaghaten meghet aghnam yugusimineng akikikayugem aqumgavigi. Taakut meghet yulghuteghllaguut nunataghhaaneng tamaghhaaneng pinguut, ulukelghiit allaaghhiinaghmeng.
66017016	Esghaqaghpek qula sighunghet, teghikusalluugemllu, ugumiilleqaat aghnaq yugusimineng akikikayuk. Saqraggiighulluku, amsiqaghqelluku, kemga neghluku, taagken siipnegha kumaghlleqaat.
66017017	Taakut qula sighunghet tawaten pikaagut qayughllak Kiyaghneghem ellngitnun atuqestekaqaa piyukelleni. Angeghqumatkaagutlu tuunaluki ataneghpagulleteng teghikusalluugmun. Tawaten pikaagut kenlanga Kiyaghneghem piyukellgha apeghiillghanun.
66017018	Taana aghnaq esghaqan neghllaguuq igleghutilghii umiilgitneng nunat.”
66018001	Taam kingunganeng esghaghaqa ilanga yaqulek qilagmeng ukilghii. Aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllaguftuq, nighughqelleghmineng iingunaghhaan nuna nighugtaa.
66018002	Akilghuughllagtuq, “Naavumaaq! Naavumaaq Babylon-eghllak! Nekaaghsimaat tughneghaat, nukeggnalghiit tughneghaat, ukmanginneghilnguut kusgenalghiit qawaaget.
66018003	Babylon-em seghletun atuqillgha sex-meng wine-etun ayuquq, nunataghhan tamaghhaan meghaa. Nunam umiilgita atuqaqaat, nunamllu akilpegaghtengita aklungighisiqngwaat nuqetusaghqaanghilngughqun sex-kun atuqiyullghakun.”
66018004	Taagken nagaqughaqa ilanga ma qilagmeng pilghii, “Yumni, aanleghaatek Babylon-meng! Ilategpenasi seghleghqellghanun aghyuullengnayukafsi ellnganun maligullusi.
66018005	Seghleghqellghi mayughteghllagngaat uusqaghtutkaghmeng qilagtun, Kiyaghneghem neqamikii seghleghqellghi.
66018006	Seghletun piteggu Babylon katam ellngan seghletun pillghatun. Malghughqelluku seghletun pillgha piteggu. Qayuusiikun kuuviteggu wine-a iknaqetulnga malghughqengngaan ellngan atuqaqegkanganeng.
66018007	Ellmineng usuqeghllagaquq, aklungighllanillu atuqaqaa samun alngunak piyukegkaminun. Enkaam ikfiqesteghllagteggullu qivghusteghllagteggullu atunekiitesluku qaghyalleghllaganun. Ellmineng piiquq, ‘Queen-nguunga aqumgalghii umiilgusimkun. Ugingighaanghitunga enkaam qivghunaanghitngwaaghtunga!’
66018008	Tamaaken apalluqluku aghneghhiinaghmi kaalleqaa tuqullghem, qivghullghem, neqangisagllagem. Taagken kenghem paneghlleqaa qayughllak aghyuughistenga, Ataneq Kiyaghneq, aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagtuq.”
66018009	Nunam umiilgi ilatkat atuqillghanunllu qiliighyullghanunllu, esghaqumegteggu agepsaa panellghan qiyakelleqaat, iglagtupigllutengllu qiyakeghllaglleqaat.
66018010	Uyavanlluteng nekevellequt qayughllak alingelghiit ellmengllu ilannayukameng ikfiqellghanun. Pillequt, “Seghleghhaghmeng! Seghleghhaghmeng elpek aangeghllak aghtiigalnguq neghllak, Babylon! Aghyuullenguten ataasighhaghmi aflumi!”
66018011	Nunam akilpegaghtengita qiyaaghwaatkaat qivghughllagumaghmeng, qayughllak kitum alngunak tukfighnaniqangit saghyangit.
66018012	Babylon-mi akilpegaghtet akikaqsaqangit gold-et, silver-et, akitughllaget uyghaget, pearl-etlu; akikaqsaqangitlu qiipaghaghqat ulimaaghet linen-meng, silk-meng, qiipaghaghqatlu iqeghtaqelghiit esnegyaaghet, kavirrakegtatlu. Akikaqsaqangitlu tepkegtepiglleghhiit unaghsit, ulimaaghet naangquneng, akitughllagneng unaghsineng, siiluneng, savikenghaagneng, marble-enengllu.
66018013	Akikaqsaqangitlu cinnamon-et, spice-et, incense-et, myrrh-et, frankincense-et; wine-et, olive-em mesiighi; avlawat, wheat-et; cattle-et, penniighet, kuunit, wagon-et; talwa yuget akikaqsaqangit qepghaghtelaaghuluki.
66018014	Akilpegaghtet Babylon pilleqaat, “Qamaglluteng pinilghiit allgeghsukeghllakaghten aviighutut. Qamagllutengllu aklungighllagten qelmeghllaget aviighutut, allamengllu allgeghsaghqaananighaten!”
66018015	Akilpegaghtet aklungighikat akikiluteng Babylon-mun, nekevghallequt uyavanlluteng qayughllak alingelghiit ilannayukameng ikfiqellghanun. Qiyallequt qivghughllagumaghmeng,
66018016	whatenllu pillequt, “‘Seghleghwaaghuuq! Seghleghwaaghuuq neghllak! Aatkayuguyaghtuq linen-meng, esneyaaghmeng, kavirrakegtamengllu, ullngaqegkayuguyaghtuqlu gold-meng, akitughllagmeng uyghagmeng, pearl-mengllu!
66018017	Ataasimi aflumi aklungighllagiitaa!’ “Qamaglluteng angyalget, yugit, passenger-ngit, akilpegaghtetlu igleghakayuget angyaghpagteggun allgeghunnaluteng kiyaghusighqameggneng, angyaghpagit aghuliiqat uyavanlluteng Babylon-meng kumaghaqngan.
66018018	Esghaghluku agepsaa kumallghan, akilghuugut, ‘Alla neghllagituq whatelngughmeng!’
66018019	Naasquteng pagulalightughiit qiyatkelluku, qivghutkelluku akilghuugut, ‘Seghleghwaaghuuq! Seghleghwaaghuuq neghllak! Aklungighllaganeng qamaglluteng angyaghpalget aklungighikayuguyaghtut! Iwernga ataasimi aflumi aklungighllagiitaa!’”
66018020	Taagken qilagmeng kina piiq, “Kaay qilagmelngughni, quyakiteggu qayughllak Kiyaghneghem naafqaa Babylon! Quyatek Kiyaghneghem yugitni, apostle-eni, uuknaliqistenillu! Kiyaghneghem aghyuughaa qayughllak seghletun pikaqegkangisi!”
66018021	Taagken iknaqeghllalghiim yaqulgem kevgaa uyghagrugllak, grain-mun kagimtisistun ayuqelghii. Miluutaa kellimun, whaten pimaghmi, “Tawateghpigaq neghllak Babylon, Kiyaghneghem miluuteghllaglleqaa asitmun enkaam allamengllu esghaghnaanghitaat.
66018022	Kitum alngunak nagaqughnaanghitii harp-esteten, pillgughikat aynganangasteten, flute-esteten, qalghightaghtetenllu! Qamaglluteng pillgughikat qepghaghteten aviighusaghqaagut, grain-meng kagimtesteten allallu nagaqughnaanghitiit!
66018023	Kenelghutam nighuga kuukgunnaanighnaquq elpeni. Mengik nulightughnaqelghiimllu ugiighnaqelghiimllu nagaqughnanighnaquk elpeni. Akilpegaghteten aghtiigatngwaaghyaghtut nunataghhaani tamaghhaani. Alignaghtaalleghpegun puughquqaqaten qamagtengngwaaghluki nunam yugi!
66018024	Babylon-mi taawa aawit uuknaliqistet, Kiyaghneghem yugi, qamagllutengllu tuqutkat nunami.”
66019001	Kingunganeng iknaqeghllalghiim yaqulgem akuzillghan, qilagmi nagaqughanka yulghuteghllaget akilghuulghiit, “Hallelujah! Yugulilleq, quulvalleq, aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu Kiyaghnemta pikii!
66019002	Ellngan nanqigtillghi ipanguut, elqughutngaat! Ellngan aghyuuqaqaa apeghseghuq aghnaq yugusimineng akikikayuk qayughllak nunam yugi seghletun pistekangi sex-kun atuqestaqluni. Kiyaghneghem akitkaqaa qayughllak qepghaghtengi tuququghtestekangi.”
66019003	Yulghuteghllaget akilghuulaataghtut, “Hallelujah! Neghllagem kumalghiim agepsaa mayuuguq quunperugllak kenlengunaan!”
66019004	Taagken yuginaq estamat siipneqluki elder-et, estamatlu unguvalghiit niinghuquulluteng manigughaat Kiyaghneq, aqumgalghii umiilgusigmikun. Pikaat, “Amen! Hallelujah!”
