66019005	Taagken umiilgusigneng aqumutaghllagegneng ma whaten piiq, “Usuqiteggu Kiyaghneghput, qamagllusi qepghaghtengani alikilghiini ellnganeng, ukavanlengughnillu aangwaaghnillu!”
66019006	Taagken nagaqughanka llangaqa mengit yulghuteghllaget. Nagatkaaluteng suksugistun tevlughteghllalghiit meghet, kallugemllu tengngaagtallghatun ayuqluteng. Akilghuugut, “Hallelujah! Ataneq Kiyaghneghput, Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq igleghutiiq!
66019007	Quyatelta, elngaatall quyaghllageltallu usuqelteggullu! Penniighaghaam nengughtelleghqaa kaatuq, nuliighqaallu yataaghqumaaq.
66019008	Kiyaghneghem aasightuumaa ugiighnaqelghii pinighrakegtameng qatelghiimeng linen-meng.” (“Linen-a” whaten pisiiguq, elqughutngalghiit aneghneghqillghet Kiyaghneghem yugita piiqegkangit.)
66019009	Taagken yaqulgem piinga, “Una igaqigu: Penniighaghaam nengughtellghan neqenghaghqellghanun neghyaghtiisqegkat quyastekaagut.” Whatenllu piinga, “Ukut ipanguut akuzitangi Kiyaghneghem.”
66019010	Taagken niinghutunga yaqulgem itegaakun manigughnaluku, iwernga piinga, “Tawaten pigpenang! Manigughhu Kiyaghneq! Qepghaataqaqa Kiyaghneq elpetun, ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu. Ellnginguut ataasiighmelnguut ipalleghmun Jesus-em apeghtuusaqegkaanun. Ipalleq Jesus-em apeghtuusaqegkaa taananguuq ipalleq Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenka uuknaliqistenun ungipaqestekaa.”
66019011	Taagken esghaghaqa qilak qelpelghii, taawa qatelghii kuuni! Kuunikun igleghlleghhiim aatgha “Ataasiighmelnguq, Ipapik”. Elqughutngaat nanqigtillghi, pilluwaqangillu anguyani.
66019012	Iiskek kumaghullghatun kenghem ayuqlutek, naasqumikun qaghpalghutelguftuq. Aatgha ellngakun igaqngaftuq kitum alngunak nallukegkanga iwerngaqun ellnginaan.
66019013	Atkuyaaghek atukek neptekaaftuk aawkun. Aatqeftaa, “Kiyaghneghem Akuzitanga”.
66019014	Qilagmeng pilluwaghtengita maligsaaghaat uuglluteng qatelghiitgun kuunitgun, atkuyaaghluteng iqangilngughmeng qatelghiimeng linen-meng.
66019015	Qaanghaneng aanuq ipelghii savigpak, taaggun qamagtengngwaaghluki nakumiit kayaalqughlleqii. Igleghulleqii iron-meng anagutalighluni. Taagken tutmaghlleqii anguyani katam yuget tutmaghaqellghistun grapes-et qageghquusignilnguut. Taana tutmalleq sakraalleghllakaa Kiyaghneghem Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguum.
66019016	Atkuyaaghakunllu qugtuqaakunllu igaqngaftuq ateq whaten; Umiilga umiilget, Atangha atanghet.
66019017	Taagken esghaghaqa yaqulek nekevghalghii siqineghqun. Qamaglluki qawaalghutet quulvani tengaalghiit iglagtupiglluni pii, “Tagilaghaallusi qerngughutek Kiyaghneghem neqenghaghqelleghllaganun!
66019018	Tagitek, neghyaghtughteki kemegkwaaghit umiilget, pilluwaghtet umiilgit, pilluwaghtetlu. Neghyaghtughteki kemegkwaaghit kuunit, kuunikun igleghtestet, qamagllukillu yuget, qepghaghtelaaghet, qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguut, ukavanlenguut, aangwaaghetlu.”
66019019	Taagken esghaghanka teghikusalluuklu, nunamllu umiilgi, pilluwaghtekullghiit qerngughutut pilluwaghnaluku igleghlleghhii kuunikun, pilluwaghtengillu.
66019020	Tugwaagket teghikusalluugenkuk, uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk allaaghlluwaghtiighaataqaq tawanlluku teghikusalluuk. (Allaaghlluwaghtiiqelleghmikun puughquqii nalluniillengegkat teghikusalluugmeng, maniguqaatlu nangaghnegha.) Teghikusalluugenkuk, uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk unguvaagkenka miluutaak naayvam kenghanun kumaghulghiimun sulphur-meng.
66019021	Pilluwaghtengik kuunikun igleghlleghhiim tuququghii savigpagkun qaneghmineng aanegkakun. Taagken qamaglluteng qawaaget neghiit kemegkwaaghit kepsuqiinalleghmeggnun.
66020001	Taagken esghaghaqa yaqulek qilagmeng ukilghii tugumiiqluni key-nganeng Saamnangilnguum Laawaaghem, qiipraghuteghllagnengllu.
66020002	Kayaalqelluku dragon-a tuwaa. (Dragon-a taananguuq ayumightaq nemeghyaq, aatgha Tughneghaq, Tughneghaq.) Taagken yaqulgem asighqaa qiipraghutneng thousand ayumiqulleghnun.
66020003	Miluulluku Laawaaghmun, taagken amigmeng uumgulluku maghqatutkaa seal-eluku. Enkaam Dragon-em puughsaghqaananighii yuget kenlanga thousand ayumiqullghet alpallghitnun. Alpakata itemutaghlleqaat.
66020004	Taagken esghaghanka umiilgusit aqumutat, aqumgalghiitlu taakutgun. Kiyaghneghem nanqigtiyaghqaaghtestekii yugneng. Eshaghankallu unguvasiit tamaakut naasqwightuqiit apalluqluku Jesus. Ungipaqegkaqegkangat ipalleq Jesus-em qayvighqegkaa, akuzitangillu Kiyaghneghem. Taakut maniguusimangitut teghikusalluugmun, nalighmeng nangaghneghanun. Talwa qagumegteggun, nalighmeng iiggmegteggun allgeghtellghitaat nalluniilkutaa teghikusalluugem. Unguvaghtuulluteng igleghutilgusighaat Christ-a thousand ayumiqulleghnun.
66020005	Taana sivuliiguq unguvaghqulleq. (Ilangi tamaakut tuqukat unguvaghtuunnaanghitut kenlanga thousand ayumiqullghet alpallghitnun.)
66020006	Tamaakut Kiyaghneghem unguvaghtekii unguvaghtuusuwhaalleghmi quyastekaagutlu agleghnaghtutlu. Tuqunaanghitut tuunglighhaani tuqullghem. Iwernga priest-ngunaqnguut Kiyaghneghmunllu Christ-amunllu. Igleghutilgusighlleqaatlu Christ-a thousand ayumiqulleghni.
66020007	Thousand ayumiqullghet alpakata, Tughneghaq anusimingllaghviganeng itemusaghqaaguq.
66020008	Enkaam aanluni puughqughlleqii nunatat mingitngalghiit nunataghhaani tamaghhaani. Tamaakut nunatat aatqiit Gog-enkuk Magog-enkuk. Yugik uglaghllagtut qenaavzeghaatun esnem. Taagken Tughneghaam qerngughlleqii pilluwamun.
66020009	Tughneghaam pilluwaghtengi iqelmun mingilluteng igleghllequt nunakun. Kaalluteng kangllulleqagket nunaaqlu Kiyaghneghem yugita nayaat, neghllaklu Kiyaghneghem piniqegkaa. Taagken qilagmeng Kiyaghneghem keneq ukigtesluku paneghtekii pilluwaghtet.
66020010	Taagken Tughneghaq puughtikaq nunataneng, Kiyaghneghem yaqulgita miluulleqaat naayvamun kumaghulghii sulphur-meng. Tawavek miluutkaqegkegket teghikusalluugenkuk, uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk. Tawani ikfiqeghllagllequt aghneghtuumaan unugtuumaan quunperugllak kenlengunaan.
66020011	Taagken esghaghaqa Kiyaghneq aqumgalghii qatelghiignekun umiilgusignekun aqumutaghllagegnekun. Nunallu qilagallu qimaaguutuk Kiyaghneghem tawantellghaneng, allallu esghaghyaghqaagpenatek.
66020012	Esghaghankallu tuqulaghaatkat, ukaliiwaqlutengllu aangwaaghwaaqlutengllu ayuqelghiit. Nekevghatnguftut sivungani umiilgusim aqumutaghllagem. Taagken igat qelpeghtiit, Igii Unguvallghem, igaqughvikegkat aatghitneng tamaakut unguvayaghqat quunperugllak. Ilangillu igalghutet qelpeghtiit igaqughvikegkat tuqukat kiyaghtaallghitneng ayuqelghiit. Kiyaghneghem nanqigtii atuqluki igaquqat igatgun.
66020013	Taagken kelliim tuqumasliini pegtii. Tuqullghemllu Hades-emllu tuqumasliitek pegtiik. Qamagtengngwaaghluki Kiyaghneghem nanqigtii kiyaghtaallghistun.
66020014	Taagken Tuqulleqlu Hades-lu miluutagket naayvam kenghanun. Naayvam kengha tuungliqaa tuqullghem.
66020015	Kitum alngunak aatgha igaqumangilkan Igaani Unguvallghem, miluutkaat naayvam kenghanun.
66021001	Taagken esghaghagka qilagraghaqlu nunaghraghaqlu. Qilaksuwhaaghiisimaaq, nunaksuwhaaghiisimaaq, kelliingiitkaaguqlu.
66021002	Esghaghaqallu Agleghnalghii Neghllak, Jerusalem-eghraghaq, ukilghii Kiyaghneghmeng qilagmelngughmeng. Neghllak yataaghqelluni ugiighnaqelghiim ullngaqellghatun ugiminun.
66021003	Nagaqughaqa ma iglagtupiglleghhii umiilgusigneng aqumutagneng pilghii, “Esghaqaghhuqun, Kiyaghneghem kiyaghfiga yugnituq! Kiyaghfikelleqii enkaam ellngit yukelleqii. Kiyaghneq ellnga katam ellngitnillequq enkaam ellnga Kiyaghneqelleqaat.
66021004	Quningighlleqii qamaglluki. Tuqungiilleqaa, qivghungiilleqaa, qiyangiilleqaa, talwa aqnighqengngiilleqaa qayughllak tamaakut atuqsaqangit atuqnanighlleqiit.”
66021005	Taagken umiilgusignilnguq aqumutagni piiq, “Esghaqaghqiqun, ulimaaqanka sangwaat qamagtengngwaaghluki nutaghaaluki!” Whatenllu piiq, “Igaqiki tamaakut aapqanka elpenun qayughllak tamaakut akuzitet ipanguut, ugpeqsaghqaagutlu.”
66021006	Piingallu, “Apeghiightuq! Whanga Alpha-nguunga Omega-nguunga, whanga piinleghuunga kenlenguunga. Kina alngunak meqsulghii, akingunaan meghsilleqaqa sengngulghiimeng unguvallengestikayugmeng meghmeng.
66021007	Kitum alngunak kayaalqiilghiim allgeghlleqii tamaakut whangamneng. Kiyaghneqelleqaatnga enkaam ellngit avaqutaqelleqanka.
66021008	Iwernga tamaakut quyughtalghiit, ugpeqillghilnguut, seghlelleghpigaghneng seghleghqelghiit, yugtaghtet, nengughtegpenateng atuqullghiit, alignalghiit, maniguutkayuget kiyaghnengllaqanun, qamagllutengllu iqlengalghiit, nekaghqaat naayvaaguq kumaghulghii keneghmengllu sulphur-mengllu. Taananguuq tuunglii tuqullghem.”
66021009	Taagken yaqulget maaghraghvinlegneng sagnelget esleqngalghiineng kingulighneng seghleliilleghllagneng, ataasim taakuneng takwaanga. Piinga, “Tagi, kelguviknaqamken Ugiighnaqelghiimeng, nuliighqaa Penniighaghaam.”
66021010	Kiyaghneghem Taghneghagkenkun yaqulgem tugulunga aglaataanga uusqalleghpigaanun naaygham. Tawani kelgutaa Jerusalem, Agleghnalghii Neghllak ukilghii Kiyaghneghmeng qilagmelngughmeng.
66021011	Kuukgutngaghmi Kiyaghneghem nighughqellghaneng. Neghllak kuukgutuq akitughllalghiitun uyghagtun, jasper-etun, meghraakegtutkaghmi crystal-etun.
66021012	Uusqaghllagmeng mingllutelek, qula maalghuk siipneqluku amigllalgaataq. Qula maalghuk siipneqluku yaqulget amigllagniteftut. Ataasikaghtaghmeng amigllaget igaqfikngaftut ateghmeng qula maalghuk siipneqluku ramkenganeng Israel-em.
66021013	Mingllutanga neghllagem qula maalghuk siipneqluku amigllalek, pingayut asivaghmi, pingayut aywaani, pingayut ikevaghmi, pingayut pakfallami.
66021014	Neghllagem mingllutanga tunemiqaaftuq qula maalghuk siipneqluku uyghagneng. Ataasikaghtaghmeng uyghaget igaqfikngaftut ateghmeng qula maalghuk siipneqluku apostle-nganeng Penniighaghaam.
66021015	Yaqulek aleghqughteka gold-meng usputalguftuq usputaghnaluku neghllak, amigllagillu mingllutangallu.
66021016	Neghllak ulluviighrakegteftuq tagtalnga, pateghtulngatun ayuqeftuq. Yaqulgem neghllak usputaghyaqminigu: 1,500 miles tagtalkeftaa, pateghtulkeftaa, uusqaghtulkeftaallu.
66021017	Mingllutangallu usputaghyaqminigu, 216 feet-nguftuq uusqaghtulnga. Yaqulgem usputallghatun ayuqeftuq yugem usputallgha.
66021018	Mingllutanga ulimaaghuftuq jasper-meng. Neghllak ulimaaghuftuq gold-eperegwaaghmeng. Gold-a meghraakegtepiglleghhii siqinwhaaghtun.
66021019	Neghllagem mingllutangan tunemii pinighnaaqusighluteng allaaghhiinaghneng akitughllagneng uyghagneng. Sivuliq jasper-nguftuq, tuunglighhaa sapphire-nguftuq, pingayiitangat agate-nguftuq, estamiitangat emerald-nguftuq,
66021020	tallimiitangat onyx-nguftuq, aghvinliitangat carnelian-nguftuq, maaghraghvinliitangat chrysolite-nguftuq, pingayuneng ingluliitangat beryl-nguftuq, estamaneng ingluliitangat topaz-nguftuq, quulngughutangat chrysoprase-nguftuq, qula ataasiq siipniitangat jacinth-enguftuq, qula maalghuk siipniitangat amethyst-nguftuq.
66021021	Qula maalghuk siipneqluku amigllaget pearl-nguftut, tamaghhaghmeng amigllaget ataasimeng pearl-meng ulimaaghuftut. Neghllagem tuumngi gold-eperegwaaghuftut; gold-a meghraakegtepiglleghii siqinghwaaghtun.
66021022	Neghllagmi esghaanneghitunga Temple-meng, qayughllak Temple-nga Atanghuuq Kiyaghneq Aghtughyaghqaghhaanghilnguq, Penniighaghaaguqlu.
66021023	Neghllak siqineghsughniituq, nalighmeng tanqighsughniituq nighugkameng, qayughllak nighughqellgha Kiyaghneghem nighukegkanga, Penniighaghaqlu kenelghutaqegkanga.
66021024	Qamagtengngwaaghluteng nunam yugi kiyaghllequt nighugakun kuukgutngalghiikun. Nunamllu umiilgita aklungiteng tagiquutiit neghllagmun.
66021025	Neghllagem amigllagi umegnaanghitut aghneghem naangneghani qayughllak unugnaanghilnguq tamaani.
66021026	Nunam yugita neghllagmun tagiquulleqiit pinighnaghllaget aklungiteng.
66021027	Iwernga neghllagmun iteghyaghqaanghituq sangwaa seghleq, talwa kina alngunak seghleghnatun pista, nalighmeng iqlengiqesta. Iwernga neghllagmun iteghyaghqaagut tamaakunginaghhaat aatghit igaqngalghiit Igaakun Unguvallghem. Taakut Igat Penniighaghaam pikii.
66022001	Taagken yaqulgem kelguvikaanga kiiwegneng maaqelghiik Kiyaghneghemllu Penniighaghaamllu umiilgusigkenka aqumutagkeneng. Unguvallelitikayugmeng melgek, meghraakegtutkalghiik crystal-etun.
66022002	Maaqngalghiik qukaakun tumangan neghllagem. Kiiwek inglugtun uqfigtuqak unguvallelitikayugneng. Tamaghhaghmi uqfik piitestikayuguuq fruit-neng tanqiinaghqun, ayumiqulleghmi, ququngiitlu naallghutusiiftut nunataanun.
66022003	Sangwaa alngunak Kiyaghneghem nanqigtekaa aghyuughyaghqaaluku, neghllagmennaanghituq. Kiyaghneghenkuk Penniighaghhaankuk umiilgusik aqumutagket neghllagmesaghqaaguk, Kiyaghneghemllu qepghaghtengita manigughlleqaat.
66022004	Gginaa esghaghlleqaat, aatghallu qawiitgun igaqngallequq.
66022005	Tamaani unugnanighlleqaa, kenelghutaghsughniighulleqii, nalighmeng siqineghsughniighulleqii, qayughllak Ataneq Kiyaghneq nighukelleqaat. Igleghutillequtlu umiilguluteng quunperugllak kenlengunaan.
66022006	Taagken yaqulgem piinga, “Ukut akuzitet ugpeqsaghqaagut, ipanguutlu. Atanghem, Kiyaghneghem igleghutilghiim taghneghiitneng uuknaliqistemi, kayagtekaqaa yaquleni kelguvikesqelluki qepghaghteni sangwaat piyaghtungestaghniluki.”
66022007	Jesus piiq, “Nagatek! Tagiyaghtughtunga! Quyastekaagut qaatkullghiit uuknaliqelleghnun igaqngalghiinun ukutgun igatgun.”
66022008	Whanga, John, nagatkaqankallu esghaqaqankallu tamaakut. Nagaqughaqngamkillu esghaghaqngamkillu tamaakut, niinghutunga yaqulgem itegaani manigughnaluku, kelguvikisteka tamaaken.
66022009	Iwernga piinga, “Tawaten pigpenang! Whangallu qepghaghtenguunga elpetun, ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu uuknaliqistestun, qaatkullghiistunllu akuzitangitnun ukut igat. Manigughhu Kiyaghneq!”
66022010	Piingallu, “Aksaqegpenaki uuknaliqellghet ukut igat aapqiit, qayughllak tamaakut pilleghqiit kaasaghtuumaat.
66022011	Kina alngunak seghletun pilghii nagneghli seghletun, enkaam kina alngunak nukeggnameng suumqelghii nagneghli nukeggnameng suumqelluni. Kina alngunak elqughutngalghii nagneghli elqughutngaluni, kinallu alngunak pelungilnguq nagneghli pelungilluni.”
66022012	Jesus piiq, “Nagatek! Tagiyaghtughtunga! Akileghtuusaghqanka kelqelleqanka nallangightughnaluki yuget kiyaghtaallghistun.
66022013	Whanga Alpha-nguunga Omega-nguunga, whanga sivuliigunga kinguliigunga, whanga piinleghuunga kenlenguungallu.”
66022014	Quyastekaagut tamaakut atkuyaateng aghvikiit iqangiitesluki. Tamaaken apalluqluku neghyaghqaaghtekaagut piitestekaaneng unguvallelitikayugem uqfigem. Iteghyaghqaaghtekaagutlu neghllagem amigllagitgun.
66022015	Iwernga neghllagem eslataanilnguut qikmiigut, alignalghiinguut, nengughtegpenateng atuqistenguut, yugtaghtenguut, kiyaghnengllaqanun maniguutestenguut, iqlengiqsuneghtuut, iqlengiqumanginaghaqutlu.
66022016	“Whanga, Jesus, kayagtekaqaqa yaqulka elpesinun ugpeqanun yughaghvignilngughnun. Apeghlleqaak ukuk elpesinun, ‘Whanga David-em kingunqaanga, whanga nighugrakegtaagunga unaangum ighaleqetaagha.’”
66022017	Taghneghaklu Ugiighnaqelghiillu piik, “Tagi!” Tamaghhaghmillu nagallghii pili, “Tagi!” Kina alngunak meqsulghii tagili; tuguklighligu akingilnguq meq unguvallelitikayuk.
66022018	Whanga, John, kelengasaaghyuganka nagallghiit uuknaliqelleghnun igaqegkatgun ukutgun igatgun. Kitum alngunak ilaraaqaki uuknaliqutkegkat ukuni igani, Kiyaghneghem aghyuughlleqaa. Ellnganun ilalleqii tamaakut seghleliilleghllaget igaqngalghiit ukutgun igatgun.
66022019	Kitum alngunak ikuvikegkaki uuknaliqutkegkat ukuni igani, Kiyaghneghem iqilleqii nengighqii piitestekat uqfiganeng unguvallelitikayugem. Kiyaghtesnaanghitaallu agleghnalghiimi neghllagmi. Taakuk apeghngaak ukuni igani.
66022020	Jesus-nguuq aapghilghii tamaaken qamaglluteng ipanguniluki. Piiqlu, “Ipapestaaq tagiyaghtughtunga!” Amen. Tagi, Ataneq Jesus!
66022021	Nangllegtallgha Atanemta Jesus-em tamaghhaghpesinilli. Amen.
